॥ ṇamo tthu ṇaṃ samaṇassa bhagava+o mahāvīrassa ॥


॥ namaḥ śrī+antarikṣapārśvanāthāya ॥

tārkikacakracakravarti-pravacanaprabhāvakācāryabhagavacchrīmallavādikṣamāśramaṇapraṇītaṃ
śrīmatsiṃhasūrigaṇivādikṣamāśramaṇasandṛbdhayā nyāyāgamānusāriṇyā
nayacakravālavṛttyā samalaṅkṛtaṃ dvādaśāraṃ
nayacakram .
ṭīkāntargatapratīkādyanusāreṇa saṅkalpitam

prathamo vidhyaraḥ
nyāyāgamānusāriṇī nayacakravālavṛttiḥ

॥ oँ namo vītarāgāya ॥ aiँ namaḥ ॥


mūlam

vyāpyekasthamanantamantavadapi nyastaṃ dhiyāṃ pāṭave
vyāmohe na, jagatpratānavisṛtivyatyāsadhīrāspadam .
vācāṃ bhāgamatītya vāgviniyataṃ gamyaṃ na gamyaṃ kvaci
jjainaṃ śāsanamūrjitaṃ jayati tad dravyārtha-paryāyataḥ ॥



jayati nayacakranirjitaniḥśeṣavipakṣacakravikrāntaḥ .
śrīmallavādisūrirjinavacananabhastalavivasvān ॥


tatpraṇītamahārthayathārthanayacakrākhyaśāstravivaraṇamidamanuvyākhyāsyāmaḥ . sa bhagavānaidaṃyugīnopapattirucibhavyajanānugrahārthamarhatpravacanānusāri nayacakraśāstramāripsurmaṅgalārthaṃ śāsanastavaṃ vakṣyamāṇavastūpasaṃhārārthamādyaṃ vṛttamāha --vyāpyekasthamityādi . vyāpnotīti vyāptuṃ śīlamasyeti vā vyāpi, auṇādikastācchīliko vā . kiṃ vyāpyam ? aviśeṣitatvāt sarvaṃ paramāṇvādi vastu . tat kathaṃ jainena śāsanena
vyāpyata iti cet, dravyārthādeśāt . tadyathā--ekaparamāṇurvarṇa-gandha-rasa-sparśapariṇāmaiḥ saprabhedaiḥ
svābhāvikaiḥ puraskṛtaiḥ paścātkṛtaiśca dvyaṇukādibhiḥ sāṃyogikairmahāskandhaparyantairvaisrasikaiḥ prāyogikaiśca
kārmaṇaśarīrādibhirabhisambadhyate . yathoktam—
ekkadaviyammi je atthapajjayā vayaṇapajjayā vā vi .tītāṇāgatabhūtā tāva+i+aṃ taṃ hava+i davvaṃ ॥ sanmati॰ 1 . 31
tathā gati-sthityavagāha-vartanālakṣaṇairdharmādharmākāśakālairāpekṣikaiḥ jīvānāmapi svābhāvikapārabhāvikairupayoga-śarīrādibhiḥ . atastasya tasya vastuno dravyārthādiṣṭasya teṣu teṣu pariṇāmeṣu avyāvṛttasvarūpatvāt
teṣāṃ ca tathā tadabhedāt sarveṣāṃ dravya-paryāyāṇāṃ parasparataśca sadaviśeṣāt tādātmyam . atastat tad
vyāpnotīti vyāpi ityucyate .

evaṃ ca sati atisammugdhatvād vastunastadviṣayayorabhidhāna-pratyayayorvyavahāra-viniścayaphalayorabhāvādidoṣāḥ syuḥ . mā bhūvanniti paryāyādeśa āśrīyate --ekasthamiti, pratyekaparisamāpterasādhāraṇadharmāṇāṃ
bhāvānāmasaṅkīrṇarūpatvena svavṛttipratilambhāt, na hi kaścit kañcidapekṣya bhavitumarhati bhāva ityekamekameva
vastu . tadarpaṇāt ekastham iti cocyate śāsanam, tasya tasya pṛthak pṛthagarpaṇāt sva-pararūpataḥ .
samagrādeśavaśād vyāpīti vyāpi ca ekasthaṃ caikameva tat . evamuttareṣvapi .
anantamantavadapi, dravya kṣetra-kāla-bhāvādeśairaviśeṣitatvād viśeṣitatvācca . yathoktam--
evaṃ duvālasaṃgaṃ gaṇipiḍagaṃ davvato egaṃ purisaṃ paḍucca sādiyaṃ sapajjavasiyaṃ, aṇege purise paḍucca
aṇādiyaṃ apajjavasiyaṃ . khettato bharateravate paḍucca sādiyaṃ sapajjavasiyaṃ, mahāvidehe paḍucca aṇādiyaṃ
apajjavasiyaṃ . kāla+o ussappiṇi-avasappiṇī+o paḍucca sādiyaṃ sapajjavasiyaṃ, ṇo+ussappiṇiavasappiṇī+o paḍucca aṇādiyaṃ apajjavasiyaṃ . bhāva+o je jadā jiṇapaṇṇattā bhāvā ityādinā
sādiyaṃ sapajjavasitameva nandisū॰ 42 .
athavā nāsminnanto'stīti anantam, anto'stīti antavat . kasya ? aviśeṣitatvāt sarvasya .
tadyathoktam--
imā ṇaṃ bhaṃte ! rayaṇappabhā puḍhavī kiṃ sāsayā asāsatā ? gotamā ! siyā sāsayā siyā
asāsayā ? se keṇaṭṭheṇaṃ bhaṃte ! evaṃ vucca+i--siyā sāsayā siyā asāsayatti ? gotamā ! davvaṭṭhatā+e
sāsatā, vaṇṇapajjavehiṃ gaṃdhapajjavehiṃ rasapajjavehiṃ phāsapajjavehiṃ saṃṭhāṇapajjavehiṃ asāsatājīvābhi॰
sū॰ 3 . 1 . 78 ityādi .
nyastaṃ dhiyāṃ pāṭave . nyastaṃ nikṣiptaṃ dhiyāmābhinibodhikabhedānāṃ paṭutāyāṃ kartavyāyāṃ
kāraṇatvenetyarthaḥ . yathoktam --jatthābhinibohi+anāṇaṃ tattha su+anāṇaṃ . jattha su+anāṇaṃ tatthābhi

nibohi+anāṇaṃ nandisū॰ 24 ti . śrutajñānasaṃskṛtadhiyāṃ nitya eva, anitya eva, avaktavya eva ityevamādyekāntavādigrāheṣu ghaṭādeḥ kumbhakārādivetanadānādyabhāvaprasaṅgānna nitya
eva, cikīrṣā-smaraṇa-pratyabhijñāna-saṃrakṣaṇādyabhāvaprasaṅgānnānitya eva, svarūpānavadhāraṇe vāgvyavahārocchittiprasaṅgāt avaktavyaḥ iti vaktavyatvāvaktavyatvayoḥ svavacanavirodhānnāvaktavya ityevamādidoṣapradarśanena, syānnityaḥ, syādanityaḥ, syādavaktavyaḥ ityanekāntābhyupagamād yathāpramāṇaṃ dharma-dharmivyavasthānāt taddoṣaparihāreṇa vastusvarūpopapādanena paramataniṣedhānujñānābhyāṃ pravādināṃ parasparavirodhanirodhaikavākyopānayanād madhyasthasākṣivat pramāṇībhūtam, teṣāmapi tattvāvabodhapāṭavādhānasamarthatvāt .
syānmatam--nanvata eva sthāṇu-puruṣādiviṣayasaṃśaya-viparyayavad nityānityādyekāntavikalpātmakatvād
vyāmohaheturapi, kāla-niyati-svabhāva-puruṣa-daiveśvara-yadṛcchādyekāntakāraṇavikalpajagatpratānavisṛtidarśanāditi . atrocyate --na; vyatyāsadhīrāspadatvāt . ekapuruṣapitṛ-putratvādivajjainaṃ hi śāsanaṃ
kālādijagatprabhedaikāntagatīrvyatyasya vyāvartya parasparavirodhanivāraṇena anekāntātmakapratiṣṭhānasamādhānakāraṇamekāntānekavādasamāhārātmakaikapratipattikaṃ paramataniṣedhānumodanābhyāmeva . na kāla eva, na
niyatireva, ekakāraṇavādināṃ kāraṇasattvavat kāryasattve'naikāntikatvāt, kāraṇasyāpi kāraṇavattve'navasthādoṣādanekakāraṇatvaprasaṅgādanekakāraṇatvasya siddheḥ, anekakāraṇatve'pi sadādyaviśeṣādananvayasyābhāvādityādidoṣāt kālo'pi, niyatirapi ityādi, ekānte doṣadarśanādanekānte cādoṣapradarśanād
laukikavādasaṃvādi . yathoktam--

kvacinniyatipakṣapātaguru gamyate te vacaḥ
svabhāvaniyatāḥ prajāḥ samayatantravṛttāḥ kvacit .
svayaṅkṛtabhujaḥ kvacit parakṛtopabhogāḥ puna-
rna vā viśadavāda ! doṣamalino'syaho vismayaḥ ॥ siddha॰ dvā॰ 3 . 8 iti .

tadevaṃvidhaṃ śāsanamūrjitam, svātantryāt paramatopajīvanavaiklavyarahitatvāt parairāghrātasya susiddhāntāntasyātyāgāt kalpanāntarāśrayaṇābhāvādanākulatvācca . jetṛtvādvā ūrjitam . anantaroktairhetubhirjayati, parasparānuvartinayotsāhabalasampadupetatvādvā jayatyeva, uditapuṇyanayopetacakravartiśāsanavat .

tattu sarvathā yogināṃ gamyam, sarvanayaprapañcasaṃskṛtadhiyāmananuviṣayaprajñatvāt teṣām . asmadādibhirekadeśamāhātmyadarśanāccheṣamāhātmyamanumānena gamyate . na gamyaṃ kvaciditi, yathaikadeśāgamyatve'nabhibhavanīyatve'pi anyatra gamyatā viṣayakhaṇḍapatestathā mā bhūditi na gamyaṃ kvacit . athavā
gamanīyaṃ gamyaṃ pratipādanīyam . na gamyaṃ pratipādanīyam, lokaprasiddhavyavahārānupātisyādvādaparigrahasphuṭapadārthatvādekadeśagateḥ śeṣasugamatvāt . ayogyapuruṣāpekṣayā vā na gamayitavyam, yathā--

sthūlamataye na vācyāḥ sūkṣmā arthāḥ sa tānagṛhṇānaḥ .
vyākulitamanā mithyātvaṃ vā gacchedapariṇāmāt ॥  

athavā prāgasamīkṣyoktārthasamīkaraṇārthaṃ kalpanāntarairna gamanīyaṃ kvacit . yathā bauddhe sarvaṃ
kṣaṇikam iti pratijñāya smṛtyabhijñāna-bandha-mokṣādyabhāvadoṣaparihārārthaṃ santānakalpanā . pradhānanityatāṃ
pratijñāya pariṇāmakalpanā vyaktātmanā kāpile . kriyāvad guṇavat samavāyikāraṇam vai॰
sū॰ 1 . 1 . 15 iti sāmānyadravyalakṣaṇaṃ pratijñāya ekāntanityānityavāde ca tadavyāptiparihārārtham adravyamanekadravyaṃ ca dvividhaṃ dravyam iti dravyatvaṃ ca sāmānya-viśeṣākhyaṃ tattattvam iti
dravya-paryāyanayadvayāśrayaṇena padārthapraṇayanaṃ kāṇabhuje . tathā dravya-guṇa-karmāṇi nānā iti pratijñāya
tadatyantabhede nīlotpalādi-saddravyādisāmānādhikaraṇya-viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvādivyavahārābhāvadoṣabhayāt

śeṣaśāsananyagbhāvenaiva jeṣyati tad yadevamvidham . evamvidhataiva tu
pratipādanīyā . kimeva pratipādyamasti ? dravyārtha-paryāyārthadvitvādyanantāntavikalpo-
tatsiddhyarthaṃ saditi yato dravya-guṇa-karmasu dravya-guṇa-karmabhyo'rthāntaraṃ sā sattā vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 2 . 7--8
ityāśritapadārthavyājena dravyārtha-paryāyārthāśrayaṇaṃ saṅkaradoṣaparihārārthaṃ ca sāmānyasyāntyaviśeṣasya ca
parikalpaneti .
vācāṃ bhāgamatītya vāgviniyatamiti, prajñāpanīyeṣveva bhāveṣu anantāsaṅkhyeyasaṅkhyeyabhāgaguṇahānivṛddhibhyāṃ kṣayopaśamaviśeṣāpekṣayā mativiśeṣābhyupagamāccaturdaśapūrvadharāṇāmeva parasparataḥ,
adyatanapuruṣendriyaśaktyutkarṣāpakarṣavat . uktaṃ ca--

jaṃ coddasapuvvadharā chaṭṭhāṇagayā paropparaṃ hoṃti .
teṇa tu aṇaṃtabhāgo paṇṇavaṇijjāṇa jaṃ suttaṃ ॥


paṇṇavaṇijjā bhāvā aṇaṃtabhāgo u aṇabhilappāṇaṃ .
paṇṇavaṇijjāṇaṃ puṇa aṇaṃtabhāgo su+aṇibaddho ॥


akkharalaṃbheṇa samā ūṇahiyā hoṃti ma+ivisesehiṃ .
te vi ya ma+īvisese su+aṇāṇabbhaṃtare jāṇa ॥ viśeṣāva॰ bhā॰ 63, 62, 64

śeṣaśāsananyagbhāvenaivetyādi . paravādatiraskaraṇena jeṣyatyeva tadavaśyam, stutidvāreṇa bhavatā
tatsāmarthyāṅgīkaraṇāt, nūnametat pratipādayiṣyati bhavān--na tadanurodhenaiva kasyaciditi . kiṃ tat
kasyacit prasādena jayati ? vivadamānasya gale pādaṃ kṛtvā jayatītyabhiprāyaḥ . yadevamvidhamiti, yad
yogināmeva sarvathā gamyam, na gamyaṃ kvacidapyanyeṣām, vācāṃ bhāgamatītya vāgviniyatam, vyāpyekasthamanantamantavadapi, nyastaṃ dhiyāṃ pāṭave, vyāmohe na, jagatpratānavisṛtivyatyāsadhīrāspadaṃ

pakḷptavidhi-bhedapadārthaikavākyavidhividhānādaśeṣajñānāvayavamavabodhasamudrāvayavībhūtaṃ śāsanamevamvivaṃvidhameva .
jagatpratānavisṛtivyatyāsena dhīramāspadamacalaṃ pratiṣṭhānaṃ ca yasya tatra kimāścaryaṃ jayatyūrjitaṃ ca iti ?
kiṃ tarhi ? evamvidhaevaṃvidhataiva tu pratipādanīyā anyamatāsādhāraṇaguṇatā . saiva virodhadharmasambhāvanā'bhāvād duṣpratipādetyabhiprāyaḥ .
atrācārya āha --kimevakimevaṃ pratipādyamasti ? pratipāditameva tat . yasmād dravyārthaparyāyārthetyādi . dravyeṇārtho dravyārthaḥ, dravyamartho'syeti vā . athavā dravyārthikaḥ, dravyamevārtho yasya so'yaṃ
dravyārthaḥ, svārthiko'yaṃ ṭhan pratyayaḥ dravyārthikaḥ . evaṃ paryāyārthaḥ paryāyārthiko vā .
arthāccāsannihite pā॰ vārti॰ 5 . 2 . 135 iti vacanādarthi-pratyarthivadinireva syāditi cet, na; asannidhānābhāvāt tadarthasya . athavā asti ityasya matamāstikaḥ, dravya āstiko dravyāstikaḥ .
tayordvayorbhāvo dvitvaṃ na, tadādayo'nantāntā vikalpāḥ, vacanapathatulyasaṅkhyaparasamayatulyasaṅkhya-
tvānnayānām .

jāva+iyā vayaṇapahā tāva+i+ā ceva hoṃti ṇayavāyā .
jāva+i+ā ṇayavāyā tāva+i+ā ceva parasamayā ॥ sanmati॰ 3 . 47

evaṃvidhavikalpopakḷptanayajālopaṣṭambhavidhi-bhedapadārthānāmekavākyavidhiḥ, tasya vidhānādaśeṣajñānānyavayavā asya sarvanayajanitāni . avabodhasamudra evābhedenāvayavībhūto yasmiṃstadavabodhasamudrāvayavībhūtaṃ śāsanaṃ duravagāhagambhīrākṣobhyapadārtharatnākaratvasāmānyāt, evamvidhaevaṃvidhameveti, uktanayataraṅgabhaṅgasaṅgraha-prastārātmakamavikalapadārthāvadyotanādanekādityasamūhavat kṛtaprakāśaṃ tamaso'vakāśābhāvāt
savitṛsahasravad bhāsvaratvādanabhibhavanīyam .


śeṣaśāsanivacanāni pratyakṣānumānaviniśceyapadārthaviparyayapraṇayanena aśrāvaṇaśabdavādivacanavadāśaṅkāmapi satyatve na janayitumalam .

laukikavyavahāro'pi na yasminnavatiṣṭhate .
tatra sādhutvavijñānaṃ vyāmohopanibandhanam ॥


tadvyatiriktāḥ śāsaninaḥ kapila-vyāsa-kaṇāda-śauddhodani-maskariprabhṛtayaḥ, teṣāṃ vacanāni .
pratyakṣānumānaviniśceyapadārthā rūpādayo ghaṭādayo'gnyādayaśca . teṣāṃ viparyayeṇa praṇayanaṃ taiḥ kṛtam .
tena viparyayapraṇayanena niruktīkṛtaṃ visaṃvādatvam . tat katham ? pratyakṣaviniśceyāstāvad yugapadbhāviṣu
pratiniyatendriyaviṣayeṣu ghaṭādyādhārādṛte grahaṇābhāvānna rūpādaya eva, rūpādyanyatamadharmagrahaṇadvāramantareṇa
ghaṭādyagrahaṇāt tadabhāve tadabhāvācca na dravyamātrameva . ayugapadbhāviṣvapi piṇḍa-śivakādiṣu mṛdagrahaṇe
piṇḍa-śivakādyagrahaṇāt mṛdabhāve piṇḍa-śivakādyabhāvāt na paryāyā eva . mṛdo'pi śivakādyanyatamāvasthāviśeṣāvasthānamantareṇa agrahaṇādabhāvācca na dravyameva . etenāgnyādi-dhūmādiliṅga-liṅgivyavahāro vyākhyātaḥ
kāryānumānaviniśceye'pi na viśeṣā eva, nirmūlatvāt, khapuṣpavat . na sāmānyameva, aviśeṣitatvāt,
khapuṣpavat . tasmādevaṃ pratyakṣānumānaviniśceyapadārtheṣu sarvalokaprasiddheṣu viparyayapraṇayanamanyaśāsaninām—
rūpādaya eva ghaṭaḥ, ghaṭa eva rūpādayaḥ, rūpādayaśca ghaṭaśca rūpādiguṇo'vayavītyarthaḥ, na rūpādayo na
ghaṭa iti vā . aśrāvaṇaśabdavādivacanavaditi sarvalokaprasiddhendriyapratyakṣavirodhivacanodāharaṇādanumānavirodhādyapyudāhṛtameva . āśaṅkāmapi satyatve na janayitumalamiti, niḥsandigdhamevāsatyatvaṃ
teṣāmityarthaḥ .
api ca --laukikavyavahāro'pītyādi yāvad vyāmohopanibandhanamiti . sātiśayabuddhibhirapi
parīkṣakairniratiśayalokaprasiddhyanuvartibhiḥ parātmamataviśeṣapratipattinirākaraṇa-tattvapratipādane kārye, itarathā
sākṣivirahitavyavahāravadaniyatārthaiva parīkṣā syāt . laukikāstu nityānityāvaktavyādyanekāntarūpameva
ghaṭādikamarthamavyutpannā api pratipadya vyavaharanto dṛśyante . tadapahnavapravṛttayaścaikāntavādāḥ nitya eva,
anitya eva, avaktavya eva ghaṭaḥ ityādayaḥ . tatra śeṣaśāsaneṣu sādhvidaṃ sādhu tvidam iti vicāro
vyāmohasyaiva nibandhanaṃ heturityarthaḥ, vicārānavakāśād visaṃvādācca .



lokapratyakṣādiniśceye'pi śeṣaśāsanavisaṃvadanajanitāsthaṃ ca pramāṇadvayasaṃsiddhisampāditapratyayapratiṣṭhāpitātyantaparokṣārthaśraddhānaṃ jinaśāsanam .
asya cārthasya pūrvamahodadhisamutpatitanayaprābhṛtataraṅgāgamaprabhraṣṭaśliṣṭārthakaṇikamātramanyatīrthakaraprajñāpanābhyatītagocarapadārthasādhanaṃ nayacakrākhyaṃ saṅkṣiptārthaṃ
gāthāsūtram--

vidhi-niyamabhaṅgavṛttivyatiriktatvādanarthakavacovat .
jainādanyacchāsanamanṛtaṃ bhavatīti vaidharmyam ॥


lokapratyakṣādiniśceye'pi, kiṃ punaratīndriyārthe ? śeṣaśāsanavisaṃvadanajanitāsthaṃ ca, śeṣaśāsanānāṃ visaṃvadanena janitā āsthā asmin jinaśāsane'smākam idaṃ variṣṭham iti parapakṣadauḥsthityādeva
svapakṣasiddhirāvīteneti . athavā svapakṣasausthityānumānamapyastītyāha --pramāṇadvayasaṃsiddhītyādi .
laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ pratyakṣānumānaprāmāṇyaṃ pratyavisaṃvādāt pūrvanyāyena sthitāsthitamṛttvapṛthubudhnādisaṃsthāno-
pādānakāraṇābhyāṃ dvayena dvayasya vā pratyakṣeṇānumānena ca tadviniśceyapadārthadvayasya saṃsiddhiḥ, tayā sampāditaḥ pratyayaḥ pramāṇaṃ jainyāṃ prakriyāyām, tata eva ca pratiṣṭhāpitamatyantaparokṣe'pyarthe merūttarakurudvīpa-samudra-vimāna-bhavana-narakaprastārapramāṇādau śraddhānaṃ yasmiṃstadidam ūrjitaṃ jayati iti pratyāmnāyate,
anyathā prāmāṇyābhāvāt . yathoktam --pratyakṣagrāhe ca sidhyati parokṣagrāhaḥ sidhyet . tadasiddhau
sambhāvanā'bhāva eva, pratyakṣavisaṃvāditvāt, unmattavākyavat   iti .
asya cārthasyetyādi yāvad gāthāsūtramityanena śāstrārambha-sambandha-prayojanābhidhānam . pūrvamahodadhisamutpatitanayaprābhṛtataraṅgāgamaprabhraṣṭaśliṣṭārthakaṇikamātramiti sambandhaḥ, na svamanīṣikayocyate, pramāṇāgamaparamparāgatamevedamityarthaḥ . anyatīrthakaraprajñāpanābhyatītagocarapadārthasādhanaṃ
prayojanam, śiṣyānugrahasyānyathā kartumaśakyatvāt . nayacakrākhyamārabhyaṃ śāstram, tadantareṇa
tadasiddheḥ . śiṣyasya prasaṅgaviprasṛtadhiyo mā bhūdvyāmoha iti saṅkṣiptārthaṃ gāthāsūtramidam --vidhi-niyametyādi . anyaśāsanānṛtatvapratipādanasādhanamidam . arthāpattyā tu bhavatiśuddhapadoccāraṇavad
vidhi-niyamabhaṅgavṛttiyuktatvājjainaṃ vacaḥ satyamiti gamyate .


vidhirācāraḥ sthitiḥsthitiḥ pravṛttirmaryādā... .... niyamaḥ... .... tayorbhaṅgāḥ--1 vidhiḥ, 2 vidhividhiḥ, 3 vidhervidhi-niyamam, 4 vidherniyamaḥ, 5 vidhi-niyamam, 6 vidhi-niyamasya
vidhiḥ, 7 vidhi-niyamasya vidhi-niyamam, 8 vidhiniyamasya niyamaḥ, 9 niyamaḥ,
10 niyamasya vidhiḥ, 11 niyamasya vidhiniyamam, 12 niyamasya niyamaḥ . teṣāṃ
vṛttiḥ svaviṣayasampātanena bhāvanā arthānām . jainasatyatvasādhanavṛttā tu vṛtti-

tadvyācakṣāṇaḥ sūriḥ vidhi-niyamaśabdāvalaukikau iti paro mā maṃsteti tatparyāyaśabdānuccārayati --vidhirācāra ityādi . vidhīyata iti vidhirbhāvasādhano'dhyāhṛtakartrarthaḥ . yo vidadhāti sa
kartā dravyārthaḥ . ko vidadhāti ? piṇḍaśivakādibhāvān mṛdvidadhāti . tayā hi mṛdā śivakādayo
vidhīyante . lakṣaṇatastu anapekṣitavyāvṛttibhedārtho dravyārtho vidhiḥ, loke dṛṣṭatvāt . ādānamaryādayā
cāra ācāra ātmarūpāparityāgaḥ pararūpānapekṣaḥ . evaṃ sthityādiṣu yojyam . paryāyārthatastu niyamaḥ,
nirādhikye, ādhikyena yamanaṃ niyamaḥ parasparaprativiviktabhavanādidharmalakṣaṇaḥ pratikṣaṇaniyato'vasthāviśeṣo yugapadbhāvyayugapadbhāvī vā rūpādiḥ śivakādiśca yo yo bhavati sa eva sa eveti . paryāyaśabdānāṃ
śeṣāṇāmapyayamartho yathākṣaraṃ yojyaḥ .
tayorbhaṅgā vidhirvidhividhirityādi . tatra vidhiranapekṣitabhedānugativyāvṛttivyāpāro
yathā gauriti . vidhividhistu śuklādibhedaniyamavādinaṃ pratyabhedapratipādanavyāpṛtaḥ--ko'yaṃ śuklādibhedo
nāma gotvavyatiriktaḥ ? iti . vidherniyamo'tiprasaktasya viśeṣe'vasthāpanaṃ vidhipradhānasyaiva tadaṃśe'vasthāpanam, yathā gāṃ śuklāmānayeti . tadubhayātmakaṃ vidhervidhi-niyamam . vidhi-niyamaṃ tu
vidhiśca niyamaśca vidhi-niyamam, dvandvaikavadbhāvaḥ, tulyakakṣau vidhiniyamāveva sahitau, dvyātmakaṃ
sarvamiti . śeṣā yathāyogametadvyākhyānusāreṇa vyākhyeyā bhaṅgāḥ . sāmānyena tu kāraṇaṃ vidhiḥ, kāryaṃ
niyamaḥ, ubhayaṃ vidhi-niyamam, śeṣāstadvikalpā eva .
evaṃ bhaṅgān vyavasthāpyedānīṃ vṛttiṃ vyākhyātukāma āha --teṣāṃ vidhi-niyamabhaṅgānāṃ vṛttiriti .
tasyāstu lakṣaṇam --svaviṣayasampātanena bhāvanā arthānām, ātmīya ātmīye viṣaye viṣaye'vatārya
yayā tadarthā bhāvyante . tathāhi--tathā bhavanti nānyatheti, nitya evākṛtakatvādākāśavat, anitya eva
kṛtakatvād ghaṭavad veti . yathoktam --dravyasyānekātmano'nyatamaikātmāvadhāraṇamekadeśanayanānnayaḥ
  iti . pratyakṣānumānābhyāṃ pūrvavat sthitāsthitamṛttvapṛthubudhnādisaṃsthānopādānakāraṇābhyāṃ vṛtti

rvivakṣitadvādaśavikalpaviśeṣaṇā, anyathā avṛttitvameva vakṣyamāṇavat . sā ca
vidhyādipratyekavṛttirūpākhyānasamadhigamyā .
tatra vidhivṛttistāvad yathālokagrāhameva vastu, svaparaviṣayatāyāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣayoranupapatterasaṃstato vivekayatnaḥ śāstreṣviti .
sāmānyaviśeṣau hi svaviṣayau paraviṣayau vā syātām . tatra sāmānyaṃ tāvadekasya sarvatvād yadi svaviṣayam, sāmānyavirodhaḥ . yadi sāmānyam, tata
tattvamityata āha --jainasatyatvasādhanavṛttā tu vṛttirvivakṣitadvādaśavikalpaviśeṣaṇeti, tatsamā-
hāraikarūpatayā tattvānvākhyānamityarthaḥ, anekasambandhidevadattapitṛputratvādidharmasamāhāraikarūpavastutattvānvākhyānavat . anyathetyekāntāvadhāraṇe pratyekaṃ svarūpānavadhāraṇāt avṛttitvameva vakṣyamāṇavaditi, taditthamidameva śāstraṃ vartsyatīti parasparavyāhatatattvāstvavṛttaya eva tā ityarthaḥ . vṛttitattvaviniścicīṣāyāṃ sā ca vidhyādipratyekavṛttirūpākhyānasamadhigamyeti tadvyākhyā kāryā . kiṃ kāraṇam ?
tatsamudāyakāryatvāt tasyāḥ .
imamarthaṃ vistareṇa vyākhyātukāma uddiśati --tatra vidhivṛttirityādi . tatra etāsvanantaroddiṣṭāsu
vidhyādivṛttiṣu vidhivṛttistāvad yathālokagrāhameva vastu . lokasya grāhaḥ, grāhavad grāhaḥ, yathā
jalacaro grāhaḥ prāṇyantarāṇyabhyātmākarṣati tathā loko'pi svābhiprāyasakāśaṃ sarvamākarṣati . yo yo
lokagrāho yathālokagrāham, evetyavadhāraṇāllokābhiprāyaṃ nātivartate vastvityarthaḥ . parīkṣakābhimānināṃ
tu tīrthyānāṃ svaparaviṣayatāyāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣayoranupapatterasaṃstato lokābhiprāyād vivekayatnaḥ
śāstreṣviti . itiśabdo hetvarthe, yasmādetamarthaṃ pratipādayiṣyāmastasmād yathālokagrāhameva vastu, tato
lokābhiprāyādvivekayatnānarthakyam .
tat kathamiti cet, ucyate --sāmānyaviśeṣau hi svaviṣayau paraviṣayau vā syātām,
vastunaḥ sāmānyaṃ ghaṭādervastuna ātmani varteta, parasya vā paṭāderātmani ghaṭādvyatiricyamāne . caturṣvapyeṣu vikalpeṣu sāṅkhyādīnāṃ doṣa iti manyamāno laukikaḥ pakṣaṃ grāhayati dudūṣayiṣuḥ sopapattikam
--tatra ādyaṃ sāmānyaṃ tāvadekasya sarvatvād yadi svaviṣayam . sarvamekamekaṃ ca sarvam,
kasmāt ? kāraṇasya vaiśvarūpyāt . yathāha--

sarvaṃ sarvātmakam . yadyevaṃ kasmāt sarvamekatra nopalabhyate sarvatra caikamiti ? ucyate--deśakālākāranimittāvabandhāttu na samānakālamātmābhivyaktiḥ . te manyāmahe jalabhūmyorapyetat
pāriṇāmikaṃ rasādivaiśvarūpyaṃ sthāvarasya jaṅgamatāṃ gatasya jaṅgamābhyavahṛtavanaspatyāderjaṅgamaśarīrapariṇāmāpannasya, jaṅgamasyāpi sthāvaratāṃ gatasya sthāvarābhyavahṛtasya tatpariṇatasya, evaṃ sthāvarasya
sthāvaratāṃ gatasya jaṅgamasya jaṅgamatāṃ gatasya . tasmāt sarvaṃ sarvātmakam   .



ātmā na bhavati, anekārthaviṣayatvāt sāmānyasya; atha ātmā, tato na
sāmānyam, ekatvādātmanaḥ; senāhastinoriva .
athocyeta--ātmaiva sāmānyam . sattvādirghaṭāderātmā, sa hi tatsamudāyakārya-

tata ekasya sarvatvāt sarvasya caikatvāt svaviṣayaṃ sāmānyaṃ ghaṭasyātmani vartata iti paramataṃ
pradarśyottaramāha--yadyevam, sāmānyavirodhaḥ sāmānyasya virodhaḥ sāmānyena ca virodhaḥ .
tat katham ? ucyate --yadi sāmānyam, tata ātmā na bhavati, anekārthaviṣayatvāt
sāmānyasya . kaścidarthaḥ kenacidarthena kaiściddharmaiḥ samāno bhavatīti kṛtvānekārthaviṣayaṃ sāmānyam .
tasmādanekārthaviṣayatvāt sāmānyasya vastunaḥ svamātmā ghaṭāderekarūpasya na bhavati, ekatvādātmanaḥ,
sāmānyasya ca nivṛtterātmanaśca, ātmābhāvāt kasya sāmānyam ? . atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityātmeṣyate,
tato'pi na sāmānyam, ekatvādātmanaḥ kena sāmānyaṃ tasya ? ityātmanaḥ sāmānyena virodhaḥ,
samānabhāvo hi sāmānyam . senāhastinoriveti, hastyaśvarathapadātisamūhaḥ senetyanekārthāpekṣāṃ darśayati,
hastīti caikārthatāṃ darśayati .
athocyeteti sa parihartukāmasya parasyābhiprāyamāha . syādeva virodho yadi ātmanaḥ sāmānyam
iti bhedena svatvamabhyupagamyeteti . yadyapi vyatirekārthaṣaṣṭhīprāpitaḥ svasvāmyādibhedaḥ tathāpyadoṣaḥ,
vyapadeśivadbhāvāt rāhoḥ śiraḥ ityādyavyatirekaṣaṣṭhīdarśanāditi . kiṃ tarhi ? brūmaḥ--iha tu ātmaiva
sāmānyam . kiṃ tat ? ghaṭādeḥ sattvādirātmā . yathoktam--
ādhyātmikāḥ kāryātmakā bhedāḥ śabda-sparśa-rasa-rūpa-gandhāḥ pañca trayāṇāṃ sukha-duḥkha-mohānāṃ
sanniveśamātram . kasmāt ? pañcānāṃ pañcānāmekakāryabhāvāt, sukhānāṃ śabda-sparśa-rasa-rūpa-gandhānāṃ
prasādalāghavābhiṣvalāghavaprasavābhiṣvaṅgoddharṣaprītayaḥ kāryam, duḥkhānāṃ śoṣatāpabhedopaṣṭambhodvegāpadveṣāḥ, mūḍhānāṃ
varaṇasadanāpadhvaṃsanabaibhatsyadainyagauravāṇīti . tathā karaṇātmakāḥ śrotra-tvak-cakṣu-rjihvā-ghrāṇavāg-hasta-pāda-pāyū-pastha-manāṃsyekādaśa tairyagyona-mānuṣa-daivāni bāhyāśca bhedāḥ sattvarajastamasāṃ
kāryaṃ samanvayadarśanāt  iti .
evaṃ pṛthivyādi gavādi ghaṭādi . tasmāt sattvādirghaṭāderātmā . sa hi tatsamudāyakāryatvāt
sāmānyam . tasmādātmaiva sāmānyamiti .


tvāt sāmānyam . evaṃ sati ātmabhedaḥ--sukhaṃ sukhaṃ ca sukhādisamudayaśca, tadātmatvāt . evaṃ śeṣāvapi . tataśca triguṇavipariṇāmakāraṇakalpanāvaiyarthyam .
nityameva tryātmakamiti cet, ekatvanityatvāt prakāśa-pravṛtti-niyamabhedābhāvādanārambhaḥ . ubhayasya cābhāvaḥ . yathā ca pradhānāvasthāyāṃ tritvaikatvādivirodhadharmasambandho'vyatiriktatriguṇaikarūpatā ceṣyate sadā triguṇaikatvāt tritvai-

atra brūmaḥ --evaṃ satyātmabhedaḥ, samudāyaikakāryatvāt sukhādi ekamasāmānyamitīṣṭasya sāmānyasya bhedaḥ . tat kathamiti cet, ucyate --sukhaṃ sukhañca sukhādisamudayaśca . sattvaṃ sukham, rajo
duḥkham, tamo mohaḥ . tat trayamaikātmyāpannamekameveti sukhasya sukhatvaṃ tatsamudāyatvaṃ ca prāptam . kiṃ
kāraṇam ? tadātmatvāt, yasmāt sukhādyātmakaḥ samudāyaḥ samudāyātmakaṃ ca sukham . evaṃ śeṣāvapīti duḥkhamohāvatidiśati . evaṃ duḥkhaṃ duḥkhañca duḥkhādisamudāyaśca, moho mohaśca mohādisamudayaśca .
tataḥ ko doṣa iti cet, tataśca triguṇavipariṇāmakāraṇakalpanāvaiyarthyam . samudāyaikakāryāṇāṃ 
trayāṇāmekatvābhyupagamādekastatsāmyāvasthāviśeṣaḥ, tasmāccāvasthāviśeṣādapracyutatvāt kuto guṇānāṃ
vaiṣamyam ? vaiṣamyābhāve kutaḥ prakṛtermahadahaṅkāratanmātrabhūtendriyādipūrvottarahetukāryabhāvaḥ ?
atrāśaṅkā --nityameva tryātmakamiti cet, pradhānāvasthāyāmapi triguṇatvānnityaṃ sarvakālaṃ
tryātmakaṃ sattvarajastama+ātmakamato guṇavaiṣamya-vipariṇāma-kāraṇatvānyupapadyante sukhādisamudāyātmakatve'pyātmabhedadoṣaśca nāstīti . etadapi vāṅmātratvādanuttaram, tathāpi tu sutarāṃ tathā,
ekatvanityatvāt prakāśa-pravṛtti-niyamabhedābhāvādanārambhaḥ . ekatvasya nityatvāt ekatvena vā
nityatvāt, sadaikatvādityarthaḥ . prakāśa-pravṛtti-niyamakāryabhedaḥ sattvarajastamasāṃ yo'bhyupagamyate bhavadbhirācārya-pavana-pāṣāṇavat, tadyathā--nāṭakācāryaḥ svahastotkṣepaṇādinā prakāśātmanā ātmano nartikāyāśca
vyavatiṣṭhate, pavanaḥ parṇacalanādinā svaparapravartanena vyavatiṣṭhate, naustambhanapāṣāṇakaḥ svaparaniyamanena
vyavatiṣṭhate tathā sattvarajastamāṃsi ityetannopapadyate, sarvakālamekatvanityatvāt tritvābhāvaḥ, tatastadanārambhaḥ pradhānāvasthāyāmiva guṇānāṃ sarvakālaṃ kāryānārambho nirvyāpāratvāt . vaiṣamyanirmūlatā ca,
ārambhābhāvāt . ubhayasya cābhāvaḥ kāraṇasya kāryatvasya ca, athavā ātmanaḥ sāmānyasya ca,
sukhādeḥ samudāyinastatsamudāyasya ca pradhānasya . kiṃ kāraṇam ? anyatarāvyavasthāne'nyatarasyāvyavasthānāt . tat kathaṃ bhāvyata iti cet, ucyate --yathā ca pradhānāvasthāyāmityādi yāvat
tritvaikatvādivyatikrameṇeti . tritvaikatvādītyuktaparāmarśaḥ, yathā tritvamekatvaṃ ca viruddhau dharmāviṣyete
evamavayavā avayavī ca, anyadananyacca, ātmā cānātmā ca, sarvamasarvaṃ cetyādi . ādigrahaṇāt sūkṣmaṃ

katvādivyatikrameṇa, evaṃ śabdādau triguṇāvyatirekaikarūpatvaṃ virodhadharmasambandhaśca
tanmayatvāt . tataśca sarvasyāvasthānāt kāraṇakāryaniyamābhāvād yadṛcchāmātratvādaṅgīkṛtapuruṣārthayatnārthahāniḥ .
sāmānyaviśeṣayośca sambandhitvādekatarābhyupagame'nyatarasyāvaśyāpekṣyatvāt sāmānyābhyupagame niyamapakṣāpattirapi .
paraviṣayatāyāmapi asamānāvasthānādasāmānyam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? anavadhṛtaikatarakāraṇatvād dravyādīnām .
sthūlaṃ cetyādi sāmarthyādāpādanīyam . eṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ . sādharmyaṃ sadā triguṇaikatvāditi . yathā tatra
tritvaikatvādyātmasvatattvavyatikrameṇeti virodhadharmasambandho'vyatiriktatriguṇaikarūpatā ceṣyata
iti pradhānasyaiva dṛṣṭāntasya varṇanam . evaṃ śabdādāviti dārṣṭāntikopanayaḥ, triguṇāvyatirekaikarūpatvaṃ virodhadharmasambandhaśca śabdatanmātrādiṣu, tatkāryeṣvākāśādiṣu bhūteṣvekaguṇādivṛddheṣu, tadvikāreṣu ca gavādighaṭādiṣu ca, śrotrādiṣvekādaśasvindriyeṣu ca pradhānadharmā āpādyāḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ?
tanmayatvāt, sattvādiguṇamayaṃ hi tat . tataśca sarvasyāvasthānāt pradhānāvasthāyāmiva na kiñcit
sūtrādi paṭādi vā kasyacit kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ vā pramāṇaṃ prameyaṃ veti niyamābhāvāt sarvatra yādṛcchikī
pravṛttiḥ prasaktā, yadṛcchāmātratvānna pradhānamahadahaṅkārādikāraṇakāryanaiyamyam . tataśca yadṛcchāmātratvādaṅgīkṛtapuruṣārthayatnārthahāniḥ . puruṣaścaitanyasvarūpaḥ, tasyārtho dvividhaḥ--śabdādyupalabdhirādiḥ guṇapuruṣāntaropalabdhirantaḥ, tat kṛtvā tadvinivartata iti tasmai puruṣārthāya yatnaḥ pradhānasya, tasya yatnasya
arthaḥ prayojanam, tasya hāniryādṛcchikatvāt . tasya ca hānau pradhāna-puruṣa-saṃyogatritvaparijñānārthaśāstrayatnārthahānirapi .
sāmānyaviśeṣayośca sambandhitvādityādi yāvad niyamapakṣāpattirapi . sāmānyaṃ viśeṣa
ityetau parasparasambandhinau, ādyantavat pitāputravadvā . tatra yadi sāmānyamabhyupagamyate viśeṣāpekṣitvāt
sāmānyasya viśeṣo'vaśyaiṣyaḥ, pitṛtvābhyupagame putratvābhyupagamavat . viśeṣābhyupagame ca sāmānyābhyupagamastadvadevetyataste balādeva viśeṣapakṣāpattirapi niyamapakṣāpattirityarthaḥ . apiśabdāt prāguktadoṣāpattiḥ .
evaṃ tāvat svaviṣayatve sāmānyasya doṣā uktāḥ .
paraviṣayatāyāmapyasamānāvasthānādasāmānyam . amukhyasāmānyānāṃ sadṛśānupravṛttivyāvṛtti

tatra dravyamapi bhavanalakṣaṇaṃ yugapadayugapadbhedabhāvimṛdbhavanaparamārtharūpādiśivakādivṛtti vyāpi .
lakṣaṇānāṃ pareṣṭānāṃ pareṣṭānāṃ paraviṣayāṇāmasambhavāt sveṣṭasamānabhavanalakṣaṇasāmānyasambhavāt parakīyamasāmānyamevetyupari upasaṃhariṣyati laukikaḥ, tat siddhaṃ kṛtvā tāvadāha --asamānāvasthānādasāmānyamiti . tat punardravyakṣetrakālabhāvaviṣayam, te hi dravyādayaḥ pare parairiṣyamāṇā ghaṭādervastunaḥ, tadapi
parasattadapekṣayā samānamityucyate nātmānameveti paraviṣayam . kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ tadasāmānyam ? ityata
āha --anavadhṛtaikatarakāraṇatvāditi, nāvadhriyate dravyameva kṣetrameva kāla eva bhāva eva vā kāraṇamiti .
evaṃ tarhi ekatamakāraṇatvāt iti vācyam; na cātra ḍataraḍatamau prāpnutaḥ, kasmāt ? anya-kiṃ-yat-tado
nirdhāraṇe dvayorekasya ḍatarac . vā bahūnāṃ jātiparipraśne ḍatamac pā॰ 5 . 3 . 91-92 ityatra
ekaśabdasyāpaṭhitatvāt . evaṃ tarhyātiśayikaḥtarhyātiśāyikaḥ tarappratyayaḥ . samānaguṇeṣu hi sparddhā bhavati, guṇavacanābhāvānneti cet, kāraṇatvaguṇato'tiśayo bhaviṣyati . evaṃ tarhi tamabastviti cet, dvayordvayoḥ prakarṣavivakṣāyāṃ
tarabityadoṣaḥ . athavā ekācca prācām pā॰ 5 . 3 . 94 iti jātiparipraśne'styeva ḍatarajityadoṣaḥ . kena
anavadhṛtamekatarakāraṇatvaṃ dravyādīnāmiti cet, ucyate--laukikairvyavahāranayapradhānaiḥ, sa ca ārhatanayaikadeśa eva . na punaryathā śāstrakārāḥ sāmānyameva viśeṣa eva dravyādyanyatamadeva vā kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ
vetyavadhārayanti .
kathaṃ punardravyādikāraṇatāvadhāryate na veti ? ucyate--dravyaṃ tāvat tatra dravyamapi bhavanalakṣaṇaṃ
vyāpītyabhisambhantsyate . apiśabdāt kṣetramapi . sarvatantrasiddhānte vyākaraṇe dravyaṃ ca bhavye
pā॰ 5 . 3 . 104 ityuktatvād bhavatīti bhavyaṃ bhavanayogyaṃ vā dravyam . dravati droṣyati dudrāveti druḥ,
drorvikāro'vayavo vā dravyam, du dru gatau pā॰ dhā॰ 944--945, sadaiva gatyātmakatvād vipariṇāmātmakaṃ
hi tat . na tu yathā guṇasandrāvo dravyam pātañjalama॰ 5 . 1 . 119 kriyāvad guṇavat samavāyikāraṇamiti dravyalakṣaṇam vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 15 iti vā . kathaṃ bhavatīti cet, bhidyate iti bhedaḥ, bhedena
bhavituṃ śīlā tasyā dharmo vā sādhu bhavatīti vā bhedabhāvinī mṛt, tasyā bhavanaṃ bhedabhāvimṛdbhavanam,
tadeva paramo'rthaḥ, ko'sau ? rūpādayaḥ śivakādayaśca . te punaryathāsaṅkhyaṃ yugapadayugapacca bhedabhāvimṛdbhavanaparamārtharūpādiśivakādayaḥ, samānādhikaraṇasamāsaḥ . punarapi te vṛttirasya teṣu vā vṛttirasya tadidaṃ yugapadayugapadbhedabhāvimṛdbhavanaparamārtharūpādiśivakādivṛtti . kiṃ tat ? dravyam . vyāpnotīti vyāpi,

kṣetramapi sarvagatinivāsavṛttisvatattvamekaikabhāvārthasaṅghātasamavasthānātmā
rūpādi-grīvādyekagamanasamavasthānavyavasthāpitapṛthivyādi-ghaṭādi vyāpi viśvasya
saddravyayugapadayugapadbhāvirūpādiśivakādibhāvavispanditasya .
na kvacidapi na pravartate . yathā rūpādiśivakādayo mṛdo bhavanamātraṃ tathā yugapadbhūtaṃ pṛthivyādi paramārthaḥ
pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśādi dravyabhavanamātram . pṛthivyāścāśmaloṣṭādi, tathā'pāṃ himakarakādi, tejaso'pyarcirādisvabhedā ityādi . ayugapadbhūtaṃ vrīhi-bījā-ṅkura-patra-nāla-kāṇḍa-puṣpa-phala-śūka-kaṇa-tuṣādi
paramārtha iti sarvaṃ dravyabhavanamātram, ekapuruṣapitṛputratvādivasāttāṃvattāṃstān bhāvān bhavatīti dravyam .
kṣetramapi vyākaraṇasiddhāntagatyaiva kṣi nivāsagatyoḥ pā॰ dhā॰ 1407 iti sarvasya siddhaṃ
sarvagatinivāsavṛttisvatattvam . gatirvyāptiḥ . nivāsastathāvasthānam . sarvabhāvānāṃ prāptyavasthānopakāreṇa
vartata iti tadvṛttisvatattvam . pradeśaracanāviśeṣo hi kṣetram . ekaikabhāvārthasaṅghātasamavasthānātmā,
ekaikasya ghaṭapaṭāderbhāvasyārthe pṛthubudhnādirūpeṇa saṃhatya samavasthitasya ātmā svarūpatattvaṃ pradhānamityarthaḥ .
kiṃ kāraṇam ? kṣetrābhāve tadabhāvāt kṣetrānugrahādeva tadbhāvāt . yathāsaṅkhyaṃ rūpādi-grīvādyekagamanasamavasthānavyavasthāpitapṛthivyādi-ghaṭādi . yathāsvaprakriyaṃ vaiśeṣikādīnām rūpa-rasa-gandha-sparśavatī
pṛthivī vai॰ sū॰ 2 . 1 . 1, śabda-sparśa-rūpa-rasa-gandhātmā pṛthivī, kakkhaṭalakṣaṇā veti . evaṃ ghaṭo'pyavayavī, guṇasamudayamātram, prajñaptisan veti vikalpanāmātram . lokanayena tu ta eva hi rūpagrīvādyavayavā
rūpādayo grīvādayaścaikagatayastathā tathā samavasthitāḥ pṛthivyādīn ghaṭādīṃśca vyavasthāpayanti yatra tat
kṣetram . kiṃ hi tat pṛthivyāḥ pṛthivītvaṃ rūpādyekagatisamavasthānādanyat, ghaṭasya vā grīvādyekagatisamavasthānādanyad ghaṭatvam ? tasmāt sarvagatinivāsavṛttisvatattvaṃ tat . vyāpi viśvasyetyādi yāvadvispaṃditasya . viśvaṃ saddravyaṃ ca vyāpnoti yugapadayugadbhāvirūpādiśivakādibhāvavispaṃditaṃ
pṛthivyabādi ghaṭapaṭādi vipariṇāmajātaṃ cetyarthaḥ .


kālo'pi yugapadayugapatkālasvatattvabhūtapadārthanirūpitavṛttiḥ--anekaprabhedopavarṇyāstikāyapṛthivyādiyugapadvṛttiḥ, ādāna-dhāraṇa-pācana-nisarjanasalilanirvartyavrīhikaṇaudanādinirvṛttivṛttiṣu ayugapadvṛttiḥ .
dravyādyapi tu rūpādiśivakādiyugapadayugapadbhāvibhāvāḥ, uktavadeva tathā

kālo'pītyādi . kālo'pi paraviṣayaṃ sāmānyam . pariṇāmavatī kriyaiva kālaḥ, kalanaṃ kālaḥ,
kalāsamūho vā . yathā--māsamāste godohamāsta iti . vartanaṃ bhavanamiti tatparyāyo vartanālakṣaṇo vā dravyātmā .
sa ca yugapadayugapatkālasvatattvabhūtapadārthanirūpitavṛttiḥ, pūrvoktarūpādiśivakādipariṇativad vakṣyamāṇāstikāyasalilanirvartyapṛthivī vrīhikaṇaudanādivadvā . tadyathā--yugapadvṛttistāvadanekaprabhedopavarṇyetyādi
yāvad yugapadvṛttiḥ . sāṅkhyādiprakriyopavarṇyāsta eva hi dharmādharmākāśapudgalajīvāstikāyāḥ saprabhedāḥ,
athavā pṛthivyādaya eva astikāyāḥ vidyamānakāyāḥ, te yatra yugapadvartante sa tadyugapadvṛttiḥ kālaḥ .
yatra ca ādāna-dhāraṇetyādi yāvannirvṛttivṛttiṣvayugapadvṛttiriti . yathoktam—
ādānīyāstrayo māsāstrayo māsāstu dhāraṇāḥ .pācanīyāstrayo māsāstrayo māsā visarjanāḥ ॥  
iti . ipradānyāḥ pūrva uttaraḥ pūrvottaraśca vāyavaḥ, śeṣāḥ śoṣakāḥ . atrāpi pratiprakriyamādityasantāpāpītasaliladhāraṇa-pācana-nisarjanavat, dhūma-jyotiḥ-salila-marutsaṅghātameghādāna-dhāraṇa-pācananisarjanavat, visrasāpariṇatapudgalavikārābhratvādivadvā, pudgalāvinābhāvād devavaikriyāderapi ādānād
dhāraṇam, dhāraṇāt pācanam, pācanānnisarjanam . nisṛṣṭasya salilasya kāryāṇi bhūmidravībhāvavanaspatyoṣadhiprarohapuṣpaphalaprāṇiśarīrāpyāyanādīni . tato'pi kāryāntarāṇyāhārabalavapuḥsthāmādīni ghaṭapaṭādinirvṛttayaścetyādi . nirvṛttayaḥ kāryāṇi, tāsāṃ nirvṛttīnāṃ vṛttiṣvayugapadvṛttiḥ kāla eva, tadupaṣṭambhajanyatvāt teṣāṃ
bhāvānāmiti .
idānīṃ bhāva ucyate . sa tu pūrvokteṣu dravyādiṣu bhavanaṃ bhāva ityuktatvādukta eva .
taddarśayannāha --dravyādyapi tvityādi . guṇaparyāyavad dravyam tattvārthasū॰ 5 . 37 ityuktam . guṇā
rūpādayaḥ, śivakādayaḥ paryāyāḥ, te yugapadayugapadbhāvinaḥ, ta eva bhāvāḥ . kṣetrakālau ca dravyameva,
bhavanasāmānyādbhāva eva vā . tasmānna tāni dravyādīni yugapadayugapadbhāvibhāvavyudāsena bhavitumarhanti

bhavanāt teṣām, anyathā dravyādīnāṃ vandhyāputravadabhāvatvāpatteḥ . bhāvo'pi
sarvavastutattvavyāpī .
ata etāni ghaṭādivastvātmasāmānyapakṣagrāhiṇāpyavaśyāpekṣyāṇi, pratyakṣata eva tathātmatvāt; kimu paraviṣayamukhyasāmānyapakṣavādinā ? pratyakṣata eva
tathā tathā paraviṣayasya samānasya bhavanāt, pareṇa samānena bhūyate .
kathañcidapīti uktavadeva ityatidiśati . tathābhavanāt teṣāmiti tadeva bhavanaṃ hetutvena vyāpārayati .
anyatheti bhavanasāmarthyābhāve dravyādīnāṃ vandhyāputravadabhāvatvāpatteḥ, na santi dravyādīni bhavanaśūnyatvād vandhyāputravat . pañcamīnirdeśāt tadvaidharmyeṇa bhavanahetutvamāvītenāha . neṣyate ca dravyādīnāmabhāvatvam, bhāvatvamevaiṣām . bhāvaśca bhavanasambandhī ghaṭavat . ato dravyādīni bhavanasambandhīni . bhavanaṃ
dravyādīn vyāpnotītyata āha --bhāvo'pi sarvavastutattvavyāpīti .
ata etānītyādi yāvadapekṣyāṇīti . etasmāt pratipāditopapattibalād dravyādīni bhāvaparyantāni bhavanapradhānānyapratyākhyeyāni tasmād ghaṭādivastvātmasāmānyapakṣagrāhiṇāpi svaviṣayasāmānyavādinetyarthaḥ . apiśabdāt svagrāharaktamanasāpi satā tvayā avaśyāpekṣyāṇi sāraṃ sārameṣitavyānītyarthaḥ .
kiṃ kāraṇam ? pratyakṣata eva tathātmatvāt . dṛśyate eva hi dravyādyekarūpabhavanasāmānyatoktavidhinā .
kimu paraviṣayamukhyasāmānyapakṣavādineti, dravyādīnāṃ parasparabhinnānāṃ samānabhavanānmukhyaṃ sāmānyam,
lokaścaivaṃvidhasāmānyavādī, vyavahāranayānuyāyitvāt . na tu yathā sāṅkhyādiṣu sādṛśyānyāpohatattvādi pramāṇaviruddham . taccopacaritaṃ bhavitumarhati na mukhyam, sādṛśyānuvṛttīnāṃ loke samānena
bhūyate iti sāmānyalakṣaṇasyādṛṣṭatvād dṛṣṭatvāccāsmadiṣṭasya laukikasya sāmānyasyetyata āha—
pratyakṣata eva tathā tathā paraviṣayasya samānasya bhavanāt, tena tena prakāreṇa dravyakṣetrakālabhāvāpekṣayugapadayugapadbhāvibhāvasya rūpādiśivakādirūpasya samānasya bhavanāt . sarvatantrasiddhāntena vyākaraṇena
lokānuvṛttinā niruktiṃ tattvānuvādinīmapyāha --pareṇa samānena bhūyata iti, samāno bhavatītyarthaḥ .
samānabhāvaḥ sāmānyam, yad bhavanti sarvabhāvāḥ sa teṣāṃ bhāva iti svārthiko bhāvapratyayaḥ . svabhāvasambandhārthā cātra kartṛlakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī tasya bhāvaḥ iti . yathā--śilāputrakasya śarīram iti .


tathā ca sarvasyāsya jagato dravyādyapekṣayā tathā tathā viśeṣaṇaikatā, tadbhedatvasambandhatvābhyām, vikacasurabhiśarannīlotpalavat . tatrānyasya kasyacidapohyasya sadṛśasya tattattvasya vā samānasyābhāvāt sāmānyānupapattiḥ . uditadoṣānubaddhā ekasarvatvāt svasāmānyāpattirvā .

evaṃ sāmānyaṃ vyākhyāyedānīṃ tadarthopasaṃhāreṇānumānamāha --tathā cetyādi yāvad viśeṣaṇaikatā .
tathā ceti evaṃ ca kṛtvā pratipāditaparasparabhedatve parasparasambandhaikyāpattau ca sarvasyāsya jagato dravyadeśakālabhāvāpekṣayā tena tena prakāreṇa viśeṣaṇaikatā . dravyaṃ kṣetreṇa kālena bhāvena ca viśiṣyateviśeṣyate,
dravyeṇa kṣetramitarau ca, evaṃ taistat parasparataśca tāni . yathāṅgulirvakrapraguṇatādyayugapadbhāvibhāvai rūpādiyugapadbhāvibhāvaiḥ deśena taṃdrataddravyāntaraiśca viśiṣyateviśeṣyate aṅgulirvakrā ṛjvī pradeśe'sminnākāśasya vartate
pradeśinī adhunā ityādi tathaikaikamapi vastu ghaṭapaṭādi na kenacinnābhisambadhyate tathā tathā
viśiṣyateviśeṣyate ca tadbhedatvasambandhatvābhyām . prayogaścātra--dravyādiviśeṣaṇasambandhī ghaṭaḥ, vastubhedatve 
sati tatsambandhatvāt, vikacasurabhiśarannīlotpalavat . vikaca-mukulitādi kṣetraviśeṣaṇam, surabhinīlatādi sahakramabhāvirūpādibhāvaviśeṣaṇam, śaraditi kālaviśeṣaṇam . utpalamiti dravyam, tadapi
teṣāṃ viśeṣaṇameva vyavacchedakatvāt .
evamanekatvasāmānyamāpādya prāk pratijñātaṃ paraviṣayatāyāmapyasamānāvasthānādasāmānyaṃ pareṣāmiti taddarśayati --tatrānyasya kasyacidapohyasya sadṛśasya tattattvasya vā samānasyābhāvāt
sāmānyānupapattiḥ . evamāpāditaparasparaviśiṣṭaikatvajagato ghaṭaikatvamātratve'rthāntarābhāvāt kuto'rthāntarāpohalakṣaṇaṃ vidvanmanyādyatanabauddhaparikḷptaṃ sāmānyam ? kuto vā samānaṃ dṛśyata iti sadṛśam, sadṛśabhāvaḥ sādṛśyamiti sādṛśyalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyam, sadṛśasya tasyābhāvāt ? kuto vā tattattvam ? tasya
bhāvastattvam, tattattvamasya tattattvam, tattu bhinne bhavati samānānekārthānuvṛttilakṣaṇaṃ sattvadravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvādi .
syānmatam--parasparaviśiṣṭaikatvādeva tatsamudayaḥ paraviṣayasāmānyamiti . etaccāyuktamityata āha—
uditadoṣānubaddhaikasarvatvāt svasāmānyāpattirvā . yaduktaṃ prāk sa tatsamudāyakāryatvāt sāmānyam ityatra evaṃ satyātmabhedaḥ--sukhaṃ sukhaṃ ca sukhādisamudayaśca, tadātmatvāt . evaṃ śeṣāvapi

saṅghātāvasthānabhedādvā ghaṭapaṭavadatyantabheda eva sarvārthānām . tathāhi--paramāṇvādīnāṃ ghaṭo bhavati, ghaṭasya vā kapālāni . anavasthāne vā nityapravṛttatvāt
sarvārthānāṃ samayamapi tathā samavasthānaṃ nāsti yathā samānatā nirūpyeta .
athāntareṇa rūpaprāptimuktipratyayābhyāṃ daṇḍivad vyaktibhinnārthasiddhi-
ityādi yāvat sāmānyaviśeṣayośca tatsambandhitvādekatarābhyupagame niyamapakṣāpattirapi iti . svaviṣayasāmānyāpattirveti vāśabdo vikalpārthaḥ svasāmānyapakṣābhihitasarvapūrvottarapakṣavikalpapradarśanārthaḥ, dravyaṃ
dravyaṃ ca dravyādisamudayaśca ityādi vikalpajātaṃ sarvamihāpi saṃbhavato yojyam .
tathā saṅghātāvasthānabhedādvā ghaṭapaṭavadatyantabheda eva sarvārthānām . yadi saṅgrahanayadarśanena
sarvamekam, atha ṛjusūtranayadarśanena sarvaṃ bhinnam, tathāpi saṅghātenāvasthitānāṃ ghaṭapaṭavadatyantaṃ parasparato
bheda eva, naikatvaṃ sarvārthānām . nanūktam--saṅgrahanayadarśanenaikamiti, satyamuktam, tattu saṅghātenāvasthitānāṃ
nopapadyate dṛṣṭaviruddhatvādityabhiprāyaḥ . tataḥ kimiti cet, tathāhi--evaṃ ca kṛtvā, kiṃ ? paramāṇvādīnāṃ
ghaṭo bhavati ghaṭasya vā kapālāni, pitā putraḥ kaḥ sambandha ityarthaḥ . ghaṭasya vā kapālānīti tadvināśajanyatvasyāpyasambandhaṃ darśayati . ādigrahaṇād dvyaṇukatryaṇukādīnāṃ grīvādīnāṃ cānyatra saṅghātasamavasthānabhedāt samavasthānakṛta eva teṣāṃ sambandhaḥ, tathā ca samānaṃ bhavanti te .
syānmatam--evaṃ vyākhyātustavaiva matena parasparavilakṣaṇānāmarthānāṃ bhedādevānavasthānaṃ prāptam,
dravyādibhedabhinnānāmanyonyanirapekṣāṇāṃ saṅghātasamavasthānābhāvāditi . atrocyate --anavasthāne vā nityapravṛttatvāt sarvārthānāṃ samayamapi tathā samavasthānaṃ nāsti yathā samānatā nirūpyeta, parasparanirapekṣotpādavināśatvādityarthaḥ .
evaṃ sarvaikabhinnapakṣayoḥ sāmānyābhāva uktaḥ . pakṣāntare'pi vaktukāmaḥ grāhayati --athāntareṇa
rūpaprāptimityādi yāvat siddhiriṣyata iti . antareṇaikarūpaprāptiṃ bhedarūpaprāptiṃ vā uktipratyayābhyāṃ
daṇḍivaditi, nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhirutpadyate, viśeṣapratyayānāmanākasmikatvācca daṇḍanimittadaṇḍipratyayābhidhānavat, daṇḍo'syāstīti daṇḍī ityatra hi daṇḍasaṃyoganimittau devadatte daṇḍyuktipratyayau
yathā dṛṣṭāvevaṃ dravyatvaghaṭatvādisāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyanimittau dravyaghaṭādyuktipratyayau syātām, nānyathā .
vyaktibhinnārthasiddhiriṣyata iti, uktipratyayābhyāṃ dravyaghaṭādivyaktito bhinnasya dravyatvaghaṭatvāderarthasya siddhiriṣyate . evaṃ guṇakarmaṇośca saṅkhyotkṣepaṇādivyaktibhinnatattattvārthasiddhireṣitavyā, bhinneṣvartheṣvabhinnoktipratyayadarśanāditi .


riṣyate . na, anyato'pi tayoḥ siddheḥ . tau hi kasmiṃścideva ākārādimātre,
sāmayikatvācchabdādarthe pratyayasya vṛddhavyavahārādākārādimātre pratipatteḥ . tathāhi--

atrocyate--tanna, anyato'pi tayoḥ siddheḥ . apiśabdānniyamābhāvena lokasiddhaṃ nāmādikamapyuktipratyayakāraṇamāha . kayoḥ siddhiḥ ? uktipratyayayoḥ . tanniyamābhāvaṃ darśayati --tau hi kasmiṃścidevākāramātre . ādigrahaṇānnāmamātre . ākaraṇamākāraḥ, buddhyā yo yathā parigṛhyate'rthaḥ nāmnā vā nirdiśyate sa eva tasyākāraḥ . sa ca tāvanmātro na tato'dhikaḥ, yathā--ākāśaṃ ḍittha iti vā, sa vānyathā
vānyathā vā, ākāśādiṣu vinānuvṛttyā ākāśakāladiśāṃ tvanmate'pyekatvāt kuto bhinneṣvabhinnābhidhānapratyayau ? kuto vākāśāditattattvānīti ? dṛśyete cātrāpyuktipratyayau . tasmānnāsti sāmānyam . ghaṭatvādisāmānyopacārātteṣvabhidhānapratyayāviti cet, na, mukhyasāmānyāsiddheḥ sādharmyābhāvāccopacārābhāvāt
tattvaparīkṣāyāmupacārasyāvakāśābhāvād mithyābhidhānapratyayatvaprasaṅgādākāśādiṣviti .
kiñcānyat --sāmayikatvācchabdādarthe pratyayasya . samayāya prabhavati samayaḥ prayojanamasya samayabhavo vā sāmayikaḥ . yathoktam --sāmayikaḥ śabdādarthe pratyayaḥ vai॰ sū॰ 7 . 2 . 20 iti, na sāmānyanimitta iti . tau cābhidhānapratyayau lokavṛddhavyavahārātmakau vṛddhavyavahāraṃ dṛṣṭvā bālānāmabhidhānapratyayau
bhavato'śikṣitavicitraśāstravyavahārāṇāmapi anvayavyatirekātmakādvṛddhavyavahārādeva . na tattvānuvṛtti-
vyāvṛttikṛtau, lokasya tattattvādyajñānāt . na tattattvāt, tattattvājñānātteṣām .
syānmatam --saṃjñākarma tvasmadviśiṣṭānāṃ liṅgam, pratyakṣapūrvakatvāt saṃjñākarmaṇaḥ vai॰ sū॰ 2 . 1 .18-19 ityuktaṃ śāstre . tasmād manvādayo'ntarālapralaya-mahāpralayeṣu vyucchinnavyavahārāṇāmapi śabdārthānāṃ sambandhaṃ paśyanti . tasmād ghaṭa-ghaṭatvasamavāyasambandho'pi sāmayikaḥ asyāyaṃ vācakaḥ iti yathā
ayaṃ panasaḥ iti samayaṃ grāhyate bāla iti . etaccāyuktam, anavasthāprasaṅgāt--yena śabdena samayaḥ
kriyate tasyānyena kārya ityanuṣaktaḥ, uttarasyārthāpratītau asya samayo na prakalpate . tatsamayānapekṣā svābhāvikī yasyārthe vṛttiḥ sa nitya iti ca śabdārthasambandhaparijñānaprayogavyavahāraparamparāyā avyavacchedāduktam .
yathāha patañjaliḥ--na hi tadeva nityaṃ yat taddhruvaṃ kūṭasthamavicālyanapāyopajanavikāryanutpattyavṛddhyavyayayogi . kiṃ tarhi ? tadapi hi nityaṃ yasmiṃstattvaṃ na vihanyate . tadbhāvastattvam . ākṛtau cāpi
tattvaṃ na vihanyate pātañjalama॰ 1 . 1 paspaśā॰ iti . samayapratyākhyānavat pratipādanapratyākhyānātideśo
vṛddhavyavahārādākārādimātre pratipatterityadoṣāya, na śabdādeva iti vakṣyamāṇatvāt .


antareṇa tattvamārabdhadravyābhāve'pi chidrabudhnaghaṭādau ghaṭābhidhānapratyayau dṛṣṭau .
ābhāmātre'pi tu tau tatra tattvopanilayanāt kṛtāviti cet, sthāṇu-mṛgatṛṣṇikayornara-salilatvaprasaṅgaḥ, tatra tadabhidhānapratyayasadbhāvāt . naratvasalilatvānupanipāte
narasaliloktipratyayau mā bhūtām . anupacaritakiñcidbhūtākārāttu kiñciduktipratyayau syātām .
tathā viśeṣo'pi . yadi svaviṣayaḥ, viśeṣavirodhaḥ . yadi viśeṣastata ātmā

tattvasambandhādṛte'pyabhidhānapratyayayoḥ pravṛttiṃ darśayaṃścāha --tathā hyantareṇetyādi . tattvaṃ hi dravye
samavaiti . dravyañca dvidhā--adravyamanekadravyañca . adravye tvākāśādau tattvābhāve'pyuktipratyayāvuktau .
anekadravyamārabdhadravyam, tacca samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇairārabhyate . samavāyikāraṇaṃ ghaṭasya kapālāni,
asamavāyikāraṇaṃ tatsaṃyogāḥ . āṅ iti ca vidhyupāyamaryādopasaṅgrahārthaḥ . ko vidhiḥ ? svataḥ svātmani
ca, ka upāyaḥ ? saṃyogādinimittāntarasahitāni, kā maryādā ? ā antyāvayavidravyāt dravyāṇi
dravyāntaramārabhante . vināśo'pi kāraṇavibhāgāt kāraṇavināśādvā . tatracchidrabudhne ghaṭe kāraṇavibhāgādutpanne saṃyogābhāvādārabdhadravyābhāve'pi ghaṭābhidhānapratyayau dṛṣṭau, tathā kuḍyalikhite samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇābhāve śiśūnāṃ ca krīḍanake loṣṭapāṣāṇādau sadbhāvāsadbhāvasthāpanākṛte . bhavedetat --ābhāmātre'pi tu ākāramātre saṃsthānamātre sādṛśyamātra ityarthaḥ, tau coktipratyayau tatra tattvasya ghaṭatvasyopanilayanāt kṛtamikṛtāviti cet, tatra tattvābhāva uktaḥ, satyapi ca tattve'smadiṣṭākāramātroktipratyayau coktau, athāpyābhāmātre tattvopanilayanamiṣyate tvayā tataḥ sthāṇu-mṛgatṛṣṇikayornara-salilatvaprasaṅgaḥ, tatra tadabhidhānapratyayasadbhāvāt tattattvopanilayanācca, ghaṭatvopanilayanād ghaṭavat .
anupanipāte naratvasya sthāṇau salilatvasya mṛgatṛṣṇikāyāṃ narasaliloktipratyayau mā bhūtām,
tau ca dṛṣṭau, kathamagṛhītaviśeṣaṇatvānnaratvasalilatvānupanipāte nāyuktau ? tatropacāralabhyau hi tau, iha
tu lokanaye vinopacāreṇa labhyau . kathamiti cet, anupacaritakiñcidbhūtākārāttu kiñciduktipratyayau syātāṃ bhavitumarhataḥ, ākārasyāsampūrṇasya dṛṣṭatvādeva . bhavatpakṣe punarna hi tattvaṃ kiñcinnilīnaṃ
kiñcinna nilīnamityasti .
evaṃ tāvat sāmānyaṃ vikalpadvaye vicāritam, viśeṣo'dhunā vicāryaḥ . tata āha --tathā viśeṣo'pīti . so'pi dvayīṃ kalpanāṃ nātivartate--svaviṣayaḥ paraviṣayo veti . tatra yadi svaviṣayaḥ,
viśeṣavirodhaḥ . viśeṣasya virodho viśeṣābhāvāpatteḥ, viśeṣeṇa virodha ātmābhāvāpatteḥ . kiṃ vāṅmā

na bhavati, anyatvād viśeṣasya guṇataḥ kālato vā; anyathā ghaṭādau sāmānyāpatteḥ .
atha ātmā, tato viśeṣo na bhavati, ekatvādātmanaḥ .
athocyeta--naikatvānyatvavirodhadoṣau, ātmaiva viśeṣaḥ ityanapādānādipratijñānāt . yadyātmāpekṣa eva viśeṣaḥ eka evānya ityātmano'nyathābhavanādanātmatvaṃ rūpādirūpeṇa ghaṭarūpādipūrvottarāṇāmabhāvatvam . tathā cobhayābhāvaḥ .
treṇa ? netyucyate, yadi viśeṣastata ātmā na bhavati, anyatvādviśeṣasya . viśeṣeṇa virodhastāvad
yadi ghaṭādāvātmani viśeṣo vartate svaviṣayaḥ tata ātmā na, anyatvādviśeṣasya rūpāderdeśataḥ parasparato viśiṣyamāṇasyeti taddarśayati --guṇata iti . kālato vā pratikṣaṇānyānyotpattyā vinaṃṣṭṛṣu rūpādiṣu
kastadātmā ? ityātmābhāvaḥ . tadabhāve kasya viśeṣaḥ ? anyathā ghaṭādau sāmānyāpatteḥ . anyatheti
rūpādīnāṃ samudāyaikyāpattyabhyupagame viśeṣapakṣatyāgaḥ sāmānyaparigrahaścāpadyate, tatra coktā doṣāḥ sukhaṃ
sukhaṃ ca sukhādisamudayaśca ityādayaḥ, ta evātra rūpaṃ rūpaṃ ca rūpādisamudayaśca ityādayaḥ . mā bhūdātmābhāvadoṣaḥ tasmiṃścātmābhāve viśeṣābhāvadoṣa iti pakṣāntaraṃ gṛhṇīyāt --athātmā saviśeṣaḥ, ātmā
eka eva sa evānanya iti . tato viśeṣo na bhavati, ekatvādātmanaḥ, ghaṭādervastuna ekatvādātmanastattattvādityarthaḥ, anyo hi viśeṣaḥ .
etaddoṣaparihārārthamathocyeta pareṇa --naikatvānyatvavirodhadoṣau . ātmano viśeṣaḥ iti
sambandhāpādānayoḥ ṣaṣṭhīpañcamīnirdeśe bhedena ātmani viśeṣaḥ ityadhikaraṇasaptamyā nirdeśe vā syātāmetau
doṣau . kiṃ tarhi ? ātmaiva viśeṣaḥ ityanapādānādipratijñānānnaikatvānyatvavirodhadoṣau mameti .
atrocyate --yadyātmāpekṣa eva viśeṣa iti tatpratyuccāraṇam, dvitīyavikalpa āyāto viśeṣasya virodha iti .
atrāpyayaṃ doṣaḥ --eka evānya ityātmano'nyathābhavanādanātmatvaṃ rūpādirūpeṇa . kiṃ vāṅmātreṇa ?
netyupapattimāha --anyathābhavanāditi . tannidarśayati --ghaṭarūpādipūrvottarāṇāmabhāvatvam . tat katham ?
anye'nye rūpādaya eva bhavantīti ghaṭābhāvaḥ, tadabhāve kasya viśeṣaḥ ? ghaṭa eva vānyathā bhavatīti
rūpādyabhāvaḥ . tataścottareṣāṃ śivakādīnāṃ piṇḍāvasthātaḥ pūrveṣāṃ ca mṛttvādīnāmabhāvaḥ . athavā ghaṭato'nyat
paṭatvam, rūpato'nyacchabdāditvam, tena prakāreṇa anyathābhavanād ghaṭābhāvo rūpādyabhāvaśca . tathā
cobhayābhāvaḥ, ātmābhāvo viśeṣābhāvaśca athavā rūpādyabhāvaprāpito ghaṭātmābhāvo ghaṭātmābhāvaprāpito
rūpādyabhāva iti .



etadaniṣṭatāyāṃ tu parāpekṣapakṣāpattiḥ . tathāpi dravyabhedaḥ . kā hi vṛttisāhāyakādṛte siddhavṛtterghaṭasya paṭādyapekṣā ? tathātmaivāsya bhidyeta . atha vā
pārthivatvādapekṣā, samānajātitvādapekṣyate ghaṭena paṭaḥ; vijātīyāt tarhi viśeṣābhāva udakādeḥ . dravyatvāpekṣā tatrāpīti cet, vijātīyābhyāṃ guṇakarmabhyāmaviśeṣaḥ . tatrāpi sattāpekṣeti cet, vijātīyāt tarhyatyantāsato jāterivājāteḥ,
kāryādvā katham ? iti bhāvābhāvayoraviśeṣaḥ . tathāpi cobhayābhāvaḥ .

etadaniṣṭatāyāṃ tu parāpekṣapakṣāpattiriti . ghaṭāderātmano'nyathābhavanādanātmatvaṃ tataśca
viśeṣasyātmanaścābhāvaḥ ityuktavirodhadoṣānabhyupagame parāpekṣapakṣaḥ paraviṣayo viśeṣo na svaviṣayaḥ ityāpannaḥ . sa kinnāmako doṣa iti cet, svapakṣaparityāganāmakaḥ . upacarya ca evamabhyupagamyamāne'pyayamaparo
doṣaḥ --tathāpi dravyabhedaḥ, dravyasya ghaṭāderātmanaḥ svarūpapararūpābhyāṃ dvidhātmāvasthānaṃ prasaktaṃ parāpekṣatvādviśeṣasya . syānmatam--paṭādyavṛttyātmaka eva ghaṭaḥ paṭādyapekṣata iti . tannetyucyate --kā hi vṛttisāhāyakādṛte siddhavṛtterghaṭasya paṭādyapekṣā . sahāyabhāvaḥ sāhāyakam, vṛtteḥ sāhāyakaṃ vṛttisāhāyakam, ghaṭavṛtteḥ sahāyabhāvaṃ paṭasya muktvā svata eva siddhavṛtteḥ pūrvameva ghaṭasya kānyā uttarakālā paṭādyapekṣā ? nāstyevetyarthaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? prayojanābhāvāt . tathātmaivāsya bhidyeta, tena prakāreṇa tathā
ghaṭasvarūpameva bhidyeta, sahāyāpekṣavṛttitvāt, śibikodvāhātmavṛttivat .
atha vā pārthivatvādapekṣā, asti ghaṭasya paṭādyapekṣetyāha . kā sā ? samānā jātiḥ .
samānajātitvādapekṣyate ghaṭena paṭaḥ . kā samānajātiḥ ? pārthivatvam . viśeṣaḥ kathamiti cet,
ghaṭātmatvādviśeṣaḥ paṭāderiti . atrocyate --vijātīyāt tarhi viśeṣābhāva udakādeḥ . yadi samānajātyapekṣayā viśeṣa iṣyate evaṃ tarhyasamānajātīyādudakāderghaṭasya viśeṣābhāvaḥ prāpnoti . aniṣṭaṃ caitat .
dravyatvāpekṣā tatrāpīti cet, dravyatvasāmānyāpekṣayā ghaṭasya udakāderviśeṣo bhaviṣyatīti cet .
vijātīyābhyāṃ guṇakarmabhyāmaviśeṣaḥ, na hi vijātīyayorguṇakarmaṇordravyatvāpekṣāsti, tābhyāmapi ca
ghaṭasya viśeṣa iṣyate . tatrāpi sattāpekṣeti cet, vijātīyāt tarhi atyantāsataḥ aviśeṣaḥ
iti vartate . evamapi kharaviṣāṇāderatyantāsato viśeṣābhāvaḥ syāt, apekṣyābhāvāt . kimiva ? jāteriva
ajāteḥ . pārthivatvajāteśca bhavatsiddhāntena apagatajāterjātyantarāpekṣā nāsti, tasyāḥ kathaṃ jātyantarādudakādervā vyaktyantarād viśeṣo bhavati, apekṣābhāvāt ? kāryādvā kathaṃ viśeṣaḥ iti vartate . kāryaṃ
hi bhavatsiddhānte prāgavidyamānaṃ samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇasānnidhye paścādutpadyate, kriyāguṇavyapadeśābhāvādasat kāryam iti siddhāntābhyupagamāt, kāraṇāvasthāyāṃ kāraṇānāṃ kāryasyāsattvādeva apekṣā nāstīti


pārthivatvāditulyatvācca tadvat tadātmatvaṃ, tattattvena apekṣyatvāditi viveka-
viśeṣābhāvaḥ prāptaḥ . niṣpanne coparatavyāpārāvasthāyāṃ siddhatvāt kāryasya kāraṇānāṃ kāraṇatvābhāvāt
kāryakāraṇaviśeṣābhāvaḥ . itiśabdo hetūpasaṃhārārthaḥ, ityuktahetupāramparyād bhāvābhāvayoraviśeṣaḥ, yathā
pūrvoktavidhinā sato'sadapekṣā'bhāvād viśeṣābhāvaḥ, evamasato'pi sadapekṣā'bhāvādaviśeṣaḥ . asato vā
kāpekṣā ? evamanayoraviśiṣṭatvāt sattvameva vā abhāvasya bhāvavat, asattvameva vā bhāvasya abhāvavat .
tathāpi cobhayābhāvaḥ, bhāvābhāvayorabhāvaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayorātmaviśeṣayorvā ghaṭāderiti .
evaṃ tāvad ghaṭādeḥ pārthivatvādyapekṣā na yuktā . abhyupetyāpi tadapekṣāṃ pārthivatvāditulyatvācca
tadvat tadātmatvam . kāryasya ghaṭasya kāraṇena mṛdā saha pārthivatvena dharmeṇa tulyatvāt tadvaditi
ghaṭasya ghaṭabhavanātmatvavat tadātmatvaṃ mṛttvaṃ, pārthivatvātmaghaṭatvavadvā . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tattattvenāpekṣyatvāt . tasya bhāvaḥ tattvam, bhavanaṃ bhāvaḥ, tasya tattvaṃ tattattvam, tattattvenāpekṣyatvāt, ghaṭabhavanavadapekṣyate hi pārthivatvam, tasmāt prāptaṃ tadātmatvaṃ ghaṭatvaṃ pārthivatvasya ghaṭātmavad ghaṭatvenāpekṣyatvāt .
itiśabdo hetvarthe, atastadātmatvādapekṣyamāṇasya vivekayatnārthahāniḥ viśeṣārthāpekṣāpratipādanayatnahāniḥ . aviśeṣa iti, evaṃ ca kṛtvā sa eva aviśeṣaḥ . ādigrahaṇāt dravyatvāditulyatvāt sattvatulyatvādityevamevāviśeṣa āpādyaḥ .
syānmatam--ayaṃ viśeṣa eva na bhavati, āpekṣikatvāt sāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ dravyatvādīnāmaupacārikatvācca . dravyatvaṃ guṇatvaṃ karmatvaṃ ca sāmānyāni viśeṣāśca vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 2 . 5 ityuktāni, kiṃ
punargotvaghaṭatvādīnīti ? kastarhi viśeṣo mukhyaḥ ? antya eva . sāmānyamapi mukhyaṃ bhāva evetyabhiprāyaḥ .
yasmādaṇuṣvekākāśadeśātītaprāptaṣuprāpteṣu anyatvajñānābhidhānaprabhāvavibhāvito'ntyo viśeṣaḥ, na hi ākasmikāvanyoktipratyayau, tasmādastyasau . sa eva ca viśeṣo mukhyaḥ . yathoktam --anyatrāntyebhyo viśeṣebhyaḥ
vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 2 . 6 iti . tathā bhāva eva ca mukhyasāmānyam, saditi yato dravyaguṇakarmasu dravyaguṇakarmabhyo'rthāntaraṃ sā sattā vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 2 . 7--8 iti vacanāt . dravyatvādīnāmaupacārikatvāttad
dvyātmatayopapāditamiti .


yatnārthahāniḥ, aviśeṣaḥ . antye'pi taddravyādiprabhedagatigrāhyatvāt, anyathā
yogināmajñānaprasaṅgāt .

atrocyate --antye'pi taddravyādiprabhedagatigrāhyatvāt . ante bhavo'ntyaḥ, antye'pi tasmin
viśeṣe viśeṣābhāva iti apiśabdāt sambandhaḥ . ko hetuḥ ? taddravyādiprabhedagatigrāhyatvāt . dravyamādiryeṣāṃ ta ete dravyādayaḥ dravyakṣetrakālabhāvāḥ, teṣāṃ prabhedaḥ tatprabhedaḥ, tatprabhedena gatiḥ pariṇāmo
vṛttirvikalpaḥ, yathā asya kāryasyeyaṃ gatiḥ iti dṛṣṭatvāt . tayā gatyā grāhyatvam, kasya ? antyaviśeṣasya . tasmāt taddravyādiprabhedagatigrāhyatvād nāntyaviśeṣaḥ kalpyaḥ, dravyāḍivyatirekeṇa pratyakṣānumānābhyāmagrāhyatvāt tatsvarūpeṇaiva grāhyatvācca . tadyathā--yogī pratyakṣeṇaikaṃ paramāṇuṃ paśyan dvyaṇukatvāt pracyutaṃ
paśyati anyaṃ tryaṇukatvāt pracyutamanyaṃ dvyaṇukasamavetamanyaṃ tryaṇukasamavetaṃ ca, dravyataḥ svata eva ca bhinnāni
tāni paramāṇvādidravyāṇi paśyati, tatra kimantyaviśeṣeṇa ? evaṃ kṣetrato pyūrdhakṣetrato'pyūrdhabhāgasthitamekamaparamarvāgbhāgamadhobhāgasthitam . kālato'pi kañcit prathame samaye sthitam, anyaṃ dvitīye sthitamāgataṃ vā . yugapadāgatasthitayorapi dravyakṣetrabhāvakṛtaṃ nānātvamastyeva . bhāvataḥ kañcit kṛṣṇaṃ śuklaṃ kañcit surabhimasurabhiṃ tiktaṃ
kaṭukaṃ vetyādi, athavā kṛṣṇamanyaṃ kṛṣṇataraṃ kṛṣṇatamaṃ dviguṇatriguṇasaṅkhyeyāsaṅkhyeyānantaguṇakṛṣṇādiṃ vā .
evaṃ śeṣavarṇairgandharasasparśaiśca saprabhedairdarśanaṃ vācyam . anyatheti parasparaviśiṣṭadravyādiviśeṣābhāve viṣayanirapekṣatvād yogināmajñānaprasaṅgāt . avaśyaṃ dravyādayo viṣayāḥ svata eva viśiṣṭā eṣitavyāḥ . na cet,
yogino mithyājñānaprasaṅgaḥ, anyathāsthitasyārthasya anyathādarśanāt . antyaviśeṣāṇāṃ ca parasparaviśeṣoktipratyayapravṛttau nimittāntaraṃ kalpyam . svata eva viśiṣṭatve'ntyaviśeṣasya kalpanā vā tyājyā, paramāṇūnāmapi
tadvad viśeṣo nimittanirapekṣaḥ kiṃ neṣyate ? viśeṣeṣvapi nimittāntarāṇi cet, anavasthāprasaṅgaḥ, tataśca
viśeṣoktipratyayānupapattirevetyalaṃ prasaṅgena . sthitam--na svaviṣayo viśeṣa iti .
paraviṣayaviśeṣaparīkṣāvasaraḥ, tata āha --paraviṣayatāyāṃ tu viśeṣasyānavasthānādaviśeṣaḥ . nanu
prāgapyuktam --parāpekṣapakṣāpattirvā iti, satyam, tatra upāttaparityāgādahṛdayatvāpādanadvāreṇa prasaṅgato'nye'pi

paraviṣayatāyāṃ tu viśeṣasyānavasthānādaviśeṣaḥ . iha dravyādipratyapekṣayā
sarvasyāsya sambaddhatvādekaikasya niravaśeṣamidaṃ jagad viśeṣaṇaṃ syāt, ekaghaṭasaṃhatanānāvasthaguṇavat . tatra sarvārthānāṃ nityapravṛttatvāt samayamapi nāsti teṣāṃ
samavasthānaṃ yadāśrayo viśeṣārtho'vasthāpyeta, āttavat .
doṣā uktāḥ, iha tu prādhānyenaiva anyena ca prakāreṇa doṣābhidhānaṃ prakriyate . anavasthānādaviśeṣa iti
sādhayiṣyamāṇamanavasthānaṃ siddhaṃ kṛtvāha . yathā ca prāk asamānāvasthānādasāmānyam iti prakramya
sāmānyābhāvaḥ pratipāditastathehāpi tadviparyayeṇa tadeva prakaraṇaṃ yojyam --kiṃ kāraṇam ? anavadhṛtaikatarakāryatvādityādi sarvaṃ tādṛgeva yāvat tata etāni ghaṭādivastvātmaviśeṣapakṣagrāhiṇāpyavaśyāpekṣyāṇi,
pratyakṣata eva tathā tathā pareṇa viśiṣṭatvādātmanaḥ; kimu paraviṣayamukhyaviśeṣavādinā ? pratyakṣata
eva tathā tathā paraviṣayasya viśeṣasya bhavanāt pareṇa viśiṣṭena bhūyata iti . iheti paraviṣayaviśeṣapakṣe
dravyādipratyapekṣayā sarvasyāsya sambaddhatvādekaikasya niravaśeṣamidaṃ jagad viśeṣaṇamiti, pūrvavadeva
dravyaṃ dravyāntarāṇi kṣetraṃ kālaṃ bhāvaṃ ca pratyapekṣate svaprabhedān paraprabhedāṃśca, evaṃ kṣetraṃ kālo bhāvaśceti sarvaṃ sarveṇa
sambaddham, tasmāt sarvasya sambaddhatvāt pūrvavat sahakramavṛttirūpādiśivakādipṛthivyādivrīhyādyaṅkurādisamavasthānād dravyāṇāṃ kṣetrato'pi teṣāmekagatisamavasthānāt kālato'pyanekaprabhedopavarṇyadharmādyastikāyapṛthivyādipānīyādānadhāraṇādisamavasthānād bhāvato'pi pūrvavad dravyādirūpādiśivakādibhavanasamavasthānāt
syādekaghaṭasaṃhatanānāvasthaguṇavaditi . yathoktam --dravyameva hi tathāvasthānād rūpādibhāvaṃ labhate, ekapuruṣapitṛputratvādivat  , dravyameva hi ghaṭākhyaṃ rūpaṃ raso gandhaḥ sparśaḥ saṅkhyā saṃsthānaṃ
śuklaṃ nīlaṃ tiktaṃ kaṭu surabhi mṛdu karkaśaṃ śuklataraṃ śuklatamaṃ cetyādiviśeṣaṇatāṃ nātivartate . ta eva hyete guṇāḥ
paryāyāśca nānāvasthāḥ parasparaviśiṣṭāḥ parasparasya dravyasya ca viśeṣaṇam, dravyameva guṇāḥ paryāyāśca .
tathānye'pi dravyakṣetrakālabhāvāḥ saprabhedā iti . syācchabdāt punaḥ syādetadevaṃ yadyetad vakṣyamāṇadoṣeṇa na vyāhanyetetyata āha --tatra sarvārthānāṃ nityapravṛttatvāt samayamapītyādi yāvad yadāśrayo viśeṣārtho'vasthāpyeteti . evaṃ parasparaviśeṣaṇatvena sarve'rthā nityaṃ pravṛttā eveti samayamātramapi
nāsti teṣāṃ samavasthānam . samavasthānāśrayo hi viśeṣo'vasthāpyeta, tadabhāvāt kuto viśeṣaḥ ? ātta-
vaditi tatkālāvagṛhītakṣaṇotpannavinaṣṭabhāvavadityarthaḥ . tataḥ kimiti cet, samavasthānābhāvānnirāśrayaḥ
khapuṣpavannāsti viśeṣaḥ .
syānmatam--sambandhadeśo na dūṣyate, upekṣyata iti . kimuktaṃ bhavati ? sambandhadeśān dravyādīn
muktvā nirāśrayatvād viśeṣo mā bhūt, sambandhadeśasthānāṃ tu ghaṭapaṭādīnāṃ kimiti mudhā viśeṣo na syāt

sambandhadeśopekṣāyāmupāttatyāgo'kasmāt, tulyatvāt sāmānyābhyupagamāt .
rūpādibhedasambandha eva viśeṣaḥ, na, anyāsambandhe'rūpāditvācchuddhānāṃ kvacidapyabhāvāt . loke dṛṣṭo nanu ca vāyuḥ śuddha eva sparśaḥ, tatrāpi hi kṣetrādidravyasya rūpādayo na gṛhyante, anabhivyaktisaukṣmyāt, dravyādivat .
tadāśrayatvād viśeṣasya ? iti . atrocyate --sambandhadeśopekṣāyāmupāttatyāgo'kasmāt . evaṃ sati
akasmādevopāttasya viśeṣasya tyāgaḥ, sāmānyābhyupagamāt . kathaṃ sāmānyamabhyupagatamiti cet, tulyatvāt sambandhadeśasthānāṃ dravyakṣetrakālabhāvapratyāsattitulyalakṣaṇatvāt sāmānyasya samānabhāvasya .
atrāha --rūpādibhedasambandha eva viśeṣa iti . rūparasagandhasparśasaṅkhyāsaṃsthānādīnāṃ saprabhedānāṃ
sambandha eva viśeṣa ucyate, ta eva hi parasparato viśiṣyamāṇā viśeṣākhyā iti . atrocyate --tad
na, anyāsambandhe'rūpāditvāt . anyairdravyādibhiramambandhe teṣāmarūpāditvaṃ prasajyate, yasmāt sarve
sarvatra sarvadā sarvathā dravyakṣetrakālabhāvāvibhāgasambaddharasā eva hi rūpādayaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? śuddhānāṃ
kvacidapyabhāvāt, prāguktaṃ dravyādisambandhābhāve rūpādisvarūpābhāvāt tatsambaddhānāmeva dṛṣṭatvāt
saprabhedadravyādisambandhābhāve rūpādayo na santyevetyarūpāditvaṃ teṣāṃ prasaktam .
itara āha --loke dṛṣṭo nanu ca vāyuḥ śuddha eva sparśaḥ . syādarūpāditvaṃ yadi dravyakṣetrakālarūparasādibhirasambandhe rūpādyabhāva eva ityayamekāntaḥ syāt, syāccānumānaṃ yadi dṛṣṭena na bādhyate, dṛṣṭaśca
vāyuḥ sparśamātra eva, na hi dṛṣṭād gariṣṭhaṃ pramāṇamastīti . atrocyate --tatrāpi hi kṣetrādidravyasya
rūpādayo na gṛhyante, anabhivyaktisaukṣmyāt, vaidharmyeṇa dravyādivat . yathā dravyādayo gṛhyante
pratyakṣeṇa na tathā vāyau rūparasagandhādayo'nabhivyaktisaukṣmyād gṛhyante . kiṃ kāraṇam ? cakṣurādīndriyagrāhyatvapariṇatyabhāvād hetvanumeyatābhāvāt . yathoktaṃ saṅgrahāntare—
mūrtiḥ kathaṃ na vāyornāsvādyeta ca kathaṃ na rūpyeta .tadvyaktigrahaṇaṃ prati na śaknuyāt tvindriyaiḥ kaścit ॥   iti .
gandhavanto'bagnivāyavaḥ, mūrtatvāt, pṛthivīvat . evaṃ rasavantau agnivāyū, mūrtatvāt, bhūmyambuvat . rūpavān vāyuḥ, mūrtatvāt, agnibhūmijalavat . rūparasagandhasparśavanti vāyvagnijalāni, mūrtatvāt, pṛthivīvat . ihāpi ca sādharmyadṛṣṭānta ucyate--vātāyanareṇusparśarasarūpagandhādivad na gṛhyanta iti, teṣāṃ hi
ravikaroddayotavyaktānāṃ rūpameva grāhyam .


athocyeta--ekakālasahāvasthānādarthānāṃ viśeṣo bhaviṣyati, avatiṣṭhate hi
kiñcit kañcit kālam . evamapi tathābhūtasāmānyābhyupagamādaviśeṣatvameva . sarvasāmānādhikaraṇyācca ekavikāre'pi sarvasyānyathātvaṃ jāyate, tanmātre'nyatvāt, gandhonādhikabhvambhovat .
atha tu tadbuddhyāsannameva grahīṣyate sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ, evaṃ tarhi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ na sāmānyaṃ nāpi viśeṣaḥ, teṣāṃ parasparāsattyabhāvāt . tadbuddhyā-

athocyeta pareṇa--yadi sambandhadeśasamavasthānādarthānāṃ viśeṣo na bhavati, ekakālasahāvasthānādarthānāṃ viśeṣo bhaviṣyati, yasmādavatiṣṭhate hi kiñcit kañcit kālam, yathā pūrvāparasthitaghaṭapaṭāviti . nanu viśeṣakāraṇamatra vaktuṃ prāptam, idaṃ tu sāmānyakāraṇameva āśaṅkitamiti . atrocyate—
sāmānyadvāreṇa viśeṣaḥ siddhyatīti tadasiddhidvāreṇa viśeṣāsiddhiriti sarvatra grāhyam . atrāpyācārya
uttaramāha --evamapi tathābhūtasāmānyābhyupagamādaviśeṣatvameva . parābhyupagama eva uttaratvamāpadyate,
ekakālāvasthāne kālasāmānyābhyupagamād deśasambandhasāmānyābhyupagamavadupāttatyāgo'kasmāt tulyatvādityaviśeṣatvameva .
kiñcānyat--prāguktavidhinā sarvasāmānādhikaraṇyācca viśeṣasvatattvasya parasparāpekṣatvād
viśiṣyamāṇatvād bhāvānāṃ parasparataḥ sarvaṃ jagadekādhikaraṇam, tatraikavikāre'pi sarvasya śeṣasyāpyaśeṣasya
tadapekṣatvādanyathātvaṃ vikāro jāyate . kutaḥ ? tanmātre'nyatvāt . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? gandhonādhikabhvambhovaditi, yathā bhvambhasorayathāsaṅkhyena gandhonasya ambhaso gandhādhikāyāśca bhuvaḥ taddhīnādhikabhāvena vikāro
dṛṣṭaḥ--gandhahīnā āpaḥ tadadhikā bhūriti . tasmānnāstyeva anavasthānānnirāśrayaḥ khapuṣpavad viśeṣa iti .
atha tu tadbuddhyāsannameva grahīṣyate sāmānyaviśeṣayoriti . athetyadhikārāntare . turviśeṣaṇe
prāktanāddeśakālāsattyadhikārād buddhyāsattyadhikāraṃ viśinaṣṭi . buddhyā āsannaṃ, saḥ iti buddhistadbuddhiḥ,
yo'sau prathamo ghaṭaḥ sa eva dvitīya iti buddhiḥ . kā sā ? tattvānuvṛttibuddhiḥ, vyāvṛttibuddhirapi tadbuddhyāsattyā dravyatvabuddhau prasaktāyām nāpo na sikatā na śivakādirghaṭa eva iti . yathoktam --anuvṛttipratyayakāraṇaṃ sāmānyam, vyāvṛttibuddhiheturviśeṣaḥ   iti . atra brūmaḥ --evaṃ tarhi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ na sāmānyaṃ nāpi viśeṣaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? teṣāṃ parasparāsattyabhāvāt . tayā tadbuddhyā
dravyasya guṇasya karmaṇo vāsattirgṛhyate, kiṃ dravyabuddhyā guṇo gṛhyate karma vā ? dravyabuddhyā hi tad dravyameva,

sannatā hi dravyasya dravyasya ca, tatraiva sāmānyaviśeṣau syātām, na guṇakarmaṇoḥ .
evaṃ ca tayoḥ sattvasāmānya-dravyārambhādiviśeṣābhāvaḥ . tathāsattiḥ sikatānāṃ
vajrasya ca, teṣāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣau syātām, na bhūmyambhasoḥ; yāvat tulyajāti-
tadāsannatvād dravyam iti gṛhyate, tatraiva ca sāmānyaviśeṣau syātāṃ na guṇakarmaṇoḥ . kasmāt ?
yasmāt tadbuddhyāsannatā dravyasya dravyasya ca, na dravyasya guṇasya ca, tathā na dravyasya karmaṇāṃ ca, na
guṇasya karmaṇaśceti sāmānyābhāvo viśeṣābhāvaśca, tadbuddhyāsattyabhāvāt . evaṃ ca kṛtvā tayoḥ sattvasāmānya-dravyārambhādiviśeṣābhāvaḥ . tayoḥ dravyaguṇayorguṇakarmaṇordravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ ca tayośca tayoścetyāvṛttyā sattvalakṣaṇaṃ sāmānyaṃ mā bhūt . tasmāt sat iti trayāṇāmaviśeṣa ityayuktam . tathā anityaṃ
dravyavat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavat iti ca sāmānyaṃ dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ mā bhūt . uktaṃ ca vaḥ śāstre —
sadanityaṃ dravyavat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavaditi dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmaviśeṣaḥ vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 8 .
evaṃ tarhi anānātvaṃ dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ prāptam iti codite viśeṣa ucyate--nāviśeṣa eva, ārambhānārambhabhedāt, dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabhante guṇāśca guṇāntaram . karma karmasādhyaṃ na vidyate vai॰ sū॰
1 . 1 . 10--11 iti . kiñcānyat--lakṣaṇabhedāt, kriyāvad guṇavat samavāyikāraṇamiti dravyalakṣaṇam,
dravyāśrayī aguṇavān saṃyogavibhāgeṣvakāraṇamanapekṣa iti guṇalakṣaṇam, ekadravyamaguṇaṃ saṃyogavibhāgeṣvanapekṣaṃ kāraṇamiti karmalakṣaṇam vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 15-16-17 . tathā virodhāvirodhabhedāt,
kāryāvirodhi dravyaṃ kāraṇāvirodhi ca, ubhayathā guṇaḥ, kāryavirodhi karma vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 13-14 .
ityevamādidravyaguṇakarmanānātvahetukalāpaśca viśeṣābhāvādanarthaka āpadyate . evaṃ tāvad dravyasya
dravyasya ca sāmānyaviśeṣau syātām, na guṇakarmaṇoḥ .
itara āha--yathā dravyayoḥ pratyāsattirdravyatvābhisambandhāt tathā sattvābhisambandhād dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ bhaviṣyati . yathoktam --saditi yato dravyaguṇakarmasu dravyaguṇakarmabhyo'rthāntaraṃ sā sattā
vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 2 . 7-8 iti . atra brūmaḥ--dravyayorapi tvadanukampādravīkṛtacetasā mayā tvayi cittānuvṛttyā
uktam, tatrāpyāśāṃ mā kṛthāḥ, tadapi nopapadyate buddhyāsattikṛtasāmānyaviśeṣavādino bhavataḥ sāmānyābhāve viśeṣābhāvāt . tathāsattiḥ sikatānāṃ vajrasya ca, pārthivatvasāmānyānuviddhatvādaśmasikatāloṣṭavajrādīnām . teṣāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣau syātām, na bhūmyambhasoḥ, anyatarasya pārthivatvābhāvāt .
tenaiva hetukrameṇa tathāsattiḥ piṇḍaghaṭayoḥ, na mṛt-sikatānām; evaṃ parataḥ parato yāvat tulyajāti-

guṇakriyayoraṇvoreva, na tu tayorapi antyaviśeṣasamavāyena apakṣiptapratyāsattyoḥ .
tasmāt sāmānyābhāvād viśeṣābhāvaḥ, sarvatraivobhayābhāvaḥ .
arthāśleṣalakṣaṇāyāṃ tvāsattau pṛthivīghaṭarūpādīnāmeva syāt sāmānyaviśeṣatā, netarasāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ .
guṇakriyayoraṇvoreva syātāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣau iti vartate . tathāsattiḥ ghaṭakapālayoḥ, na piṇḍaghaṭayoḥ; evaṃ kapālaśakalayoḥ, na ghaṭaśakalayoḥ; śakalaśarkarayoḥ, na ghaṭaśarkarayoḥ; pāṃśuśarkarayoḥ, na
śakalaśarkarayoḥ; pāṃśudhūlyoḥ, na dhūlīśarkarayoḥ; dhūlītruṭyoḥ, na pāṃśutruṭyoḥ; truṭiparamāṇvoḥ, na
dhūlīparamāṇvoḥ . athavā ghaṭasya ca ghaṭasya ca, na ghaṭasya kapālasya cetyādi . tayorapi aṇvoḥ pārthivaśuklagatisamavāyinorevāṇvoḥ, na āpyapārthivādinīlaśuklagatisthitijātiguṇakriyayoḥ . na tu tayorapītyādi yāvadapakṣiptapratyāsattyoriti . tulyajātiguṇakriyāsamavāyinoranyatvapratyayaprabhāvolliṅgitāntyaviśeṣayoḥ tatsamavāyenāpakṣiptā apahṛtā pratyāsattistayorapi iti kṛtvā kutastadbuddhyāsannaprakaraṇam ?
tasmāt sāmānyābhāvād viśeṣābhāvaḥ, sarvatraivobhayābhāva iti dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ na sāmānyaṃ
nāpi viśeṣaḥ ityataḥ prabhṛti yāvat aṇvoḥ ityetadavadhimadhyābhihitopattibalād yathopapāditasāmānyaviśeṣābhāvaṃ smārayati .
atrāha--sā dvidhā pratyāsattiḥ, arthasambandhādanarthasambandhācca . tatrānarthalakṣaṇā sad-dravyapṛthivī-mṛd-ghaṭāditattvānuvṛttibuddhigrahaṇā yathoktā, sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāmarthatvābhāvāt . arthalakṣaṇā tu dravyaguṇakarmasambandhātmikā, teṣāmarthasaṃjñitatvāt . yathoktam --artha iti dravyaguṇakarmasu
vai॰ sū॰ 8 . 2 . 3 . tatra kriyāvat vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 15 ityādi dravyalakṣaṇam . tadbhedalakṣaṇaṃ ca --rūparasa-
gandhasparśavatī pṛthivī, rūparasasparśavatya āpo dravāḥ snigdhāśca, tejo rūpasparśavat, vāyuḥ
sparśavān vai॰ sū॰ 2 . 1 . 1-4, yatra rūpādicāturguṇyaṃ sā pṛthivī, gandhahīnā dravasnehādhikāścāpaḥ,
dravasneharasagandhahīnaṃ tejaḥ, rūpahīno vāyuḥ, dravyāśrayyādilakṣaṇo guṇaḥ . śrotragrahaṇo yo'rthaḥ
sa śabdaḥ vai॰ sū॰ 2 . 2 . 21 . cakṣurgrahaṇo yo'rthaḥ sa rūpam . ityādyarthalakṣaṇaniyatayā pratyāsattyā
sāmānyaviśeṣau syātāmiti .
atrocyate --arthāśleṣalakṣaṇāyāṃ tvāsattau pṛthivīghaṭarūpādīnāmeva syāt sāmānyaviśeṣatā, lakṣaṇoddeśanirdeśakṛtaivetyarthaḥ . netarasāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣatā iti vartate, sattva

tathāpi svaviṣayasāmānyaviśeṣāpattiḥ . sā coktadoṣā .
tasmāt sarvathāntaraṅgaṃ svamūrtisthaṃ pradhānaṃ vyavasthitamanapekṣam--na hi tasya
dravyatvapṛthivītvaguṇatvarūpatvādyanuvṛttivyāvṛttibuddhilakṣaṇayorna syāt . iṣyate ca tayorapi vaiśeṣikaiḥ
guṇasamudāyadravyavādibhiśca sādṛśyānuvṛttinivṛttilakṣaṇasāmānyaviśeṣatā . ko'bhiprāyaḥ ? arthāśleṣalakṣaṇāsattikṛtasāmānyaviśeṣābhyupagame tattvānuvṛttivyāvṛttibuddhigrahaṇau na syātām . tattvānuvṛttinivṛttikṛtayorvābhyupagame'rthāśleṣakṛtapratyāsattyorabhāva iti virodhād na prakalpateprakalpete ityayamabhiprāyaḥ .
kiñcānyat --tathāpi svaviṣayasāmānyaviśeṣāpattiḥ . arthāśleṣalakṣaṇāsattau satyāmapi svaviṣayameva sāmānyam, svaviṣaya eva viśeṣaḥ ityetau prāguktau vikalpāvāpannau . sā coktadoṣā, sāpi ca
svaviṣayasāmānyaviśeṣāpattiruktadoṣaiva --yadi svaviṣayam, sāmānyavirodhaḥ . yadi sāmānyaṃ tata
ātmā na bhavati, anekārthatvāt sāmānyasya . atha ātmā tato na sāmānyam, ekatvādātmanaḥ . atha
ātmaiva sāmānyam, rūpādirghaṭāderātmā tatsamudāyakāryatvāt; evaṃ satyātmabhedaḥ--rūpaṃ rūpaṃ ca
rūpādisamudayaśca ityādi . tathā viśeṣo'pi . yadi svaviṣayaḥ, viśeṣavirodhaḥ . yadi viśeṣastata
ātmā na bhavati, anyatvādviśeṣasya guṇataḥ kālato vā, anyathā ghaṭādau sāmānyāpatteḥ . atha ātmā
tato viśeṣo na bhavati, ekatvādātmanaḥ . athocyeta--naikatvānyatvavirodhadoṣau, ātmaiva viśeṣaḥ
ityanapādānādipratijñānāt; yadi ātmāpekṣa eva viśeṣaḥ, eka eva anya ityātmano'nyathābhavanādanātmatvamityādipūrvoktadoṣasambandhinī svaviṣayasāmānyaviśeṣāpattiḥ .
atrāha saṃsargavādī--yadi ātmaiva sāmānyam, ātmaiva viśeṣaḥ iti brūyāṃ sāṅkhya-bauddhavat syurete
doṣā mamāpi . na punarahamevaṃpakṣaḥ . mama tu sāmānyaviśeṣau dravyaguṇakarmabhyo'rthebhyo'tyantabhinnau,
nāgṛhītaviśeṣaṇā viśeṣye buddhirastīti sattvābhisambandhāt sat, dravyatvābhisambandhād dravyam ityādisāmānyaviśeṣavādinaḥ kathaṃ svaviṣayasāmānyaviśeṣapakṣadoṣāḥ ? iti . atrāpi paraviṣayasāmānyaviśeṣavādipratyākhyānāt kā gatiḥ ? ityalaṃ prasaṅgena .
tasmādityuktadoṣopasaṃhārārthaḥ, etaddoṣāpetaṃ sarvathāntaraṅgaṃ vastu iti pratipattavyaṃ ghaṭādi ityabhisambhantsyāmaḥ . sarveṇa prakāreṇa sarvathā yāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ gatvā sāmānyameva, viśeṣa eva ityevamādinā
vicārya vicārya antaraṅgaṃ vastu ghaṭasya kenacit prativiśiṣṭenākāreṇa udakādyāharaṇadhāraṇādisamarthena
bhavanaṃ samānena cārthāntaraistadevāśrayaṇīyam, na bahiraṅgaṃ sattvadravyatvādi svaparaviṣayasāmānyaviśeṣavādi

anuvṛttyapekṣā ghaṭāntareṣu . yadi syāt tato'nuvarteta sa teṣvapi, tataśca sarvasāmānyāt sa eva sa syāt, tadyathā--pūrvāhṇāparāhṇayoreka eva ghaṭaḥ . tatsanniveśasvarūpā-
parikalpitam . yathoktam --antaraṅgabahiraṅgayorantaraṅgo vidhirbalavān . ya eṣa prekṣāpūrvakārī puruṣaḥ
sa prātarutthāya pratyaṅgavartīni svāni kāryāṇi kurute, tataḥ sambandhinām, tataḥ suhṛdām, tataḥ
śeṣāṇām pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 1 . 1 . 56 iti . tadantaraṅgatvaṃ kutaḥ ? svamūrtisthatvāt, svā mūrtirgrīvādyātmikā,
tatrasthatvājjalādyāharaṇasamarthasya bhavanasya . pradhānatvācca tadeva grāhyam . kutaḥ pradhānam ? tadarthatvāt
sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ, kanyārthavastrālaṅkāravat, ghaṭārtho hi sāmānyaviśeṣakalpanāvyāpāraḥ . vrīhikaṇārthapalālādivadapradhānatvāt sāmānyaviśeṣayostyājyatā . vyavasthitatvācca tadeva ghaṭabhavanaṃ grāhyam . vyavasthitaṃ ca ātmanyeva sthitatvāt, na yathā tau sañcāriṇau sāmānyaviśeṣāvavyavasthitau parāpekṣatvādavyavasthitatvāccāvastu vandhyāputravat . kva punaḥ sañcāriṇau ? saddravyādiṣu . sad-dravya-pṛthivī-mṛd-ghaṭatvābhisambandhāt asti dravyaṃ pārthivo mārtiko ghaṭaḥ iti ghaṭe sampratyayaḥ   ityuktaṃ
hyācāryeṇa . ghaṭabhavanasyodakādyāharaṇāsaktātmanaḥ punaḥ kva sañcaraṇam ?
anapekṣatvācca, tadeva vastu ityabhisambhantsyate pratyekaṃ sarvatra . taddhi ghaṭabhavanaṃ na ghaṭa iti vā paṭa
iti vā ghaṭapaṭādidravyāntaradi dravyāntaramapekṣate yathā anuvṛttivyāvṛttisāmānyavādimate tadarthaṃ ghaṭapaṭādyarthāntarāpekṣā
vyāvṛttiviśeṣavādimate ca tadarthaṃ paṭādidravyāntarāpekṣā . laukikānuvartivyavahāranayavādimate tu sannihitasvādhīnavṛttitvād ghaṭātmabhavanasya na tadapekṣāstīti ta ddarśayati --na hi tasyānuvṛttyapekṣā ghaṭāntareṣu .
arthāpattyā na vyāvṛttyapekṣā paṭādidravyāntareṣu . yadi syādapekṣā tato'nuvarteta sa ghaṭaḥ teṣvapi
ghaṭāntareṣvapi . na punarapekṣāsti, tasya svasāmarthyenaiva siddhatvād ghaṭātmanaḥ . yadyapekṣeta ghaṭo ghaṭāntarāṇi, ghaṭāntareṣvapyanuvarteta . tataśca sarvasāmānyāt sa eva sa syāt, ghaṭāntaramapi ghaṭātmaiva
syāt, tattattvānuvṛtteḥ, ghaṭātmavat iti doṣaḥ syād deśabhinneṣvapi ghaṭeṣu kālabhinnaghaṭavat . tannidarśayati —
tadyathā--pūrvāhṇāparāhṇayoreka eva ghaṭa iti . nāpi ghaṭastattvānuvṛttimapekṣate, ghaṭātmanyasiddhe tattvānuvṛttyasiddheḥ; tata eva ca na paṭādivyāvṛttimapekṣate, tadāyattatvādityata āha --tatsanniveśasvarūpā-

pekṣatvācca tasyāstadapekṣā vyarthā, itaretarāśrayadoṣāpādanāt . tathā viśeṣe'pyasya
nāpekṣā, tathāhi sa eva na syāt, uktavat .--pūrvaṃ yathālokaprasiddhamanapekṣitapūrvāparaprabhedaṃ prakṛtiḥ iti vā anyat iti vā vartamānaṃ nityaṃ na pralayabhāk sad vartate bhāvo
yo'sau tadeva vastviti pratipattavyam . kiṃ na etena ? yadi kāraṇam, yadi kāryamkāryam, yadi sāmānyaṃ, yadi viśeṣaḥ .
pekṣatvācca tasyāḥ tadapekṣā vyarthā . ghaṭāvayavasanniveśasvarūpamapekṣate ghaṭāntarānuvṛttiḥ paṭādivyāvṛttiśceti yuktā anuvṛtterghaṭāpekṣā vyāvṛtteśca paṭādeḥ . ghaṭasya punaranuvṛttivyāvṛttyapekṣā vyarthā, svata
eva siddhatvāt . syānmatam--ghaṭo'pi ghaṭatvāpekṣātmalābhaḥ, tattvānuvṛttirapi ghaṭātmalābhāpekṣeti .
etaccāyuktam, itaretarāśrayadoṣāpādanāt . ghaṭa-ghaṭatvānuvartanayoritaretarāśrayatvadoṣamāpādayatyeṣā
kalpanā, itaretarāśrayāṇi ca kāryāṇi na prakalpante, tadyathā--naurnāvi baddhā netaratrāṇāya .
ityuktam--sāmānyaṃ nāpekṣata iti . tathā viśeṣe'pyasya nāpekṣeti . yathā sāmānyāpekṣā nāsti
ghaṭātmalābhasya tathāviśeṣetathā viśeṣe'pīti proktahetuvidhinātidiśati . tathā ca yojitamasmābhirarthataḥ . granthato
yojanāpi --tathā hi sa eva na syāduktavaditi . na hi tasya vyāvṛttyapekṣā paṭādiṣu . yadi
syāt, sa tebhyo'pi vyāvarteta . tataśca sarvaviśiṣṭatvāt sa eva na syād ghaṭo'pi, ghaṭapaṭayoriva .
tatsanniveśasvarūpāpekṣatvācca tasyāḥ tadapekṣā vyarthā, itaretarāśrayadoṣāpādanāditi sarvamatideśyam .
kiñcānyat --pūrvatvācca ghaṭātmabhavanasya . sāmānyaviśeṣābhyāṃ hi pūrvaṃ ghaṭabhavanam . tat kathamiti
cet, yathālokaprasiddham . loke prasiddhaṃ lokaprasiddham, yathaiva loke prasiddhaṃ tathā ghaṭabhavanam,
ākārādimātrameva ca ghaṭa iti loke prasiddham, tadeva pūrvam, anapekṣitapūrvāparaprabhedatvāt . ke punaḥ
pūrvāparaprabhedāḥ ? ghaṭādārabhya yāvat prakṛtiste pūrvaprabhedāḥ sāṅkhyānām, sat iti vā vaiśeṣikāṇām,
apare prabhedāḥ yāvadantyaviśeṣakṛtamanyat, iti sāṅkhyavaiśeṣikābhyāṃ kalpitam, ata āha --prakṛtiriti
vānyaditi vā . bauddhena vā kṣaṇikatvādatyantamanyaditi . vartamānatvācca, vartaterastyarthatvāt, astibhavatividyatipadyativartatayaḥ sannipātaṣaṣṭhāḥ sattārthāḥ   iti vacanāt . ata eva nityaṃ jalāharaṇādivyavahārasannipāti satatamatītānāgatakālayorapi ghaṭapaṭādyavasthānāt . na pralayabhāgiti, na ambhastaraṅgavat
svātmapraveśam, na pradīpajvālānalavadatyantavināśam, dvividhamapi pralayaṃ na bhajate, dravyasya paryāyāntareṇa
paryāyasyāpi dravyāvinābhāvādeva, ekāntāsadutpattivināśavādayorahetudṛṣṭāntatvādekāntanityavāde ca dharmāvirbhāvatirobhāvābhāvāt . taddhi tena rūpeṇa sarvakālaṃ sad, vartateḥ sattārthatvāditi tadeva vyācaṣṭe —

ko hi vādānāmantaṃ kartuṃ śaknuyāt ? āha ca--ṇiyayavayaṇijjasaccā savvaṇayā paraviyālaṇe mohā .te puṇa+adiṭṭhapuṇa adiṭṭhasamayo vibhaja+i sacce va ali+e vā ॥ sanmati॰ 1 . 28ko hyetad veda ? kiṃ vā'nena jñātena ?  
vartata iti . bhāva iti vṛttibhavanayoḥ prāguktaṃ paryāyaśabdatvaṃ darśayati . yo'sāviti pratyāmanati, ya evaṃ
vyākhyāto bhāvaḥ so'sau tadeva vastu nānyaditi pratipattavyamiti nigamayati . tadantaraṅgaṃ
pradhānamanapekṣaṃ pūrvaṃ vartamānaṃ ca tad vastu . itiśabdaḥ parisamāptyartho'vadhāraṇārtho vā, ityāneva
paryāpto'rthaḥ, nāto'dhiko nyūno vā, ye'nye'nyat kalpayanti--kāraṇameva, kāryameva, sāmānyameva, viśeṣa
eva, tadubhayameva, anyataropasarjanapradhānameva, naiva vāstyubhayamiti . kiṃ na etena ? yadi kāraṇam, yadi
kāryam, tataḥ ko doṣaḥ ? dṛśyate hi kāraṇamapi kāryamapi, yathā--paramāṇukāraṇaṃ dvyaṇukādi mṛtpiṇḍaśivakādīnāṃ kāryamapi, tadbhedajatvāt . evaṃ dvyaṇukatryaṇukādīnāmapi kāraṇakāryabhāvaḥ saṅghātabhedābhyām .
sāmānyaṃ dravyakṣetrakālabhāvānāṃ svaparabhavanasāmānyānativṛtteḥ . svaparaviśiṣṭabhavanātmakatvād viśeṣaḥ .
evamubhayamanyataropasarjanapradhānatvaṃ sahakramasvātantryapāratantryavivakṣāvaśāt . na cāstyubhayam, ekāntarūpasya parasparāpratibaddhasyāsiddherasiddhyādiśūnyatānubhavanāt .
sa eva vyavahāranayāśrayāllaukiko brūte --ko hi vādānāmiti ekāntavādānām antaṃ kartuṃ śaknu
yāt--ucchedaṃ śaknuyāt kartumiti . kiṃ kāraṇam ? na hi sāṅkhyābhihitāḥ sat kāraṇe kāryam,
asadakaraṇādupādānagrahaṇāt sarvasambhavābhāvāt .śaktasya śakyakaraṇāt kāraṇabhāvācca sat kāryam ॥ sāṅkhyakā॰ 9
ityevamādayo hetavaḥ, na vā vaiśeṣikoktāḥ kriyāguṇavyapadeśābhāvādasat vai॰ sū॰ 9 . 1 . 1 ityādayaḥ,
kṣaṇikā ghaṭādayaḥ pratyayāyattajanmatvāt ityādayo vā bauddhoktāḥ paraspareṇocchettuṃ śakyante, abhiyuktabuddhyutkarṣaparamparāyā adṛṣṭaniṣṭhatvāt . etasminnarthe jñāpakamāha --āha ceti, nāhameva svamanīṣikayā
bravīmi, kiṃ tarhi ? anye'pyevaṃ bruvate .
ṇiyayavayaṇijjasaccā savvaṇayā paraviyālaṇe mohā .te puṇa adiṭṭhasamayo vibhaja+i sacce va ali+e vā ॥ sanmati॰ 1 . 28
svaviṣayasatyatvādevāvicālyā iti taccālane moghāḥ . teṣāmanekāntasthitisvatattvānavabodhāt satyameva,
asatyameva vā ityadṛṣṭasamayastān vibhajate ityācāryasiddhasenaḥ .


tathā ca kāraṇe kāryasadasattvāniyamaḥ, kāraṇe satyeva bhāvābhāvābhyāmasati
ca sevādyudyogaphalāniyamāt . tadyathā--vātakarkoṭakīpuṣpaṃ dṛṣṭamasatkāryam . avyakta-

tathānye'pi—
yatnenānumito'pyarthaḥ kuśalairanumātṛbhiḥ .abhiyuktatarairanyairanyathaivopapādyate ॥ vākyapa॰ 1 . 34 iti .
anumānāntarabādhyatve'navasthitānumānatvāllokaprasiddhireva pramāṇamityarthaḥ . ko hyetad veda ityaśakyaprāptiṃ
darśayati kiṃ vānena jñātena iti prayojanābhāvaṃ ca . yasmāt pratijñāhetudṛṣṭāntopanayanigamanānāṃ jijñāsāsaṃśaya-śakyaprāpti-prayojanapūrvāṇāṃ saṃśayavyudāsaḥ phalamante bhaviṣyatīti daśāvayavavādināṃ matam, tathā ca
vyavahāraprasiddhiḥ . tasmāt tyajyantāmadyatanāvyāptyatiprasaṅgāgamakākṣaradaridrakusṛtikāraracitanyāyalakṣaṇānīti .
tathā ca kāraṇe kāryasadasattvāniyamaḥ . evaṃ ca kṛtvānena nyāyena yathā kāraṇameva, na kāryam;
kāryameva, na kāraṇam; sāmānyameva, na viśeṣaḥ; viśeṣa eva, na sāmānyam; ubhayam; anyataropasarjanam; ubhayābhāvo vā ityayaṃ niyamo nāstyuktavidhinā tathā kāraṇe kāryasya sattvameva asattvamevetyayamapi niyamo nāsti . katham ? yadi kāryaṃ sat tataḥ kāraṇameva iti nāsti, kāryasyāpi sattvāt .
katham ? kriyānimittakatvāt kāraṇakāryatvayoḥ kāryābhāve kāraṇābhāvaḥ kāraṇābhāve kāryābhāva iti .
tathā yadi kāraṇaṃ sat, tataḥ kāryameva na bhavati, kāraṇasyāpi sattvāt . evaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣobhayānyataropasarjanobhayābhāveṣvapi bhāvanīyam . tatra tāvat kāraṇe kāryaṃ sadeva asadeva sadasaccaiva iti vā
ye bruvate teṣāṃ niyamābhāva uktaḥ anyataropasarjanobhayābhāvayorapyukta eva bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ . kāraṇe
kāryaṃ sadeva, asadeva ityaniyamaḥ . ko hetuḥ ? kāraṇe satyeva bhāvābhāvābhyāmityayathāsaṅkhyaṃ hetū .
satyeva bhāvāt asat kāraṇe kāryam ityaniyamaḥ, satyevābhāvāt sadeva ityaniyamaḥ . asati ca
kāraṇe kāryasya sadasattvāniyamaḥ iti vartate . kutaḥ ? sevādyudyogaphalāniyamāt . dṛṣṭo hi
loke kṛṣīvalavaṇigrājapuruṣaśilpyādīnāṃ kṛṣivāṇijyasevāśilpādiṣu kāraṇeṣūdyuktānāṃ phalāniyamaḥ . sa
satsvasatsu ca dṛṣṭaḥ . tadyathā --vātakarkoṭakīpuṣpaṃ phalakāraṇaṃ satkāryam, puṣpatvāt, āmrapuṣpavadityanumānaprasaṅge'pi ca dṛṣṭamasatkāryam . asat kāryaṃ puṣpaphalamasminnityasatkāryam . tasyāphalatvadarśanād
dṛṣṭaviruddhamanumānam . ato'satkāryaṃ taditi .
avyaktamiti cet . syānmatam--avyaktāni vātakarkoṭakī-vañjula-japākusumādīnāṃ phalāni

miti cet, na, vyaktikāryasya avyaktakāryatvādasattvatulyatvāt . bījādīnāmapyakāraṇataiva kvacidakaraṇāditi kāraṇamapyakāraṇameva, kāryakāraṇāvyabhicārābhāvāt .
kāryasadasattvāniyamāttu kāraṇe kāraṇatāyāmeva karaṇākaraṇe kāryasya, aviditavedanārthavidhiparatāyāṃ vākyapravṛttestasyāmavasthāyāmanupajanitaviṣayatvādapavāda-
kāryāṇīti . etaccāyuktam, vyaktikāryasya avyaktakāryatvādasattvatulyatvāt . vyaktiḥ kāryamasyeti
vyaktikāryam . kiṃ tat ? kāryam . tasya kāryasya avyaktakāryatvāt, asattvena tulyam, tadbhāvo'sattvatulyatvam, tasmādasattvatulyatvānnāvyaktaṃ kāryamastīti . athavā vyaktiśca sā kāryaṃ tad vyaktireva kāryam,
tadavyaktaṃ kāryamavyaktakāryam, tasyāvyaktakāryatvādasattvatulyatvam, tasmādasattad vātakarkoṭakyādipuṣpaphalam, nāvyaktaṃ kāryamiti .
syānmatam--karotīti kāraṇam . yathoktam—
ṣṭhivasivyorlyuṭparayordīrghatvaṃ vaṣṭi bhāguriḥ .karoteḥ kartṛbhāve ca saunāgāḥ sampracakṣate ॥  
tasmāt svakāryasyākaraṇādakāraṇatvameveti . etadapi nopapadyate, yasmād bījādīnāmapyakāraṇataiva
kvacidakaraṇāditi prāptam . itiśabdo hetvarthe . yasmāt teṣāmapi bījānāṃ trivarṣaparamoṣitānāmaṅkurādyutpādane śaktyabhāvaḥ, ādigrahaṇād mṛdāderghaṭādyutpādane . tataḥ ko doṣaḥ ? kāraṇamapyakāraṇamevāstu
kāryakāraṇāvyabhicārābhāvāditi . evaṃ ca sati kṛṣīvalādīnāṃ sakṛddṛṣṭabījāṅkurādikāraṇakāryabhāvavyabhicārāṇāṃ tadarthapravṛtteḥ punaranārambhāt karaṇābhāve kāraṇābhāva eva syāt, aniṣṭaṃ caitat . loke
punarupapadyate --kāryasadasattvāniyamāttu kāraṇe bījādau kāraṇatāyāmeva satyāṃ karaṇākaraṇe
sannihite tantvādau kāraṇe kāryasya paṭādeśca, kādācitkayoḥ karaṇākaraṇayordarśanāt .
syānmatam--kāraṇe kāryasya sadasattvayoḥ karaṇākaraṇayoścāniyame kimarthaṃ punaḥ karotīti kāraṇam
iti śabdavyutpattirāśrīyate ? iti . atrocyate --aviditavedanetyādi . ajñātajñāpanamaviditavedanamartho'sya vidheriti aviditavedanārtho vidhiḥ, tatparatāyāṃ vākyapravṛtteḥ tasyāmavasthāyāmanupajanitaviṣayatvādapavādasparśasya . tadā hi karotīti kāraṇam iti kāraṇatvavidhānamātraṃ kriyate deśakālādiviśeṣāviśeṣaṇādasati svaviṣaye kamarthamapavādaḥ spṛśet--kiṃ karotyeṣa na karotyapi kvacit kadāciditi ?

sparśasya, nīlotpalavat . tathā nyagrodhaphalamasatkāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭam . āmrapuṣpaphale
satkāryakāraṇe dṛṣṭe .
sarvasarvātmakatvasarvakāraṇatvāt sevādikriyākalāpo yathā arthaprāpteḥ kāraṇaṃ
tathā kleśaprāpterapi .
nanvata eva kleśo'pi bhavatīti cet, evaṃ satīpsitena tāvadbhavitavyam,
sannihitatacchaktyabhīhitatvāt, sarvaśāstrajñānyataravyākhyānavat .
tadā sa manyate vaktā--idaṃ tāvat pratiṣṭhāṃ yātu karotīti kāraṇam iti . pratiṣṭhite cāsmiṃstata uttarakālaṃ
siddhe sati kāraṇatve sambhavataḥ kāryasattvāsattvayoḥ tena viśeṣaṇaprakāreṇa karotyeva na karotyeveti vikalādeśavaśānniyamopapatterviśeṣaṇamāśrīyate . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? nīlotpalam . yathā hi nīlotpalaṃ bhavati iti
tadbhavanamātraṃ vidhīyate nīlameva, utpalameva iti vā niyamaviśeṣānāśrayaṇāt, tathā karotīti kāraṇam
iti kriyābhāvanamātraṃ vidhīyate karotyeva, na vā ityanāśritya viśeṣaniyamam . yathā vā nīlaṃ tila-kambalādiviśeṣānapekṣam utpalamapi raktatādiviśeṣānapekṣaṃ parasparaviśiṣṭamubhayamucyate tathā karotīti kāraṇam iti
karaṇamātraṃ deśakālādikāryapratibandhāpratibandhanirapekṣamucyate . athavā śabalotpalatve satyapi tasya dharmabhedānapekṣaṃ
nīlotpalam ityucyate, tathā karaṇabhāvābhāvabhedadharmanirapekṣaṃ kriyāmātraṃ karotīti kāraṇam ityucyate .
tathā nyagrodhaphalam . tena prakāreṇa tathā, yathā prāguktasadasattvāniyamāttu kāraṇe kāryasya
