kāraṇatāyāmeva karaṇākaraṇe tathā kāryakaraṇākaraṇāniyamāttu kāraṇasya kāryasya kāryatvāniyamaḥ . vaṭanyagrodhodumbarādiphalānāṃ phalatvāt puṣpakāryatvānumānaprasaṅge phalamasatkāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭamiti pūrvavad vyabhicāraḥ . āmrapuṣpaphale satkāryakāraṇe dṛṣṭe ityatrāpi kādācitkayoreva kāryakāraṇayordarśanāt kāryakāraṇasadasatkaraṇākaraṇāniyamameva darśayati .
itaśca kāryakāraṇasadasattvāniyamaḥ --sarvasarvātmakatvasarvakāraṇatvāt . sthāvarajaṅgamābhyavahṛtānyonyarasarudhirādirūpādipariṇāmāpattivaiśvarūpyadarśanāt sarvaṃ sarvātmakam, tata eva sarvaṃ sarvasya kāraṇaṃ
kāryaṃ ceti kṛtvā sevādikriyākalāpo yathā arthaprāpteḥ kāraṇaṃ tathā kleśaprāpterapi prakalpyata eva
kāraṇam . tadapi ca phalamarthakleśaprāptyādi aniyatam, ubhayatra vyabhicārāt .
itara āha --nanvata eva kleśo'pi kāryasattvādeva bhavatīti niyataṃ kāraṇe kāryam ityāpannaṃ
cedityevaṃ cenmanyase . evaṃ sati īpsitena tāvad bhavitavyam . kiṃ ca tadīpsitaṃ phalam ? arthaprāptiḥ, na kleśaḥ sevakasya . kiṃ kāraṇam ? sannihitatacchaktyabhīhitatvāt . sannihitā sā
śaktirasya so'yaṃ sevakaḥ sannihitatacchaktiḥ aproṣitārthaprāptiśaktiḥ, sevā vā sannihitā, sā śaktirasyāḥ sā sannihitatacchaktiḥ, tayā abhīhitatvāt ceṣṭitatvāditi vṛttivṛttimatorananyatvāt sevā

tatra deśakālākāranimittāvabaddhatvānneṣṭameva phalamavāpyate, jñāvyākhyānavat . atha deśādayaḥ kim ? yadi te kāryaṃ tatasteṣāmakāraṇatvādasarvatvādatantratvādapratibandhakatvam . atha te kāraṇaṃ tataḥ sarvakāraṇatvasarvātmakatvāt
kimiti sarvaṃ na bhavati, samuditakāraṇatvāt, saṃyuktatantupaṭavat ?
atha vā sarvaṃ na bhavati, anabhivyaktatvāddeśādeḥ, pradhānasāmyāvasthānavad
sevakayoryatheṣṭaṃ vigrahasambandhau . yuktaṃ hi tābhyāmīpsitārthaprāptiyuktābhyāṃ bhavitum, nānīpsitakleśabhāgbhyām .
ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? sarvaśāstrajñānyataravyākhyānavat . yathā sarvaśāstrajñaḥ puruṣo vyākaraṇādyanyatamacchāstramīpsitameva vyācaṣṭe tathaitaditi .
atra brūmaḥ --tatra deśakālākāranimittāvabaddhatvānneṣṭameva phalamavāpyate sevakeneva prasannanṛpādapi, svanagarabhāṇḍāgārādikṣetrapratibandhavat śvaḥprabhātādikālapratibandhavat prasādadānābhimukhyākārāvabandhavat dvitīyakarmaṇyatāpradarśanādinimittāvabandhavat . śāstrajñadṛṣṭāntasyāpi tādṛgvidhāvabandhasadbhāve sati
avyākhyānavadaniyama eva phalasyetyata āha --jñāvyākhyānavat, sarvaśāstrajño'pyebhirevāvabandhairīpsitaṃ
na vyācaṣṭa iti .
laukiko bravīti --atha deśādayaḥ kim ? iti . vikalpadvayāntaḥpātena nirotsyāmyetadityabhiprāyaḥ . ye deśādayo'vabandhakābhimatāste yadi kāryatayeṣṭāstatasteṣāmakāraṇatvādasarvatvam .
kāraṇabhāvāddhi sarvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ syāt, tadabhāvādasarvatvaṃ deśādīnāṃ prāptam . asarvatvācca teṣāmatantratvaṃ teṣu,
kasyacit tadadhīnavṛttitvābhāvāt . tato'tantratvādapratibandhakatvamapi .
athācakṣīthāḥ --te deśādayaḥ kāraṇamiti . tataḥ kāraṇaṃ cet, sarvakāraṇatvāt sarvātmakatvāt kimiti sarvaṃ na bhavati ? bhavatyevetyarthaḥ . kasmāt ? samuditakāraṇatvāt, samuditakāraṇatvaṃ
sarvakāraṇatvāt sarvātmakatvācca . atra prayogaḥ--sarvaṃ sarvatra syāt, samuditakāraṇatvāt, saṃyuktatantupaṭavat . yathā tantūnāṃ parasparasaṃyoge sati niyamāt paṭo bhavati svakāraṇatvasaṃnidhānādevaṃ sarvakāraṇatva-
sarvātmakatvasadbhāve ko deśādipratibandho nāma anya iti kimiti mudhā sarvaṃ na bhavediti ?
atha vā sarvaṃ na bhavatītyādi sa eva laukika āśaṅkate . atha mataṃ bhavataḥ sāṅkhyasya--sarvaṃ na
bhavati śarīrakleśasukhārthānarthaprāptyādi . kutaḥ ? anabhivyaktatvāt . añjū vyaktimrakṣaṇagatiṣu pā॰ dhā॰
1459, mrakṣitamabhivyaktaṃ sphuṭīkṛtam, anabhivyaktamasphuṭam, anabhivyaktatvād deśādeḥ kāraṇasya sarvaṃ
na bhavati . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? pradhānasāmyāvasthānavat . yathā pradhānaṃ sattvarajastamastriguṇatvasāmyāvasthāne'nabhivyaktatvāt sarvakāraṇamapi sat sarvān bhāvānna prakaroti ghaṭapaṭādīn, atha ca prakaraṇāt prakṛtiḥ
pradhīyante bhāvāstata iti pradhānam ityādibhirnāmabhirucyate, tasya cānabhivyaktatvaṃ tatsāmyāvasthānānma

mayūrāṇḍakarasagatagrīvādivadvā . nanu ca deśādeḥ sarvatvāt sarvātmakatvād
vaiṣamyāvasthaiva iti laukikaprakṛtitvameva prakṛteḥ, sarvātmakatvāt, deśādivat .
anabhivyaktisāmyāvasthāne cāyukte, aprayojanatvāt, nirvṛttānirvṛttārthakriyaudāsīnyavat . prakṛtikāraṇatyāgena kāraṇāntarasya vā tathāpraṇeturāpattiḥ .
nyethāḥ tathā hi deśādikāraṇaṃdeśādi kāraṇaṃ sāmyāvasthānādanabhivyaktaṃ pradhānavat sarvaṃ kāryaṃ na kurute . lokaprasiddhamapyatrodāharaṇam --mayūrāṇḍakarasagatagrīvādivat . yathā mayūrāṇḍakarasāvasthāyāmeva mecakavarṇagrīvādyavayavānabhivyaktiḥ tatsāmyāvasthānāt, ataḥ sarvaṃ na bhavati mayūrāṇḍakarasāvasthāyāmiva tadgrīvādīti .
atrocyate--maivaṃ maṃsthāḥ, nanu cetyādi . nanvityanujñāpane, tvayāpyetadiṣṭam--sarvaṃ deśādīti .
tasmād deśādeḥ sarvatvāt sarvātmakatvam, sarvātmakatvācca vaiṣamyāvasthaiva . itiśabdo hetvarthe,
yasmāllaukikaprakṛtitvameva prakṛteḥ sūktābhimatāyāḥ . katham ? yathā hi laukikī prakṛtirdeśādirviṣamāvasthaiva satī sarvakāraṇātmikā kāryātmikā viṣamā samā ca vyaktā cāvyaktā ca tathā sāṅkhyaparikalpitaprakṛtirapi syāt . kiṃ kāraṇam ? sarvātmakatvāt, deśādivad mayūrāṇḍakarasavad vā vaiṣamyāvasthaivetyarthaḥ . sāmyāvasthaiva vā deśāderapi, sarvātmakatvāt, prakṛtivaditi .
kiñcānyat--ete api ca kalpane nopapanne--deśādīnāmanabhivyaktiḥ prakṛteḥ sāmyāvasthānamiti . kasmāt ? aprayojanatvāt . na hi deśādīnāmanabhivyaktau prayojanamasti, puruṣavimokṣaṇahetorvyaktarūpatayā pravartamānānāṃ tathā puruṣārthasiddheḥ, anirvṛttaudanasya pacikriyāyāmaudāsīnyavat . nāpi nirvartitārthāyāḥ prakṛteḥ punarātmānamupasaṃhṛtya sāmyāvasthāne kiñcit prayojanamasti, siddhaudanasya odanārtharandhanādipravṛttivat . athavā prakṛtereva anabhivyaktisāmyāvasthāne na yukte, aprayojanatvāt . aprayojanatvaṃ nirvṛttānirvṛttārthatvāt . yadi nirvṛttārthā, siddhaudanarandhanavadayuktaṃ sāmyāvasthānam . anirvṛttārthaṃ cet
pradhānam, asiddhaudanaudāsīnyavadayuktaṃ sāmyāvasthānam . tathānabhivyaktiḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? prakāśanārthaṃ
pravṛttāyā vyaktivaiṣamyābhyāṃ tadarthasiddheḥ, tābhyāmṛte cāsiddheḥ, anabhivyaktisāmyāvasthānayorapi pravṛttiviśeṣatvāt, dvidhāpyaprayojanatvādayuktamiti . athavā'prayojanā anabhivyaktiḥ, nirvṛttārthatvāt, deśādirūpeṇa prakāśitātmavṛttiḥ kimarthaṃ nābhivyajyate ? kimarthaṃ vā sarvaṃ puruṣārthamakṛtvā sāmyena avatiṣṭhate ?
sāṅkhyaiśca dvividhapuruṣārthasiddhyai prakṛtipravṛttiriṣṭā, nākasmikī yadṛcchāvādimatavat . na ceśvarasvabhāvādikāraṇavādimatavad vā kāraṇāntaram . yathāsaṅkhyaṃ cātra dṛṣṭāntadvayaṃ darśayati --nirvṛttānirvṛttārthakriyaudāsīnyavaditi, pacanāpacanavadodanasyetyarthaḥ . syānmatam--tasyāḥ prakṛteravyaktisāmyāvasthāne kālaniyatiyadṛcchāsvabhāveśvarādyanyatamakāraṇavaśāditi . etaccāyuktam, prakṛtikāraṇatyāgena abhyupetavirodhadoṣa

ātmāntaratvaprakāśanaṃ hi jñānārthasya svatantrasya apratihatasarvagatatvasya
pradhānasya dharmaḥ . atastena nityapravṛttenaiva bhavitavyam, tatsvabhāvatvāt, yathā
sambandhinī yasmāt kāraṇāntarasya vā tathāpraṇeturāpattiḥ, kāraṇādanyat kāraṇaṃ kāraṇāntaram, prakṛteranyat kāraṇaṃ yat prakṛtiṃ tathā praṇayati tadasti svabhāvaniyatikālayadṛccheśvarādīnāmanyatamadityāpannam,
aniṣṭaṃ caitat .
kāraṇāntaranirapekṣasya kāraṇasya svakāryākaraṇaṃ ca yuktiviruddhamityata āha --ātmāntaratvaprakāśanaṃ
hītyādi yāvat pradhānasya dharma iti . ātmano'nya ātmā ātmāntaram, tasya bhāva ātmāntaratvaṃ
parasparavibhinnamahadahaṅkārādyavasthāntaratvam, tasya prakāśanam . hiśabdo yasmādarthe, yasmādanabhivyakteḥ
sāmyāvasthānasya ca pratipakṣo'vasthāntaraprakāratvena ātmaprakāśanamayaṃ prakṛterdharmaḥ . syānmatam--upāyānabhijñatvāt kāraṇāntaraṃ sācivyaguṇopetamapekṣata iti, etaccāyuktam, jñānārthatvāt . uktaṃ ca --dharmajñānavairāgyaiśvaryāṇi buddhidharmaḥrmā adharmājñānāvairāgyānaiśvaryāṇi ca . teṣāmaṣṭānāṃ saptabhirbadhnāti ekena
mocayati   iti tasya pradhānasya jñānārthasya pariṇatyavasthātmakasyāyuktā sacivāpekṣā . syānmatam--paratantratvāt sahāyāntaramapekṣate, tacca na, svatantratvāt . syānmatam--kvacit pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ kvacidanyat, avyāpitvāt, laukikakālādikāraṇavaditi . etaccāyuktam, apratihatasarvagatatvāt tasya .
athavā ātmāntaratvaprakāśanamiti ātmā puruṣaḥ, ātmano'nya ātmā ātmāntaram,
tasya bhāva ātmāntaratvaṃ puruṣādbhinnaṃ triguṇasvabhāvaṃ svamātmānaṃ pradhānaṃ puruṣāya prakāśayati . puruṣādvānyaḥ 
puruṣa ātmāntaram, tasya bhāva ātmāntaratvaṃ puruṣāntaratvam, tasmai puruṣāya prakāśya ātmasvarūpaṃ
puruṣāntarāṇāṃ prakāśayati, puruṣāntaratvaṃ vā caitanyasvarūpamadhyasthaśuddhakevalatvaiḥ parasparabhinnaiḥ puruṣāntarasthaiḥ
puruṣāntareṣu prakāśiteṣvapi anyeṣāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ yat puruṣāntaratvaṃ taireva caitanyādibhiryuktaṃ prakāśayati .
prakṛtervā svayamacetanāyā ācaitanyasvarūpasya prakāśanam . ayaṃ hi dharmastasya jñānārthasya svatantrasya
apratihatasarvagatatvasya pradhānasya .
evaṃ tasya svabhāvadharmaṃ samarthya idānīmanabhivyaktisāmyāvasthānapratipakṣabhūtaṃ nityapravṛttatvaṃ pradhānasyānumimīte --atastena nityapravṛttenaiva bhavitavyamiti pratijñā . ata ityanantaroktadharmatvāt pradhānasya,
taddharmatvamidānīṃ hetutvena vyāpārayitumāha sāmānyataḥ --tatsvabhāvatvāditi, sa svabhāvo dharmo yasya tat
tatsvabhāvaṃ pradhānaṃ pūrvoktairhetubhirviśeṣitamatastannityapravṛttaṃ bhavitumarhati . iha yad yad yatsvabhāvaṃ tat tat

agnirdahanaprakāśanapravṛttaḥ .
nanu bhasmacchanno'gnirapi na dahati na prakāśayati . atha kathaṃ jīvati ?
kathaṃ jñāyate agniḥ iti adahannaprakāśayan vā tāvat kośakādi svāśrayamātram,
gṛhapradīpakavat ? chādanābhāvo'pi ca pradhāne .
tenaiva svabhāvena nityapravṛttaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathāgnirdahanaprakāśanapravṛttaḥ . yat punarnityapravṛttaṃ na bhavati na tat
tatsvabhāvam, yathā na kiñcit tādṛgiti .
dahanāditatsvabhāvasyāgnestathāpravṛttyadarśanāt sādhyadharmavaikalyaṃ dṛṣṭāntadoṣa iti tannidarśayannāha —
nanu bhasmacchanno'gnirapi na dahati na prakāśayatīti, dahanatapanayorabhedāditi . atrocyate --atha
kathaṃ jīvati ? iti . jīvanamagneścetanatvāt, caitanyamāhāralābhālābhayoḥ puṣṭiglānyādidarśanād manuṣyavat . sa cendhanaṃ dahan jīvati, sthiterjīvitaparyāyatvāt sthiterindhanadahanāvinābhāvāt . acetanatvamabhyupagamyāpi sthitiprakāśanendhanadahanātmakasyāgneḥ pratyakṣānumānaviṣayasya satastathā pratyakṣānumānābhyāmagrahaṇe'stitve pramāṇāntarāsiddheḥ kathaṃ jñāyate agniḥ iti adahan aprakāśamānaḥ aprakāśayan vā
dravyāntaraṃ tāvat kośakādi svāśrayamātram ? tat parimāṇamasya tāvat, svaparimāṇamātramapi svāśrayadravyaṃ kośakādi aprakāśayan katham agniḥ ityucyate ? kośaka ityucyate'nnapulikā . dṛṣṭānto
gṛhapradīpakaḥ . gṛhe prajvālitaḥ pradīpako gṛhapradīpakaḥ, yathā gṛhapradīpako'nnapulikāmātramapi yadi na
prakāśayati prakāśātmakaḥ sanna pradīpaḥ iti jñāyate; agnivaidharmyadṛṣṭānto vā--gṛhapradīpo gṛhaṃ prakāśayannasti, yadi na tathāgniḥ svamāśrayaṃ prakāśayati prakāśātmakaḥ saṃstato nāstīti gamyate . kiñcānyat,
bhasmacchannāgnisādharmyābhāvo'pi ca pradhānasya cchādanābhāvādityata āha --chādanābhāvo'pi ca pradhāna
iti . agnerbhasmavat prakṛterāvaraṇābhāvād bhasmacchannāgnitulyaṃ na bhavati pradhānamato viśeṣya brūmaḥ--nirāvaraṇāgnidahanaprakāśanavat tatsvabhāvatvānnityapravṛttenaiva bhavitavyam . iti tadavasthā nityapravṛttatā . tataścānabhivyaktisāmyāvasthānānupapattiḥ .
syānmatam--yadyapi pradhānaṃ mahadādibhāvenātmāntaratvaprakāśanārthaṃ puruṣasya pravartate tathāpi keṣāñcit
puruṣāṇāṃ kṛte prayojane'nyeṣāmakṛte kālakrameṇa vyaktyavyaktisāmyavaiṣamyāvasthāḥ pratipadyate, sā cāsya

kālādikāraṇāntaranirapekṣasya tasya svatantratvāt sarvapuruṣārthapravṛttatvācca
niravaśeṣapuruṣaviṣaye svānyatvajñāpane kṛte kṛtakṛtyatvāt kiṃ sāmyāvasthānena ?
akṛte'pyakṛtakṛtyatvāt kiṃ pratinivṛttyā prayojanam ?
anabhivyaktisāmyāvasthānānupapatteśca kimiti satatasamavasthitasamanupravṛtti pratyakṣakāraṇanānābhedābhivyaktisvabhāvamevedaṃ jagannābhyupagamyate ? mṛtpiṇḍa-
pravṛttiḥ svabhāvād niyateḥ kālād yadṛcchāyā veti . etadapi nopapadyate, kālādikāraṇāntaranirapekṣasye-
tyādi . pradhānaṃ hi kāraṇaṃ niyatikālasvabhāveśvarayadṛcchādyanyatamānapekṣaṃ kāraṇaṃ jagato'bhyupagataṃ bhavatā,
na tu yathā lokanaye kvacit kālo'pi niyatirapītyādi . svatantratvācca tasya prakṛtipuruṣayoḥ svarūpabhedaparijñāpanasya svārthasyānurūpaśrotrādyekādaśendriyagrāmasya śabdabuddhyādivikalpagrāmasya vacanādānaviharaṇānandotsargakarmaśabdādyarthagrāmasya ca nirvartane svatantratvānna kāraṇāntarāpekṣāsti . sarvapuruṣārthapravṛttatvācca
kṛtārthasyākṛtārthasya ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sāmyāvasthāne nivṛttau ca prayojanābhāva ityata āha --niravaśeṣapuruṣaviṣaye svānyatvajñāpane kṛte kṛtakṛtyatvāt kiṃ sāmyāvasthānena ? akṛte'pyakṛtakṛtyatvāt kiṃ pratinivṛttyā prayojanam, asiddhaudanasūpakāranivṛttivat ? iti tadavasthamaprayojanatvam .
atra codyam--nanu prāguktam --anabhivyaktisāmyāvasthāne cāyukte, aprayojanatvāt, nirvṛttānirvṛttārthakriyaudāsīnyavaditi, ataḥ punaruktamiti . atra brūmaḥ--na, kāraṇāntarāpekṣāpratiṣedhaparatvādasya, pravṛttinivṛttyoḥ pradhānasya aprayojanatvamātrapratipādanaparatvāt tasyetyadoṣaḥ .
avyaktisāmyāvasthānānupapatteśceti . aprayojanatvādibhiranabhivyaktisāmyāvasthāne anupapanne,
tataścāvyaktisāmyāvasthānānupapatteḥ kimiti kiṃ kāraṇaṃ jagadevaṃsvabhāvamiti na gṛhyate ? ityabhisambandhaḥ .
satatasamavasthitasamanupravṛttīti, satataṃ sarvakālaṃ samavasthitā nityānuparatā samanupravṛttiḥ kāraṇakāryapravṛttyātmikā prakarṣeṇa vṛttiryasya tadidaṃ jagat satatasamavasthitasamanupravṛtti . pratyakṣakāraṇanānābhedābhivyaktisvabhāvamiti, pratyakṣāṇi ca tāni kāraṇāni ca pratyakṣakāraṇāni mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍacakrodakasūtra-
kulālādīni ghaṭādīnāṃ kāryāṇām, tāni nānājātīyāni, tantuturīvemakuvindādīni paṭādīnāmityevaṃprakārāṇi, teṣāṃ bhedāḥ pratyakṣakāraṇanānābhedāḥ, taisteṣāṃ vābhivyaktirghaṭapaṭādikāryarūpeṇa, saiva svabhāvo
yasya tadidaṃ pratyakṣakāraṇanānābhedābhivyaktisvabhāvam . kiṃ tat ? jagat . evetyavadhāraṇe, kimavadhārayati ?
pratyakṣadṛṣṭaśukraśoṇitāhārādikāraṇānyeva ityavadhārayati . kimato nirastam ? avyaktādi adṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇāntaram . tasmād dṛṣṭakāraṇanānābhedābhivyaktisvabhāvamevedaṃ jagat kimiti nābhyupagamyate ?
kimityadṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇāntaraṃ parikalpyate ? iti . evaṃ tāvat kāraṇe kāryasadasattvāniyama uktaḥ .


śivakasthāsakosakuśūlaghaṭakapālaśakalaśarkarikāpāṃśuvātāyanareṇupunarupacayaprāptānantyaskandhapāṃśumṛtpiṇḍāderaniyatādisadasadbhūtakāraṇādhyāsāvimuktyanirmūlatvaṃ
kāryasya .
ato'vagamyatāṃ na kiñcidanyat phalaṃ tacchāstreṇa kriyate yallokavyavahāra-

kāryāniyamo'pi ca . kāryameva sadasadbhūtakālādiviśeṣakāraṇamevetyaniyamaḥ pradhānādiśāstrakāraparikalpitakāraṇapūrvakameveti vā . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tathānugamyamānadṛṣṭāntābhāvāt . kiṃ tarhi ? etāvānniyamaḥ --kāraṇādhyāsāvimuktyanirmūlatvaṃ kāryasyeti, tathānugamyadṛṣṭārthatvāt, mṛtpiṇḍaśivaketyādipāṃśumṛtpiṇḍāderityantasya daṇḍakasyopari aniyatādisadasadbhūtakāraṇādhyāsāvimuktyanirmūlatvamiti
vakṣyamāṇasambandhatvāt . kāryameva, sadeva asadeva vā kāraṇaṃ kālādi, sādikāraṇamityasya vā'niyamapradarśanārthamudāharaṇamāha --mṛtpiṇḍaśivaketyādi yāvat pāṃśumṛtpiṇḍāderiti, eṣāṃ mṛtpiṇḍādyavasthāviśeṣāṇāṃ vātāyanareṇuparyantānāmeva loke dṛṣṭatvāt punarupacayāt prāptamānantyaṃ yeṣāṃ skandhānāṃ te punarupacayaprāptānantyaskandhāḥ vātāyanareṇubhyaḥ prabhṛti punarupacayakrameṇa pāṃśu-mṛtpiṇḍa-śivaka-sthāsa-kosaka-kuśūlaghaṭa-kapāla-śakala-śarkarikā-pāṃśu-vātāyanareṇava iti cakrakakrameṇa kāraṇakāryāniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ . utkrameṇāpi ca
saṅghātabhedābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇasadasattvāniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ, piṇḍamupamṛdya śivakakaraṇāt śivakaṃ copamṛdya piṇḍakaraṇāt sthāsakādīnāmanyatamamavasthāviśeṣamupamṛdyāpi piṇḍādikaraṇāt kriyākriyāphalakrameṇa ca kadācit
kāraṇakāryāniyamadarśanādityaniyatādi, itthamaniyata ādirasyetyaniyatādi, jagaditi sambadhyate, tadeva
aniyatasadasadbhūtakāraṇakāryam, aniyatādisadasadbhūtaṃ kāraṇam, tasya adhyāsastena vā kāraṇena adhyāso'dhiṣṭhānam . tena kāraṇādhyāsena avimuktiratyāgaḥ kāraṇasāmānyāvinābhāvaḥ, na tu atyantanirmūlotpattivināśalakṣaṇakāryatvaṃ khapuṣpavat, tathaiva loke dṛṣṭatvāt . tayā avimuktyā anirmūlatvaṃ kāryabhūtasya jagataḥ .
ataḥ proktahetordṛṣṭakāryakāraṇasadasattvāniyamāt paraparikalpitapradhānādyadṛṣṭaikakāraṇānupapatteḥ kālādiviśeṣakāraṇaikyānumānābhāvācca kāraṇasāmānyamātrānumānāccāvagamyatām--na kiñcidanyat phalaṃ
tacchāstreṇa kriyate, nirarthakāni śāstrāṇītyarthaḥ . kiṃ tat ? yallokavyavahāraphalādatiricya varteta,
yadapekṣya śāstrāṇi sārthakāni syuḥ . tasmādavagamyatām--idaṃ jagallokaprasiddhameva aniyatānuparatādyantadṛṣṭakāraṇakāryaprabandhamiti . na tu yathānyaiḥ kalpitam--uparatavyāpāraṃ sat pradhānamatīndriyaṃ punarindriyagrāhyatvādibhāvena jagat sṛjati, punarātmānaṃ saṃhṛtya uparatavyāpāraṃ tiṣṭhati . na cātyantāsatkāryaṃ kṣaṇotpannavinaṣṭamasambaddhamūlaṃ vaitaditi . itiśabdo hetvarthaḥ . ko hetuḥ ? śāstranairarthakyam . kasmin sādhye ?

phalādatiricya varteta iti vṛthaivamādau śāstrārambhaḥ . atra tu śāstramarthavat syāt—
idaṅkāma idaṃ kuryāditi . arthyo hi kriyāyā evopadeśaḥ, citrādivat, na tu laukike eva
gṛhyamāṇe'rthe idamevaṃ naivaṃ vetinaivaṃ ceti vicāraḥ . anupahatendriyamanaḥpratyakṣeṇa loke yathāsau
śāstrārambhavṛthābhāve, ata āha --vṛthā evamādau śāstrārambhaḥ . kva tarhi śāstramarthavat syāditi cet,
atīndriye puruṣārthasādhyasādhanasambandhe . ko'sau ? ityata āha --atra tu śāstramarthavat syāt—
idaṅkāma idaṃ kuryāditi . idaṃ śabdena sarvanāmnā sāmānyavādinā sarvāḥ kriyāḥ phalecchāpreritāstatsādhanīḥ sūcayati agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ, putrakāmo yajeta, paśukāmo yajeta, annādyakāmo yajeta ityādyāḥ, kriyākriyāphalasambandhasyātīndriyatvāt . uktaṃ ca --aprāpye śāstramarthavat
mīmāṃsāda॰ 6 . 2 . 18, pratyakṣādipramāṇairanadhigamye ityarthaḥ .
arthyo hītyādi . arthādanapeto'rthyaḥ . hiśabdo yasmādarthe, yasmāt kriyāyā evopadeśo'rthyaḥ sasādhanāyāḥ phalādisambandhinyāḥ, citrādivat . ādigrahaṇāccitrapustakāṣṭhakarmādivat .
yathāvayavasthānavinyāsavarṇasaṃyogapravibhāgaviṣayaviniyogādyupadeśa evopayogāt sārthakaḥ, na kuḍyavarṇacitrakārādisvarūpopadeśaḥ tatra tadanupayogāt, tathā nityakṣaṇikatvāditattvavarṇanaṃ ghaṭapaṭādeḥ triguṇakāraṇapūrvakatvādivarṇanaṃ jagataḥ satatasaṃpravṛttikṣaṇikānupākhyatvādivarṇanaṃ vā . syānmatam--pradhānakṣaṇabhaṅgādivādārambho'pratyakṣaviṣayatvāt sārthakaḥ, kriyākriyāphalasambandhopadeśavaditi . etadapi nopapadyate, yasmād na tu
laukika eva gṛhyamāṇe'rthe idamevaṃ naivaṃ vetinaivaṃ ceti sārthako vicāra ityabhisambandhaḥ, prasiddhārthaviṣayasya
vicārasyāniṣṭhādoṣaniṣṭhatvāt . neti pratiṣedhe, turviśeṣaṇe, loke bhavo laukikaḥ, deśakālapuruṣakriyā-
viśeṣādyapekṣarūpādimadarthe kāryakāraṇamṛtpiṇḍādighaṭādyākārādike pratyakṣata eva gṛhyamāṇe idaṃ sarvaṃ sattvarajastamaḥsaṃjñatriguṇātmakameva, na caitadevam; kṣaṇabhaṅgajanmātmakam, na vaivamcaivam ityādivicāraḥ kiṃsambandhaḥ ?
kimphalaḥ ? ko vātra puruṣārthasādhanaparijñānopayogaḥ ? iti vimṛśyatāṃ bhavadbhireva .


vyavasthitastathā gṛhyata eva . tatra punarvacanaṃ pratyakṣaprasiddherbādhakamāpadyate anuvādādibhāvābhāve siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ iti loke dṛṣṭatvāt--na yathedaṃ
lokena gṛhyata iti .
pratyakṣāpramāṇīkaraṇe sarvaviparyayāpattistarkataḥ--alomā hariṇaḥ, catuṣpāttve
satyutplutya gamanāt, maṇḍūkavat . maṇḍūko'pi lomaśaḥ, tasmādeva, hariṇavat .

syānmatam--lokadarśanamapramāṇam, avyutpannalokapratyakṣavyabhicārāt, mṛgatṛṣṇikādiṣviveti .
atrocyate--tathā sati pratyakṣasya apramāṇīkaraṇaṃ pramāṇajyeṣṭhasya . mā ca maṃsthāḥ--mṛgatṛṣṇikādipratyakṣajñānavyabhicārāt sarvaṃ pratyakṣaṃ vyabhicaratīti . kiṃ tarhi ? anupahatendriyamanaḥpratyakṣaṃ yat tanna vyabhicaratīti gṛhyatām . tādṛśā ca pratyakṣeṇa loke ghaṭapaṭādiryathāsau yena prakāreṇa yena svarūpeṇa vyavasthitastathā gṛhyata eva svasthendriyamānasaiḥ, tatra tādṛśe'rthe punarvacanam idamevaṃ naivaṃ vetinaivaṃ ceti, pratyakṣaprasiddherbādhakamāpadyate yadi tad vacanaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt . na punastat pramāṇam, tayā prasiddhyā svayameva bādhyamānatvāt . prasiddhārthaṃ vacanaṃ na niyamādanuvādād vā anyatra pramāṇaṃ syādityato jñāpakamāha --anuvādādibhāvābhāve yaḥ siddhe sati ārambho niyamārthaḥ sa iti paribhāṣāyā loke dṛṣṭatvāt, lokavyavahārānuvādi vyākaraṇādiśāstramapi lokata eveti kṛtvā . kīdṛk punastad vacanam ? ityata āha --na yathedaṃ
lokena gṛhyata iti . itiśabdaḥ pradarśane, idaṃ tadvacanaṃ prasiddherbādhakābhimatamiti pradarśyate . katham ?
neti pratiṣedhe, yena prakāreṇa yathā, yathā mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍacakrasūtrodakakulālaparispandanirvṛtto ghaṭaḥ pṛthukukṣyādisvarūpa udakādyāharaṇasamartha iti lokena cakṣurādibhirgṛhyate nāyamevaṃsvabhāvaḥ . kiṃ tarhi ? yathāhaṃ bruve

pramāṇāni pravartante viṣaye sarvavādinām .saṃjñābhiprāyabhedāttu vivadante tapasvinaḥ ॥ siddha॰ dvā॰ 20 . 4 iti .
tasmādapramāṇaṃ pratyakṣaviruddhatvācchāstrakāravacanam .
śāstrakāravacanaprāmāṇye vā pratyakṣāprāmāṇyam . evaṃ ca sati ko doṣaḥ ? tatra pratyakṣāpramāṇīkaraṇe sarvaviparyayāpattistarkataḥ, sarvabhāvānāṃ pratyakṣapramāṇasiddhānāṃ viparyaya āpādayituṃ śakyate .

pṛthivī avasudhā, padārthatvāt mahābhūtatvāt, ākāśavat . evaṃ śeṣapadārtheṣvapi
dṛṣṭāntabhedāt .

yūkāvat . tathā pṛthivyavasudhā, padārthatvāt, ākāśavat . asādhāraṇadharmasambandhenāpi rūparasagandhasparśadharmasambandhinī na bhavati . pṛthivyavasudhā, mahābhūtatvāt, ākāśavat . ākāra-gauravaraukṣyādidharmasambandhinī na bhavati, tata eva, tadvat . tathā bauddhamate'pi pṛthivī na bhūḥ, mahābhūtatvād
rūpatvācca, jalavat; na kakkhaṭa-dhāraṇadharmā, tata eva, tadvat . evaṃ śeṣapadārthabhedeṣvapīti jalānalā-
nileṣu vyomanīndriyādiṣu ātmādiṣu yathāprakriyaṃ yathāsambhavaṃ ca svarūpanirākaraṇam, asādhāraṇadharmanirākaraṇe ca padārthatvamahābhūtatvarūpatvādihetukāni sādhanāni yojyāni mahadahaṅkāratanmātrendriyaśabdādiṣu

kṣityudakajvalanapavaneṣu cakṣurādiṣu rūpādiṣu ca . dṛṣṭāntabhedāditi bhūmerākāśadṛṣṭāntavadākāśasya bhūmyādidṛṣṭāntena tathā jalāderapi parasparataste te dharmā nirākāryā itaramitarasya dṛṣṭāntaṃ kṛtveti .

hārthaṃ hi śāstreṇa nirūpayanti santo vastu anugrāhyebhyaḥ
śiṣyebhyaḥ--prakṛtipuruṣāveva, kṣaṇabhaṅgaḥ, vijñānamātrameva, dravyaguṇādi vā, iti śāstrasyāpavādatvācchāstreṇāpoditād viparītaṃ vastūcyamānamapramāṇam, śāstrasya sandehādyapavādatvāt . na hariṇādisvabhāvādi
apramāṇam, tatra śāstreṇa moha eva vyāpāra iti tannirapavādaṃ hariṇasvarūpādi, tasya nirapavādatvāt
tattu lokena yathā gṛhītaṃ tathaiva . ādigrahaṇād maṇḍūkasvarūpādi . tat pramāṇameva, nirapavādatvāt,

kasya ? pratyakṣaprasiddheḥ . kasmāt ? sāpavādatvāt . taddhi hariṇālomatvādi pratyakṣaprasiddhena lomaśatvādinā

teṣāmevānarthasāmānyaṃ pṛthivītvam, tatsambandhalabhyatvāt pṛthivībuddhyabhidhānayoḥ, evamaptejovāyutvāni

sāmānyāni viśeṣāḥ tatsamavāyalakṣaṇaśca sambandha ityete padārthā nānā, svatattva-prayojana-lakṣaṇa-matyabhidhāna

kuto'ṇuhariṇamaṇḍūkakāraṇakāryadharaṇisaṃyogaguṇotplavanakarmabhavanavyāvṛttitathāsamavāyāḥ, dravyādīnāmitaretarānātmakatvādatyantamanyatvānnirmūlatvāt sarvathā tattvavṛttivyatītatvāt, khapuṣpavat; anyathā bālakumāravat .
bhedāditi ye vadanti teṣāṃ tannānātvaikānte atadātmakatvāt kuto'ṇuhariṇamaṇḍūkakāraṇakāryadharaṇisaṃyogaguṇotplavanakarmabhavanavyāvṛttitathāsamavāyāḥ ? aṇugrahaṇena hariṇamaṇḍūkasamavāyikāraṇadravyagrahaṇaṃ paramatena . hariṇamaṇḍūkagrahaṇena sambaddhāṇudvyaṇukādyārambhanirvṛttāvayavidravyaṃ kāryaṃ gṛhyate . tasya
hariṇamaṇḍūkādidravyasya dharaṇyāṃ saṃyogo guṇaḥ, utplavanaṃ karma, bhavanaṃ bhāvaḥ sattā, vyāvṛttiranyabhavanavilakṣaṇo viśeṣaḥ, teṣāṃ tathāsamavāyaḥ sambandha iti ṣaḍapyete padārthā vakṣyamāṇakhapuṣpadṛṣṭāntā na santi . kā
tarhi bhāvanā ? nāsti paraparikalpitaṃ dravyam, guṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣānātmakatvāt, khapuṣpavat, tebhyo'-
tyantamanyasvabhāvatvādvā . na guṇakarmaṇī staḥ, adravyātmatvāt, khapuṣpavat . evaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāḥ . na dravyaṃ sat, aguṇakarmatvāt, khapuṣpavat; asāmānyaviśeṣātmatvāt, khapuṣpavat . na pṛthivī
pṛthivī iti vyapadeśyā, pṛthivītvādatyantamanyatvāt, jalavat . pṛthivītvaṃ pṛthivītvam iti na
vyapadeśyam, pṛthivyā atyantamanyatvāt, jalatāvat . na santi guṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāḥ,
adravyātmakatvāt, khapuṣpavat . evamekaikamapi itarānātmakatvāt khapuṣpavannāsti, itarasvarūpavad vā

tathā'sthiteḥ ? ubhayānekatvaikānte sādhyasādhanadharmadharmiṇa eva kutaḥ, tathā'pūrvatvāt ?

tasmāt tattva eva tathābhivyakteḥ kuto'nyapakṣo'sapakṣo vyāvṛttistatpakṣaḥ sapakṣastatsattvaṃ ceti sādhūcyate--tavaiva
aviśeṣaikāntavādinaḥ sapakṣāsapakṣavṛttyavṛttyorhariṇādisvarūpaviparītāpādanasādhaneṣviva asattvāpattiriti .
tathā viśeṣaikānte kutastatpakṣaḥ sapakṣastatsattvaṃ vā ? deśataḥ paramāṇuśo rūpādiśo vijñānamātraśo'nupākhyatvaśaśca bhedāt kālato'tyantaparamaniruddhakṣaṇādūrddhamanavasthānācca kutastatpakṣaḥ, atrāpi tasya
pakṣo vakturvacanasya vā, sa eva pakṣaḥ ityartha eva vā, anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti dharmadharmiṇorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayoścāsambhavāt . kutaḥ sapakṣaḥ, arthāntarasambaddhasāmānyābhāvāt, sādhyābhāvasāmānyābhyupagame sapakṣāsapakṣāviśeṣaprasaṅgāt . kutaḥ sattvaṃ tatra, tadabhāvāt kṛtakatvādisavikalpadharmāntarābhāvāt parasparavilakṣaṇanirvyāpāradharmamātratvāt sarvadharmāṇāṃ nirupākhyatvaśūnyatvaparamārthatvācca . pūrvavacca prativādipakṣāsapakṣavyāvṛttyabhāvo
vāśabdāt . pūrvavaccopasaṃhṛtya tadarthāvabodhano heturucyate --tathā'sthiteḥ . tena prakāreṇa tathā kṣaṇikanirvyāpāraśūnyatvaprakāreṇa asthiteḥ kasyacidarthasyeti viśeṣaikānte'pi sarvatra sapakṣavṛttyādyasattvāpattiritthamiti .
tathā ubhayānekatvaikānte . ubhayamiti sāmānyaviśeṣau, tadubhayamanekaṃ bhinnaṃ parasparataḥ
ityetasminnapyekānte sādhyasādhanadharmadharmiṇa eva kutaḥ ? sādhyasya tāvadanityatvasyābhāvaḥ, dharmamātrasya

dṛṣṭāntābhyupagamāt pratyakṣapramāṇīkaraṇāllokatvāpatteḥ pratijñātavyāghātaḥ .

nirmūlatvāt, khapuṣpavat; tathā sādhanasyāpi kṛtakatvasya . kṛtamityanukampitaṃ kutsitamajñātaṃ vā kṛtakam .
nirmūlatvaṃ punardravyādatyantabhinnatvāditi dharmayorabhāvaḥ . dharmiṇorapi śabdaghaṭayoḥ aguṇākarmatvādibhyo

tarkasiddherityaviśeṣaviśeṣobhayānekatvaikāntavādeṣūktā doṣāḥ .
kiñcānyat, dṛṣṭāntasya pratyakṣatvāt, anumānatvāddhetoḥ, upanayasya upamānatvāt, āgamatvāt
pratijñāyāḥ, dṛṣṭāntābhyupagamāt pratyakṣapramāṇīkaraṇamāpannam . tasmācca lokatvam, dṛṣṭāntasaṃvāditvapratipādanārthatvācchāstrārthasya tārkikāṇāṃ tarkairupatiṣṭhatāṃ vyākhyārtham . yathoktam --laukikaparīkṣakāṇāṃ
yasminnarthe buddhisāmyaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ nyāyasū॰ 1 . 1 . 25 iti . tathā loko dṛṣṭāntaḥ, tadviruddhaṃ yadabhidhīyate
tad dṛṣṭāntaviruddhamiti . tataḥ ko doṣa iti cet, pratijñātavyāghātaḥ . kiṃ pratijñātam ? śāstranirūpaṇaviparītamapramāṇam, na hariṇasvarūpādi, nirapavādatvāditi, tadvyāhanyate śāstrapramāṇīkaraṇe, pratyakṣabalāllokasya pravṛttatvāt .
śāstratvādalokatvamiti cet . syānmatam--nanūktaṃ śāstrakārāḥ svadṛṣṭārthapratipādanakuśalā buddhisaṃvādārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntaprāṇaistarkaiḥ śāstrārthān pratipādayanti, na punaḥ śāstrārthā loke
pratyakṣīkartuṃ śakyāḥ . tata eva tadarthavācīni śāstrāṇyalokaḥ   iti . tacca na, lokāśrayatvāt teṣāṃ śāstrāṇām . tāni hi śāstrāṇi, yasmādarthe hiśabdaḥ, yasmāt tāni sāmānyaviśeṣakāraṇakāryamātrāṇāṃ sāmānyamātrasya dadhni kāraṇamātrasya snehaśauklyāderdṛṣṭasya viśeṣamātrasya
cārciṣṣu navanavotpādavināśarūpasya dṛṣṭasya sarvatrādhyāropeṇa praṇītāni . kṣīrasyaiva snehādisāmānyasya
kāraṇākhyasya saṃsthānamātraṃ dṛṣṭvā dadhyādyavasthāviśeṣamantareṇa tasya sāmānyasya sthityabhāvamapaśyadbhiḥ yathedaṃ
saṃsthānamātram, na kāryaṃ na viśeṣastathānye'pi ghaṭapaṭādayo'rthāstriguṇapradhānasaṃsthānamātram iti sarvatrādhyāropya tadarthāni śāstrāṇi praṇītāni kāraṇameva sāmānyameva sarvatra ityetasyārthasya pratipādanaprasaṅgena .
tathā arciṣāṃ pratikṣaṇotpattivināśapārthakyāni dṛṣṭvā rūparasasparśagandhamūrttyādisāmānyāvasthānamantareṇa
tadasambhavamapaśyadbhiḥ yathedaṃ viśeṣamātram, na sāmānyaṃ na kāraṇaṃ tathānye'pi mahīmahīdhrasaritsamudradvīpagaganatārānakṣatragrahagaṇādayo bhāvāḥ iti sarvatrādhyāropya tadarthāni śāstrāṇi tatpratipādanaprasaṅgavacanaracanāvibhaṅgataraṅgāpāratoyasamudrībhūtāni praṇītāni .


anyatra dṛṣṭasyādhyāropād ghaṭatattvavadalaukikatvamiti cet, na, vyāmohasya
mṛgatṛṣṇikādivadalaukikatvāttathā .
tathāca tatra pratijñādīnāmapyanupapattiḥ, yadi yathā lokena gṛhyate na tathā
vastu, pratijñā tāvad yathā gṛhyamāṇā aviśeṣāderna tathā syāt . tataścāṃśe

anyatra dṛṣṭasyādhyāropād ghaṭatattvavadalaukikatvamiti cet . syānmatam--laukikam
iti indriyagrāhyamucyate ghaṭarūpādivat . yadatra ghaṭe ghaṭatattvaṃ pṛthukukṣyāvikukṣyādyākāraviśeṣastadanyatra ghaṭāntare'dhyāropyate, tacca nāsti adhyāropādeva . lokasaṃvādāttu pratipādanārtho'dhyāropaḥ . evaṃ śāstrāṇāmapyadhyāropādevālaukikatvamiti nāsti pratijñātavyāghātadoṣo yaṃ bhavān manyate lokatvāpatteriti .
atra brūmaḥ --na, vyāmohasya mṛgatṛṣṇikāvadalaukikatvāt tathā . tena prakāreṇa tathā, satyam,
bhavati tadalaukikamaviśuddhatvād mṛgatṛṣṇikādijñānavat . viśuddhalokasya na punarupapadyate, mṛgatṛṣṇikācadeva
tasya vyāmohasyāprāmāṇyaprasaṅgāt . ūṣarabhūpradeśe graiṣmoṣmasantaptacakṣuṣo ravikiraṇāḥ patitāḥ pratyutpatanto
dūrād vyāmohahetavastoyavadābhāsante . tasmācchāstravijñānasya mṛgatṛṣṇikāvijñānavadaprāmāṇyaprasaṅgādasamañjasodgrāham .
kiñcānyat --tathā ca tatra pratijñādīnāmapyanupapattiḥ . na kevalaṃ śāstravijñānāprāmāṇyameva,
kiṃ tarhi ? tena prakāreṇa tathā ca evaṃ ca kṛtvā tatra sati tasminnalaukike mṛgatṛṣṇikāvat pratijñādīnāmapyavayavānāmanupapattiḥ . katham ? yadi yathā lokena gṛhyate na tathā vastu . yadīti parābhyupagamaṃ darśayati, yadi pratipādanakauśalena pratipādanabuddhisaṃvādamātratvena dṛṣṭāntamupādāya yathāhaṃ yuktyopapādayāmi śāstreṇa ca tathā tad vastu na tu yathā lokena gṛhyate tatheti bhavato'bhiprāyaḥ . tatra pratijñā
tāvad yathoktā gṛhyamāṇā aviśeṣāderna tathā syāt . aviśeṣaikāntavāde tāvat sarvasya sarvātmakatvāt nityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñā yathā śrotreṇa gṛhyate na tathā bhavitumarhati . kiṃ kāraṇam ? netrādigrāhyarūpādyātmikāpi seti kṛtvā . evaṃ viśeṣaikāntavāde'pi anityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratijñā akāranikārādivarṇavijñānānāṃ deśakālakṛtātyantanānātvakṣaṇikatvaśūnyatvanirupākhyatvāt parasparāpekṣābhāve sarvabhāvābhāve ca yathā gṛhyate na tathā syāt . evamubhayānekatvaikānte pūrvavadanyataragrāhyasya itarapakṣanirapekṣasyābhāvāt .
tataścāṃśe pratyakṣavirodhaḥ . tataśceti tasmādeva hetorloke gṛhyamāṇasya viparītatvādaviśeṣaikānte
tāvat pratyakṣavirodhaḥ, aṃśe bhāge, tasyaiva vastunaḥ aviśeṣaikāntavādiparikalpitasya pratyakṣopalabhyasya viśe

pratyakṣavirodhaḥ, aṃśe svavacanavirodhaḥ, aṃśe'bhyupagamavirodhaḥ, svoktaviparyayarūpābhyupagamāt . atha tathā tato na tarhi lokagṛhītamanyathā .
kiñcit tathā kiñcidanyathā unmattapratipattivaditi cet, evaṃ tarhi sākṣāllokapakṣāpattyābhyupagamavirodhaḥ, kiñcidgrahaṇāttathāgrahaṇādanyathāgrahaṇācca . bhedavada-
ṣatvāt pratyakṣavirodhaḥ . aṃśe svavacanavirodhaḥ, tatkāle pratipādanaśabdaviśeṣatveṣṭeḥ . aṃśe'bhyupagamavirodhaḥ, svaśāstre sarvatra prasiddhena pūrvakālābhyupagatena sarvātmakatvenādhunātanadharmadharmiviśeṣasya virodhāt .
svoktaviparyayarūpābhyupagamādityante kāraṇamuktam, pratyakṣasvavacanābhyupagamānāmabhyupagamāviśeṣāt .
evaṃ viśeṣaikānte śrotrendriyagrāhyasya śabdasya tāvanmātrakālāvasthātuḥ pūrvottaravarṇasambandhatadbuddhyavasthānasopākhyatvapratyakṣatvāt pratyakṣavirodhaḥ . tathaiva svavacanasyopapatteḥ svavacanena anityaśabdapratijñā virudhyate . ata
eva cābhyupagamena virodhaḥ . pūrvavat sa eva heturatrāpi . tathā ubhayānekatvaikānte prāgabhihitasādhanānyevātra vyāpāryāṇi adravyatvād vandhyāputravad nānityatvam, na śabdo'sti ityādisvarūpābhāvaḥ . acākṣuṣapratyakṣaguṇasya sato'pavargaḥ karmabhiḥ sādharmyam, sato liṅgābhāvāt vai॰ sū॰ 2 . 2 . 25--26 kāryatvāt
kāraṇato vikārāt ityādiśāstravihitahetuvyākhyānārthaṃ pratipādanakāle tatprayogāt pratyakṣīkaraṇāccānityatvaśabdatvādyabhāvāt pratyakṣavirodhaḥ . svavacanasya tatkālasya tathāvasthānābhyupagamāt svavacanavirodhaḥ .
pūrvābhyupagamena cedānīntanasya virodhādabhyupagamavirodhaḥ . pūrvavat svoktaviparyayarūpābhyupagamāditi
sarvatra heturiti .
atha tathā . athaite doṣā mā bhūvan vitathatvāśrayā iti tathaiva ityabhyupagamyate paraiḥ . tato na
tarhi lokagṛhītamanyathā ityāpannam . lokatvācca pratijñātavyāghātastadavastha iti .
kiñcit tathā kiñcidanyathā, unmattapratipattivaditi cet . syānmatam--kiñcillokena gṛhītaṃ
tathaiva bhavati pratijñādi, kiñcidanyathā ghaṭādi, lokasyāparīkṣakatvāt . parīkṣakāśca pada-vākya-pramāṇavidaḥ .
dṛṣṭānta unmattapratipattiḥ . yathonmatto'parīkṣakaḥ padavākyapramāṇānabhijñaḥ kiñcit tathā pratipadyate kiñcidanyathā, tatpratipattiścāpramāṇaṃ sadasatoraviśeṣād yadṛcchopalabdheśca, tadvallokapratipattirapīti .
atrocyate --evaṃ tarhi sākṣāllokapakṣāpattyābhyupagamavirodhaḥ . sākṣāditi pratyakṣata eva
lokapakṣāpattiḥ . katham ? kiñcidgrahaṇāt tathāgrahaṇādanyathāgrahaṇācca . kiñcittvādeva na sarvaṃ sarvātmakam, sarvāsarvatvasiddhiśca vibhāganirdeśāt kiñcit iti . evaṃ tena prakāreṇa tathā iti sa cānya

bhedapadārthopādānācca na tathā iti punarnavo'bhyupagamavirodhaḥ .
stayośca kaściddharmaḥ prakāravyapadeśabhāgeṣitavyaḥ, teṣu triṣvapi siddheṣu yasmāt tathā iti ghaṭate . evam
anyathā ityapi, ayamanyasmādanyaḥ, anyaśca asmādanyaḥ iti sarvāsarvatvasiddherlokapakṣāpattiḥ . evaṃ
viśeṣaikānte deśakālakṛtātyantabhedanirupākhyaśūnyatveṣu kiṃ tat syāt kiñcit iti vibhajya anyasmādavasthitādanavasthitamasadvānyaditi vocyeta vilakṣaṇamiti ? evaṃ tathā anyathā iti ca na ghaṭete . evamubhayānekatvaikānte pūrvavad dravyādīnāmitaretarānātmakatvāt sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ kāryakāraṇayorvā nirmūlatvādibhyo
vā hetubhyo'sattvād vastunaḥ kiñcittathānyathā ityanupapatterlokapakṣāpattiḥ . tayā ca saha sarvasarvātmakatvādiśāstrābhyupagamo virudhyate . evaṃ tāvat pratijñā duṣṭā . pratijñāvaddhetudṛṣṭāntāvapi duṣṭāveva, tadasādhakatvāt . unmatta iti ca dṛṣṭānto lokapakṣapātādṛte na sidhyati, utkṛṣṭo mada unmāda iti madāntarāpekṣo
vimadatvāpekṣo vā nirdeśaḥ, sa ca laukika eva, tamabhyupagamya tannirācikīrṣava evonmattatarā iti .
evaṃ tāvad vākyaviṣayo doṣaḥ . idānīmekapadaviṣaya ucyate --bhedavadabhedapadārthopādānācca na
tathā iti punarnavo'bhyupagamavirodhaḥ . bhedo'syāstīti bhedavān, nāsya bheda ityabhedaḥ, bhedavāṃśca
abhedaśca sa eveti bhedavadabhedaḥ, ko'sau ? padārthaḥ vṛkṣa ityādiḥ svārtha-dravya-liṅga-saṅkhyā-karmādikārakarūpaḥ . yaduktaṃ krama-yaugapadyacintāyām—
svārthamabhidhāya śabdo nirapekṣo dravyamāha samavetam .samavetasya tu vacane liṅgaṃ saṅkhyāṃ vibhaktiṃ ca ॥
abhidhāya tān viśeṣānapekṣamāṇastu kṛtsnamātmānam .priyakutsanādiṣu tathā pravartate'sau vibhaktyantaḥ ॥ pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 5 . 3 . 74
iti vyākaraṇe sarvatantrasiddhānte . tatra svārtha iti jātirākāro vocyeta sva evārthaḥ svārtha iti so'nyāpekṣatvādanyena vinā na svaḥ iti syāt, ato dravyādisiddherbhedavān padārthaḥ . teṣāmeva ca svārthādīnāmatyantabhede'nyonyānātmakatvāt khapuṣpavadabhāvaḥ syāt, deśakālādyabhedopalabdheśca abhedasiddherabhinnaḥ
padārthaḥ . tasmād bhedavadabhedapadārtha upāttaḥ padaṃ prayuñjānena śāstravidā svārthamātravādināpi . tathā dravye

atha pratijñaivābhyupagamaḥ, tasyā lokāprāmāṇyāt . nanvaviśeṣādiṣvasataḥ pakṣāderupādānāllokābhyupagamāt lokavadeva cārthaḥ iti vyavasthāpya śabda-
liṅge saṅkhyāyāṃ kārake kutsādau padārthe ca yojyaṃ krameṇa yugapadvā vācye . tamabhyupagamyāviśeṣavādino viśeṣavādina ubhayānekatvavādino vā na tathā iti tameva punarbruvato navo'bhyupagamavirodhaḥ . nava iti na
svaśāstrābhyupagamena, kiṃ tarhi ? tatkālābhyupagamenetyarthaḥ . sa ca sarvatrābhyupagamavirodha iti .
atha pratijñaivābhyupagamaḥ . syānmatam--na hi padaprayogaviṣayo'bhyupagamo'sti, padārthābhāvāt,
padārthasya utprekṣāviṣayatvād vākyārthādhigamopāyatvena uddhṛtya vākyārthād vyākhyeyatvāt . vākyameva 
śabdaḥ, tadartha eva ca śabdārthaḥ . tasmāt pratijñaivābhyupagamaḥ, tatsādhanārthatvāccheṣavākyāvayavavyāpārasya .
kasmāt ? tasyā lokāprāmāṇyāt . tataḥ tasyāḥ pratijñāyāḥ hetubhūtāyāḥ, tadbalādityarthaḥ, lokāprāmāṇyāt lokasyāpramāṇatvasiddheḥ . nityaḥ śabdo'kṛtakatvādākāśavat iti nityatve siddhe tadbalād
nityānityādyanekarūpaikavastupratipattirloko'pramāṇībhavatīti .
atrocyate --nanvaviśeṣādiṣvasataḥ pakṣāderupādānāllokābhyupagamāditi . sarvaṃ sarvātmakam
ityetasminnaviśeṣaikānte'bhyupagate punaḥ nityaḥ śabdaḥ ityasya pakṣasya taddhetordṛṣṭāntasya cābhāvaḥ pūrvoktebhyo
hetubhyo nirviśeṣatvādibhyaḥ . tathā viśeṣaikānte pūrvoktahetubhya eva pakṣādīnāmabhāvo nirmūlatvādibhyaḥ .
ubhayānekatvaikānte'pi parasparavibhinnasvabhāvānāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣakāryakāraṇānāmabhāva ityuktam . tasmādaviśeṣādiṣvasataḥ pakṣāderlokamatasiddhasyopādānālloka eva punarabhyupagato bhavati agatibhiḥ śāstravidbhiḥ .
tasmāllokābhyupagamāllokaḥ pramāṇīkṛta eva kiñcidakiñcittathānyathā ityādiparasparavilakṣaṇavyavahārābhyupagamācca lokāprāmāṇyaṃ na sidhyatīti te yūyaṃ sudūramapi gatvā lokameva śaraṇaṃ gantumarhatha śāstravidaḥ . evaṃ
śāstravyavahāro lokadarśanamantareṇa na sidhyatīti vākyaviṣayaḥ padaviṣayo vā tataḥ sākṣāllokapakṣāpattyābhyupagamavirodha ityuktaḥ .
tathā tadviṣayaḥ svavacanavirodho'pi pratipattavyaḥ . kasmāt ? lokavadeva cārtha iti vyavasthāpya
śabdaprayogāt . lokena tulyaṃ vartate lokasyeva loka iva vā lokavat, evetyavadhāraṇe, kimavadhārayati ?
loke'rthamavadhārayati nārthe lokam, śāstravidāmapi lokatvāt . pṛthaktve'pyarthalokayorubhayatra vāyamevakāro draṣṭavyaḥ--lokavadevārthaḥ arthavadeva loka iti, dvayorapi parasparāvyabhicārāt śāstravidāṃ lokapṛthaktve

prayogāt tathāsatyatvasiddhe śabdārthe punaḥ na yathālokagrāhaṃ vastu iti virudhyeta
svavacanena . lokavirodhastu prastuta eva, tadavirodhe'pravṛtteḥ . lokāprāmāṇye ca sarvatra
pratyakṣānumānavirodhāvupasthitāveva, tatsthatvāttayoḥ .
laukikārthapṛthaktve ca tatkalpitārthānām . itiśabdaḥ prakāre, anena prakāreṇa itthaṃ vyavasthāpya buddhyā
abhyupagamya svaniścitārthapratipādanārthaṃ pareṣāṃ śabdaprayogāt, padāvadhiko vākyāvadhiko vā śabdaprayogavyavahāro lokānupātītthamiṣṭaṃ tairapi śāstrakāraiḥ . tatra ca tathāsatyatvasiddhe śabdārthe, tena prakāreṇa
tathā, yena prakāreṇa mṛdrūpādipṛthukukṣyādike'rthe ghaṭaśabdo lokena prayuktastenaiva prakāreṇa satyatvena siddhe satyatvasiddhe loke śabdaṃ prayuñjānaiḥ śāstravidbhiḥ loko'bhyupagato'smābhiḥ ityuktameva bhavatyarthāt . tataḥ punaḥ na
yathālokagrāhaṃ vastu iti virudhyeta . lokasya grāho lokagrāhaḥ, grāha iva grāhaḥ, yo yo lokagrāho
yathālokagrāham . kiṃ tat ? vastu . yathaivāgopālaprasiddhaṃ vastu bruvāṇo vādī yo yaḥ prayujyate mayā śabdaḥ
sa sa na tathārthaḥ syāt ityanena svavacanenaiva viruddhamāha, svena vacanena tattadvacanaṃ virudhyeta . virudhyeta
iti āśaṃsāvacane liṅ pā॰ 3 . 3 . 134, kathaṃ mukhaniṣṭhuraṃ virudhyata eva ityavadhāryocyate ? kathañcid virudhyeta iti dākṣiṇyamācāryaḥ svakaṃ darśayati . evaṃ tāvat svavacanavirodhaḥ .
lokavirodhastu prastuta eva . rūḍhivirodho lokavirodhaḥ, sa tu prastuta eva . tadavirodhe'pravṛtteḥ, tena lokena avirodhe śāstrāṇāmapravṛtteḥ, tasyā rūḍheḥ śabdaprayogādevābhyupagatāyā virodhamanupapādya
śāstrāṇāmaviśeṣaviśeṣobhayānekatvaikāntapratipādanārthānāmapravṛtteḥ . kathamapravṛttiḥ ? tāni rūḍhamevārthamanubrūyuḥ,
arūḍhaṃ vā vyutpādayeyuḥ ? yadi rūḍhamanuvadanti, vyarthāni . athārūḍhaṃ vyutpādayanti rūḍhivirodhinamartham,
virudhyanta eva lokena niḥsaṃśayamiti sādhūcyate --tadavirodhe'pravṛtterlokavirodhaḥ prastuta eveti .
kiñcānyat --lokāprāmāṇye ca śāstrakārāṇāṃ sarvatra pade pade vākye vākye pratyakṣānumānavirodhāvupasthitāveva . tatra tāvat aṃśe pratyakṣavirodha ityādyabhihitaṃ pūrvam, idānīṃ sarvatra pratyakṣavirodho
vācya iti viśeṣaḥ . anumānavirodho vā noktaḥ so'bhidheyaḥ, tadanuṣaṅgeṇa punaḥ pratyakṣavirodhavacanaṃ ca
tatpūrvakatvādanumānasyeti . śāstrakārapravṛtterlokaviruddhatvādeva pratyakṣānumānavirodhāvapyupasthitāveva . evetyavadhāraṇe, na na bhavataḥ, bhavata evetyarthaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tatsthatvāt tayoḥ . lokanāddhi loko'nupahatendriyamanaskaḥ prāṇigaṇo loka ityucyate . tayoḥ tasmiँlloke sthitatvāt pratyakṣānumānayoḥ lokaścedapramāṇaṃ lokasthe pratyakṣānumāne prāgevāpramāṇe . athavā sa eva sthitastatsthaḥ, supi sthaḥ pā॰ 3 . 2 . 4
iti vacanāt, loka eva prāmāṇyena vyavasthitaḥ . kva ? tayoḥ pratyakṣānumānayoḥ . sa eva lokaḥ pratyakṣānumānajñānādhāratvāt tadrūpāpatteśca pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca, tatastadaprāmāṇye tayoraprāmāṇyamiti .


śāstravadeva tayorapyalaukikatvakalpanārthaṃ lakṣaṇāntaraṃ kalpyaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaikāntasaṃvādi . ghaṭādikalpanāpoḍhaṃ pratyakṣam . atha kā kalpanā ? nāmajātiguṇa-

syānmataṃ bhavatām--kathaṃ pramāṇajyeṣṭhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na pramāṇīkriyeta ? iti . tatra vaḥ sampradhāramimaṃ
prayacchāmi--tadapi ca pratyakṣamevaṃ kalpyaṃ śāstravadevetyādi . śāstre jñāte'pi tadvihitakriyāsādhyatvāttadiṣṭaphalasya kriyāyāścāvyabhicārājjñāne, yathoktam—
jānānāḥ sarvaśāstrāṇi cchindantaḥ sarvasaṃśayān .na ca te tat kariṣyanti gaccha svargaṃ na te bhayam ॥   iti .
tasmāt jñānaṃ phalasyāvyabhicāri kāraṇaṃ kriyāsādhanavādino'pi, kimaṅgaṃ punarjñānamātrasādhanavādinaḥ ?
iti tadeva vicāryate --śāstravadevetyārabhya yāvad vyañjanakāya iti . śāstra iva śāstravat, yathā
śāstre'bhihitāḥ padārthā atyantavilakṣaṇāstathā pratyakṣamapi laukikapratyakṣavilakṣaṇaṃ tathānumānaṃ cāstu,
tayorapyalaukikatvakalpanārthaṃ pratyakṣānumānayorapyalaukikatvasya kalpanārthaṃ lakṣaṇāntaraṃ kalpyam . kiṃ
tat ? sāmānyaviśeṣaikāntasaṃvādi, sāmānyaṃ ca viśeṣaśca sāmānyaviśeṣau, sāmānyaviśeṣau ca sāmānyaviśeṣau ca sāmānyaviśeṣā ityekaśeṣaḥ sarūpatvāt sāmānyameva, na viśeṣaḥ; viśeṣa eva, na sāmānyam;
tau parasparavilakṣaṇau vā iti ta eva ekāntā laukikapadārthavilakṣaṇāḥ śāstreṣu kalpitāḥ . taiḥ saṃvadituṃ
śīlamasya tadidaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaikāntasaṃvādi . ghaṭa ādiryasyāḥ kalpanāyāḥ sā ghaṭādikalpanā ghaṭasaṅkhyotkṣepaṇasattāghaṭatvādyadhyāropāt, tasyāḥ tataḥ kalpanāyā apoḍhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kalpanīyam . syādāśaṅkā--
kalpanāpoḍhaṃ pratyakṣaṃ viśeṣaikāntavādina eva mataṃ netarayoḥ, tayoḥ kathamalaukikatvamiti cet, atrocyate—
yat tāvad viśeṣamātraṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayamanirdeśyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ tat kalpanāpoḍhatvādalaukikaṃ tat sāmānyānātmakatvāt
khapuṣpavadasaditi siddham . tathā viśeṣānātmakatvāt khapuṣpavat sāmānyamātraṃ sarvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ kalpanāpoḍhaṃ
vastu tadasat, asattvāt tajjñānamapi tadvat . tathobhayānekatvaikānte tayoritaretarānātmakatvāt khapuṣpavadabhāva
ityalaukikatvam . yadyapi sāmānyaviśeṣavyapāśrayaṃ lakṣaṇamabhihitam --śrotrādivṛttiḥ pratyakṣam ṣaṣṭita॰,
ātmendriyamano'rthasannikarṣād yad niṣpadyate tadanyat vai॰ sū॰ 3 . 1 . 18 ityādi, tathāpi sāmānyaviśeṣaikāntavādināṃ balāt tadeva kalpanāpoḍhamalaukikaṃ cetyāpannam, tasya cobhayātmakatvābhyupagame pratijñāhāniḥ . athavā tenaiva dūṣitatvāt kastau hatau haniṣyati ? iti tasyaivopari badhyate parikara ityanenābhiprāyeṇa pūrvameva tāvattatparikalpitapratyakṣalakṣaṇamupanyasya dūṣayitukāmaḥ sūrirityalamatiprasaṅgena .
prakṛtamucyate --atha kā kalpanā yayāpoḍhaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti ? atrocyate --nāma-jāti-guṇa-

kriyādravyasvarūpāpannavastvantaranirūpaṇānusmaraṇavikalpanā . tato'poḍhamakṣādhipatyotpannamasādhāraṇārthaviṣayamabhidhānagocarātītaṃ pratyātmasaṃvedyaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣam . cakṣu-
kriyā-dravyasvarūpāpannavastvantaranirūpaṇānusmaraṇavikalpanā . tato'poḍham apetam . nāma saṃjñā
śabdaḥ ityanarthāntaram, taddvārikā kalpanā . sā dvividhā samāsataḥ--yādṛcchikī naimittikī ca .
nāmagrahaṇād yādṛcchikī jātyādigrahaṇācca naimittikī gṛhītā . nimittanirapekṣaṃ nāma yādṛcchikaṃ ḍittho
ḍavitthaḥ ityādi . śabdadvāratve satyapi jātyādinimittāpekṣā bhinnā . tatra gauḥ iti jātyā śuklaḥ iti guṇataḥ
matublopādabhedopacārādvā viśeṣaṇasvarūpāpannaṃ tato viśeṣaṇādanyad vastu tayorviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayorabhedasambandhanātmikayā kalpanayā pūrvaṃ manasā nirūpyate paścādanusmaryate . tathā ḍitthādiṣvapi asyedam, so'yam iti vā
bhinnayorarthābhidhānayorabhedasambandhanayā nirūpaṇānusmaraṇe, śabdārthayornimittanaimittikayorbhinnayorabhedādhyāropāt . kriyāśabdeṣu pācakaḥ ityādiṣu nābhedopacāraḥ abhinnarūpatvāt kriyākriyāvatoḥ, ato na nirūpaṇaṃ
kintu anusmaraṇameva . sarvatra ca śabdārthābhedopacārānnirūpaṇānusmaraṇe sta eva . tathā dravyaśabdeṣu saṃyogasamavāyanimittād daṇḍī, viṣāṇī ityādiṣu . tasyāḥ kalpanāyā apoḍham . akṣādhipatyotpannamiti,
rūpālokamanaskāracakṣurbhyaḥ sampravartate .vijñānaṃ maṇi-sūryāṃśu-gośakṛdbhya ivānalaḥ ॥  
cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpaṃ ca ālokaṃ ca bāhyaṃ samanantaraniruddhaṃ manaḥsaṃjñitaṃ cittaṃ cittāntarāvakāśadānātmakaṃ
pratītya cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate, caturbhiścittacaittāḥ abhi॰ ko॰ 2 . 64 iti siddhāntāt . tathāpi ca
adhipatinā cakṣuṣā vyapadiśyate cakṣurvijñānam iti, asādhāraṇakāraṇatvāt, yathā yavāṅkura iti
bījartuvārimārutākāśasaṃyoge satyapīti . asādhāraṇārthaviṣayamiti, cakṣurādijñānānāṃ parasparaviviktarūpādinirvikalpasvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt . abhidhānagocarātītam, manonirūpitārthaviṣayatvādabhidhānasya
tadgocarātītam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? pratyātmasaṃvedyatvāt, ātmānamātmānaṃ prati pratyātma, pratyātmanā saṃvedyate
nānyasmai śakyamākhyātuṃ śūlādivedanāsvarūpavat . jñānamiti kalpanāyā anyatrāsambhavāt sambandhaḥ .
pratyakṣam, akṣamakṣaṃ prati vṛtteḥ pañcendriyajam .


rvijñānasamaṅgī nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlam itiabhidharmāgamo'pi . prakaraṇapāde'pyuktam—
nīlaḥ sa nāma nīlaṃ na nīlārtho'nakṣaraḥ sa ca .nīlamiti bhāṣamāṇo nīlasyārthaṃ na paśyati ॥
etasyaivārthasya bhāvanā tu--arthe'rthasaṃjñī, na tvarthe dharmasaṃjñī abhi॰ pi॰ . arthe rūpādike

cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlam iti abhidharmāgamo'pīti
viśvastameva laukikapratyakṣavilakṣaṇaṃ kalpyamānamacīkḷpaḥ, tavāgamo'pyevameveti darśayati . cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī cakṣurvijñānasamanvayī santānaḥ, agi ragi lagi gatyarthāḥ pā॰ dhā॰, cakṣurvijñānaṃ samaṅgituṃ
śīlamasyeti cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī, evaṃ śrotrādivijñānasamaṅginaḥ . nīlaṃ vijānāti, rasādiviviktaṃ
rūpaṃ svalakṣaṇaṃ vijānāti . no tu nīlam iti vijānāti, itiśabdasya śabdaparyāyatvāt idaṃ
tad nīlam iti śabdanirdeśyaṃ na vijānāti, apaṭutvādindriyavijñānasya kutaḥ śaktirevaṃ kalpayitum .
prakaraṇapāde'pyuktamiti bhavatsaṃmatāgamavyākhyānagranthāntare'pyetadarthānuvādinyabhihitamiti darśayati . nīlaḥ sa nāma nīlaṃ neti ślokaḥ . yadetannīlametaditi nāmnā nirdeśo nīlamasya nāma
etannirūpaṇavikalpakṛtam . na nīlārthaḥ nīlasya rūpasya vastunaścakṣurindriyaviṣayasya paramārthaḥ svarūpato'nakṣaraḥ
akṣarairvyañjana-pada-nāmakāyairanabhilapanīyaḥ . sa ca puruṣo nirūpaṇakāle svayaṃ niścinvannanusmaraṇakāle vānusmaran paraṃ pratipipādayiṣan vā nīlamiti vācaṃ bhāṣamāṇo nīlasyārthamanabhilāpyasvarūpaṃ svajñānāṃśavadavikalpaṃ na paśyati, tadā tatsvarūpaviṣayasyāvikalpasya nīlārthavijñānasya ca niruddhatvāt tadānyasya
nīlaśabdābhilāpyasyādhyāropitasya sāmānyasya indriyagocarānāgateḥ .
etasyaivārthasya bhāvanā tu . tuśabdo viśeṣaṇārthaḥ, enamevārthaṃ bhāvanayā'nayā viśeṣayati . bhavati
eṣo'rthaḥ, taṃ bhavantaṃ bhava bhava iti buddhau bhāvayati yayā vyākhyayā sā bhāvanā . kā punaḥ sā ? arthe'rthasaṃjñī,
na tvarthe dharmasaṃjñīti . etasya bhāvanāvākyasya punarvyākhyā --arthe rūpādike pratyakṣavijñānaviṣaye

svarūpasaṃjñī, arthasvarūpaviśeṣamātrālambanayā saṃjñayā nirvikalpayā samprayuktaṃ
svalakṣaṇaviṣayamasya santānasyeti . na tvarthe rūpādike yadṛcchādināmasaṃjñī . evamabhidharme uktam--dharmo nāmocyate nāmakāyaḥ padakāyo vyañjanakāyaḥ .
kalpitamapi tvidamaphalamalaukikatvāt . svavacanavyapekṣākṣepadustaravirodhapari-
rūparasagandhaśabdaspraṣṭavyalakṣaṇe svarūpasaṃjñī rūpādimātrasaṃjñī, saṃjānātīti saṃjñī, svarūpasaṃjñā asyāstīti
vā svarūpasaṃjñī . kimālambanā sā saṃjñā kiṃsvarūpā vā yayā samprayuktaṃ tat pratyakṣaṃ rūpādicittaṃ nirvikalpaṃ
caitasikyā samprayuktakadharmākhyayā yogāt saṃjñayā saṃjñītyucyate tatsantānaḥ ? ityata āha --arthasvarūpaviśeṣamātrālambanayā nirvikalpayā saṃjñayā samprayuktamiti gatārthaṃ vyākhyātatvād bhāṣyeṇa . tadeva
svalakṣaṇaviṣayam, svameva viśeṣa eva lakṣaṇam, lakṣyata iti lakṣaṇam, kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam pā॰
3 . 3 . 173 iti karmaṇi lyuṭpratyayaḥ, svalakṣaṇaviṣayamananyaviṣayamityarthaḥ . asya santānasyeti cakṣurvijñānasamaṅginaḥ, cakṣurvijñānavat cakṣurādipañcavijñānakāyā vyākhyātā itthaṃ kalpanāpoḍhā iti pradarśyate .
yat punaruktaṃ kalpanātmakaṃ jñānaṃ na tat pratyakṣam, arthasvalakṣaṇāviṣayatvāt, gavi aśvajñānavat iti
sādhanam . itaśca savikalpakaṃ nīlamidam ityādijñānaṃ na pratyakṣam, viśeṣaṇādhyāropāt, utpalādhārasurabhyādijñānavaditi . iti parisamāptyarthaḥ, arthe'rthasaṃjñī ityetasya vyākhyānamiti parisamāptam .
na tvarthe dharmasaṃjñī ityasya vyākhyā --na tvarthe . neti pratiṣedhe, tu viśeṣaṇe, tamarthamadhyāropaviśiṣṭaṃ pratiṣedhati . tasminneva rūpādike'rthe na tu yadṛcchādināmasaṃjñī yadṛcchā-jāti-guṇa-kriyā-dravyaśabdasaṃjñī, dharmaśabdasya śabdaśabdārthaparyāyatvāt dharmasaṃjñī na bhavati śabdasaṃjñī na bhavatītyarthaḥ . naiṣā
svamanīṣikocyate, kiṃ tarhi ? evamabhidharma uktam abhidharmapiṭake'bhihitam . kimuktam ? dharmo nāma
ucyate nāmakāya ityādi . nāmaiva nāmakāyaḥ, kāyavat pratikṣaṇaṃ śarārutvāccaturbhūtasaṅghātatvācca nāmnāṃ
vā vijñānādīnāṃ saṅghātatvāt, saṃjñāśabdānāṃ kṣaṇikānāmapi saṃhatānāmeva utpattivināśābhyupagamāt .
yathoktam—
varṇo gandho rasaḥ sparśaścatvāro'pi ca dhātavaḥ .aṣṭāvete'vinirbhāgāḥ sahotpādāḥ sahakṣayāḥ ॥  
iti siddhāntāt . padāni nāmākhyātopasarganipātāḥ, tatkāyaḥ padakāyaḥ . vyañjanāni akṣarāṇi, arthasya
vyañjakatvāt . tatkāyo vyañjanakāya iti .
evaṃ tāvat kalpitameva bhavatsiddhānte, kiṃ sampradhāraṇayā atra ? idānīṃ paramārtho vicāryate—
kalpitamapi tu idamaphalamityādi . nāsya phalamiti aphalam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? alaukikatvāt,
kharaviṣāṇakuṇṭhatīkṣṇādikalpanavat . kasmādalaukikatvamiti cet, svavacanavyapekṣākṣepadustaravirodhapari-

hāraṃ tvaduktivadevedamapratyakṣam, kalpanātmakatvānnirūpaṇavikalpātmakatvādālambanaviparītapratipattyātmakatvādadhyāropātmakatvāt sāmānyarūpaviṣayatvāt tadatadviṣayavṛttitvāt sadasadabhedaparigrahātmakatvāt sarvathā sādhāraṇārthatvādeḥ, anumānādijñānavat .
hāram . yasmāt svaṃ vacanaṃ svavacanaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇavādino dinnabhikṣoḥ, svavacanasya svavacane vā vyapekṣā
pratyavamarśaḥ svavacanavyapekṣā, saiva ākṣepaḥ, tena ākṣepeṇa dustaro virodhasya parihāro'syeti svavacana
vyapekṣākṣepadustaravirodhaparihāram, svenaivaitadvacanena paurvāpareṇa pratyavamṛśyamānena virudhyate sadāhaṃ maunavratiko'smi, pitā me kumārabrahmacārī ityādivacanavat, na tu asmadupapattivad dūṣyamidam, tadarthe
dṛṣṭāntamāha --tvaduktivadevedam, yatheyaṃ tvaduktiḥ kalpanātmikā satī na pratyakṣaṃ tathaivedamapratyakṣamiti
pratijñā . kalpanāpoḍhalakṣaṇalakṣitaṃ jñānamatra dharmi, tadapratyakṣatvadharmaviśiṣṭaṃ sādhyate . ko hetuḥ ? kalpanātmakatvāt . nanvidamasiddhaṃ kalpanātmakatvaṃ tasya jñānasya kalpanāpoḍhatvāt . atredaṃ tatsādhanārthamabhidhīyate dharmāntaram--tat kalpanātmakaṃ nirūpaṇavikalpātmakatvāt, idam ittham iti jñānaṃ nirūpaṇam, sa eva vikalpaḥ, tadātmakaṃ tat pratyakṣaṃ ghaṭatvādijñānavaditi . āha--nirūpaṇavikalpātmakatvamapyasiddhamindriyajñānasyeti, ācāryo'tra tatsādhanārthamāha --ālambanaviparītapratipattyātmakatvāt .
tatrālambanaṃ dravyasanto nīlādiparamāṇavo na tatsamūho nīlapītādyākāravān, saṃvṛtisattvāt . tasyāpi
nīlapītādyākārasya pratyekaṃ tāratamyavattvāt yathā pratipattirna tathālambanamityālambanaviparītapratipattyātmakaṃ
tat . yadālambanaviparītapratipattyātmakaṃ na tat pratyakṣam, yathā sthāṇau puruṣapratipattiriti . syānmatam—
dravyasatāmevāṇūnāṃ nīlapītādyākāratvānna viparītā pratipattiriti, etaccāyuktam, ākārasya adhyāropā-
tmakatvāt, māṇavake siṃhatvādhyāropavat . sa cādhyāropita iti kuto gamyate ? sāmānyarūpaviṣayatvāt . tatsāmānyaṃ ca kārīṣa-tauṣa-tārṇa-pārṇādiviśeṣānāśritāgnitvavat . tadapi asiddhamiti cet,
siddhameva, tadatadviṣayavṛttitvāt . sa ca asaśca viṣayastadatadviṣayau, tatra vṛttirasyeti tadatadviṣayavṛtti tad
jñānam, anekaparamāṇusamūhajatvāt tasya samūhe teṣu ca vṛttatvāt, samūhasya asattvāt samūhināmeva
dravyasatāmaṇūnāṃ sattvāt tayośca abhedena nīlādyākāraparigraheṇa jñānotpatteḥ . samūhāsattvaṃ ca tadagrahe
tadbuddhyabhāvāt, balākāpaṅkti-muṣṭi-granthyādivat . uktaṃ ca—
guṇānāṃ paramaṃ rūpaṃ na dṛṣṭipathamṛcchati .yat tu dṛṣṭipathaprāptaṃ tanmāyeva sutucchakam ॥ ṣaṣṭita॰ iti .

uktaṃ vo'bhidharme eva--sañcitālambanāḥ pañca vijñānakāyāḥ, rūpādiparamāṇorekasyāsañcitasyālambanasya ghaṭanīlādiṣvabhāvāt . tathā sambhāvane'pi teṣāmatīndriyatvādālambanatvānupapatteścakṣurādivijñānānāṃ rūpādiparamāṇusaṅghāta evālambanam .
tataḥ pratyekamālambanaparamāṇūnāṃ paramārthasatāmeṣāmaviṣayatā .
ataḥ sadasadabhedaparigrahātmakatvāt taimirikakeśoṇḍukādijñānavat tadatadviṣayatvamasya . kiñcānyat —
sarvathā sādhāraṇārthatvāt . sādhāraṇo'rtho'sya jñānasyeti sādhāraṇārtham . tatsādhāraṇārthatvamabhedaparigrahātmakatvāt . ādigrahaṇāt anvayavyatirekārthaviṣayatvāt sāmānyaviśeṣātmakārthaviṣayatvāt ityādibhyo hetubhyaḥ . dṛṣṭānto'numānādijñānāni tvayaivodāhṛtāni—
bhrāntisaṃvṛtisajjñānamanumānānumānikam .smārtābhilāṣikaṃ ceti tadābhāsaṃ sataimiram ॥ pra॰ samu॰ 1 . 8 iti .
tasmāddhetupārampaṇa kalpanātmakatvasiddherekaikasmādvoktahetorapratyakṣamidaṃ kalpanāpoḍhalakṣaṇalakṣitaṃ jñānam,
anumānādijñānavaditi, yathā anumānādijñānaṃ kalpanātmakatvādapratyakṣaṃ tathā bhavateṣṭamindriyajñānam .
mā maṃsthāḥ proktakalpanātmakatvādihetvasiddhiḥ iti . yasmāduktaṃ vo'bhidharma eva abhidharmapiṭaka
eva buddhavacane'bhihitam --sañcitālambanāḥ pañca vijñānakāyā iti . nityaṃ samprayuktakadharmairyuktatvād rāgādibhiḥ kāyā ityucyante pañca cakṣurādivijñānāni . rūpādiparamāṇorekasya asañcitasya
anyaiḥ samānajātīyairasaṅgatasya ālambanasya viṣayasyendriyabuddhigrāhyatvasya ghaṭādiṣu ghaṭapaṭarathādiṣu
nīlādiṣu rūparasagandhasparśabdeṣu tadguṇeṣu pratyakṣābhimateṣu saṃvṛtisatsu abhāvāt sañcitāṇughaṭanīlādyākāra eva gṛhyate cakṣurādibhiḥ . tasyāṃ cāvasthāyāṃ paramāṇutvena avasthānam ārhatān pratyasiddham,
pariṇāmāntarāpattyabhyupagamāt . vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ paramāṇvārabdhāvayavidravyam . sāṅkhyānāṃ samavasthānaviśeṣāpannāḥ sattvādayo guṇāḥ . laukikānāṃ tu sthūlakāryānumitatajjātīyasūkṣmakāraṇamātrasambhāvanam--santi
kecit sūkṣmā bahavaḥ sthūlasya kāraṇabhūtāḥ paṭasyeva tantava iti . sambhāvitānāṃ tathāsambhāvane'pi teṣāṃ
saṅghāta-pariṇāmābhyāmṛte cākṣuratvādyabhāvo lokavyāptāṇuvat, ato'tīndriyatvādālambanatvānupapattiḥ .
ataścālambanatvānupapatterdravyasatāṃ paramāṇūnāmetat pratipattavyam --cakṣurādivijñānānāṃ rūpādiparamāṇusaṅghāta eva ālambanamiti . ādigrahaṇād rasādiparimaṇḍalādiparamāṇusaṅghāta eva ālambanam .
tataḥ kimiti cet, tataḥ pratyekamālambanaparamāṇūnām, ālambanārthāḥ paramāṇava ālambanaparamāṇavaḥ,
teṣāṃ paramārthasatāmeṣām, ta eva hi paramārthasanto na samūho nīlādirghaṭādiśca saṃvṛtisattvāt, bhavatsiddhāntenaiva aviṣayatā paramāṇūnām .


tatra prativiviktarūpāntarāviviktasvatattve rūpasaṅghāte indriyasannikṛṣṭe
ālambanaviparītā yeyaṃ pratipattiravyapadeśyaikātmakanīlarūpaviṣayā nanu hetvapadeśavyapadeśyaiva sā . yataḥ sañcayagrahaṇāpadeśena vyapadeśyaṃ dhūmenevāgniriva gṛhyate
tato'nyat kalpitamekaṃ sāmānyaṃ nīlarūpaṃ taddvāreṇa .

tatra prativiviktarūpāntarāviviktasvatattve, pratyekaṃ viviktāni rūpāntarāṇi pratiparamāṇu vā
rasādibhedena vā, teṣāmeva rūpāntarāṇāmaviviktaṃ svatattvaṃ yasya so'yamaviviktasvatattvaḥ . ko'sau ? rūpasaṅghātaḥ, rūpadhātubhedaparamāṇusaṅghātaḥ adhikṛtacakṣurviṣayābhimatarūpasaṅghāto vā . tasmin rūpasaṅghāte indriyasannikṛṣṭe svaviṣayyābhimukhyena upasthite ālambanaviparītā paramārthata ālambanabhūtebhyaḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ
nīlam iti vā ghaṭaḥ iti vā yeyaṃ pratipattiḥ sā viparītā, tadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvāt, balākāsu paṅktijñānavat, avyapadeśyaikātmakanīlarūpaviṣayā, vyapadeśyānekaparamāṇvālambanebhyo'nyo'vyapadeśya eka
ātmā asyeti avyapadeśyaikātmakam, kiṃ tat ? nīlarūpam, tad viṣayo'syā iti avyapadeśyaikātmakanīlarūpaviṣayā abhimatā pratipattiḥ iti vartate . saiva vā pratipattiravyapadeśyā ekātmakānekaparamāṇunīlarūpaviparītaikanīlarūpaviṣayā, tadvyākhyānārthamabhidharmapiṭake bhavatāṃ yathocyate --nīlaṃ vijānāti,
no tu nīlam iti . nāvyapadeśyā sā pratipattirityabhiprāyaḥ, taṃ pradarśayati --nanu hetvapadeśavyapadeśyaiva
sā . yasmāduktam --heturapadeśo nimittaṃ liṅgaṃ pramāṇaṃ kāraṇamityanarthāntaram vai॰ sū॰ 9 . 2 . 4
iti . na cāvaśyaṃ śabdābhidheyameva vyapadeśyam, kiṃ tarhi ? yadyadarthāntareṇādhigamyate tattadvyapadeśyam,
arthāntarasya hetvapadeśanimittādiparyāyatvāt . tavāpi ca yataḥ sañcayagrahaṇāpadeśena nimittāntarajanyami-
ndriyajñānamiṣṭaṃ tasmād vyapadeśyaṃ tat . tathā coktam --sañcitālambanāḥ pañca vijñānakāyāḥ abhi॰
pi॰ iti, na sañcayālambanā iti . etasyārthanidarśanārthamudāharaṇamāha --dhūmeneva agniriva gṛhyate,
yathā dhūmena arthāntarabhūtena agniratra iti jñānamutpadyamānaṃ vyapadeśyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathaitadapi nīlarūpādiviṣayaṃ
cakṣurādivijñānaṃ paramāṇubhirarthāntarairjanitatvād vyapadeśyam . tato'nyadityādi . tata eva yathā vyapadeśyaṃ
tathā dhūmādagniriva tad nīlarūpaṃ tataḥ paramāṇubhyaḥ paramārthasadbhyaḥ anyat kalpitamakalpitebhya ekaṃ
bahubhyaḥ sāmānyaṃ viśeṣebhyaḥ, na sākṣādindriyairavyavahitaṃ gṛhyate, kiṃ tarhi ? vyavahitamevārthāntaraiḥ paramāṇubhiḥ taddvāreṇa paramāṇudvāreṇa gṛhyate, na svata eveti .


nanu ca sañcayasya kārakahetutvenāpadeśaḥ pratyakṣapratipatterna dhūmavajjñāpakahetvapadeśatayā agnerivārthāntarasyaikarūpatvasya . nanvidamasyaivārthasya pradarśanārthaṃ prastutamasmābhiḥ, yadīdaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syāt kārakādeva svārthādālambanāddhetorjāyeta dāhānubhavanavat
pratyakṣatvādavyavahitapratipattyātmakatvāt pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvādanadhyāropātmakatvāditi yāvat .

atrāha --nanu ca sañcayasyetyādi yāvadarthāntarasyaikarūpatvasyeti . nanvityanujñāpane, caśabdaḥ
prasiddhabhedasamuccaye, nanvidaṃ prasiddham--anyaḥ kārako heturanyo jñāpaka iti . tasmādaṇūnāṃ tatsañcayasya
nīlasya ca kārakasambandhād dhūmasyāgneśca jñāpakasambandhāt pratyakṣānumānapratipattyorvaiṣamyamataḥ sādhyadharmavaikalyaṃ dṛṣṭāntasya iṣṭavighātād viruddhatā hetoriti vākyārthaḥ . akṣarāṇyuttānārthānyeveti na vivṛṇmahe .
atrācāryo doṣadvayaṃ pariharannāha --nanvidamasyaivārthasya pradarśanārthaṃ prastutamasmābhiḥ . naitadaniṣṭamasmākaṃ na vā sādhyadharmavaikalyaṃ yat sañcayasya jñāpakatvaprasaṅgāt pratyakṣapratipattestaddoṣadvayamasmān pratyāpādyeta . na punarevametat, asyaiva pratipipādayiṣitatvāt . taducyate --yadi bhavanmatamidaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syāt,
kārakādeva niṣpādakādeva cakṣurādivijñānasya nīlapītādeḥ svārthābhimatādālambanabhūtāddhetorjāyeta
sañcayākhyāt saṃvṛtisataḥ, na paramārthasato'ṇvāderapi syāt, bhavati tu . tasmānna pratyakṣam, jñāpakadhūmādyapekṣāgnijñānavat, vaidharmyeṇa dāhānubhavanavat . svārthamātrālambanaṃ vā syāt pratyakṣatvād dāhānubhavanavat . yathoktam—
anyathā dāhasambandhāddāhaṃ dagdho'bhimanyate .anyathā dāhaśabdena dāhārthaḥ sampratīyate ॥ vākyapa॰ 2 . 421
avyavahitapratipattyātmakatvāt pratyakṣasyeti tasyaivopacayahetuḥ, arthāntareṇāvyapetasyārthasya grāhakaṃ
pratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā dāhānubhavaḥ, tathā tasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt pratyakṣasyārthāntaranirapekṣatā syāt, na
punarastīti svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvādanadhyāropātmakatvāditi yāvat, sarvatrārthāntarādhyāropavṛttyarthāntaraheyatayotpannaṃ na jñānamiti yāvaduktaṃ bhavati tāvaduktaṃ bhavati svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvādavyavahitapratipattyātmakatvāt pratyakṣatvādityādi . arthāntaranimittagrāhyaṃ cāpratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā dāhaśabdajanitajñānamiti .
evaṃ tāvat kārakatāṃ sañcayasyābhyupagamya doṣa āpāditaḥ .


kārakatāpi ca sañcayasya naiva tasya, paramārthato'sattvādalātacakravat
pratyavayavavyavasthānamātratvāt . lokavattu sañcayasattve viśiṣṭo'padeśo vyapadeśo
grāhyādanyaḥ, tena vyapadeśena vyapadeśyaṃ prameyamanumeyaṃ na pratyakṣam, dhūmānumitāgnivat,

idānīṃ kārakatāmapi dūṣayitukāma āha --kārakatāpi ca sañcayasya naivāstiṃ tasyeti pratijñā,
paramārthato'sattvāditi hetuḥ . alātacakravaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ . paramārthato'sattvaṃ saṃvṛtisatvādsaṃvṛtisattvād bhavanmatena
ghaṭavat . yathoktam—
yasmin bhinne na tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat .ghaṭāmbuvat saṃvṛtisat paramārthasadanyathā ॥ abhi॰ ko॰ 6 . 4 iti .
yathā ulmukaṃ bhramad bhrāntadṛṣṭeścakravadābhāti, na taccakramasti, agnikaṇānāṃ nairantaryābhāvāt, cakrasya para-
mārthato'sattvācca cakravijñānasya akārakatā evaṃ sañcayasya saṃvṛtisattvānnīlavijñānasya akārakatā . tathā
atīndriyatvādaṇunīlānām . itaśca sañcayasya akārakatā, pratyavayavavyavasthānamātratvāt, avayavamavayavaṃ prati pratyavayavam, avayavā nīlādiparamāṇavaḥ, teṣāmeva saṃhatyaikatra parasparāsattyā vyavasthānamātraṃ
sañcayo na tebhyo'rthāntaramiṣṭaṃ bhavatām . ataḥ paramārthato nāstyevāsau sañcayo nāma kaścit . tasya asataḥ
kharaviṣāṇasyeva kā kārakatā ?
abhyupetyāpi sañcayasya sattvaṃ doṣaṃ brūmaḥ --lokavattu sañcayasattve, yathā lokasya avyutpannasyāpi
samudāyivyatirekeṇa sanneva avayavī pariṇāmāntaraṃ tatsamudāyo vā yo'stu so'stu parairvyutpāditaḥ sannevāsau
tantupaṭādiṣu buddhi-śakti-kāryā-'bhidhāna-saṅkhyādibhedadarśanādiṣṭaḥ, tatrākṣarārthānusāreṇa vyapadeśo'styeveti
gṛhyatām . tataśca avyapadeśyo viṣayaḥ pratyakṣasya, pratyakṣaṃ cāvyapadeśyam ityubhayamanṛtam . tat kathamiti
cet, viśiṣṭo'padeśo vyapadeśa iti viśabdasya viśiṣṭārthatām apadeśaśabdasya hetvarthatāṃ ca
darśayati . viśiṣṭo'nya ityarthaḥ . kuto'nya iti cet, ucyate --grāhyādanyaḥ, grāhyo nīlādiḥ, tasmādanyaḥ sañcayastadvyapadeśaḥ . tena sañcayena vyapadeśena hetunā vyapadeśyam, kiṃ tat ? prameyaṃ nīlādi
tvadabhimatapratyakṣapramāṇagamyam . kiṃ bhavati tannīlādirūpam ? anumeyaṃ prāpnoti, vyapadeśavyapadeśyatvāt,
na pratyakṣam . tasya jñeyasyāsmādeva hetoḥ pratyakṣatvābhāvo'numeyabhāvaśca sādhyate, tadvajjñānasya apratyakṣatā 
anumānatā ca sādhyate . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? dhūmānumitāgnivat . yathā dhūmena vyapadeśena sādhito'gni

kārakatāyāmakārakatāyāṃ vā vastunaḥ pitṛdhūmādivat .
abhidhānāvyapadeśyataikātmakatve api ca naiva, anumitāgnivad bahuviṣayatvād
nīlasya .
taddhi nīlarūpanirūpaṇaṃ vikalpaḥ, pratiparamāṇuparasparapratibhinnasvatattvāneka-
ranumeyo'pratyakṣaśca tathā nīlarūpam . yathā ca dhūmālambanotpāditāgnijñānamanumānamapratyakṣaṃ ca tathā
nīlajñānaṃ saṃyogotpāditamiti .
kiñcānyat--sarvathā tad nīlādijñānaṃ tena sañcayena vyapadeśyaṃ tadavinābhāvāt tasya, kārakatāyāmakārakatāyāṃ vā na kaścid viśeṣo vyapadeśyatvasiddhau vastunaḥ . kutaḥ ? arthāntaranimittādeva,
pitṛdhūmādivat, yathā pitā putrasya janakaḥ, tena vyapadiśyate kārakeṇa putraḥ dhūmena jñāpakena agniḥ,
aviśiṣṭatvādvastunaḥ . tatastulye vyapadeśyatvahetau apratyakṣatvānumānatvasādhanasamarthe satyavyapadeśyanirodhako'yamanarthako vicāraḥ kārako jñāpaka iti kārakatvamabhyupetyāpyeṣa doṣo'bhihitaḥ . evaṃ tāvadarthakṛto'sya
nīlasya vyapadeśaḥ siddho yatsiddherapratyakṣānumeyatve siddhe . tatsiddheśca tajjñānasya anumānatvaṃ sidhyet
avyapadeśyatvādilakṣaṇavirodhaśca . evaṃ tāvadarthato vyapadeśyameva .
yadapīṣṭam--abhidhānato na vyapadeśyaṃ tannīlādiparamāṇurūpaṃ paramāṇusamūhābhedādekaṃ ceti, ete dve
abhidhānāvyapadeśyataikātmakatve api ca naiva sto nīlarūpasya iti pratijñā . dṛṣṭānto'numitāgnivaditi pratipattisaukaryāt prāgeva hetordṛṣṭānta uktaḥ, tadbalāvayavasiddheḥ . hetusamarthanārthatvāt dṛṣṭāntasya
hetustarhi ka ityatrocyate --bahuviṣayatvāt . yathā dhūmajñānānumito'gnirabādivinivṛttyupalakṣito deśakālādibhedabhinno'pi abhidhānavyapadeśyo'nekātmakatvāpanna eva gṛhyate tathā nīlārtho'pi syād bahuparamāṇuviṣayatvāt, tathā jñānamapīti .

āha --taddhi nīlarūpanirūpaṇamityādi . taditi prāgapadiṣṭaṃ vikalpātmakatvam, hiśabdo yasmādarthe,
yasmānnīlarūpasya nirūpaṇamuktanyāyena arthavyapadeśena śabdavyapadeśena vā dṛṣṭam, sa ca vikalpa evetyavikalpakatvaṃ nāsti, ataḥ kalpanāpoḍham iti duṣṭaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ jñānārthayoḥ . adhyāropācca nirūpaṇaṃ tasya, tat
kathamiti cet, ucyate --pratiparamāṇu paramāṇuṃ paramāṇuṃ prati pratiparamāṇu parasparataḥ pratibhinnāni svāni
tattvāni . yo yasya bhāvaḥ sa tasya tattvam, na so'nyatra bhavati, bhavanameva hi tattvam, ato vibhinnāni
pratiparamāṇu tattvāni, ekaikasya paramāṇoḥ paramāṇvantarebhyo'tyantabhinnaṃ svaṃ tattvam, bhāvāntaramanapekṣya

rūpaikatattvaikarūpādhyāropād rūpāntarasāmānyarūpaviṣayatvāt tadatadviṣayavṛttatvādatadanapohād nāgnyanumānavat tatsāmānyātmakataiva, prajñaptiparamārthasthitasañcayaparamāṇuparigrahābhedātmakatvāt sarvathā sādhāraṇārthatā, kalpanātmakatvānna pratyakṣam,
apratyayapratyayātmakatvāt, śabdāśrāvaṇatvapratyayavat . saṃvṛtyatīndriyatvābhyāṃ hi
svarasenaiva bhavanād bhāvānāmekavacadasādhāraṇabhavanatvāt paramāṇūnāṃ svāni tattvāni bhinnāni . tathā
teṣāṃ paramāṇūnāṃ nīlādirūpāṇyapyanekarūpāṇyeva . teṣāṃ ca svatattvānāṃ teṣāṃ ca nīlādisvarūpāṇāmanekarūpāṇāmekadvitriguṇādibhinnānāṃ yathāsaṅkhyam ekatattvaikarūpādhyāropāt sarvaparamāṇutattvānāmekasvatattvādhyāropāt sarvaparamāṇurūpāṇāmekanīlarūpādhyāropādarthāntaranirūpaṇam . sa cāpyadhyāropo rūpāntarasāmānya-
rūpaviṣayatvāt, rūpādanyad rūpaṃ rūpāntaram, paramāṇurūpāt paramāṇvantararūpaṃ rūpāntaram, evaṃ sarvāṇi
paramāṇvantararūpāṇi, teṣāṃ rūpaṃ nīlamityabhedena yat sāmānyaṃ buddhyā gṛhyate so'dhyāropastadviṣayaḥ . tadapi
sāmānyaṃ tadatadviṣayavṛttatvāt sāmānyamityucyate, sa cānyaścārtho viṣayo'syeti kṛtvā . tataścātra
pratyakṣe'nyasyānapohaḥ, anumāne tvanagneragneranyasyāpohaḥ . tasmādatadanapohāt pratyakṣamaviviktaviṣayaṃ svaviṣayābhimate'nyatra cāparityāgena abhedena ca vṛtteḥ, nānumānaṃ svaviṣaye sāmānyamātra eva vṛtteḥ . ato'numānāt paraparikalpitaṃ pratyakṣaṃ pāpīyaḥ saṅkīrṇataraviṣayatvāditi . tasmād nāgnyanumānavaditi tat agnyanumānatulyamapi tanna bhavati, apohyārthāpohaśaktiśūnyatvāt . tasmāt tatsāmānyātmakataiva gnyanuagnyanumānasya, na pratyakṣasyeti tasya nīlāderarthasya pratyakṣaviṣayasya tajjñānasya ca tadavasthā saṅkīrṇarūpatā .
kiñcānyat--tadatadviṣayavṛttatāpi na nīlarūpādestajjñānasya vopapadyate . kiṃ kāraṇam ? sadasatoḥ
sambandhābhāvāt, ghaṭakhapuṣpavat . tata upacaritameva tadatadviṣayavṛttatvamapīti tatpradarśanārthamāha --prajñaptiparamārthasthitasañcayaparamāṇuparigrahābhedātmakatvāt . prajñaptisan sañcayaḥ, paramārthasantastu tathāsthitāḥ
paramāṇavaḥ, teṣāṃ parigrahaḥ sadasadabhedātmakaḥ, tasmāt sadasatparigrahābhedātmakatvāt tadatadviṣayavṛttatā .
sā ca sarvathā sādhāraṇārthatā, sarvathā eteṣvanantarokteṣu hetuṣu . tato mūlahetuḥ kalpanātmakatvāt
iti sa evaitaiḥ sādhitaḥ, tasmānna tat pratyakṣaṃ na cānumānavadasaṅkīrṇasvaviṣayamityetadarthabhāvanārthāḥ
punasta eva hetavo vyāpāritāḥ pratyekamapi pūrvavadetasminnarthe yojyāḥ . itaśca tajjñānamapratyakṣam, apratyayapratyayātmakatvāt, śabdāśrāvaṇatvapratyayavaditi . pratyayaḥ kāraṇaṃ heturityarthaḥ, na pratyayo'syeti apratyayaḥ,

nāṇuṣu na sañcaye pratyayatā tathāpratipattiṃ prati . anumānajñānamapi ca tanna pratipūryate sambaddhagṛhītasyānyathāpratipatteḥ, viruddhādijñānavat .
tiṣṭhatu tāvat pratyakṣavidhividhānābhyupagamena svalakṣaṇamātraviṣayapratyakṣatvasya
ko'sau ? pratyayaḥ, pratyayo vijñānam, dvitīyasya pratyayaśabdasya vijñānārthatvāt, akāraṇajñānatvādityuktaṃ
bhavati . kathaṃ punarakāraṇaṃ tajjñānam ? saṃvṛtyatīndriyatvābhyāṃ yasmānnāṇuṣu na sañcaye pratyayatā tathāpratipattiṃ prati, dravyasatāmaviṣayatvāt tasya, dravyasanto hi paramāṇavo'tīndriyatvādeva na pratyakṣajñānahetavaḥ;
tathā nīlatvādayaḥ saṃvṛtisantaḥ, tatsañcayo'sattvādeva akāraṇam . tasmādubhayathāpi apratyayaḥ sa pratyayaḥ
nīlaṃ rūpam iti . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? yathā aśrāvaṇaḥ śabdaḥ iti pratyayo'pratyayo'pratyakṣaṃ ca tathedamapīti .
syānmatam--kalpanātmakatvādibhya eva hetubhyo'numānajñānaṃ tarhi cakṣurādivijñānaṃ bhaviṣyatīti .
atrocyate --anumānajñānamapi ca tanna pratipūryate . karmakartaryātmanepadaṃ yak ca, tatpratiṣedhād na
pratipūryate iti rūpam, yathā'yamodano vipannatvāt pūtimāṃsavadātmānaṃ na bhojayati na bhujyate svayameva
tathedamapi jñānamātmānaṃ na pratipūrayati na pratipūryate . kasmāddhetoḥ ? sambaddhagṛhītasyānyathāpratipatteḥ .
sambaddha eva gṛhītaḥ, tasya sambaddhagṛhītasyānyathāpratipatteḥ, tasya jñānasya anyathāpratipadyamānasambaddhagṛhītārthatvādityarthaḥ . yad jñānaṃ sambaddhamevārthaṃ gṛhṇat tamevārthamanyathā pratipadyate tad jñānaṃ nānumānamapi sampūrṇaṃ
bhavati . tadyathā --viruddhādijñānam . yathā kṛtakatvānnityaḥ śabdaḥ iti pakṣadharmajñānaṃ śabdasambandhi
ghaṭādiṣvanityānugamasambaddhaṃ gṛhītvā nityaṃ śabdaṃ pratipadyamānaṃ viruddhahetvābhāsajñānaṃ bhavati, ādigrahaṇāt
prameyaśrāvaṇatvadvāraṃ nityajñānaṃ vā śabdaviṣayamanaikāntikābhāsaṃ yathā tathedamapi na sampūrṇamanumānajñānamapīti .
athavā tiṣṭhatu tāvadityādi yāvat pratyakṣaviṣayatvābhyupagamavirodha iti . sthitaṃ tāvadastu
vidūrasthena āgamenābhyupagatena pratyakṣaviṣayatvasya virodha ityetat . idamevāsmin prakaraṇe yadudāhṛtaṃ pūrvaṃ
cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī ityādi tadeva na ghaṭata iti vākyārthaḥ . pratyakṣasya vidhiḥ pratyakṣasya janma, tasya
vidhānaṃ vyākhyānam --sañcitālambanāḥ pañca vijñānakāyāḥ abhi॰ pi॰ iti, sa eva abhyupagamaḥ
pratyakṣavidhividhānābhyupagamaḥ . svalakṣaṇamātraviṣayapratyakṣatvameva, svalakṣaṇamātraṃ viṣayo yasya tat svalakṣaṇamātraviṣayam, kiṃ tat ? pratyakṣam, tasya bhāvaḥ svalakṣaṇamātraviṣayapratyakṣatvam, tasya pratyakṣavidhi-

virodhaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayatvābhyupagamavirodhaḥ . cakṣurvijñānasamaṅginīlavijñānam ityetadeva tu na ghaṭate pratyakṣalakṣaṇodāharaṇam .
evaṃ te sañcayasya rūpamātratvāt tadgrahaṇe tatpratyakṣatvāt sañcitālambanakalpanāvaiyarthyādatanmātratve saṃvṛtisattvādarūpatvācca cakṣurnaiva cakṣuḥ syāt, ubhayathāpi
rūpāgrāhitvāt, ghaṭādivat .
vidhānābhyupagamena virodhaḥ samanantaragranthopapādito'sau sthita eva . cakṣurvijñānasamaṅginīlavijñānamityetadeva tu na ghaṭate . tuśabdo viśeṣaṇe, kiṃ viśinaṣṭi ? pūrvasmāllakṣaṇavākyādāgamasyāsyāśuddhataratāṃ viśinaṣṭi . cakṣuṣaḥ cakṣuṣi cakṣuṣā vā viśiṣṭaṃ jñānaṃ vijñānamasādhāraṇaviṣayam, tat samaṅgati
samanvetīti cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī, kaḥ ? santānaḥ, vijñānasya tadarthaikagamanāt taddvāreṇa tatsantāno'pi
samaṅgatītyucyate . tatsamaṅgino nīlavijñānam . tadeva pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhamanirdeśyaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayam
ityādi vacanaṃ tena lakṣitasya udāharaṇam idaṃ tat iti pratyakṣīkaraṇaṃ pradarśanam, yathā vṛddhirādaic 
pā॰ 1 . 1 . 1 ityupalakṣitasya āśvalāyanaḥ ityudāharaṇam .
kathaṃ tanna ghaṭate ? tata āha --evaṃ te sañcayasyetyādi yāvat sañcitālambanakalpanāvaiyarthyāditi . evaṃ te udāharaṇatveṣṭau satyāṃ sañcayasya rūpamātratvāt, kiṃ bhavati ? sañcitālambanakalpanāvaiyarthyaṃ syādityabhisambhantsyate . rūpamātratvaṃ sañcayasya kuta iti tadgrahaṇe tatpratyakṣatvāt, yadgrahe yasya
pratyakṣatvaṃ tat tāvanmātrameva dṛṣṭam, yathā dāhagrahe dāhapratyakṣatve dāhamātrameva nāto'nyo'rtha iṣṭa evaṃ
sañcayagrahe nīlarūpamātrameva . ataḥ kim ? sañcitālambanakalpanāvaiyarthyam, sañcayābhāvāt . sañcayābhāvo
rūpamātratvāt . sañcitālambanakalpanāvaiyarthyāccodāharaṇameva tu na ghaṭate cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī ityādi .

bhūdeṣa doṣa iti na rūpamātraṃ sañcayaḥ, sa eva ca gṛhyata itīṣyate, tataḥ sañcayasya saṃvṛtisattvādarūpatvaṃ
kharaviṣāṇavat . saṃvṛtisattvaṃ prāgupapāditam . arūpatvācca na cakṣurgrāhyaḥ syāt sañcayaḥ, rūpādanyatvāt, śabdavat khapuṣpavadvā . tataḥ ko doṣa iti cet, ucyate --cakṣurnaiva cakṣuḥ syāt, rūpasyāgrāhakatvāt, ghaṭavat jihvāvat tvagvadityādi . kathaṃ rūpasyāgrāhakaṃ cakṣuḥ iti dṛṣṭa-prasiddhiviruddhamucyata iti 
cet, tavaiva dṛṣṭaprasiddhivirodhāvāpādyete mayā . kiṃ kāraṇam ? ubhayathā rūpāgrāhitvāttasya . yadi
sañcayastathāpyasannarūpa evetyuktatvādacakṣurviṣayo rūpam, tato rūpasyāgrāhakatvāccakṣuracakṣuḥ śrotravat . athāsañcitameva paramāṇunīlarūpamiṣṭaṃ tathāpyatīndriyatvādacakṣurviṣayo rūpam, ato rūpasyāgrāhakatvācca cakṣurna
ca cakṣuḥ syāduktavaditi sūktam--ubhayathāpi rūpasyāgrāhakaṃ cakṣuriti . evaṃ tāvat cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī
ityatra cakṣuṣo'cakṣuṣṭvāccakṣurgrahaṇamanarthakam .


vijñānamapi na vijñānaṃ syāt, anyathārthapratipatteḥ, alātacakrādijñānavat .
na ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ samaṅgati, rūpādanyatrāsambhavāt . na hi sañcayo rūpam . yadapi
ca tadrūpaṃ tadviṣayamapi cakṣurvijñānasya samaṅganaṃ nāsti, aviṣayatvāt, anyendriyaviṣayavat . sañcayaviṣayamapi saṃvṛtisattvāt khapuṣpavat .
nīlavijñānasambandhī na bhavati tatsantānaḥ, tadākārajñānotpattihetvabhāvāt,
adagdhasya dāhājñānavat .

vijñānagrahaṇamapyata evānarthakamityata āha --vijñānamapi na vijñānaṃ syādityādi yāvat khapuṣpavaditi . viśeṣeṇa jñānaṃ vijñānaṃ tadbhavadabhimataṃ pratyakṣaṃ mukhyaṃ vijñānaṃ na syāt, itarathā kathamācāryaśrīmallavādī 'vijñānaṃ na syāditi svavacanavirodhaṃ māyeya-dinnāviva brūyāt ? kiṃ kāraṇaṃ punarvijñānaṃ tanna
syāt ? anyathārthapratipatteḥ, arūpasya sañcayasya rūpatvena pratipatteḥ sañcayatvena vā rūpamātrasya pratipatteḥ .
ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? alātacakrādijñānavat . yatholmukāgnikaṇamātramārthaṃ cakram iti pratipadyamānaṃ na vijñānamevaṃ
tadapi . ādigrahaṇāt sthāṇau puruṣajñānamityādi . evaṃ tāvaccakṣuriti vijñānamiti ca dvayaṃ dūṣitam .
cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī ityatra samaṅgitvamapi dūṣayitukāma āha --na ca cakṣurvijñānaṃ samaṅgatīti, taddvāreṇa
puruṣākhyasantānaikagamanaṃ samaṅganaṃ tatastanniṣedhaḥ . kasmānna samaṅgati ? cakṣurvijñānasya rūpādanyatrāsambhavāt, na vā tatsantāno'nyatra sambhavati, uktaṃ hi --sati sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvaḥ   iti . sañcayāpekṣo vyabhicāro'styato viśeṣyata iti cet, tanna, yasmānna
sañcayo rūpam . arūpatvāccakṣurvijñānasaṅgatyabhāvaḥ . syānmatam--nīlarūpāvyabhicārādeva tadekagamanāt
samaṅgītyucyate cakṣurvijñānamiti, etaccāyuktam, tasyāpyatīndriyatvāccakṣurvijñānāviṣayatvādarūpatvam . abhyupetyāpi tvanmatena yadapi ca tadrūpam, rūpata iti rūpyamrūpyata iti rūpam, cakṣurvijñānena kila rūpyata iti, tadviṣayaṃ sa
viṣayo yasya tat tadviṣayam, kiṃ tat ? ekagamanam, kasya ? cakṣurvijñānasya, tadapi nāsti .
kasmāt ? aviṣayatvāt . aviṣayatvamatīndriyatvāt prastutapratyakṣasya . anyendriyaviṣayavat, yathā
śabdo'nyendriyaviṣayaścakṣurvijñānena na samaṅgyate tathā tadapi rūpamiti . syānmatam--sañcayaścakṣurvijñānasaṅgatiyogyaḥ syāditi, atra brūmaḥ --sañcayaviṣayamapi cakṣurvijñānasya samaṅganaṃ nāsti iti vartate .
kasmādasattvam ? saṃvṛtisattvāt khapuṣpavaditi saṅgamanābhāvasādharmyeṇa dṛṣṭāntaḥ . evaṃ tāvad rūpam, cakṣuḥ,
vijñānam, samaṅgī ityetāni dūṣitāni .
idānīṃ nīlam, vijānāti iti ca dūṣyam . tatra nīlaṃ padārthato dūṣitameva, vijānātīti ca
dūṣitameva padārthataḥ, rūpacakṣurvijñānānāṃ saṅgateśca dūṣitatvāt . mā bhūdakṣarasthānaṃ dūṣaṇaśūnyamiti kṛtvā
vākyārthato'pi dūṣyate --nīlavijñānasambandhī na bhavati tatsantānaḥ, tadākārajñānotpattihetvabhāvāt . sa ākāro'syeti tadākāraṃ jñānaṃ nīlākāram, tasyotpattistadākārajñānotpattiḥ, tasyā hetuḥ
sañcayo nīlarūpaṃ vā syāt, ubhayamapi tanna bhavatyuktavidhinaiva, atastadākārajñānotpattihetvabhāvāt .

nīlaṃ ca sañcayaṃ ca pratyekasamuditakāraṇatvād vijñāsyatīti cet, na, yugapajjñānāsambhavāt, jñānasya kriyāvaidharmyāt .
tayorekajñānatvādekajñeyatve itaretaratve sarvasarvātmavāditā . sarvanīlaikye hi
samavāyagrahaṇe pratyekaikanīlagrahaṇaṃ syāt . tataśca yathātra sandrāvāt sarvanīlaikatā
ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? adagdhasya dāhājñānavat, yathā adagdhasya dāhānubhavajñānaṃ tadākārajñānotpattihetvabhāvānnāsti tathā nīlavijñānasambandhī na bhavati tatsantāna iti . evaṃ nīlarūpatatsañcayayoranyataraviṣaya-
tveṣṭau doṣā uktāḥ .
idānīṃ pratyekaṃ ta eva samuditā ityubhayaikaviṣayatve doṣaṃ vaktukāmaḥ pakṣāntaraṃ grāhayati --nīlaṃ
ca sañcayaṃ ca pratyekasamuditakāraṇatvādvijñāsyatīti cet, syānmatam--ta eva hi nīlaparamāṇavaḥ
pratyekaṃ śibikodvāhanyāyena samuditāśca kāraṇaṃ na caikaikaḥ, na ca samudāyastadvyatirikto'stītyubhayakāraṇatvaṃ jñānasya, tasmājjñānotpattihetvabhāvāsiddhiriti . etanna, yugapajjñānāsambhavāt, dvayorarthayoryugapadekajñānābhāvādekaikasmiṃścārthe yugapajjñānayorabhāvādbhavataḥ . yathoktam—
vijānāti na vijñānamekamarthadvayaṃ yathā .ekamarthaṃ vijānāti na vijñānadvayaṃ tathā ॥ catuḥśa॰ 268 iti .
syānmatam--hastena anekabadarāmalakādyarthagrahaṇavat syāditi . etaccāyuktam, jñānasya kriyāvaidharmyāt .
jñānaṃ ca pratyakṣamucyate, kalpanāyā jñānāvyabhicārāt, pratyakṣaṃ kalpanāpoḍhaṃ yajjñānamarthe rūpādau
nyāyapra॰ iti vacanāt . evaṃ rūparūpasamudāyayornānātve doṣaḥ .
yadyapi syāt tayorekajñānatvādekajñeyatvam, ekaṃ jñānamanayorityekajñāne, tayorekajñānatvāt
ekameva jñeyaṃ tadbhāva ekajñeyatvaṃ dāhānubhavavat, tasminnekajñeyatve itaretaratve anyonyātmāpannatve sati
sarvasarvātmavāditā . katham ? samudāyānarthāntaratvād rūpaṃ samudāya eva samudāyasvarūpavat, samudāyo
vā rūpameva rūpānarthāntaratvād rūpasvarūpavat . evaṃ rasādi-ghaṭādi-rūpādisamudāyāntarābhimatārthānāmanarthāntaratvāt sarvasarvātmakatvavāditā . tasmāt sarvaparamāṇunīlānāṃ sañcayānarthāntaratvādaikye sati samavāya-
grahaṇe yuvatikeśapāśasamudāye gṛhyamāṇe, hiśabdo yasmādarthe, yasmāt sarvanīlaikyaṃ tasmādekameva nīlaṃ
rūpamekakeśagataṃ gṛhyeta, ekamekaṃ prati pratyekaikanīlagrahaṇaṃ syāt, ekanīlavālagrahaṇe'pi ca sarvanīlakeśapāśagrahaṇamekanīlātmakatvāt samudāyasya . tataśca yathātra sandrāvāt sarvanīlaikatā, guṇasandrāvo
dravyam, nārthāntaram, sandrutya sarvanīlaguṇā ekatāmāpannāḥ, tathā rūpādipañcakasyāpi rūparasagandhasparśaśabdapañcakasyāpi sandrāvādekatā syāt iti vartate . kasmāddhetoḥ ? guṇatvāt, dharmatvādityarthaḥ, na
hi vaiśeṣikavad dravyaguṇabhedo'stīti kṛtvā . dṛṣṭānto nīlaikatvavat, yathā sarvanīlānāṃ guṇatvāddharmatvā

tathā rūpādipañcakasyāpi, guṇatvāt, nīlaikatvavat . tataśca guṇasandrāvadravyatvāt
sarvathā pṛthivyādīnām, teṣāmapi rūpādiparamārthatvāt sarvasarvātmakatvam .
ayaṃ tu sandrāvātiśayo māyeyīyaḥ, sañcitālambanābhyupagamād rūpādiparamāṇūnāṃ sañcitānāmasañcitānāṃ prāganabhyupagamāt . āgama evoktaṃ hi vaḥ--saṅghātā
eva saṅghātān spṛśanti, sāvayavatvāt   . tatra parasparasparśanirūpaṇe sarvātma-
dekatvaṃ tathā rūparasādyekatvam . tataśca sandrāvasiddhau guṇānāṃ rūpādyaikye sati ko doṣaḥ ? ucyate —
guṇasandrāvadravyatvāt guṇānāṃ sandrutimātrameva yasmāddravyaṃ tasmāt sarvathā pṛthivyādīnāṃ pṛthivyaptejovāyvādīnām ekatvam iti vartate . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tadeva rūpādyekatvaṃ kāraṇam, tata āha --teṣāmapi
rūpādiparamārthatvāditi, rūpādaya eva paramārtho guṇasandrāvadravyatvāt, teṣāṃ caikyam, ataḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyughaṭapaṭasaritsamudrajyotirādeḥ sarvasya lokasya tadātmakatvādaikyaṃ prāptamiti . tadupasaṃhṛtyaivāha --sarvasarvātmakatvamiti . ataḥ sādhūcyate--sarvasarvātmavāditaiva viśeṣaikāntavādino'pyaviśeṣaikāntavādina iveti .
aviśeṣaikāntavādinamatiśete ca viśeṣaikāntavādīti tadvyācikhyāsurāha guṇasandrāvātmakadravyatvāpādanāya --ayaṃ tvityādi yāvanna sa sañcayādṛte sambhavatīti . tuśabdo viśeṣaṇārthaḥ, kiṃ viśinaṣṭi ?
rūpādīnāmaikyāpatteḥ prāk pṛthaksvarūpaistanmātraiḥ śabdādibhirāhaṅkārikairākāśādyārambhābhyupagamavādināmaviśeṣaikāntavādināṃ kadācidasañcitāḥ santyapi rūpādaya iti prakriyā, viśeṣaikāntavādināṃ tu sañcitatayaikyāpattireva kvacit pṛthagasañcitarūpādyanabhyupagamāt sarvasarvātmakavādātiśaya iti viśinaṣṭi vyākhyātārthaṃ
sandrāvātiśayo'yaṃ māyeyīyaḥ sañcitālambanābhyupagamādrūpādiparamāṇūnāmiti grantham . tatsañcayatvakāraṇapradarśanārthamāha --sañcitānāmasañcitānāṃ prāganabhyupagamāt, prāgasañcitāḥ paramāṇurūpādayaḥ
paścāt sañcitya ālambanībhūtā iti nābhyupagamyate yasmād māyāsūnavīyaiḥ . avaśyaṃ caitadevaṃ bhavadbhirabhyupagatametaditi tadarthopapradarśanārtham āgama evoktaṃ hi vaḥ . hiśabdo yasmādarthe, yasmāduktaṃ hi vaḥ siddhānte,
kimuktam ? saṅghātā eva saṅghātān spṛśanti sāvayavatvādityuktam . kiṃ paramāṇavaḥ parasparaṃ
spṛśanti ? na spṛśanti ? spṛśanto'pi kiṃ deśena deśaṃ spṛśanti ? sarvaṃ vā ? saṅghātaṃ vā ? saṅghātā
vā saṅghātān spṛśanto deśena vā deśaṃ sarvaṃ vā spṛśanti ?   iti paripraśnopakramaṃ tatra
parasparasparśanirūpaṇe ityādi, sarvātmasparśanāsparśanayordoṣāpādanena nirddhāritam --saṅghātāḥ saṅghātān
deśena spṛśanti deśameva   iti . yadi paramāṇuḥ paramāṇuṃ spṛśed deśābhāvāt sarvātmanā
spṛśet, tataśca sa tatpraveśena piṇḍo'ṇumātrakaḥ syāt sapratighatvahānaṃ cāsya syāt . tathā saṅghāto'pīti

sparśanāsparśanayoḥ piṇḍāṇumātrakatvasapratighatvābhāvādidoṣāpatterdeśasparśa evopāttaḥ . na sa sañcayādṛte sambhavati .
yattūktaṃ no nīlamiti etadevaikaṃ saṃvadati, kadācidapi nīlaparamāṇvākāraniyatajñānotpattihetvabhāvāt, samudāyasyānīlatvāt . bhedatattvābhimatapratyekasamudāyaparigrahe'pi teṣāmitaretaranīlatvenānīlatvādatadrūpatvājjātyākārādinā ananyatva-
sarvātmanā sparśābhāvaḥ . asparśane'pi sapratighatvābhāvaḥ . paramāṇuṣu cāvidyamānaḥ pratighātaḥ sikatāsvivāsat tailaṃ tatsaṅghāte'pi na syāt, sa ca dṛṣṭaḥ saṅghāte, tasmānnāstyasparśanaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ saṅghātānāṃ
ca . tasmāt saṅghātā eva saṅghātān deśena spṛśanti . ādigrahaṇād gatipratibandhābhāvadoṣasteṣāṃ syāt,
tataśca saṅghātābhāvādālambanābhāvaḥ syādityādidoṣāpatteḥ deśasparśa evopāttaḥ . so'pi ca sparśo
na ca sañcayādṛte sa sambhavati kathañciditi sādhūcyate--sandrāvātiśayo māyeyīya iti . evaṃ nīlaṃ
vijānāti iti vākyārtho'pi na ghaṭata ityuktam .
etattu tasminnabhidharme pratyakṣalakṣaṇodāharaṇavākye saṃvadatyarthataḥ . kenārthena katamat ? yattūktaṃ
no nīlamiti vijānāti iti vartate . a-mā-no-nāḥ pratiṣedhe, nīlaṃ na vijānāti iti etadevaikaṃ
saṃvadati nānyat kiñcit . kiṃ kāraṇam ? kadācidapi nīlaparamāṇvākāraniyatajñānotpattihetvabhāvāt . ye tāvat paramāṇavo nīlā ucyante teṣāṃ kadācidapi nīlākāre niyatasya jñānasyotpattau hetutvaṃ
na bhūtaṃ na bhavati na bhaviṣyati cātīndriyatvāt, ato'sau tvadabhimatacakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī na kadācinnīlaṃ
vijānātīti suniścitopapattikaṃ vacaḥ . syānmatam--sañcayasyendriyaviṣayatvānnīlātmakatvācca tasya
nīlaṃ vijānātīti, etaccāyuktam, samudāyasyānīlatvāt . yadi samudāye saṃvṛtisati nīlatvaṃ syāt 
syādetadevam, na punarabhāvasya nīlatāstīti na vijānāti nīlam ityetadevātra subhāṣitamiti .
syānmatam--na vijānīyānnīlaṃ yadyekaikaṃ paramāṇumatīndriyaṃ paśyatīti brūyāt tatsamudāyaṃ vā khapuṣpasthānīyamiti, kiṃ tarhi ? tāneva paramāṇūn pratyekaṃ bhinnān saṃhatān sarṣapapracayavadekasthān paśyatīti .
etaccāyuktam, bhedatattvābhimatetyādi . bhedā eva tattvaṃ bhedatattvam, tadbhāvastattvam, bhedatattvam
ityabhimatāḥ pratyekaṃ ta eva samudāyaḥ, na samudāyaprādhānyam, kiṃ tarhi ? bhedapradhāna eva samudāyaḥ
pratyekasamudāyaḥ saḥ, tatparigrahe'pi bhedasvarūpaparasparaviśiṣṭasamudāyaparigrahe'pi, śibikodvāhakanyāyena pratyekamasāmarthye'pi tatpradhānasamudāye nīlajñānotpattihetusāmarthyamastvityetasminnapi ca pakṣe parigṛhyamāṇe nīlābhāvānna nīlaṃ vijānāti . kasmāt ? teṣāmitaretaranīlatvenānīlatvāt . tāni nīlatvāni
