pratiparamāṇu bhinnāni svāśrayaparamāṇuto'nyatra na vartante, svarasotpattibhaṅgavattvādarthāntarāsambandhācca bhāvānām .
tasmāditarasya nīlatvamitaratra nāsti, tasyāpi nīlatvamitaratra nāsti . kiṃ kāraṇam ? atadrūpatvāt,

karasyānupapatteratyantavyāvṛttārthatvāddravyasadrūpatvād grahaṇābhāvānna nīlaṃ vijānāti .
ata eva pratyakṣavidhividhāyakavākyasyaiṣo'rtha āpadyate--cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī
sañcitālambanaḥ santānaḥ sañcayaṃ saṃvṛtisantaṃ nīlaṃ vijānāti, tasyāsataścakṣuṣā
tadeva rūpaṃ tadrūpam, na tadrūpamatadrūpam, tadbhāvo'tadrūpatvam, tasmādatadrūpatvāt . na hi tannīlamitaranīlarūpaṃ bhavati . yadi bhavet tadeva tat syāt, tadrūpatvāt, tadvat; na tu bhavati . athavā tadrūpamasya tadrūpam,
na tadrūpamasya rūpamityatadrūpam . kena rūpeṇa ? jātyākārādinā, na hi tannīlamitaranīlarūpaṃ jātyā nīlatvalakṣaṇayā sāmānyabhūtayā ākāreṇa vā saṃsthānaviśeṣeṇa vṛttaparimaṇḍalādinā, jātirūpeṇākārarūpeṇa vā
yat syādananyatvakaraṃ tayornīlayoḥ paramāṇvostasya tvanmatena kasyacidanupapatteratadrūpatvam . ato na nīlaṃ
nīlāntararūpeṇāsti, tadvannīlāntaramapi tadrūpeṇa nāsti . ādigrahaṇāt prathamakṣaṇadṛśyaṃ dvitīyakṣaṇadṛśyarūpaṃ
na bhavati, tadapītararūpaṃ na bhavatīti . deśato'pi deśāntaradṛśyaṃ deśāntaradṛśyarūpaṃ na bhavati . ato'nanyatvakarasyānupapatteratadrūpatvam . ananyatvakarasyānupapattiratyantavyāvṛttārthatvāt . artha iti paramārthasan nīlaparamāṇureva, te ca paramāṇavo'tyantamitaretaravyāvṛttāsādhāraṇarūpāḥ . kasmāt ? dravyasadrūpatvāt,
dravyasato hyetad rūpaṃ yadanyanirapekṣaviviktasvarūpatvam, tatra yathā tad rasarūpeṇa gandharūpeṇa vā nāsti
dravyasadrūpatvāt tathā nīlāntararūpeṇāpi nāsti . tadapi ca dravyasadrūpamāṇīṣādyabhāve rathābhāvavat nīlāntararūpābhāvavadvā tadabhāve'pi na bhavatyeva, nīlatvaśūnyatvādvā nīlāntaranīlavat . tadapi paranīlaṃ tadvadanīlam . ataḥ katarat tannīlaṃ syādyadvijñāyeta cakṣuṣā cakṣurvijñānasamaṅginā ? iti grahaṇābhāvānna
nīlaṃ vijānāti cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī . ananyatvakarasya jātyāderabhāvādeva vā rūpamiti vā rasa iti
vātyantabhinnānāṃ paramāṇūnāmabhedena dravyasatāṃ grahaṇābhāvānna nīlaṃ vijānāti . itaretarābhāvaparamārthatvādvoktanyāyenaiva na nīlaṃ nīlāntaraṃ cāsti rūparasādivadananyarūpamiti na nīlaṃ vijānāti ityetadeva
saṃvadatīti sūktamiti .
ata evetyādi . ata ityanantaranirdiṣṭanīlārthacakṣurvijñānasamaṅganābhāvāt, evetyavadhāraṇe, vakṣyamāṇavākyārthāpattiḥ, pratyakṣavidheḥ pratyakṣajanmano vidhāyakasya vākyasyaiṣo'rtha āpadyate, no tu nīlamiti ityatra itiśabdasya prakārārthavācitvādevaṃprakāro vākyārtha āpadyata iti . katamasya vākyasyeti
sphuṭīkaraṇārthaṃ prastutameva pratyakṣalakṣaṇodāharaṇavākyaṃ pratyuccārya pradarśayati --cakṣurvijñāna ityādi tadeva .
cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī sañcitālambanaḥ pūrvoktaḥ santānaḥ cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī sañcitamālambanamasyeti
sañcitālambanaḥ sañcayaṃ saṃvṛtisantaṃ nīlaṃ rūpaṃ vijānātyasadavastu nīlābhimataṃ jānāti, na sat
kiñcidityayamartho jāyate . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tasya nīlasya sañcayasya asataḥ cakṣuṣā cakṣurindriyeṇa

grahaṇāt . no tu nīlamevaṃ bhavati, paramārthasatparamāṇunīlatvāt .
bhāvanā tvasya--anarthe'rthasaṃjñī, na ca kadācit kaścidapyarthe dharmasaṃjñī . anarthe
saṃvṛtisati samudāye dravyasannīlasaṃjñī, na tvarthe'rthasaṃjñī, na tvarthe eva dravyasati
arthasaṃjñī tasyātīndriyatvāt . na ca kadācit kaścidapyarthe dharmasaṃjñī, atīndriyatvādatyantaṃ sarvakālamagrāhyatvāt . anarthe eva dharmasaṃjñī, anarthe evāsati nāmādidharmasaṃjñyapi, sañcayasya nāmādīnāṃ ca kalpanātmakatvāt kalpanāpohāsambhavāt .
grahaṇāt . no tu nīlamevaṃ bhavati, evamprakāramasadrūpaṃ nīlaṃ na bhavati, sadeva hi tannīlaṃ na jānāti
paramārthasat . kiṃ kāraṇaṃ tannīlaṃ na bhavatīti cet, paramārthasatparamāṇunīlatvāt, paramārthasanto hi
paramāṇava eva nīlā na sañcayaḥ . tasmānna nīlaṃ vijānāti cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgīti .
bhāvanā tvasyetyādi . uktopapattibalādeva tvaduktā bhāvanā na ghaṭate --arthe'rthasaṃjñī, na tvarthe dharmasaṃjñī abhi॰ pi॰ iti . kathaṃ tarhi ghaṭate ? ityatrāha --bhāvanā tvasya anarthe'rthasaṃjñī, na ca kadācit
kaścidapyarthe dharmasaṃjñīti . tadvyācaṣṭe --anarthe saṃvṛtisati samudāye . anartho hi saṃvṛtisattvāt samudāyaḥ,
tadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvāt, yathoktaṃ yasmin bhinne na tadbuddhiḥ abhi॰ ko॰ 6 . 4 iti ślokaḥ, paṅktyādivat . iti
tvanmatenaiva tasminnasallakṣaṇe samudāye dravyasannīlasaṃjñī paramārthasatparamāṇunīlasaṃjñī, teṣāmevārthatvāt .
anarthe'rthasaṃjñī ityetasmādbhāvanāvākyādarthākṣiptametallabhyate --na tvarthe'rthasaṃjñīti . tadvyācaṣṭe --na tvartha
eva dravyasati paramāṇunīle eva arthasaṃjñī bhavati . kasmāt ? tasyārthasyātīndriyatvādityetat kāraṇaṃ
puṣkalamastyasminnasmatkalpitabhāvanāvākya iti darśayati . yadyevamarthe dharmasaṃjñī bhavatu, netyucyate, na ca
kadācit kaścidapyarthe dharmasaṃjñī . kadāciditi samudāyasyaivendriyaviṣayatvāt tadgrahaṇakāle itarakāle
vā na dharmasaṃjñyapyarthe bhavitumarhati . athavā pratyakṣakāle'numānakāle vā . kiṃ kāraṇam ? atīndriyatvāt, atyantaṃ sarvakālaṃ kadācit ityasya vyākhyānam, agrāhyatvāt . kasya ? paramāṇunīlādeḥ .
tato'rthādetadapyāpannam --anartha eva dharmasaṃjñīti . tadvyācaṣṭe --anartha evāsati nāmādidharmasaṃjñyapi .
kiṃ kāraṇam ? sañcayasya nāmādīnāṃ ca kalpanātmakatvādanarthe'narthasaṃjñīti yāvat, kalpanātmake
sañcaye'narthe'narthakalpanātmakaśabdādidharmasaṃjñī . kasmāt ? kalpanāpohāsambhavāt samudāye samudāyāśrayanāmādiṣu vā, nāmajātyādiyojanā ca kalpanā, tadapohastasya jñānasya kalpitasamudāyatannāmādiviṣayasya na sambhavatyeva . tasmādasmaduktaiṣā bhāvanā ghaṭate . athavā tvadīyairevākṣaraireṣo'rtho bhāvyate --arthe'rthasaṃjñī na, arthe nīlādau paramārthasatyarthasaṃjñī na bhavatyatīndriyatvāt tasya . tuśabdo viśeṣaṇe, arthe dharmasaṃjñī na iti vartate, yastāvadartha evārthasaṃjñī na bhavatīti sa kuto'rthe dharmasaṃjñī bhavati ? iti viśeṣastuśabdāt . arthāpattyā pūrvavadanarthe'rthasaṃjñī tasminneva ca dharmasaṃjñīti .


tataḥ śūnyaśūnyapratyutpādanāvadasadviṣayatvānnirmūlakalpanāmātrasatyatā .
yaccāpyabhihitamabhidharmakośe--yadetadanekaprakārabhinnaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ tatra kadācidekena

tataḥ kiṃ jātam ? śūnyaśūnyapratyutpādanāvadasadviṣayatvaṃ doṣajātamapi tasyāḥ kalpanāyāḥ .
yathā śūnyaṃ śūnyena guṇitaṃ jātaṃ śūnyameveti yathā gaṇakānāṃ kvacit kalpanamasadviṣayaṃ śiṣyamatiparikarmārthaṃ
tathedamasadviṣayam . tataśca asadviṣayatvānnirmūlakalpanāmātrasatyatā, nirbījā samudayakalpanā taddharmakalpanā ca, nirmūle dve api kalpane, te pramāṇamasya tanmātram, tanmātrameva satyam, nānyat kiñcit
satyaṃ bhavatkalpite pratyakṣe . tasmānnirmūlakalpanāmātrasatyatvāllaukikeṣṭasatsalilādibījamṛgatṛṣṇikādikalpanābhyo'pi pāpīyasyau pratyakṣānumānakalpane yuṣmadīye .
yaccāpyabhihitamabhidharmakośe yadetadanekaprakārabhinnamityādi yāvadanekavarṇasaṃsthānaṃ paśyata

dravyeṇa cakṣurvijñānamutpādyate yadā nīlāditatprakāravyavacchedo bhavati, kadācidanekena yadā na tatprakāravyavacchedaḥ, tadyathā dūrānmaṇisamūhamanekavarṇasaṃsthānaṃ paśyataḥ . atrāpi kathamanekaprakārabhinna-
iti buddhavacanaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇānuṣaṅgāgataṃ cakṣurvijñānasamaṅginīlavijñānodāharaṇasabhāvanavākyavannopapadyate
evetyupapādayiṣyannupanyasyati . idaṃ punarbuddhavacanaṃ pramāṇam iti abhidharmakośe nidarśitaṃ tadvicāryam .
tatrānekaḥ prakāraḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ kāraḥ, ko'sau ? anyonyātulyatvam . kena prakāreṇa bhinnaṃ rūpāyatanam ?
nīlapītādiprakārabhinnam . tatra tasmin rūpāyatane'nekaprakārabhinne kadācidekena dravyeṇa cakṣurvijñānamutpādyate . kadā punarekena dravyeṇotpādyate ? yadā nīlāditatprakāravyavacchedo bhavati, nīlamevedaṃ
na pītādi, pītamevedaṃ na nīlādi ityekaprakāravyavacchedo yadā bhavati tadā cakṣurvijñānamekena dravyeṇotpādyate . kadācidanekena, kadā punaranekena ? yadā na tatprakāravyavacchedo bhavati, nīlādiprakāravyavacchedo yadā na bhavati tadā cakṣurvijñānamanekena dravyeṇotpādyate . asminnartha udāharaṇamapyāha --tadyathā
dūrānmaṇisamūhamityādi . viprakṛṣṭadeśasthitaṃ maṇīnāṃ samūhamanekavarṇasaṃsthānamanekena varṇena saṃsthānaṃ
vyavasthānamasya tamanekavarṇasaṃsthānaṃ paśyataḥ, anekavarṇamanekasaṃsthānaṃ ca paśyata iti vā . yo nīlapītādyanekavarṇo
vṛttatryasrādyanekasaṃsthāno vajrendranīlamarakatasasyakapuṣparāgapadmarāgasphaṭikādimaṇisamūho'nekaprakārabhinnastaṃ
paśyataḥ puruṣasya dūrānna vyavacchedo bhavati, ārāttu vyavacchedo bhavati--ayamindranīlo vajrādīnāmanyatamo veti .
tatra kalpanāpoḍhasvalakṣaṇaviṣayapratyakṣalakṣaṇacodyopakramaprasaṅgena yattarhīdaṃ sañcitālambanāḥ pañca
vijñānakāyāḥ abhi॰ pi॰ iti tat kathaṃ yadi tadekato na vikalpayati ? iti, yaccoktamanekaprakārabhinnaikānekadravyotpādyajñānatetyatra kalpanātmakatvaprasaṅgo'svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvaprasaṅgaśceti codite tatparihārārtham —
āyatanasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratyete svalakṣaṇaviṣayā na dravyasvalakṣaṇam abhi॰ ko॰ bhā॰ 1 . 10 iti kathaṃ
tat kalpanāpetam ? ityatra vicāraḥ kariṣyate . idameva tāvadvicārayāmo buddhavacanam--kadācidekena
dravyeṇa jñānamutpādyate kadācidanekeneti . atrāpi kathamanekaprakārabhinnasāmānyavṛttirūpāyatanatāyāṃ

sāmānyavṛttirūpāyatanatāyāṃ tadrūpāyatanaṃ paśyatastasya tadviṣayatvāt svalakṣaṇaviṣayāḥ pañcavijñānapañca vijñānakāyāḥ paṭhyante iti vaktavyam . kathaṃ ceti sañcitālambanatāyāmavibhāgasamavasthasamūhātmakatvādekaprakārāvacchedo maṇisamūhaprabhānuviddhavarṇasaṃsthānavat ?
ekasya ca dravyasya kadācidagrahaṇādekena dravyeṇa kathaṃ cakṣurvijñānamutpādyate,
rasānāsvādanarasājñānavat . ekadravyajñānotpādane tu sañcitālambanakalpanā
nirarthikaiva, tadabhyupagamavirodhaḥ .
yāvat paṭhyanta iti vaktavyam . kathaṃ vaktavyamiti sambandhaḥ . anekaprakāre bhinne sāmānye
vṛttirasya rūpāyatanasya tadanekaprakārabhinnasāmānyavṛttirūpāyatanam, tadbhāvastādṛgrūpāyatanatā, tasyāṃ satyāmanekaprakārabhinnasāmānyavṛttirūpāyatanatāyāṃ tadrūpāyatanaṃ paśyataḥ samūhātmakaṃ tadālambanatvāt tasya cakṣurvijñānasya tadviṣayatvāt sāmānyākhyasamūharūpāyatanaviṣayatvāt kathaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ tadyujyate ? tathāsarvarūpādipañcavijñānakāyā rūpāyatanatadvijñānayorudāharaṇamātratvāt kathaṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayāḥ pañca
vijñānakāyāḥ paṭhyanta iti vaktavyo'tra samādhiḥ . āyatanasya sāmānyarūpatvānna svalakṣaṇatetyarthaḥ .
kathaṃ cetītyādi yāvadekaprakārāvaccheda iti . kathamiti hetuparipraśne, caśabdo doṣasamuccaye,
kena hetunā tasyāmanekaprakārabhinnasāmānyavṛttirūpāyatanatāyām, itiśabdaḥ prakāravācī, itthaṃ nānārūpaṃ
rūpāyatanaṃ paśyataḥ sañcitālambanatāyāmavibhāgasamavasthasamūhātmakatvāt, avibhāgenaikyāpattyā
samavasthā yasya samūhasya so'yamavibhāgasamavasthasamūhaḥ, tadātmakatvādrūpāyatanasya kathamekaprakārāvacchedaḥ ?
na bhavitumarhatītyarthaḥ . kimiva ? maṇisamūhaprabhānuviddhavarṇasaṃsthānavat, yathā nānāvarṇānāṃ maṇīnāṃ
samūhe tatprabhayānuviddhe varṇasaṃsthāne nāstyekaprakārāvacchedastathaikadravyāvacchedābhāva iti .
kiñcānyat --ekasya ca dravyasya kadācidagrahaṇāt ekasya ca dravyasya paramāṇoḥ sarvadāpyatīndriyasya grahaṇābhāvādekena dravyeṇa kathaṃ cakṣurvijñānamutpādyate ? na kadācit kathañcidutpādyata ityarthaḥ .
tasmāt kadācidekena dravyeṇa jñānamutpādyate yadā nīlādiprakāravyavacchedo bhavati iti kimetadabuddhavacanaṃ buddhavacanam ? iti cintyatām . kimiva punarekasya dravyasya kadācidagrahaṇāccakṣurvijñānaṃ notpādyate
iti cet, ucyate --rasānāsvādanarasājñānavat, rasanendriyeṇānāsvādite yathā rasajñānaṃ notpadyata
evaṃ cakṣuṣā na gṛhīte cakṣurvijñānaṃ nāsti . yadi cāsya buddhavacanasya buddhavacanatvasiddhyarthamekena dravyeṇa
jñānamutpādyata ityabhyupagamyate tata ekadravyajñānotpādane tu sañcitālambanakalpanā nirarthikaiva .
yadā caivaṃ pratyekaṃ cakṣurviṣayatā aṇūnāmiṣyate tadedamaparaṃ buddhavacanamabuddhavacanaṃ nirarthakaṃ ca jāyate . katamat ?
sañcitālambanāḥ pañcavijñānapañca vijñānakāyāḥ abhi॰ pi॰ iti . etasya vā satyatve tadasatyatā sthitaiveti
parasparato vacanadvayaviṣayo'bhyupagamavirodha ityata āha --tadabhyupagamavirodhaḥ .


prakārāvacchedānavacchedānekaprakārabhinnatvajñānānyapi na syuḥ, rūpāyatanasya
sañcitagatereva, narasiṃhavat . narasiṃhānekaprakāragatirapi hi naratvasiṃhatvasañcayayoḥ
pūrvaṃ bhedena darśanāt . asañcaye tu taddravyeṣvaṇuṣu prakāragrahaṇameva nāsti, asañcitasyādarśanāt; kuta eva tadvyavacchedādi ?
anekena iti vacanāt saṃvṛtisatsāmānyāsatkalpanaviṣayāḥ pañca vijñānakāyāḥ,

kiñcānyat --prakārāvacchedetyādi yāvat sañcitagatereva . na prakāraḥ, avacchedaḥ, anavacchedaḥ, anekaprakārabhinnatvam ityetānyapi jñānāni bhavitumarhanti . kasmāt ? rūpāyatanasya sañcitagatereva, sañcitameva hi rūpāyatanaṃ gamyate nāsañcitam . ato na prakāraḥ iti jñānaṃ ghaṭate prakṛṣṭaḥ
kāraḥ prakāraḥ nīlaḥ pīta iti, ayamasmādviśiṣṭa iti parasparato'tyantabhedābhāve prakārābhāvāt, abhedagateḥ sāmānye na tu prakārajñānaṃ ghaṭate, tathāvacchedo'nyasmādanyasya bhedābhedavikalpanāt, tathānavacchedaḥ,
anekaḥ iti, anekena ca prakāreṇa bhinnaḥ iti bhinnānāmabhedagatiḥ . sañcitagaterabhedagateśca na prakārādijñānāni akalpanātmakāni svalakṣaṇaviṣayāṇi ca bhavitumarhanti . kimiva ? narasiṃhavat, yathā narasyākāro'dhastyaḥ siṃhasyākāraḥ śirobhāgaḥ, tadubhayābhedagaternarasiṃha ityucyate evaṃ prakārādijñānānyapi bhinne- 
ṣvabhedakalpanādeva syurnānyatheti . nare siṃhe ca narasiṃhāviti bhinnayorabhedagatyabhāvādadṛṣṭāntateti cet, na,
sañcayayorevābhedarūpatvāt . narasiṃhānekaprakāragatirapi hītyādi, tayorhi pratyekaṃ nara iti siṃha iti ca
bhinnayorapi prakāragatiryasmānnaratvasiṃhatvasañcayayoḥ, nīlādiparamāṇvādidravyāṇāṃ pūrvaṃ bhedena darśanādabhedakalpanātmikā bhedagatiriti yuktā, na tathā tu .
abhyupetyāpi narasiṃhaprakāragatimeva ca asañcaye tu taddravyeṣvaṇuṣvityādi . sañcitālambanāḥ
pañca vijñānakāyā iti yaduktaṃ tvayā tadvismṛtyedamuktam --yadetadanekaprakārabhinnaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ tatra kadācidekena dravyeṇa jñānamutpādyata iti . cakṣurvijñānasamaṅgī nīlaṃ vijānāti no tu nīlamiti etadapi
vismṛtyedamuktam --kadācidanekena yadā tadvyavacchedo na bhavati, tadyathā--maṇisamūhamanekavarṇasaṃsthānaṃ
paśyata iti, nīlapītādyanekarūpasya yugapadgrahaṇābhyupagame nīlaikarūpavijñānavirodhādityalaṃ prasaṅgena . prakṛta-
mucyate--dravyasatsu aṇuṣu nīlapītādiprakāragrahaṇameva nāsti tadasañcaye . kiṃ kāraṇam ? asañcitasyādarśanāt . asañcitānāmadarśanamatīndriyatvādityuktam . kuta eva tadvyavacchedādi ? sati hi darśane
tadvyavacchedānavacchedaprakārabhinnatvajñānāni sambhāvyeran, asati darśane dūrādeva tāni na syuḥ . evaṃ tāvat
ekena dravyeṇa ityayuktam .
yadapi coktam anekena dravyeṇa kadācijjñānamutpādyate iti, etasmāt anekena iti vacanāt
tasyānekadravyasya saṃvṛtisattvāt sāmānyatā, sāmānyatvādasatkalpanaṃ tat, tadviṣayāḥ pañca vijñānakāyāḥ, asatkalpanaviṣayatvādanumānatadābhāsajñānavadapratyakṣamapramāṇaṃ vā dūrānmaṇisamūhadarśanavadveti

na svalakṣaṇaviṣayāḥ, ekavijñānānekaviṣayatāpi .
yadapi ca buddhenoktam--dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpattirbhavati . katamad dvayaṃ pratītya ? cakṣuḥ
pratītya rūpāṇi cotpadyate cakṣurvijñānam . śrotraṃ pratītya śabdāṃścotpadyate śrotravijñānam . ghrāṇaṃ pratītya
gandhāṃścotpadyate ghrāṇavijñānam . jihvāṃ pratītya rasāṃścotpadyate jihvāvijñānam . kāyaṃ pratītya spraṣṭavyāṃścotpadyate kāyavijñānam . manaḥ pratītya dharmāṃścotpadyate manovijñānam   . atrāpi yadi
vyaktyapekṣo nirdeśaḥ sañcayavacanāya tato'yameva doṣaḥ . atha dravyoktaye tata
ihābhyupagamavirodhaḥ . buddhyāderapi caindriyakatvam, atīndriyatvāt, rūpavat .
yaścātra virodhaḥ sa tulyaḥ paramāṇvaindriyakatvena . atīndriyatvādanumānavirodhaḥ .
na svalakṣaṇaviṣayāḥ prasaktāḥ . na ca kevalamasvalakṣaṇaviṣayataiva doṣaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? ekavijñānānekaviṣayatāpi dūradarśanavadeveti .
buddhavacanāsamañjasatvapratipādanaprasaṅgenedamapyupanyastam --yadapi ca buddhenoktamityādi yāvad
dharmāṃścotpadyate manovijñānamiti . yadyanekena dravyeṇa jñānamutpādyate, sākṣād buddhenoktaṃ yadapi ca dvayaṃ
pratītyetyādi virudhyata ityabhisambandhaḥ . ādhyātmikamāyatanaṃ bāhyaṃ ca dvayaṃ pratītya vijñānasyotpattirbhavati ityuktvā svayameva punaḥ pratipṛcchaya vyākaroti --katamaddvayaṃ pratītya ? cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca
pratītya ityādi vibhajya vācyaṃ gatārthameva tat . dvayaṣaṭkād vijñānaṣaṭkamutpadyata iti pūrvapakṣaḥ . tathā cāha--


vijānāti na vijñānamekamarthadvayaṃ yathā .
ekamarthaṃ vijānāti na vijñānadvayaṃ tathā ॥ catuḥśa॰ 268 iti .

atrottaramāha --atrāpi cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca pratītya cakṣurvijñānasyotpattirbhavati iti dvayī
gatirbahuvacananirdeśasya--sañcayāpekṣayātīndriyāṇāmapi rūpāṇāṃ vyaktipadārthāśrayaḥ syāt ? jātyākhyāyāmekasmin bahuvacanamanyatarasyām pā॰ 1 . 2 . 958 iti jātipadārthāśrayo vā ? tatra yadi vyaktyapekṣo
nirdeśaḥ sañcayavacanāya tato'yameva saṃvṛtisatsāmānyāsatkalpanaviṣayāḥ pañca vijñānakāyā na
svalakṣaṇaviṣayā iti doṣaḥ . atha dravyoktaye tajjātīyāḥ paramāṇava ekarūpanirdeśena sarve nirdeṣṭavyā
ityekasmin bahuvacanaṃ tata ihābhyupagamavirodhaḥ, abhyupagataṃ tvayā atīndriyāḥ paramāṇavaḥ iti, tena
virodhaḥ . asmiṃścābhyupagame'nyadapyaniṣṭāpādanamucyate --buddhyāderapi caindriyakatvam, atīndriyatvāt,
rūpavaditi . buddhisukhaduḥkhecchādveṣavedanādayo dharmāścākṣuṣāḥ syurbhavatparikalpitāḥ, atīndriyatvāt, rūpavat . rūpaṃ vā na cakṣurgrāhyaṃ syāt, atīndriyatvāt, buddhyādivat . brūyāstvam--nanvatīndriyatvaṃ cakṣurgrāhyatvaṃ ca parasparato virudhyete iti . tanmā maṃsthāḥ, bhavato'niṣṭāpādanaparatvād bhavadbuddhinivartanaphalatvāccāsya
prayogasyeti . athāpi yaścātra virodhaḥ sambhāvyeta sa tulyaḥ paramāṇvaindriyakatvena, paramo'ṇuḥ paramāṇuḥ,

uktabhāvanāvat svavacanavirodho'pi .
vādaparameśvarasaṃśrayaścaivam . na ca nastena saha virodhaḥ, tasya lokanāthatvāt .
sa hi vilupyamānasya lokatattvasya trātātrātā sarvavādabhedayāthārthyaparipālanāt . kathaṃ saṃśraya iti cet, anekātmakarūpāyatanābhyupagamāt .
aṇuśabdaḥ sūkṣmaparyāyaḥ, paramaśabdastadatiśayavācī, sa cātīndriyatve ghaṭate, tasyātīndriyasyaindriyakatvaṃ cākṣuṣatvaṃ yathā viruddhamevamidamapi buddhyādyaindriyakatvaṃ tulyamiti samānadoṣatayā virodhodbhāvanamastu ko doṣaḥ ?
kiñcānyat, cakṣuḥ pratītya rūpāṇi ca pratītya cakṣurvijñānamutpadyate iti cātīndriyatvādanumāna- 
virodhaḥ, sthūlānāṃ sūkṣmapūrvakatvāt kāryānumānasiddhāḥ paramāṇavaḥ, tasmānnityānumeyānāṃ teṣāṃ cakṣurviṣayatvābhyupagame vacanayoranumānavirodhitā . kiñcānyat --uktabhāvanāvat svavacanavirodho'pi, uktā
bhāvanā uktabhāvanā, tadvaduktabhāvanāvat, anayaiva paramāṇuratīndriyatvāccākṣuṣaścetyanumānavirodhabhāvanayoktayā
tulyatvāt atīndriyābhimataḥ paramāṇuścakṣurviṣayatāmāyāti iti bruvataḥ svavacanavirodho'pi .
vādaparameśvarasaṃśrayaścaivam . evaṃ ca bhavata ekāntavādinastattyāgenānekāntavādāśrayaḥ . vādāḥ
sarva eva lokaṃ svasātkartuṃ samarthatvāllokasya īśate ekāntā api . teṣāṃ tu sarveṣāmanekāntavādaḥ parameśvarastadvaśavartināmīṣṭe . teṣāṃ svārthonnayanasamarthānāmapi parasparavirodhadoṣavatāmudāsīnamadhyamanṛpativat
sandhyādiṣāṅguṇyānyatamaguṇāśrayiṇāṃ vijigīṣūṇāṃ parārpaṇalakṣaṇasaṃśrayaguṇādhāraḥ parameśvaraḥ syādvādaḥ,
tatsaṃśrayeṇaiva svavṛttilābhāt tadasaṃśraye parasparakāryavilopāt svayaṃ vināśācca teṣām . laukiko vyavahāranaya
āha --na ca nastena saha virodhaḥ . kasmāt ? tasya lokanāthatvāt . loko hi vyavahāranayastadvaśavartitvena tanmatavilokanāt, tasya lokasya nāthata iti lokanāthaḥ syādvādaḥ . kasmāt ? sa hi ito'muto
vilupyamānasyaikāntavādibhirlokatattvasya lokasārasya samyagdarśanaratnasya trātā trāṇaśīlastrāṇadharmā
sādhu trāṇakārī veti . kathaṃ trāteti cet, sarvavādabhedetyādi, lokabhūtānāṃ sarvavādānāṃ bhedāḥ sarvavādabhedā
nityānityādyekāntāḥ, teṣāṃ yāthārthyāni yathārthabhāvāḥ svaviṣayasamarthanāni, teṣāṃ lokasaṃvādenopagrāhayitṛ-
tvāt parasparasāmyāvasthāpanena paripālanāt trātetyucyate .
itara āha --kathaṃ saṃśraya iti cet . astu tāvadvādaparameśvaratvaṃ lokatrāṇāt syādvādasya lokatrāṇaṃ
ca parasparāvirodhopapādanenaikīkaraṇācca teṣām, vādaparameśvarasamāśrayaḥ kathamekāntavādānām ? ityatrocyate—
anekātmakarūpāyatanābhyupagamāt . aneka ātmā yasya tadidamanekātmakaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ yat tadekena

atra caikarūpāyatanādhāratayā tatraśabdena anantaranidiṣṭameva rūpāyatanamuktaṃ
tasyaivobhayarūpatā punardarśitā . evaṃ ca tasyaivaikānekatā, tathā'vibhaktatattvena jñānotpatteḥ . tataśca syādekaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ syādanekaṃ rūpāyatanam, uktahetuvat .
dravyeṇa kadācijjñānamutpādayati kadācidanekeneti tadvyavacchedāvyavacchedābhyāmiti, tadabhyupagamāt syādvādasamāśrayaḥ . syādvādaikadeśāśca nayā ekāntavādāḥ, yathoktam --bhaddaṃ micchaddaṃsaṇa sanmati॰ 3 . 59 gāhā .
naitāḥ svamanīṣikāḥ, lakṣaṇamapi tathaiva nayānām, uktaṃ hi --dravyasyānekātmakatve'nyatamātmakaikāntaparigraho nayaḥ svaprādhānyenārthanayanānnayaḥ  , sa ca mithyādṛṣṭiranekākārārthasya viparītapratipattitvāt, anekātmakavastupratipattitvāt syādvādasya yāthārthyam . kathaṃ punarlokabhūtena vyavahāranayenaikāntavādino
nigṛhyanta iti cet, lokanāthasamāśritatvāt teṣāṃ lokanāthapakṣasamāśraya eva prativādipakṣābhyupagamaḥ, sa
nigrahasthānamekāntavādināmabhyupagamasamakālamevāvasito vāda iti .
atra caikarūpāyatanādhāratayetyādi . tvayāpi syādvādyabhyupagatānekātmakavastvekānekatvānekāntavādo'bhyupagata eva, yasmādanekaprakārabhinnamityādi yāvadanekavarṇasaṃsthānaṃ paśyata ityatra ca vākye ekameva
rūpāyatanaṃ jñānādhāra itīṣṭam, yasmāt tadādhāratayā punaḥ tatra ityadhikaraṇavācipratyayāntena tatraśabdenānantaranirdiṣṭameva rūpāyatanamuktamavyatirekamabhedaṃ tasya vastuna āgṛhyoktam . tasyaivobhayarūpatā
punardarśitā kadācidekena dravyeṇa kadācidanekena jñānamutpādyate iti bruvatā . rūpāyatanasyaivaikānekasaṅkhyānirdeśyatvamanabhyupagacchatā kathaṃ tatraśabdasāmānādhikaraṇyamāpādayituṃ śakyate ? yadi tadekamanekaṃ ca
na syāt, tathā itarathā tatra ca rūpāyatane'nyatra veti syāt, na tu bhavati .
tasmādevaṃ cetyādi . evaṃ coktavidhinā tasya tvayaivoktasya rūpāyatanasyaikasyaivaikatānekatā ca
atastvayaivoktā . kasmāt ? tathā'vibhaktetyādi . tena prakāreṇa tathā, avibhaktaṃ tattvaṃ tadbhāvastattvaṃ
yasya tadidamavibhaktatattvam, tadbhāvastattvamekānekatvādyavibhaktavastutattvam, tena tathā'vibhaktatattvena
jñānotpatteriti hetuḥ . kasmin sādhye ? tasyaivaikānekatāyām . dṛśyate hi tadeva rūpāyatanamekamanekaṃ ca
paramāṇavastatsamūhaśceti jñānotpattiḥ . dūrānmaṇisamūhamanekavarṇasaṃsthānaṃ paśyata ityudāharaṇamapyevamevaikānekarūpadravyarūpāyatanatve sādhye cakṣurvijñānādhārasya vastunaḥ sādharmyadṛṣṭāntatvaṃ bhajate, na ekāntaikānekarūpatve . tataścāvaśyameṣo'rtha āpadyate --syādekaṃ rūpāyatanaṃ syādanekaṃ rūpāyatanamiti . kasmāt ?
snigdharūkṣatvābhyāṃ bandhaikyapariṇāmāpattestatsamūhagrāhyatvādekam, dravyārthāvasthānāt paramāṇūnāṃ svarūpabhinnānāṃ bhedādanekam . tata eva dravyam, rūpādiguṇaparyāyapariṇāmāpatteradravyam . pratisvamasādhāraṇarūpādipariṇāmāpekṣayā svalakṣaṇaviṣayam . sādhāraṇībhūtabhedasamūhāpekṣacākṣuṣatvādipariṇāmāpatteḥ sāmānyaviṣayam,

nanu kadācicchabdaḥ kālāntaravacanaḥ, na, ekakāla evobhayarūpatvāt syāt
tat tat syānna tat tat, grahaṇāpadeśaviśiṣṭārthatvāt, anekavarṇamaṇirūpavadekapuruṣapitṛputratvādivadvā .
ato'napekṣitasvābhyupagamamanekāntadūṣaṇamāpadyate . avibhāvitaivamarthyapūrvā-
yathoktam --bhedasaṅghātābhyāṃ cākṣuṣāḥ tattvārtha॰ 5 . 28 iti . uktahetuvaditi, tathā'vibhaktatattvajñānotpatterbhedābhedātmakajñānotpattivadetadapi vastu bhedābhedātmakamiti .
itara āha --nanu kadācicchabdaḥ kālāntaravacanaḥ . tasminneva hi vastuni kadācit kālāntare
jñānamekākāramutpadyate kadācidanekākāram, jñānasyaivākāravattvānnirākārabāhyavastupakṣe iti . atrocyate—
tanna, ekakāla evobhayarūpatvāt . ekasminneva hi kāle nīlaparamāṇusamūhākārajñānasya bhedābhedātmakatvaṃ
dṛṣṭam, ato na samyaguktam--kadācicchabdaḥ kālāntaravacanaḥ, tasmādekākāraṃ kadācit kadācidanekākāraṃ
jñānamutpadyate tasminneva vastuni iti . tasmāccaikakāla evobhayarūpatvāt syāt tat tat, tadeva tadvastu
paramāṇudravyasamūhābhedāt . syānna tat tat, rūpādipariṇāmabhedāt . hetvantaramapyatrocyate --grahaṇāpadeśaviśiṣṭārthatvāt, grahaṇaṃ jñānam, jñānamevāpadeśo hetuḥ, tena hetunā viśiṣṭo grahaṇāpadeśaviśiṣṭaścāsāvarthaśca, tadbhāvo grahaṇāpadeśaviśiṣṭārthatvam . yasmāccakṣurvijñānāddhetorviśiṣṭo'rtho rūpaṃ samudāyasamudāyyātmakaṃ
gṛhyate tasmādanekātmakaṃ tadvastu . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? anekavarṇamaṇirūpavat, eka eva vā maṇirmecakasphaṭikādyanyatamastadrūpavat, nānāvarṇānāṃ vā maṇīnāṃ samūhasya rūpavat . yathā tad grahaṇāpadeśaviśiṣṭaṃ jñānapari-
cchinnaṃ vibhinnarūpaṃ tathā cakṣurviṣayābhimataṃ vastu . ekapuruṣapitṛputrādivadveti grahaṇāpadeśaviśiṣṭatvasādharmyadṛṣṭāntāntaram . yathaikaḥ puruṣo'nekasambandhijanāpekṣayā pitā putro bhāgineyo mātulaḥ ityevamādivyapadeśyatvaṃ bhajate na cāsya virodha-saṅkarā-'navasthāprasaṅgadoṣā grahaṇāpadeśaviśiṣṭārthatvādevaṃ cakṣurvijñānavijñeyaṃ
vastu pratipattavyam .
ato'napekṣitetyādi . ata eva kāraṇād ye'tra codayanti parasparaviruddhānāṃ kathamekatra sambhavaḥ
  iti, teṣāṃ tadanapekṣitasvābhyupagamamanekāntadūṣaṇamāpadyate, svo'bhyupagamaḥ svābhyupagamaḥ,
sa nāpekṣito yasmin dūṣaṇe tadanapekṣitasvābhyupagamamanekāntadūṣaṇam . tadyathā--sarvaṃ sarvātmakamaviśiṣṭaṃ
pratijñāya pariṇāmabhedavyākhyānaṃ cānapekṣyānekāntadūṣaṇam, deśakālakṛtātyantaviśiṣṭatvaṃ pratijñāya santānāviśeṣavyākhyānaṃ cānapekṣyānekāntadūṣaṇam, asatkāryotpattiṃ pratijñāya tulyajātīyadravyaguṇāntarārambhaniyamavyākhyānaṃ cānapekṣyānekāntadūṣaṇaṃ ca . kasmāddhetoḥ ? avibhāvitaivamarthyapūrvābhyupagamatvāttvekāntavādinām . uktānekāntasvarūpo'rtha evamarthaḥ, tadbhāva aivamarthyam, avibhāvitamaivamarthyaṃ pūrvābhyupagamaśca yaista 

bhyupagamatvāttvekāntavādināṃ na viśeṣadoṣaḥ kasyacidapi .
āyatanasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratyete svalakṣaṇaviṣayāḥ, na dravyasvalakṣaṇaṃ prati abhi॰ ko॰ bhā॰ 1 . 10
ityetattu prāk coditameva doṣaṃ pratiṣṭhāpitavānasi . yattu samastālambanaṃ vijñānaṃ sāmānyaviṣayaṃ prāpnoti, na svalakṣaṇaviṣayam ityetat pratiṣṭhāpitameva kṛtam . eṣa tu viśeṣadoṣaḥ
--ajñānatvaprasaṅgaḥ sphuṭatarakaḥ... ... ...kutaḥ pratyakṣatvam ?
yo'pi caikākāraparikalpanāt pratyakṣasya kalpanātmakatvaprasaṅgo'svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvaprasaṅgaśca sañcitālambanatāyāmiti codite samādhirabhidhīyate'svalakṣaṇatvadoṣaparihāraḥ—
anekārthajanyatvāt svārthe sāmānyagocaram .
anekadravyotpādyatvāt tat svāyatane sāmānyagocaram ityucyate, na tu bhinneṣvabhedakalpanāt
pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 1 . 4 teṣu pṛthak pṛthaggrahaṇābhāvāt . yathā hi śamīśākhāpatreṣu sarva-
ime'vibhāvitaivamarthyapūrvābhyupagamā ekāntavādinaḥ, tadbhāvādavibhāvitaivamarthyapūrvābhyupagamatvādunmugdhabhrāntamattādivadanapekṣitasvābhyupagamamanekāntadūṣaṇam . tasmāt kasya vayaṃ viśeṣya ayameva unmugdho bhrānta unmatto
vā iti doṣaṃ brūmaḥ ? sarva eva yūyamevaṃ doṣaduṣṭāḥ, kiṃ tapasvinā viśeṣaikāntavādinaivāparāddhaṃ vādaparameśvaraparirakṣyalokatattvavilopanodyaminā ? ityata āha --na viśeṣadoṣaḥ kasyacidapīti prāgabhihitam .
sambandhāgatakalpanātmakatvāpādanacodyadūṣaṇamanuktvā tadabhyupagamena parihāroktiḥ āyatanasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratyete svalakṣaṇaviṣayā na dravyasvalakṣaṇaṃ prati ityetattu vyākhyānaṃ prāguccārya coditameva
doṣaṃ calayitvā pratiṣṭhāpitavānasi sthirīkṛtavānasītyarthaḥ . yattu samastālambanamityādi yāvadityetat pratiṣṭhāpitameva kṛtamiti . eṣa tu viśeṣaḥ kalpanātmakatvadoṣādanyo doṣaḥ . katamaḥ ? ajñānatvaprasaṅgaḥ . tadyathā --sphuṭataraka ityādi yāvat kutaḥ pratyakṣatvamityetadupadarśitamiti gatārtham .
yo'pi caikākāretyādi codyapratyuccāraṇametad yāvat sañcitālambanatāyām . etaduktaṃ bhavati—
yadi tadekato na vikalpayati kathaṃ sañcitālambanatā ? kalpanānāntarīyikā hi sā kalpanāmantareṇa na
sambhavatīti codite tatrottaro vakṣyamāṇo yaḥ samādhirabhidhīyate sa eva ca kila asvalakṣaṇatvadoṣaparihāro'bhimato'rthadvayavācitvāvirodhādasya vākyasyeti tat pratyuccārayati savyākhyānam --anekārthajanyatvāt svārthe sāmānyagocaramityādi yāvat teṣu pṛthak pṛthaggrahaṇābhāvāditi gatārtham . piṇḍārthastu—
yadyapi paramāṇusamūhajanyatvānna jñānamarthataḥ sāmānyagocaraṃ tathāpi rūpaṃ raso vā svārtho'nyāpṛktatvādarthāntarakalpane tasya jñānasyāpaṭutvāt, tacca vijñānamutpādayituṃ śibikodvāhavat saṃhatya samarthāḥ paramāṇavo nānyatheti sāmānyagocaratāstu, ko doṣaḥ . yadi tad bhinneṣvabhedaṃ kalpayadutpadyeta syāt kalpanā

patrālambanaṃ jñānamavivekenotpadyate, na ca saṅghātaḥ kaścideko'sti teṣāmanārabdhalakṣaṇakāryatvāt, evamaṇuṣvapi . ayamasamādhireva, aṅgīkṛtārthavināśitvāt,
śabdakṛtakatvābhivyaktisthāpanārthapravṛttavaiśeṣikavat svaviṣayatāṃ pratijñāya tadatadabhūtasāmānyagocaropasaṃhārāt . nanvata eva na tat pratyakṣam, svārthe sāmānyagocaratvāt, anumānavat . anumānamapi vā na .
tmakam, na tu bhinneṣvabhedaikākāraparikalpanāt tadutpadyate iti . asyārthasya dṛṣṭāntaḥ --yathā hi śamīśākhāpatreṣvityādi . yathā sarvapatrālambanaṃ jñānamantādimadhyāvivekenotpadyate evaṃ pratyakṣamapi . syānmatam—
tadvyatirekeṇa patre samudāye ca yathā jñānaṃ pratyakṣamapi tathā syāditi . etaccāyuktam --na ca saṅghātaḥ
kaścideko'sti, teṣāmanārabdhalakṣaṇakāryatvāt . na hi samudāyo vaiśeṣikakalpitakāryadravyavat
pṛthagasti . nāpi pariṇāmāntaramāpannam, teṣāṃ kāraṇabhūtānāṃ kṣaṇikatvādārambhaniṣṭhākālabhedāvasthānābhāvāditi . evamaṇuṣvapīti dārṣṭāntikaṃ nidarśayati .
atrottaramucyate --ayamasamādhireva . kutaḥ ? arthasyāsya jaratkuṭīravadāroṭanākṣamatvāt tvadvākyajanitasya prākcoditadoṣasyāyaṃ samādhirapyasamādhireva, aṅgīkṛtārthavināśitvāt, śabdakṛtakatvābhivyaktisthāpanārthapravṛttavaiśeṣikavat . vaiśeṣikasyeva vaiśeṣikavat, acākṣuṣapratyakṣasya guṇasya
sato'pavargaḥ karmabhiḥ sādharmyam, sato liṅgābhāvātvai॰ sū॰ 2 . 2 . 25--26 kāryatvāt ityādibhiranityatvaṃ vaiśeṣikatvāt siddhaṃ kṛtakatvaṃ ca, tasyābhivyaktisthāpanārthaṃ pravṛttasya vaiśeṣikasyevāṅgīkṛtārthanāśitvamevam anekārthajanyatvāt svārthe sāmānyagocaram ityarthavacanayordoṣaḥ . tadvyācaṣṭe, kutastatsādharmya- 
miti cet, ucyate --svaviṣayatāṃ pratijñāya tadatadviṣayatayā tadatadabhūtasāmānyagocaropasaṃhārāt . sa cāsaśca viṣayo'sya sa tadatadviṣayaḥ, tadbhāvastadatadviṣayatā . tadatadabhūtaṃ sāmānyam, tad
gocaro'sya viṣaya upasaṃhārasya, tasmādupasaṃhārāt . sa cānyaśca viṣayaḥ sāmānyasyeti tadanyataratraiva na
pravartate ekataratrādṛṣṭatvāt, tvanmatenaiva pratisvaṃ niyatatvādbhāvānāṃ naikarūpamapi tanna ca tatra vṛttaṃ na cāto'nyatra .
tatrāvṛttatvāt tanna bhavati, atatrāvṛttatvādatanna bhavati . tatastadatadabhūtaṃ sāmānyaṃ gocaro'syopasaṃhārasya yaḥ
sa tadatadviṣayatayā tvayedānīṃ kriyate . tasmāt tadatadviṣayatayā tadatadabhūtasāmānyagocaropasaṃhārādaṅgīkṛtapratyakṣavināśa ityata āha --nanvata eva na tat pratyakṣaṃ svārthe sāmānyagocaratvādanumānavat . svārthe
iti svaviṣaye svagrāhye vastuni, yat svagrāhye vastuni sāmānyagocaraṃ tajjñānamapratyakṣaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathānumānamiti . anumānamapi vā neti, nānumānamapi tat syāt, svārthe sāmānyagocaratvāt, pratyakṣavat .


svavacanavirodhi kumārabrahmacāripitṛvacanavaccaitat asvārthaviśiṣṭe svārthe
svaviṣaye rūpādiprakāre sāmānyagocaram iti, yasmādarthaviṣayaśabdau lakṣaṇārthāveva, uktaṃ hi tvayaiva--pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca pramāṇe . yasmāllakṣaṇadvayaṃ prameyam . na hi
svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhyāmanyat prameyamasti . svalaṇakṣaviṣayaniyataṃ pratyakṣam, sāmānyalakṣaṇaviṣaya-

svārthe sāmānyagocaram ityetat svavacanavirodhi . kimiva ? kumārabrahmacāripitṛvacanavaccaitat, yathā kaścid brūyāt pitā me kumārabrahmacārī iti, tasya tadvacanaṃ svata eva virudhyate--yadi pitā
kathaṃ kumārabrahmacārī ? atha kumārabrahmacārī kathaṃ pitā ? iti, tathedamapi yadi tajjñānaṃ svārthe kathaṃ
sāmānyagocaram ? atha sāmānyagocaraṃ kathaṃ tat svārthe ? svārtha iti ca tvayā na cakṣuṣo'nyasya vendriyasya
viṣaya iti viśeṣamāśritya lakṣaṇamabhidhīyate, kiṃ tarhi ? prameyamucyate sāmānyato vastu svalakṣaṇaṃ svārthaḥ
iti . tathā sāmānyalakṣaṇamiti na dhūmānumeyāgnimātram, kiṃ tarhi ? liṅgagamyaṃ sarvam . etasyārthasya
pratipādanārthamāha svārthalakṣaṇameva nirūpayan --asvārthaviśiṣṭe, svo'rthaḥ svārthaḥ, na svārtho'svārthaḥ
svārthādanyaḥ, tato viśiṣṭaḥ svārthaḥ, tasmin svārthe, tamevārthaṃ paryāyeṇāha --svaviṣaye, kimuktaṃ bhavati ?
ekasmin rūpādiprakāre prakṛṣṭe kāre rūpe rase'nyasminneva sāmānyagocaramiti, sāmānyaviṣayaṃ ca
svārthe jñānamiti ca vispardhitametat parasparato dvayam . yasmādarthaviṣayaśabdau lakṣaṇārthāveva lakṣaṇaśabdaparyāyavācinau tasmāt svārthaḥ svaviṣayaḥ svalakṣaṇamityetadvivakṣitaṃ bhavataḥ, tadvismṛtya bhrāntena nendriyagrāhyasvārthasāmānyabhedakalpanāt parihāro yujyate vaktum . kasmāt ? pratyakṣavyākhyāviṣayatvāt svārthasvalakṣaṇasvaviṣayaśabdānām .
mā maṃsthāḥ--naitadevaṃ bhavatīti, uktaṃ hi pramāṇasaṅkhyānirūpaṇe tvayaiva--pratyakṣamanumānañca pramāṇe
ityādi . pramāṇadvitvaṃ niyamyate, prameyadvitvāt, parimeyadvitvaniyataprasthatulādiparimāṇadvitvavat . taddarśayati —
yasmāllakṣaṇadvayaṃ prameyam . syānmatam--prameyāntaraṃ svasāmānyadvirūpalakṣaṇam, tadapekṣayā pramāṇāntaraṃ
syāditi . tannivāraṇārthamāha --na hi svasāmānyalakṣaṇābhyāmanyat prameyamasti, pratyakṣānumānābhyāmagrahaṇāt, kharaviṣāṇavat . syānmatam--tatraiva viṣayadvaye vikalpasamuccayāṅgāṅgibhāvaiḥ pratyakṣānumānāgamādīnāṃ pramāṇānāṃ vṛttirbhaviṣyatīti, tanna bhavati, yasmāt svalakṣaṇaviṣayaniyataṃ pratyakṣaṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaviṣayaniyatamanumānamityuktam . kathaṃ punarlakṣaṇaśabdo'rthaparyāyaḥ ? aryate gamyata ityarthaḥ . tathā
lakṣyata iti lakṣaṇaṃ karmasādhanatvāllakṣaṇaśabdasya . tacca lakṣaṇaṃ vastu svabhāvaḥ svarūpamarthaḥ prameyamiti paryāyāḥ .
tat punardvirūpaṃ paricchedyaṃ dvābhyāṃ pramāṇābhyāṃ paricchedyatvāt, pramāṇaṃ paricchedakaṃ prameyaṃ paricchedyamityarthaḥ .

niyatamanumānam pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 1 . 2 . prameyādhigamanimittaṃ hi pramāṇam . na caitadadṛṣṭārtham .
na ca pramāṇayorviṣayasaṅkara ityadhigamyasya dvitvāt tadadhigamanimittaṃ dvirūpamityevaṃ
vyavasthāpite sāmānyagocaravyāvṛttārthena svārthena bhavitavyam . tataḥ svārthe sāmānyagocaram ityetad virudhyate .
sāmānye svaviṣaye pratyakṣaṃ jñānamutpadyate iti cet, sāmānyameva
svaviṣayaḥ, svalakṣaṇaṃ nāsti . ato lakṣaṇadvayābhāvāt prameyapramāṇadvitvāvadhāraṇakalpanā vyarthā, pramāṇayorvā viṣayasaṅkaraḥ prāptaḥ . pratyakṣamapi vānumānabheda eva
syāt, anekārthajanitasāmānyagocararūpādiprakāraparigrahāt, dhūmabalākāliṅga-
yasmālloke dṛṣṭaṃ prameyādhigamanimittaṃ pramāṇam, hiśabdasya hetvarthatvāt, prameyādhigamanimittaṃ hi pramāṇamiti . na caitat agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ, dānaṃ dadyāddharmakāmaḥ   ityevamādyāgamavadadṛṣṭārtham, pratyakṣadṛṣṭārthamevaitadupalambhakatvādupalabhyasya dvividhasya dṛṣṭatvāt . na ca pramāṇayorviṣayasaṅkara
iti prāguktayuktikāṃ viviktaviṣayatāṃ darśayati . itiśabdaḥ pradarśane, etāvānatra saṅkṣepeṇārthaḥ, tadvistaro'paro grantha iti sūcayati .
idānīṃ vyavasthāpitārthopasaṃhārārthamidaṃ vākyamāha --adhigamyasya dvitvāt tadadhigamanimittaṃ
dvirūpamityevaṃ vyavasthāpite lakṣaṇaśabdo'rthaparyāyavācī nendriyagrāhyaviśeṣārthaprakṛta ityetasmiṃścārthe sthite
pratyakṣānumānayoḥ svarūpābhāvaḥ svavacanavirodhaśca doṣāḥ svārthe sāmānyagocaram iti bruvataḥ proktavidhineti
sthitam . punaścātra doṣaḥ--evamavasthite sāmānyagocaravyāvṛttārthena svārthena bhavitavyam . tataḥ
ko doṣaḥ ? svārthe sāmānyagocaram ityetadvirudhyate, na hi tādṛśaḥ svārthasya sāmānyatāsambandho'sti, nāpi sāmānyasya svārthasambandha iti .
mā bhūdeṣa doṣa iti tasminneva sāmānye svaviṣaye svārthe pratyakṣaṃ jñānamutpadyata iti cet,
tata evaṃ sāmānyameva svaviṣayaḥ, svalakṣaṇaṃ nāsti . ataḥ paribhāṣitāsādhāraṇasvalakṣaṇaviṣayābhāvādevaṃ
kalpyamāne lakṣaṇadvayaṃ nāsti, ekameva sāmānyalakṣaṇam, dvayābhāvāt tadviṣayamekamevānumānaṃ pramāṇaṃ
syāt . tataśca prameyapramāṇadvitvāvadhāraṇakalpanā vyarthā, mā bhūdavadhāraṇavaiyarthyamiti, svārthe sāmānye
ca pratyakṣaṃ pravṛttaṃ tathānumānaṃ ceti pramāṇayorvā viṣayasaṅkaraḥ prāptaḥ . vāśabdādekasya jñānasya dvyarthatā
vā . pratyakṣamapi vā paraparikalpitamanumānabheda eva syāt . kasmāddhetoḥ ? anekārthajanitasāmānyagocararūpādiprakāraparigrahāt . mā jñāsīdasiddho'yaṃ heturiti, tvayaivoktaṃ hi—
tatrānekārthajanyatvāt svārthe sāmānyagocaram . pra॰ samu॰ 1 . 4 iti .
anekena bhinnenārthena abhinnamekaṃ sāmānyaṃ rūpaṃ rasa ityādiprakāraṃ parigṛhyotpadyamānaṃ jñānaṃ tena
janitaṃ tat, tasmādanekārthajanitasāmānyagocararūpādiprakāraparigrahāt tasya jñānasya . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? dhūma-

janitajñānavat . asvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvaṃ cobhayatra .
anekaikatvāpattisāmānyagocarasvalakṣaṇa evāsāvartha iti cet, na, ārātparāntamadhyavarṇapramāṇasaṃsthānaviviktavṛttyavasthapatraviśeṣasvalakṣaṇaviṣayasāmānyānātmasāmānyātmakatvāt . na ca saṅghātaḥ kaścidasti, teṣāmanārabdhalakṣaṇakāryatvāt . evamaṇuṣvapi,
balākāliṅgajanitajñānavat, dhūmādatrāgniḥ, balākābhyo'tra jalam iti liṅgajanitayoragnijalajñānayorapi
svarūpato'numānatvābhedaḥ, evaṃ rūpādiṣūtpadyamānānāṃ pratyakṣābhimatānāmanumānatvābhedaḥ . etasmādeva hetorasvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvaṃ ca, asvalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣam, anekārthajanitasāmānyagocararūpādiprakāraparigrahāt,
anumānavat . ubhayatretyanena anumāne'pyasvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvam, tata eva hetoḥ, anantarabhāvitapratyakṣavat .
athavā ubhayatreti svalakṣaṇe sāmānyalakṣaṇe cāsvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvam . katham ? svalakṣaṇābhimatamasvalakṣaṇam,
anekaikībhāvāt, samudāyavat . tatsāmānyamapi na svalakṣaṇam, ata eva, anantaroktasamudāyavat . sāmānyāsvalakṣaṇatvaṃ siddhaṃ sādhyata iti cet, na, svārtha eva sāmānyagocaram iti vacanāt svārthatvenābhyupagatatvāditi . avaśyaṃ caitadevamabhyupagantavyam, yataḥ śamīśākhāpatrasaṅghātāviśeṣadarśanodāharaṇena ca sphuṭameva darśitamapratyakṣatvamananumānatvamapramāṇatvamasvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvaṃ viṣayasaṅkara ityevamādi doṣajātam .
anekaikatvāpattisāmānyagocarasvalakṣaṇa evāsāvartha iti cet . syānmatam--anekasyaikatvāpattiḥ sāmānyam, sa eva gocaro'syeti anekaikatvāpattisāmānyagocaraḥ, sa eva svalakṣaṇaḥ sāmānyagocara eva svalakṣaṇaḥ, asāvevārthaḥ pratyakṣasyetyeṣā bhavata āśaṃsā cet, na, ārātparāntamadhyetyādi
yāvat svalakṣaṇaviṣayasāmānyātmakatvāt . naitadupapadyate, pūrvaparādiparasparaviviktāvasthapatraviṣayasāmānyātmakatvāt . ārādantaḥ, parāntaḥ, madhyaḥ, nīlaprakarṣādirvarṇaḥ, hrasvadīrghālpamahattvādi pramāṇam,
vṛttādi saṃsthānaṃ ca, tairviviktā vṛttayo'vasthāśca yeṣāṃ patraviśeṣāṇāṃ te tairviviktavṛttyavasthapatraviśeṣāḥ,
ta eva svalakṣaṇāḥ, te viṣayo'sya sāmānyasya tat svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ sāmānyamātmā svarūpamasya, tadbhāvaḥ
sāmānyātmakatvam, tasmāt sāmānyātmakatvāt . etaduktaṃ bhavati--deśākṛtivarṇapramāṇasaṃsthānādibhiratyantaviśiṣṭānāṃ svalakṣaṇānāmeva sāmānyātmakatvam, nānyat sāmānyamasti, ato'nupapannam--anekaikāpattisāmānyagocarasvalakṣaṇa evārtha iti . nanūktamanekaikāpattisāmānyagocaramiti, tanna, yasmād na ca
saṅghātaḥ kaścidasti . caśabdānnāvayavī, na ca pariṇāmāntaraṃ tadvyatiriktaṃ tvanmatena . kasmāddhetoḥ ?

na hi tadanekadravyotpādyam . na ca sañcayaḥ kaścidasti, ata eva na pratyayasyālambanaṃ
yujyate, anālambanatvāccābhāsārtho'pi na tatrāsti vandhyāputraputratvānābhāsanavat .
svābhāsāṃ hi vijñaptiṃ janayadālambanaṃ yujyate . asvatvāttvasya adravyatvāt
kuta ābhāsavijñāpanam ? sve tu paramāṇavo nābhāsamutpādayitumalam, atīndriyatvāt . iti pratyakṣajñānaṃ notpadyate, nirālambanatvāt, khapuṣpavat .
teṣāṃ patrāṇāmanārabdhalakṣaṇakāryatvāt . na hi patraviśeṣairārabdhaṃ kiñcit kāryāntaramasti, ta eva
hyanārabdhalakṣaṇāḥ patraviśeṣāḥ sañcitya kāryībhūtāḥ, tasmānna teṣvanyat sāmānyamasti . evamaṇuṣvapi,
paramāṇuṣvapi tathā na kiñcit sāmānyamasti . tasmānna svārthe sāmānyagocaraṃ tajjñānamiti .
yadapi coktam --anekadravyotpādyatvāt tat svāyatane sāmānyagocaramityucyate na tu bhinneṣvabhedakalpanāt pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 1 . 4 iti, sā tvadiṣṭā sāmānyagocaratāpi ca na ghaṭate, yasmānna
tadanekadravyotpādyam . kutastarhyutpadyate ? sañcayāt . na ca sañcayaḥ sāmānyam, tato na ca sa
rūpādibhyo bhedena kaścidasti rūpādisañcayaḥ . ata eva na pratyayasyālambanaṃ yujyate, pratyayo jñānam .
kiṃ kāraṇam ? abhūtatvād vandhyāputravat . syādāśaṅkā--svābhāsajñānotpatterālambanaṃ bhaviṣyati samudāyo'kāraṇatve satyapīti . etat kutaḥ ? akāraṇatvādevālambanatvābhāve kā pratyāśā ābhāsārthasya ? ityata āha —
anālambanatvācca ābhāsārtho'pi na tatrāsti . kimiva ? vandhyāputraputratvānābhāsanavat .
yathā hyasattvādanālambanaṃ vandhyāputro'nālambanatvāccānābhāsastathā sañcaya iti .
svābhāsāṃ hītyādi . viṣayo hi nāma yasya jñānena svabhāvo'vadhāryate ālambanaparīkṣāvṛ॰ 1
iti tvaduktopapattirevātra vyāpāryate . tat punaḥ kutaḥ ? asvatvādanātmakatvāt . yastvātmanā svabhāvenāsiddhaḥ sa viṣayaḥ syājjñānasyeti kā yuktiḥ ? asvatvāttvasyādravyatvāt paramārthasattvābhāvāt kuta
ābhāsavijñāpanaṃ paravācoyuktyā, vijñāpanaṃ vijñaptirbuddhiriti paryāyāḥ, dūrata eva nāstītyarthaḥ . evaṃ
tarhi sve tu paramāṇava ātmānaḥ te viṣayatāṃ yāntu, netyucyate, te nābhāsamutpādayitumalamatīndriyatvāt . atīndriyatvaṃ nirābhāsatvād viyadvaditi . itiśabda upasaṃhāre, itītthamanālambanatvaṃ
sañcayasyāṇūnāṃ ca siddhaṃ pratyakṣajñānasya, tasmāt pratyakṣajñānaṃ notpadyate, nirālambanatvāt, svapuṣpavat . ataḥ pratyakṣasya nirālambanasya khapuṣpavadanutpatteruktopapattividhinā kalpanāpoḍhasya saviṣayasya
pratyakṣasya jñānasya vā'bhāve pratipādite svavacanavyapekṣākṣepadustaravirodhaprastuteśca kalpanāpoḍhaṃ pratyakṣam
ityetallakṣaṇamanarthakaṃ syāt, lakṣyasyābhāvāt, kharaviṣāṇakuṇṭhatīkṣṇādinirṇayavat .


abhyupete'pi tu sañcitālambanapratyayatve naivāsya pratyakṣatā, tadābhāsatvāt
kalpanātmakatvād bhrāntijñānātmakatvāt saṃjñāsaṃsthānasaṅkhyāvarṇānyathākalpanāt,
mṛgatṛṣṇikāpratyayavadalātacakrapratyayavad dvicandrapratyayavat kāmalopahatacakṣuṣo
nīlarūpapītapratyayavat . ata idaṃ naiva pratyakṣam, atathābhūtārthādhyāropātmakatvāt,
bhrāntivat saṃvṛtisajjñānavat, yathā gopāla... ... ...tathā saṃvṛtisati... ... ....
yathoktam--

yasmin bhinne na tadbuddhiranyāpohe dhiyā ca tat .
ghaṭāmbuvat saṃvṛtisat paramārthasadanyathā ॥ abhi॰ ko॰ 6 . 4


abhyupete'pi tu viṣaye doṣaḥ . sa cābhyupagamyamāno'pi viṣayaḥ sañcaya eva sambhāvyeta, na paramāṇavo'tīndriyatvāt . sa cālambanapratyayo jñānasya sañcayaḥ, tasminnabhyupete'pi tu sañcitālambanapratyayatve naivāsya pratyakṣatā sidhyati tvanmatenaiva, tadābhāsatvāt . tadābhāsatvaṃ kalpanātmakatvāt,
uktā ca kalpanātmakatā . tadubhayamapi bhrāntijñānātmakatvāt . bhrāntiḥ saṃjñāsaṃsthānasaṅkhyāvarṇānyathākalpanāt, saṃjñā ca saṃsthānaṃ ca saṅkhyā ca varṇaśca, teṣāṃ tairvānyathākalpanāt . anyathāpratipattirevātra kalpanābhimatā . saṃjñāsaṃsthānasaṅkhyāvarṇānāmanyathāpratipattermṛgatṛṣṇikāpratyayavadalātacakrapratyayavad dvicandrapratyayavat kāmalopahatacakṣuṣo nīlarūpapītapratyayavaditi yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dṛṣṭāntāḥ
yathākramaṃ ca hetavo bhrāntijñānātmakatve sādhye tataśca pratyakṣatvābhāve sādhye . tatsamarthanārtha uttaro
granthaḥ . tadarthamupasaṃhṛtyānte sādhanam --ata idaṃ naiva pratyakṣam, atathābhūtārthādhyāropātmakatvāt,
bhrāntivat, nāvārūḍhasya tīravṛkṣadhāvanadarśanātmikāmekāṃ kriyābhrāntiṃ muktvā proktacaturvidhabhrāntivat .
upanayastu vyavahāraprasiddhasya paramāṇunīlatvagrahaṇasya sarvatrātathābhūtārthapratipattisādharmyāt . athavā tata eva
hetoḥ saṃvṛtisajjñānavadapratyakṣam . tadvyākhyā --yathā gopāletyādinā dṛṣṭāntaṃ samarthya tathā saṃvṛtisatītyādinā dārṣṭāntikasamarthanam .
saṃvṛtisallakṣaṇe jñāpakamāha --yasmin bhinne ślokaḥ . yasmin ghaṭe bhinne kapālaśakalaśarkarādibhāvena ghaṭābhimatādvastuno'nyeṣvapyapoḍheṣu kapālādiṣu na ghaṭabuddhirasti, tadagrahe tadbuddhyabhāvāt, aṅgulya

rajjvāṃ sarpa iti jñānaṃ rajjudṛṣṭāvanarthakam .tadaṃśadṛṣṭau tatrāpi sarpavad rajjuvibhramaḥ ॥ hastavālapra॰ 1
yaccoktam--āyatanasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratyete svalakṣaṇaviṣayā na dravyasvalakṣaṇaṃ prati iti tat
kathamiti cet,
tatrānekārthajanyatvāt svārthe sāmānyagocaram .
anekadravyotpādyatvāt tat svāyatane sāmānyagocaramityucyate, na tu bhinneṣvabhedaikākāraparikalpanāt
pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 1 . 4 . atrāpyanekārthaviṣayaikapratyayatvāt sāmānyarūpatvādasvalakṣaṇaviṣaya-
bhāve muṣṭibuddhivat . ato'ṅgulivyatirekeṇa mṛṣṭyabhāvavat kapālādivyatirekeṇa ghaṭābhāva iti saṃvṛtisan
ghaṭaḥ . evaṃ kriyāsambhave kriyayā apohe . yatrāpi kriyayā'poho na sambhavati tatrāpi dhiyā'pohe'nyeṣāṃ
rūpādīnāṃ ghaṭasya samudāyād na tadbuddhirasti . rūpādisamudāyasya ca paramāṇurūpādyapohe na tadbuddhirasti
iti vartate, dṛṣṭāntaḥ --ambuvat, ekasminnapi jalabindau jalabuddhidarśanāt, rūpādiṣu punarbuddhyāpoḍheṣu na 
toyabuddhirastītyetat saṃvṛtisato lakṣaṇam . athavā yasmin ghaṭe bhinne'vayavaśo na tadbuddhirbhavati tad ghaṭavat saṃvṛtisat . yatra cāmbubuddhyā'rthāntarāpohe na tadbuddhirarthāntaranivṛttirūpasya vastunaḥ svarūpābhāvādagnivāyvādinivṛttimātraṃ vyavahāraprasiddhāmbuvat tadapi saṃvṛtisat . paramārthasadanyathā, etadviparītalakṣaṇaṃ
svata eva viviktarūpaṃ yadvidyate rūpaṃ rasa ityādi tat paramārthasat pratyakṣagocaramiti .
etadapi paramārthasadityabhimataṃ saṃvṛtisallakṣaṇānativṛtterasadeva, yathoktavidhinā saṃvṛtisadeva sarvamapītyatrāpi jñāpakodāharaṇaṃ tatsaṃvādyabhihitam --rajjvāṃ sarpa iti jñānam, tāvadeva rajjvāṃ sarpa iti viparyayajñānaṃ bhavati yāvadaspandādiviśeṣaliṅgādarśanam . viśeṣatastu tadavadhāraṇadṛṣṭau satyāṃ prāktanaṃ sarpadarśanaṃ
jāyate'narthakam . sāpi rajjubuddhistadavayave dṛṣṭau satyāṃ yathā sarpa iti jñānamanarthakaṃ tathānarthikā, tata
āha --tadaṃśadṛṣṭau tatrāpi sarpavad rajjuvibhrama iti . evamanayā kalpanayā sarvapiṇḍajñānānāṃ saṃvṛtisadviṣayataiveti sādhūktam--apratyakṣaṃ nīlādiviṣayaṃ cakṣurādivijñānaṃ śākyaputrīyaṃ bhrāntivaditi . evaṃ
tāvat kalpanāpoḍhapratyakṣalakṣaṇasañcitālambanapañcavijñānakāyagranthavirodhodbhāvanacodyopakramāyātaparihārārthasyānekārthajanyasvārthasāmānyagocaravākyasya saprasaṅgo doṣo'bhihitaḥ .
adhunā yadetadanekaprakārabhinnarūpetyādigranthacodyadvārāyātakalpanātmakaparihārārthaṃ yaccoktam
āyatanasvalakṣaṇaṃ pratyete svalakṣaṇaviṣayā na dravyasvalakṣaṇaṃ prati iti tat kathamityetatpari-
hārārthasya tasya vākyasya doṣaṃ vaktukāmaḥ parapakṣameva tāvat pratyuccārayan vyācaṣṭe sūriṣṭīkākāralikhitaṃ
likhan yāvadekākāraparikalpanāditi gatārtham . uttaraṃ tu atrāpi, apiśabdāt pūrvasminnarthavikalpe
vyākhyātā doṣāste'trāpi sambhavanti . kathamiti cet, anekārthaviṣayaikapratyayatvāt, aneko'rthaḥ
paramāṇavaḥ, tadviṣaya eka iti pratyayaḥ so'nekārthaviṣayaikapratyayaḥ, tadbhāvādanekārthaviṣayaikapratyayatvāt .

tvāt . pratyakṣasyāpratyakṣatvasādhane ca dve leśenonnīte tvayaiva--tvadabhimatapratyakṣamapratyakṣamanekārthajanyatvādanumānavat . anumānamapi hi pakṣadharmādyanekārthajanyam .
jñāpakaḥ sa heturiti cet, kārakādapi anekasmādarthājjāyate sādhyasādhanadharmānvayaikāntavataḥ .
na, asañcitānekārthajanyatvādanumāne . nanu dhūmādirapi sañcaya eva gṛhīto'-
teṣu paramāṇuṣu pratyekamatīndriyeṣu samuditeṣvasamuditeṣu vā pratyayābhāvāt tatsamūhe'nekārthaviṣayaḥ sa
evaikaḥ pratyayaḥ, samūhālambanatadābhāsajñānotpattyabhyupagamāt . arthabhedaviṣayajñānābhyupagame ca vijānāti
na vijñānam catuḥśa॰ 268 ityādi virudhyeta . tasmādekaḥ pratyayo'nekārthaviṣaya ekārtharūpaḥ .
tata eva sāmānyarūpastadatadviṣayatayā tadatadabhūtasāmānyagocaraḥ . tataśca asvalakṣaṇaviṣayaḥ, ta eva
hi paramāṇavaḥ svalakṣaṇaṃ na tatsamūhaḥ sāmānyatvāt . ata eva saṃvṛtisaṃśca saḥ . tasmādasvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt kalpanātmako nirdeśyaścetyevamādyasmābhiḥ prāk prakrāntaṃ tat sutarāmaśeṣaṃ tvayaiva bhāvitam
anekārthajanyatvāt svārthe sāmānyagocaram pra॰ samu॰ 1 . 4 iti parihāraṃ bruvatā .
kiñcānyat, bhavadabhimatapratyakṣasyāpratyakṣatvasādhane ca dve leśenonnīte tvayaiva, mā bhūt svābhyupagamadoṣavyaktiriti kuśalajanatarkagamye, na sphuṭe . katame dve ? anekārthajanyatvāt svārthe sāmānyagocaratvāditi caite dve . tatra tāvat prathamaṃ sādhanam --tvadabhimatapratyakṣamapratyakṣam, anekārthajanyatvāt,
anumānavat . dṛṣṭānte'numāne'nekārthajanyatvamasiddhamiti mā maṃsthāḥ, yasmādanumānamapi pakṣadharmādyanekārthajanyam, pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣānugamo vipakṣavyāvṛttirityanekārthena janyate'gnyanityādyanumānajñānaṃ tathedamapi pratyakṣamanekaparamāṇvarthajanyamiti . jñāpakaḥ sa heturiti cet . syānmatam--anumāne pakṣadharmādiraneko'pyartho dhūmakṛtakatvādiragnyanityādijñānasya na kārakaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? pūrvaprasiddhamevāvinābhāvinaṃ
sambandhaṃ smārayatīti jñāpakaḥ sa hetuḥ, itarastu pratyakṣajñānasya kārako'rthaḥ, tasmādvaidharmyādadṛṣṭānta iti .
etaccāyuktam, atrāpi tulyatvāt, kārakādapītyādi, anumānamapi iti vartate, anumānamapi svārthaṃ
kārakādanekasmādarthājjāyate . katamasmāt ? sādhyasādhanadharmānvayaikāntavataḥ pakṣadharmasapakṣānugamavipakṣavyāvṛttimata aikāntikāt, agnimān pradeśo dhūmavattvāccullīmūlavat, anityaḥ śabdaḥ kṛtakatvād
ghaṭavat, na nadīvannākāśavat iti kārakahetutaivānumāne'pi tadarthasya .
itara āha --na, asañcitānekārthajanyatvādanumāne . naitat sādharmyamupapadyate, kasmāt ?
asañcitānekārthajanyatvādanumānasya sañcitānekārthajanyatvācca pratyakṣasya . deśakālabhinnasannihitāsannihitārthaviṣayaṃ hyanumānam, tadviparītaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamiti . atrocyate --nanu dhūmādirapi sañcaya eva gṛhīto'-

gnyādimaṇūniva gamayati .
hetupratyayo'sau, anadhipatipratyayaḥ kalpanāyā iti cet, kārakādapyanekasmādarthājjāyate sādhyasādhanadharmānvayaikāntavataḥ .
atha kathamasāvanadhipatiḥ ? indriyāviṣayatvāt . nanu sañcayahetupratyayo'pyanadhipatirindriyāviṣayatvāt . tathā svārthe sāmānyagocaratvādanumānavadapratyakṣam .
anumānaṃ vā pratyakṣaṃ syāt, anekārthajanyatvāt svārthe sāmānyagocaratvāt, pratyakṣavat . dvayamapyetadekameva, ekalakṣaṇatvāt .
gnyādimaṇūniva gamayati . nanviti prasiddhānujñāpane, nanu dhūmo'gnimattvaviśiṣṭapradeśadharmaścaturbhūtasaṅghāto'nvayavyatirekasahito'gnimattvavijñānaṃ pradeśe janayatyaṇusamudaya iva rūpavijñānam, gamayatyagniṃ
tajjñānaṃ janayatīti jñānotpattau kārakatvāvyabhicārādubhayatreti .
hetupratyaya ityādi . syānmatam--hetuḥ pratyayo nimittamanālambanamityarthaḥ, asau dhūmo'numāne
nimittam . anadhipatipratyayaḥ, kalpanāyā hetoḥ, nirvikalpaṃ hi jñānamadhipatipratyayaṃ pratyakṣam, na
tathānumānam, ato vaidharmyānna dṛṣṭānta iti cet, evaṃ cenmanyase .
atra pareṇaivottaraṃ vācayitukāma āha --atha kathamityādi . idamasi tvaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ --kathamasāvanadhipatirdhūma iti, anālambanamityarthaḥ . itara āha --indriyāviṣayatvāddhetupratyeyasyārthasyāgnyādilakṣaṇasya .
ācārya āha --nanu sañcayahetupratyayo'pyanadhipatirindriyāviṣayatvāt . paramāṇusañcaya eva pratyakṣe'pyanadhipatiḥ, tasmādeva hetorindriyāviṣayatvāt, sañcayasya paramāṇuvyatiriktasyāsattvāditi vistareṇa
prāgabhihitametat . tasmāt sarvathā tulyamubhayaṃ kārakatveneti . tathā svārthe sāmānyagocaratvādanumānavadapratyakṣamityetasmin sādhane kārakahetutvapratipādanārthaḥ prapañcastulya ityatidiśati .
anumānaṃ vetyādi . vāśabdo vikalpārthaḥ, yadi pratipāditamidaṃ yuktivaśāt pratyakṣasya tvadabhimatasyānumānatvaṃ mayā tat tvayā svagrāharaktamanasā svasamayaprasiddhyanupātinā neṣyate pratyakṣatvameveṣyate tatastasmāt sādharmyādanumānaṃ vā pratyakṣaṃ syādanekārthajanyatvāt svārthe sāmānyagocaratvādityetābhyāmeva
hetubhyāṃ pratyakṣavadityete api dve sādhane leśenonnīte, na sphuṭamiti .
kiñcānyat, etasmādeva hetudvayādviṣayaikyāpatteḥ pramāṇaikyamityata āha --dvayamapyetadekameva, eka-
lakṣaṇatvāt . svasāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ hyekameva vastu viṣayo'sya pramāṇadvayasyetyuktavidhinā prasaktatvāt pratyakṣamevaikaṃ pramāṇaṃ tadubhayaṃ syāt, anekārthajanyasāmānyaikagocaratvāt, cakṣurādidvārajanmapratyakṣabhedapratyakṣatvavat .
anumānameva vā syāt, tata eva kāraṇāt, dhūmakṛtakatvādyanumitāgnyanityādijñānānumānavat .


anekārthajanyatvācca svārthasāmānyagocaratāyāṃ yadābhāsaṃ teṣu jñānamutpadyate
tathā ta ālambanam, pratyekaṃ paramāṇurūpasya buddhāvasanniveśāt samudayakṛtatannirbhāsatayālambanamiti prāptam . evaṃ ca sati arthasannikarṣādakṣaṃ prati yadutpadyate tajjñānaṃ

idānīṃ vasubandhoḥ svaguroḥ tato'rthād vijñānaṃ pratyakṣam vādavi॰ iti bruvato yaduttaramabhihitaṃ paraguṇamatsarāviṣṭacetasā tattvaparīkṣāyāṃ paramodāsīnacetasā tu yena kenacidabhiprāyeṇa svamataṃ
darśitameva dinnena vasubandhupratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ dūṣayatā, tasya punarartho yo'stu so'stu kiṃ no'nena ? idameva
tāvadastu --rūpādiṣvālambanārtho vaktavyaḥ pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 1 . 15 iti vikalpya vikalpadvaye doṣajātaṃ
tallakṣaṇe prakrāntaṃ tat tavāpi samānamiti pratipādayiṣyan nayacakrakāraḥ saviśeṣaṃ tanmatavirodhahetuṃ
svavacanajanitamāha --anekārthajanyatvācca svārthasāmānyagocaratāyāmityādi, śiṣyācāryayostulyottaratvāt . svārtha iti nīlādiḥ, sa eva kila sāmānyamanekārthajanyatvāt, aneko'rthaḥ paramāṇavaḥ tajjanyaṃ
nīlaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣamata indriyasya svārtha ityetasyāmanekārthajanyatvācca svārthasāmānyagocaratāyāṃ yadābhāsaṃ teṣu
jñānamutpadyate tathā ta ālambanaṃ rūpādaya iti nīlapītāditvena yathaivābhāsante tathaivālambanamityetadiṣṭam . kiṃ kāraṇaṃ ta eva nīlādiparamāṇavo nālambanamiti cet, ucyate --pratyekaṃ paramāṇurūpasya
buddhāvasanniveśāt, ekamekaṃ prati pratyekaṃ paramāṇūnāṃ yannīlādirūpaṃ tasyātīndriyatvādbuddhau na
sanniveśaḥ, tasmāt kiṃ prāptam ? samudayakṛtatannirbhāsatayālambanamityetat prāptam, nīlādirūpasya
tatsamudāyātmakatvāt .
evaṃ ca sati paramāṇusañcayanīlādinirbhāsatayālambanatve sati pratyakṣārtha evaṃ jāyate, tadyathā —
arthasannikarṣādakṣaṃ prati yadutpadyate tajjñānaṃ pratyakṣamiti jñānamarthena viśeṣyate, arthenendriyasya sanni

pratyakṣam . na tadupapadyate, tasyārthasyābhāvāt . na ca sañcayo'rthaḥ, saṃvṛtisattvāt . ato
nāsāvutpattipratyaya iṣyata iti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvābhāvājjñānatvapratyakṣatvābhyupagamahāniḥ .
cakṣurādijñāneṣvataḥ svanirbhāsavyatiriktaprameyābhāvādasatsatpratipatterapratyakṣatvena prasiddhena pratyakṣatvanirākaraṇādanumānavirodhaḥ .
yathā cātra samānānekārthajanyendriyasvārthādyadutpadyate tadapi ca taimirakavada-
karṣādutpadyamānaṃ jñānamakṣaṃ prati vṛtteḥ pratyakṣamiti jñāne'rthasya viśeṣaṇatā . sannikarṣādvā akṣaṃ prati yo vartate'rthaḥ sa pratyakṣaḥ, arthendriyasannikarṣādakṣaṃ prati vṛtteḥ pratyakṣamitatvādupacaritavṛttirartho'kṣeṇa viśeṣyate iti .
atrottaramucyate --na tadupapadyate pratyakṣaṃ tasyārthasyābhāvāt . evaṃ ca sati ityuccārya sañcayaḥ prasakta
ityabhyupagamyagamayya dūṣayati--yasmānna ca sañcayo'rthaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇaṃ nārthaḥ sañcaya iti cet, saṃvṛtisattvāt .
saṃvṛtisattvamadravyatvād vāndhyeyavat . ata etasmāt kāraṇād nāsāvutpattipratyaya iṣyate, utpattau
pratyaya ālambanapratyaya ityarthaḥ, so'sattvānneṣyate . itiśabdo hetvarthe, etasmāt kāraṇāt so'rtho na
viśeṣaṇena viśeṣyastasmādviśeṣaṇaviśeṣyatvābhāvājjñānatvapratyakṣatvābhyupagamahāniḥ, jñānaṃ pratyakṣam
ityetadabhyupagataṃ viśeṣaṇasya viśeṣyasya cārthasyābhāvāt kimviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ ca syāditi hīyate .
kiñcānyat --cakṣurādijñāneṣvata ityādi yāvadanumānavirodhaḥ . cakṣurādīndriyabuddhayaḥ svaviṣayanirbhāsasvarūpamātrā eva, jñānatvāt, vastutvāt, sattvāt, taimirikādijñānavat . ataścakṣurādivijñāneṣu
svanirbhāsavyatiriktaprameyābhāvaḥ . tataśca taimirikasya keśonduka-maśaka-makṣikā-dvicandrādidarśanavat sā
tu asatsatpratipattireva, asadavastu sadvastu iti pratipattiḥ . tasmāddhetorasatsatpratipatterviparyayapratipattestasya jñānasyāpratyakṣatvaṃ prasiddhamalātacakrādijñānavat, tena apratyakṣatvena prasiddhena tvayā pratijñātaṃ
tatpratyakṣatvaṃ nirākriyate, tannirākaraṇādanumānavirodhaḥ . nanu pratyakṣanirākaraṇāt pratyakṣavirodho'yaṃ
kathamanumānavirodhaḥ ? ityatrocyate--tvanmatena pratyakṣadharmasya vikalpasyoktānumānena nirākaraṇānnirvikalpakapratyakṣatvābhāvāt katamat tat pratyakṣaṃ yena nirākriyeta yadvā nirākuryāt ? ato'numānavirodha evāyam .
kiñcānyat--ghaṭasaṅkhyotkṣepaṇasattāghaṭatvādyākārajñānānāmapi pratyakṣatvaprasaṅgaḥ . kathamiti cet,
ucyate --yathā cotretyādi dārṣṭāntikaṃ muktvā dṛṣṭāntaṃ tatsādharmyaṃ ca varṇayati . yathā cātra bhavanmatena
samānānekārthajanyendriyasvārthāt, samānena nīlavarṇenā'nekena paramāṇusaṅghātalakṣaṇenārthena janya indriyasvārthaḥ, nāsādhāraṇo vastvabhimatasvalakṣaṇasvārthaḥ, kasmāt ? tattyaktvā tatrānekārthajanyatvāt svārthe sāmānyagocaraṃ jñānam pra॰ samu॰ 1 . 4 iti vacanādanyādṛśaḥ svārthasyeṣṭatvāt, tādṛśaḥ svārthād yadutpadyate

pramāṇam, samānānekārthātathābhūtārthānnīlādisaṅghātāt prajñaptisata ālambanāt
paramārthasadākāro labhyate, ta eva hi paramāṇavo nīlāditvenābhāsante iti tadviṣayaṃ
jñānaṃ pratyakṣamiṣṭaṃ tathā ghaṭasaṅkhyādyākārebhyaḥ pratyakṣajñānajanakārthasadharmabhyaḥ samānānekārthajanyendriyasvārthebhyaḥ samānānekārthātathābhūtārthebhyaḥ paramārthasadākāro lapsyate
iti ghaṭādijñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syāt, saṃvṛtisadālambanatvāt, nīlādijñānavat . nīlādijñānaṃ vā na pratyakṣaṃ syāt, ghaṭādijñānavat . ta eva hi te paramāṇava ābhāsante .
evamubhayostulye janakatve kuta etat--nīlādyābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na ghaṭādyābhāsamiti . yathaiva hi paramāṇvavayavasamudāye ta evābhāsante tathā ghaṭādijñāneṣvapi samuditāsta evābhāsante, tathāstheṣveva ghaṭabuddhiḥ pravartate prajñaptiśca evaṃ tathāstheṣveva
nīlādirūpabuddhiḥ pravartate prajñaptiśca .
jñānam ityabhisambhantsyate, tadapi ca taimirakavadapramāṇam, timire bhavaṃ taimiram, yathā dvicandradarśanaṃ tathā samānenāpyanekavarṇamaṇisamūhena janya indriyasvārtho mecakastasmādutpadyamānaṃ tadapi ca
taimirakavadapramāṇam . kutaḥ ? yasmāt samānānekārthāt tasmādatathābhūtārthāt tannīlādisaṅghātājjñānamutpadyate,
atathābhūtārthatvamasya saṃvṛtisattvamata āha --samānānekārthātathābhūtārthānnīlādisaṅghātāt prajñaptisata
ālambanāt saṃvṛtisataḥ paramārthasadākāro nīlādiko labhyate, yatasta eva hi paramārthasantaḥ paramāṇavo
nīlāditvenābhāsanta iti tadviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ nīlādipratyakṣamiṣṭam . tathā nirākṛtebhyaḥ pratyakṣatvena ghaṭasaṅkhyādyākārebhyo ghaṭasaṅkhyotkṣepaṇasattāghaṭatvādyākārebhyaḥ pratyakṣajñānajanakārthasadharmabhyaḥ, katamena
sādharmyeṇa sadharmabhya iti cet, ucyate --samānānekārthajanyendriyasvārthebhya ityetatsadharmabhyaḥ . kimuktaṃ
bhavati ? samānānekārthātathābhūtārthebhyaḥ, paramārthasadākāro lapsyate nīlādisaṅghātavadityatastadupasaṃhṛtya sādhanamāha --ghaṭaḥ saṃyukto viyuktaḥ paro'paraḥ spandata ityādi jñānaṃ pratyakṣaṃ sa ca tadviṣayaḥ
pratyakṣaḥ syāt, saṃvṛtisadālambanatvāt, nīlādijñānavat . nīlādijñānaṃ tadarthaśca na pratyakṣe vā
syātām, saṃvṛtisattvāt, ghaṭādijñānārthavat . vāśabdasya vikalpārthatvādubhayatra jñānotpādakārthāviśeṣāt . tat samarthayati --ta eva hi te paramāṇavo ya eva ghaṭāditvenābhāsante ya eva nīlāditvenābhāsanta
iti . evamubhayornīlādighaṭādijñānayostulye janakatve tat kuta etat--nīlādyābhāsaṃ jñānaṃ
pratyakṣaṃ na ghaṭādyābhāsamiti ? svarucimātrādanyat kāraṇaṃ nāstītyarthaḥ .
yathaiva hītyādi yāvat samuditāsta evābhāsanta iti buddhāvābhāsanasāmarthyāviśeṣācca janakahetvaviśeṣameva darśayati . atra ca yathā paramāṇvavayavasamudāye ta eva nīlapratyavabhāsatvājjñānasyākārasanniveśaviśiṣṭāḥ sāmānyata ābhāsante tathā ghaṭādijñāneṣvapi ākāraviśeṣeṇa samuditāsta
evābhāsante, nānyo ghaṭo nāmāsti yastathābhāseta . tathāstheṣu tena prakāreṇa sthiteṣu rūpādiṣveva ghaṭa

athocyeta--nīlādisamudāye dravyasadākāro vidyate, tadaṇvātmakatvāt tathāsattvāt tatpratyakṣatvaṃ nyāyyam . na tu ghaṭādyākāraḥ, atatparamāṇutvāt tathā'sattvāt . etacca tulyamubhayatrāviśeṣāt . yathaiva tasmin ghaṭādyanākāratā tadanaṇutvāt tathā'sattvāt evaṃ rūpādyākārasyānākāratā sañcitasyaindriyakatvādālambanatvāt tadanaṇutvāt tathā'sattvādanyathā'viṣayatvādanālambanatvādapratyakṣatvāt .
pakṣāntarāpattiścaivaṃ yathā te vidyante tathā ta ālambanamiti . yathā coktaṃ pratyekaṃ
iti buddhiḥ pravartate prajñaptiśca evaṃ tathāstheṣveva paramāṇuṣu nīlādirūpabuddhiḥ pravartate prajñaptiśceti
sarvamubhayatra tulyam .
atra pareṇobhayorvaidharmyapradarśanārthamathocyeta--nīlādisamudāya ityādi yāvat tadaṇvātmakatvāt
tathāsattvāditi . nīlādisamudāye nīlādidravyasadākāraḥ paramārthasadākāraḥ sa vidyate . kiṃ
kāraṇam ? tadaṇvātmakatvāt teṣāṃ nīlādīnāmaṇvātmakatvāt aṇūnāṃ dravyasattvāt . tatpratyakṣatvaṃ
nyāyyam, nyāyādanapetaṃ nyāyyaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ, tadviṣayasya ca jñānasya pratyakṣatvaṃ tatpratyakṣatvam . na tu
ghaṭādyākāro na tvasti ghaṭasaṅkhyotkṣepaṇādyākāraḥ, atatparamāṇutvāt, tasyākārasya paramāṇutvaṃ tatparamāṇutvam, na tatparamāṇutvamatatparamāṇutvam, ato'tatparamāṇutvāt . tataḥ kim ? tathā'sattvāt, tena
prakāreṇāsattvāt paramāṇutvena teṣāṃ ghaṭādyākārāṇāmasattvāt .
atrācārya uttaramāha --etacca tulyamubhayatrāviśeṣāt, paramāṇujanyatvādeva nīlādighaṭādyākārapratyakṣayoḥ . yathaiva tasmin rūpādisamudāye ghaṭādyanākāratā tadanaṇutvāt, tasya ghaṭādyākārasyānākāratā tasyākārasyānaṇutvāt, tathā'sattvādanaṇusattvena ghaṭādyākāreṇāsattvādaṇutvenaivāsattvāt . evaṃ
rūpādyākārasyānākāratā anantaroktahetoḥ sañcitasyaindriyakatvāt paramāṇusamudāyasyaindriyakatvāt
tasyaivālambanatvāt, asañcitasyātīndriyatvādata evānālambanatvāt, tadanaṇutvāt tasya sañcitasyaindriyakasyālambanasyānaṇutvāt tathā'sattvādanaṇutvādevāsattvāt, anyathā'viṣayatvāt paramāṇutvenā-
viṣayatvāt, aviṣayatvādeva anālambanatvāt, ata eva apratyakṣatvāt .
kiñcānyat --pakṣāntarāpattiścaivam . yadābhāsaṃ teṣu jñānamutpadyate tathā ta ālambanam
pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 1 . 15 ityevaṃ pakṣaṃ parityajya yathā te vidyante tathā ta ālambanamityayaṃ pakṣa āśrito
bhavati, pakṣāntaragamanaṃ ca vādāvasānāyeti . kiñcānyat, asminnapi ca pakṣe tvayaiva vasubandhuṃ pratyuktā ye
doṣāste tavāpi syuḥ . yasmāt tvayāpi cāyaṃ pakṣo'ṅgīkṛta eva . kathamiti cet, taddarśayati --yathā ca
pratyakṣotpattibījasañjananārthamuktam--pratyekaṃ ca te samuditāḥ kāraṇamiti . tatrānekārthajanyatvāt
svārthe sāmānyagocaram pra॰ samu॰ 1 . 4 ityasya vyākhyāyāṃ punarvasubandhuṃ dūṣayitukāmena vikalpitaḥ
sa evārthaḥ--kiṃ yathā vidyamānā anyābhāsasyāpi vijñānasya kāraṇaṃ bhavanti tathā pratyakṣasyālambanaṃ
rūpādayaḥ iti pūrvapakṣatvena . etayośca vacanayorekākārārthatvādasāvapi pakṣo'bhyupagatastvayā . tataḥ ko

ca te samuditāḥ kāraṇam pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 1 . 15 . evamapi na ta ālambanamatīndriyatvāt .
evamvievaṃvidhālambanatāyāṃ ca dhūmo'gnipratyakṣajñānālambanaṃ syāt, tathā vidyamānatve'nyathābhāsasyāpi jñānasya kāraṇībhavanāt, tvaduktapratyakṣālambanavat . cakṣurādyapi
vālambanaṃ syāt .
na ca grāhyasya nīlāderviṣayasya cakṣurādivijñānasya nīlādiparamāṇava āla-
doṣa iti cet, evamapi na ta ālambanamatīndriyatvādindriyagocarātītatvād gaganavadindriyajñānālambanaṃ na bhavanti paramāṇavaḥ .
kiñcānyat, uttaradoṣa ucyate'bhyupagamyāpi evaṃvidhālambanatāyāṃ cetyādi yāvat tvaduktapratyakṣālambanavaditi . anyathā vidyamānāḥ paramāṇavo'tīndriyatvena vidyamānāḥ samūhābhāsasyāpi
jñānasya kāraṇaṃ bhavanti ityevaṃvidhālambanatāyāṃ satyāṃ dhūmo'gnipratyakṣajñānālambanaṃ syāt, tathā
vidyamānatve'nyathābhāsasyāpi jñānasya kāraṇībhavanāt . dhūmatvena vidyamāno dhūmo'gnyābhāsasyānyābhāsasyāsvābhāsajñānasya kāraṇībhavannupalabhyata iti pakṣadharmatvamastyasya . tvaduktapratyakṣālambanavaditi
dṛṣṭānte tasya sapakṣānugamanaṃ darśayati . yathā tvaduktasya pratyakṣasyālambanaṃ paramāṇavo'nyathā vidyamānāḥ paramāṇutvena vidyamānāḥ samūhābhāsajñānasya kāraṇaṃ bhavanti tathā dhūmo'pi tatsādharmyāt tajjanitajñānālambanasyāgneḥ pratyakṣālambanatayā vyāptatvāt pratyakṣālambanatāmātmanaḥ sādhayati . dhūmanimittāgnijñānaṃ vā
pratyakṣaṃ syāt, tathā vidyamānatve'nyābhāsavijñānajanakārthālambanatvāt, tvaduktapratyakṣavat . tatsādharmyādeva
vā tvaduktapratyakṣaṃ sahārthenāpratyakṣaṃ syād dhūmajanitāgnyarthajñānavat .
kiñcānyat, tasmādeva hetoścakṣurādyapi vālambanaṃ syāt, evamayamatiprasaṅgadoṣa evaṃvādinaḥ .
yadi kāraṇamālambanaṃ vijñānasyānyābhāsasyāpiṣṭaṃ tataścakṣurādīndriyāṇi cakṣurādivijñānānāmālambanāni syuḥ,
anyathā vidyamānatve'nyābhāsasyāpi vijñānasya kāraṇībhavanāccakṣurindriyaṃ cakṣurvijñānasyālambanaṃ syād
rūpādiparamāṇuvat . tajjñānaṃ vā cakṣurindriyālambanaṃ syāt, tajjanyatve satyanyābhāsatvāt, paramāṇujanyarūpavijñānavat . evaṃ śrotrādijñānāni . paramāṇvālambanatvamabhyupagamyāyaṃ doṣa uktaḥ .
na ca grāhyasya nīlāderviṣayasyetyādi . cakṣurādibhirgrāhyasya nīlādeḥ samūhātmakasya, viṣayo
gocaraḥ, sambandhi cakṣurādivijñānam, tasya nīlādiparamāṇavo na ālambanam, anyathā paramārthato
vidyamānatvāt . anyatheti svābhāsādanyathābhāsante na tathā paramārthato vidyante paramārthatastu svalakṣaṇā
apyagrāhyā vidyante, tasmādanyathā paramārthato vidyamānatvāt cakṣurādivannīlādigrāhyaviṣayajñānālambanā
na bhavanti paramāṇavaḥ . yathā cakṣurādīndriyāṇyanyathā paramārthato'nīlādiparamāṇvātmakāni santi anyathā
nīlādijñānotpattau hetubhāvaṃ bibhrati nālambanāni tathā paramāṇava iti . itaśca paramāṇvālambanaṃ na bhavati

mbanam, anyathā paramārthato vidyamānatvāt tadasādhāraṇaviṣayatvādvā, rasajñānavat .
nanu ca pratyekameva te samuditāḥ kāraṇam, tathāsanta eva samuditāḥ paramāṇavaścakṣurādijñānotpattihetutvādālambanam, tadavasthānāṃ jñānotpādanaśaktyabhivyakteḥ,
cakṣurādiparamāṇūnāmiva . na hyeka indriyaparamāṇurviṣayaparamāṇurvā vijñānamutpādayitumalam, na tatsamudāyaḥ prajñaptisattvāt . pratyekakāraṇatāyāmaṇūnāṃ samudāye
darśanaśaktivyaktiḥ, śibikāvāhakasamudāyavahanaśaktivat, andhapaṅktivat pratyekādarśanavailakṣaṇyena .
cakṣurvijñānam, tadasādhāraṇaviṣayatvādvā, tasyāsādhāraṇaviṣayatvāccakṣurvijñānasya . asādhāraṇa ekaiko
nīlaparamāṇurviṣayo'syeti tadasādhāraṇaviṣayatvam, tacca siddham, pratyekaṃ ca te samuditāḥ kāraṇam
pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 1 . 15 iti vacanāt . tasmādasādhāraṇaviṣayatvādvā rasajñānavat, yathā rasajñānamasādhāraṇaviṣayatvānnīlaparamāṇvālambanaṃ na bhavatyevaṃ cakṣurvijñānamapi . vāśabdāt tannīlaparamāṇavaścakṣurviṣayā
na bhavanti, asādhāraṇaviṣayatvāt, asādhāraṇāśca te viṣayāśca, rasajñānavat, rasajñāne iva rasajñānavat, yathā rasajñāne rasalakṣaṇo'rtho'sādhāraṇaviṣayatvāt tvanmatenaiva cakṣurvijñānaviṣayo na bhavati evaṃ
nīlaparamāṇava iti .
itara āha --nanu ca pratyekameva te samuditāḥ kāraṇamityādi yāvadandhapaṅktivat pratyekādarśanavailakṣaṇyeneti . nanu mayā viśeṣyoktam--pratyekameva te samuditāḥ kāraṇamiti . kimuktaṃ bhavati ?
tathāsanta eva paramāṇutvena paramārthasanta eva samuditāḥ paramāṇavaścakṣurādijñānotpattihetutvādālambanam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tadavasthānāṃ jñānotpādanaśaktyabhivyakteḥ, samudāya avasthā yeṣāṃ te tadavasthāḥ,
tadavasthā eva hi jñānamutpādayituṃ śaktāḥ, sā hi jñānotpādanaśaktiḥ pratyekaṃ vidyamānāpi nābhivyajyate,
samudāye'bhivyajyate . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? cakṣurādiparamāṇūnāmiva pratyekaṃ rūpadarśanaśaktānāmapi na sā
śaktirabhivyajyate samudāye tvabhivyajyate, tadvadālambanaparamāṇūnāmapi . viṣaya-viṣayiparamāṇūnāṃ pratyekaṃ
tacchaktīnāmapyasamuditānāṃ śaktyabhāvaṃ tulyaṃ darśayati --na hyeka indriyaparamāṇurviṣayaparamāṇurvā vijñānamutpādayitumalamiti . na tatsamudāyaḥ prajñaptisattvāt, nāpi teṣāmindriyaviṣayaparamāṇūnāṃ samudāyo vijñānamutpādayitumalaṃ prajñaptisattvāt paramārthato'sattvādityarthaḥ . tasmādekamekaṃ prati kāraṇabhāvaḥ
pratyekakāraṇatā, tasyāṃ satyāmeva pratyekakāraṇatāyāmaṇūnāṃ samudāye darśanaśaktivyaktiḥ . kimiva ?
śibikāvāhakasamudāyavahanaśaktivat, yathā śibikāvāhakānāṃ pratyekaṃ vidyamānaiva sā vahanaśaktiḥ
samudāye'bhivyajyate tathendriyaviṣayaparamāṇūnāṃ darśanadṛśyaśaktiḥ . vaidharmyeṇa andhapaṅktiḥ pratyekādarśanavailakṣaṇyena, yathāndhānāṃ pratyekamasatī darśanaśaktivyaktistatpaṅktāvapi na bhaviṣyati tathehendriyaviṣayadraṣṭṛdṛśyaśaktayo nābhaviṣyan, bhavanti tu . tasmāt pratyekaṃ vidyamānaśaktaya evendriyaviṣayaparamāṇavaḥ samudāye'-
bhivyaktaśaktayo bhavantīti .


nanvevamabhyupagatanirākaraṇaphalaiveyaṃ pratyakṣavyavasthā, asañcitaparamāṇvālambanaśrayaṇāt pratyekadarśanaśaktikhyāpanājjanakānanyathātvāt sañcayābhāvāt .
ādipratijñānavat svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvapratisamādhānena nirvahaṇametadanekārthajanyasvārthasāmānyagocaranirasanam . pratyavekṣitapūrvāparānumatanigamanaparigraheṇa vā

atrocyate --nanvevamabhyupagatanirākaraṇaphalaiveyaṃ pratyakṣavyavasthā . abhyupagataṃ sañcitālambanāḥ
pañca vijñānakāyāḥ abhi॰ pi॰ iti, tasyābhyupagatasya nirākaraṇaṃ phalamasyāḥ pratyakṣavyavasthāyāḥ .
kutaḥ ? asañcitaparamāṇvālambanaśrayaṇāt, pratyekaṃ darśanaśaktimatāmindriyaviṣayaparamāṇūnāṃ darśanaśaktivyaktirityasyāṃ kalpanāyāṃ nanvasañcitāḥ paramāṇavaścakṣurvijñānotpādanaśaktā ityetadāśritaṃ bhavati pañcānāṃ
vijñānakāyānāmasañcitālambanatvam . taccābhyupagataṃ niruṇaddhi sañcitālambanatvamidaṃ kalpanāntarāśrayaṇam .
kiṃ kāraṇam ? pratyekadarśanaśaktikhyāpanāt, śibikāvāhakasādharmyāt ta eva hi darśanaśaktiyuktāḥ
pratyekamiti bhavati . syānmatam--nanu pratyekaśaktānāmeva sañcaye tacchaktyabhivyaktirityuktam . ācārya
āha--satyam, uktametat, ayuktam, kiṃ kāraṇam ? janakānanyathātvāt, na hi jñānasya janakebhyaḥ
paramāṇubhyo'nyaḥ sañcayo'stīti prāgetad vistareṇa pratipāditam, tasmājjanakānanyathātvāt sañcayābhāvāt pratyekaṃ darśanaśaktyabhivyaktipratyakṣavyavasthā abhyupagatanirākaraṇaphalaiveyam . athavā janakānāmanyaḥ
prakāro'nyathā, tadbhāvo'nyathātvam, tatpratiṣedho janakānanyathātvam, tasmājjanakānāṃ paramāṇūnāmatīndriyāṇāmananyathātvādaindriyakatvavyavasthānābhāvāt sañcayasyārthāntarabhūtasyābhāvādasañcitaparamāṇvālambanaśrayaṇaṃ
tadavastham .
athavā yuktaiṣā kalpanā tvayāśrayituṃ svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣam ityetatpratijñānasaṃvāditvāt tannirvoḍhukāmena . yasmāt pratyekaṃ te samuditāḥ kāraṇam pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 1 . 15 ityetat pratyakṣaviṣayasamarthanavacanamādipratijñānena tulyaṃ vartata iti ādipratijñānavat, ādipratijñānānurūpam, yā hi pratijñā
svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣam iti saitena vacanena niruhyate, yasmāt svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvapratisamādhānena
nirvahaṇametat svalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ pratyakṣam iti ādau pratijñāya pratyekaṃ te samuditāḥ kāraṇamiti bruvatā'ṇūnāṃ svalakṣaṇatvāt pratyavekṣitapaurvāparyasādhyasādhanasambandhaṃ hi vaktavyam . aho sādhu, kintu punaratra
devānāṃpriya bhavato doṣajātam . kiṃ tat ? anekārthajanyasvārthasāmānyagocaranirasanam, tatrānekārthajanyatvāt svārthe sāmānyagocaram pra॰ samu॰ 1 . 4 iti codyottarapakṣaparigraheṇa pratyavekṣitapaurvāparyasausthityārthanigamanavacanamanena tu nirasyate . atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa iti pratyavekṣitapūrvāparānumata-

ādipratijñātārthanirasanam .
anekāntavaddvayorantayoravasthātavyam--pratyekatāyāṃ cāvastheyamagnyambhovacca
tadaśakyaśakte samudāye, sākṣāt tvaduktatattvatvādanekaikatvabhṛśagatyarthasamudāyaparigrahācca .
itarathāpi caiṣāṃ samudāya eva na syāt, pratyekamabhūtatvāt, vandhyāputravat .
bauddhairevoktā trayātiriktasaṃskṛtakṣaṇikānityatvābhyupagamena sahāsaṅgatirasya, pratyeka-
nigamanaparigraheṇa vā ādipratijñātārthanirasanam . vāśabdasya vikalpatvāt svalakṣaṇaviṣayapratyakṣatvaṃ vā nirasyate, anekārthajanyasvārthasāmānyagocaratā vā, ubhayaṃ vā nirasyata iti .
kiñcānyat, pratyekaṃ te samuditāḥ kāraṇamiti vacanādavyastā ityetadarthādāpannamiti tadeva punaḥ
smārayati doṣāntaraiḥ --anekāntavad dvayorantayoravasthātavyam . dvāvantau dvau deśau, dvayordeśayoravastheyaṃ
taiḥ paramāṇubhirekataḥ pratyekasamuditaiḥ . kimiva ? anekāntavat . anekāntena tulyaṃ vartata ityanekāntavat,
yathā dravyāntaparyāyāntayoravatiṣṭhamānāḥ paramāṇavasta eva tatsamudāyaśceti vyapadiśyante tathā pratyekatāyāṃ
cāvastheyamityanekāntasādharmyaṃ darśayati . caśabdaḥ samuccaye, kiṃ samuccinoti ? samudāyamuparitanam, 
pratyekatāyāṃ ca samudāye cāvasthātavyamiti . agnyambhovacca tadaśakyaśakte samudāye, agneḥ śakyaṃ
dahanādi hlādanasnehanādyaśakyam, ambhasastu snehanahlādanādi śakyamaśakyaṃ dahanādi, tadaśakye śaktastadaśakyaśaktaḥ pratyekāśakye śaktaḥ samudāyaḥ . vākyārthastu lokavyāpino'pi paramāṇavaḥ saṅghātabhedapariṇāmāpekṣā eva cākṣuṣatvādibhājo bhavanti nānyathetyubhayāntātyāgavādino jainā yad vadanti tadeva tavāpyāpannam . kutaḥ ? sākṣāttvaduktatattvatvāt, tvayaiva sākṣāduktaṃ tattvameṣāṃ paramāṇūnām pratyekaṃ cakṣurvijñānotpādane na śaktāḥ, samuditāḥ śaktāḥ iti . evaṃ tāvat sākṣādanekāntābhyupagamaḥ . arthāpattyā
vābhyupagata eva, anekaikatvabhṛśagatyarthasamudāyaparigrahācca . samityekībhāve, sa caikībhāvo'nekasya,
iṇ gatau pā॰ dhā॰ 1045, ayanaṃ gamanaṃ gatirāya iti paryāyāḥ, utkaṭāya udāyaḥ, saṅgato bhṛśamāyaḥ, samudāyaśabdasya tatparigrahāt pratyekaṃ te samuditā anekaikībhūtabhṛśagatayaḥ ityarthaḥ kṛtaḥ, tasmāccānekāntavādābhyupagamaḥ .
kiñcānyat, itarathāpi caiṣāṃ samudāya eva na syāt, nyāyato'pītyarthaḥ, etat pratijñānam .
samudāya eva na syāt, pratyekamabhūtatvāt, vandhyāputravadityeṣa nyāyaḥ, yathā pratyekamabhūtānāṃ vandhyāputrāṇāṃ samudāyo nāsti tathā paramāṇūnāmiti . nanvayamanyāyaḥ pratyekamabhūtatvāsiddheḥ paramāṇūnāmiti
cet, netyucyate, bauddhairevoktā trayātiriktasaṃskṛtakṣaṇikānityatvābhyupagamena sahāsaṅgatirasya .

tvaprāptyanantarameva vinaṣṭatvāt . pratyekatvaprāptirapi caivaṃ naiva, asattvāt, vandhyāputravat . sahotpādādadoṣa iti cet, na, tulyatvāt . kiṃ bhūtasya sahatā ? abhūtasya ? yadi bhūtasya bhavanānantaravinaṣṭatvāt kutaḥ sahatā, uktavadasattvāpattereva ?
yaduktaṃ vaḥ siddhānte—
buddhibodhyaṃ trayādanyat saṃskṛtaṃ kṣaṇikaṃ ca tat .   iti .
ākāśa-pratisaṅkhyā-'pratisaṅkhyānirodhākhyāt trayādanyat pratyayajanitatvāt saṃskṛtam, saṃskṛtatvācca
kṣaṇikānityam, kṣaṇo'syāstīti kṣaṇikam, kṣaṇamātramevāsya kālo na parata iti kṣaṇikānityameva na kālāntarāvasthāyyanityatvaṃ laukikābhimataghaṭādivadityetenābhyupagamena saha pratyekaṃ te samuditāḥ kāraṇamityasyābhyupagamasya saṅgatirnāsti . kiṃ kāraṇam ? pratyekatvaprāptyanantarameva vinaṣṭatvāt, ekaikasya
paramāṇoḥ svarūpalābhasamanantarameva vinaṣṭatvāt kaḥ pratyekasamudāyaḥ ? ko vā deśato'tyantaṃ rūpādibhedena
yāvadanabhilāpyatathāvasthānāṃtayāvaśyaṃ bhidyamānānāṃ pratyekaṃ bhāvaḥ ? iti siddhaṃ pratyekamabhūtatvaṃ deśataḥ kālataścāvasthāntarāprāpteriti . pratyekatvaprāptirapi caivaṃ naiva, nirmūlata eva paramāṇūnāṃ yāpi pratyekatvaprāptiḥ sāpi
caivamuktavidhinā naivāsti, svarūpaprāptimātradeśakālāpratīkṣitvavināśitvādasattvāt, vandhyāputravat, yathā
vandhyāputrāṇāṃ pratyekatvaprāptirnāsti tathā paramāṇvabhimatānāṃ tathānavasthānāmabhāvānna pratyekatvaprāptiriti .
sahotpādādadoṣa iti cet, teṣāṃ paramāṇūnāmasattvamasiddhaṃ tathānavasthānāmapi deśaikyena
kālaikyena ca sahotpādābhyupagamāt, tasmādasti pratyekatvaprāptiriti . etacca na, tulyatvāt paramāṇvasattvasya, deśakālabhedotpādāsattvena sahotpādāsattvasya tulyatvāt, vikalpadvaye'pi yaugapadyāsiddheridamasi
tvaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ --kiṃ bhūtasya sahatā ? abhūtasya ? iti vikalpadvayānativṛttereṣa praśna ubhayathāpi na ghaṭata
ityuttaraṃ vaktumanasaḥ . itara āha--abhūtasya sahatetyayukto vikalpaḥ, ka evaṃ brūyāt abhūtasya khapuṣpasyeva satā'satā vā sahatā iti yataḥ sa vikalpaḥ pūrvapakṣyate ? tasmādbhūtasya sahateti brūmaḥ . atrācārya
āha--tvamevaitadvikalpadvayaṃ tathāvasthāḥ pratyekaṃ samuditāḥ kāraṇaṃ paramāṇavaḥ iti bruvāṇaścintaya
ka evamāheti . kiṃ na etena ? yo bravīti sa bravītu, yadi bhūtasya yadi tāvad bhūtasya sahotpādaḥ,
bhavanānantaravinaṣṭatvāt kṣaṇikavāde kutaḥ sahatā ? nāstyatra kāraṇaṃ sahatve kasyacit kenacidityarthaḥ .
uktavadityatideśāddeśakālābhyāmatyantabhede nirabhilāpyasvabhāvānāṃ pratyekatvaprāptireva nāstītyuktaṃ tathā teṣā
masattvāpatterevāṇūnāṃ kutaḥ sahatā ityabhisambandhaḥ . pratilabdhasahatvasya cotpāda ucyate tvayā, tattu

athābhūtasya vandhyāputrasamudāyo'pi syāt, abhūtatvādasthitatvāt, aṇusamudāyavat . santānāditi cet, so'pyevameva .
athocyeta--bāhyavastusvatattvapratipattijanitaḥ sarva evaiṣa virodhasaṃkleśaḥ .
vijñānamātrakamidaṃ tribhuvanam . na dravyasaṃvṛtyādi tato bhinnamasti .
nanu devānāṃpriya ! tvanmatavadeva vijñānavādavidhvaṃsanārtha evāyamārambhaḥ .
sahatvaṃ yaugapadyamapratilabdhamasattvāpattereva . tasmāt sahotpādādadoṣaḥ ityaparihāraḥ . athābhūtasyotpādo yaugapadyeneṣyate sāpi sahatā nopapadyate'niṣṭaprasaṅgāt . kimaniṣṭam ? vandhyāputrasamudāyo'pi syādityaniṣṭam . kutaḥ ? abhūtatvādasthitatvādaṇusamudāyavaditīdaṃ sākṣādaniṣṭāpādanam . aṇusamudāyo'pi
na syādabhūtatvādasthitatvādvandhyāputrasamudāyavat . abhūtatvamasthitatvaṃ ca hetudvayaṃ śūnyakṣaṇikavādinoḥ
siddhatvāduktam . santānāditi cet, syānmatam--abhūtatvamasthitatvaṃ ceṣyate teṣām, tathāpi janmavināśasantānasyāvyavacchedāt sthitatvamastyataḥ sahotpādādadoṣa iti . etaccāyuktam, yasmāt so'pyevameva, so'pi santāno bhūto vā syādabhūto vā ? yadi bhūtaḥ kutaḥ sahatā, uktavad bhavanānantaravinaṣṭebhyo'nyasya santānasyābhāvāt ? asti cet tadvilakṣaṇo nityo'nya iti sarvakṣaṇikapratijñāhāniḥ . athābhūtaḥ,
vandhyāputravadityādyabhihitadoṣākāṅkṣameva .
athocyeta--bāhyavastusvatattvetyādi yāvat tato bhinnamastīti . athetyadhikārāntare, atha
sañcitālambanaviṣayajñānapakṣe kalpitāḥ kalpitā upapattayo viphalā bhavanti sadoṣāśceti taṃ parityajyedamucyeta --sarva evaiṣa virodhasaṃkleśo bāhyavastutattvapratipattijanitaḥ, vijñānād bāhyaṃ vastutattvamasti
iti pratipattau satyāṃ jāyate'yaṃ saṃkleśaḥ . yadi paramāṇava ālambanaṃ tato'tīndriyatvasañcitālambanatvādyabhyupagamavirodhaḥ; atha samudāyaḥ, asattvāt khapuṣpavadanālambanameva; pratyekaṃ te samuditāḥ, svavacanavirodhādidoṣaḥ proktanyāyenetyevamādivirodhodbhāvanajanitena cittasaṃkleśena kimarthaṃ bādhyāmahe ? evaṃ tu sarvadoṣavinirmuktamidaṃ kalpanāntaramāśrayāmahe --vijñānamātrakamidaṃ tribhuvanam . yaduktam—
dyaiḥ kṣamā vāyurākāśaṃ sāgarāḥ sarito diśaḥ .antaḥkaraṇatattvasya bhāgā bahiriva sthitāḥ ॥ vākyapa॰ 3 . 7 . 41 iti .
na dravyasaṃvṛtyādi, na punaretasyāṃ kalpanāyāmevamvidhaḥmevaṃvidhaḥ saṃkleśo'sti yat idaṃ saṃvṛtisadidaṃ paramārthasadidamaindriyakamatīndriyamityādi vikalpyamānaṃ vijñānādvyatiriktamarthajātamicchatāṃ syāt, na tu tat tato
bhinnamasti . tasmādanarthako vicāra iti .
atrocyate --nanu devānāṃpriya tvanmatavadeva vijñānavādavidhvaṃsanārtha evāyamārambhaḥ . yathedaṃ

tiṣṭhatu tāvad bāhyārthābhāve vijñeyatvābhāvo vijñeyatvābhāve ca vijñānatvābhāvaḥ .
vijñānaṃ hi pratyakṣādi . tatra katamad vijñānamātramidaṃ sarvaṃ traidhātukam ? na tāvat
pratyakṣavijñānamātram, tasyaivamavasthatvāt . nānumānavijñānamātram, tasyāpi tatpūrvakatvāt tadasiddhāvasiddheratantvapaṭavat . na saṃśayabhrāntyādikalpanāvijñānamātraṃ
kalpanāpoḍhaṃ pratyakṣamityetasya tvanmatasya tatsaṃvādino buddhavacanasya ca vidhvaṃsanārtho'yaṃ mamārambhastathā
vijñānamātravādavidhvaṃsanārtho'pyayamevārambhaḥ, tvattīrthakarābhihitatvāt tasyāpi . athavā tatparamārthatvāt
tatpratipādanārthatvācca sarvadeśanānāṃ bauddhīnāṃ tadvidhvaṃsanārtha evāyamārambhaḥ . etadapi pramāṇābhāvādayuktamiti
grāhyam, pramāṇābhāvaśca prameyābhāvāditi sa doṣaḥ sthita eveti darśayati --tiṣṭhatu tāvadityādi . taṃ
copāyena darśayiṣyannāha --bāhyārthābhāve vijñeyatvābhāvaḥ, tasya vijñānamātratvāt . vijñeyatvābhāve ca
tasya vijñānatvamapi nāsti, vijānātīti hi vijñānam, kiṃ vijānāti vijñeyābhāve ? tataḥ prameyatvābhāvāt pramāṇatvābhāvaḥ pratyakṣasyeti jñeya-jñāna-pramāṇa-prameyatvavilakṣaṇaṃ khapuṣpavat kiṃ tat pratyakṣaṃ nāma ?
ityeṣa doṣo durnivāraḥ, sa tāvat tiṣṭhatu . idaṃ tāvadastitvābhyupagamenaivānyathā vicāryate --vijñānaṃ
hītyādi . hiśabdo dṛṣṭāntārthe, dṛṣṭaṃ hi loke vijñānaṃ pratyakṣādi, pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca pramāṇe
vijñāne . ādigrahaṇāt saṃśayaviparyayānadhyavasāyalakṣaṇāni ca vijñānāni pramāṇābhāsābhimatāni . idamasi tvaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ --tatra nirdhāryaṃ katamad vijñānamātramidaṃ sarvaṃ traidhātukamiti, naikamapi vijñānamātraṃ
bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ . brūyāstvam--pratyakṣavijñānamātramiti, tanna tāvat pratyakṣavijñānamātraṃ tasyaivamavasthatvāt, tasya pratyakṣavijñānasyaivamavasthā yathāsmābhirvyākhyātā na rūpādiviṣayā na samudāyaviṣayā na
cakṣurādinimittā saṃvṛtyā paramārthena vā yujyate iti tasmānna pratyakṣavijñānamātram . syānmatam--anumānavijñānamātramiti . tadapi nānumānavijñānamātram . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tasyāpi tatpūrvakatvāt, tasyāpyanumānasya tatpūrvakatvāt pratyakṣapūrvakatvāt . pratyakṣapūrvakaṃ hi svānubhavottarabhāvivikalpātmakamavikalpajñānasamanantarajanmā'numānaṃ mānasamaindriyamayogimānasapratyakṣapūrvakameveṣyate, tasyaiva pratyakṣasyāsiddhau kuto'numānasiddhiḥ ? ato nānumānamātramata āha --tadasiddhāvasiddhiratantvapaṭavat . yathā tantupūrvakasya paṭasya
tantvasiddhāvasiddhistatpūrvakatvāt tathā pratyakṣāsiddhāvasiddhiranumānasya . evaṃ tāvat pramāṇavijñānamātratvāsiddhiḥ . evaṃ tarhi saṃśayabhrāntyādikalpanāvijñānamātramastu, tadapi na saṃśayabhrāntyādikalpanāvijñānamātraṃ
vā, na saṃśayamātraṃ na bhrāntyādimātram, ādigrahaṇānna svapnānubhavānubhūtānukāramātraṃ na taimirikakeśondukādyākāramātram, sarvasyāsya kalpanātmakasya pramāṇābhāsasya ata eva pratyakṣapūrvakatvādeva tadasiddhāva

vā, ata eva . nānadhyavasāyamātram, anavagrahātmakatvāt tasya . tasmānna vijñānamātramityalamativikāśinyā saṅkathayā .
anayaiva ca diśā svavacanavyapekṣaivākṣepo'viśeṣaikāntavādino'pi . sarvasarvātmakatāyāṃ śrotrādivṛttiḥ pratyakṣam ṣaṣṭita॰ iti bruvato nirvikalpatvādvibhāgābhāvāt
siddheḥ . syānmatam--anadhyavasāyamātramastviti . tadapi nānadhyavasāyamātram, na asañcetitāvyaktasukhaduḥkhādisvarūpamityarthaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? anavagrahātmakatvāt tasya, na hi tadatyantāsañcetitaṃ nāma
jñānamasti . yadyapyavyaktajñānamasti apaṭutvāt tadarthāvagrahātmakaṃ na bhavatyato vijñānameva na bhavati,
yasmād vijānātīti vijñānamiṣṭam, tacca na kiñcid vijānātīti nānadhyavasāyavijñānamātram .
tasmānna vijñānamātram, pramāṇapramāṇābhāsavijñāneṣvanantarbhāvāt katamad vijñānamātramidaṃ sarvam ? 
etebhyaśca vijñānebhyo vyatiriktasyānyasya vijñānasyābhāvānna kiñcidetadvijñānamātraṃ sarvam . ityalamativikāśinyā saṅkathayeti saṅkṣipyopasaṃharati pratyakṣalakṣaṇasya sarvathā dūṣitatvāt, itarathā hyadyāpi dūṣaṇavacanaprapañcasyānekasyāvakāśo'stīti . evaṃ tāvadviśeṣaikāntavādinā kalpitaṃ laukikapratyakṣavilakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ
na ghaṭate, svavacanavyapekṣākṣepadustaravirodhatvāt .
anayaiva ca diśā svavacanavyapekṣaivākṣepo draṣṭavya iti vākyaśeṣaḥ . eṣo'tideśaḥ kasya
cet, aviśeṣaikāntavādino'pi . apiśabdādanantaroktasya viśeṣavādino'sambhavāt ubhayavādino'pi .
tatra yad viśeṣavādinaḥ prāguktaṃ doṣajātaṃ kalpanāpoḍhaṃ pratyakṣam icchataḥ kalpanātmakatvameva hetuparamparayā''pādya apratyakṣatvam, anumānatvam, ubhayaikyam, saṅkaraḥ, abhāvaḥ, nirdeśyatvam, asvalakṣaṇatā ca, kārakajñāpakāviśeṣāpādanādabhidhānārthavyapadeśyatā ca paścācca kalpanāpoḍhatāmabhyupetyāpi
svasāmānyayorlakṣaṇayorabhāvāccakṣuṣo rūpasya tadvijñānasya cābhāvaḥ ityādi lakṣaṇavākyamuddiśya tadidānīmutkrameṇa vācyamiti taddiśaṃ darśayati --sarvasarvātmakatāyāmityādinā yāvadanakṣamiti . evaṃ hi lakṣaṇadūṣaṇātideśaḥ--sarvaṃ sarvātmakam ityaviśeṣamicchataḥ sāṅkhyasyāpi sarvātmakasyaikasya vastuno rūparasādibhedena śrotrādibhedena ca vikalpayitumaśakyatvād viśeṣaikāntavādina iva nirvikalpaparamārthaparamāṇumātra- 
sādharmyādavikalpakatvam . avikalpakatvād yathā pūrvaṃ pratyakṣalakṣaṇodāharaṇavākye doṣāḥ cakṣurnaiva cakṣuḥ,
