rūpaṃ naiva rūpam, vijñānaṃ naiva vijñānam ityādayastathā śrotrādivṛttiḥ pratyakṣaṃ śrotratvakcakṣurjihvāghrāṇānāṃ manasā'dhiṣṭhitā vṛttiḥ śabdasparśarūparasagandheṣu yathākramaṃ grahaṇe vartamānā pramāṇaṃ pratyakṣamiti
bruvataḥ sarvasarvātmakatve nirvikalpatvādvibhāgābhāvāt kiṃ śrotraṃ yat tvagādibhyo vibhaktam ?
kimaśrotraṃ tvagādi yacchrotrādvibhaktam ? yaccoktaṃ śrotrādi iti, tatra ka ādiḥ sarvātmakaikavastutve

kiṃ śrotram ? kimaśrotram ? ka ādiḥ ? ko'nādiḥ ? kā vṛttiḥ ? kā vā'vṛttiḥ ?
kiṃ prati ? kimaprati ? kimakṣam ? kimanakṣamityādi ?
loke śāstre ca hi vastusvatattvasākṣātpratipattiḥ pratyakṣam . tattu tvanmatavanna
tvevaṃlakṣaṇam pratyakṣam, nirvikalpatvāsiddheḥ kalpanātmakatvādibhyo bhrāntyādivat .
sañcitālambanasthāna uktavad rūpāderekasyāsarvasyālambanasyāsañcitavad ghaṭa-
prathamadvitīyādyanyonyāpekṣavibhāgābhāvāt ? ko'nādirmadhyo'nto vā ? kā vṛttisteṣāṃ śrotrādīnāṃ pūrvamapravṛttānāṃ paścādvṛttiḥ kālabhedenāvasthāntaratvena ca viśiṣṭā ? kā vā'vṛttirvṛttyuparamalakṣaṇā vibhāgābhāvādeva ? kiṃ prati, katamo'nyo bhāvo yamapekṣya taṃ pratyakṣamityucyate ? napuṃsakaliṅgasyāvyaktaguṇasandehaviṣayatvāt kiṃ prati iti praśnaḥ . kimaprati, sarvasarvātmakaikatve kaiḥ kiṃ nāpekṣyate ? kimakṣamindriyaṃ yad
viṣayavyatiriktaṃ śrotrādi parasparavyatiriktaṃ vā ? kimanakṣamindriyavyatiriktaṃ viṣayo rūpādi parasparato
vā ? iti pradarśane, itthaṃ vibhāgābhāvād vibhāgena lakṣaṇapraṇayanaṃ svavacanavyapekṣākṣepadustaravirodham .
ādigrahaṇāt kiṃ śabdādi ? kiṃ manaḥ ? kimadhiṣṭheyaṃ kena ? iti .
kiñcānyat, tvanmatenaiva pratyakṣalakṣaṇāyogādayuktam . loke śāstre ca hi vastusvatattvasākṣātpratipattiḥ pratyakṣam, vastunaḥ svaṃ tattvamasādhāraṇamātmīyaṃ rūpam, yā tasya sākṣātpratipattirna vyavahitā
sā pratyakṣam . tattu tvanmatavanna tvevaṃlakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣam, tvanmata iva tvanmatavat, yathā sarvasarvātmakatve
tvanmate śrotrādivṛtteḥ sarvasarvātmakavastvekadeśaśabdādiviṣayatvāt samudāyarūpatvādvastusvatattvasya
vibhāgābhāvācchrotrādivṛttirna sambhavatītyuktaṃ tathā tasya nirvikalpasya vastuno vastusvatattvasākṣātpratipattyabhimataṃ laukikaṃ sāmayikaṃ ca pratyakṣalakṣaṇaṃ na ghaṭate, nirvikalpatvāsiddheḥ, naiva tannirvikalpaṃ
pratyakṣaṃ śabdādivibhāgavikalpaviṣayatvāt, avibhāgarūpaṃ ca sarvasarvātmakaṃ vastusvatattvam, tadviṣayaṃ ca tanna
bhavati, tataśca kalpanātmakam, kalpanātmakatvādibhyo bhrāntyādivad na pratyakṣam iti vartate,
kalpanātmakatvānnirūpaṇavikalpātmakatvādālambanaviparītapratipattyātmakatvādadhyāropātmakatvādasāmānyarūpaviṣayatvāt tadatadviṣayavṛttitvāt sadasadabhedaparigrahātmakatvāt sarvathā sādhāraṇārthatvāt, bhrāntisaṃśayānumānādijñānavaditi .
sañcitālambanasthāna uktavadityādi yāvannīlādiṣvabhāvādityanenā'tidiṣṭagranthārthabhāvanopāyadikpradarśanaṃ karoti mā bhūd vyāmoha iti . yādṛk sañcitālambanasthāne'smābhiruktam paramāṇunīlādīnāṃ
sañcayaḥ sāmānyaṃ saṃvṛtisattvādasat iti, iha tu tadviparītaṃ samudāyaparamārthatvaṃ nīlādisaṃvṛtisattvam .

nīlādiṣvabhāvāt tathāsambhāvane'pi tasyātīndriyatvādālambanatvānupapatteścakṣurādivijñānānāṃ rūpādisaṅghāta ālambanamiti prāptam . te ca pratyekaṃ paramārthato'santa
iti teṣāmaviṣayatetyādyaśeṣaṃ yathābhāgamatra yojyaṃ bhedābhedasaṃvṛtiparamārthasthānavyavasthāpanayā .
saṃvṛtisanto nīlādaya aindriyāḥ, na paramārthasatsamudāyaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tasya rūpādyātmakatvāt tadekadeśabhūtasya rūpāderaparamārthasato'pyavibhāgāvasthasya ekasyāsarvasyālambanasyāsañcitavat na hyeko'sarvaḥ
kadācidālambanaṃ rūpaṃ rasaḥ śabdo vā yathā'sañcitāḥ paramāṇavaḥ pūrvasmin vāde naindriyakā evamasañcita-
vadasmin vāde lokalokottaravyavahārapratyakṣābhimateṣu ghaṭādiṣu nīlādiṣu cābhāvānna pratyakṣaṃ tadviṣayaṃ
jñānamityabhisambandhaḥ . kimuktaṃ bhavati ? rūpādayaḥ sarvaikātmarūpā eva santi na pṛthaksvarūpāḥ . tatastadviṣayaṃ
jñānamabhāvaviṣayatvādapratyakṣaṃ vandhyāsutādiviṣayajñānapratyakṣavaditi . anayā diśā yadābhāsaṃ pratyakṣaṃ na
so'sti viṣayaḥ, yo'sti na tadābhāsaṃ pratyakṣam ityādi viśeṣaikāntavādinaṃ prati yo'bhihitaḥ prapañcaḥ sa
sarvo yojyaḥ . tathāsambhāvane'pi cetyādi, rūpāderekasya sattvarajastamoguṇasāmyāvasthānalakṣaṇapradhānākhyapadārthatvasambhāvane'pi . naiva tatsāmyāvasthānaṃ śabdādibhedaikasarvātmakatvābhāvarūpaṃ sambhāvyate, sambhāvyamāne'pi ca tasminnavyakte tasyā'vyaktasyātīndriyatvādālambanatvānupapatteścakṣurādivijñānānāṃ
rūpādisaṅghāta ālambanamiti prāptam . te ca rūpādayaḥ pratyekaṃ paramārthato'santaḥ, itiśabdo
hetvarthe, ityataḥ kāraṇādrūpādisaṅghātālambanatvāt teṣāṃ pratyekaṃ paramārthasattvābhāvānna viṣayatā . rūpādayo
na cakṣurādiviṣayāḥ, paramārthato'sattvāt, vandhyāsutavat . rūpādiviṣayaṃ vā na pratyakṣam, paramārthato'sadviṣayatvāt, vandhyāsutajñānavat . tasmād yoni-bīja-prakṛti-bahudhānaka-pradhānā-'vyaktādiparyāyākhyaṃ yad
vastu tadatīndriyatvādapratyakṣam . yadindriyaviṣayaṃ tatpariṇāmabhede saṅghāte rūpādi na tat paramārthasat . ityā-
dyaśeṣaṃ viśeṣaikāntavādimate yathābhāgaṃ yo yo bhāgo yathābhāgaṃ tadviparyayeṇāviśeṣaikāntavāde'tra yad
yatra bhajate tat tathānusṛtya yojyamityatītaṃ granthārthaṃ smārayati . tadyojanopāyadiṅmātrapradarśanārthamapyāha—
bhedābhedasaṃvṛtiparamārthasthānavyavasthāpanayeti . ye tatra bhedarūpāḥ paramāṇavaḥ paramārthasantaste'tra saṃvṛtisantaḥ sarvasarvātmakaparamārthavāde, yastatrābhedaḥ paramāṇusamudāyaḥ saṃvṛtisan so'tra paramārthasannityanayā
vyavasthāpanayā yojyam .
punaruttaro'pi grantho yojyaḥ . tadyathā --sarvasarvātmakaikarūpāntarāviviktasvatattve rūpādisattvādisaṅghāta indriyasannikṛṣṭa ālambanaviparītaikarūpeyaṃ pratipattiḥ vyapadeśyānekātmakanīlarūpaviṣayā, na
ca hetvapadeśāvyapadeśyaiṣā, yataḥ sarvātmakagrahaṇāpadeśena dhūmenevāgnisāmānyavad gṛhyate nānirdeśyarūpam .

nānātvaikāntavāde'pi ātmendriyamano'rthasannikarṣādyanniṣpadyate tadanyat vai॰ sū॰ 3 . 1 . 18
dravyādinirmūlatvāt kimātmādi ? iti na pratyakṣam, dravyarūpādibhavanaviśeṣakāraṇa-
kiṃ kāraṇam ? tato'nyat kalpitamekaṃ rūpam . nanu sarvasya kārakahetutvenāpadeśaḥ pratyakṣapratipatteḥ, na
dhūmavajjñāpakahetvapadeśatayāgnerivā'rthāntarasyānekarūpatvasya . nanvidamasyaivārthasya pradarśanārthaṃ prastutamasmābhiḥ, yadīdaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syāt kārakādeva svārthādālambanāddhetorjāyeta dāhānubhavavat pratyakṣatvādavyavahitapratipattyātmakatvāt pratyakṣasya svalakṣaṇaviṣayatvādanadhyāropātmakatvāditi yāvat . api ca kārakatāpi
sarvasya naiva tatra, dvitīyacandravat paramārthato'sattvādanupāttavyāvṛttivyavasthānamātratvāt . lokavattu
sarvasattve viśiṣṭo'padeśo vyapadeśo grāhyādanyaḥ, tena vyapadeśena prameyaṃ vyapadeśyamanumeyaṃ na pratyakṣam,
dhūmānumeyāgnivat, akārakatāyāṃ kārakatāyāṃ vā vastunaḥ pitṛdhūmādivat .
abhidhānāvyapadeśyānekātmakatve api ca naiva, anumitāgnivadevaikānekaviṣayatvānnīlasya . taddhi
nīlarūpanirūpaṇaṃ vikalpaḥ, pratiparamāṇuparasparapratibhinnasvatattvānekarūpaikatattvaikarūpādhyāropāt sarvasarvātmakaikarūpavasturūpādyanekarūpādhyāropādvā rūpāntarasāmānyarūpaviṣayatvāt tadatadviṣayavṛttatvādanapohādapohādvā'gnyanumānavat tatsāmānyātmakataiva paramārthasthitasañcayaprajñaptinīlāṇubhedaparigrahātmakatvāt
sādhāraṇārthaviviktakalpanātmakatvānna pratyakṣamapratyayapratyayātmakatvācchabdāśrāvaṇatvapratyayavat . saṃvṛtyatīndriyatvābhyāṃ hi na nīlādiṣu na ca sañcaye kāraṇatā tathāpratipattiṃ prati . anumānajñānamapi ca tanna
pratipūryate, sambaddhagṛhītasyānyathāpratipatteḥ, viruddhādijñānavaditi samānametat kalpanātmakatvāt .
anyadapi yathāsambhavaṃ tatprakriyāpatitaṃ muktvā yadubhayoḥ sāmānyaṃ tat sarvaṃ yojyam . evaṃ tāvadviśeṣāviśeṣaikāntavādayoḥ svavacanavyapekṣākṣepadustaravirodhatvāllaukikapratyakṣavilakṣaṇaṃ pratyakṣaṃ kalpitamapi tvayuktamityuktam .
nānātvaikāntavāde'pi sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥayuktaṃ pratyakṣam iti vartate . kīdṛśaṃ vā tat
pratyakṣaṃ kathamayuktaṃ vā ? iti, ātmendriyamanorthasannikarṣād yanniṣpadyate tadanyat, ātmā manasā
mana indriyeṇa indriyamartheneti catuṣṭayatrayadvayasannikarṣādutpadyamānaṃ pratyakṣamityetadapi nānātvaikāntavādimataṃ
dravyādinirmūlatvāt kimātmādi ? iti na pratyakṣam, dravyamādiryeṣāṃ ta ime dravyādayo dravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyā adravyatvāt dravyebhyo'nye khapuṣpavanna syuḥ, evaṃ guṇebhyo'nye na syuraguṇatvāt,
akarmatvāt karmaṇo'nye, asāmānyatvāt sāmānyato'nye, aviśeṣatvād viśeṣebhyo'nye, asamavāyatvāt
samavāyādanye, nirmūlatvācca khapuṣpavat sarve . tasya nirmūlatvaṃ cāpariṇāmitvād vandhyāputravat . ato'sattvādātmādīnāmātmamano'kṣārthābhāve kimātmādi, yatsannikarṣājjñānamutpadyeta ? kasya tat, ātmadravyābhāvāt ? kiṃ tat, guṇābhāvāt ? itiśabdo hetvarthe, rājapuruṣo'smīti na bibhemi iti yathā tathā
iti na pratyakṣam, ātmādidravyāṇāṃ jñānādiguṇānāṃ cābhāvānnāsti pratyakṣamityarthaḥ . teṣāṃ cātmādīnāmanyathā paramārthato vidyamānānāmanekāntātmakānāmekāntātmatayā kalpanādanyathādhyāropāt kalpanātmakatvādibhyo hetubhyo bhrāntyādivanna pratyakṣamiti pūrvoktaṃ tadeva vyācaṣṭe --dravyarūpādītyādi yāvatkalpanāt .

kāryatadatatpadārthānekāntasvatattvānyatamaikāntakalpanāt kalpanātmakatvādibhyo
bhrāntyādivat .
ataḥ sarvapramāṇāvirodhitattvavyavahārasamavasthalokaparigrahavadeva sāmānyaviśeṣau ghaṭādiviṣayāviti vidhiḥ .
eṣa ca vedavādibhirapi lokapramāṇaka ājñānikavāda upajīvyate yasyāya-
dravyagrahaṇena pṛthivyādīnāṃ tatkalpitānāṃ sarvaguṇānāṃ guṇagrahaṇena bhavanagrahaṇena sattāyāḥ viśeṣagrahaṇena
gotvādīnāṃ yāvadantyaviśeṣasya kāraṇagrahaṇenāvayavādidravyāṇāṃ saṃyogādiguṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca grahaṇam . 
kāryagrahaṇena dvyaṇukādyavayavidravyāṇāṃ citrādiguṇānāṃ ca grahaṇam . tatra paramārthataḥ sa ca asaśca padārtho'nantarokto dravyādiḥ, tasyānekāntaḥ svatattvaṃ dravyamapi rūpādyapi bhavanamapi viśeṣo'pi kāraṇamapi
kāryamapīti . tasya tasyānyatamaikāntakalpanādatattvaṃ dravyameva guṇa eva karmaiva bhavanameva viśeṣa eva
netarasvatattvamapīti . tasmāt kalpanātmakatvaṃ siddham . tataḥ kalpanātmakatvādibhyo bhrāntyādivadapratyakṣam . kalpanātmakatvādayaḥ prāguktādhyāropātmakālambanaviparītapratyayatvādayaḥ .
ataḥ sarvapramāṇāvirodhītyādi yāvadvidhiriti . ata ityanantaroktasarvopapattiprapañcato yat
prāk pratijñātaṃ yathālokagrāhameva vastu iti tannigamayati sopapattikaṃ sarvapramāṇāvirodhitattvavyavahārasamavasthalokaparigrahavadeveti, pratyakṣānumānāgamapramāṇairanavadhāritakāraṇakāryobhayānubhayātmakaṃ tasya
tasya vastuno bhāvastattvamavirodhi, tasmiṃstattve tattvasya tattvena vā vyavahāraḥ, tasmin samavasthā yasya
lokasya tasya lokasya parigrahaḥ sa sarvapramāṇāvirodhitattvavyavahārasamavasthalokaparigrahaḥ, tadvat tena tulyaṃ
vartata iti . evetyavadhāraṇe, tādṛglokaparigrahavadeva sāmānyaviśeṣau, na tu sāmānyameva viśeṣa eva
parasparato bhinnāvabhinnāveveti vā yathā śāstreṣu kalpitāviti . athavā sarvapramāṇāvirodhini tattvavyavahāre
samavasthā yasya sa lokaḥ sarvapramāṇāvirodhitattvavyavahārasamavasthaḥ, tasya parigrahavadeva sāmānyaviśeṣau
nānyatheti yathā pratipāditaṃ lokavadeva ghaṭādiviṣayāviti, yathā loke ghaṭādibhavanameva sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaśca
dravyakṣetrakālabhāvarūpabhavanāviśeṣaviśeṣābhyāmuktavidhinā kāryakāraṇādibhedena vā niyatau sarvatra na maryādayetyanavadhṛtasvabhāvau . iti vidhiḥ, iti pradarśane, eṣa vidhiritthaṃ vicārito yaḥ pṛthaguddiṣṭaḥ .
eṣa ca vedavādibhirapi lokapramāṇaka ājñānikavāda upajīvyata iti . nayānāmekaikasya
śatadhā bhedāt saptanayaśatāni ārṣe vyākhyāyante, teṣāṃ punaścaturdhā saṅkṣepaḥ kriyā-'kriyā-'jñāna-vinaya

manyo bhedaḥ--sarvamidamajñānapratibaddhameva jagat pṛthivyādi . indriyāṇyapi ca tanmayānyevācetanāni . tatkaraṇatvāt taiḥ prakāśitaṃ sthūlamajñaṃ pratipadyeta jñaḥ . tasyāpi
cendriyasannikṛṣṭasyāsādhāraṇasvarūpasya na nirūpaṇopāyo'sti, pratyekaṃ samudāye vā
vādasamavasaraṇavacanāt tatroktaḥ, ājñānikavādaḥ kiñcinna jñāyate, ko ha vaitad veda ? kiṃ vā'nena
jñātena ? ityaśakyaprāptyaphalatvābhyāṃ vastutattvavicāro na yujyate, kriyāyā evopadeśo'taḥ śreyān iti
leśenābhyupagatatvāt . yasyāyamanyo bheda iti tasyaivājñānavādasyānyo'yaṃ bhedaḥ . katamo'sau bhedaḥ ?
sarvamidamajñānapratibaddhameva jagat pṛthivyādīti . katham ? rūpādimattvād ghaṭādivat . ādigrahaṇāt pṛthivyaptejovāyavaḥ . nanvete padārthā ajñā eva, kimarthamajñānapratibaddhaṃ jagat pṛthivyādītyucyate ?
ucyate--ākāśakāladigātmendriyamanaḥprabhṛtīnāmapi tadvyatirekeṇānupalabdherna santi tanmayatvādeva ca
tadvadacetanānyata āha --indriyāṇyapi ca tanmayānyevācetanānīti . tanmayatvānumānaṃ ca bhūyastvād
gandhavattvācca pṛthivī gandhajñāne . tathāpastejo vāyuśca rasarūpasparśeṣu rasarūpasparśaviśeṣāt
vai॰ sū॰ 8 . 2 . 5-6 iti .
syānmatam--pratyabhijñānāhaṅkārecchādiviśeṣaliṅgadarśanādātmā tadguṇastadvyatirikto'stīti . etaccāyuktam, guṇaguṇinorbhedamicchatāṃ jñānādanyatvasāmyāt pṛthivyādiguṇatve'pi tulyānumānatvāt . abhyupetyāpi ātmādivyatirekaṃ tatkaraṇatvāt teṣāmindriyāṇāṃ karaṇatvāt tāni vā'sya karaṇāni tatkaraṇo
jñaḥ, taiḥ karaṇaiḥ prakāśitaṃ ghaṭādisthūlamajñaṃ prakāśyatvādeva cānyamapyarthaṃ prakāśya pratipadyamāno'pi
pratipadyeta jñaḥ, sambhāvyamānapratipattirapi puruṣaḥ sthūlamevārthaṃ pratipadyetājñānātmakam . karaṇāni
cājñāni . acetanakaraṇaprakāśitamapyacetanaṃ pradīpaprakāśitaghaṭādivadeva syāt sthūlaṃ ca, na paramāṇvādi
sūkṣmaṃ śuddhaṃ cetanasvarūpapuruṣādi vā syādajñānāpratibaddham . tasyāpi cendriyasannikṛṣṭasyetyādi .
satyapi ca tasya sthūlasya grāhyatve tatsvarūpājñānādajñānasambaddhameva . tasyendriyasannikṛṣṭasya dravyāntaravyatiriktamasādhāraṇaṃ yat svarūpamātmādervātīndriyasya tasya kvacit kadācidadṛṣṭatvāt idamidam iti
na nirūpaṇopāyo'sti . nirūpaṇaṃ nirṇayajñānamiṣṭam . kiṃ kāraṇaṃ na nirūpaṇopāyo'sti idamidam iti
cet, ucyate --pratyekaṃ samudāye vā taddṛṣṭyanupapatteḥ, tasyāsādhāraṇarūpasyāpūrvasyāpūrvatvādeva dṛṣṭyanupapattirnirṇayānupapattiśca . pratyekaṃ tāvanna hi ghaṭa ekaikaḥ kṛṣṇādirūpo'pūrvatvāddṛśyate svarūpataḥ, tata eva
pratyekamanirūpitasvarūpāṇāṃ kuto nirūpaṇaṃ samudāye, sikatāsu pratyekamanirūpitasya samudāye tailasya nirūpaṇābhāvavat ? niścayena rūpaṇaṃ nirūpaṇam, tadupāyābhāvāt ajñānapratibaddhameva sarvam iti sādhūktam .


taddṛṣṭyanupapatteḥ . svasaṃvedanenocchvasanābhyavahṛtapariṇatisuptādicalanakaṇḍūyanasphuraṇaghrāṇarasanādikriyā asañcetitāḥ . itthaṃ kalpitākalpitatathābhūtapratyayānupapatterajñānānuviddhameva sarvaṃ jñānam . paricchedārthaśca pramāṇavyāpāraḥ . na cetthaṃ tatparicchedo'sti .
na ca ajñānam ityuktavirodhaḥ, rādhakapūrṇakamātṛvyapadeśavadviśeṣyaprādhānyādanavadhāraṇājjñānājñānayoraviśeṣāt saṃśayaviparyayānadhyavasāyanirṇayāvagamāvabodhārthatvāt .

syānmatam--anubhaviturbāhyaviṣayam idamidam iti nirūpaṇaṃ mā bhūd yadi na bhavati, svasaṃvedanaṃ
tvāntaraṃ sukhaduḥkhādiṣu kiṃ nirūpaṇaṃ na bhavati ? iti . ucyate --svasaṃvedanenocchvasanābhyavahṛtapariṇatītyādi, vyabhicārānna bhavati, prāṇāpānāvasañcetayanneva hi kurute sarvo lokaḥ, abhyavahṛtamapi khalarasabhāvena
rasarudhirādibhāvena ca pariṇamayanna sañcetayati svayameva . tathā suptādīnāṃ calanakaṇḍūyanasphuraṇādikriyāḥ
kurvatāmasañcetayamānānāmeva tāḥ kriyā dṛśyante . supta-matta-mūrcchita-garbhāḥ suptādayaḥ . tathānyamanasāmavyaktacalanakaṇḍūyanamaśakadaṃśasparśasaṃvedanaṃ gandhādijñānaṃ suptādīnāṃ cāmladravyāsvādanamasañcetitam . rasanamāsvādanamityarthaḥ . ādigrahaṇāt kṣutajṛmbhitakāsitādayaḥ . yathaitāḥ kriyā asañcetitāstathā svasaṃvedanamapi . itthaṃ kalpitākalpitatathābhūtapratyayānupapatteḥ, kalpitastāvat kalpitatvādeva tathābhūto na
bhavati pratyayaḥ, akalpito'pītthamuktavidhinā nopapadyate tathābhūtaḥ pratyayaḥ śuddha ityarthaḥ . tasmāt kalpitākalpitatathābhūtapratyayānupapatterajñānānuviddhameva sarvaṃ jñānamiti . paricchedārthaśca pramāṇavyāpāraḥ,
pramāṇaṃ hi vyāpriyamāṇaṃ yathārthaparicchedārthamiṣyate, na cetthaṃ tatparicchedo'stīti vaidharmyaṃ darśayati .
syānmatam--ajñānapratibaddham ityajñānaśabdoccāraṇādeva jñānābhyupagamaḥ kṛto bhavati pratiṣedhasyā'brāhmaṇavadanyatra prasiddhaviṣayatvāt, anyathā pratiṣedhānupapatteḥ svavacanavirodhācca . tadapi na cājñānamityuktavirodhaḥ . kimiva ? rādhakapūrṇakamātṛvyapadeśavat . kutaḥ ? viśeṣyaprādhānyādanavadhāraṇāt,
kā bhāvanā ? yathā rādhakasya pūrṇakasya vaikaiva mātā vivakṣitā bhavati tadā rādhakamātā iti rādhakena
viśiṣyamāṇāviśeṣyamāṇā pūrṇakamātā iti pūrṇakena vā atha rādhakapūrṇakamātā ityubhābhyāṃ vā, sarvathā rādhakasyaiva
pūrṇakasyaiva vā mātetyavadhāraṇaṃ nāsti, viśeṣyaprādhānyāt, tathā jñānājñānābhyāṃ tadeva viśiṣyateviśeṣyate vastviti
viśeṣyaprādhānyānnoktivirodho jñānājñānayoraviśeṣāt . na tu yathā viśeṣaṇaprādhānyādavadhāraṇaṃ nīlamutpalam iti . atasteṣāmavabodhārthābhedājjñānatvamajñānatvaṃ cāviśiṣṭamiti tat pradarśayannāha --saṃśayaviparyayānadhyavasāyanirṇayāvagamāvabodhārthatvāt . gamḷ sṛpḷ gatau pā॰ dhā॰ 982--983, ava pūrṇagamanamavagamaḥ, avagamaścāvabodhaḥ, abudha vagamanebudha avagamane pā॰ dhā॰ 858, 1172 iti vacanāt . sarveṣāṃ saṃśayaviparyayanirṇayānadhyavasāyānāmavagamārthatvādavagamasya cāvabodhaparyāyatvāt .


tasmādetasminnayabhaṅge'jñāta eva śabdasyārthaḥ . yathā cāhuḥ—
astyarthaḥ sarvaśabdānāmiti pratyāyyalakṣaṇam .apūrvadevatāśabdaiḥ samamāhurgavādiṣu ॥ vākyapa॰ 2 . 121
sarvāṇi ca padāni vākyārthaḥ .
vyavahāradeśatvāccāsya dravyārthatā . dravyaśabdodravyaśabdo droravayave drurgatiryātrā vyavahāro lokasya

tasmādetasmin nayabhaṅge'jñāta eva śabdasyārthaḥ . bhaṅgagrahaṇaṃ bhaṅgāntarasūcanārtham, parasparanirapekṣāṇāṃ bhaṅgānāṃ vṛttermṛṣātvāt tadviparyayāyāḥ satyatvāt teṣāṃ ca vidhiniyamayoreva bhaṅgatvānnayānām .
tasmādasminneva nayabhaṅge śabdasyājñāto'rthaḥ, nānyeṣu, teṣvapyanye'nye'rthā iti . etasya darśanasya jñāpakamāha—
yathā cāhuḥ--astyarthaḥ sarvaśabdānāmiti ślokaḥ . sattāmātramarthaḥ sarvaśabdānām, ko'pyasyārtho'sti,
na nirarthakaḥ śabdaḥ, sa punarartho na nirūpayituṃ śakyaḥ ayamayam iti, etat pratyāyyalakṣaṇam . tatra dṛṣṭānto'pūrvadevatāsvargaśabdānāmarthāḥ, yathā teṣāmatyantāparidṛṣṭatvāt īdṛśo'pūrvaḥ svargo devatā vedṛśī iti na
pratipadyāmahe nirūpaṇena tathā gavādiśabdānāmapyarthaistatsamaireva bhavitavyam, na hi gamanagadanagarjanādiṣvarthavyavasthā viśeṣarūpeti kaścidastyarthaḥ ityetāvat pratipattavyam . etasminneva nayabhaṅge sarvāṇi ca
padāni vākyārthaḥ . tadyathā--devadatta ! gāmabhyāja śuklāṃ daṇḍena ityatra parasparāvivekena saṅkīrṇarūpāṇi
padāni ekārthāni anvayavyatirekābhyāmanugamyamānaṃ sampiṇḍitamevārthaṃ brūyurna pṛthagbhūtam . tasmāt sarvāṇi
padāni vākyāya vākyārthaḥ, padānyeva vākyārthaḥ, naikaikaṃ na tadvyatiriktam . yathoktam --arthaikatvādekaṃ
vākyaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ cedvibhāge syāt mīmāṃsāsū॰ 2 . 1 . 46 iti . na tu yathānyaiḥ kalpyate'nyathā—
ākhyātaśabdaḥ saṅghāto jātiḥ saṅghātavartinī .eko'navayavaḥ śabdaḥ kramo buddhyanusaṃhṛtiḥ ॥
padamādyaṃ pṛthak sarvaṃ padaṃ sāpekṣamityapi .vākyaṃ prati matirbhinnā bahudhā nyāyadarśinām ॥ vākyapa॰ 2 . 1--2
iti, alaukikatvādaśakyaprāptyaphalatvābhyāmeva .
kva punarayaṃ nayo'ntarbhāvyate, kiṃ dravyanayabhede ? paryāyanayabhede ? ucyate --vyavahāradeśatvāccāsya
dravyārthatā, laukikasama upacāraprāyo vistṛtārtho vyavahāraḥ tattvārthabhā॰ 1 . 35 iti vacanāt tasya

tasyā avayava ekadeśo'samastavṛttiranyathāvṛttitvāt . loke hi tadekadeśavṛttitā
mṛdghaṭādisāmānyaviśeṣatvadravyatvānāmiti dik .
tasmādanyattvavastu, alaukikatvāt, khakusumavat, vyatireke ghaṭavat .
nibandhanaṃ cāsya--ātā bhaṃte ! ṇāṇe, aṇṇāṇe ? gotamā ! ṇāṇe ṇiyamā ātā, ātā puṇa
siyā ṇāṇe siyā aṇṇāṇe . bhagavatīsū॰ 12 . 3 . 46712 . 10 . 468
dravyārthabhedatvāt . lokavyavahāraviṣayo hi vyavahāraḥ, tadekadeśo vidhinayaḥ, tasmāddravyārthabhedaḥ . yathā—
davvaṭṭhiyaṇayapagatī suddhā saṃgahaparūvaṇāvisa+o .paḍirūvaṃ puṇa vayaṇatthaṇiccha+o tassa vavahāro ॥ sanmati॰ 1 . 4
tasya śabdārthavyutpattidarśanārthamāha --dravyaśabda iti, droravayavo dravyam iti vyutpāditatvāt atha druḥ

5 . 2 . 108 iti nipātitatvāt, tasyārtho drurgatiryātrā vyavahāro lokasyeti . tasyā yātrāyā avayava
ekadeśa ityarthakathanam . sa ekadeśaḥ ka iti cet, ucyate--ekadeśo'samastavṛttiranyathāvṛttitvāt,
samastalokavyavahāraviparītavṛttitvānmithyādṛṣṭirityarthaḥ . sā punarasyā vidhivṛtterekadeśavṛttitā kutaḥ paricchidyata iti cet, lokata eva paricchidyata ityarthaḥ . yasmālloke tadekadeśavṛttitā mṛdghaṭādisāmānyaviśeṣatvadravyatvānām, mṛt sāmānyam, ghaṭo viśeṣaḥ, mṛdaḥ sāmānyaṃ dravyatvam, ghaṭaviśeṣaśchidrabudhnakhaṇḍauṣṭha-sampūrṇa-rakta-kṛṣṇatādiḥ . sarva evaiṣo'parityājyo'rthakalāpaḥ samastavṛttau nayānāṃ yathāsvaṃ ca
pramāṇavaśādvyavasthāpyaḥ . tasyājñānānuviddhatvaikāntādvakṣyamāṇadoṣasambandhācca laukikasyāpyasyā'yuktiḥ .
iti parisamāptau, vidhinayaśatabhede digiti .
tasmādanyat tvavastu, alaukikatvāt, khakusumavaditi gatārtham . abhiprāyārthaḥ--sa tu
manyate loko'laukikaikāntaṃ sāṅkhyādiparikalpitamavastviti . vyatireke ghaṭavaditi, yadvastu tallaukikameva yathā ghaṭaḥ kāryaṃ vā kāraṇaṃ vā sāmānyaṃ vā viśeṣo vā yo vā sa vāstu yathālokaprasiddhi pṛthubudhnādiprāguktasāmānyaviśeṣabhavanāt sa ca laukika iti . vyatireke vaidharmye .
sarvanayānāṃ jinapravacanasyaiva nibandhanatvāt kimasya nibandhanamiti cet, ucyate, nibandhanaṃ cāsya—
ātā bhaṃte ! ṇāṇe, aṇṇāṇe ? iti svāmī gautamasvāminā pṛṣṭo vyākaroti gotamā ! ṇāṇe

ṇiyamā ātā, jñānaṃ niyamādātmā jñānasyātmavyatirekeṇa vṛttyadarśanāt . ātā puṇa siyā ṇāṇe
siyā aṇṇāṇe, ātmā punaḥ syājjñānam, syādajñānamapyasau jñānāvaraṇīyakarmavaśīkṛtatvāt saṃśayaviparyayānadhyavasāyabāhulyādityasmāt sūtrādetad mithyādarśanaṃ nirgatamajñānoktivirodhasamādhimaditi .
iti vidhibhaṅgāraḥ prathamo dravyārthabhedaḥ samāptaḥ ॥




oँ arham

atha dvitīyo vidhividhyaraḥ .

ayamapi tu vidhivṛttyekānto vipratiṣedhādayuktaḥ . tadyadi lokatattvamajñeyameva
lokatattvavyāvartanaṃ tarhyapratyayameva . yadi tajjñānamaphalameva kimiti śāstravihitārtha-

ayamapi tu vidhivṛttyekānto vipratiṣedhādayukta iti . kaḥ punaḥ sambandhaḥ ? svaviṣayasampātanenārthānāṃ bhāvanātmabhirvidhiniyamavṛttibhirviditapratyekatattvābhiḥ samadhigamyā jainasatyatvasādhanavṛttā
vivakṣitadvādaśavikalpaviśeṣaṇaikaiva vṛttiradhikṛtetyanantaroktāyā vidhivṛtterapi pratyekavṛttāyā mithyādṛṣṭitvādayamapi tu vidhivṛttyekāntastyājyaḥ . kasmāt ? ayuktatvāt, ayuktatvaṃ vipratiṣedhāt . viruddhaḥ pratiṣedho
vipratiṣedhaḥ, sarvamuktaṃ mṛṣā iti pratiṣedhavat . apiśabdāt sāmānyaviśeṣobhayavādaikāntaḥ prathamanayadūṣito'numata ityayamabhisambandhaḥ .
kathaṃ vipratiṣedha iti cet, ucyate--yaduktaṃ tvayā sarvamajñānānuviddhameva jñānam, na ca
jñānājñānayoḥ kaścidviśeṣo'sti saṃśayaviparyayānadhyavasāyanirṇayānāmavabodhaikārthatvāt, na lokatattvaṃ
jñātuṃ śakyam, viphalaśca vivekayatnaḥ śāstreṣu iti . tadyadi lokatattvamajñeyameva sarvaśāstravihitalokatattvavyāvartanaṃ tarhyapratyayameva aśakyaprāptyaphalatvābhyām, pratiṣedhasya pratiṣedhya- 
svarūpajñānaviṣayatvācca kiṃ tvayaivedaṃ viditvā'viditvā vā sāmānyaviśeṣau svaviṣayau paraviṣayau vā
syātāmityādi lokatattvaṃ śāstrāntareṣu kalpitaṃ dūṣitam ? viditvā cet, na tarhi tanmataṃ na viditam .
athāviditvā tataḥ kathaṃ dūṣitam ? ityubhayathāpi na yujyate pratiṣedho viruddhatvāt, pratiṣidhyate pratiṣedhyaṃ
ca na jñāyata iti hāsyametat . syānmatam--pratiṣedhyaṃ jñāyate, taistasya vastunaḥ sattvādiguṇatrayātmakakṣaṇasadrūpa-dravyādiṣaṭvadārthātmakāditayā bahudhā kalpitasyānupapatteriti . etadapi vipratiṣiddham, teṣāmapi
matānāṃ lokatattvāntaḥpātināṃ mithyāvidhikatvaṃ jñātamajñātaṃ vā syāt ? iti tulyavikalpatvāt, jñātā

pratiṣedhaprayāsaḥ ? kriyopadeśanyāyyatvābhyupagamo'pi caivaṃ vighaṭeta, saṃsevyaviṣayasvatattvānupātipariṇāmavijñānavirahitatvāt, avaidyauṣadhopadeśavad bālakāhigrahaṇavat .
jñātatvayośca taddoṣāvimokṣāt . sāmānyaṃ svaviṣayaṃ paraviṣayaṃ cetthamitthaṃ ca na yujyate tathā viśeṣa iti
prapañcitatvādajñātaṃ cet tat sarvam, apratyayatvānna pratiṣedha ityuktam . jñātaṃ cet kathaṃ jñātumaśakyaṃ
lokatattvam ? ityapratyayameva . svayamasamīkṣitavācyavācakasambandhatvāt te vacasa unmattavadeva tāvat
aśakyaṃ prāptuṃ lokatattvam ityuktam, vipratiṣedhāt .
yadapyuktam --anarthako vivekayatnaḥ śāstreṣviti, tatrāpi vipratiṣedhāt, yadi tajjñānamaphalameva kimiti śāstravihitārthapratiṣedhaprayāsaḥ ? śāstravihitārthajñānaṃ tatpratiṣedhopāyajñānaṃ
cāvadhāryam--kiṃ saphalam ? aphalam ? yadyaphalaṃ vijñānam, śāstravihitārthān pratiṣiṣedhiṣataḥ
prayāso'pyaphala evājñātatvāt pūrvavat . atha saphalam, aphalameva lokatattvajñānam iti vyāhanyate .
ataḥ ko ha vaitadveda ? kiṃ vā'nena jñātena ? ityetadayuktamuktam, vipratiṣedhāt .
yadapyuktaṃ vastutattvāśakyaprāpteḥ kriyāyā evopadeśo nyāyyastatpūrvakatvāt sukhāvāpteḥ ityatrocyate —
kriyopadeśanyāyyatvābhyupagamo'pi caivaṃ vighaṭeta, vighaṭata eva iti kathaṃ niṣṭhuramucyate ? vighaṭeta
iti tatsambhāvanayocyate dākṣiṇyalokajñānābhyām . ko heturvighaṭane ? saṃsevyaviṣayasvatattvānupātipariṇāmavijñānavirahitatvāt . sam ityekībhāve, ātmasādbhāvena sevyamānasya viṣayasya svatattvamāhārādeḥ śabdasparśarasarūpagandhātmakasya svarūpaṃ vātādiprakopaśamopacayapralayāvaham—
nāgarātiviṣāmustākvāthaḥ syādāmapācanaḥ . carakasaṃ॰ 6 . 15 . 98 iti .
tattattvānupātī pariṇāmaḥ, tadanupatituṃ śīlamasyeti, kimuktaṃ bhavati ? āsevyamānasya vastunastatkriyāta eva
svarūpānupātena vipākaḥ pariṇāmaḥ . tadvijñānavirahitatvam . sa itthaṃ vipākaḥ sukhāya duḥkhāya vetyetadvijñānaṃ
hitāhitaprāptiparihārārtham, tattu bhavatāṃ nāstyeva . atastadvirahitatvāt kriyopadeśo'pi agnihotraṃ juhuyāt
svargakāmaḥ, taṇḍulān pacedbhoktukāmaḥ ityādirdṛṣṭādṛṣṭārtho na ghaṭate, ajñātasaṃsevyavastutattvapariṇāmatvāt,
avaidyauṣadhopadeśavat, yathā kasyacidavijñātarasavīryavipākaprabhāvadravyaguṇaviśeṣabhāgābhāgasaṃyogasya deśa

upadeśādeva tajjñānayoga iti cet, na, ubhayathāpi pauruṣeyatvādveda-
kālāturaprakṛtisātmyāgnibalābalavātādirogasamutthānanidānādilakṣaṇānabhijñasyauṣadhopadeśo na ghaṭate tathā
agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ ityādyupadeśaḥ . athavā hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthatvāt sarvopadeśānāṃ tada-
bhāvāt krīḍitamevāstvitīdaṃ bālakāhigrahaṇavat tajjñānavirahitasyopadeśaśravaṇagrahaṇadhāraṇatarkaṇānuṣṭhānādi
anarthānubandhyeva syāditīdamarthapradarśanārthaṃ dvitīyamudāharaṇam .
upadeśādeva tajjñānayoga iti cet . syānmatam--puruṣasyātīndriyārthadarśanaśaktiśūnyatvāt
svargāpūrvakarmasambandhajñāne pūrvavijñānakāraṇābhāvādvandhyāyā dauhitrasmaraṇavat . dravya-guṇa-rasa-vīrya-vipākādijñānasyānumānaṃ pūrvavijñānakāraṇaṃ sambhāvyeta . tasmādupadeśādevāgnihotrakarmasvargaphalābhisambandhādijñānamiti . etaccāyuktam, ubhayathāpi pauruṣeyatvāt, dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthatvenopadeśajñānasyāpi pauruṣeyatvāt,
jñānato vacanataśca puruṣādhīnatvāditi vā; yathā tvamatīndriyeṣvartheṣu pūrvavijñānakāraṇābhāvaṃ manyase puruṣasya
puruṣajñānavacanānāṃ tadviṣayāṇāṃ cāprāmāṇyaṃ rāgādiyogāttathā sarvopadeśasyopadeṣṭṛjñānasya śrotṛjñānavacanayośca
jñānatvavacanatvābhyāṃ pauruṣeyatvānativṛtterbhāratarāmāyaṇādivadaprāmāṇyam . agnihotrādyupadeśasyātīndriyārthasya
prāmāṇyavat sāṅkhyādyatīndriyārthopadeśaprāmāṇyaṃ vā . vānaramūlikādiparijñānavat kasyacit kiñcidviṣayaṃ
tattvajñānaṃ syāt, na tu sarvauṣadhādiviṣayaikapuruṣajñānam, ato vaidyakādiṣvapi pūrvajñānakāraṇābhāvaḥ . tadviṣayaikapuruṣavijñānavadatīndriyendriyagrāhyasarvapadārthaviṣayaikapuruṣavijñānābhyupagamo vāvaśyambhāvī, kiṃ kāraṇam ?
vedavacanayoranyathānupapatteḥ, puruṣamantareṇa vedanaṃ vedo jñānamityarthaḥ tena ca jñātasya vacanaṃ parapratyāyanaṃ
tadubhayaṃ pratyayanaṃ pratyāyanaṃ ca nopapadyate, tayoḥ puruṣasamavāyitvāt . uktaṃ ca—
rūpaṃ nibandhaḥ sambandhaḥ prāmāṇyaṃ pratyayaḥ kriyā .śabdasya puruṣādhīnā jñānaṃ cānanyadātmanaḥ   iti .

vacanayoranyathānupapatteḥ . upadeśāprasiddhirapi caivaṃ bhavataḥ, sarvasyopadeśasya
sāṅkhyādyupadeśavallokatattvānveṣaṇādṛte sambhavābhāvāt . tasyāpi tvanavasthāne
auṣadhopadeśājñānavadagnihotrādyupadeśājñānam, tajjñānavat tadapi vā pramāṇāntaragamyamiti . evaṃ tāvat
kriyopadeśamabhyupagamya doṣa uktaḥ .
anabhyupagamyāpi upadeśāprasiddhirapi caivaṃ bhavataḥ, tvanmatenaiveti vākyaśeṣaḥ, sarvasyopadeśasya
sāṅkhyādyupadeśavallokatattvānveṣaṇādṛte sambhavābhāvāt, upadeśo vyākhyā, asau ca vyākhyā
padaviṣayā vākyaviṣayā pramāṇaviṣayā tadviṣayavastuviṣayā vā vedavyākaraṇasāṅkhyādiśāstravikalpitā
yathāsvaṃ prakriyābhiḥ . tatra yathā sāṅkhyādiprakriyābhirvastutattvaṃ ghaṭāderlokatattvānveṣaṇaparayā vyākhyayā vinā
nādhigamyate'tastathā vyākhyāyate evamagnihotrādi saṃjñāsaṃjñisambandhavyutpādanena vyākhyāyate, prakṛtipratyayādivibhāgena padaviṣayaṃ vākyaviṣayaṃ pramāṇaviṣayaṃ ca pratyakṣānumānāgamabādhābhyuccayavikalpāṅgāṅgibhāvavikalpādi
lokatattvānveṣaṇamantareṇa nādhigantuṃ śakyamityupadeśastattvānveṣaṇaparaḥ sarvaḥ pravartate . tatra yathā sāṅkhyādyupadiṣṭārtheṣvaśakyaprāptirupadeśānarthakyaṃ ca tathā vedavyākaraṇamīmāṃsādyupadeśānāmapītyupadeśāprasiddhiḥ . atha
lokatattvānveṣaṇaparāṇāṃ teṣāmupadeśānāṃ śakyaprāptyarthopadeśasāphalye śakyete, kaḥ parābhyupagame pradveṣaḥ ?
ihāpi ca yathā lokata eva pratyakṣānumānagamyaghaṭapaṭāditattvaparicchedaḥ śakyate kartumevaṃ padavākyapramāṇaparicchedo'pi śakyaḥ, ghaṭādipadācchabdārthapratyayaviṣayasya lokata eva varṇānupūrvyādiniyatavācyavācakapratyayāvyabhicārasya prasiddheḥ . evaṃ vākye pramāṇe ca yojyam . uktaṃ ca—
pramāṇāni pravartante prameyaiḥ sarvavādinām .saṃjñābhiprāyabhedāttu vivadante tapasvinaḥ ॥ siddha॰ dvā॰ 20 . 4 iti .
tasmādupadeśānāṃ tvanmatenaiva sarveṣāmaprāmāṇyasiddhiḥ, lokatattvānveṣaṇaparatve sati aśakyaprāptyaphalatvenābhyupagatatvāt, sāṅkhyādiśāstrakāropadeśavat . ato dṛṣṭādṛṣṭārthakriyopadeśe padavākyapramāṇaviṣayaviṣayavyākhyāvaiyarthyaprasaṅgānna vedaśāstropadeśasiddhirlokatattvānveṣaṇaparatvānativṛtteḥ, tarkaśāstravācyalokatattvavicāravijñānasāphalyaṃ vā . upadeśāprasiddhau parīkṣakatvahāniḥ, padavākyapramāṇaviṣayaviṣayāvyabhicārajñānārthatvāt
parīkṣāyāḥ . parīkṣaiva copadeśaḥ, parīkṣāvyākhyayoranarthāntaratvāt . sa copadeśastvanmatenaivaivaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate,
lokatattvānveṣaṇātmakatvāt .
syānmatam--padavākyapramāṇānāmapi sāmānyaviśeṣādighaṭādijagattattvavicāravadavyavasthaiva, pramāṇānāmapi pramāṇāntarādhigamyatve'navasthādoṣaprasaṅgāditi . atrocyate--pramāṇānavasthā tāvannāsti, candrārkamaṇipradīpādivat svaparāvabhāsitvāt pramāṇānām . padādīnāmabhyupagamyāpi tvanmatenā'navasthāmāha --tasyāpi

kriyāvidhāyyapi śāstraṃ nāvatiṣṭheteti tatprāpyapuṇyādyabhāvaḥ, yathā agnihotraṃ juhuyāt
svargakāma iti vidheraprasiddhārthaviṣayavidhāyitayā'saṃvyavahāryatvāttadvihitakriyāphalasambandhābhāva ārogyārthiḍitthabhakṣaṇoktivat .
athocyeta--kartavyatāṃ vidhāya itikartavyatāvidhānāt evamprakāramevāgnihotraṃ
nāma karma bhavati iti prasiddhaṃ bhaviṣyati tasyetarārthāvicāreṇa .
tvanavasthāne jagattattvasya pramāṇavicārasya vā kriyāvidhāyyapi śāstraṃ nāvatiṣṭheta, tasyāpi lokatattvānveṣaṇātmakatvānativṛtterapramāṇatvāt . itiśabdo hetvarthe, ayaṃ hetuḥ kriyāvidhāyiśāstrānavasthānāt
iti, atastatprāpyapuṇyādyabhāvaḥ, kriyāvidhāyiśāstropadiṣṭakriyābhivyaṅgyāpūrvābhāva ityarthaḥ . katamat
punastat kriyāvidhāyi śāstram ? ucyate, yathā--agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ ityetacchāstram . idaṃ
tu punaḥ kiṃ vidhiḥ, anuvādaḥ, arthavādaḥ ? ucyate --vidhiḥ . kathamupalakṣyate vidhiriti ? aprasiddhārthaviṣayavidhāyitayā lakṣyate . atrāprasiddhamagnisampradānaṃ havanaṃ vidhīyate, svargasya sukhasaṃjñasya tatprāptyāśrayasya viśiṣṭadeśādyātmakasya vā tadabhilāṣasya ca kartari siddhatvāt svargāvāptāvupāyo'gnihavanam ityupāyasyāpūrvatvāt . kathaṃ punastatkriyābhivyaṅgyāpūrvābhāvaḥ ? tvanmatādevoktavat . itaśca tarkotthāpitalokatattvajñānānapekṣatvāt tasya vidherasaṃvyavahāryatvam, asaṃvyavahāryatvāt tadvihitakriyāphalasambandhābhāvaḥ,
dṛṣṭānta ārogyārthiḍitthabhakṣaṇoktivat, yathā ārogyārthine puṃse ḍitthaṃ bhakṣaya ityuktistatkriyā ca viphale aprasiddhatvādevaṃ tvaduktikriye aśakyaprāptyarthe cetyaśakyaprāptyādimatsāṅkhyādivivekayatnatulyatvaṃ tavāpi .
athocyetetyādi . atrāha--mā maṃsthāḥ sāṅkhyādiyatnatulyatvametasya, kiṃ kāraṇam ? vaidharmyāt, 
tadyathā --kartavyatāṃ vidhāya itikartavyatāvidhānāt, tatra agnihotraṃ juhuyāt iti kartavyatayāgnihotraṃ vidhīyate, tataḥ punaruttaratra viśeṣya itikartavyatā vidhīyate tadagnihotramevamevaṃ ca kartavyam
iti yadyathāgniṣṭomādisaṃsthāviśeṣairdravya-guṇa-devatā-kartṛ-kāma-kāla-deśādiviśeṣaiśca, vasante brāhmaṇo yajeta,
grīṣme rājanyaḥ, śaradi vājapeyena vaiśyaḥ . holākā prācyaiḥ, udvṛṣabhayajña udīcyaiḥ   .

nanu caivamapi kartavyatāpratipattirlaukikakartavyatādyarthatattvānusṛtereva, kartavyatāvidhānānantaraṃ cetikartavyatāvasaraḥ, yathā ghaṭādikartavyatāyāṃ vihitāyāṃ ghaṭaṃ
kuru iti tataḥ punaritikartavyatākramaḥ--evaṃ nirvartayeriti . na tu ghaṭavadagnihotraśabdaḥ
bāyavyaṃvāyavyaṃ śvetamālabheta bhūtikāmaḥ, vāyurvai kṣepiṣṭhā devatā, vāyumeva svena bhāgadheyenopadhāvati,
sa evāsmin bhūtiṃ nidhatte tai॰ saṃ॰ 2 . 1 . 1 ityādi tvayā pratipatsyata iti śiṣyamanuśāsti . tata uttarakālam evamprakāramevāgnihotraṃ nāma karma bhavatiiti viśeṣavidhāyinārthapratipattibalena prasiddhaṃ
bhaviṣyati tasya śiṣyasya sāṅkhyādivivekaprayatnavailakṣaṇyena itarārthāvicāreṇa ghaṭaparamāṇvādikāryakāraṇasāmānyaviśeṣādisvarūpāvicāreṇeti .
atrocyate --nanu caivamapītyādi . nanvityanujñāpane, kartavyatā iti yā kartavyatāpratipatti
ragnihotrādiviṣayā sā pratipattitvāllaukikakartavyatādyarthatattvānusṛtereva, pratyekaṃ patanaṃ pratipattiḥ, sā
dvividhā--ādhyātmikī bāhyā ceti, tatrādhyātmikī idaṃ kartavyamidaṃ na kartavyam ityādikā buddhireva, bāhyā tu dvipadacatuṣpadadhanadhānyādyarthaṃ mamīkriyā . sā dvividhāpi lokaprasiddhamevārthamanusṛtya bhavitumarhati nāprasiddham, tasmādagnihotrādipratipattirapi lokatattvānusṛtereva, nānyathā . anyathā kimviṣayākiṃviṣayā
sā syānnālikeradvīpajātavṛddhasya godhenupratipattyabhāvavat ? iti taddarśayati --kartavyatāvidhānānantaraṃ
cetikartavyatāvasaraḥ, laukikakartavyatādyarthatattvānusṛtereva iti vartate . prasiddhakartavyatāpratipattyanantaraṃ
prasiddhetikartavyatāpratipattyavasara iti nyāyaḥ, tadubhayamalaukikatvādagnihotrasāmānyasyāgniṣṭomādiviśeṣasya

prādhānyamasti, kuryājjuhuyāditi tiṅantasya kriyāvācinaḥ prādhānyāt sādhanānāṃ sādhyasiddhyarthapravṛttitvāt .
apaśabdo hi nāma arthaviśeṣavivakṣāyāṃ tadabhidhāyitvarūpātikramāt . yathā goṇīśabdo hi sāsnādimatyarthe'paśabdaḥ, sa tu āvapane śabda eva . tathā gāvīśabdo'pi gavyavaseye'śaktiḥ gāvī ityasminnarthe śabda
eva . tathā coktam—

tasmādapaśabdaścāyamasminnarthe kuryādarthopādānaṃ cābhedakamiti sādhūktam .



tyaktajuhotikartrarthagrahe tu niṣkriyakartṛtvāt kuryādarthābhāvaḥ . juhotiprayogāsattvam, tyājyatvāt, vyādhivat . kriyānāmasvavṛttityāgopādānābhyāṃ dhātuprātipadikaprakṛtibhedo'pi, na padabheda eva padāntaraviṣayatvāttvāt vākyabheda eva vā, ajñātasyāgnihotrasya
kriyāviśeṣaṇatvenānuvādāt .

tyaktajuhotikartrarthagrahe tu niṣkriyakartṛtvāt kuryādarthābhāvaḥ . athācakṣīthāḥ--etaddoṣabhayāt
tyaktvā juhotyarthaṃ niṣkriyaṃ kartrarthamātrameva gṛhyate kuryāt iti kartavyatāmātracodanārthaḥ . evaṃ ca sati
tyaktajuhotikartrarthagrahe tu, tuśabdo viśeṣaṇe, atyantamarthābhāvenaiva viśeṣayati, karoti, kuryāt ityevamādiśabdānāṃ kṛñprakṛtīnāṃ ghaṭādikarmāpekṣāmantareṇa kiṃ karotu, kiṃ kuryāt ityanirṇītārthatvāt ko'rthaḥ syāt ?
kṛñarthābhāVe kartrarthasya niḥsādhyasya vā'kartṛtvaṃ syāt . ataḥ kuryācchabdo nirarthakaḥ, tyaktasvaprakṛtyarthatvāt
tādṛgvidhasya kṛbhvādiprakṛtirahitasya yādādipratyayāntasya prayogasyādarśanāt . abhyupetyāpi prayogaṃ juhotiprayogāsattvaṃ brūmaḥ, asattvamapraśastatvam, kutaḥ ? tyājyatvāt, tyājyatvaṃ tvayā tyaktatvādasmanmatenā'rthābhāvāt . arthābhāvaścoktavidhinā siddha eva . tasmāt tyājyatvādasattvaṃ juhuyāt ityasya prayogasya .
dṛṣṭānto vyādhivat, yathā vyādhistyājyatvādapraśastastathā juhotiśabdo'pi sārtha iti . kiñcānyat, 
kriyānāmasvavṛttītyādi . ākhyātasya kriyārthatvarūḍhasya svārthaṃ viprakīrṇāvayavakalāpaṃ tyaktvā piṇḍitahotrasattvārthopādānam, na ca tamapyupādāya tatraivāvatiṣṭhate, kiṃ tarhi ? punarapi sattvārthaṃ tyaktvā kriyārthopādānam .
evaṃ nāmaśabdasyāpi sattvavṛttiṃ svāṃ tyaktvā kriyārthopādānaṃ kriyārthaṃ tyaktvā sattvārthopādānamiti .
tābhyāmeva ca tyāgopādānābhyāṃ kuryāt, juhuyāt ityetayorapi śabdayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣārthayoritaretarārthavṛttyā bhedaḥ svaprakṛtibalena piṇḍanaviprakiraṇāt tadbhedavat tadbalenā'syāpi . tathā tadvācinyoḥ prakṛtyorapi
bhedastābhyāṃ tyāgopādānābhyām . kayoḥ prakṛtyoriti cet, dhātuprātipadikayoḥ, ata āha --dhātuprātipadikaprakṛtibhedo'pi, na padabheda eva, sa kutaḥ padabheda iti cet, padāntaraviṣayatvāt, padāntarasya
viṣayo'syeti padāntaraviṣayaṃ tat padamākhyātaṃ nāma vā, tadbhāvāt padāntaraviṣayatvāt kuryājjahuyāditi .
athavā vākyārthavicārapradhānasya mīmāṃsakasya yaduktaṃ prāk vākyabhedo vidhyanuvādatvāpatteḥ iti, sa tu na
kevalo vākyabhedaḥ padabheda eva vā, kiṃ tarhi ? dhātuprātipadikabhedo'pītyabhisambadhyate, na ityanuvartanāt . tatra ko heturiti cet, ajñātasyāgnihotrasya kriyāviśeṣaṇatvenānuvādāt, ajñātārtho

evaṃ ca śruteryāsau pratipattistasya abhāvaḥ . svapratyavekṣānuvādanyāyena ca
tattyāgāt kartrādyarthapratipattivaśena śabdārthasthāpanād nṛjñānameva pramāṇīkṛtam .
evaṃ tarhi yathāśruti agnihotravaddhavanamapi grahīṣyate . nanvarthadvayavidhānamaśakyamekena vākyena .
vidhiḥ, jñātārtho'nuvādaḥ, agnihotramajñātatvād vidhīyate, tat kuryāt, juhuyāt, havanaṃ kuryāt iti
juhotikriyayā viśeṣya prasiddhasya vihitasyaivānuvadanāditi prāguditamarthamupapattitvenopadarśayati .
tataśca kim ? evaṃ cetyādi yāvat tasyā abhāvaḥ . evaṃ cetyanantaranirdiṣṭakriyānāmasvavṛttityāgopādānābhyāmeva śruteryāsau pratipattirjuhuyādityasyāḥ padaśruterhavanakriyāvidhānamartho juhuyād havanaṃ
kuryāditi tasyā abhāvaḥ, sā na bhavati, anyathārthādhigateḥ, yacchabda āha tannaḥ pramāṇam pā॰ ma॰
bhā॰ 2 . 1 . 1 iti ca hīyate . nāmākhyātayorarthabhedatyāgopādānadoṣebhyaśca śabdāvyavasthānāt puruṣabuddhivaśena
śabdārthāvasthānam, kutaḥ ? svapratyavekṣānuvādanyāyena ca tattyāgāt, svayaṃ pratyavekṣito'rthastvayā
ayamasya śabdo'syārtha evaṃ bhavati na veti doṣavattvādayaṃ tyājyo'yaṃ guṇavattvādāśrayaṇīyaḥ iti vicārya
svamatipramāṇīkaraṇena śratiśrutiprāmāṇyatyāgaḥ kṛtaḥ . tatastattyāgāt kartrādyarthapratipattivaśena śabdārthasthāpanād nuḥ puruṣasya jñānameva pramāṇīkṛtam, tasyaiva vidhyarthavadavasthitasyānuvadanāt . ataśca
te vādāvasānaṃ nigrahasthānaṃ puruṣajñānaprāmāṇyāśrayeṇa kriyopadeśavākyāpramāṇīkaraṇāt pratijñātyāgapratijñāntaragamanalakṣaṇam . eṣa ca pratijñātyāgapratijñāntarāśrayaṇadoṣa itaratrāpyarthavyākhyāne havanaṃ kuryāt
ityetasmin bhavati, kasmāt ? svapratyavekṣānuvādena ca tattyāgāt kartrādyarthaniyatapratipattivaśena śabdārthasthāpanādevameva saprakṛtipratyaya evāgnihotraśabdo'vabodhyate śabdaprāmāṇyatyāgena svamatiprāmāṇyāvalambanāt .
evaṃ tarhi yathāśruti agnihotravaddhavanamapi grahīṣyate . āha--na śabdārthaṃ tyajāmi, uktadoṣabhayāt . kiṃ tarhi ? yā yā śrutiryathāśruti, yathāgnihotraśabdaśravaṇāt tadartho gṛhyate tathā havanamapi juhuyācchabdaśravaṇādgrahīṣyate, tato na doṣo'stīti . tadekatra havanamagnisampradānaviśiṣṭakarmakārakatayocyate, anyatra
svaviśiṣṭakartṛkatayeti . atrocyate --nanvarthadvayavidhānamaśakyamekena vākyena agnisampradānakasya karmabhūtasya havanasya tadviśiṣṭasya ca kartṛtvasya, yathā brāhmaṇasampradānakahavirdānavākyena śuklagavānayanamapi .


naiva havanaṃ vidhīyate, kiṃ tarhi ? agnihotraśabdena vihitaṃ havanamanūdyate .
prāptamanūdyate vākyāntareṇa, aprāptaṃ ca vidhīyate . na ca prāptirasti havanasya, avihitatvāt . yadagnihotraṃ havanameva tat, punaruktaṃ tarhyevam, anayoraviśeṣāt . vidhivihitasya hyanuvadanamanuvādaḥ . agnihotrahavanavidheyatvādanuvādāyogyatā .
atha tvicchayaivānuvādo yathākathañcit syāt tataḥ punaruktadoṣābhāva eva
syāt . uktaṃ hi—
anuvādādaravīpsābhṛśārthaviniyogahetvasūyāsu .īṣatsambhramavismayagaṇanāsmaraṇeṣvapunaruktam ॥  
idaṃ tvanuvādākṣamam, vidhīyamānatvāt, ākhyāyamānapaṇḍitatvavat . vihita-

itara āha --naiva havanaṃ vidhīyata ityādi . juhuyācchabdena naiva havanaṃ vidhīyate, kiṃ tarhi ?
agnihotraśabdena vihitaṃ havanamanūdyate, vidhyanuvādayorbhinnalakṣaṇatvāt . kiṃ tayorlakṣaṇamiti cet,
ucyate --prāptamanūdyate vākyāntareṇa, yathā paṇḍitastiṣṭhati iti śāstrajñaḥ paṇḍitaḥ iti vākyāntaravihitapāṇḍityasya sthānānuvādāt . aprāptaṃ ca vidhīyate, yad vākyāntarāprāpitamavijñātaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa
tad vidhīyate, yathā svargakāmo juhuyāditi . atrocyate--yadyetadvidhyanuvādayorlakṣaṇaṃ nānuvādo havanasya yujyate,
yasmānna ca prāptirasti havanasya, avihitatvāt . itara āha--asti prāptirhavanasya, agnihotrasya havanatvāt tasya ca vihitatvādityata āha --yadagnihotraṃ havanameva tat, punaruktaṃ tarhyevamanayoragnihotrahavanavidhānayoraviśeṣāt . etaccārthapunaruktam, punaruktaṃ ca nānuvāda unmattavākyavat . anuvādalakṣaṇābhāvaṃ
cāsya darśayati --vidhivihitasya hi anuvadanamanuvāda iti, hiśabdo yasmādarthe, yasmād vidhivākyavihitasyārthasya paścādarthaviśeṣaprāpaṇārtho vādo'nuvādaḥ . tadatra lakṣaṇaṃ na ghaṭate, agnihotrahavanavidheyatvāt, 
agnihotrasya havanasya caikībhūtayorvidheyatvāt . tannigamayati --anuvādāyogyateti .
atha tvicchayaivānuvādo yathākathañcit syāt . syānmatam--vakturvivakṣitapūrvikā śabdapratipattirityasya havanasya vidhānaṃ na vivakṣyate, anuvādo vivakṣyata iti . etadapi yathākathañcit syād vihitārthābhāvāt, vivakṣecchayoranarthāntaratvādicchāmātrataśca nirupapattikasyārthasyāsiddherna syādityabhiprāyaḥ . yadyapi
yathākathañcit syāt tataḥ punaruktadoṣābhāva eva syāt, iṣyate ca paunaruktyaṃ śabdato'rthataśca, uktārthaśabdārthakathanamaviśeṣeṇa punaruktamanyatrādarādibhyaḥ   iti paunaruktyābhāvaḥ .
uktaṃ hīti punaruktāpavādamarthaviśeṣāpekṣaṃ darśayati anuvādādara . paṇḍitamānaya ityukte paṇḍito
devadatta ityanuvādo na punaruktam . evamādare svāmin svāminniti . vīpsāyāṃ grāmo grāmo ramaṇīyaḥ .

meva tvanūdyate ca viśeṣavidhānārtham . na cātra kaścijjuhotipunarvacanena viśeṣo
janyate . tataśca prāktanameva sañjātam . sarvathā kimatiricyate paunaruktyadoṣavyapetam ?
vidhiliṅkartā āste . ato nānuvādaḥ, uttaraviśeṣāsambandhanāt, vidhīyamānapaṇḍitatvavat .
athocyeta--vidhiliṅkartrarthe pratyayārthe'vaśiṣyamāṇe'vaśyavācye prakṛtiparavyava-
bhṛśārthe ghanaṃ ghanaṃ mṛdu mṛdu śanaiḥ śanairiti . viniyoge ghaṭaṃ kuru ghaṭaṃ kurviti . hetau kṛtakatvādanityo ghaṭaḥ,
tasmāt kṛtakatvāditi . asūyāyāṃ viparyasyā''syaṃ hasati hasatīti . īṣadīṣaditi, stokaṃ stokamiti .
sambhrame svāgataṃ svāgatamiti . vismaye vidyādharo vidyādhara iti . gaṇane ekamekaṃ dve dve iti . smaraṇe ā !
vidito viditaḥ pāṭaliputre dṛṣṭo dṛṣṭo'sīti . evamādyarthaviśeṣābhāve punaruktadoṣāvaśyambhāvād na cedanuvādatvamasya paunaruktyamevāsya . paunaruktyābhāve nānuvādatvam . tasmādidaṃ tvanuvādākṣamamayogyamityarthaḥ,
katamat ? juhuyādityetat padam . kutaḥ ? vidhīyamānatvāt, yo'rtho vidhīyate na so'nūdyate, ākhyāyamānapaṇḍitatvavat, yathāyaṃ paṇḍito devadatta iti vidhīyamānapāṇḍityo devadatto nānūdyate tathā juhuyādityetadapi apūrvopadeśatvādanuvādavaidharmyāccāsya tallakṣaṇābhāvāt . kiṃ tallakṣaṇamiti cet, vihitameva tvanūdyate ca viśeṣavidhānārtham, yathā--paṭurdevadattaḥ, payasainaṃ bhojayeti . tallakṣaṇābhāvāt kim ? tallakṣaṇābhāvānnānuvādo'pūrvavidhānāt, yatra na viśeṣo vidhīyate maulavidhireva saḥ .
evaṃ tarhi viśeṣavidhānādanuvādo'stu tadvaditi cet, tanna bhavati, yasmād na cātra kaścijjuhotipunarvacanena viśeṣo janyate, juhuyāt ityanena śabdena agnihotraśabdābhihitādarthānna kaścidanyo
viśiṣṭo'rtho'bhidhīyate yato'nuvādaḥ syāt . tataśca prāktanameva sañjātaṃ yāvadeva agnihotraṃ kuryāt iti
vākyavikalpe'bhihitaṃ tāvadeva agnihotraṃ juhuyāt ityatrāpi vākye, tato'dhikaṃ na kiñcidasti . evaṃ yāṃ
tāṃ gatiṃ gatvā kalpayitvāpi sarvathā sarvaprakāreṇa agnihotraṃ juhuyāt ityasmin vākye'gnihotrakarmaṇyevāntarbhāvitahavane juhuyācchabdaprakṛtyarthe kimatiricyate paunaruktyadoṣavyapetam ? vidhiliṅkartāste,
vidhau vihitasya liṅpratyayasya kartṛkārakasya tanmātrārtha āste na dūṣitaḥ, anyat sarvaṃ punaruktādidoṣaduṣṭamevetyarthaḥ agnihotraṃ kuryāt, agnihotraṃ juhuyāt ityetayorvākyārthavikalpayoruktadoṣatvāt . ato nānuvādaḥ, uktadoṣasambandhādityarthaḥ . kathamiti cet, uttaraviśeṣāsambandhanād vidhīyamānapaṇḍitatvavadityetadanantaroktārthasamāhārārthaṃ sādhanaṃ gatārtham . tasmāt kartrarthamātramavaśiṣyate, śeṣaṃ punaruktam .
athocyeteti paramatamāśaṅkate . atha tvayocyeta --vidhiliṅkartrarthaḥ pratyayārtho'nuktatvādavaśiṣyate,
avaśyaṃ ca vācyo'sau, tasmin pratyayārthe'vaśiṣyamāṇe'vaśyavācye, prakṛtiparavyavasthāyā iti

sthāyā āvaśyake prakṛtyupādāne prāpte varamāsannā prakṛtirupāttā, arthaḥ punarasyā na
vivakṣyate gatārthatvāt . evaṃ tarhi varatarakaṃ pratyāsannatarā'vivakṣitārthā kṛñprakṛtirupāttā, vacanasyopāttārthapratyāyanārthatvāt . sāpi cāpakṣiptavācyārthasthitiruktavat .
asmiṃstu nyāye'tilaṅghyamāne kriyopadeśavādo'pi tattvavādavadeva tyaktaḥ
syāt, tatrāpi yadṛcchābhyupagamāt . ko ha vaitadveda bālapralāpavad vyavasthāpetamu-
hetvarthe pañcamī, prakṛteḥ paraḥ pratyayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 3 . 1 . 2 itīyaṃ vyavasthā, tasyā vyavasthāyā maryādāyāḥ sthiterhetorāvaśyakaṃ prakṛtyupādānam, tasmiṃścāvaśyake prakṛtyupādāne prāpte katamā
prakṛtirupādātuṃ yogyā ityevaṃ vicārayata idaṃ me yogyamiti pratibhāti --varamāsannā prakṛtirupāttā, arthaḥ
punarasyā na vivakṣyate gatārthatvāt, tasmādavivakṣitārthā sā, satyapi nāntarīyakatve pratyāsannaprakṛtyupādāne vilakṣaṇāmanyāṃ parityajyā'vilakṣaṇā juhotiprakṛtirevopāttetyavaseyam, prayogo'gnihotraṃ juhuyāditi .

rthā'nuktārthā kṛñprakṛtirupāttā . kiṃ kāraṇam ? vacanasyopāttārthapratyāyanārthatvāt, arthaṃ pratyāyayiṣyāmīti hi śabdaḥ, kartṛpratyayāntayā kṛñprakṛtyā pratyāyyate sphuṭataram, ato'gnihotraṃ kuryādityevāstu .
itara āha--tvayaiva samarthitatvādevamevāstu . ācārya āha--syādevaṃ yadi sāpi cārthasthitirnirdoṣā syāt,
kintu sāpi cāpakṣiptavācyārthasthitiruktavat, tasyāmapyarthasthitau nirākṛto vācyo'rthaḥ juhrotyajuhotyarthatyāgabhedābhyām ityādiprabandhena uktavad yathāśrutārthābhāvādidoṣāt pauruṣeyatvādiprasaṅgācca . evaṃ tāvannyāyena parīkṣyamāṇametadvākyaṃ na yujyate puruṣatarkalakṣaṇena .
yadyapi puruṣatarkalakṣaṇaṃ nyāyamatilaṅghyāpauruṣeyo nityo vedākhyaḥ kriyopadeśaḥ puruṣagatarāgādidoṣāśaṅkāhetuvinirmuktaḥ pramāṇam, puruṣakṛtāni hi vākyāni avidyārāgādyaviyuktapuruṣavadapramāṇāni aphalāśakyaprāptinityānityādivastutattvavicāraviṣayāṇi, saphalaśakyaprāptipuruṣahitopāyakriyopadeśāttu vedavādaḥ

avadhāraṇavaiṣamyamapyataḥ . iyaṃ bhāvanā--yā tatra bhāvanā yūpaṃ chinatti cchedanena
yūpaṃ svīkarotīti, na ca cchedanamevetyavadhāryate'ṣṭāśrikaraṇādīnāmasaṃskāratvaprasaṅgāt,

hyagnihotraṃ karoti na pravrajyādinā, na ca karotyevetyavadhāryate svargādikāmābhāve
karaṇābhāvāt .
ata eva prasiddhivaiṣamyamapi, tasyāprasiddhasya kriyākalāpābhimatārthanāmadheyamātratvāt . śailīprāmāṇye cāsya śailyā yūpakriyā'yāthārthyāt .

avadhāraṇavaiṣamyamapyata iyamityādi . anantaroktā yeyaṃ bhāvanā, anayaiva bhāvanayāvadhāraṇavaiṣamyamapi bhāvayiṣyāmi, ata āha --yā tatra bhāvanā yūpaṃ chinatti cchedanena yūpaṃ svīkarotīti

aṣṭāśrikaraṇādīnāmasaṃskāratvaprasaṅgaḥ, tadatra prasaktam, tat tu neṣyate . kintu karotyevetyavadhāryate svatvenāparigrahamātrapratiṣedhārtham . eṣāvadhāraṇabhāvanā yūpe . seha havanavidhivākye na śakyāśrayitum . kiṃ kāraṇamaśakyeti cet, avadhāraṇāsambhavāddhavanenāgnihotraṃ karotīti . kathaṃ punarasambhavaḥ ?
yasmāddhavanenāgnihotraṃ karoti na pravrajyādinā, na ca karotyevetyavadhāryate svargādikāmābhāve
karaṇābhāvādityavadhāraṇavaiṣamyam .
havanenāgnihotraṃ karotīti havanādanyasyāgnihotrasyābhāvādata eva prasiddhivaiṣamyamapi, tasyāgnihotrasyāprasiddhasya kriyākalāpābhimatārthanāmadheyamātratvāt prasiddhayūpadravyacchedanādivaiṣamyam .

āha --nanu sevādivat kriyāmātratva itikartavyatābhyaḥ pratipattiḥ . yadyapyagnihotrakriyāmātratve yūpacchedādiśailīvaiṣamyaṃ tathāpi sevādikriyāvadeva tadbhaviṣyati . yathā hi sevetyupasthānāñjalikaraṇādisvāmyājñānuvṛttibhajanārthā viśeṣeṇa manovākkāyaparispandabhedātmikā ekaiva svāmicittānurodhalakṣaṇā

atrocyate--tanna, bhajanārthasevājñātatve tāsāṃ sevārthatvāt, atrāpi dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayorvaiṣamyādityabhisambandhaḥ . taddarśayati--bhajanaṃ bhaktiḥ, saivārthaḥ sevāyā iti bhajanārthā sevā, tasyāḥ sevāyā
jñātatve tāsāṃ tadavayavābhimatānāmupasthānāñjalikaraṇādīnāṃ sevārthatvāt, ajñātatve tadarthāpratipādanāt,

tasmādvaiṣamyam . avaśyaṃ caitadevam, itarathā pratikriyaṃ pṛthaktvāpatteḥ, yathā kṛṣisevayoḥ parasparaṃ tadaṅgakriyāṇāṃ ca pṛthaktvaṃ tadaṅgatvenājñātatvādevamagnihotrasya tadaṅgakriyāṇāṃ ca syāt, na tu bhavati tadaṅgabhāvenājñātatvādagniṣṭomādīnāmiti .

sevādibhiḥ . kiñcānyat --uttarakriyāmātratvācca, yathā sevāyā uttarakriyāmātratvamupasthānādīnāmevamagnihotrasyāgniṣṭomādītikartavyatānāmiti . etadapi na, lokaviditadānādyarthānubaddhetikartavyatāmātrārthatāpatteḥ . evamapi lokaviditairdānādyarthairanubaddhāyā itikartavyatāyā yo'rthastanmātrārthatvamāpanna-

atha agnihotram ityasyāpūrvaviśeṣābhidhānārthataiva kalpyeta tathā sati

dṛṣṭaṃ vā . kiṃ kāraṇam ? agnisampradānavirodhāt, tasyāgnerdahanātmakasya sarvadravyāṇāṃ vināśakasya
sampradānatvavirodhāt, chinnapāṇermatsyābhayadānavat muṣitasya vā caurābhayapradānadānavat, agnaye iti

ityādyuktadarśanavaditi .

tadābhatvamasyāḥ paramārthena adānātmikāyā dānatvenādānāt, tacca siddham . yathā bālaramaṇakādikriyāyāṃ
svādvannādisaṃjñādikriyāyāmanyonyadānabhojanādikriyāstadābhā eva evamidamapi dānamagnau prakṣepa iti .
idaṃ cātrāniṣṭāpādanam --pradhānādivādasādhutā ca prasiddhiviparītetyādi, prasiddherviparītaṃ tattvam,

asādhutābhyupagamavaduktahetorvedavādāsādhutā vā syādityubhayathāpyaniṣṭāpādanam .

mantradevatādiviśiṣṭābhiḥ . mā bhūd yajñasaṃjñāyāḥ kriyāyā eva dharmatvaṃ yathā kaiścinmīmāṃsakairevaṃ vyākhyāyate --yajñena yajñamayajanta devāstāni dharmāṇi prathamānyāsan ṛgveda॰ 10 . 90 . 15 iti, kiṃ kāraṇam ?
tasminnarthe pratyakṣata evānityāyāḥ kriyāyā anantaraṃ phalasambandhādarśanāt kriyāvaiphalyadoṣaprasaṅgācca agnihotram iti dharmaḥ kriyābhivyaṅgya ucyate kārye kāraṇopacārādagnihotrābhivyaṅgyo'gnihotramiti . tataḥ
agnihotraṃ dharmaṃ juhuyād bhāvayet svargakāmaḥ ityeṣa vākyārtho nirdoṣa ityetamarthaṃ spaṣṭīkārayituṃ vidhividhinayaḥ
pṛcchati --tathā sati apūrvābhidhāne ko'rthaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt ? arthaśabdasya prayojanābhidheyayordṛṣṭatvāt
ko'rthaḥ sādhitaḥ, kiṃ prayojanaṃ kṛtaṃ syāt ? ko'bhidheyaḥ samarthitaḥ syāt ? vidhinayo bravīti --yaḥ 
svargakāmaḥ sa havanenetikartavyatāviśeṣeṇa svargaṃ bhāvayedityayamarthaḥ kṛtaḥ sādhitaḥ samarthitaḥ
syādityarthaḥ . vidhividhinaya āha--vidyāparyāyatattvajñānotpādanārthatvādavidyānirākaraṇārthatvācca śabdaprayogasya kimūnīkṛtamarthāvidyāyā iti, na kiñcidūnīkṛtamityabhiprāyaḥ . tat samarthayati --yāvadevetyādi,
yaduktaṃ bhavati yaḥ svargaṃ kāmayate sa juhuyāditi taduktaṃ bhavati apūrvaṃ juhuyāt svargakāma iti,
nāpūrvo'rtho'dhiko'gnihotraśabdena labhyate, havanenaiva tasyābhivyaṅgyatvāt juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ ityetāvataiva
gatārthatvāt juhuyād dharmaṃ bhāvayet svargakāmaḥ ityetasyāṃ vākyārthavyaktau ko'gniśabdena hotraśabdena cārthaḥ ?
ityata āha --tato bhāvanasya gatārthatvāt, bhavantaṃ dharmaṃ bhāvayato hetukartṛsādhanasādhyasya dhātvarthasya

kimiva ? sāmānyādyarthaikāntavadeva, yathā sāmānyameva, viśeṣā eva, sāmānyaṃ viśeṣāśca
ityekāntārthaparigrahe prāguktavidhinā pūrvottaravirodhaparihāraprāpyo'rtho'śakyaprāptiraphalaḥ puruṣapramāṇatvāt tathā'yamapi tarkaḥ . sa cāniṣṭha iti, api ca tarko'pratipūrṇo yadi na bhavedāśrīyeta, kintu na pratipūrṇaḥ .

rbhasmāderghaṭapaṭādeśca paraviṣayasāmānyavādimatavat, sarvaikyāpannasya sato'gnyāderbhinnavastutvenābhiniveśastadabhyupagamo'gniriti paramāṇudvyaṇukādibhūmyabādisaṃyogasambhūtavanaspatībhūtāgnibhasmatruṭiparamāṇvādivicchinnāvasthāmātratve sati agniriti bhavati krameṇa pariṇāmabhedābhyupagamāt, tasya vidhānāt, agnihotraṃ juhuyāt iti

vighaṭanapradarśanam . evaṃ hi kāraṇe ghṛtādau kāryasyāgnihavanakarmaṇastatkāryasya ca svargāderasattve sati karaṇamupapadyate, tacca sati nopapadyate siddhaudanapacanavat, viśiṣṭaikāgnyādyavasthābhyupagame ca puruṣādikāraṇātmakasarvaikyābhyupagamavirodhini satyupapadyate nānyathetyata āha --sarvagatasatkāryakāraṇavṛttitve bhedavidhinirviṣayatvāt, suptasuṣuptajāgaritaturīyāvasthākrameṇaikameva yugapadvā sarvagataṃ puruṣākhyaṃ kāraṇam, tacca satkāryam,

krama ityatastadupadarśanārthamāha--mṛtpiṇḍakālaghaṭavaditi . athavā tattva eva tathābhūteriti pāṭhaḥ, tattva
eva tadbhāva eva sati tena tena prakāreṇa bhavanāt, piṇḍa eva mūrtisvabhāvarūpādyātmake śivakādyātmanā
nīlaraktādyātmanā ca bhavanāditi .
ata eva ca kāraṇamātramasau, tattva evātathābhūtestathābhūtervā kāraṇapramāṇamasau havanakriyā ghṛtādikāraṇebhyo na vyatiriktā, uktahetorasatkāryābhāvāt kāraṇamātramasau kriyā iti pratipattavyamavaśyam . na
kevalaṃ kriyaiva kāraṇamātram, saha phalenāpi sā kāraṇamātram, phalamapyasyāḥ svargākhyaṃ sukhādi ghṛtādikāraṇānyathābhavanamātram . atropacayahetū pratipāditārthāveva tadātmatvāt tannirvṛttatvāditi, tasyātmā sa
ātmāsyeti vā tadātmā, tena tasmiṃstasya sa eva vā nirvṛttaḥ, tadbhāvastannirvṛttatvaṃ tadātmatvaṃ ca, tasmāt tadātmatvāt tannirvṛttatvād ghaṭamṛttvavat, ghaṭasya mṛttvaṃ ghaṭamṛttvaṃ mṛdeva ghaṭaḥ, ghaṭa eva mṛd yathā pratipāditaṃ

ekāntavādasvābhāvyāditikartavyatākartavyatābhyupagamāttu pūrvottarāvasthānubandhāt sarpasphaṭāṭopamukulaprasāraṇakuṇḍalīkaraṇavad yajñopavītasūtratantutvapaṭatvavadvā saṃsthānamātrabhinnakāraṇakāryatvābhyupagama āpadyata iti kāryatyāga iti
svaśabdārthāpattiviṣayaviparītārthatvād vivakṣābhedavyāghātaḥ .
yadītikartavyatā janayati tataḥ sā tajjanyā na, janakatvāt kāraṇatvāt
tattva evātathābhūtestathābhūterveti tadvat . tasmāt kāraṇameva kriyā kriyāphalaṃ ca . evaṃ tāvadapratipūrṇastarkaḥ prāg nāsīt kriyā kāryatvena parigṛhītatvāt iti, asiddhahetutvāt pratitarkeṇa bādhyatvācceti
suṣṭhūcyate .
kiñcānyat, svayameva tvayā parityaktatvāccāpratipūrṇa eva, kasmāt ? ekāntavādasvābhāvyāt,
evaṃsvabhāvā hyekāntavādāḥ sarvoktamṛṣātvavādavat, yathoktaṃ tvayā tadanubandhāccetikartavyataiva kartavyatā
iti bruvatā kāraṇe kāryasya sattvamabhyupagamyāsattvaṃ ca tyaktaṃ bhavati, ato brūmaḥ --itikartavyatākartavyatābhyupagamāttvityādi . itiśabdasya prakārārthavācitvāditthamitthaṃ ca kartavyaṃ ghṛtena juhuyāt payasā juhuyāt ityādiprakārā kartavyatā itikartavyatā, saiva kartavyatā kāraṇabhūtāstā eva prokṣaṇādikriyāḥ
agnihotram ityabhyupagamāt, pūrvottarāvasthānubandhād vicchinnapūrvottarāvasthasya kasyacidabhāvāt kāraṇameva
kāryaṃ sarpasphaṭāṭopamukulaprasāraṇakuṇḍalīkaraṇavad yajñopavītasūtratantutvapaṭatvavadvā, sūtrameva
yathā yajñopavītākhyāṃ labhate tathāsamavasthānāt tathā tantava eva paṭastadvat saṃsthānamātrabhinnasya kāraṇasyaiva kāryatvamityayamabhyupagama āpadyate iti, itiśabdo hetvarthe, etasmāt saṃsthānamātrabhinnakāraṇakāryatvābhyupagamāpatterhetoḥ kāryasya tyāgaḥ kāryatyāgaḥ, kuryāt ityayaṃ hi śabdaḥ kāryārthe sati arthavān
bhavati, nānyathā . punaritiśabdo hetvarthe, tataśca kuryādarthatyāgāt svaśabdārthāpattiviṣayaviparītārthatvād
vivakṣābhedavyāghātaḥ, agnihotraṃ juhuyāt ityanena svaśabdenaivāsatkāryavādo'bhyupagataḥ, tadanubandhāccetikartavyataiva kartavyatā ityarthāpattyā kāraṇātmakakāryavādo'bhyupagataḥ, tayoranyonyaviparītārthatvādviruddhatvād
vivakṣābhedo vyāghātaśca . vivakṣābhedastāvadasatkāryavācinaḥ śabdasya kāraṇātmakakāryābhidhānābhyupagamāt
kāraṇātmakakāryavācinaścāsatkāryābhidhānābhyupagamāt . ata eva ca parasparato virodhād vyāghāto'nayoḥ .
athavārthadvayasya svaśabdārthāpattiviṣayasyābhyupagamād vivakṣābhedo'yaṃ puruṣabuddhivaśād vedavādaprāmāṇyamapauruṣeyaṃ
vyāhantīti vivakṣābhedavyāghātaḥ, sa ca tvayā tattvānapekṣaṇadoṣānnekṣyate vastutattvavicārapradveṣiṇā yaḥ
kāryakāraṇasvarūpānapekṣiṇo'pi balādayaṃ kāraṇakāryatattvavāda āpadyate'nekāntarūpo vastunastādātmyādanapekṣyamāṇo'pi svamatavyāghātīti .
evaṃ kāraṇātmakatve'bhyupagate'pi yadītikartavyatā janayatīti iṣyate tato na sā kartavyatā ghṛtādi

pūrvatvād vidhāyakatvāt, mātṛvad vacanavat . atha janyā sā, evaṃ tarhi na janikā,
janyatvādibhyaḥ, putrādivat .
pratītikartavyataṃ ca kartavyatāsamāpteritikartavyatāntarānārambhaḥ . pratyekaṃ
tvasamāptāvakāraṇabhāvādatathātā ca . samudāyasyāpi ca tanmātratvāt, uktavat .
kāraṇetikartavyatāvyatiriktā kācidasti tataḥ sā tajjanyā na bhavati kriyā, nātmanaivātmānaṃ janayatītyarthaḥ . kasmāt ? janakatvāt kāraṇatvāt pūrvatvād vidhāyakatvād mātṛvat, yathā mātā
nātmānaṃ janayati, kiṃ tarhi ? tato'nyāṃ duhitaraṃ janayati, evamiyamitikartavyatā janikā satī . tathā
kāraṇatvāt pūrvatvād vidhāyakatvāditi vyākhyeyāni . vacanavadityatra yathā vacanamapi nātmānaṃ janayati
buddhiṃ tu tato'nyāṃ vācyaviṣayāṃ janayati tathā itikartavyateti . atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa iti janakatvamasiddhaṃ
tasyā janyatvāt, janyā hi setyatrocyate --atha janyā sā evaṃ tarhi na janikā na kāraṇam,
janyatvādibhyaḥ, janyatvāt kāryatvādapūrvatvād vidheyatvāt, putrādivat . ādigrahaṇād vācyārthajñānavat . tasmāt svavihitadoṣatvājjanyatve janakatve vā doṣānativṛtterayuktamuktam --itikartavyataiva karta-
vyatā tadanubandhāditi .
kiñcānyat, kāraṇamātratve sati kartavyatā pratītikartavyataṃ parisamāptā vā syāt, aparisamāptā
vā ? tatra tāvad yadi pratyekamitikartavyatāsu kartavyatā parisamāptā tataḥ pratītikartavyataṃ ca kartavyatāsamāpteritikartavyatāntarānārambhaḥ, ekayā ghṛtena juhuyāt ityanayaiva itikartavyatayā tanmātraparisamāptāyāḥ kartavyatāyāḥ kṛtatvāt payasā dadhnā ityādīnāmitikartavyatāntarāṇāmārambho nirarthakaḥ prāptaḥ .
anārambha eva vā tasyā api kāraṇamātratvāt itikartavyataiva kartavyatā iti tvayaivābhyupagatatvāt nyāyataśca
ghṛtādikāraṇadravyamātratvasya kriyāyāḥ pratipāditatvāt siddhaudanapacanavadanārambha eva prāptaḥ . evaṃ tāvat
pratyekaparisamāptau doṣaḥ . pratyekaṃ tvasamāptāvakāraṇabhāvādatathātā ca, yadi śibikāvāhakakāraṇatvavat
pratyekamasamāptā ca kartavyatā itikartavyatāsu tathāpyakāraṇatā, pratyekamakāraṇatvāt, sikatātailavat .
itiśabdasya evamarthatvāt evaṃśabdasya ca prakārārthatvādevaṃ kartavyamitikartavyam, ghṛtādiprakṣepasvarūpakartavyatā
tathātā, na tathātā atathātā, tattathātvaṃ na prāpnoti pratyekamakāraṇatvādityatathātā ca . nanūktaṃ śibikāvāhakavahanaśaktivat samudāye setikartavyatāśaktiriti, atrocyate --samudāyasyāpi ca tanmātratvādavayavamātratvāduktavaditi, uktaṃ hi tattva evātathābhūtestathābhūterveti, avayavā eva hi samudāyībhavanto
dṛśyante, no cet sikatātailavadeva na syāt tilasamudāyatailamapi .


abhimatavidhyanuvādavaiparītyadoṣaprasaṅgaśca . tanmātrahavanārthatvād ghṛtādivad
havanasya vidhāyakatā, anuvādatā ca ghṛtādeḥ kāraṇamātravṛttitvād havanavat .
evaṃ cāvākyatvam, ananuvādatvādavidhāyakatvāt, vicchinnārthapadavat kākarutavat . jñātājñātāviśeṣāccaivaṃ ghaṭajñānavajjñātājñātālambanavidhyanuvādārthayugapadvi-

kiñcānyat, abhimatavidhyanuvādavaiparītyadoṣaprasaṅgaśca . tatra tāvat ghṛtena juhuyāt payasā
juhuyāt ityādivākyeṣu ghṛtādervidheyatvābhimatasya kāraṇamātrasya havanakāryasyānyasya tanmātretikartavyatāmātrahavanārthatvāt agnihotraṃ juhuyāt ityatra śrutahavanānuvādābhāvo'pi, havanasya ghṛtādivyatiriktasyābhāvāt .
tataśca ghṛtādividhānavajjñātārthābhimatasya havanavākyasya vidhāyakataiva syāt, nānuvādatā . anuvādatā
ca ghṛtāderajñātārthavidhāyakābhimatasyāpi, kāraṇamātravṛttitvād havanavaditi, kāraṇamātre vṛttirasya tat
kāraṇamātravṛtti ghṛtādi havanaṃ ca, uktavidhinā kāryābhāvasya pratipāditatvāt . tasmāt kāraṇamātravṛttitvād
havanavad ghṛtāderanuvādatā ghṛtādivaddhavanasya vidhāyakateti . evaṃ ceti, vidhyanuvādayoranyonyasvabhāvasaṅkarāvyavasthitātmasvabhāvatvānna vidhirnānuvādo'sti, ata evamuktaprakāreṇāvākyatvam, ananuvādatvādavidhāyakatvāt, vicchinnārthapadavat . yathā vicchinnārthamekaṃ padamadhikṛtapadārthāntarāsambandhaṃ gām ityetanna
vākyamata eva vidhyanuvādatvākāṅkṣyārthābhāvāt tathā agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ, ghṛtena payasā juhuyāt
ityādīni . yasyāpi padārtho nāstyeva taṃ prati kākarutavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ . yathā kākarutamarthāntarākāṅkṣārahitamavākyamavidhyanuvādatvāt tathedamapi .
jñātājñātāviśeṣāccaivaṃ ghaṭajñānavat . evamiti kāraṇamātrakāryatvābhyupagame sādhutāsādhutayoḥ
sādhutā tāvat gauḥ ityādeḥ padasya agnihotraṃ juhuyāt ityādervākyasya vidhitvamanuvādatvaṃ ca nopapadyate .
śabdo hi jñātārtho'jñātārtho vā prayujyate, jñātārtho'nūdyājñātārthavidhānārthaṃ prayujyate, sa punarjñātārthaḥ svata
eva pratyakṣādinā pramāṇena jñāte'rthe prayujyeta vākyāntareṇa vā pareṇa jñāpite'rthe, yathā ayaṃ devadattaḥ iti
ayaṃśabdasya pratyakṣadṛṣṭārthavācitvādanūdya devadattatvaṃ vidhīyate, vākyāntaraveditārthāni vā padānyanūdya abhyājanaṃ vidhīyate devadatta ! gāmabhyāja śuklām iti jñātājñātārthatā padānāṃ vākyānāṃ ca sādhutvābhimatānāṃ
pratyekaṃ sarveṣāṃ dvyarthatā dṛṣṭā . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? ghaṭajñānavat . yathā ghaṭasyārātīyā bhāgāścakṣurādyupalabhyā
jñātāḥ parāntarbudhnādibhāgā na jñātāḥ . saiṣā lokaprasiddhā sādhutā padavākyaśabdānāṃ kāraṇātmakāryavāde'sminna ghaṭeta, sarvasyaikātmakatve jñātājñātabhedānupapatteḥ, ekasyaiva vā tadubhayābhāvādvidhyanuvādatvābhāvasyoktatvāt kākarutādivaditi . nāpyasādhutā vākyabhedānarthakyādidoṣasambaddhā ghaṭate, yasmāt kāraṇātmakakāryavāde'rthāntarābhāvājjñātājñātālambanavidhyanuvādārthayugapadvivakṣāvṛttivākyabhedadoṣaparikalpanāpari


vakṣāvṛttivākyabhedadoṣaparikalpanāpariślathatā . śrutibhedo'pi vṛthaivaṃ sādhvasādhutvābhyām, ekārthatvāt, ghaṭakuṭavat . idaṃ cājñātamapi sat tvayā tattvamevaivaṃ vivektāraṃ prati pradarśitaṃ ghuṇākṣaravat .
athocyeta--kāraṇamātrakāryadarśanamiha nirmūlāpaviddhakriyāvākyaprabandhamiti
ślathatā, yathāsaṅkhyena jñātālambano'nuvādaḥ, ajñātālambano vidhiḥ, tayorarthayoryugapadvaktumicchā yugapadvivakṣā, ekasminnarthe tasyā vṛttiḥ, asau dvyarthatā vākyabhedaḥ, devadattākhyānavākyasyaiva gavānayanacodanāyāṃ devadattānvākhyānavadanuvādo gavānayanavidhānavākyasya vā devadattākhyānavākyavad devadatta- 
vidhānamiti yeyamekasya śabdasya yugapadarthadvayābhidhānaśaktyabhāvādvākyabhedadoṣaparikalpanā tasyāḥ pariślathatā, arthabhedābhāvāt . ato'sādhutāpi śabdānāṃ nāsti, sarve sādhavo'sādhavo vā śabdāḥ
prasaktā iti .
kiñcānyat, na kevalaṃ vākyabhedadoṣo bhedābhāvadoṣaścāpadārthātmakaḥ, śrutibhedo'pi vṛthaivaṃ
sādhvasādhutvābhyām . evamiti kāraṇātmakakāryavādābhyupagamaprakāreṇoktamatidiśya saṅkṣipya sādhanamāha
sodāharaṇam --ekārthatvād ghaṭakuṭavaditi, yathā pratītārthayorghaṭakuṭaśabdayorekārthatvādanyataraprayogo vṛthā
sādhutvābhimatayoḥ, asādhutvābhimatasya gośabdamātrasya vācā-diśā-sāsnādimadartheṣu yugapat prayuktasya
caikārthatvāt arthabhedadoṣaparikalpanāpariślathatā iti vartate . tasmāt padavākyaśabdayoḥ sādhutvāsādhutvāviśeṣācchiṣṭetaralokavyavahārāviśeṣaḥ . evaṃ te juhuyādukteḥ paunaruktyasvavacanavirodhau svaśabdoktāsatkāryavādatyāgaḥ kāraṇātmakasatkāryāvādābhyupagamaścetyapratipūrṇatarkatā sadoṣatvādityuktam .
yadapyetat tvayābhyupagataṃ kāraṇātmakasatkāryatvaṃ tadapyasamīkṣyābuddhipūrvakamevoktamityatastatpradarśanārthamāha --idaṃ cājñātamapi sat tvayā tattvamevaivaṃ vivektāraṃ prati pradarśitaṃ ghuṇākṣaravat . yathā
ghuṇaḥ kāṣṭhamutkirannakṣarākārāmapi rekhāmutkirati yadṛcchayā tathā tvayedaṃ tattvamevaivaṃ kāraṇātmakasatkāryatvaṃ
pradarśitam itikartavyataiva kartavyatā iti bruvatā . tat punarvivektāraṃ prati pradarśitam, itthamasatkāryaṃ 
bhavati, itthaṃ satkāryam iti yo vācyavācakasādhanasvarūpavivekajñastaṃ pratyeva pradarśitaṃ nātmatulyabuddhīn
prati, darśayannapi svayaṃ tadvivekaṃ na cecchati .
athocyeta--kāraṇamātrakāryadarśanamihetyādi yāvadvacanacchalāditi . atha tvayaivamucyeta--na
mayā kāraṇamātrakāryadarśanaikānto'bhyupagamyate yatastvayaite doṣā māṃ pratyāpādyante . kiṃ tarhi ? mayābhyupagamyate

asatkāryaṃ vivakṣyate, alabdhavṛttitvāt, khapuṣpavat . tad dvividham--anitikartavyatātmakamitikartavyatātmakaṃ ca . tatrānitikartavyatātmakaṃ ghaṭādi yūpādi ca .
itikartavyatātmakaṃ punaḥ prāptisaṃvādi, yathā sevādi . tacca na kāraṇamātram, kuryātpratipāditādasatkāryavādādādau madhye'nte ca kartavyatābhyupagamād yaducyate tvayā
doṣajātaṃ tad vacanacchalāt .
na kāraṇameva na kāryameva nobhayameva nānubhayamevetyavicārya vastutattvaikāntaparigrahamakṛtvā kāraṇaṃ kāryamubhayamanubhayaṃ vābhyupagamyate . asmin agnihotraṃ juhuyāt svargakāmaḥ iti vākye yat kāraṇamātrakāryapradarśanamanupāttāparityaktamiha vidhinaye sadapi yat tadatra nirmūlāpaviddhakriyāvākyaprabandham, nirmūlamapaviddhaḥ kriyāprabandho vākyaprabandhaśca yasmiṃstadidaṃ nirmūlāpaviddhakriyāvākyaprabandham . itiśabdo hetvarthe,
yasmānnirmūlāpaviddhakriyāvākyaprabandhaṃ tasmāt kāraṇamātrakāryadarśanasya taddoṣaparihārārthamiṣyatemiṣṭato vivakṣyate'navadhāritaikāntadarśanatvāt kāraṇamātratvaṃ tyaktvā yat kāryāsattvaṃ tadeva agnihotraṃ juhuyāt iti vākye
kāraṇamātrakāryadarśanameva sat asat kāryam iti vivakṣyate'bhyupagamyate ca . kiṃ kāraṇam ? alabdhavṛttitvāt, alabdhā vṛttiranenetyalabdhavṛtti kāryam, tasmādalabdhavṛttitvāt khapuṣpavat, yathā khapuṣpamalabdhavṛttitvādasattathā kāryaṃ svargāpūrvādi alabdhavṛttitvādasat . labdhavṛttitve kuryājjuhuyāt iti na
codyeta, siddhaudanārthaṃ pacet ityacodanāvat . ato'sat kāryamāgṛhya svargādi tatprāptyarthaṃ kriyāśrīyate—
agnihotraṃ kuryāditi . tad dvividham, tacca kāryaṃ dvividham --anitikartavyatātmakamitikartavyatātmakaṃ ca . tatrānitikartavyatātmakaṃ kāryaṃ ghaṭādi yūpādi ca loke vede ca dṛṣṭam, mṛdānayanamardanadaṇḍagrahaṇacakrabhramaṇādītikartavyatātmakaṃ ghaṭākhyaṃ kāryaṃ na bhavati taduparame'pi pṛthagupalabdheḥ, tathāṣṭāśrikaraṇādītikartavyatātmako na bhavati yūpaḥ . itikartavyatātmakaṃ punaḥ kāryaṃ prāptisaṃvādi, prāptyā
saṃvadituṃ śīlamasya prāptisaṃvādi, yathā sevādi, upasthānāñjalikaraṇādirūpaiva sevā tābhyaḥ pṛthaganupalabdheḥ .
tacca kāryaṃ na kāraṇamātraṃ netikartavyatātmakaṃ ghaṭādiyūpādivat, kuryātpratipāditādasatkāryavādāt,
kuryācchabdapratipāditāt agnihotraṃ kuryāt ityatra kuryācchabdena pratipāditāt ghaṭaṃ kuryāt iti pratipāditaghaṭāsatkāryārthavākyavadidamapi vākyaṃ sphuṭatarāsatkāryārtham . kiṃ kāraṇam ? ādau madhye'nte ca
kartavyatābhyupagamāt, ato'satkāryavādasya upakramaprabhṛtyapavargaparyavasāneṣu kriyāviśeṣeṣvabhyupagatatvād
yaducyate tvayā doṣajātaṃ tat tvadvacanāt prāptiprāpitetikartavyataiva kartavyatā iti vacanacchalāt,
kāraṇamātrakāryatvāpattistato vidhyanupapattirityādi sarvaṃ doṣajātaṃ nāstīti .
etadapi nopapadyate, vidhividhinayadarśanopapādayiṣyamāṇakāraṇamātratvavādāt . abhyupetyāpi asa

asatkāryavādoktāvapi naivāsya vākyatā, itikartavyatāvākyāsiddhau tadasiddhestatsiddhau tatsiddheḥ . itikartavyatāvākyamavākyam, ananuvādatvāt, unmattapralāpavat . juhuyāt ityasyoktavadeva sarvaprayogaparīkṣāyāmarthābhāvāditikartavyatāvākyapratyayāpi na kartavyatāgatiḥ .
kvedamabhihitaṃ juhuyāt iti ? havanāpūrvakaraṇārthatayoḥ pradhānāgnihotraśruti-
tkāryavādoktāvapi naivāsya vākyatā prāptyanubandhaprāpitetikartavyatākartavyatārthasyāgnihotrahavanakaraṇārthasya
vākyasya vākyatā . kutaḥ ? itikartavyatāvākyāsiddhau tadasiddhestatsiddhau tatsiddheḥ, tat punaritikartavyatāvākyam, tadavākyatve tadbalapratiṣṭhāpyakartavyatāvākyamapyavākyam . tatra tāvat ghṛtena juhuyāt ityetaditikartavyatāvākyamavākyam, ananuvādatvāt, unmattapralāpavat . yathā kāmonmattasya pakṣī
iti darśane bhrānteḥ hā priye ! hā priye ! ityādirvipralāpo na vākyaṃ prasiddhārthānuvādābhāvādevaṃ ghṛtena
juhuyāt ityasyāpi tadabhāvāt tatkartavyatāvākyābhāvaḥ . ananuvādatvaṃ cāsya ghṛtasampradānakahavanavidhānād
vidhivākyasya, vidhyanuvādayoścānyonyanirākāṅkṣayoranyatarābhāvaḥ . syānmatam--vidhimātrasya dvāraṃ dvāram
iti anuvādamātrasya udghāṭyatām iti dṛṣṭatvād nāpekṣeteti cet, na, tatrāpi bahiraṅgasthitaprakaraṇādibhyastatsiddherapekṣaiva . tasmādiha itikartavyataiva kartavyatā iti vacanāt kartavyatāvākyasyaivāsiddheḥ ghṛtena

kuryāt, havanaṃ kuryāt, agnihotraṃ havanaṃ kuryāt, prāptyanubandhaprāpitaghṛtādītikartavyatātmakakartavyatāgnihotraṃ

parīkṣāyāṃ nirmūlārthatvamaviṣayatvāt, aviṣayatvamapūrvārthatvāt, apūrvārthatvamajñātārthatvāt, ajñātārthatvaṃ pramāṇāntareṇa vākyāntareṇa vā prāgavihitatvāditi . tamupasaṃhṛtyāha --itikartavyatāvākyapratyayāpi na
kartavyatāgatiḥ .

tyāgādyāpatteragnihotrobhayakaraṇārthatayorapi juhotityāgādyāpatteḥ .
śailīprasiddhau chidivadahavanātmakāgnihotratvādanagnihotratvaprasaṅgāt pradhānasvargakāmānabhisambaddhajuhotyarthānuvādena kiṃ prayojanam ?
dyāpatteḥ arthābhāvāt ityādyabhisambadhyate, kramollaṅghanena vikalpadvayopanyāsastulyottaratvāt, havanaṃ kuryāt,
agnihotrākhyamapūrvaṃ kuryāt ityetayorarthavikalpayoḥ pradhānasyāgnihotraśabdasya tadarthasya ca tyāga āpadyate .
ghṛtena juhuyāt ityādiṣu anuvādasaphalīkriyārtham agnihotraṃ juhuyāt ityatra juhuyācchabdasya svaprakṛtyarthasya
sārthakatve'gnihotraśabdaḥ paunaruktyānnirarthaka āpadyate . atha pradhānatvādagnihotrasya mā bhūdagnihotraśabdo
nirarthaka iti juhuyācchabdo nirarthaka iṣyate tato juhuyācchabdanairarthakyāt prayogo nopapadyate vihitārthābhāve'nuvādatvābhāvāt . pradhānatvaṃ cāgnihotrasya sākṣāt svargādikāmyapuruṣārthasādhanatvena vidhānāt, juhotiprādhānye ca tadanupapattiḥ . atra ca na tu ghaṭavadagnihotraśabdaḥ kāñcidapi kartavyatāṃ bravīti ityādiḥ
sarvo granthaḥ pūrvottarapakṣaprasaṅgato yojyo yāvat nāpi ghaṭādikartavyatāyāmiva kācit kriyā prasiddhā
yayāgnihotrākhyatā havanasyātidiśyeta havanākhyatā vāgnihotrasya iti havanaṃ kuryāt ityayamuktottaro'rthavikalpaḥ . apūrvārthapakṣe'pi agnihotraśabdasya juhuyācchabdasya caikārthatvāt pradhānāpūrvavācyagnihotraśabdasya
tyāgastathaiva . viśeṣastu atha agnihotram ityapūrvaviśeṣābhidhānārthataiva kalpyate tathā sati apūrvābhidhānena
ko'rtha ityādi yāvat tadanuṣṭhātavyam iti granthaśca yojyaḥ . ādigrahaṇāt puruṣapramāṇakatā śabdaprāmāṇyatyāga ityādidoṣaḥ . tataḥ pradhānāgnihotraśrutityāgādyāpatterarthābhāvāt kvedamabhihitamityādi .

saprapañco yāvat tvadabhiprāyavattu havanānuvādaviśiṣṭāgnihotrābhyupagame'pi cāgnihotrasyātmādivastutattvavadaprasiddhasvarūpatvāt karaṇāsiddhiḥ .

śreṣṭhatamāya karmaṇe yajurveda॰ 1 . 1 ityādiśabdā agatārthā iti vijñāyante tathāyaṃ ghṛtena juhuyāt iti

paunaruktyādidoṣajātam, tadapyatra nāsti juhuyācchabdasyānuvādatvādeva, havanaṃ kuryāt ityatrāpyagnihotrapradhānatyāga ityādidoṣajātaṃ tadapi nāsti, tasmādiyaṃ vyākhyā ādivākye pradhānaśrutyatyāgaguṇakṛdapīti,
