prayogāyogyatvam, tataścānuvādatvāsambhavaḥ, tasmādanuvādāsambhavāt tannetyabhisambandhaḥ . idaṃ ca punaruktamarthāpannasvaśabdārthaṃ punarvacanalakṣaṇe punarukte nigrahasthānavikalpe . dvividhaṃ punaruktaṃ nigrahasthānam, tadyathā—
śabdārthayoḥ punarvacanaṃ punaruktam, arthādāpannasya svaśabdena punarvacanaṃ ca nyā॰ sū॰ 5 . 2 . 14--15 iti .
tasmādidamarthādāpannasya punarvacanam, viśeṣavidhānamantareṇārthāpannārthasya svaśabdenoccāraṇāt . ghṛtena juhuyāt
ityatra na syāt punaruktam, ghṛtaviśiṣṭahavanavidhānāt . iha tu svargakāmānurūpakarmānurūpakriyāviśeṣavidhyarthatāyā upadeśavṛttereva gatārthatayābhyupagatatvād ghṛtaviśiṣṭahavanavidhānajuhotyanuvādatāyāśca mūlavākyagatajuhotya

sambhavāt sākṣācchrutavidhijuhuyāttyāgena cārthāpannārthāśrutānūditajuhuyātkalpanād vidhīyamānavākyārthaviṣayānuvadanācca vākyabhedapunaruktadoṣāṅgīkaraṇādanuvādānuvādasya ca prāptaviśeṣaṇaparārthaviṣayārthatvādvidhiviṣayaviprakṛṣṭībhūtārthatvāt . iti
rthāsiddherananuvādataiva . kiñcānyat, jaghanyatarā ceyaṃ vyākhyā . kasmāt ? sākṣācchrutavidhijuhuyāttyāgena
cārthāpannārthāśrutānūditajuhuyātkalpanāt sa eva puruṣapramāṇakatvadoṣaḥ śabdāprāmāṇyadoṣaśca .
juhuyāt ityasya kriyāśabdasya vidhyarthasya sākṣācchrutasya pratyakṣasya tyāgaṃ kṛtvā arthāpannārthasya arthādāpanno'rtho'syetyarthāpannārthaḥ, ko'sau ? sa eva juhuyācchabdo'nuvādābhimataḥ, tasya aśrutasyārthāpannārthasyānūditavikalpanādanuvādakalpanāt tanna iti vartate . kiñcānyat, vidhīyamānavākyārthaviṣayānuvadanācca,
vidhīyamāno vākyārtho vidhīyamānavākyārthaḥ, sa viṣayo'syeti vidhīyamānavākyārthaviṣayaḥ sa eva juhuyācchabdaḥ, tasyaivānuvadanaṃ sa evānuvādaḥ, tasmād vidhīyamānavākyārthaviṣayānuvadanācca kiṃ saṃvṛttam ?
vākyabhedasya punaruktasya cāṅgīkaraṇam, na hīdameva vākyaṃ svargakāmābhisambaddhāgnihotravidhānaṃ tadanuvadanaṃ ca kartuṃ śaknoti svargakāmakartṛkasyāgnihotrakarmaṇo vākyāntareṇāprāpitatvāt . yathā ayaṃ devadattaḥ
ityatra na devadatta evānūdyate vidhīyate ca, pratyakṣasiddhastu idamo viṣayo'nūdyate, evamiha prasiddhārtho'pekṣyaḥ, sa
tu nāsti . tasmādubhayārthakalpanādekasya vākyasya tadasambhavācca vākyabhedadoṣaḥ . paunaruktyaṃ tu viśeṣavidhānābhāvāt, viśeṣavidhyartho hyanuvādo yuktaḥ, yathā ayaṃ devadattaḥ iti ayaṃśabdapratyakṣaprasiddhārthamanūdya devadattavidhānam, na tu tathātra kaścid viśeṣo vidhīyate, tasmādaviśeṣābhidhānāt paunaruktyam . tasmāt agnihotraṃ juhuyāt ityasya vākyasya prathamatvādekavākyagatatvāccānayorvidhyanuvādayorarthāpannāgnihotrakarmavidhitve
juhoteranuvādatve vā vākyabhedapunaruktadoṣāṅgīkaraṇād na ityevābhisambadhyate . evaṃ tāvat
agnihotraṃ juhuyāt ityatra juhuyācchabdo nānuvādo ghaṭate, na ca agnihotraṃ svargakāmaḥ iti vidhiḥ .
kiñcānyat, anuvādānuvādasya ca prāptaviśeṣaṇaparārthaviṣayārthatvāt . anuvādatvaṃ hi prāptaviṣayārtham, yathā ayaṃ devadattaḥ iti ayaṃśabdārthaḥ prāptārtho'prāpto devadattārtho'dhunā prāpaṇīyaḥ . evaṃ
prasiddhyaprasiddhibhyāṃ viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyau, tāvevopakārakopakāryatvābhyāṃ parārthasvārthau . na tathā agnihotraṃ
juhuyāt ityatra prāptaviśeṣaṇaparārthaviṣayatvamagnihotraṃjuhuyācchabdayoḥ, ato'prāptāviśeṣaṇāparārthatvāt
sāmyādanuvādatvābhāvaḥ . abhyupagamyāpi prāptādi doṣa ucyate--yat paścāducyate kartavyatāprasiddhyarthamiti- 
kartavyatāvākyaṃ ghṛtena juhuyāt iti tasya vidhiviṣayaviprakṛṣṭībhūtatvaṃ juhuyācchabdasyānuvādābhimatasya .

ghaṭitavighaṭitapratisamādheye tatpratisamādhānārthamudyatena tvayā cikitsayaiva gaṇḍasyopari sphoṭa āpāditaḥ .
laukikajuhotyarthānuṣṭhānapravṛttopadeśaviṣaya eva tvayaṃ paramanuvādaḥ syāt,
sa cānupapannaniyamārtha upadeśaḥ prāptivihitetikartavyatānatiriktahavanakriyānāma-
kiṃ kāraṇam ? prāptaviśeṣaṇaparārthaviṣayatvādanuvādasya aprāptaviśeṣyasvārthaviṣayatvādvidherādivākyagata eva
tāvajjuhuyācchabdo'nuvādo na ghaṭate prāptatvādyabhāvāt, tasyānuvādastu ghṛtena juhuyāt ityatra juhuyācchabda
iṣṭaḥ syāt tatpratirūpakastasyārthaḥ pratiśabdakasyevetyāpanno'prāptāviśeṣaṇāparārthatvād vidhiviṣayaviprakṛṣṭībhūtārthaśceti . tataśca vidhiviṣayaviprakṛṣṭībhūtārthatvānna kartavyatāviṣayatvamitikartavyatāyāḥ, yathā daśadāḍimādiślokāvayavānām . kiñcānyat, iti ghaṭitavighaṭitetyādi yāvad gaṇḍasyopari sphoṭa
āpāditaḥ . itiśabdo hetvarthe, yasmāditthaṃ kartavyaviṣayaviprakṛṣṭatvamitikartavyatāyāḥ ityādi doṣajātaṃ
vidhyanuvādatvābhāvāt tasmād ghaṭitavighaṭitam, prāgīṣad ghaṭitamāsīt sevādivaditikartavyataiva kartavyatā iti, tadapyanayā prāptivihitasvarūpasiddheḥ ityādikayā kalpanayā vighaṭitamuktavidhinaiva . tataśca
pratisamādheye viruddhataradoṣāpādanaṃ vidhiviṣayaviprakṛṣṭībhūtārthatvāditi . tataśca pratisamādheye tasminneva
vākye'nuvādatvābhāvādavākyatvādidoṣaduṣṭe tatpratisamādhānārthamudyatena tvayā aho paramaviduṣā cikitsakenānapekṣitapūrvāparakriyāvidhivipākena cikitsayaiva gaṇḍasyopari sphoṭa āpāditaḥ . tasmādaprasiddhārthatvānna maulo juhotirnottaro vānuvādo ghaṭate .
yadi bhavato ghṛtena juhuyādityasyānuvādatvamiṣṭaṃ tato'hameva te buddhisaṃvibhāgaṃ karomi, śrūyatām—
laukikajuhotyarthānuṣṭhānapravṛttopadeśaviṣaya eva tvayaṃ paramanuvādaḥ syāt, laukiko hi dānādanārtho juhotiḥ, tadarthānuṣṭhānapravṛttopadeśo yadyasya viṣayaḥ syād dadyāt, adyāt iti tadarthaprasiddhestadviṣayo'nuvādo yujyate vidhirvā . yasmai kasmaicidyadi kiñciddadyāt ghṛtaṃ dadyāt tena juhuyāt, yadi bhuñjīta ghṛtena
juhuyādityetasminnarthe'nuvādo ghaṭate . sa cānupapannaniyamārtha upadeśaḥ, samīkṛtya vyākhyāto'rtho'sya
śabdasya te mayā tathāpi tu punastvadiṣṭaviruddhārthametadāpadyate, loke'nupapannaniyamopadeśārthatvadarśanād vicitrayordānabhojanayoḥ svaparaprītihetutvād yathopapatti ghṛtena payasā dadhnā guḍena ca bhuñjīta tānyeva ca bubhukṣave
dadyāditi . na tu yathā akṣivaidyake triphalāṃ ghṛtenaiva bhakṣayet, na guḍena, guḍasya cākṣuguḍasyācakṣuṣyatvāt .
yathoktam--

prabhūtakṛmimajjāsṛṅmedomāṃsakaro guḍaḥ . carakasaṃ॰ 1 . 27 . 238
cakṣustejomayaṃ tasya viśeṣācchleṣmaṇo bhayam . carakasaṃ॰ 1 . 5 . 16 iti .



mātrārthaḥ . tanmātratvāttu tasyāḥ prakaraṇānubandhanāddhitvā juhotiprayogabāhulyaṃ
kṛñprakṛtiliṅkartṛtā pradarśayitavyā--yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti tad
ghṛtādinā svargakāmaḥ kuryāditi .
tvadvacanāttvapramāṇaniyamāgamo'nupadeśakaśca vivekturapīti sambhāvyeta, apratyavekṣitārthatvāt paurvāparyayogāpratisambaddhārthatvād ghaṭitānumatavidhvaṃsanādunmatta-

kiñcānyat, idaṃ cāgnihotraṃ juhuyāt kāṭhakasaṃ॰ 6 . 7 yadagnaye ca prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti
mai॰ saṃ॰ 1 . 8 . 7 ghṛtena juhuyāt kāṭhakasaṃ॰ 6 . 3 . 5 śūrpeṇa juhoti tena hyannaṃ kriyate tai॰ brā॰ 1 . 6 . 5
ityevamādividhyanuvādārthavādavākyagato juhotiḥ śrūyamāṇa upasthānādītikartavyatānatiriktasevanakriyānāmadheyamātrārthatvavat prāptivihitetikartavyatānatiriktahavanakriyānāmamātrārthaḥ, viprakīrṇāvayavakalāpā- 
kārā kriyaivāsyārtho'siddharūpaḥ, na siddharūpo yathā yūpaghaṭādi . tanmātratvāt tu tasyāḥ kriyāyāḥ
prakaraṇānubandhanāt prakaraṇena anubandhayan vaktā brūte śrotā ca pratipadyate--kriyāmātramavaśyamanena śabdena
kartavyamityetāvaccodyata iti . tasmāt kriyāmātratvāt prakaraṇānubandhanād hitvā tyaktvā juhotiprayogabāhulyaṃ sarvajuhotiprayogān, kriyāmātre pratipādye nāntarīyakatvāt kṛñprakṛtiliṅkartṛtā pradarśayitavyeti tatpratipādanārtham, abhimatavākyārthatāsya syādevaṃ kalpyamāne . tannidarśayati --yadagnaye ca
prajāpataye ca sāyaṃ juhoti tad ghṛtādinā svargakāmaḥ kuryāditi, etāvatā tadarthasya sugamatvājjuhotiprayogabāhulyamapratyayaraṭitameva punaranyatrānyatra juhuyāt, juhoti ityādi .
kiñcānyat, tvadvacanāttu apramāṇaniyamāgamo'nupadeśakaśca vivekturapīti sambhāvyeta .
yo'pyajñaprayuktaśabdārthonnayanasamartho vivektā puruṣaḥ padavākyapramāṇajñastaṃ pratyapyayaṃ vākyaprayogo'pramāṇaniyamāgamo'nupadeśakaśca . apramāṇaniyamāgamaḥ pratyakṣānumānagamyārthāsaṃvādāt . anupadeśakastvagamakatvāt . tat punaḥ
sambhāvayāmi bhavedevam, mā maṃsthā niṣṭhuram apramāṇaniyamāgamo'nupadeśakaśca ityavadhāryaivocyata iti .
kutaḥ ? apratyavekṣitārthatvāt paurvāparyayogāpratisambaddhārthatvād ghaṭitānumatavidhvaṃsanāt . apra-
tyavekṣitārthatā juhotibāhulyaprayoganirviṣayatvādibhiḥ . pūrvāparasambandharahitatā pṛthagarthābhimatānāṃ vidhyādiśeṣābhāvāt . ghaṭitavidhvaṃsanam itikartavyataiva kartavyatā iti ghaṭitasya ādivākyagatajuhotyanuvādābhyupagamād ghaṭitānumatavidhvaṃsanam . ityetebhyo hetubhyo'pramāṇaniyamāgamo'nupadeśakaśca vākyaprayogaḥ . dṛṣṭānta
unmattapralāpavat, yadvākyamunmattādipralapitaṃ puruṣoccāritaśabdasāmānyāt sadvākyavadābhāsamānamapramāṇaniyamamagamakaṃ ca, yathā—
śaṅkhaḥ kadalyāṃ kadalī ca bheryāṃ tasyāṃ ca bheryāṃ sumahad vimānam .tacchaṅkhabherīkadalīvimānamunmattagaṅgāpratimaṃ babhūva ॥  

pralāpavat, pratyavekṣāprāmāṇyayorjñānaviṣayatvāt, tvanmatāttu vedo na jñānaṃ tato'pramāṇaniyamo'nupadeśakaśca, acetanatvāt, ākāśavat .
yadapi ca prasahya kāraṇeṣu phalasya khapuṣpavadasattvamucyate evaṃvidheṣvekāntena
tadapi cānyāyyameva . yadetadasattvaṃ nāma tvayā kvacinmanyate tato'nyat kāryam,
iti, tathedamapi vivekturapyarthapratipādanasamarthaṃ na bhavatīti . evaṃ vicāryamāṇamidaṃ vākyaṃ doṣebhyo
na mucyate . athavā naivāyaṃ doṣo na ca vicārayogyo'yamudvrāhaḥ pratyavekṣāprāmāṇyayorjñānaviṣayatvāt,
jñānaṃ hi pramāṇamapramāṇaṃ veti vicāryate pratyavekṣyate ca tatra prāmāṇyasya mukhyatvāt, na hyatra kudupādiprāmāṇyavat prāmāṇyamaṅgīkriyate . tasmāt pratyavekṣāyāḥ prāmāṇyasya ca jñānaviṣayatvāt tvanmatādeva vedasyājñānābhimatatvānna vicāro na pramāṇabhāvo vāsti ajñānatvādvedasya . tvayā hi prāgevotpatatoktam--na hi kiñcijjñānaṃ niścitaṃ viśuddhaṃ cāsti sarvasya saṃśayādyajñānānuviddhatvāditi . taddarśayannāha --tvanmatāttu vedo na
jñānaṃ na jñānata iti, na yathā jñānakāryatvājjñānātmātmaprayuktaśabdacaitanyamapi kārye kāraṇopacārādannakāryaprāṇānnatvavaditi vā . tataḥ kimiti cet, apramāṇaniyamo'nupadeśakaśca vedaḥ, acetanatvāt,
ākāśavat . yathā ākāśamacetanatvādapramāṇaṃ kūṭasthanityatvācca na jñānavadvacanamevaṃ vedo'pīti prāmāṇyopadeśābhāvaḥ .
yadapi ca prasahyetyādi . prasahya balātkāreṇa paraṃ kañcit puruṣamagaṇayatā ekavīraṃmanyenākramya
paribhūyāsmanmataṃ yadapi ca agnihotraṃ juhuyāt ityatra kāraṇeṣu ghṛtādiṣvitikartavyatātmasu svargādiphalasya
khapuṣpavadasattvamucyate evaṃvidheṣviti sarvetikartavyatānāmādimadhyāvasāneṣu, tat punarasattvamekāntena
kathañcit kāryādisattvamapi ityetatpakṣanirapekṣaṃ sarvathā nāstyeva iti tvayeṣṭaṃ tadapi cānyāyyameva .
yato yadetadasattvaṃ nāma tvayā kvacinmanyate, nāmeti mithyākalpitanāmamātrameva tad yat tvayā kvacit
sattvanirapekṣamasaditi cintyate . kathaṃ punaranyāyyaṃ tadasattvamiti cet, ucyate, nyāyena bādhyatvāt . katamo
nyāya iti cet, evaṃ tarhi brūmaḥ --tato'nyat kāryam, asato'nyadityarthaḥ . kutaḥ ? tadasamarthavikalpatvāt, asaṅgatārtho'samartho'sambaddho vikalpaḥ, tenāsatā sahāsambaddho vikalpo'syeti tadasamarthavikalpaṃ
kāryam, tasya kāryasyāsamarthavikalpatvāt tato'nyatvam . kimiva ? ghaṭapaṭavat, yathā ghaṭavikalpāḥ pṛthubudhnordhvagrīvādayo mṛducaturasrādibhiḥ paṭavikalpairasaṅgatāḥ paṭavikalpāśca tairityanyau ghaṭapaṭau parasparata evamasadvikalpairasaṅgataṃ kāryaṃ tasmāt tato'nyaditi .


tadasamarthavikalpatvāt, ghaṭapaṭavat . vikalpāsāmarthyaṃ cāsatkāryayoḥ siddhameva .
caturṣu vikalpeṣu kāryakhapuṣpayorubhayorasattvaṃ kāryāsattvameva vetyetad vikalpadvayaṃ
syāt, ubhayasattvakāryasattvayoḥ pratipakṣābhyupagama eveti vādābhāvāt .
tadyadi tāvadubhayāsattvaṃ tato'sattvāviśeṣādevāviśeṣe kāryāvirbhāvavat
khapuṣpāvirbhāvo'pyāyatyāṃ syādasatkāryavat .
atha na kāryaprādurbhāvavat khapuṣpaprādurbhāvo'sacca kāryamiti niścitam, tadvailakṣaṇyānna tarhyasat khapuṣpam, sadasadvilakṣaṇatvād ghaṭavat, itara udumbarapuṣpavat .
nanu ghaṭāsattvaṃ paṭāsattvavilakṣaṇam, na, sato vailakṣaṇyāt .

syānmatam--asadvikalpāsaṅgatatvaṃ kāryasyāsiddham, tanna, siddhameva, yasmād vikalpāsāmarthyaṃ
cāsatkāryayorasataḥ kāryasya ca siddhameveti gṛhāṇa, vikalpacatuṣṭaye dvayoreva sambhavāt . asat khapuṣpam,
kāryamaṅkurādi, tayorvikalpāścatvāraḥ--1 khapuṣpamasat kāryamapyasat, 2 khapuṣpaṃ sat kāryamasat, 3
khapuṣpamasat kāryaṃ sat, 4 khapuṣpaṃ sat kāryamapi sat, ityeṣu caturṣu vikalpeṣu kāryakhapuṣpayorubhayorasattvaṃ kāryāsattvameva vetyetadvikalpadvayaṃ syāt sambhavet . kiṃ kāraṇam ? ubhayasattvakāryasattvayoḥ
pratipakṣābhyupagama eva, satkāryavādaḥ pratipakṣo'satkāryavādasya, itiśabdo hetvarthe, ityasmāddhetorvādābhāvaḥ, tasmād vādābhāvādubhayābhāvakāryābhāvavikalpāveva sambhavetām, netarau .
tataśca tayorubhayāsattvakāryāsattvavikalpayostad yadi tāvadubhayāsattvaṃ tato'sattvāviśeṣādevāviśeṣaḥ khapuṣpakāryayoḥ, asattvāviśeṣādevāviśeṣe kāryāvirbhāvavat khapuṣpāvirbhāvo'pyāyatyāṃ 
syāt, eṣyati kālāntare'smād vartamānāt kṣaṇādanyasmin kṣaṇe bhavet . dṛṣṭāntaḥ --asatkāryavat,
bījādaṅkuravat . na caitaddṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ vā khapuṣpaprādurbhāvaḥ iti .
athaitasmādaniṣṭāpattidoṣād dṛṣṭeṣṭavirodhādapasarpan brūyāstvam --na kāryaprādurbhāvavat khapuṣpaprādurbhāva iṣyate, asacca kāryamiti niścitam . tataḥ ko doṣa iti cet, ucyate --tadvailakṣaṇyānna
tarhyasat khapuṣpam, asatkāryavailakṣaṇyānnedānīmasat khapuṣpam, kintu saditi prāptam . asatkāryavailakṣaṇyaṃ
khapuṣpasyāyatyāmaprādurbhāvaḥ, tasmādasatkāryavailakṣaṇyādāyatyāmaprādurbhāvānna tarhyasat khapuṣpam, kiṃ tarhi ?
sat, ko hetuḥ ? asadvilakṣaṇatvāt, asatā kāryeṇa saha vilakṣaṇatvāt . dṛṣṭānto ghaṭavat, yathā
ghaṭo'sadvilakṣaṇatvāt sannevaṃ kharaviṣāṇamapyāyatyāṃ prādurbhavatā kāryeṇa vailakṣaṇyāt sat prasaktam . itara
udumbarapuṣpavat, itara iti vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ, yadasat tadasadvilakṣaṇaṃ na bhavati yathodumbarakusumamiti parasyāniṣṭāpādanārthatvādasadvaidharmyaṃ khapuṣpasyeti . nanu ghaṭāsattvaṃ paṭāsattvavilakṣaṇam . syānmatam--ghaṭasyā

athaivamapi vailakṣaṇye khapuṣpāsattvaniścayo na nivartate'prādurbhāvātmakaṃ ca
tat, na tarhi prādurbhāvātmakatvāt kāryamasad nirvṛttaghaṭavat . asattva āyatyāṃ na
prādurbhavet, asattvāt, khapuṣpavat . śeṣaṃ pūrvavadeva viparyayeṇa .
sattvaṃ paṭātmanā, paṭāsattvaṃ ghaṭātmaneti tayoritaretarābhāvalakṣaṇāsattvaṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ ca parasparato dṛṣṭam, tau ca
ghaṭapaṭau santau, tasmādasadvailakṣaṇyasya satyapi darśanādanaikāntikateti cet, ucyate --na, sato vailakṣaṇyāt .
nānaikāntikatāsya hetoḥ, sato vailakṣaṇyāt . sata eva vailakṣaṇyam, taddhītaretarābhāvātmakaṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ sata
eva, nāsataḥ . tasmādasato vailakṣaṇyaṃ na bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ? sadvailakṣaṇyamapi tat sata evetarāpekṣayā tadrūpeṇāsattvāt . ayaṃ tu kāryasyāyatyāṃ prādurbhāvo'satā khapuṣpeṇātyantavilakṣaṇo'prādurbhāvaśca khapuṣpasya
kāryeṇāsateti nāsti sato vailakṣaṇyaṃ satā tadviśeṣadharmatvād rūpādiviśeṣadharmāvailakṣaṇyavat . athavā
sato'vailakṣaṇyāt, sataḥ availakṣaṇyāt . satastu ghaṭādeḥ paṭādinā saha vailakṣaṇyaṃ nāstyeva, sattvānvayāviśeṣād deśakālākārādimātraviśeṣasyāviśeṣatvāt, aṅgulyādiviśiṣṭākāśāviśeṣavat .
athavā na tarhyasat khapuṣpam . kasmāddhetoḥ ? sadasadvilakṣaṇatvāt, satā'satā ca vilakṣaṇatvāt . sacca dvividham--tulyajātīyaṃ ghaṭasya ghaṭa eva, atulyajātīyaṃ paṭādi . asacca kāryamāyatyāṃ bhāvādaṅkurādi . khapuṣpamatyantāprādurbhāvāt kāryeṇāsatā vilakṣaṇaṃ satā ca ghaṭapaṭādinā tvanmatena itaretarābhāvavailakṣaṇyena tulyajātīyena atulyajātīyena ca bhāvānāṃ parasparavailakṣaṇyavad, dṛṣṭānto ghaṭavaditi, yathā
ghaṭastulyajātīyebhyo ghaṭāntarebhyo'tulyajātīyebhyaśca paṭādibhyaḥ sadbhyo vilakṣaṇo'sataśca khapuṣpādeḥ saṃśca
dṛṣṭastathā khapuṣpaṃ ghaṭavat sadasadvilakṣaṇatvānnāsat, sadevetyarthaḥ, dviḥ pratiṣedhaḥ prakṛtiṃ gamayatīti kṛtvā .
itara udumbarapuṣpavat, yadasat tanna sadasadvilakṣaṇam, yathodumbarapuṣpam . tvanmatyaivātrāpi vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ, khapuṣpakharaviṣāṇodumbarapuṣpādīnāmasattvāviśeṣādaniṣṭāpādanasāmyāt sādhyāntaḥpātī . tasmād
vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntena nārthaḥ . astu tadā sadvilakṣaṇatvamitaretarābhāvāpekṣatvāt, kathamasadvilakṣaṇaṃ khapuṣpamiti
cet, āyatyāṃ prādurbhavatā kāryeṇāsatā vailakṣaṇyasya tvayaivābhyupagatatvāt tvanmatanivāraṇārthatvādasya prayāsasya
nāsmākaṃ doṣa iti .
athaivamapītyādi . atha te prādurbhāvāprādurbhāvavailakṣaṇye satyapi kāryakhapuṣpayoḥ asadeva khapuṣpam
ityayaṃ niścayaḥ asadvailakṣaṇyād ghaṭavat sad bhavatu ityasmānnyāyānnivartyamāno'pi na nivartate, aprādurbhāvātmakaṃ ca tat khapuṣpam ityetacca vailakṣaṇyamiṣyata eva, prāduḥ prākāśye janmani ca, tathā''viḥ

ataḥ kāryaṃ sat, āvirbhāvātmakatvāt, nirvṛttaghaṭavat; vaidharmyeṇa ākāśaghaṭavat . asacca khapuṣpam, anāvirbhāvātmakatvāt, khaghaṭavat; vaidharmyeṇa
nirvṛttaghaṭavat .
tulye vā'sattve viśeṣo vaktavyaḥ, aviśeṣe vailakṣaṇyānupapatterghaṭaghaṭasvātma-
 , prādurbhavati prakāśaṃ bhavati gṛhyate jñāyate utpadyate jāyata iti vā, tathāvirbhavatīti, evaṃ
cāprādurbhāvātmakasya khapuṣpasyāsattve'rthādāpannam --na tarhi prādurbhāvātmakatvāt kāryamasat, sadevetyarthaḥ . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? nirvṛttaghaṭavat, yathā nirvṛtto ghaṭaḥ prādurbhāvātmakatvāt prakāśātmakatvāt sanneva
tathā kāryamapi sat . asyāścārthāpatteraikāntikatvānna jātyuttaratā, yathā gehe devadattasyābhāve sthitimato
bahirbhāvānumānamarthāpannamaikāntikatvānna jātivādaḥ . asmākaṃ tvatrābhiprāyaḥ--sadeva kadācidupalabhyate jāyate 
vā nātyantāsaditi, darśanādarśane ca sadviṣaye nātyantāsadviṣaye ityetaduttaratra darśayiṣyāmo vicārasyāsya tatphalatvāt . athaivamapi tvayā kāryasya sattvaṃ neṣyate tato'sattve kāryasyāyatyāṃ na prādurbhavet kāryamasattvāt
khapuṣpavat, prādurbhavati tu, tasmāt sat . śeṣaṃ pūrvavadeva viparyayeṇetyatītagranthamatidiśati . viparyayeṇetyarthataḥ śabdatastaddvayorviparyayeṇa yojyaḥ . tadyathā--atha na khapuṣpāprādurbhāvavat kāryāprādurbhāvo'sacca kāryamiti
niścitam, na tarhyasat kāryam, sadeva tat, asadvilakṣaṇatvād ghaṭavat, itara udumbarapuṣpavat . nanu
ghaṭāsattvaṃ paṭāsattvavilakṣaṇam, na, sato vailakṣaṇyāt . athaivamapi vailakṣaṇye kāryāsattvaviniścayo na
nivartate prādurbhāvātmakaṃ ca tat, na tarhi prādurbhāvātmakatvādasat kāryaṃ nirvṛttaghaṭavat, asattve āyatyāṃ na
prādurbhavedasattvāt khapuṣpavaditi .
tadupasaṃhārārthamāha --ataḥ kāryaṃ sat, āvirbhāvātmakatvāt, nirvṛttaghaṭavat; vaidharmyeṇa
ākāśaghaṭavat, ākāśamevākāśasyākāśe vā ghaṭa ākāśaghaṭaḥ, sa tvanāvirbhāvātmakatvānnāsti, na
tathā kāryamanāvirbhāvātmakam, tasmāt tat saditi . asacca khapuṣpam, anāvirbhāvātmakatvāt,
khaghaṭavat; vaidharmyeṇa nirvṛttaghaṭavaditi tayoḥ sadasatoḥ kāryakhapuṣpayorvailakṣaṇyaṃ darśayati .
yadi bhavanmatena kāryakhapuṣpayorasattvameva tulyaṃ tulye vā'sattve viśeṣo vaktavyaḥ--asmād
viśeṣahetoḥ kāryamasattve satyapi prādurbhavati na tu khapuṣpamiti . nocyate ced viśeṣahetuḥ, aviśeṣo'nayoḥ .
aviśeṣe ca vailakṣaṇyānupapattiḥ khapuṣpakharaviṣāṇayorivāsatoḥ, dṛṣṭaṃ ca vailakṣaṇyamāyatyāṃ prādurbhāvāprādurbhāvābhyām, tattu aviśeṣe tayornopapadyate . tasmāddhetoraviśeṣe vailakṣaṇyānupapatterghaṭaghaṭasvātmavat, yathā ghaṭa
eva ghaṭasvātmeti tayorna vailakṣaṇyamaviśiṣṭatvādevamaviśeṣaḥ syāt, na tu bhavati dṛṣṭatvāduktatvāccāvirbhāvānāvirbhāvayoḥ . tasmāt tayoryathāsaṅkhyaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ cāvaśyameṣitavyam . itara āha--naivāstyaviśeṣo'sato'pi,

vat . viśeṣonnayane'pi tu viśeṣasya sadāśrayatvāt sattvaṃ ghaṭavaditi sāmānyameva .
athaitat sāmyamubhayāsattvānmā bhūdityanyatarāsattvaṃ kāryasattvābhyupagamaparihāreṇa kāryamevāsaditi, atra kāryasamīpa evakāra ityanyatra pratiyoginyasattve
niyamaḥ--asattvaṃ kārye eva nānyatrāpīti . tataśca na khapuṣpamasat . tathā ca sato-
yasmāccaturvidho'sanniṣyate prākpradhvaṃsetaretarātyantābhāvākhyo ghaṭasya mṛtpiṇḍādikapālādipaṭādikharaviṣāṇādivaditi . atrocyate --viśeṣonnayane'pi tu viśeṣasya sadāśrayatvāt sattvaṃ ghaṭavaditi . apiśabdo'nabhyupagamaṃ darśayati, naivābhāvasya kharaviṣāṇavandhyāsutādeḥ parasparato viśeṣo'styavastutvāt tvanmatenaiva,
asmanmatena tu vastutvamabhāvasyāpi kasyacit prameyatvasāmānyaviśeṣavattvādihetubhyastvadabhyupagatebhyaḥ pramāṇavat .
atastvanmatenaivābhāvasya bhāvād viśeṣaḥ paramārthato nāsti . abhyupetyāpi brūmaḥ--viśeṣonnayane'pi tu yena
kenacit prakāreṇa sadāśrayo'sāvabhāvastvatparikalpitaścaturvidho'pi viśeṣatvād rūpādivad ghaṭavat . tataśca
viśeṣasya sadāśrayatvāt sattvaṃ ghaṭavat, yathā ghaṭaḥ santaṃ pṛthivyādyarthamāśritya vartamānaḥ sanneva svameva vātmānamāśritya vṛtteḥ sannevaṃ viśeṣo'pi sadāśrayatvāt sanniti . itiśabdo hetudṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikopasaṃhāre, itthaṃ
bhāvābhāvayoḥ sāmānyameva, na viśeṣa iti . evaṃ tāvat kāryakhapuṣpayorubhayorasattvameva veti sāmyamāpāditam .
dvitīyavikalpo vicāryate --athaitat sāmyamityādi . athaitadāpāditaṃ sāmānyamanicchatā kāryasattvaparihāreṇa ubhayāsattvābhyupagamādāyātamidamanyatarāsattvaṃ kāryasattvaparihāreṇābhyupagamyate pratipakṣavādādanyat pūrvoktadvayānyataraviśiṣṭam, kiṃ tat ? kāryamevāsaditi, avaśyaṃ dvayoranyatarābhyupagame'vadhāraṇamāpadyate, taccāvadhāraṇaṃ yata evakārastato'nyatrāvadhāraṇam   iti paribhāṣitatvācchāstreṣu
loke ca dṛṣṭatvādavadhāraṇaphalatvācca vākyasyaitadupapadyate --kāryasamīpa evakāra iti kāryamevāsat
iti kāryaśabdasamīpa evakāraprayogāt, itiśabdasya hetvarthatvāt, anyatra pratiyogini asattve niyamaḥ,
asacchabdavācye'rthe khapuṣpādau niyamastatra evakārābhāvāt, na kāryaśabdārthe . yathā vṛkṣaścūta ityatra cūto
niyamādvṛkṣaḥ, vṛkṣastu cūto'nyo vā syādityaniyamaḥ, tathehāpi kāryamevāsat, na khapuṣpādyakāryamasat, kiṃ
tarhi ? sat, na tu asadeva kāryam iti niyamyate, yadi sadapi kāryaṃ syādastu, ko doṣaḥ ? iti taddarśayati—
asattvaṃ kārya eva, nānyatrāpītyakārye khapuṣpādāviti . itiśabdo hetvarthe, asmādavadhāraṇāddhetorityarthaḥ .
evaṃ sati ko doṣa iti cet, ucyate --tataśca na khapuṣpamasaditi prasaktaṃ dṛṣṭeṣṭaviruddhaṃ sattvaṃ khapuṣpasyetyarthaḥ

'saditi asataśca saditi saṃjñā kriyate, kāryāsattvaṃ kharaviṣāṇaviparītaghaṭādīnāmasattvena tulyam, nāmamātre visaṃvādaḥ . kāryasattvanivṛttyekāntatyāgācca svavacanādivirodhāpattiḥ . asadevakāre tvasadanavadhṛteḥ pūrvadoṣa eva .
athocyeta--asattvādeva tayoḥ kāraṇakāle na kaścid viśeṣo'sti, yadeva
tathā cetyādi yāvad nāmamātre visaṃvādaḥ . evaṃ ca kṛtvā kāryamasat kharaviṣāṇaṃ saditi saṅgītyā
sato'saditi asataśca saditi saṃjñā kriyate . kāryāsattvamiti tataḥ kharaviṣāṇaviparītā ye
nirvṛttā ghaṭādayasteṣāṃ ghaṭādīnāmasattvena tulyam, kāryasyāsattvaṃ satāmevāsattvena tulyaṃ viparītaṃ nāmamātramagnermaṅgalanāmavat, na cātra kaścidarthasya sattve visaṃvādo'sat kāryamiti . kiñcānyat, kāryasattvanivṛttyekāntatyāgācca svavacanādivirodhāpattiḥ . kāryasattvanivṛttiḥ kāryāsattvam, tadavadhāraṇamekāntaḥ,
kāryamevāsaditi tasya tyāgo'nantaroktavidhinā prāptaḥ, tataśca kāryasattvanivṛttyekāntatyāgācca svavacanādivirodhāpattiḥ . svavacanavirodhastāvat tadeva kāryamasadityuktvā tasyaivakārasāmarthyāt sattvāpādanāt tadeva sat
tadevāsaditi bruvataḥ . athavā yadi kāryaṃ kathamasat ? athāsat kathaṃ kāryam ? kriyate ghaṭo ghaṭatayā
vyajyate dīpeneva kriyayeti vakṣyati . tathābhyupagamādabhyupagamavirodhaḥ . tathā loke prasiddhatvāllokavirodhaḥ .
tattva eva tathābhūteranumānavirodhaḥ . tathā mṛtpiṇḍaghaṭādikāraṇakāryadarśanāt pratyakṣavirodhaḥ . evaṃ tāvat
kāryamevāsat, na khapuṣpādi ityavadhāraṇadoṣaḥ .
kāryamevāsat, na kāraṇam ityasyāvadhāraṇasya pratipakṣavādāpatterathaivamavadhāryate kāryamasadeva iti .
tatrāpi yata evakārastato'nyatrāvadhāraṇamityasatsamīpa evakārāt kāryamasattvenāvadhāryate kāryaṃ
niyamādasat, asattu kāryaṃ vā syāt khapuṣpādi vā ityevamasadevakāre tvasadanavadhṛteḥ pūrvo doṣo
yo'sattvāviśeṣādityādiḥ sa eva, kāryakhapuṣpayorasattve āyatyāmāvirbhāvānāvirbhāvakṛto viśeṣo na
syādityaviśeṣāpattidoṣaḥ prāguktaḥ sa evātrāpi .
athocyetetyādi . aviśeṣāpattidoṣasya ca parihārārthamathocyate tvayeti paramatamāśaṅkate, katham,
asattvādeva tayoḥ kāryakhapuṣpayoḥ kāraṇakāle viśeṣāsambhavaḥ, yathā khapuṣpamasat tathā kāraṇakāle
kāryamapyasadeveti nānayoḥ kaścid viśeṣo'sti, na hyasato nirupākhyasya khapuṣpasya vṛntaphalakesarādyavayavasaurabhādiviśeṣāḥ kharaviṣāṇakuṇṭhatīkṣṇatvādibhyo bhinnalakṣaṇāḥ santyubhayeṣāmavastutvānnirupākhyatvāccetyasmā

kāryāsattvaṃ tadeva khapuṣpāsattvamapīti nāvadhāraṇakṛto doṣo nāpi pūrvastulyatvāpattidoṣaḥ, anekaviṣayatvāttulyatvasya .
evamapyekatvādviśeṣābhāvaḥ . yathaiva hi khapuṣpamanupādānamabuddhisiddhaṃ niḥsāmānyaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ ca evaṃ kāryasyopādānaṃ buddhisiddhatvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavattvaṃ
ca na syāt .
atha sāmānyaviśeṣopādānabuddhisiddhatvasadbhāvāsadbhāvau kāryakhapuṣpayoriṣyete
khapuṣpavadabhavadapi tadasadeva, nirvṛttamapi tarhyasat sāmānyaviśeṣavattvāt kāraṇa-
daviśeṣāt kāraṇakāle yadeva kāryāsattvaṃ tadeva khapuṣpāsattvamapīti . tataḥ kiṃ parihṛtamiti cet,
nāvadhāraṇakṛto doṣa ityavadhāraṇadoṣaḥ parihṛto bhavati . kāryamevāsat, asadeva kāryam ityavadhāryamāṇe
khapuṣpasattvaṃ kāryakhapuṣpayoraviśeṣa ityetau doṣau tayoraviśeṣābhyupagamānna sta iti . nāpi pūrvastulyatvāpattidoṣaḥ kāryasyāyatyāmanāvirbhāvaḥ khapuṣpasyāvirbhāva ityaviśeṣaḥ . asyāpi tulyatvāpattidoṣasyābhāvo'sato viśeṣābhāvādanekaviṣayatvāt tulyatvasya, ayamanenābhyāmebhirimāvime vārthāstulyāḥ iti
hi tulyatvamanekaviṣayaṃ dṛṣṭam, na hi tadeva tena tulyamiti .
atrocyate --evamapyekatvād viśeṣābhāva iti, tvayaiva kāryakhapuṣpayorasattvāviśeṣo'bhyupagata
ekarūpatvādavastuna iti tadavastha evāviśeṣadoṣaḥ . tasyaivedānīmaviśeṣadoṣasyāpādanārthaṃ vikalpyate'nyadaniṣṭāpādanam --yathaiva hītyādi . yathaiva khapuṣpasyopādānaṃ pūrvadṛṣṭaśrutānubhūtaṃ buddhau siddhaṃ vākārādiviśiṣṭatvaṃ
nāstītyanupādānamabuddhisiddhaṃ ca khapuṣpam, tataḥ kim ? anupādānābuddhisiddhatvābhyāṃ tad niḥsāmānyaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ ceti siddhamevaṃ ghaṭādeḥ kāryasya mṛdādyupādānaṃ buddhisiddhatvaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavattvaṃ
ca na syāt, tacca mṛda eva yenākāreṇa bhavanaṃ deśakālanavapurāṇakṛṣṇaraktatvādighaṭabhede'pi tulyatayā
sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaśca paṭādibhyaḥ . tacca khapuṣpasyopādānabuddhisiddhatvasāmānyaviśeṣavattvaṃ ca syāt, ubhayornirupākhyatvāt . na tvetadiṣṭam . tasmādastyanayorviśeṣa iti sat kāryam .
atha sāmānyaviśeṣopādānabuddhisiddhatvasadbhāvāsadbhāvau kāryakhapuṣpayoriṣyete tvayā
viśeṣau, khapuṣpavadabhavadapi tadasadeva . khapuṣpavaditi yena prakāreṇa khapuṣpaṃ na bhavati notpadyate tena
prakāreṇābhavadapi anyathā bhavadapi utpadyamānaṃ kadāciddṛśyamānamapītyarthaḥ, upādānabuddhisiddhatvasāmānyaviśeṣavattvaprakāreṇa bhavadapi tat kāryamasadeveṣyate, tataścaivaṃ sati ayamaparo doṣaḥ --nirvṛttamapi tarhyasat
kāryam iti vartate, sopādānabuddhisiddhatvasadbhāve'pi . kasmāt ? sāmānyaviśeṣavattvāt kāraṇakālakāryavat, yathā kāraṇakāle kāryamasat tvanmatena sāmānyaviśeṣavadapi sopādānaṃ buddhisiddhamapi tathottara

kālakāryavat . kāryavaccābhavadapi khapuṣpamasanna syād niḥsāmānyanirviśeṣatvāt
sāmānyaviśeṣavat, kāryāsattvavailakṣaṇyādvā kāraṇavat .
atha na kāryopādānādimattvavat khapuṣpasyāpyupādānādimattvamasacca kāryamiti
niścitamityādi pūrvavaccakrakadvayapravartanam . upādānādimattvaviśeṣaṇakṛto viśeṣaḥ .
kālaṃ nirvṛttamapi tadasadeva syāt kāraṇakālavaditi . kāryavaccābhavadapi khapuṣpamasanna syāt, kāryaprādurbhāvaprakāreṇābhavadapi tasminnabhavanaprakāraviśeṣe satyapi sat prāpnoti khapuṣpaṃ niḥsāmānyanirviśeṣatvāt, taddhi khapuṣpaṃ niḥsāmānyaṃ nirviśeṣaṃ ceti siddham, atastasya niḥsāmānyanirviśeṣatvāt sattvaṃ
syāt . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? sāmānyaviśeṣavat . kāryavaditi siddhe vaiśeṣikamatālambanena sāmānyaviśeṣadṛṣṭānto
niḥsāmānyanirviśeṣāṇāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣāṇāṃ vastutvaṃ khapuṣpatulyameveti kākvā darśitaṃ bhavati . prakṛtārthopanayastu yathā sāmānyaviśeṣo ghaṭatvādirniḥsāmānyo nirviśeṣaśca saṃśceti siddhastathā khapuṣpamapi sat
syāt . kiñcānyat, kāryāsattvavailakṣaṇyādvā kāraṇavat asanna syāt khapuṣpam iti vartate . kāryasya
ghaṭāderasattvena khapuṣpasyāprādurbhāvānupādānābuddhisiddhatvaniḥsāmānyaviśeṣatvavailakṣaṇyāt khapuṣpamapi sat 
syāt kāraṇavat . etaiśca prakāraiḥ siddhameva kāryāsattvavailakṣaṇyamiti siddho hetuḥ . nirvṛttatvādiprakāreṇa ca
kāraṇasya tadvailakṣaṇyaṃ siddhamiti sādharmyaṃ kāraṇakhapuṣpayoḥ . kāraṇaṃ vā khapuṣpavat kāryāsattvavailakṣaṇyādasat
syāt kāryasyāsattvaṃ vā tyājyamityabhiprāyaḥ .
atha na kāryopādānādimattvavadityādi . atha bhavatā khapuṣpasattvaprasaṅgadoṣabhayād
yuktapratipādanamapi kāryopādānādimattvavat khapuṣpasyāpyupādānādimattvaṃ neṣyate, ādigrahaṇād
buddhisiddhasāmānyaviśeṣavattvāni neṣyante, idaṃ kāryasyāsādharmyaṃ khapuṣpeṇa saheṣyate, asacca kāryamiti
niścitamityādi pūrvavaccakrakadvayapravartanamiti granthamatidiśati tameva . kathaṃ punarbhāvyate,
yadi kāryopādānādimattvavat khapuṣpasyopādānādimattvaṃ neṣyate kāryaṃ cāsaditi niścitam,
tadvailakṣaṇyādanupādānādivailakṣaṇyād na tarhyasat khapuṣpam, sadasadvilakṣaṇatvād ghaṭavat, itara
udumbarapuṣpavat . nanu ghaṭāsattvaṃ paṭāsattvavilakṣaṇam, na, sato vailakṣaṇyāt . athaivamapi vailakṣaṇye
khapuṣpāsattvaviniścayo na nivartate'nupādānādimattvāt, na tarhyupādānādimattvāt kāryamasat, asattve
nopādānādimat syāt khapuṣpavat, etadaviparyayacakrakam . śeṣaṃ pūrvavadeva viparyayeṇa . ataḥ sat kāryamu-
pādānādimattvād nirvṛttaghaṭavat, vaidharmyeṇākāśaghaṭavadityādirapi yāvat sadāśrayatvāt sattvaṃ ghaṭavaditi, etadviparyayacakrakamevacakrakam, evamubhayāsattve . anyatarāsattve tu athaitat sāmyamubhayāsattvānmā bhūdityanyatarāsattvaṃ kāryasattvābhyupagamaparihāreṇa kāryamevāsaditi, atra kāryasamīpa ityādi yāvat svavacanādi

tasmāt kāryaṃ sat kāraṇavat . nanu sattve'pi kāraṇavat pratyakṣatvaṃ prasajyate,
na, avyaktatvād vitaṭīkhātahastīva pūrvaṃ khananād bhūgandhavat . ata eva ca
prakaraṇacintā--kiṃ ghaṭādi kāryaṃ sat ? asat ? apratyakṣatvasya satyasati ca
darśanādanekāntāt .
virodhāpattiḥ . punarapi asadevakāre tvasadanavadhṛteḥ pūrvadoṣaḥ . athocyata ityādi yāvat kāryāsattvavailakṣaṇyādvā kāraṇavaditi sa eva granthaḥ . upādānādimattvaviśeṣaṇakṛto viśeṣa iti, ataḥ kāryaṃ sadupādānādimattvāt kāraṇasvātmavat, vaidharmyeṇākāśaghaṭavat . asacca khapuṣpamanupādānatvāt khaghaṭavat, itaro
nirvṛttaghaṭavat . tathā sat kāryaṃ buddhisiddhatvād nirvṛttaghaṭavat, itaro nabhoghaṭavat . asacca khapuṣpaṃ buddhyasiddhatvāt khaghaṭavat, itaro nirvṛttaghaṭavat . evaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣābhyāmapi yojyam . tasmāt kāryaṃ sat
kāraṇavat, na tu khapuṣpamityarthaḥ .
āha --nanu sattve'pi kāraṇavat pratyakṣatvaṃ prasajyate . tvatparikalpitaṃ mṛtpiṇḍāvasthāyāṃ kāryaṃ
ghaṭākhyaṃ pratyakṣaṃ syāt, sattvāt, kāraṇavat mṛtpiṇḍavadityartha iti . atrocyate --na, avyaktatvāt . naiṣa
doṣaḥ, kasmāt ? avyaktatvāt, tasyāṃ hi mṛtpiṇḍāvasthāyāṃ ghaṭo'nabhivyaktatvādindriyairnopalabhyate vitaṭīkhātahastīva pūrvaṃ khananāt, ta eva hi mṛdavayavā bhittigatāḥ khananāt prāgapi vidyamānāḥ khananottarakālaṃ hastyākāravyapadeśaṃ labhante, na ca te prāgabhivyakteranupalabdhatvānna santi . athavā kārye satyapi
hyavyakte bhūgandhavadapratyakṣatvaṃ kāryasya, yathā bhuvo gandho vidyamāno'pi na ghrāṇendriyagocaramāgacchatyavyaktatvāt, salilasiktastūttarakālamabhivyakta upalabhyate, tathā mṛdavasthāyāmapratyakṣo ghaṭaḥ kulālaprayatnadaṇḍacakrasūtrādikāraṇābhivyañjitaḥ paścādupalabhyate, atastasya pratyakṣatvaṃ bhavatīti ko doṣaḥ ? ata eva ca
prakaraṇacinteti prakaraṇasamadoṣo'nekāntāt, uktamanaikāntikatvamasya hetoḥ . yata eva prakaraṇacintā sa
nirṇayārthamapadiṣṭaḥ san prakaraṇasamaḥ nyā॰ sū॰ 1 . 2 . 7, iha hi ghaṭādeḥ kāryasyāpratyakṣatvādeva cintā
samutpannā --kiṃ ghaṭādi kāryaṃ sat ? asat ? iti, apratyakṣatvasya sati asati ca darśanād mūlodakādau kharaviṣāṇādau cetyato vyabhicaratyapratyakṣatvaṃ tathā sattvamapi pratyakṣāpratyakṣayordarśanāt sato'pratyakṣasya
merūttarakurudvīpagrahagṛhītagrahādeḥ kharaviṣāṇādeścāsata ityanekāntāditi . evaṃ tarhi darśanādarśanayoḥ prādurbhāvāprādurbhāvayośca samānaḥ prakaraṇasamadoṣa iti cet, na, janmaprakāśaviṣayaviśeṣasyoktatvāt . upādānādimattvāviśeṣācca tvatpakṣe na samāno doṣa iti .


evaṃ tarhi mayāpi śakyaṃ vaktum--yadetat sannāma tato'nyat kāryaṃ tadvikalpāsāmarthyād ghaṭapaṭavat . caturṣu vikalpeṣu dvayoḥ pratipakṣavādāpattestyāgādubhayasattvamanyatarasattvaṃ ca syāt . tadyadi tāvadubhayasattvaṃ tataḥ sattvāviśeṣādevāviśeṣe
sarvatvaikatvabhedo na syāt, kāryaikatvavat kāraṇaikatvamapi syāt . atha na kāryaikatvavat kāraṇaikatvaṃ sacca kāryamiti niścitaṃ tadvailakṣaṇyānna tarhi sat kāraṇam, asat,
sadvilakṣaṇatvādudumbarapuṣpavat, itaro nirvṛttaghaṭavat . nanu ghaṭasattvaṃ paṭasattvavilakṣaṇam, na asato vailakṣaṇyāditaretarāsattvāt . athaivamapi vailakṣaṇye kāraṇasattvaniścayo na nivartate'nekātmakaṃ ca tat, na tarhyekātmakatvāt kāryaṃ sat . sattva ekātmakaṃ na bhavet, sattvāt, kāraṇavat . śeṣaṃ pūrvavadviparyayeṇa . tathānuvṛttivyāvṛttyā-

evaṃ tarhītyādi yāvat tathopasaṃhārameva . itara āha--tvaduktasādhanaprapañcasya kāryāsattve'pi
tulyatvād mayāpi śakyaṃ vaktum, kāryasattvasya kāraṇe tvanmatasya nivāraṇe kṛte kāryāsattvaṃ bhavitumarhati .
tatsādhanaṃ śrūyatām --yadetat sannāma kāraṇaṃ tato'nyat kāryam, tadvikalpāsāmarthyāt, ghaṭapaṭavat .
atrāpi 1 kāraṇaṃ sat kāryaṃ sat, 2 kāraṇaṃ sat kāryamasat, 3 kāraṇamasat kāryaṃ sat, 4 kāraṇamasat kāryamasaditi caturṣu vikalpeṣu dvayoḥ pūrvavat pratipakṣavādāpattestyāgādubhayasattvamanyatara- 
sattvaṃ ca syāt . tatrobhayasattve tāvat tad yadi tāvadubhayasattvaṃ tataḥ sattvāviśeṣādevāviśeṣe sarvatvaikatvabhedo na syāt . mṛdeva sarvaṃ piṇḍaśivakādighaṭapiṭharakapālādi, kāryaṃ tvekameva piṇḍa iti vā śivaka iti
vā'nanyadekam . evaṃ tu kāryaikatvavat kāraṇaikatvamapi syāt . atha na kāryaikatvavat kāraṇaikatvaṃ
sacca kāryamiti niścitam, tadvailakṣaṇyānna tarhi sat kāraṇam, asat, sadvilakṣaṇatvādudumbarapuṣpavat, itaro nirvṛttaghaṭavat . nanu ghaṭasattvaṃ paṭasattvavilakṣaṇam, na, asato vailakṣaṇyāditaretarāsattvāt . athaivamapi vailakṣaṇye kāraṇasattvaniścayo na nivartate'nekātmakaṃ ca tat sarvātmakamityarthaḥ, na tarhyekātmakatvāt kāryaṃ sat . sattva ekātmakaṃ na bhavet sattvāt kāraṇavat,
etat prathamacakrakam . śeṣaṃ pūrvavadviparyayeṇetyādi yaduktaṃ tadapi, atha na kāraṇasarvatvavat kāryasarvatvaṃ sacca
kāraṇamiti niścitam, tadvailakṣaṇyānna tarhi sat kāryam, asat, sadvilakṣaṇatvādudumbarapuṣpavat, itaro
ghaṭavat . nanu ghaṭasattvaṃ paṭasattvavilakṣaṇam, na, asato vailakṣaṇyāditaretarāsattvāt; etad dvitīyaṃ cakrakam . ataḥ sarvātmakatvasataḥ kāraṇādanyat kāryamekātmakatvāt kumbhādiva ekakaṇaḥ . ekātmakatvasataśca
kāryādanyat kāraṇaṃ sarvātmakatvāt kaṇādiva kumbha iti .
tathānuvṛttivyāvṛttī, anuvṛttiḥ mṛd mṛd iti piṇḍaśivakādiṣu, vyāvṛttiḥ ghaṭaḥ piṭharaḥ

divicāreṇa pūrvavaccakrakadvayapravartanaṃ tathopasaṃhārameva .
na, asiddhatvāt . yadi hi ghaṭo mṛtpiṇḍādanyaḥ, tadvadeva piṇḍāderapyasarvatvaṃ
iti . tad yadi tāvadubhayasattvaṃ sattvāviśeṣādevāviśeṣe kāryavyāvṛttivat kāraṇavyāvṛttirapi syāt
sattvād ghaṭavat . atha na kāryavyāvṛttivat kāraṇavyāvṛttiḥ sacca kāryamiti niścitam, tadvailakṣaṇyānna
tarhi sat kāraṇam, asat, sadvilakṣaṇatvādudumbarapuṣpavat, itaro nirvṛttaghaṭavat . nanu ghaṭasattvaṃ paṭasattvavilakṣaṇam, na, asato vailakṣaṇyāt . athaivamapi vailakṣaṇye kāraṇasattvaviniścayo na nivartate'nuvṛttyātmakaṃ ca tat, na tarhi vyāvṛttyātmakatvāt kāryaṃ sat, sattve na vyāvarteta sattvāt kāraṇavat; dvitīyaṃ
cakrakamaviparyayeṇa . śeṣaṃ pūrvavad viparyayeṇetyādi, atha na kāraṇānuvṛttivat kāryānuvṛttiḥ sacca kāraṇamiti
niścitam, tadvailakṣaṇyānna tarhi sat kāryam, asat, sadvilakṣaṇatvādudumbarapuṣpavat, itaro ghaṭavat . nanu
ghaṭasattvaṃ paṭasattvavilakṣaṇam, na, asato vailakṣaṇyāt; prathamaṃ viparyayacakrakam . athaivamapi vailakṣaṇye
tatsattvaviniścayo na vinivartate'nuvṛttyātmakaṃ ca tat, na tarhi vyāvṛttyātmakatvāt kāryaṃ sat, sattve na
vyāvarteta sattvāt kāraṇavat; etad dvitīyaṃ cakrakaṃ viparyayeṇa . ato'nuvṛttisataḥ kāraṇādanyat kāryam,
vyāvṛttatvāt, paṅkterivaikaḥ . vyāvṛttisataśca kāryādanyat kāraṇam, anuvṛttatvāt, ekasmādiva paṅktiḥ .
ādigrahaṇādasadanukrāntāvirbhāvānāvirbhāvacakrakadvayamapi yojyam . yadi tāvadubhayasattvaṃ tataḥ
sattvāviśeṣādevāviśeṣe prāk kāryānāvirbhāvavat kāraṇānāvirbhāvo'pi syāt . atha na prāk kāryānāvirbhāvavat kāraṇānāvirbhāvaḥ sacca kāryamiti niścitam, tadvailakṣaṇyānna tarhi sat kāraṇam, asat, sadvilakṣaṇatvād ghaṭavat, itara udumbarapuṣpavat . nanu ghaṭasattvaṃ paṭasattvavilakṣaṇam, na, asato vailakṣaṇyāt .
athaivamapi vailakṣaṇye kāraṇasattvaviniścayo na vinivartate nityāvirbhāvātmakaṃ ca tat, na tarhi satatānāvirbhāvātmakatvāt kāryaṃ sat, sattve prāgapyāvirbhavet sattvāt kāraṇavat; prathamam . śeṣaṃ pūrvavadeva viparyayeṇa--atha na
kāraṇasatatāvirbhāvavat kāryasatatāvirbhāvaḥ sacca kāraṇamiti niścitam, tadvailakṣaṇyānna tarhi sat kāryam,
asat, sadvilakṣaṇatvādudumbarapuṣpavat, itaro ghaṭavat . nanu ghaṭasattvaṃ paṭasattvavilakṣaṇam, na, asato
vailakṣaṇyāt; dvitīyaṃ cakrakam . ityevamāvirbhāvānāvirbhāvavicāreṇa dve cakrake mate iti .
atrocyate --na, asiddhatvāt . naitadupapadyate'smatpakṣasādhanavat tvatpakṣasādhanam, kiṃ kāraṇam ?
asarvatvādihetūnāmasiddhatvāt, yasmādasmākaṃ sarvameva anuvṛttireva kāraṇameva upādānameva buddhisiddhameva

sarvasmādanyatvāt . tasmāt sarvasyāpyasarvatvāt sarvatvaikatvabhaṅgacatuṣṭayābhāvaḥ .
tathānuvṛttyādyabhāvaśca tata eva nāsti .
svoktavirodhādi ca . yadi kāryaṃ kathamasat ? athāsat kathaṃ kāryam ? mṛdeva
hi ghaṭaḥ kriyate ghaṭatayā vyajyate dīpeneva kriyayā . tathā ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāprasiddhirapi .
itīṣṭaṃ tasmādasarvatvāderasiddhatvāt tadvikalpābhāvāt tadasamarthavikalpatvāsiddhiḥ . tataḥ kāraṇāt kāryamanyadityetanna sidhyatīti . tatrāsarvatvāsiddhau pratipāditāyāṃ vyāvṛttyādīnāmapyasiddhirāpāditaiva bhaviṣyatītyasarvatvābhāvamevāpādayitumāha --yadi hi ghaṭo'sarvakāryatvābhimato mṛtpiṇḍāt sattvābhimatādanya itīṣyate
tadvadeva ghaṭavadeva kāryavadeva piṇḍāderapyasarvatvaṃ viprakṛṣṭasyāpi, kimuta sannikṛṣṭasya śivakādeḥ ?
sarvasmādanyatvād ghaṭavat . tasmādekaikasyāsarvatvavat sarvasyāpyasarvatvāt sarvatvābhāva iti sarvatvaikatvabhaṅgacatuṣṭayābhāvaḥ . tadasamarthavikalpatvamapyata eva nāsti . tathānuvṛttyādyabhāvaśca tata eva nāsti,
yathaikasya ghaṭasya mṛdanuvṛttyabhāvastathā sarvaghaṭeṣu tathā śivakādiṣvapyabhāva ityanuvṛttyabhāvādanuvṛttivyāvṛttikṛtavikalpābhāvaśca . evaṃ kāraṇopādānabuddhisiddhasāmānyaiḥ sapratipakṣairvikalpacatuṣṭayāsiddhistadasamarthavikalpāsiddhiścāpādanīyā . tataḥ kāraṇādanyat kāryamityetanna sidhyati .
kiñcānyat, svoktavirodhādi ca, svavacanābhyupagamalokavyavahārapratyakṣānumānavirodhā ādigrahaṇāt .
pramāṇagrahaṇāt pratyakṣānumānagrahaṇam . viśeṣasvarūpavirodhau ca kaṇṭhoktau vakṣyati . tatra svavacanavirodhastāvad
yadi kāryaṃ ghaṭavat kriyate tat kathamasat khapuṣpavat kāryaṃ ca ? svena vacanena svameva vacanaṃ virudhyate .
athāsat khapuṣpavat kathaṃ kāryaṃ ghaṭavat ? iti saiva svavacanavirodhabhāvanā viparyayeṇa tayoreva śabdayorvirodhadarśanārthā . yasmād mṛdeva hi ghaṭaḥ kriyate . hiśabdo yasmādarthe, yasmāt sarpasphaṭāṭopakuṇḍalībhavanavad mṛda eva ghaṭībhavanaṃ tathā prakāśanaṃ vyaktirvimalatā kriyate . karaṇaṃ yathā pṛṣṭhaṃ kuru pādau kuru
iti . taddarśayannāha --ghaṭaḥ kriyate ghaṭatayā vyajyate vidyamāna eva vyaktībhavati . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? sa
eva ghaṭo dīpeneva kriyayā vyajyate daṇḍādivyāpāraṇātmikayā . tathā ca viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāprasiddhirapi, kāryamasat iti vyāghātāt proktasvavacanavirodhabhāvanāta eva khapuṣpanirvṛttaghaṭayoriva na kāryamasatā viśeṣyaṃ nāpyasat kāryeṇeti na parasparato viśeṣaṇaṃ viśeṣyaṃ veti viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyāprasiddhirasmādeva
kāraṇāt .


ata eva yatnena mahatā pratipādanārthaṃ na kriyāyāṃ khedaḥ kartavyo bhavati .
ajñānapratibaddhaikānte'pi ca svavacanavirodhaḥ . pramāṇavirodhastu prastuta eva .
jñāpakatvādviśeṣavirodhaḥ . aprayogaprasaṅgāt svarūpavirodhaḥ .
ataḥ pūrvoditadoṣāsambandhenedaṃ pratipattavyam--ātmaiva sāmānyaṃ svāvasthā-

ata evetyādi yāvat khedaḥ kartavyo bhavati . yat tvayā vyākhyānamanuṣṭhitam itikartavyataiva
kartavyatā iti yatnena mahatā pūrvottaracodyaparihārapakṣāvyavacchedavatā pratipādanārthaṃ na kriyāyāṃ kriyāvyākhyānārthaḥ khedaḥ kartavyaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? sāmānyādivastuvicārakhedasyāvyavasthitaparamārthatvāt sarvasya
kriyāyā evopadeśo nyāyya ityasyābhyupagamasyoparodhāt . evaṃ tāvajjñānapūrvakakriyopadeśapakṣe svavacanavirodha
uktaḥ . yasminnapi agnihotraṃ juhuyāt ityādikriyopadeśopajīvanaṃ nāsti ajñānapratibaddhameva sarvam
ityekāntastasminnajñānapratibaddhaikānte'pi cājñānapratibaddhatve svavacanasya virodhaḥ, asat kāryam
iti jñātvoktaṃ cenna tarhi sarvamajñānapratibaddhamevāsya jñānaprasiddhatvāt . athājñātvā kathaṃ pratipādakaṃ sādhakaṃ
ca ? iti svavacanavirodhaḥ . tvayāpi etadevam iti niścityābhyupagamyoktatvādajñānapratibaddhābhyupagamasya
ca tena virodhāt evam ityavagamādabhyupagamavirodhaḥ kṛtaḥ . loke jñānavyavahārāt tadvirodhaḥ, jñānapūrvako
hi lokavyavahāraḥ, tatastasyājñānapratibandhābhyupagamāpratīterlokarūḍhivirodhaḥ . pramāṇavirodhastu prastuta
eveti, pratyakṣavirodhastāvat tathā loke dṛṣṭatvāt, kriyayābhivyajyamānasya ghaṭādeḥ kāryasya dīpeneva sata
upalabdheranumānavirodhaḥ . jñāpakatvād viśeṣavirodha iti, asya asat kāryam iti jñāpakavākyasya
jñāpakatvaviśeṣeṣṭeḥ pratyakṣasvavacanādivirodheṣu dharmaviśeṣaviparyayasiddherviśeṣavirodhaḥ . teṣvevāprayogaprasaṅgād
dharmasvarūpasya pratipipādayiṣitasya nirākaraṇād dharmasvarūpavirodhaḥ . evaṃ dharmisvarūpavirodhastadubhayasvarūpavirodhaśca yathāyogamāpādya ityalamatiprasaṅginyā kathayā . tasmādayukto'satkāryavādaḥ agnihotraṃ
juhuyāt, itikartavyataiva kartavyatā, kuryāt iti cābhyupagataḥ pareṇeti .
ata ityādi . ata etebhyo doṣebhyo niḥsṛtya kiṃ pratipattavyam ? ucyate --ataḥ pūrvoditadoṣāsambandhena, ye pūrvamuditā vidhivādinā sāmānyaikāntavāde viśeṣaikāntavāde sāmānyaviśeṣanānātvavāde
doṣā mayāpi ca ye doṣā uktāḥ sāmānyādivicārapratyākhyāyinaḥ kriyopadeśavādino'jñānavādinaśca teṣāmubhayeṣāmapi doṣāṇāmasambandhena idaṃ pratipattavyam--ātmaiva sāmānyamiti . nanu pūrvatra dūṣitamevaitad
matam ātmaiva sāmānyam iti sukhaṃ sukhaṃ ca sukhādisamudayaśca ityādipūrvottarapakṣaprapañceneti, atrocyate--na, ātmaśabdasya puruṣaparyāyatvādavayavānabhyupagamāt samudāyavādaparihāreṇāsya puruṣasāmānyasyāvasthāvato'vasthābhyo'nanyasya tatsvarūpāvasthānāt tadvaidharmyāt . ātmā iti na vastusvarūpaparyāyavācino'tra

nām, ghaṭagrīvādirūpādinavādibhedābhedasamavasthāvat . evaṃ ca kalpyamānaṃ sarvasarvātmakatvasatkāryatvamūlarahasyānatikrameṇa kalpitam . avicāro'pi ca tattvenaikyamāśritya nyāyyaḥ, nājñānapratibandhāt .
ayaṃ tasya pravṛttiparyāyasya vidhervidhiḥ, evaṃ pravṛttirityarthaḥ . vidhinā bhavatīti
grahaṇam, kiṃ tarhi ? atati satataṃ gacchati tāṃstānavasthānaviśeṣān svarūpāparityāgeneti ātmā, sa eva
sāmānyaṃ caitanyalakṣaṇam . evaṃ tarhi viśeṣābhāve kasya sāmānyam ? iti sāmānyābhāvaprasaṅgaḥ, sa mā 
bhūditi viśeṣā vaktavyāḥ . ucyate--sāmānyaṃ puri śayanāt puruṣaḥ, viśeṣāstu tasyaivāvasthāvato'vasthā
jāgratsuptasuṣuptaturīyākhyāḥ . tāsāṃ svāvasthānāṃ puruṣaḥ sāmānyamiti . kiṃ nidarśanamiti cet, ghaṭagrīvādirūpādinavādibhedābhedasamavasthāvat, yathā ghaṭasya sthūlā grīvābudhnamadhyāvasthāḥ sūkṣmāśca rūpādayo
deśabhedabhinnāḥ kālabhedabhinnāśca navapurāṇāvasthāḥ, teṣāmevāvasthābhedānāmabhedena samavasthā ghaṭa iti tadvadātmaiva svāvasthānāṃ sāmānyam . evaṃ ca kalpyamānaṃ sarvasarvātmakatvasatkāryatvamūlarahasyānatikrameṇa
kalpitamiti guṇaścātra vidyate, evaṃ hi sarvaṃ sarvātmakaṃ sacca kāryam iti mūlarahasyametannātikrāntaṃ bhavati
puruṣātmakatvāt sarvasya tadvikāramātratvācca bhedānāṃ tatraivāntarlayāvirbhāvāt sarvakāryāṇāṃ kṛkalāsavarṇaviśeṣāṇāmiva kṛkalāse .
avicāro'pi cetyādi . yadapi ca anarthako vivekayatnaḥ śāstreṣu ityavicāra iṣyate so'pyanenaiva yuktimārgeṇa tattvenaikyamāśritya nyāyyaḥ, tasya bhāvastattvam, ātmano bhāvenaikyamāśritya nyāyādanapeto nyāyyaḥ, nājñānapratibandhāt . yadyajñānapratibandhādavicārastataḥ svayamavijñāte pramāṇaprameyabhāvābhāvādayuktamityuktam . iha tu jñānātmakapuruṣasvarūpaikyāpattisanniścaye niścitamevaitat, kiṃ vicāreṇa
gatārthatvāt, na tu jñātumaśakyatvāditi .
ayaṃ tasya pravṛttiparyāyasya vidhervidhiḥ . vidhiḥ sthitirācāraḥ pravṛttirmaryādā ityasya vidhinayasyāyameva vidhirācāraḥ sthitirityādi . evaṃ pravṛttirityarthaḥ, yā caitanyātmasvarūpā pravṛttiḥ sā
vidhervidhirityetamarthaṃ vyācaṣṭe . yaḥ punarvidhiḥ prāktanaḥ sa na yujyate, yasmād vidhinetyādi . bhavatīti
bhāvo bhūprakṛtiḥ kartrarthaḥ, prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūtaḥ pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 3 . 1 . 67 iti vacanāt .
bhāve ghaño vihitatvād bhūyata iti bhāvaḥ, na bhavati iti kartrartha iti cet, tatrāpi yena bhūyate samānena
samāno bhavatīti bhāvo ṇaprakaraṇe bhuvaścopasaṅkhyānamiti vā kartā sāmānyamityevaṃ vyavasthite'rthe sarvatantra

bhāvo bhedābhedanānātāsu na bhāvo bhaviturabhāva iti vivicyate, na ca vivicyate ca .
tathā na bhavatyeva vidhitvaṃ vidheḥ, lokavaditi vidhānādvidhirutsarga evaṃ na bhavati . yathā
tat tathānyathā ca bhavati tathā vaktavyamiti vidhirvihito bhavatyutsṛṣṭaḥ .
siddhāntena vyākaraṇena tatra viśeṣamātravāde deśakālabhede parasparaviviktadravyadeśakālabhāvabhinne bhavane'bhede ca

vyākaraṇadṛṣṭena niruktyarthena samarthito vidhinā vivicyate ca sādṛśyāsādṛśyābhyām . sādṛśyāt
samāno bhavatīti pṛthak pratijñāyate, teṣu vikalpeṣu doṣāṇāmabhihitatvād nirdoṣabhavanokteśca vivicyate
vidhinā . kimevaṃ vivicyata eva ? netyucyate, na ca vivicyate ceti, pratijñā sā punaraviviktaiva kṛtā
ko ha vaitadveda, kiṃ vānena jñātena iti vacanāt . sa eṣa vidhervidhirna bhavati vivicyamānārthavidhānāt
svavacanavirodhadoṣādaṃśena vivekādavivekācca . yatrāpyaṃśena vivekastatra vivicyamānāṃśe'pi ca yathā bhavatā
vidhinayavādinābhihitaṃ tadvad vivicyate na ca vivicyate cāpi paramatadūṣaṇāt svamatasādhanācca ghaṭādirbhāvo vivicyate na ca vivicyate tathā na bhavatyeva vidhitvaṃ vidheḥ, na vidhirvihita evamityabhiprāyaḥ .
kathaṃ punarvidhīyate iti cet, lokavat, loka iva lokavat, lokavaditi vidhānād yadi lokavadeva
vidhīyate vidhirutsarga evaṃ na bhavati . kathaṃ na bhavati ? kiṃ na etena yadi kāraṇam ? yadi na ca vivicyate pratijñāpi tadaṃśadvārikā na kāryā ityādyavicārya vidhānānna bhavati . kiṃ tarhi ? yaduktasūktatayā sarvātmakatvena vidhirutsargaḥ sidhyati, tadyathā yathā tat tathānyathetyādi . athavā yathā loke dṛṣṭaṃ tathā vidhervidhirbhavati . kathaṃ punarloke vidhervidhiḥ ? ucyate --iti vidhirityādi . iti itthamanantaraṃ vakṣyamāṇo
vidhirvidhirbhavati loke, yathā tat tathānyathetyādi, mṛtpiṇḍaśivakādiprakāreṇa tathānyathā ca bhavati
yathā tathā vaktavyam, taccātacca yayopapattyā bhavati tathā vaktavyam, eṣa vidhervidhiḥ . evaṃ so'vivakṣitavyāvṛttiranaṅgīkṛtabhedastirakṛtaviśeṣo nirvyāvṛttireva vidhirvihito bhavatyutsṛṣṭa iti paryāyaśabdenotsargo vidhiriti sarvatrāsya vidhilakṣaṇasya darśayati .


tadyathā--puruṣo hi jñātā jñānamayatvāt . tanmayaṃ cedaṃ sarvaṃ tadekatvāt sarvaikatvācca bhavatīti bhāvaḥ . ko bhavati ? yaḥ kartā . kaḥ kartā ? yaḥ svatantraḥ . kaḥ
svatantraḥ ? yo jñaḥ .
nanu kṣīrarasādi dadhyādeḥ kartṛ, na ca tajjñam, na, tatpravṛttiśeṣatvād gopravṛttiśeṣakṣīradadhitvavat, jñaśeṣatvādvā cakrabhrāntivat .
nanu cakrabhrāntāvapi ko bhavitā ? iti pratyapekṣāyāṃ ghaṭabhavanavyavahāravad mṛd

ko'sau ? nidarśyatāmiti cet, ucyate --tadyathā puruṣo hītyādi . uktaniruktaḥ puruṣaśabdaḥ,
hiśabdo yasmādarthe, yasmādasau jñātā jñānaśīlo jñānadharmā sādhujñāyī vā puruṣa eva . jñātṛtvaṃ ca
jñānamayatvāt, jñānāvayavo jñānavikāro vā jñānamayaḥ sa upayogalakṣaṇatvāt . tataḥ kimiti cet,
tanmayaṃ cedaṃ sarvaṃ devamanujatiryaṅnarakapṛthivyādighaṭādibhedabhinnaṃ jagat, tadekatvāt tasya puruṣasyaikatvāt
vastutvāt tadekatvavat sarvaikatvam, sarvaikatvāccaikaṃ sa ca jagacca sarvaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ, na tu ghaṭapaṭādibhedena

bhavatīti . tannirṇayārthaṃ praśnottarakrameṇa granthaḥ --ko bhavatītyādirgatārtho yāvat kaḥ svatantraḥ ? yo jña
iti, ajñasyāsvātantrayādeva kartṛtvābhāvāt, kāṣṭhādiviprakīrṇapacananirvartanavat, yathā kāṣṭhaiḥ sthālyāmodanaṃ
devadattaḥ pacatītyatra devadatta eva pacanasya nirvartako jñātṛtvāt na kāṣṭhādīni tathā puruṣa eva bhavatīti bhāvaḥ .
itara āha --nanu kṣīrarasādi dadhyādeḥ kartṛ . kṣīrāddadhi bhavatyajñāt kartṛṇaḥ, rasād guḍaḥ, na ca
tat kṣīraṃ raso vā jñamiti jñakartṛtvamanaikāntikamiti . etacca na, tatpravṛttiśeṣatvāt, tasyaiva jñasya
pravartamānasya pravṛtteraparisamāptāyāḥ śeṣatvāt . kālakramabhedakṛtastu viśeṣo na nivāryate . yathoktam—
śarkarāsamavīryastu dantaniṣpīḍito rasaḥ .dantaniṣpīḍitaḥ śreṣṭho yāntrikastu vidāhakṛt ॥   iti .
gopravṛttiśeṣakṣīradadhitvavat, yathā gordhenoḥ pravṛtteraparisamāptāyāḥ kṣīradadhinavanītaghṛtaniṣpandanādi 
śeṣastathā puruṣapravṛttiśeṣa eva jagaditi . jñaśeṣatvādvā cakrabhrāntivat . kā vā sā pravṛttiḥ
pravartamānapuruṣavyatiriktā, sarvasya jñaśeṣatvāt ? dṛṣṭāntaścakrabhrāntiḥ, yathā kulālaprayatnabhramitasya cakrasya
bhrāntau kulālapravṛttiśeṣatvaṃ jñaśeṣatvamevaṃ dadhyāderapi jñaśeṣatvam, gorjñasya śeṣatvaṃ dadhnaḥ, gobhuktatṛṇādyāhārasya
rasarudhirādipariṇatasya jñamantareṇa kṣīradadhyādibhāvo nāsti .
nanvityanujñāpane, cakrabhrāntāvapi ko bhavitā ? iti pratyapekṣāyāṃ jijñāsāyāṃ mūlabhavitā

yena bhūyate tadeva . itarathāsau naiva syād bhaviturabhāvāt . jñasyaiva suptāvasthatvādvasthātvād na
ca cakradaṇḍādi karaṇanirīhatvāt, dadhīva payasaḥ, jñaśeṣasuptāvasthatvātvasthātvāt .
yathaiva hi rūpādayo'mūrtatvena sūkṣmāṃ vṛttimatyajanta eva svapravṛttiprabhāvāvabaddhamūrtatvaprakramān paramāṇūnadhyāsya nānāprabhedapṛthivyādibhedasthūlarūpā jāyante
vaśyāpekṣyo ghaṭabhavanavyavahāravad mṛt, yathā piṇḍaśivakādyavasthākrameṇa ghaṭabhavanavyavahāre mṛdevādyā
bhavitrī tathehāpi cakrabhrāntau bhavanavyavahāratvād mūlabhavitṛ dravyamapekṣyaṃ parataḥ parato'pi yena bhūyate yad
bhavati tadeva, maulaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadevetyarthaḥ . tasmād ghaṭabhavane mṛdvad bhrāntibhavane kulālo'pekṣyaḥ, kulālaśeṣabhrāntivacca jñaśeṣaṃ sarvam, itarathāsau naiva syād bhaviturabhāvād vandhyāputravadamūlatvādityarthaḥ .
syānmatam--acetanānāmapi abhrādīnāṃ ceṣṭādarśanājjñaprayogamantareṇa pravṛttirdaṇḍādīnāmiti . etaccāyuktam, jñasyaiva suptāvasthatvātvasthātvāt na ca cakradaṇḍādi karaṇanirīhatvāt, na ca cakradaṇḍādi svata
eva bhavati karaṇanirīhatvāt, karaṇatvānnirīhāṇi, nirīhatvānna svata eva jñāturyatnamantareṇa tadyatnaśeṣaṃ vāntareṇa
tasyaiva suptāvasthā daṇḍacakrādi niṣpandabhūtā niścetanībhūtā bhavitumarhati . tasmāt sāpi suptāvasthā jñasya
cetanasyaiva vṛttirbhavitumarhati, dadhīva payasaḥ, yathā dadhi payaso'vasthā tathā daṇḍacakrādi jñasyaiva kulālasya .
etena dadhyādyapi jñabhavanamākhyātameva, jñaśeṣasuptāvasthatvātvasthātvāt tasyāpi dadhyādeḥ kulālayatnaśeṣacakradaṇḍādivajjñayatnaṃ jñayatnaśeṣaṃ vāntareṇa pravṛttyabhāvājjñapravṛttimātratvamevetyarthaḥ
etasyārthasya bhāvanārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntamāha --yathaiva hītyādi . yathaiva rūparasagandhasparśaśabdā amūrtatvena
sūkṣmāṃ vṛttimatyajanta evetyādi, sūkṣmapūrvakatvāt sthūlasya sūkṣmatāṃ nirūpya sthūlatvaṃ nirūpayati, na hi te
rūpādayaḥ pratiniyatacakṣurādivijñānaprabhāvitasvarūpā mūrtāḥ sthūlā iti vā kenacidiṣṭāstasmādamūrtāḥ, tadbhāvo'mūrtatvam, tena amūrtatvena vṛttiḥ, saiva ca sūkṣmā, tāmatyajanto'jahata eva svapravṛttiprabhāvāvabaddhamūrtatvaprakramān svayā pravṛttyā prabhāvena cāvabaddho mūrtatvena prakramo yeṣāṃ te svapravṛttiprabhāvāvabaddhamūrtatvaprakramāḥ paramāṇavaḥ, rūpādīnāmātmīyayā pravṛttyāvabaddho mūrtatvena prakramaḥ paramāṇūnāṃ sabhedānām, tān
paramāṇūnadhyāsyeti sṛṣṭeḥ kramaṃ darśayati dṛṣṭāntarūpeṇa . tata uttarakālaṃ nānāprabhedapṛthivyādibhedasthūlarūpā jāyante rūpādaya eva . pṛthivyā aśma-loṣṭa-sikatā-vajrādayaḥ prabhedāḥ, himakarakādayo'pām, jvālāṅgāramurmurādayastejasaḥ, utkalikā-maṇḍala-guñjā-jhañjhādayo vāyoḥ, vṛkṣagulmavallīlatāvitānavīrudho vanaspateḥ, kṛmi-pipīlikā-bhramarādi-manuṣya-deva-nārakā jaṅgamānām . etat pravṛtternidarśanam .

yathaite pṛthivyādayaḥ sūkṣmā mūrtasūkṣmāmūrtarūpādipūrvakāḥ sthūlatvāt tantupūrvapaṭavadevaṃ tato'pi parato'pi paraṃ

evaṃ tato'pi paraṃ kāraṇaṃ rūpādibhāvamāpadyata iti rūpādipravibhaktamapravibhaktasvatattvaṃ yat tad bhavati tadeva tattvam .
tat kim ? nanu jñānasvatattva ātmeti rūpādibhireva nirūpitaṃ tat, taddhi rūpaṇaṃ
rūpaṃ jñānameva vibhaktāvibhaktaṃ grahaṇameva, na tu rūpyate tat tena tasmin vetyādi rūpam, rasāderguṇagaṇād dravyādvā vibhaktasyānavasthānādrūpasya puruṣabhinnaputratvādivat .
dvidhāpi rūpasyāvibhaktatattvātmakatāyāmapi rūpādanyeṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ pratyakṣato
rūpādibhyaḥ parato'pyaparamanyat paraṃ variṣṭhaṃ pradhānaṃ kāraṇaṃ rūpādibhāvamāpadyate iti pratipattavyam . tacca
paraṃ yat kāraṇamātmānamamūrtasūkṣmarūpāditvena sthūlamūrtaparamāṇudvipradeśādiskandhapṛthivyāditvena ca pravibhajamānaṃ
pravartate . kiñca, iti rūpādipravibhaktamapravibhaktasvatattvaṃ paramāṇudvipradeśādipṛthivyādiṣvapravibhaktasvarūpāditattvavat . kiṃ punastasya svatattvam ? tasya bhāvastattvam, svārthiko bhāvapratyayaḥ, taddarśayati --yat
tad bhavati tadeva tattvam . svaṃ ca svaprabhedāpekṣayā, tattvatā anusṛtatvāt, paratattvābhāvena viśeṣyate
svatattvamiti paramatāpekṣayā ceti .
itara āha --tat kimiti nirūpyam . ācārya āha --nanu jñānasvatattva ātmeti rūpādibhireva nirūpitaṃ tat paraṃ kāraṇam . ātmā jñānasvatattvaḥ, sa punā rūpādibhireva nirūpitaḥ, rūpa rūpakriyāyām pā॰ dhā॰ 1934, rūpitaṃ nirṇītaṃ tu jñātam, nirṇayo rūpaṇamityeko'rthaḥ . taddhi rūpaṇaṃ
rūpamiti yasmāt kāraṇād rūpaṇaṃ rūpamityeko'rthaḥ . ādigrahaṇād rasanamāsvādanaṃ rasaḥ, evaṃ śeṣāṇāmapi
rūpaṇakṛtātmalābhaniruktatvād rūpaṇatā, jñānameva rūpaṇaparyāyatvājjñānasya, vibhaktāvibhaktaṃ grahaṇameva, 
vibhaktagrahaṇaṃ rūpaṃ raso gandhaḥ śabdaḥ sparśa iti jñānam, rūpamityavibhaktaṃ sarveṣu, tad dvividhamapi grahaṇameva
rūpaṃ bhāvasādhanatvād rūpaśabdasya . na tu rūpyate tat tena tasmin vetyādi rūpam, na tu karmakartṛkaraṇādhikaraṇasādhanatvam, ādigrahaṇāt na tasmai tasmād rūpamiti sampradānāpādānakārakabhedebhyo
