ata eva ca sāśaṅkamanvāhuranye, na viniścitaṃ prasahya, yathā kālaḥ pacatītyādi, bhūtānāṃ
vartanātmakāt kālādanyatvābhyupagamādananyatvena kālavartanātmakatvenaiva na viniścitam . tathā prajānāmanyatve
saṃharaṇaṃ suptānāṃ jāgratāṃ vā tadanyatvena nirdeśādaviniścitatvāt sāśaṅkameva bhedadarśanānupātenoktatvāt .

ye punarviniścitadhiyasta evaṃ vadanti--
kāla eva hi bhūtāni kālaḥ saṃhārasambhavau .
svapannapi sa jāgārti kālo hi duratikramaḥ ॥
nanu taiḥ sarvaiḥ svabhāva eva bhavati iti bhāvyate . yat puruṣādayo bhavanti
sa teṣāṃ bhāvaḥ, tairbhūyate yathāsvam . tathā ca svabhāve sarvasvabhavanātmani bhavati
ye punarviniścitadhiyaste prasahyaivaṃ vadanti, tadyathā --kāla eva hi bhūtāni bhūtatvena kālasyaiva
vartanāt . kālaḥ saṃhārasambhavau, yathoktaṃ prāk rūpādayo na kecit kālamantareṇa iti bhūmyādivrīhyādivadātmanyeva sambhavasaṃhārakriye iti ca bandhasaṃsārau iti vacanācca . svapannapi jāgarti, sa eva
svapiti jāgarti ca, na tu svapadbhyo jāgradbhyo vā vyatiriktaḥ kaścit te vā tataḥ, svaprabhedakramasahavṛttimātratvājjāgratsvapadavasthayoḥ, suptavṛttyānāvirbhūtātmanastasyaiva kālasya jāgradvṛttyābhivyaktavikramatvāt kvacit
krameṇa bhedavṛttivijṛmbhitatvāt sāmānyavartanasya suptavibuddhādisvaprabhedeṣu avyāghātāditi kālakāraṇavādo
vidhividhivikalpa eva samāptaḥ .
tadvikalpa eva svabhāvabhāvo'dhunā --nanu taiḥ sarvairityādi . jñaḥ svatantraśca puruṣa eva bhavatīti
svātantrye satyapi jñājñarūpārūpakriyā'kriyādiniyamānniyatireveti sarvatra vartanatattvaḥ prabhuvibhutvābhyāṃ kāla
eva bhavatīti ca etairvādairnanu svabhāva eva bhavatīti bhāvyate, bhavan bhāvyate taireva pratipādyate . kiṃ
kāraṇam ? dravyārthaprasavād yat puruṣādayo bhavanti sa teṣāṃ bhāvaḥ, yathā sarvabhāvāḥ svena bhāvena
bhavanti sa teṣāṃ bhāvaḥ pā॰ vā॰ 5 . 1 . 119 iti vacanād yena bhāvena yo bhavati sa tasya bhāvastattvamātmīyo bhāvaḥ svabhāva ityanarthāntaram, tataśca tatra te bhavantīti tadātmāno'bhisambadhyante puruṣādīnāmātmāno bhavanti, tairbhūyate yathāsvamiti bhāvena teṣāmabhisambandhaḥ . te bhavanasya kartṛtvamanubhavanti
jñānasvātantrya-niyama-vartanātmakaṃ tat taditi vadadbhiḥ sa sa svabhāva eva parigṛhīto bhavati .
evaṃ ca svabhāvaparigrahe sati kāraṇāntaraparikalpanā vyarthetyata āha --tathā ca svabhāve sarvetyādi
yāvat ke te ? sarvabhāvānāṃ puruṣādīnāṃ svaṃ svaṃ bhavanamātmā yasya so'yaṃ sarvasvabhavanātmā,
tasmin svabhāve bhavati bhavanasyānubhavitari kartari svatantre bhavati bhavatervā kartari sati siddhe svabhāve

siddhe'rthāntaranirapekṣe ke te ? teṣāmapi hi svatvaṃ svabhāvāpāditameva, anyathā te ta
eva na syuranātmatvād ghaṭapaṭavat . evameva tatra tatra puruṣādisvabhāvānatikramāt
sarvaikatvamabhinnaṃ tadbhāvavattvādeva varṇyate iti svabhāvaḥ prakṛtiraśeṣasya .
puruṣādīnāṃ ca svatve sattvānapohāt tulye kāla eva bhavanātmā na puruṣādaya
iti na svabhāvādṛte sidhyati .
siddhasyāsādhyatvāt siddhaudanavadarthāntaranirapekṣe taireva vādaiḥ pratipādite ke te puruṣādayaḥ ? na te
bhavantītyarthaḥ, kiṃ tairvinā svabhāvasya na pratiprāptaṃ kāryam ? . syānmatam--teṣāṃ svo bhāva ātmīyaḥ svabhāva
iti tānapekṣata iti, etaccāyuktam, yasmāt teṣāmapi svatvaṃ svabhāvāpāditameva, te hyātmānaḥ sve,
tadbhāvaḥ svatvam, taddhi teṣāṃ svatvaṃ puruṣādīnāṃ kenāpāditam ? svātmabhireva . yadyevaṃ svaḥ svo bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ
parasparaviviktaḥ svabhāva evetyāpāditaṃ svātmabhireva tat . anyathā yadi tadātmatvaṃ teṣāmātmabhāvāpāditameva
na syāt tataste ta eva na syuranātmatvād ghaṭapaṭavat, yathā ghaṭaḥ paṭānātmatvāt paṭo na bhavati
paṭo'pi ghaṭānātmatvād ghaṭo na bhavati evaṃ puruṣādayo'pyātmānātmatvādātmāno na syuḥ, na syureva vā
anātmatvāt khapuṣpavat . tasya svabhāvakāraṇatvasya vyāptipradarśanārthamāha --evamevetyādi, itthamevaitat,
avaśyamatreva tatra tatra yathātra svabhāvavāde svabhāvānatikramāt svabhāva evetyabhinnaṃ svabhāvavyatiriktārthābhāvāt tasya cābhinnatvāt tathā tatra tatra puruṣaniyatikālādivādeṣūktavidhinā puruṣādisvabhāvānatikramāt
sarvaikatvamabhinnaṃ tadbhāvavattvādeva varṇyate, jñātmabhavanasya niyamātmabhavanasya vartanātmabhavanasyānyasya vā
tasya tasya svabhāvādeva varṇanāt . itiśabdo hetvarthe, asmāduktahetoḥ svabhāvaḥ prakṛtiraśeṣasya yonirbījaṃ prabhavaḥ kāraṇamityarthaḥ .
kiñcānyat, puruṣādīnāṃ ca svatva ityādi, dravyārthasya kañcidaparityajya vṛtternayānāṃ pūrvavirodhitvāduttarānuvṛtteśca kālasya puruṣādyaparityāgena vṛttiṃ tāvad darśayati, kālavāde puruṣādīnāṃ svatvaṃ sattvānapohāt, kathaṃ sattvamanapoḍham ? saṃsāryanāditvābhyupagamāt puruṣatvam . tasminneva kāle niyaterapyātmatvaṃ
sattvānapohāt, sattvānapohaśca yugapadayugapanniyatārthābhyupagamāt . evaṃ kālavāde niyatipuruṣayoḥ sattvābhyupagamaḥ . tathā puruṣavāde niyateḥ kālasya cātmatvaṃ sattvānapohāt, kathaṃ sattvānapohaḥ ? muktikramābhyupagamāt kālasattvānapohaḥ, avasthāniyamābhyupagamānniyatisattvānapoha ityādi . evaṃ niyativāde kālapuruṣayoḥ svatvamātmatvaṃ sattvānapohāt, kālasattvānapohaḥ anādimadhyāntāṃ niyatim iti kālasattvābhyupagamāt tāṃ samprapaśyan sarvajña iti puruṣasattvābhyupagamāt . eṣa dravyārthasya sarvatra sarvasattvāt svabhāva
ityudgrāhaḥ kṛto bhavati, tatra sattvānapohāt sattve tulye kāla eva bhavanātmā na puruṣādaya iti na

na, atulyatvāt sattvasya, kālasyaivaikasya vrīhivat tathā tathā bhavanāt puruṣādeśca pṛthak pṛthapṛthakpṛthagbhinnabhāvātmakabhavanāt . nanvevamapi kālasyaiva nānyasya iti
svabhāva eva parigṛhīto bhavati, tathā ca puruṣādīnāṃ kāraṇakāryaniyamāt .
kālasyaiva tattvāt kāraṇakāryavibhāgābhāvāt sāmānyaviśeṣavyavahārābhāva
eveti cet, evamapi sa eva svabhāvaḥ . pūrvādivyavahāralabdhakālābhāvaścaivam, apūrvā-
svabhāvādṛte sidhyati tatsvatattvasya sattvāvinābhāvāt, kālodāharaṇaṃ tu kālavādidūṣitapuruṣādivādānāmapi taddūṣaṇena dūṣyatvāt tatpratipādanavat pratipādyatvācca . yathoktam--

samanantarānulomāḥ pūrvaviruddhā nivṛttaniranuśayāḥ .   iti .

kālavādyāha --na, atulyatvāt sattvasya, kālasattvapuruṣasattvayoranyonyenātulyatvāt . kathamatulyatā ?
kālasyaivaikasya vrīhivattathā tathā bhavanāt puruṣādeśca pṛthak pṛthagbhinnabhāvātmakabhavanāt, yathā
vrīhirevaiko mūlāṅkurādibhāvena bhavati tathā kāla eva tathā tathā vartanātmā bhavati vrīhivad mūlāṅkurāditvena,
na tathā puruṣādayo bhinnātmabhavanāditi . atrocyate --nanvevamapi kālasyaiva nānyasyeti kālasyaiva
bhavanaṃ na puruṣādeḥ iti vacanāt sutarāṃ kālasyāsau bhavanātmeti svabhāva eva parigṛhīto bhavati .
yathā ca tvayocyate sattvātulyatā kālasyaiva vrīhyādivadaṅkurādivacca puruṣādīnāṃ bhavanamiti tathā ca
puruṣādīnāṃ kāraṇakāryaniyamādapi caivaṃsvabhāvaḥ kālaḥ kāraṇaṃ vrīhyādivat, kāryaṃ puruṣādayo'ṅkurādivat,
niyamāt sa sa tasya svabhāva iti sa eva svabhāvaḥ parigṛhyate paraiḥ . pūrvatra sattvasya hetutvena
vivakṣitasya sattvāvinābhāvitvena bhāvanā, iha siddhasyaiva svabhedeṣvabhedena vyavasthitasya sāmānyaviśeṣavyavahāraprasiddhibhāvaneti viśeṣaḥ .
kālasyaiva tattvādityādi yāvadabhāva eveti cet . syānmataṃ bhavataḥ--traikālyaikakūṭasthatvāt
kālasyaiva tattvāt kālavāde kāraṇaṃ kāryam iti vibhāgābhāvādasau sāmānyaviśeṣavyavahārābhāva eva,
mithyātvāccāsya vyavahārasyāsadviṣayatvāditi cet, evamapi sa eva svabhāvaḥ bhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ,
kālasyaiva hi sa svabhāvo yadasau bhavatīti svabhāvaparigrahaḥ . kiñcānyat, vyavahārapratyākhyāne prāgabhihitakālāstitvānumānapratyākhyānadoṣaḥ, tadyathā --pūrvādivyavahāralabdhakālābhāvaścaivamapūrvāditvānniyativat . yathā pūrvaparādikāraṇakāryavyavahārābhāvād niyatirnāstītyucyate tathā kālo'pi tadabhāvānnāstīti
prāptam . yadapi ca kālānumānaṃ yugapadayugapadvṛttyā ghaṭarūpādīnāṃ vrīhyaṅkurādīnāṃ cocyate tadapi svabhāvānumānameva sampadyate, yasmād yugapadayugapadityādi, yugapadvartanāt kramavartanāccātiriktasya kasyacidabhāvāt
kāla eva ityuddiśya nirdeśārthaṃ ghaṭarūpādi vrīhyaṅkurādi codāhṛtaṃ tasyoddeśyasya nirdeśyasya ca bhāvasya tena
tenātmanā bhavato bhavanādeva tu viśeṣeṇaiva svabhāvo'bhyupagata iti darśanārtham .


ditvāt, niyativat . yugapadayugapad ghaṭarūpādīnāṃ vrīhyaṅkurādīnāṃ ca tathā tathā bhavanādeva tu svabhāvo'bhyupagataḥ .
tathā ca dṛśyate teṣveva tulyeṣu bhūmyambvādiṣu bhinnātmabhāvaṃ pratyakṣata eva
kaṇṭakādi . tadeva tīkṣṇādibhūtam, na puṣpādi tādṛgguṇam . tacca vṛkṣādīnāmeva .
tathā mayūrāṇḍaka... ... ...mayūrādibarhāṇyeva vicitrāṇi . anvāha ca--

kaḥ kaṇṭakānāṃ prakaroti taikṣṇyaṃ vicitrabhāvaṃ mṛgapakṣiṇāṃ ca .
svabhāvataḥ sarvamidaṃ pravṛttaṃ na kāmacāro'sti kutaḥ prayatnaḥ ॥


kenāñjitāni nayanāni mṛgāṅganānāṃ ko vā karoti rucirāṅgaruhān mayūrān .
kaścotpaleṣu dalasannicayaṃ karoti ko vā karoti vinayaṃ kulajeṣu puṃsu ॥  

yadi svabhāva eva kāraṇaṃ kiṃ na svabhāvamātrādeva bhūmyādidravyavinirvṛttinirapekṣā kaṇṭakādyutpattirbhavet ? kimanyathāpi na syāt ? kaṇṭakaḥ kimarthaṃ vidhyati ?

athavā naitad yuktigamyaṃ svabhāvakāraṇyam, tathā ca dṛśyate teṣveva tulyeṣu bhūmyambvādiṣu
hetuṣu bhinnātmabhāvaṃ pratyakṣata eva kaṇṭakādi, kaṇṭakasya mūlataḥ kramahīnatanurāyatā, ādigrahaṇāt
patrāṅkurādi saṃsthānavarṇādi bhinnātmabhāvam . punastadeva kaṇṭakādi tīkṣṇādibhūtam tīkṣṇaṃ tīkṣṇataraṃ kuṇṭhaṃ
kuṇṭhataraṃ saviṣaṃ nirviṣamityādi, na puṣpādi tādṛgguṇaṃ sukumārādisvabhāvaṃ surabhidurgandhādisvabhāvaṃ ca .
tacca vṛkṣādīnāmeva, tacca kaṇṭakādi vṛkṣa-vallī-kṣupādīnāmeva, tatrāpi varvalādīnāmeva na nyagrodhādīnām .
na caiṣā mayūracandrakāditā vṛkṣādīnām, na ca barhiṇapārāpatādīnāṃ kaṇṭakādi . tathā mayūrāṇḍaketyādi
yāvad vicitrāṇi, barhādīnāmeva pañcavarṇatā nodakādīnām, tānyapi ca mayūrādibarhāṇyeva vicitrāṇi
na śukādibarhāṇīti . anvāha ceti pūrvavajjinavacanānusāreṇaiva . kaḥ kaṇṭakānāmityādi kenāñjitānītyādi ca gatārthe vṛtte .
itara āha --yadi svabhāva eva kāraṇamityādi yāvat kiñcicca neti . arthāntaravyapekṣotpattidarśanānna svabhāva eva kāraṇam, āsye kavalaprakṣepavat . dṛṣṭā ca kaṇṭakāderutpattirbhūmyādidravyavinirvṛttivyapekṣaivānapahnavanīyā . sā ca na syād bhūmyādidravyanirvṛttivyapekṣotpattiḥ svabhāvādeva, svabhāvasyārthāntaranirapekṣakāraṇatvāt . yadi ca svabhāva eva kāraṇaṃ kiṃ kāraṇaṃ na svabhāvamātrādeva bhūmyādidravyavinirvṛttinirapekṣā kaṇṭakādyutpattirbhavet ? kiṃ ca kāraṇamanyathāpi na syāt ? bhūmyādyantareṇa nirvṛttiḥ kaṇṭakasya
kiṃ na syāt ? kiṃ vā kaṇṭakasya saukumāryaṃ kusumasya vā taikṣṇyaṃ na syāt ? so'pi kaṇṭakaḥ kimarthaṃ

kimarthaṃ ca kadācid vidhyati ? kimarthaṃ kiñcideva vidhyati kiñcicca na ? nanūtpātādisvabhāvaniyamavaśādanapekṣitadravyakālādirapi dṛṣṭaiva kaṇṭakādyutpattiḥ . api ca
bhūmyādidravyavinirvṛttyapekṣaiva kaṇṭakanirvṛttiriti bruvatā svabhāvasiddhistvayaiva
varṇyate, bhūmyādibhya eva kaṇṭako bhavatīti tatsvabhāvavarṇanāt .
yathā pṛthivyādisvabhāvo viśvathā kaṇṭakādirevaṃ nimittānāmapi nimittatā
vidhyati ? kusumaṃ kiṃ na vidhyati ? kimarthaṃ ca kadācid vidhyatīti, tīkṣṇo'pi vedhasvabhāvo'pi
sarvakālaṃ kiṃ na vidhyati kaṇṭakaḥ ? kimarthaṃ kiñcideva vidhyati, na sarvam ? tadapi kiṃ kvacideva pradeśe
vidhyati na sarvatra ? ityatra viśeṣaheturvācyaḥ . dṛṣṭaścāyaṃ niyamo'rthāntarāpekṣaḥ, sa tu svabhāvasyārthāntaranira-
pekṣatvānnopapadyate iti .
atrocyate --nanūtpātādisvabhāvetyādi yāvad dṛṣṭaiva . yaducyate bhūmyādidravyavinirvṛttyapekṣaivotpattirdṛṣṭā ityetattadupekṣotpattidarśanāt svabhāvāvyabhicārācca svabhāva eveti mantavyam . tadyathā--utpātādiṣu
akaṇṭakānāṃ vṛkṣādīnāṃ kaṇṭakāḥ kaṇṭakināṃ cākaṇṭakā nidhyādiliṅgatvena dṛṣṭāḥ . yathoktam—
akaṇṭakāḥ kaṇṭakinaḥ kaṇṭakāścāpyakaṇṭakāḥ .viparyayeṇa dṛśyante vadanti nidhilakṣaṇam ॥   iti .
itthaṃ satyāmapi bhūmyādidravyanirvṛttau kaṇṭakābhāvādasatyāmapi etaddravyakālādinirvṛttau kaṇṭakadarśanācca nāpekṣāsti svabhāvasya . kintu utpātādisvabhāvaniyamavaśādanapekṣitadravyakālādirapi dṛṣṭaiva kaṇṭakādyutpattiḥ, na punastaṃ taṃ svabhāvamantareṇa sā utpattirastīti svabhāva evāvyabhicārād vyāpitvācca kāraṇameṣitavyam . kiñcānyat, api cetyādi . api ca tvayā bhūmyādidravyavinirvṛtyapekṣaiva bhūmyādīnyeva
vṛkṣatvena kaṇṭakadravyatvena taikṣṇyāditvena ca nirvartante, tatsamāyoganirvṛttyapekṣā kaṇṭakanirvṛttiriti bravatābruvatā
nanu saiva svabhāvasiddhistvayaiva varṇyate . kiṃ kāraṇam ? bhūmyādibhya eva bhūmyambukṣetrabījāṅkurādidravyanirvṛttibhya eva kaṇṭako bhavatīti tatsvabhāvavarṇanāt, anyathā svabhāvāt kimanyadatra śakyaṃ vaktuṃ
kāraṇam ? bhūmyambukṣetrabījāṅkurādibhya eva kaṇṭako bhavati na mṛtpiṇḍādibhya ityeva teṣāṃ svabhāva iti
svabhāvasyaiva samarthanaṃ tadapi teṣāṃ tattatsvābhāvyāt .
kiñcānyat, yathā pṛthivyādītyādi yāvannimittānāmapi nimittatā svābhāvikīti . yathaivāyaṃ 
viśvathā sarvathānekaprakāraṃ bījāṅkurādikramanirvṛttaḥ kaṇṭakādiḥ pṛthivyādisvabhāvaḥ puruṣaprayatnanirapekṣo'prayatnata
eva bhavati, athavā pṛthivyādīnāmeva prāgabhihitanyāyena vṛkṣaghaṭādisvabhāvābhyupagamād yathā svabhāva eva
evaṃ nimittānāmapi ghaṭapaṭādyutpattau puruṣakārasādhyābhimatāyāṃ mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍacakrasūtrodakakulālādinimittānāṃ nimittatā sāpi svābhāvikī, tato na svabhāvavyatiriktaṃ kiñcit . evaṃ ca sarvasya svābhā

svābhāvikī, tatra kuta utpattirapi ? prativastu svabhāva evāyaṃ vayaḥkṣīrādivat .
yadi cāsau na syāt tata uttaratrāpi na bhavedeva abhūtatvād vandhyāputravat . evaṃ
mṛdādiṣu vidyamānānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ nimittāpekṣasvabhāvaivotpattiḥ, nākāśādiṣu .
dṛṣṭā ghaṭādīnāṃ kriyāyā utpattiriti cet, na, prāganabhivyakteḥ . sā sati
agrahaṇanimittābhāve kimiti cet, svabhāvādeva atisannikṛṣṭamativiprakṛṣṭaṃ vā
vikatvena tatra kuta utpattirapi ? yā prāguktā tvayā bhūmyādidravyavinirvṛttyapekṣaivotpattiriti sā kutaḥ ?
nāstyeva kāraṇam, tasmānnāsti sā, prāgevābhivyaktaye viracitalīnāvasthatvāt . tasmāt sotpattiḥ prativastu svabhāva evāyam, vastu vastu prativastu svo hi bhāvaḥ svabhāva iti niruktyā prativastu ātmīyaṃ
bhāvamācaṣṭe . vayaḥkṣīrādivaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, yathā bālyakaumārādivayo'vasthāḥ pūrvaviracitā eva āvirbhavanti yathā kṣīradadhyudasvinnavanītaghṛtādyavasthāstathā ghaṭādayo nimittasvabhāvāpekṣābhivyaṅgyaviracitasvabhāvā
āvirbhavanti . yadi cāsāvityādi yāvad vandhyāputravat . yadi cāsāvutpattisvabhāvo'smadabhihito
na syāditthaṃ pūrvāvasthāyāmeva tata uttaratrāpi na bhavedeva abhūtatvād vandhyāsutavat . asyaivārthasya
bhāvanārthamāha --evaṃ mṛdādiṣvityādi gatārthaṃ yāvannākāśādiṣu .
dṛṣṭā ghaṭādīnāṃ kriyāyā utpattiriti cet . syānmatam--dṛṣṭaviruddhamuktaṃ tvayā vidyamānānāṃ
ghaṭādīnāṃ nimittāpekṣasvabhāvaivotpattiriti, kriyāyā eva kulālasya ghaṭāderarthasyotpatterdarśanāditi . etacca
na, prāganabhivyakteḥ, kriyāyāḥ prāk sotpattiranabhivyaktā apavarakaghaṭavat pradīpeneva kriyayābhivyajyate
notpādyata ityadoṣaḥ . sā sati agrahaṇanimittābhāve kimiti cet, sā sati arthe'nabhivyaktiragrahaṇanimittānāmatyāsannaviprakṛṣṭavyavahitasamānābhihārābhibhavasaukṣmyendriyadaurbalyamanovaiyagryapittopaghātādīnāmabhāve
sati kimarthaṃ bhavatīti cenmanyase, vayamatra brūmaḥ --svabhāvādevetyādi yāvaccakṣurādinā na gṛhyate .

añjanamandarādi cakṣurādinā na gṛhyate, yathā sa svabhāvastathāyamapi . tathā kiñcidatyantānupalabdhisvabhāvameva bhavati ātmādi . tanna puruṣakāmacāraprayatnādibhyaḥ
kiñcidapi nirvartate . tatra kutaḥ kasyacidarthino'pyevaṃ vā viparyaya eva vārambhakriyānirvṛttayaḥ ? tathā cāhuḥ--kaṭukaḥ kaṭukaḥ pāke vīryoṣṇaścitrako mataḥ .tadvad dantī, prabhāvāttu virecayati sā naram ॥ carakasaṃ॰ 1 . 26 . 68
na tvasmābhireva tad vaktavyam --svabhāvādeva, agrahaṇahetuṣu asatsvapi sato'rthasyānabhivyaktau svabhāva eva
kāraṇamiti . kasmāt ? tvayaivābhyupagatatvāt, atisannikṛṣṭamativiprakṛṣṭaṃ vyavahitaṃ vā cakṣurindriyaṃ rūpamañjanamandarādi na gṛhṇātyatyantam ityatra kena tvayā etat kāraṇena pratipannam ? iti pṛṣṭenāvaśyaṃ svabhāvāditi vaktavyam, ayaṃ hi cakṣuṣaḥ svabhāvo yadatisannikṛṣṭamañjanādi na paśyati ativiprakṛṣṭaṃ vā mervādīti
śeṣendriyāṇāmapi svabhāvādevātiviprakṛṣṭādyagrahaṇaṃ svaviṣayaniyamaśceti . kiñcānyat, yathā sa svabhāvastathāyamapi, yathā cakṣurādīndriyāṇāmātmano'tyantamatisannikṛṣṭādyagrahaṇaṃ svabhāvastathānabhivyaktāgrahaṇaṃ
svabhāva iti kiṃ na gṛhyate ?
kiñcānyat, yathaitat tathā kiñcidatyantānupalabdhisvabhāvameva bhavati ātmādi, ātmākāśa-
kāladigādayaḥ kāryata eva nityamanumeyāḥ padārthāḥ saukṣmyād bāhyendriyāviṣayāstatsvabhāvāḥ . tatra nāstyātmā
nāsti kālaḥ dharmādharmākāśadigādayo vārthā na santīti vṛthaiva vivadante śākyādayaḥ svabhāvabhedamavidvāṃsaḥ .
tasmād yaducyate tvayā kriyāto ghaṭādi nirvartata iti tanna puruṣa-kāma-cāra-prayatnādibhyaḥ kiñcidapi
nirvartate, puruṣāt tadicchātastatpravṛttestatprayatnād vīryādityarthaḥ . ādigrahaṇānna tadbuddheḥ na svāminiyogādibhyaḥ sarvatra vyabhicāradarśanāt . kiṃ tarhi ? bhūmyambvādivrīhyaṅkurādimṛdghaṭādyabhivyaktyanabhivyaktisvabhāvo
ghaṭo'pi pṛthivyādisvabhāva eva vastutvāt tadātmatvāt, yathā--āpo dravāḥ, sthirā pṛthivī, calo'nilaḥ,
mūrtihīnamākāśam, uṣṇo'gnirityādiṣu svabhāva eva, tatra kutaḥ kasyacidarthino'pyevaṃ vā viparyaya
eva vārambha-kriyā-nirvṛttayaḥ, āpo dravā bhavantu, sthirā pṛthivī, calo'nilaḥ, agniruṣṇaḥ, viyadamūrtaṃ
bhavatu ityevamarthino'pi puruṣasya nārambho na ceṣṭā na ca nirvṛttirvā tathā viparyaye'pi mā bhūd dravaṃ
jalam, sthirā bhūḥ, calo'nilaḥ, agniruṣṇaḥ, amūrtamākāśam ityārambhaḥ kriyā nirvṛttirvā svabhāvasyānyathākartumaśakyatvāt . evaṃ ghaṭādiṣvapi yojyaṃ svābhāvikatvam .
tathā cāhuriti svābhāvikatve jñāpakamāha . kaṭukarasaḥ kaṭuvipāka uṣṇavīryaścitrakaḥ, tadvad dantī
kaṭukarasā kaṭuvipākā uṣṇavīryā, viśeṣastvasyāścitrakāt prabhāvena virecayati, prabhāva iti svabhāvaparyāyatvād rasāderapi svabhāvatvāt sa eva sāmānyaviśeṣābhyāṃ tathā tathā varṇyata iti, tasmād yat tvayoktaṃ
kriyāto ghaṭādyutpattiḥ iti tatra pṛthivīmṛtpiṇḍaśivakādikramāpattavyaghaṭātmanaḥ sthairyātmavanna sta utpatti-

iti kathaṃ ghaṭotpattyādi sambhāvyate ? pravṛttimṛdāṃ sa svabhāva eva . phalasvabhāvānurūpāḥ pravṛttayo'ta eva vyavasthitā iti prayāso'narthakaḥ . svabhāvādeva pravartitavyamityeva pravartante'pratarkato vastūni, akṣinimeṣadhātukaṇṭakādivat .
vināśāvuktahetutvāt . itiśabdo hetvarthe, asmāddhetoḥ kathaṃ ghaṭotpattyādi sambhāvyate ? ādigrahaṇād
vakṣyamāṇau vināśavipariṇāmāvapi kathaṃ sambhāvyete ? naiva sambhāvanīyaṃ tattrayamityarthaḥ .
syānmatam--kulālaprayatnapravṛttidaṇḍacakrasūtrodakamṛdādīnāṃ puruṣābhisandhyanurūpaghaṭādyutpattivināśavipariṇāmaphalaiḥ sambandhadarśanānna svabhāva eveti . etaccāyuktam, yasmāt pravṛttimṛdāṃ sa svabhāva eva,
yathoktaṃ prāk nimittānāṃ nimittatā svābhāvikī iti, tasmāt svabhāva eva . kiñcānyat, phalasvabhāvānurūpāḥ pravṛttayo'ta eva vyavasthitāḥ, svabhāvabalādeva mṛtpiṇḍadaṇḍādibhireva ghaṭo bhavatīti jñātvā
cakramūrdhni mṛtpiṇḍaṃ saṃsthāpya daṇḍagrahaṇacakrabhramaṇādivyāpārā ghaṭaphalayogyāḥ kriyāstadanurūpā vyavasthitāḥ .
tathā turīvemaśalākādisādhanāḥ sūtropādāna-tantusantāna-pāyana-vayanakriyāḥ paṭaphalasvabhāvānurūpā vyavasthitāḥ . evaṃ kṛṣisevāvaṇijyāparivrajyādipravṛttayaḥ svabhāvameva hetuṃ samarthayantyo dṛśyante loke vyavasthitāḥ,
āsāṃ nāpyutkarṣo nāpyapakarṣaḥ kaścit . phalānurūpāḥ pravṛttayaḥ pravṛttyanurūpaṃ phalaṃ tatra tatreti vyavasthitaphalapravṛttitā svabhāvādeveti .
syānmatam--vyavasthitapravṛttiphalasvabhāve bhāve puruṣaprayāsastarhyanarthaka iti cet, satyametat, iti
prayāso'narthakaḥ, yathā tvaṃ brūṣe tathaiva svabhāvasāmarthyādeva pravṛtternivṛtteśca phalasiddhyasiddhyoranarthaka eva
prayāsa iti tvayā sadoṣābhimato'pyayaṃ pakṣo mayā tattvavādabhraṃśabhayānna tyajyate . itthamanarthako'pyasau
prayāsaḥ puruṣasyāstyeva, sanneva svabhāvādeva . yathoktam—
svabhāvataḥ pravṛttānāṃ nivṛttānāṃ svabhāvataḥ .nāhaṃ karteti bhāvānāṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati ॥  
iti pravṛttinivṛttyorbhāvānāṃ svabhāvasvātantryameva, sa hi svo bhāva ātmā vastūnāṃ nirvṛttānāmityuktatvāt .
pravṛttinivṛttyorānarthakye kiṅkṛtā kimphalā vā pravṛttiḥ ? ataḥ svabhāvānurūpapravṛttipratijñāvyāghāta iti cet,
na vyāghātaḥ, tatsvābhāvyādeva yasmāt pravartitavyamityeva pravartante'pratarkato vastūni, prakṛṣṭastarkaḥ
pratarkaḥ, anenopāyenārthasya siddhiḥ iti ya ūhaḥ sa tarkaḥ, na pratarko'pratarkaḥ, apratarkata eva vastūni
pravartitavyamityeva pravartante svabhāvādeva, tadyathā --akṣinimeṣadhātukaṇṭakādivat, yathā akṣinimeṣonmeṣā

evaṃ ca yadi hetuto yadyahetuto ghaṭakaṇṭakādi ubhayathāpi svabhāvānativṛttiḥ .
ātmabhavanamanādipravṛttaṃ kāraṇaṃ jagataḥ .
evaṃ ca tatrānādipravṛttasvabhāvaviparyayeṇa yadyutpattirvināśo vipariṇāmo
vā tato'nādipravṛttakāraṇasvabhāvavyatyāse hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthaśāstravyarthatā
puruṣasya kriyāyāḥ phalasya ca tathā'svabhāvatvāt . anyathotpādavināśavipariṇāmebhyo ghaṭārthaṃ pravṛtteṣu tatpaṭa utpadyate tadvināśārthaṃ pravṛtteṣvavināśo vipariṇāmārthaṃ
pravṛtteṣvavipariṇāmaśca . ataḥ śāstrārthavattvāya varamidameva kāraṇaṃ sva eva bhāvaḥ
vanarthakāvabuddhipūrvau ca puruṣasyāhṛtāhārarasarudhiramāṃsamedosthimajjaśukrāditvena vibhajanaṃ kaṇṭakatīkṣṇabhavanaṃ
cetyevamādipravṛttayastathā ghaṭādiphalasvabhāvānurūpāḥ pravṛttayo'pratarkata eveti .
evaṃ cetyādi . evaṃ ca kṛtvā lokaprasiddhivaśād yadi hetuto yadyahetuto yathāsaṅkhyaṃ ghaṭakaṇṭakādi buddhyabuddhipūrvanirvṛttābhimataṃ yadastu tadastu ubhayathāpi svabhāvānativṛttiḥ . evametadātmabhavanamanādipravṛttaṃ kāraṇaṃ jagataḥ, pṛthivyabbījāṅkurādiṣu sthiradravādisvabhāvāvirbhāvatirobhāvādirūpeṇa ekaṃ nityaṃ
ca notpadyate na vinaśyati na cānyathā bhavatīti pratipattavyam, utpādavināśavipariṇāmānāmanādipravṛttasvabhāvakāraṇavirodhitvāt .
evaṃ ca tatrānādipravṛttasvabhāvetyādi yāvad vipariṇāmo veti pūrvapakṣa uttānārthaḥ . uttarapakṣastu tato'nādipravṛttakāraṇasvabhāvavyatyāse iti pratyuccāraṇam, ātmabhavanaviparyaye doṣaḥ, hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthaśāstravyarthatā, dharmārthakāmamokṣaphalaprāptyupāyavidhānārthāni tadapāyaparihārārthāni ca
śāstrāṇi vyarthāni syuḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? puruṣasya kriyāyāḥ phalasya ca tathā'svabhāvatvāt,
kartṛkaraṇakarmādisādhanānāṃ tadaṅgasampannāyāḥ kriyāyā dharmārthakāmamokṣāṇāmanyatamasya tatphalasya cānyonyānurūpeṇa anātmatvādityarthaḥ . parasparānurūpānabhyupagame'nyathotpādo'nyathā vināśo'nyathā vipariṇāmaścānanurūpeṇeti yāvat . tato'nyathotpādavināśavipariṇāmebhya iti puruṣādisādhanakriyāphalānāṃ tathā'nātmatvaṃ samarthayati, ghaṭārthaṃ pravṛtteṣu ghaṭotpattyarthaṃ pravṛtteṣu tatpaṭa utpadyate tadvināśārthaṃ pravṛtteṣvavināśo vipariṇāmārthaṃ pravṛtteṣvavipariṇāmaśceti, svabhāvāniyamānnotpādavināśavipariṇāmāḥ santi,
yadi syurayathābhipretāḥ syuḥ svabhāvāniyamāditi svabhāvāparigrahe śāstrāṇāmarthavattā na yujyate . atastasmāt
siddhaśāstrāṇāmanatiśaṅkyatvādaniṣṭatvāccānarthakyasya śāstrārthavattvasiddhyarthaṃ ca ghaṭādeḥ kāraṇamanveṣaṇīyam,
tacca kāraṇamanviṣyamāṇaṃ śāstrārthavattvāya varamidameva kāraṇaṃ svabhāvaḥ, nāto'nyad vimardaramaṇīyataramasti . kuto'nyannāsti ? yattatkāraṇaṃ sva eva ātmīya eva ātmaiva vā bhāvaḥ, katamo'sau ? saṅgraheṇa

dvidhā prativastu jīvājīvavadavasthitaḥ, yo'sti sa bhāvaḥ ya ātmā sa bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ .
sa caiko'pi kārakabhedaṃ svaśaktibhedādeva labhate, sa evānubhavati so'nubhūyate . svadravyasaṃyogavibhāgasvābhāvyena sa eva bhavatīti saṃsāramokṣau svabhāvataḥ .

ca parabhāvanirākaraṇārthamucyate . yathoktam --kimidaṃ bhaṃte ! atthitti vuccati ? goyamā ! jīvā ceva
ajīvā ceva sthānāṅgasū॰, tathā kimidaṃ bhaṃte ! sama+etti vuccati ? gotamā ! jīvā ceva ajīvā ceva
sthānāṅgasū॰, evamāvalikocchvāsaniḥśvāsaprāṇastokalavamuhūrtāhorātrakālavibhāgā ratnaprabhādibhūmayo dvīpāḥ
samudrāḥ parvatādyāśca neyāḥ .
sa caikaḥ svabhāvaḥ pūrvavadaśeṣanityatvalakṣaṇayukto'pi kartṛkarmakaraṇādikārakabhedaṃ svaśaktibhedādeva
labhate, tadyathā--svasādhanaviśeṣasvabhāvādeva viśeṣo bhavati, sa evānubhavati so'nubhūyate, etadvyākhyārthodāharaṇatvena kārakadvayaṃ kartṛkarmakārakabhedā eva śeṣakārakāṇīti darśanārtham . so'nubhavati kṛtvā phalamanubhavati karmaphalaṃ bhuṅkte . so'nubhūyate svabhāvabhedenātmanaiva bhujyate'pi . sa eva kathamanubhavati anubhūyate ca ?
iti tadarthapradarśanārthamāha --svadravyetyādi . svayameva dravyāṇi ātmaiva karmakarmitvasvabhāvāni dravyāṇi saṃyujyante
viyujyante ca, teṣāmeva svabhāvabhedānāṃ dravyāṇāṃ saṃyogavibhāgau bandhamokṣau deśasarvavikalpau, tadvikalpavicitrasukhaduḥkhajanmamaraṇavaiṣamye, tayoḥ svābhāvyena sa eva bhavatīti saṃsāramokṣau svabhāvataḥ, yathā
vrīhireva aṅkuratvādyanubhavanātmānubhavati anubhūyate ca . anyonyasaṃyogaviyogaviparivartena karmakarmisvābhāvyena viparivartamāno'pi svabhāvātmā vyādheḥ sādhyāsādhyadvaitarūpavat svajātyaparityāgādadvaitatvād vyavasthita
eva sarvatra bhavyābhavyajīvarāśyoḥ . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? yathā kanakāśmani suvarṇaṃ dvidhāvirbhavat kriyā-'kriyābhyāṃ
tatsvabhāvaḥ, kvacinnāstyeva kanakamiti so'pi svabhāvaḥ, tathā keṣāñcit svayamevāpagamādātmaviśuddhyāvirbhāvaḥ

antareṇāpi dhātuvādaṃ kanakāvirbhāvastathā karmavivekasvābhāvyādeva bhavyajīvānāmātmāvirbhāvaḥ, samyagdarśanajñānapūrvikayā tu kriyayā prācuryeṇa kaivalyaprāptirdhātuvādakriyayeva kanakotpattiḥ, keṣāñcidanāvirbhāva eva karmāvivekasvābhāvyāt .
evaṃ ca tadubhayasvabhāvavarṇanādabhavyajīvakarmaṇoḥ... ... .... bhavyasya tu
viśuddhi... ... .... yadi heturanyo mṛgyeta tenānantyamasyāpi syāt, anāditvāt,
ākāśavat . tadantavattve vākāśamapi sāntaṃ syāt, anāditvāt, bhavyakarmavat .
athāpyasyānāditve'heturanto bhavati tathā ādiḥ siddhakarmasantānasya kasmānna
bhavati ? iti svabhāva eva śaraṇaṃ tadupāyasvabhāvo mokṣa iti . evaṃ sarvacodyeṣu .
kaivalyaṃ yathā bharatamarudevyādīnāmityata āha taddṛṣṭāntatvena --antareṇāpi dhātuvādaṃ kanakāvirbhāvastathā
karmavivekasvābhāvyādeva bhavyajīvānāmātmāvirbhāvaḥ, samyagdarśanajñānapūrvikayā tu kriyayā prācuryeṇa kaivalyaprāptirdhātuvādakriyayeva kanakotpattiriti svabhāvavaicitryādeva, tathā keṣāñcidanāvirbhāva eva karmāvivekasvābhāvyāt .
evaṃ ca tadityādi . evaṃ ca kṛtvā svabhāvanayabalena āmnātā jīvā dvividhāḥ--bhavasiddhikāśca
abhavasiddhikāśceti tadubhayasvabhāvavarṇanāt abhavyajīvakarmaṇorityādi bhavyasya tu viśuddhītyādi
ca gatārthaṃ vākyadvayam . anāderjīvakarmasantānasya vyavacchedāvyavacchedau svabhāvādeveti nātra kaścid
bhavyakarmasantānasāntatāyāmabhavyakarmasantānānantatāyāṃ vā hetuḥ śakyo vaktumanyaḥ svabhāvāt . yadi
heturanyo mṛgyeta tena ānantyamasyāpi syāt, kasya ? bhavyakarmasantānasyāpyanantatvaṃ syāt . kasmāt ?
anāditvādākāśavat, svabhāvamanicchadbhiranāditvaheturabhyupagantavyo jāyate so'niṣṭānantatvasādhanāya
bhavati . adhunā'nāditvahetusadbhāve'pi tatsāntateṣṭāvākāśasāntatetyata āha --tadantavattve vākāśamapi
sāntaṃ syādanāditvād bhavyakarmavaditi svabhāva evāntavattve kāraṇam, na heturanyo'sti hetuvādena
vimṛgyamāṇaḥ . athāpyasya bhavyasaṃsārasyānāditve sati aheturanto bhavati nirhetukahetuko'nta iṣyate 
tato yathā cāsyānāditve saṃsārasyāheturanto bhavati tathā kasmāt tasya virodhī punarnirhetukahetukāntavattvavad
bhavyakarmasantānasya nirhetukahetukādiḥ siddhakarmasantānasya kasmānna bhavati ? iti vācyamatra viśeṣakāraṇamasvabhāvahetuvādinā, mama tu punaḥ svabhāvavādinaḥ svabhāva eva sarvatra kāraṇaṃ vyāpitvāt . itiśabdo
hetvarthe, ityataḥ kāraṇāditthaṃ svabhāva eva śaraṇaṃ kāraṇavādinām . kathaṃ kṛtvā ? tadupāyasvabhāvo mokṣa iti samyagdarśanādiratnatrayopāyasampannabhavyakarmasantānātyantocchedasvabhāvo mokṣa iti . evaṃ
tāvad bhavyasaṃsārocchittāvabhavyasaṃsārānucchittau ca hetuvāde codite svabhāvāśrayeṇa parihāra uktaḥ . evaṃ

svabhāvānabhyupagame tu na sādhanaṃ na dūṣaṇaṃ ca svabhāvāpetāvayavārthavāditvāditi vādahānaṃ te .
ayaṃ sarvo'pi yatnaḥ so'nyabhinnasvarūpopādānenaiva svābhimatinirākaraṇāya
bhavati . puruṣavāde tāvajjñānamayo na rūpādimayaḥ, rūpādīnāṃ tanmayatvāt . kāryā-
sarvacodyeṣvityatideśaḥ, yathā bhavyābhavyasaṃsārocchittyanucchittyorviśeṣaheturvācyaḥ iti codite svabhāvādeveti vyavasthoktā tathā jīvājīvarūpyarūpisakriyākriyatvādiviśeṣāḥ kutaḥ iti codite svabhāvādeva
vyavasthāvaśyamāśrayaṇīyā .
svabhāvānabhyupagame tvityādi yāvad vādahānaṃ te iti . yadi svabhāvo nābhyupagamyate tataḥ
sādhanadūṣaṇābhāvastato vādatyāgaḥ, tadyathā--pakṣahetudṛṣṭāntādayaḥ svena bhāvena sampannāḥ sādhanam, pakṣaḥ
sādhyatvenepsito yadi viruddhārthānirākṛtaḥ, hetuḥ pakṣadharmaḥ sapakṣe san vipakṣād vyāvṛttaḥ, dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyānugatahetupradarśanamasati sādhye hetvasattvapradarśanaṃ ca . tadviparyaye tadābhāsā iti sābhāsaṃ sādhanaṃ svena bhāvena
bhavati . tatsādhanadoṣodbhāvanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ tadanyathoktirdūṣaṇābhāsa iti ca svena bhāvena vyavasthitamabhyupagamya
sādhanaṃ dūṣaṇaṃ ca sābhāsaṃ vivadiṣurasi saṃvṛttaḥ, anyathā na sādhanaṃ na dūṣaṇaṃ ca svabhāvāpetāvayavārthavāditvāditi vādatyāgaste prāptaḥ . tasmāt svabhāva eva prabhuvibhutvābhyāṃ kāraṇaṃ jagata iti . evaṃ tāvat
svabhāvavādaḥ .
anayā ca diśā śabdabrahmatattvabhedasaṃsargarūpavivartamātramidaṃ jagaditi . yathoktam—
anādinidhanaṃ brahma śabdatattvaṃ yadakṣaram .vivartate'rthabhāvena prakriyā jagato yataḥ ॥ vākyapa॰ 1 . 1
ityādikāraṇavādā bhidyante saṃjñādibhedāt . te punaḥ sarve'pi paramārthadravyārthasya vidhividhinayasya svarūpamaspṛśanta eva pravartante, yasmāt saṅkṣepeṇāyaṃ sarvo'pi yatnaḥ so'nyabhinnasvarūpopādānenaiva svābhimatinirākaraṇāya bhavati, tadyathā--puruṣavādinaḥ puruṣādanyadavastu apuruṣatvād vandhyāputravat tathā niyateranyadaniyatitvād vartanādanyadavartanatvāt svabhāvādanyadasvabhāvatvād vandhyāsutavadavastu iti bruvatāṃ puruṣaniyatikālasvabhāvavādināmātmātmavastuno dravyārthavṛttasya tatparamārthasya tattvānāṃ sarvaikatvanityatvakāraṇamātratvasarvagatatvānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratipādanārthamudyatānāṃ vādinām anyadavastu iti svato bhinnānyārthābhyupagamenaiva
tatpratipādanaṃ nānyatheti tatpratipādanārtho yatnaḥ so'yamanyabhinnarūpopādānamantareṇa nāstīti sa yatnaḥ svābhimatapuruṣādyarthanirākaraṇāyaiva bhavatyanyabhinnārthābhyupagamāt .
katham ? iti taddarśayati --puruṣavāde tāvajjñānamayo na rūpādimaya iti, rūpādīnāṃ tatsuṣuptāvasthāmātratvābhimatānāṃ tanmayatvāt jñānātmakapuruṣamayatvāt . tāni ca rūpādīni kāryātmānaḥ, kāryā

tmanāṃ tanmayatve kāryatvānekatvānityatvāsarvatvāni puruṣasyaiva prāptāni . avasthāvacca
pūrvādiniyatyādiṣvapi .
svabhāvavāde tu atiśayaścāyam, ādāveva bhedopādānāt sambhavavadvyabhicāravṛttyanumatyā bhāvaviśeṣaṇasvaśabdopādānāt tathaiva cārthasya nirūpaṇāt . yadayaṃ
bhavati bhūyate'neneti vā bhāvaḥ . svaśabdo'svavyāvartanārtha itaretarābhāvamātraviṣa-
tmanāṃ tanmayatve cetanaikakāraṇātmatve kāryatvānekatvānityatvāsarvatvāni puruṣasyaiva prāptāni tanmayatvāt pratyekaparisamāptatvācca teṣāṃ pratyakṣata upalabhyatvācca . tasmāt puruṣasyaikanityakāraṇasarvatvāni nirākriyante'vasthānāṃ kāryakāraṇātmanāṃ puruṣamayatvādityuktaḥ puruṣātmakatvapratipādanayatnasya dravyārthavṛttasarvaikatvādyabhimatinirākaraṇadoṣo'vasthāśrayaṇāt . avasthāvacca pūrvādiniyatyādiṣvapītyatideśena niyatikālasvabhāveṣvapi
svābhimatinirākaraṇaṃ teṣāmapi darśayati . avasthāvacceti yathā suptasuṣuptajāgradvimuktyavasthābhedena bhinnānyarūpopādānenaiva svābhimatinirākṛtiḥ puruṣavāde'bhihitā tathā bālyādipūrvottarāvasthāsu tathāniyativartanāsvabhāvādibhedābhyupagamādeva svābhimataniyatyādinirākaraṇam .
svabhāvavāde tu,tuśabdo viśeṣaṇe, viśeṣo'sya svamatanirākaraṇadoṣādatiśayaścāyam . kiṃ
kāraṇam ? ādāveva bhedopādānāt, itare sṛṣṭipradarśanadvāreṇa dūraṃ gatvā paścād bhedamupādadate, svabhāvavādī punarutthāna eva bhedamupādatta ityayamatiśayaḥ . kuto bhedopādānamiti cet, sambhavavadvyabhicāravṛttyanumatyā bhāvaviśeṣaṇasvaśabdopādānāt . sati sambhave vyabhicāre ca viśeṣaṇam, yathā nīlamutpalamiti nīlatvaṃ cedutpale sambhavati vyabhicarati ca kadācit, raktamapi tad dṛṣṭamutpalaṃ bhramarādiṣu ca
nīlatvam, ato viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati nīlaṃ ca tadutpalaṃ ca taditi evaṃ bhedavṛttyanumatyā vinā viśeṣaṇopādānābhāvāt, tathehāpi bhāvaśabdavācyasyārthasya svaśabdābhidheyaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ svaśabdopādānaṃ bhedādhārasambhavavadvyabhicāravṛttyanumatyaiva sahitam, yathā sambhavānumatyā vinā na viśeṣaṇaṃ tathā nāntareṇa vyabhicāramapi viśeṣaṇaṃ bhavati . tatra vyabhicāro virudhyate dravyārthavādasyaikyādityabhiprāyārthaḥ . tathaiva cārthasya nirūpaṇāditi, na kevalaṃ svaśabdopādānamātrādeva bhedo'ṅgīkṛtaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? artho'pi bhūmyādikaṇṭakāditvena tathā
nirūpyate uttareṇa granthena bhedaprādhānyenaiva bhāvīkṛtenārtho'pi bhinno viśeṣaṇatvenopādātuṃ yogyaḥ, tadyathā—
yadayaṃ bhavatītyādi, tatra svaśabdabhāvaśabdayorarthavyutpattyorbhāvaśabdārthavyutpattistāvad bhāvavādinaḥ svabhāvavādinaścāvayoḥ śabdārthavyutpattirbhāvaśabdasya bhavatīti bhāvo bhūyate'neneti vā bhāva iti tulyā, tasyāṃ
ca tulyatāyāṃ na kaścid visaṃvādaḥ . svaśabdo'rtho vā viśeṣaṇatvena pravartamānaścintyaḥ, so'svavyāvarta


yo'rthābhāvārthatvādasvābhavane varteta, sa tatropakṣīṇaśaktitvāt svabhavanasya na prayojakaḥ . etadapi cāsvabhavanavyāvartanaṃ svaśabdasya naivāsti, asvasyābhūtatvāt . na
cābhūto vyāvartanāya . atha sa tathābhūta eva tataḥ sa bhāva eva, kiṃ vyāvṛttyā
anarthikayā ? tadbhāvatvaprasaṅgāt, abrāhmaṇavacane brāhmaṇatvavat . yadapi vyāvartyate
tadapi ca bhavedeva, asato'prasaktatvādaprasaktasya cāvyāvartyatvāt khapuṣpavat,
nārthaḥ, svo bhāvo'svo bhāvo na bhavatītyasvavyāvartanaṃ tasyārthaḥ, svaśabdaśca bhāvasyaivātmaparyāyasya vācakaḥ,
tasmād viśeṣaṇatvādasvavyāvartanārthaḥ sampadyate . tadarthatvācca itaretarābhāvamātraviṣayaḥ, svaḥ paro na
bhavati paro'pi svo na bhavatīti svaparābhāvāditaretarābhāvo'rthābhāvo bhāvābhāva iti yāvat . tataścārthābhāvārthatvādasvābhavane varteta asvo na bhavati ityeṣo'sya mukhyo'rtho jāyate na tu bhāvasvarūpapratipādanamiti bhāvārthāsaṃsparśānna kiñcidanena .
syānmatam--bhāvamapi brūta iti, etaccāyuktam, yasmāt sa tatropakṣīṇaśaktitvāt svabhavanasya
na prayojakaḥ, atibhāra eṣa hi śabdasya yadekaḥ svaśabdaḥ parabhavanavyāvṛttiṃ svabhavanapratipādanaṃ ca yugapat
sakṛduccaritaḥ kuryāt, ato na prayojako na vācaka ityarthaḥ . artho vāsya svaśabdasya svaśabdaṃ na prayojayati
śabdavṛttivirodhāt . tasmādasvabhavanavyāvartanamevārthaḥ . etadapi cāsvabhavanavyāvartanaṃ svaśabdasya
naivāsti . kintvarthādgaterabhyupetya etad vicāritam . kimarthaṃ nāstīti cet, ucyate --asvasyābhūtatvāt
svasyaiva bhūtatvād bhāvasyaiva bhūtatvādityarthaḥ . svaśabdārthābhāvānna svaśabdaṃ prayojayati vandhyāputravat . tadabhāvād bhāvaśabdavyatiriktārthaviṣayābhimataḥ svaśabdo'pi nāstītyata āha --na cābhūto vyāvartanāya
prabhavatīti vākyaśeṣaḥ, abhūtatvād vandhyāsutavat .
atha so'rtho'svastathābhūta eva tataḥ sa bhāva eva, bhāvādeva tasya svaśabdavācyārthasya bhāvaśabdavācyārthavat kiṃ vyāvṛttyānarthikayā ? iti svaśabdasya vyāvartyābhāvād vyāvṛttiranarthikā, vyāvartyārthābhāvaśca tasya bhāvatvād bhāvavadityuktaḥ . syānmatam--tasya vyāvartyasyābhāvād vyāvartyatā viśeṣaṇārthavattā ceti, etaccāyuktam, tadbhāvatvaprasaṅgāt, na hyasataḥ prasaṅgo'sti, aprasaktasya ca vyāvartyatā nāsti
abrāhmaṇavacane brāhmaṇatvavat, na hyabrāhmaṇavacane brāhmaṇo'prasakto vyāvartyate, yathoktaṃ nañivayuktamanyasadṛśādhikaraṇe tathā hyarthagatiḥ pā॰ vā॰ 3 . 1 . 12 iti . bhāvaśabdārthavyutpattyarthaṃ kartrarthopādānād yadayaṃ bhavati iti bhāvaśabdasya ayaṃśabdaviśiṣṭasya svarūpoktaḥ svaśabdo'pyanarthakaḥ . tasmād yadapi

kiñcittvād vastutvādarthatvādibhyaḥ svavat .
ayaṃ ca svabhāvaḥ kiṃ vyāpī prativastu parisamāpto vā ? vyāpitve tyaktasvaparaviśeṣaṇaḥ syāt . prativastutve kiṃ tena kalpitenābhinnaphalena lokavādāt . pratyekamātravṛtti ca vastu ghaṭādyeva ghaṭādītītaretarābhāvāt parasparamasvabhavanaparigrahāt
kutaḥ kva cāsau svabhāvaḥ syāt ? bhāvaviṣayaikārthe svatve na kiñcidanyat svaṃ nāmeti
kimatra bhedena kriyate ghaṭādinā paṭādibhāvaviśiṣṭena ? so'pi yadi bhāva eva ko'yaṃ
vyāvartyate tadapi ca bhavedeva vyāvartyatvādabrāhmaṇavat, vaidharmyeṇa nāsat tat, kutaḥ ? asato'prasakta-
tvādaprasaktasya cāvyāvartyatvāt khapuṣpavat . vyāvartyasya sattve'numānāntaramapyāha --kiñcittvād
vastutvādarthatvāt, ādigrahaṇāt prameya-jñeya-sattvādibhyo'pi . dṛṣṭāntaḥ svavaditi, yathā svaṃ
vyāvartyād vibhaktatvāt kiñcid vastu arthaḥ prameyaṃ jñeyaṃ sacca tathā vyāvartyamapi sajjñeyaṃ prameyamartho vastu
kiñcidvā prasaktatvādeva, tasmād bhavedeva .
kiñcānyat, ayaṃ ca svabhāva ityādi . ayaṃ ca tvadiṣṭaḥ svaśabdaviśiṣṭo bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ kiṃ
vyāpī prativastu parisamāpto vā ? yadi vyāpī sarvagata eka eva tasmin vyāpitve tyaktasvaparaviśeṣaṇaḥ syāt, ekarūpatvāt tasya pararūpābhāvāt svaśabdopādānaṃ paraśabdopādānaṃ ca nirarthakameva .
atha vastuni vastuni parisamāptaḥ prativastu tataḥ prativastutve kiṃ tena kalpitenābhinnaphalena lokavādāt ?
lokavādo hi ghaṭasya ghaṭatvameva svabhāvo nānyaḥ, paṭasya paṭa eva iti śrūyate, ghaṭādipṛthagbhūto na kaścideka
iti . sa yadi tathā prativastu kalpyate na kaścit tena lokavādābhinnaphalenārthaḥ kalpitena . tasmānnaikaḥ
kaścit svabhāvo yathā pūrvaṃ svabhāvavādyupavarṇitaḥ sidhyati . kiṃ tarhi ? laukika eva sidhyati .
kiñcānyat, svabhāvābhāva eva prasaktaḥ, tadyathā --pratyekamātravṛtti ca vastu ghaṭādyeva ghaṭādīti,
ghaṭa eva ghaṭaḥ paṭa eva paṭaḥ paṭe ghaṭo nāsti na ghaṭe paṭa itītaretarābhāvāt parasparamasvabhavanaparigrahaḥ
kṛto bhavati, tataḥ parasparamasvabhavanaparigrahāt kutaḥ kva cāsau svabhāvaḥ syāt ? yadyupapattidvāreṇārthaḥ tata idamupapattimukhamasya, bhāvaviṣayaikārthe svatve svatvādananyo bhāvaḥ, ya eva bhāvaḥ
sa eva sva ityanayoranarthāntaratvameveti satyaṃ na kiñcidanyat svaṃ nāmeti, itiśabdo hetvarthe,
tataḥ kimatra bhedena kriyate ghaṭādinā paṭādibhāvaviśiṣṭena ? dravyārthasvarūpasyābhinnatvāt . bhedena
yaducyate ghaṭa iti paṭādinā bhāvavyāvartanārthaṃ bhedena ghaṭasya bhāvo na paṭasya iti svo bhāvo na
parabhāvaḥ iti ca puruṣādivādavad bhedādhāraṃ tena kiṃ kalpitena dravyārthasvarūpavirodhinā bhedādhāreṇeti .
so'pi yadīti so'pi ca ghaṭādirbhedo bhāvo vā yadi bhāvaḥ bhavatīti bhāva eva bhāvasvarūpādabhinna

bhedo nāma ghaṭādirbhāvavyatiriktaḥ ? atha na bhavati tadastitvameva na . nanu ghaṭasya
bhāva iti paṭādivyatirekeṇa ghaṭa eva, na, bhāvasyaiva tathā tathā bhavanāt . na hi
hastādau bhavati kurvati vā devadatto na bhavati na karoti vā . ato bhāvatve'bhāvatve
vā nāstyeva bhedo ghaṭādiḥ . yaṃ taṃ bhuvo'rthamabhidadhati sarvadhātavaḥ .
tacca pratyavastamitaniravaśeṣaviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavanaṃ sarvavastugarbhaḥ sarvabimbasāmānyamabhinnaṃ bījam . tadeva hi bhavanaṃ vrīhyādi mṛdādi ca sādhyaṃ sādhanamekamaheyamapracyutaṃ
eva ataḥ ko'yaṃ bhedo nāma ghaṭādirbhāvavyatirikta iti svayamevokto bhedābhāvaḥ . atha na
bhavati bhedaḥ bhāvo na bhavati nānubhavati bhavanaṃ na vā bhāva evābhyupagamyate tadastitvameva nābhyupemaḥ,
abhavanāt kharaviṣāṇātmavat tat .
itara āha --nanu ghaṭasya bhāvaḥ ityavyatirekaṣaṣṭhyā vyapadiśyamānatvāt paṭādivyatirekeṇa
ghaṭa eveti svato'pṛthagbhūtena bhavanena, tataḥ paṭādibhedena bhavanasya kartā ghaṭa eveti . atrocyate --na,
bhāvasyaiva tathā tathā bhavanāt, na brūmo ghaṭasya bhavanaṃ na paṭasyeti bhedavyapadeśo nāstīti, sa punarupacarito ghaṭādibhirabhinnasyaikasya bhāvasyaiva tathā tathā tena tena prakāreṇa ghaṭapaṭādinā bhavanāt, anyathā
paṭādayo na bhavantyeva bhavanavyatiriktatvādityuktam . sa eva hi bhāvo ghaṭapaṭādirbhavati hastādibhavanakaraṇayoḥ
puruṣabhavanakaraṇavat ghaṭādīnāṃ bhāvāvyatirekāt puruṣāvyatiriktahastādibhavanavaditi . taddarśayati --na hi
hastādau bhavati kurvati vā devadatto na bhavati na karoti vā, hastādau bhavanakaraṇayoḥ kartṛtvaṃ
pratipadyamāne tatsamudāyasyāvaśyaṃ tatpratipatteḥ samudayasamudayinoścānanyatvāt . tadupasaṃharati --ato
bhāvatve'bhāvatve vā nāstyeva bhedo ghaṭādiriti . bhavane prastute karotigrahaṇaṃ kimartham ? sarvadhātūnāṃ
bhavanārthatvapradarśanārtham, tata āha --yaṃ taṃ bhuvo'rthamabhidadhati sarvadhātava iti . etasmād bhāvānna
ghaṭādirbhinna iti .
tacca pratyastamitaniravaśeṣaviśeṣaṇaṃ bhavanam, nimagnāni nilīnāni pratyastamitāni tatraiva bhāve
niravaśeṣāṇi viśeṣaṇāni sva iti para iti vā ghaṭaḥ paṭa ityādi vā . tacca sarvavastugarbhaḥ, tadeva bhavanaṃ
sarvavastūnāṃ mūladalikam . sarvabimbasāmānyam, mudrāpratimudrānyāyena bhidyamānānāmātmarūpāṇāṃ sphaṭikavadanekadhā dṛśyamānānāṃ bimbabhūtānāṃ pratibimbabhūtānāṃ ca sāmānyam, abhinnaṃ bījamityāditatsvarūpavarṇanāni evamprakārāṇi nirviśeṣaṇasyāpyaṃśaparikalpanayeti . tat kathaṃ bhāvyate iti cet, ucyate --tadeva hi
bhavanaṃ vrīhyādītyādi yāvat sādhanamekam . bhavanameva vrīhibījam, ādigrahaṇādambukṣetrakālādi
aṅkurādi vā . tadeva ca mṛdādi mṛlloṣṭavajrāśmasikatādi ca bhavanameva iti vartate, sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca
bhavati, puruṣavādivyākhyānanyāyena svayameva viśvamādi vartate, yathā tadabhinnakartṛkaraṇādi sādhanaṃ sādhyaṃ ca

sadā, hastyādiprapañcena puruṣasyaiva hastyādimṛdādibhavanavat . ghaṭāderabhavanasya bhedasyāsattvameva, bhāvād bhinnatvāt kharaviṣāṇavat, aghaṭatvādātmanā'bhāvāt paṭavat .
vikalpo hi bhedasaṃsargapariṇāmairbhavet . na cāsya bhedo na saṃsargo na vipariṇāmaḥ, ekatattvātmakatvāt, pratisvatvavat . vikalpena ca bhāva eva, nābhāvaḥ
tathā bhavanameva ātmāvyatiriktaṃ sādhanaṃ sādhyaṃ caikameva tathā tathā, aheyamaparityājyaṃ bhavanameva vrīhyādivikalpānantye'pi tadavasthameva, apracyutamātmasvarūpād bhavanāt sadā sarvakālam . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? hastyādi
yāvad bhavanavat, yathā naṭādirabhinayapuruṣo hastyaśvaparvatasaritsamudrādiprapañcānabhinayati svataḥ sṛjatyupa-
saṃharati ca tathā tathā bhavanāt, te ca na hastyādayo'nye tataḥ kecid bhedena bhavanti, hastyādiprapañcena tu
puruṣa eva hastyādirmṛdādiśca bhavati, ādigrahaṇāccitralepyakāṣṭhapustādirbhavati, tathā bhavanameva pṛthivyambumṛdādi bhavati, na bhedaḥ kaścid bhavanād ghaṭādeḥ, kiṃ kāraṇam ? ekatraivopayuktārthatvāt . ghaṭāderabhavanasya
bhedasyāsattvameva bhāvād bhinnatvāt kharaviṣāṇavat . bhāvād bhinno'pi ghaṭo bhavatyeva cet, tasya
bhavane vandhyāputro'pi bhavet . etasya diṅmātratvādaghaṭatvādātmanā'bhāvāt paṭavat, ghaṭabhavanaṃ hi ghaṭaḥ,
tadabhāvo bhāvābhāvaścāghaṭaḥ, tasmādaghaṭatvād ghaṭātmanā'bhāvāt . etamevārthaṃ vyācaṣṭe --ātmanā'bhāvāditi, sādhanāntarameva vā anyātmanā bhāvāditi yāvat . paṭavat, yathā paṭo ghaṭātmanā'bhavan ghaṭo na
bhavatyevaṃ ghaṭo'pi ghaṭātmanā abhavanād ghaṭo mā bhūt, ghaṭātmanā abhavanaṃ ca bhāvād bhinnatvābhyupagamāt
siddham . na cedevam, vandhyāputro'pi bhaved ghaṭātmanā'bhavanāt paṭavat . ghaṭavadeva vā tadbhāvād bhedābhāvaḥ, ghaṭādibhedābhāvācca bhāva evāvikalpo'tra satyaḥ .
idānīṃ bhedakāraṇadiśamudgrāhya dūṣayiṣyannāha --vikalpo hītyādi . vikalpo na satyaḥ, sa tu
bhavannebhistribhiḥ kāraṇairbhaved bheda-saṃsarga-pariṇāmaiḥ . tatra bhedena ghaṭād bhidyamānāt kapālāni parasparato bhinnānīti gṛhyante . saṃsargeṇa tantūnāṃ saṅghātena paṭastantubhyo'nya utpanna iti . pariṇāmena kṣīraṃ dadhitvena pariṇatam, dadhi kṣīrādanyat, eteṣāṃ cānyatā uktiprayojanādinānātvālloke prasiddheti, etā bhedavādyupapattayo bhavantyo bhaveyuḥ . tatra na cāsya bhedo na saṃsargo na vipariṇāma ityetāstisraḥ pratijñā eka-
hetusādhyāḥ . ko'sau hetuḥ ? ucyate --ekatattvātmakatvāt, tasya bhāvastattvam, ekaṃ tattvamananyat, sa
evātmāsya bhāva ityekatattvātmā, tadbhāvādekatattvātmakatvāt, pratisvatvavat, yathā svaṃ svaṃ prati pratisvaṃ
tvanmatena bhinnānāmasādhāraṇaḥ svātmā yaḥ sa tu bhāva ityevaikatattvātmakatvānna bhedasaṃsargapariṇāmātmaka

khapuṣpādirasattvāt . iti tattvādeva kuto'tra vikalpaḥ ?
nanu bhedaḥ pratyakṣata eva gṛhyate pūrvottarādidikkālotpattivināśavastupravibhaktatvāt, abhedaśca na gṛhyate .
asti kiñciditi bhāvavyatirekeṇa pūrvottarādidikkālotpattivināśavastupravibhāgābhāvāt sa eva hyutpātādyudakāgnitvavadanyathā vartamāno'nyathāpi vartata eva, na
stathā bhāvo'pīti nāsti vikalpo bhāvasya . athāpi syādvikalpaḥ so'smanmatenaiva na bhedābhyupagamenetyata
āha --vikalpena ca bhāva eva, nābhāvaḥ khapuṣpādirasattvāditi bhāvavadevāsau bhāva ekanityasarvagatatvādidharmā, tasyaiva ghaṭapaṭādinā bhavanam, nāsya bhedaḥ kaścit, bhedaścābhāvo bhāvānātmakatvādityuktam .
tasmādasattvādasau na vikalpyeta bhedaḥ khapuṣpavat . ataḥ sambhāvyamānaśca svabhāva eva vikalpitaḥ tvanmate'pi tasyāpi bhāvasya iti tattvādeva prāguktahetuprakāreṇa tattvādekatvādeva kuto'tra bhāve vikalpaḥ .
itara āha --nanu bhedaḥ pratyakṣata ityādi yāvadabhedaśca na gṛhyate . pūrvo'yamuttaro ghaṭa iti digbhedena, ādigrahaṇādūrdhvādhodakṣiṇāparabhedena ca gṛhyate ghaṭādiḥ, tathā utpanno vinaṣṭa ityutpattivināśābhyām,
vastuto'pi ghaṭapaṭādirūparasādisvarūpabhedena kṛṣṇo raktaḥ khaṇḍaḥ śakala ityādi, ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ pravibhaktatvādarthānāṃ bhedena gṛhyamāṇānāṃ kathaṃ bhedābhāvaḥ ? pūrvottaraśabdābhyāṃ deśakālapariṇāmakramā api gṛhītāḥ .
evaṃ pratyakṣato grahaṇaṃ bhedānām, abhedaśca na gṛhyate pratyakṣata eva iti vartate .
atrocyate --asti kiñcidityādi . pūrvottarādibhedābhāvaṃ pratipādya pratyakṣatvābhāvaṃ ca pratipādayiṣyan bhedābhāvapratipādanārthaṃ tāvadāha --asti kiñciditi bhāvavyatirekeṇa pūrvamuttaraṃ vā nāstyeva
prāguktakāraṇatvāt, tataḥ kiṃ tadapūrvaṃ yadutpadyate pūrvaṃ vā vinaśyati ? iti pūrvottarayorabhāvādevotpattivināśau
na staḥ, tata eva vastupravibhāgo'pi nāsti . tasmāt pūrvottarādidikkālotpattivināśavastupravibhāgābhāvāt kiṃ tat pravibhaktaṃ pravibhajyate pravibhakṣyate vā ? yat tadevaṃdharma tadeva nāstīti nāpūrvaṃ bhāvādanyat
pūrvottarādyasti, ato nābhāvo bhedo bhavati . kathaṃ tarhi bhedapratyakṣateti cet, ucyate --sa eva
hyutpātādyudakāgnitvavadityādi yāvadanyathāpi vartata eva . yathotpāte jvalanamudakasya śītadravādiguṇasya,
sa toye tadvirodhyagnitvadharmāpattyā dṛṣṭo bhedo'nyathā vartamānasyānyathā vartanam . ādigrahaṇād nidhyupaliṅgatvena bhūmyabādivartanaṃ bhedena . tadyathoktam --mahākālagata ūṣmā sahasrasaṅkhye dhūmo lakṣe jvalanaṃ koṭau
  iti . tathā citrakarmādihasanarodanasthānasaṅkrāntyādibhedarūpeṇa sa eva bhāvo bhavatīti tasmānnāsti bhedaḥ . bhidyamānaṃ hi vastu evaṃ bhidyate svarūpād viparyayagatyā yadyabhāvo bhaved bhāvaḥ, sa tu na


bhidyate kathañcidupacitāpacitabhavano veti na kācidavasthā dadhighaṭādirādinidhanavibhāgavatī . yadi syāt, khapuṣpāvasthāpi tantrayadharmā syāt sarvato vyāvṛttatvād
dadhighaṭavat . ghaṭo vā ādinidhanavibhāgarahitaḥ syāt, ata eva, khapuṣpavat .
mahāpṛthivīviyadavasthe sādinidhanavibhāge syātām, itaretarāsattvāt, ghaṭavat .
ghaṭo'pi vā anādyādiḥ, ata eva, ākāśamahāpṛthivīvat .
grahaṇamapi naiva bhedasya, bhedasyābhāvādeva, khapuṣpagrahaṇavat kalpanātmakatvāt . deśakālabhedagrahaṇamasadadhyāropātmakaṃ deśakālabhedābhāvāt khapuṣpavat .
bhidye'hamiti kathañcidabhāvo'pi bhavati, bhāvādabhāvo hi bhinna upacitāpacitabhavano veti sa eva bhāvo
na bhidyata iti kathañcidupacitāpacitabhavano veti sambandhaḥ, yāvad bhavitavyaṃ tāvadeva na nyūno
nādhiko vā bhavati sa bhāvaḥ . itiśabdo hetvarthe, upacitāpacitabhavanābhāve dadhighaṭādyavasthānāmādinidhanavibhāgābhāvadarśanāditi hetuḥ, taṃ darśayitumāha --iti na kācidavasthā dadhighaṭādirādinidhanavibhāgavatī, ādiḥ prāgavidyamānasyotpattiḥ, nidhanaṃ vidyamānasya vināśaḥ, vibhāgo'nyatvam, ete cādinidhana-
vibhāgā dadhighaṭādyavasthānāṃ na santi pūrvottarotpattivināśavastupravibhāgābhāvasya pratipāditatvāt . tatastadabhāvānnopacīyate nāpacīyate cāsau bhāvaḥ kṣīradadhyādyavasthāsvekarūpatvād bhavanasya mṛtpiṇḍaghaṭādyavasthāsu ceti .
etasya hetorasiddhiṃ pariharan parapakṣe'niṣṭāpādanena sādhayati --yadi syādityādi, ādinidhanavibhāgavatī
yadi syāt sā dadhighaṭādyavasthā khapuṣpāvasthāpi tatra tantrayadharmā syāt sarvato vyāvṛttatvād dadhighaṭavat, sarvato vyāvṛttatvaṃ ca siddhaṃ ghaṭasya dadhighaṭādyavasthānāṃ ca bhedābhyupagamāt, tathānicchatastadviparyayeṇa khapuṣpadharmāpādanaṃ ghaṭasya gatārthaṃ sādhanadvayam . mahāpṛthivīviyadavasthe sādinidhanavibhāge
syātām, itaretarāsattvād ghaṭavat . ghaṭo'pi vā'nādyādiḥ anādiranidhano nirvibhāgaśca syādata
eva itaretarāsattvādeva ākāśamahāpṛthivīvaditi ghaṭabhedābhyupagamenaivaitat sādhanamaniṣṭāpādanamiti . evaṃ
tāvadupacitāpacitabhedābhāvaḥ .
yadapyuktaṃ pratyakṣata eva bhedo gṛhyata iti tad grahaṇamapi naiva bhedasya, bhedasyābhāvādeva, khapuṣpagrahaṇavat . abhāvaḥ kalpanātmakatvāt tasya, bhāvaikyasya sādhitatvād bhedaḥ kalpanātmakaḥ, kalpanātmakaṃ cāsad vastuno'nyathātvāt . sā ca kalpanā deśataḥ kālato vā svarūpata eva vā bhinneṣvartheṣvabhedakalpanādvā syāt, deśakālādyabhede vā bhedakalpanāt syāt, ubhayathāpyasadrūpatvāt kalpanāyāḥ, iha tu tvanmatena 
deśakālābhyāmabhedo nāsti, bheda eva, ghaṭādeḥ kapālāditvena bhidyamānasya vastuno yāvat paramāṇuśo rūpādiśo'nabhilāpyatvaśaśca bhedādabhedābhāvaḥ kālataśca kṣaṇe kṣaṇe'nyatvāt . tasmādanabhilāpyaparamārthasya ca
vastuno ghaṭa iti rūpādi iti vā grahaṇamasadadhyāropātmakaṃ deśakālabhedābhāvāt khapuṣpavat,

abheda eva tu gṛhyate pratyakṣataḥ, bhāvasyābhinnatvād gṛhyamāṇasya ca bhāvatvāt .
atha samasta eva kasmād bhāvo na gṛhyate ? atha bhedapakṣe kiṃ samasta eva ghaṭo
na gṛhyate ? samānadoṣatvādacodyametat . svapakṣe viśeṣaṃ paśyata etadyujyeta vaktum,
na tu sarvatraivādarśanabhākpakṣasya .
tattu adarśanamatraiva nivartate, nānyatra . ihābhede bhāvebhāve tasya ya ekadeśastasya grahaṇe
tasyaiva grahaṇam, tato'bhinnatvāt tadbhāvatvāt, deśasvātmavat . tasya hyeko'pi prathanaṃ
khapuṣpa iva khapuṣpavat tat pratyakṣābhāsamevetyarthaḥ . yadapyucyate abhedaśca na gṛhyate pratyakṣataḥ iti tadapi
na, yasmādabheda eva tu gṛhyate pratyakṣataḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? bhāvasyābhinnatvād gṛhyamāṇasya ca
bhāvatvāt, nābhāvo gṛhyate yataḥ khapuṣpādiḥ .
brūyāstvam --atha samasta eva kasmād bhāvo na gṛhyata iti . atra tu samastagrahaṇaṃ vakṣyāmaḥ
sakāraṇam, tvadgrāhavinivṛttyarthaṃ tāvat tvāṃ kiñcit pṛcchāmo nā'nāhatamukho mūrkhastiṣṭhatīti --atha bhedapakṣe
paśyatā tvayā ghaṭaṃ kiṃ samasta eva ghaṭo na gṛhyata iti, parāntādibhāgāḥ kiṃ na pratyakṣāḥ ? ārādbhāgā
eva kiṃ pratyakṣāḥ ? ityatra viśeṣakāraṇaṃ kathayeti . kiñcānyat, samānadoṣatvādacodyametat, ubhayoḥ
samāno doṣo nāsāvekataścodyate--bhāvasya sarvagatasyāpratyakṣatvadoṣo mama nāstīti . svapakṣe bhedasya pratyakṣatvādiviśeṣaṃ paśyata etad yujyeta vaktum itthaṃ bhavati tathā na bhavati iti . etadapi sambhāvanayocyate, na tu sarvatraiva adarśanabhāk pakṣo yasya tava tasya na tu yujyata evetyarthaḥ, sarvatraiva na ghaṭe na
rūpādau vā na kvacit pratyakṣatā yujyata ityarthaḥ . athavā svaparapakṣayoḥ sarvatraiva . etaduktaṃ bhavati--evaṃ hi
svapakṣarāgāviṣṭo bhavān paramatsareṇa svadoṣaṃ naiva paśyati svacaraṇalagnapāśādarśī prayojanāvasthitāmiṣadarśī
iva śakuniḥ, tvatpakṣe'tyantadarśanāsambhavādeva ghaṭādeḥ pratyakṣatvābhāvaḥ .
idānīmabhedapakṣa eva darśanaṃ sambhavati nānyatra iti vakṣyāma iti yaduktaṃ taddarśayiṣyannāha --tattu
adarśanamiti . tat punaradarśanam, tu viśeṣe, viśeṣeṇātraiva abhedapakṣa eva nivartate, nānyatreti na
bhedapakṣe yāvannirabhilāpyatvaśo bhedādityuktam . darśanaṃ tarhi katham ? iti tat samarthayati --ihābhede bhāve
yadetat sarvaṃ tad bhāva evābhinnatvāt, tasyābhinnasya bhāvasya ya ekadeśo ghaṭastasya grahaṇe ghaṭasya grahaṇe
tasyaiva grahaṇam bhāvasyaiva grahaṇaṃ samastasya . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tato'bhinnatvāt, tato bhāvād ghaṭasyābhinnatvāt ghaṭādvā bhāvasyābhinnatvāt . tad vyācaṣṭe --tadbhāvatvāt, tasyāpi bhāvatvāt tadbhāvatvāt paryāyāntareṇa hetvantaraṃ vā, ghaṭo'pi bhāva eva cābhinnatvāt, yo yo bhāvaḥ sa sa tadgrahaṇe gṛhyate . dṛṣṭānto deśa

prati deśaḥ sarvāvibhaktabhavanavṛttyātmakatvāt sārvarūpyamanatikrāntaḥ, na cāsyordhvādhastiryagdikṣu mūrtivivartapratyaṅgānāmekatvābhimatabhedavat kvacidavacchedo vidyate .
iti sa dhruvaḥ kūṭastho'vicālyanapāyopajano'vikāryanutpattiravṛddhiravyaya uktavat .
svātmavat, deśasya svātmā deśasya bhāvaḥ svaṃ tattvaṃ bhāvādabhinnatvāt tadbhāvād gṛhyate bhāvavat tathā
deśagrahaṇe samasto bhāvastadbhāvatvād gṛhyate .
etadbhāvanārthamāha --tasya hyeko'pi prathanaṃ prati deśaḥ, hiśabdo yasmādarthe, yasmāt tasyaiko'pi
deśaḥ prakhyān sarvāvibhaktabhavanavṛttyātmakatvāt sarveṇa samastena bhāvenāvibhaktaḥ bhavanam ityevaikāṃ
vṛttimanubhavatyātmarūpāmiti so'pi deśaḥ sarvabhāvātmā prāguktaprāṇyādyapāṇyādyavayavapuruṣātmatvavat, ata āha --tasya
hyeko'pi prathanaṃ prati deśaḥ sarvāvibhaktabhavanavṛttyātmakatvāt sārvarūpyamanatikrāntaḥ . tato'nena
nyāyena deśagrahaṇe samastagrahaṇamityabhedapakṣa eva darśanaṃ nānyatreti . nanvekadeśaśca sa eva ceti vipratiṣiddhamiti cet, tanna, jñāyamānatvāpekṣayoktatvāt, tvanmatyā sāvayava iva niravayavo'pi prakhyātīti mayā tathoktam, paramārthatastu nirvibhāga evāsāvukto vakṣyate ca . athavā prathanaṃ vistāraḥ, vistīrṇatvāt tasya bhāvasya
prathanaṃ deśaṃ prati ityadoṣaḥ . tasmāccāvibhakta ityuktam . ata āha --na cāsyordhvādhastiryagdikṣu mūrtivivartapratyaṅgānāmekatvābhimatabhedavat kvacidavacchedo vidyate dakṣiṇottaramathurayorapi, kimu ghaṭapaṭayorbhavanaikamūrtivivartānavacchedāditi . yathaikatvābhimatasya bhedasya ghaṭādermūrteḥ śarīrasya vivartānāṃ vibhāgānāmūrdhvādhastiryagdiktayāṅgāvayavatayā nāparaḥ kintu pratyaṅgatayā ca puruṣapāṇyādivat kapālāditvena ābhāsamānānāmeko'ntyābhedaścakṣurādigrāhyābhimata ekatvād nirvibhāgastathā bhāvavivartapratyaṅgānāṃ tadekatvād nirvibhāgaḥ .
tasmād bhāvasya na kvacit tvadabhimatabhedavadekatvādavacchedo vidyata iti yadi ghaṭāditvena yadi rūpāditvena
tvadiṣṭabhedavadeva . itiśabdo hetvarthe, yasmād vibhāgāvacchedābhāvāddhetoḥ sa bhāvo dhruvastriṣvapi kāleṣu,
kūṭastho māṣarāśisthamāṣavat sarveṇaikībhūta eva, avicālī na sthānāt sthānāntaraṃ saṅkrāmati, anapāyopajanaḥ koṣṭhāgāradhānyavad nirgamapraveśāvapāyopajanau bhāvasya na staḥ, avikāryapi svasthānasthasyāpi nartakībhrūkṣepādivad vikārābhāvāt, anutpattiḥ prāgabhūtvā ghaṭādivadutpattyabhāvāt, avṛddhiraṅkurapatravadupacayā-
bhāvāt, avyayo vṛkṣādipatrādyavayavakhaṇḍādivad vyayābhāvāt . etāni hi nityaviśeṣaṇāni bhāvasyaiva
ghaṭante na puruṣādīnām, atra bhāve dhruvādinityalakṣaṇayogaḥ paraparikalpitabhedāsambhavidharmatvena vyākhyātaḥ
svarūpato nidarśanābhāvāt . uktavaditi ca pūrvottarotpattivināśavastupravibhāgābhāvād yukto nityaikasarvātmakatvātideśaḥ .


asya pratyakṣapramāṇasiddhirihaiva, anyatrānumānataiva sambandhaikadeśapratyakṣatvapratyayaśeṣasiddhyātmakatvāt . kuto'numānatāpi ? sambaddhayoḥ kadācidagrahaṇāt
pratyakṣapūrvakatve tatsambhavāt tadabhāve tadasiddheḥ . kuto'jñānamapi ? pratyakṣapūrvakā-

kiñcānyat, asya pratyakṣapramāṇasiddhirihaiva, abhinnabhāvapakṣe pratyakṣatvād bhāvasya pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ
sidhyati, uktavat iti vartate . yathoktaṃ tasya hyeko'pi prathanaṃ pratideśaḥ sarvāvibhaktabhavanavṛttyātmakatvāt
sārvarūpyamanatikrāntaḥ, tatastadbhāvatvāt tato'bhinnatvāt tasya ya ekadeśastasya grahaṇe tasyaiva grahaṇaṃ
deśasvātmavadityuktaṃ bhāvapratyakṣatvam . tataḥ sarvapramāṇajyeṣṭhapratyakṣapramāṇasiddhirihaiva yathārthavastuviṣayatvāt .
anyatrānumānataiva, bhāvaikavastupakṣādanyatra bhedapakṣe'numānataiva pratyakṣābhimatasyāpi . kiṃ kāraṇam ? sambandhaikadeśapratyakṣatvapratyayaśeṣasiddhyātmakatvāt, dvayoḥ sambaddhayoḥ sambandhe tadekadeśapratyakṣatve tatpratyayāccheṣasiddhirātmā anumānasyeti tadātmakaṃ tat, sambaddhaikadeśa iti vā pāṭhaḥ, yathoktam—
sambaddhādekasmāt pratyakṣāccheṣasiddhiranumānam .  
sambaddhānāṃ bhāvānāṃ svasvāmibhāvena vetyādinā saptavidhena kaścidarthaḥ kasyacidindriyasya pratyakṣo bhavati .
tasmādidānīmindriyapratyakṣāccheṣasya apratyakṣasyārthasya yā siddhiranumānaṃ tat, yathā dhūmadarśanāt
agniḥ iti jñānam . tathā ātmendriyamano'rthasannikarṣajapūrvakaṃ trividhaṃ pūrvavadityādilakṣaṇameva tatra
sambhavati . deśagrahaṇasya ārādbhāgaviṣayasyāśeṣatadvastvasaṃsparśādekadeśagrahaṇena śeṣagrahaṇamanumānameva . tasyānumānatve'pi mā sthirāṃ buddhiṃ kārṣīrityata āha --kuto'numānatā'pi proktanyāyena pratyakṣatvāsiddheḥ .
kathamiti cet, sambaddhayoḥ kadācidapyagrahaṇāt, pratyakṣakāle hi sambaddhayoryugapad grahaṇāduttarakālamekadeśagrahaṇād viṣāṇādiva gavi anumānaṃ syāt, tadeva tu pratyakṣadarśanaṃ nāstītyuktam . pratyakṣapūrvakatve
tatsambhavāt pratyakṣasiddhau tadbalena anumānasiddhiḥ sambhāvyeta, tadabhāve tadasiddheḥ pratyakṣatvāsiddheranantaroktatvādeva kuto'numānatāpi ? .
itaro nirāśībhūta āha--tat kimajñānamevāpadyate ? ācārya āha --kuto'jñānamapīti, ajñānamapi tanna bhavati tvadabhimataṃ pratyakṣam . kutaḥ ? pratyakṣapūrvakājñānatraye'ntarbhāvābhāvāt, saṃśayaviparyayānadhyavasāyā ajñānavikalpāḥ, te ca pratyakṣajñānapūrvakāḥ, saṃśayastāvat sāmānyapratyakṣād viśeṣāpratyakṣād

jñānatraye'ntarbhāvābhāvāt saṃśayanīyaviparyetavyaviṣayapratyakṣātyantābhāvādādhikyāvasāyāsambhavāccānadhyavasāyāsambhavāt .
anvāha ca--yathā viśuddhamākāśaṃ timiropapluto janaḥ .saṅkīrṇamiva mātrābhiścitrābhirabhimanyate ॥tathedamamṛtaṃ brahma nirvikāramavidyayā .kaluṣatvamivāpannaṃ bhedarūpaṃ prakāśate ॥tasyaikamapi caitanyaṃ bahudhā pravibhajyate .aṅgārakitamutpāte vārirāśerivodakam ॥prakṛtitvamanāpannān vikārānākaroti saḥ .ṛtudhāmeva grīṣmānte mahato meghasamplavān ॥  
viśeṣasmṛteśca saṃśayaḥ vai॰ sū॰ 2 . 2 . 17, tathā samānānekadharmopapattervipratipatterupalabdhyanupalabdhyavyavasthātaśca viśeṣāpekṣo vimarśaḥ saṃśayaḥ nyāyasū॰ 1 . 1 . 23 iti sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ pratyakṣapūrvakatve samānānekadharmatvādīni viśeṣaṇāni syurnānyathā sthāṇupuruṣādiṣviti saṃśayanīyārthābhāvānna saṃśayaḥ . tata eva
viparyetavyābhāvānna viparyayastvanmatenaivetyata āha --saṃśayanīyaviparyetavyaviṣayapratyakṣātyantābhāvāt .
anadhyavasāyo'dhyavasāyapūrvaḥ, sa cādhiko'vasāyo'dhyavasāyaḥ pratyakṣajñānam, etadabhāvasyoktatvād nādhyavasāyo'nadhyavasāya ityādhikyāvasāyāsambhavācca tadvyāvṛttiviṣayānadhyavasāyāsambhavād kuto'nadhyava-
sāyaḥ ? tasmād yaduktaṃ puḍhavikāyikādī jīvā andhā mūḍhatamapaviṭṭhā bhagavatīsū॰ 7 . 7 . 292 ityādi
tat satyam .
anvāha ceti tasmin jinapravacanaprasiddhābhedabhāvanirvikalpavidhividhinayadarśane bhedābhāsapratyakṣānumānasaṃśayaviparyayānadhyavasāyāsambhavamanuvartamāno'nyo'pyāha . yathā viśuddhamākāśamiti dṛṣṭāntasamarthanam,
timiropaplutadṛṣṭerviśuddhe nabhasi keśondukamaśakamakṣikāmayūracandrikādimātrābhiravayavairvitatamiti niravayave'pyasaṅkīrṇe saṅkīrṇadarśanaṃ bhavati . tathedamiti dārṣṭāntiko bhāvaikaparamārthaḥ, amaraṇādamṛtamavināśād bṛhattvād

eṣu vidhividhiṣu avikalpaḥ śabdārthaḥ, na tvajñātaḥ sarvasyaikatvād yasya
kasyacijjñāne sarvasya jñātatvāt . anvāha--śāstreṣu prakriyābhedairavidyaivopavarṇyate ॥anāgamavikalpā tu svayaṃ vidyopavartate ॥ vākyapa॰ 2 . 235
brahma nirvikāraṃ stimitaṃnistimiraṃ vyomavadeva sthitam, napuṃsakanirdeśaḥ sarvabhedābhimatāsadvikārasādhāraṇatvādavyakte
guṇasandehe napuṃsakaliṅgaprayogavacanāt, bhavanāpekṣayā vā napuṃsakam . akaluṣamapi sadavidyayā jñānābhāsena
kaluṣatvamivāpannamanāpannamapi abhedarūpaṃ sad bhedarūpamābhāti . evaṃ tāvadamalaṃ malarūpeṇābhātītyuktam .
idānīmekaṃ sadanekadhā pravibhajyata iti brūmaḥ --tasyaikamapītyādi . yathā udanvatāṃ toyamutpāte'ṅgārarāśivat
prajvaladupalakṣyate tathāsyānekarūpatā mithyaiva . prakṛtitvamiti, prakarṣeṇa kṛtiḥ prakṛtirghaṭapaṭādiprakāro
bhedaḥ, tadbhāvamanāpannāneva vikārāṃstāneva ghaṭapaṭādīnātmabhāvādapracyutāneva nartakahastabhrūkṣepādikalpānākaroti sa svataḥ svātmānaṃ bhāva evākārarūpeṇa sṛjati upasaṃharati ca, ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? ṛtudhāmeva, ṛtūnāṃ
dhāma indraḥ, indra iva . nirmalamākāśaṃ dṛṣṭvā vaktāro bhavanti--mahāvarṣasya garbha iti, kuto nirmale nabhasi
varṣasambhavaḥ ? tathāpi tannairmalyāvināśanenaiva śakraḥ śakrakārmuka-śatahradā-mahāghana-stanita-varṣita-karakā-dhārāvarṣādīn sṛjatyupasaṃharati cetyucyate kṣaṇenaiva punastādṛgvaimalyadarśanānnabhasaḥ . yatheyaṃ ṛtudhāmnaḥ sṛṣṭiḥ śuddhagaganāpṛthagbhūtajalaprakṛtitvābhimatameghādirūpā tathā sarvaghaṭādigavādirūpā sṛṣṭirbhāvādevopasaṃhāraśceti bhāvavidhividhinayaḥ samāptaḥ ॥
evaṃ tāvad vastvarthato vidhividhinayavikalpāḥ puruṣa-niyati-kāla-svabhāva-bhāvā vyākhyātāḥ . anayā
diśā śabdabrahmavidhividhinayagrahādyekakāraṇavādā unnayanīyāḥ . idānīṃ teṣu śabdārtho vaktavyaḥ, sa ca
sāmānyenocyate sarveṣāṃ tulyatvāt . sa ca dvividhaḥ--padārtho vākyārthaśca . tatra padārthastāvat --eṣu
vidhividhiṣvavikalpaḥ śabdārthaḥ, ukteṣu puruṣādivādeṣvavasthādyupacaritaprakriyābhedakalpitavikalpāsattvāt
tadvastunirvikalpatvāt . na tvityādi, nājñātaḥ, sarvasyaikatvād yasya kasyacijjñāne sarvasya jñātatvāt . etena
vaktṛtvādyasamanvayo vyākhyāto dṛṣṭāntābhāvāt sarvasya sarvajñatvād bhedābhāvāt . etamarthamanyo'pyanvāha—
śāstreṣu prakriyā . sāṅkhyayogavaiśeṣikavedaśiraḥprabhṛtiṣu nṛprakṛtipuruṣadravyaguṇādinityānityādvaitadvaitatraitādipadārthaprakriyābhedairvikalpātmakapadārthapraṇayane yathāprakriyamavidyaivopavarṇyate vikalpasyāvastutvāt . vidyā tu
tattvajñānaṃ sā āgamavikalparūpā na bhavitumarhati, vāggocarātikrāntatvāt tattvajñānaviṣayānantātmakaikapara

ye tvete ghaṭādiśabdā meghastanitavadete śabdā eva kevalā nārthasvarūpasya
vācakā mayūravirutavat saṅketād vyavahārānupātinastasyaiva caikasya brahmaṇo lakṣaṇārthāḥ tadekadeśatvāt prāgabhihitapratyakṣasiddhivat . evaṃ ca kṛtvāhuḥ--sarvadhātavo
bhuvo'rthamabhidadhati   iti .
mārthasya . yathoktam --paṇṇavaṇijjā bhāvā āva॰ ni॰ 488 ityādi . āgamābhyāsāttu samyagdarśana-jñānacāritra-tapoviśeṣaviśeṣitāvidyasya sarvabhāvaviṣayā vidyā svayameva svātmanaiva upavartate, nāvidyamānā kutaścidānīyate, sā cānāgamavikalpetyata āha --anāgamavikalpā tu svayaṃ vidyopavartate . tathā cānyaḥ--

vikalpayonayaḥ śabdā vikalpāḥ śabdayonayaḥ .
teṣāmatyantasambandho nārthāñśabdāḥ spṛśantyapi ॥

śabdā iti śabdagaḍumātrapratipattihetava ityata āha --ye tvete ghaṭādiśabdā meghastanitavadete
śabdā eva kevalāḥ, nārthasvarūpasya vācakāḥ, ghaṭādipratipādanasamarthābhimatā na pratipādakā ityarthaḥ .
nanvidaṃ prasiddhaprastutavyavahāraviruddhaṃ tvayoktam--arthasyāpratipādakā ghaṭādiśabdā meghastanitavacchrotragrāhyatvāditi, ghaṭādiśabdā iti ca tvadvacanādeva teṣāṃ ghaṭādyarthapratipādanadarśanāditi . atrocyate--na brūmaḥ apratipādakāḥ iti . kiṃ tarhi ? avācakā iti brūmaḥ, pratipattṛsaṅketavaśāt tadupalakṣaṇatvena pratipādakatvaṃ vikalpātmārthaviṣayaṃ na virudhyate, yasmād mayūravirutavat saṅketād vyavahārānupātinaḥ, yathā mayūravirutaṃ
trāsamadaharṣasthānagamanādyanyatamāvasthāviśeṣasahacaraṃ śrutacaraṃ tathottarakāle kṛtasaṅgīteḥ puruṣasya tādṛg vijñānamādadhāti evaṃ puruṣo'pi ghaṭapaṭādiśabdoccāraṇena pūrvasaṅketavaśāt puruṣāntarāya svābhiprāyamarpayatīti na
prasiddhivyavahāravirodhau, tathaiva acetanaśabdeṣvapi kālākālameghastanitādiṣu saṅketādeva śubhāśubhādiparijñānaṃ
dṛśyate . athavā kimanena prasiddhivyavahāravirodhaparihāraparikleśena ? nanvayameva suśliṣṭaḥ parihāro vyāpī
ca, tadyathā--te sarva eva śabdāstasyaiva caikasya brahmaṇaḥ puruṣādyanyatamavidhividhinayavikalpasya yathopapāditaṃ tvayā rucitasyānyatamasya lakṣaṇārthāḥ tadekadeśatvāt prāgabhihitapratyakṣasiddhivat . yathā gaurviṣāṇī kakudmān prāntevāladhiḥ sāsnāvān iti yathaite viṣāṇyādiśabdā gorekadeśavācitvāt tadupalakṣaṇārthāḥ prasiddhasaṅketavaśād goreva vācakāstadavayavānāṃ tasmādabhinnatvādevaṃ sarvaśabdāstadavayavānāṃ tato'pṛthaktvāt tasyaiva brahmaṇo vācakā iti vācakatve'pyupapannaḥ prasiddhivyavahārāvirodhaḥ . abhinnaikabhavanabrahmopalakṣaṇārthatve sarvaśabdānāṃ śabdalakṣaṇavinmatisaṃvādi jñāpakamāha --evaṃ ca kṛtvāhuḥ śabdalakṣaṇavida iti
vākyaśeṣaḥ . sarvadhātavo bhuvo'rthamabhidadhatīti teṣāmapyasminneva darśane karotyādidhātūnāṃ sattārthānati

sa eko'navayavaḥ śabdo vākyārthaḥ, na tu sarvāṇi . saṅgrahadeśatvāccāsya dravyārthatā . bhavati bhavanaṃ bhāvo dravatīti dravyam, na vikārāvayavau .
krame bhvarthavacanamupapadyate, bhuvaṃ vadanti iti bhūvādayaḥ, vādiśabdasya auṇādikeñantatvāt tathā bhūvādiśabdavyākhyānāt, nānyathā . ityuktaḥ padārthaḥ .
idānīṃ vākyārtha ucyate --sa eko'navayavaḥ śabdo vākyārthaḥ, vākyaṃ ca vākyārthaśca
vākyārthaḥ, vākyena yukto'rtho vākyārthaḥ, vākyasambadhī vākyād vākyasyaivārthaḥ . yathāhuḥ—
ākhyātaśabdaḥ saṅghāto jātiḥ saṅghātavartinī .eko'navayavaḥ śabdaḥ kramo buddhyanusaṃhṛtiḥ ॥
padamādyaṃ pṛthak sarvaṃ padaṃ sākāṅkṣamityapi .vākyaṃ prati matirbhinnā bahudhā nyāyadarśinām ॥ vākyapa॰ 2 . 1, 2 iti .
tatra yaiḥ eko'navayavaḥ śabdaḥ ityuktaṃ tairviniścityoktaṃ bhavanasyānavayavatvāt tathaiva padavākyaśabdatadarthādyātmatvāditi . na tu sarvāṇi ekasyaiva sarvatvāditi caritārtha eṣa dravyārtho vidhividhinayaḥ, hetorvāsmāt
saṅgrahadeśatvāccāsya dravyārthateti, saṅgraho dravyārthaḥ, sa punardvividhaḥ--sarvasaṅgraho deśasaṅgrahaśca, ityevamādiśataprastāro'sāvārṣe śatabhedaśruternayānām . yathoktam --ekkikko ya satavidho satta ṇayasatā havaṃtyevaṃ āva॰
ni॰ 759 iti . saṅgrahasyāpi dravyārthatā
titthakaravayaṇasaṃgahavisesapatthāramūlavākaraṇī .davvaṭṭhi+o ya pajjavaṇayo ya sesā vikappā siṃ ॥ sanmati॰ 1 . 3 tivacanāt .
dravyārthasamāsaśca ādinaye vyākhyātaḥ . tasmāt saṅgrahadeśatvāt tadavayavatvādasya dravyārthateti .
dravyaśabdasya ko'rthaḥ ? dravatīti dravyam, guṇasandrāvo dravyam pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 5 . 1 . 119, dravyaṃ
bhavyaṃ yogyaṃ bhū prāptau pā॰ dhā॰ 1845 iti prāptiyogyamiṣṭārthaprāptiyogyaṃ dāru, kriyāvadādilakṣaṇaṃ
dravyam, ityevamādi yathāsambhavaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ vācyam . iha tu bhavati bhavanaṃ bhāvaḥ . bhavati prācyacatuṣṭaye
puruṣādisvabhāvānte, bhavanaṃ bhāvo'ntye pūrvoktavat, pūrvaviruddhatvānnayānāṃ dravati bhavati gacchati satatamiti
dravyaṃ gatyātmakatvāt dravyaṃ ca bhavye pā॰ 5 . 3 . 104 iti vacanāt, na vikārāvayavāviti vidhinayāyuktatvād gatārtham .


nibandhanamasya--kiṃ bhavaṃ eke bhavaṃ, duve bhavaṃ, akkhu+e bhavaṃ, avva+e bhavaṃ, avaṭṭhi+e bhavaṃ
aṇekabhūtabhavvabhavi+e bhavaṃ ? somilā ! eke vi ahaṃ duve vi ahaṃ akkhu+e vi ahaṃ avva+e vi ahaṃ avaṭṭhite vi ahaṃ aṇekabhūtabhavvabhavi+e vi ahaṃ bhagavatīsū॰ 18 . 10 . 647 .

kimetat sāmarthyavādinā svamanīṣikayocyate tvayā, āhosvidārṣe'pi nibandhanamasya darśanasyāsti
yata etad nirgatamiti ? atra asti ityucyate, nibandhanamasya somilabrāhmaṇapraśne kiṃ bhavaṃ eke bhavamityādike vyākaraṇe somilā ! eke vi ahaṃ, duve vi ahaṃ, akkhu+e vi ahaṃ, avva+e vi ahaṃ,
avaṭṭhite vi ahaṃ, aṇekabhūtabhavvabhavi+e vi ahamityādi nibandhanamiti .
evaṃ dvitīyo vidhividhyaraḥ savikalpo nayacakrasya samāptaḥ ॥

atha tṛtīyo vidhyubhayāraḥ .

atha kiṃ bhavatā puruṣādivādeṣu pratisvaṃ tathā tathā yā etā avasthā uktāḥ
puruṣādi tattvaṃ tallakṣaṇam, uta puruṣādilakṣaṇāstāḥ ?
yadyavasthāsvātmaiva puruṣādi, na puruṣādyātmā avasthāḥ, tataḥ puruṣo nāma na
kaściccaturavasthāvyatiriktaḥ, samudayimātrasamudāyābhyupagamād rūpādisamudāyavat


kamaladalavipulanayanā kamalamukhī kamalagarbhasamagaurī .
kamale sthitā bhagavatī dadātu śrutadevatā siddhim ॥

idānīṃ vidhyubhayārāvasaraḥ . yadyayaṃ vidhividhinayārokto bhāvo nirdoṣaḥ syādarāntarārambho'narthakaḥ
syāt, sa tu sadoṣa eveti prāptāvasaraṃ taddoṣamuktvottaratra vidhyubhayāraṃ nirdidikṣuḥ prācyadoṣābhidhānārthameva
tāvadāha --atha kiṃ bhavatā ityādi . athetyadhikāropanyāse, anantaroktapuruṣādivādadūṣaṇādhikāropanyāsārtho'thaśabdaḥ . kiṃśabdaḥ praśne, sāmānyena puruṣa-niyati-kāla-svabhāva-bhāveṣu anantarokteṣu pratisvamātmano grāhe tathā tathā tena tena prakāreṇa puruṣaḥ suptādicaturavasthaḥ, niyatireva pūrvaparādikriyā'kriyādiniyatāvasthārūpā, kāla eva kramayaugapadyabhūtabhavadbhāvivyavasthātattvaḥ, svabhāva evātmapravibhāgamātraprativiviktabhavanabhedatattvaḥ, bhāva eva svatvāsvatvādyavidyāvikalpavinirmuktasattāmātravyāpyanañjanaśabdārthajñānādyavasthāviśeṣajagattattva iti yā etāḥ pratisvamaśeṣā vrīhyaṅkurādighaṭapaṭādivastuvyāptivṛttayo'vasthāstasya tasya puruṣādidarśanasya vyāpitvapradarśanārthamuktāstāsu kiṃ puruṣādi tattvamavasthālakṣaṇaṃ tallakṣaṇam ? tāni ca lakṣaṇaṃ
tasyāḥ, na so'sti tadvyatiriktaḥ, yathā rūpādaya eva ghaṭa iti . uta puruṣādilakṣaṇāstāḥ ? puruṣādyeva
satyam, na tāḥ kāścidavasthāḥ, yathā ghaṭa eva rūpādayaḥ na rūpādayo nāma kecid ghaṭavyatirekeṇa, iti dvayorvikalpayoranyataro'vadhāryaḥ .
kiñcātaḥ ? yadyavasthāsvātmetyādi yāvat samudayamātravāda evāyamanyaḥ . yadi puruṣādi na
kiñcidasti, avasthāsvātmaiva tallakṣaṇam, tā eva satyāḥ, na puruṣādyātmāvasthāḥ puruṣādisvarūpāstā
avasthā na bhavanti ityevamabhyupagataṃ bhavati tataḥ puruṣo nāma na kaściccaturavasthāvyatirikta ityetadā

samudāyamātravāda evāyamanyaḥ, turīyatvapratipādanārthābhyupagatamuktikramavattu ayugapadavasthāvṛtteḥ kṣaṇikavādaḥ vāsovat, caturjñānamātratvāt kalpanājñānamātrasatyaṃ
na kiñcit tadābhāsajñānabahirbhūtaṃ svapnavaditi vijñānavyatiriktārthaśūnyavādaḥ .
acintyamevedaṃ cintyate . ūrdhvamadhastiryak kvacit tattvaika eva vyavasthitaḥ
puruṣaḥ, anatiriktaparāparāṇīyojyāyorūpātmakatvāt, vṛkṣavat .
pannam . puruṣādi iti sāmānyenopakramya puruṣo nāma iti puruṣasyaivābhāvavacanaṃ vidhividhinayavikalpānāṃ
puruṣasya prathamatvāt taddūṣaṇenātidekṣyamāṇatvāt . puruṣavāde prastute kathaṃ puruṣa evāsannityāpādyata iti
cet, ucyate--yasmāt samudayimātrasamudāyābhyupagamād rūpādisamudāyavat samudāyamātravāda
evāyamanyaḥ, sa evāyaṃ bauddhaparikalpitarūpa-vedanā-vijñāna-saṃskāra-saṃjñāskandhasamudāyaḥ puruṣo'ṅgulimuṣṭivat
balākāpaṅktivat akṣoddhicakrapañjarāṇīṣākṣaparayugasamilādirathavaditi samudayavāda īṣanmaṣīmrakṣitakukkuṭavat
puruṣapratyākhyānaphalo'nyavadābhāti suptasuṣuptajāgratturīyāvasthāsaṃjñābhedāt . yugapadbhāvirūpādiguṇasamudāyavādatulyo yugapadavasthacaturavasthāsamudayavāda iti eṣa deśabhinnarūpādisamudayavādatulyaḥ . nāyaṃ deśabhinnarūpādi- 
samudayavādatulya eva, kiṃ tarhi ? kālabhedabhinnāyugapadbhāvisatatasaṃvṛttajanananidhananāmarūpavādatulyaḥ kṣaṇikavādo'pi, yasmāt turīyatvapratipādanārthābhyupagatamuktikramavattvayugapadavasthāvṛtteḥ kṣaṇikavāda iti,
suṣuptasuptajāgratparamavinidrāvasthāviśuddhikramānyathāvṛttyabhyupagamādavasthākṣayo'nyathātvam, ante ca kṣayadarśanādādau kṣayo'numeyo'vasthānāmiti kṣaṇikavādaḥ . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? vāsovat, yathā vastraṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe
jīryajjīryadante viśīryate tathāvasthā api . na kevalaṃ samudayakṣaṇikavādāveva, kiṃ tarhi ? śūnyavādo'pi,
tadyathā --caturṇājñā ?netyādi, yathā puruṣavādinā catasro'vasthāḥ pṛthak parigṛhya tāsvapi jñānameva
suptatvāt suptapuruṣavat suṣuptatvād madirāmattavadityādinā pratipāditam, tathā tathā rūpādyamūrtamūrttyāpattyā
tvayaiva rūpaṇād rūpam iti ca jñānātmanā caitanyasvarūpādanapetā rūparasādighaṭādisṛṣṭiścānekadhopapāditā, sā ca kalpanājñānam, tanmātrameva satyam, na rūpādi kiñcit tadābhāsajñānabahirbhūtaṃ svapnavat,
yathā svapne siṃhādyābhāsajñānamātram na siṃhādiḥ kaścit tadbahirbhūtastathā jāgradvijñānamapi jñānamātrameva
grāmārāmastrīpuruṣādirūpādyākārajñānamātraṃ tadvyatiriktārthaśūnyasvapnavijñānavadvetyetadāpannam . ataḥ kalpanājñānamātrasatyamiti vijñānavyatiriktārthaśūnyavādaḥ, vijñānamātravādasyāpi grāhyagrāhakavikalpātītanirvikalpatvāśrayasya
śūnyatvāpatteḥ .
puruṣavādyāha --acintyamevedaṃ cintyata ityādi . madvacanāparijñānādasambaddhaṃ dūṣaṇam, mayā hi
puruṣa evedam ityavadhāryoktam, noktam idameva puruṣaḥ iti pratyakṣāḥ suptādyavasthā uddiśyeti . atra

nanvayamekāvasthāmātrasvatattva eva vyavasthāpitaḥ, caitanyānativṛttivarṇanāt .
tacca vinidrāvasthāto'nanyaditi vinidrāvasthālakṣaṇa eva puruṣa ātyantikanidrāvigamarūpanirūpyatvād vinidrāvasthāsvātmavat . na hyasāvitarātmikā, svavṛttityāgāpatteḥ . tanmātratve tu puruṣasyāpi tadvajjāgradādyavasthānātmakatvādasarvagatatvam .
prayogaḥ --ūrdhvamadhastiryak kvacit tattvaika eva vyavasthitaḥ puruṣa iti pratijñā, anatiriktaparāparāṇīyojyāyorūpātmakatvād vṛkṣavaditi, yathoktam—
yasmāt paraṃ nāparamasti kiñcid yasmānnāṇīyo na jyāyo'sti kiñcit .vṛkṣa iva stabdho divi tiṣṭhatyekastenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ puruṣeṇa sarvam ॥ śvetāśva॰ 3 . 9 iti .
yasmādanyat paraṃ nāstyananyadadvaitamevetyarthaḥ . athavā yasmāt paraṃ pradhānaṃ prakṛṣṭam aparamaprakṛṣṭamanyadvā
nāsti ūrdhvādhastiryakparāparavibhāgābhāvādavibhāgātmanā tasyaiva vyavasthānāt . nāṇīyo na jyāyo'sti
kiñciditi sūkṣmasthūlavibhāgābhāvāt tādrūpyeṇāvibhaktasyāpi tasyaivāvasthānāditi . śeṣaṃ gatārtham .
atrocyate --nanvayamityādi . nanu tvayāyaṃ puruṣo'vasthātmakatvamanatikrāmannekāvasthāmātrasvatattva
eva vyavasthāpitaścaturavasthāsvarūpopavarṇanadvāreṇaiva tannirūpaṇādavasthāsvātmaka evāsāviti, tatrāpi ca
viśeṣeṇa ekāvasthāmātrasvatattvasturīyāvasthātattva ityarthaḥ . tat kuta iti cet, caitanyānativṛttivarṇanāt, sarvatra jñānamayo'sau puruṣaḥ iti pratijñāya tadvyāptipradarśanārthaṃ caitanyameva vṛkṣatṛṇakuḍyapuruṣādi,
suptatvāt suṣuptatvājjāgaritṛtvāt, suptādipuruṣavat iti vārṇitaṃ caitanyameva . tacca vinidrāvasthāto'nanyat,
tacca caitanyaṃ vinidrāvasthaiva, yathoktam—
puruṣasya na kevalodayaḥ paśavaścāpyanivṛttakevalāḥ .na ca satyapi kevale prabhustava cintyeyamacintyavad gatiḥ ॥ siddha॰ dvā॰ 4 . 22 iti .
itiśabdo hetvarthe, asmāddhetorvinidrāvasthālakṣaṇa eva puruṣaḥ, etadevāsya lakṣaṇam, upayogo
lakṣaṇam tattvārtha॰ 2 . 8 iti vacanāt . etat pratijñāmātram . atra heturucyate --ātyantikanidrāvigamarūpanirūpyatvāt, sarvatra sarvadā vāntamatīto'tyantaḥ, tatra bhava ātyantiko nidrāvigamaḥ, sa eva
rūpaṃ tattvam, tena tattvena nirūpyatvāt, yathā nirūpitaṃ puruṣavādinaiva sarvaṃ sarvatra sadā sarvathā cetanātmakameveti siddho hetuḥ . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? vinidrāvasthāsvātmavat, yathā vinidrāvasthāṃ caturthīṃ śuddhacaitanyātmānaṃ nātivartate proktarūpeṇa nirūpyatvāt puruṣastathā śeṣāvasthāsvapi taddharmatānativṛttyaiveti evameṣā vinidrāvasthaiva sarvatrāpāditā . na hyasāvitarātmikā, yathā suptādyavasthāsturīyāvasthaiva na tathā sā tadātmikā .
kasmāt ? svavṛttityāgāpatteḥ, yadi sā vinidrāvasthā suptādyavasthāpi syāt tatastayā viśuddhāvasthā svavṛttistyaktā syāt, na tvasti svavṛttityāgo'vasthāsaṅkarasvarūpanirṇayābhāvādidoṣāt . ataḥ sā tanmātraiva, tasyāśca
tanmātratve tu puruṣasyāpi tadavasthāmātratvamato vinidrāvasthāmātratvam, tadvajjāgradādyavasthānātmaka

atha vinidrāvasthālakṣaṇo'pi puruṣaḥ sarvatvānna vinidrāvasthāmātra eva, vinidrāvasthāpi vinidrāvasthātmikā satī sarvatvānna vinidrāvasthāmātraiva syād vinidrāvasthālakṣaṇatvāt puruṣasvātmavat . tataśca pratyavasthaṃ tasyā eva sarvātmakatvāt
tṛṇādyapi sarvagatamiti kiṃ puruṣaikatvaprakalpanayā ? atallakṣaṇatvādvā vinidrāvasthāyā
abhāvaḥ, tataśca tattattvacaturavasthasarvātmakapuruṣābhāvaḥ .
atha vinidrālakṣaṇaviparīto'pi puruṣaḥ puruṣa evāvadhāraṇabhedāt, vinidrāvasthā-
tvam, tasmājjāgradādyavasthānātmakatvād vinidrāvasthāmātratvāt suptādidṛṣṭaśeṣāvasthāsu avṛtterasarvagatatvamiti cāvyāpitvadoṣaḥ puruṣakāraṇavādasya .
atha vinidretyādi . mā bhūt puruṣāsarvagatatvadoṣa iti vinidrāvasthālakṣaṇo'pi san puruṣaḥ
sarvatvānna vinidrāvasthāmātra eva, kiṃ tarhi ? suptādivṛttirapītīṣyate, tato vinidrāvasthāpi vinidrāvasthātmikā satī sarvatvādeva na vinidrāvasthāmātraiva syāt, suptādyavasthāpi syādityarthaḥ . hetuḥ
vinidrāvasthālakṣaṇatvāt puruṣasvātmavat, yathā puruṣo vinidrāvasthālakṣaṇatvāt sarvagata iṣyate tathā
vinidrāvasthā''tmasthaiva syāt sarvagatā syāt, vinidrāvasthālakṣaṇā hi sāpīti . tataścetyādi, evaṃ ca satyanyo'pi doṣaḥ, avasthāmavasthāṃ prati pratyavasthaṃ vinidrāvasthāvṛtteḥ suptasuṣuptajāgradavasthāsvapi tasyā eva
vinidrāvasthāyā evāviśeṣeṇa sarvagatatvāt suṣuptāvasthāpi tṛṇādi sarvagataṃ syāt sarvātmakatvād vinidrāvasthāvat, sarvātmakatvaṃ vinidrāvasthālakṣaṇatvāt puruṣavadityuktam . tasmāt tṛṇādyapi sarvagatamiti kiṃ
puruṣaikatvaprakalpanayā ? kaḥ puruṣavādaviśeṣābhimānaḥ ? tṛṇamevedaṃ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yacca bhāvyam, yasmāt
paraṃ nāparamasti kiñcit ityādi tenedaṃ pūrṇaṃ tṛṇena sarvam iti ca kasmānna paṭhyate ? iti .
kiñcānyat, atallakṣaṇatvādvetyādi . lakṣaṇaṃ viśeṣya arthāntarādavacchidya svarūpe'vasthāpakaṃ nīlotpalavat, tat punaḥ svātmanyasthitatvānnāsti lakṣaṇaṃ pratyavasthaṃ sarvātmasu vṛttatvāt . tato'tallakṣaṇatvādvā
vinidrāvasthāyā abhāvaḥ syāt svātmanyasthitatvāt khapuṣpavat . tataśca tattattve, tāsāṃ tattvaṃ catasṛṇāmavasthānāṃ saiva, tattattve caturavasthā'bhāvaḥ, tā eva ca sarvam, tadabhāvāt sarvābhāvaḥ, sarvābhāvāt
tadātmakasya sarvātmakasya puruṣasyāpyabhāva ityata āha --tataśca tattattvacaturavasthasarvātmakapuruṣābhāvaḥ,
caitanyameva hi puruṣasyāvasthānāṃ ca lakṣaṇam, tadabhāve puruṣasyāvasthānāṃ cābhāve kimavaśiṣyate ?
atha vinidrālakṣaṇetyādi . atha mataṃ bhavataḥ--vinidrāvasthāpuruṣābhāvadoṣayoḥ parihāre sarvadoṣaparihāraḥ, sa cāvadhāraṇavaiparītyeneti, tadyathā --puruṣastu puruṣa eva vinidrāvasthālakṣaṇaviparīto'pi,
kiṃ kāraṇam ? avadhāraṇe bhedāt . kathamavadhāraṇabhedaḥ ? ucyate --vinidrāvasthāsvātmani avadhāryamāṇe

svātmani vinidrāvasthaiva lakṣaṇam, puruṣe tu lakṣaṇameva anyāsāmapyatyāgāt, sa
hyanekarūpo mecakavat . na, uktavadavadhāraṇabhedasyānyāyyatvāt pratijñātavyāghātād
ghaṭarūpāditvavat, puruṣatvaṃ prāguktamavasthānām, adhunā tu pṛthaksvātmānastā
ucyanta iti tattvaṃ puruṣasya rūpādighaṭatvavat . yadā ca tāsāmeva tattvaṃ tatastāsāṃ
vinidrāvasthaiva lakṣaṇaṃ nānyā kācidavastheti svātmano lakṣaṇatvamavasthāyā niyatam, sā tvanyāvasthātmano'pi
lakṣaṇatvānna niyateti na vinidrāvasthāyāstāvadabhāvo'sti . puruṣasyāpyabhāvo nāsti, puruṣe tu lakṣaṇamevetyavadhāraṇād vinidrāvasthā lakṣaṇameva puruṣasya nālakṣaṇamiti puruṣo lakṣyatvenāniyato'nyābhirapyavasthābhirlakṣyatvādanyāsāmapyatyāgāllakṣaṇatvena puruṣasyeti bhedenāvadhāraṇam . yasmāt sa hyanekarūpo mecakavat
puruṣaḥ, varṇasaṅkaro hi mecakaḥ, sa nīlo'pi pīto'pi śeṣavarṇo'pi tathā puruṣo vinidrāvasthālakṣaṇo'pi
suptādyanyatamāvasthālakṣaṇo'pīti .
atrocyate --na, uktavadityādi . naitadupapannam, uktavadavadhāraṇabhedasyānyāyyatvāt, uktena
tulyamuktavat tenaiva prāguktaprakāreṇa tenaiva nyāyenāvadhāraṇabhedasyāvasara eva nāsti, nyāyādanapetaṃ nyāyyam,
na nyāyyamanyāyyam . kutaḥ ? pratijñātavyāghātāt, yadyavadhāraṇaṃ bhinnārthaviṣayamāśrīyate caitanyātmakaikapuruṣamayamidaṃ sarvam iti pratijñā hīyate, athaikapuruṣamayatvapratijñā paripālyate bhinnārthaviṣayādhārāvadhāraṇopapattirviśīryate, katham ? ghaṭarūpāditvavat, yathā ghaṭa eva rūpādayaḥ ityetasmin pakṣe na rūpādayo nāma
kecit santi ghaṭādarthāntarabhūtāḥ, tatra rūpasvātmano rūpāvasthaiva lakṣaṇaṃ na rasādyavasthāpi, ghaṭātmanastu
rūpāvasthā lakṣaṇameva itarāsāmatyāgāt iti ko'rthaḥ syād rūpādyabhāvāt ? tathehāpi vinidraikāvasthālakṣaṇapuruṣavyatiriktārthābhāvāditarāsāṃ suptādyavasthānāmabhāvādeva ko'vadhāraṇārthāvakāśaḥ ? ityavadhāraṇābhāvaḥ pratijñāvyāghāto vetyetadubhayaṃ pradarśayati --puruṣatvaṃ prāguktamavasthānām adhunā tu pṛthaksvātmānastā
ucyante'vasthā iti prāguktavadavadhāraṇabhedasyānyāyyatvaṃ pratijñāvyāghātaśceti . iti tattvamiti asmāddhetoḥ pratijñāvyāghātādavadhāraṇabhedānyāyyatvāccobhayathāpīṣṭaviparītaṃ tattvamavasthātvaṃ puruṣasya avasthā eva
puruṣaḥ, na puruṣa evāvasthāḥ ityetat prāptaṃ rūpādighaṭatvavat, yathā rūpādaya eva ghaṭaḥ ityetasmin pakṣe
na ghaṭo nāma kaścit ityayamarthaḥ, tatra rūpameva, na rasaḥ ityādyavadhāraṇamupapadyate bhinnārthaviṣayatvāt tathā
yadyavasthā eva puruṣa ityucyeta yujyetāvadhāraṇaṃ puruṣābhāve'vasthānāmeva bhinnānāmitarāvasthānivṛttyarthamekāvasthāvadhāraṇam, tat tu na yujyate caitanyātmakaikapuruṣamayatvapratijñāvyāghātāditi .
kiñcānyat, yadā ca tāsāmeva tattvamityādi yāvallokavadeva tattvāpattiriti . yadā ca tāsāṃ
bhāvastattvam, bhāva eva tāḥ, tābhireva bhūyate, bhedenāvadhāryamāṇatvād vinidrāvasthaiva vinidrāvasthāsvātmani
lakṣaṇam, puruṣe tu sā lakṣaṇameva, na tu saiva lakṣaṇaṃ puruṣasyānyāsāmapyavasthānāṃ tallakṣaṇatvātyāgāt . tathā

tathā tathetaretarātmasu abhāvādavadhāraṇabhedād bhinnabhinnārthatvānnanu tadeva sarvāsarvagatatvamiti lokavadeva tattvāpattiḥ .
athāvikalpaśabdārthatvādalakṣaṇa eva na tvajñātatattvatvāt, kathaṃ tarhi caturavasthāvarṇanamanekātmakasarvagatatvabhāvanaṃ ca ? yadyasyaikaikā pratyekamavasthā na bhavati
tato'sattvāt kuto'sya tadekatvāpattyātmikā avikalparūpatā ? na hi pṛthagavṛtte
tathā tāsāmitaretarātmasu abhāvaḥ, avadhāraṇabhedāt . tathā tathā iti vacanāduttarottarabhedānāmapītaretarātmasu nāsti bhāvaḥ, tadyathā--rūpāvasthāsvātmani rūpāvasthaiva lakṣaṇam ghaṭasvātmani tu rūpāvasthā lakṣaṇameva
rasādyavasthānāmapi tallakṣaṇatvātyāgāt, tathā pṛthivīloṣṭādīnāmitaretarātmasu abhāvālloṣṭāvasthāsvātmāvadhāraṇe
loṣṭāvasthaiva loṣṭāvasthāsvātmā, pṛthvīsvātmāvadhāraṇe tu sā lakṣaṇameva, na tu saiva vajrādīnāmapyatyāgāditi
sarvatrāstyavadhāraṇabhedaḥ . tato'vadhāraṇabhedāt tvaduktādeva tathā tathetaretarātmasu abhāvādavadhāraṇabhedādatyantaṃ bhinnārthatvam, ato bhinnabhinnārthatvāt sāmānyābhāvaḥ, sāmānyābhāvād viviktānekabhedāvasthāmātratvāt sarvamasarvagatam ghaṭo ghaṭa eva, rūpaṃ rūpameva, raso rasa eva, paṭaḥ paṭa eva ityādi prāptam .
tato nanu tadeva darśanametadapyāpannaṃ yaduktaṃ yathālokagrāhameva vastu, śāstreṣvanarthako vivekayatnaḥ ityādi

iti lokavadeva tattvāpattiriti .
athāvikalpaśabdārthatvādalakṣaṇa eva, na tvajñātatattvatvāt . tasya nirvikalpasyāvibhāgasya

sāmānyaviśeṣavyavasthāvicārarūpasya--tattvasya kuto vā lakṣaṇam ? kuto'vasthā ? iti . etaccāyuktaṃ caturavasthāvarṇanāt, yadi tāścatasro'pyavasthā asatyā eva tadvarṇanaṃ khapuṣpasaurabhavarṇanavat kathamupapadyate ? iti .
kiñcānyat, sarvagatatvabhāvanā'bhāvaprasaṅgāt, taddarśayannāha --anekātmakasarvagatatvabhāvanaṃ ca katham iti
vartate . sarvaṃ gataṃ sarvagatam, sṛ gatau pā॰ dhā॰ 935, 1095, sarvam ityayameva sarvaśabdo gamanārthadeśāntaraprāptilakṣaṇāṃ kriyāṃ bhinnavikalpārthaviṣayāmāha yadanyacca anyacca tadaśeṣaṃ sarvam iti, tataśca tat tadaśeṣaṃ
gataṃ sarvagatam, tadbhāvaḥ sarvagatatvamarthānekātmakatvāvinābhāvi, anekātmakaṃ hi sarvam, bhinnānekavikalpakṛtsnārthagataṃ sarvagatamityeṣā bhāvanā nirvikalpaikātmakatve na yujyata iti .
