prakāśātmaiva tu niyamaḥ . itarathā sa prakāśo na saḥ, tathā'niyatatvāt
tathā'bhūtatvāt, ghaṭapuruṣavad ghaṭapaṭavadvā . ya eva niyamaḥ sa eva prakāśaḥ,
tathāniyatatvāt tathāpravṛttatvāt, ghaṭaghaṭasvātmavat .
rūpaṃ nā'nākāśādirvā iti . tasmāt sattvaṃ tamonugṛhītaṃ tathā prakāśate na svata eva tasmādanyaḥ prakāśānniyama iti . etaccāsat, tamaso'pi sattvavat pṛthagaparisamāptarūpatvāt, sattvaprakāśananiyamane svayaṃ
sattvaprakāśanākāṅkṣitvāt tamastvanmatenāparisamāptameva tamoniyamanāpekṣaprakāśātmakasattvavat . tadvyākhyānaṃ
tamaso'pi hītyādi, tamaḥ sattvaprakāśarūpavyaktiṃ sattvaprakāśanapratilabdhatathāniyati kuryād nāprakāśitatathāniyativyakti . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tasya tathā vyakteḥ sattvaprakāśanapratilabhyatvāt . yasmāt tathā prakāśanaṃ
vyaktiriti itiśabdasya hetvarthatvād niyamanayogyatayā hi tamasaḥ prakāśanaṃ sattvasya vyaktiḥ, sā ca
prakāśātmakasattvānugrahād bhavati nānyatheti sattvāprakāśitatamoniyamanāparisamāptarūpatvam, prakāśā-
nanugrahe satyaniyatatvāt . na ca svayamaniyataṃ niyamayitumanyaṃ samarthaṃ vandhyāputravadityata āha —
aniyataṃ ca kathamanyaniyamane pravarteta ? ityādirata uttaraḥ prāgatītagranthātideśaḥ evaṃ tu nānayorityādipūrvottarapakṣaprapañcātmako yāvanna pariṇāmasya tatraivoktatvāditi . tadyathā --evaṃ tu nānayoritaretarānugrāhitā, utthāpyasāhāyakaśaktitvāt, vātāhatanaudvayavad glānaśibikāvāhakavat . asampūrṇaśaktitā
vā'prakarṣaḥ aniyama ityarthaḥ, iti kāraṇataiva na syādasampūrṇaśaktitvādupahatabījavat . asadakaraṇādibhyaścānyato na tatsvarūpaprakarṣaḥ . yadā ca sudūramapi gatvā prāgavṛtterasatkāryatvaṃ mā bhūditi prakarṣaḥ
pariṇāmādeva tadā pariṇāmasyānyatra vṛttasyānyatrāpariṇāmakatvād yuvatvavadātmamātravṛttitvameva, nānyatra vṛtto'nyadanyathā karoti pariṇāmitvāt . evaṃ tarhi pūrvavadudāharaṇādevāpravṛttyātmakatvaṃ
sukhasya niyatarūpeṇāpravṛttyātmakatvamityarthaḥ, ko hi viśeṣastamaḥpravartanādṛte kṣīradadhipariṇāmakālavat
pūrvaṃ na pravṛttaṃ paścācca pravṛttamiti ? na, pariṇāmasya tatraivoktatvādityeṣa granthaḥ samāno'trāpi .
ata uttarastu grantho'rthataḥ samānagamaniko'pi viśeṣya likhyate bhāvanārthaṃ viśeṣaṇātulyatvāt, tadyathā —
prakāśātmaiva tu niyamaḥ itarathā sa prakāśo na saḥ, tathā'niyatatvāt, tathā'bhūtatvādityasyaivārthakathanaṃ prāktanavyākhyānavat . rūpādisvarūpaniyatārthaprakāśanāt prakāśaḥ prakāśaḥ syād nānyatheti,
tvanmatena ghaṭapuruṣavat, yat tathā aniyataṃ tanna prakāśaḥ, yathā ghaṭaḥ puruṣe na niyato ghaṭe ca puruṣaḥ,
yo yaḥ prakāśaḥ sa tathāniyata eva yathā rūparasādi . lokapratītodāharaṇameva ghaṭapaṭavadveti . evaṃ tāvat, prakā

niyamyaniyāmakatvād naulambanapāṣāṇavanneti cet, na, tadātmana eva tathāniyatatvāt sannidhimātrāt pūrvavadaniyamanāt . ya evāsau sattvasyātmā prakāśaḥ sa
niyāmakaḥ, tathāniyamavidheḥ, itarakartṛvat, tamoniyamātmarūpāpādanāditaratathā-
śasya rūpāntaranivṛttirūpaṃ niyamamantareṇa prakāśanābhāvapradarśanād niyamātmakatvamuktam, idānīṃ ya eva niyamaḥ
sa eva prakāśa iti tayorananyatvāpādanam, tathāniyatatvāt tena prakāreṇa niyatatvāt rūpaprakāśanarūpeṇa rasādyātmanivṛttyā prakāśasya niyatatvāt, tathāpravṛttatvādityasyaivārthakathanaṃ vṛttiniyativyaktīnāmaikārthyāt, ghaṭaghaṭasvātmavat, yat tathāniyataṃ yat tathāvṛttaṃ yat tathāvyaktaṃ tadeva tat, yathā ghaṭa
eva ghaṭasvātmā . yat punastadeva na bhavati na tat tathāniyataṃ tathāvṛttaṃ tathāvyaktaṃ vā, yathā puruṣaḥ .
niyamyaniyāmakatvād naulambanapāṣāṇavanneti cet . syānmatam--niyamyaṃ prakāśatattvaṃ
sattvam, tamo niyāmakam . tasmād niyamyaniyāmakatvabhedād naikatvaṃ sattvatamasoḥ naulambanapāṣāṇavat,
yathā nauḥ pravartamānā niyamyate lambanapāṣāṇena niyāmakena, tayoścānyatvamevaṃ sattvatamasoriti . etacca na,
tadātmana eva tathāniyatatvāt, tasyaivātmā sa eva vātmā tadātmā, tasyaiva prakāśātmano niyatatvāt,
tasmādeva tenaiva vātmanā prakāśātmana eva niyatatvāt, sattvatamasorbhedābhāvād naulambanapāṣāṇavad bhedasādharmyābhāvādayukto dṛṣṭānta iti vakṣyate . tadvyākhyānārthamāha --sannidhimātrāt pūrvavadaniyamanāt,
iha tamaḥ sannihitamapi prāk sannidhimātrādevāniyāmakaṃ svayamaniyatatvāt sattvādhīnaniyatitvāt, kintu
niyamyamaniyamāt, kastarhi niyāmakaḥ ? ucyate --ya evāsau sattvasyātmā prakāśaḥ sa niyāmakaḥ .
kathamiti cet, ucyate--yasmāt tathāniyamyavyaktisvarūpaḥ, tena prakāreṇa śabdādiniyatiniyamyavyañjanasvarūpaḥ sa eva prakāśa eva . kutaḥ ? tathāniyamavidheḥ, tena hi prakāreṇa niyamasya vidhiḥ śabdasvarūpeṇa
prakāśamānasya śabdasya rūpādyanātmanā niyatā prakāśamānatā niyamavidhiḥ, tasmāddhetoḥ prakāśa eva niyamaḥ .
dṛṣṭānta itarakartṛvat kumbhakārādivat, yathā mṛddravyaṃ piṇḍaśivakādibhāvenābhivyajyamānaṃ tathā tathā prakāśayatā kartrā kumbhakāreṇa niyamakāriṇā nirvartyate niyamyate niyate rūpe'vasthāpyate nāprakāśamānamapravartamānaṃ ca
satkāryavādābhyupagamādasadakaraṇādihetusāmarthyācca, tasmāt sa kartā prakāśasthānīyo niyāmakaḥ piṇḍaśivakāderniyamyasya tathā prakāśastamasaḥ . kutaḥ ? tamoniyamātmarūpāpādanāt, sattvenaiva hi tathā tathā prakāśamānena tamaso niyamarūpamāpādyate mṛda iva tathā prakāśayatā kartrā kumbhakāreṇa tadātmalābhahetutvāt . tatastvadabhimataniyāmakatvaviparyayāpattiḥ, tamaso niyamyatvāt sattvādhīnaniyatitvāt sattvasyaiva niyāmakatvāt pakṣadharmaviparītatā sattvāpādyaniyamātmarūpatā prasaktā, sattvāprakāśite niyamābhāvāt . sattvāpāditaṃ hi tamaso
niyamātmarūpam, tasmāt tamoniyamātmarūpāpādanāt sattvaṃ niyāmakam, itaratathārūpāpādanāt tamovat .

rūpāpādanāt tamovat . tamo'pi hi itaratathāsvarūpāpādanādṛte kimanyat
karoti ?
evaṃ ca nauvat tama evāpadyate tathā prakāśasya niyamyatvāt tathāprakāśānatiriktatattvarūpatvādvā niyamasya kuto'naulambanapāṣāṇabhedasādharmyam ? bhede lambanapāṣāṇo nāvaṃ niruṇaddhīti yujyate, na tu tathāprakāśātiriktatattvarūpo moho
niyāmako'sti .
na tadrūpatvamatadvṛttitvāditi cet, na, tamaḥsvaniyamavat tadātmana eva niyatatvāt . anyathā sattvaṃ sattvameva na syādityuktatvādanyathā tu niyatyabhāvāt .
tamo'pi hi ityādi, tamaso'pi hi niyāmakatvamevameva yujyate tvanmate yadītarayoḥ sattvarajasorātmarūpāpādanaṃ kuryāt, anyathā itaratathāsvarūpāpādanādṛte tamaḥ kimanyat karoti ? tayorhi sattvarajaso-
rātmarūpāpādanameva, ātmarūpamāpādayanniyāmakamityucyate . yathā tamaḥ pūrvaṃ prakāśapravṛttyātmabhyāmaniyatayoḥ
sattvarajasostathāniyamanād niyāmakamevaṃ sattvamapītaratathāniyamātmarūpāpādanād niyāmakamastu, ko doṣaḥ ?
evaṃ ca nauvat tama evāpadyate . evaṃ ca sattvasyaivoktavidhinā niyāmakatvād nausthānīyaṃ niyamyaṃ
tama eva syāt, na niyāmakam . lambanapāṣāṇasthānīyaṃ sattvameva niyāmakam, na niyamyaṃ syāt . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tathā prakāśasya niyamyatvāt, yasmāt tenoktaprakāreṇa prakāśena niyamyatvaṃ mohasya tasmāt tamasaḥ
sattvena niyamyatvādityarthaḥ . tasmāt prakāśāprakāśite tamaso niyatyabhāvāt tamasaḥ prakāśena tathā niyamyatvāt tadātmana eva tathāniyatatvāditi sādhūktam . evaṃ tāvat sattvatamasorbhedamabhyupetya viparyayāpattyā niyamyaniyāmakatvādityasya hetorasiddhiruktā . naiva vā sattvavyatiriktaṃ tamo'bhyupema ityata āha --tathāprakāśānatiriktatattvarūpatvād vā niyamasya śabdaprakāreṇā'rūpādiprakāreṇa ca yaḥ prakāśastadanatiriktatattvarūpatvānniyamasyābhivyakteḥ kuto'naulambanapāṣāṇabhedasādharmyam ? na nauranauḥ, kaḥ ? lambanapāṣāṇaḥ, tasya
nāvo bhedaḥ, tatsādharmyamanaulambanapāṣāṇabhedasādharmyam, tattu kutaḥ sattvatamasorbhedasādharmyam ? bhedābhāvādityarthaḥ . tato dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoḥ sādharmyābhāvādayuktamiti vaiṣamyaṃ darśayati --bhede sati lambanapāṣāṇo nauvilakṣaṇo nāvaṃ pravartamānāṃ niruṇaddhīti yujyate . na tu tathāprakāśātiriktatattvarūpo
moho niyāmako'sti etayoḥ śabdādyāvirbhāvamātraphalatvāt, ato na yujyate .
na tadrūpatvamatadvṛttitvāditi cet . syānmatam--prakāśanamātraṃ sattvasya vṛttirniyamanaṃ tu tamasaḥ,
tasmāt sattvasyāniyamanādatadvṛttitvād vṛttibhedācca na niyamanaṃ sattvasya tamasaśca na prakāśanamityasti bheda
iti . etacca na, tamaḥsvaniyamavat tadātmana eva niyatatvāt, yathā tamasaḥ svo niyamaḥ prāgavṛttaḥ
paścāt svata eva tamaḥsvātmanaḥ pravartamānastamasā vinā abhūtatvāt tadatyāgena vṛttestadadhīnatvāt tadrūpa
evaṃ tadātmana eva pravṛttatvāt tathā sattvaprakāśapravṛttyanatiriktatattvarūpastamoniyamaḥ sattvāvyatiriktaḥ prakāśā

syānmatam--prakarṣeṇa kāśanaṃ prakāśanaṃ... ... ...pravṛttivat . na, sattvasyāpi
tamovadaparisamāptarūpatvād... ...niyāmakābhāvasya cāparyāptatvenoktatvāt .
evaṃ caika eva vinidrāvasthāpuruṣatvavad niyamaḥ pradhānamiti tanmātrameva tat,
niyamāpattirūpanirūpyatvāt, niyamasvātmavadityādi bhaṅgacakrāvartanaṃ niyamasvātmaiva
vā trīṇyapīti puruṣāvasthāvad yāvat sukhādananyad duḥkhamiti . atra tu sukhādananya
eva mohaḥ, anātmatve'śoṣādyātmakatvāt, sukhasvātmavadityādi sākṣepaparihāraṃ
pūrvavat pravṛttisthāne niyamaṃ kṛtvā .
na cāpīdamekata eva tattvam . sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvāt syādekata eva tattvam .
dhīnatvāt tadavinābhāvāt tadaparityāgena pravṛttestadātmana eva pravṛttatvāditi . kiñcānyat, anyathā
sattvamityādi, yadi svata eva niyamo na syāt tato'nyathā sattvaṃ sattvameva prakāśo vā prakāśa eva na
syāt tathā'niyatatvād rajovat pravṛttivat . mūlata eva tadvā prakāśa iti na syādaniyatatvād vandhyāputravat puruṣavadityuktatvāditi tathā . anyathā tu niyatyabhāvāt, prakāśāprakāśite tamaso niyatyabhāvādaniyatasya cābhāvāt prakāśa eva niyama iti .
syānmatam--prakarṣeṇa kāśanaṃ prakāśanamityādi yāvat pravṛttivaditi prāsaṅgikaṃ tadeva codyam,
tatrottaramapi sattvasyāpi tamovadaparisamāptarūpatvādityādi akṣaraviparyāsena yathāyogākṣaropanyāsaṃ yāvat
utthāpyasāhāyakaśaktitvād vātāhatanaudvayavad glānaśibikāvāhakavad yāvacca upahatabījavaditi
vācyam, tasmādidaṃ vyākhyātārtham --niyāmakābhāvasya cāparyāptatvenoktatvāt .
evaṃ caika eva vinidrāvasthāpuruṣatvavadityādi yāvad bhaṅgacakrāvartanamiti prāguktaṃ bhaṅgacakramāvartya vyākhyeyamiti tadevātidiśati samānatvāt . tatra tu pravṛttireva pradhānaṃ pravṛttyāpattirūpanirūpyatvāt
pravṛttisvātmavaditi pravṛttimātratve pradhānabhaṅgacakrakamāvartitam, iha tu pravṛttisthāne niyamaṃ kṛtvā pradhānasthāne
pradhānameva ca kṛtvā bhaṅgacakrāvartanaṃ tadvadeva kāryam . punaśca niyamasvātmaiva vā trīṇyapīti puruṣāvasthāvad bhaṅgacakrāvartanaṃ dvitīyaṃ likhitaṃ yathā tathātra pravṛttitraiguṇyavad niyamatraiguṇyaṃ likhitaṃ draṣṭavyamiti .
bhaṅgagranthaparivṛttiparimāṇamapyāha --yāvat sukhādananyad duḥkhamitīyaddūram . atra tu viśeṣaḥ sukhādananyo
moha iti pratijñā, hetuḥ --anātmatve'śoṣādyātmakatvāditi, dṛṣṭāntaḥ sukhasvātmavaditi . ityādi
sākṣepaparihāraṃ pūrvavaditi avadhāraṇena coktasādhanāntarāpakṣiptānyatvo vipakṣābhāvaḥ sūcyata ityādisarvātītavyākhyānaprapañcātideśaḥ . tadvyākhyānopāyadiṅmātrapradarśanaṃ caitat --pravṛttisthāne niyamaṃ kṛtveti .
na cāpīdamekata eva tattvamityādītyuttarasya vikalpotthāpanagranthasya sambandhaḥ . sukhato duḥkhamohayorananyatvaṃ tattvamuktam, tattvanekataḥ . sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvāt sāmānyaviśeṣabhedabhāvāt, yathā vṛkṣa iti
sāmānyaṃ kadamba iti viśeṣaḥ, yathātra kadambo niyamād vṛkṣaḥ, vṛkṣastu syāt kadambo'nyo vetyekatastattvaṃ

kintūbhayato'nanyatvādabhinnatvādekatvāt... ... ...sannihitāpattibhavanasattārthatvamayathārthaṃ syāt... ....
evaṃ tvanabhyupagame idaṃ nirūpyam--asti pradhānaṃ bhedānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāt .
etat kathaṃ nirūpyate ? iti anekātmakatvakāraṇakalpanā asadvāda eva, sambhāvyavikalpānupapannārthatvāt, taduktasatyatvānupapannārthasarvoktānṛtatvapakṣavat .
tathā yadi sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvaḥ syāt syādekata eva tattvam, na tu tatheha sukhaduḥkhamohānāṃ sāmānya-
viśeṣabhāvo'stīti . kintūbhayato'nanyatvādabhinnatvādekatvādityādinā sattvarajastamasāmekatvāpādanārthaḥ
pūrvavat sarva eva prakramabhedaiḥ sa eva tathaiva granthaḥ pravṛttyā prakāśaviśeṣitayā mohaviśeṣitayā ca neyaḥ,
tathā ca bhāṣya eva sulikhitatvānna vivriyate . sannihitāpattibhavanasattārthatvamayathārthaṃ syādityatra tu
viśeṣaḥ, āpattibhavanaṃ sannidhibhavanāvinābhāve yujyate, nānyathā, yadi tadrūpādi bīje na sannihitasannihitaṃ  tato'ṅkurasyāsattvādyāpattiḥ syāt, sat kāryaṃ kāraṇe ceti dvaividhyaṃ ca bhavanasyaivameva yujyeta āpattyanāpattibhedāditi,
śeṣaṃ pūrvavat . sattvena tamasā ca saha bhāvanāyāṃ kṛtāyāṃ punaśca tathaiva tamaso'pi sattvena rajasā tadvadeva
bhāvanāgrantho niravaśeṣo likhita ācāryeṇaiveti na vivṛṇmahe, sa evānusartavyaḥ . sarvatra ca bhedacodyeṣu
pravartyapravartakatvāt pallavapavanavanneti cet, na, tadātmana evetyādi tadeva sattvarajaḥsaṃyoge'pi, prakāśārthiprakāśabhedād nartakīnartakācāryavanneti cet, na, tadātmana evetyādi sattvarajaḥ saṃyogesattvarajaḥsaṃyoge sattvatamaḥsaṃyoge ca, niyamyaniyāmakatvād naulambanapāṣāṇavanneti cet, na, tadātmana evetyādi sattvatamaḥsaṃyoge rajastamaḥsaṃyoge ca tatra prakāśanapravartananiyamanavacanāni ca yathopapatti yojyāni . kuto'pallavapavanabhedasādharmyam, kuto'nartakīnartakācāryabhedasādharmyam, kuto'naulambanapāṣāṇabhedasādharmyam ?
iti copanayeṣu dvayaṃ dvayaṃ dvayordvayorguṇayoḥ sambhavitvāccodayitvā parihāryamiti . evaṃ tāvat sukhaduḥkhamohānāṃ prakāśapravṛttiniyamātmakānāmananyatvāt ekātmakaikakāraṇapūrvakatvam iti sādhvabhyadhāmeti .
evaṃ tvanabhyupagama idaṃ nirūpyamityādi . evamekātmakaikakāraṇānabhyupagame sāṅkhyairidaṃ nirūpyam,
katamat ? yat tad bhinnātmakatvaṃ parigṛhya prayukte kāryakāraṇavīte'bhihitam --asti pradhānaṃ bhedānāṃ
kāryakāraṇabhāvāt, ādhyātmikānāṃ bāhyānāṃ ca bhedānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvo dṛṣṭaḥ, ādhyātmikānāṃ kāryātmakānāṃ vakṣyāmaḥ sattvarajastamāṃsi trīṇi śabdādyātmabhirvyavatiṣṭhamānāni parasparārthaṃ kurvantītyevamādi,
etat kathaṃ nirūpyate ? vakṣyamāṇeṣu vicāravikalpeṣu yathā yathocyate tathā tathānupapattireveti itiśabdahetvarthatvād nirūpaṇābhāva evetyabhiprāyaḥ . tadvicāroddeśārthaṃ sādhanamāha --anekātmakatvakāraṇakalpanā
asadvāda eva sambhāvyavikalpānupapannārthatvāt, anupapannasambhāvyavikalpārthatvādityarthaḥ, ye'tra sambhāvyante vikalpāste'nupapannārthā iti vakṣyati, tasmādayamasadvāda eva . dṛṣṭāntaḥ --taduktasatyatvānupapannārthasarvoktānṛtatvapakṣavat, tenaivoktastaduktaḥ sarvamanṛtam iti pakṣaḥ, sa evoktastadukto vā . asau satyaśced

yaducyate sattvarajastamāṃsi trīṇi śabdādyātmabhirvyavatiṣṭhamānāni parasparārthaṃ
kurvanti, sattvaṃ śabdakāryaṃ prakhyāya śabdātmanā vyavatiṣṭhamānaṃ rajastamasoḥ śabdātmabhāvāya pravṛttiṃ khyāpayati . atra prakāśātmakena sattvena prakāśātmakayoreva
rajastamasoḥ śabdātmanā vyavatiṣṭhamānena śabdātmabhāvāya pravṛttirvyaktiḥ prakhyāpyate,
utāprakāśātmakayoḥ ? yadyaprakāśātmake rajastamasī śabdātmabhāvāya prakhyāpyete
tataḥ sattvaṃ puruṣasyāpi tarhi śabdātmabhāvāya pravṛttiṃ prakhyāpayiṣyati śabdatvāyainaṃ
pravartayiṣyati, aprakāśātmakena tenāpi śabdabhāvāya pravartitavyaṃ prakāśakārakopapatteḥ rajastamobhyāmiva .
na tarhi sarvamuktamanṛtam, asya satyatvāt sarvoktāntaḥpātitvācca, athāsatyamidaṃ na tarhi sarvasyoktasyānṛtatvamanenānṛtena pratipādyate'syānṛtasyāpramāṇatvādityubhayathāpyasadvādastṛtīyavikalpābhāvācca tatheyamapi triguṇamekaṃ kāraṇam ityanekātmakaikakāraṇakalpanā asadvāda iti .
tat punaḥ katamad vacanam ? iti tat pradarśayannāha --yaducyate sattvarajastamāṃsītyuddeśavākyaṃ
yāvat parasparārthaṃ kurvantīti, nirdeśavākyaṃ ca sattvaṃ śabdakāryamityādi yāvat pravṛttiṃ prakhyāpayatīti
etadasadvādadharmeṇa pakṣīkṛtaṃ vākyam . atra ca dvayaṃ sambhāvyate tṛtīyābhāvāt, taddarśayati --prakāśātmakenetyādi yāvat prakhyāpyata ityayameko vikalpaḥ . sattvaṃ prakāśātmakaṃ sat tadātmakayoreva rajastamasoḥ
śabdātmanā vyavasthā'neneti svayaṃ śabdātmanā vyavatiṣṭhamānaṃ tenātmanopakurvat tayoḥ śabdātmabhāvāya
pravṛttiṃ prakhyāpayati, pravṛttiḥ prakhyāpyate . kā sā pravṛttiḥ ? vyaktirityarthakathanam . pravṛttiṃ prakhyāpayati
ityetadeva sphuṭīkartukāmaḥ pravṛttiḥ prakhyāpyate iti vibhaktiviparyāsena vivṛṇoti ākhyātenābhihitakarmakatvāt prathamayā . eṣa prathamaḥ praśnavikalpaḥ . dvitīyastu utāprakāśātmakayoriti rajastamasoraprakāśātmakayorvā tat sattvaṃ śabdakāryaṃ prakhyāya śabdātmanā vyavatiṣṭhamānaṃ śabdātmabhāvāya pravṛttiṃ khyāpayati ? iti
praśnaḥ . prakāśātmakayorityeṣa vikalpo na ghaṭata eva, sattvarajastamasāṃ jātyantaratvābhyupagamāt prakāśapravṛttiniyamakāryatvabhedāt sukhaduḥkhamohātmakabhedācca rajastamasī na prakāśātmake iti .
atrocyate --yadyaprakāśetyādi yāvad rajastamasī iveti . yadyaprakāśātmake rajastamasī
śabdātmabhāvāya prakhyāpyete tatastadvat sattvaṃ puruṣasyāpi tarhi śabdātmabhāvāya pravṛttiṃ prakhyāpayiṣyati, tadarthavivaraṇam --śabdatvāyainaṃ pravartayiṣyati, śabdatvapariṇāmenainaṃ pariṇamayiṣyatītyarthaḥ .
sattvena śabdakāryaprakhyātinā śabdātmanā vyavatiṣṭhamānena puruṣaḥ śabdātmabhāvāya pravartyate'bhivyajyate vyavasthāpyate ca, aprakāśātmakatvāt, yad yadaprakāśātmakaṃ tat tat sattvena śabdakāryaprakhyātinā śabdātmanā
vyavatiṣṭhamānena śabdātmabhāvāya pravartyaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ vyavasthāpyaṃ ca dṛṣṭaṃ yathā rajastamaśca, vipakṣābhāvād vyāvṛttiravācyā . tatsādhanavyākhyānadvāreṇa sādhanāntaropanyāsadvāreṇa vā granthaḥ aprakāśātmakenetyādiḥ yāvad

athocyeta--aprakāśatvānnaikāntaḥ śakyate kartum . puruṣaḥ sattvānna prakāśate,
aprakāśakatve sannihitaprakāśakārakatvāt, pradīpeneva viyat . rajastamasī ca prakāśyete, aprakāśakatvāt, pradīpeneva pṛthivī . puruṣo'prakāśaḥ, rajastamasī ca prakāśe .
evaṃ tāvad vikalpasamajātitvādanuttarameva . api ca naiva viyato'prakāśakatvam,
yasmād rūpādipṛthagbhūtapṛthagvipariṇatiṣu pṛthivyādiṣu nāprakāśanaṃ ghaṭate bodhya-
rajastamobhyāmiveti . apiśabdād rajastamobhyāmapi tenāpi ca puruṣeṇāprakāśātmakena śabdabhāvāya
pravartitavyaṃ prakāśitavyaṃ vyavasthātavyamityete pravṛttiprakāśaniyamāḥ puruṣakāryāḥ syuḥ, sa pravartate prakāśate
vyavatiṣṭhate pariṇamatītyarthaḥ . kutaḥ ? prakāśakārakopapatteḥ, tasyāprakāśakatve sati upapannaprakāśakārakatvādityarthaḥ . yad yadaprakāśakatve satyupapannaprakāśakārakaṃ tena tena śabdabhāvāya prakāśitavyaṃ pravartitavyaṃ vyavasthātavyaṃ yathā rajasā tamasā ca . athavā rajastamaśca yathā pravartata ityādi yathābhivyaktārthānurūpaṃ vyākhyātavyamiti .
etasya sādhanasyānaikāntikatvodbhāvanārthaṃ sādhanadvāreṇa paramatamāśaṅkyāha, athocyeta--aprakāśatvād naikānta ityādi sopasaṃhārahetukaprakāśanāprakāśanasādhane yāvat prakāśe iti . aprakāśatvād
naikāntaḥ śakyate kartumiti, ayaṃ heturna śakya aikāntikaḥ kartum, yasmācchakyate vaktumitthamapi --puruṣaḥ
sattvād na prakāśate na vyajyata iti . kasmāt ? aprakāśakatve sannihitaprakāśakārakatvāt,
yadaprakāśakatve sannihitaprakāśakārakaṃ tadaprakāśamānaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā pradīpeneva viyat . rajastamasī ca
prakāśyete aprakāśakatvāt pradīpeneva pṛthivītyetat pūrveṇa sādhanena vyākhyātārthaṃ sat sannihitaprakāśakārakatvāditi na viśeṣyate . yathā ca viyatpṛthivyoraprakāśatvasāmānye satyeva kārakasānnidhye'pi prakāśāprakāśau dṛṣṭāvevaṃ puruṣasyāprakāśātmakatve'pyaprakāśataiva rajastamasoḥ sattvasya prakāśataiveti viśeṣo'stviti .
atrocyate --evaṃ tāvad vikalpasamajātitvādanuttarameva, prayatnānantarīyakatve satyeva mūrtāmūrtatvādiviśeṣavad ghaṭaśabdayoranityo nityaśceti viśeṣaḥ syāt iti vacanavat . kiñcānyat, etadapi ca naiva viyato'prakāśakatvaṃ tvanmatenaiva śabdātmanā prakāśamānatvādasti . yadapi ca rūpaviṣayāprakāśanaṃ pṛthivyādiṣvetadapi
ca naivāprakāśanaṃ ghaṭate yasmād rūpādītyādi yāvannāprakāśatve prakāśanamiti . yasmāditi heturvakṣyamāṇārthaḥ, nāprakāśanaṃ ghaṭata iti sādhyam, rūpādiriti rūparasagandhāstejombhobhūmiṣu, tebhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtāvākāśānilau śabdasparśātmakau, rūpādipṛthagbhūtābhyāṃ kha-vātābhyāṃ pṛthagbhūtā vipariṇatiryeṣāṃ teṣu rūpādipṛthagbhūtapṛthagvipariṇatiṣu pṛthivyādiṣu pṛthivyabādiṣu tejorahiteṣu vidyamānaḥ prakāśakatvaprakāśaḥ svagato vipari-
ṇatastirobhūtaḥ, kintu prakāśyaprakāśo'styāvirbhūtatvāt, atasteṣāṃ prakāśyataiva . kvacidatyantamatirobhūtatvād

bodhakamanuṣyaprakāśyaprakāśakatvavat . hetuhetumattve'pi tayornāprakāśatve prakāśanam .
viyatpṛthivīviśeṣopapattivacca te eva pravartete na puruṣa ityastu nāma, prakāśātmake tarhi rajastamasī śabdabhāvāya pravṛtteḥ sattvavat, vaidharmyeṇa puruṣavat .
asatkāryavāditā cātisphuṭaiva, sattve pravṛttiniyamayorabhūtayoḥ śabdātmavyavasthānavacanādabhyupagamāt, rajastamasoḥ prāgasato jātyantarakāryabhūtasya prakāśanasyā-
vajrādiṣu prakāśatā ca dṛśyata eva, tasmāt kharapṛthivyādiṣu prakāśatā svagataprakāśavipariṇāmād vidyamānaprakāśakataiva bodhyabodhakamanuṣyaprakāśyaprakāśakatvavat, jñānasvabhāva eva hi manuṣyaḥ prakāśātmā
prakāśyo bodhyo bodhakaśca dṛṣṭaḥ, na kuḍyādiracetanaḥ, tathā pṛthivyādayaḥ . manuṣyagrahaṇamasyaiva rathyāpuruṣasyodāhāryatvāt . syānmatam--bodhakabodhyayorhetuhetumadbhāvānnobhayorubhayadharmateti dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikavaiṣamyamiti .
etaccāyuktam, yasmāddhetuhetumattve'pi tayoḥ sūriśiṣyayordvayorapi pratyekaṃ nāprakāśatve prakāśanamiti .
tasmād viyatpṛthivyorapi prakāśakatvasāmyād dṛṣṭāntābhāve puruṣasya rajastamasośca viśeṣāpādanāsiddhiḥ .
athāpi tvadanuvṛttyā viyatpṛthivīviśeṣopapattimabhyupemaḥ puruṣasyāprakāśakatve sati apravartanādi rajastamasośca
pravartanādi tathāpi te viyatpṛthivīviśeṣopapattivacca te eva pravartete rajastamasī na puruṣa ityastu nāma,
naivāstītyabhiprāyaḥ . kintvayamanyaste doṣo'niṣṭa āpadyate --prakāśātmake tarhi rajastamasī, sattvavilakṣaṇe
na bhavata ityarthaḥ, kutaḥ ? śabdabhāvāya pravṛtteḥ, sattvavat, yacchabdabhāvāya pravartate tat prakāśātmakaṃ
dṛṣṭam, yathā sattvam, vaidharmyeṇa puruṣavaditi, yat prakāśātmakaṃ na bhavati na tacchabdātmabhāvāya pravartate
yathā tava puruṣa iti .
kiñcānyat, --asatkāryavāditā'tyantāniṣṭā prasaktā evamanabhyupagame iti vartate, sā cāsatkāryavāditā'tisphuṭaiva, katham ? sattve pravṛttiniyamayorabhūtayoḥ śabdātmavyavasthānavacanādabhyupagamāt, sattvasya kāryaṃ prakāśa eveṣṭo na pravṛttiniyamau jātyantarabhūtarajastamaskāryatvāt, tau tatrāsantau punastasya kāryāvabhyupagatau, kutaḥ ? vyavasthānavacanāt sattvaṃ śabdakāryaṃ prakhyāya śabdātmanā vyavatiṣṭhamānamiti bruvatābhyupagamāditīti . tadā yadi tat sattvamapravṛttamaniyataṃ vā pūrvavadapravṛttatvādaniyatatvācca tayostathārūpāṃ śabdātmikāṃ pravṛttiṃ na prakhyāpayed naiva vā syād vandhyāputravadityuktatvāt vyavasthānasya ca prakāśapravṛttiniyamātmakasya prāgasataḥ sattvaviṣayasyārambhāvasthāyāṃ sāmyāvasthāvilakṣaṇāyāmabhyupagatatvādasatoḥ pravṛttiniyamayoḥ sattvābhyupagamādatisphuṭā . kiñcānyat, rajastamasorityādi yāvat prakāśanasyābhyupagamāditi, asatkāryavāditā'tisphuṭaiveti vartate . tasminneva sattvaprakāśātmavyavasthānopakāra

bhyupagamāt, pṛthagbhūtatattvakāraṇāśrayābhivyakteḥ vaiśeṣikābhimatatantvāśrayapaṭavat .
tairyathāsvamakāraṇasadbhiḥ prakāśādibhirārabdhaṃ kāryamapi bhrāntimātram, tvaduktahetusāmarthyādeva tanmayārabdhatvādasadātmakaṃ hi tat kārpāsikatantvārabdhapaṭakārpāsikatvavat . tanmayatanmayaṃ ca asadātmakaṃ tanmayatanmayārabdhatvāt kārpāsikapaṭakuṭerapi
kārpāsikatvavad rūpādisukhādimayatvavat .
vākye rajastamasoḥ śabdabhāvāya pravṛttiṃ prakhyāpayatīti vacanāt tayo rajasi tamasi ca prāgasataḥ prakāśasya
jātyantarakāryabhūtasya tadānīṃ prakhyāpanādasato'bhivyaktirutpattirvābhyupagatā, yadi te rajastamasī tathā pratipadyete
vyavatiṣṭhete pravartete vā tataḥ sattvena prakāśitaṃ syāt ācāryeṇeva nartakyāḥ prāgapratipannāyā apravṛttāyā
avyavatiṣṭhamānāyāḥ . tasmāt prakāśo'pi tayoḥ prāgasan paścājjāta ityasatkāryavāditā . sedānīṃ vaiśeṣikā-
satkāryavāditayā tulyeti bhāvyate --pṛthagbhūtatattvetyādi, pṛthagbhūtaṃ tattvamātmā kāryaṃ tadbhāvo yasya sa
pṛthagbhūtatattvo guṇaḥ, sa evāśrayaḥ kāraṇaṃ ca, tasmiṃstasmin guṇe sattve rajasi tamasi ca vaiśeṣikakalpitapaṭādikāryasya ca tantvādiṣu parasparasaṃyogāpekṣeṣvasato bhavanavat prakāśapravṛttiniyamānāṃ kāryāṇāṃ sattve
pravṛttiniyamayorasatoḥ prakāśaniyamayośca rajasi pravṛttiprakāśayośca tamasyasatāṃ parasparāpekṣapravṛttiṣu sattvādiṣūtpattirbhavanamuktaṃ bhavati . prāgasantaḥ prakāśapravṛttiniyamāḥ śabdādyārambhakāla utpannā iti pratipadyasva
pṛthagbhūtatattvakāraṇāśrayābhivyakteḥ vaiśeṣikābhitatantvāśrayapaṭavat .
kiñcānyat, tairyathāsvamityādi . vaiśeṣikābhimatakāryādapyetat pāpīyo bhrāntimātratvāt . uktanyāyena te sattvādiṣu prakāśādayaḥ kāraṇeṣvasantaḥ, yathāsvam yo yaḥ svo yathāsvam, prakāśaḥ sattve nāsti
itarāpekṣa utpannaḥ, evamitarāvapīti tairakāraṇasadbhiḥ prakāśādibhirārabdhaṃ parasparāśrayaṇena vyaktaṃ pravṛttaṃ
niyataṃ ca yat kāryaṃ triguṇaṃ śabdādi tadapyalātacakravad bhrāntimātraṃ na paramārthato'stītyāpannam,
tvaduktahetusāmarthyādeva tanmayārabdhatvādasadātmakaṃ hi tat, tvayaivoktaṃ hi yacca yanmayairārabdhaṃ tadātmakaṃ taditi śabdādīnāṃ sukhādyātmakatvaṃ śabdādyārabdhānāṃ bhūtānāṃ bhūtārabdhānāṃ ca śarīrādighaṭādīnām, tasmād vayamapi tathaiva brūmaḥ--śabdādi asadātmakaṃ tanmayairārabdhatvāt kārpāsikatantvārabdhapaṭakārpāsikatvavat, yathā kārpāsikaistantubhirārabdhaḥ paṭaḥ kārpāsika ityucyate tathā śabdādyasanmayaṃ 
tanmayaprakāśādyārabdhatvāditi . tanmayatanmayaṃ ceti yadapi ca bhūtādi śarīrādi ghaṭādi sarvamasadātmakaṃ
tanmayatanmayārabdhatvāt kārpāsikapaṭakuṭerapi kārpāsikatvavaditi . tacchāstraprasiddhameva vodāharaṇaṃ
rūpādisukhādimayatvavaditi . śabdasyāsanmayatve sādhye rūpādisukhādimayatvamudāharaṇam, rūpādīnāmapi
tathaivāsanmayatvaṃ śabdādisukhādimayatvadṛṣṭāntenāpādyamiti .


athocyeta--evameva tatkāraṇatvaṃ tatra ca śabdādikāryasattvam, śuklaraktakṛṣṇatantvātmikāyā rajjoḥ kāryāyāstantukāraṇatvavat . nanvevaṃ yathāsmaduktavadvaikatvaṃ
rajastamasī api sattvameva, prakāśakāraṇatvāt, sattvasvātmavat . atha tvanmatena,
sarvavyaktavyāpi cāsatkāryatvaṃ pratiguṇaṃ prakāśādyordvayoḥ kāryātmanoḥ prāgabhūtatvāt .
bauddhavadvā asatkāryatvam, tathābhūtavastunirmūlotpattitvāt, dvitīyakṣaṇa—
ghaṭavat .

athocyeta--evameva tatkāraṇatvam, teṣāṃ sattvādīnāṃ kāraṇatvamevameva yujyate . tatra ca teṣu
sattvādiṣu kāraṇeṣu śabdādikāryasattvamevameva yujyate pratisvaṃ prakāśādikāryāṇāṃ śuklaraktakṛṣṇatantvātmikāyā rajjoḥ kāryāyāstantukāraṇatvavat, yathā pratyekaṃ śuklādiguṇāstantavastrayo'pi triguṇāmekāṃ rajjumārabhamāṇāḥ kāraṇatvaṃ nātivartante tatasteṣu sata eva traiguṇyasyāvirbhāvād rajjoḥ satkāryatvaṃ tathā sattvādikāraṇatvaṃ śabdādisatkāryatā ceti .
atrocyate --nanvevamityādi yāvat sattvasvātmavaditi . evameva iti yadetad vacanaṃ tasya dvayī
gatiḥ, yathāsmaduktavadekātmakaṃ kāraṇamanekākāraviparivṛtti puruṣavadityabhyupagamāditi taddarśayati sakāraṇam —
yathāsmaduktavadvaikatvaṃ rajastamasī api sattvameva, prakāśakāraṇatvaṃ ca tayoryathāprāgvyākhyātaṃ siddham,
ata eva tasyāṃ gatau doṣaḥ sa eva puruṣādyanyatamaikakāraṇavādābhyupagama iti . atha tvanmatena jātyantarasukhāditrayakāraṇatadātmakakāryābhyupagamena evameva ityeṣā gatiriti . itara āha--eṣā gatirastu, ko
doṣaḥ ? iti, atra doṣakutūhalaṃ ced brūmaḥ --sarvavyaktavyāpi cetyādi, tadeva hyasatkāryatvamitthaṃ
bhāvanāntareṇāpādyate, sarvavyaktaṃ śabdādi tantupaṭādi ca vyāpituṃ śīlamasya tadasatkāryatvaṃ sarvavyaktavyāpi,
kasmāddhetoḥ ? pratiguṇaṃ prakāśādyordvayoḥ kāryātmanoḥ prāgabhūtatvāt, guṇaṃ guṇaṃ prati pratiguṇaṃ sattve
dvayoḥ pravṛttiniyamayoḥ prāgabhūtatvādeva kāryātmanoḥ tathā rajasi prakāśaniyamayoḥ tamasi prakāśapravṛttyoḥ
kāryātmanorabhūtatvāt anyaguṇakāraṇakāryātmanāmanyatra vyaktipravṛttiniyatikāryāṇāmasatāmutpattervyavasthānavacanāt prakhyāpanavacanācca abhyupagatatvāt . tasmād vaiśeṣikakāryavadasatkāryatvam .
na kevalaṃ vaiśeṣikavadeva, kiṃ tarhi ? bauddhavadvā asatkāryatvam, varaṃ hi vaiśeṣikāsatkāryatulyatvaṃ
tadasatkāryatvasya kāraṇaiḥ saha kañcit kālaṃ tiṣṭhata iti tairiṣṭatvāt . idaṃ bauddhāsatkāryatulyameva te prāptam,
kutaḥ ? tathābhūtavastunirmūlotpattitvāt, tena prakāreṇa bhūtaṃ vastu śabdo rūpam ityādinā, tathābhūtavastuno nirmūlā utpattiḥ, tadbhāvāt tathābhūtavastunirmūlotpattitvāt . kimarthaṃ punarnirmūlotpattitvāditi
siddhe tathābhūtavastugrahaṇam ? dṛṣṭāntadvayenārthadvayapradarśanārtham, tadyathā --dvitīyakṣaṇaghaṭavat, yathā kṣaṇaḥ
kṣaṇāntare'nutpanna evottarasmin pūrvo nirudhyate uttaraśca tadanantaramutpadyate nirmūlaḥ nāmonnāmau tulāntayoriva

asatkāryāḥ śabdādayaḥ, kāraṇatvāt, anyaguṇātmakasukhapravṛttyādivat itarānupakṛtāvidyamānaprakāśāditrayasukhādikāraṇavat . pratyekamitarānupakṛtavidyamānaprakāśāditrayasvakāryā vā sukhādayaḥ, kāraṇatvāt, śabdādivat tantvādivadvā .
atha prakāśātmakayoreva rajastamasoḥ śabdabhāvāya vyavatiṣṭhate sattvaṃ tata
ekātmakaikakāraṇatvam, tacca neṣyate .
tato yathaiva kāraṇe kāryasya sattvād ghaṭenaiva ghaṭaḥ kriyate tadātmavyaktiprati-
  ityuktatvāt . tatsahacaritaṃ ca ghaṭādi vastu pūrvasmin niruddhe pāścātyasya pāścātyasyotpādābhyupagamād nirmūlotpattyeveti ubhayaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyaṃ cobhayam, tatsādharmyādidamapi sattvādiprakāśādikāryaṃ
śabdādi sāṅkhyamatamiti yojyam . tasmād nirmūlotpattisādharmyād bauddhāsatkāryavādatulyateti .
evaṃ prakāśādyasatkāryatve siddhe sarvavyaktāsatkāryatvasādhanam --asatkāryāḥ śabdādayaḥ kāraṇatvāt,
yad yat kāraṇaṃ tat tadasatkāryaṃ dṛṣṭam, anyaguṇātmakasukhapravṛttyādivat, anyo guṇaḥ sattvād
rajaḥ, tasyātmā sukham, tacca svayaṃ sāmyāvasthāyāmekaprakāśātmakāryamapi sad jātyantararajaskāryapravṛttyātmakamārambhāvasthāyāmiṣṭaṃ tryātmakaśabdādyātmavyavasthānavacanāt, tathā niyamātmakamapi ādigrahaṇāt . ataḥ
sukhaṃ sattvaguṇaṃ prāgasatpravṛttiniyamakāryaṃ paścāt tatkāryaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca tadvacchabdādayo'satkāryāḥ kāraṇatāṃ ca
bibhratīti, evamanyaguṇaduḥkhaprakāśaniyamavat anyaguṇamohaprakāśapravṛttivadityekaikameva dṛṣṭāntaṃ kṛtvā yojyam .
etasyārthasya sphuṭīkaraṇārthamāha --itarānupakṛtāvidyamānaprakāśāditrayasukhādikāraṇavaditi, itareṇa
rajasā tamasā cānupakṛtau prāgasantau pravṛttiniyamau paścāt tadupakārajanitau sukhe kāraṇe dṛṣṭau, ādigrahaṇādevaṃ duḥkhe prakāśaniyamāvitarānupakṛtau prāgasantau paścāt tadupakārajau tathā mohe'pīti . yadyevaṃ neṣyate
tataḥ pratyekamitarānupakṛtavidyamānaprakāśāditrayasvakāryā vā sukhādayaḥ, kāraṇatvāt, śabdādi-
vat tantvādivadveti, svaśabdādekasyaiva sattvaguṇasya trayo'pi prakāśādaya ātmīyā eva kāryāstathetarayośceti puruṣādivāda evaiṣa saṃjñāmātravipratipatteriti . evaṃ tāvadaprakāśātmakayo rajastamasoḥ śabdātmanā
vyavatiṣṭhamānena tatprakhyātinā sattvena tadātmaprakhyāpane doṣā uktāḥ .
yadi caivaṃ satkāryavādasyotkhātamūlatvaprasaṅgabhayādasatkāryavādasya pratiṣṭhitamūlatvaprasaṅgabhayācca neṣyate'yaṃ vikalpaḥ aprakāśātmakayoḥ iti tataḥ prakāśātmakayoḥ ityastu, tatrāpi ca doṣaṃ vaktukāma
idamāha --atha prakāśātmakayorityādi yāvanneṣyata iti gatārtham .
tato yathaivetyādi dṛṣṭāntameva tāvat prakriyāprasiddhamupavarṇayati . kāraṇe kāryasya sattvād
ghaṭenaiva ghaṭaḥ kriyate iti, mṛtpiṇḍaghaṭenorddhvagrīvakuṇḍalauṣṭhapṛthukukṣibudhnādighaṭaḥ kriyate prakāśyate, karoteḥ
prakāśārthatvāt, yathā pṛṣṭhaṃ kuru pādau kuru, tacca karaṇaṃ vimalīkaraṇaṃ prakāśanamityarthaḥ, kāraṇe kāryasya sata
eva prakāśanāt sarpasphaṭāṭopamukulatvavad dīrghakuṇḍalakībhāvavacca, tatra yathā sarpeṇaiva sarpaḥ kriyate tathehāpi

niyatasvasādhanakramasamāveśāt kāraṇaghaṭena kāryaghaṭo'bhivyajyate tathābhūtavyaktiśaktisthūlatāpattyā mṛda eva ghaṭatvāt tathaiva sattvena sattvameva prakāśyate śabdādiprakāśena apṛthagbhūtaprakāśāditattvamākāśādi prakāśyate śabdādipravṛttyā śabdādiniyamena
pravartyate niyamyate ca . apṛthagbhūtatattvenaiva sattvena prakāśena pravṛttisattvena anapekṣayā
ghaṭenaiva mṛdā ghaṭaḥ pṛthukukṣyādyākārāḥ kriyante'tyantabhinnenānyenānyasyākaraṇāt . kiñcānyat, tadātmavyaktipratiniyatasvasādhanakramasamāveśāt, ghaṭātmatvasya vyaktiḥ prāganupalabhyasya paścādupalabdhiḥ, sā
pratiniyatānāmātmīyānāṃ kulāladaṇḍādīnāṃ tatkramasya ca kālākhyasādhanatvāt piṇḍaśivakādibhāveṣu yathāvasthaṃ
vyāpriyamāṇānāṃ krameṇa vyāpārādityarthaḥ . taddarśayati --kāraṇaghaṭena kāryaghaṭo'bhivyajyata iti . kathaṃ
vyajyate iti cet, ucyate --tathābhūtavyaktiśaktisthūlatāpattyā, pṛthukukṣyādiprakāreṇa vyaktiśaktirasyāṃ
mṛdi śaktimatyāṃ sūkṣmāvasthānāduttarakālaṃ deśakālādyavabandhāpagamāt sthūlatāpattyā indriyagrāhyatayā nirmārjyadarpaṇasvarūpopalabdhivat karmaiva sad vastu kartṛ bhavati, mṛda eva ghaṭatvāt, mṛdeva hi ghaṭo bhavati, ghaṭamātmānamātmanā avasthāntaramātraviśiṣṭamavasthāntaramātraviśiṣṭena karoti, kartureva karmatvābhyupagamāt . kulāladaṇḍādīnāṃ tarhi sādhanatvābhāvaḥ svayameva mṛdaḥ kartṛkarmatvābhyupagamād ghaṭasyaiveti cet, na, ata eva
tatsādhanatvād vīraṇādito'karaṇādasadakaraṇādihetubhyo mṛdyeva santaṃ ghaṭaṃ kulālacakradaṇḍādayo'bhivyañjayantaḥ
kartṛkaraṇasampradānāpādānādhikaraṇādibhāvaṃ pratilabhante tadviṣayameva na vīraṇādiviṣayaṃ na tantvādiviṣayam,
tadātmagatavyaktiśaktipratiniyatasvasādhanakramasamāveśādeva tāni ca kāraṇāni parasparopajanitakāryasādhanaśaktīni ekaprabandhena pravartamānāni kārakāṇi ityucyante, nānyaviṣayāṇi . tasmāt kulālādīnāmapi
tathaiva kartṛtvādibhāvopapatteḥ ghaṭenaiva ghaṭaḥ kriyate iti sādhūktam .
evaṃ dṛṣṭāntamātmanaivātmānaṃ prakāśayati karotīti pratipādya dārṣṭāntikaṃ pratipādayati --tathaiva sattvenetyādi . yathā kāraṇe kāryasya sattvād ghaṭenaiva ghaṭaḥ kriyata ityuktaṃ tathā kāraṇe kāryasya sattvāt sattvena
sukhaprakāśādikāraṇātmanā tadātmakaṃ sattvameva prakāśyate mṛdghaṭāvasthāvat, taddarśayati --śabdādiprakāśenāpṛthagbhūtaprakāśāditattvam, kiṃ tat ? ākāśādi, rūpādyapṛthagbhūtatattvāyā mṛdo ghaṭe tadapṛthagbhūtatattvaghaṭādiprakāśavat prakāśāpṛthagbhūtena prakāśāpṛthagbhūtatattvaṃ prakāśyata ityarthaḥ, prakāśāpṛthagbhūtāveva
pravṛttiniyamāvapīti taddarśayati --śabdādipravṛttyā śabdādiniyamena, tadapyākāśādi yathā prakāśāpṛthagbhāvāt prakāśyate tathā pravartyate niyamyate ceti . tad vistareṇa paryāyaśabdānvākhyānena bhāvayati—
apṛthagbhūtatattvenetyādi, apṛthagbhūtatattvatvādeva tena sattvena prakāśena pravṛttisattveneti prakāśapravṛttyoraikyaṃ darśayati, evakāreṇāvadhāraṇārthena tataḥ pṛthagbhūtārthābhāvaṃ ca darśayati . ata eva cāha --anapekṣayā

svaśaktyā vyaktirāvirbhāvaḥ . āvirbhāvena pravṛttyā pravṛttisattvena pravṛttisattvamevānapekṣā svavyaktirāvirbhāvaḥ pravṛttiḥ . tathā niyamasattvenānapekṣeṇa svaśaktyā
āvirbhāvena svaniyatyā niyamasattvamevānapekṣā svavyaktiḥ . prakāśa eva pravṛttirniyamaśca, pravṛttirevetaradvayam, niyama evetaradvayam . ata eṣāmekapuruṣavṛttaśyāmāyatākṣapralambabāhutvavadekavastusvatattvabhūtānāmavyatirekaikavṛttitāvṛttiteti .
sattvasattvenaiva sattvasattvaṃ prakāśyate vyaktipariṇāmena vyaktībhavatītyuktaṃ
svaśaktyā, yaduktaṃ bhavati prakāśenāpṛthagbhūtatattvena sattvena ityādiparyāyaistaduktaṃ bhavati pravṛttisattvena
pravṛttyā svaśaktyā vyaktirāvirbhāvaḥ, janī prādurbhāve pā॰ dhā॰ 1149, prāduḥ prākāśye, prakāśo janma
abhivyaktirityanarthāntaram prakāśātmakayoreva rajastamasoḥ iti vacanādapṛthagbhūtaṃ tattvaṃ prakāśādīnāmarthāntaranirapekṣamiti . yathā prakāśa eva pravṛttiriti darśitaṃ tathā pravṛttireva prakāśa iti darśayati --āvirbhāvena pravṛttyā pravṛttisattvena pravṛttisattvamevānapekṣā svavyaktiḥ, svataḥpṛthagbhūtaprakāśaniyamānapekṣā
svātmābhivyaktirityarthaḥ . tatparyāyakathanam --āvirbhāvaḥ pravṛttiriti . tathā niyamasattvena anapekṣeṇetyādinā granthena prakāśapravṛttyanarthāntarabhūto niyama eva sattvaṃ rajaścetyata āha --svaśaktyāvirbhāvena
svaniyatyā, kā ca sā ? niyamasattvamevānapekṣā svavyaktiḥ pūrvavat svapravṛttiḥ svaniyama ityeko'rtha
iti prāgupapāditatvāt prakāśa eva pravṛttirniyamaśca, yasmāt prakāśamānaḥ pravartate niyataścārtha iti . evaṃ
pravṛttirevetaradvayam, yasmāt pravartamānaṃ prakāśate niyataṃ ca, niyama evetaradvayam, niyato hyarthaḥ
prakāśate pravartate ca, tasmādihāpi tadeva bhāvitamaikyamiti .
kathaṃ tarhyekameva prakāśapravṛttiniyamabhedapratyayavyapadeśabhāg bhavati ? ityatrocyate --ata eṣāmekapuruṣavṛttaśyāmāyatākṣapralambabāhutvavat, yathaikasmin puruṣe pravṛttāni tadavyatiriktāni śyāmatvamāyatākṣatvaṃ
pralambabāhutvamityetāni bhinnānīva tadbhedapratyayavyapadeśabhāñji bhavanti tathaikavastvityādinopasaṃharati, ekasya
vastunaḥ svatattvabhūtānāṃ tadabhidhānaprayojanānāṃ sattvarajastamasāṃ tatkāryāṇāṃ ca prakāśanapravṛttiniyamānāmavyatirekaikavṛttitā . iti parisamāptyarthaḥ, evaṃ tāvadetayā bhāvanayāpāditaikyānāṃ sattvādīnāṃ
sattvasvātmatvenaiva kartṛkarmatvavṛttiruktā parasparasvarūpāpādanena bhedamabhyupagamya .
idānīṃ phalābhedānnaiva bheda iti pratipādayiṣyannāha --sattvasattvenaiva sattvasattvaṃ prakāśyate, trayāṇāmapi sattvarūpatvasyāpāditatvāt sattvasattvaṃ rajaḥsattvaṃ tamaḥsattvamiti bhidyate, tasyābhedaḥ phalābhedādāpādyate'dhunā . yat tat sattvaṃ sattvameva bhavati nānyad bhavati rajastamo vā tat sattvasattvaṃ tena sattvasattvenaiva
prakāśyate vyajyate tadeva sattvasattvasyaiva bhavanaṃ vyajyate sphuṭīkriyate, pūrvavat kartṛkarmabhāvo'vasthāvaśāt .
taddarśayati --vyaktipariṇāmena, mṛtsattve yad vidyamānaṃ sattvasattvaṃ ghaṭaprakāśasattvaṃ tenaiva tad vyajyate

bhavati, sato hi bhāvaḥ sattvam . rajaḥsattvena sattvasattvam, vyaktirvyaktipravṛttipariṇatyā vyaktyaivetyuktaṃ bhavati . tamaḥsattvena sattvasattvam, vyaktirvyaktiniyamapariṇāmena vyaktyaivetyuktaṃ bhavati . evameva ca rajaḥsattvaṃ tamaḥsattvaṃ ca . evameva ca
sattvaprakāśena sattvaprakāśaḥ prakāśyate rajaḥprakāśastamaḥprakāśaśca rajaḥprakāśena
svapariṇāmena, sadeva hi sattvena pariṇamati nāsat, yathoktam --atthittaṃ atthitte pariṇamati bhagavatīsū॰
1 . 3 . 32 iti . yaduktaṃ bhavati vyaktībhavati iti taduktaṃ bhavati sattvasattvena sattvasattvaṃ prakāśyate iti .
sattvasattvam iti ca viśeṣaṇaṃ rajaḥsattvatamaḥsattvābhyām, tayorapi tvanmataprasiddhyā satyapi bhede'smaduktavadabheda evetyabhinnaphalatvādaikyamāpādyam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? yasmāt sato hi bhāvaḥ sattvam, yasmāt sadeva
sad bhavati tasmāt tadeva sattvasattvaṃ tattvaṃ tadbhāvaḥ pariṇāma ityanarthāntaram, tadbhāvaḥ pariṇāmaḥ tattvārtha॰
5 . 41 iti vacanāt . taddhi pravartamānaṃ na kiñcidapekṣata iti pravṛttiniyamānapekṣeṇa sattvasattveneti .
evaṃ rajaḥsattvena sattvasattvaṃ prakāśyata iti vartate . pūrvavad vyaktiriti prakāśaikārthyam, kimuktaṃ bhavati ?
vyaktipravṛttipariṇatyā prakāśanapravartanapariṇāmena tayaiva pravṛttyātmikayā vyaktyaivetyuktaṃ bhavatītyaikyaṃ
darśayati . evaṃ tamaḥsattvenetyādi vyaktiniyamapariṇāmena ityakṣaraviparyāsamātreṇa bhedādarthaikyāpādanaṃ
gatārthaṃ yāvad vyaktyaivetyuktaṃ bhavatīti, sattvenaiva vyaktyātmanā pravṛttena niyatenāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam,
anyathā tatsvarūpābhāvādityuktatvāt . evameva ca rajaḥsattvena sattvasattvaṃ prakāśyate, vyaktirvyaktipravṛttipariṇatyā pravṛttyaivetyuktaṃ bhavati, sato hi bhāvaḥ sattvam . tathā rajaḥsattvena rajaḥsattvaṃ prakāśyate,
vyaktipravṛttipariṇatirvyaktipravṛttipariṇatyā pravṛttyaivetyuktaṃ bhavatīti tathaiva gamanīyam . tathā rajaḥsattvena
tamaḥsattvaṃ prakāśyate, vyaktiniyatipariṇatirvyaktipravṛttipariṇatyā pravṛttyaivetyuktaṃ bhavatīti . tathā tamaḥsattvena
sattvasattvaṃ prakāśyate vyaktiniyatipariṇatyā niyamenevetiniyamenaiveti, niyato hi bhāvo vyajyate pravartate . tathā
tamaḥsattvena rajaḥsattvaṃ prakāśyate, vyaktipravṛttiniyatirniyatipravṛttipariṇatyā niyatyaivetyuktaṃ bhavati . tathā
tamaḥsattvena tamaḥsattvaṃ prakāśyate vyaktiniyatipariṇatyā niyatyaivetyuktaṃ bhavatīti tadeva bhāvitam . evameva
cetyādi, yathā sattvarajastamasāṃ navadhā vikalpā uktāstathā sattvaprakāśena sattvaprakāśaḥ prakāśyata iti
sattvaprakāśena rajaḥprakāśastamaḥprakāśaśceti trayaḥ rajaḥprakāśena sattvaprakāśo rajaḥprakāśastamaḥprakāśaśceti trayaḥ
tamaḥprakāśena sattvaprakāśo rajaḥprakāśastamaḥprakāśa iti trayo vikalpāḥ, prakāśyate pravartyate niyamyate ityanenaiva

sattvaprakāśo rajaḥprakāśastamaḥprakāśaśca tamaḥprakāśena sattvaprakāśo rajaḥprakāśastamaḥprakāśaśca prakāśyate pravartyate niyamyate iti trayo'pyarthā aikyamāpādanīyāḥ .
sarvāpyeṣā mṛdghaṭavyaktisthūlateva sattvaprakāśādiprapañcā vyaktirekaiva ekārthaviṣayeti .
tathā yaducyate--rajaḥ śabdakāryam... ... ...prakāśasthāne pravṛttiṃ kṛtvā...
...vāyum . tathā tamaḥ śabdakāryam... ... ...lambanapāṣāṇam .
atastrīṇyapyekam, apṛthagbhūtasamavasthānasvarūpabhedātmakatvāt, varaṇāditamastvavat .
granthena trayo'pyarthā aikyamāpādanīyāḥ, pratyekaṃ navasvapi yojyā ityarthaḥ . eṣa dārṣṭāntiko'pyartho vyākhyātaḥ,
sa idānīṃ dṛṣṭāntena sādharmyeṇopasaṃhriyate --sarvāpyeṣā mṛdghaṭavyaktiśaktisthūlateva yathā prāgupavarṇitā
kāraṇe kāryasya sattvād mṛdyanabhivyaktāyā ghaṭavyaktiśakteḥ sthūlatā ūrdhvagrīvādivyaktendriyagrāhyatā sā ekaiva
tathā sattvaprakāśādiprapañcā vyaktirekaiva, ekārthaviṣayā sattvamiti vā raja iti vā tama iti vā
pradhānamiti vā yathecchasi tathāstu sarvathāpyekasya kāraṇākhyasya vastunaḥ sūkṣmasya sthūlataiva vyaktiriti tadviṣayā
vyāvarṇyate . iti vicāraparisamāptyarthaḥ, yat pratijñātaṃ sattvaṃ prakāśātmakayośced rajastamasoḥ śabdabhāvāya vyavatiṣṭhate tata ekātmakaikakāraṇatvamiti tat sādhvabhyadhāmeti .
tathā yaducyate rajaḥ śabdakāryamityādigranthasyāpi samānadauṣṭyāpādanārtho'tideśaḥ bhāṣye eva
sulikhitātideśopāyatvād na vivriyate . viśeṣaṇavinyāsopāyaśca sulikhita eva prakāśasthāne pravṛttiṃ
kṛtvetyādi sarvamanugantavyaṃ yāvad vāyumiti . tathā tamaḥ śabdakāryamityādi tathaivānugantavyaṃ yāvad
lambanapāṣāṇamiti . evaṃ samāpitaprasaṅga idānīṃ sādhanamāha --atastrīṇyapyekamityādi yāvad
varaṇāditamastvavaditi . sattvarajastamāṃsi trīṇyapi prakāśapravṛttiniyamātmakāni jātyantarābhimatānyekaṃ
vastutaḥ tritvasyātantratvād bhinnamapyabhinnamiti pakṣārthaḥ . paramatāpekṣayā trayāṇāmaikyāsiddheḥ sādhyam .
trīṇyapi ca parasya siddhāni dharmitvena asmākaṃ ca vastuśaktitvabhedenetītthaṃ sādhyate, anyathā trīṇī caikaṃ ca
iti virudvaṃ syāt . apṛthagbhūtasamavasthānasvarūpabhedātmakatvāt, bhūtaṃ bhavanaṃ bhāvo bhūtiriti bhāve
niṣṭhāvidhānādapṛthagbhavanamasya saṅgatyā ekībhāvenāvasthānasya tadidamapṛthagbhūtasamavasthānam, tadeva svarūpaṃ
bhedāścātmā yeṣāṃ tāni sattvādīni apṛthagbhūtasamavasthānasvarūpabhedātmakāni, tadbhāvāt . kṣīrodakavad

deśakālābhedena sahabhavane'pi saṅgatyaikyāvasthānasvarūpatvaviśeṣaṇāt kvacit kadācit pṛthagbhavanābhāvādityuktaṃ
bhavati . tatsvarūpabhedātmakatvaṃ ca vādiprativādiprasiddham . dṛṣṭāntaḥ --varaṇāditamastvavat, yathā
varaṇasadanāpadhvaṃsanabaibhatsyadainyagauravāṇāṃ parasparato bhinnānāṃ chādanastambhanaviśaraṇārocanaviṣādādhogamanadharmāṇāṃ bhedātmakatve satyapi mohātmakatamaḥsvārūpyānatikrameṇaikyamapṛthagbhavanasamavasthānasvarūpabhedātmakatvāt
tathāsmādeva hetoḥ sattvādīnyekamiti .

nanūktamanvayavīta eva, atrāha--kathaṃ punaretadupalamyate sukhaḥdukhamohā jātyantarāṇi iti, atrocyate--sukhaṃ

calamaprakāśakaṃ pravṛttiśīlaṃ dṛṣṭam, duḥkhāśca karaṇapravṛttayaḥ, tasmāt prakāśaniyamābhyāmanyāḥ . tathā moho
gururaprakāśako dṛṣṭaḥ, mūḍhāśca karaṇaniyamāḥ, tasmāt prakāśapravṛttibhyāmanya iti . etenādhyātmikānāṃ
kāryakāraṇātmakānāmityādinottareṇa granthena tairyagyonādisaṃsāragatādhyātmikakāryakāraṇātmakabhedānāṃ sukha

apṛthagbhavanasamavasthāna... ...etenādhyātmikānāṃ kāryakāraṇātmakānāṃ bhedānām... ...moho gururityubhābhyāmanyaḥ . nanu lakṣaṇabhedāhetutvam, apṛthagbhūtasamavasthānasvarūpalakṣaṇabhedātmakatvāt, varaṇādibhinnalakṣaṇatamastvavat .
duḥkhamohamayatvātideśaḥ kāryakāraṇātmakatvāt teṣāmapīti . asya granthasyārthavyākhyānaṃ sādhanaireva kriyate—
sattvarajastamāṃsi jātyantarāṇi, lakṣaṇabhedāt, cetanaśarīravat . lakṣaṇabhedaḥ sattvaṃ laghvapravṛttiśīlaṃ dṛṣṭamityādi tatsādhanairbhāṣye sulikhitamiti na vivṛṇmahe . tathā rajastamasoranyatvāpādanasādhanānyanugantavyāni
yāvad gururityubhābhyāmanya iti .
ācārya uttaramāha --nanu lakṣaṇabhedāhetutvamityādi yāvat tamastvavat . lakṣaṇabhedahetūnāṃ laghutvādīnāmapyahetutvam, etenaiva pratyuktatvāt . katham ? laghutvaprakāśāpravṛttiśīlatvānyapyekam, apṛthagbhūtasamavasthānasvarūpalakṣaṇabhedātmakatvād varaṇādibhinnalakṣaṇatamastvavat, tathaiva vyākhyeyaṃ lakṣaṇaśabdādhikyena, vigrahastu tatsvarūpameva lakṣaṇam, sa eva bhedo yasyeti . tasmāt tādṛksvarūpalakṣaṇabhedātmakatvamapyahetuḥ . ato nānyatvaṃ sattvādīnāmiti .


nāpṛthagbhūtatā . sukhaṃ mohād guroranyat, laghutvāt, lohapiṇḍādiva arkatūlaḥ
... ... .... punaśca sukhatvaduḥkhatvamohatvādayo'pyanyatvahetavaḥ syuḥ . śarīrendriyagata
ātmaikadeśastadekadeśabhūtābhyāṃ rajastamobhyāmanyaḥ, sukhatvāt, loṣṭavat . evaṃ
duḥkhamohau .
sarve'pyete hetavo'prasiddhasādhyadharmasamanvayavyāvṛttayaḥ svata evānumānanirā-

itara āha --nāpṛthagbhūtatetyādi hetvasiddhipratipādanasādhanāni lokaprasiddhadṛṣṭāntāni yāvat pradīpādiva ghaṭa iti . loṣṭadṛṣṭānto vakṣyate sukhaduḥkhamohaiḥ puruṣabhogyairanyonyato'nyairupeta ityatideśasādhanoktikāla uttaratra . apṛthagbhūtasamavasthānasvarūpamasiddham, tat kathamiti cet, sādhanairevocyate --sukhaṃ
mohād guroranyadityādi subodhatvānna vyākhyeyaṃ parasparānyatvasādhanakadambakaṃ yathābhāṣyalikhitamanugantavyam .
punaścetyādi, etasmādanye sādhanaprapañcāt sukhatvāt duḥkhatvād mohatvādityādayo'pyanyatvahetavaḥ
syuḥ, ādigrahaṇāt prasādādayo'pīti . tatprayogadigupapradarśanārthamāha --śarīrendriyagata ātmaikadeśastadekadeśabhūtābhyāṃ rajastamobhyāmanyaḥ, kāryabhūtasya śarīrasya kāraṇabhūtānāṃ cendriyāṇāmādhyātmikānāmekadeśastadātmabhūtatvaṃ gatastadātmabhūtābhyāṃ rajastamobhyāmanyaḥ, sukhatvāt, loṣṭavat, yathā loṣṭo
bhogyo hi puruṣasya bhokturupayogārthapravṛtteḥ kapotonnayanārthakṣepaṇādānādiṣu sukhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃdṛṣṭaṃ ṣṭaṃḥ ? calanapīḍanādiṣu duḥkhaṃ
loṣṭo nu kapoto nu ityādisaṃśayaviparyayādiṣu mohaḥ . tasmāt sukhaṃ duḥkhamohābhyāmanyad loṣṭavat, loṣṭa
iva loṣṭavat . evaṃ duḥkhamohāvityatideśaḥ, duḥkhaṃ śarīrendriyagataṃ tadātmaikadeśabhūtābhyāṃ sattvatamobhyāmanyad
duḥkhatvālloṣṭavat, mohaḥ sattvarajobhyāmanyo mohatvālloṣṭavaditi .
atra brūmaḥ --sarve'pyeta ityādi . sarvagrahaṇād laghutvādayo mohatvaparyantāstvayoktā anyatvahetavo'prasiddhasādhyadharmasamanvayavyāvṛttayaḥ . ete hetavo'siddhā evāvadhāraṇe iti vakṣyati, siddhatve'pi
aprasiddhasādhyadharmasamanvayāḥ pṛthagbhūtasukhādyātmakasattvādilaghvāditūlaloṣṭādivastvabhāvāt, sarvasya traiguṇyāvyatirekācca . na caiṣāṃ vipakṣād vyāvṛttirasti, tūlaloṣṭādereva vipakṣatvena vyavasthānāt . viviktaikasukhātmakāddhi vastuno'nyad viviktaduḥkhādyātmakaṃ syād vipakṣaḥ, tattu nāsti sarvasya triguṇaikātmakatvāt, na
puruṣo'sattvāt tasyāpi sukhādanyatvāditi . tataśca tūlaloṣṭāderapi vipakṣatvāt tataśca laghutvādihetūnāmavyāvṛtteraprasiddhasādhyadharmavyāvṛttayaste hetava iti viruddhatvaṃ hetudoṣaḥ . sādhyasādhanobhayānanvayo dharmyasiddhiśca
sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ, sādhyāvyāvṛttādidoṣaśca vaidharmyadṛṣṭānta iti darśayati .


kṛtasvapakṣapratyakṣīkaraṇārthāśca . anavadhṛtalaghvādidharmatāyāmitarātmakamapīti atathātaiva . asajātīyalakṣaṇavyāvṛttārthaviṣayatāyāmasiddhaṃ pakṣadharmatvamasmān prati
bhavantaṃ ca . tadyathā--

ṇicchayato savvalahuṃ savvaguruṃ vā ṇa vijja+e davvaṃ .
vavahārato tu jujjati bāyarakhaṃdhesu ṇa itaresu ॥ bṛhatkalpa॰ 65


kiñcānyat, svata evānumānanirākṛtasvapakṣapratyakṣīkaraṇārthāśca ete hetavaḥ iti vartate,
asti pradhānaṃ bhedānāmanvayadarśanāt iti prakramya sukhaduḥkhamohānvitā ādhyātmikā bāhyāśca śabdādayaḥ
kāryātmakāstrayāṇāmekakāryabhāvāt, tadārabdhāścākāśavāyvanalāmbhobhūmayo bhūtākhyāstairyagyonamānuṣadaivāni śarīrāṇīndriyāṇi ca tadātmakānidarthāni trayāṇāmekakāryabhāvāt sukhādyanvitānyeva candanaśakalādivat
  ityevamādyanumānasiddhaṃ traiguṇyam anyat sukhaṃ duḥkhamohābhyāṃ laghveva ca ityevamādipakṣaṃ
nirākaroti tasya svapakṣasyānumānanirākṛtasyānyāviditasya sarvalokāpratyakṣasya sataḥ pratyakṣīkaraṇārthā ete
hetavaḥ saṃvṛttā itītthamanumānaviruddhapratijñādoṣodbhāvanavakroktireṣā .
kiñcānyāt, anavadhṛtetyādi yāvadatathātaiva . laghutvāt ityādayo hetavaḥ kimavadhāritārthā
utānavadhāritārthāḥ ? iti sampradhāryametat, laghveva sukhaṃ na guru na calaṃ vā, tathānyeṣāmapi calatvādīnāṃ
calameva gurveva pravṛttiśīlameveti . tatrānavadhāritalaghvādidharmatāyāṃ satyāmitarātmakamapīti laghucalagurvāditryātmakatayaiva pakṣadharmatā syādeṣāṃ tathā sati ityatathātaiva ananyataivetyarthaḥ, itiśabdahetvarthatvāt
tryātmakaikatvādityarthaḥ . asajātīyetyādi yāvadasmān prati bhavantaṃ ceti . athāvadhāritārthā ete laghvādihetavo gurvādyasajātīyalakṣaṇavyāvṛttārthaviṣayāstatasteṣāmasajātīyalakṣaṇavyāvṛttārthaviṣayatāyāṃ viśeṣato'pakṣadharmataiva, mūlatastatrāsmān prati tāvadapakṣadharmatvam . tadyathā--ṇicchayato savvalahuṃti gāthā,

atyantagurutāyāmetadeva patet, saṃyogabhāve'pi patanapratibandhyaviṣahyagurutvāt, tantupratibandhānivāryapātopalavat . yogino'pi ca sutarāṃ patanameva syāt,
śilābaddhaśilāvat . atyantalaghutāyāṃ na kadācidapi patanaṃ syāt . kanyānudaravattu
vyavahāro'yamapekṣākṛto bādaraskandhaviṣayaḥ . evamevāpekṣikalohapiṇḍakārkatūlagurutvalaghutve'navasthitaikatve .
niṣkṛṣya avadhārya cayataḥ jñānataḥ paramārthanayato vā sarvathā laghu sarvaṃ vā laghu na vidyate tathā sarvaguru
dravyam, paramāṇudvipradeśādyasaṅkhyeyāntānāṃ keṣāñcidanantapradeśānāṃ ca skandhānāṃ śeṣadravyāṇāṃ cāgurulaghutvāt, tataḥ paramanantānantapradeśānāṃ bādarāṇāmāpekṣikalaghugurupariṇāmitvāt, vyavahāranayena tu yujyate
laghutvaṃ gurutvaṃ vā anyonyasmāt laghurgururveti . vātaṃ rātīti vātarā badarapramāṇā bādarā vā skandhāḥ sthūlā
ityarthaḥ . ṇa itaresu, netaresu, prāguktaparamāṇvādiṣu sūkṣmeṣvagurulaghutvamevetyarthaḥ .
atyantagurutāyāmityādi nirapekṣaikāntagurutāyāmetadeva patet patanakriyameva syāt na tiṣṭhed
norddhvaṃ gacched gurutvāt, dṛṣṭānto vakṣyamāṇaḥ . syānmatam--patedeva guru yadi pratibandhī na syāt, asti
tu saṃyogaḥ pratibandhī patanasya phalasyeva vṛntamiti, ato viśeṣayāmaḥ --saṃyogabhāve'pi patanapratibandhyaviṣahyagurutvāditi, pratibandhinā yad viṣahyaṃ na bhavati guru tat patedeva, sa cāsya nāsti pratibandhī
tvayaikāntagurutvābhyupagamāt . tantupratibandhānivāryapātopalavat, ekena tantunā pratibandhinā satyapi
saṃyogabhāve tadaviṣahyagurutvāt patatyeva yathopalastathaitat patedeva sukhaṃ laghutvaśūnyagurutvāditi . yogino'pi
cetyādi, yo'pi cāsya yogī pratibandhakastasyāpi ca yoginaḥ pratibandhino gurutvāt tatpatanopacayahetutvāt
sutarāṃ patanameva syāt patedeva tenāpi hi saha śilābaddhaśilāvaditi pātahetutvaṃ draḍhayati . evaṃ
tāvadatyantagurutve patanameva prasaktam . athavā mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityatyantalaghutvamiṣyate tato'tyantalaghutāyāṃ
na kadācidapi patanaṃ syāt, pātākhyo bhāva eva na syāt tasyotpattikāraṇābhāvāt, tacca kāraṇaṃ gurutvaṃ
patanasya, tadabhāvāt khapuṣpavat na syāt . syānmatam--dṛṣṭaviruddhamucyate gurulaghutvadarśanāt arkatūlo
laghurgururlohapiṇḍaḥ iti dṛṣṭatvāditi . eṣa na doṣaḥ, yasmāt vavahārato tu jujjati ityuktatvādityata āha —
kanyānudaravattu vyavahāro'yamapekṣākṛto bādaraskandhaviṣaya iti, yathā anudarā kanyā ityanyāsāmudaravatīnāmudareṇa sadṛśamudaramasyā nāstītyudaravatyeva anudarā ityucyate vyavahāratastathā bādaraskandheṣu
laghugurutve . yadapi ca lohapiṇḍārkatūlodāharaṇaṃ tadapi tattulyāpekṣikalaghugurutve eva sādhayatītyata āha —
evamevāpekṣiketyādi yāvadanavasthitaikatve . alpavācini kani lohapiṇḍakaḥ palamātrapramāṇo'rkatūla

atha mamātra kim ? dravyaṃ caitadevaṃ laghugurutvāpekṣayā tadeva dṛṣṭam, na guṇāḥ .
sattvādayo guṇāstvime laghutvādilakṣaṇā mayocyante, dravyatā teṣāṃ sandrāve ekatvāpattau bhavati .
ā adyāpi yadi guṇasandrāvo dravyamiṣyate tatastavāpyetaddravyameva, kuto'syāsandrāvaḥ ? sattvādayo guṇā laghutvādilakṣaṇāstatsandrutilakṣaṇaṃ dravyameva, śabdādibhāvena vyavasthānāt, śabdādisvātmavat .
anāpannatadrūpasya asandrutasya śabdādibhāvāpattikālo vyavasthānaśabdenocyata
bhārāllaghīyān palaśatikā tulā, viṃśatistulā bhāraḥ   iti paribhāṣitatvāt . ayaspiṇḍo
gururapi laghurarkatūlo laghurapi gururdṛṣṭa ityanavasthitaikagurutvalaghutvatattve gurulaghutve, āpekṣikatvādasmān
prati na gurutvalaghutve parasparato'nye, tato nāyaspiṇḍārkatūladṛṣṭānto'sti .
itara āha --atha mamātra kimityādi yāvadekatvāpattau bhavatīti . yadi yuṣmatsiddhāntenānavasthitatattve laghugurutve yujyete tato yuktamuktam--asmān pratyasiddhaṃ laghureva iti . tato mamātra kim ?
yat punaretaduktaṃ bhavantaṃ ca pratyasiddham iti tadayuktamuktam . yadapi ca bhavatsiddhāntenoktaṃ tadapi nopapadyate, yasmād dravyaṃ caitadevaṃ laghugurutvāpekṣayā tadeva dṛṣṭamiti na gurulaghvādayo guṇāḥ sattvarajastamāṃsi
ca, laghvādiprakāśādyātmakā guṇāstvime tallakṣaṇā mayocyante, teṣāṃ guṇānāṃ sandrāve saṅgame, tadarthavyaktiḥ
ekatvāpattāviti, tatraitasmin guṇaikagamane dravyatā bhavati guṇasandrāvo dravyam pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 5 . 1 . 119
iti lakṣaṇāt, te ca guṇāḥ parasparato'nye, tasmānnāsiddhamityabhiprāyaḥ .
ācārya āha --ā adyāpītyādi yāvacchabdādisvātmavaditi . nanvetatpratipādanameva vartate
ananyatvaṃ guṇānām, tasmādekaikakāraṇam . yadi bhavatā guṇasandrāvo dravyamiṣyate tatastavā'pyetad
dravyameva, na guṇāḥ pṛthak, sandrutānāmevāvasthānāt kuto'syāsandrāvaḥ ? na pradhānāvasthāyāṃ nāpi
vyaktāvasthāyāmasandrāvaḥ, yato'syāsandrāvādadravyatvaṃ syāt . tasmād dravyameva, na pṛthag laghvādayo guṇā
iti . tatrāpi ca pratijñāyate --sattvādayo guṇā laghutvādilakṣaṇāḥ tatsandrutilakṣaṇaṃ dravyameva,
śabdādibhāvena vyavasthānāt, yo yaḥ śabdādibhāvena vyavatiṣṭhate sa so'rtho laghvādilakṣaṇaguṇasandruti
dravyameva, śabdādisvātmavat, yathā śabdādisvātmānaḥ sattvādiguṇasandrutilakṣaṇaṃ dravyameva śabdādibhāvena vyavasthānāt tathā laghugurutvādilakṣaṇāḥ sattvādaya iti .
anāpannatadrūpetyādi yāvaducyata iti cediti . śabdādirūpamanāpannasya sattvasyāsandrutasya
guṇāntarāsaṅgatasya tadanātmakasya svenaiva rūpeṇa sthitasya prāgārambhādārabhamāṇasya ca yaḥ śabdādibhāvāpattikālo yāvadaniṣpannaśabdāditvakāla ityarthaḥ, sā hyavasthā sattvaṃ śabdakāryaṃ prakhyāya śabdātmanā vyava

iti cet, na, pūrvatulyatvāt nāntareṇa pravṛttyādyekatvagatiṃ vyavasthāpatteḥ .
ato yathāhetvaikāntikatvatprayuktalakṣaṇavailakṣaṇyaviśeṣaṇapakṣaviracanayā ta
evānyatvahetavo viparyasanīyāḥ--sukhaṃ mohād gurorananyat, laghutvāt, lohapiṇḍavadarkatūlavat śabdabhāvavyavatiṣṭhamānasukhādivadvā . tathā duḥkhāt pravṛttiśīlādananyat, pravṛttiśīlatvātapravṛttiśīlatvāt, vāyuvadākāśavadityādi . muktvāpi vā lakṣaṇabhedavaila-
tiṣṭhamānam iti vyavasthānaśabdenocyate, anyathā vyavasthitameva śabdādibhāvena syāt sattvamiti .
etacca na, pūrvatulyatvāt, yathā prāguktaṃ laghvādilakṣaṇasattvādyaikyāpattirdravyam, tacca kadācit sattvādipṛthagavasthānābhāvāt tatsandrutilakṣaṇamevoktam, tathehāpi na sa kaścit kālo'sti yaḥ pravṛttiniyamavirahitaprakāśamātrāvasthānopalakṣito yadi pradhānāvasthāyāṃ yadi vyaktāvasthāyāmiti, ata āha --nāntareṇa
pravṛttyādyekatvagatiṃ vyavasthāpatteriti . ādigrahaṇānniyamo gṛhyate, pravṛttiniyamāvantareṇa na vyavasthāpattirasti, ato hetornāntareṇa pravṛttyādyekatvagatiṃ vyavasthāpatteḥ pūrveṇa tulyatvam, iti nāsti
sattvādipṛthaktvaṃ tavāpīti .
ato yathāhetvaikāntiketyādi yāvad viparyasanīyāḥ . etasmādeva sattvādyekatvād yo yo
heturyathāhetu sukhaṃ mohād guroranyad laghutvāt ityādi tvatprayuktaḥ sa sa heturviśeṣeṇāsmatpakṣaṃ sādhayannaikāntiko bhavati . taṃ prati yathaikāntiko bhavati tathocyate --sukhaṃ mohād gurorananyallaghutvāt, yad
yallaghu tat tad gurorananyat, lohapiṇḍavadarkatūlavat, yathā prāgvarṇitamāpekṣikamarkatūlagurutvaṃ
lohapiṇḍalaghutvaṃ ceti tad dvayaṃ sahitaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ . śabdabhāvavyavatiṣṭhamānasukhādivadveti laukikārthātikrame'pi tvanmatenaiva dṛṣṭāntāntaramiti . tathā duḥkhāt pravṛttiśīlādananyat, sukhamiti vartate .
kutaḥ ? apravṛttiśīlatvād vāyuvadākāśavaditi pṛthaktvābhāvād darśayati, yathā vāyurākāśaṃ vā
sukhātmakaṃ duḥkhāt pravṛttiśīlādananyat tathehāpītyādigrahaṇād duḥkhaṃ sukhādananyadapravṛttiśīlāt,
pravṛttiśīlatvāt, yadyat pravṛttiśīlaṃ tat tadapravṛttiśīlādananyad vāyvākāśavat . tathā sukhaṃ duḥkhamohābhyāmaprakāśakābhyāmananyat, prakāśakatvāt, ghaṭapradīpādisukhavat . tathā duḥkhaṃ mohādananyadacalāt,
calatvāt, ghaṭaparvatādiduḥkhavat; tathā sukhāt prakāśakādananyat, aprakāśakatvāt, pradīpaghaṭādiduḥkhavat . tathā mohaḥ sukhaduḥkhābhyāmagurubhyāmananyaḥ, gurutvāt, pṛthivyagnyādigurutvavat . evaṃ ca sukhatvād
duḥkhatvād mohatvāt prasādādikāryatvādityādayo'pyananyatvahetava eva . pratyekamitaraguṇasvarūpānanyatvaṃ pratijñāya tattadrūpavinivṛttihetuto yat kiñcid vastūdāhṛtya sādhyam, sarvasya loṣṭāderlaghuprakāśetarādiparasparāpṛthagbhūtaguṇātmakatvāt . tadyathā--śarīrendriyagata ātmaikadeśastadekadeśabhūtābhyāṃ rajastamobhyāmananyaḥ sukhatvā

lloṣṭavat, sattvarajobhyāmananyo mohatvālloṣṭavat . tathā śarīrendriyagata ātmaikadeśastadekadeśabhūtābhyāṃ
rajastamobhyāmananyaḥ prasādakāryatvālloṣṭavat, evaṃ lāghavaprasavādibhyaḥ . tathā sattvatamobhyāmananyaḥ śoṣatvālloṣṭavat . evaṃ tāpādibhyaḥ . tathā sattvarajobhyāmananyo varaṇatvāt, evaṃ sadanādibhya iti . evaṃ tāvad
yathāhetvaikāntikatvaṃ prati ta evānyatvahetavaḥ ananyatvahetavaḥ ityuktāstvatprayuktalakṣaṇavailakṣaṇyaviśeṣaṇapakṣa-
viracanayā laghvādaya eva .
athavā muktvāpi vā . lakṣaṇabhedahetūnāṃ sukhaṃ mohād guroranyallaghutvād mahālohapiṇḍārkatūlavat
ityādiviśeṣaṇamantareṇa bhedo na śakyaḥ sādhayitumiti tadracanākusṛtiryathā tvayā kriyate tathaiva mayā kṛtā,
kintu tāṃ muktvāpi lakṣaṇabhedavailakṣaṇyaviśeṣaṇapakṣaviracanāṃ sattvādibhedalakṣaṇābhimatebhya eva tvaduktebhyo laghvādihetubhyo'bhedasiddhiḥ śakyā āpādayituṃ sphuṭenaiva nyāyādhvanā bhrāntijananena vinetyarthaḥ .
tadyathā --sukhaṃ mohādananyat, apuruṣatve'calatvāt, mohasvātmavat,  apuruṣatvaviśeṣitaḥ
acalatvāt iti hetuḥ puruṣādacalād vyāvartyate mā bhūdanaikāntika iti . duḥkhādananyat sukhamiti
vartate, aniyamaśīlatvāt, atrāpi  apuruṣatvaviśeṣaṇaṃ draṣṭavyamadhikārāt, duḥkhasvātmavaditi .
tathā duḥkhaṃ sukhādityādi sādhanacatuṣṭayaṃ sukhādananyatvasādhanadvayavadapuruṣatvaviśiṣṭaṃ duḥkhamohayoḥ saṃyoganiṣpannamiti sādhanaṣaṭkaṃ gatārthaṃ yāvad duḥkhasvātmavaditi .
itara āha --nanvevaṃ viruddhāvyabhicārivadubhayāniścayaḥ . yathoktam --yathoktalakṣaṇayordvayorviruddhayornityānityasādhakayorekatra sannipatitayorhetvorekasmin dharmiṇi śabde parasparanivāritavyāptyoḥ śrāvaṇakṛtakatvayoḥ śabdatvaghaṭādidṛṣṭāntayorubhayatra saṃśayo bhavati   iti, tatheha
āvābhyāmuktairanyatvānanyatvahetubhirubhayāniścayo'stu, mā bhūt tvatproktānāmevaikāntikatvamiti .
atrocyate --na, uktatvāt, naiṣa ubhayāniścayo yujyate, asmābhiḥ bhinnātmakatāyāṃ tu ityādi
prakramya sukhaṃ duḥkhādananyat anātmatve satyavaraṇādyātmakatvāt duḥkhasvātmavadityādibhiraikāntikairhetubhirananyatvasya likhitatvāt . athavā noktatvāditi tvatprayuktānāmanyatvahetūnāṃ laghutvādīnāmuktadoṣatvāt sarve'

guṇeṣu sandrāvasya . viruddhāvyabhicāriṇi coktam--pratyakṣāgamabalīyastvāt tata eva
niścayo'nviṣyatenveṣyate pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ iti . balīyastvaṃ cāsmaddhetūnāmādyahetubhāvanāt .
pyete'prasiddhasādhyadharmasamanvayavyāvṛttayaḥ, anumānanirākṛtapakṣāḥ, anavadhāraṇe viparyayahetavaḥ, avadhāraṇe
cāpakṣadharmā eveti . tasmādanaikāntikāḥ . teṣāṃ caikāntikā asmaduktā nivartakā eveti na
tulyamāvayoḥ .
itaścātulyamāvayoḥ --bhāvitatvācca guṇeṣu sadā sandrāvasya, bahudhā bhāvitaṃ hi sadā sattvādayo
guṇāḥ sandrutā eva pradhānamahadahaṅkārādisarvāvasthāsu na jātu pṛthagbhūtasamavasthāśceti . kiñcānyat, viruddhāvyabhicāriṇi coktam, viruddhāvyabhicāriṇyapi na parasparanivāritavyāptitvamātrāt saṃśaya eva, kiṃ tarhi ?
pratyakṣāgamabalīyastvāt tata eva niścayo'nviṣyatenveṣyate iti hyuktam, tayorviruddhāvyabhicāriṇoḥ pakṣadharmayoryaḥ pratyakṣīkṛtārthenāgamena balīyān pratyakṣasaṃvādinā pratyakṣeṇāgamena ca janitabalādvā pratyakṣeṇaivāgamenaiva
vā yathāprasiddhi yo balīyāṃstata eva niścayo'nviṣyatanveṣyate ityādivyākhyāvikalpeṣu pratyakṣāgamena ghaṭādiṣu
prasiddhasādhyānityatvānvayasya kṛtakatvahetorbalīyastvāt tato'nitya iti niścayaḥ syāt, na tu śrāvaṇatvasya śabdatve
pratyakṣīkartuṃ śakyo'nvayaḥ śabdatvasyāprasiddhatvāditi, tadvat kimiha sādharmyamiti cet, ucyate --balīyastvaṃ

mā maṃsthāstvadīyā hetavo balīyāṃsaḥ, asmatpakṣasādhanatvāyeto viparivartayituṃ
śakyatvāt . tadyathā--sukhādanyad duḥkham, prasādādyanātmakatvāt, puruṣavat .
mohaśca duḥkhādanyaḥ, tata eva, tadvat . mohādanye sukhaduḥkhe, varaṇādyanātmakatvāt,
puruṣavat .
kiṃ tvānmātrādeva viparivartanam ? trailakṣaṇyāt ? trailakṣaṇyāccet, ādilakṣaṇa-
cāsmaddhetūnāmādyahetubhāvanāt, bhinnātmakatāyāṃ tu ityādi prakramya anātmatve sati avaraṇādyātmakatvādityādibhirādyahetubhiḥ pratyakṣāgamabalīyastvamāpāditam . tasmānna samaṃ nāviti .
itara āha --mā maṃsthāstvadīyā hetavo balīyāṃsaḥ avaraṇādyātmakatvādayaḥ iti . tadabalatvaṃ
ca asmatpakṣasādhanatvāyeto viparivartayituṃ śakyatvāt . tadyathā--pūrvahetavastāvadabalāḥ, yataḥ śakyante
ta ito'pi sutarāṃ puruṣanivṛttyarthamanātmatvaviśeṣaṇādṛte'pi viparivartayitum . tadyathā--sukhādanyad duḥkhaṃ
prasādādyanātmakatvāt puruṣavat, asamarthasamāsenāgamakenāpyarthaṃ gṛhītvā nañivoktyanusāreṇoktam .
mohaśca duḥkhādanyaḥ, tata eva, tadvaditi . caśabdād duḥkhādanyau sukhamohau śoṣādyanātmakatvāt
puruṣavat, tathaiva vyākhyā, dve sādhane samasyokte mohādanye sukhaduḥkhe varaṇādyanātmakatvāt puruṣavaditi tathaiveti . atrocyate --kiṃ tvānmātrādeva viparivartanam ? trailakṣaṇyāt ? iti praśnaḥ . pratāraṇārthabhāvavācipratyayasahitapañcamyantaśabdaprayogamātrāt pakṣadharmasādṛśyāt trailakṣaṇyaśūnyānna parivartanamityabhiprāyaḥ .
syānmatam--na tvānmātrāt, kiṃ tarhi ? trailakṣaṇyāccedevaṃ cenmanyase, tadayuktam; yasmādādilakṣaṇameva
nāsti, iha pakṣadharmatvameva tāvannāsti yadādhāreṇa śeṣadvayam . kathaṃ pakṣadharmo nāstīti cet, yasmād na

meva nāsti, na hyanātmanāṃ nāma dharmaḥ kaścidasti, na duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ nānyat .
nanvanyapadārthaviṣayatvād bahuvrīheḥ nāsti prasādādyātmā varaṇādyātmā vā sa
ko'pyanyaḥ syāt saddharmavān . evamapi yathā sthūlaśirā rāhuḥ ityatra asata ākhyā
rāhoḥ śirovyatiriktasya . asadākhyayā vyapadeśivadbhāvaṃ kṛtvā vyavahāro dṛṣṭastathedamapi syāt . tadanabhyupagame dharmadharmisvarūpavirodhau . dharmisvarūpavirodhastāvat—
ātmano'nanyadeva duḥkham, prasādādyanātmakatvāt, ātmasvatattvavat, anyathā sukhānyatvaprasādādyanātmakatvānupapatteḥ . dharmasvarūpavirodho'pi caivameva . tataśca prakṛti-
hyanātmanāṃ nāma dharmaḥ kaścidasti, yadi prasādādyātmā na bhavatītyanātmakaṃ duḥkhamucyate, atha ātmaiva
nāstītyanātmakamityucyate, dvidhāpyasiddhaṃ duḥkhasyānātmakatvaṃ dharmyasiddhyāpatteḥ . kathamiti cet, ucyate —
na duḥkhaṃ na sukhaṃ nānyad mohaḥ puruṣo vā, tvatparikalpitaṃ duḥkhaṃ prasādādyanātmakatvāt khapuṣpavat
syāditi dharmyabhāvādapakṣadharmatvam .
itara āha --nanvanyapadārthetyādi yāvat saddharmavān . nanu bahuvrīheranyapadārthaviṣayatvāt tatsūcanasamāsāntakappratyayāntatvādanātmakaśruteḥ nāsti prasādādyātmā varaṇādyātmā vā citragudevadattavat sa
ko'pi varaṇādibhyaḥ prasādādibhyaścānyaḥ sanneva, nāsaddharmavān dharmī pakṣo bhavitumarhatīti .
atrocyate--naitadupapadyate, bahuvrīherapyanyapadārthaviṣayatvānaikāntyāt, evamapītyādi yāvaddharmadharmisvarūpavirodhāviti . sthūlaṃ śiro'sya sthūlaśirā rāhuḥ, kapo'tantratvād bahuvrīhereva tantratvāt, tasya
cānyapadārthatvavyabhicāraṃ darśayati tadguṇasaṃvijñānapakṣāśrayaṇena, bhavati bahuvrīhau tadguṇasaṃvijñānamapi pā॰ ma॰
bhā॰ 2 . 1 . 662 . 1 . 69, 2 . 2 . 24 iti vacanāt, na hi sthūlaśirolakṣitastadvyatirikto rāhurasti citragavaviśiṣṭadevadattavat, tadeva hi sthūlaṃ śiro rāhuḥ, tadvadasata ākhyā rāhoḥ śirovyatiriktasya . ākhyā vyapadeśaḥ
sthūlena śirasā vyapadeśena citrābhiriva vyapadeśino devadattasya vyatiriktasya, tadvadavyatiriktasyāpi
rāhostayākhyayā vyapadeśivadbhāvaṃ kṛtvā vyavahāro dṛṣṭo'sato'pi tathedamapi syāt . tasya vyapadeśivadbhāvavyavahārasyānabhyupagame uktopapattyā dṛṣṭamimasadākhyayā vyapadeśivadbhāvavyavahāramanabhyupagacchataste dharmadharmisvarūpavirodhau doṣau bhavataḥ . dharmisvarūpavirodhastāvadātmano'nanyadeva duḥkhaṃ puruṣādityarthaḥ . prasādādyanātmakatvāt, bahuvrīhisāmarthyāt prasādādyātmano'nyatvādityarthaḥ . ātmasvatattvavat, puruṣasvātmavadityarthaḥ . puruṣatvāpattiśca duḥkhasya dharmisvarūpavaiparītyam, ato dharmisvarūpavirodhaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? anyathā
sukhānyatvaprasādādyanātmakatvānupapatteḥ, puruṣatvāpattimantareṇa sukhasya duḥkhādanyatvaṃ varaṇādyanātmakatvaṃ

puruṣayorapyekataiva . evaṃ duḥkhamohayorapi .
atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityanātmaviśeṣaṇatvāt tadvattvadvat, tathā sati yathā kim ?
dṛṣṭāntaḥ idaṃ tat iti nidarśayituṃ na śakyate . na hi sukhādanyadasti kiñciduktavadapuruṣam . yacca sukhādananyat tadanātmatve na prasādādyanātmakaṃ na laghvādyanātmakaṃ
ceti nidarśayituṃ na śakyate .
duḥkhasya vā sukhādanyatvaṃ prasādādyanātmakatvaṃ mohasya tābhyāmanyatvaṃ prasādādiśoṣādyanātmakatvaṃ ca nopapadyate bhāvitanyāyatvāt sukhaduḥkhamohānāmaikyavṛttitvasya . tasmāt puruṣasvarūpāpatteḥ prasādādiśoṣādivaraṇādikāryāṇāṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānāṃ dharmisvarūpaviparītateti . kiñcānyat, yo'pi dharmasvarūpavirodhaḥ so'pītthamucyate, tadyathā --dharmasvarūpavirodho'pi caivameva, yathā puruṣatvāpattau sukhādīnāṃ sukhādyātmaparityāgena
dharmisvarūpavirodhaḥ tathā pauṃsnāpattau trayāṇāmaikyāpattau cānyadharmasvarūpavirodhaśca . tataśca prakṛtipuruṣayorapyekataiva, tasmāddhetoḥ puruṣatvāpatterananyatvāpatteśca prakṛtiḥ puruṣādanyā pumān vā prakṛteranya iti nopapadyate . tato'smadabhīṣṭam ekameva kāraṇam ityetad darśanaṃ sādhīyaḥ . evaṃ duḥkhamohayorapi, yathā sukhaṃ
duḥkhādanyat ityetat kiṃ tvānmātrāt ? trailakṣaṇyāt ? ityataḥ prabhṛti yāvat prakṛtipuruṣayorapyekataiva ityuktaṃ
tathā duḥkhaṃ sukhamohābhyāmanyat, mohaḥ sukhaduḥkhābhyāmanyaḥ ityeteṣvapi caturṣu sukhaṃ mohādanyat iti ca
sādhane sa eva grantho yojya iti .
atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityanātmaviśeṣaṇatvāt tvadvat . etaddoṣaparihārārthaṃ yathā tvayā
anātmatve sati avaraṇādyātmakatvāt sukhaṃ duḥkhādananyad mohavat ityādyabhihitaṃ tathāhamapi
anātmatve sati laghutvāt sukhaṃ duḥkhādanyad mohavat ityābravīmīti, ato dharmadharmisvarūpavirodhau prakṛtipuruṣadoṣaśca neti . atrocyate --tathā sati yathā kim ? iti . evaṃ sati yathā kiṃ sukhādanyat
ātmānaṃ muktveti . dṛṣṭāntaḥ idaṃ tat iti nidarśayituṃ na śakyate idaṃ tat sukhāt puruṣāccānyad
vastviti samanvayasyābhāvaḥ, yadanātmatve sati laghutvādidharma tat sukhāt puruṣāccānyaditi vastvantarābhāvāt .
taddarśayannāha --na hi sukhādanyadasti kiñciduktavadapuruṣam ? puruṣavyatiriktaṃ hi sarvaṃ parasparāviviktasukhādisvatattvamevetyuktam . tasmādanyat sukhameva sarvamiti samanvayābhāvaḥ . ata eva cānyatvena pakṣīkṛte
sukhādau puruṣavyatiriktasapakṣābhāvāt sukhāderapi sukhādanyasya vipakṣatvād vipakṣāddhetorvyāvṛttyarthaṃ yaducyate
yacca sukhādananyat tadanātmatve na prasādādyanātmakaṃ na laghvādyanātmakaṃ ceti nidarśayituṃ na
śakyate, na ca mohādi sukhādanyanna bhavatītyaśakyaṃ darśayitumiti vipakṣāvyāvṛttirapi . ato vipakṣa eva
sattvād viruddhāśca te hetava ityabhiprāyaḥ .


atha tu yad vibhaktasvatattvaṃ duḥkhamohābhyāṃ sukhādanyanna bhavati tat prasādādyanātmakamapi na bhavati yathā sukham . tathā sati tathāniyamavat tathāpravartanāt
tathāvyakteśca niyamapravṛttiprakāśātmakaṃ sukhameveti aikyaṃ mohādīnāmabhyupagataṃ
tvayaiveti ko vādārtha ubhayorapi ? tatraiva tvavaraṇādyātmakatvādivad vidoṣā laghvādihetavo'pi sukhādāvapi ca viparihārapakṣīkṛte'pi ca .
paradharmeṇāpi sukhaṃ duḥkhādananyat, calāprakāśakatvāt, avibhaktāśeṣaguṇātmakaloṣṭavat . evaṃ ca sthite sukhaṃ duḥkhādananyat, laghutvādapravṛttiśīlatvāt prakā-

atha tvityādi yāvat sukhamiti . atha mataṃ tava yad vibhaktasvatattvaṃ duḥkhamohābhyāṃ tat sukhaṃ
sukhādanyanna bhavati tat prasādādyanātmakamapi na bhavatīti viviktasvarūpasya sukhasya duḥkhādanyatvāt prasādādyātmakatvācca tadeva śakyate vaidharmyeṇa nidarśayitum . ata eva ca tamaḥ sukhādanyad viviktasvarūpamaprasādātmakamapuruṣaṃ ceti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaśca syāditi . evamitarasādhaneṣvapi ubhayadoṣaparihāra iti . atrocyate—
tathā satītyādi yāvat ko vādārtha ubhayorapi ? iti . evaṃ sati tena prakāreṇa niyamo'yaṃ yat sukhādanyanna bhavati tat prasādādyanātmakamapi na bhavatyeveti etena prakāreṇa niyamavat sukhamevānanyat prasādādyātmakaṃ bhavati ceti tathā tasya vastunaḥ pravartanāt tathāvyakteśca niyamapravṛttiprakāśātmakaṃ sukhameveti
tadabhyupagamenaivaikyaṃ mohādīnāmāpannamasmin sādhane, etadabhyupagamavacca śeṣasādhaneṣvapi duḥkhādanyat sukhaṃ
mohaśca ityevamādiṣu yad yadanātmatve duḥkhādanyanna bhavati tacchoṣādivaraṇādyanātmakamapi na bhavati ityevaṃ
niyamād vyakteḥ pravṛtteścaikyaṃ mohādīnāmabhyupagataṃ tvayaivetītaretaraikatvābhyupagamaḥ . itiśabdo hetvarthe, ityataḥ
ko vādārthaḥ vādaprayojanamubhayorāvayoḥ ? tvayaivaikyābhyupagamānna vādārthastava mamāpi pratipannārthapratipādanavaiphalyāditi . evaṃ tāvadavaraṇādyātmakatvādihetavaḥ prathamoktānanyatvapakṣasyaiva sādhakā anātmatvaviśeṣaṇā
api nānyatvapakṣasyeti pratipāditāḥ .
tatraivānanyatvapakṣa eva tvavaraṇādyātmakatvādivad vidoṣā laghvādihetavo'pi, nānyatvapakṣe,
tatra sadoṣā evetyabhiprāyaḥ . nanu laghvādayo'nanyatvahetava uktā eva, kiṃ punaranuśayena ? iti, atrocyate —
sukhādāvapi ca na sattvādiṣveva, tatrāpi ca viparihārapakṣīkṛte'pi ca, na yathā tvayā sukhaṃ mohād
guroranyat iti parihārapakṣīkṛte caiva .
paradharmeṇāpidukhaṃ sukhādananyat laghutvāt ityetenāpi, na kevalam anātmatve calatvādevetītthaṃ
viśiṣṭena pratipādanavidhinā ananyatvahetava iti . apiśabdāt svadharmeṇa sukhaṃ duḥkhādananyallaghutvāt ityādibhiḥ sukarapratipādanamevetyarthaḥ . paradharmeṇa tāvat sukhaṃ duḥkhādananyat calāprakāśakatvāt, calamaprakāśakaṃ pravṛttiśīlaṃ duḥkham   iti vacanād duḥkhadharmeṇa sukhaṃ
tato'nanyaditi sādhyate . avibhaktāśeṣaguṇātmakaloṣṭavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ prāgupavarṇitaḥ, avibhaktāḥ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakasattvarajastamoguṇātmako loṣṭa iti tritvaikyānatikramācca ta evāśeṣaguṇāḥ, tadātmako loṣṭaḥ

śakatvāt . tatsaṃyogācca, evaṃ mohādapi . paradharmeṇa calatvādaprakāśakatvāt pravṛttiśīlatvāt tatsaṃyogācca, evaṃ mohādapi . evaṃ gurutvādaprakāśakatvāt tatsaṃyogācca,
evaṃ mohādapi . dvābhyāmapyananyat sahitābhyām . eta eva sarva ityanayā diśā
abhyūhyāḥ svaparadharmāḥ prasādādayaśca . itaretarasaṃyogena ca bhaṅgavikalpāḥ saṅkalanīyāḥ . evameva caita eva duḥkhamohayorapi . anye'pyacetanatva... ...śarīrādyāpattitvādiprakṛtidharmaiḥ . ityataḥ kutaḥ saṅkalanā pratyekadvitricaturādisaṃyogadharmānantyāt .
calāprakāśātmakatvād duḥkhādananya iti sa eva loṣṭo dṛṣṭānto bhāvitasukhādyekātmakatvāt . evaṃ tāvat
paradharmeṇa . evaṃ ca sthite'svadharmeṇāpi loṣṭādyarthānāṃ sukhādyekātmakatve sthite'nanyatve laghutvādihetavo'pi
sādhakā iti taddarśayati--sukhaṃ duḥkhādananyallaghutvāt loṣṭavaditi vartate . evamapravṛttiśīlatvāt
prakāśakatvāt . etāni ca catvāri sādhanāni, pratyekaṃ trīṇi tānyeva samuditānyekamiti . atra dvikasaṃyogenāpi trīṇi--laghvapravṛttiśīlatvāt, laghuprakāśātmakatvāt, apravṛttiprakāśātmakatvāditi . evaṃ
mohādapīti, mohāt sukhamananyat ityatrāpi ta eva hetavastāvantaḥ . paradharmeṇa sukhasya duḥkhadharmābhyāṃ
pratyekaṃ dve samudāyenaikamiti trīṇi--calatvādaprakāśakatvāccalāprakāśakatvāditi . pravṛttiśīlatvādityapi,
tatsaṃyogenetarābhyāmapi sapta sādhanāni . evaṃ mohādapīti mohādananyaccalatvādityādibhyastebhya eva .
evaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhādananyad gurutvādaprakāśakatvāt tatsaṃyogācceti mohadharmebhyastribhyaḥ . evaṃ mohādapīti
tebhya eva mohadharmebhyastribhyo mohādapyananyat sukhamiti . dvābhyāmapyananyat sahitābhyāmiti duḥkhamohābhyāmananyat sukhaṃ laghutvādityādibhyastebhya eva hetubhyohetubhyaḥ, dvitricaturādisaṃyogena tat pratyekaṃ cānugantavyamityata
āha --eta eva sarva ityanayā diśābhyūhyāḥ, na kevalameta eva laghutvādayaścalatvādayo gurutvādayo
vā svaparadharmā hetavaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? svaparadharmāḥ prasādādayaśca, prasādalāghavādayaḥ śoṣatāpabhedādayo varaṇasadanāpadhvaṃsanādayaśca . itaretaretyādi, dvitricaturādisaṃyogena ca bhaṅgavikalpāḥ saṅkalanīyāḥ .
evameva caita eva duḥkhamohayorapīti sukhāt parasparataścānanyatvaṃ yojyaṃ pratijñānāṃ ca pratyekaṃ dvitrisaṃyogena ceti sukhasya duḥkhād mohād dvābhyāṃ cānanyatayā tisraḥ, evaṃ duḥkhasya tisraḥ, mohasya tisraḥ,
trayāṇāṃ parasparato'nanyatayaikaiveti daśa pratijñāḥ . etāsu sukhadharmā laghvādayaḥ, duḥkhadharmāścalādayaḥ, mohadharmau
gurvaprakāśau, pratyekaṃ dvikādisaṃyogena saptatyadhikaṃ śataṃ sādhanānām . lāghavagaurave tvapanīya prasādādiśoṣādivaraṇādīnāṃ ca hetvagraṃ pañcaṣaṣṭisahasrāṇi pañca śatāni ca ṣaṭtriṃśāni . kiñcānyat, na kevalameta eva
hetavaḥ, anye'pyacetanatvetyādi samāsadaṇḍakamadhye yāvaccharīrādyāpattitvādiprakṛtidharmaiḥ sāmānyabhūtai

nanvevaṃ svavacanavirodhādi, na, tavātmana evopālambhāt, pradhāna... ... ...abhyupagamāt . hetuviruddhatoktāvapyevameva . iti sphuṭameva sukhaṃ sadā vyaktaśabdasparśarūparasagandhamevetyabhyupagamyatāṃ tebhya eva laghvādihetubhyo viyadādivat . svamatena tu
vyaktaśabdasparśarūparasagandhavatpratijñāyāṃ viyadvarjānyudāharaṇāni .
raviśeṣitaiśca apuruṣatve sati sattvāt prameyatvāt sarvagatatvādakṛtakatvādityādi vā yāvat kiñcidihāsti
sarvaṃ tadananyatve trilakṣaṇatāṃ pratipadyate dharmajātamityataḥ kutaḥ saṅkalanā ? na śakyameva saṅkalayituṃ
pratyekadvitricaturādisaṃyogadharmānantyāditi svapakṣasādhanahetusaulabhyaṃ darśayati bhāvitatraiguṇyaikātmakaloṣṭādivastunyāyavyāpitvāditi .
itara āha --nanvevaṃ svavacanavirodhādīti, sukhaṃ duḥkhādananyat iti pratyakṣaṃ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ
pratipuruṣaṃ svānubhavena pṛthaktvasiddheḥ śarīravikārādibhiranumeyatvācca lokaprasiddherabhyupagatatvācca tvayāpi
svavacanena ca sukhaṃ duḥkham iti pṛthaguccāraṇāt svavacanābhyupagamalokaprasiddhipratyakṣānumānavirodhadoṣā ananyatvapratijñāyā iti . etaccāyuktam, tavātmana evopālambhāt, yasmādeva punaḥ svasiddhānta
eva svavacanādivirodha unnīyate tvayā ātmana eva, na mama, māmuddiśyātmano'pariparihāreṇa vacanavakratayocyate . kuta iti cet, ucyate --pradhānetyādi yāvadabhyupagamāt . pradhānamekaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohātmakatvādabhinnaguṇātmakaṃ sāmyena cāvasthitamiti kasyāyaṃ svavacanavirodhaḥ ? tathā parasparamupakurvanti sattvādayaḥ
śabdādibhāvena ca vyavatiṣṭhante pratyekaṃ sukhādyātmaneti sukhāditryātmakatvaṃ na ghaṭādāvekasminneva ceti tvayaivābhyupagatatvādaikyaṃ nānyatvokteśceti kasya svavacanādivirodhadoṣāḥ ? iti svasthena cetasā cintyatām, mama
tu tvaddoṣodbhāvanaparaprayāsatvādadoṣaḥ, evamasmaddoṣotkīrtanadvāreṇa svadoṣotkīrtanamevaitad bhavata iti .
kiñcānyat, hetuviruddhatoktāvapyevameva, yathoktamete hetavaḥ saprapañcāḥ saviśeṣaṇanirviśeṣaṇāḥ
pratijñādoṣodbhāvanadvāreṇa viruddhāvyabhicāryudbhāvanadvāreṇa caite'smatpakṣasyānanyatvasya sādhakā iti tathā hetuviruddhatāpyanyatvapakṣe prāgvyākhyātasamanvayavyāvṛttyabhāvavidhinā ananyatvapakṣa eva darśanāditi .
tadupasaṃhārārthamāha --iti sphuṭamevetyādi yāvad viyadādivaditi, itiśabdopasaṃhārārthatvāt .
yadabhilaṣyate tvayā pradhānaṃ nāma guṇasāmyāvasthānaṃ kiñcidastīti tannābhilaṣaṇīyam . sukhaṃ sadā vyaktaśabdasparśarūparasagandhamevetyabhyupagamyatāṃ sphuṭameva, kimanyāpadeśena paradoṣābhidhānena vā ? tattvavādinaiva bhavitavyamṛjunā . tebhya eva laghvādibhyo hetubhyo viyadādivat, yathā ākāśavāyyagnyabbhuvaḥ
pañca mahābhūtāni vyaktaśabdādibhāvāni tathā sukhamiti laghvādibhya eva hetubhyaḥ pṛthivyāmiva śabdādayaḥ
pañcāpi śeṣeṣvapi caturṣu bhūteṣu vyaktā ityabhyupagamyatām . pariṇativiśeṣāttu hiṅgugandhavat sūpe lavaṇarasavaccāpsu kasyacideva pratyakṣatā śabdāderna śeṣasyābhibhavādibhiriti . paramatenaivaitaduktam . svamatena tu vyaktaśabdasparśarūparasagandhavatpratijñāyāṃ viyadvarjānyudāharaṇānīti, sparśarasagandhavarṇavantaḥ pudgalāḥ

trayaviṣayasamanvaya... ... ...vītānāṃ vyavahārasamprasiddha... ... ...hetutvāvadhāraṇārthānāṃ cāvītānāmatathārthatvāt samastatantrārthavighaṭanameva .
tatvārtha॰ 5 . 23 iti sāmānyena aṇavaḥ skandhāśca tattvārtha॰ 5 . 25 mūrtatvāt pṛthivīvad vāyvādayo'pi . śabdabandhasaukṣmyasthaulyādayastu skandheṣveva pudgaleṣviti . ākāśasyāvagāhopakārasya naite dharmāḥ
santīti vādaparameśvaramatam, ato viyadvarjānyudāharaṇāni ityuktam .
itthaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānāṃ jātyantaratvāsiddhirāpāditā . tasmādeva ca vītāvītānāṃ sukhāditraiguṇyakāraṇapūrvakatvānumānasyānumānābhāsatetyata āha --trayaviṣayasamanvayetyādi yāvad vītānām, vyavahārasamprasiddhetyādi yāvacca hetutvāvadhāraṇārthānāṃ cāvītānāmatathārthatvāditi . teṣāṃ vītāvītānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ tadyathā—
prāganumānaṃ saprabhedaṃ vyākhyāya teṣāṃ yadetat sāmānyato dṛṣṭaṃ śeṣavadeṣa heturatīndriyāṇāṃ bhāvānāṃ samadhigame,
tasya prayogopacāraviśeṣād dvaividhyam, vītavīta āvīta iti sāmānyena, viśeṣeṇa tu svarūpād vītasiddhiḥ, yadā hetuḥ

parapakṣamavyapekṣya svenaiva rūpeṇa kāryasiddhāvapadiśyate tadā vītākhyo bhavati . pariśeṣādāvītasiddhiḥ, yadā
nedamato'nyathā sambhavati asti cedam tasmāt pariśeṣato heturevāyam ityavadhārya kāryasiddhāvapadiśyate tadā
āvītākhyo bhavatīti prayogalakṣaṇam, svalakṣaṇaṃ tvasya parapakṣapratiṣedhena svapakṣaparigrahakriyā āvīta iti .
vītasya āvītasya vā bhāvaḥvākyabhāvaḥ pañcapradeśaḥ--pratijñā hetuḥ dṛṣṭānta upasaṃhāro nigamanamiti . tatra sādhyāvadhāraṇaṃ pratijñā, sādhanasamāsavacanaṃ hetuḥ, tannidarśanaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ, sādhyadṛṣṭāntayorekakriyopasaṃhāraḥ, pratijñābhyāso nigamanamiti . purastād vītasya prayogaṃ nyāyyaṃ manyante paścādāvītasyeti .
prayogaśca--asti pradhānaṃ bhedānāmanvayadarśanāt, ādhyātmikānāṃ bhedānāṃ kāryakāraṇātmakānāmekajātisamanvayo dṛṣṭa iti candanaśakalādidṛṣṭāntaṃ vakṣyati . sāmānyapūrvakāṇāṃ ca bhedānāmityādi ekajātisamanvayapradarśanārthasukhāditriguṇaikajātisamanvayaṃ kāryātmakānāṃ tatsanniveśaviśeṣatvaṃ pakṣīkṛtya ekakāryatvāt iti hetumāha tathottaratropasaṃhārāt . pañcānāṃ pañcānāmityādivīpsayā vyāptiṃ darśayati . tathā
karaṇātmakānāṃ neyam . prasādādiśoṣādivaraṇādikāryātmakaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ guṇatrayaikajātisamanvitam . tairārabdhānyākāśādīni bhūtāni ekottaraguṇavṛddhyā tatkāryatvāt tatsamanvayācca tatpūrvakāṇi . tathā bāhyānāmapi tairyagyonamānuṣadaivānāṃ tatpūrvakateti . tasmāt traiguṇyasamanvitatvād bhedāstriguṇapūrvakāścandanaśakalādivat . śakalakapālāmatrabhūṣaṇaprabhṛtīnāmiti vyāptidarśanārthaṃ sādhanasya dṛṣṭāntabāhulyam .
itaśca asti pradhānaṃ bhedānāṃ parimāṇāt . ādhyātmikānāṃ kāryakāraṇātmakānāṃ parimāṇaṃ dṛṣṭam .
sāmānyatastrayaḥ sukhaduḥkhamohāḥ, kāryakaraṇaviśeṣataḥ ṣoḍaśa bhāvāḥ pañca bhūtāni ekādaśendriyāṇi cetyādi

rūpaparimāṇam . pravṛttiparimāṇaṃ dvidhā hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthatvāt, dharmādiprayojanatvāccaturdhā, dhṛtisadācāra-kāmasukha-kutūhala-vinivṛttiprayojanaṃ pañcadhā prāṇādilakṣaṇācceti pravṛttiparimāṇam . phalaparimāṇaṃ
dvividham--dṛṣṭamadṛṣṭaṃ ca . adṛṣṭaṃ kāryakaraṇasāmarthyaṃ prabhuśaktiḥ sādhanasānnidhyaṃ vibhuśaktiśceti dvidhā .
evamaśaktistadviparītā dvidhaiva . śaktirdeva-gandharva-yakṣa-rakṣaḥ-pitṛ-piśācāḥ, aśaktirmānuṣa-paśu-mṛga-pakṣisarīsṛpa-sthāvarāṇi . śakteḥ prakṛtiḥ śarīranimittam, aśakterjarāyvaṇḍodbhitsaṃśokāḥ . mātāpitṛbhyāṃ jarāyvaṇḍaṃ
ca, tat ṣaṭkośikam, pṛthivyā udbhijjam, pṛthivyudakasaṃśokāt saṃśokajamityadṛṣṭaphalaparimāṇam . dṛṣṭaphalaparimāṇaṃ karaṇāni pravartamānāni kriyānte sāmānyataścaturṇāṃ śaktyādīnāmanyatamaṃ pratyayaṃ kurvanti . śakti

ruktā . siddhirūhena sādhanaṃ tārakam, śabdena sutāram, adhyayanena tārayantam, vātādīnyādhyātmikānyabhyatītya kriyayā tāraka-sutāra-tārayantānāmanyatamena pramodam, mānuṣādyādhibhautikātyayena tattrayānyatamenaiva
pramuditam, śītādyādhidaivikātyayena tattrayānyatamenaiva modamānam, yadā kuśalasaṃsṛṣṭavyapāśrayāt sandehātikramāt tadanyatamena ramyakam, daurbhāgyātikrameṇa sadāpramuditamityaṣṭau siddhayaḥ . sannihitaviṣayasantoṣāccikīrṣitādarthādūnasya nivṛttirekaiva tuṣṭirupāyanavattvādnavatvād navavidhā tuṣṭiḥ . prakṛtyupādānakālabhāgyakāraṇapūrvaka

puruṣānyatvāparijñānād mādhyasthyalābho'mbhaḥsalilaughavṛṣṭyākhyāḥ śarīraśarīriviśeṣaṇopāyāścatasra ādhyātmikāstuṣṭayaḥ . bāhyāśca viṣayanirvedajāḥ pañca viṣayeṣvarjanarakṣaṇakṣayasaṅgahiṃsādoṣadarśanāt sutārasupārasunetrasumārīcottamābhayākhyā iti nava tuṣṭayaḥ . ekādaśendriyavadhāḥ badhirāndhāghramūkajaḍonmādakuṇikuṣṭiklībodāvartapaṅgutāḥ . pūrvoktebhyaḥ siddhyupāyebhyo viparītanāmāno'ṣṭāvasiddhayaḥ . tathā tuṣṭiviparītanāmāno'

nāmbhasikyādayo nava atuṣṭaya ityaśaktiraṣṭāviṃśatividhā . aśreyaḥpravṛttyahaṅkāramamakārakrodhamaraṇaviṣādāstamomohamahāmohatāmisrāndhatāmisrāḥ pañca viparyayā ityetad dṛṣṭaphalaparimāṇam . itthaṃ rūpa-pravṛttiphalaparimāṇamādhyātmikānāṃ kāryakāraṇātmakānāṃ bhedānāṃ nirdiṣṭam, anena tairyagyonamānuṣadaiveṣvapi saprapañceṣu
jñeyam . tasmāt parimitatvāt saṃsargapūrvakā bhedāḥ, vrīhāviva saṃsṛṣṭā mūlāṅkuraparṇanālakāṇḍaprasavatuṣaśūkapuṣpakṣīrataṇḍulakaṇabhāvāḥ yathā vā śukraśoṇitasaṃsṛṣṭāḥ kalalārbudamāṃsapeśiśarīravyūhabālyakaumārayauvanasthāvirā bhāvā iti .
itaśca asti pradhānaṃ bhedānāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvāt . śabdādyātmanā vyavatiṣṭhamānāni sattvarajastamāṃsi
prakāśapravṛttiniyamaiḥ parasparārthaṃ kurvanti . sattvaṃ śabdādyātmanāśabdātmanā vyavatiṣṭhamānaṃ tadbhāvāyetarayoḥ pravṛttiṃ
khyāpayati, evaṃ rajaḥ pravartayati, tamo niyamayati . śabdādyārabdhāni pṛthivyādīni ārambhotkrameṇa

dhṛtisaṅgrahapaktivyūhāvakāśadānaiḥ parasparārthaṃ kurvanti . indriyāṇyapyanyonyaviṣayagrahaṇasāhāyakenopakurvanti . yacca
yasya viṣayaṃ prakhyāpayati arjayati pāti saṃskaroti upadhatte vā tat kāraṇamitarat kāryam . sthānasādhanātmaprakhyātyupabhogaiḥ karaṇārthaṃ karoti kāryam, karaṇaṃ vṛddhikṣatabhagnasaṃrohaṇasaṃśokaparipālanaiḥ kāryārthaṃ karoti .
evaṃ bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ daivamānuṣatairyagyonānāṃ saprapañcānāmanyonyopakāraḥ rakṣā-saṅgraha-sevana-pūjana-poṣaṇasthiti-śuśrūṣādivikalpā varṇāśramādīnāṃ yojyāḥ . ekakartṛkā bhedāḥ, parasparopakārakopakāryatvāt, śayanādivat . tasmādasti pradhānamiti .
itaśca asti śaktimadavasthāmātratvācchaktīnām . kāryakāraṇānāmadhiṣṭhitānāmanadhiṣṭhitānāṃ ca
svakāryasamarthāstriṣu kāleṣu śaktayo'vatiṣṭhante . tadyathā--prāk pravṛtteḥ śaktyavasthānamanumīyate pravṛttyupalabdheḥ,
pravṛttikāle'vasthānamapavargadarśanāt, pravṛttyuttarakālāvasthānaṃ pravṛttivyatirekeṇāvasthānadarśanāt . evamādyantavad
vyaktamupalabhya vyaktaśaktyavasthāsti, anavasthitaśakterādyavasānābhāvāt khapuṣpavat, avasthitaśaktereva
tadbhāvād mṛdaḥ piṇḍādibhāvavat . tasmād vyaktaśaktipravṛttyupalabdherasti pradhānamiti .

itaśca asti pradhānam, vaiśvarūpyasyāvibhāgaprāpterdeśakālapramāṇabalarūpapratyāsatteravaśyambhāvyucchedānucchedābhyāṃ ca nivṛtteḥ . jalabhūmyoḥ pāriṇāmikaṃ rasādivaiśvarūpyaṃ sthāvareṣu dṛṣṭam, tathā sthāvarāṇāṃ
jaṅgameṣu, jaṅgamānāṃ sthāvareṣu, sthāvarāṇāṃ sthāvareṣu, jaṅgamānāṃ jaṅgameṣu . jātyanucchedena sarvaṃ sarvātmakam,
deśakālākāranimittāvabandhāt tu na samānakālamātmābhivyaktiḥ, te manyāmahe jalabhūmyorapyetat pāriṇāmikaṃ rasādivaiśvarūpyam, anyeṣāṃ ca bhūtānāmanyapariṇāma iti, evaṃ tadapyanyasyetyavaśyaṃbhāvī avibhāgaḥ .
