yatra cāvibhāgastat pradhānam, vaiśvarūpyasyāvibhāgakāraṇapūrvakatvāt, mayūrabarhavaicitryasyeva tadaṇḍakarasapūrvakatvam . tasmādasti pradhānamiti ebhiḥ pañcabhirvītaiḥ samanvayaparimāṇopakāraśaktipravṛttivaiśvarūpyagatyākhyaiḥ
sāmānyasaṃsargaikakartṛśaktimacchaktyavibhāgasaṃjñaṃ pradhānaṃ siddham . ata evaikatvamarthavattvam, parārthatvaṃ saṃhatya

kāriṇāṃ pārārthyācchayanādivat . ataḥ puruṣāstitvamanyatvaṃ tadbahutvaṃ ca puruṣāṇām . pradhānasya ādyantapuruṣārthopalabdhyanantaraṃ nivṛttiḥ vrīhyudakagatyā raṅganartakīvadveti pradhānapuruṣasaṃyogavibhāgāvittham . iyatparijñānaphalaṃ ca śāstram .
tathā saṃvyavahāraprasiddherityādi yāvadāvītānāmiti vyākhyātaṃ draṣṭavyam . eteṣāmeva pañcānāṃ
vītānāṃ pariśuddhyarthāḥ pañcaiva āvītāḥ . evamebhiḥ pañcabhirvītaiḥ pradhānasya parigrahaṃ kṛtvā punarāvītaiḥ
kariṣyāmaḥ . parapakṣapratiṣedhena svapakṣaparigrahakriyā āvītaḥ ityapadiṣṭaṃ purastāt . tasyāsya pratipakṣāḥ sarvaikāntinaḥ puruṣeśvarāṇupravādāḥ vikārapuruṣā vaināśikāśca . teṣāṃ vaināśikapratiṣedhamagre vakṣyāmaḥ, kasmāt ?
kiñcid vaināśikā hītara ityataḥ prabhṛtyupakramya anupalabdhernāstīti dvitīyasya śiraso'nabhyupagatasyāsata utpattyabhāvād vyabhicāraprasaṅge gate yāvadanāgate'pi kāle na bhaviṣyatīti .
kiñcānyat, yadi vyaktasyāsata utpattirbhavati arthārthibhistṛṇapāṃśuvālukāḥ muktāmaṇirajatasuvarṇāni kriyeran, kasmāt ? abhāvakriyā gurukāryā bhāvakriyā laghvīti . na tvevaṃ kriyate, tasmādayuktamityādi yāvaduktottaratvādasamyagvidhiḥ . kiñcānyat, yadi vyaktasyāsata utpattiryonyabhāvādekatvaprasaṅgaḥ, pradhānābhāvāt sāmānyamātramidaṃ vyaktaṃ nirviśeṣamityetat prasajyeta . kasmāt ? sāmānyapūrvakatvād
viśeṣāṇām, sāmānyapūrvakā hi loke viśeṣā dṛṣṭāḥ, tadyathā--kṣīrapūrvakā dadhimastudrapsanavanītaghṛtāriṣṭakilāṭakūrcikābhāvāḥ . na tvasati bhāvaḥ kaścidasti yatpūrvakā vyaktaviśeṣāḥ syuḥ . tasmāt
sāmānyamātramidaṃ vyaktaṃ nirviśeṣamityetat, na tvidaṃ tādṛk . tasmād nedaṃ vyaktamasata utpadyate . na cedaṃ
sata utpadyate . pāriśeṣyāt pradhānādevedaṃ vyaktamutpadyata ityetad yuktam . tasmādasti pradhānamiti . eṣo'nvayavītasyāvītaḥ .

kiñcānyadityādi tadeva yonyabhāvādanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ, parimāṇasya saṃsargapūrvakatvāvinābhāvādityarthaḥ . pradhānābhāvād niṣparimāṇamidaṃ vyaktamavyavasthitamityetat prasajyeta . kasmāt ? satāṃ hyarthānāṃ
loke parimāṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tulāmāna-hasta-vyāma-rajjvātmopacayaiḥ, na tvasati bhāvaḥ kaścidasti yaḥ pratipadyamānaḥ
parimāṇe'vatiṣṭheta . tasmād niṣparimāṇamidamavyavasthitamityetat prasajyeta, na tvidaṃ tādṛk, tasmād nedaṃ
vyaktamasata utpadyate . na cedaṃ sata utpadyate . pariśeṣataḥ pradhānādevedam . tasmādasti tat .
kiñcānyat, ekajātisamanvayābhāvaprasaṅgāditi tadeva . sthālīghaṭetyādi dṛṣṭāntaviśeṣaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣotthāpanārthamucyate . atra paro brūyāt--viśeṣamātrasya darśanādasata utpattiḥ, tadyathā --ākāro
gauravamityādidharmabhedāditi . tatrottaram --tādrūpyeṇopakārādadoṣa iti dharmabhedapariṇatyā lokavṛttāntanayanādityupakārabhedapradarśanāt kāryakāraṇabhāvavītasyāvītatvaleśaṃ ca spṛśatīti tasmādeva granthādavagantavyaṃ
yāvat purastād vyākhyātam, yathā --tairyagyonamānuṣadaivāni parasparārthaṃ na kurvīranniti . tatra
yaduktaṃ bhūtānāṃ tatsamūhānāṃ ca vyāvṛtterviśeṣamātramidaṃ vyaktam, tasmādasata utpadyate iti, etadayuktamiti

punarasatsamanvayāśaṅkāṃ nirasya prapañcena yāvat tasmād yuktametat--yonyabhāvād bhedaprasaṅga iti .
eṣo'nvayavītasyāvītaḥ prasaṅgo vyākhyātaḥ . ācāryeṇāpi tathaiva vyavasthā-tulyajātisamanvayādītyuktaṃ
tenaiva krameṇa ādigrahaṇāt trayaḥ śeṣā apyāvītāḥ sūcitāḥ .
tatra kāryakāraṇavītasya āvītastāvat --kiñcānyat, kāryakāraṇayośca vyaktamidaṃ dvidhā
kṛtvā kāryarāśiṃ kāraṇarāśiṃ ca kṛtvā na asata utpattiḥ sambhavati iti vākyaśeṣaḥ, kramayaugapadyapravṛttyasambhavāt . parasparārthātmalābhatvāt kāryakāraṇayoranyonyānurūpātmalābhābhāvaḥ . ataḥ krameṇa
pravṛttyabhāvaścakrākṣavat asattvādasadvādinaḥ . tathā yugapadapyabhūtavinaṣṭayoranapekṣatvāt kharaviṣāṇavat
kriyādimadhyāvasāneṣu asattvādeva pravṛttyasambhavaḥ . yadārabhyate tat kriyate niṣṭhāṃ ca gacchatīti loke
dṛṣṭam, tat parasparāpekṣāmantareṇa na sambhavati cakrākṣavadityuktam . tasmāt kramayaugapadyapravṛttyasambhavā-
dakāryakāraṇatvaprasaṅgaḥ . kāryakāraṇabhūtaṃ caitad vyaktam . tasmānnedamasata utpadyate . pariśeṣataḥ pradhānādevedamiti kāryakāraṇavītasyāvītaḥ . kiñcānyat, nirbījamakasmādutpadyamānaṃ vyaktamanekadeśatvād bhedānāmasambaddhamutpadyeta, sambaddhaṃ cotpadyate, tasmānnedamasata iti śaktivītasya āvītaḥ . śeṣastu prasaktānuprasaktavicāreṇa saṃsthānamādimaddharmamātraṃ śabdādīnāṃ vināśyavināśinām, evaṃ liṅgamādimaddharmamātraṃ sattvādīnāṃ
vināśyavināśinām, tasmin vikārasaṃjñā  , tatra yaduktaṃ vikārasya vināśitvāt
pradhānasya vināśitvam iti etadayuktam, guṇavyatiriktaguṇapravṛttikāraṇābhāvādākasmikyāḥ
pravṛtterabhāvāccetyādibhiḥtyādiḥ pratyabhijñānārthakriyāhetukāryaniyamādibhiśca hetubhiratyantāsadutpattivināśapratiṣedhārthaḥ
sarvo grantho vaiśvarūpyāvibhāgagativītasyāvīto draṣṭavya iti . evameṣāṃ pradhānāstitvaikyādisādhanārthaṃ vītānāṃ
tatsadbhāvasya anyathā vyaktāsambhavasya vā darśanena tryātmakayonihetutvamavaśyamityetadavadhāraṇārthānāṃ cāvī

anyaḥ punarāha--na sarvasarvātmakatvaparigraho nyāyyaḥ, anyathā bhavanadvaitaparigrahād vidhyubhayanayaikāntopapatteḥ . sannidhirna hi sannidhimātravṛttirasti anāpannatvādanāvirbhūtatvādapravṛttatvādaniyatatvāt . anāpannatvādibhyo nāsti vandhyāputravat sannidhiḥ, padyativartatyarthapravṛttatvādeva sattāyāḥ . na hi dravyādisadbhedavat
padyativartatyoḥ sattāviśeṣatvena upādānam, sattārthāḥ  ityaviśeṣeṇa vacanāt .
tānāmatathārthatvamuktavidhinā pratipāditam, ekatvaṃ puruṣavadapariṇāmitvaṃ ca sukhādīnām . tata ekatvāt
puruṣavadapariṇāmitvādatathārthatvaṃ ceti . tasmādatathārthatvādanumānābhāsatvādete'rthā nopapannāḥ, tadyathā—
bhinnaguṇatvaṃ vaiṣamyātmakatvaṃ vipariṇāmaḥ punaḥ sāmyāpattiśceti . tadanupapatterjagatsargasaṃhārakalpanā nirmūlā
pradhānābhāvāt . tannirmūlatvāt puruṣārthena hetunā prayuktā pravṛttirityetadapi vitatham, tadvitathatvāt tadviṣayaḥ
pratyayo'pyajñānameva, tadajñānatvāt jñānaprāpyapuruṣārthābhāvo'pīti samastatannrārthavighaṭanameveti kimavaśiṣyate
vārṣagaṇe tantre ? subhāṣitābhimatastyājyo'yamanupapannaparokṣārthavādaḥ . yadyupapadyeta parokṣārthamapi taṃ gṛhṇīyāma,
na tūpapannaḥ . tasmāt sarvasarvātmakatvaparigraha eva nyāyyaḥ .
anyaḥ punarityādi . na sarvasarvātmakatvaparigraho nyāyyaḥ, anyathā bhavanadvaitaparigrahād
vidhyubhayanayaikāntopapatteḥ . tatra bhavati bhāvadvaitam, bhavato bhāvasya bhāvyabhavitṛtvābhyāṃ bhedābhyāṃ
bhāvopapattiḥ ityetat pratipādayiṣyate . na tvevaṃ yathānantaradūṣitaṃ sannidhyāpattibhavanadvaitam . tatra tāvad
yaḥ sannidhirna hi sa sannidhimātravṛttirasti, kutaḥ ? anāpannatvāt, āpattiranāvirbhūtasyāvirbhāvaḥ,
tata āha --anāvirbhūtatvāt, anāvirbhavanamapravartanam, apravartanaṃ cāniyamaḥ . athavā āpattirvipariṇāmo
bhāvāntareṇopalabdhiḥ, āvirbhāvo vyaktiḥ, pravṛttiḥ santataḥ pariṇāmaprabandhaḥ, niyatasvarūpatvamavigatadravyārthabhāvasthitiḥ, ebhyo viparyayo'nāpannatvādiḥ, tebhyo hetubhyo'nāpannatvādisvarūpebhyo nāsti vandhyāputravat
sannidhiḥ . ādigrahaṇādapravṛtteravyakteraniyaterityādibhyaḥ . ataḥ sannidherasatparyāyatvāt sannidhibhavanābhāvaḥ . nanūktam --astibhavatyādiṣu asti-vartatī sannidhivācinau, bhavati-vidyatī sāmānyabhavanavācinau, padyatirāpattibhavanavācī   iti, satyamuktam, ayuktaṃ tūktam, astyādīnāṃ
sannipātaṣaṣṭhānāṃ sattārthavācitvāt sarve'pyamī sattārthamevāviśeṣeṇa bruvate . sā ca sattā padyati-vartatyekārthaivetyata āha --padyati-vartatyarthapravṛttatvādeva sattāyāḥ . syānmatam--sadviśeṣadravya-guṇa-karmavad
vartatipadyatyorupādānaṃ sattāviśeṣatveneti . etaccāyuktam, yasmād na hi dravyādisadbhedetyādi yāvadupādānamiti gatārtham . kiṃ tarhyupādānam ? ucyate--astyāditulyārthatvena . kuto jñāyate iti cet, sattārthā
ityaviśeṣeṇa vacanāt, asti-bhavati-vidyati-padyati-vartatayaḥ sannipātaṣaṣṭhāḥ sattārthāḥ  
ityaviśeṣeṇoktatvāt siddhasenasūriṇā .


yadyapi cāpattibhavananirūpaṇaṃ pradhānameva bhavati mahadādivikārāpattyā, tena
kila bhūyata iti tadapi na, tasyāpi bhāvyamānatvād bhāvayitāramantareṇānupapatteḥ
anāpannasya ca asattvāt, asvatantratvāt, śabdādivat .
bhavati kartā yaḥ svatantraḥ, pravartanavṛttatvāt, tathābhavanavṛttatvāt tantupaṭavat .

evaṃ tāvat sannidhibhavanaṃ nāstyeva nirūpaṇānupapatteḥ . āpattibhavanamapi nāsti, kathamiti cet,
yadapi cāpattibhavananirūpaṇaṃ sāṅkhyaiḥ kriyata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ . pradhānameva bhavati mahadādivikārāpattyā, yasmāt tena kila bhūyata iti, itiśabdahetvarthatvād mahadādibhāvamāpadyata ityasmāt kāraṇāt
pradhānameva bhavati, tenaiva bhūyate sattvādimayatvād viśvasyeti . kilaśabdaḥ kṣepe, evaṃ kila teṣāṃ matamiti,
sa ca kṣepo'nupapadyamānatvāt . kathamiti cet, ucyate --tadapi na, tasyāpi bhāvyamānatvād bhāvayitāramantareṇa bhāvyatvānupapapatteḥ, svata eva na bhavatītyarthaḥ . bhāvyamānatvaṃ ca vakṣyamāṇopapattikatvāt siddham . tacced vyāpṛtaṃ dvitīyena vyāpṛtatareṇa vinā na pravartitumarhati, anāpannatvāt, anāpannasya ca sannidhimātrasyāpāditāsattvāt . tasmādanāpannasya ca svata evāpattyabhāvāttaduktāpattibhavanaṃ
nopapadyata iti . kiṃ kāraṇamanupapannamiti cet, asvatantratvāt, anyatantraṃ hi tat pradhānākhyamacetanatvāt . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? śabdādivat, yathā śabdādayaḥ sattvarajastamomayatvādasvatantrāstadātmakena pradhānena
bhāvyante'nyena vyāpṛtā api vyāpārayitrā tathā pradhānamapi .
tasmāt tato'nyo bhavati mukhyaḥ . ko'sau ? yaḥ kartā . kaḥ kartā ? ata āha --yaḥ svatantraḥ .
kasmāt ? pravartanavṛttatvāt, pravartayataḥ kriyā pravartanam, tena pravartanena vṛttatvāt pravartayitṛtvena vṛttatvādityarthaḥ . pravartayaddhi kāraṇaṃ tadbhāvamāpadyate, śabdādi yathā pravartayat sattvarajastamolakṣaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ śabdādibhāvamāpadyate tvanmatena . tathābhavanavṛttatvāt, tena pravartyamānarūpeṇa bhavanam, tena vṛttatvāt pravartayitāramantareṇābhavanādavṛttatvāt, tantupaṭavat, yathā tantavaḥ paṭaṃ pravartayantaḥ paṭasya kāraṇamityucyante paṭaśca
tantukāryaṃ taiḥ pravartyatvāt . nanvete pradhānaśabdādipaṭādidṛṣṭāntā advaitavādaṃ samarthayantīti, ucyate--pravartayitṛtvamātrasādharmyāt tadabhyupagamya bhedena nidarśyate, anyathā puruṣādivadadvaitābhyupagame vidhyubhayaikāntotthānābhāvāt . bhāvyabhāvakabhedaprasiddheśca abhāvitasyāsattvād vandhyāputravadaṇudharmādayo'pi bhāvyamānā eva
syurityetatsādharmyād dṛṣṭāntāḥ śabdādayaḥ .
yadyevaṃ prastutaṃ dharmādharmāvaṇavo vā kāraṇamastyeveti siddhatvāt kimanumitena kāraṇena iti cet, netyu

dharmādharmāṇvādīnāmapi ca tantvaṃśvādivat pūrvapūrvaśaktatāratamyena sannihitatadvidhaśaktiḥ prativiśiṣṭabuddhiḥ svatantro'bhiprāyapravṛttyāpatteḥ pravartayitṛtvāt kāraṇam,
śaktimatpravṛttinivṛttiviniyogeṣu svātantryāt, adhikṛtapaktṛvat . sambhavanadhāraṇajvalanavikledanavyāpāreṣu sthālīkāṣṭhataṇḍulādīnāṃ pravṛttinivṛttiviniyogeṣu
svātantryāducyate--devadatta eva pacati, tena pacyate, sa pacati, tena pacanaṃ kriyate,
prayojanamātrārthatvāt kriyāyāḥ . sākṣādvā bhavitṛvat, yathā ca sambhavanadhāraṇa-
cyate --dharmādharmāṇvādīnāmapi ca tantvaṃśvādivadityādi yāvat prativiśiṣṭabuddhiḥ . yathā paṭastantupūrvakaḥ, tantavoṃ'śupūrvakāḥ, aṃśavastuṭipūrvakāḥ, tuṭīnāmapi pravartane śaktāstataḥ pūrve pūrve yāvacchatāṇukaḥ,
tato'pi pūrve pūrve yāvad dvyaṇukaḥ paramāṇurityanumīyate śabdādito yāvat pradhānam, tathā aṇvādīnāmapyacetanānāṃ pravartakau dharmādharmau . ādigrahaṇāt kāla-svabhāva-niyatyādivādyantaraparikalpitāḥ . evaṃ pūrvapūrvaśaktatāratamyena īśvaraḥ sannihitatadvidhaśaktiḥ dharmādharmāṇvādipradhānaśabdādestathā tathā tathā viniveśane sannihitā
yasya śaktiḥ so'sti . kātra tadvidhaviniveśanaśaktirmukhyā tasyeti cet, ucyate--prativiśiṣṭā buddhiḥ,
ato'sau prativiśiṣṭabuddhirviśiṣṭabuddhibhyo'pi sthapatikulālādibhyaḥ, pratikartṛ viniveśanapravṛttinivṛttiviniyojaneṣu jñatvāt svātantryācca teṣāṃ bhāvānāmīṣṭe, na te tasyeśate nāpyātmanaḥ na ca parasparam, ajñāsvatantratvābhyām . sa tu prativiśiṣṭabuddhitvāt svatantraḥ, tasyābhiprāyeṇaiva pravṛttimāpadyante dharmādharmāṇvādayaḥ . so'pi
cābhiprāyapravṛttyāpatterna sannidhimātravṛttiḥ, atasteṣāṃ pravartayitā, pravartayitṛtvāt kāraṇaṃ śaktimat sa
eva, teṣāṃ śaktimatāmapi bhāvyatvenāsvātantryāt tasyaiva tatpravṛttinivṛttiviniyogeṣu svātantryāt
jagatsargasthityantarālapralayamahāpralayeṣu, pravartanaṃ prāgaudāsīnyena sthitānāṃ dharmādīnāṃ sṛṣṭeḥ pravartanam, pravṛttānāṃ
punarupasaṃhārād nivartanam, viniyogo daiva-mānuṣa-tairyagyona-sarit-samudrādi-tanu-karaṇādyavayavavibhāgavinyāsaḥ,
viṣṇumanvādīnāmadhikṛtapuruṣāṇāmapi ihatyaparameśvarābhiprāyānurodhena pravartamānādhikṛtarājasthānīyādipuruṣāṇāmiva tasyaiva pravartayitṛtvāt . atastatsādharmyapradarśanārthamāha --adhikṛtapaktṛvat . tadvyākhyānārtham—
sambhavanadhāraṇetyādi yāvat prayojanamātrārthatvāt kriyāyā iti . yathā hi rājñā niyuktaḥ sūpakāraḥ
sthālīkāṣṭhataṇḍulādīnāṃ sambhavanadhāraṇajvalanavikledanavyāpāreṣu pravṛttinivṛttiviniyogeṣu svātantryāt
tattadātmā bhavati tatheśvara iti . athavā kartṛkarmakaraṇādhikaraṇasampradānāpādānāni pratikārakaṃ pacādīnāṃ
kriyābhedād yathāsvaśakti svātantryāt kartṝṇi, yathā adhikaraṇaṃ sthālī nidarśanamātraṃ sambhavanadhāraṇe kurvatī
pacati ityucyate, jvalanaṃ kurvanti kāṣṭhāni pacanti ityucyate, adhiśrayaṇodakāsecanataṇḍulāvapanaidho'pa

rohaṇādisamarthaṃ tathā bhavat pṛthivyudakādi vrīhirjāyate bhavati ca bhavati . sattvatamaḥprakāśaniyamapravṛttisattve'pi pravartayitṛtvād rajobhavanavadvā . dṛṣṭāntabāhulyapradarśanaṃ
pratisiddhāntaparidṛṣṭādṛṣṭādeḥ pravartayitṛtvakhyāpanārtham .
karṣaṇādikriyāḥ kurvan devadattaḥ pacati ityucyate, ityādi pratikārakaṃ svātantrye satyapi upakramaprabhṛtyapavargaparyavasānāsu kriyāsu tasyaiva svātantryāt sambhavanādipratyakṣatāyāmapi pacanaśaktimatāmapyadhikaraṇādīnāṃ devadattasya pravartayitṛtvādevocyate devadatta eva pacati iti, nānyāni anīśvaratvāt . tāṃ mukhyāṃ kartṛśaktiṃ
darśayati --tena pacyate tṛtīyayā kartari vihitayā sa pacatīti vā prathamayā tatra vihitatippratyayasamānādhikaraṇatayā . punarapi sphuṭīkaraṇārthamāha --tena pacanaṃ kriyata iti yāvaduktaṃ bhavati tāvaduktaṃ bhavati
tena pacyate sa pacati iti . kutaḥ ? prayojanamātrārthatvāt kriyāyāḥ, prayojanaṃ paravyāpāraṇam,
vikledavyāpāraṇārthāḥ sambhavanajvalanādikriyāḥ, tāsāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ devadattāyattatvāt sa pacati tena
pacyata ityuktam .
dṛṣṭāntāntaramāha sphuṭīkaraṇārthaṃ vyāpitvapradarśanārthaṃ ca --sākṣādvā bhavitṛvat . tadvarṇanam --yathā
ca sambhavanetyādi yāvad bhavati ca bhavati, na kevalaṃ pacatyādibāhyakriyāviṣayameva prayojyatvam, kiṃ
tarhi ? vrīhyādibhavanādyantaḥkriyāviṣayamapi prayojanam . tathā bhavat pṛthivyudakādi bāhyaṃ vrīhirjāyate
bhavatītyantarbhavanam . sambhavanadhāraṇasamarthā pṛthivī, rohaṇasamarthamudakam, ādigrahaṇād varddhanasamarthā
vāyukālādayaḥ, taiḥ kāritasya vrīhibhavanasya pratyakṣatāyāmapi satyāṃ vrīhirjāyate bhavati antaḥsanniviṣṭasvātantryāt tasyaiveśvarasya prayojakatvāducyate --bhavati ca bhavatīti, bhavanamapi bhavadeva bhavatīti svarūpamātra-
lābho'pi tadvaśādityarthaḥ .
athavā prastutapradhānakāraṇavādisiddhamevedaṃ nidarśanam --sattvatamaḥprakāśetyādi yāvad rajobhavanavadvā . yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sattvasya prakāśapravṛttistamaso niyamapravṛttiścāstyevetyuktaṃ sattvaṃ śabdātmanā
pravartamānamityādiparasparopakāravīte, prakāśādilakṣaṇasya sattvasya pravṛttirguruvaraṇalakṣaṇasya tamasaśca
pravṛttiryathāsaṅkhyam itarayoḥ khyāpayati vyavasthāpayati iti vacanāt . rajastu pravṛttilakṣaṇameva pravartakamiṣṭaṃ
viśeṣataḥ, satyapi pravṛttisāmānye karoti pravartayati iti vacanāt . tathā adṛṣṭāṇvādibhūtakālādipravartamānasāmānye'pīśvara eva pravartayitṛtvāt kāraṇamiti . dṛṣṭāntabāhulyapradarśanaṃ pratisiddhāntaparidṛṣṭādṛṣṭādeḥ pravartayitṛtvakhyāpanārtham, siddhāntaṃ siddhāntaṃ prati pratisiddhāntaṃ teṣu teṣu vaiśeṣikādisiddhānteṣu kalpitānāṃ parito'numānairdṛṣṭānāmapyadṛṣṭāṇupradhānaviṣṇvādīnāṃ pravartayitā īśvara iti dārṣṭāntikopanayanāt .


iti sa eva bhavati, sarvavyaktipravṛttyātmakatvāt . evameva cāsyāṣṭamūrtitocyate .
itarathā adṛṣṭāṇupradhānādeḥ pravṛttiphalaprakarṣāpakarṣau na syātām . dṛṣṭau ca tau .
tayorato na vimardakṣamaṃ kāraṇamastīśvarakāmacāreraṇādṛte .
tanukaraṇabhuvanasādhanāya pravṛttāni adṛṣṭāṇupradhānādīni viśiṣṭacetanādhiṣṭhitā-

iti sa eva bhavati, itthamīśvara eva bhavati paramārthataḥ . sarvavyaktipravṛttyātmakatvāt,
sarvāsāṃ vyaktīnāṃ pravṛttaya ātmā'sya sarvavyaktipravṛttyātmakaḥ tadviśiṣṭabuddhiśaktyāvāsarūpatvāt tāsām,
evameva cāsyāṣṭamūrtitocyate kṣiti-jala-pavana-hutāśana-yajamānā-''kāśa-soma-sūryākhyāṣṭamūrttitāsya
svaśaktyāvāsarūpatvāt tāsu sa eva bhavati sā sā ca .
kiñcānyat, pravṛttiphalaprakarṣāpakarṣābhāvaprasaṅgādīśvara eva kāraṇaṃ nādṛṣṭādi na pradhānādītyata āha —
itarathetyādi yāvad dṛṣṭau ca tau . yadyadṛṣṭāṇvādeḥ pradhānādervā pravṛttayaḥ phalāni vā syuḥ kriyāṇāṃ pūrvakṛtakarmaphalapreritānāṃ tadanurūpatvāt phalānāṃ ca phalapreritakarmānurūpatvād manuṣyanirvartanīyā eva svabhāvamārdavā

nyeva pravartante, sambhūyaikārthakāritvāt, takṣādhiṣṭhitarathadārugaṇavat . tathā
acetanatvāt sthitvā pravṛtteḥ turyādivat .
cetanānadhiṣṭhitakṣīradadhimeghādivadanekānta iti cet, na, adṛṣṭakartṛkaviṣayapratijñārthāvyatirekāt śabdānityatvasādhane pratijñāntarnītajaladhidhvanyanityatvavat .
dikriyāḥ kṛtvā manuṣya eva punarapi syāt, mā bhūt sarāgasaṃyamādidevagatinirvartanīyakriyāsambandhī tadanurūpavaikriyaśarīrādilabdhyutkarṣabhāvaḥ, tathā bahvārambhaparigrahādinirayāyuḥsaṃvartanīyakarmabhāk tadanurūpaduḥkhaikarasanārakatvanikṛṣṭaphalānubhāvī vā mā bhūt, parasparānurūpaśālibījāṅkurādihetukāryabhāvaprabandhavad viśiṣṭaviśiṣṭabuddhisvatantrakāraṇapreraṇābhāvāt svānurūpakāryakāraṇānubandhasāmarthyābhyupagamācca nādṛṣṭād na pradhānādervaiṣamyaṃ
syāt, dṛṣṭaṃ ca vaiṣamyamadhyayanavidyāgamānadhigamādi, utkarṣāpakarṣayoranyadato na vimardakṣamaṃ kāraṇamastīśvarakāmacāreraṇādṛte, tadabhiprāyasyāpratighātasya pravṛttiḥ kāmacāraḥ, tena preraṇaṃ bhāvānāṃ pravartanaṃ svācārāṇāmapyaniṣṭaphalasambandho durācārāṇāmiṣṭaphalasambandhaḥ, tasmāt sarvamīśvarapravartitaṃ pravartate, nānyathā .
prayogaśca --tanu-karaṇa-bhuvanasādhanāyetyādi yāvat takṣādhiṣṭhitarathadārugaṇavaditi . yathāprakriyaṃ
śarīrāṇīndriyāṇi bhuvanaṃ ca sādhayitumadhitiṣṭhadbhiradṛṣṭaiḥ preritāḥ paramāṇavo vaiśeṣikāṇāṃ pravṛttāni sattvādīni
pradhānena sāṅkhyānāmanyeṣāṃ vā bhūtāni kāla-svabhāva-niyatyādyadhiṣṭhitānītyabhimatāni pravartyāni sapravartakāni
viśiṣṭacetanādhiṣṭhitānyeva pravartanta iti pratijñā . sambhūyaikārthakāritvāditi hetuḥ, sambhūyakāritvaṃ
pūrvapūrvaśaktatāratamyakāraṇānumānokteḥ, paramāṇusattvādayaḥ sambhūya tanvāditvenāvasthitāḥ paraspareṇa sambhūya
gamanābhyavaharaṇasukhaduḥkhānubhavarūpādyupalabdhisattvaguṇādhāratādi kāryaṃ kurvanto dṛśyante, tat siddhameṣāṃ
sambhūyaikārthakāritvam . takṣādhiṣṭhitarathadārugaṇavat, rathārtho dārusaṅghāto rathadārugaṇaḥ, sa takṣṇā viśiṣṭacetanenādhiṣṭhitastathaitāni . tathā'cetanatvāt, tatheti tasyāmeva pratijñāyāṃ acetanatvāt ityupacayahetuḥ, sa eva rathadārugaṇo dṛṣṭāntaḥ, vakṣyamāṇo vā turyādivaditi . tanu-karaṇa-bhuvanānāmacetanatvaṃ ca
siddham . athavā sthitvā pravṛttesturyādivat, yathā turivemaśalākānalikārajjvañcanikāsūtrādīni prāgapravṛttāni kañcit kālaṃ sthitvā pravartamānāni viśiṣṭakuvindabuddhyadhiṣṭhitāni paṭaniṣpattyai pravartante tanukaraṇabhuvanāni tatheti .
cetanānadhiṣṭhitakṣīradadhimeghādivadanekānta iti cet . syānmatam--prativiśiṣṭabuddhinā
kenacidanadhiṣṭhiteṣu kṣīradadhimeghādiṣu sambhūyaikārthakāritvācetanatvasthitvāpravṛttidharmāṇāṃ darśanādanaikāntikatā saṃśayahetuteti . etacca na, adṛṣṭakartṛkaviṣayapratijñārthāvyatirekāt, adṛṣṭo'syāḥ kartā
viṣayaḥ seyamadṛṣṭakartṛkaviṣayā pratijñā, tasyāḥ pratijñāyāstanukaraṇabhuvanadharmikāyāḥ prativiśiṣṭabuddhyadhiṣṭhitatvasādhyadharmaṇaḥ kṣīradadhimeghādidharmiṇāmapṛthaktvāt pratijñāntaḥpātitvād vipakṣābhāve hetuvyabhicārābhāvād

sthitvāpravṛttacetanānadhiṣṭhiteśvaravadanekānta iti cet īśvarasya vā cetanādhiṣṭhitatā tasyāpi cānyādhiṣṭhitatetyanavasthā . na, cetanādhiṣṭhitapravṛttitvasādhyadharmatvāt .
devadattādayastarhi cetaneśvarānadhiṣṭhitāḥ pravartante so'pi veśvarastadvaccetanāntarādhiṣṭhitaḥ . ucyate ca tvayā cetanānāmapīśvarādhiṣṭhānaṃ puruṣavādanirasanāya--ajño janturanīśo'yamātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ .īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhrameva vā ॥ mahābhā॰ vana॰ 30 . 28 iti .
nānekāntaḥ, śabdānityatvasādhane pratijñāntarnītajaladhidhvanyanityatvavat, yathā anityaḥ śabdaḥ
iti pratijñāte kṛtakatvaṃ deśakālābhyāmanavarate jaladhidhvanau puruṣādibhedena cānavarate sāmādiśabde ca
dṛṣṭatvādanekānta iti vacanaṃ tadābhāsacodanam, udanvatsāmādiśabdānāmapyupādānabhedabhinnānām śabdaḥ
iti śrotragrāhyatvābhedena pratijñātānāṃ śabdatvānatikramāt pakṣāntarnītatvāt, tadanityatvaṃ kṛtakatvāvinābhāvi
śabdādanyasya nityasya kṛtakasyādarśanācca jāyate, deśakālopādānabhedabhinnasyābhede'pi satyupalabhyadharmaṇo'nupalabhyatvācchabdavyaktidharmitvācca jātyuttaraṃ ca, tasmādanuttaramiti .
sthitvāpravṛttacetanānadhiṣṭhiteśvaravadanekānta iti cet . syānmatam--yatheśvaraḥ svayaṃ prāgapravṛttān sthitvā pravartayannapi cetanāntareṇānadhiṣṭhitaḥ pravṛttaśca tathā tanvādīni sthitvā pravṛttāni syurityanekāntaḥ . īśvarasya vā cetanādhiṣṭhitatetyādi, evamanaikāntikatvānicchāyāṃ vā cetanādhiṣṭhito'sāvīśvaraḥ
prāptaḥ sthitvā pravṛtteradṛṣṭāṇupradhānādivat, ato'nyeśvaratā grahādhiṣṭhitastrīpuruṣādivat . tasyāpi cādhiṣṭhāturanyādhiṣṭhitatetyanavasthā syāditi . etacca na, cetanādhiṣṭhitapravṛttitvasādhyadharmatvāt, naiṣa doṣaḥ,
cetanādhiṣṭhitapravṛttitvaṃ hi sādhyate dharmaḥ, sa cācetanānāmeva taddharmiviṣayatvāt, cetanānāṃ siddhatvāt
prayojanābhāvācca . tanukaraṇabhuvanasādhanapravṛttādṛṣṭāṇupradhānādīni hyacetanāni dharmīṇi cetanādhiṣṭhitatvadharmeṇa
viśiṣṭāni sādhyanta iti pratijñāviṣayājñānādadoṣa iti .
devadattādayastarhi cetaneśvarānadhiṣṭhitāḥ pravartante, sāmarthyādacetanadharmiviṣayaṃ cetanādhiṣṭhānaṃ
sādhyata iti pratijñāviṣayavyavasthāyāṃ cetanānāṃ devadattādīnāṃ cetaneśvareṇādhiṣṭhānaṃ na prāpnoti, tato devadattādivaccetanānadhiṣṭhitānāṃ tanvādisādhanārthādṛṣṭāṇupradhānādīnāmanekāntaḥ . so'pi veśvarastadvaccetanāntarādhiṣṭhita iti prāptam . ucyate ca tvayā iṣyata eva tvayā cetanānāmapīśvarādhiṣṭhānam, yathā—
ajño janturanīśo'yamātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ .īśvaraprerito gacchet svargaṃ vā śvabhrameva vā ॥ mahābhā॰ vanapa॰ 30 . 28
puruṣavādanirasanāyeti ślokavacanaprayojanamāha, mā bhūt puruṣakāraṇavādaprasaṅgaḥ tadavasthamātraṃtadavasthāmātraṃ tanvadṛṣṭapradhānāṇvādi iti, ata uktaṃ bhavatā ajño janturanīśo'yamiti .


na, prāg viśiṣṭabuddhicetanapratijñānāt, viśiṣṭabuddhitvamapi cāsyārthānāmarthakriyāyogyatvena sanniveśakatvāt .
tanvādīni na viśiṣṭabuddhinā kṛtāni padmanālakaṇṭakamayūracandrakādivat .
na, dadhimeghādivaduktottaratvāt . laghuprakāśaguruvaraṇapravṛttiniyamānāṃ viśiṣṭabuddhipūrvakatā, mithaḥpratyanīkasambhūyaikārthakāritvāt, pācakādhiṣṭhitānalodakaudanasādhanavat . anyonyābhibhavanamithunavṛttitvavipariṇāmāditi cet, na, pariṇāmasyāpi kāryatvāt . dharmāntaraikya... ... ....

atrocyate --na, prāg viśiṣṭabuddhicetanapratijñānāt, prāgasmābhirviśeṣitam--viśiṣṭabuddhyadhiṣṭhitāni tanvādīni . viśiṣṭabuddhitvaṃ cāparādhīnaṃ svātantryam . tat kutaḥ siddhamiti cet, ucyate—
viśiṣṭabuddhitvamapi cāsyārthānāmarthakriyāyogyatvena sanniveśakatvāt, tanvādīni viśiṣṭabuddhipūrvakāṇi arthakriyāyogyatvena sanniviśiṣṭāsanniviṣṭāvayavatvāt, sthānagamanaśayanāsanāhārādiprayojanāni hi tanvādiṣu
kriyante tatkriyāyogyāvayavasanniveśāt sthapatibuddhipūrvakaprāsādavat . tasmādarthakriyāyogyatvenārthānāṃ sanniveśakaḥ sa sthapativat . tasmācca viśiṣṭabuddhiriti .
anaikāntikatodbhāvanārthamāha --tanvādīnītyādi yāvat padmanālakaṇṭakamayūracandrakādivaditi .
nahi praśastaśubhavarṇagandharasasparśasya lakṣmīnilayasya jalāśayālaṅkaraṇasya kamalasya grahaṇadhāraṇopabhogādisādhanabhūte nāle kenacidasūyayā mā grahīt kaścit iti kaṇṭakāḥ kṛtāḥ, nīlotpalanālādiṣvapyatiprasaṅgāt .
na ca mayūracandrakāṇāmindracāpavarṇapratispardhivicitravarṇatā kṛtā kuḍyādiṣu citrakareṇeva kenacid viśiṣṭabuddhinā, citrakaravetanadānādyabhāvaprasaṅgāditi . atrocyate --na, dadhimeghādivaduktottaratvāt, kṣīradadhimeghādivat padmanālakaṇṭakamayūracandrakādīnāṃ tanvādivaccādṛṣṭakartṛkaviṣayapratijñārthāvyatirekādanaikāntika-
tvābhāva ityuktottarametat .
evaṃ tāvat sāmānyena viśiṣṭabuddhipūrvakatoktā, prastutakāpilamatāpekṣayā caivaṃ pratijñāyate --laghuprakāśetyādi yāvat pācakādhiṣṭhitānalodakaudanasādhanavaditi . yathā parasparapratyanīkayoragnyudakayorapratyanīkatvavidhāyinā viśiṣṭabuddhinā pācakenādhiṣṭhitayoḥ satyapi mithaḥ pratyanīkatve tadbuddhivaśavartinoḥ saṃhatyakāritvādodanasādhanaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathā laghuguruṇoḥ prakāśavaraṇayoḥ pravṛttiniyamayośca mitho viruddhayorapi saṃhatya mahadādibhāvenaikārthakāritvād viśiṣṭabuddhipūrvakateti . anyonyābhibhavanamithunavṛttitvavipariṇāmāditi cet .
syānmatam--sattvarajastamasāmevāṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ puruṣārthamuddiśya pravṛttānāṃ vaiṣamyavipariṇāmād mahadādi


anvāha ca--eko vaśī niṣkriyāṇāṃ bahūnāmekaṃ bījaṃ bahudhā yaḥ karoti .tamātmasthaṃ ye'nupaśyanti dhīrāsteṣāṃ śāntiḥ śāśvatī netareṣām ॥ śvetāśva॰ 6 . 12
sādhanam, nānyaḥ prayokteti . etacca na, pariṇāmasyāpi kāryatvāt . tadvyācaṣṭe --dharmāntaraikyādi,
pariṇāmo hi dharmāntaraniṣedho dharmāntarāvirbhavanaṃ ca, taddvayabhūtaṃ kāryam, sa tu pariṇāmaḥ kāryatvāt pūrvavat
pratijñārthāvyatirekād rathādivat so'pi viśiṣṭabuddhimadvihitaḥ . tasmādayuktam--svata eva pariṇamante
sattvādaya iti .
anvāha ceti jinamatānusāreṇa . eko'dvitīyaḥ pradhāno vā vaśī jñatvasvātantryābhyām niṣkriyāṇāmajñāsvatantrāṇām, paratantrā jñā api hi niṣkriyā eva . bahūnāmanantānāṃ pradhānāṇvādīnāṃ karmakaraṇasampradānāpādānādhikaraṇapradhānaśaktīnāmanantānāmapi pravartayitṛtvāt svavaśīkartuṃ śaktatvād vaśīti .
ekaṃ bījaṃ pradhānaṃ mahadādivipariṇatyā bahudhā brahmādistambāntānantabhedabhinnajagattayā yaḥ karoti sṛjati
adhitiṣṭhati ātmābhiprāyānurūpyeṇa tathā tathā vyavasthāpayati . tamīśvaraṃ svato bhinnasya bhāvyabhavanasya
pradhānādisaṃjñasya bhāvayitāramātmasthamātmani sthitaṃ kṣityādyaṣṭamūrtisarvagataṃ sarvatra tāsāṃ sadbhāvād ye'nupaśyanti tatprasādādeva tajjñānānusāreṇa yogābhyāsaprasādakrameṇa . ke'nupaśyanti ? dhīrā avicalitayogasamādhayaḥ . ko yogaḥ ?
pratyāhārastathā dhyānaṃ prāṇāyāmo'tha dhāraṇā .tarkaḥ samādhirityeṣa ṣaḍaṅgo yoga ucyate ॥ amṛtanādopa॰ 6
tatrendriyāṇāṃ viṣayebhyo manasaśca pratyāharaṇaṃ pratyāhāraḥ . prāṇāyāmastrividhaḥ--recakaḥ kumbhakaḥ
pūraka iti . tatra recaka āntaraṃ vāyuṃ bahirniṣkāśayati nāsikādvāreṇa . pūrakaḥ bāhyamantaḥ praveśya
pūrayati . kumbhakaḥ pūrṇakumbhavadaspandaṃ vāyuṃ sāmīpyenāvasthāpayati . dhyānamiṣṭadevatācintanaṃ vā . dhāraṇā
yathābhyāsaṃ hṛdayādiṣu pradeśeṣu manaso'vasthāpanam, yathā pūrvaṃ nābhau tato hṛdaye kaṇṭhe nāsikāgre bhruvormadhye
lalāṭe mūrddhanīti . tarkaḥ śūnyāgāragirikandarādyekānte śucau deśe śarīramṛju āyasya dantāgrāṇi jihvāgreṇa
sandhāya palyaṅka-svastika-vīrāsanādyāsanaṃ samapādādisthānaṃ vā āsthāya dhyāyato me samādhirbhavatīti tarkayet
anenetthaṃ kṛtena kriyāviśeṣeṇa āhāra-vihāra-svādhyāyādinā dhyānasamādhirbhavati iti tadupāyavicāra
ūhastarkaḥ . dhyānayogābhiratiḥ samādhirityeṣa ṣaḍaṅgo yogaḥ . anena yogena sarvatra kṣityādimūrtimīśvaraṃ dṛṣṭvā
paścād bhāvitātmā tamātmasthameva paśyati--yadatra mama śarīre kaṭhinaṃ sā pṛthivī parameśvaramūrtiḥ, yad dravaṃ
tajjalam, ūṣmā tejaḥ, calaṃ vāyuḥ, śuṣiramākāśam, yaccaitanyaṃ sa yajamānaḥ, cakṣuḥ sūryaḥ, jihvā somo


ayaṃ vidherubhayabhāk . vidhirvyākhyāto lokavadanapavādapravṛttiḥ, tasya
utsargāt sa vidhīyate, sarvasarvātmakatvād nirapavādaḥ pravartata eva . niyamaḥ
sannidhiprayojyasatorapravṛtteḥ tayorasatsattvāt .
sādṛśyasāmānyaṃ ca śabdārthaḥ, sarvasarvātmakatve'pi ca sṛṣṭyarthavattvād nāvikalpaḥ . vākyamapi ca pṛthak sarvapadam, tasmāt sarvasarvātmakatvādeva . dravyārthabhedo'rthaḥ .
mano vetyanyeṣvapi avayaveṣu yathāsambhavaṃ ye'nupaśyanti te dhīrāḥ śāśvatīṃ śāntimāpnuvanti tenaiveśvareṇa
sāyojyaṃ nirvāṇaṃ mokṣamityarthaḥ . netare pradhāna-puruṣa-niyatyādikāraṇina iti .
nayasvarūpākhyānārthamāha --ayaṃ vidherubhayabhāk, ubhayaṃ vidhiṃ niyamaṃ ca bhajata ityubhayabhākū .
vidhirvyākhyāto lokavaditi pūrvamiti smārayati . punaḥ saṅkṣepeṇa vyācaṣṭe --anapavādapravṛttiḥ, na
kañcidarthamayamapaharati kiṃ na etena yadi sāmānyaṃ yadi viśeṣaḥ ? ityādi, tasya vidherutsargād vidhānāt sa vidhirvidhīyate, kasmāt ? sarvasarvātmakatvād nirapavādaḥ pravartata eva, pravartate, na kvacid
vyāhanyate, ayaṃ hi nayaḥ sarvaṃ sarvātmakam itīcchati yat prāk sūcitaṃ sannidhyāpattivyākhyāne tadevātrāpi
vakṣyate, niyamaḥ sannidhiprayojyasatorapravṛtteḥ, yāvetāvanantaroktau sannidhirbhavati āpattibhavanasahāya
īśvarapravartyo vā prayojyaḥ pradhānādṛṣṭāṇvādirbhāvaḥ tayordvayorapyapravṛtterasattvam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tayorasatsattvāt, tadubhayaṃ hyasadeva sadityucyate svatantrasya karturjñasyaiva bhavanāt tadvilakṣaṇasyābhavanāpannasyāpravṛttasyāsattvāt khapuṣpavat . tasmād niyamaśceti vidhirvidhīyate niyamyate ceti . tato'yaṃ vidherubhayabhāgiti .
śabdārtho'dhunā --sādṛśyasāmānyaṃ ca śabdārthaḥ, vākyārthasya vakṣyamāṇatvāt padārtha iti gamyate .
sadṛśasanniveśamānairmīyata iti samānam, samānaṃ dṛktvaṃ yatra draṣṭṝṇāṃ tat sadṛśam, sadṛśaṃ samānam,
samānabhāvaḥ sāmānyaṃ jāti-liṅga-pratyayā-'bhidhāneṣviti, nānyāpoho na samānavastvatiriktatattattvādi vā
tadanupapatteḥ . etat sāmānyaṃ śabdārthaḥ . nanu sāmānyamavikalpātmakaṃ puruṣaniyatyādi sarvasarvātmakatvāditi
pūrvavādaprasaṅga iti cet, netyucyate, sarvasarvātmakatve'pi ca sṛṣṭyarthavattvāt, jagatsṛṣṭilakṣaṇotsargavyāpitvāt tadarthavattvādasya nayasya nāvikalpaḥ iti sambhantsyate prakṛtaśabdārthaḥ, abhihitanyāyena sattvādiśabdāditanvādivikalpapratyayasya satyārthatvādadvaitapratyayasyāsatyārthatvāditi padārtha uktaḥ . vākyārtho'dhunā —
vākyamapi ca pṛthak sarvapadamiti, vākye'vadhārite tadarthāvadhāraṇasaukaryāt . ākhyātaśabdaḥ saṅghāto
jātiḥ saṅghātavartinī vākyapa॰ 2 . 1 ityādiṣu vākyalakṣaṇavikalpeṣu asya nayasya matena pṛthak sarvaṃ padaṃ
vākyam, vākyārthaḥ pṛthak pṛthak sarvapadārtha iti, yathā devadatta ! gāmabhyāja śuklām ityatraikaikaṃ padaṃ

saṅgrahadeśatvād dravyārthaḥ . dravyamapi guṇasandrāvaḥ, guṇānāmekībhāvena dravaṇaṃ
tenāpi tadvaśitvāt .
upanibandhanamasya duvihā paṇṇavaṇā paṇṇattā--jīvapaṇṇavaṇā ajīvapaṇṇavaṇā ca prajñāpanāsū॰ 1 . 9 . kimidaṃ bhaṃte ! lo+etti pavuccati ? goyamā . jīvā ceva ajīvā ceva, evaṃ rayaṇappabhā
jāva īsīpabbhārā samayāvaliyādi   .
vākyam, kiṃ kāraṇam ? tasmāt sarvasarvātmakatvādeva, yasmāddevadatto'pi gavātmako'bhyājātmakaśca tathā
pravartanāt tattadāpatteḥ, tānyapi tatheti tasmāt sarvasarvātmakatvāt pṛthak pṛthak sarvaṃ padaṃ vākyamiti .
etasya vidhyubhayanayasya dravyārthabhedo'rthaḥ pūrvaviruddhatvānnayānāmavikalpārthād vidhividhinayād vikalpārthadravyārthatayā bhidyate .
ārṣoktānāṃ nayānāṃ kasminnantarbhāvaḥ ? ityata āha --saṅgrahadeśatvād dravyārthaḥ, saṅgrahanayasyāpi
śatadhā bhedāt taddeśastadekadeśo dravyaśabdārthaḥ . katamasmin vigrahe iti cet, ucyate --dravyamapi
guṇasandrāvaḥ . tadvyākhyā--sam ekībhāve, dru gatau pā॰ dhā॰ 945, tasmād guṇānāmekībhāvena
dravaṇam, kāraṇe kāryasya sattvāt satāmeva sukhādīnāṃ rūpādīnāṃ pṛthak pṛthak sannihitānāmaikyagamanājjīvapudgalapariṇāmaḥ saṅgamanam . āha--vidhyubhayanayatvāt sannihitatadvidhaśaktīśvarapṛthaktvādaṇvādīnāṃ
tadekaikasarvātmakatvācca teṣāṃ bhavatu ekībhāvaḥ, mā bhūdīśvarasyeti . netyucyate, tenāpi tadvaśitvāt
sannihitatacchaktināpi saheśvareṇaikībhāve tacchaktivyakternānyatheti . ata eva cāsya nayasyādvaitavādād bhedaḥ .
āha--kiṃ svamanīṣikayaitaducyate ? āhosvidastyasya kiñcidupanibandhanamārṣamapi ? iti . asti
ityucyate, upanibandhanamasya--duvihā paṇṇavaṇā paṇṇattā jīvapaṇṇavaṇā ajīvapaṇṇavaṇā ceti .
athavā kimidaṃ bhaṃte ! lo+etti pavuccati ? goyamā ! jīvā ceva ajīvā ceva, evaṃ rayaṇappabhā
jāva īsīpabbhārā samayāvaliyādi .
iti vidhyubhayārastṛtīyo nayacakrasya ॥




oँ arham

atha caturtho vidhiniyamāraḥ .

nanvevaṃ tvaduktā evopapattayaḥ sarvaprāṇīśvaratvaṃ sādhayanti, sukhādyātmasaṃvedyalakṣaṇatvāt karmaṇaḥ sukhādyadṛṣṭāṇūnāmapi ca karmatvāt karmapravartanābhyupagamāt

nanvevamityādi . pūrvavadasmin darśane na parituṣyata utthānamityabhisambandhaḥ . nanu ityanujñāpane,
nanu tvaduktā evopapattayaḥ pratyekaṃ sarvaprāṇīśvaratvaṃ sādhayanti, bāhyādhyātmikasukhaduḥkhamohamātratvājjagataḥ sadasadvedyamohāntarāyabhedānāṃ sukhāditrayavipākaphalatvānativṛttestadātmasaṃvedyalakṣaṇatvāt karmaṇaḥ,
sukhādisaṃvedanenaiva hi tatkāraṇabhūtaṃ karma svakāryeṇa phalena lakṣyate'numīyate sāmānyatodṛṣṭānumānena deśāntara-
prāptyā iva ādityagatiḥ . ataḥ kāraṇe kāryasya sattvāt kārye kāraṇopacārāt sukhādayaḥ karma, annaprāṇatvavat . adṛṣṭaṃ dharmādharmākhyaṃ parairiṣṭameva karmeti, ātmāpi karma, katham ? taccādṛṣṭamātmano rāgādikarmavipākapariṇatyavasthasya prayogapariṇāmāt karmatāmāpannam . punarapi sukhād rāgādi, tataḥ punaḥ karma, tataḥ sukhādi
phalam . tacca jīvapariṇāmātmasātkṛtakārmaṇayogyaparimāṇaparamāṇusamūha evātmasthamekībhūtaṃ cātmanā,
yathoktam—
yogaiḥ sakṛt svayogād mūrtaḥ san bāhyamarthamādatte .āttasya cānubhavanaṃ bandhaṃ prati sa ca tato'nanyaḥ ॥  
tacca saṃvedyam, kartuḥ saṃvedanāt . tataḥ saṃvedyalakṣaṇatvāt karmaṇaḥ sarveśvarateti sambhantsyate . karma
hi pratiprāṇi niyatakartṛkaṃ svavipākasukhāditvena saṃvedyam, tenāṇūnāmeva karmatvapariṇāmāpannānāmātmaikībhāvena
vedanaṃ saṃvedanam, tena ca puruṣeṇa teṣāṃ tathā prayojanāt kartṛtvam, ataḥ sukhādyadṛṣṭāṇūnāmapi ca
karmatvādityāha . prāk pratipāditaṃ hi dvyaṇukatryaṇukādisaṃyogaiḥ pṛthivyudakavrīhyaṅkurādiparivṛttirūpeṇātmanasteṣāṃ caikatvaṃ sarvasarvātmakatvaṃ ca . tasmāt karmakāraṇāṃ jagatpravṛttiṃ sādhayanti tvaduktā evopapattayaḥ .
itaśca karmapūrvakaṃ jagat, karmapravartanābhyupagamāt sarvaprāṇinām, karmavaśādeva hi prāṇinaḥ śubhāśubhajātikularūpādyutkarṣāpakarṣāḥ . yathoktam--


sarvaprāṇināṃ kartṛtvāt kartureva bhavitṛtvābhyupagamāt tasyaiva bhavituśca prayojanāt
sarveśvaratā .
īśvarāttu karmaṇaḥ pravartanaṃ kiṃ sataḥ, asataḥ ? tadyadyabhūtasya tato'dvaitaṃ tasyāpi
tadātmakatvāt . bhūtasya cet, prāgapi tadasti, tacca īśvarātmaiva tathābhūtestathāpravṛttestadāpatteḥ, tathāpi sutarāmadvaitam tadātmakatvādeva . atha yasmai pravartyate yathā tasmāt
tarhi tat tathābhūtaṃ tadvaśāt tatheśvarapravṛtteḥ, tatastasya pravartane sa eveśvaraḥ .


svakarmayukta evāyaṃ sarvo'pyutpadyate naraḥ .
sa tathā kriyate tena na yathā svayamicchati ॥  


yathāhāraḥ kāle pariṇativiśeṣakramavaśāt
sukhaṃ pathyo'pathyo'sukhamiha vidhatte tanubhṛtām .
tathā dharmādharmāviti vigataśaṅkāmapi kathāṃ
kathaṃ śrotuṃ neyā viṣayaviṣavegakṣatadhiyaḥ ? ॥  

kiñcānyat, kartṛtvāt prāṇinām iti vartate . mā bhūvannakṛtābhyāgamakṛtapraṇāśakartrantaraphalasaṅkrāntyādayo doṣā iti sadasadācārāḥ prāṇina eva kartāro bhoktāraścābhyupagantavyāḥ, anyathā hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthānāṃ śāstrāṇāmānarthakyaprasaṅgāt . tataḥ kartureva bhavitṛtvābhyupagamāt . kaḥ kartā ? yaḥ
svatantraḥ . yaḥ svatantro bhavitā'pi sa eva . syānmatam--nanvīśvaraḥ prayoktṛtvāt kartetyuktam, netyucyate,
tasyaiva bhavituśca prayojanāt, sarvaḥ prāṇī pratyekaṃ bhavitā prayojayati ātmanā ātmānaṃ svakṛtakarmavipākātmakarāgadveṣabhayagauravādidharmacoditaḥ . yathoktam—
prayatna evāparajanmajo'yaṃ sūryādayaḥ śrāddhajanapravādāḥ .utpaśyatāmeva hi daivasiddhimutsāhinaṃ śrīrbhajate manuṣyam ॥   iti .
tasmāt tanvādipradhānāṇvādiṣu satsvapi pravartyeṣu teṣāmeva karmasādbhūtānāṃ prāṇināṃ bhavitṛtvāt tattadāpatteḥ
sarvaprāṇināṃ svātantryāt karmavaśapreritakāryakāraṇabhāvena satatabhavanāt tathāpravartakasyaikaikasya sarvātmakatvāt
sarveśvaratā iti sādhūktam .
idānīṃ tvadiṣṭeśvarakāraṇatve tu doṣā ucyante --īśvarāt tvityādi . idaṃ cintyam--īśvarāt
karmaṇaḥ pravartanaṃ kiṃ sataḥ, asataḥ ? kiṃ cātaḥ ? tadyadyabhūtasya karmaṇa īśvaraḥ pravartakaḥ tataścādvaitaṃ
puruṣādivādavat prāptaṃ tasyāpi tadātmakatvāt karmaṇo'pīśvarātmakatvādīśvarasyaiva karmatvenotpatteḥ . bhūtasya
cet, atha bhūtasya karmaṇa īśvarāt pravṛttistata etat prāptam --prāgapi tat karmāsti, kāraṇe kāryasya
sattvāt . tacceśvarātmaiva, tanukaraṇādibhāvyavat tathābhūtestathāpravṛttestattadāpatterityādibhiryuktibhiḥ,
tathāpi sutarāmadvaitaṃ tadātmakatvādeva puruṣāvasthāvadīśvarabhāvyatadātmakāṇvādibhavanavad vā . atha yasmai
pravartyate yathā . athācakṣīthāḥ--na tat karmeśvarātmakam, kiṃ tarhi ? yasmai prāṇine śubhamaśubhaṃ vā naranārakatiryagamaravicitrabhedarūpeṇa yena yena prakāreṇa pravartyate teneśvareṇa tattatprāṇyātmakaṃ taditi . atrocyate —
tasmāt tarhi tat tathābhūtam, pratyekaṃ prāṇinaḥ kāraṇāt tasmāt tasmāt tathā tathā bhūtamityarthaḥ,

atha tatkṛtamapi puruṣakārarājaprasādavadīśvarāpekṣaṃ pravartate, kṛtatāṃ prati tāvat
svātantryaṃ siddhaṃ tasyaiva, tatkṛtaṃ hi karmaiva īśvaraprasādamutpādayati . dravyādipañcakāpekṣasevādikriyāphalapratyakṣavat .
tvadabhimateśvarastu yadi svatantraḥ karmānapekṣaśca pravartayati tataḥ pratipuruṣaniyāmakakarmābhāve'nupapannasthānavigrahendriyopabhogābhyudayapratyavāyāpavargādiviśeṣamidaṃ
jagat syāt, tulyakāraṇatvāt, paṭatāntavatvavat .
tadvaśāt tatheśvarapravṛtteḥ, tatastasya pravartane sa eveśvaraḥ, kṛtaṃ tvadiṣṭamīśvarākhyamātmavaśena tathā
pravartayatastasya tasya prāṇina īśvaratvam, neśvarasya tathā pravartyatvāt karmakaravat .
atha tatkṛtamapi puruṣakārarājaprasādavadīśvarāpekṣaṃ pravartate . atha matam--prāṇibhiḥ
kṛtamapi karma īśvarakṛtameva, īśvaravaśāt pravartamānatvāt . tadyathā--dvayoḥ puruṣayostulyapuruṣakārayorapi rājā
ekasyaiva prasīdati netarasyeti phalaṃ rājavaśena dṛṣṭaṃ na puruṣakarmavaśena tatheśvaravaśāt tatkarmapravṛttiriti .
atrocyate --kṛtatāṃ prati tāvat svātantryaṃ siddhaṃ tasyaiva prāṇitoṣiteśvareṇa prāṇyanuṣṭheyakarmapratyayaprasādotpatteḥ, tatra ca rājño nimittamātratvāt . puruṣakṛtakarmajanyaprasādarājavadeva īśvarasyāpyanyatarapuruṣakṛtakarmapratyayaprasādotpādanāt karmasvātantryam, tatkṛtaṃ hi karmaiveśvaraprasādamutpādayati anyatareṇa kṛtaṃ netareṇetyarthaḥ,
anyatarapuruṣakṛtakarmapratyayasyeśvaraprasādasya tenotpādyatvāt tasmāt puruṣakarmāpekṣatvādīśvarapravṛtteḥ karmaprādhānyaṃ
pravṛttau phale ceti . syānmatam--rājavadeva karmaṇaḥ pravṛttau tatphaladāne ceśvaro'pekṣyatvāt pradhānaṃ kāraṇamiti . etacca na, yasmād dravyādipañcaketyādi yāvat pratyakṣavat . dravyaṃ kṣetraṃ kālaṃ bhāvaṃ bhavaṃ cāpekṣya
hi karmaṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ kṛtānāṃ ca phalaṃ pratyakṣata upalabhyate . sa eva puruṣaḥ kartā dravyaṃ dātā deyaṃ vā dravyaṃ
vastrasuvarṇādi . kṣetraṃ grāmanagarāraṇyaraṇabhūmyādi yatra tat prāpyate phalam . kālaḥ kasmiṃścit kāle divā
rātrau pūrvāhṇe'parāhṇe sadyaścirādveti . bhāvaḥ prasannaḥ kupitaḥ ityādi . bhavo hastimahāmātrayoḥ śarīrānurūpāhārābharaṇādidānamiti . atra prayogaḥ--paratrāpi prāṇikṛtaphalaṃ pratiniyatadravyādyapekṣam, sukhādikriyāyāḥ
phalatvāt, dravyādipañcakāpekṣasevādiphalavat . tasmād dravyādipañcakāpekṣamapi karma phaladāne svatantraprāṇiniyateḥ pradhānam . neśvaraṃ ca karmāpekṣate, paratantratvāt tasyeti .
tvadabhimateśvarastvityādi . astu tāvadīśvarasya svātantryaṃ karmānapekṣā ca tasya jagadutpādanārthaṃ
pradhānādi pravartayataḥ, prāṇināṃ karmākāraṇatve tadanapekṣāyāṃ ca doṣa ucyate--tadyathā tataḥ pratipuruṣetyādi,
puruṣaṃ puruṣaṃ prati dravyādipañcakatvena niyāmakaṃ niyataṃ yadi karma na syāt īśvara evāviśiṣṭo hetuḥ syāt
īśvarākhyasya kāraṇasyāviśiṣṭatvādaviśeṣaḥ syāt . kasya ? daiva-mānuṣa-tairyagyonākhyaprāṇigaṇasya . kīdṛg
viśeṣa iti cet, ucyate--sthānavigrahendriyopabhogalakṣaṇo viśeṣo na syāt . kasmāt ? tadviśeṣaheto

anapekṣā ca kiṃ karmaṇaḥ sataḥ, asataḥ ? yadyasata eva, kim ? kriyāvilopaḥ .
uktaṃ ca vaḥ śāstre--yogaṃ sādhayiṣyan... ...nidrātandrāpramādālasyarahitaśca syāt  
ityādi . karmābhāve ca prāṇināṃ sadā muktatvāt tanvādisṛṣṭirīśvarasyānarthikā . tataśca bhāvyabhāvakabhedābhāvād dvaitakalpanānirmūlatā . atha tu vidyamānāveva dharmādharmau nāpekṣate sa tato'kṛtābhyāgamakṛtapraṇāśau doṣau syātām, ākṣīṇoditakarmāśayabandhamokṣābhyām .
rīśvarasya samānatvāt . sa tu viśeṣo dravya-kṣetra-kāla-bhāva-bhavāpekṣaniyateḥ pratipuruṣaṃ ca niyāmake karmaṇi
tatpañcakāpekṣavipāke sati viśiṣṭe syāt . dṛṣṭaśca so'smadabhīṣṭapratiniyatadravyādivipākakarmaprāṇigaṇeśvaratve
sati yujyate--keṣāñcidabhyudayaḥ keṣāñcit pratyavāyaḥ keṣāñcidapavarga iti . atra prayogaḥ --anupapannasthānavigrahendriyopabhogābhyudayapratyavāyāpavargādiviśeṣamidaṃ jagat syāt, tulyakāraṇatvāt,
paṭatāntavatvavat, yathā paṭastantukāraṇatvāviśeṣāt tāntavaḥ na mārtikaḥ sauvarṇo veti jātyākṛtivarṇādyaviśiṣṭastathedaṃ jagat syāt, na tu bhavati . tasmādayuktam . athavā pratiniyatadravyādyapekṣavipākānekeśvarakāraṇapūrvakamevedaṃ jagat, prativiśiṣṭajātyākṛtivarṇādimattvāt, ghaṭapaṭarathādivat . tasmāt karmāpekṣamīśvaratvaṃ
sarvaprāṇināmiti .
abhyupetyāpi karmānapekṣāṃ tatra doṣaṃ brūmaḥ --anapekṣā cetyādi . kimiyamīśvarasya dharmādharmalakṣaṇasya
karmaṇo'napekṣā sataḥ ? asataḥ ? . kiñcātaḥ ? yadyasata eva dharmādharmayorasatorevānapekṣā, kimiti
praśnaḥ, tataḥ kimiti cet, ucyate --kriyāvilopaḥ, asatorhi tayoḥ khapuṣpakharaviṣāṇayoriva kāpekṣā ?
tataśca hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthāḥ sarvāḥ kriyā vilupyeran, iṣyante ca tāḥ, yasmāduktaṃ ca vaḥ śāstre--yogaṃ
sādhayiṣyannityādi gatārthaṃ yāvad nidrātandrāpramādālasyarahitaśca syādityādi ityācāravidhāyigranthasmāraṇam . kiñcānyat, karmābhāve cetyādi yāvad nirmūlatā, akarmatvāt prāṇinaḥ sadā muktāḥ
syuḥ . tataśca tanvindriyaviṣayasambandhino na bhavanti . tataśca tanvādisṛṣṭirīśvarasyānarthikā . tataśca
bhāvyabhāvakabhedābhāvaḥ . tasmād bhāvyabhāvakabhedābhāvādīśvarakarmapradhānāṇvādidvaitakalpanānirmūlatā .
evaṃ tāvadasataḥ karmaṇo'napekṣā na yuktā . atha tu vidyamānāveva dharmādharmāvabhyudayapratyavāyaniḥśreyasakriyāyāṃ nāpekṣate sa īśvaraḥ svatantratvāt prayojanābhāvācca tayoḥ vidvadvyākhyānādikriyāsu balīvardānapekṣaṇavaditi manyase tato'kṛtābhyāgamakṛtapraṇāśau doṣau syātām . katham ? yathāsaṅkhyamākṣīṇoditakarmāśayabandhamokṣābhyām . yāvatkṣīṇakarmaṇo'pi bandhābhyudayapratyavāyasambandhī akṛtābhyāgamaḥ syāt,
kutaḥ ? dharmādharmanirapekṣatvāt svabhāvapuruṣādivādimatavat . uditātyantāśubhakarmāśayasya nārakāderapi
muktyabhyudayasambandhī kṛtapraṇāśaḥ syāt dharmādharmanirapekṣatvāt puruṣasvabhāvādivādimatavadeva, aniṣṭaṃ caitat .
evaṃ tāvadīśvarasya karmānapekṣā aniṣṭāpatterayuktā .


atha karmāpekṣaḥ pravartate tatastānyeva karmāṇi īśvarāṇi, teṣāṃ tasyāpi tathā
bhāvayitṛtvāt . na sa tāni tathā bhāvayati, tathā bhāvyamānatvāt, anāpannasyāsattvāt kharaviṣāṇavat, asvatantratvācchabdādivat . bhavati kartā svatantraḥ,
tathā pravartanavṛttatvāt, tantupaṭavat .
īśvarasyāpi ca karmaṇi vṛtteḥ sarva eva puruṣaḥ sannihitatadvidhaśaktiḥ prativiśiṣṭabuddhipramāṇīkṛtakriyaḥ svatantraḥ tathāpravṛttyāpatteḥ ā īśvarāt pravartayitṛtvāt

athaivaṃvidhāniṣṭāpattivyāvṛttyarthaṃ karmāpekṣaḥ pravartate iti manyase tatastānyeva karmāṇi kartṝṇi
svatantrāṇi bhavitṝṇi īśvarāṇi . kasmāddhetoḥ ? teṣāṃ tasyāpi tathā bhāvayitṛtvāt, yasmāt tamapīśvaraṃ tena tena prakāreṇa bhavantaṃ bhāvayanti tānyeva karmāṇi, na sa tāni karmāṇi tathā bhāvayati, kutaḥ ?
tathā bhāvyamānatvāt pradhānena śabdādivaditi vakṣyamāṇadṛṣṭāntatvāt . yathā ca pṛthivyudakādīn vrīhireva
tathā bhāvayati pṛthivyādyapekṣo'pi tathāpatteḥ, na pṛthivyādayastathānāpatteḥ; evaṃ karmāṇyeveśvarāṇi tathā
bhāvayitṛtvāt, na tvadiṣṭeśvarastathā bhāvyamānatvāditi . syānmatam--pṛthivyudakādīnyapi bhāvayanti eva
vrīhiṃ vrīhitvenānāpannānyapīti . etaccāyuktam, teṣāmasattvāt, asattvaṃ ca anāpannasyāsattvāt khara-
viṣāṇavaditi sannidhibhavanadūṣaṇe prakrāntameva nyāyaṃ darśayati . asvatantratvācchabdādivaditi eṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ
sarvatra pradhānakāraṇatvasādharmyeṇopāttaḥ kāpilān prati, yathā pradhānasvātantryāt tatkāraṇatvaṃ gamayati śabdādi
ārātīyakāraṇatvābhāvaṃ cāsvātantryāt teṣāmiti nāvyaktamiti vyaktamityeva vā pradhānatā bhavatīti yathā
tvayaivoktaṃ tathaiveśvaro'svatantratvāt karmāpekṣatvādakāraṇaṃ tānyeva kāraṇānīti gamayati tābhireva tvaduktābhirupapattibhiḥ . ato yaduktaṃ tvaduktā evopapattayaḥ sarvaprāṇīśvaratāṃ sādhayantīti tat sādhu . tadbhāvayannāha —
bhavati kartetyādi prāgvyākhyātārthānyeva bhavatyekārthapadāni yāvat tantupaṭavaditi . yathā tantava eva
paṭaniṣpādanena bhavantastathāpravartanavṛttatvāt paṭakāraṇāni tathā puruṣā eva kartāra iti .
īśvarasyāpi cetyādi tāsāmevopapattīnāmitomukhatāṃ bhāvayati anenāpi granthena . yathā tvayā
prāgupapāditaṃ bruvatā pūrvapūrvaśaktatāratamyena sannihitatadvidhaśaktirviśiṣṭabuddhiriti tathehāpi tābhirevopapattibhistaireva ca tantvaṃśvādibhirdṛṣṭāntaiḥ karmaṇi vṛtteḥ karmaniṣṭhatvāt sṛṣṭyatiśayaprakarṣasya karmaṇāṃ puruṣatvāt
sarva eva puruṣaḥ sannihitatadvidhaśaktiḥ prativiśiṣṭabuddhipramāṇīkṛtakriyaḥ, prativiśiṣṭabuddhinā
tenaiśvareṇātenaiveśvareṇānyaiśca śāstrakārairviśvadṛśvabhirapi pramāṇīkṛtāstatkriyāstatkriyāphalaparijñānārthatvācchāstrakāraprabhṛtīnāṃ
siddhaśāstrāṇāmanatiśaṅkyatvācca . sa ca svatantraḥ, tathāpravṛttyāpatteḥ tena prakāreṇa karmiprāṇipravṛtti-
vadīśvarasyāpi pravṛttyāpatteḥ, eśvarāt pravartayitṛtvāditi, ā īśvarāt yāvadīśvarastāvat pravartayitṛtvā

kāraṇam, śaktimatpravṛttyapravṛttidarśanāt...paktrādivat, yāvadevamevāsya sarvatvāt
sarvamūrtitā . api ca utkarṣāpakarṣadarśanāt pravṛttyanubhavaphala... ...puruṣādṛte'pravṛttereva utkarṣāpakarṣau na nirbījeśvarakāmacāreraṇāt .
karmāpekṣatve'pi neśvaravaiyarthyam, tadabhāve pravṛttyabhāvāt, dārvādyapekṣarathakāravaditi cet, na, itaratrāpi tulyatvāt . tadyathā--īśvarāpekṣatve'pi na karmavaiyarthyam, tata eva, rathakārāpekṣarathadāruvat . pravartayitṛtvācceśvarasya tathā pravartakaṃ
karma, karmaṇaḥ puruṣaḥ, iti puruṣa eveśvaraḥ . evaṃ pratighātaprasaṅgo'pīśvarasya, sāpekṣapravṛttitvāt, rathakāravat . yathā rathakāre upādānopakaraṇāsāmarthyavaikalyayoḥ
dīśvarasya pravartyatvāt kāraṇāni sarvapuruṣāḥ . śaktimatpravṛttītyādi, īśvarasyāpi teṣāmeva śaktimatāṃ puruṣāṇāṃ śaktisākalyasannidhyasannidhyoḥ pravṛttyapravṛttidarśanāditi tadevopapattijātaṃ smārayati yāvat paktrādivaditi, ādigrahaṇād rajovat pravṛttivadityādi, pūrvavadeva granthaṃ cātidiśati --yāvadevamevāsyayāvadevamevāsya sarvatvāt sarvamūrtitā, evameva cāsya kṣityādyaṣṭamūrtitocyate ityetasmādavadherārātīyo granthaḥ sarvo draṣṭavyastābhirevopapattibhiḥ sarvaprāṇīśvaratve tadvadeveti . punarapi cotkarṣāpakarṣadarśanādityādirīśvarasargasādhanārtho
granthaḥ pravṛttyanubhavaphaletyādistadvadeva yāvat puruṣādṛte'pravṛttereva utkarṣāpakarṣau na nirbījeśvarakāmacāreraṇāditi karmakāraṇatvārtho gatārthaḥ . tasmāt karmāpekṣatvāt sarvasarvātmakatvāt sarveśvarateti .
karmāpekṣatve ityādi yāvad rathakāravaditi cet . syānmatam--karmāpekṣatve'pi na vyarthamīśvarakāraṇatvam, tadabhāve pravṛttyabhāvāt . yatra yadabhāve pravṛttyabhāvaḥ pravartakasya tatreśvarasyāpyavaiyarthyaṃ dṛṣṭam,
yathā rathakārapravṛttau rathārthaṃ dārvādyapekṣaṇamiti cenmanyase, tanna, itaratrāpi tulyatvāt . tat kathamiti
cet, prayogata eva darśyate viparyayasiddhiḥ, tadyathā--īśvarāpekṣatve'pi na karmavaiyarthyam, tata eva
hetoḥ, rathakārāpekṣarathadāruvaditi viruddhaikāntikaḥ .
tadupasaṃhṛtyāha --pravartayitṛtvācceśvarasyetyādi yāvat puruṣa eveśvara iti . pravartayitā hīśvaraḥ,
dāsasya svāmivat . tacca pravartayitṛtvaṃ karmaṇaḥ siddhamuktavidhinā pravartyatvaṃ ceśvarasya, tathā pravartakaṃ karma,
karmaṇaḥ puruṣaḥ pravartata iti prakṛtatvād gamyate, itiśabdo hetvarthe, tasmāt puruṣa eveśvaraḥ sarva iti .
evaṃ karmeśvaratāpi tu, yathaivaṃ tathottaratra bhāvayiṣyate . puruṣasya tāvat sarvasyeśvaratvamuktamiti . evaṃ pratighātaprasaṅgo'pītyādi . kiñcānyat, pratihanyate ca tvadabhimateśvaraḥ sāpekṣapravṛttitvād rathakāravat . asya
sādhanasya vyākhyā --yathā rathakāra ityādi, upādānaṃ dāru, upakaraṇāni vāsyādīni, teṣāmasāmarthyaṃ
vaiguṇyaṃ satāmeva vaikalyaṃ tvanyatamābhāva eva, tatra pratighāto dṛṣṭaḥ iti vākyaśeṣaḥ . tathetyādi dārṣṭā

pratighātastathā apacitakuśalamanujighṛkṣataḥ upacitakuśalaṃ copajighāṃsatastasya
yadyapratighātaḥ syāt syāt svātantryam, na tu bhavati, puruṣakṛtakarmapratyayena
īśvarapravṛttipratighātadarśanāt .
yattūcyate--sargādau apratihatasvaśaktivaśādeva śarīrādīnyutpādya pratibuddhānāṃ
prāṇināṃ dharmādharmamaryādāmupadiśati, madhyakāle ca teṣāṃ svamaryādānuṣṭhānānurūpeṇa
phalena iṣṭenāniṣṭena vā anugrahaṃ karoti, ayamanugraha eva teṣāṃ tadṛṇamokṣaṇavat,
mokṣamārgopasevinaśca sāyojyaṃ gamayati, antakāle ca śarīrendriyabhūtavat kuśalākuśale saṃhṛtya pralayakṣapāyāṃ svāpayati, yadapi cākāṅkṣyate tasya sarvajñatvaṃ sarvakāri-
ntikam, sāpekṣapravṛttitvasādharmyānugamenopanayanaṃ rathakāre kāryam, vaidharmyeṇa tu darśayati --apacitakuśalamanujighṛkṣata ityādinā . puruṣamapacitaśubhakarmāṇamanugrahītumicchatastadviparītaṃ copahantumicchatastasyeśvarasya
yadyapratighātaḥ syāt syāt svātantryam, na tu bhavati, apekṣyasya karmaṇaḥ svakṛtakarmavaśasya pratyayena
tadvaśena īśvarasya pravṛttipratighātadarśanāt . na cedevamiṣyate, śubhakarmāṇaṃ duḥkhenetaraṃ ca sukhena yojayet .
tathā ca akṛtābhyāgamakṛtapraṇāśau syātām ityuktam, tacca neṣṭam . tasmāt puruṣakarmapratyayena īśvarapravṛttipratighāto'sti, pravṛttipratighātācca naiśvaryaṃ tasya pratighātyatvāt pṛthagjanavadityanīśvaraḥ sa iti .
yattūcyata ityādi yāvat pralayakṣapāyāṃ svāpayatīti . kālabhedena sāpekṣanirapekṣapravṛttipakṣayorabhyupagamādubhayathāpi siddheḥ pravṛttipratighātāsambhavādadoṣaḥ . tadyathā --sargādau dharmādharmavikalānāṃ śarīrendriyaviṣayotpādane nirapekṣo'pratihatasvaśaktivaśādeva śarīrādīnyutpādayati, tāṃścotpādya buddhānāṃ suptotthi-
tānāṃ dharmādharmamaryādāmupadiśati tapodānayajñādi kuruta, mā kārṣṭa hiṃsānṛtasteyāgamyāgamanādīni iti,
tayośca dharmādharmayoḥ sīmācchedena vyavasthāṃ maryādāmupadeśena vyavasthāpayati . madhyakāle ca teṣāṃ prāṇināṃ
yathāsvaṃ dharmādharmamaryādāmanutiṣṭhatāmanuṣṭhānānurūpeṇa phaleneṣṭena aniṣṭena vā viṣayopabhogalakṣaṇenānugrahaṃ
karoti yadā tadā sāpekṣo'pratihatasvaśaktivaśādeva . syānmatam--dharmānuṣṭhānaphalopabhogena iṣṭenānugraho
yujyate, kathamadharmānuṣṭhānaphalopabhogenāniṣṭena yuktaḥ ? ityatrocyate --ayamanugraha eva teṣāṃ tadṛṇamokṣaṇāditi . ye punastadupadiṣṭamokṣamārgaprasthitāstāṃśca mokṣamārgopasevinaḥ sāyojyaṃ gamayati . ko'sau
mokṣamārgaḥ ? māheśvaro yogavidhiḥ . tānātmanā saha yuṅkte iti sayuk, tadbhāvaḥ sāyojyaṃ teṣāmīśvarasādbhāvaḥ,
taṃ gamayati nayati . etad madhye sāpekṣamaiśvaryam . punarapyantakāle ca śarīrendriyabhūtavat, yathā
śarīrendriyāṇi bhūtākhyāṃśca viṣayānupasaṃharati tathā kuśalākuśale teṣāṃ dharmādharmāvapi saṃhṛtya tān puruṣān
sargāhani saṃsṛtavatastena dharmādharmaphaleneṣṭāniṣṭopabhogātmakena divasavyāyāmapariśramābhibhūtān bālakān putrakāniva pitā sarvapuruṣān saṃsārahetubhūtadharmādharmānupasaṃhṛtya pralayakṣapāyāṃ svāpayatītyante'pi nirapekṣo'prati

tvāt tadapi naiva, asyānarthakārthapravṛttabālādipravṛttivadajñakriyāsādharmyād dharmādharmopadeśapravṛtteranarthakārthaviṣayatvāt . yasyābhāve yasyābhāvo yasya ca bhāve yasya dhruvo
bhāvastat kāraṇam, itarat kāryam . na ca dharmādyabhāve śarīrāderabhāvaḥ, sargādau
śarīrādinirvṛttyabhyupagamāt . na ca dharmādibhāve dhruvaḥ śarīrāderbhāvaḥ, adattaphalakuśalākuśalasaṃhārādantakāle .
yathā copadeśe'nabhijñatvaṃ tasya tathā prāṇināmapyanugrahakriyāyāmanugrahakriyāyā api yadā
hatasvātantryaḥ sa eveṣṭaḥ . tasmādubhayathāpi apekṣyānapekṣya ca tadaiśvaryasiddheradoṣa eva doṣābhimatyā tvayodbhāvita iti parapakṣaḥ .
atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ--tatkāritvāt tajjñatvamiti yat sarvajñatvamākāṅkṣyate tadapi naiva . karmaṇāmeva tannirapekṣa--
pravṛttau tasya pratighātādanaiśvaryaṃnaiśvaryam, sṛṣṭaprāṇisaṃsārakāle sargādyantayośca akṛtābhyāgamakṛtapraṇāśādidoṣāstadavasthā
evetyaparihṛtadoṣatvād na kiñcidetat . anyo'pi ca doṣaḥ --yadapi cākāṅkṣyate tasya sarvajñatvaṃ
sarvakāritvāt karaṇasya jñānāvinābhāvāt sarvaṃ cet karotyavaśyaṃ sarvamasau vettīti sarvakāritvāt sarvajña
iti, tadapi naivopapadyate, asyānarthakārthapravṛttabālādipravṛttivadajñakriyāsādharmyādajño'sau bālavadasamīkṣitapravṛttitvādityetadanayā kalpanayāsmākaṃ tvayā pratyakṣīkriyate, kiṃ kāraṇam ? dharmādharmopadeśapravṛtteranarthakārthaviṣayatvāt, anarthakau dharmādharmāvarthau hyasya dharmādharmamaryādopadeśasya . na ca tayordharmādharmayoḥ
śarīrādikāraṇatvam, vināpi dharmādharmamaryādayā sargādau prabhusṛṣṭeḥ śarīrādinirvṛttyabhyupagamāt, dharmādharmamaryādāyāṃ satyāmeva ca pralayakāle śarīrādyabhāvābhyupagamācceśvarasāmarthyādeva . tasmāt tayornāsti kāraṇatā,
kāraṇalakṣaṇāyogāt . kiṃ tat kāraṇalakṣaṇamiti cet, ucyate --yasyābhāve ityādi gatārthaṃ yāvaditarat
kāryamiti . kathaṃ tadayoga iti cet, ucyate --na ca dharmādyabhāva ityādinā granthena tayoḥ kāraṇābhimatayorabhāve'pi śarīrādeḥ kāryasya bhāvaṃ bhāve'pi cābhāvamupadeśasāphalyānabhijñatvaṃ ca darśayati yāvadadattaphalakuśalākuśalasaṃhārādantakāle iti gatārthatvād na vivriyante'kṣarāṇi .
kiñcānyat, yathā copadeśa ityādi yāvat kriyāyā api anabhijñatvamiti vartate . na kevalamupadeśānabhijñatvameva tasya, kiṃ tarhi ? prāṇināmanugrahakriyānabhijñatāpi iti tadatidiśati . tat kathaṃ

tadedaṃ vyāmūḍhyaiva... ...kim... ...upabhogavibhājanānugrahakriyayā atigarīyasyā ?
iti atyantaparavaśatvamevaiśvaryamucyate . anugraho'pi viparyayeṇocyate, duḥkhahetuduḥkhātmakatvābhyām, viṣakṛtabhojanakleśanavat . tatsāyojyagamane'pyevam .
evaṃ ca tat sādhveva yattvāśaṅkyate tvayā ādyantavad madhye'pi īśvaraprādhānyādīśvaravaśādeva pravṛttau phalasaṅkaraprasaṅgaḥ, tatprasaktau kriyāvilopaḥ, tataśca sarvanirmokṣaḥ sarvānirmokṣo vā  iti .
bhāvyate iti cet, ucyate --yadā tadedaṃ vyāmūḍhyaivetyādirbhāvanāgranthaḥ yāvadupabhogavibhājanānugraha-
kriyayā'tigarīyasyā kimiti vartate ? tasmin hi kāle prāṇināmandhalakavat pravṛtterīśvarasyaiva teṣāṃ
śarīrādyutpādayāmi, dharmādharmamaryādāṃ praṇayāmi, tatra pravartayāmi, tatphalairanubadhnāmi, tān prāṇinaḥ phalānurūpamiṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ copabhogaṃ vibhajyānugṛhṇāmi ityevamādikā yānugrahakriyā tayānugrahakriyayā kliśyamānasyānekapuruṣastrīnapuṃsakajanasādhāraṇasyeva bhṛtakasyātikleśaḥ . iti hetvarthe, tasmādatikleśatvādatyantaparavaśatvamevaiśvaryaṃ śītalikāparyāyaśabdābhidheyalūtāvaducyate iti .
kiñcānyat, anugraho'pi viparyayeṇocyate ananugraha eva san anugrahaḥ iti . kiṃ kāraṇam ?
duḥkhahetuduḥkhātmakatvābhyām, duḥkhahetutvādiṣṭopabhogasya hiṃsādyātmano'rjana-rakṣaṇa-kṣaya-saṅgadoṣe
duḥkhātmakatvācca aniṣṭopabhogasya, duḥkhātmakatvāccānanugraha evāsau . dṛṣṭāntaḥ --viṣakṛtabhojanakleśanavat,
yathā kaścit krūramūrkhanṛpatiḥ svavaśān bhṛtyān viṣamiśramāhāraṃ bhojayan anugṛhṇāmi vaḥ iti brūyāt tathā
tvadabhimateśvaro'pīti . yaccoktaṃ duḥkhamapi tadṛṇamokṣaṇavadanugraha eva iti, etadapyayuktam, saṃsāramocakavyādhacaṇḍālādimāritasattvānugrahaprasaṅgāt sattvanikāyakalikaluṣakṛtātmopanipātanena ajñābodhe sattvānugrahavadajñānaprasaṅgācca . tatsāyojyagamane'pyevam, īśvareṇa kila sāyojyaṃ mokṣaḥ, svātmanā sāyojyaṃ
gamayannapyasau prāṇigaṇamatikleśabhājanameva karoti sṛṣṭasaṃsārakliṣṭeśvaratvasyoktalakṣaṇasyāmokṣaśabdābhidheyatvādalamaiśvaryeṇa mokṣeṇa ca tādṛśā sadā sarvapuruṣavyāpārodvahanāyāsātmanā . tasmād varamātmādhīnayatheṣṭaceṣṭaṃ
daurgatyamapīti .
evaṃ ca tad yattvāśaṅkyate tvayā ādyantavadityādinā granthena vineśvareṇa kilaite doṣāḥ
itīṣṭāste sahāpīśvareṇa tathaivaiva bhavantīti taddarśayannāha --sādhvevetyādi gatārthaṃ hetuhetumadbhāvapratipādanakrameṇa
yāvat tatprasaktau kriyāvilopaḥ . kutaḥ ? īśvaraprādhānyāduktānantaradoṣācceti dharmādharmakriyāḥ prāṇināṃ na
syuḥ phalābhāvādīśvaravaśādeva ādyantamadhyeṣu phalasaṅkarāt . tataśca sarvaprāṇināṃ nirmokṣaḥ niḥśeṣamokṣastadvaśādeva sarvānirmokṣo vā proktaproktaprāpta? iti .


yattu sarvaśāstrakriyāvilopaparihārārthaṃ karmādyupasarjanatayā īśvaraprādhānyakāraṇye prokte ādau sa eva svaśaktita eva sākṣād vyāpriyate śarīrādyutpādane
dharmādharmamaryādāṃ copadiśati, tadanu dhyānāt puṇyamutpādya dharmādharmamaryādāyāḥ
paripālakān brahmādīnādhikārikān viniyuṅkte, ante ca dharmādharmau saṃhṛtya
śarīrādivat kuśalākuśalāśayakalaṅkaśuddhaṃ svāpayati . idamanyathaivodgrāhyate
īśvarakarmaṇoḥ pradhānopasarjanabhāvābhyupagamād dvaitam, bhāvyate tvanyathā sa eva
svaśaktita eva ityavadhāraṇādadvaitārthabhāvanāt sākṣādevāprayojanena kasyacit . evaṃniyamanāyeyamapi bhāvanā--tadanudhyānāttadanu dhyānāt puṇyamutpādya iti . pratyupasaṃhriyate tu dvaitādvaite dve
api tyaktvā . advaitasya tyāgastāvad dharmādharmamaryādāsthāpanavacanena . maryādā nāma
anatikramasthānam, sukhaduḥkhapravṛttisīmā . tataśca sargādau sthānādyātmake sukhaduḥkhe'pi na syātām, aniyataviṣayatvāt, pralayavat . ante ca syātām, aniyata-

yattu sarvaśāstretyādi . etaddoṣaparihārārthaṃ karmādyupasarjanatayā īśvaraprādhānyakāraṇye prokte .
katham ? iti tad bhāvayatyuttareṇa granthena --ādau sa eva svaśaktita evetyādinā yāvaccharīrādivat
kuśalākuśalāśayakalaṅkaśuddhaṃ svāpayatīti gatārthaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ . dharmādharmamaryādāyāḥ paripālakān
brahmādīnādhikārikān viniyuṅkte iti viśeṣaḥ . atrottaramāhācāryaḥ --idamanyathaivodgrāhyate ityādi .
anyathā tāvat pratijñāyate īśvarakarmaṇoḥ pradhānopasarjanabhāvābhyupagamād dvaitam, bhāvyate tu sādhyahetuvyākhyānaṃ kriyate anyathā . kathamiti cet, sa eva svaśaktita evānyanirapekṣa ityavadhāraṇādadvaitārthabhāvanāt, adṛṣṭādīnāṃ tacchaktīnāṃ ca svato vyatiriktānāṃ nirāsena sākṣādevāprayojanena kasyacit
kañcidapyanyamaprayojayan sākṣāt svaśaktita eva ityavadhārayatā cādvaitameva bhāvyate bhavatā . punarapyāha—
evaṃniyamanāyeti, advaitaniyamanāyeyamapi bhāvanā . katamā sā bhāvanā iti cet, tadanu dhyānāt
puṇyamutpādya ityeṣāpyadvaitabhāvanaiveti . evaṃ tāvat pratijñātaṃ dvaitam, advaitaṃ bhāvitamityuktam .
pratyupasaṃhriyate tu dvaitādvaite dve api tyaktveti pratijñātabhāvite dvaitādvaite api tyaktvā . tatrādvaitasya tyāgastāvad dharmādharmamaryādāsthāpanavacanena kṛta iti vākyaśeṣaḥ . kā maryādā ? ucyate —
maryādā nāma anatikramasthānamiti maryādālakṣaṇamāha . viṣayatastu sukhaduḥkhapravṛttisīmā, ityati viṣaye
sukhamiyati duḥkhamiti dharmādharmayoḥ sīmani svake svake vyavasthāpanam, dharmasya sukhapravṛtticchedena adharmasya
duḥkhapravṛtticchedena ayamasmādanyaḥ, ayamitarasmādanyaḥ iti sīmāvibhāgaḥsīmā vibhāgaḥ . tataḥ kimiti cet, tataśca
sargādau sthānādītyādīti, sthānavigrahendriyaviṣayāḥ sthānādayaḥ, tadātmake sukhaduḥkhe'pi na syātām .
kasmāt ? aniyataviṣayatvāt, aniyatau hi viṣayau tadā sukhaduḥkhayoḥ avidyamānasthānāditvādavidyamānadharmādharmatvācca . dṛṣṭāntaḥ --pralayavat, yathā pralaye dharmādharmābhāvādevāniyataviṣaye sukhaduḥkhe, tataścāsatī, tadvat sargādāvapi syātāmiti . kiñcānyat, ante ca syātām sukhaduḥkhe iti vartate . kutaḥ ?

viṣayatvād niyataviṣayatvādvā, madhyavat . madhye vā na syātām, antavat .
athocyeta--ata eva na sukhādipravartanātmikā dharmādharmamaryādā, kiṃ tarhi ?
dharmo'yamadharmo'yamiti . etadapi tulyaṃ pūrveṇa, asattvāt . dhāraṇāddhānādvā dharma
ityarthasyābhāve kathamasau dharmaḥ, tadviparyayo vā kathamadharmaḥ ?
atha tu tasya rucereva sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā tato dharmādharmamaryādāvacanamanarthakam,
sadaiva īśvaraśaktimātravaśādeva yathā tathā yasya kasyacit siddheḥ, ādyantavat .
aniyataviṣayatvāt, viṣayāniyamo'pi ca rūpādipañcakatvādyabhāvādupasaṃharaṇakāle, madhyakālavat .
athavā niyataviṣayavattvāt, vyavasthāpitadharmādharmamaryādatvāt sukhaduḥkhe tadā niyataviṣaye, tasmāt tadāpi 
syātāṃ madhyamakālavat sṛṣṭyuttarakālavadityarthaḥ . tadviparyayeṇa vā sādhanam --madhye vā na syātāṃ sukhaduḥkhe
niyataviṣayatvāditi vartate, antavaditi .
athocyetetyādi yāvaddharmo'yamadharmo'yamiti . syānmatam --ata eveśvarasyaiva kāraṇatvād na sukhādipravartanātmikā dharmādharmamaryādā tatsamarthanāsamarthetyarthaḥ, īśvarasyaiva sukhaduḥkhayoḥ pravartakatvāt . yadi sā na pravartayati sukhaduḥkhe dharmādharmamaryādā kimarthamasau tāṃ vyavasthāpayatīti cet, ucyate,
svarūpasaṃjñāvyavasthāpanamasau tayorlokavyavahārārthaṃ karotītyata āha --kiṃ tarhi ? ayaṃ dharmo'yamadharma ityetāvadupadeśeneti . atrācārya uttaramāha --etadapi tulyaṃ pūrveṇa, asattvāt, sargādāvantavanna syātāmaniyataviṣayatvāt, ante ca syātāṃ niyataviṣayatvādvā madhyavat, madhye vā na syātāmantavaditīdameva
doṣajālaṃ prāptam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? dhāraṇāddhānādvā dharma iti nirukteryadi maryādāṃ dhārayati prāṇināṃ sukhe
caitān dhatte tato dharma ityetasyārthasyābhāve kathamasau dharma ucyate ? tadviparyayo vā kathamadharma iti
tadviparītārthābhāve ? tasmāt sukhasthānādidhāraṇāddharmaḥ, sukhakāraṇaṃ hyavyabhicāri tadiṣyate, yasyābhāve yasyābhāvo yasya ca bhāve yasya dhruvo bhāvastat kāraṇamitarat kāryamiti kāraṇasya dharmasya kāryasya ca sukhasyāvyabhicārāt . evamadharme'pi vyākhyā viparītārthā kāryā . tasmādayuktam--saṃjñākaraṇamātreṇa maryādeti .
atha tvityādi . syānmatam --tasyeśvarasya rucerevecchātaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ vā na dhāraṇadhāna-
pravṛttyātmakatvāddharmasyānyasya vā kasyaciditi . atrocyate --dharmādharmamaryādāvacanamanarthakam, yaduktaṃ
pratibuddhānāṃ prāṇināṃ dharmādharmamaryādāmupadiśyottarakālaṃ svamaryādānuṣṭhānānurūpyeṇa ityādi tat sarvamanarthakaṃ saṃvṛttam . tatsādhanārthaṃ hetumāha sadṛṣṭāntam --sadaivetyādi yāvad yasya kasyacit siddherādyantavaditi . sargasyādau madhye'vasāne ca sadaiva sarvakālamīśvaraśaktimātravaśādevānyasya kāraṇasyābhāve'pi yathā tathā yena vā tena vā prakāreṇa sukhasya duḥkhasya veṣṭāniṣṭaśarīrāderaniyamena yasya kasyacit
mārakasyāhiṃsakasya vā siddherdharmādharmākāraṇatvam . tadakāraṇatvādādyantavat prathamāvasānakālayoriva
tanmaryādāvacanamanarthakamiti . evaṃ tāvadadvaitatyāgaḥ .


tathā dvaitamapi tyaktaṃ sākṣādvyāpāravacanāt . sākṣādvyāpāro hyaiśvaryam, tasmāt
tadavyāhatavṛtteḥ kiṃ dharmādinā, kimādhikārikaiḥ ? atha tairvinā śaktirvyāhanyate
tasya tarhi vyāhataśaktitvāttvevamanīśvaratā itaravat .
nanu pradhānopasarjanadvaitapratijñānāt tatsaṃvādena bhāvanārthaṃ sargādau sākṣādvyāpāra ucyate upasarjanena vināpi pradhānasya pravṛttisadbhāvāt citrācāryasyeva
śiṣyeṇa vināpi tathā'dṛṣṭādyabhāve'pīśvarasya . na, ādikarasya kartṛtvāt . avyajyamānaprakāravyaktirādiḥ, ādānāt, ādityodayāditvavat . prayojanaparamārthatvād bhavitṛtvasya .

na kevalamadvaitatyāga eva, kiṃ tarhi ? tathā dvaitamapi tyaktam . kutaḥ ? sākṣādvyāpāravacanādityādi yāvat kimādhikārikairiti . sākṣādvyāpāro hyaiśvaryam, tad vyācaṣṭe --tasmāt tadavyāhatavṛtteḥ
tasya sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ sarvakālaṃ sarvadeśe vā'vyāhatā vṛttirasya, atastadavyāhatavṛttitvāt kiṃ dharmādinā ?
ādigrahaṇādadharmeṇa kim ? sthānavigrahendriyaviṣayairvā prāṇināṃ sukhaduḥkhāśrayaiḥ prāṇibhirvā kiṃ kriyate ? na
kiñcidityabhiprāyaḥ . kimādhikārikaiḥ brahmamanuviṣṇvādibhirdharmādharmamaryādāpālanārthaṃ viniyujyamānairveti .
atha manyase tairvinā śaktirvyāhanyate tasyeśvarasya tatastarhyasya vyāhataśaktitvāt tvevamanīśvaratā
kāryāntarāśakteḥ śramādvā itaravaditi pṛthagjanavadityarthaḥ .
nanu pradhānopasarjanetyādi yāvat tathā'dṛṣṭādyabhāve'pīśvarasyeti . āha--dvaitamevodgrāhitaṃ
bhāvitaṃ pratyupasaṃhṛtaṃ ca, nānyathodgrāhabhāvanopasaṃhārāḥ . katham ? pradhānamupasarjanaṃ ca dvaitaṃ pratijñātam,
tasyaivārthasya saṃvādeneśvaraḥ pradhānaṃ na karmetyetadbhāvanārthaṃ sargasyādau svaśaktitaḥ sa eva sākṣād vyāpriyate
ityucyate . kasmāt ? upasarjanena vināpi pradhānasya pravṛttisadbhāvāt citrācāryasyeva śiṣyeṇa
vināpīti . yathā śiṣyamapradhānaṃ grāhayitvā citrakarmāgrāhayitvā vā prāyeṇa tena vinā saha vā citrakarmaṇi
citrakarācāryaḥ pravartata eva svaprādhānyāt sannidhyasannidhyorapi śiṣyasya pravartakatvādevamīśvaro'pyadṛṣṭādisannidhyasannidhyoḥ pravartate pradhānatvāditi bhāvyatvādudgrāhitadvaitānurūpabhāvanopasaṃhārātmakatvād na
kaściddoṣa iti .
etacca na, ādikarasya kartṛtvāt . ādiṃ karotyādikaraḥ, sa eva ca kartā, tasyaiva kartṛtvāt .
ko'sāvādiriti cet, ucyate --avyajyamānaprakāravyaktirādiḥ, sata evārthasyāvyaktasya kenacit
prakāreṇa vyaktirādiḥ . kutaḥ ? ādānāditi ādānamādiḥ ityakṣarārthaniruktimāha hetuṃ dṛṣṭāntaṃ ca
ādityodayāditvavaditi, yathā ādityasyodayamadhyāhnāstamayatvaprakāreṇa divasavibhāgānāṃ vidyamānānāṃ
vyaktirevaṃ tatra . prayojanaparamārthatvād bhavitṛtvasya, yaḥ prayojayati paramārthataḥ sa kartā bhavitā

ādikaratvaṃ ca yathā vrīhau sambhāvyate, avrīhermṛdādervrīhitvena ādikaratvāt .
tathā prāk pṛthivyādīnāmapyādikaratvaṃ paścādapi tathā, tadāditvād vrīheḥ tathābhivyakteḥ tatprayuktatvāt . kasmāt pṛthivyeva na bhūto vrīhiḥ ? ko vā bravīti pṛthivī
na bhūta udakādiśca vrīhiriti vrīhyādi vā pṛthivyādi na bhūtamiti, tatprayuktatvāt ? itaścetaśca tadātmakatvāt tadavyatiriktatvāt tat tadeva .
bhūkṛñoḥ sarvadhātvarthatvāt, na prayojyaḥ, ityasmāt kāraṇād ya ādikaraḥ sa kartā, yaśca kartā sa bhavati,
bhūkṛñoḥ sarvadhātvarthavyāpitvāt . etaduktaṃ bhavati--yataḥ prakārāntareṇābhivyañjayan bhāvāntarasyādikaratvād
bhavati vastu tata ekaikasya sarvatvam, na sarvasyaikatvaṃ parasparāpekṣābhivyañjanenādikaratvāditi .
asmiṃścārthe vyāpakaṃ dṛṣṭāntamāha sphuṭīkaraṇārtham --ādikaratvaṃ ca yathā vrīhau sambhāvyata iti .
tadvyākhyā --avrīhermṛdādervrīhitvenādikaratvāditi, mṛtsalilavātākāśānāmavrīhīṇāṃ vrīhiprakāreṇābhivyaktiṃ kurvan vrīhirādikaraḥ, etamarthaṃ hetutvena vyāpārayati siddhaṃ kṛtvā pañcamyā vrīhitvenādikaratvāditi . tathā prāgityādi, evaṃ ca kṛtvā vrīhitvāt prāgapi pṛthivyabvāyvākāśānāmapyādikaratvaṃ
paścādapi tena prakāreṇa tathā vrīhivadeva, tadāditvād vrīheḥ, te ādiḥ pṛthivyādayo vrīheḥ prāk
paścācceti teṣāmādikaratvam tena prakāreṇābhivyakteḥ . kiñcānyat, tatprayuktatvād vrīheḥ, te hyasya prayoktāraḥ, yo yasya prayoktā sa tasya kartā yathā ādityodayāditvamityata āha--tatprayukto vrīhiḥ .
kasmāt pṛthivyeva na bhūto vrīhiḥ, pṛthivyeva udakameva vāyureva vā ākāśameva vā, tatprayuktatvāt ādikaratvādādityodayāditvavat ? iti . atrocyate --ko vā bravīti--pṛthivī na bhūta udakādiśca vrīhiriti tatprayuktatvāt vrīhyādi vā pṛthivyādi na bhūtamiti tatprayuktatvāt ? vrīhirapi
pṛthivyabvāyvākāśādi bhavati, pṛthivyudakavāyvākāśādyapi ca vrīhimāṣāmrajambvādi bhavati, tatkṛtāhāro'pi
pṛthivyādi vrīhyādi; pṛthivyādyapi tatkṛtāhāraḥ, tatkṛtāhāraśarīrendriyabuddhyādi tatkṛtamanuṣyatiryaṅnārakadevādi ca, tatkṛtāhāravrīhipṛthivyādi ca tatkṛtāhāraśarīrendriyabuddhimanuṣyādi sarvaṃ parasparataḥ sarvātmakaṃ bhavati,
tatprayuktatvāt tathābhivyaktestadādikaratvādityādihetubhiḥ . kiyadvodāhriyate ? nyāyasyāsya vyāpitvāt
sarvaṃ tadudāharaṇameva . diṅmātrapradarśanārthaṃ  tadvyāpitvapradarśanārthaṃ  cāha --itaścetaśceti, yadi vrīhito
vrīherādikaratvam atha pṛthivyāditaḥ pṛthivyāderādikaratvamiti tānyevodāharaṇāni . evaṃ tatkṛtāhāraśarīrendriyādiṣvapi draṣṭavyam, sarvasyaikaikasya sarvātmakatvāt . tata āha --tadātmakatvāt tadavyatiriktatvāt tat
tadeveti tasya tasya prakārasya hetutvaṃ dṛṣṭāntatvaṃ ceti .


puruṣakarmasvapyevameva . puruṣaḥ karmayogyānāṃ pudgalānāṃ karmatvena ādikaraḥ,
tathāvidhopayogagateḥ prayojanaparamārthatvād bhavitṛtvasya . tadapi ca karma ādikaram, bāhyamapi ghaṭādi ādikaram .

evaṃ dṛṣṭāntabhūtaṃ prastutanyāyaprasādhitaṃ sarvasarvātmakavādaṃ prathayitvā dārṣṭāntikaṃ puruṣakarmavādamīśvarakāraṇanirākaraṇāyāha --puruṣakarmasvapyevamevetyādi . puruṣaḥ kartā karmayogyānāṃ pudgalānāṃ karmatvena
ādikaraḥ . ke karmayogyāḥ pudgalāḥ ? ucyate--paramāṇuvargaṇā agrahaṇavargaṇā, agrahaṇavargaṇā dvipradeśavargaṇā, evaṃ daśapradeśādisaṅkhyeyapradeśavargaṇāḥ . samānajātīyānāmekaśo buddhyāvasthāpitānāṃ piṇḍo vargaṇā,
kucikarṇakābhīrasavarṇagopiṇḍavat . anantapradeśavargaṇā api kāścid grahaṇayogyāḥ kāścidagrahaṇayogyāḥ .
grahaṇayogyāyogyatvaṃ cātisthūlasūkṣmāyogyatvāt svedeneva paramāṇuśarkarāṇāṃ, yogyatvācca madhyamaparimāṇānām .
tatra yā grahaṇayogyāḥ pudgalato vargaṇāḥ tāśca mānena siddhānāmanantatamabhāgaḥ abhavyasiddhīnāmanantaguṇāḥ .
eṣa tāvadaudārikayogyasya jaghanyasya vidhiḥ . taduparyekaparamāṇau prakṣipte dvitīyāpyaudārikayogyā evamekaikavṛddhānyanantānantāni sthānāni audārikakāraṇatvena grahaṇayogyāni . jaghanyādutkarṣasthānamasaṅkhyeyaguṇam,
yasmāt paramparopanidhayā prathamasthānādārabhyānantasthāneṣu teṣu teṣu dviguṇatā bhavati tasmādasaṅkhyaguṇaṃ saṅkhyeyaguṇaṃ vā, anantaropanidhayā tu rūpādhikameva . tasminnutkṛṣṭaudārikayogyadravye rūpe prakṣipte jaghanyaṃ vaikriyaśarīrasyāgrahaṇayogyam . evaṃ rūpādhikavṛddhyā tānyapyanantānantāni sthānāni pūrvavat, jaghanyādutkṛṣṭamasaṅkhyeyaguṇam, ko guṇakāraḥ ? śreṇyasaṅkhyatamabhāgaḥ . teṣāmagrahaṇānāmupari vaikriyasya jaghanyaṃ grahaṇayogyam . tānyapi

sthānāni pūrvavadanantānantāni . punarāhārakāgrahaṇāni, tathā tadupari tadgrahaṇayogyāni tathaiva . audārikaśarīrayogyebhyo vaikriyaśarīrayogyānyasaṅkhyeyaguṇāni, tato'saṅkhyeyaguṇānyāhārakayogyāni, tāvadasaṅkhyeyaguṇāni
grahaṇāgrahaṇāni pūrvasmāt pūrvasmāt . taduparyāhārakotkṛṣṭe rūpe prakṣipte jaghanyamagrahaṇaṃ taijasasya, jaghanyādutkṛṣṭamanantaguṇam, ko guṇakāraḥ ? abhavyebhyo'nantaguṇaḥ siddhānāmanantatamabhāgaḥ . tadupari rūpādhike taijasaśarīrayogyaṃ jaghanyam . jaghanyādutkṛṣṭamanantaguṇam, ko guṇakāraḥ ? siddhānāmanantatamabhāgo'bhavyebhyo'nantaguṇaḥ . anena vidhinottareṣāṃ bhāṣāprāṇāpānamanaḥkarmayogyānāmagrahaṇāntaritānāṃ grāhyāṇāmuttarottarānantaguṇamāneyāḥ . antaraṃ tu grāhyāṇāṃ jaghanyādutkṛṣṭo viśeṣādhikaḥ sarvatra, ko viśeṣaḥ ? tasyaivānantabhāgaḥ . agrāhyāṇāṃ tu jaghanyādutkṛṣṭo'nantaguṇaḥ, ko guṇakāraḥ ? siddhānāmanantatamabhāgaḥ abhavyebhyo'nantaguṇaḥ . evaṃ-
vidhaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sarvatra loke'vagāḍhagāḍhanicite karmatayā pariṇamayya tadyogyān kāyavāṅmanaḥkarmalakṣaṇānāṃ
trayāṇāṃ yogānāṃ kāyayogena gṛhṇāti tenaiva kārmaṇaśarīratayā pariṇamayati puruṣaḥ svavīryeṇa yogākhyena, vāṅmanaḥprāṇāpānatayā pariṇamayya kāyayogenaiva vāṅmanaḥprāṇāpānatayālambya visṛjati . yathoktam—
jogehi tadaṇurūvaṃ pariṇamayati geṇhitūṇa paṃcataṇū .pā+ugge vālaṃbati bhāsāṇamaṇattaṇe khaṃdhe ॥ karmapra॰ gā॰ 17
tathā manasā vācā kāyena vāpi yuktasya vīryapariṇāmaḥ .jīvasyātmani yaḥ khalu sa yogasaṃjño jinairdṛṣṭaḥ ॥  
tejoyogād yadvad raktatvādirghaṭasya pariṇāmaḥ .jīvakaraṇaprayoge vīryamapi tathātmapariṇāmaḥ ॥   iti .

puruṣasyetyarthaḥ . yathoktam—
ūṣmaguṇaḥ san dīpaḥ snehaṃ vartyā yathā samādatte .ādāya śarīratayā pariṇamayati cāpi taṃ sneham ॥  

yathā cātmani akarmaṇāṃ karmatvena ādikaratvaṃ tathā karmaṇāmapi ātmana
ādikaratvaṃ tathābhivyakteḥ tatprayuktatvāt . kasmāt ātmaiva na karmabhūtaḥ ? ko vā
bravīti na karmabhūto'sau karmāṇi cātmabhūtāni neti tathāvidhopayogagatestatprayuktatvāt... ... ....

snehābhyaktasyāṅge lagadeva rajo malībhavatyapi vā .rāgadveṣasnehābhyaktasya tathā bhavati karma ॥  
rūkṣayati ruṣyato nanu vaktraṃ snihyati ca rajyataḥ puṃsaḥ .audāriko'pi nanu bhāvavaśāt pariṇamati deho'yam ॥  
tasmādātmā kartā karaṇayuktaḥ karmatvena ādikaraḥ, pūrvavat prayojanaparamārthatvād bhavitṛtvasya .
kimātmaivādikaraḥ ? netyucyate, tadapi ca karma ādikaram, tadapi ca jñānāvaraṇādikarma grahaṇayogyamaudārikādiśarīrabhedādivipākaṃ pudgalaḥ, kiṃ bhavati ? naranarakadevatiryaggatisaṅgrahabhavanavāsyādyanekaprabhedasarvātmaśarīrāṇāṃ tatsambaddhātmanāṃ cādikaraṃ bhavati . yathoktam—
jīvapariṇāmahetū kammatayā poggalā pariṇamaṃti .poggalakammaṇimittaṃ jīvo vi taheva pariṇamati ॥   iti .
na kevalamādhyātmikamevādikaram, kiṃ tarhi ? bāhyamapi ghaṭādi ādikaraṃ sarvādikaram .
viparyayeṇāpi bhāvayitukāma āha --yathā cātmani akarmaṇāmityādi pūrvavat sacodyaparihāraṃ gatārthaṃ
yāvat ko vā bravīti na karmabhūto'sau karmāṇi cātmabhūtāni neti tathāvidhopayogagatestatprayuktatvādityādibhirhetubhiḥ . tasmāt sarvasarvātmakatvāt ko'nya īśvaraḥ ? kā vānyā prakṛtiḥ ? iti .
itaśca anyonyakāritādikaratvāt karmakarmiṇoḥ sarvasarvātmakateti . kāraṇamāha --acetanajñānāvaraṇetyādi, acetanāni jñānadarśanāvaraṇavedyamohāyurnāmagotrāntarāyākhyāni saprabhedāni karmāṇi
pudgalātmakānyatyudīrṇānyapyātmano'kṣarānantatamabhāgamupayogasvābhāvyād nāvṛṇvanti, śeṣaṃ keṣāñcidāvṛṇvanti
ekendriyanigodasūkṣmāparyāptakādīnām, karmaṇāṃ kṣayopaśamavaicitryāt .

athaivaṃ neṣyate tato naivātmā badhyeta karmaṇā tatphalabhūtaiśca tanvādibhirna yujyeta
vikarmatvād muktavat . prakṛtīśvarādisṛṣṭivaśādeva na badhyeta na yujyeta ca tanvādibhiḥ, amūrtatvāt, ākāśavat .
savvajīvāṇaṃ pi ya ṇaṃ akkharassa aṇaṃtatamo bhāgo ṇiccugghāḍita+o .taṃ pi jadi āvarijjejja teṇa jīvo ajīvataṃ pāve .suṭṭhu vi mehasamuda+e ho+i pabhā caṃdasūrāṇaṃ ॥ nandīsū॰ 42
tathāṃ svalpaṃ rajo hi kaluṣaṃ ca nabhaḥ karoti rāhurgṛṇoti śaśinaṃ balavāṃśca somaḥ .paṅko vināśayati vāriguṇaprakṛṣṭiṃ doṣā muhūrtarabhasā balavān svabhāvaḥ ॥  
tasmāt karmakarmiṇoranyonyādikaratvam . kevalinastu vigatasarvāvaraṇavighnamohatvād yadyapyupayogāvaraṇābhāvāt tathāvidhopayogagatirasiddhā tathāpi vedyāyurnāmagotrakarmacatuṣkatatprayuktatvādihetusadbhāvādanyonyādikaratvaṃ siddham . siddhānāṃ tu karmanirmuktāvyābādhapāriṇāmikaparamasukhakṣāyikasamyakatvajñānadarśanavīryalabdhyādīnāṃ cādikaratvam . nanvātmapudgalaikyāpattivacanādeva vā bhedapratīteḥ svavacanavirodha iti . etanna, kasmāt,
pālanapūraṇapuruṣatvāt, pṛpālanapūraṇayoḥ pā॰ dhā॰ 1086, pālayati sukhaduḥkhādivipākāṃstāṃstān
pudgalānātmabhāveneti pālyate taistathāvidhopayogagatyeti vā puruṣaḥ, pūrayati tāṃstaiḥ pūryata iti vā puruṣaḥ .
pumāṃsaṃ gilati puṃsā vā gilyata iti pudgalaḥ, pūraṇād galanād vā pudgala iti niruktibhede'pyarthaikyāt
puruṣapudgalaśabdayorindraśakravadekārthatvādadoṣaḥ .
athaivaṃ neṣyate yathā mayoktaṃ karmakarmiṇoranyonyādikaratvaṃ yadi na syāt īśvaravaśāt, svabhāvādeḥ
prakṛtyādervā kutaścit saṃsāravaicitryaṃ syāditīṣyate tato naivātmā badhyeta karmaṇā saṃsārabījabhūtena
śubhāśubhena, tataśca tatphalabhūtaiḥ śarīrendriyasthānaviṣayaiḥ śubhāśubhairna yujyeta vikarmatvād muktavat .

yadi tvadṛṣṭābhāve'pyasāvīśvarastataste muktānāmapi tanvādīni asau kuryāt,
īśvaratvāt, sargādivat .
ata eva ca sambhūyakāritvācetanatvasthitvāpravṛttīnāmapakṣadharmatā .
evaṃ ca kṛtvā tadapi sarvamasambaddhaṃ yat karmakāraṇaikāntina āhuḥ . ta
itthamāhuḥ--yadi pravartayitṛtvāt puruṣakāraḥ kāraṇaṃ syāt tataḥ pradhānamadhyamā-
mukto vā badhyeta, tata eva, tadvat . syānmataṃ muktāmuktavikalpasambhavalpalpāsambhava eva paramārthataḥ sṛṣṭivaśavyavasthānāditi .
tadapi nopapadyate, prakṛtīśvarādisṛṣṭivaśādeva na badhyeta tanukaraṇādibhiḥ, na yujyeta bhuvanena ca,
amūrtatvādākāśavat . ākāśaṃ vā badhyeta yujyeta ca tanvādibhiḥ, tata eva, tvadabhimatapuruṣa iva .
aniṣṭaṃ caivamādi bhavata iti .
kiñcānyat, yadi tvadṛṣṭābhāve'pītyādi . mayā tāvaditthamadṛṣṭākhyakarmatvāpannasarvapuruṣeśvaratvamuktaṃ
tasya tasya tanvādyādikaratvāt . tanna ceditthamādikaratvamicchasi tato'pi tvadanuvṛttyābhyupagate'pyadṛṣṭākhyakarmābhāve'pi mayā doṣa ucyate --asāvīśvarastataste muktānāmapi abhūtatathāvidhahetūnāmakarmaṇāṃ
tanukaraṇāni bhuvanāni cāsau kuryāt, īśvaratvāt, sargādivat . tathā pralayakāle'pi sarveṣāṃ kuryāt,
tata eva, tadvat . madhye vā na kuryāt, īśvaratvāt, pralayakālavat . aniṣṭaṃ caitat . asmāccāniṣṭāt
karmātmaikyāt sarvasarvātmakatvāt sarveśvaratā .
ata eva cetyādi . karmātmaikyasarveśvaratvābhyām, aṇava eva karma, ta eva sukhādayaḥ, . tasmādadṛṣṭāt
sṛṣṭiḥ pradhānāt sṛṣṭiḥ pṛthagaṇubhyo'dṛṣṭacoditebhyo vā sṛṣṭiḥ iti vādāntaraparikalpaṃ tyaktvā asmaduktakarmātmaikyasarvasarvātmakasarveśvaratvābhyupagamo'vaśyambhāvī . tasmāt tvayoktasambhūyakāritvācetanatvasthitvāpravṛttīnāmapakṣadharmatā . ekatvāt kasya dvitīyasya kena saha sambhūyaikārthakāritā ? kiṃ tadacetanaṃ cetanāt
pṛthagbhūtam ? satatasampravṛttapūraṇa-pālana-galana-puṃgaraṇādidharmatvācca kā sthitvā pravṛttiḥ ? ityasiddhārthatvād
viśiṣṭacetanādhiṣṭhitatvaṃ tanvādīnāṃ na sādhayitumalamiti . yadapi viśeṣyoktaṃ mithaḥ pratyanīkasambhūyaikārthakāritvāditi tadasattvaṃ tu pūrvoktameva ṇicchayato savvalahumityādigāthayā . tasmānneśvarapūrvikā sṛṣṭiḥ,
kintu anekeśvarapūrviketi vijñeyā .
evaṃ ca kṛtvetyādi . anenaikānteśvarapūrvakavādadoṣaprakāśanena karmaikāntavādadoṣaprakāśanamapi kṛtaṃ
veditavyamasambaddhatvāt tasya karmaikāntavādasya . kathaṃ punaste karmaikāntavādina āhuḥ ? kathaṃ vā tadasambandhaḥ ?
ityatastatpradarśanārthaṃ tāvat puruṣakāraṃ nirākurvantaḥ karma samarthayantaḥ ta itthamāhuriti tadupapattīrdarśayati,
yathā --yadi pravartayitṛtvāt puruṣakāraḥ kāraṇaṃ syāditi puruṣakāra eva kāraṇaṃ na karmāpīti cenmanyasa
ityekāntaṃ sūcayati tata idamaniṣṭaṃ puruṣakārakāraṇaikāntinaste prāptam . katamadaniṣṭam ? ucyate --pradhāna

dhamabhinnāḥ siddhayo'siddhayo vā nānā na syuḥ, utkarṣārthikāraṇaikatvāt . utkarṣārthipuruṣakāraikatvāt pradhānamadhyamādhamabhedabhinnāḥ puruṣakārā na sidhyanti . saprabhedāstāḥ siddhayo'siddhayaśca nānājātīyā na syuḥ, avyatiriktakāraṇatvāt,
tulyatantupaṭavat .
kāryātirekāttu kāraṇātireka iti karmaiva pravartayitṛ . dvividhā ca... ... ...
itarasya . tatra tvadiṣṭapuruṣakāravyāpārasyāvatāra eva nāsti svaśaktyādhānāsamarthatvāt . cetanāmātrasāro hi puruṣakāraḥ śaktiḥ, na ca sa paśutve vartamāno manu-
madhyamādhamabhinnāḥ siddhayo'siddhayo vā nānā na syuḥ, tāśca dṛṣṭāḥ, na hi dṛṣṭād gariṣṭhamanyat
pramāṇamasti . kasmānnānā na syuriti cet, ucyate --utkarṣārthikāraṇaikatvāt, ātmotkarṣārthī puruṣa
eva kāraṇaṃ na karmāpi kāraṇamiti puruṣakārakāraṇaikāntavādamāśaṅkate, puruṣakārasyaikatvamutkarṣārthipuruṣakāraikatvam, utkarṣārthinaḥ puruṣasya kriyā kāraḥ, tasyaikatvāt pradhānamadhyamādhamabhedabhinnāḥ svācāradurācāravikalpadvayaprabhedakṛtā lokaprasiddhāḥ puruṣakārā na sidhyanti, eka evotkṛṣṭaḥ prāpnoti . tataśca tatsādhyānāmapi phalabhūtānāṃ pradhānamadhyamādhamānāṃ śubhāśubhānāṃ bhedā na prāpnuvanti, ekaivotkṛṣṭā siddhiḥ prāpnoti,
na madhyamādhame sabhede siddhī syātām . nāpi ca puruṣakārāṇāmasiddhayaḥ syuḥ, tāśca dṛṣṭā iti tadupasaṃhṛtya
sādhanamāha --saprabhedāstāḥ siddhayo'siddhayaśca nānājātīyā na syuravyatiriktakāraṇatvāt
tulyatantupaṭavaditi puruṣakārasyaiva kāraṇatvāt tadvyatiriktakāraṇābhāvād bhavataḥ puruṣakāraikāntavādinaḥ
karmānapekṣatvāditi .
itthaṃ parapakṣe doṣamuktvā svapakṣasādhanamāha --kāryātirekāttu kāraṇātireka iti karmaiva pravartayitṛ . itiśabdo hetvarthe, kāryāṇāmanekabhedānāṃ siddhīnāmasiddhīnāṃ ca parasparato'tiriktatvāt kāraṇātirekeṇāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyam, tacca kāraṇaṃ karmaiva puruṣasya tvadabhimatasya pravartayitṛ pravartakamanekabhedamiti grahītavyam .
tasya kāryanānātvānumitasya kāraṇasāmānyasya karma iti saṃjñā kriyate, puruṣakārasya puruṣādīnāṃ ca kāraṇānāṃ
nirākṛtatvāt . tasya siddhyasiddhibhedakāryaliṅgādanumānaṃ deśāntaraprāptyanumeyādityagateriva, dvividhā cetyādinā
talliṅgāsiddhiparihārārthaṃ yāvaditarasyeti gatārtham, prasiddhaṃ liṅgamityarthaḥ . tatretyādi, tatra etasmin kāraṇavaicitryānumānaliṅge kārye tvadiṣṭapuruṣavyāpārasyāvatāra eva nāstītyāvayorlokasyeva prasiddhe kāryaliṅge
tvadabhimatakāraṇāsambhavo'smanmatakāraṇasambhava eveti ca darśayati . kasmāt ? svaśaktyādhānāsamarthatvāt . kasya svaśaktiriti cet, cetanasya puruṣasya . cetanāmātrasāro hi puruṣakāraḥ śaktiḥ,
hiśabdo yasmādarthe, yato'syaiṣā  śaktiḥ etāṃ cādhātuma  śakto'sāviṣṭe manuṣyatve paśutve vartamāna iti
svaśaktyādhānāsāmarthyaṃ darśayati --na ca sa ityādi, satyapi caitanye tāṃ svāṃ caitanyaśaktiṃ karmabalākṛṣṭanikṛṣṭa

ṣyatve svacaitanyaśaktimādhātuṃ samarthaḥ, manuṣyaḥ sanna tajjñānaṃ paśau, tasyāpi karmalabhyatvāt . api tarhi gaṅgāyāḥ srotasya... ....
