ato yathāhāraviśeṣābhyavaharaṇakhalarasādivibhajanādyasañcetitakriyāsu asvatantra eva tāḥ karmakṛtāḥ puruṣo matkṛtā ityabhimanyate, tatkāryatāyāṃ hi tāsāṃ
kadācidakaraṇābhāvādihaiva amṛtatvaprasaṅgaḥ tathā kāyendriyanirvartane'pyaniṣṭaśarīrendriyādirna syāt, iṣṭasyaiva karaṇaṃ svātantryāt syāt . tasmāt sarvameva tat karmaṇa
eva . tadatirekeṇa ka ātmani pratipadyeta ?
paśvajñānakuśaktau vartamāno na viśiṣṭeṣṭamanuṣyacaitanye sthāpayituṃ śakta iti, viparyayeṇa manuṣyaḥ sanna tajjñānaṃ
paśau ādhātuṃ samarthaḥ iti vartate . tasyātmano yat svatattvam iti tvayā pratarkitaṃ tanna śaknoti karmavaśīkṛto yonijātyantarastho yonijātyantare'nyatrādhātum, kutaḥ ? tasyāpi karmalabhyatvāt, paśormanuṣyasya
vā caitanyasya karmavaśādeva tathābhāvāt manuṣyaḥ paśurvā svajātināmakarmodayādeva bhavatītyarthaḥ, tadudayasya
kāraṇāntaradurnivāratvāt . tatra dṛṣṭāntamāha --api tarhi gaṅgāyā ityādi, sambhāvanayaitaducyate, api
caitat sambhāvyam--devavikriyotpātādinā gaṅgāsrotasyanyathāsnotasyānyathā pravṛttasya karmaṇo'nyathā pravartanamiti . evaṃ
tāvadabhyupagamya svatantraṃ cetanaṃ puruṣakāraṃ ca tasyoktam .
naiva vābhyupagacchāma etat sarvaṃ kiñcit karmavyatiriktam, kutaḥ ? tattvacintāyāṃ karmavyatiriktakāraṇānavasthānādityetad darśayati --yāyo'pi cetyādi yāvad vetālāviṣṭaśavaśarīravaditi .
karmavetālāviṣṭo hi puruṣo'svatantra iṣṭāniṣṭatulyapravṛttiḥ paravaśatvāt puruṣasya, upakramaprabhṛti ityādi
yāvajjahyāditi tatsvātantryābhāvapratipādanārtho nimeṣopakramādārabhya maraṇāpavargāvasāna iti gatārthaḥ .
punarapi --ato yathāhāraviśeṣetyādi yāvadihaivāmṛtatvaprasaṅgaḥ . māturojaḥ pituḥ śukrañca
prathamāhāraḥ, tataḥ sattāhaṃ kalalaṃ bhavati tandulavai॰ 17 ityādinā krameṇa śarīrendriyādikāraṇāhāraḥ
prāṇanādiyātrāsamarthaḥ, tasya ca khalarasādibhāvena vibhajanam, ityādyasañcetitāvyaktakriyāsu asvatantra
eva garbhādiṣu suptaśca . tāstu kriyāḥ karmakṛtāḥ puruṣo matkṛtā ityabhimanyate, tathā bhāsamānatvāt .
tatkāryatāyāṃ hi puruṣakārakāryatāyāṃ hi tāsāṃ kriyāṇāṃ kadācidakaraṇābhāvāt prāṇasthitihetvanuparamaṇād maraṇābhāvaḥ, tasmādihaivāmṛtatvāya kalpeteti dṛṣṭeṣṭavirodhadoṣaprasaṅgaḥ . tathā kāyendriyanirvartane'pyaniṣṭaśarīrendriyādirna syāt kāṇakuṇṭabadhirādiḥ, sampannendriyajātisaṃsthānasaṃhananādiyukta eva
syāt . puruṣakārakāryanirvartane ca dharmādyanuṣṭhānaviṣayopabhogādau iṣṭasyaiva karaṇaṃ svātantryāt syāt .

akāraṇamapi karma, sahāyāpekṣatvāt, bhārotpāṭavat . etadapi ca na mantavyam
akāraṇamapi karma sahāyāpekṣatvāt, phalopahārāya svāminayodyogāvapekṣyau amātyādiprakṛtiśca iti, yatastānyapi hi svāmidharmādharmarajjuyatinibaddhāni, tadāyattatvāt tadbhogyatvāt... ...tantupaṭavat . yadi tāni svāmidharmādharmarajjuyatinibaddhāni
na syustataḥ sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅgaḥ .
yo'pi svāmipuruṣakāraḥ so'pyadharmaphalatvāt karmaiva, kleśatvāt, jvaravat .
tasmāt sarvameva tat karmaṇa eva hetoḥ, nātmanaḥ, karmaṇaḥ iti pañcamyā hetvarthe vihitatvāt .
tadatirekeṇa ka ātmani pratipadyeta ? tasmādevaṃ vidvān ka ātmani etadanupapadyamānaṃ karmavyatirekeṇa
abhyupagacchet ? nābhyupagacchatyeva vidvānityabhiprāyaḥ . tasmādahetuḥ puruṣastatkāraśca .
syānmatam --akāraṇamapi karma, sahāyāpekṣatvāt . puruṣakāramakāraṇamapi karma sahāyamapekṣate
kavalāsyaprakṣepādivat . yathoktam—
ālasyād yo nirutsāhaḥ sa kiñcinnāśnute phalam .stanakṣīrādipānaṃ ca pauruṣānna viśiṣyate ॥  
ato bhārotpāṭavat, yathā bhāraṃ samudvahan puruṣaḥ sahāyamutkṣeptāraṃ nikṣepakaṃ cāntareṇa svayameva na
śaknoti voḍhumiti kāraṇamakāraṇaṃ ca dṛṣṭastathā karma puruṣakāramantareṇeti kāraṇamakāraṇaṃ ceti .
etadapi ca na mantavyamakāraṇamapītyādinā tameva pūrvapakṣaṃ vyācaṣṭe . bhārotpāṭāpekṣabhāro-
dvāhavadatra kiṃ sahāyaṃ karmaṇo'pekṣyamiti cet, ucyate --phalopahārāyetyādi, phalamupahariṣyataḥ karmaṇastatsvāminaḥ karturnayodyogāvāntarāvapekṣyau, bāhyā svāmātyādiprakṛtiḥ . kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam evaṃ na
mantavyam ? ucyate --yatastānyapi hi svāmidharmādharmarajjuyatinibaddhānītyādi yāvat tantupaṭavat
sahetudṛṣṭāntakena padavākyena amātyādīnāṃ dharmādharmakāryatvamāpādya karmakāraṇāvadhāraṇāt puruṣakāraṃ nirākaroti
tadāyattatvāt tadbhogyatvādityādinā hetusaulabhyaṃ ca darśayati . tantupaṭavaditi tantvāyattapaṭavat paṭatvena
tantūnāmeva bhogyatvavat . yadi tānītyādi evamanabhyupagame sarvāviśeṣaprasaṅga ityaniṣṭāpādanam .
yo'pītyādi . yadapi coktaṃ svāminayodyogāvapekṣyau iti svāmipuruṣakāraḥ so'pyadharmaphalatvāt karmaiva, na puruṣakāro nāma karmātirikto'stītyavadhāraṇārthaṃ prākpratijñātaṃ samarthayati, kleśatvāt,
kleśo hi cintāvyāyāmarūpaḥ, manaḥśarīrāyāsātmakatvāt, jvaravat .


athaitamadharmaphalaṃ necchasi na tarhi duḥkhamadharmaphalamiti prāptam, tatkarmaṇaḥ prāṇātipātāderdharmaphalaprāptiriṣṭaprāptiriti prāptam, dharmādharmaphalaviparyayāt . puruṣakāranairarthakyaṃ ca .
sa ca yadyahetuko muktānāmapi syāt . sahetuścet karmaṇa evācetanāt, yuktikṣamahetvantarābhāvāt .
yadā ca puruṣasya pravṛttau nāsti kartṛtvaṃ tadā dravatīti dravyaṃ kartṛsādhanaṃ na
bhavati . karmaparigrahaviśeṣastu dravyaṃ drūyate gamyate...iti . bhogyena karmapuruṣeṇa

athetyādi . athaitaṃ puruṣakārasaṅkleśamadharmaphalaṃ necchasi prajñotsāhayuktasya praśastatveneṣṭatvālloke
tato na tarhi duḥkhamadharmaphalamiti prāptaṃ śirorogādi, kleśatvāt, nayodyogapuruṣakāravat . yathoktam—
anarthapāṇḍityamadhītya yantritaḥ suteṣu dāreṣu ca nityaśaṅkitaḥ .niśāsu jāgarti hinasti bāndhavān namo'stu rājyāya varaṃ daridratā ॥   iti .
atha prasiddhivirodhadoṣabhayād duḥkhamadharmaphalamiti tvayānujñāyate tatsācivyakriyāyāśca hiṃsāderduḥkhasādhanatāṃ gatatvāt tatkarmaṇo hetoḥ prāṇātipātāderdharmaphalaprāptiḥ, kāsau ? iṣṭaśarīrendriyaviṣayasukhasamyagjñānārogyādiprāptiḥ ityetat prāptam; śubhāśubhayoriṣṭāniṣṭaviparyayaphalābhyupagamāt dharmād nayodyogau
duḥkhaṃ vā ityuktatvādata eva prāptam, adharmaphalād duḥkhāt sukhaṃ dharmaphalamiti prāptam . kiṃ tat ? iti
taddiṅmātraṃ pradarśayati --iṣṭaprāptiriti iṣṭaśarīrendriyādiprāptirityetat prāptam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? dharmādharmaphalaviparyayāt ityataḥ puruṣakāranairarthakyaṃ ca yādṛcchikatvāviśeṣāt . ato yaduktaṃ karmaiva kāraṇaṃ puruṣakārasyāpi karmaphalatvāt iti śreyān pakṣaḥ . yathoktam--

yathā yathā pūrvakṛtasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ nidhānasthamivopatiṣṭhate .
tathā tathā pūrvavidhānusāriṇī pradīpahasteva matiḥ pravartate ॥  

abhyupagamyāpi puruṣakāraṃ doṣaṃ brūmaḥ--sa nirhetukaḥ sahetuko vā syāt ? kiñcātaḥ ? sa ca puruṣakāro yadyahetuko muktānāmapi syād nayodyogalakṣaṇaḥ na ceṣṭasteṣām . atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa iti saheturiti brūyāt tataḥ sahetuścet karmaṇa evācetanāt, śubhādapi puruṣakārāt sevādikādanarthāvāpteraśubhādapi
prāṇātipātāderarthāvāpterdharmādharmaphalasaṅkarokteranumātuṃ śakyata etat abuddhipūrvakādacetanakarmavaśādevaitacchubhāśubhavaicitryam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? yuktikṣamahetvantarābhāvāt, vicāritaniṣiddhatvāt puruṣa-niyati-kālasvabhāvādihetvantarāṇāṃ nātrānyad vimardakṣamaṃ kāraṇamastyanyadato daivākhyāt karmaṇaḥ .
yadā cetyādi . yasmin kāle evaṃ ca kṛtvā puruṣasya pravṛttau sādhyāyāṃ nāsti kartṛtvamiti
siddhe karmaṇa eveti ca siddhe tadā tasmin kāle dravatīti dravyaṃ kartṛsādhanaṃ na bhavati svatantrasya
karturanupapatteḥ . karmaparigrahaviśeṣastu, tuśabdo viśeṣāvadhāraṇārthaḥ, karmasādhanamupapannārthaṃ dravyaṃ drūyata

dravyaṃ kriyate, karmapuruṣeṇaiva karmapuruṣaḥ kriyate, yathā vrīhiṇaiva vrīhiḥ kriyate,
kāryeṇaiva bījavrīhiṇāṅkuravrīhiḥ .
yaccāpi puruṣakārakāraṇaikāntina āhustadapi sarvamasambaddham . ta itthamāhuḥ—
evaṃvādinaste punaḥ kāryalakṣaṇatvāt karmaṇo'kṣarārthācca karmavyatiriktaḥ kartā asti,
ghaṭasyeva kulālaḥ .
nanu karmaṇaiva kariṣyate . nanu sudūramapi gatvā vrīherapyāvartakatvāt svarūpabhedādakṣarārthācca nirvivādakṛtakatvāt karmaṇaḥ kartureva bhāvaḥ tacchakteḥ .
ityayaṃ viśeṣo'vadhāryate . tadvigrahaṃ darśayati --drūyate gamyata ityādi . tadidānīṃ nirūpyate --bhogyena
karmapuruṣeṇa tena dravyaṃ kriyate . kimuktaṃ bhavati ? karmapuruṣeṇaiva karmapuruṣaḥ kriyata ityuktaṃ bhavati .
tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ --yathā vrīhiṇaiva vrīhiḥ kriyata iti . kāryeṇaiva bījavrīhiṇāṅkuravrīhiriti tadvyākhyā,
evaṃ tāvadavadhāraṇena kartrartho nirākṛtaḥ, karmaikāntavāda upapāditaḥ, cetanācetanaikyāt sarvasarvātmakatvāccāyukta īśvaro'nyo heturiti ceti .
yaccāpītyādi . na kevalaṃ kartṛsādhana eva doṣaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? karmaikāntavādo'pyayuktaḥ . tatpradarśanārthamāha --evaṃvādinaste punaḥ kāryalakṣaṇatvāt karmaṇaḥ, kāryaṃ karma, yat kriyate tat karma, karturīpsitatamaṃ karma pā॰ 1 . 4 . 49 iti lakṣaṇādakṣarārthāccānumeyaḥ kartā . tasmāt karmaṇo'nyaṃ kartāraṃ
karmavyatiriktamantareṇa karmābhāvād ghaṭasyeva kulālo'vaśyaiṣyaḥ kartā . prayogaśca--svatovyatiriktacetanakartṛkaṃ tvadiṣṭaṃ karma, kāryatvāt kriyamāṇatvāt, ghaṭavaditi .
atrottaraṃ paraḥ nanu karmaṇaiva kariṣyata iti svata eva karmaṇā karma kriyate na tadvyatiriktena
kartretyuktaṃ prāg dṛṣṭānte vrīhiṇaiva vrīhiḥ kāryeṇa bījavrīhiṇā kāryo'ṅkuravrīhiḥ kriyata ityuktaṃ mayeti
smārayati . itara āha --nanu sudūramapi gatvetyādi, vicārya vicāryāpyātmavyatiriktapuruṣāvinābhāvitvāt
karmaṇastvayāpyetadabhyupagantavyaṃ karmavādinā--karmavyatiriktaḥ kartā puruṣo'stīti . kasmāt ? vrīherapyāvartakatvāt, asyāpi vrīhidṛṣṭāntasya kṣityudakākāśavātāṅkurādyāvṛttirūpatvāt teṣāṃ ca svarūpabhedāt
svataḥpṛthagbhūtakartravinābhūtaṃ karma sidhyati ato viparyayasādhanatvamiti . kiñcānyat, akṣarārthācca, kriyata
iti karma karturīpsitatamaṃ karma pā॰ 1 . 4 . 49 iti karmaśabdākṣarārthaḥ . tatastasya kṛtakatvaṃ nirvivādam,
tasmācca nirvivādakṛtakatvāt karmaṇaḥ kartureva bhāvaḥ svatantrasya, puruṣa eva bhavati, kartureva bhāvaḥ
sarvasyeti pañcamīnirdeśād vā puruṣādeva sarvaṃ bhavati kāraṇāt . evaṃ ca tvaduktahetoreva karmavyatiriktapuruṣasiddheḥ karmaṇaśca tadvyatiriktasya siddherāvartakavaidharmyeṇa karmaṇaḥ kṛtakatvaṃ kartrarthāntarabhūtasyāvadhāraṇaṃ ca
yuktam . kutaḥ ? tacchakteḥ, tasmādeva hi kartuḥ puruṣāt karmaṇaḥ kṛtakatvaśaktiḥ, karturvā puruṣasya karaṇaśaktiḥ,
na vrīhiṇaiva vrīhivadāvartakatveneti .


na hi sa kriyamāṇaḥ, karmaṇo'svatantratve sati alabdhātmavṛttitvādabhavanamābhūtadevadattavat .
śāstranirākaraṇamevaṃ tvadupadeśādikriyānirākaraṇaṃ ca, karmapravṛttimātratvāt
tatpratipattyapratipattyoḥ .
karmapravṛttimātratvāt tathā śāstrārthasya asmadupadeśādikriyāṇāṃ ca prati-

na hi sa kriyamāṇa ityādi yāvadābhūtadevadattavaditi tadeva bhāvayati . tasyāḥ karmaśakterasvatantratvamalabdhātmavṛttitvāt . asvātantryācca kuto bhavanam ? dṛṣṭāntaḥ--ābhūtadevadatto garbhopakramāvasthāyāṃ kāryāyāmalabdhātmavṛttitvādasvatantraḥ asvatantratvādakartā, akartṛtvācca na bhavati kāryāvasthāvyatirekeṇa yathā devadattaḥ tathā kāryāvasthāyāṃ karmāpi kriyamāṇaṃ na bhavet, aniṣṭaṃ caitat tvayāpi . tasmāt karmābhavati, tacca
pṛthagbhūtapuruṣabhavanādṛte na bhavatītyasti puruṣaḥ .
kiñcānyat, puruṣakārapratyākhyāne sarvaśāstravaiyarthyaprasaṅgaḥ . katham ? yathākramaṃ hitaprāptyahitaparihārāvarthau sarvaśāstrāṇām, tābhyāṃ ca hitāhitaprāptiparihārārthābhyāṃ niruktīkṛtasatyatvāni pramāṇāntarasaṃvādena
cikitsitādīni śāstrāṇi, yathā—
kaṭukaḥ kaṭukaḥ pāke vīryoṣṇaścitrako mataḥ .tadvad dantī, prabhāvāt tu virecayati sā naram ॥ carakasaṃ॰ 1 . 26 . 68nāgarātiviṣāmustākvāthaḥ syādāmapācanaḥ ॥ carakasaṃ॰ 6 . 15 . 98
ityādīni puruṣatatkriyayorabhāve karmakāraṇaikānte nirākṛtāni syurittham . na ceṣyate tannirākaraṇaṃ
kasyacit pramāṇāntarasaṃvādinaḥ śāstrasya prāmāṇyadarśanāt . tvadupadeśādikriyāṇāṃ ca dṛṣṭārthānāṃ nirākaraṇam evamiti vartate, karmakāraṇaikānte punaḥ puruṣasya svatantrasya tatkriyāyāścābhāve parapratipādanārthaṃ
tacchaktiyuktaśabdoccāraṇakriyā na syāt karmata eva pravṛtteḥ . ādigrahaṇādodanasya mukhasaṃyojanādikriyāśca
na syuḥ, karmapravṛttimātratvāt tatpratipattyapratipattyoḥ, tvadupadeśārthapratipattiḥ karmata eva parasya, sa
pratipadyate vināpyupadeśena, na pratipadyate vā satyapyupadeśe .
karmapravṛttimātratvādityādi yāvat karmaṇa eveti cet . syānmatam--yaducyate śāstranirākaraṇamevaṃ tvadupadeśādinirākaraṇaṃ ca karmaṇo'svatantratve satyalabdhātmavṛttitvādābhūtadevadattavadabhavanam,
nirvivādakṛtakatvāt kartureva bhāvastacchakteḥ, vrīherapyāvartakatvāt svarūpabhedāt puruṣa eva bhavati,
ityādi sarvaṃ nopapadyate, karmata eva bhavati ityupapadyate karmapravṛttimātratvāt tathā śāstrārthasyāsmadupadeśādikriyāṇāṃ ca pratipattyapratipattyoḥ karmapravṛttimātratvāt prājñapuruṣapratipattivad balīvardādyapratipattivacca . tasmāt sarvāṇyetāni karmaṇa eva hetorbhavanti pūrvoktanyāyavaccintāvyāyāmādiśārīra

pattyapratipattyoḥ sarvāṇyetāni karmaṇa eveti cet, atha tadādikarma kutaḥ ? brūyāstvam--oṃ puruṣādeveti . karmata eva na, vrīhivaidharmyeṇākartṛkatvāt, ātmādivat,
notkṣepaṇavat .
kathamasambaddham ? yasmānna śubhamaśubhaṃ vā rūpādi iṣṭakāraṇamaniṣṭakāraṇaṃ
vā ekāntena kiñcidasti . tadeva śubhamaśubhamiṣṭakāraṇamaniṣṭakāraṇaṃ ca . eka eva
mānasakleśaphalatvāt tasya, iti cedāśaṅkāyām, evaṃ cenmanyase . tatastvamidamasi tāvat praṣṭavyaḥ --atha
tadādikarma kutaḥ ? iti . mama tāvadabhiprāyaḥ--kṛtakatvāt karmaṇaḥ puruṣādeva taditi . tannecchatā tvayā
vaktavyam--kutastadādikarma yata etat sarvaṃ pratipattyapratipattikleśādi ? iti tvadabhiprāyākarṣaṇārthaḥ praśnaḥ, kiṃ
tadapi karmaṇa eva uta puruṣāt ? iti . brūyāstvam--oṃ puruṣādeveti, evaṃ nāmāstu, ko doṣaḥ
gatyantarābhāvāt, karmata eva ityabhiprāyaḥ syādityatra brūmaḥ --na, vrīhivaidharmyeṇākartṛkatvāt,
vrīherapyāvartakatvāt kartṛtvamupayāti, nāsāvato vrīhirakṛtakaḥ, akartṛkatvāt, tataścākriyamāṇatvānnopapadyate karmaṇaḥ karmatvaṃ tasyādikarmaṇaḥ . kimiva ? ātmādivat, yathā ātmākāśakāladigādīni na
kenacit kriyanta ityakarmāṇi tathā ādikarmāpi syāt . notkṣepaṇavaditi vaidharmyadarśanam, yathā utkṣepaṇaṃ
karma tadvyatiriktenotkṣeptrā vinā na bhavati tathedamiti .
evaṃ puruṣakāravādinā karmavādī dūṣitaḥ, karmavādinā ca prāk puruṣakāravādī . tasmād yaduktam
evaṃ ca kṛtvā tadapi sarvamasambaddhaṃ yat karmakāraṇaikāntina āhuḥ, yacca puruṣakārakāraṇaikāntina āhustadapi sarvamasambaddhaṃ parasparadūṣitatvāt iti tadubhayamidānīṃ naikaṭyenāpyasambaddhamiti pratipādayitukāmaḥ
praśnayati --kathamasambaddhamiti paravacanena svavacanena caikatvāt tayoḥ pṛthak karmapuruṣakārābhāvādevāsambaddhamiti tatpratipādayiṣyannāha --yasmād na śubhamaśubhaṃ vetyādi yāvat kāya iti . ayaṃ tāvad dṛśyamānaḥ
kāyaḥ puruṣo vāstu yatte'bhirucitam, na me kaścidatra pakṣapātaḥ . tacca yasmād na kiñcidatra śubhamevāśubhameva vā bāhyamapi kāyād bhinnamabhimataṃ rūpādi iṣṭasya sukhasya kāraṇaṃ citra-mayūra-srak-candana-
bhramararutādi aniṣṭasya vā duḥkhasyātivivarṇahuṇḍasaṃsthānākārakaṇṭakaśivārutādi . sarvamapyetadiṣṭakāraṇamapyaniṣṭakāraṇamapi śubhamapyaśubhamapi iti gṛhāṇa dravyakṣetrakālabhāvapuruṣāntarasaṃyogaviśeṣāśrayapariṇāmaviśeṣāpatteḥ surabhi-madhura-sukhasparśa-surūpa-suśabdetarabhāvamupalabhyate abhakṣitabhakṣitamodakavat pakvāpakvāmraphalavat padmakesaranālavat jātājātavipannāvipannasurādivat svasthāsvasthastrīpuruṣagītarutādivat . yathoktamārṣe --tecceva poggalā subbhigaṃdhattā+e pariṇamaṃti te ceva te poggalā dubbhigaṃdhattā+e pariṇamaṃti
jñātādharma॰ ityādi . tasmād na śubhamaśubhaṃ vaikāntena kiñcidasti bhinnajāti . kiṃ tarhi ? tadeva
śubham tadevāśubham, tata eva ca iṣṭakāraṇamaniṣṭakāraṇaṃ ca, yathā tridoṣaghnamodakādi pramāṇā

hyayaṃ pudgalakāyaḥ ., bhoktṛbhogyātmakavipariṇāmavṛttitvāt, ata āhāravacchubhāśubhādidharmatāsya bhoktṛtvād bhogyatvāt .
nanvannodakaśubhāśubhate prativiśiṣṭāpaśadayogakṛte, na, ekaikasya sarvarūpadravyabhavanaparamārthatvāt tadeva tat, tatparamārthatvāt, tadvat . anyathātve'pi tadanatirekātmakatvāt, tantuyajñopavītavat .
pramāṇakālākālāhāritamiti svasthasarpadaṣṭāhāritaviṣavadvā tathaika eva hyayaṃ pudgalakāyaḥ, pudgala uktaniruktikaḥ, kāyaḥ śarīraṃ citatvād rogādiduḥkhanivāsatvādvā sarvo'pi bāhyābhyantaro mūrtadravyasaṅghātaḥ kāyaḥ
rūpādisaṅghātatvāt paramāṇorapi . pudgalasya pudgalasyeva vā kāya iti vigraha-samāsau . athavā pṛthak parikalpanayānayā kim ? indriyapratyakṣābhimataḥ śarīrākhyaḥ pudgalakāyaḥ svasaṃvedyajñānātmakaḥ kriyādiliṅgānumita
ātmakāyo vā so'yameka eva, na hyatra kācid bhedabuddhiḥ kāryā bandhapariṇāmaikyāpatteretannayadarśanāt .
eka eva śubhāśubhādidharmā iti sādhyasya kāyasya vakṣyamāṇāhāradṛṣṭāntasāmyamāpādya hetutvena tatsādharmyamāha --bhoktṛbhogyātmakavipariṇāmavṛttitvāditi . yadi puruṣakāravādimatena bhoktā, athāpi
karmavādimatena bhogyaḥ, tasmāt kāyo bhoktṛbhogyātmakaḥ, tasya vipariṇāmo vṛttirasyeti kāyaḥ sambadhyate
bhogyasya bhokturvā vipariṇāma iti, śukraśoṇitaṃ jananyāhṛtānnarasādi cādyuttarakāraṇamasya śarīrasya tadubhayaṃ
bhoktṛ bhogyaṃ ca anyonyabhāvāpatteḥ, tathā caturvidho'pyāhāro'śanādirāhartrāhāryabhāvād bhoktṛ bhogyaṃ ca, tacca
śubhāśubheṣṭāniṣṭakāraṇameveti, kāyacaitanyayorvaikyapariṇāmāpannasyaiva bhoktṛbhogyapariṇāmavṛttitvaṃ siddham, ata
āhāravacchubhāśubhādidharmatāsyeti, yathā āhāraḥ śubhaścāśubhaśca dṛśyate saṃskṛtāsaṃskṛtaḥ, saṃskṛto'pyaśubha
eva saṃskriyamāṇānnādyaśubhatvāt, saṃskārakābhimatakarpūrāderapi kālāntare daurgandhyādidarśanāt, sarvapudgalānāṃ prāguktavidhinā śubhāśubhatvavat pudgalatvādāhāraḥ śubho'śubhaśceti tathā kāya iti . athavā cetanācetanayorātmaśarīrayoraikyapariṇāmāt tadeva bhoktṛ bhogyaṃ cetyanenaivāhāradṛṣṭāntena sambaddhaṃ pratyekamapi sādhayatyetad
dharmadvayamityata āha --bhoktṛtvād bhogyatvāditi . evaṃ kartṛtvāt karmatvādāhāravacchubho'śubhaśca kāya
iti . athavā sukho'pi duḥkho'pi sa eva kāyaḥ, sukhastāvad duḥkhatvādāhāravat, duḥkhaḥ sukhatvādāhāravat, yat paraṃ pratyasiddhaṃ taditareṇa siddhena dharmāntareṇa sādhyam . evamiṣṭo'pyaniṣṭatvāt, aniṣṭo'pīṣṭatvāt āhāravadeva .
itara āha --nanvannodakaśubhāśubhate prativiśiṣṭāpaśadayogakṛte . prativiśiṣṭakarpūrādyekāntaśubhadravyayoge sati jalādi aśubhagandhamapi sat surabhīkriyate adhikaguṇābhibhavabhāvanayā, evamaśucyapaśadadravyayoge sati tadutkṛṣṭagandhābhibhavāt tadbhāvanayā karpūrādyapi tadgandhībhavadupalabhyate . athavā tadeva
vinaṣṭaṃ śubhataḍākādigatamalpaṃ śuṣyacchuṣyat karpūragandhaṃ bhavadupalabhyate, nālikeraphalāni surabhīṇi santi
pūtībhavanti dṛśyante . tasmādubhayadharmatā sarvadravyāṇām, tathā kāyo'pīti . etacca na, ekaikasya sarvarūpadravyabhavanaparamārthatvāt . vīpsayā vyāptiṃ sarvarūpadravyabhavanasya bhāvakasya bhāvyasya ca darśayati

yathā cātra pariṇāmyapariṇāmakapariṇamyapariṇamakabhāvādekatvaṃ tathātmakarmaṇorapi . ātmā
pariṇamayati tathābhavanasāmarthyād gatijātyādinā pudgalān pudgalāścātmānaṃ mithyādarśanāditvena, anyonyapariṇāmakatvādanāditvamekatvam .

āha--yaduktaṃ tvayā karpūrodakādyacetanānāṃ pariṇāmyapariṇāmakabhāvādekatvaṃ cetanācetanayośca jīvakarmaṇoriti tadyuktam . kintu rūpādi upayogībhavadātmā bhavati ātmāpi rūpādībhavati tatpariṇāmāt

kuto rūpādyapi ātmana eva tattvamiti cet, ucyate --upayogātmakatvāt, matyādicakṣurdarśanādibhedaprabheda upayoga ātmā'sya rūpāderviṣayasya so'yaṃ tadātmakaḥ . kathaṃ rūpāderviṣayasyopayogātmakatvamiti cet,

bhavanātmakatvād nirvastutvāpatteḥ dravyameva tathātathābhavanalakṣaṇaṃ satyaṃ cakṣurādipratyayopayogāpadeśena bhavati bhāgineyādyapadeśaviśiṣṭaikatvasatyapuruṣavat .
yaccopayogasvatattvaṃ matyādi tadapi pudgalātmatattvam, rūpādyātmakatvāt,
aṇvādivat . upayogalakṣaṇa ātmā rūpādyātmakeṣu pudgaleṣu upayuktaḥ rūpādyātmaka
eva, sarvātmanā grāhye upayogamayān mṛtpiṇḍaḥ śivakāditāyāmiva so'cetana
eva syāt paṭe'nupayujyamānaghaṭādivat . ātmā pudgalasvatattva eva ātmasvatattvajñānāvaraṇādyudayapravṛttyavyatiriktabhāvāvyatiriktarūpatvācca .
rūpādayaḥ syuḥ . ādigrahaṇād bhāvabhedena ekaguṇadviguṇatriguṇakṛṣṇādibhedena agṛhyamāṇatvād viśiṣṭasya
sāmānyasyaiva grahaṇāt . tataḥ kim ? abhavanātmakatvād nirvastutvāpattirvandhyāputravat . tataśca nirvastutvāpatteretat pratipattavyam --dravyameva tathātathābhavanalakṣaṇaṃ satyaṃ na rūpādayo nāma keciditi .
tathā tatheti rūparasādiprakāreṇa bhavati śyāmaraktatāditadbhedaprakāreṇa ceti satyam, dravyaṃ ca bhavye pā॰
5 . 3 . 104, dravati bhavatīti . kathaṃ punastad dravyamabhinnaṃ sad rūpādibhedena bhavatīti cet, cakṣurādipratyayopayogāpadeśena bhavati . cakṣurādipratyayā ityadhipatyālambanahetusamanantarapratyayāḥ, te nimittamasyopayogasya jñānadarśanākhyasya sa cakṣurādipratyayopayogaḥ, tadapadeśena rūpādi bhavati jñānāpadeśena cakṣūrūpādipratyayenetyarthaḥ . yathoktam—

ityeva ca satyastathā dravyamekameva rūpādi bhavati cakṣurādyapadeśāditi sādhūktamekameva sarvātmakamiti .

rūpādyātmakatā ? na, upayogātmakatvādeva rūpādīnāmapyuktavat .

sarvātmanā sārvātmyena sarvaiḥ pradeśairgrāhye dravye upayogamayān upayogamagacchan anupayujyamāno'cetana
eva paṭānupayujyamānaghaṭādivat syāditi sambhantsyate . kathaṃ punarupayogaṃ yān yāyāt ? mṛtpiṇḍaḥ
śivakāditāyāmiva, yathā mṛtpiṇḍaḥ kṛtsnaḥ śivakādibhāve sārvātmyena vyāpāraṃ gacchati tathā yadi na
gacchedātmā grāhye tatastādātmyamapratipadyamānaḥ so'cetana eva syāt paṭe'nupayujyamānaghaṭādivaditi
yathākramaṃ vaidharmyeṇa sādharmyeṇa ca dṛṣṭāntau . cetano hyupayogalakṣaṇastadabhāvādacetanaḥ syāditi eṣa doṣo
rūpādyātmakatvābhāve syādātmana upayogalakṣaṇasya . tasmāt siddhaṃ rūpādyātmakatvamātmana upayogātmakatvāt .
ataḥ pudgalasvatattvameva matyādi iti sādhūktam . itaśca ātmā pudgalasvatattva eva, ātmasvatattvetyādi yāvad bhāvāvyatiriktarūpatvācca . ātmanaḥ svatattvamaudayiko bhāvaḥ, udaye bhava audayikaḥ,
kasya ? karmaṇo jñānāvaraṇīyāderaṣṭavidhasyāpi, sa ca tadudayapravṛttito'pṛthagbhūto'vyatirikto bhāvaḥ svaṃ tattvamātmanaḥ, tadavyatiriktarūpaścātmā, tasmādātmasvatattvajñānāvaraṇādyudayapravṛttyavyatiriktarūpatvāccātmā
pudgalātmatattva eva tādātmyapratipatteḥ rūpādyātmakaparamāṇvādivadityarthaḥ .
atrāha --nanvevamityādi yāvat kuto'sya rūpādyātmakatā ? iti . nanu bhoḥ ! tvaduktena
vidhinā etenaiva pudgala evātmā prāptaḥ tasyopayogātmanaḥ pudgalatvāt, yo'yaṃ pudgalopayogaḥ rūpaṃ
rasaḥ ityādijñānātmanaḥ sa cātmopayoga eva upayogavyatiriktasya rūpāderabhāvādupayogasya rūpādyātmakatvādupayogarūpatvācca rūpādīnām . tasmāt kuto'sya ātmano rūpādyātmakatā ? iti prastutasyopayogasya

rūpādīnāmapyanantaramevoktam . tasmād rūpādīnāmapyupayogātmakatvāduktavat pudgalo'pyātmā ātmāpi pudgala
eveti rūpādyātmakatvamātmano na doṣāya .
anena sarvamapītyādi yāvaditaretarātmakatvāt . evaṃ ca kṛtvā puruṣasya rūpādimatpudgalātmakatvāt pudgalasyāpi upayogātmakapuruṣātmakatvāt taducyate karmaiva kāraṇam, puruṣakāra eva kāraṇam ityavadhāritamubhayamapyekāntagatamasambaddhaṃ boddhavyamiti . ubhayorapi pakṣayoḥ saha doṣoktireṣā .

vṛkṣahaṭavat . yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sādhyaścalayitavyaḥ, itaro'vicālyo na kampayitavyaḥ . prathamo baddhamūlo vṛkṣavat,
dvitīyo haṭavadabaddhamūlaḥ, duḥkhaviśleṣyaḥ sukhaviśleṣyaścetyarthaḥ, nikācitānikācitāvayavatvāt,

pariṇamanamapi ca karmaṇaḥ puruṣakārasya viṣayo na ca viṣayaḥ kvacit, aprāptaprāptavipariṇāmāvasthatvāt, puṣpatugdṛḍhaphalavat .
evaṃ ca kṛtvā kriyāsahāyaśca sa phalaṃ prayacchati ekaśca, sāpekṣānapekṣaśaktitvāt, bhārotpāṭavat . sopakramasya karmātmātmanaḥ puruṣātmanā... ...tṛṇadāhavadvā .
nikācitāḥ karmapradeśāḥ tīvrakrodhādyaśubhapariṇāmena, anikācitā mandapariṇāmena . kimiva ? ayaḥśalākākalāpavat, yathā sūtramātropanibaddhā ayaḥśalākā ekaśalākāpakarṣamātraprayāsena sarvāḥ pracyavante,
prataptasampṛktaprahatāḥ saṅgharṣaṇādṛte na śakyāḥ pṛthak kartum, tathā karmavidhiḥ .
pariṇamanamapi cetyādi yāvat puṣpatug-dṛḍhaphalavat . tasyāpi pūrvakarmaṇaḥ tīvramandādihetūpasevanasañcitasya phaladānamihatyapuruṣakārasya kṛṣyadhyayanasevāvāṇijyādyanuṣṭhānasya viṣayo na ca viṣayaḥ
kvaciditi, aprāptaprāptavipariṇāmāvasthatvāt, yathāsaṅkhyaṃ svayamaprāptavipariṇāmāvasthaṃ puruṣakāravipariṇāṇamyaṃ puruṣakāreṇa vipācyate viṣayatvamānīyate udīraṇākaraṇenodīryate, prāptavipariṇāmāvasthaṃ tu
vaiyarthyānna viṣayīkriyate puruṣakāreṇa na vipācyate nodīryate svayameva vipakvatvāt . kimiva ? puṣpatugdṛḍhaphalavat, puṣpatokaṃ dṛḍhaphalaṃ ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ dṛṣṭāntau . yathā dṛḍhaphalaṃ svayameva vipacyamānaṃ na pācyate
puruṣakāreṇa, puṣpatokaṃ tu vṛkṣāyurvedavidhinā vipācyate . athavā puṣpatokasyaivotpannasya dṛḍhaṃ phalamasya
bhāvīti dṛḍhaphalaṃ tādṛkchaktyaivotpannamiti tasyaiva bhavati tacchaktivirahitasya na bhavatīti tadevāprāptapākakālaṃ
kadalakāmrādiphalaṃ kodravapalālādiveṣṭitaṃ nikhātaṃ vā pārśvadhūmādibhirvipācyate, netaradavaśyaṃ vināśīti .
athavā aprāptavipariṇāmāvasthaṃ puṣpatokamatimṛdutvādupakrameṇāpi na pācyate pācanāyogyatvāt kuthyati
vilīyate vā, dṛḍhaphalaṃ tu pācanayogyaṃ prāptakālatvāt pācyate .
evaṃ ca kṛtvā kriyāsahāyaśca sa phalaṃ prayacchati ekaśca sahāyībhūtāyāḥ kriyāyā api
tacchaktimātratvāt, kriyāsahāyasya puruṣakārasya phalapradānaṃ sāpekṣānapekṣaśaktitvāt, bhārotpāṭavat,
yathā bhāramutpāṭayan kaścit puruṣaḥ svayamevotpāṭayati, kaścit punaḥ sahāyāpekṣaḥ, evaṃ puruṣakāro'pi
phalapradāne sahāyāṃ kriyāmapekṣate kaścit kaścinneti sopakramasya kriyāpekṣā na nirupakramasya . tatra sopa

evamanayaiva diśā puruṣakāraikāntavādaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . yatraikasya svātantryaṃ tatra
tatpradarśitatattvasya itarasyāpīti bhāvanīyam . tathāvagāhādilakṣaṇairastikāyaiḥ
kramasya karmātmātmana ityādi yāvat tṛṇadāhavadveti tasyaiva sahaikībhūtasya ātmanaścetanācetanatvena
puruṣātmanetyādinā sāpekṣān udayopaśamakṣayopaśamakṣayān avasthāviśeṣān darśayati sodāharaṇān .
evamanayetyādi yāvadbhāvanīyamiti . evaṃ tāvad dvyātmakatayā ātmakarmaikāntavādapratyuktidigiyaṃ
pradarśitā . anayaiva diśā anayaiva puruṣakāra ityāpādyoktanyāyena tadeva vastu karmasaṃjñāmātreṇa bhāvayitvā
puruṣakāraikāntavādaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ . tadyathā --karma ca kāraṇaṃ pravartayitṛtvāt sukhaduḥkhotkarṣāpakarṣavikalpānubhavāvaśyambhāvi, tasya caikasya uktavat sarvatvādupayogatvāt puruṣatāpi ityādi sarvamaśeṣaṃ
yojanīyam, yat pareṇānabhyupagatamanyataraditarat taditarasminnāpādyamiti, tata āha --yatraikasya svātantryaṃ
tatra tatpradarśitatattvasya itarasyāpīti bhāvanīyamiti bhāvanopāyaṃ pradarśayati sāmānyena . tathā
viśeṣya bhāvitamevāsmābhiriti .


aikyaṃ pravartakapravartyanyāyāt, taddravyatvāt, pṛthivyādivat . avagāhādidravyaṃ yathā
viyadādi evamātmādyapi, tasyaiva tathābhūteḥ, udakādivrīhitvaśivakādighaṭatvavat .
avibhaktāvagāhāvagāhyāvagāhakamekamevedaṃ bhavanaṃ mithyāgrāhotthāpitadravyaguṇakarmasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyaprabhedaṃ sarvagatetarābhimatadravyamātramutkṣepaṇādi tada-

na kevalaṃ karmātmanorevābhinnaikyam, kiṃ tarhi ? yathā cātra tattvaṃ karmātmanoḥ sarvaprabhedeṣu vṛttaṃ
bhāvitamasmābhistathā avagāhādilakṣaṇairastikāyaiḥ avagāhagatisthitilakṣaṇairākāśadharmādharmākhyaiḥ saha
karmātmavicāroktāt pravartakapravartyanyāyād bhāvanīyamiti vartate . yathā pravartaka eva pravartya ityuktaṃ
tathā avagāhādi pravartakaṃ pravartyaṃ cobhayamekameva karmātmavaditi . punarapi tadbhāvanārthamāha --taddravyatvāt,
yad yad yaddravyaṃ tat tat tattattvam, yathā prāg bhāvitaṃ pṛthivyādi vrīhyādi . pṛthivyādivat taddravyatvamasiddhamiti cet, netyucyate, avagāhādidravyaṃ yathā viyadādi evamātmādyapi, yathāvagāhopakāraguṇamākāśaṃ gatisthityupakāraguṇau dharmādharmāvevamātmaparamāṇvādidravyamapi . kuto hetoḥ ? tasyaiva tathābhūteḥ, tadeva hyātmapudgaladravyaṃ tathā tathāvagāhagatisthitirūpeṇa bhavati . kimiva ? udakādivrīhitvaśivakādighaṭatvavat, yathodakapṛthivyākāśavātabījāṅkurādaya eva vrīhībhavanti yugapadbhāvino bhāvāḥ
yathā ca kramabhāvinaḥ śivaka-sthāsaka-kuśūlakādaya eva ghaṭībhavanti tathā ātmādyapyavagāhādi, avagāhādi
viyadādi, viyadādyavagāhādi, avagāhādyātmādi ca bhavatīti tasya tasya taddravyatvam, taddravyatvāt pravartakapravartyaikyanyāyo'vasthitaḥ . tasmāccātmapudgalākāśadharmādharmāstikāyā ekaṃ tattvaṃ sarvaprabhedavṛttamiti .
kiñcānyat, avibhaktetyādi yāvadekamevedaṃ bhavanam . avagāho'vagāhamānādātmāṇvāderavibhaktaḥ
avagāhyamapyākāśamavagāhadharmasya svaliṅgasya pṛthagasiddheravagāhakādavibhaktaṃ dravyārthavivakṣāyāṃ paryāyasyābhāvāt . tasmādekamevedaṃ bhavanamiti sādhūktam . tat punaranyatra prativādimate mithyāgrāhotthāpitetyādi
yāvat sarvagatetarābhimatadravyamiti . kāryadravyaṃ paṭādi kāraṇadravyāt tantvāderanyat tantvādi ca kāryādanyat, evaṃ guṇāḥ paṭaraktaśyāmatvādayaḥ paṭāt kāraṇakāryākhyāḥ parasparataśca, karmāpyutkṣepaṇādi kriyāvaddravyasamavetaṃ sarvagatāsarvagatadravyād guṇebhyaḥ parasparataśca, dravya-guṇa-karmabhyaḥ parasparataścānye sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyā itītthaṃprabhedaṃ tadevāsmaduktaṃ bhavanaṃ mithyāgrāhotthāpitaṃ kaiścit . yaiścetthaṃ vikalpitaṃ tān
prati sarvagatetarābhimatadravyasvarūpamutkṣepaṇādi, ādigrahaṇād rūparasādiguṇagaṇaḥ sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāśca, tacca sarvagatāsarvagatadravyaṃ parasparato'nyonyānyatarasvarūpamātramiti pratijñārthaḥ . tadavyatiriktatvāditi hetuḥ, anantaroktavidhinā ca tadavyatiriktatvaṃ siddham . tatsvarūpamātraṃ tadavyatiriktam anayoḥ
śabdayoḥ ko'rthabheda iti cet, na kaścidetannayadarśanena, aparastu śabdabuddhyādibhedamicchatīti tanmatā

vyatiriktatvāt ghaṭaghaṭabhavanavat . evaṃ pacikriyāpi pṛthivyādikāṣṭhādisvatattvapratiniyatā kvacidapyanatikrāntadravyasvarūpā pṛthivyādikāṣṭhādidravyamātraṃ bhavanameva .
tacca yadasau bhavati sa tasya bhāvaḥ puruṣādiniyamacetanācetanavikalpadvaitaviśeṣaṇavinirmuktaḥ . tadeva hi bhavanaṃ yat sarvātmakamasadvyāvṛttārtham . anena hi pravartayitṛtvāt sarvaprabhedena bhūyate, na na bhūyate'pi abhāvena prāgabhāvādinā, tadātmāna-
pekṣayaitaduktam . dṛṣṭāntaḥ ghaṭaghaṭabhavanavat, yathā ghaṭa eva ghaṭabhavanaṃ na tato'nyat tatastadavyatiriktam .
yadyanyat syād ghaṭo na bhaved bhavanādanyatvād bhavanavyatiriktatvāt khapuṣpavat, bhavanaṃ vā tasya na syāt tato'nyatvāt paṭabhavanavaditi . ato ghaṭamātraṃ ghaṭabhavanaṃ tadavyatiriktaṃ ca evaṃ sarvagatetaradravyamātramutkṣepaṇādīti .
evaṃ pacikriyāpītyādi . kāṣṭhādipṛthivyādisvatattve pratiniyatā pacikriyāyā vṛttiḥ pūrvoktasarvapariṇatyāvṛttirūpatvādanyonyasvarūpāpatteśca teṣāmaikyāpattiśceti anatikrāntaṃ dravyasya svarūpaṃ deśe kāle vā
yayā pacikriyayā sā kvacidapyanatikrāntadravyasvarūpā . sā cotkṣepaṇādivadeva pṛthivyādikāṣṭhādidravyamātraṃ bhavanameva .
bhavanaṃ bhāvo'stitā iti paryāyaśabdāḥ . tacca bhavanaṃ yadasau bhavati sa tasya bhāvaḥ, na
tato'nyaḥ, svabhāvasambandhārthastu ṣaṣṭhyapadeśaḥ kraśayatyacetasaḥ   iti vacanāt svārthābhidhāyinyevābhede kartṛlakṣaṇā ṣaṣṭhī--dravyasya bhavanaṃ dravyameva bhavatīti . sa ca bhāvaḥ puruṣādiniyamacetanācetanavikalpadvaitaviśeṣaṇavinirmuktaḥ, puruṣa evedam, niyatireva, kāla eva ityādi cetanamacetanaṃ ca bhavatītyanena vikalpena dvaitamidaṃ manuṣyādi ghaṭādi ceti viśeṣyate yat puruṣādivāde jāgratsuptādyavasthābhedena kramayaugapadyādibhedena vā tena viśeṣaṇena vinirmuktaḥ sa bhāvo nirviśeṣaṇa eva sarvātmakaḥ,
ghaṭādi paṭo bhavati vrīhirudakam manuṣyo nabho dharmādharmādi, paṭo'pi ghaṭo vrīhyudakādi, ityaviśeṣeṇa sarvaṃ
bhavatyevaikaikamiti tadeva hi bhavanaṃ yat sarvātmakamasadvyāvṛttārtham, na hyasannāma kiñcidasti . kiṃ
kāraṇam ? yasmādanena pravartayitṛtvāt sarvaprabhedena vrīhyudakākāśāṅkurādinā bhūyate, na na bhūyate'pīti
dviḥ pratiṣedhād bhavanamevābhāvavyāvṛttyā niyamyate bhavatyeva, na na bhavati iti . kena punarna bhavati ?
abhāvena prāgabhāvādinā, asmin hi naye na kenacit prakāreṇa kiñcinna bhavatīti prākpradhvaṃsānyātyantābhāvā na santyeva . kutaḥ ? tadātmānatiriktatvāt, sa sa ātmā tadātmā tasyātmā vā tadātmā,
tato'natiriktatvāt . yad yad yadātmānatiriktaṃ tasya tasya prāgabhāvādyabhāvaḥ, tenāpyātmanā bhavatyevetyarthaḥ .

tiriktatvāt bālakumārādivat . bhūtvā na bhavati abhūtvā ca bhavati, anyathā'bhāvatvāpatteḥ .
acetana iti ca cetanādanya ātmaivoktaḥ paryudāsavācitvānnañaḥ, nocyate
cetano na bhavatyacetana iti cetanā na bhavatyacetanā iti jñānādi na bhavatyajñānādirvā iti .
kimiva ? bālakumārādivat, yathā bālaḥ kumāro yuvā madhyamaḥ sthaviro vā iti devadatta eva tena
tena prakāreṇa bhavati bālakāle kaumārābhāvena kaumāre'bālabhāvena yajñadattādyanyābhāvena kharaviṣāṇādyatyantābhāvena ca sarvaḥ sarvadā sarvatra sarvathā ca bhavati sa eva devadattastattadātmakastathā sarvadravyabhavanamiti .
bhūtvā na bhavatyabhūtvā ca bhavatīti, mṛtpiṇḍakāle na na bhavati ghaṭastadavyatiriktātmakatvād devadattabālakumārādivat, kapālakāle na na bhavati ghaṭaḥ tadavyatiriktātmakatvād devadattabālakumārādivat . kasmāt ? anyathā'bhāvatvāpatterasattvāpatteḥ . yadyevaṃ neṣyate tvayā prāgabhāvādināpi bhavatyeva
iti, tatastasya devadattādervastuno bālakumārādisarvāvasthātmaparityāge kiṃ tad devadattākhyaṃ vastu ? kāstāstadvyatiriktā bālādyavasthāḥ ? ityabhāva āpadyate . na santyavasthāḥ parasparasambandhābhāvād vandhyāputravat .
nāstyavasthāvat, avasthāvyatirekeṇānavadhāraṇāt, vandhyāputravat .
atrāha--na cetano'cetanaḥ iti nañā pratiṣedhavācinā sambandhādacetanarūpeṇa cetanasya bhāvābhāva
iti . atra brūmaḥ --acetana iti ca cetanādanya ātmaivoktaḥ paryudāsavācitvād nañaḥ, nātyantābhāvavācitvāt . sa ko'nyaścetanādanya ātmaiva iti cet, ucyate--sparśāsparśādidharmaṇastasyaivopayogādyasparśarūpādanyena rūpeṇa sa eva sparśādimān jñānāvaraṇādikarmarūpa ātmā, tena cetanādanyenācetana iti
cetana evoktaḥ, na tu bhavanmatātyantacetanābhāvarūpeṇa, prasajyapratiṣedhākhyasya vikalpāntarasyābhāvād
nocyate cetano na bhavatyacetanaḥ iti . tathā cetanā na bhavatyacetanā iti nocyate'jñānādi
jñānadarśanavīryādi na bhavatīti, kiṃ tarhi ? cetanāyā anyā'cetanā, kā sā ? sparśādīti . tathā jñānādi
na bhavatītyajñānādi nocyate, kiṃ tarhi ? jñānāderanyadajñānādi sparśādyeva . acetanā'jñānayorbhūya udāharaṇaṃ cetanātmano dravyasya nirdeśenāparituṣṭasya parasya tadabhipretaparyāyanirdeśena pratipādanārtham, ajñānādirveti, kiyatī vodāharaṇamālā kriyate ? yo'pyajñāna-saṃśaya-viparyayajñānādirjñānād bhinna ityabhimato dharmakalāpaḥ so'pi jñānājñānātmātmarūpāderbhinna eveti tatrāpi na tu jñānādirna bhavatyajñānādirityucyate, kiṃ
tarhi ? jñānāderanya evājñānādirityātmaiva ajñānādirūpeṇocyate iti .


yadyeṣa nyāyo neṣyate tataḥ tathā sarvato vyāvṛtterayuktaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhaḥ,
svato'pi vyāvṛtteḥ khapuṣpavadasattvāt . anyatvācca tattva eva prāgabhāvādivyāvṛtterbālakumārādivat tattva evatattvameva cetanā .
sā punarjñānadarśanādisaṃvedanā nirvṛttyupakaraṇalabdhitattva upayogātmā . ato
rūpādimadapyātmā, cetanatvāt, abhimatātmavat, tasyaiva tathābhūtatvādā mukteḥ .
evaṃ ca kṛtvā jñānaṃ na jñānaṃ pudgalātmakatvād rūpādivat, ajñānamapi ca jñānaṃ tata
eva tadvat, cetano'cetanaḥ, acetanaścetana ityādi .

yadyeṣa nyāyo neṣyate'nyaḥ sa prasajyapratiṣedha iṣyate cetano na bhavatyacetana ityādiriṣyate tvayā
tata evaṃ sati tathā tena prakāreṇa sarvato vyāvṛttiḥ, ghaṭaḥ paṭo na bhavatīti paṭo'pi ghaṭo na bhavatīti
parasparavyāvṛttivat sarvabhāvavyāvṛtteścetanācetanayorvyāvṛttiḥ . tataśca sarvato vyāvṛtterayuktaḥ prasajyapratiṣedho nirviśeṣavyāvṛttyarthatvād naña iti . syānmatam--svatastvavyāvṛttirbhaviṣyati ghaṭavaditi cet,
ucyate --svato'pi vyāvṛtteḥ, svato'pi tarhi vyāvṛttaṃ tat paraparikalpitaṃ vastu prāpnoti sarvato
vyāvṛttatvāt khapuṣpavat . tasmāccāvastutvaṃ svaparato vyāvṛttatvāt khapuṣpavadeveti . tata āha --asattvāditi . tasmāt sthitametat--asattvaprasaṅgāt prasajyapratiṣedhābhāvācca prāgabhāvādivyāvṛtteranyatvamarthaḥ bālaḥ
kumāro na bhavati ityādiṣu . tata upasaṃhriyate maula eva anyatvācca tattva eva prāgabhāvādivyāvṛtterbālakumārādivat tattvameva cetaneti .
sā punaridānīṃ cetanā kiṃsvarūpā ? iti vācyā, ucyate --jñānadarśanādisaṃvedanā, sākārānākāropayogau saprabhedau jñānadarśanagrahaṇena gṛhītau, ādigrahaṇena sukhaduḥkharāgadveṣabhayādisaṃvedanā gṛhītā .
sāpi ca nirvṛttyupakaraṇalabdhitattva upayogātmā, indriyāṇāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ nirvṛttiḥ pakṣmapuṭakṛṣṇasārāditvena niṣpattiḥ, upakaraṇaṃ tu masūrakātimuktakakadambakṣuraprānekākāratayā pradeśānāṃ niṣpattiḥ, etannayadarśanena vāñjanapādābhyaṅgapradīpādyapyupakārakamupalabdheḥ sarvamupakaraṇam . labdhiḥ punarnirvṛtteḥ prāk paścāccātmanā
pūrvopāttaṃ tadyogyanāmakarmodayajaṃ dravyaṃ jñānadarśanāvaraṇayorvīryāntarāyasya ca kṣayakṣayopaśamau, tattattva upayogo
jñānadarśanasvatattvavyaktiḥ, sa eva cātmā . tataḥ kimiti cet, ato rūpādimadapyātmā, yadetad
rūparasādidharma mūrtapaudgalamādhyātmikamindriyapāṇyādyavayavātmakaṃ śarīraṃ tadapi ātmaiva . kutaḥ ? cetanatvāt, cetanatvaṃ cāsyānantaraṃ pratipāditam . kimiva ? abhimatātmavat, yathā śuddhopayogalakṣaṇaḥ kevalī
ātmā cetanatvāt tathendriyādyapi rūpādimaditi . tat samarthayati --tasyaiva tathābhūtatvādā mukteḥ, sa
eva hi dravyakevalī saṃsārāvastha upayogātmā tathābhūto nirāvaraṇajñānadarśanaḥ saṃvṛtto'bhimatātmā, tasmādā
muktestasyaiva tathābhūtatvādihāpi saṃsāre sa eveti rūpādimataḥ puruṣasya muktasya copayogātmakatvādaviśeṣa
eva . evaṃ ca kṛtvā jñānaṃ na jñānaṃ pudgalātmakatvād rūpādivat, pudgalātmakatvaṃ ca jñānasyānantaraṃ

evaṃ cāyaṃ saṅgraheṣu dravyaprakṛtinayaḥ . sa ca saṅgrahaikadeśatvād dravyārthaḥ .
dravyaśabdo'pi kartṛsādhanaḥ . dravyamapi dravati yāti na vicchidyate bhinnarūpavyāptyā . nanu karmaṇi karmasādhanatvamuditam . nanu karmasādhanavyākhyānena tenaiva
kartṛsādhanatvameva vyavasthāpitam, dravyeṇaiva dravyaṃ kriyate vrīhivat iti kartari
tṛtīyayā kartṛsādhanatvābhyupagamāt .
etasmiṃśca naye dravyameva śabdārtho nityaḥ sarvātmakaḥ . anvāha ca--pṛthivīdhātau
kiṃ satyam ? vikalpaḥ . vikalpe kiṃ satyam ? jñānam . jñāne kiṃ satyam ? om . tad brahma .  
pratipāditam . ajñānamapi ca jñānaṃ tata eva tadvat, cetano'cetanaḥ, acetanaścetana ityanekadhā
sarvasarvātmakatāṃ bhāvayati . ityādigrahaṇānnidarśanamātrametad bhāvitam, anayā diśā sarvatra bhāvanīyamiti .
āha--ārṣokteṣu nayeṣu katamo'yam ? iti, atrocyate --evaṃ cāyaṃ saṅgraheṣu . saṅgrahaḥ śatavikalpaḥ, ekkeko ya satavidho satta ṇayasatā havaṃti te cevaṃ āvani॰āva॰ ni॰ 759 iti vacanāt . teṣu saṅgraheṣu
ayaṃ vidhiniyamanayo draṣṭavyo ya evaṃ varṇitaḥ . te'pi ca saṅgrahāḥ saṅgraheṇa trividhā bhavanti dravya-sthitanayaprakṛtayaḥ . dravyaprakṛtayaḥ karma-puruṣakārādyekāntavādāḥ, sthitaprakṛtayaḥ puruṣa-kāla-niyatyādivādāḥ,
nayaprakṛtayaḥ prakṛtīśvarādikāraṇavādāḥ . teṣu cāyaṃ nayaḥ sthitaprakṛtīnāṃ puruṣa-kāla-niyati-svabhāvanayānāṃ
virodhinorīśvaranayasya pradhānanayasya cādhiṣṭhātṛpradhānākhyayorvipakṣo dravyaprakṛtinayo vidhiniyamabhaṅgo
draṣṭavyaḥ . sa ca saṅgrahaikadeśatvād dravyārthaḥ, niyamātmakatvāt paryāyāṃśasparśitve'pi saṅgrahaikadeśatvād
dravyārtha evāyamiti .
dravyaśabdo'pi kartṛsādhanaḥ, dravyamapi dravatītyādiparyāyaśabdaistadarthaṃ vyācaṣṭe, dravati yāti na
vicchidyate bhinnarūpavyāptyā bhinnāni rūpāṇi cetanācetanāni vrīhipṛthivyādīni devamanuṣyādīni ca
sākalyena vyāpnotyeva na kiñcidapi tyajatīti . codaka āha --nanu karmaṇi karmasādhanatvamuditam,
karmakāraṇavyākhyāne'yaṃ dravyaśabdaḥ karmasādhana evoktaḥ drūyata iti dravyam iti, karmavādaśca vidhiniyamabhaṅga
ityuktam, tat kathamadhunā'vadhāryaṃ dravatīti dravyaṃ kartṛsādhanamucyata iti . atra vidhiniyamanayo brūte
pūrvoktameva smārayan --nanu karmasādhanavyākhyānena tenaiva kartṛsādhanatvameva vyavasthāpitamiti . tat
kathamiti cet, ucyate --dravyeṇaiva dravyaṃ kriyate vrīhivaditi kartari tṛtīyā dravyeṇa iti, tayā
kartṛsādhanatvābhyupagamāt prāgasmābhiḥ puruṣakarmapṛthivīvrīhyādīnāmātmanaivātmanaḥ kartuḥ karmatvasya ca
vistareṇa varṇitavat satyāṃ karmatāyāmapi kartṛtvaṃ dravyatvāditi sāmānyārthasyāvicchedāt svātantryāt .
etasmiṃśca naye dravyameva śabdārthaḥ, na paryāyārthaḥ padārtha ityarthaḥ . sa ca nityo vicchedā

iti . sa eṣa paramārthaḥsa eṣa paramārtha   . etaduktaṃ bhavati--ataḥ paraṃ śabdārthavyavahāro nivartate
nirvikalpatvāt, vyavahārātīto'yamarthaḥ . atrānuvṛttivyāvṛttī anantaroktapṛthivyādidhātuvikalpajñānasatyatvānuprabandhasāmarthyopahitarūpe yathābhāgaṃ prasiddhiṃ gacchataḥ .
atra utpādavināśaśabdāvapi tatsthitarūpāveva, ūrdhvapadanam... ... .... anityaghaṭādiśabdā api svatattvabījaṃ dravyamevāvicchinnamāhuḥ .
bhāvādavasthitatvādvā sarvātmaka ekaikasya sarvārtharūpānusyūtatvāt . anvāha ceti jñāpakamāha, etameva nayamanuvartamāno'nyo'pyāha . pṛthivīdhātāvityādi yāvat tad brahmeti . pṛthivyeva pṛthivīdhātuḥ, dhṛtyādidharmadhāraṇāt . tatra kiṃ satyam ? vikalpa iti svayameva pṛṣṭvā vyācaṣṭe . na kadācidapyatra pṛthivī nāmāsti
aśmasikatāmṛlloṣṭavajrādīn vimucya, ta eva hi vikalpāḥ pṛthivī, na pṛthivyeva te . vikalpe kiṃ
satyam ? jñānam, te'pi ca vikalpā jñānādanye na santi, jñānameva ātmakarmalakṣaṇaṃ caitanyaṃ tathā tathā
vijṛmbhate, caitanyasyaiva vyavahāramārgapātitvāt . jñāne kiṃ satyam ? om, avati rakṣati pātiyāti prīyate
tṛpyati cetanācetanabhede satyapyevamādidhātvarthātmanā vipariṇamamānaṃ karmātmatayaikaṃ bhavati yena yathā parikalpyate tat tathānuvartata ityom . tadetad brahma . sa eṣa paramārthaḥ, tadetat tattvaṃ paramaṃ brahma bṛhaditi .
tasyārthaṃ kathayati etaduktaṃ bhavati--ataḥ paraṃ śabdārthavyavahāro nivartate nirvikalpatvāditi, iyaṃ
śabdārthavyavahāragatiryāvannirvikalpaṃ jñānamevaitaditi, ataḥ paraṃ brahma iti yat paraṃ tattvaṃ tatra jñānamapi
nirvikalpaṃ sad na kramate, taddarśayati --vyavahārātīto'yamarthaḥ . ayamiti vyākhyātamadhigamopāyakramamātraṃ
darśayati .
katham om ityeṣo'nvayavyatirekarahitaḥ śabdārtho bhavitumarhatīti cet, ko brūte'nvayavyatirekarahita
iti ? yasmādatrānuvṛttivyāvṛttī anantaroktapṛthivyādidhātuvikalpajñānasatyatvānuprabandhasāmarthyopahitarūpe, pṛthivyādidhātūnāmacetanābhimatānāṃ vikalpasatyānāṃ cetanakarmātmanokarmābhimatānāṃ ca jñānasatyasvarūpapuruṣatvena vānvitavyatiriktānām om iti karmātmaikyāpattyā tatsatyatvānuprabandhena śaktyupadhānaṃ
nityamevetyanvayavyatirekavānevāyaṃ śabdārtha iti . te cānuvṛttivyāvṛttī yo yo bhāgo yathābhāgaṃ prasiddhimabhidhānābhidheyavyavahārātmikāṃ karma iti puruṣaḥ iti karmapuruṣakāra iti eka eva iti vā prasiddhiṃ
gacchata iti .
sa ca śabdārtho'nādyanuprabandhasāmarthyopahitānupravṛttitvād nityaḥ . atrotpādavināśaśabdāvapi
tatsthitarūpāveva nāsadudbhavātyantavināśarūpāviti, tadvyācaṣṭe --ūrdhvapadanamityādi gatārtham, yathāsaṅkhyamāvirbhāvatirobhāvasvarūpayorapi bhāvābhidhāyitvādavasthita evārtha utpadyate vinaśyatīti cocyate tathā

vākyārtho'pi ca pṛthak sarvaṃ padam, sarvasarvātmakatvāt .
nibandhanamapyasya ārṣam--je ekaṇāme se bahuṇāme ācārāṅgasū॰ 1 . 3 . 4 iti .
tathā pariṇamamānaḥ . anityaghaṭādiśabdā apīti, anityaḥ pradhvastaḥ ityādayo ghaṭaḥ paṭaḥ ityādayaśca
śabdāḥ pṛthivyādilakṣaṇā api nātyantamutpannamabhūtaṃ vārthaṃ bruvate, kiṃ tarhi ? svatattvabījaṃ dravyamevāvicchinnamāhuḥ, svatattvaṃ yadabhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca na bhavati tadanityam, samānakartṛkayoḥ pūrvakāle ktvāpratyayavidhānāt . sa eva tu dṛśyādṛśyapariṇāmābhyāṃ bhavati na bhavatīti svatattvasya anityatvasya bījaṃ
dravyamevārthaḥ . ghaṭādi tāvattadanityatvam, tasya bījamavasthitaṃ dravyaṃ sāmānyameva aṅkurādervrīhivat . tadevāvicchinnaṃ mahāpṛthivīvadanutpādavyayayogi avṛddham avicāli kūṭasthaṃ dhruvaṃ nānyaditi padārthaḥ .
vākyārtho'pi ca pṛthak sarvaṃ padam, pratyekaṃ padaṃ vākyam devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklām ityatra
devadatta evetarapadārthaparisamāpteḥ karmavibhaktyante gośabde ca tathāparisamāpteritarapadārthānām . tacca sarvasarvātmakatvāduktanyāyādupapannam .
na caitāḥ svamanīṣikā ucyante, kintu nibandhanamapyasya darśanasya ārṣamasti yato'sya darśanasya
vinirgama iti taddarśayati --je ekaṇāme se bahuṇāme, yadekasya bhāvaḥ tat sarvasyāpi yat sarvasya
tadekasyāpi .
iti caturtho'ro nayacakrasya samāptaḥ prathamaśca mārgo nemirityarthaḥ .
ardhamekapustakaṃ samāptam ॥ cha ॥





oँ arham

atha pañcama ubhayāraḥ .

satyametad bhavatīti bhāvaḥ iti . kintvidaṃ dravyamevārthaḥ iti virudhyate'bhyupagamena svavacanena vā tadavayavena vā, yat tad bhavati tasya bhāvatvādapi, ato'nyathā'sattvāt khapuṣpavat, ubhayam--dravyaṃ bhāvaśca .

evamanantaranayenābhihite bravītyuttaraḥ --satyametad yaducyate tvayā bhavatīti bhāvaḥ iti .
kintvidaṃ dravyamevārthaḥ iti virudhyate, dravyaṃ ca bhavye pā॰ 5 . 3 . 104, dravatīti dravyaṃ drūyata
iti vā dravyamiti kartṛkarmasādhanavyutpattimātrabhede satyapi arthabhedābhāvāt sarvasarvātmakatvācca dravyameva
pṛthivyādivrīhyādibhāvena bhavati nānyaḥ kaścidbhāvo'sti ityetadavadhāraṇaṃ virudhyate, kena saha virudhyate ?
abhyupagamena, yasmāt tvayaivābhyupagataṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ dravyaṃ bhavatīti bhāvaḥ iti bhavanalakṣaṇasya prakṛtyarthasya
sādhyasya dravyalakṣaṇena pratyayārthena sādhanena kartrā viśeṣaṇāt taddvyarthatābhyupagateti, viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyayośca
bhedāt dravyamevārthaḥ iti pūrvo'bhyupagamo virudhyate, itarathā vaiyarthyaṃ paunaruktyaṃ vā syād dravyaṃ bhavati
iti . athavā prakṛṣṭakālenābhyupagamena virudhyate iti kiṃ citramāyatyām ? kintu svavacanena vā virudhyate
iti vartate, vāśabdasya vikalpārthatvāt samuccayārthatvādvā abhyupagamena svavacanena ca virudhyata iti, ata
āha --tadavayavena vā, bhavati iti dravyam iti vā viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhedānupādāne'pi ekasminneva pade
prakṛtipratyayārthabhedopādānāt, bhū sattāyāṃ prakṛtiḥ, laṭpratyayaḥ kartari, tau prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha
brūtaḥ pradhānopasarjanabhāvena, yathā rājapuruṣau puruṣārthamiti, tathā dravyamityatrāpi dru gatau pā॰ dhā॰ 945
kṛtyalyuṭo bahulam pā॰ 3 . 3 . 113 iti kartṛkarmādyanyatamasādhane yatpratyaye prakṛtipratyayabhedābhyupagamāt .
kiṃ kāraṇam ? yat tadbhavati tasya bhāvatvādapi, yat tat tvadiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ tad bhāvo'pi kriyāpi, kriyā
bhāvaḥ pravṛttiriti paryāyāḥ, bhāvasyāpi bhāvāt bhavatīti bhāvaḥ iti vyutpatteḥ dravyam iti bhavati iti
ca vacanād bhavanasya dravyād bhinnatvāt . ato'nyathā'sattvāt, yadi dravyaṃ bhāvo'pi na syāt
kriyāpi na syāt tatastadasat syādabhāvatvādakriyatvāt khapuṣpavaditi . tasmād dravyakriyayoḥ sattvād
yaduktaṃ tvayā dravyamātramutkṣepaṇādi iti tadasat .


tatra sammūrcchitasarvaprabhedanirbhedaṃ bījaṃ dravyam, tathābhavanavinābhūtasannidhivastutvavyaktiḥ kriyā, pravṛttiḥ kriyā bhāvaḥ, vadanagataniyatakramākārarūpaparimāṇamāyākārakapatākikāsantānaniṣkālavat, māyākārakavad dravyādanutpādavyayātmakāt pṛthivyādermūlādayaḥ, yathāsvaṃ patākikāmālāvat kriyātmānaḥ . adravya-

tasmācca na ekaṃ sarvam anantaranayadarśanam, na sarvamekaṃ puruṣaniyatyādivikalpavidhividhinayadarśanam,
nāpi vidhyubhayadarśanaṃ kartrakartṛbhūtaṃ prakṛtipuruṣamidam, nādhiṣṭhātradhiṣṭheyamidamitīśvarakāraṇaṃ pradhānopasarjanabhūtaṃ
prāṅnirdiṣṭam, kiṃ tarhi ? ubhayaṃ kartṛ bhavanasya pradhānaṃ ca tulyabalatvādasya bhāvo bhavatīti sāmānyena,
kiṃ punastadubhayamityata āha --dravyaṃ bhāvaśca . atra bhāvaśabdaḥ kriyāvacanaḥ kriyā bhāvo dhātuḥ pā॰ vā॰
1 . 3 . 1 iti lakṣaṇāt .
tasmāddvayaṃ dvayaṃ sarvaṃ ghaṭapaṭādi bhavati pacatyādivat . tatra sammūrchitasarvaprabhedanirbhedam, sammūrchitāḥ
saṃsṛṣṭāḥ avinirbhāgena sarve prabhedāḥ pacipaṭhibhujigamyāsiśayyādayaḥ kṛṣṇagauradanturahrasvadīrghatādayaśca yasmiṃstat sammūrchitasarvaprabhedaṃ tat sarvatra svarūpasamavasthānād nirbhedaṃ ca tadagṛhītataraṅgādiprabhedasaraḥsalilavat
tat teṣāṃ bījamāśrayo dravyamityetad dravyalakṣaṇam . tathābhavanavinābhūtasannidhivastutvavyaktiḥ kriyā,
tena prakāreṇa pacipaṭhigamyādinā bhavanaṃ tathābhavanam, tena bhavanena vinābhūtaḥ sannidhiḥ śaktimanmātrāvasthā
śaktyanabhivyaktiryasya vastunastat tathābhavanavinābhūtasannidhivastu, tasya bhāvo vastutvam, tadvyaktiḥ vastuśaktyabhivyaktiḥ kriyā ityetat kriyālakṣaṇam . pravṛttiḥ kriyā bhāva iti paryāyakathanam .
tasya dvayasya svatantrasya bhāvasya nidarśanam --vadanagatetyādi yāvad niṣkālavaditi . māyākārakavadane vyavasthitaḥ kramo yāsāmākārā rūpāṇi parimāṇāni ca tā māyākārakapatākikāḥ, tāsāṃ santānasya
niṣkālavat . pṛthak tayoḥ svarūpavyākhyānārthamāha --māyākārakavad dravyādanutpādavyayātmakāt
pṛthivyādermūlādaya iti jagad dārṣṭāntikaṃ dṛṣṭāntena māyākārakeṇa samīkurvan dravyaṃ vyācaṣṭe kriyāṃ ca
yathāsvaṃ patākikāmālāvat kriyātmāna iti ca . yā yā svā yathāsvaṃ patākikāmālā avyavacchedena
nīlapītādivarṇā hrasvadīrghāditanusthūlādisaṃsthānapramāṇā niyatā eva krameṇa niṣkasanti tathā pacati gacchati
ityādikriyā dravyād devadattāderiti . tato'nyā api ca tāstena vinā na bhavanti, so'pi tābhirvinā
na bhavati, atha ca niyatākārarūpaparimāṇāstāḥ sa ca tatpariṇatavyaktiriti dvayamapi bhavatīti .
evaṃ tasminneva dravyakriyātmani vastunyantarbhāvāt padārthāntarakalpanāvaiyarthyam kriyāmātratvād guṇādyāśritapadārthānām . dravyajātibhedaparikalpanāvaiyarthyaṃ ca sarvadravyāṇāṃ kriyāvattvāditi tatpradarśanārthamāha—

dravyavaddravyasaṃyojanaviyojanotkṣepaṇāpakṣepaṇāditathābhavanaviśeṣaṇasamavayanādayo
bhavanameva dravati jānāti icchati dveṣṭi dhvanati yatate saṃyunakti viyunakti
śvetate ityādi .
pṛthivyādisaṃyojanaviyojanotkṣepaṇāpakṣepaṇatathābhavanaviśeṣaṇasamavayanādibhavanena vinā na dravyabhedāḥ sambhavanti yāvadantyaṃ dravyam, pṛthivyādinā vinā na
saṃyojanaviyojanotkṣepaṇāpakṣepaṇatathābhavanaviśeṣaṇasamavayanādayo na mūlādibhāvo
veti dravyabhāvaparigrahaḥ .
evaṃ ca kṛtvoktam--na hi kiñcit svasminnātmani muhūrtamapyavatiṣṭhate vardhate yāvadanena
adravyadravyavaddravyasaṃyojanetyādayaḥ, guṇādayastāvat kriyaiva iti prāguktam, adhunāpyucyate taddvāreṇa jātyabhedaśca . dvividhaṃ hi dravyam--adravyamanekadravyaṃ ca . nāsya dravyaṃ samavāyikāraṇamityadravyamātmākāśakāladikparamāṇvākhyam . dravyavad dravyaṃ tu dvyaṇukādi mahāpṛthivīparyantam . tasya dvividhasyāpi dravyasya
jātibhedābhāvaḥ, yasmāt saṃyojanaṃ prāptiḥ kriyā pariṇatilakṣaṇā, saiva saṃyogo guṇo'ṇvākāśādīnām,
ātmākāśāderapi pariṇamanakriyāvattvāduktavadakriyasyāsattvāt . evaṃ viyojanaṃ vibhāgaḥ kriyāmātraṃ na guṇaḥ .
tathā rūpyate'kṣibhyāmiti rūpam, rasyate jihvayeti rasaḥ, evaṃ gandhasparśaśabdā anye ca saṅkhyādayo neyā buddhyā
saṅkhyāyamānatvāt . utkṣepaṇāpakṣepaṇādīti ūrdhvakṣepaṇādikriyā dravyadharmo dravyaprabhedaḥ . tathābhavanamiti
sattāsāmānyaṃ dravyasyaiva samānasya bhavanam, yat samānena bhūyate . viśeṣaṇamiti viśeṣaḥ kriyaiva yena nīlādinā
gamanādinā kriyāmātreṇa dravyasya viśeṣeṇa bhavanaṃ sa sa viśeṣaḥ . samavayanaṃ sambandhaḥ, so'pi saṃyoga eva,
sam ityekībhāvenāvayavānāmavasthānaṃ tantvādīnāṃ paṭāditvena samavāya iheti kāryakāraṇayorekībhavanam .
ādigrahaṇād yāvatsamavāyidravyaṃ bhedāt samavāyānantyaṃ darśayati ṣaṭpadārthaparimāṇābhāvaṃ ca pariṇāmadharmānantyāt kriyāguṇādipadārthānantyācca . bhavanameva bhāva eva kriyaiva, na guṇādayaḥ santīti bhavanaśabdena
kriyāṃ darśayati . idānīṃ dravyaṃ darśayitukāma āha --dravatītyādi yāvacchvetata ityādi kārakaṃ tallakāreṇa
kartṛvācinā drujñeṣidviṣidhvaniyatisaṃyujiviyujiśvitīnāṃ sādhyānāṃ kriyāviśeṣāṇāṃ sakartṛkāṇāmabhidhānāt .
tayoranyonyarahitayordravyakriyayorabhāvapradarśanārtho granthaḥ --pṛthivyādisaṃyojanetyādi yāvad dravyabhāvaparigrahaḥ . ādau tāvad bhavanena kriyayā bhāvena vinā na dravyabhedāḥ sambhavanti pṛthivyādayo
yāvadantyaṃ dravyaṃ paramāṇudravyamiti, pṛthivyādinetyādi yāvanna mūlādibhāvo vetyuktānāmeva dravyabhedānāmabhāve saṃyojanādayaḥ kriyābhedā na santītyādi tenāniṣṭāpādanam . tasmād dravyabhāvaparigraho yukta
ityupanayati, itiśabdasya hetvarthatvāt .
evaṃ ca kṛtvetyādi yāvadapāyena vā yujyata iti bhāṣyakāreṇa sāṅkhyādāhṛtyokto jñāpakagranthaḥ

vardhitavyamapāyena vā yujyate pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 1 . 2 . 64 . na hi kaścidartho dravyaṃ svasminnātmani
nirbhedanirupākhye muhūrtamapi avatiṣṭhate, apiśabdād yāvat samayamapi nāvatiṣṭhate,

sannihitavyaktiyuktatvāt .
