sambandhaḥ . yathātra vīraśabdaḥ puruṣasāmānādhikaraṇyād vastutvenaikatvaṃ gatastathā puruṣaśabdo'pi vīrasāmānādhikaraṇyāt, anyathā vaiyadhikaraṇyād ghaṭapaṭādivadasambandhādidoṣāḥ syuḥ . atha ca vīro viśeṣaṇaṃ puruṣo
viśeṣya iti parasparato bhinnārthatvamanayoḥ, itarathā sāmānādhikaraṇyāt tādātmyāt paunaruktyādidoṣāḥ
syuḥ . dṛṣṭaṃ cānayoraikātmyaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyāt, viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyabhāvāccānyatvam . evaṃ plakṣādipadatvena
dṛṣṭāntaparipūrṇatve satyuttarakālabhāvinaścārthasyaikasambandhiviṣayatvaṃ plakṣadhavādyupāttaikasamuccayagocaratvamityananyatvam, anyatvaṃ tu plakṣadhavayorevāsau samuccaya iti, tathā dravyādaliṅgasaṅkhyo bhāvo vastutvaikatvagatirananyo'nyaśceti . itthaṃ vā vyākhyāne'nyatvaikānto dravyārthatyāgo'nvayatyāgaśceti parihṛtā doṣāḥ .
ataḥ paramaliṅgasaṅkhyatvaprasādhanāyottaro granthaḥ sādhu bhavatītyādiryāvad bhavatsu yāḥ saṅkhyāstā
na bhavantīti . ekasmin dvayorbahuṣu vā devadattādibhavitṛṣu liṅgasaṅkhyābhedavatsu yat triliṅgaṃ saṅkhyāścaikatvādyāstā na bhavanti bhavane napuṃsakaliṅgamekavacanameva cānumīyate tadviśeṣaṇe sādhuśabde śrūyate ca sādhu
bhavantaṃ paśya ityādi kārakādivyatireke'pi . tasmādanyad bhavanaṃ bhavadbhyo devadattādibhyaḥ svarūpataḥ satyapi
vastutvaikatve . syānmatam--kimarthaṃ napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ prathamaikavacanaṃ ca ? ityatrocyate --pratyayaparaprakṛtivyavasthayā
tu prathamaikavacane, kiṃ kāraṇam ? atikramakāraṇābhāvāt . avaśyaṃ ca pratyayaparā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā,
prātipadikārthaliṅgaparimāṇavacanamātre prathamā pā॰ 2 . 2 . 46 iti sattāmātre'pi prathamāvidhānāt tato'tiriktārthāsambhavāt prathamātilaṅghane phalābhāvāt vacanasya ca nāntarīyakatvāt sattāmātrārthakāraṇatvāt kāraṇāntarābhāvāt, kāraṇāddhi tadatikramaḥ syāt . napuṃsakaṃ ca bhavanasyāvyaktatvāt, avyakte guṇasandehe
napuṃsakaliṅgaṃ prayoktavyamiti . kiṃ tathā loke dṛṣṭamiti cet, ucyate --kimapi dṛśyate iti, yathā
hastyaśvanarādisamūhaṃ dṛṣṭvā vaktāro bhavanti--kimapi dṛśyate, itiḥ pradarśane, etadeva vākyamudāharaṇatvena
pradarśayati .
tathetyādi pūrvasādhanavat tasminneva pakṣe hetvantaramupacayarūpeṇocyate . tena prakāreṇa tathā yathā pūrvaṃ
vastutvaikatvagatyananyadanyat iti pakṣīkṛtya sādhitaṃ tathātrāpi trikālaviṣayād dravyādanyo bhāvo na
ca tena vinā kāraka iti pakṣaḥ, dravyeṇa vinā na svayaṃ kārako bhāvaḥ, tatsahavṛttirevānyatve'pītyarthaḥ .

tvāt, dravyaṃ trikālaviṣayam kriyā tu trikālā gamanagantṛvat, vartamāna eva devadatte
gantari gatitraikālyam agamad gacchati gamiṣyati iti tathā abhūd bhavati
bhaviṣyati iti .
bhāvasya dravyādanyatvena tadapṛthakkārakatvena ca sādhyatvād bhāvagamanayorekārthatvād dṛṣṭāntaḥ sādhyaikadeśa iti cet, devadattagamanayostraikālyātraikālyābhyāṃ
bhedasiddherdravyabhāvayorapi tadvat, yugapadayugapattattvakhaghaṭavat .
atha dravyārthabhedatvādasya kathamidaṃ prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsābhāvātmakaṃ traikālyam ?
kasmāt ? trikālatvāt, trayaḥ kālā asyeti trikālaḥ, ko'sau ? bhāvaḥ kriyālakṣaṇaḥ, abhūd bhavati
bhaviṣyati ityupaneṣyamāṇatvād bhedena tribhirapi kālairabhisambandhadarśanād bhāvasya trikālatvaṃ siddhatvāddhetuḥ . dravyaṃ trikālaviṣayamiti, bhāvasya tridhā bhinnakālatve'pi ekarūpatvād vartamānatvenāvatiṣṭhamānaṃ
tatsambandhi dravyaṃ tāṃstrīnapi viṣayīkarotīti trikālaviṣayam ityucyate, triṣvapi kāleṣu tadeva bhavatītyarthaḥ . atrikālaṃ dravyaṃ trikālaviṣayamiti kriyā tu trikālā vartamānaviṣayetyuktaṃ bhavati . gamanagantṛvaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ . tadvyācaṣṭe --vartamāna eva devadatte gantari, evakāro'vadhāraṇe, triṣvapi kāleṣu ganturvartamānaikakālatāmavadhārayati . gatitraikālyam, gamanasya trayo'pi kālā anavadhāritaikarūpā dṛṣṭāḥ .
tannidarśayati --agamad gacchati gamiṣyatīti, tathā'bhūdityādirupanayo vyākhyātārthaḥ .
bhāvasyetyādi paramatāśaṅkā . syānmatam --bhāvasya dravyādanyatvena tadapṛthakkārakatvena ca
sādhyatvād bhāvagamanayorekārthatvād dravyād bhavanapṛthaktvāsiddhivad ganturgamanapṛthaktvāsiddherdṛṣṭāntaḥ
sādhyaikadeśa ityetasyāṃ vicikitsāyāṃ kathaṃ sādhanamiti cet, ucyate --devadattagamanayostraikālyātraikālyābhyāṃ bhedasiddherdravyabhāvayorapi tadvaditi sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ sādhyasādhanatvābhyāṃ vivakṣitatvādadoṣaḥ
tadvicikitsāyāmapi tulyatvāt, yugapadayugapattattvakhaghaṭavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, tasya bhāvastattvam, tadeva
bhavatītyarthaḥ . nanūktaṃ dravyabhede dravyārthatyāgaḥ, atyāge'nvayābhāvaḥ iti, naiṣa doṣaḥ, yugapadayugapattattvaviśeṣaṇādātmādisarvaikyād yugapattattvaṃ khaṃ dravyārthātmābhedāt khādeḥ dravyātmaiva vā'yugapattattvo ghaṭaḥ, tathā
traikālyātraikālyavastvanyānanyatve dravyabhāvayoḥ .
athetyādi . atha matam --dravyārthabhedatvādasya nayasya dravyārthasya ca nityatvāt kathamidaṃ
prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsābhāvātmakaṃ traikālyaṃ yujyata iti vākyaśeṣaḥ . yat prāg nāsīdadhunā bhavati tad
vartamānamityucyate, tacca prāgabhūtam, yadvinaṣṭamatītaṃ pradhvastamabhūtam, yad bhaviṣyati tadapi prāgabhūtamidānīmabhāvāt, aṅkuraghaṭakapālādidarśanāt . tacca pūrvāparakālatulyatvād nityasya na yuktam, nerdhruve tyab

na, pravṛttinityatvāt . nityatvasyāpi dvitvam . kūṭasthasya dravyasya taṃ tamātmānaṃ
paryanubhavataḥ dhrauvyaṃ kauṭasthyaṃ ca . itarasya tu tathā tathābhivyajyamānasya akauṭasthyaṃ
satatasampravṛttirūpaṃ nityatvaṃ ca .
ata eva bhūtābhūtabhāktvaṃ dravyādanyo bhāvaḥ ityasyārthasya sādhanam . vyatikrāntyavyatikrāntibhāktvād bhinnau kriyādravyabhāvau, tadyathā--kṛtaḥ kaṭo devadattena, kṛtaḥ karmaṇā vibhāgaḥ . kriyā vyatikrāmati, vibhāgaḥ karma ca na vyatikrāmataḥ
śabdārthasya piṇḍitatvāt . na ca vyatikramāvyatikramau nirnimittau bhavitumarhataḥ .
dṛṣṭaśca karmavibhāgayoravyatikrame karaṇasya vibhāgaviṣayasya vyatikramaḥ . tatra
nityamiti nirukteḥ . tasmādasiddhaṃ bhāvasya traikālyam, dravyārthābhyupagamāt . dravyasyaiva vā traikālyābhyupagame
bhāvasya dravyārthavādatyāga iti . atrocyate --na doṣaḥ, pravṛttinityatvāt, nātrāpi dravyārthatyāgaḥ pravṛttinityatvāt, bhavanapravṛttirbhāva ityarthaḥ, sā ca pravṛttirnityā sadā pravṛttervastuno bhāvo'pi nitya eveti na
dravyārthatyāgo nātraikālyamiti .
itara āha--kuto nityatvasya dvaitam ? iti . atrocyate--vastuno dravyabhavanātmakasyobhayatvādeva
nityatvasyāpi dvitvaṃ siddhaṃ yathā prāgupavarṇitaṃ na hi tadeva nityamityādi yāvat tadapi hi nityaṃ yasmiṃstattvaṃ na vihanyate pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 1 . 1 . paspaśā॰ iti uktatvāt, idānīmapi taddvitvaṃ pradarśyate --kūṭasthasyetyādi, dravyaṃ hi kūṭasthaṃ nityaṃ pūrvāparakālatulyatvāt, tasya kūṭasthasya dravyasya sarvaprabhedanirbhedasya bījabhūtasya
gamanasthānādisarvātmakatvenāvasthitasya taṃ tamātmānaṃ paryanubhavataḥ tatparyanubhavanātmatvādeva dhrauvyaṃ kauṭasthyaṃ ca
yujyate . itarasya tu bhāvasya tathā tathābhivyajyamānasya paryanubhūyamānasya krameṇa yugapadvā satatapravartanātmano
bhāvasya pravṛtterakauṭasthyaṃ satatasampravṛttirūpamavyavacchinnabhavanātmakaṃ nityatvaṃ ceti nityatvasyāpi dvitvam
iti sādhūktam .
ata evetyādi . etasmādeva nityatvadvitvādanyadidamapi kāraṇaṃ bhūtābhūtabhāktvaṃ dravyādvaidharmyamasyāḥ
pravṛtteranyatvakāri dravyādanyo bhāvaḥ ityasyārthasya sādhanam, dravyavilakṣaṇo bhāvaḥ ityatra heturityarthaḥ .
bhūtābhūtā kriyā, dravyaṃ bhavadeva, vṛttā vartamānā ca kriyā, dravyaṃ vartata evetyarthaḥ . athavā bhūtaṃ dravyamabhūtaṃ
karaṇaṃ sthitaṃ gataṃ ca yathāsaṅkhyaṃ, vyatikrāntyavyatikrāntibhāktvād bhinnau kriyādravyabhāvau,
tadyathā--kṛtaḥ kaṭo devadattena, devadattaḥ kaṭakaraṇakāle karaṇoparame ca kaṭasyaikarūpa eva, kriyā tu vīraṇasaṃyogāvasthāyāmavyatikrāntā kaṭaniṣpattyuttarāvasthāyāṃ vyatikrāntā . tathā kṛtaḥ karmaṇā vibhāga iti
dvitīyamudāharaṇaṃ kartṛkarmasamavāyitvāt kriyāyāḥ pacibhidivat, vaiyākaraṇasiddhāntena tu karturīpsitatamaṃ
karma pā॰ 1-4-49, kriyaiva tu vaiśeṣikasya, ihāviśeṣeṇa vibhāgahetuḥ kriyā, vibhāgaśca santatyanuparamād

devadatte dravye karmaṇi vā karaṇalakṣaṇayā pravṛttyā bhavitavyamavicchedena, sā ca
tadatadbhavanasvarūpā .
yathā ca saṃyogavibhāgaphalaṃ karma gamanaṃ gantuḥ padārthāntaram, tatsambandhaṃ cāntareṇa
gamanaṃ na bhavati tathā gamanādyapi karaṇasambandhamantareṇa na bhavati, anyato bhinnaṃ
svatattvād dravyādvā na syāt karmeti na syāt . tathā bhavadvā kṛtam iti vyapadeśaṃ
na janayet, karaṇasambandhābhāvāt, ākāśādivat . tathā ca tat sad asatkāraṇamiti nityaṃ syāt .
dravyavadavasthita iti vivakṣitaṃ tasya, vibhāgaḥ kaṭakartuścalanātmakasya karmaṇa īpsitatamatvāt karma calanena
dravyaṃ deśāntaraṃ prāpayatā kriyata iti sā kriyā vyatikrāmati, vibhāgaḥ karma ca na vyatikrāmataḥ, śabdārthasya
piṇḍitatvād nāmatvādityarthaḥ . na ca vyatikramāvyatikramau nirnimittau bhavitumarhataḥ . dṛṣṭaśca vartamānayoḥ
karmavibhāgayoḥ dravyayoravyatikrame karaṇasya kriyāyā vibhāgaviṣayasya vyatikramaḥ . na caikasmin vyatikramāvyatikramau yugapad bhavataḥ virodhāt pramāṇāntarāpekṣāmantareṇa, tasmādetadanumeyaṃ tatra devadatte dravye kaṭasya kartari karmaṇi
vā kartari calane vīraṇānāṃ kaṭe vā karmaṇi karaṇalakṣaṇayā pravṛttyā bhavitavyamavicchedena . sā ca pravṛttiḥ
kriyā tadatadbhavanasvarūpā, tasmin dravye'tasmiṃśca karaṇe bhavanamasyāḥ pravṛtteḥ svarūpam, tayā ca vyatikramāvyatikramavibhāgatayā dvirūpayā'vaśyamavyavacchinnayā'kūṭasthayā pravṛttibhavanātmikayā bhavitavyamiti .
yathā ca saṃyogetyādi . idamadhunā gantṛgamanadṛṣṭāntayorbhavitṛbhavanadārṣṭāntikayośca prāguktavad
bhedānabhyupagame doṣābhidhitsayocyate . saṃyogavibhāgāḥ karmaṇāṃ kāryaṃ sāmānyam, gurutvaprayatnasaṃyogānāmutkṣepaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyam vai॰ sū॰ iti vacanād deśāntarasaṃyogaṃ dravyasya deśāntaravibhāgaṃ ca
gamanakarmārabhate gurutvādijanakaṃ cotkṣepaṇaṃ karma . tasmāt saṃyogavibhāgaphalaṃ karma gamanaṃ gantuḥ
padārthāntaram, tayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgayostatkāraṇasya ca karmaṇo yāvaddravyabhāvābhāvād vaiśeṣikamatavat
padārthāntaratāyāṃ satyāṃ ganturgamanena sambandhaḥ, tatsambandhaṃ cāntareṇa gamanaṃ na bhavati, gacchati devadattaḥ
iti hi gamanasambandhād dṛṣṭam, vyatilaṅghitagamanaśca gataḥ ityucyate, tasmāt tadvyatikramamantareṇa gatam
iti na bhavati . eṣa vidhiḥ karmaviśeṣe gamane dṛṣṭaḥ . tathā gamanādyapi karaṇasambandhamantareṇa na bhavatīti
kriyā sidhyati, anyato bhinnamiti svatattvāt karmatvāt dravyādvā karmatvasya svatattvasyāśrayo na syāt
karmeti na syāt, kriyamāṇatvāddhi tat karma karaṇe sati, karaṇavyatikrame ca kṛtam iti na syāt .
karmaṇi tu bhinne dravyāt svatattvādvā syāditi . tathā bhavadvetyādinā karaṇaṃ bhavadapi svasambandhavyatikramamantareṇa kṛtam ityetaṃ vyapadeśaṃ na janayet, tacca dṛṣṭam, kiṃ kāraṇaṃ na syāditi cet, karaṇasamba

yathā ca karma kriyayā vinā na bhavati tathā karaṇamapi bhavanavyaktimantareṇa
naiva bhavet, tathā bhavanasambandhavyatikramamantareṇa bhūtamiti na syāt . pūrvaḥ pūrva
uttarottarakāryakāraṇabhāvena . tataśca prāgādinirviśeṣaṇaṃ nāsti bhavanasambandhavyatikramābhāvāt khapuṣpavat, asatkāraṇatvādvā, abhūtabhavanasambandhavyatikramatvāt .
vyatikramaśca tṛṇakarmādau kaṭavibhāgādibhavanabhūtatāyām . dravyaṃ kriyā ca dvayameva
ndhābhāvāt . kimiva ? ākāśādivat . tataḥ kiṃ syāt ? tathā ca tad bhavat karma sattvāt
kāraṇāsambandhācca sadasatkāraṇamiti nityaṃ syāt, nityalakṣaṇayogāt . kiṃ nityalakṣaṇamiti cet,
ucyate --sadakāraṇavattannityam vai॰ sū॰ 4 . 1 . 1 iti nityalakṣaṇaṃ vaiśeṣikamateneti . evaṃ tāvat karma
gamanādi karaṇasambandhād bhavati ityupapāditam .
yathā ca karmetyādi . yathā ca gamanādi karma kriyayā vinā na bhavatyuktavidhinā tathā
karaṇamapi bhavanavyaktimantareṇa bhavanakriyāvirbhāvena vinā naiva bhavet, na bhavitumarhatītyarthaḥ . tathā
bhavanasambandhavyatikramamantareṇa bhūtamiti na syāt, tatsambandhe bhavati iti bhavati tatsambandhavyatikrame ca bhūtam iti . pūrvaḥ pūrva uttarottarakāryakāraṇabhāveneti kriyāsambandhaprabandhaṃ pradarśayati
tataśca prāgādinirviśeṣaṇamityādi bhavanasambandhe tadvyatikrame cāsati prākpradhvaṃsetaretaraśaktisaṃyogādyabhāvābhāvādabhāvabhedarahito nāstyabhāva ityanarthāntaramiti aviśeṣeṇaiko'tyantābhāva eva syādabhāvaḥ bhavanasambandhavyatikramābhāvāt khapuṣpavaditi, yathā khapuṣpaṃ bhavanasambandhābhāvāt tadvyatikramābhāvācca na
bhavedevaṃ sarvaṃ ghaṭādi syāditi . asatkāraṇatvādvā, tadā hi vastuno bhavanakāraṇaṃ yo'sau karaṇasambandho
bhavanasambandhaśca sa nāsti tadvyatikramo veti satkāraṇābhāvādakāraṇatvādatyantābhāva eva syāt khapuṣpavat
sarvaṃ ghaṭādi . tadupasaṃhṛtya hetumāha --abhūtabhavanasambandhavyatikramatvāditi, gatisthityādikaraṇabhavanasambandhavyatikramasadbhāvād gacchati tiṣṭhati karoti bhavati gatasthitakṛtabhūtavyaktyātmakadevadattavastu bhavadupalabhyate nānyatheti . syānmatam--bhavanasya satatasampravṛttasyāvyatikrama iti . atrocyate --vyatikramaśca
tṛṇakarmādau, tṛṇatantvādīnāṃ kriyāstṛṇakarma, ādigrahaṇāt saṃyogaḥ, yathāsaṅkhyaṃ kaṭavibhāgādibhavanabhūtatāyām, atrāpi ādigrahaṇāt paṭavibhāgasaṃyogādayo gṛhītāḥ, bhavanasya bhūtatāyāmevaṃlakṣaṇasya
bhavati vyatikramaḥ tṛṇaṃ kaṭo bhavati, gamanakarma vibhāgo bhavati saṃyogaścānyena . syānmatam--kathaṃ tṛṇaṃ
kaṭo bhavati, karma vibhāgo bhavati ityetaducyate ? iti . atrocyate, atrāpi nanūktam --dravyaṃ kriyā
ca dvayameva sarvamidamiti saṃyogādi sarvaṃ guṇakriyātvapratipādanāt tasya bhavanasya bhūtatā vyatikrama iti .

sarvamidam . evameva ca bhāvakriyāśrayaḥ kārakāṇāṃ karmādibhāvaḥ .
yadi dravyavat kriyāpi vastunastattvaṃ syāt tatastayā vinā naiva vastu syāt,
tattvāt, devadattabālādivat ghaṭarūpādivat . dṛṣṭaṃ caitad gamanādikriyayā vināpi
devadattākhyaṃ vastu . antareṇāpi tu kriyāṃ bhavatyeva vastu, tasmāt tato'nyat tadantareṇāpi bhāvāt ghaṭapaṭavat . dṛśyate hi devadatte gacchatyadhṛtiṃ karoti yajñadattaḥ .
yadi dravyapāramārthyavat kriyāpi syāt gamanavat kriyātvāt sthānamapi paramārtha
evameva cetyādi . evaṃ kṛtvā bhāvakriyāśrayaḥ, bhāva eva kriyā bhāvakriyā . dravyaṃ bhāvaḥ, sa
eva ca kriyā, dravyasya vā kriyā . tadāśrayo dravyabhavanāśrayo'yaṃ kārakāṇāṃ karmādibhāvaḥ karmakaraṇādibhāvaḥ, na niyatarūpaḥ vicitrakriyābhavanasambandhād bhavati, devadattaḥ pacati odanaṃ kāṣṭhaiḥ sthālyām,
odano bhavati, kāṣṭhāni jvalanti sandhukṣanti, sthālī dhārayatītyadhiśrīyate ityevamādidarśanāt . na hi
kiñcijjātiviśeṣayogād gotvādiyogādivat karmatvakaraṇatvādhikaraṇatvādiyogāt karmaivedaṃ karaṇamevādhikaraṇameva niyataṃ nānyadapi bhavatīti . kiṃ tarhi ? aniyataśaktiviṣayam, śaktīnāṃ kārakatvāt, tadeva hi
dravyamanyayā kriyayā pramārṣṭi netre iti netrādi karma bhavati, anyayā karaṇam netreṇa paśyati iti,
anyayādhikaraṇam netre'ñjanaṃ tiṣṭhati ityādi . tasmāt sarvaprabhedanirbhedaṃ bījaṃ vastu dravyaṃ tattvam,
tadbhedibhavanavyaktiḥ kriyā .
yadītyādi evamanicchato doṣaḥ, yadi dravyavat kriyāpi vastunastattvam ātmā svarūpaṃ syāt
tatastayā vinā kriyayā naiva vastu syāt, tattvāt tadātmatvāt svarūpatvāt, yad yattattvaṃ yadātmāsvarūpaṃ vā na tat tena vinā bhavati devadattabālādivat, yathā devadattatattvā bālādayo'vasthāviśeṣāḥ
kramabhāvino na tena vinā bhavanti tathaitadapi vastu kriyayā vinā na syāt, ghaṭarūpādivaditi ghaṭatattvā
rūpādayo yugapadbhāvinastena vinā na bhavanti tathā kriyayā vinā tad vastu na syāditi viśeṣaḥ . dṛṣṭaṃ caitad
gamanādikriyayā vināpi devadattākhyaṃ vastvityaniṣṭāpādanametat . doṣadarśanādapi vastu bhavatītyetadarthaṃ sādhanamāha --antareṇāpi tu kriyāṃ bhavatyeva vastu tasmād vinā bhāve doṣadarśanāt tato'nyat
kriyāto'nyad vastu iti pratipattavyam . na kevalaṃ doṣadarśanādeva, kiṃ tarhi ? anyatvaheturapyastītyata āha —
tadantareṇāpi bhāvāt, yad yadantareṇāpi bhavati tat tato'nyat ghaṭapaṭavat, yathā ghaṭaḥ paṭamantareṇa
bhavan paṭādanyaḥ paṭaśca ghaṭamantareṇāpi bhavaṃstato'nyastathā kriyāmantareṇāpi bhavad vastu tato'nyaditi .
tannidarśanāntaraṃ vicārāntarāspadamapyāha --dṛśyate hi devadatte gacchatyadhṛtiṃ karoti yajñadatta iti .
atra yajñadattasyādhṛtikāraṇaṃ gamanaṃ devadattākhyād vastuno'nyat pūrvottarakālatulye'pi tasmin yato'dhṛtirbhavati, tasmād na kriyā vastunastattvam . 
yadi dravyapāramārthyavadityādi . yadi yathā devadattākhyasya vastuno dravyaṃ paramārthastathā kriyāpi
syāt gamanavat kriyātvāt sthānamapi paramārtha iti prāgeva sthānakriyayā gamanavirodhinyā devadatto'

iti tasya gamanaṃ naiva syāt, devadattāvaruddhadeśe yajñadattavat . atha gamanatattva eva
devadatta iṣyate tathāpi gamanakriyāparamārthadevadattatvāt sthānaṃ naiva syāt iti
yānasthānayorabhāvāt pūrvavaddhṛtiḥ satatamadhṛtirvā syāt tathā . tathā bhavane'pi
yathā devadatte gacchati adhṛtirasya tathā tadātmatvād yāvaddevadattamadhṛtiprasaṅgaḥ
tatkālavat, devadatta evāsyādhṛtinimittamiti . sthityātmakatvādvāsya gacchatyapi
devadatte yajñadattasya dhṛtireva sadā syāt sthānakālavat . yajñadatta... ... ...
dhṛtiradhṛtirvā .
varuddhaḥ syāt . tataśca tayāvaruddhatvāt tasya devadattasya gamanaṃ naiva syāt, kadācidapi na gacched
devadatta ityarthaḥ . devadattāvaruddhadeśe yajñadattavat, yathā devadattākhyaṃ vastu devadattatvenāvaruddhamiti
tadvirodhino yajñadattatvasyānavakāśāt tatra yajñadattatvaṃ naiva jātu bhavati tathā devadatte sthānenāvaruddhe gamanaṃ
naiva jātu syāditi . atha mā bhūd yajñadattādhṛtikāraṇasya devadattagamanasyābhāva iti gamanatattva eva
devadatta iṣyate tathāpi gamanakriyāparamārthadevadattatvāt sthānaṃ naiva syāt kadācidapi, gamanenāvaruddhatvād devadattasya devadattatvāvaruddhadevadatte yajñadattatvavadeva . itiśabdo hetvarthe, tataśca hetoryānasthānayorabhāvāt, yānābhāvāt tāvat pūrvavaddhṛtiryathā prāg gamanotpattergamanāsattvādadhṛtyabhāvaḥ tathā gamanābhāvād gacchatyapi devadatte yajñadattasyādhṛtyabhāvaḥ devadattasattvāt gamanakāle'pi, gamanābhāve yathā yajñadattasya dhṛtirbhavatyevaṃ satatamadhṛtirvā syāditi . evaṃ sthānābhāve'pi dhṛtyadhṛtī syātāmuktanyāyena . tatheti
tena prakāreṇa proktopapattikramaprāpitābhāvaprakāreṇa yānasthānayoriti .
tathā bhavane'pītyādi . bhavatu vā gamanaṃ sthānaṃ vetyabhyupagamyāpi doṣa ucyate . tatra gamane
tāvad yathā devadatte gacchatyadhṛtirasya tathā tadātmatvād yāvaddevadattamadhṛtiprasaṅgaḥ, yathā devadattagamanakāle yajñadattasyādhṛtiheturdevadatto gamanātmatvāt tathā yāvajjīvam ātmano yāvadāyuryajñadattādhṛtihetureva syāt gamanātmatvāt tatkālavaditi tasya devadattasya gatiparamārthatvād vastutvāvasthānācca devadattasya
gamanātmanaḥ pūrvottarakālatulyatvāt . atastadvivaraṇārthamāha --devadatta evāsyādhṛtinimittamiti, iti—
śabdo hetvarthe, yato devadatto gamanātmaiva tasmāt satatamadhṛtiprasaṅgaḥ . evaṃ tāvadayaṃ sthānavirodhinyā gaterbhāve'bhihito doṣaḥ . gativirodhinyāḥ sthitereva vā bhāve sthityātmakatvād vāsya devadattasya gacchatyapi
devadatte yajñadattasya dhṛtireva sadā syāt sthānakālavad devadattasadbhāvāditi .
evaṃ tāvad devadattagatisthitiviṣayayajñadattādhṛtivicāradvāreṇa doṣā uktāḥ . idānīṃ yajñadattādhṛtiviṣayo'pi vicārastathaiva kartavyaḥ . atrāpi yadi dravyapāramārthyavadityādigrantho dhṛtyadhṛtiyajñadattaśabdoccāraṇena yathāsambhavaṃ yojyaḥ . prakārāntareṇāpi tu yajñadattetyādi yāvad dhṛtiradhṛtirvā . yajñadattadravyatvaṃ

na, tadatadbhavanāvicchedātmakapravṛttinityatvasyākūṭasthatvād bhavanamevedaṃ gatidhṛtisthityādi . bhedajñānavyavahārau tu śabdabhedadravyapravṛttitattvānurūpyāt, śabda-
hi vastusvarūpam, dhṛtyadhṛtikriye ca tadavyatirikte . tato devadattayānasthānayorapi devadattāvyatirekāt
tadvad yāvaddevadattaṃ gamanaṃ sthānaṃ veti dhṛtirevādhṛtireva vā syād yajñadattatattvavat, virodhinaḥ kriyāntarasyābhāvāt pūrvavat . tasmādetena kriyāyā api nityatvādityāha --na, tadatadbhavanāvicchedātmakapravṛttinityatvasyākūṭasthatvāt, tadbhavanamatadbhavanaṃ tadatadbhavanaṃ ca sarūpaikaśeṣāt tadatadbhavanam . tadbhavanaṃ tāvadastibhavatyādiviṣayam, punaḥ punarbhavatyeveti . atadbhavanaṃ sthānād gamanaṃ gamanācca sthānamiti . tadatadbhavanaṃ
bhavanasahite te eva sthānagamane tathā dhṛtyadhṛtī . tasyāviccheda ātmā yasyāḥ pravṛtteravicchedātmikāyāḥ sā
tadatadbhavanāvicchedātmakapravṛttiḥ, tasyā nityatvam, tadakūṭasthaṃ kūṭasthadravyanityatvavilakṣaṇam, tadbhāvāt
tadatadbhavanāvicchedātmakapravṛttinityatvasyākūṭasthatvād bhavanamevedaṃ gatidhṛtisthityādi, etā
yānasthānadhṛtyadhṛtyādikāḥ parasparavirodhinyaḥ kriyāstā etā bhavanameva satatasampravṛttirūpabhavanātmakatvād
bhavadbhavanavilakṣaṇaṃ nityaṃ ca pravṛttibhavanamātramevetyabhinnaṃ kriyāmātram . ato dravyaṃ kriyā cobhayaṃ nityaṃ bhāvaḥ .
syānmatam--kriyābhedābhāvād bhedajñānavyavahārābhāvaḥ syāt, dṛśyete bhedajñānaṃ bhedavyavahāraśceti . etaccāyuktam, tasmād bhedajñānavyavahārau tu gacchati tiṣṭhati dhṛtiṃ karotyadhṛtiṃ vā na vā iti dvāvapyetau
śabdabhedadravyapravṛttitattvānurūpyāt, śabdo bhedo yasyā dravyapravṛtteḥ sā śabdabhedadravyapravṛttiḥ, na
śabdo'nyo dravyāt, pravṛttiḥ kriyā guṇo'pi kriyeti prāguktam . rūparasagandhasparśabhedāyāḥ pravṛtteḥ śabda-
bhedā pravṛttiranyā, tasyāstattvaṃ varṇātmakatvādi rūpam, tadānurūpyācchabdabhedapravṛttitattvānurūpyād bhedajñānaṃ
bhedavyavahāraśca bhavati . śaktimato dravyasya śaktayo yugapadbhāvinyo rūparasādayaḥ kriyā eva, gamanasthānādikriyāstu kramabhāvinyaḥ . yathoktam—
śaktimātrāsahāyasya viśvasyādbhutakarmaṇaḥ .sarvathā sarvadā bhāvāt kvacit kiñcid vivakṣyate ॥ vākyapa॰ 3 . 7 . 2 iti .

śaktīnāṃ yathānurūpaṃ prativiṣayaniyatapratyāyanavṛttitvāt nityapravṛttikramaprāptiviśiṣṭavastubhāgābhiniveśibhirabhidhānaiḥ sarvasya vasturūpasyābhidhātumayogyatvāt . yathā
devadatto gacchati ityatra devadattaśabdo dravyāṃśaviṣayaniyataśaktitvād gatyādīn
nopātte na vā vyudasyati tathākhyātamapi devadattaṃ nopātte na vā vyudasyati kriyāṃśaviṣayaniyataśaktitvāt nāmākhyātayorniyatavastubhāgābhiniveśitvāt, tadanupātyayaṃ bhedapratyayaḥ . tathaiva gatisthitidhṛtyadhṛtyādibhedavyavahārāḥ sarvabhedaparyanubhavārthatvād nityapravṛtteḥ .
devadattavastunā gatirupāttaiva tadātmatvāt agninevauṣṇyam . gacchatiśabdena
vivakṣāpi ca tāsāṃ śabdaśaktīnāṃ yathānurūpaṃ prativiṣayaniyatapratyāyanavṛttitvāt, satyapi
sarvasarvātmakatve dravyārthanayasya varṇātmakaghaṭaśabdaśakteḥ pṛthukukṣyūrdhvagrīvādyākārapratyāyane niyatā vṛttirnānyatra,
rūpādidravyaśaktipravṛttibhedaniyatendriyagrāhyatvavacchabdaśaktipravṛttibhedād bhedajñānavyavahārāvityarthaḥ .
tadvyācaṣṭe --nityapravṛttītyādinā, nityapravṛtteḥ kramaprāptyā viśiṣṭo yo vastubhāgastadabhiniveśibhirabhidhānaiḥ sarvasya vasturūpasyābhidhātuṃ śabdairayogyatvāditi . tannidarśayati --yathā devadatto gacchatītyādi yāvad na vā vyudasyatīti gatārtham . tathākhyātamapītyādi tadvadeva gatārthaṃ yāvat kriyāṃśaviṣayaniyataśaktitvāditi, nāmākhyātayorniyatavastubhāgābhiniveśitvāditi tadeva kāraṇam,
tadanupātyayaṃ bhedapratyaya ityupasaṃharati, dravyaśaktyaṃśaniyataśabdapravṛttyanupāti bhedajñānamityarthaḥ . tathaiva
gatisthitidhṛtyadhṛtyādibhedavyavahārāḥ sarvabhedaparyanubhavārthatvād nityapravṛtteḥ yāsau satatasampravṛttiḥ
sā sarvān gamanādīn bhavanabhedān paryanubhāvayāmi dravyam iti pravartate, yadi tān nānubhavet kriyābhedān
dravyaṃ tato na te syuḥ tenāparyanubhūyamānatvāt khapuṣpavat . sarvabhedaṃ nirbhedaṃ bījaṃ dravyam iti ceṣyate . tadvā
dravyaṃ na syāt bhedāparyanubhavanāt khapuṣpavat, evaṃ tad dravyaṃ bījaṃ syād yadi tān bhedān paryanubhavet .
āha--yathānantaroktaṃ devadattaśabdo gatyādīn nopādatte na ca vyudasyati aṃśaniyatatvācchabdaśaktīnāṃ pravṛttatvācca tathā vastunāpi devadattena gatyādayaḥ kimanupāttāvyudastāḥ ? netyucyate viśeṣaḥ —
devadattavastunetyādi, devadattaśabdenānupādīyamānāpi hi gatirvastunā tena upāttaiva aṃśaniyatyabhāvād
viśeṣahetośca . ko viśeṣaheturiti cet, ucyate --tadātmatvāt, gatyādyātmako hi devadattaḥ tatparyanubhavanāt, yad yadātmakaṃ tena tadupāttam, agninevauṣṇyam, yathā agnerauṣṇyamātmetyagninopāttaṃ tathā
devadattena gatiriti .


ca devadatta upāttaḥ, śabdasya dravyabhedaparyanubhavanapravṛttyātmatvāt .
arthopanipātitvāttu vacaso devadattaśabdenāpi gatyādi na nopāttam,
arthavat tadbhavanārthatvāt . devadattaśabdo hi dvitīyādivinābhūtaḥ kevale kartaryeva
prayujyate, kartā ca kriyāyāḥ sādhanatvāt kriyāsu tathā tathā vartamānastathā tathā
śabdo'pi tattadarthavācī . yathāhurantataḥ--astirbhavantīparaḥ prathamapuruṣe'prayujyamāno'pyastīti
gamyate, vṛkṣaḥ astīti gamyate pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 2 . 3 . 1 .

evaṃ tāvad devadattavastunā gatirupāttā na devadattaśabdena iti viśeṣa uktaḥ . kiṃ gacchatiśabdena
gacchatyarthena ca devadattārtha upātto na ? ityatrocyate --gacchatiśabdena ca devadatta upātta iti, puँlliṅgaṃ
devadattābhisambandhāt . śabdena cedartha upātto'rthena gacchatilakṣaṇena devadattārtha upātta eva tadātmatvāditi
viśeṣaḥ . yathā na, tadatadbhavanāvicchedātmakapravṛttinityatvasyākūṭasthatvād bhavanamevedaṃ gatisthitidhṛtyadhṛtyādi iti gamyādipravṛttibhavanena bhavadbhavanamupāttameva ubhayātmatvād vastuno dravyakriyātmadvairūpyāt
arthena gantrādyupāttaṃ devadattādi gamayatītyuktaṃ kriyāyā dravyabhedaparyanubhavātmakatvāditi tathā śabde'pyeṣa
vidhiḥ --gacchatiśabdenetyādi, gacchatiśabdena ca devadatta upātta uktavadubhayavastutvāt prāk
śabdasya dravyabhedaparyanubhavanapravṛttyātmatvāditi .
evaṃ tāvat sarvasarvātmakadravyārthanayatvādasato bhedān kalpitānāśritya bhedajñānavyavahārāvuktau,
paramārthatastu arthopanipātitvāt tu vacasa ityādi . devadattaśabdenāpi gatyādi na nopāttam,
upāttameva, arthavat . kutaḥ ? tadbhavanārthatvāt, tasya bhavanaṃ tadbhavanaṃ gatyādibhavanamevārtho devadattaśabdasyeti devadattārtheneva gatyādyartho'pyupātta iti gṛhāṇa . mā śaṅkiṣṭhāḥ--tadbhavanārthatvamasiddhamiti, ata āha —
devadattaśabdo hītyādi . yadā svārtha-dravya-liṅga-saṅkhyā-karmādivāci prātipadikaṃ, vibhaktayastadabhivyañjikāḥ, vivakṣāvaśācca kārakaviśeṣāśrayaṇam, karmādīnāmapi kārakatvāt kartṛtvamiṣṭameva iti siddhāntastadā
viśeṣānāśrayaṇe'pi dvitīyādivinābhūto devadattaśabdaḥ kevale kartaryeva prayujyate, kartā ca kriyāyāḥ sādhanatvāt kriyāmantareṇa na bhavati, kriyāśca āsiśayitiṣṭhatyādayaḥ, tāsu tāsu svayamasau kartā tena tena
prakāreṇa vartamānastathā tathā śabdo'pi tattadarthavācī . yathāhurantata iti jñāpakam, vicārāvasāne vaiyākaraṇairetad niścitam --astirbhavantīpara ityādi . laḍ bhavantī ityucyate . śeṣaṃ gatārtham . prathamamadhyamottamāntamanyadapi kriyāpadaṃ bhavatyeva diṅmātrolliṅganāt tvamasi ahamasmi tiṣṭhati tiṣṭhasi tiṣṭhāmi ityādīnāṃ
niyamābhāvāt, kriyāpadena vinā na bhavati ityeṣa hi niyamaḥ .


devadattaśabdo na devadattakartrarthapratyāyanārtho nānarthakaḥ, arthapratyāyanārthatvād
vacanapravṛtteḥ . devadattaśabdena devadattārtho vijñāyamāna evānūdyate sa gacchati iti
vidhānāya, gatividhānaṃ sthānaviparītadevadattakartṛkagamanapratipādanāya yo gacchati
sa devadattaḥ iti tathā yo'sau sa gacchati iti .
tathā cedamānarthakyaṃ paunaruktyaṃ ca avibhaktavidhyanuvādārthaṃ vaktāraṃ prati .
prathamapadopādānasannihitārthavyañjanaṃ dvitīyapadaṃ tatsannidhimātreṇa tathā pratipattuḥ
śroturupakārakaṃ nānyasya .

sa eṣa upāttagatyartho devadattaśabdo na devadattakartrarthapratyāyanārtho nānarthakaḥ samyakpratyavekṣāyāmiti vartate, tasyā arthapratyāyanārthatvād vacanapravṛtteḥ arthaṃ pratyāyayiṣyāmi iti vacanaṃ pravartate
tasmānnānarthakam, samīkṣyakāryuktitvāt . pramāṇāntaropalabdhatvācca devadattasya na devadattavācakaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ?
devadattaśabdena devadattārtho vijñāyamāna evānūdyate, jñātārtho hyanuvādo vidhyaṅgatvāt . kimartho'nuvāda
iti cet, sa gacchatīti vidhānāya, devadattaviśiṣṭagatividhānāya . gatirhyajñātārthatvād vidhīyate
devadattakartṛkā . devadattānuvādo gatividhānārtho'stu, gatividhānaṃ kimarthamiti cet, ucyate --sthānaviparītetyādi . adhyārūḍhadevadattakartṛsādhanaṃ sthānaviparītaṃ gamanaṃ vivakṣitam, tatpratipādanāya devadattaṃ gatikartṛtvena
adhyārohayāmi iti prayujyate . tannidarśayati --yo gacchati sa devadatta iti tathā yo'sau sa gacchati
iti devadatto gatikriyāyāḥ karteti ajñātārthasya jñātārthenānūdyamānena vidhānād dravyakriyāvācinoścābhinnārthatvācca vastutaḥ .
evaṃ sati paunaruktyamiti cet, abhyupagamyate tathā cedamityādi . evaṃ ca kṛtvā devadattaḥ ityukte
viśiṣṭakriyātmakakartṛnirdeśād gatergatatvād gacchatiśabdo'narthakaḥ punaruktaṃ ca tathā gacchatiśabdādeva
viśiṣṭakartṛkagamanavacanād devadattārthagaterdevadattaśabdo'pi . tau ca ānarthakyapaunaruktyadoṣau na vibhaktavidhyanuvādārthaṃ vaktāraṃ śrotāraṃ vā prati bhavataḥ, kaṃ tarhi prati ? ucyate --avibhaktavidhyanuvādārthaṃ vaktāraṃ
prati, avibhakto vidhirayamavijñātārthatvācchabdaḥ anuvādo'yaṃ vijñātārthatvād vidhyaṅgatvācca ityavivektāraṃ
vaktāraṃ śrotāraṃ vā''sādya ānarthakyaṃ paunaruktyaṃ vā syādanyatarasyaivānayoḥ, na vivektāraṃ vaktāraṃ
śrotāraṃ vā āsādya ānarthakyaṃ paunaruktyaṃ vā syādanyatarasyaivānayorvivektāraṃ vidhyanuvādārthau iti .
syānmatam--astu svayaṃ niścitadravyakriyātmakaikavastuvidhyanuvādārthaṃ vacanaṃ vaktāraṃ prati, kathaṃ punaḥ
śroturiti cet, ucyate--tasyāpi prathamapadopādānetyādi yāvacchroturupakārakamiti . prathamaṃ padamatra
devadattaḥ iti gacchati iti vā yathāvivakṣaṃ prayuktam . prathamapadamupādānamasya so'rthaḥ prathamapadopādānaḥ,

prathamapadopāttārthameva dvitīyapadam udgrāhitārthavivaraṇārthatvād bhāṣyagranthavat,
nādita eva tadarthajñānasya kārakaṃ tathāvyaktavyañjanatvāt pradīpavat .
sannihitaśca dvitīyapadābhidheyābhimataḥ, tasya vyañjanaśabdo dvitīyapadam, tatsannidhimātreṇa prayogamātreṇa
prāk pratipanna evābhivyajyate so'rthastenetyarthaḥ, tathā pratipattuḥ śroturiti vakturabhiprāyamūhituṃ samarthasya
gṛhītasaṅketasyetyarthaḥ upakārakaṃ pratipattyādhānasamarthaṃ, nānyasyeti avibhaktavidhyanuvādārthasyākṛtasaṅgītervā .
na sa punaḥ śabdāparādho yadasau tadarthaṃ na pratipadyate, yathā--na hi sa sūryasyāparādho yadenamulūko na
paśyatīti . tasmādaikārthye satyapi vidhyanuvādabhinnārthāvetau .
atra prayogaḥ --prathamapadopāttārthameva dvitīyapadam, udgrāhitārthavivaraṇārthatvāt, udgrāhito
gamanabhavanābhisambandhī devadattaḥ, tadvivaraṇārtho gacchatiśabdaḥ, devadattaḥ ityukte āgṛhītagatirapi na pareṇa
jñāyata ityuktatvāt . yadudgrāhitārthavivaraṇārthaṃ padaṃ tat pūrvapadopāttārthameva dṛṣṭam, bhāṣyagranthavat, yathā
vṛddhirādaic pā॰ 1 . 1 . 1 iti sūtreṇaivopāttamarthaṃ bhāṣyagranthe padāni vivṛṇvanti--vṛddhiḥ itīyaṃ saṃjñā
bhavati ādaicvarṇānāmiti, sādhvanuśāsanādivicārādhāreṇa sūtreṇaivopāttatvāt . tathā coktam--

sūtreṣveva hi tat sarvaṃ yad vṛttau yacca vārtike .
udāharaṇamarthasya pratyudāharaṇaṃ paśoḥ ॥   iti .

syānmatam--prathamapadopāttārthaṃ cet prathamapadoccāraṇakāla eva tathā pratipattuḥ śroturupakārakaṃ syāt
tenaiva vyaktatvāditi . atrocyate--kasyacid bhavatyapi, keṣāñcid nādita eva tadarthajñānasya kārakam, tathāvyaktavyañjanatvāt, tena prakāreṇa vyaktastathāvyaktaḥ, devadattaśabdoccāraṇamātreṇa śrotuḥ
viśiṣṭakriyāviṣayakartṛko devadattaḥ ityetāvat tāvadādhīyate buddhau tasmāt tathāvyaktaḥ, tasya vyañjano
gacchatiśabdaḥ nāpūrvaṃ kiñcidāha tadanuvāditvāt, atastathāvyaktavyañjanatvāt pradīpavat, yathā pradīpaḥ
prāgabhivyaktaṃ ghaṭamapavarakasthaṃ vyanaktīti nādita eva tadarthajñānasya kārakaḥ tathātra vākye gacchatiśabdo'pīti .
athavā dravyārthavāde kumbhakāro'pi vidyamānameva ghaṭaṃ tathābhivyanakti nāvidyamānamutpādayati pradīpavat .
tasmāt kumbhakārasyāpi vyaktavyañjanatvāt piṇḍādyavasthāyāmapi vyakta eva ghaṭaḥ kriyākramābhivyaktipratyakṣatvāt pradīpābhivyaktaghaṭavat, tathā devadatto gacchati ityatrāpi vyaktavyañjanatvād nādita eva tadarthajñānasya kāraka iti .


tathā ca vināpi tathābhūtaśabdasannidhiṃ pūrvaśrutaśabdopāttārthavṛttireva, tathāniyatatvāt, yathā praviśa piṇḍīmiti . vakturvivakṣāyāmanyathoktyānarthakyāt arthaprakaraṇādyāpādanācca ante nāmnaḥ kartṛtvapratipattiḥ śroturapi bhavantī dṛṣṭā . tasmād
vaktṛvat pratipattiḥ śroturapi .

mā ca maṃsthāḥ--kevalopapattimātrakamevaitaducyate prathamapadopāttārthavāci dvitīyapadam iti . kintu
lokavyavahāre'pi prasiddhistathā dṛṣṭeti tad darśayitumāha --tathā ca vināpītyādi yāvat praviśa piṇḍīmiti iti . evaṃ ca kṛtvā tathābhūtasyānuvādamātrabhinnārthasya śabdasya sannidhimantareṇāpi pūrvaśrutaśabdopāttasyārthasya vṛttireva tathāniyatatvāt, tathā hi tacchabdavṛttirniyatā yathā kvacidaśrūyamāṇadvitīyapado'pi tatpadārthaviṣayapratipattiheturbhavati tathaiva ca pratipattāro dṛśyante, yathā praviśa piṇḍīm
ityatra praviśaśabdaśravaṇāt praveśayogyaṃ prakaraṇādibhiḥ suṣiraṃ gṛhādi karmapadamatra iti piṇḍīm iti ca
karmapadaśravaṇādanantaroktapraviśyasambhavāt tadyogyabhakṣikriyākartṛkarmakam iti pratipadyante . tasmāt prathamapadopāttārthavyañjanaṃ dvitīyapadam iti sādhūktam . yathā devadattaśabdopāttārthavācī gacchatiśabdastathā
gacchati iti ca tipā upātta eva kartā, kiṃ kāraṇam ? laḥ kartari ca iti kartari vihitalakārādeśatvāt
tipaḥ . ko'sau kartā iti cet, ucyate--sa ca devadatta eva viśiṣṭaḥ, viśiṣṭakartṛviṣayagamanavivakṣitatvāt . athavā gacchatiḥ svāṃśopāttārthaviṣayaka eva tacchabdavyavasthāpyasvarūpatvāt, yo yacchabdavyavasthāpyasvarūpaḥ śabdaḥ sa svāṃśopāttārthaviṣayaka eva dṛṣṭaḥ, yathā ghaṭaśabdavyavasthāpyordhvatvādiriti .
evamanicchato doṣa ucyate --vakturvivakṣāyāmanyathoktyānarthakyāditi, devadattakartṛviṣayāṃ gatiṃ
pratipipādayiṣatā hi vaktrā gacchatiḥ prayukto yadi tamevārthaṃ na brūyāduktervācyaḥ ko'rthaḥ syāt ? ityānarthakyaṃ
prāptamiti . kiñcānyat, arthaprakaraṇādyāpādanācca, saṃsargaviprayogasāhacaryavirodhārthaprakaraṇaliṅgaśabdā


anayā ca śabdārthagatibhāvanayā bhavanamevedamekarūpaṃ devadattabhedaṃ gatisthityādibhedaṃ vā bhavati, tena tathā bhūyata iti .
nanu kārakāṇāṃ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā . sarvatra pravṛttisambhave kenacit
phaloddeśena kārakavatyāḥ parigrahārthaṃ viśeṣagrahaṇam . sarvabhāveṣu hi pravṛttirasti
sahabhāvibhirasahabhāvibhiśca viśeṣaiḥ pratyāśrayaṃ sahitā prādurbhāvatirobhāvātmikā
ntarasannidhyaucitīdeśakālavyaktisvarādisāmarthyabhedairarthasyānavagamyamānasya vaktrabhiprāyānuvartibhirvyākhyātṛbhirviśeṣe'vasthāpanaṃ dṛṣṭam, tacca tenaiva śabdenopāttārthatve ghaṭate nānyatheti . tathā śrotrāpyaśruto'pi gṛhyate
sa iti gacchati ityukte ko gacchati ? devadattaḥ iti ante'vasāne nāmnaḥ kartṛtvapratipattiḥ,
yadyapi tipā upāttaṃ kartṛtvaṃ tathāpi yāṃ tāṃ gatiṃ gatvā nāmapadārtha eva kartā iti pratipattiḥ śroturapi bhavantī dṛṣṭā, tasmāddhetostasyā dṛṣṭāyāḥ pratipatteḥ, kveva ? vaktṛvat, vaktarīva vaktṛvat, yathā
vaktari pratipattiḥ prāgupajātā gacchatiṃ devadattakartṛviṣayaṃ prayuñje'ham iti śroturapīti . evam anyonyābhisambaddhadravyakriyāvācinau nāmākhyātaśabdau iti sādhūktam . evamupapattyantaraṃ śabdārtho'pi dravyakriyā-
tmakavastuviṣaya iti bhāvitam .
anayā cetyādi . etayāpi śabdārthagatibhāvanayāsmadvyākhyātayā loke dṛṣṭayā bhavanamevedamekarūpaṃ devadattabhedaṃ gatibhedaṃ sthitibhedaṃ dhṛtyadhṛtihasanakathanādibhedaṃ vā bhavati sarvatra vyakterbhavati . yasmāt
tena tathā bhūyata iti, itiśabdahetvarthatvād yasmādekameva bhavanaṃ devadattadravyarūpaṃ gatisthityādikriyārūpaṃ
ca bhavati, tenaiva tena tena rūpeṇa bhūyate, na bhavanaśūnyamanyat kiñcidasti, bhavanameva bhavatīti .
nanu kārakāṇāmityādi . bhavanamevāviśiṣṭaṃ sarvatra kriyā ityāpādite tadamṛṣyatā idaṃ vaiyākaraṇena
kriyālakṣaṇamabhidhīyate --pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā ityetajjyāyaḥ kriyālakṣaṇam, na satatasampravṛttimātram .
tatra kārakāṇām ityetasya vyākhyānamudbhūtaśabdaiḥ kārakasyaiva kriyātvaṃ mā vijñāyi bhavatā, kārakapṛthagbhūtā gṛhyatām iti bhedadarśanārthā ṣaṣṭhī . viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ punaḥ kimarthamiti cet, tata āha --sarvatra
pravṛttisambhava ityādi . kenacit phaloddeśeneti sāṃvyavahārikamodanādiphalamuddiśyate, kārakavatyā
iti svāśrayapṛthagbhūtakaraṇādisādhanavatyā ityarthaḥ, sarvā hi kriyā kartṛsamavāyinī karmasamavāyinī vā syāt
pacatibhinattivat phalavatīti evaṃrūpāyāḥ pacipaṭhigamyādeḥ parigrahārthaṃ bhidyādeśca viśeṣagrahaṇamiti .
pravṛttimātraparigrahe tvatpakṣe doṣa ucyate --sarvabhāveṣu hi pravṛttirastītyādi, rūpādibhiḥ sahabhāvibhirasahabhāvibhirgatisthityādibhiśca viśeṣaiḥ pratyāśrayaṃ vastuni vastuni sahitā yuktaiva sā pravṛttiḥ,
prādurbhāvatirobhāvātmiketi rūpamasyāḥ kathayati, pracayāpacayaphaleti kāryasya pravṛttimāha kriyāyāṃ

pracayāpacayaphalā ityuktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa--sarvasya muhūrtamapyanavasthānāt kiṃ phalaṃ
laukikam ? viśeṣāstūpajāyamānāḥ svāśrayāt kārakāntarāṇyapekṣante, yathā vikledastaṇḍulāśrayaḥ kāṣṭhādīnyapekṣate . tatra yā pravṛttiḥ sā lokavyavahārānaṅgam . tasmāt
pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā na pravṛttisāmānyam .
bhāvaśca kriyā iti yaducyate tanna sidhyati . pravṛttisāmānyasya kutaḥ
kriyātvaṃ phaloddeśakārakasambandhābhāvāt, gacchatyādivyāpirūpatā vā pravṛttiviśeṣatvenābhūtatvāt kārakavat, vaidharmyaṃ tadbhedavat . tathā ca dravyadvitīyatāpi naiva
pravṛttisāmānyasya, asattvāt, khapuṣpasyeva . asattvaṃ ca adravyatve sati agatyāditvāt khapuṣpavat .
gṛhītvoktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇeti tasyāḥ sarvatra vastuni sambhavantyāḥ svarūpaphalasadbhāvapradarśanārthamuktamiti granthaṃ
yojayati, sarvasya muhūrtamapyanavasthānāt kiṃ phalaṃ laukikaṃ sāṃvyavahārikam ? iti vyavahārākṣamatāṃ
darśayati . viśeṣagrahaṇasāmarthyāt punarviśeṣāstūpajāyamānāḥ pacyādaya odanādiphalāntarahetavaḥ svāśrayāt
kārakāntarāṇyapekṣante . tannidarśayati --yathā vikledastaṇḍulāśrayaḥ kāṣṭhādīnyapekṣate iti . tadupanayati --tatra yā pravṛttirityādi gatārthaṃ yāvad na pravṛttisāmānyamiti . iti viśeṣagrahaṇasāphalyaṃ
vyākhyātaṃ bhavati pravṛttisāmānyasyākriyātvaṃ ca .
bhāvaśca kriyetyādi yāvat kutaḥ kriyātvaṃ phaloddeśakārakasambandhābhāvāt ? yaducyate
dravyaṃ ca kriyā ca iti yannyāyabalena tvayocyate dravyakriyātmako bhāva iti tanna sidhyati tvadabhipretakriyābhāvāsiddherityarthaḥ . itaścāsiddhiḥ svaviśeṣāvyāpitvād na pravṛttisāmānyaṃ kriyeti . tatpratipādanārthamāha —
gacchatyādivyāpirūpatā vā iti kutaḥ iti vartate . gatyādivyāpinī na bhavati tvadiṣṭapravṛttisāmānyalakṣaṇā kriyā pravṛttiviśeṣatvenābhūtatvāt, yad yat pravṛttiviśeṣatvenābhūtaṃ tat tad gacchatyādīn na
vyāpnoti yathā kārakaṃ kārakāṇāṃ pravṛttiviśeṣatvenābhūtamakriyā, akriyātvaṃ cāvayoḥ siddhamiti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
sādharmyeṇa . vaidharmyaṃ tadbhedavaditi, yā yā kriyā sā sā pravṛttiviśeṣatvena bhūtā yathā gacchatitiṣṭhatyādikriyābhedāḥ dravaṇa-patana-sarpaṇa-riṅgaṇādayo vā gamanaviśeṣāḥ . tasmād gacchatyādyavyāpitvādapyakriyātvaṃ
pravṛttisāmānyasya kārakavaditi .
tathā cetyādi . evaṃ ca kṛtvā dravyaṃ kriyā ca dvau bhāvāviti dravyasya bhāvasya dvitīyo bhāvaḥ
kriyā ityetadapi pravṛttisāmānyakriyāvādino nopapadyate tasyāḥ kriyāyāstvadiṣṭāyā asattvāt khapuṣpasyeva,
yathā khapuṣpamasattvād dravyasya dvitīyaṃ na bhavati tathā pravṛttisāmānyamiti . asattvamasiddhaṃ pravṛttisāmānyasyeti cet, asat tadadravyatve sati agatyāditvāt khapuṣpavat, agatyāditvaṃ ca tadavyāpitvāditi .
tasmāt pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā na pravṛttisāmānyam iti vaiyākaraṇapakṣaḥ .


abhyupagatā tāvadasmadabhimativat sarvabhāvaviṣayā pravṛttirbhāvānāmātmā
phalāntarahetuhetubhāvāvibhaktavṛttiḥ sarvabhāveṣvityukteḥ . anantaroktaviśeṣadvayasannidhānāt phalāntarahetutvāt teṣāmeva .
yathā ca viśeṣāḥ phalanirvṛttau kārakāntarāṇyapekṣante tathā mṛdbhavanasyāpi
ghaṭaphalanirvṛttau kārakāntarāpekṣā, kartā kumbhakāro'sya daṇḍādinā udakādyāhṛtyai
atataḥ śālāyāṃ ghaṭaṃ karoti . mālavanagare sapta varṣaśatāni āma eva ghaṭo varṣe

atrocyate --abhyupagatā tāvadasmadabhimativadityādi . nanu tvayāpi pravṛttiviśeṣakriyāvādinā
pravṛttisāmānyameva kriyā ityetadabhyupagatamasmadabhimativat . katham ? iti taddarśayati --sarvabhāvaviṣayā
pravṛttirbhāvānāmātmeti, ādāveva tāvadabhyupagataṃ tvayā na hi kiñcit svātmani muhūrtamapyavatiṣṭhate vardhate
yāvadanena vardhitavyamapāyena vā yujyate iti bruvatā sarvabhāvānāṃ satatasampravṛttirātmā svarūpamiti, sa
cābhyupagamo'smanmatisāmyāt pravṛttisāmānyakriyātvaṃ samarthayati, kiṃ kāraṇam ? phalāntarahetuhetubhāvāvibhaktavṛttiḥ sarvabhāveṣvityukteḥ, phalaṃ bījādipravṛtterhetubhūtāyā aṅkurādi, tato'nyāni phalāni
phalāntarāṇi tadanubandhajanmāni parṇa-nāla-kāṇḍa-tuṣa-śūka-kṣīra-taṇḍulādīni krameṇa, hetavaḥ pūrve pūrve
yathāsvam, tato'pi pūrve pūrve'ntaritā hetuhetavaḥ, ta eva bhāvāḥ kriyātmānaḥ, tairevāvibhaktā vṛttirvartanaṃ
satatasampravṛttiḥ sarvabhāveṣvityuktatvāt . kathamuktam ? na hi kiñcit svātmani ityādivacanāt sarvabhāveṣu
bījāṅkuramṛtpiṇḍādiṣūktam . tacca pravṛttisāmānyaṃ taṇḍulavikledādīnāmapi tatsvārūpyānativṛtteḥ . kiñcānyat,
yadapi coktaṃ kenacit phaloddeśena pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kārakāṇām iti sa ca viśeṣaḥ sahabhāvino rūpādayo'sahabhāvino gamanasthānādayaśca taiḥ pratyāśrayaṃ yuktā tadātmikā ca ityanenāpi vacanena sāmānyapravṛttereveti
kriyātvamuktaṃ bhavati . kiṃ kāraṇam ? anantaroktaviśeṣadvayasannidhānāt sarvatra teṣāmeva ca viśeṣāṇāṃ
sāmānyapravṛttyātmakānāmodanādyuddeśyaphalarūpatvāt sannidhānācca phalāntarahetutvāt teṣāmeva, ta eva hyodanādiphalāntarahetavo nānyaḥ kaścit, ataḥ pravṛttiviśeṣātmikāpi saiva sāmānyapravṛttireveti .
yadapi coktaṃ viśeṣāstūpajāyamānā ityādistadanantarokto grantho yāvad na pravṛttisāmānyaṃ lokavyavahārānaṅgatvāditi, atrocyate--ihāpi samānakalpatvād na doṣaḥ, viśeṣagrahaṇānarthakyaṃ ca parapakṣa ityata
āha--yathā ca viśeṣā ityādi pravṛttiviśeṣasāmānyalakṣaṇayoḥ kriyayoraviśeṣāpādanagrantho gatārthaḥ . pacerodanaphalanirvṛttau kārakāntarāpekṣāvat mṛdbhavanasyāpi ghaṭaphalanirvṛttau kārakāntarāpekṣeti piṇḍādiṣu
sarveṣu bhavanameva kumbhakārādīni mṛdo'nyāni kārakāṇyapekṣata ityarthaḥ . tānyudāharati --kartā kumbhakāro'syetyādi kartṛkaraṇasampradānāpādānādhikaraṇāni kulāladaṇḍādyudakādyāhṛtyatacchālā iti . kālo'pi keṣā-
ñcit kārakamiti taddarśayannāha --mālavanagare sapta varṣaśatānīti, tatra āma eva ghaṭo varṣe pradarśyate

pradarśyate saṅgopyate ca godohe vā taḍāgādau; tasyaiva kṣaṇamapyanavasthānamudake
prakṣiptasya . pravṛttiviśeṣatvenābhūtatvādyasiddhatāpi caivamuktaiva . agatyāditvācca
nāsattvam . nanvagamanasthānaṃ cākāśaṃ bhavati iti sandehahetutā .
gatyabhāvo'pravṛttirgatinivṛttiriti cet, atha nirupākhyameva gatyabhāvamātrasthānaṃ tat prāpnoti abhāvatvādapravṛttatvāt khapuṣpavat .
saṅgopyate ca saṅgopitasārāṇi dravyāṇi iti khyāpanārthaṃ, godohe vā taḍāgādāviti, tasyaiva āmasya
kṣaṇamapyanavasthānamudake prakṣiptasyeti ca kārakaviśeṣāpekṣāpradarśanam .
yadapyuktaṃ pravṛttisāmānyaṃ pravṛttiviśeṣatvenābhūtatvāt kārakavad gacchatyādivyāpi na bhavati
iti tadapi nānumānam, asiddhahetutvāt . pravṛttisāmānyasya pravṛttiviśeṣatvenābhūtatvamasiddhaṃ pravṛttiviśeṣasvarūpatvādeva, tatsāmānyasya pravṛttiviśeṣasvarūpatvaṃ ca sarvatra bhavanasyāvicchinnatvāt tadavinābhāvācca
gatyādiviśeṣāṇāṃ bhavanasvātmavaditi tannyāyamanusmārayannāha --pravṛttiviśeṣatvenābhūtatvādyasiddhatāpi
caivamuktaiva . ādigrahaṇād virodhāvirodhabhāvau dravyakriyayorevamuktāveveti . yadapyuktam --asattvād dravyadvitīyatāpi naiva pravṛttisāmānyasyāsattvaṃ ca khapuṣpavadagatyāditvāditi, atrocyate--agatyāditvācca
nāsattvaṃ hetvasiddherevoktavad gatyādisvarūpatvāt satatabhavanasyeti .
abhyupagamyāpi agatyādihetusiddhimanaikāntikatvaṃ brūmaḥ --nanvagamanasthānaṃ cākāśam agacchadatiṣṭhacca vyoma bhavati astyeva . tatra kimagatyāditvādasat syāt khapuṣpavat ? utākāśavat sat syāt ?
iti sandehahetuteti . syānmatam--agatyastu, kathamasthānamākāśam nityasthitatvāt ? tasmāt agatitvāt
iti saṃśayahetutā syāt, asthānatvāt ityayukteti . atrocyate--asyāpyasthānatvameva, yasmāt paṭhyate
ṣṭhā gatinivṛttau pā॰ dhā॰ 928, pravṛttāyā gateryā nivṛttiḥ pratibandhaḥ sā sthitirvakṣyamāṇavat . na cāsya
pravṛttagaterākāśasya pratibandho jātu pragatadevadattagatinivartanavat . asthānam iti ca sthānādanyad gamanādi
ucyate na sthānasyātyantābhāva eva, tasmādākāśamapyasthānagamanaṃ saccetyanaikāntikahetutā tadavasthaiva sādhanayoranayoriti .
gatyabhāvo'pravṛttirgatinivṛttiriti cet . syānmatam--nanvabhāvo gatergatinivṛttirapravṛttiḥ, tasmād
gatyabhāvamātratvāt sthiterabhāvatvād nāsthānaṃ na sthānavadeva cākāśaṃ gaterevābhāvāditi . atrocyate --atha
nirupākhyamevetyādi . upākhyā saṃjñā, nirgatopākhyaṃ nirupākhyaṃ tvatparikalpitagatyabhāvamātrasthānaṃ tat prāpnoti,
abhāvatvāt . abhāvatvaṃ cāsyāpravṛttatvāt khapuṣpavat . ākāśādi ca pravṛttaṃ sthānavadasthānaṃ ceti vakṣyāmaḥ .



gativiśeṣaṇasāmarthyāditi cet, tadevedamasmadiṣṭaṃ sthānasya sattvaṃ gatyabhāvasya
gativiśeṣaṇayogāt siddham . gativiśeṣaṇasāmarthyāpāditasthityādyuttarabhāvasatyatvāt ata eva ca sarvātmakabhavanasvatattvamālambya tatsvābhāvyāt pūrvottarabhāvayorekasyābhivyaktyā itarasya anabhivyaktyā ca bhavanaṃ bhāvaḥ . virodhibhāvaprādurbhāve
hi bhāvāntaranivṛttiḥ bhāva eva virodhibhāvaprādurbhāvatvādeva, yathā jāgaraṇena svapno
nivartyate . na hi kriyāntaramanyaṅgīya kriyāntaraṃ prādurbhavatīha kiñcit . ihāpi ca
gatibhavanamanyaṅnīya na sthitibhavanaṃ prādurbhavati .

gativiśeṣaṇasāmarthyāditi cet . syānmatam--yadi sarvathā sthānaṃ nivṛttirabhāvaḥ ityaviśeṣya
brūyāṃ khapuṣpavad nirupākhyaṃ syāt, kiṃ tarhi ? gatyā viśiṣṭaṃ sthānaṃ gatinivṛttiḥ iti brūmaḥ . tasmād
gatyabhāvaḥ iti sopākhyamiti . atrocyate --tadevedamasmadiṣṭaṃ sthānasya sattvaṃ gatyabhāvasya sthityabhāvasya gamanasya sattvavad gativiśeṣaṇayogād bhavanmataviruddhaṃ siddham, tasmiṃśca siddhe sthāne tadvad
gatisthityādi sarvakriyāpadābhidheyaṃ bhāvaḥ satyameva nāsaditi siddham . tasmācca gativiśeṣaṇasāmarthyāpāditasthityādyuttarabhāvasatyatvāt ata eva ca sarvātmaketyādi yāvad bhavanaṃ bhāva iti . yeyaṃ niruktiḥ
bhavanaṃ bhāvaḥ iti sāpyetasmādeva kāraṇād gatisthityādisarvātmakameva bhavanasvatattvamālambya tadaparityāgena
tatsvābhāvyāt tattadbhavanānubhavasvabhāvatvāt pūrvasya gatibhāvasya uttarasya ca sthitibhāvasya athavā pūrvasya
sthitibhāvasya uttarasya ca gatibhāvasya yathāvivakṣākramaṃ yathāpariṇatikramaṃ ca yathāsambhavamekasyābhivyaktyā
itarasyānabhivyaktyā ca bhavanaṃ bhāva iti nirucyate .
syānmatam--virodhino bhāvasya uttarasya sthityādeḥ prādurbhāvād gatervināśaḥ gatervā prādurbhāve sthiteḥ,
sa cābhāvo vināśaḥ pākajotpattivaditi . atrocyate--yo'pyabhāvābhimato vināśo virodhibhāvaprādurbhāve hi bhāvāntaranivṛttiritīṣṭaḥ, sa ca bhāvāntarānabhivyaktistasya bhāvāntarasya sthiteranyasya gatyādeḥ
gatervānyasya sthityāderbhāva eva nābhāvaḥ, virodhibhāvaprādurbhāvatvādeva . yathā jāgaraṇena svapno nivartyate,
kimuktaṃ bhavati ? nivartyate'nabhivyaktiṃ nīyata ityucyate . yathā jāgaraṇena svapno'nabhivyaktiṃ nīyate tathā
svapnena jāgaraṇam, jāgrato'pi ca suptavad manda-mandatara-mandatamacaitanyadarśanāt suptasyāpi jāgrata ivābhivyaktavyaktataravyaktatamasvapnadarśanāt tadeva hi caitanyaṃ tīvramandāvaraṇodayakṣayopaśamāpekṣaṃ nidrā-nidrānidrā-pracalā-pracalāpracalādibhedaṃ paṭu-paṭutara-paṭutamendriyādibhedaṃ ca dṛśyate . tasmādekasyaiva vastuno-
'bhivyaktyanabhivyaktikṛte svapnajāgaraṇe, anyataranyaṅgayanenānyatarabhavanāt sarpasphaṭāṭopakuṇḍalakībhavanavat .
ata āha --na hi kriyāntaramanyaṅgīyetyādi gatārthaṃ yāvadiha kiñciditi . eṣā dṛṣṭāntavarṇanā .
ihāpi ca gatibhavanamityādi gatārthaṃ dārṣṭāntikavarṇanamapi . tasmāt kriyāntaraprādurbhāve pūrvabhāvanivṛttiḥ
nābhāva iti .


syādetat--yathā bhuktikriyāyā nivṛttistṛptiphalāvasānā, prayojanābhāve
kārakānabhisambandhād bhujernivṛttirna kriyāntarabādhanāt evametadapi syāt . atrocyate--atrāpi tu phalaṃ tṛptiḥ kriyāntaram . bubhukṣāṃ hi bādhitvā bhuktiḥ pravartate,
bhuktiṃ ca bādhitvā tṛptiḥ pravartate, kriyācakrakāṇyetāni .
yadi sthitirnāma avastukamabhidhānaṃ vivakṣāśabdayorapravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ . atha
dravyamātraṃ sthitiḥ dravyasyāvirodhād gatāvapi syāt . yatastu khalu virodhyavirodhibhāvā vācyavastusthitiḥ tasmād bhavanānanyatva eva gativirodhinī sthitiḥ .

atrāha --syādetadityādi yāvadevametadapi syāditi . yathā tu bhuktikriyāyā nivṛttistṛptiphalāvasānā tat prayojanamuddiśya kārakapravṛtteḥ, tasmiṃścāvasite prayojane kārakāṇi na pravartante, tasmāt kārakānabhisambandhād bhujernivṛttiḥ na kriyāntarabādhanāt . evaṃ gatirapi prāptiphalāvasānā prayojanābhāve kārakānabhisambandhād nivartate na kriyāntarabādhanāt . ataḥ saṃśemahe--kiṃ svapnajāgaraṇavat kriyāntaranyaṅnayane kriyāntarodbhāvastādātmye satyeva syāt ? utātyantanivṛttireva gateḥ phalāvasānabhujikriyāvat ? iti . atrocyate—
atrāpi tu mā maṃsthāḥ bhujinivṛttirabhāva eva iti, kiṃ tarhi ? phalaṃ tṛptiḥ kriyāntaraṃ pravṛttereva
kriyātvāt, bubhukṣāṃ hi bādhitvetyādi yāvat kriyācakrakāṇyetānīti . etaduktaṃ bhavati--kriyāntaraprādurbhāvena vinā na kriyānivṛttirnāpi pūrvakriyānyakkaraṇamantareṇa kriyāntaraprādurbhāvaḥ, bubhukṣābhuktitṛptikriyācakravat pūrvapūrvabādhayā uttarottaraprādurbhāvāt samānametadapīti . tasmād nābhāvo gatinivṛttiḥ,
bhāva eva sthitiriti .
etadanicchordoṣa ucyate --yadi sthitirnāmetyādi . sthiterbhāvatvānabhyupagame dvayī gatiḥ sthitiśabdasya
syāt tṛtīyavikalpābhāvāt--yadvā sthityabhidhānamavastukam ? yadvā dravyamātraviṣayaṃ syāt ? kiñcātaḥ ?
idamato bhavati doṣajātam--avastukatve vivakṣāśabdayorapravṛttiprasaṅgaḥ, yadyavastuviṣayaṃ sthitiśabdavacanaṃ
vaktumicchā vivakṣā sā svaniścitamarthaṃ paraṃ pratyāyayāmīti jāyate, arthābhāvācca na syāt . tathā ca
abhidhīyate'nenetyabhidhānaṃ sthitiśabdaḥ, tasyābhāvaḥ syādarthābhāvāt, kākavāsitādivadanarthakaṃ vā tat
syāditi . evaṃ tāvadavastukatve doṣaḥ . atha dravyamātraṃ sthitiḥ dravyasyāvirodhād gatāvapi syāt,
yathā devadattasadbhāvād gatyavirodhācca devadatto gacchati ityatra devadattābhidhānaṃ pravartate tathā devadattastiṣṭhati
gacchati ca ityetadabhidhānaṃ pravarteta, ubhayatra dravyasyaiva sattvāt viśeṣābhāvācca . evaṃ doṣadarśanād na
gatyabhāvamātraṃ sthitiḥ . yatastu khalvityādi, virodhyavirodhibhāvā vācyavastusthitiḥ, gatisthityoḥ parasparavirodhād devadattadravyeṇa sahāvirodhād bhāvāveva gatisthitī dravyavat, grantho gatārtho yāvad bhavanānanyatva
eva gativirodhinī sthitiriti . bhavanānanyatva iti dravyabhavanādananyaiva gatiḥ sthitirveti pravṛttibhavanānanyatva eveti yathāprakrāntamupasaṃharati .


syādetat--sthityā virodhavat khapuṣpādinā gatyabhāvenāpi virodhaḥ, tatra
tadvirodhitvāt tadavinābhāvitve kuta etad bhāvaviṣayameva abhāvaviṣayamevaitaditi
vā kutaḥ ? yadyabhāvo'pi bhāvena abhāvena vā bhāvo virudhyate tāvubhau bhāvāveva
tarhi virodhitvāt yatkiñcidvat . anutpadyamānasthitau gatinivṛttau gatisthityādyekabhūtabhavanāvinābhūtadravyavināśaviṣayaṃ sthānam ityabhidhānaṃ syāt . tasmād
gatyabhāvalakṣita... ... ....
evaṃ khapuṣpādyasattāvāciśabdānāṃ bhāvārthatvam, yathā tiṣṭhati pacati itya-

syādetadityādi . syānmatam--virodhitvāt ityetadanaikāntikamabhāvatvaprasaṅgāt . gaterabhāvo gatyā
virudhyate prakāśābhāveneva tamasā prakāśaḥ, yathā tvanmatenaiva nanu prāg gatireva kriyāntaraprādurbhāvenānabhivyaktiṃ
nīyamānā bhāva eva ityuktam, tatra sthityā virodhavat khapuṣpādinā gatyabhāvenāpi virodhaḥ . tatra
tadvirodhitvāt tadavinābhāvitve iti gatirabhāvāvinābhāvinī syāt tadvirodhitvāt, yacca yadvirodhi
tat tenāvinābhāvi dṛṣṭam, yathā--gatiḥ sthityā . khapuṣpādervā bhāvatvameva syāt, gativirodhitvāt,
sthitivat . evaṃ tadavinābhāvitve sati kuta etad bhāvaviṣayameva etadabhidhānaṃ sthitiḥ iti ?
khapuṣpādiḥ ityabhāvaviṣayamevaitaditi vā kutaḥ ? viśeṣo vātra vācya iti .
atra brūmaḥ --yadyabhāvo'pītyādi . khapuṣpādervipakṣaṃ kṛtvā bhāvatvād nāniṣṭāpādanam . kiṃ
viśeṣeṇoktena ? yathā sthiterabhāvatvāyuktistathā khapuṣpāderapītyabhiprāyaḥ . tat kathaṃ bhāvyate ?
iti taducyate --yadyabhāvo bhāvena abhāvena vā bhāvo virudhyate tāvubhau yo virudhyate yena
ca virudhyate bhāvāveva tarhi virodhitvāt yatkiñcidvaditi udāharaṇasaulabhyaṃ darśayati ahinakulādivad ghaṭapaṭādivad ghaṭakapālādivadvā sarvatra sahānavasthānalakṣaṇaviroghadarśanād deśataḥ kālato veti .
tasmāt khapuṣpāderapi bhāvatvād nāniṣṭamiti .
yadapi ca tvayā sthityabhidhānamabhāvaviṣayamiti manyate tasyāpīyamupapattiḥ syād bhavantī, tadyathā—
gatyabhāvamātraviṣayatvaṃ cānutpadyamānasthitirgatinivṛttiriti, tathā ca kalpyamānāyāmanutpadyamānasthitau
gatinivṛttau, gatisthityādi ekabhūtaṃ bhavanaṃ prāguktanyāyakam, tenāvinābhūtaṃ dravyam, tasya vināśo'tyantamabhāvaḥ, tadviṣayaṃ sthānam ityabhidhānaṃ syāt, na caivaṃ dravyasya kūṭasthanityatvād bhavitumarhati . tasmādeva
ca tadaniṣṭabhayāt pratipattavyam--gatinivṛttiḥ sthitirnābhāvaḥ, tathā khapuṣpādiśceti . tadupasaṃharati --tasmād
gatyabhāvalakṣitetyādi gatārtham .
anantaraṃ khapuṣpādirapi prasaṅgato'bhihito yo'sāvabhāvābhimatastatrāpi abhāvaḥ iti ca nāpadārtha
ucyate, kiṃ tarhi ? nañaḥ paryudāsavācitvād bhāvādanyo bhāva iti bhāvaviśeṣaḥ, abrāhmaṇakṣatriyādivat .
evaṃ khapuṣpādyasattāvāciśabdānāṃ bhāvārthatvam, evamasadbhāvābhimateṣvapi sadarthaviṣayatvamiti nyāya

nyathābhavanaṃ tathā vinaśyati ityādi . khapuṣpādīnāmapi nanu tathā abhavanam,
anyathā na tu abhavanam . agatisthitiranyathābhavanamevaṃ khapuṣpādirapi, sati niyatatvāt prakārāṇām .
evaṃ ca eka eva pūrvāparībhūto bhāvaḥ pravṛttirityucyate sa ca evāntarbhāvitasvaprabhedatvāt pravṛttiviśeṣa ityucyate, bhujiviśeṣavat, yathā bhujāveva dravyakṣetra-
vyāpitāṃ darśayati . vakṣyate cāsyodāharaṇamatideśasya . idaṃ tu tāvat prakṛtaṃ bhāvyate --yathā tiṣṭhati,
pacati ityanyathābhavanam, anyena prakāreṇa parispandapariṇatasya dravyasya tataḥ prakārādanyena aparispandapariṇatiprakāreṇa bhavanaṃ tiṣthati āste śeta ityādi, taṇḍulādikaṭhinadravyamṛdūbhavanaṃ pacatyādi . yathaitāḥ kriyāḥ
anyathābhavanamātrabhedāḥ pravṛttisāmānyaṃ bhavanaṃ nātivartante tathā vinaśyati pradhvaṃsate nitiṣṭhati ityādayo'pi bhavanaprakārāḥ pravṛttisāmānyaṃ bhāvatvaṃ ca nātivartante . evaṃ kriyāpadavācyasyārthasya anyathābhavanamātratā
vyākhyātā . ye'pyatyantābhāvābhimatāḥ khapuṣpādiśabdavācyāsteṣāmapi nanu tathā abhavanam, anyena
prakāreṇa na tvabhavanam, bhavanameva, nātyantābhavanamityarthaḥ . katham ? agatisthitiḥ, gateranyā sthitiragatisthitiḥ, na tu gatyabhāvamātram, gatereva prakārāntaratā . yathā sā sthitiranyathābhavanamevaṃ khapuṣpādirapi
anyathābhavanam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? sati niyatatvāt prakārāṇām, prakāratvāt sanneva khapuṣpādiḥ, yo yaḥ
prakāraḥ sa sanneva, yathā gatinivṛttiḥ sthitiruktanyāyā satī . kathaṃ khapuṣpādeḥ prakāratā iti cet,
ucyate--khapuṣpasya ca samavāyarūpeṇānabhivyaktiḥ aśokakusumādiprakāreṇābhivyaktiriti prakāratvānativṛtteḥ,
dravyakriyayoḥ sarvātmakatvādasmin dravyārthanayabhede sarvaṃ dravyaṃ kriyā ca gamanādi, dravyabhedānāṃ gamanādikriyābhedānāṃ coktavad bhavanadvayābhedāt katamat khaṃ katamadvā puṣpāṇāṃ vikasanamanyat ? iti devadattagamanabhavanadvayatvavat tadapīti khapuṣpādirapi bhāvaḥ .
evaṃ cetyādi . evaṃ ca kṛtvā gamanasthānādikramabhāvinīnāmapi kriyāṇāṃ satatasampravṛttitādātmyānatikramādeka eva pūrvāparībhūto bhāvaḥ pravṛttirityucyate, evameva ca tadupapadyate yaduktaṃ pūrvāparībhūtaṃ
bhāvamākhyātenācaṣṭe vrajati pacati nirukta॰ 1 . 1 ityādīti sarvadhātvaikārthyasya cānantaramāpādayiṣyamāṇatvāt . kasmāt sa bhāvaḥ pravṛttirityucyate ? brūmaḥ--prakarṣeṇa vartanāt . sa ca prakarṣaḥ sadā sarvaprabhedānubhavanarūpaḥ, sa ca evāntarbhāvitasvaprabhedatvāt pravṛttiviśeṣa ityucyate rūpādigatyādīn svaprabhedān
antarbhāvayanneva bhāvaḥ sāmānyabhavanalakṣaṇo bhavan, bhedānāṃ parasparato viśeṣāviśeṣau bhedānusyūtatvāt, na
tvadiṣṭaḥ kārakāṇāṃ pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ sāmānyapravṛtterbhinnaḥ kaściditi . dṛṣṭāntaḥ --bhujiviśeṣavaditi . tadvyākhyānam --yathā bhujāvevetyādi yāvat prakāramātraṃ bhidyata iti . aśana-pāna-khādya-svādyādidravyabhedena

kālabhāvabhedena prakāramātraṃ bhidyate evaṃ gatisthityorastimriyatyorvā . sarvaiva vāsau
... ... ...kriyaiva .
evaṃ ca bhujigatisthitipaktyādīnāmapi tathā tathā sarvabhāvavyāpitā, bhāṣatijānātiśvetatyādīnāmapi pūrvottaravyaktyavyaktibhavanaikatvāt .
kāṃsapātryāṃ pāṇau śarāve veti kṣetrabhedena prathamadvitīyagrāsādinā dinarātryādinā sāyaṃprātarāśādinā vā
kālabhedena tīvramandakṣudhitaglānauṣadhasvasvarasāyanādibhāvena ca prakāramātreṇaiva bhidyate na bhujitvena . na hi
teṣu prakārabhinneṣu kaścidabhujirbhavati akriyā vā . kintu sarvo'pyasau bhujirūpānatikramād bhujireva, atha
ca parasparataḥ prakāramātrabhedād bhidyante tathā sāmānyapravṛttireva pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ, vartaterastyarthasya sarvagatisthityādibhedātmakatvāt . evaṃ gatisthityorastimriyatyorveti virodhibhāvaprādurbhāvo'pi sāmānyabhavanasyaiva
prakāramātrabhinnasya vispanditamiti tannigamayati --sarvaiva vā'sāviti yāvat kriyaiva . tasmādasti-bhavati-
vidyati-padyati-vartatīnāmekārthatvāt prakārabhedācca tato nāsāmānyaḥ pravṛttiviśeṣo bhujisāmānyamātraprakārabhinnabhujiviśeṣavaditi .
kiñcānyat, evaṃ cetyādi . na kevalamastyādaya eva sarvadhātvarthavyāpitvāt sāmānyapravṛttimātratvabhāvanāyāṃ nidarśanam, kiṃ tarhi ? bhujigatisthitipaktyādīnāmapi tathā tathā sarvabhāvavyāpitā,
bhuktestāvad bhujerabhyavaharaṇārthasya upayogaparyāyatvāt upayogasyāpattyarthatvāt āpatteḥ pariṇāmārthatvāt pariṇāmasya
vṛttisattābhavanārthatvāt . tathā gatirapi sarvabhāvavyāpinī gamana-calana-spandana-pariṇāmādyekārthatvāt, dravati
droṣyati dudrāveti druḥ, drorvikāro dravyam, dravyaṃ ca bhavye pā॰ 5 . 3 . 104, dravyaṃ sadaiva gatyātmakaṃ vipariṇāmātmakamityarthaḥ . ārṣe'pi yathā --paramāṇupoggale ṇaṃ bhaṃte ! kiṃ eyati veyati calati phaṃdati khobhati
khubhati taṃ taṃ bhāvaṃ pariṇamati ? haṃtā gotamā ! tadeva jāva pariṇamati bhagavatīsū॰ 5 . 7 . 212 iti .
sthitirapi tiṣṭhatyāste'sti svarūpaṃ na tyajati pariṇamati tathā tathā bhavatītyarthaḥ . pacati-kṛṣati-likhatyādayaḥ
paktyādayaḥ, teṣāmapi paktyādīnāmastyādyaviśeṣaḥ pākasya kriyāphalatvāt kriyāyāśca hetuphalarūpābhinnapariṇatitvāt pacyate pacatyātmānaṃ bījamaṅkurībhavati jāyate'sti vipariṇamati ityādyekārthatvāt . yathā kṛṣi-vilikhatī
tathātmanaḥ śirāṃ darśayati tathā tathā sarvabhāvavṛtteḥ kaṇḍūyata ityādyekārtham . syānmatam--astu bhujyādīnāṃ
sarvabhāvavyāpitā gatisthitisattāvipariṇāmādyanatikramāt, paṭhi-hasi-vidi-śviti-gaḍyādīnāṃ kathamiti cet,
ucyate --bhāṣatijānātiśvetatyādīnāmapi pūrvottaravyaktyavyaktibhavanaikatvāt evaṃ ca tathā tathā

yadapyādinaigamanayadarśanamanavabudhya pūrvanayanipāti sthitisvarūpanirūpaṇaṃ
kriyate sā tu dravyāvasthāviśeṣo gativat pratipattavyā iti atrāpi yatnaprasādhitakriyārthāntaratvatyāgaḥ avyaktadravyāvasthātvāt . yat tad dravyaṃ tato'nanyā
kriyā, tadavasthātvāt, devadattabālakumārādivat . tathā cābhyupagamavirodhaḥ .
sarvabhāvavyāpitā iti vartate . bhāṣa vyaktāyāṃ vāci pā॰ dhā॰ 612 jñā avabodhane pā॰ dhā॰ 1508

evamabhidhānāttu avyutpattau vyutpattau vā svavacanādivirodhaḥ . tatra tāvadavyutpattau avasthāyāstato'nyatvam, tatsvādiviṣayaśabdavācyatvāt, devadattāśvavat . śilāputrakaśarīravanneti cet, na, avasthāśarīraśabdaprayogānarthakyāt atrāpi
śarīrāvasthākriyātvāt .
vyutpattāvapi kartari ṣaṣṭhīyaṃ dravyasyāvasthā iti, sā yadviṣayaṃ dravyasya kartṛtvaṃ
tāmātmano'kriyātvāt tadanyagativicalanapratibandhātmikāmavasthāṃ darśayati .

evamabhidhānāttvavyutpattau vyutpattau vetyādi . atra dravyāvasthā ityasya śabdasyārthadvayakalpanā
syāt--rājavṛkṣādiśabdavadavyutpattirvyutpattirvā rājapuruṣaśabdavat . ubhayathāpi svavacanavirodhaḥ . tadvyācaṣṭe --tatra tāvadavyutpattau avasthāyāstato'nyatvam, dravyādanyāvasthā, tatsvādiviṣayaśabdavācyatvāt, tasya svasvāmisambandhādiṣaṣṭhīviṣayeṇāvasthāśabdena vācyatvaṃ dravyasya, itarathā dravyaśabdo'vasthāśabdo vānarthakaḥ syāt, iha yadviśeṣavācino'pi śabdasya vācyārtho'nya ityavaśyamabhyupagantavyam,
devadattāśvavat, yathā devadattāśva ityukte devadattasya svamaśvaḥ so'sya svāmīti tena svāmiviṣayeṇa
aśvaśabdena tasya devadattasya vācyatvāt tato'nyatvaṃ dṛṣṭamevaṃ dravyāvastheti .
śilāputrakaśarīravanneti cet . syānmatam--yathā śilāputrakasya śarīram ityatra śilāputrakādananyasminnapi śarīre svādiviṣayaśabdavācyatvadarśanādanaikāntikateti . etacca na, avasthāśarīraśabdaprayogānarthakyāt, yadyananyacchilāputrakācchilāputrakaśarīraṃ śilāputraka eva śarīraṃ śarīrameva
śilāputrakaḥ iti ghaṭakuṭaśabdavat paryāyamātratvāt pratītapadārthakaṃ śrotāraṃ prati anyataraprayogānarthakyaṃ
syād gatārthatvāt . tathā dravyamevāvasthā dravyāvasthetyanyatarānarthakyam . tasmādanyatarānarthakyād nedamupapannam, śilāputrakaśarīravad nānaikāntikateti . kiñcānyat, atrāpi śarīrāvasthākriyātvādayuktam,
nanvasmābhirupapāditam--dravyakriyātmakaṃ sarvavastviti . tasmādatrāpi śilāputrakeṇa śīryate, śarārutvāccharīramiti śarāru bhavati, tena śarāruṇā bhūyata iti dravyakriyābhidhānaṃ nātivartate . tathā ca dravyāvasthā dravyamavatiṣṭhate dravyeṇāvasthīyate ityavasthānasya kriyātvānativṛttestato'nyatvameva . evaṃ tāvadavyutpattau .
vyutpattāvapi sāmāsikapadatvāt samāsasya ca ṣaṣṭhīsamāsatvāt ṣaṣṭhyāśca kartari vihitatvāt
kartari tu ṣaṣṭhīyaṃ dravyasyāvasthā iti dravyamavatiṣṭhata ityādi prāgvat . sā yadviṣayamityādi yāvat
tadanyagativicalanapratibandhātmikāmavasthāṃ darśayati . sā ṣaṣṭhī yadviṣayaṃ dravyasya kartṛtvaṃ
yāṃ kriyāṃ sādhayat sādhanaṃ kartṛ bhavati tad dravyaṃ tato'rthāntarabhūtāṃ tāmavasthānakriyāṃ darśayatīti sambhantsyate . kiṃ kāraṇam ? ātmano'kriyātvāt tasya dravyasya svayamakriyātvāt, kriyāmantareṇa kartuḥ

yadapi ca dvitīyaṃ viśeṣagrahaṇaprayojanamabhidhīyate--sarvadā sarvabhāvānāṃ
pravṛttisamanvayād devadattaḥ ityapi nāpravṛttikaṃ vastu, sarvabhedasambandhānuguṇyāttu
nāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ tasmānna kriyā ityevamarthaṃ viśeṣagrahaṇam . idamapi tyaktadravyārthotthānam .
yathā tatra pravṛttisāmānyanivṛttyarthe viśeṣagrahaṇe tathehāpi devadattādidhātutvanivṛttyarthe
virodhāt, kriyā dravyādarthāntaram ityanena darśanenāvirodhāt, uktivastukriyālakṣaṇena dravyakriyāśrayeṇa
ca prāguktena ca nyāyena cāvirodhāditi .
evaṃ tāvat pravṛttisāmānyakriyātvanivṛttyarthaviśeṣagrahaṇaprayojane doṣābhidhānaṃ kṛtam, adhunedamapi
viśeṣagrahaṇaprayojanaṃ dūṣyate --yadapi ca dvitīyaṃ viśeṣagrahaṇaprayojanamabhidhīyate sarvadetyādi .
sarvadā iti pravṛttyanivṛttiṃ darśayati . sarvabhāvānāmiti vyāptiḥ . kutaḥ ? pravṛttisamanvayāddhetoḥ
devadatta ityapi nāpravṛttikaṃ nākriyaṃ vastu tena śabdenābhidhīyate, kiṃ tarhi ? sapravṛttikamevocyate, yathā
pacatyādīnāṃ kriyāvacanatvamevaṃ devadattādīnāṃ dravyavācitvābhimatānāmapi vācyasyārthasya pravṛttyā sattayā
gatyādisarvabhavanātmikayā samanvitatvam . tataḥ pacatyādivad devadattādayo'pi śabdāḥ kriyāvacanāḥ,
tasmāt kriyāvacano dhātuḥ pā॰ vā॰ 1 . 3 . 1 iti dhātusaṃjñāste'pi syuḥ, viśeṣagrahaṇasāmarththāt punarviśeṣo na bhavatīti nivartyate . kasmāt punardevadattādayo viśeṣā na bhavantītyucyate --sarvabhedasambandhānuguṇyāt tu nāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ, sarvairhasipaṭhigamyādibhirbhedairdevadattabhavanapravṛtteḥ sambandhenānuguṇatvāt pravṛttisāmānyamevedaṃ bhavanavat satyapi bhavadbhavanabhāvaviśeṣe tuśabdasya viśeṣārthatvāt . tasmād na kriyeti devadattāderakriyātvamupasaṃharati itiśabdasya samāptyarthatvāt, evamarthaṃ viśeṣagrahaṇamiti prakṛtopasaṃhāraḥ,
pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā na pravṛttisāmānyamiti na bhavanamātraṃ nāpi devadatta ityupasaṃhārārthaḥ . asyāpi viśeṣagrahaṇasya sadoṣatvamucyate --idamapi tyaktadravyārthotthānam, idaṃ hi viśeṣagrahaṇaprayojanavyākhyānamutthāna eva dravyārthatyāgaṃ kurute . apiśabdāt prāguktabhavanasāmānyakriyātvanivṛttyarthaṃ viśeṣagrahaṇamante
kriyāmeva tyajatīti smārayati . sarvadā sarvabhāvānāṃ pravṛttisamanvayāt iti hetuvacanena devadatta iti
nāpravṛttikam iti nāmavācyārthasvarūpavacanena ca pravṛttimātramevedaṃ na dravyaṃ nāmeti dravyārthasya prāgabhyupagatasya tyāgaḥ kṛto bhavati anenāpi viśeṣagrahaṇaprayojanavacanena dvitīyeneti .
na kevalaṃ dravyārthatyāga eva doṣaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? prāgvyākhyātaviśeṣagrahaṇaprayojanatulyadoṣānubandhaṃ
cedam . kathamiti cet, ucyate --yathā tatretyādi grantha upasaṃhṛte doṣāsaktyā codyameva uttaratvena samarthayati . bhāṣyakāreṇa kārakavatyāḥ phaloddeśinyāḥ kriyātvaṃ pratipādya upasaṃhṛtaṃ tasmāt pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā,
na pravṛttisāmānyamiti, tatra doṣa āsajyate--yadi pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ kriyā pravartate, īhate, ceṣṭate ityādīnāṃ dhātusaṃjñā na prāpnoti, kriyāvacanānāmeva dhātutvāt teṣāṃ cākriyātvāt pravṛttiviśeṣakriyātvādityeṣa
doṣo yathā tatra pravṛttisāmānyanivṛttyarthe viśeṣagrahaṇe tathehāpi devadattādidhātutvanivṛttyarthe

viśeṣagrahaṇe vṛtādīnāṃ dhātusaṃjñā naiva prāpnoti akriyāvacanatvād devadattavat,
asvaśabdopādānasādhyabhāvādilakṣaṇavacanaṃ cānarthakaṃ syāt . yathā ca tatrocyate—
naiṣa doṣaḥ, viśeṣa iti bhavataḥ kva sampratyayaḥ ? ya upādīyamāno'nyaṃ nivartayati .
yadyevaṃ vṛtādayo'pyupādīyamānā viśeṣān nivartayanti, tathā coktam--sāmānyamapi
yathā viśeṣastadvat pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 2 . 2 . 24, tataścaiṣāṃ siddhā dhātusaṃjñā . evamihāpi pratyu-
viśeṣagrahaṇe vṛtādīnāṃ dhātusaṃjñā naiva prāpnoti . kiṃ kāraṇam ? akriyāvacanatvād devadattavat,
tadarthasyākriyātvādakriyāvacanatvam, tadarthasyākriyātvaṃ sarvabhedasambandhānuguṇyāt . sa vā devadattaḥ kriyā
syāt sarvabhedasambandhānuguṇatvāt vṛtādivat, aniṣṭaṃ caitaditi . kiñcānyat, pravṛttisāmānyanivṛttyarthe
devadattādidravyanivṛttyarthe ca viśeṣagrahaṇe dvidhāpi asvaśabdopādānasādhyabhāvādilakṣaṇavacanaṃ cānarthakaṃ syāt . yaduktam asvaśabdopādānasādhyabhāvo bhāvaḥ iti bhāvalakṣaṇam, bhāvādigrahaṇāt
svaśabdopādānasiddhabhāvaṃ sattvam iti dravyalakṣaṇamuktita eva pṛthagiti, vastuto'pi liṅgasaṅkhyādimadaliṅgasaṅkhyatvaṃ ca dvayoḥ pṛthaktvaṃ tathā trikālātrikālaviṣayatvaṃ bhūtābhūtabheda ityādi pṛthaktvalakṣaṇavacanamanarthakaṃ dvayorapi kriyātvāditi .
yathā ca tatrocyate naiṣa doṣa ityādi . evaṃ doṣe'bhihite syānmataṃ pravṛttisāmānyanivṛttyarthaviśeṣagrahaṇaprayojanadoṣaṃ pariharāmīti viśeṣa iti bhavataḥ kva sampratyaya iti praśnopakramaṃ doṣavādinaiva
parihāramabhidhāpayiṣyataste, doṣavādī kila brūyāt --ya upādīyamāno'nyaṃ nivartayatīti . paro
brūyāt --yadyevaṃ vṛtādayo'pyupādīyamānā viśeṣān nivartayantīti, tairhi gacchatyādayo viśeṣā
nivartyante na gacchati na śete na bhuṅkte vartata eva asti bhavati vidyata eva kevalamiti . tasmādupādīyamānā
gamanādīn viśeṣān nivartayanti vṛtādayaḥ, tiṣṭhatyādivat . tathā coktaṃ bhāṣyakāreṇa --sāmānyamapi
yathā viśeṣastadvaditi jñāpakamidam, iti vartatyādirviśeṣa eva upādīyamānatve viśeṣanivṛttihetutvāt
tiṣṭhatyādinivṛttihetugacchatyādivat . tataścaiṣāṃ siddhā dhātusaṃjñā vṛtādīnāmiti yathaiṣa sāmānyapravṛttinivṛttyarthe viśeṣagrahaṇe parihāra evamihāpi pratyucyeta dravyanivṛttyarthe'pi viśeṣagrahaṇe parihāra ucyeta
pratyucyeta . sarvadā sarvabhāvānāṃ pravṛttisamanvayād devadattaḥ ityapi nāpravṛttikaṃ vastu, tasmāt
tannivṛttyarthaṃ sarvabhedasambandhānuguṇyāt tu nāyaṃ viśeṣaḥ ityetadarthe'pi viśeṣagrahaṇe devadattasya kriyātvaṃ
syāt, vṛtādīnāṃ tadvadakriyatvādvā dhātusaṃjñā mā bhūt, svaśabdopādānasiddhatādivacanānarthakyaṃ cetyādidoṣāpādane kṛte sa eva parihāra ucyate tvayā --viśeṣa iti bhavataḥ kva sampratyayaḥ ? ityādi yāvat
siddhā dhātusaṃjñā .

yat punarucyate na vayaṃ vastunyasahabhāvatāṃ nivṛttiṃ brūmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? pacati...

evaṃ parihāradvaye'pi samānamuttaramidamucyate --evaṃ cocyamāne nanvasmaddhṛdaya eva dṛṣṭam . nanu
ityanujñāpane, anujñātaṃ tvayaitad yadasmaddhṛdayakṣetra uptasya darśanabījasya tvadvacanasalilasekena phalamabhivyaktam . tadvivṛṇoti smārayan --nanvasmābhirapyabhihitaṃ pravṛttireva pravṛttiviśeṣaḥ iti, yaducyate
vṛtādisāmānyamupādīyamānaṃ gamanādiviśeṣaṃ nivartayatīti tadyujyeta yadi vṛtādisāmānyavyatirekeṇa gamanādiviśeṣaḥ syāt, sa tu sāmānyameva ityuktam . tasmād na sāmānyaṃ viśeṣābhāvādupādīyamānaṃ viśeṣān
nivartayitumarhati khapuṣpādiviśeṣāniva . ataḥ pravṛttiviśeṣatvābhāvādubhayatra parihāre viśeṣagrahaṇānarthakyadevadattakriyātva-vṛtādyakriyātvadoṣāstadavasthā eveti . tadupasaṃharati --evaṃ ca kṛtvā pravṛttimātrasyetyādi
gatārthaṃ yāvadanarthakamubhayorapi vyākhyāvikalpayoriti .
evaṃ tāvad viśeṣagrahaṇamanarthakam, na kevalamanarthakameva, kiṃ tarhi ? anarthārthamapītyata āha --na
cāphalameva, aniṣṭakṛdapīti . tadaniṣṭakṛttvaṃ sādhanenaiva bhāvyate --evaṃ devadattasya kriyātvaṃ syāt,
anyanivartanapravṛttiviśeṣatvāt pacādivṛtādivaditi, pravṛttiviśeṣatvamanyatvaṃ tannivartanaṃ ceti dravyādanyasya pravṛttisāmānyavyatiriktasyārthasyābhāvādevāyuktam, abhyupagamyāpi doṣaḥ--devadattaḥ kriyā syāt,
anyanivartanatve sati viśeṣapravṛttitvāt, sa gacchatyādiviśeṣanivartano yajñadattādiviśeṣanivartanaśca sāmānyatvāt, upādīyamānatve sati anyanivartanatvāt pravṛttiviśeṣaśca . tataśca pacatyādivad vartatyādivacca kriyā,
kriyātvāt tadvācinaḥ śabdasya dhātusaṃjñā, pūrvaprakrāntanyāyakrameṇa pacyādivad vṛtyādayaḥ, tadvad devadattādaya
iti sarvaṃ kriyaivetyāpannam . aniṣṭaṃ caitadāvayoriti . ye'pyamī vṛtādayaste'pyakriyāḥ, tacchabdānāmadhātusaṃjñetyādi, sarvabhedasambandhānuguṇaviśeṣatvād devadattavadeva . pacādīnāṃ ca gamanādisarvadhātvartha-
vyāpitvasya prāgupapāditatvāt siddhahetutvāt sādhīyaḥ sādhanamidamapi, caśabdasūcitatvādanantarodāhṛtadvividhakriyāvāciśabdaprakṛtatvācca sarvanāmaśabdatā ca syāt .
yat punarityādi yāvadayaṃ ca dharmo vṛtādīnāmapyaviśiṣṭa iti . pacādiviśeṣanivartakatvād
vṛtādayo dhātusaṃjñā bhavanti ityukte parasyāśaṅkā syāt naiva nivartayanti pacādīn vṛtādayaḥ, virodhābhāvaśca vṛtādyantarbhāvāt pacādīnām, ato viśeṣanivartakatvābhāvād na dhātusaṃjñā vṛtādayaḥ syuḥ ityā

ayaṃ ca dharmo vṛtādīnāmapyaviśiṣṭaḥ . atra brūmaḥ--vastunaḥ pravṛttau... ... ...
vaidharmyeṇa .
evamayaṃ sa ubhayanayaḥ . naigamadeśatvāddravyārtho'yam . dravyamapi bhāvasādhanam .
śaṅkya tatpratisamādhānaṃ punarucyate--na vayaṃ vastunyasahabhāvatāṃ nivṛttiṃ brūmaḥ, nivṛttiratrāsmābhirnārthadharmaprakalpitā vivakṣitā, kiṃ tarhi ? śabdadharmaprakalpitā vivakṣitā, arthagatā hi nivṛttirasahabhāvajanitā
ghaṭapaṭādivadekatrāsambhavāt, śabdagatā tu vijñānapravṛttinivṛttimātrakṛtā sā, devadatte sannihitasattādravyatvagatisthitivṛttyavṛttyādisarvadharmasambandhinyapi gacchati devadattaḥ ityukte tiṣṭhati āste śete ityādikriyākalāpaṃ nivartya devadattaṃ gacchatiśabdo gamanenaiva sambandhayati tadviṣayaikavijñānādhānahetutvāt, na tathā
vastuni nivṛttiḥ sambhavati satatasannihitasarvadharmātmakatvād devadattasya . tadudāharati --kiṃ tarhi ? pacatītyādi gatārtham, udāhṛtārthasaṃvādī dārṣṭāntiko'rthaḥ --ayaṃ ca dharmo vṛtādīnāmapyaviśiṣṭaḥ, vartate,
īhate, ceṣṭate ityādayo'pi śabdāḥ kriyāntaranivṛttivijñānādhānadharmiṇo na vastugatān dharmān nivartayitumalam, śabdānāṃ buddhipravṛttinivṛttikriyāyāṃ prabhutvād vastupravṛttinivṛttyorapravṛttatvāditi .
atra brūmaḥ--vastunaḥ pravṛttāvityādi yāvad vaidharmyeṇeti . avasitaprayojanamidaṃ vacaḥ, tvayaiva
bastupravṛtteḥ sarvapravṛttiviśeṣasahitāyā evābhyanujñātatvād bhāvitatvācca, sambhāvanaiva hi na, vastupravṛttiḥ
sarvapravṛttiviśeṣātmiketyatītavicāreṣu vistareṇa caritārthametat . kathaṃ ? viśeṣavān vāgvyavahāro viśeṣāntarapravṛttinivṛttiviṣayo na vastunyatyantanirbhedātmake prabhavati iti bhāvayatā bhavataiva subhāṣitatvāt kimasmābhirvācyaṃ vṛtādīnāṃ pacādīnāṃ vā dhātusaṃjñā prāpnoti na prāpnotīti ? sarveṣāṃ dhātūnāmasmadabhimatapravṛttisāmānyakriyāvacanatvānativṛttervastuvyavahāre śabdavyavahāre veti na kiñcid na prasidhyati . tvayā tu punarasadarthaviṣayatvād bhrāntijñānaṃ śabdārthaviṣayaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ vastvasaṃsparśādityalaṃ prasaṅgena .
prakṛtamucyate --evamayaṃ sa ubhayanayo yo'sau mayā ādāvuddiṣṭo vidhiniyamātmaka ubhayanaya iti,
vidhiśca niyamaśca sarvatra dravyaṃ kriyā ceti vidhiniyamam, dvandvaikavadbhāvāt, sa eṣa nirdiṣṭaḥ pratyakṣīkṛtaste .
kasya punarayamārṣābhihitānāṃ nayānāṃ bheda ityatrocyate --naigamadeśatvād dravyārtho'yam, na paryāyārthaḥ .
dravyaparyāyasaṅgṛhītānāṃ bahubhedānāṃ madhye dravyārthabhedeṣu naigama-saṅgraha-vyavahāreṣu yo naigamo'nekabhedastasyaikadeśo'yaṃ tadbheda ityarthaḥ . ekkekko ya satavidho satta ṇayasatā havaṃti te cevaṃ āvani॰ 226 iti
vacanāt .


dvyarthatā uktavat . padārtho dravyakriye . vākyamākhyātaśabdaḥ . tadartha ukta ubhayabhāk . nayavinirgamasūtram--atthittaṃ atthitte pariṇamati bhagavatīsū॰ 1 . 3 . 32 iti .

dravyaśabdaḥ kiṃsādhano'trābhipreta iti cet, ucyate --dravyamapi bhāvasādhanam, yat tad
drūyate kenāpi yo dravati gacchati satataṃ pravartate tasya yad dravaṇaṃ gamanaṃ satatapravṛttiḥ sa bhāvastad bhavanam,
tatsādhano dravyaśabdaḥ, kartṛsādhanāvinābhāvibhāvasādhanavyākhyānasya sopapattikasya vistareṇa kṛtatvāt saiva
dvyarthatā uktavat, dravyakriyātmakadvyarthatā parasparāvinābhāvinī karaṇādīnāṃ tadavyatiriktasvarūpatvāt
sarvatra ghaṭapaṭādibījāṅkurādiṣu ca sarvaikātmyasya subhāvitatvāditi . padārtho dravyakriye uktavat iti
vartate . vākyamākhyātaśabda iti, ākhyātaṃ sāvyayakārakavākyamekamiti vākyam,ākhyātaṃ sāvyayakārakaviśeṣaṇaṃvākyamekatiṅ pā॰ vā॰ 2 . 1 . 1 . iti vākyam . tadartha uktaḥ
vākyārtha uktaḥ ubhayabhāk dravyakriyādvyātmakavastu bhajate vākyārtha iti vistareṇokto'nena vidhiniyamabhaṅgena naigamaikadeśadravyārthena .
nayavinirgamasūtram--atthittaṃ atthitte pariṇamatīti, astitvaṃ bhāvo bhāve'stitve pariṇamati . bhāvo bhāva eva satataṃ vartate paritaḥ samantād namati pariṇamati taṃ taṃ bhāvamāpadyate sadā kartṛsahita eva .
iti ubhayanayaḥ pañcamo'raḥ parisamāptaḥ ॥




oँ arham

atha ṣaṣṭho vidhiniyamavidhyaraḥ .

nanvevamubhayamapyavastu, anupapannasvāvasthatvāt, khapuṣpavat . svā avasthāḥ
sthityutpattivināśāḥ . tā yadi bhāvasya tato dravyamanavasthamiti dravyaprabhedāsambhavaḥ . bhāva eva tu sa tathābhūta āpadyate, tadbhedasya tadātmakatvāt, mṛdvat .
pravṛttibhāvavacanāt tu pravṛttāveva vyatirekasambhavād bhāvādeva sarvasya kṛtatvād

evaṃ vidhiniyamabhaṅgāre dravyakriyātmakavāde saṃhṛte ṣaṣṭhanaya āha --nanvevamityādi vicārāśrayaṃ
doṣāpādanasādhanam . ubhayamapi dravyaṃ kriyā ca ityavastu anupapannasvāvasthatvāt, anupapannāḥ svā
avasthā asya, tadbhāvādanupapannasvāvasthatvāt khapuṣpavaditi . kāstāḥ svā avasthāḥ ? ucyate --svā avasthāḥ
sthityutpattivināśāḥ . tāśca dravyasya vā syuḥ kriyāyā vā ? kiñcātaḥ ? tā yadi bhāvasya tāḥ sthityādayaḥ prāguktatathābhūtasannihitavastutvavyaktilakṣaṇāyāḥ kriyāyā iṣyante'vasthā iti tato dravyamanavasthaṃ
prāptam, anavasthālakṣaṇatvādubhayoranyatarakalpanāvaiyarthyādavasthāvyatiriktalakṣaṇābhāvāt . bhavatu dravyamanavastham, ko doṣa iti cet, ucyate --dravyamanavasthamiti dravyaprabhedāsambhavaḥ prāptaḥ, itiśabdasya hetvarthatvādanavasthatvādityarthaḥ, dravyaprabhedā rūpādigatyādivivartāḥ, te na sambhavanti anavasthatvādasattvāt khapuṣpasyeva . tataśca yaduktaṃ dravyasya lakṣaṇaṃ tasya hāniḥ . katamasya iti cet, ucyate, sarvaprabhedanirbhedaṃ bījam
ityasya . tasmānnāsti dravyam, anavasthatvāt, khapuṣpavat .
tataḥ kiṃ prāptam ? bhāva eva tu sa tathābhūta āpadyate, dravyabhūtā kriyaiva āpadyate, kasmāt ?
tadbhedasya tadātmakatvāt, sthityutpattivināśā hi dravyabhedābhimatā dravyasyaivavyasya cedātmāno bhavanti, tata
etadarthādāpannam--kriyāyā ātmeti, kriyaiva ca dravyaṃ saṃjñāmātrabhedāt . mṛdvaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, yathā mṛdbhedāḥ
piṇḍaśivakādayo mṛdātmakāḥ santo mṛdbhūtā eva tathā sthityādayo dravyabhūtabhāvabhedā eveti dravyābhāve'rthāpattyā sthityādayaḥ kriyāyā bhedā ityāpannāḥ .
yadapi ca kalpitaṃ pravṛttisāmānyavyatirekeṇa kārakavatyā odanādiphaloddeśinyāḥ parigrahārthaṃ viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ tadapi na kāryam . kasmāt ? pravṛttibhāvavacanāt tu matpakṣe pravṛttāveva vyatirekasambhavaḥ,

dravyabhāvatyāgād dvayavibhāgavacanaṃ vyartham, tataśca tathābhavanavinābhūtasannidhānamapi
nirmūlam, sarvanirmūlatā caivam, avyaktirapi asannihitatvāt khapuṣpavat .
athocyeta--sannihitatathābhūtavastutattvavyakti dravyameva sthityādisvāvasthamastu, evaṃ
tarhi sarvaprabhedanirbhedatvamasatyaṃ dravyasya kriyāyāścākriyātvamavyañjakatvāt prāgeva
tathābhūtavyaktivyarthatvāt .
athaitaccedubhayaṃ necchati tato'vibhāgāvasthatvād dravyamavibhāgāvasthaṃ tadvya-
pravṛttisāmānyameva bhāvaḥ ityuktatvād viśeṣāstatraiva sambhavanti . ato'sya vyatirekasambhavād yadapi
odanādi phalaṃ tadapi pravṛttisāmānyameva . tasmād bhāvādeva kriyāyā eva sarvasyeṣṭasya kṛtatvād dravyaṃ
bhāvaḥ ityetat tyaktam . tattyāgād dvayavibhāgavacanaṃ vyartham, dravyaṃ kriyā ca vastu ityubhayābhyupagamo
mūlata eva vighaṭate . tataśca tathābhavanena pravṛttilakṣaṇena vinābhūtasya sannidhānamapi nirmūlam . tataśca
yadi dve api dravyakriye vibhakte na staḥ tatastayorlakṣaṇamanupapannam, ataśca vibhāgena lakṣaṇābhāvāt tayorabhāvaḥ
khapuṣpavat . tadabhāvāt kriyā kutaḥ tathābhavanakriyāsannidhilakṣaṇaṃ dravyaṃ pravṛttisāmānyaṃ vā kutaḥ tathābhavanavinābhūtatvāt khapuṣpavadeveti . sarvanirmūlatā caivamiti sannidhinirmūlatvāt kriyāyā avyaktirbhedānāmavyaktiśca tayā vinetyata āha --avyaktirapi asannihitatvāt khapuṣpavat .
athocyetetyādi . syānmatam--bhāvasya prāguktavat sthityutpattilayā akalpamānāḥ samanantaroktadoṣadarśanāt, sannihitatathābhūtavastutattvavyakti dravyameva uktavat sammūrcchitasarvaprabhedaṃ sthityādisvāvasthamastu, tāśca sthityādyavasthāḥ kriyayābhivyaktiṃ nīyanta iti . atrocyate --evaṃ tarhi sarvaprabhedanirbhedatvamasatyaṃ dravyasya, te hi sthityādibhedā dravyasyaiva saṃvṛttā iti nirbhedatvoktirvyāhanyate . kiñcānyat, kriyāyāścākriyātvam, sannihitatathābhūtavastutattvavyaktiḥ kriyeṣyate, te hi bhedāḥ kriyayābhivyajyante ced
bhedāḥ prāgapi kriyābhivyakteḥ santi, tathābhūtatvāt kriyāyā vyaktikaratvābhāvaḥ . tasmāccāvyañjanāt kriyā
dravyavat kharaviṣāṇavadvā na kriyeti . tataśca dravyasyādravyatvāt kriyāyāścākriyātvādaśeṣapakṣadhvaṃsitvam,
anupapannasvāvasthatvād dravyasya kriyāyāśca khapuṣpavadabhāva iti .
athaitaccedubhayaṃ dravyanirbhedāsattvādadravyaṃ sannihitatathābhūtavastuvyaktyabhāvādakriyātvaṃ ca necchati
bhavān sarvavastutyāgabhayāt tato'vibhāgetyādi, avibhāgāvasthatvāt, vibhāgā bhedāḥ sthityādyavasthāḥ,
tadabhāvād dravyamavibhāgamityasadāpannam, mā bhūd dravyasya bhedātmakasyādravyatvamiti kriyāyāścākriyātvamavyañjakatvāt prāgeva tathābhūtavyaktivyarthatvād mā bhūditi kimāpannam ? dravyamavibhāgāvastham . tadvya-

ñjikā kriyā, tato yadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyati yugapadayugapadbhāvipṛthivyādibhedāvibhāgadravyasvāvasthatvāt .
astviti cet, tato'ṅkurotpattau tasyaiva vināśitvādanutpanno'vinaṣṭaśca sarva
eveti svavacanādivirodhāḥ, tathā cāṅkurapatrādinirākaraṇādapi ca lokādivirodhāḥ .
ñjikā kriyeti, kriyāyāścāvibhāgāvasthadravyaviṣayayathāsannidhivyaktikriyātvādavibhāgasyaiva sannihitasya
vyañjikā hi kriyā . tataḥ kimiti cet, tato yadeva utpadyate tadeva vinaśyati, ūrddhvapattirutpattirātmalābhaḥ pratyakṣopalabdhiḥ, vividhamadarśanaṃ vināśo'nupalabdhirabhāvaḥ . ekarūpatvācca vastunastadabhivyañjanācca
kriyāyā utpattivināśayorapyabhedād yadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyati . kiṃ kāraṇam ? yugapadayugapadbhāvipṛthivyādibhedāvibhāgadravyasvāvasthatvāt . yadā cāvibhāgāvasthaṃ dravyam kriyā ca tadvyañjikā ca
tadāmī yugapadbhāvinaḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśakālādibhedā rūparasagandhasparśasaṅkhyāsaṃsthānādibhedāśca ye cāyugapadbhāvino mṛtpiṇḍaśivakādibhedāste sarve'pyavibhāgāvasthāmātramityāpannāḥ . tasmāt sarvabhedānāmavibhāgāvasthāmātratvādutpattirvināśa ityapyayugapadbhāvinau bhedau tayośca avibhāgāvasthadravyatvam, tataścaikyam, ekatvācca yadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyati iti sādhūktaṃ deśakālādibhedābhāvāt .
astviti cet . syānmatam--ekatvādutpattyādibhedaikyād yadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyati ityastu,
tarhi ko doṣa ityatra doṣakutūhalaṃ ced brūmaḥ--yadi bījāṅkurādyayugapadbhāvināmapi pṛthivyādiyugapadbhāvibhedamūlatvād yadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyati tato'ṅkurotpattau tasyaiva vināśitvamiti doṣa udāharaṇena sphuṭīkriyate, yasmād bījocchūnamūlādipūrvabhedānāṃ patranālādyuttarabhedānāṃ ca vināśāvasthatvāt aṅkura evaikaḥ
iti satyaṃ tato'ṅkurotpattāvaṅkura eva vinaśyati, tataśca dṛṣṭeṣṭaviruddhāvanutpattyavināśadoṣau syātām, aṅkurotpattau tasyaiva aṅkurasyaiva vināśitvād na bījaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ nāṅkura utpannaḥ, vinaṃṣṭurutpattuścābhedāt . bhede tu
sati yujyeta bījaṃ vinaṣṭamaṅkura utpannaḥ iti . sa cotpannaśced na vinaṣṭaḥ, vinaṣṭaśced notpanna ityubhayāvyavasthānād notpanno na vinaṣṭa iti . astu nāmānutpanno'vinaṣṭaśca, kiṃnāmako mamāyaṃ doṣo nyāyalakṣaṇokta
iti cet, ucyate--naika eva, kiṃ tarhi ? sarva eveti svavacanādivirodhāḥ, utpadyate ced na vinaśyati
vinaśyati ced notpadyate, tvayā cocyate--yadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyatīti, deśakālādibhedābhāve kathamūrddhapadanavividhādarśanabhedena tadeva iti cābhedena nirdeśo viruddhārthaḥ ? ataḥ svavacanavirodhaḥ . utpattivināśayorvā rūḍhibhedādekādhikaraṇavirodhālloke pratītatvāllokavirodhaḥ . pratyakṣata evotpādavināśabhedadarśanāt pratyakṣavirodhaḥ . utpadyamānaghaṭavadutpadyamānatvād na vinaśyati vinaśyattvācca notpadyate bhinnaghaṭavadityanumānavirodhaḥ . tathā cāṅkurapatrādinirākaraṇādapi ca lokādivirodhā iti vyākhyānamanantaroktasyārthasya

kṣaṇikavādātiśayo'taḥ, tadyathā--tatra hi utpādādanyo vināśakṣaṇaḥ jātasya vināśāt, iha tu utpāda eva vināśaḥ prasaktaḥ kriyārthakālarahitadravyotpādāditvāt .
śūnyavādatā vā, sarvasyāvinaṣṭānutpannāsthitatvāt khapuṣpavat .
nanu pṛthivīdravyatvābhede sta utpādavināśau tatkālau ca tadaṃśabījāṅkurabhedā-
lokapratītidvāreṇa sukhapratipādyatvāditi gatārtham . vacanadvāreṇa tu prācyaṃ vākyam, uktyāśrayatvādeṣāṃ
doṣāṇāmiti .
evaṃ tāvadutpādavināśādyabhāvadoṣaḥ . na kevalameta eva doṣāḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? anityatādoṣaśca . sa
ca kṣaṇikavādaṃ vātilaṅghya anityatvadoṣo'tiśayena vartata iti . ata ityasmādeva hetoḥ, kasmāt ? yadeva
utpadyate tadeva vinaśyati ityabhyupagamāt . sa caivamanityatvātiśayadoṣaḥ pradarśyate, tadyathā--tatra hītyādi .
tatra hi kṣaṇikavāde na hi yadeva utpadyate tadeva vinaśyati, kiṃ tarhi ? kṣaṇo'syāstīti kṣaṇika ityutpādādanyo vināśakṣaṇaḥ utpatturvinaṃṣṭuścetyabhyupagamyate, bhinnasya kālasya kṣaṇākhyatvāt, tasmiṃśca kāle
jātasya vināśād, na jāyamānasya . sa hi kṣaṇikavādī naikamevotpādakṣaṇaṃ vināśakṣaṇaṃ cecchati ekasyotpattibhaṅgāsaktibhayāt . yathoktaṃ yadyekasmin kṣaṇe jātaḥ   ityādi . kṣaṇānāṃ kṣaṇavartināṃ
ca bhedāt jātasya iti ca nāśanaṃṣṭṛkṣaṇānāṃ ca bhedaṃ sūcayati . iha tu yadeva utpadyate tadeva vinaśyati iti
vāde utpāde eva vināśaḥ prasaktaḥ kriyārthakālarahitadravyotpādāditvāt, kriyāśabdavācyo'rthaḥ
kriyaiva vārthaḥ kriyāprayojano vā kālaḥ kriyārthakālaḥ, sa eva te vaiyākaraṇasyeṣṭaḥ, yadyapyanyeṣāmanyathā,
yathoktam --pariṇāmavatī kriyaiva kālaḥ   ityādi . tādṛgvidhakālarahitaṃ dravyaṃ kriyātmakakālavinābhūtaṃ tadeva utpādo vināśo'vasthānaṃ cetīṣṭatvāt kṣaṇikavādātiśāyī ayaṃ kṣaṇikavādastvadīya
iti sādhūktam . nānityavāde'pi tiṣṭhati anavasthānādutpādādīnām, kiṃ tarhi ? śūnyavādatā vā, yathā
prāguktaṃ sarvasyāṅkurānutpādāvināśavadanavasthānamapīti śūnyatāsādhanaṃ gatārthaṃ yāvat khapuṣpavaditi .
nanu pṛthivītyādi yāvadabhedasya cāvyaghāta iti . syānmatam--pṛthivīdravyatvaṃ śivakādiṣvabhinnam, tasmiṃścābhinne tadutpādavināśayoścābhede satyeva pṛthivīdravyatvenānutpannāvinaṣṭatve satyaikye ca sta
utpādavināśau tatkālau ca, tasyaiva pṛthivīdravyatvasya cāśābhyāṃ bījāṅkurākhyābhyāṃ bheda ityasti
bhedaḥ kārakasadbhāvādityutpattirasti tathā vināśastatkālau ca, itiśabdasya hetvarthatvādevaṃ bhedasyā-
bhedasya ca vyāghāto nāsti, tasmāt tadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyati pṛthivīdravyatvābhedāt tadaṃśabījāṅkura
