diti bhedasyābhedasya cāvyāghātaḥ . evaṃ tarhi pṛthivītvajātimātramabhinnaṃ dravyaikatvavighātakam, bījasya aṅkurasya ca nānātvam . tasmānna tadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyati .
tataśca yathā bījamaṅkurāt pṛthageveṣyate tathā pāṃśvāditvamapi pārthivatvād bhinnameṣitavyamiti bhedanirbhedadravyanirmūlanam .
api ca tvayaivāpāditaṃ bhedabahutvaṃ dravyaikatvavighāti, tatparihārārthamutthitena
pārthivatvamapi nānaivotthāpitam . bhedakaṃ cābhedakādanyadabhedakaṃ ca bhedakāt, bhedakatvādabhedakatvāt, yathā dravyakriye .
nanu ghaṭa utpadyamāna eva śivakatvena piṇḍatvena vinaśyati iti sa evotpadyate
bhedāt tatkālau ca sta iti nānityaśūnyate doṣāviti . atrocyate --evaṃ tarhītyādi yāvad na tadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyatīti . ayamidānīmasmatparikalpito bheda evāpatitastavāpi aśmasikatāmṛlloṣṭavajrādibhede sati pṛthivī nāma na kadācidanyāsti tadvyatirekeṇa, kintu pṛthivītvajātimātramabhinnaṃ tadbhedavyāpi .
tacca dravyamekam ityasya tvatpakṣasya vighātakaṃ jātimātramabhinnaṃ śeṣaṃ sarvaṃ bhinnamiti sidhyati, bījasya
aṅkurasya ca nānātvam, bījād vinaśyato'nyo'ṅkura utpadyamānatvāt, vinaṃṣṭurmṛtādanya iva devadatto
yajñadattādutpadyamāna iti . tasmād na tadeva utpadyate tadeva vinaśyati, anyanivṛttyarthāvadhāraṇasya bhedasatyatve sati ānarthakyāt . tataśca yathā bījamityādidṛṣṭāntaḥ . yathā aṅkurādikāleṣu bhinneṣvapi vrīhitvasāmānyābhede sati pṛthageva bījamaṅkurādiṣyate mā bhūt pūrvokto'nutpādādidoṣa iti tvayā tathā pāṃśvāditvamapi pāṃśumṛtpiṇḍāditvamapi pārthivatvād bhinnameṣitavyam . tataḥ kimiti cet, brūmaḥ --iti
bhedanirbhedadravyanirmūlanam, ityasmāt pāṃśvāditvabhedābhyupagamāt sarvaprabhedanirbhedaṃ dravyaṃ na bhavati . tataśca
lakṣaṇābhāvād dravyameva nirmūlitaṃ tvayeti .
api cetyādi . tvayaivāpāditaṃ bhedānāṃ bahutvaṃ dravyaikatvavighāti . katamena vacanena iti cet,
pārthivatvādekatvamutpatturvinaṃṣṭuśca netaradravyāṃśābhyāṃ bījāṅkurābhyām, tābhyāṃ cānekatvam ityanena vacanenāpāditam . kiñcānyat, idamapyanyadaniṣṭaṃ tatparihārārthamutthitena tvayāpāditam . katham ? yaccodito'si
bījāṅkuranānātvaṃ kṣaṇikātiśayaḥ śūnyavāditā ca bhavataḥ iti tatparihārārthamutthitena nanu pṛthivīdravyatvābheda
ityādinā vacanena pārthivatvamapi nānaivotthāpitam . kathamiti taducyate--abhedakaṃ pārthivatvam, bījādi
bhedakam, bhedakaṃ cābhedakādanyat abhedakaṃ ca bhedakāt, bhedakatvāditi svabhāvabhedaṃ hetutvenāha,
itaśca asmādanyadabhedakatvāditi, ubhayordṛṣṭānto dravyakriye, yathā dravyāt sarvabhedanirbhedādanyā tathābhūtavastutvavyaktilakṣaṇā kriyā kriyātaśca dravyam, tathā ca pārthivatvamabhedakatvād bījāderbhedakād bhinnasvabhāvaṃ
tadvad bhedakatvāt nānā syāt kriyāyā iva dravyamiti .
āha --nanu ghaṭa utpadyamāna ityādi yāvad ghaṭatvenotpadyata iti . yat tvayoktaṃ yadeva utpadyate

sa eva vinaśyati, tathā ghaṭatvena vinaśyan ghaṭatvenotpadyate śivakatveneva vinaśyaṃśchatrakatvena . ayamaparihāra uktottaratvāt, śivakenaivotpattau śivakenaiva vinaṃṣṭavyaṃ tato'bhinnatvāt ghaṭotpādavat . evaṃ tvanutpattau vināśasyāpyabhāvād ghaṭādibhavanābhāvaḥ,
bhavanasambandhavyatikramābhāvāt sarvamabhūtaṃ nāstītyevamādyāpadyate .
athocyeta--aikya eva mṛtkumbhāvasthayoḥ mṛddravyasyaiva bhavanasya tathāniyatā
tadeva vinaśyati tatrānutpattyavināśasvavacanavirodhādikṣaṇikavādātiśayaśūnyatādoṣā na sambhavanti pratyakṣavacanādīnāṃ tathātvāt, yasmād ghaṭa utpadyamāna eva śivakatvenotpadyamānaḥ piṇḍatvena vinaśyati
pūrvottarakālayorapi saddravyapṛthivīmṛttvābhedavad ghaṭābhedāt piṇḍāvasthāyāṃ śivakādyavasthāyāṃ mṛdādiyāvatparamāṇvavasthāyāṃ kapālādiyāvatparamāṇvavasthāyāṃ ca ghaṭa eva iti sa evotpadyate sa eva vinaśyati, itiśabdasya hetvarthatvāt uktahetvarthatvāt tasmād ghaṭa eva piṇḍatvenotpadyamānaḥ śivakatvena vinaśyatiṃ, tasmād
nānutpattyādidoṣāḥ . yathā ca piṇḍatvenotpadyamānaḥ śivakatvena ghaṭa eva vinaśyati tathā punarghaṭatvena
vinaśyan ghaṭatvenotpadyate, kimiva ? śivakatveneva vinaśyaṃśchatrakatvena, yathā śivakatvānantaraṃ
chatrakatvaṃ jāyamānaṃ tadotpannaṃ vinaṣṭaṃ ca tathā deśāntarabhāvāntarāntaritaghaṭavināśaghaṭasambhavayorapi abhedo
vastutvādibhyaḥ piṇḍaśivakatvavaditi .
atrocyate --ayamaparihāra uktottaratvāt, nanvatroktameva prāgaṅkurasyaiva vināśitvādidoṣajātam,
tasya piṇḍaśivakasaṃjñāmātrapṛthakkṛtāduktimātrabhedād na parihāro bhavati, yasmādarthato yadeva śivakotpattau
śivakenaiva vināśaḥ iti tadeva aṅkurotpattāvaṅkureṇaiva vināśaḥ ityuktam . tato'yaṃ te doṣo balādāpātyate —
śivakenaivotpattau śivakenaiva vinaṃṣṭavyamiti . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tato'bhinnatvāt, yato yadabhinnaṃ tadutpattau
tenaiva vinaṃṣṭavyam, yathā tvaduktānantaraghaṭotpādavaditi . evaṃ tvanutpattāvityādi . evaṃ cedutpattirneṣyate
tasyaivāvasthitasya ghaṭasya naivotpattirasti atyantaṃ ghaṭākhyād bhāvādanyatvāt khapuṣpavat, anutpannasya ca vināśābhāvaḥ khapuṣpavadeva, vināśasyāpyabhāvād ghaṭādibhavanābhāvaḥ, apiśabdādutpatterapyabhāvād ghaṭādīnāmutpattivināśaśūnyatvād bhavanābhāvaḥ astitvābhāvaḥ, utpattivināśau hi bhavanasambandhaḥ, tadvyatikramasya
cābhāvāt sarvamabhūtaṃ nāstītyevamādi āpadyate . ādigrahaṇādavastu asad abhāvo nirupākhyamityādi .
atra punaḥ parihāraḥ --athocyetaikya evetyādi . yathā satyevaikye mṛtkumbhāvasthayoḥ sarvasarvātma

eva bhavanabhāgā abhivyajyante tāṃśca bhāvo'pi tathābhivyanakti tathā utpattisthitivināśā abhinnasyaivāvasthāḥ syuḥ .
nanvasmābhirapīdamuktam--ananyatvād dravyasvāvasthātve sati avirodhāt
pūrvottarābhāvādabhibhavaikyānāpatteravidyamānapārthakyāt kasyacid vyaktyavyaktī
nopapadyete, kuta utpādādiḥ ?
api ca lokapratītavyaktidharmaviparītatvādutpādādyabhāvaḥ, kriyāsvāvasthā-
katvād bhinnayorapyabhedaḥ tathā bījāṅkurādibheda ityabhiprāyaḥ . yathā mṛdaḥ kumbhāvasthā yugapadbhāvināṃ rūparasādīnāmayugapadbhāvināṃ ca śivakādīnāṃ niyatāni bhavanāni, mṛddravyasyaiva kartṛbhavanasya rūpādiśivakāditvena
tena prakāreṇa niyatā eva bhavanabhāgā māyākārakapatākikāvad nāniyatābhivyaktayo'bhivyajyante prathamabhavanaśabdasya kartṛbhavanārthatvāt . tāṃśca bhavanabhāgān kriyāpi tathābhivyanakti nānyathā, bhāvaśabdasya dvitīyasya
kriyāvācitvāt . yadi bhinnasya mṛtkumbhādyayugapadavasthā rūpādipṛthivyādiyugapadavasthā vā syuḥ tāstasya mṛddravyasyaiva na syuḥ, kasmāt ? anyatareṇāvaruddhāvakāśatvād ghaṭapaṭādivat . bhavanti caikasya . tasmādabhinnamṛtkumbhāvasthāvadutpattisthitivināśā abhinnasyaivāvasthāḥ syuḥ, ko doṣaḥ ? iti .
atrocyate --nanvasmābhirapīdamityādi yāvat kuta utpādādiriti . nanvasmābhiste eva nopapadyete ityuktaṃ vyaktyavyaktī ityabhisambadhyate tathāniyatabhavanabhāgadravyāvasthāyā vyañjanamavyañjanaṃ veti .
kasmāt ? ananyatvāt sarvasya sarvātmakatvācca . taccānanyad dravyameva, tasya ca sthityutpattivināśā ananye,
kiṃ kāraṇam ? tvayābhyupagatānāṃ sthityādīnāṃ dravyasvāvasthātvāt, dravyasyaiva svāvasthāḥ sthityādayaḥ parasparato'nanyāḥ iti hi samāśritastvayāyaṃ pakṣaḥ, parasparabhinnasthityādīnāṃ dravyasvāvasthātve sarvapakṣārthadhvaṃsitvabhayāt . tasmād dravyasvāvasthātvādavirodhaḥ sthityādīnām, na yathā svapnajāgaraṇayorvirodhaḥ .
tasmād dravyasvāvasthātvādavirodhaḥ . avirodhāccānanyatvamāsām . ananyatvācca pūrvamidam, uttaramidam
iti kramābhāvaḥ, tataḥ pūrvottarābhāvāt kaḥ kenābhibhūto yenaikyamāpadyeran sthityādayaḥ yata etat syāt
iyamanayā kriyayābhivyajyate'vasthā neyam iti ca . kasmāt ? avidyamānapārthakyāt, pṛthaksiddhānāṃ hi
aikyāpattiḥ syāt sati avirodhe tantupaṭatvavat . tasmādabhibhavaikyānāpatteḥ pūrvottarābhāvāt dravyasvāvasthātve sati avirodhādananyatvāt kasyacid vyaktyavyaktī nopapadyete . kutastadanupapatteḥ
tathāniyatabhavanabhāgavyaktyavyaktibhāvābhyāmutpādādibhedaḥ ? iti tadavastho doṣaḥ .
kiñcānyat, api cetyādi . abhyupagamyābhinnārthaikyāpattiviṣaye vyaktyavyaktī lokapratītavyaktidharmaviparītatvādutpādādyabhāva iti brūmaḥ . loke hi pūrvavṛttivyatirikto vyañjakaḥ prasiddho'nyaḥ udakāñjanadīpādiyogo bhūgandhacakṣurindriyaśaktyabhivyaktighaṭādidarśanaheturyathāsaṅkhyam, yujikriyāsādhanabhūyogi ca

dravyabhedaniṣedhād dravyamātrābhyupagamād vyaktidharmatyāgād vyaktikāraṇābhāvāt .
ahetuto vā vyaktāvavyakterapi tadvatteti nityameva vyaktiravyaktirvā sarvasya syāt .
pariṇāmād naivamiti cet, na, uktadoṣatulyatvāt .
bhūdakādidravyajātamupalabhyate yathā na tu tathā taddravyavyatiriktam, yadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyati iti dravyaṃ
ca svāvasthā'vibhāgaṃ bruvatā tvayā na tato'nyaḥ saṃyogaḥ saṃyogī vābhyupagamyate dravyakriyāpṛthagbhūtaḥ dravyasvāvasthāmātratvādutpādādīnām . kiṃ kāraṇam ? kriyāsvāvasthādravyabhedaniṣedhāt, utpādādayaḥ kriyāyāḥ
svāvasthāḥ ityetaṃ pakṣaṃ dravyasyāpi parasparabhinnāḥ santyo'vasthāḥ ityetaṃ ca pakṣaṃ yasmād niṣiddhavanto vayaṃ
dravyanirmūlatvādidoṣāt . tasmādabhyupagataṃ tvayā na kiñcid dravyavyatiriktamastīti . tataśca tadabhyupagamād
vyaktidharmastyaktaḥ, tadviparyayadharmaṇo dravyamātrasyābhyupagamāt . tattyāgācca vyaktiranuttarameva vyaktikāraṇābhāvāditi .
syānmatam--nirhetukā vyaktiravyaktirvā dravyadharmaḥ svabhāvaḥ . yathoktam—
sudūramapi sandhāya saṅkṣīṇāsūpapattiṣu .na svabhāvāgamāvante kaścinna pratipadyate ॥   iti .
etaccāyuktam, ahetuto vā vyaktau avyakterapi tadvatteti, tena tulyaṃ tadvat, tadbhāvastadvattā,
vyaktivadbhāva ityarthaḥ . katham ? yathā vyaktirnirhetukā tathaivāvyaktirapi nirhetukā . tataḥ kimiti cet,
ucyate --iti nityameva vyaktiravyaktirvā sarvasya syāt nirhetukatvāt mṛdavasthāyāṃ ghaṭāvyaktivad
ghaṭāvasthāyāmavyaktirghaṭasya syāt, ghaṭāvasthāyāṃ ghaṭavyaktivad mṛdavasthāyāṃ vyaktiḥ syāt, mṛtpiṇḍe ghaṭavyaktivad gagane'pi syāt, viyatyavyaktivad mṛdyapyavyaktirvā syādityādi .
pariṇāmād naivamiti cet . syānmatam--yathā tvayoktaṃ na tathā bhavitumarhati pariṇāmābhyupagamāt, avasthitasya dravyasya dharmāntaranivṛttau dharmāntarāpattiḥ pariṇāmaḥ, tasmād mṛtpiṇḍaśivakādipariṇāmaiḥ sthityutpattivināśā bhaviṣyanti, na nirhetukāḥ . tasmādeva pariṇāmād vyaktyavyaktī ca sta iti .
etadapi na, uktadoṣatulyatvāt . ya ete'smābhirbhāvasvāvasthātvapakṣe dravyasvāvasthātvapakṣe ca bhinnābhinnātmakadvaidhe doṣā uktāste tulyā eva pariṇāmapakṣe'pi draṣṭavyāḥ pariṇāmāvasthayoḥ śrutimātrabhedāt, utpattiprādurbhāvatvāt vināśanivṛttitvāt avasthitasya iti ca svaśabdenaiva sthitivacanāt . pariṇāmoccāraṇena ca
nanvevamubhayamapi avastu ityādirādito grantho yojyo yāvadayamevāvadhiriti . tasmādaparihāraḥ pariṇāmaḥ .


atha vināśasāmānādhikaraṇye doṣadarśanāt tadevotpadyate tadevāvatiṣṭhate,
atrāpi tathā vā sarvathā vā avatiṣṭhamāne utpattiḥ kutaḥ, utpadyamāne vāvasthānam ?
iti svavacanādivirodhāḥ pūrvavat .
vyāpisvatattvānumatāṃśutantuvattu pradīrghadravyapūrvottarāvasthā bījāṅkuratvādaya

evaṃ tāvadutpādavināśayoḥ saṃyogenāyaṃ vikalpaḥ saprasaṅgaparihārapracarco'bhihitaḥ tathā vakṣyamāṇeṣūtpādasthitisaṃyoge sthityutpādasaṃyoge sthitivināśasaṃyoge vināśotpādasaṃyoge vināśasthitisaṃyoge trikādisaṃyogeṣu ca samānaḥ pracarco draṣṭavyaḥ yadeva utpadyate tadeva vinaśyati ityataḥ prabhṛti yāvadayamavadhiriti,
granthayojanayā yojayiṣyate .
atha vināśasāmānādhikaraṇye ityādi . utpādavināśaikādhikaraṇye doṣadarśanād nirdoṣoya'miti vikalpāntaramāśrīyate --tadeva utpadyate tadevāvatiṣṭhata iti . atrāpi na nirdoṣameveti brūmaḥ, atrāpi
hi dvayī gatiḥ tenāpi utpattiprakāreṇāvatiṣṭhamāne yadvā utpādenaivāvatiṣṭhamānaṃ tadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyati
ceti yadvā sthityutpattivināśaprakāraiḥ sarvathāvatiṣṭhamānaṃ tadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyati ca ityucyate ? yadi
tathotpādenaiva avatiṣṭhamānamutpadyate vinaśyatītyucyate tata utpādenaivāvasthitatvāt kimiti punarutpadyate ?
atha sarvathāpyavatiṣṭhamānamutpadyata iti ucyeta tatastryātmakaṃ sat kathamutpadyate ? utpattirūpasya cāvasthitatvād notpadyata iti utpattirdvidhāpi kuta iti, asambhava ityarthaḥ . asti cotpattiḥ . utpadyamāne
vāvasthānaṃ kutaḥ iti vartate . yadyutpadyate kathamavatiṣṭhate ? yadyavatiṣṭhate kathamutpadyate ? iti svavacanavirodhaḥ
pūrvavaditi, yathāṅkurotpattivināśaikādhikaraṇyodāharaṇe svavacanādivirodhāstathātrāpyutpattisthitisāmānādhikaraṇye yojyā iti .
vyāpītyādi yāvat prakalpa iti . syānmatam--yathā svatattvānumatāṃśutantuvattu, vyāpnotīti
vyāpī, aviśeṣitatvāt sarvasya vyāpyasya kāryasya vyāpakaṃ kāraṇamucyate vyāpīti . vyāpinaḥ svatattvameva
ityanumatoṃ'śustvayāpi dravyārthavādāśrayiṇā, vyāpi svatattvamasyeti vā vigrahaḥ, sa ca vyāpisvatattvānumatoṃ'śureva tanturvyāpyaḥ, kāraṇamayatvāt kāryasya . kimuktaṃ bhavati ? yathāṃśumayastanturatoṃ'śureva tanturiti dṛṣṭāntaḥ
aṃśurapi tantustanturapyaṃśuriti vā, tathā bījamayo'ṅkuro bījamevāṅkuraḥ aṅkuro'pi bījaṃ bījamapyaṅkura iti vā
dārṣṭāntikaḥ . tad varṇayati --pradīrghadravyetyādi, prakṛṣṭadīrghatvasya drāghīyaso dravyasya mervāderiva pūrvottaratayā
sthityutpattivināśāvasthā vyāpisvatattvānumatabījāṅkuratvādaya iti, asmin prakalpe tadevotpadyate tadevā

iti prakalpe bījasyāṃśūnāṃ vā anutpādyavināśitvād nityatvādaṅkuratantvanupapattireveti ta eva virodhāḥ pūrvastambanityatvādvā bījānupapatteḥ .
stambottarabījotpattestu aṅkuravat sthitibhinnotpattitvāt sarvasya dravyātmano'nityatā'vyāpitā ca pūrvādyabhāva eva vā'bhedatvāt .
athocyeta--yaduktaṃ bhavati yadevotpadyate tadevāvatiṣṭhata iti taduktaṃ bhavati
utpattirūpamevāvasthānamiti khapuṣpavailakṣaṇyenaivamevocyate . evaṃ sati yadevotpadyate
vatiṣṭhate ityutpattisthitisāmānādhikaraṇye svavacanādivirodhā na santi, tasya vastuno'vasthāmātrabhinnasyānutpannāvināśinaḥ sthitasyaivotpādāditi . atrocyate--etasminnapi prakalpe bījasya dārṣṭāntikasya aṃśūnāṃ
vā dṛṣṭāntabhūtānāṃ vāśabdādanyasya vā kasyacid vastunaḥ pradīrghasya anutpāditvādavināśitvācca nityatvam, nityatvāt sthitireva notpādavināśāviti kuto'ṅkuro bījāt ? kutoṃ'śubhyastantuḥ ? ato'ṅkuratantvanupapattireveti . tataḥ kimiti cet, iti ta eva virodhāḥ, utpattyabhāvāt pūrvavat svavacanādivirodhāstadavasthā eveti . pūrvastambanityatvādvā bījānupapatteḥ ta eva virodhāḥ iti vartate, nanu tvaduktenaiva nyāyena vyāpisvatattvānumatapūrvastambabījatvaṃ pradīrghadravyasthitatvaṃ ceti pūrvastambasyānutpādyavināśitvād
nityatvam, nityatvād bījānupapattiḥ, ato'pi tadeva utpadyate tadevāvatiṣṭhate iti svavacanādivirodhā iti
dūṣaṇaṃ nyāyasya vyāpitāṃ darśayati .
atha mā bhūvannete doṣā iti stambāduttarakālaṃ bījotpattiriṣyate tataḥ stambottarabījotpattestu
hetoḥ aṅkuravadityādi . yathāṅkuro bījādutpadyamānaḥ sthitādanya utpadyate pūrvadoṣabhayāt pūrvastambācca bījaṃ
tathā sarvamapi sthitibhinnotpatti, tasmāt sthitibhinnotpattitvāt sarvasya dravyātmano'nityatā'vyāpitā ca . yathāṅkuro bījādisthitādutpanno'nityo'vyāpī ca tathā tvadabhyupagatapradīrghadravyātmano'pyanityatvamavyāpitvaṃ ca syāt tathaiva . kiñcānyat, evaṃ pūrvādyabhāva eva vā'bhedatvāt, pūrvamidaṃ bījādi,
uttaramidamaṅkurādi ityetasya vā'bhāvaḥ, kasmāt ? abhedatvāt, abhinnaṃ hi tadvastu dravyaṃ na kriyā, vyāpisvatattvabījāṅkurādiprādurbhāvasya kriyāviṣayatvāt tasya pradīrghatvakalpanābhrāntitvāt kiṃ pūrvam ? kimuttaram ?
iti pūrvottarasthityutpattikalpavacanānupapattiḥ .
athocyeta ityādi yāvat khapuṣpavailakṣaṇyenaivamevocyata iti . syāt parihārārthavyākhyāśaṅkā—
tadevotpadyate tadevāvatiṣṭhate ityanena vacanena kimuktaṃ bhavati ? iti tadācaṣṭe --yaduktaṃ bhavati yadevotpadyate tadevāvatiṣṭhata iti taduktaṃ bhavati ityarthaṃ kathayatyanena vacaneneti . sa punarayamartha evaṃ kathito
bhavati --utpattirūpamevāvasthānamiti kathito bhavati . yadi notpadyetāvasthitābhimataṃ nāvatiṣṭheta anu

tadevāvatiṣṭhate ityutpattirevāvasthānamityāpannam, uktasthitityāgāt, ataśca kṣaṇikatvāpattiḥ, ubhayātyāgābhimatau vānekāntāpattiḥ .
athocyeta--utpādapūrvatva ete doṣā mā bhūvanniti tadeva vinaśyati tadevotpadyate . atrāpi yadeva vinaśyati bījaṃ tadevotpadyata ityaṅkurāprādurbhāva eva prāpta
iti pūrvavat svavacanādivirodhāḥ tatpūrvapatrādyapohācca lokādivirodhāḥ . tadeva
vinaśyati tadevotpadyate iti kṣaṇikavādātiśayanādi ca pūrvavat .
tpattirūpatvāt . tasmādanutpannamasthitaṃ khapuṣpādi, tadvailakṣaṇyena yadeva utpadyate tadevāvatiṣṭhate, nānutpattikamavatiṣṭhate, tasmādutpattyanumitamevāvasthānaṃ dravyasyeti . atrocyate --evaṃ sati yadevetyādi yāvat kṣaṇikatvāpattiriti . itthaṃ tarhīdaṃ vyākhyānaṃ saṃvṛttam--yadeveti yasmādityarthaḥ avyayatvād yacchabdasya, yata evotpadyate tata evāvatiṣṭhata iti prāguktotpattṛsthātraikyavadutpattisthityaikyāpattiḥ, ata utpattirevāvasthānamityāpannam, kiṃ kāraṇam ? uktasthitityāgāt, utpattireva sthitirityanumimānena sthitirutpattireva kṛteti yoktā
vyāpisvatatvānumatāṃśutantuvat tu pradīrghadravyapūrvottarāvasthā sthitiriti sā tyaktā syāt, tattyāgādutpattirevāvasthānam, na sthitirnānā kācidityataśca kṣaṇikatvāpattiḥ, utpadyata utpadyata eva nāvatiṣṭhate
kiñciditi sarvaṃ kṣaṇikam ityuktaṃ bhavati . syānmatam--kṣaṇikatvadoṣo mā bhūditi kenacit prakāreṇa
sthitam, utpadyate kenacit itīṣyata iti . tataśca ubhayātyāgābhimatau vānekāntāpattiḥ, yadi
sthityutpattī na tyakte tvayā tataste'bhyupagamavirodhinī syādvādaprakriyā anekāntavastutattvā āpadyata iti .
athocyeta--utpādapūrvatva ete doṣā ityādi . yadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyati, yadevotpadyate
tadevāvatiṣṭhate ityubhayorutpādapradhānayorvikalpayorye doṣāstānaparihāryān pratyuccāryānumatya cāsau tau vikalpau
tyaktvā vikalpāntare nirdoṣe manyamānaḥ śrayeta vināśapradhāne . tatrādyastāvad vikalpaḥ --tadeva vinaśyati
tadevotpadyata iti . asminnapi vikalpe doṣa ucyate--loke tāvat pratyakṣādiprasiddham aṅkurotpattau bījaṃ
vinaśyati . tava punaryadeva vinaśyati bījaṃ tadevotpadyate nāṅkura ityaṅkurāprādurbhāva eva prāptaḥ, itiśabdasya hetvarthatvāt tataśca pūrvavat svavacanādivirodhāḥ, tatpūrvapatrādyapohācca lokādivirodhāḥ,
aṅkurābhāve'ṅkurapūrvāṇāṃ patrakāṇḍanālapuṣpaphalaśūkādīnāmuttareṣāṃ loke pratyakṣādipramāṇaprasiddhānāmaṅkurāpalāpavadapalāpāllokādivirodhāḥ, pūrvavad vacanalokadvārābhyāṃ doṣābhidhānamiti .
tadevetyādi, tadeva vinaśyati tadevotpadyate iti vacanenānanyabhūtasyaikasminneva kāle vināśa utpādaśceti kṣaṇikavādātiśayaḥ pūrvavat, bhinnakālavināśotpādo hi kṣaṇikavādaḥ, sa cānenātiśayyate .
ādigrahaṇādavinaṣṭānutpannāsthitatvāt khapuṣpavad bījāṅkuraśūnyatā syāditi .



athotpādaikādhikaraṇye doṣadarśanāt tadeva vinaśyati tadevāvatiṣṭhate . atrāpi
tathā vā sarvathā vā avatiṣṭhamāne kuto vināśo vināśe vāvasthānam ? iti ta eva
svavacanādivirodhāḥ kṣaṇikavādātiśayanādi ca pūrvavat .
athocyeta--utpādavināśapūrvatāyāmete doṣā mā bhūvanniti tadevāvatiṣṭhate
tadevotpadyata ityucyeta . atrāpi tathā vā sarvathā vā utpadyamāne'vasthānaṃ kutaḥ,
avatiṣṭhamāne votpattiḥ ? iti ta eva svavacanādivirodhāḥ kṣaṇikavādātiśayanādi .
atha yadevāvatiṣṭhate tadeva vinaśyati, atrāpi tathā vā sarvathā vā vinaśyati
kuto'vasthānam, avasthāne vā vināśaḥ ? iti pūrvavat svavacanādivirodhāḥ kṣaṇikavādātiśayanādi śūnyatā vā . avatiṣṭhate vānvayaḥ, vinaśyati vyatirekaḥ . ananvayagocaravyatirekamātropalabdheśca tadevāvatiṣṭhate tadeva vinaśyati iti pūrvavat ta
eva svavacanādivirodhāḥ . avasthitārthavināśābhyupagamenāśeṣasādhanāvayavadhvaṃsaḥ,

athotpādaikādhikaraṇya ityādi dvitīyavikalpe vināśapradhānasthitipakṣe'nantarodgrāhite'pi uktavadeva
doṣāḥ sthānābhidhānena tu yojyāḥ, yojanādikpradarśanaṃ tu tathā vā sarvathā veti sthitiprakāreṇa vinaśyet
utpattisthitivināśaprakāreṇa vā vinaśyet iti vikalpyate . utpattipradhānavikalpābhihitadoṣavadatrāpi
vināśaprādhānyena sthityā saha yojitaṃ tathā vā sarvathā vā vinaśyati avatiṣṭhamāne kuto vināśaḥ ?
vināśe vā kuto'vasthānam ? iti ta evādhikṛtāḥ svavacanādivirodhāḥ kṣaṇikavādātiśayanādi
ca pūrvavat . evaṃ tāvadutpādapūrvayorvināśapūrvayoścotpādasthitivikalpayordoṣā uktāḥ .
athocyeta--utpādavināśapūrvatāyāmityādi pūrvavaduccārya doṣāṃścānumatya tyaktvā caturo'pi
vikalpānimau nirdoṣau vikalpāvityāśrayet . tatrādyastāvat tadevāvatiṣṭhate tadevotpadyata ityucyetetyādi
yāvat kṣaṇikavādātiśayanādīti pūrvavadatrāpi vyākhyā kāryā avatiṣṭhamāne ityuccāraṇena tu yojya iti .
atha yadevāvatiṣṭhate tadeva vinaśyatīti sthitipūrvadvitīyavikalpe'pi vyākhyānaṃ tadeva yojyaṃ
yāvat kṣaṇikavādātiśayanādīti gatārthaṃ śūnyatā veti . asmin vikalpe'nyathāpi doṣābhidhitsayāha —
avatiṣṭhate vānvaya ityādi yāvat svavacanādivirodhā iti . ananvayagocaretyādi, avasthānamanvayaḥ,
vyatireko vināśaḥ, anvayaśūnyo vyatireka evānanvayaḥ, sa eva gocaro vyatirekaḥ, arthaśūnyo vināśa eva
ityarthaḥ . tanmātropalabdheśca sarvatraiva bījāṅkurapatrādau tadevāvatiṣṭhate tadeva vinaśyati itītthamapi vyapa-
deśo na sambhavatīti pūrvavat ta eva virodhā anenāpi prakāreṇeti . evaṃ tāvat pakṣadoṣā abhihitāḥ . na
kevalaṃ pakṣadoṣā eva, kiṃ tarhi ? avasthitārthavināśābhyupagamenānena bhavato'śeṣasādhanāvayavā

tathāvyavasthānavināśāt . tathāvyavasthānāvināśe eva hi sapakṣamapi tat syāt
agniratra dhūmāt iti yathā, vināśe'vasthānaviparītavṛttitvāt .
evaṃ trikādiyogabhaṅgeṣvapi yāvadyogam .
dhvaṃsyante . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tathāvyavasthānavināśāt, yathā sphuṭitapṛṣṭhatvāt kharaṃ kharaviṣāṇam ākāśasphoṭavaditi vacanavat . tadvaidharmyeṇa sādhanavyavasthāṃ darśayati --tathāvyavasthānāvināśa eva hi sapakṣamapi
tat syāt, taddhi sādhanaṃ sādhanaṃ bhavat pakṣeṇa sahāpi satyeva vyavasthitasyārthasyāvināśe bhavitumarhati,
nāvināśe . kimiva ? agniratra dhūmāt iti yathā, yathā hi dhūmo dhūmarūpeṇa vyavasthito vyavasthite evāgnau
agnitayā tadvattayā ca pradeśe, yadyubhayavyudāsānugṛhītasamudāyārthasādhyatā yadi dharmaviśiṣṭadharmisādhyatā
sarvathā vyavasthitasya vastuno vyāpyo dhūmāṃśo vyāpakena agnyaṃśena vyāptastamaṃśaṃ vyavasthita eva vyavasthitaṃ
gamayati avinaṣṭamavinaṣṭo'vinaṣṭasyeti syāt sādhanatvaṃ sādhyatvaṃ ca . tvanmate tu punarvividhādarśane vināśe'tyantābhāve'nyabhavanarūpe vā viparītātmake tvayeṣṭayāvasthayāvaśyaṃ vinaṃṣṭavyamityavasthānaviparītavṛttitvāt
anyathābhavanarūpatvādasya dhūmākhyasyāṃśasya pakṣadharmatvamasiddham . ataḥ pradeśasyāpyanyathāvṛttatvādabhūtatvādvā
āśrayāsiddhiḥ . viparītavṛtterviruddhatāpi ca, pakṣadharmatvamabhyupagamya dhūmaṃ dhūmarūpeṇāvasthitamagneragnirūpeṇāvasthānasya anyathābhūtatvāt . athavā avasthānaviparītavṛttitvāditi, tvanmatenetthaṃ viruddhatā, manmatasaṃvādena tu
tvadīyasarvahetuviruddhatā . avasthānavināśadvayarūpa evāgnistvayābhyupagataḥ, tatra yāvantamaṃśamagnitvavyavasthānarūpaṃ
spṛśati tāvatā agnyantare sapakṣe ca dṛṣṭaḥ yāvantaṃ ca vināśarūpaṃ spṛśati tāvatā agnitvavyavasthānābhāve tadviparīte vā vipakṣe dṛṣṭaḥ tasmādanaikāntika iti hetudoṣāḥ . tasyaivāgneravasthānavināśadvyaṃśasya tadvataḥ pradeśasya
ca dvyaṃśasya vyavasthānāṃśamātre darśanād vanaspaticaitanye svāpavadavyāpipakṣadharmaśca sādhanaṃ tadvṛttyavṛttyoḥ . evaṃ
dṛṣṭānte'pi sādhyasādhanadharmadharmyasiddhidoṣāstadavyāvṛttyādidoṣāśca yojyāḥ .
evaṃ trikādiyogabhaṅgeṣvapi yāvadyogamiti . ete dvikasaṃyogabhaṅgeṣu ṣaṭsu doṣā uktāḥ . tathā trikādiyogabhaṅgeṣvapi vācyā ityatidiśati, uktadikpātitvāt teṣāmapi vikalpānām . tatraikastrikasaṃyogaḥ--yadevotpadyate tadevāvatiṣṭhate vinaśyati ceti prathamaḥ, yadevotpadyate tadeva vinaśyatyavatiṣṭhate ceti dvitīya ityutpattipradhānau dvau trikasaṃyogau, tathā vināśapradhānau sthitipradhānau ca . athavā yadevotpadyate tadevotpadyate vinaśyati ityanutpattidoṣaparihārārthamutpattisvarūpaṃ vināśasamānādhikaraṇamavadhārayan vikalpayet, tathā śeṣeṣvapīti

atra pakṣe'mī doṣā ityanyadutpadyate'nyad vinaśyatītyādi yathāvastubījāṅkurakarmādyātmadharmāṇusthūlapṛthivyādivat .
dvayordvayorapi dharmayostrikasaṃyogāḥ kāryāḥ . utpādenābhibhavād vināśasya utpādasya prādurbhāvād avasthānasyotpādena sahabhāvādanyonyābhibhavodbhavamithunavṛttayo hi guṇāḥ sattvarajastamobhidhānā utpattivināśasthityākhyā bhavantīti . tathā catuṣkasaṃyogāḥ pañcakasaṃyogāḥ ṣaṭkasaṃyogāśca sambhavanto yojyāḥ . yāvadyogamiti
sakalakaraṇopāyena yāvanto bhaṅgāstāvanta ityarthaḥ, yāvanti vā darśanānyarthataḥ sambhavanti taddarśanānusāreṇa
tāvanto bhaṅgāḥ kāryā ityarthaḥ, abhihitasāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattidoṣadiśā bhaṅgopacayāśrayeṇa doṣopacayamapi
vardhayadbhirvyākhyeyamityupāyaṃ darśayati .
atra pakṣa iti dravyasyāvasthāmātraṃ sthityādayo na bhinnāśca parasparata ityasmin pakṣe'mī doṣā iti
tasmād viparyayo'stviti tadupasaṃharati --ityanyadutpadyate'nyad vinaśyatītyādi . ādigrahaṇāt
anyad vinaśyati anyadutpadyate, anyadutpadyate'nyadavatiṣṭhate, anyad vinaśyati anyadavatiṣṭhate, anyadavatiṣṭhate'nyadutpadyate, anyadavatiṣṭhate'nyad vinaśyati ityādibhaṅgāḥ sambhavanto grāhyāḥ . yathāvastubījāṅkurakarmādyātmadharmāṇusthūlapṛthivyādivat, yad yad vastu yathāvastu, bījamanyad vastu vinaśyati aṅkuro'nya
utpadyate dravyam, karma gamanamutpadyate sthānaṃ vinaśyati, ādigrahaṇād nirṇayabuddhyādirguṇa utpadyate saṃśayabuddhyādirvinaśyati, ātmākāśakāladiṅmanodravyāṇi notpadyante na vinaśyanti avatiṣṭhanta eva, tathāṇavo'pi, paṭādi
sthūlamutpadyate piṇḍādi vinaśyati, dharmo'bhiṣecanādikarmaṇotpādya utpadyate guṇaḥ saṃskāraprayatnādiśca kāraṇa-
vināśādibhiśca vinaśyati, na vibhutvādiriti .


yat tat sat tato'nyat kāryam, tadatulyavikalpatvāt, ghaṭapaṭavat . kathamatulyavikalpatā ? iha kāryakāraṇayordvayorapi sattvaṃ kāryāsattvameva vetyetad vikalpadvayaṃ
syāt, itarayorabhyupagatapratipakṣatvād vādābhāvāt .
tad yadi tāvadubhayasattvaṃ tata upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatve tadātmakasattvāviśiṣṭatvāt kāraṇasvātmavat kāraṇāvirbhāvavad nityaṃ kāryāvirbhāvaḥ syāt . atha na kāraṇā-

atrānumānaṃ kāraṇakāryanānātve'bhidhīyate --yat tat sat tato'nyat kāryam, tadatulyavikalpatvāt, ghaṭapaṭavat, yat tvayā kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca sadityabhimataṃ tatra bījādeḥ puruṣādeśca kāraṇāt tanubhuvanādyaṅkurādi kāryamanyadityabhiprāyaḥ . pakṣīkriyate tu sat ityabhimatād vastuno'nyat tat kāryamiti .
viśeṣahetuḥ --tadatulyavikalpatvāditi, satā tenātulyo vikalpo'syeti kāryamabhisambadhyate, tasya tvayā
kāraṇādananyatveneṣṭatvād nāśrayāsiddhidoṣo hetoḥ . ghaṭapaṭavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, yathā ghaṭaḥ paṭenātulyavikalpo
loke pṛthukukṣibudhnavṛttordhvagrīvādyākārādivikalpaḥ paṭāccaturasradīrghādisaṃsthānādivikalpādanyo dṛṣṭastathā kāryaṃ
sato'nyaditi .
atrāha --kathamatulyavikalpateti, asiddhamatulyavikalpatvamiti codakābhiprāyaḥ . atra catvāro
bhaṅgāḥ sambhāvyante--yo vā kāraṇaṃ sat kāryaṃ ceti, yo vā kāraṇaṃ sat kāryamasat, kāryaṃ sat kāraṇamasat,
kāryamasat kāraṇaṃ ceti vā . teṣu dvau sambhavetām, na dvau . tadyathā --iha kāryakāraṇayordvayorapi sattvaṃ
kāryasattvameva vā ityetad vikalpadvayaṃ syāditi kāraṇaṃ sat kāryaṃ ca sat, kāraṇamasat kāryaṃ sat
ityetau vikalpau bhavitumarhato netarāviti . kasmāt ? itarayorabhyupagatapratipakṣatvād vādābhāvāt,
abhyupagataḥ pratipakṣo yasmin yena vā vādinā so'bhyupagatapratipakṣo vikalpo vādī vā, tadbhāvādabhyupagatapratipakṣatvāt, kiṃ bhavati ? vādābhāvo bhavati avasitaprayojanatvāt, paraścedabhyupagacchati kimiti vādaḥ
kriyate ? tau ca vikalpau sat kāraṇamasat kāryam, asat kāraṇamasat kāryaṃ ca iti yadi tvamabhyupagacchasi avasitaprayojanaḥ syāmaham, ato vādābhāvādidaṃ vikalpadvayaṃ syāditi .
kiñcātaḥ ? ucyate --tad yadi tāvadubhayasattvam, kāryasattvaṃ kāraṇasattvaṃ ca ityayaṃ vikalpaḥ
parīkṣyate, tiṣṭhatu tāvadasat kāraṇaṃ sat kāryamiti vikalpaḥ . atrobhayasattve kāraṇāvirbhāvavat kāryāvirbhāvaḥ syāditi pakṣārthaḥ sambadhyate, upalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatve sati tadātmakasattvāviśiṣṭatvāt
kāraṇasvātmavat, yathāvaraṇātidūrātisāmīpyādyanupalabdhikāraṇavirahe sati sattvātmakaṃ kāraṇamāvirbhavati
nityaṃ mṛdādi tathānupalabdhikāraṇāsattve sati tadātmakasattvāviśiṣṭakāryamāvirbhaved nityamiti .
athetyādi . etena sattve'pi āvirbhāvānāvirbhāvakṛtaṃ vailakṣaṇyamāpadyate kāraṇakāryayoḥ, tataśca sadvi

virbhāvavad nityaṃ kāryāvirbhāvaḥ sacca kāryamiti niścitaṃ tadvailakṣaṇyānna tarhi sat
kāraṇam, asat, sadvilakṣaṇatvāt khapuṣpavat . nanu ghaṭasattvaṃ paṭasattvavilakṣaṇam, na,
itaretarāsattvavailakṣaṇyāt . athaivamapi vailakṣaṇye kāraṇasattvaniścayo na nivartate āvirbhāvātmakaṃ ca tat na tarhi anāvirbhāvātmakatvāt kāryaṃ sat khapuṣpavat . itarathā
hi nityamevāvirbhavet sattvāt kāraṇavat, kāraṇaṃ vā nāvirbhavet anāvirbhāvakasattvāviśiṣṭatvāt kāryavat .
atha na kāryānityaprādurbhāvavat kāraṇaprādurbhāvaḥ sacca kāraṇamiti niścitaṃ
tadvailakṣaṇyānna tarhi sat kāryam, asat, sadvilakṣaṇatvāt khapuṣpavat, itaraḥ
kāraṇavat . khapuṣpamapi vā sat, āvirbhāvānupalabdheḥ, kāryavat . nanu ghaṭasattvaṃ
paṭasattvavilakṣaṇam, na, itaretarāsattvavailakṣaṇyāt . athaivamapi vailakṣaṇye kāryasattvaviniścayo na vyāvartate anityāvirbhāvātmakaṃ ca tat na tarhi āvirbhāvātmakatvāt
kāraṇaṃ sat, na tvevaṃ bhavati . ataḥ kāraṇaṃ sat, upalabhyatva āvirbhāvakatvāt,
kṛtavat . kṛtamapi kāraṇavat sat, upalabhyatve āvirbhāvakatvāt, kāraṇavadeva .
na tu kāryaṃ sat, upalabhyatve āvirbhāvānupalabdhyātmakatvāt, khapuṣpavat . sattve
vā viśeṣo vaktavyaḥ, aviśeṣe vailakṣaṇyānupapatteḥ . viśeṣonnayane'pi viśeṣasyāsadāśrayatvāt tato'nyatvameva, tatrāsattvameva aghaṭapaṭavat .
lakṣaṇatvādasat kāraṇamāpadyate'bhyupagamapratyakṣādiviruddham . tasyānaikāntikatvacodanā --nanu ghaṭasattvaṃ paṭasattvavilakṣaṇamiti . sato hi ghaṭāt paṭo vilakṣaṇaḥ saṃśca dṛṣṭaḥ, khapuṣpamasat, tatra sandehaḥ--kiṃ khapuṣpavadasat kāryaṃ syāt ? ghaṭavilakṣaṇapaṭavat sat syāt ? iti . atrocyate --na, itaretarāsattvavailakṣaṇyāt,
ghaṭaḥ paṭātmanā nāsti paṭo'pi ghaṭātmanā nāstyeveti asattvāṃśābhyāmeva vailakṣaṇyamanayoḥ, ato
vipakṣāsiddheḥ sapakṣa eva vṛtternānaikāntikaḥ . śeṣo granthaḥ satkāryavādaviparyayeṇa tulyagamatvāduktānusāreṇohyo yāvadanāvirbhāvakasattvāviśiṣṭatvāt kāryavaditi prathamacakrakaṃ kāryasattvaprasaṅgena .
atha na kāryānityaprādurbhāvavadityādi kāraṇasattvaprasaṃgacakrakaṃ dvitīyaṃ yāvadupasaṃhāragranthaḥ --ataḥ
kāraṇaṃ sat, upalabhyatva āvirbhāvakatvāt, kṛtavaditi kṛtaghaṭavadityarthaḥ . syānmatam--kṛtaṃ ghaṭādikāryamakṛtāt kāryāt kāraṇāccānyad vilakṣaṇaṃ ca tat tasmādasaditi . etacca na, viśiṣṭaṃ kṛtamapi kāraṇavat
sat, upalabhyatve āvirbhāvakatvāt, kāraṇavadeveti upalabhyatvaviśeṣaṇamāvaraṇādyabhāvaprakāśādyupalabdhipradarśanamiti . śeṣaṃ prāguktasatkāryavādadvitīyacakrakaviparyayeṇa tulyagamaṃ yāvat tato'nyatvameveti . tatra kimuktaṃ
bhavati ? tadvyākhyānārthamāha --tatrāsattvamevāghaṭapaṭavaditi . yathā ghaṭābhāva eva paṭo'ghaṭastathā viśeṣo'pi kalpyamāno'satvāṃśadvāreṇa syād nānyathetyaviśeṣād vailakṣaṇyānupapattiriti dvitīyaṃ cakrakaṃ samāptam .


athaitat sāmyamubhayasattvād mā bhūdityanyatarasattvaṃ kāryāsattvābhyupagamaparihāreṇa kāryameva sat iti . atra kāryasamīpe evakāra ityanyatra pratiyogini sattve
niyamaḥ sattvaṃ kārye eva niyataṃ nānyat sat iti, tataśca na kāraṇaṃ sat, tathā ca
sato'saditi asataśca saditi saṃjñā kriyate, kāryasattvaṃ kharaviṣāṇādisattvatulyam,
nāmamātre visaṃvādaḥ . kāryāsattvanivṛttyekāntatyāgāccābhyupagamavirodhaḥ svavacanādivirodhāḥ . sadevakāre tu sadanavadhṛteḥ pūrvadoṣā eva .
athocyeta--sarvathā sattvādekakāraṇatayā na kaścid viśeṣo'sti, yadeva
kāraṇakāle kāryasattvaṃ tadeva kāraṇasattvamapīti nāvadhāraṇakṛto doṣo nāpi pūrvastulyatvāpattidoṣaḥ . evamapyekatvād viśeṣābhāvaḥ, tato yathaiva kāraṇamanupādānasiddhaṃ
sāmānyamantarbhāvitāśeṣaviśeṣasattvātmakamevaṃ kāryasyānupādānasiddhatvāt sāmānyatvādantarbhāvitāśeṣaviśeṣasattvātmakatvāt kāryamapi kāraṇavadevākramaṃ syāt .

athaitat sāmyamityādi . pūrvadoṣaparihāreṇānyatarasattvaparigrahe kāryamasat iti necchato'vaśyaṃ kāryameva sat ityavadhāraṇapakṣaḥ syāt . sa ca satkāraṇapratiṣedhavādaviparyayeṇa doṣābhidhānavadihāpi kāryo yāvad
nāmamātre visaṃvāda iti . evaṃ ca sati kāryāsattvanivṛttyekāntatyāgāccābhyupagamavirodha ityādi gatārthaṃ
tathaiva . atha kāryameva sat ityavadhāryamāṇa ete doṣā iti sattvaṃ nāvadhāryate kāryamastyeva kāraṇamapyasti
itīṣṭatvāditi cet, availakṣaṇyādikṛtāḥ pūrvadoṣā eva .
athocyeta--sarvathā sattvādityādi yāvadanekaviṣayatvāt tulyatvasyeti . pakṣadvayoktadoṣaparihārārthamitthaṃ kalpayet --sarvathā sattvāt sarvapiṇḍaśivakaghaṭādiprabhedābhedādekakāraṇatā, tayā na kaścid
viśeṣo'sti, yathaikasyaivāheḥ saṃvarte vivarte vā'bhinnasya kāraṇasya kāraṇatā, nāheḥ pṛthagbhūtau saṃvartavivartau
tathā tathā tasyaivāvasthānāt, nāpyahiḥ saṃvarto vivarto vā na bhavati tatheti . tad bhāvayati --yadeva kāraṇetyādi yāvat kāraṇasattvamapīti . iti nāvadhāraṇetyādyupanayaḥ, itiśabdasya hetvarthatvād yadi kāryameva sat atha kāraṇameva sat ityucyeta yadi sadeva kāraṇaṃ kāryaṃ ca ityucyate sarvathā tasya kāraṇasya
svasaṃvartavivartaikarūpatvād nāvadhāraṇakṛto doṣo'sti paramatāpekṣatvādavadhāraṇasyāpi . nāpi pūrvaḥ tulyatvāpattidoṣaḥ khapuṣpādyasadvilakṣaṇaprādurbhāvāprādurbhāvakāraṇakāryāvailakṣaṇyadoṣo vāsti, ekatvāt . anekaṃ
hi tulyamatulyaṃ vā syāt idamanena tulyaṃ ghaṭādi paṭādi vā iti . nirastapūrvāparībhāvātmani kārye katarad
bhinnaṃ kāraṇaṃ nāma ? kāraṇātmakabhāvitakāryatvādvā katarat kāraṇam ? iti . na tvasti bhedaḥ, tasmādadoṣa iti .
atrocyate --evamapyekatvād viśeṣābhāvaḥ tvayokto'dhunā . tataḥ kim ? tata iti yathaiva

atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa itīṣyata evākramaṃ kāraṇe kāryasya sannihitatvādahivat .
yadi kramavadahyādi kāraṇaṃ syāt na syāt kramavattvāt khapuṣpavat . tasmādakramameva
sarvam, kāraṇatvādeva kāraṇasvātmavat tathā bhedenābhavadapi sadeva . khapuṣpamapi tarhi
sat kāraṇaṃ ca syādanupalabhyatvāt kāryavat . kāraṇaṃ vā asat kāryaṃ ca tathānupalabhyatvāt khapuṣpavadeva .
yadi tu na kāraṇānupādānasiddhatvavat kāryamanupādānasiddhaṃ saditi ca niścayo
na vyāvartate tadvailakṣaṇyānna tarhi kāraṇaṃ sat, asat, sadvilakṣaṇatvāt khapuṣpa-
kāraṇamanupādānetyādi yāvadakramaṃ syāditi . viśeṣābhāvāt kāraṇavat kāryamanupādānasiddham, anupādānasiddhatvāt sāmānyam, sāmānyatvāccāntarbhāvitāśeṣaviśeṣasattvātmakameva, tasya kāryasya sāmānyatvādanupādānasiddhatvādantarbhāvitāśeṣaśivakasthāsakośakuśūlaghaṭādiviśeṣasattvātmakatvāt kāryamapi
kāraṇavadevākramaṃ syāt, upalabhyate ca krameṇa prāk piṇḍaḥ paścācchivaka ityādi .
atha mā bhūdityādi yāvat sadeveti . syānmatam--iṣyata evākramaṃ kāraṇam, ahāviva saṃvartavivartasadbhāvāt kāraṇe kāryasya sannihitatvāt . yadi kramavadahyādi kāraṇaṃ syāt na syāt kramavattvāt
akramatvābhāvādityarthaḥ, akramāt kāraṇādatyantavilakṣaṇatvāt khapuṣpavat . yugapatsannihitasarvadharmakaṃ kāraṇamahyādīṣṭam, no cet saṃvartavivartāvahāvivākāśe'pi syātāmubhayorakramatulyatvāt . tasmād viyati abhūtairahi-
saṃvartavivartādibhiḥ sahaivākramameva ahirātmarūpabhūtaiḥ, tasmāt kāraṇatvādakramameva sarvamahyādikāraṇasvātmavat . kimarthaṃ tarhi kāraṇavad na bhedena bhedā gṛhyante tadaiva iti cet, ucyate --kāraṇatvādeva kāraṇasvātmavat, ahiḥ saṃvartavivartādibhedenābhavannapi kāraṇatvenaivākramarūpeṇa bhavannapi sa evāsti gṛhyata eva
sattvāt tadeva kāraṇaṃ tathā tathā tathā gṛhyata ityartha iti . atrocyate--etadapi asat anumānāntaravirodhāt, khapuṣpamapi tarhi sat syāt anupalabhyatvāt kāryavat . kāraṇaṃ ca syāt khapuṣpam,
anupalabhyatvāt, kāryavat . kāraṇatve vā tathābhedenābhūtatvāt sat khapuṣpaṃ syāt kāryavat . athaivaṃ neṣyate
kāraṇamasat kāryaṃ ca sat tvadiṣṭaṃ tathānupalabhyatvād bhedena kramabhāvinā ahisaṃvartavivartādiprakāreṇānupalabhyatvādityarthaḥ khapuṣpavadeveti . na caivamādīṣṭam, tasmādanupādānasiddhaṃ kāraṇaṃ sat, upādānasiddhaṃ
kāryamasacca sad bhavati .
yadi tvityādi . yathā kāraṇamanupādānasiddhaṃ sattvāt tathā kāryamanupādānasiddhaṃ sattvāt ityetad
neṣṭamupādānasiddhameveṣṭam, asattvāpattibhayāt sat iti ca niścayo na vyāvartate bhavatastatastadvailakṣaṇyāt upādānasiddhatvavailakṣaṇyād na tarhi kāraṇaṃ sat . kasmāt ? anupādānāditvāt sāmānyatvā

vadityādi pūrvavaccakrakadvayapravartanam . tasmādasat kāryam .
nanvevamasattvādāyatyāmapi nāvirbhavet kāryaṃ khapuṣpavat . na, saviśeṣaṇāsattvā-
dantarbhāvitāśeṣaviśeṣasattvātmakatvāt, asat, kāryavailakṣaṇyāt khapuṣpavadityādi pūrvavaccakrakadvayapravartanamupādānānupādānavilakṣaṇatvādivacanena āvirbhāvānāvirbhāvātmakatvādivacanavad netavyam--
yat tat sat tato'nyat kāryam, tadatulyavikalpatvāt ghaṭapaṭavad dravyakriyāvadvā . kathamatulyavikalpatā ? iha kāryakāraṇayordvayorapi sattvaṃ kāryasattvameva vetyetad vikalpadvayaṃ syāt, itarayorabhyupagatapratipakṣatvād vādābhāvāt . tad yadi tāvadubhayasattvaṃ tatastadātmakasattvāviśiṣṭatvāt kāraṇasvātmavadupalabdhilakṣaṇaprāptatve yathā kāraṇasyānupādānopalabdhiḥ tathā kāryasya syāt . atha na kāraṇānupādānavat kāryānupādānaṃ sacca kāryamiti niścitam, tadvailakṣaṇyād na tarhi sat kāraṇamasat sadvilakṣaṇatvāt khapuṣpavat, itaraḥ kṛtaghaṭavat . nanu ghaṭasattvaṃ paṭasattvavilakṣaṇam, na, itaretarāsattvavailakṣaṇyāt .
athaivamapi vailakṣaṇye kāraṇasattvaniścayo na nivartate anupādānātmakaṃ ca tat, na tarhyananupādānātmakatvāt
kāryaṃ sat khapuṣpavat . itarathā hi nityamevopādīyeta sattvāt kāraṇavat, kāraṇaṃ vopādānavat syāt
upalabhyasattvāviśiṣṭatvāt kāryavat iti prathamacakrakam .
atha na kāryānityopādānavat kāraṇopādānam, sacca kāraṇamiti niścitaṃ tadvailakṣaṇyād na tarhi sat
kāryam, asat, sadvilakṣaṇatvāt khapuṣpavat, itaraḥ kāraṇavat . khapuṣpamapi vā sat anupādānānupalabdheḥ kāryavat . nanvityādīti sottaram . athaivamapi vailakṣaṇye kāryasattvaviniścayo na vyāvartate upādānātmakaṃ ca tat na tarhi anupādānātmakatvād gandharvanagaravat kāraṇaṃ sat, na tvevaṃ bhavati, ataḥ kāraṇaṃ
sat upalabhyatve'nupādānātmakatvāt kṛtavat, kṛtamapi vā kāraṇavat . na tu kāryam, anupādānānupalabdhyātmakatvāt khapuṣpavat . sattve vā viśeṣo vaktavyaḥ, aviśeṣe vailakṣaṇyānupapatteḥ . viśeṣonnayane'pi
viśeṣasyāsadāśrayatvāt tato'nyatvameva, tatrāsattvameva aghaṭapaṭavat iti dvitīyacakrakapravartanaṃ kṛtamiti .
tasmādasat kāryamityupasaṃhṛte āha --nanvevamityādi . yadyevamasat kāryaṃ cedutpadyate tato'sattvādāyatyāmapi bījamṛtpiṇḍādyavasthānakālāduttarakāle'pyaṅkuro nāvirbhavecchivakādi ghaṭādi ca kāryamasattvāt
khapuṣpavat, khapuṣpamapyāyatyāṃ vā prādurbhavet asattvāt aṅkuraghaṭādivadityetadaniṣṭaṃ prasaktam . tacca
nāsti . tasmāt sat kāraṇe kāryamiti . etacca na, saviśeṣaṇāsattvāt, yo'yaṃ heturaniṣṭāpādanārthamuktaḥ
asattvāt iti eṣo'siddhaḥ, abhūtaṃ nāstītyanarthāntaram vai॰ sū॰ 9 . 1 . 9 iti vacanādatyantāsata evā

dananyacandrāditvavat . ata eva prakaraṇacintā--kiṃ ghaṭādi kāryamasadāvirbhavedalātacakravat, utetaracakravat sadāvirbhavet ? anaikāntikatvāt .
evaṃ tarhi mayāpi śakyaṃ vaktum--yat tadasat tato'nyat kāryam tadvikalpāsamarthatvād ghaṭapaṭavadityādi . uttaramatra vaktumaśakyam . yadyevamahamapi bravīmi
satkāryasādhanānyapyaśakyāni nivartayituṃ sopanayasaprapañcānāṃ vaktuṃ yuktatvāt . tatho-
sattvāt . ananyacandrāditvavat, yathā nāstyanyaścandramā iti dvitīyacandrābhāvādananyo'yameveti sāmānyāt pratiṣidhyate candramāḥ tathā nāsti ghaṭo gehe mṛtpiṇḍe kapālāvasthāyāṃ vetyādīnyasattvāni saviśeṣaṇāni ananyacandrāditvanidarśanasūcitāni teṣāṃ ca satāmevāsatāmāyatyāmāvirbhāvadarśanāditi .
ata eva prakaraṇacintetyādi . yasmāt prakaraṇacintā sa nirṇayārthamapadiṣṭaḥ prakaraṇasamaḥ
nyā॰ sū॰ 1 . 2 . 7 iti, yasmādeva āvirbhavad dvividhaṃ dṛṣṭam--sadasacca, tadyathā--alātacakrādyasat,
sacca rathādicakrādi, tatra sandehaḥ --kiṃ ghaṭādi kāryamasadāvirbhavedalātacakravat utetaracakravat sadāvirbhavet ? iti . yata eva saṃśayo na tata eva hi nirṇayaḥ, anaikāntikatvāt . aikāntiko hi
hetuḥ syāt, dhūmādatrāgniryathā . ityasadeva kāryamiti .
evaṃ tarhītyādi . satkāryavādī pūrvābhihitasatkāryavādopapattibhirviruddhāvyabhicāricikīrṣayāha —
evaṃ tarhi mayāpi śakyaṃ vaktum, tadyathā --yat tadasat tato'nyat kāryam tadvikalpāsamarthatvād ghaṭapaṭavadityādisatkāryasādhanaprapañco'tītaḥ so'tra draṣṭavya iti pūrvapakṣaḥ . uttaramatra vaktuma-
śakyam, yathātrāsatkāryasādhanāni anivartyāni tathā satkāryavādasādhanānyapīti .
yadyevamiti . yadyevaṃ bravīṣīti pratyuccāryāha ahamapi bravīmi-- evamapi satkāryasādhanānyapyaśakyāni nivartayitum, sopanayasaprapañcānāṃ vaktuṃ yuktatvāt, yathā tvayopanayasahitāni pratyavasthānasahitāni ca pūrvottarapakṣaprasaṅgena, satkāryāsatkāryavādayostulyaṃ samarthanamiti bhavato yadi matiḥ tatho

bhayavādasiddhiḥ, ubhayoranyatarasya vā niṣedhe pramāṇābhāvāt . nanvevaṃ tathārthasthitisatyatvāt sarvavādanāthānekāntavādāśrayaṇaṃ kṛtam, tadatatsamarthavikalpatvāt, ekapuruṣapitṛputrādivat . na ca tena saha kasyacid virodhaḥ, tasmādayamārādhyaḥ śaraṇaṃ ca .
yat tad bhūyate dravyeṇa tasya sarvagatatvaṃ nityatvaṃ cotsargaḥ, bhūtābhūtabhedātmakastasyaivāpavādaḥ, tasya ca vidhānam, ityeṣa ubhayavidhirna bhavati .
bhayavādasiddhiḥ satkāryāsatkāryavādayoḥ siddhiḥ, nivārayitumaśakyatvāt . syānmatam--anyonyanivāritayoranayorvādayorasiddhirevetyasadvādāśrayaṇaṃ śreya iti . etaccāyuktam, ubhayoranyatarasya vā niṣedhe
pramāṇābhāvāt, jñānābhidhānayoḥ pramāṇayordvirūpārthaviṣayatvādasadviṣayayoraprāmāṇyāt . tasmādavaśyamubhayarūpārthasthitisatyatvam .
tataḥ kim ? iti cet, ucyate --nanvevaṃ tathārthasthitisatyatvāt sarvavādanāthānekāntavādāśrayaṇaṃ kṛtam tvayā iti vākyaśeṣaḥ . anekāntavādo hi vādanāyakaḥ sarvavādavirodhāvirodhayornigrahānugrahasamarthatvāt, arivijigīṣvādīnāmivodāsīnanṛpaḥ . sa cettham--syādanyat syādananyat
kāraṇāt kāryamityādi . kutaḥ ? tadatatsamarthavikalpatvāt, tasmiṃścātasmiṃśca vikalpe samarthatvāt,
kāraṇe kāryaṃ sadananyat, asadanyat iti vā pakṣe samartho vikalpo'syeti anantaroktavikalādeśahetudvayasamāhāraikarūpo'yaṃ hetuḥ pakṣadvayasādhanasamarthaḥ . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? ekapuruṣapitṛputrādivat, yathaika eva
puruṣo'pekṣāviśeṣopanītaiḥ pitṛputrabhrātṛbhāgineyamātulādibhiranyairanyo'nanyaśca tena tena prakāreṇa saṃścāsaṃśca
kāraṇakāryanityānityādiparyāyārpaṇīyaśceti . asya hetorbhāvanā uktasādhanadvayādevādhigamyā vikalpabhaṅgakairvyākhyātaiva . sadasadvādyubhayopanītahetusāmarthyādevānekāntasiddhiḥ . na ca tena saha kasyacid virodhaḥ,
tasmāt parityaktapakṣarāgairanabhiniviṣṭairātmahitagaveṣibhiḥ kuśalairanyathā hitaprāptyasambhavāt āśrayaṇīyaḥ iti
paricchidyāyamārādhyaḥ śaraṇaṃ ca nayasamūhātmakatvādananyasādhāraṇotsāha-prabhu-mantraśaktiyuktabharatacakravartivad
vijigīṣubhiriti . yadyasau sarvairārādhyaḥ śaraṇaṃ ca vādānāṃ kimarthaṃ vādibhiḥ saha vyudyate ? dṛṣṭaśca vivādaḥ, tasmād
vivāditvāccheṣavādivadanārādhyo'śaraṇaṃ tavāpi ca darśanāt tena saheti . atrocyate--mama tena sahāvirodha eva
tavāpi ca, kintu vayaṃ tvatpratipattyaikāntavastvanupapatterbrūmaḥ, vayaṃ tvadanugrahārthaṃ tvadanuśāsina iti na doṣaḥ .
idānīṃ naigamanaya ubhayavidhirātmamatasvarūpaṃ vaktukāmaḥ paramataṃ prāgdūṣitaṃ pratyuccārayannitthamupasaṃharati —
yat tad bhūyata ityādi . yat tad bhavati tena bhavatā yad bhūyate dravyeṇa tasya bhavanasāmānyaṃ kṣetrataḥ
sarvagatatvaṃ kālato nityatvaṃ ca sarvātmakaṃ tasya utsarjanaṃ vidhānaṃ sa eva vidhiḥ prāguktaḥ, paścād dvitīyaḥ
pravṛttyātmakabhūtābhūtabhedātmakastasyaivāpavādaḥ, tasya ca vidhānam ityeṣa ubhayavidhistvayeṣṭa eva na bhavati .


sattādravyatvādigaganādisarvagatatvamaṇvādisahitanityatvaṃ cotsargaḥ . ārabdhadravyaguṇānāṃ karmaṇaścānityatvāt prāguktebhyo dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ parasparataḥ svajātiprabhedebhyaśca kāraṇakāryatayā cānyatvamityapavādaḥ . tayorvidhireṣa vidhiniyamavidhiḥ .

kastarhīti cet, sattādravyatvādīti yāvad nityatvaṃ cotsarga iti . sattā mahāsāmānyam, dravyatvaṃ
pṛthivyādiṣu sāmānyam, ādigrahaṇād guṇatvakarmatve ca rūpādigamanādiṣu ca sāmānyaviśeṣāstadbhedāḥ .
gaganādīni ākāśātmadikkāladravyāṇi vibhaktasarvagatāni, dravyāṇāmeṣāṃ sarvavyāpitā sarvagatatvamaṇvādisahitanityatvaṃ ceti teṣāṃ dravyāṇāmaṇūnāṃ ca nityatvaṃ kālavyāpitā pārthivādicaturvidhāṇudravyāṇāṃ ceti .
ādigrahaṇād manodravyasahitānāmiti vibhutvaparimaṇḍalatvādiguṇasahitānām, te ca guṇāstāni ca
dravyāṇi nityānītyarthaḥ . eṣa utsargaḥ sāmānyavidhiḥ .
ārabdhadravyetyādi yāvadapavāda iti . pārthivāpyataijasavāyavyaiścaturvidhairaṇubhiḥ saṃyogāpekṣaiḥ
samānajātīyaiḥ samānajātīyāni dvyaṇukādīni tadādyuttaravṛddhyā mahāpṛthivyādiparyantāni ārabdhāni, dravyāṇi
dve bahūni vā dravyāntarāṇyārabhante caturvidhānyeva, yeṣāmevādhikṛtamārambhasāmarthyaṃ tairārabdhe kāryadravye
tatsamavetā niyamata eva guṇāśca guṇāntaramārabhante   iti vacanāccitrādaya ārabdhaguṇāḥ,
teṣāmubhayeṣāmārabdhadravyāṇāmārabdhaguṇānāṃ cānityatvāt prāguktebhyo viśeṣaḥ tathā karmaṇaśca saprabhedasya .
evaṃ tāvad nityānityasarvagatāsarvagatabhedenānyatvam, punaśca dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ parasparataḥ dravyebhyo guṇānāṃ
karmaṇāṃ ca guṇebhyo dravyāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca karmabhyo dravyāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ ca parasparata iti svajātiprabhedebhyaścānyatvam, dravyajāteḥ parasparataḥ pṛthivyā udakādibhyaḥ udakasya pṛthivīsahitebhyo'nyebhyaḥ, evaṃ jvalanapavanagaganadikkālātmamanasāmitarebhyo'nyatvamiti sattāsamavāyasāmānyaviśeṣāntyaviśeṣebhyaścānyatvaṃ nityebhyo'nityānāṃ cetyapavādaḥ, tathā kāraṇakāryatayā ca, dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ dravyaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyam
vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 17 ityādi saṃyogavibhāgāḥ karmaṇāṃ kāryam vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 28 ityādi kāraṇakāryanānātvena cānyatvamityapavādaḥ . tayorutsargāpavādayorvidhiḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayorvidhiniyamayorityarthaḥ . eṣa
vidhiniyamavidhiḥ, na prāktanastvatparikalpitaḥ . 


kriyā hi prāgabhūtanirvṛttyarthā anekadravyatāyāṃ bhavati, adṛṣṭavaśādaṇuṣu karma-

yadapyuktaṃ tvayā yathābhūtasannihitavastuśaktivyaktiḥ kriyā dravyābhede sarvabhedaprabhedanirbhedaṃ bījaṃ
dravyam iti ca tanna bhavati, yasmāt kriyā hi prāgabhūtanirvṛttyarthā, jagatpralayakāle ca kā tvadiṣṭavyāpāralakṣaṇā kriyā madiṣṭādṛṣṭacoditāṇugatakarmaṇyasati ? sā hyadṛṣṭacoditāṇukarmajanitā dharmanirvṛttyarthā
jagatsṛṣṭyarthā ca syāt, karmaiva ca naḥ kriyā, na hi sā nirvṛttameva nirvartayituṃ krīḍitamevāstu iti
nirarthakaṃ vā pravartate . sā cānekadravyatāyāṃ satyāṃ bhavati, anekadravyatvaṃ cādṛṣṭacoditāṇukarma antareṇa
na bhavitumarhati, kasmāt ? adṛṣṭavaśādaṇuṣu karmasambhavād dvyaṇukādyanekadravyotpatteḥ tatsamavāyācca, tataścānekāṇukṛtāgnyūrdhvajvalanādilokasthitikarasarvakāryopapatteḥ naikasya kasyacit khavad nityasya kriyāsti . bhedabījamātradravyaśaktivyaktau vā na kaścidupakāro'styasya jagataḥ, kiṃ kāraṇam ? yasmāduktam --aṇumanasoścādyaṃ
karmetyadṛṣṭakāritam vai॰ sū॰ 5 . 2 . 14 iti . na cedetadevamiṣyate yadā adṛṣṭaparigṛhīteṣvaṇuṣu karma na

sambhavād dvyaṇukādyanekadravyotpatteḥ . na cedetadevamiṣyate tadā caikyena tadekaṃ dravyaṃ
niṣkriyatvānna kiñcidārabheta, tataśca tadapi na bhavedeva karma, dvyaṇukādyanekadravyadravyābhūteḥ kriyānirviṣayataiva syāt . ārabdhadravyabhūtāvapi ca tadabhāvāllakṣaṇā-
bhavati tadā caikyena stimitagaganavat tadekaṃ dravyaṃ niṣkriyatvād na kiñcidārabheta, tataścārambhābhāvāt
tadapi na bhavedeva karma, karma hyārambhasvarūpaṃ kalpyate, tasya svarūpābhāvāt khapuṣpavadabhāvaḥ, tadabhāvād
dvyaṇukādyanekadravyaṃ dravyaṃ na bhavet, tadabhūteḥ kriyānirviṣayataiva syāt, yadyanekadravyaviṣayā na bhavati
ārambhābhāvādanekadravyatvānupapattereva aṇvākāśādyekadravyaviṣayāpi na bhavatyeva sā tvadiṣṭā asmadiṣṭakarmavilakṣaṇā teṣāṃ nityaikastimitagaganavadārambhābhāvāt, aguṇavato dravyasya guṇārambhāt karmaguṇā aguṇā
akriyāścāsmanmatena tvanmatenāpi guṇādīnāṃ kriyātvāt kriyāyāśca dravyapradhānāyā niṣkriyatvādeveti kriyānirviṣayatā suṣṭhūcyate .
evaṃ tāvat kriyā dravyaṃ nārabhata ityuktam . idānīṃ tvadiṣṭaṃ dravyaṃ ca bhavye pā॰ 5 . 3 . 104

rambhānārambhādibhedāccānyatvādevānyatvam, guṇakarmaṇāṃ tadabhūteḥ dravyebhyo viśeṣaḥ
bhavatyeva bhavati dravyam ityayuktamiti vakṣyāmaḥ . katham ? abhyupetyāpyārabdhadravyaṃ kāraṇe kāryasyāsattvād
varṇitavarṇitopapattivat kāraṇadravyebhyo'nyatvāt kāryadravyāṇāṃ na hi tadeva dravyaṃ bhavatīti . athavāyamapyapavādavidhiḥ --ārabdhadravyabhūtāvapi ca pūrvadravyebhyaḥ kāraṇabhūtebhyaḥ kāryabhūtānāmanyatvād guṇakarmatvādinā
tasyaiva vā'bhāvād dravyasyeti . kiñca, lakṣaṇārambhānārambhabhedāccānyatvādevānyatvamiti, viśeṣaprakaraṇe kriyāvat vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 14 ityādi dravyalakṣaṇam, dravyāśrayī vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 15 ityādi
guṇalakṣaṇam, ekadravyādi karmalakṣaṇam, itthaṃ lakṣaṇabhedād nānaiva dravyaguṇakarmāṇīti . dravyeṣvapyanārambhakebhyo gaganādibhyaḥ pṛthivyādyārambhakanānātvam, guṇānāmapi saṃyogavibhāgarūpādīnāmārambhakāṇāṃ vibhutvādyanārambhakebhyo nānātvam, karmaṇo'vayavidravyasaṃyogavibhāgārambhiṇo'nārambhakebhyo bhedaḥ, tadabhāvāt . teṣāṃ
virodhāvirodhakāraṇakāryaprakaraṇakṛtaṃ ca nānātvamādigrahaṇāt . guṇakarmaṇāṃ tadabhūteriti dravyameva dravyaṃ
bhavati, na guṇā na karmāṇi, guṇānāmaguṇākarmatvāt karmaṇaścāguṇākarmatvād dravyebhyo viśeṣaḥ . anāra

anārabhyatvācca śabdasyetarebhyo viśeṣaḥ sāmānyādīnāṃ ca . tatastvaduktadravyasvarūpalakṣaṇabhavanānupapattirityubhayasyāpyabhāvaḥ . dravyādiṣaḍbhedasya saprabhedasyaiva bhāvaḥ .
yaducyate yadayaṃ bhavati svayameva yadanena bhūyate sa evāsya bhāva iti naiṣa bhāvaḥ .
anyenānyena bhūyate so'nya evāsya bhāvaḥ yena ca bhūyate so'pi cāsya bhāvaḥ .
bhāve'pyubhayatā ubhayotsargāt, dvividho hi bhāvaḥ--svabhāvaḥ saṃbandhaśca .
bhyatvāccākāśaguṇasya śabdasyetarebhyo viśeṣaḥ sāmānyādīnāṃ ceti sāmānyasya sāmānyaviśeṣāṇāmantyaviśeṣāṇāṃ cetarebhyo'nārabhyatvāt, samavāyasya cāśrayitve satyapi parasparataśca svāśrayasya svānurūpapratyayādhānahetutvādityevamādiviśeṣahetusadbhāvāt sarvamanyadeva .
tataḥ kim ? tatastvaduktadravyasvarūpalakṣaṇabhavanānupapattiḥ, sarvaprabhedanirbhedaṃ bījaṃ dravyam,
tasyaiva dravyasya tathābhūtasannihitaśaktivyaktirbhāvaḥ ityevaṃsvarūpalakṣaṇasya bhavanasyānupapattiḥ, dravyabhavanabhinnabhavanātmakatvād guṇādīnāṃ dravyāntarāṇāṃ sattāsamāvāyādyāśritapadārthānāṃ ca . itiśabdo hetvarthe,
tasmāt kāraṇādubhayasyāpi sāmānyasya dravyabhavanasyaikarūpasyotsargasya kriyābhavanasya cāpavādasya bhūtābhūtādibhedasyābhāvaḥ . kathaṃ tarhi tayorbhāva iti cet, ucyate--dravyādiṣaḍbhedasya saprabhedasyaiva pṛthakpṛthaksvarūpasyaiva viśeṣadharmakasya bhāvaḥ .
yadapi ca tat svasanmātraṃ svarūpasattvaṃ tadapi nātmanaiva, yaducyate--yadayaṃ bhavati svayamevārthāntaranirapekṣaṃ svatantram, vibhaktyantareṇa tadeva vyaktīkaroti --yadanena bhūyate iti, svabhāvasambandha ityarthaḥ,
ayaṃ tvayeṣṭaḥ sa evāsya bhāva iti, naiṣa punarbhāvo bhavati . kastarhi ? anyenānyena bhūyate'nyāpekṣeṇa
ca tathā tadbhinnena so'nya evāsya bhāvo bhāvaḥ . ko'sau ? sattā mahāsāmānyam . yena ca bhūyate
so'pi cāsya bhāvaḥ, sadvyapadeśārhasya dravyādeḥ sato'pi bhāvaḥ, na kevalaṃ sattaiva, yatsambandhād bhavati
iti bhavati sāpi sattā bhāvaḥ sacca dravyādi bhavatītyarthaḥ .
bhāve'pyubhayatā ubhayotsargāt, sattāyāmapi ubhayatā sāmānyaviśeṣatā, sotsṛjyate niyamyate
ca, so'pi hyutsṛjyate ca bhāvaḥ sarvagataḥ iti, niyamyate svagata eva iti . sattāntarasambandhanirapekṣasadbhāve'sati mā bhūt sambandhānavasthā, dvividho hi bhāva iti sarvasya vastuna utsargāpavādau pṛthak

svabhāvaḥ svarūpasattā, sambandhaḥ sambandhasattā yatsambandhād dravyaguṇakarmasu saditi
bhavati .
na tu bhavatyeva bhāvaḥ san, dravyaguṇakarmavat sattāsvatattvāsamavāyāt .
daṇḍavattu arthāntarāpekṣatvād dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ sattādisambandhānurūpapratyayahetutvaṃ
sāmānyādīnām, na tvagṛhīte viśeṣaṇe viśeṣye buddhiranupravartate .
pṛthagvibhinnarūpau darśayati . tadvyākhyā --svabhāvaḥ sambandhaścetyādi gatārthaṃ yāvad dravyaguṇakarmasu
sat iti bhavati, svarūpasattā nārthāntaramapekṣate sambandhasattā tvapekṣata ityarthaḥ .
na tu bhavatyevetyādi . na tu bhāvaḥ sattā san, dravyaguṇakarmavat sanna bhavati sadbhāvasāmānye'pi
bhāvānāṃ pratisvaṃ svabhāvabhedāt, dravyaguṇakarmasadvaidharmyāt sanna bhavati na dravyaṃ bhavati na ghaṭādirbhavati,
dravyatvaghaṭatvādisambaddhadravyādighaṭādivad na sa dravyādi bhavatītyarthaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? sattāsvatattvāsamavāyāt, sattāsamavāyo dravyatva-guṇatva-karmatva-ghaṭatvādisvatattvasamavāyo vā sattāyā yato nāsti, te
hi dravyādayaḥ sattāsvatattvasamavāyāt saddravyaghaṭādivyapadeśārhā bhavantīti . eṣo'pi viśeṣaḥ kimarthaṃ
sattāsvatattvasamavāyād dravyādi sad bhavati na punardravyādisamavāyāt sattādisvatattvāni dravyādīni
bhavanti iti cet, ucyate--svarūpasattayā satāmapi sāmānya-sāmānyaviśeṣa-viśeṣa-samavāyānāmasattvāt
svasadbhāvādeva satāṃ sambandhasadbhāvaśūnyānāṃ sattādīnāmitarebhyo viśeṣaḥ, sa tu sambaddhadravyādīnāmastīti darśayati --daṇḍavat tvarthāntaretyādi gatārthaṃ yāvad viśeṣye buddhiranupravartate
iti . viśeṣaṇasvarūpapratyayanimittatvād viśeṣaṇānāṃ sattādisambandhānurūpapratyayahetutvaṃ sāmānyādīnāṃ
svāśrayeṣu daṇḍanimittadaṇḍipratyayavat dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ na tvagṛhīte viśeṣaṇe, śvaityādiviśeṣapratyayasya

evameva hyubhayasyaivobhayaprādhānyasyāpi vidhiḥ, na tu dravyakriyayoḥ ubhayaprādhānyābhāvāt tathābhūtārthaviṣayatvāt sannidhānasya vyakterapi tadbhavanatantratvāt .
gaganādiṣvatatsambandhiṣvabhāvavaditi . evameva hyubhayasyaivobhayaprādhānyasyāpi vidhiryathāsmābhiruktaḥ
tathaiva sāmānyasya viśeṣasya ca vidhiḥ sambhavati, atyantaviśeṣarūpatvāt padārthaṣaṭkabhedānām, tathā
sāmānyaviśeṣadvayavidhirapi bhavitumarhati, na tu pūrvanayeṣṭo dravyakriyayoḥ, ubhayaprādhānyābhāvādasvātantrye kartṛtvābhāvāditi . asmābhistvadanukampayā abhyupagate'pi kartṛtve svatantrabhavanātmake dravyasyaiva
prādhānyamiti tadvidhānāt kriyāyāḥ prādhānyāvidhānāt, bhaved dravyaṃ kartṛ svātantryāt, na kriyā
prādhānyābhāvāt ityevaṃ yuktyā prāpte'pi tvadanukampayā tayoḥ kartṛtve vābhyupagate'pi na bhavitumarhati
ubhayaprādhānyābhāvādityarthaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇamubhayaprādhānyaṃ nāsti iti cet, ucyate --tathābhūtārthaviṣayatvāt sannidhānasya, dravyaṃ hi sannihitabhavanamiṣyate tathātathābhavadbhāvābhimukhasannihitaghaṭādibhavanagehavat,
gehasannihitaghaṭavat sarvathā teṣāṃ kriyāvyaṅgyābhimatānāṃ dravye sannidhānābhyupagamāt pradīpeneva gehe
sannihitānāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ kriyayā na kiñcit prayojanam, sambhāvyamānamapi prayojanamabhivyaktimātraṃ syāt,
tasyā vyakterapi tadbhavanatantratvāt dravyabhavanasyaiva pradhānasyopakāramātrārthatvād vyakteraprādhānyamiti .

ayaṃ tūbhayapradhānavidhiḥ--ārabdhānārabdhadravyāṇāṃ svabhāvabhedād viśeṣaḥ,
bhāvasattvasya atyantavyañjanasvātantryādanyathābhūteḥ . pṛthivyudakatejovāyvākāśa-
ayaṃ tūbhayapradhānavidhiriti nigamanam . tuśabdo viśeṣaṇārthaḥ, evaṃ hyasau viśiṣṭārthādhikārāparityāgenaiva sāmānyaviśeṣayorvidhiriti . kīdṛśa iti cet, tannidarśayati --ārabdhānārabdhetyādi saprabhedasaṭpadārthaparasparānyatvapradarśanārtho grantho yāvat karmaṇi tu svabhāvasambandhasadbhāvābhyāmiti prāyo
gatārthaḥ, tathāpi kiñciducyate--pārthivādiparamāṇudvyaṇukādyārabdhānāmapi svabhāvabhedād deśakālābhede'pi
nānātvam, paramāṇvākāśādīnāmanārabdhānāṃ ca tata eva, bhāvasambandhābhivyaṅgyābhede'pi sati ārabhyāṇāṃ
ca kādācitkatvāditareṣāṃ nityatvād viśeṣaḥ . bhāvasattvasya sattāsattvasya svabhāvasadbhāve'pi viśeṣaḥ,
kasmāt ? atyantavyañjanasvātantryāt, itare vyajyante sa tu vyanaktyeveti . anyathābhūteḥ, evamanyena
prakāreṇa bhavanāt sarvatra sannihitameva bhavati ityabhāvāt anyathābhūteriti . yadyevaṃ bhāvavyañjanāsvātantrye
satyeva na syāt, naiva syāt sattā sambandharahitatvāt khapuṣpavat, bhāvo hi sadbhāvasadvyañjanasvātantryābhāvāt
khapuṣpavad na syāditi . pṛthivyudaketyādi . etānyapi dravyāṇi itaretarābhāvātmanā na santi, asatāmeva

kāladigātmamanodravyāṇāmitaretarāsatāmeva bhāvādisambandhāt tathā tathānyatā,
anyatve eva asati sattvam . guṇakarmaṇorapyevameva . na cāsyānyasmāt sadabhidhānapratyayau svaparaprakāśahetutvāt pradīpavat, svasadbhāvena sata evāsattvaṃ sambandhasadbhāvābhāvāt, aguṇaguṇavat . evaṃ sāmānyaṃ sāmānyameva . kāryadravyādīnāṃ svabhāvasadbhāvo
na bhavatīti bhavatyeva . kiñcit tu bhavatyeva bhavati paramāṇvākāśakāladigātmamano-
sattāsambandhāt sattvaṃ bhavati dravyatvasambandhād dravyatvaṃ bhavati . tataśca sattāto dravyatvāccānyonyataśca tena
tena prakāreṇānyatā, anyatva evetaretarāsatāṃ bhāvādisambandhādanyatva eva asati sattvamanyatva
eveti . guṇakarmaṇorapyevameveti, bhāva-guṇatva-karmatvādibhiḥ sambandhāditaretarāsatāmeva sadguṇakarmatvāni .
evaṃ bhāvo'satāṃ sambandhāt sattvaṃ janayati dravyādīnāmityuktam, tathā kiṃ bhāvasya sambandho'nyena
janyate ? netyatrocyate --na cāsyetyādi . sa hi svayaṃ sambandhādanyeṣāṃ sadabhidhānapratyayaheturnānyasmāt sadabhidhānapratyayau labhate, svaparaprakāśahetutvāt, pradīpavat, na hi pradīpo ghaṭādiprakāśanasamarthaḥ svaprakāśane
ghaṭādīnapekṣate tathā sattāpi . tasmāt tasya svabhāvasadbhāvena sata evāsattvaṃ sambandhasadbhāvābhāvāt,
netaretarāsattvāt, yathā guṇo'guṇaḥ iti nāsya guṇo'stītyaguṇa ucyate guṇaḥ, na tu guṇo na bhavatīti .
kasmāt ? guṇāntarasambandhābhāvāt, na svayamaguṇatvāditi . evaṃ sāmānyaṃ sāmānyameveti gatārtham,
evaṃ tāvat svata eva bhāvaḥ sattāntarānapekṣaḥ san . yo'pyasau svabhāvasadbhāvaḥ kāryadravyādīnāṃ parato bhāvasambandhādādheyastasmādevāsanniti na, kiṃ tarhi ? tanna bhavatīti bhavatyeva, abhūtvā bhāvāt bhūtvā
cābhāvāt kāryasya svasadbhāvenaivāsat sad bhavati sadapyasad bhavatīti tasya svasadbhāvasya kāryasya sadasadbhāvadvairūpyaṃ tadatatsamarthavikalpatvāt, ekapuruṣapitṛputratvādivaditi bhāvitameva . tasmāt sarvamanyathānyathaiva sāmānyaviśeṣātmakaṃ bhavati . kiñcit tvityādi . idaṃ punarbhavatyeva bhavati svasadbhāvādeva
nābhūtvā na sattāsambandhāt paramāṇvākāśakāladigātmamanodravyādi, ādigrahaṇāt samavāya

dravyādi . viśeṣe'pyubhayatā sāmānyaviśeṣāntyaviśeṣābhyām . karmaṇi tu svabhāvasambandhasadbhāvābhyām .
ayaṃ ca naigamaikadeśatvād dravyāstikaḥ . dravyamapi dravyatvasambandhāt . jātiḥ
vibhuparimaṇḍalaparimāṇaguṇādi . sarvatra cetaretarāsattvānyathātvamiti viśeṣaḥ, svabhāvasattvaṃ sāmānyam .
viśeṣe'pyubhayateti sāmānyaviśeṣā dravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvādayaḥ, antyaviśeṣā yogināmekākāśadeśasthāṇvanyatvakarāḥ . karmaṇi tu svabhāvasadbhāvena karmatvasambandhasadbhāvena cetarebhyo bhedābhedau . evaṃ
dravyaguṇayordravyatvaguṇatvasambandhasadbhāvāt svabhāvasadbhāvāccetyevamādisādharmyavaidharmyābhyāṃ ṣaṭsu padārtheṣu
viśeṣā eva vaiśeṣikaṃ viśeṣaprayojanaṃ vā vaiśeṣikamiti vidhiniyamayorvidhirupapadyate, na tu tvadiṣṭaikavastuvidhiniyamavidhiriti .
atrāha--kimayaṃ dravyāstikabhedaḥ paryāyāstikabhedaḥ ? iti, ucyate --naigamaikadeśatvād dravyāstikaḥ,
dravyamastītyasya matiḥ, na pūrvavad dravyamevāsti, nāpyuttaravat sadasad nāstyeva vā dravyamiti . naigamaśabdo
niruktārthabhedaḥ, teṣu dravyamapītyādi dravyatvasāmānyaviśeṣaviśeṣaṇasambandhād dravyam, na bhavyadravaṇaguṇasandrāvasamudāyādyātmakam .
jātiḥ śabdārtha iti . sarvaśabdānāṃ jātivācitvameva, ākāśādīnāmapi jātivajjātiḥ iti

śabdārthaḥ . antyaṃ ca padaṃ vākyārthaḥ .
upacārāt . antyaṃ ca padaṃ vākyārthaḥ, yathā devadattaḥ kāṣṭhaiḥ sthālyāmodanaṃ pacati ityatrāntyena pacati--
padavyaṅgyena saha parasparasaṃsargalakṣaṇasyānvayavyatirekavato'rthasya paripūrṇatvāt . sa ca vākyārthaḥ pūrvapadajñānāhitasaṃskārāpekṣo'ntyapadapratyayaḥ, pratyekaṃ padairhi svāṃśārthaviṣayairutpāditāni vijñānāni saṃskāramādadhati,

ato'ntyapadajñānaṃ pūrvapadajñānasaṃskāraparipākavaśāt sambandhyantaravyavacchedi parasparasaṃsargaviṣayamupajāyate iti

asya nirgamasūtram--imā ṇaṃ bhaṃte . rataṇappabhā puḍhavī kiṃ sāsatā, asāsatā ? gotamā !
siyā sāsatā siyā asāsatā . se keṇaṭṭheṇaṃ bhaṃte ! evaṃ vuccati--siyā sāsatā siyā asāsatatti ?
gotamā ! davvaṭṭhayā+e sāsatā, vaṇṇapajjavehiṃ gaṃdhapajjavehiṃ rasapajjavehiṃ phāsapajjavehiṃ saṃṭhāṇapajjavehiṃ
sambandho'nvayavyatirekavānantyapadārthavyaktirvākyārtha iti . yathāha—
nādairāhitabījāyāmantyena dhvaninā saha .āvṛttaparipākāyāṃ buddhau śabdo'vadhāryate ॥ vākyapa॰ 1 . 84 iti .
sa ca kṛtasaṅgītereva padādiśabdārthajñasya puruṣasya pratyayaheturvākyārthaḥ śabdo vā, nākṛtasaṅgīteḥ, mlecchaprayuktaśabdārthāparijñānavat .
naitāḥ svamanīṣikā ucyante, kiṃ tarhi ? asya nayasya yato nirgamastannirgamasūtram--imā ṇaṃ bhaṃte
rataṇappabhetyādi yāvat saṃṭhāṇapajjavehiṃti . etamevāgamaṃ bhedavacanāditi hetutvenāha nayacakrakāraḥ,

asāsatā jīvājīvābhi॰ 3 . 1 . 78 iti bhedavacanāt . varṇādiparyāyādiṣu varṇaḥ paryavaḥ
samantād bhavitā ekavākyabhāvāt varṇasyaiva parito bhavanād gamanācca . varṇebhya
vyācaṣṭe ca --varṇādiparyāyādiṣvityādi . paryāyaśabdasya parigamanārthasya paryavaśabdasya bhāvavācino grahaṇād
varṇādiparigamanāni yasmin samantato bhāvo vā, avaterdhātorbhāvārthasya rakṣaṇādidaṇḍake pāṭhāt, varṇādaya
eva paryāyāḥ paryavā iti karmadhārayo vā sarūpaikaśeṣatvāt saṅgṛhītasamāsadvayatvāt, samantād gamanatvāt
samantād bhāvitvācca paryāyāṇāṃ paryavāṇāṃ ca, atra kenārthena paryāyaparyavārthayorekasyoktau dvitīyasyāpi saiva
niruktiḥ ? iti manyamāna āha --varṇaḥ paryavaḥ samantād bhavitā ekavākyabhāvāt dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ
saprabhedānāṃ sattāsamavāyasambandhapradhānānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭarūpāṇāmekavākyabhāvāditi, bahuvrīhiṃ darśayati --varṇasyaiva
parito bhāvād gamanācceti .
kathaṃ punastatparigamanaṃ paryavanaṃ ca ? iti tad bhāvayituṃ sopapattikaṃ sanidarśanamāha --varṇebhya
evetyādi yāvad gṛhyanta iti . varṇebhya eva rūpādibhyo guṇāntaraṃ citravarṇo raktaśyāmapāṇḍvādiḥ

eva varṇāntaraṃ tadārambhaniyamādeva pṛthivyādiṣu bhavati samantād gacchati vā . tāni
prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsātmakāni gṛhyante, tasmāt tairvarṇādiparyavairaśāśvatī, varṇa eva ca
paryavo guṇaḥ yathāsambhavaṃ śyāmādiḥ saṃyogavibhāgapṛthaktvaparatvāparatvādiśca, taiḥ
pākajo vā tadārambhaniyamādeveti, yathoktam --yeṣāmadhikṛtamārambhasāmarthyam   iti, pṛthivyādiṣu
varṇāntaraṃ bhavati samantād gacchati vā . tāni varṇādiparyavāḥ paryāyā vā ghaṭādīni vā dravyāṇi
ārabdhāni tairapyanyārabdhadravyāṇi prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsātmakāni varṇādyanātmakānyeva mṛtpiṇḍādyavasthānāni
ghaṭādīni kapālādīni ca gṛhyante . tasmāt taiḥ prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsātmakairghaṭādyātmabhūtairvarṇādiparyavairaśāśvatī
kāryakāraṇabhūtairityarthaḥ . karmadhāraye vā varṇa eva ca paryavo guṇo yathāsambhavamityādi, guṇā ime, taiḥ
aśāśvatī iti ca vartate varṇādiparyavairiti sambandhaḥ . yathāsambhavamārabdhānārabdhadravyagatāḥ kecicchyāmādayo'nārabdhacaturvidhāṇugatāḥ tadārabdhadravyāntare kāraṇaguṇapūrvāścaturvidhe, pārthiveṣveva raktādyāḥ pākajāḥ,

gandhādibhiśca . śāśvatī dravyārthataḥ . iti ṣaṣṭho vidhiniyamavidhyaraḥ .
saṃyogavibhāgau sakriyeṣu, pṛthaktvaṃ sarvadravyeṣu, paratvāparatve digdeśakālāpekṣe talliṅge, ādigrahaṇād gandhaśabda-jñānādayo'sādhāraṇaguṇāḥ pṛthivyākāśātmādīnām, ekatvādisaṅkhyāḥ sarvadravyasādhāraṇā eva, gandhādibhiriti tṛtīyānirdeśādebhiścāśāśvatī . śāśvatī nityā rūpādimūrtisaṃsthānasāmānyadharmairdravyārthato
ratnaprabhetyarthaḥ .
iti ṣaṣṭho nayo naigamabhedo dravyāstikāntaḥpātī parisamāpta itiśabdasamāptyarthatvāt, vidhiniyamavidhyara iti nāmanirdeśo'yaṃ nayacakravibhāgavinyastaścakrāra ivāra iti .



ayaṃ ca ṣaḍbhedo dravyāstika upavarṇitaḥ . eṣu ca paryavaśabdo bhāvavacanaḥ,
paryāyaśabdaḥ samantādgativacanaḥ . viśeṣeṇa tu yathādarśanameva vidhyādiṣu pratyekaṃ
vyākhyātasvarūpabhedamanugantavyaṃ sarvagatisāmānyamatyajadbhiḥ . dravyaśabdārthastatra
tatra vyākhyāta eva .

ayaṃ cetyatītān pañcaitaṃ ca ṣaṣṭhaṃ sampiṇḍya ekasya triśatabhedasya saṅkṣepeṇa ṣaḍ bhedāḥ, tatra 1vidhiḥ
2vidhividhiḥ 3vidhividhiniyamaṃ 4vidhiniyamaḥ 5vidhiniyamaṃ ṣaṣṭhaścāyaṃ 6vidhiniyamavidhiriti ṣaḍbhedo
dravyāstika upavarṇitaḥ, ṣaḍapyete bhedā dravyāstikasyaivetyarthaḥ .
eṣu ca ṣaṭsu nayeṣu paryavaśabdo bhāvavacanaḥ samantād bhavanāt paryavaḥ sarvātmanā bhavanāt .
paryāyaśabdaḥ samantādgativacanaḥ, samantād gamanāt paryāyaḥ, dravyasya varṇādyātmanā parito gamanāt .
ayaṃ ca vigrahārthaḥ ṣaṇṇāmapi sāmānyena draṣṭavyaḥ, viśeṣeṇa tu yathādarśanameva vidhyādiṣu pratyekaṃ vyākhyātasvarūpabhedamanugantavyaṃ sarvagatisāmānyamatyajadbhiḥ, sarvasya sarvātmakatvāt ekasya sarvātmakatvāt ekaikasya
sarvātmakatvāt sarvasya caikaikātmakatvāt sarvagatimeva yathādarśanamāha . dravyaśabdārthastatra tatra vyākhyāta eva
yathādarśanaṃ dravyaprādhānyāt, paryāyopasarjanādihānte paryāyaśabdo vyākhyātaḥ .
iti dravyārthanayavikalpāḥ samāptāḥ ॥




oँ arham

atha saptama ubhayobhayāraḥ .

yadyasat kāryaṃ notpadyeta asannihitabhavitṛkatvāt khapuṣpavat . khapuṣpamapi
votpadyeta asannihitabhavitṛkatvāt kāryavat .
khapuṣpasattvasyāśrayo nāstīti cet, na, itaratrāpi tulyatvāt . ghaṭasya
mṛdo'tattvād ghaṭādisattvasyāpyāśrayo nāstyeva utpatsyamānasya asataḥ sattāsamavāyitvāt .

idānīṃ paryāyanayaprathamaśirāpradidarśayiṣayā anantaranirdiṣṭavaiśeṣikobhayavidhinirācikīrṣayā cottaraḥ
samanantarānulomatvāt pūrvaviruddhatvānnivṛttaniranuśayatvācca nayānāmasatkāryavādameva dūṣayitumāha --yadyasadityādi . āstāṃ tāvadasmanmatam, pūrvanayamatenaivaitat tvaddarśanamanupapannamiti brūmaḥ, dravyārthikanayānāṃ sannihi tabhavitṛkabhavanābhyupagamād nāsat kāryamutpattumarhati, asannihitabhavitṛkatvāt, khapuṣpavat . khapuṣpamapi votpadyetāsannihitabhavitṛkatvāt kāryavat . ṣaṭpadārthasaṃsargavādasya sattāsamavāyabalena pravṛttatvāt
sattāsamavāyonmūlanāt tantrasyaivonmūlanamityabhiprāyeṇāyaṃ sattāsamavāyavicāraprastāva iti .
khapuṣpasattvasyāśrayo nāstīti cet . syānmatam--kāraṇadravyeṣvāśrayabhūteṣu satsveva sattāsamavāyāt kāryaṃ prāgasat paścādutpadyate, khapuṣpaṃ tu nirāśrayatvād notpatsyate kāryavaidharmyāditi . etacca na,
itaratrāpi tulyatvāt, kāryamapi hi nirāśrayamasattvādeva khapuṣpavat, ato na kaścit kāryakhapuṣpayorvi-
śeṣaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? ghaṭasya kāryasya mṛdo'tattvāt, mṛddravyasya piṇḍādirūpairbhavitṛṇo na tattvaṃ tvanmate
piṇḍādi kāryamasattvāt . tasmād ghaṭādisattvasyāpyāśrayo nāstyeva khapuṣpādisattvasyeva . tvanmatenaivotpatsyamānasya piṇḍaghaṭādeḥ kāryasya niḥsattāsamavāyasyā'sataḥ sattāsamavāyitvāt sattāsamavāyitvābhyupagamāt utpannaṃ hyāśrayamāśrayantyāśrayiṇaḥ sattādayaḥ   iti siddhāntāt tasyāṃ hyavasthāyāṃ

athāśrayisamavāyādṛte'pi kāryaṃ svenaivāstitvenotpannamāśrayo bhavati khapuṣpavaidharmyeṇa, evaṃ tarhi tasya svata eva sataḥ kiṃ tadatiriktasattāsambandhakalpanayā prayojanam ? kāryakhapuṣpayorāśrayakṛtaviśeṣābhāvo vā . yadyasat sad bhavati, viśeṣaheturvaktavyaḥ--khapuṣpaṃ kasmānnotpadyate ? ghaṭādi kasmādutpadyate ?
athocyeta--kāraṇavadakāraṇaviśeṣāt . yadyakāraṇaṃ notpadyate tatpuruṣavācyaṃ
tataḥ kāryaṃ notpadyata eva kāraṇamevotpadyate iti sa eva kāraṇavādaḥ parigṛhītaḥ
syāt . atha bahuvrīhisamāsāśrayaṇam, tannotpadyate'vidyamānakāraṇatvād ghaṭavat;
svayamasataḥ kāryasyāśrayatvābhāvāt khapuṣpamutpannamāśrayantvāntyāśrayiṇa ityaho paramatākiṅkaratvaṃkiṃkatvaṃ bhavatāmiti .
sattāyāḥ samavāyābhāve ca kutaḥ kāryotpattiḥ ? iti .
athāśrayītyādi . athaitasmāt khapuṣpatulyatvāpattidoṣabhayāt sattāyā āśrayiṇyāḥ samavāyādṛte'pi
sat kāryaṃ tadāśrayabhūtaṃ svenaivāstitvena svabhāvasattayaivotpannamāśrayo bhavati kadācidapyanutpatsyamānasya
khapuṣpasya vaidharmyeṇetīṣyate, tata evaṃ tarhītyādi, iṣyata evaitadasmābhiḥ svenaiva mahimnā tat sat iti,
na tu tvayā . tvayā caivamasmābhiriveṣyamāṇe kharaviṣāṇādyasadvilakṣaṇasya tasya kāryasya svata eva sataḥ kiṃ
tadatiriktasattāsambandhakalpanayā prayojanam ? na kiñcit tena kalpitenetyarthaḥ, sattāsambandhānarthakyam,
ataḥ sarvadravyaguṇakarmādikāraṇasamavāyikāryasaṃsargavādo nivartate tasmādeva . tadaniṣṭānabhyupagame yo mayā
prāguktaḥ kāryakhapuṣpayorāśrayakṛtaviśeṣābhāvo vā, tatra tulye tayorasattve kāryamevotpadyate khapuṣpameva
notpadyata iti ko viśeṣahetuḥ ? tadvyaktiḥ --yadyasadityādi gatārthaṃ yāvad ghaṭādi kasmādutpadyata iti,
ityataḥ kāryakhapuṣpayoraviśeṣadoṣastadavasthaḥ .
athānyathaitaddoṣaparihārārthamucyeta--kāraṇavadakāraṇaviśeṣāt, yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sakāraṇaṃ ghaṭādi
khapuṣpamakāraṇamityasti viśeṣaḥ, kāraṇaiḥ samavāyyasamavāyibhirghaṭādi sambadhyate na tu khapuṣpādīti . sa
eva svābhiprāyaṃ vivṛṇoti --yadyakāraṇaṃ notpadyate tatpuruṣavācyamiti na bhavati kāraṇamityakāraṇam
itthaṃ tatpuruṣasamāsaścediṣṭaḥ tataḥ kāryaṃ notpadyata eva kāraṇamevotpadyate, tasyaiva vidhividhyādiprācyanayadarśanāt kāryatayotpādāt sa eva kāraṇavādaḥ parigṛhītaḥ syāt, sa ca mayā neṣṭaḥ . tasmāt
tatpuruṣe naiva vicāraḥ kāryaḥ . atha yasya na kāraṇaṃ tadakāraṇamiti bahuvrīhisamāsāśrayaṇaṃ tannotpadyate
kāryaṃ tasyāṃ bahuvrīhikalpanāyāmavidyamānakāraṇatvāt khapuṣpavat . ghaṭavaditi vaidharmyam, yathā ghaṭa utpadyate
na tatheti . tataḥ kim ? tato'nutpannatvāt tadanāśrayaḥ sattāyāḥ, sattānāśrayatvāt tatsambandhābhāvācca na

evaṃ tarhi sarvāsattvaprasaṅgaḥ paramāṇvādīnāmakāraṇatvādanutpannatvādanāśrayatve sattāsamavāyābhāvaḥ, teṣāṃ hyāśrayatve sattvasamavāya iṣṭaḥ, tataḥ sattāsamavāyābhāvāt
kāraṇānāṃ paramāṇvādīnāmabhāvāt kāryasya kāryasamavāyināṃ ca khapuṣpād na
kaścid viśeṣa iti sarvaśūnyateti sarvavirodhāḥ .
athocyeta--nityotpannatvāt svasadbhāvenaiva santi paramāṇvākāśādīni, kāryadravyaguṇakarmaṇāmeva sattāsamavāyāt sattvamiti . evaṃ tarhi ākāśaparamāṇvādiṣu
anupanipātisvarūpatvādātmābhedācca na kenacit sambandho'syāḥ syāt . asati ca
sambandhe yathā sattā satī eva padārthatvāt svarūpasadbhāvācca tathā tānyapi dravyaguṇa-
satkāryamiti . atrocyate --evaṃ tarhi sarvāsattvaprasaṅga ityādi yāvat sarvaśūnyateti sarvavirodhā
iti . paramāṇavo'kāraṇatvād viyadādīni ca notpadyante, anutpannatvādanāśrayaḥ sattāyāḥ, tadanāśrayatve
sattāsamavāyābhāvaḥ, teṣāṃ hyāśrayatve sattvasamavāya iṣṭa iti tadvaidharmyaṃ darśayati . tataśca sattāsamavāyā-
bhāvāt khapuṣpavat kāraṇānāṃ paramāṇvādīnāmabhāvaḥ, tadabhāvāt kāryamakāraṇatvādanādhāraṃ kva samavaitu ? tasmāt
kāraṇāsamavāyitvāt khapuṣpāt tasya na kaścid viśeṣaḥ, ataḥ prāguktāviśeṣadoṣastadavasthaḥ kāryasamavāyibhiḥ
paramāṇubhiḥ sahitasya kāryasyedānīṃ prāpitastvayaiva, kārye samavetānāṃ rūpādighaṭatvādyutkṣepaṇādīnāṃ kāryasamavāyināṃ ceti vigrahāntarāt . tataḥ kimiti cet, ucyate --iti sarvaśūnyatā, iti sarvabhāvā na santīti
bruvataḥ paramaśūnyavāditā bhavataḥ itiśabdanigamanārthatvāt . iti sarvavirodhāḥ, itthaṃ svavacanābhyupagamapratyakṣānumānarūḍhivirodhāḥ sarvāsadvādinaḥ pramāṇābhāvāt . kāraṇākāraṇakāryākāryavirodhāvirodhalakṣaṇabhedasūtrāṇāṃ
sadādyaviśeṣasūtrasya ca sattāsamavāyaprāṇotthānatvāt kimavaśiṣṭaṃ syācchāstrasya tannānātvaprayojanasya vaiśeṣikākhyasya kāryakāraṇakhapuṣpāviśeṣāditi .
itthaṃ prāgasataḥ sakāraṇasya kāryasya khapuṣpāviśeṣo mā bhūditi athocyeta--nityotpannatvādityādi . svasadbhāvenaiva santi pṛthivyādicaturvidhaparamāṇvākāśakāladigātmamanāṃsi dravyāṇi sattāsamavāyau
guṇāśca vibhuparimaṇḍalādayaḥ . kintu kāryadravyaguṇakarmaṇāmeva sattāsamavāyāt sattvamiti .
atrocyate --evaṃ tarhītyādi yāvat tatpadārthatvavaditi . yathākāśaparamāṇvādiṣu nopanipatituṃ śīlamasyāḥ
sattāyāstathā kāryadravyaguṇakarmasvapi sattāsvarūpatvādanupanipātisvarūpatvam, anupanipātisvarūpatvāccātmābhedastasyāḥ sarvaparamāṇvākāśādiṣvagaganādipadārtheṣvātmābhedācca na kenacit sambandho'syāḥ syāt . asati ca
sambandhe yathā sattā sattādravyatvaguṇatvādisambandhābhāve satyeva padārthatvāt svarūpasadbhāvācca svātmasvarūpaṃ
svātmani ādadhāti ityevaṃsvarūpā tathā sattādisamavāyamantareṇa tānyapi kāryadravyaguṇakarmāṇi bhavantu
ākāśaparamāṇvādivat sattāvacceti kiṃ tadvyatiriktasattādravyatvādisamavāyakalpanayā ? tasmāddhetuphalavandhya

karmāṇi bhavantu tatpadārthatvavaditi sattāsambandhāt santi dravyādīnītyayuktam .
tato'nupapannavikalpatvāt sattāsamavāyasya sattādravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvarūpatvādisambandhāt saddravyaguṇakarmarūpādaya ityādyaviśeṣa-lakṣaṇavirodhāvirodhārambhānārambhādiviśeṣadharmābhidhānamayuktaṃ sarvavākyānṛtatvavat .
tvādabhāvaḥ syāt sattāsamavāyayoḥ khapuṣpavaditi . iti sattāsambandhāt santi dravyādīni ityayuktam, tasmāt sattāsambandhād dravyaṃ sad guṇaḥ san karma saccetyayuktam . ādigrahaṇād dravyatvābhisambandhād dravyāṇi pṛthivyādīni, guṇatvābhisambandhād guṇā rūpādayaḥ, karmatvābhisambandhāt karmāṇi
gamanādīni ityayuktam, itiśabdasya nigamanārthatvād evaṃ tāvad yat pratyajñāsiṣmahi --asannihitabhavitṛkatvāt khapuṣpavat kāryamasaditi pūrvanayadarśanenaiva tadupāpīpadāmeti .
ita uttaramasmādeva nyāyāt kaṭandyāṃ ṭīkāyāṃ ca yat pūrvapakṣitaṃ tadeva samarthayitumāha --tato'nupapannavikalpatvādityādi uddeśavākyam . sattāsambandhāt santi, dravyatvād dravyāṇi, guṇatvād guṇāḥ,
karmatvāt karmāṇi, rūpatvād rūpam, ādigrahaṇāt pṛthivītvādibhyaḥ pṛthivyādayaḥ, rasatvādibhyo rasādayaḥ,
gamanatvādibhyo gamanādaya ityādi . kriyāvad guṇavat samavāyikāraṇaṃ dravyalakṣaṇam . dravyāśrayī
aguṇavān saṃyogavibhāgeṣvakāraṇamanapekṣa iti guṇalakṣaṇam . ekadravyamaguṇaṃ saṃyoga-vibhāgeṣvanapekṣaṃ
