dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmaviśeṣaḥ vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 7 iti ṣaḍaviśeṣamukhena viśeṣābhidhānaṃ sattāsamavāyabījaṃ sarvatra
tat sarvamayuktaṃ vaktum . kasmāt ? anupapannavikalpatvāt, sarvavākyānṛtatvavat, yathā sarvaṃ madīyaṃ
tvadīyamanyadīyaṃ ca vākyamanṛtam iti bruvāṇasya tasya vākyaṃ satyamanṛtaṃ satyānṛtaṃ vā syāt ? sarvathā
nopapadyate . yadi tad vākyamapyanṛtaṃ satyānṛtaṃ vā tataḥ sarvavākyānṛtatvapratipādanāsamartham svayamapramāṇatvāt, apramāṇatvamasatyatvāt . atha satyaṃ na tarhi sarvamanṛtam, tasya sarvāntaḥpātitvāt tatsatyatvavaccheṣasyāpi satyatvāt sarvathānupapannaṃ vākyamevaṃ sattāsamavāyāt sat ityādisadādyaviśeṣalakṣaṇavirodhārambhādi

iha prāk sattāsambandhāt satāṃ vā asatāṃ vā sadasatāṃ vā dravyādīnāṃ satkarī
sattā ? na tāvadasatāṃ satkarī sattā śaśaviṣāṇādīnāmapi satkaratvaprasaṅgāt .
nāpi satāṃ bhūtatvāt sattāvat prakāśitaprakāśanavaiyarthyavat . satāṃ ca punaḥ sattāsambandhāt sattvādanavasthāprasaṅgāt . prāk tat sattāsambandhāt kimātmakamiti
svarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ kāryam, anyathā'sattvāt . nāpi sadasatām, aikātmyānupapatteḥ
ghaṭakhapuṣpavat . ubhayadoṣaprasaṅgācca, yadasat tat kharaviṣāṇatulyam, yat sat tatra
sattāsambandho vyarthaḥ, sadasatorvaidharmyāt kārye sadasattā na vai॰ sū॰ 9 . 1 . 12 iti ca
tvanmatasiddhānupapattirevāyaṃ vikalpaḥ . tasmād vikalpānupapatterna sattāsambandho'bhidhānapratyayahetuḥ .
viśeṣadharmāpādanavākyāni nopapannāni, sarvapadārthānāṃ vaiśeṣikīyāṇāṃ sattāsamavāyamūlaviśeṣātmakatvād
dravyādikāryotpattivicāraprakṛteśca tadeva vicāryate tatprāṇatvād vaiśeṣikīyatantrasyeti .
syānmatam--kathaṃ punaranupapannavikalpatvaṃ sattāsamavāyasya ? iti, atrocyate --iha prāk sattāsambandhāt satāṃ vetyādivikalpatrayopanyāso gatārthaḥ, evaṃ bhavanmataṃ syāt . taduttaram --na tāvadasatāmityādi . laghutvādutkrameṇāsatāṃ sattāsambandhāt sadabhidhānapratyayapratiṣedhaḥ prāgiti .
nāpi satāmiti vaiyarthyāpādanaṃ bhūtatvāt sattāvaditi gatārtham . prakāśitaprakāśanavaiyarthyavaditi dvitīyamudāharaṇaṃ lokasiddhaṃ śāstrasiddhāt sattodāharaṇād bhedenopanyastamiti viśeṣaḥ . na vaiyarthyadoṣa
evāsmin vikalpe, kiṃ tarhi ? satāṃ ca punaḥ sattāsambandhāt sattvādanavasthāprasaṅgāditi, vidyamānānāmeva punarapi sattāsambandhāt sattveṣṭau sattāyā api tatsattvābhidhānapratyayakaryāḥ sattāntarasambandhāt
sattvam, tasyā api tathetyanavasthā syāt . kiñcānyat, prāk tat sattāsambandhādityādi yāvadanyathā'sattvāditi . tacca dravyādi pūrvaṃ sattāsambandhāt kimātmakam ? iti svarūpāvadhāraṇaṃ kāryam .
tasyāmavasthāyāṃ sattāsambandhaśūnyatvād naivāsti tat, anavadhṛtātmakatvāt, khapuṣpavat . anyathā'sa-
ttvāt anavadhṛtātmakatve tasyāsattvāditi .
nāpi sadasatāmiti tṛtīyavikalpasyottaram . aikātmyānupapatterityanekāntavādābhyupagamasya pūrvābhyupagamena virodhāt . athavā aikātmyānupapatteriti anārhatanayena prakāśatamasorivātyantavaidharmyāt sat
sopākhyam asad nirupākhyam tayoḥ sadasatorvaidharmyādekatra na yujyate sadasattvam . ghaṭakhapuṣpavaditi,
ghaṭaḥ sopākhyaḥ sattvāt, asattvāt khapuṣpaṃ nirupākhyamiti vaidharmyādekatvābhāvastayorevaṃ sadasadātmakaṃ
kāryamityayuktam . kiñcānyat, ubhayadoṣaprasaṅgācca . tadvyācaṣṭe --yadasat tat kharaviṣāṇetyādi
yāvat tvanmatasiddhānupapattirevāyaṃ vikalpa iti . asatpakṣe khapuṣpādaviśeṣaḥ, satpakṣe sattāsambandha

nanvaguṇādivad dravyādīnāṃ sattāsambandhaḥ pratiṣidhyate na tu svarūpasadbhāva
iti sattā naivāsatāṃ satkarī . eṣa vikalpo'nupapanna iti tvayaiva tarhi kṛtam . evamapi naivaitat, sattāsambandhāt prāk svabhāvasadbhūtakāryāsattvapratipādanadvāreṇāyaṃ
vicāraḥ prastuta eva .
nanu sa prāgviṣayāsatsatkaratve śaśaviṣāṇādisatkaratvaprasaṅgastadavasthaḥ,
dravyādīnāṃ svata evāstitve sattāsambandho vyarthaḥ syādato'satsatkaratvameva sattāyāḥ,
vaiyarthyam, sadasatorvaidharmyāt kārye sadasattā na vai॰ sū॰ 9 . 1 . 12 iti ca tvanmatāviruddhamevānupapannatvam . tasmād vikalpānupapatterna sattāsambandho'bhidhānapratyayaheturiti nigamanam .
āha --nanvaguṇādītyādi yāvad naivāsatāṃ satkarīti . astu tāvat satāmeva satkarī satā
nāsatām, yathā mathā prāgukto dṛṣṭāntaḥ svabhāvasadbhāvapratipādanārthaṃ bhāvasya yathā nāsya guṇo'stītyaguṇo
guṇa eva sannaguṇa ityucyate tathā svabhāvasadbhāvasanneva bhāvo nāstyasya sannityasannucyate na tu svayamasanniti,
tathā dravyādayo'pi santaḥ, teṣāṃ tu sattayā saha sambandhaḥ pratiṣidhyate na tu svarūpasadbhāva ityato
naivāsatāṃ satkarī sattā, kiṃ tarhi ? satāmeva . tasmādasatāṃ sattāsambandhānabhyupagamādadoṣa iti .
atrocyate --eṣa vikalpo'nupapanna iti tvayaiva tarhi kṛtam, evaṃ bruvatā tvayaiva tarhi asatāṃ
satkarī sattā na bhavati ityetadasmadanuṣṭheyamanuṣṭhitam, ato'sya siddhatvādatra vayaṃ niścitāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ .
api ca --evamapi naivaitadityādi . yadyapi mayā tvadanabhijñatākhyāpanārthamuktam--asatāṃ sattāsambandho
nāstīti . naitadapyevam . kintvasatāmeva sattāsambandhaḥ syād vā na vā ? iti vicāryam . kiṃ kāraṇamiti
cet, ucyate--śaśaviṣāṇādisatkaratvaprasaṅgaḥ . sattāsambandhāt prāk tadviṣayo dravyādi kāryaṃ tat
svabhāvenaiva kiṃ sat ? uta sattāsambandhāt sat ? ityetasmin sandehe svabhāvasadbhūtasya kāryasyāsattvapratipādanadvāreṇāyaṃ vicāraḥ prastuta eveti kathaṃ prastutaparityāgena parihāro yujyata ityabhiprāyaḥ .
api ca nanu sa prāgviṣayetyādi . yo'yamasmābhiḥ prāgudgrāhitaḥ yadyasat sad bhavati ityādinopapattigranthena
aguṇaguṇasthānīyasattāyā evābhāva iti yadyavidyamānaṃ dravyādiviṣayaṃ sattā svayamasatī santaṃ kuryāt śaśaviṣāṇādīn vandhyāputrādiḥ sataḥ kuryādityeṣa prasaṅga āpipādayiṣitastadavasthaḥ . etadanicchato dravyādīnāṃ
svata evāstitve sattāsambandho vyarthaḥ syādityeṣa vā doṣaḥ nirviṣayatvāt sattāsambandhasya, aniṣṭaṃ

taccāpyevamanupapannamasatsatkaratvam . yo'pi cāvayavārthavikalpeṣu antyo vyutpattivikalpaḥ so'pyevamanupapannaḥ .
na, sādhyenānabhisambandhāt... ... ...asādhanatvam . pratijñāviśeṣo vā... ...
prativiśiṣṭatvam . atha dravyādīnām... ... ...teṣāmasattvamasiddhaṃ dravyādyabhyupagame
sattvāt . prāgutpatteriti cet, siddhasādhanametat, tadā teṣāṃ sattāsambandhānabhyupagamāt .
nāsatā sambadhyate sattā viśeṣaṇatvād daṇḍavat . yathā viśeṣaṇasya daṇḍasya
nāsatā daṇḍinā sambandhastathā sattāyā api .
atha sambadhyate, sattāyā eva hi sāmarthyāt tasyā ādhārībhavati saddravyādi,
caitat . ato'satsatkaratvameva sattāyā ityeṣa eva vikalpo bhavitumarhati . taccāpyevamanupapannamasatsatkaratvaṃ vicāritavidhinetyupasaṃharati .
yo'pi cāvayavārthetyādi . anupapannavikalpatvāt ityasya sādhanasyāvayavārthāḥ satāmasatāṃ
sadasatāṃ vā dravyādīnāṃ satkarī sattā iti vikalpāḥ, teṣu nāsatāṃ satkarī ityasya vikalpasya upapāda-
nārthaṃ yāni sādhanāni vyutpāditāni pūrvapakṣīkṛtya vyāvartitāni ca, teṣu yo'ntyo vyutpattivikalpaḥ suṣṭhu
vyutpādya vyāvartitaḥ pūrvapakṣa ityabhimataḥ so'pyevamanupapanna iti vicāraparyantasyottarasyānupapattau tuṣakaṇḍavat sarvavicāranairarthakyāt pūrvapakṣa evottarapakṣo bhavatītyabhiprāyaḥ .
yat tāvaduktam --nāsatāmityādi pūrvapakṣo yāvat satkaratvaprasaṅgāditi atra prakrāntaṃ praśastamatinā —
na, sādhyenānabhisaṃbandhādityuttaraṃ yāvadasādhanatvamityeṣa prathamo vyutpattivikalpaḥ . pratijñāviśeṣo
vetyādi dvitīyo gatārthaḥ sottaro yāvat prativiśiṣṭatvam . atha dravyādīnāmityādistṛtīyaḥ sottaro
yāvat teṣāmasattvamasiddham, dravyādyabhyupagame sattvāditi . atra codyam --prāgutpatteriti cet,
prāgutpatterna santi dravyādīni, tasmādasattvaṃ siddhamiti . atrottaram --siddhasādhanametat, tadā teṣāṃ
sattāsambandhānabhyupagamāditi .
eteṣu triṣu vyākhyāvikalpeṣu asārabuddhyā nāsatā sambadhyate sattā, viśeṣaṇatvāt, daṇḍavat .
yathā viśeṣaṇasyetyādi sādhanavyākhyā yāvat sattāyā apīti .
atha sambadhyata ityādinā yāvat tadavastha iti pūrvapākṣika eva paramatamāśaṅkyottaramāha --atha
tava matamasadapi dravyādi sambadhyate sattādheyasvarūpatvāt tatpratipādyasattvāt sattāyā eva hi hetubhūtāyāḥ

tadvacchaśaviṣāṇādibhirapi sambadhyeteti śaśaviṣāṇādīnāmapi satkaratvaprasaṅgastadavasthaḥ . na, śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantanirātmakatvānabhyupagamāt kāryadravyaguṇakarmaṇām .
nanu asat ityatra naña uttarapadābhidheyanivāraṇārthatvāt satpratiṣedhārthatvāt
kathamasya sātmakatvam ? na, anekāntāt, aputrabrāhmaṇavadaguṇaguṇavat . yathā nāsya
putro'stītyaputro brāhmaṇaḥ nāsya guṇo'stītyaguṇo guṇaḥ tathehāpi nāsya sadityasat .
na ca tadapi nirātmakaṃ śaśaviṣāṇavat, sattāsambandhādṛte'pi yathā parapakṣe pradhānādīnāṃ sātmakatvaṃ tathehāpi syāt .
tvatpakṣe dṛṣṭāntābhāva iti cet,...... sāmānyādivadvā,.........sāmānyādivadeva
sāmarthyāt tasyā ādhārībhavati saddravyādīti . etadapi nopapadyate, yasmāt tadvacchaśaviṣāṇādibhirityādi gatārtham . evaṃ vyutpādya pūrvapakṣaṃ praśastamatirāhātrāpyuttaram --śaśaviṣāṇādivadatyantanirātmakatvānabhyupagamāt . keṣām ? kāryadravyaguṇakarmaṇām . dvividho hi bhāva uktaḥ svabhāvasadbhāvaḥ
sambandhasadbhāvaśca itaretarāsatāṃ sātmakānāmeva saviśeṣaṇāsattvādananyacandrādivadityādi pūrvam .
tasmācchaśaviṣāṇādīnāmevātyantāsatāmasattvam, na prākpaścāditaretarādyasatāmanātmakatvam . ato dravyādi
sat, tattu svakāraṇeṣu samavetaṃ vastveva, sattāsambandharahitamapi sātmakameva, na kharaviṣāṇādivad nirātmakam .
tasmād yuktaḥ sattāsambandho dravyādīnām, na khapuṣpādīnāmiti .
atrāha --nanvasadityādi yāvat kathamasya sātmakatvamiti dravyādernirātmakatvāpādanārtho grantho
gatārthaḥ uttarapadābhidheyanivārakatvāt satpratiṣedhārthaḥ, satpratiṣedhārthatvādanātmakamiti . atrottaram --na,
anekāntādityādi yāvat tathehāpi nāsya sadityasaditi laukikaśāstrīyadṛṣṭāntadvayena vyabhicārapradarśanārtho bahuvrīhisamāsāśrayeṇa aputrabrāhmaṇavadaguṇaguṇavaditi ca gatārtho granthaḥ . evamanātmakatve'sthite
tasyā vyabhicāra ucyate --na ca tadapi nirātmakamityādi, vaidharmyeṇa śaśaviṣāṇavaditi . sattāsambandharahitatvād nirātmakaṃ kharaviṣāṇavadityetat sāṅkhyabauddhakalpitapradhānapuruṣapañcaskandhavat syāt . athavā
sattāsambandhāt sātmakamityevamucyamāne pradhānādivat sattāsambandhādṛte'pi sātmakatvadarśanādityavyāpitā
tathehāpi syāditi .
tvatpakṣe dṛṣṭāntābhāva iti cedityādi pūrvapakṣīkṛtya taduttaram --sāmānyādivadvetyārabhya yāvat
sāmānyādivadeva sātmakaṃ na ghaṭādivat sātmakamiti vāśabdāvadhāraṇārthatvavyākhyānasahito granthaḥ
vaiśeṣikapakṣe sattāsambandharahitasātmakadṛṣṭāntābhāve codite sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ sātmakatvavat syāditi

sātmakaṃ na ghaṭādivat sātmakam . sāmānyādīnāṃ sātmakatvamasiddhamiti cet,
na, svarūpabhinnatve sati abhinnavāgbuddhivyavahāraviṣayatvād yad viśeṣaṇaṃ tat
sāmānyam .
atrāpyuttare bahveva sampradhāryam, atyantanirātmakatvānabhyupagamāt iti vacanena sadasattvayorapi vikalpavattvaṃ varṇyate--kiñcitsat samastasaditi, evamasadapi .
saṃpūrṇaniratiśayasvātmana eva tu sattvād nirūpyam--katamat tat kva vā kiñcitsattvamasattvaṃ vā ? etarhi nirūpyate--nanvidameva tadekasattāsadasadapi asamarthagavavat .
gatārtham . sāmānyādīnāṃ sātmakatvamasiddhamiti cediti dṛṣṭānte sādhyadharmāsiddhicodanā . tatparihāraḥ —
na, svarūpabhinnetyādi yāvad viśeṣaṇaṃ tat sāmānyamiti dṛṣṭāntasādhanam . chatravastrakambalādiviśeṣaṇaiśchatrivastrikambalināṃ sātmakairātmarūpapratyayakarairviśeṣaṇatvavat svarūpabhinnatve sati abhinnavāgbuddhivyavahāraviṣayatvād viśeṣaṇaṃ sāmānyaṃ sātmakaṃ cetyantamuttarametaditi .
atrāpyuttare vahneva sampradhāryam, asmān pratyetadapyuttaraṃ na niścalamevetyabhiprāyaḥ . yasmādetadapyuttaraṃ dravyādīnāṃ śaśaviṣāṇavadatyantanirātmakatvānabhyupagamabalena saprasaṅgamutthāpitaṃ śaśaviṣāṇādīnāmapi
satkaratvaprasaṅgastadavasthaḥ ityataḥ prabhṛti samānapracarcam, anyadapyatra vakṣyāmaḥ --atyantanirātmakatvānabhyupagamāt ityanenaiva tāvadvacanena sadasattvayorapi vikalpavattvaṃ varṇyate, dvidhā sat--kiñcitsat samastasaditi, evamasadapītyābhyāṃ vikalpābhyām . sampūrṇaniratiśayasvātmana eva tu sattvāt, tuśabdaḥ
paramatavyāvartanārthaḥ, yadyapi mataṃ parasya--sadasatorvikalpavattvamastu, ko doṣa ? iti, tanna bhavati, sat
sattaraṃ sattamamiti sato'tiśayābhāvāt kuto vikalpaḥ sattve ? tasmāt sampūrṇameva sattvamevamasattvamapi .
tato nātyantānātmakaṃ sātmakaṃ ca ityayuktaṃ vaktumityabhiprāyaḥ . astu vā vikalpavat sattvamasattvaṃ ca, tat
punarnirūpyaṃ tvayā katamat tat svarūpataḥ kva vāśraye kiñcit sattvamasattvaṃ vā ? iti vikalpyam .
atrāha --etarhi nirūpyate, kimatra nirūpyam ? nanvidameva tadekasattāsadasadapi, ekayā
svabhāvasattayā sat tadevāsat sambandhisattayeti . tatastat kiñcitsat kiñcidasat . kimiva ? asamarthagavavat, yathā gokāryāsamartho gaureva sannagaurityucyate nāsau gaurna bhavati tathedamapi dravyādi sadevāsaditi .

evaṃ tarhi sāmānyasattāyāḥ sattā avyaktiḥ kiñcitsatī na sampūrṇā satī
ekasadbhāvatvāt svasattāvat, svabhāvasadbhāvatvāt asamavetasattākāni dravyādīni
yathā . sā asarvagatā ca vyaktireva vā na bhavati ekajātīyāpetasvarūpatvāt ghaṭavat .
ubhayāsampūrṇatāyāṃ ca tad na sat asattvāt khapuṣpavat, nāsat sattvād
ghaṭavat, na sadasat sadasattā'bhāvāt . sadasadvaidharmyanirākaraṇāyaiva tu prāya iyaṃ
pratipattirbhavataḥ .
atra brūmaḥ --evaṃ tarhītyādi . sāmānyākhyāyāḥ sattāyāḥ sāmānyasattāyāḥ sattā, sā
cāvyaktiḥ dravyādivyaktirahitā kiñcitsatī, na sampūrṇā satī svabhāvasattāmātreṇa satī sambandhisattayā
na satī, satī cāsatī ca vikalpavatītyarthaḥ . kasmāt ? ekasadbhāvatvāt, yadekasattayā sat tat saccāsacca dṛṣṭam, tadyathā --svasattāvat, yathā dravyādi svabhāvasattayā sadekayā sambindhisattayā asat tathā
mahāsattāpi syāditi . eṣa eva hetvartho'nyayā vācocyate --svabhāvasadbhāvatvāt, asamavetasattākāni
dravyādīni yatheti gatārthametadaniṣṭāpādanam . sā sāmānyasattā asarvagatā ca svaviṣayasarvagatā na
bhavatītyetadapi doṣāpādanam, na sarvasvaviṣayānuvṛttirityarthaḥ . vyaktireva vā dravyādivyatiriktā na
bhavatīti doṣāpādanapratijñāntaram . ubhayatraika eva hetuḥ --ekajātīyāpetasvarūpatvāditi, ekaprakāramekajātīyam, prakāravacane jātīyar pā॰ 5 . 3 . 69, na tu jātyantāccha bandhuni pā॰ 5 . 4 . 9, mā
bhūd dravyatvasattādivadanaikāntikatvam . tata ekajātīyādapetaṃ vyāvṛttaṃ svarūpaṃ yasyāḥ sā ekajātīyāpetasvarūpā, tadbhāvādekajātīyavyāvṛttasvarūpatvād ghaṭavat sajātīyāsajātīyavyāvṛttasvarūpatvādityarthaḥ .
yathā ghaṭa ekaprakārebhyo vyāvṛttasvarūpo deśakālavarṇākārādibhirviśiṣṭatvād ghaṭāntarasvaviṣayavyāpī ca na
bhavati vyaktireva ca na bhavati tathā sattāpi syāditi . tasmādayuktamasamarthagavavadekasattāsadasattvaṃ dravyādestathā sattāyāśceti .
itaścāyuktam, vakṣyamāṇadurnirūpavikalpatvāt khapuṣpavadasattvādityanupapannavikalpatvahetorevaitāni
vyākhyānāntarāṇi . tadyathā --ubhayāsampūrṇatāyāṃ cetyādi . vastuno dravyādeḥ sāmānyasya vā sattvenāsattvena ca kiñcitsamastatvābhyāmasampūrṇatāyāṃ punarapi tad nirūpyameva kiṃ sadasampūrṇam, utāsat, āhosvit
sadasat ? iti . tatra yadi tāvat sat tat sad na bhavati, kasmāt ? asattvāt khapuṣpavat, ubhayā

yo'pi cāsacchabdasya nāsya sadityasadaguṇaguṇavat satsattāsambandharahitamityarthaḥ so'pyanupapanno vikalpaḥ kṛttaddhitāntarūpārthaviprakṛṣṭāntaratvāt .
atha nāsya saditi sattāpi svabhāvasattayā satī yasya nāsti tadapyasad
dravyādi ucyate gurutvā bhāvād guṇāgurutvavat . etadeva nanu prastutam, sadādayaḥ
ṣaḍaviśeṣā dravyādīnāmeva trayāṇāṃ na sāmānyādīnāmityuktvā sāmānyādīnāṃ
sattvamucyamānaṃ sadityasaditi ca svavacanavirodhāya .
sampūrṇatvābhyupagamād nāsiddhamasattvamasattvasyāpīṣṭatvāt . nāsat na ca tadasat sattvād ghaṭavat,
sattvamapi nāsiddhamubhayāsampūrṇatveṣṭereva . na sadasat, nāpi tat sadasadubhayarūpamityarthaḥ, tvanmatenaiva
sadasatorvaidharmyāt kārye sadasattā na vai॰ sū॰ 9 . 1 . 12 iti vacanāt . kiñcānyat, sadasattābhāvāt,
yathā sattāsambandhāt sad bhavati tathā sadasattāsambandhāt sadasat syāt asattāsambandhādasad vā syāt,
na caivaṃ bhavitumarhatyadṛṣṭāniṣṭatvāt . tasmādasattā'bhāvāt sadasattā'bhāvācca na sadasad nāsadasampūrṇamiti .
ahaṃ punarevaṃ tarkayāmi tvayā nopalakṣitā sadasadvaidharmyanirākaraṇāyaiva tu prāya iyaṃ pratipattirbhavataḥ
kiñcitsat samastasaditi tathā kiñcidasat samastāsaditi bruvataḥ, ubhayāsampūrṇatāyāṃ tadeva saccāsacceti
sadasatoḥ sādharmyameva, na vaidharmyamiti pratipannatvāditi .
kiñcānyat, naita eva doṣāḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? yo'pi cāsacchabdasyetyādi yāvat satsattāsambandharahitamityartha iti pūrvapakṣapratyuccāraṇam . yo'pyasau nāsya sadityasadaguṇaguṇavaditi tasya bahuvrīhisamāsāśrayāt sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyaiḥ sadbhiḥ śūnyaṃ sattayā na sambaddhaṃ tasmādasacchabdasya sadarthavācitvameveti
vikalpa iti . tatrottaramucyate --so'pyanupapanno vikalpaḥ kṛttaddhitāntarūpārthaviprakṛṣṭāntaratvāt,
bhavatyasti veti sat kṛdantarūpam, arthaścāsya dravyabhūtaḥ, sato bhāvaḥ satteti taddhitāntaṃ rūpam, arthaścāsya
yasya guṇasya bhāvād dravye śabdaniveśastadabhidhāne tvatalau pā॰ vā॰ 5 . 1 . 119 iti sato'sādhāraṇaṃ
svarūpaṃ sadantaravyāpi sāmānyaṃ ceti śabdato'rthataścātyantabhedādanayoḥ kathaṃ sattā sat syāt yadabhāvād
nāsya sadityasad dravyādi bhaṇyeta ? evaṃ tāvat saduktau naiva sattoktiḥ .
atha nāsya sadityādi . atha mā bhūcchabdārthaviprakṛṣṭatvāt kṛcchabdena taddhitārthānabhidhānācchabdārthasaṅkaradoṣa iti sattāpi svabhāvasattayā satī tasyāḥ sattvāt, sā yasya nāsti tadapyasad dravyādi
ucyate, yathā guruguṇābhāvādaguru dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma cocyate gurutvābhāvād guṇāgurutvavat tathā sadabhāvasattābhāvatulyatvādasadityucyamānamadoṣamiti .
atrocyate --etadeva nanu prastutam, sadanityaṃ dravyavat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavaditi
dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmaviśeṣaḥ vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 8 iti sadādayaḥ ṣaḍaviśeṣā dravyādīnāmeva trayāṇāṃ na sāmānya

yattu sat tatsamavāyikāraṇaṃ tadasyāstyeva, tat kimiti matvoktaṃ nāsya sat
tadidamasad dravyādi kāryamiti ? yattvasya nāsti samavetaṃ tadapekṣya na yuktaṃ vaktuṃ
nāsya sat tadidamasat iti . taddhi sadeva na bhavatyāvayorapi matena . kiṃ tarhi ?
nāsyāsat tadidamanasat . na hi khapuṣpaṃ yasya nāsti so'sannityucyate, saṃstu
satvāṃśca niyamād bhavati pratiṣedhadvayārthatvāt .
viśeṣasamavāyānāmityaviśeṣābhidhānadvāreṇa trayāṇāṃ tribhyo nānātvaṃ parasparataśca lakṣaṇādinā vyācikhyāsitaṃ bhavatā . asmābhiśca dravyavyatiriktaguṇādyabhāvāt sāmānyādyabhāvācca sattvenāviśeṣa eva, viśeṣe
vānyatarad dravyāditrayaṃ sāmānyāditrayaṃ vā khapuṣpatulyaṃ syādityāsañjitaṃ proktadvāreṇa vādaprastāvāditi .
tatra sadādiṣaḍaviśeṣo dravyāditrayaviṣaya eva na sāmānyāditrayaviṣaya ityuktvā sāmānyādīnāṃ sattvamucyamānaṃ sadityasaditi ca svavacanavirodhāya sadā maunavratiko'smi iti vacanavat .
yattu sadityādi . yat tu satyaṃ mukhyaṃ sat tatsamavāyikāraṇaṃ dravyādikāryasyāśrayaḥ paramāṇutantukapālādi ghaṭapaṭādipariṇāmikāraṇaṃ tadasyāstyeva bījabhūtaṃ sādhayiṣyamāṇaṃ tat, tat kimiti
matvoktaṃ matvarthasattvādinā bahuvrīhiṇā nāsya sadasti tadidamasad dravyādi kāryamiti ? tasya
mukhyasya sato'stitvādayuktaṃ vaktum, na ca sad na bhavatyasat iti tatpuruṣeṇa dravyādikāryasyāsattvāditi vā .
nanūktam--sāmānyaṃ samavāyisat, tadasya nāsti yatsambandhād dravyādikāryaṃ sadvyapadeśaṃ labhate
iti tadapekṣayoktam asat1 iti . atrocyate --yattvasya nāsti samavetamiti sāmānyaṃ tadapekṣya na
yuktaṃ vaktuṃ nāsya sat tadidamasat iti . yasmāt tat sadeva na bhavatyāvayorapi matena, tvanmatena
tāvat sadaviśeṣābhāvāt sāmānyāditrayasya dravyādereva sadādyaviśeṣāt, asmanmatena dravyādivyatiriktasāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāsattvādeva tasyaiva vivādasya prastutatvāt tasyāsattvād dravyādi kathaṃ nāstyasya sat
tadidamasat iti bahuvrīhiṇā vaktuṃ śakyam . kiṃ tarhi yuktaṃ vaktum ? nāsyāsat tadidamanasaditi,
tasmādasad yasya nāsti tat sadeva anasadityarthaḥ . tannidarśanam --na hi khapuṣpaṃ yasya nāsti so'sannityucyata iti, sāmānyāpekṣayā napuṃsakanirdeśe prāpte puṃliṅganirdeśo'rthasāmānādhikaraṇyāduttānārthaḥ . saṃstu
satvāṃśca niyamād bhavati, sannasyāstīti satvān yathā gaurasyāstīti gomān bahuvrīhiḥ sadapekṣa eva
satyevārthe yujyate nānyatheti tathā tatpuruṣe'pi yojyametadeva vaidharmyanidarśanam . kasmāt ? pratiṣedhadvayārthatvāt, yathā pratiṣedhadvayamarthavadeva dṛṣṭam anaguḥ iti tathā dviḥ pratiṣedhasya prakṛtyarthāpatteḥ nāsyāsat
ityukte satvāneva bhavitumarhati, nāsan sadarthatvāt .


nanu dvividhabhāvatvāt sattvāsadvacane'pi na doṣaḥ . nanu tadevedaṃ bhavanaṃ vicāryate, tasyaiva dvaividhyasyāsmān pratyasiddhiḥ, uktavat .
kasmāt khapuṣpaṃ dalamakarandādiṣu kāraṇeṣu na samavaiti ? adravyatvāt abhūtatvāt asannihitatvāt . kasmāccampakapuṣpaṃ tu samavaiti ? taddravyatvādeḥ .
yathā ca dravyādīni prāk santi sattayābhisambadhyante tathotpattyavasthāyāḥ

atrāha --nanu dvividhabhāvatvāt sattvāsadvacane'pi na doṣaḥ, svabhāvasat sambandhisaditi ca
dvividhaṃ saduktam, tasmāt sattāyāḥ sāmānyākhyāyā api svabhāvasattvamastīti nāsya sat tadidamasaditi
vaktuṃ yujyata eveti .
atrocyate--nanu tadevedaṃ bhavanaṃ vicāryate, kimekavidhameva niratiśayamasmanmatavat ? uta tvanmatavat
kiñcitsat samastasaditi svabhāvasat sambandhisaditi ca ? tasyaiva dvaividhyasyāsmān pratyasiddhiḥ . sattāsambandharahitatvamapi sattopapattirahitatvameva . uktavat, yathānantaramevoktam--na kiñcitsat samastasannāma svabhāvasat
sambandhasannāma veti vikalpajātaṃ sato'stīti . athavā khapuṣpamapyasannihitabhavitṛkatvāt kāryavad bhavedityatītaṃ sarvamevoktaṃ tat sampūrṇaniratiśayaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ cetyetasya pratipādanārthamiti .
atra kenacit pṛcchyeta --kasmāt khapuṣpaṃ dala-kesara-makarandādiṣu kāraṇeṣu na samavaiti ?
iti . vayamatropapattiṃ bramaḥ --adravyatvāt nirbījatvādityarthaḥ . dravyaṃ sāmānyamāśraya ityādiparyāyāḥ .
kasmād nirbījam ? iti cet, abhūtatvāt, atīte'dhunānāgate kāle na bhūtaṃ hi tat, bhūtaśabdasya
trikālavācitvādākāśabhūtavat, asattvādakāraṇatvādakāryatvādityādyarthaḥ . tat kuta iti cet, asanni- 
hitatvāt, yat satataṃ bhavati tat sannihitam, sannihitameva hi bhavati, asannihitaṃ naiva bhavati, vandhyāputra
iva vandhyāyāṃ bījādhānādibhāvenāsannihitaḥ . athavā adravyatvādasannihitatvādabhūtatvāditi paryāyaśabdā eveti .
punaḥ pṛcchet kaścit --kasmāccampakapuṣpaṃ dalādiṣu tu samavaitīti . tuśabdaḥ khapuṣpādasya
viśeṣaṃ darśayati . atrocyate viśeṣaḥ --taddravyatvāderiti ta eva hetavastulyavyākhyānāḥ . eṣa khapuṣpacampakapuṣpayorviśeṣo'sattvāt sattvācca bhavati . iyaṃ ca bhāvābhāvayoḥ praśnopakramā svarūpaviśeṣavyākhyā .
yathā ca dravyādīni prāk santītyādi . atrānumānam--yasyāmavasthāyāmutpannamātrāṇi dravyādīni
santyeva sattayābhisambadhyanta itīṣyante tasyā avasthāyāḥ prāgapi santīti pratijñā . tasyāmavasthāyāṃ sattayābhisambadhyamānatvāt, yasyāmavasthāyāṃ sattayābhisambadhyante tasyā avasthāyāḥ prāgapi santyeva dṛṣṭāni
yathā utpattyuttarakālaṃ sattayābhisambadhyamānāni utpattyavasthāyāṃ tānyeva . tathotpattyavasthāyāḥ prāgapi
syuriti abhūtakriyāguṇavyapadeśamutpattyavasthamapi kāryaṃ tataḥ prāgapi sat sattayā sambandhitvāt tatkāla

prāgapi syuḥ sattāsambandhitvāt bhavanāt idānīṃ bhāvāt ākāśavat . idānīmapi
sattayā na sambadhyeta kāryam . prāgasattvāt khapuṣpavat .
anyathābhūtatvād neti cet, anyathābhavane'pi tadananyathābhavanameva
mṛttantvāditadbhāvānatikramāt sajātīyāsajātīyetarasvabhāvabhūtatvāt sucirādapi
tattattvāt dṛḍhībhūtaghaṭavat .
yadapi coktaṃ nāsya putro'stītyaputra iti putrāntarasambandhaḥ pratiṣidhyate iti
idamapi nātigamitārtham, atrāpi hi putrāntarasambandho na pratiṣidhyate naña uttarapadābhidheyanivāraṇārthatatpuruṣasamāsasambhavasāmarthyāt, bahuvrīhāvapi putrātmatva-
dravyādivat . kimuktaṃ bhavati sattāsambandhitvāt iti ? ata āha --bhavanāt, abhūtakriyāguṇavyapadeśābhimatāvasthaṃ kāryaṃ tataḥ pūrvamapi vastusvarūpameva, nābhāvaḥ, idānīṃ bhāvāt ākāśavaditi
tadvyaktyartham . idānīmapi na sattayā sambadhyeta kāryam, prāgasattvāt, khapuṣpavaditi viparyayeṇāniṣṭāpādanasādhanam . bhavadeva hi bhavati gaganavat, nāvidyamānamaśvaviṣāṇavaditi .
anyathābhūtatvād neti cet, pratyakṣaṃ tantubhyo'nyathā paṭabhavanāt pratyakṣaviruddhaṃ prāgapi sat kāryam
iti vacanamiti cet, tad na, pratyakṣamanyathābhavane'pi tadananyathābhavanameva pratyakṣataḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ?
mṛttantvāditadbhāvānatikramāt anatikrāntatadbhāvatvādityarthaḥ . dṛḍhībhūtaghaṭavaditi dṛṣṭānto vakṣyate .
hetorasya vyākhyā --sajātīyāsajātīyetarasvabhāvabhūtatvāt, ghaṭasya sajātīyāni ghaṭāntarāṇi, asajātīyāni paṭādīni, tebhya ubhayebhya itaraḥ anyo ghaṭaḥ sajātīyāsajātīyabhinno deśakālākārapramāṇarūpādibhedāt . nanvevaṃ sajātīyāsajātīyabhinnatve svakāraṇebhyo'pi bhinnatvāt prāgasattvameva prāptaṃ kāryasyeti .
etaccāyuktam, svabhāvabhūtatvāt iti viśeṣyoktatvāt svasamavāyikāraṇabhūtaparamāṇudvyaṇukādirūparasādyātmakapariṇāmasvabhāvenaiva bhūtatvāditi tadbhāvānatikrama evaivaṃ vyākhyāto bhavati . kiñcānyat, sucirādapi
tattattvāt; deśakālākārādibhede satyapi mṛdaḥ piṇḍādyavasthāsu mṛdavasthāgatarūpādisvarūpānativṛtteḥ paramāṇurūpāditattva eva ghaṭaḥ, tasmādanyathābhavane'pi tadananyathābhavanameva . kimiva ? dṛḍhībhūtaghaṭavat,
yathā mālavanagare ghaṭo dṛḍhībhūta ārdrādi-sāmiśuṣka-nava-yuva-madhyama-purāṇādyavasthāsu anyathābhavane'pi
ghaṭatvamanatikrāman saptasu varṣaśateṣu nīteṣvapi sa eva tathā bhavati evaṃ tadapi kāryaṃ dravyādīti .
kiñcānyat, yadapi cetyādi pūrvapakṣapratyuccāraṇaṃ yāvat pratiṣidhyata iti . taduttaram --idamapi
nātigamitārthamityādi yāvat sambhavasāmarthyāditi . tad vivriyate--yadapi sata evāsattvapratipādanārthaṃ
dṛṣṭāntatvenoktam--nāsya putro'stītyaputraḥ, na tu putro na bhavatīti, tasyānyaputratvāditi . tadapi nātigamitārthamiti dākṣiṇyavacanametat, mā niṣṭhuraṃ vocamiti . kathamagamitārtham ? yasmādatrāpi putrāntara

meva pratiṣidhyate nañā ataddravyatvāt svayaṃ putrībhāvapariṇāmaśūnyatvāt khapuṣpavat .
tathā cānvāha--aṅgādaṅgaṃ sambhavasi hṛdayādabhijāyase . kauṣītakibrā॰ 2 . 7
sambandho na pratiṣidhyate, anyasya svāmiputrāderdṛṣṭatvāt tasya putro'stīti bahuvrīhisamāsārthasya pratyakṣaviruddhasyāsambhavāt . kiṃ tarhi vaktavyam ? naña uttarapadābhidheyanivāraṇārthatatpuruṣasamāsasambhavasāmarthyāt, yathā bhikṣāṃ dehi iti gṛhabahirantaḥsthayoryācakadāyakayoryācñādānasambhavavat ko bhikṣāṃ
dadāti ? iti praśne pratyākhyānadānasambhavavat gavākṣe gāvaḥ ityādityakiraṇasambhavavadvā uttarapadābhidheyasambhavaḥ svayamevāsau putro na bhavati ityuktaṃ bhavati, tacca vakṣyate . tasmād nāsya putro'stītyaputra ityayukto
dṛṣṭāntaḥ . abhyupagamya bahuvrīhiṃ bahuvrīhāvapi putrātmatvameva pratiṣidhyate nañā na putrāntarasambandhaḥ .
kasmāt ? ataddravyatvāt, tad dravyaṃ tat kāraṇaṃ tad bījaṃ pariṇāmi asya tadidaṃ taddravyam, na taddravyamataddravyam, tadbhāvādataddravyatvāt svayaṃ putrībhāvapariṇāmaśūnyatvāt svayaṃ svaputratvenānutpitsutvādityarthaḥ .
khapuṣpavaditi gatārtham . yathoktam --agaṇirūpitā agaṇipariṇāmitā agaṇisarīreti vattavvaṃ siyā
bhagavatīsū॰ 5 . 2 . 181 iti . tathā cānyo'pyanvāha--aṅgādaṅgaṃ sambhavasītyādi . tānyeva pituḥ

yadapyuktam aguṇo guṇaḥ iti tadapi guṇabhūto'yamartho na bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ?
svatantraṃ dravyameveti guṇasandrāvavāde guṇabhāvo guṇasya pratiṣidhyate na guṇasambandho
yugapadayugapadbhāvitā, bhavanalakṣaṇadravyatvāt, saṅgrahavādavadvā . tasmād bahuvrīhyasadapi
nāsat, sadeva .
svavacanavirodhādeḥ sadapyasat sattāsambandharahitatvāt . sattāsambandhena
śukrādyaṅgāni putrāṅgatvena pariṇamanti kṣīradadhitvavat . hṛdayādabhijāyase iti, prajñāpi saiva putrasya yā
pituḥ, aśvādiprajñāyā manuṣyādiṣvabhāvāt .
yadapyuktaṃ dvitīyamudāharaṇaṃ tatraiva aguṇo guṇaḥ iti śāstrīyaṃ tadapi guṇabhūto'pradhāno dravyāśrayī
upasarjana itīṣṭo'yamartho na bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ? svatantraṃ pradhānaṃ dravyameveti, uttarapadābhidheyanivāraṇārthatvād
nañaḥ . na tu nāsya guṇo'stītyaguṇo guṇaḥ, tasya hi rūpādeḥ parasparato'nyarasādiguṇakasya guṇasadbhāvāt .
sattvādervā guṇasandrāvavāde guṇavattvād guṇabhāvo guṇasya guṇatvameva pratiṣidhyate, na guṇasambandhaḥ . sa ca
dṛṣṭo guṇasambandhaḥ yugapadayugapadbhāvitā, yugapadbhāvitā rūparasagandhasparśasaṅkhyānādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ sambandhaḥ,
ayugapadbhāvimṛtpiṇḍaśivakasthāsakādīnāmayugapadbhāvitā, kṛṣṇanīlaśuklaraktādivarṇādibhedānāmayugapadbhāvitādi
śeṣaguṇānāmiti . tathā sattvādīnāmaṅgāṅgibhāvena yugapadbhāvitā, mahadahaṅkāratanmātrādīnāmayugapadbhāvitā
ceti . kasmāt ? bhavanalakṣaṇadravyatvāt, dravyaṃ ca bhavye pā॰ 5 . 3 . 104 bhavatīti dravyaṃ bhavyaṃ
bhavanasambandhayogyam, guṇāḥ sandrutyaiva tiṣṭhanti bhavanti dravantīti guṇayanti guṇyante drūyante jñāyante
cetyeka evārtha iti . saṅgrahavādavadvā, yathā vā saṅgrahanayavāde sarvasya sarvātmakatvāt ta eva rūpaparamāṇvādidravyaviśeṣāḥ svajātyaparityāgena yugapadayugapacca bhavanti dravanti drūyate bhūyate tairevetyuktam .
tasmād bahuvrīhyasadapi nāsat, sadeveti prastutopanayaḥ . yathoktam--atthittaṃ atthitte pariṇamatīti ṇatthittaṃ ṇatthitte pariṇamati bhagavatīsū॰ 1 . 3 . 32 iti . tasmāt sampūrṇaniratiśayaṃ sadasad
veti . tasmādasat kāryaṃ na sattayā sambadhyate satvābhāvādasampūrṇasadasattvābhāvādityuktam .
tathā svavacanavirodhādeḥ sadapyasaditi, yadapi sat iti dravyādi kāryamiṣṭaṃ tadapi svavacanavirodhāderdoṣādasadeva jāyata iti pakṣaḥ . svavacanādivirodhāścānumānavirodhadvāreṇaivodbhāvayiṣyante, tatra
tāvat tasyāsattve hetuḥ --sattāsambandharahitatvāt . sattayā sambandhamanubhūya sat ityabhidhānaṃ pratyayaṃ
ca labhate kāryam, viśeṣaṇasvarūpābhidhānapratyayabhāktvād viśeṣyasya, daṇḍanimittadaṇḍyabhidhānapratyayabhāgdevadattavat . sattāsambandhaśca sannihitālliṅgāt sadabhidhānapratyayadarśanādanumīyate, ataḥ sattāsambandhāt sad
bhavati ityuktaṃ bhavatīti paramatasamarthanameva tāvadetat . tasmāt sattāsambandhena bhāvyamānaṃ sad bhavati,


bhāvyamānaṃ sad bhavati, yacca bhāvyamānaṃ sad bhavati tadārambhakebhyo bhavati dravyādyārabdhadravyāntarādivad bhāvyamānabhavitṛtvāt .
sattāpi yadi dravyāderbhāvikā tataḥ kāraṇam, bhāvakatvāt, ārambhakavat .
sati sattāntarādhānād neti cet, na, tulyatvāt, evamapi kāraṇameva te sattā sati
sattāntarādhāyitvāt paṭasattādhāyitantusaṃyogavat, vṛttasattvātiriktasattvakāraṇa-
parata ātmānaṃ labhate na svata ityarthaḥ . tataḥ kim ? tata idaṃ bhavati --yacca bhāvyamānaṃ sad bhavati
tadārambhakebhyo bhavati kāraṇadravyādibhya ityarthaḥ . sādhyānugatasādhanavacanāt sādharmyadṛṣṭānta eṣaḥ,
tannidarśanaṃ hetunā'vyavahitaṃ pratipattilāghavārtham --dravyādyārabdhadravyāntarādivaditi, yathā dravyaguṇakarmabhirdravyaguṇāntarāṇyārabhyante, karma ca guṇaiḥ saṃyogavibhāgaprayatnagurutvasaṃskārādṛṣṭaiḥ, tathā sattayā
ārabhyate tat sat kāryam . heturatra bhāvyamānabhavitṛtvāditi vyākhyātārthaḥ . tasmāt tasyāmavasthāyāmasat tad dravyādikāryam . asat tat iti ca bruvataḥ svavacanavirodho'numānavirodhaśca, pratyakṣābhyupagamarūḍhivirodhā api yojyāstathaiva . evaṃ tāvad dravyādikāryamutpattyavasthāyāṃ svata evāsti
itīṣṭamapi sattāsambandhād bhavitṛtvāt asadeva ityuktam .
na kevalaṃ dravyamevāsat tadā, kiṃ tarhi ? sattāpi ca nāsti ityāpādayiṣyate hetusadbhāvena kāraṇatvādibhyaḥ . kāraṇatvāt tāvat --sattāpi yadi dravyādeḥ kāryasya bhavato bhāvikā tata uktavidhinā
kāraṇam, bhāvakatvāt bhāvayitṛtvādityarthaḥ, tasilādiṣvākṛtvasucaḥ pā॰ 6 . 3 . 35 iti puṃvadbhāvāt .
ārambhakavaditi paṭasya tantvādivaditi vakṣyate, iha tu sāmānyena yathārambhakāḥ paramāṇavastatsamavāyinaḥ
saṃyogavibhāgā adṛṣṭādiguṇāśca sāpekṣā nirapekṣāḥ kriyāścādṛṣṭādihetukāḥ kāraṇāni bhāvakāni yathāsambhavaṃ
dvyaṇukādikāryadravyāṇāṃ guṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ ca tathā sattāpi kāraṇamiti .
sati sattāntarādhānād neti cet . syānmatam--svayamutpanne samavāyyasamavāyikāraṇārabdhe
dravyādau kārye svabhāvataḥ satyeva sattāntaraṃ sambandhisattvamādhīyate tayā sattayā, tasmād nārambhikā sā,
anārambhakatvāccā'kāraṇamaṇvādivat, ato vaiṣamyaṃ dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayoḥ, bhāvakatvaṃ vā tasyā nāstīti .
etacca na, tulyatvādanantaroktadaṇḍyādivad viśeṣaṇasvarūpasadabhidhānapratyayānumitasattāsambandhanivṛtteḥ .
abhyupetyāpyabhāvakatvaṃ sati sattāntarādhāyitvaṃ ca sattāyāḥ evamapi kāraṇameva te sattā, sati
sattāntarādhāyitvāt, paṭasattādhāyitantusaṃyogavat, yathā tantubhiḥ parasparasaṃyogāpekṣairārabdhe paṭe
sati tatsaṃyogaḥ sattāsamavāyajaṃ sambandhisattvamādadhānaḥ kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ tathā sattāpi syāditi . syānmatam—
ārambhakāḥ paramāṇavo na saṃyogaḥ, tasmād vaiṣamyamiti . etaccāyuktam, saṃyogasyāpyārambhakatveṣṭeḥ kāraṇatvamātrasādhanād vā na doṣa iti . athavā vṛttasattvātiriktasattvakāraṇatvāt kāraṇameva sattā iti

tvāt tantvādivat . tathā ca dravyādyanyatamadeva tat .
ata eva ca nāsya sat tadidamasat iti svānvayavṛtti sattvavyatirekavṛtti ca
nirūpitamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ niṣkalaṃ sattvaṃ yasya tad dravyādi sidhyatyeva, tadarthamabhidhānapratyayahetunā anyena sattādinā nārthaḥ, svata eva siddhaprayojanatvāt . tatra
dravyādivyatiriktasya sadabhidhānapratyayahetoranavakāśaḥ svata eva siddhābhidhānapratyayatvāt, sattādivat, ākāśādivat . svagataputratvasaṃsiddhānvayavyatirekā-
vartate, yasmād vṛttasya niṣpannasya kāraṇāntaraiḥ svabhāvasataḥ tato'tiriktaṃ sambandhisattvaṃ karoti sattā
tasmāt kāraṇameva . ko dṛṣṭāntaḥ ? tantvādivat, yathā vṛttasattvaṃ tantutvaṃ tadatiriktapaṭasattvakaraṃ kāraṇaṃ
ca tathā satteti . athavā yathā vṛttasya tantubhirārabdhasya paṭasya janmottarakālamapi sattvaṃ kurvantastantava eva
saṃyogāpekṣāḥ kāraṇaṃ paṭasyeṣyante tathā sattāpi vṛttasattvātiriktasattvakaratvāt kāraṇameva syāt, ādigrahaṇāt kapālavīraṇādidravyāṇyudāhartavyānīti .
tathā ca dravyādyanyatamadeva tat, sāmānyaṃ sattākhyaṃ dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma vā, nānyat syāt .
yaddhi kāraṇaṃ tad dravyaṃ guṇaḥ karma vā, nāto'nyad dṛṣṭam, yathā tantavastatsaṃyogāśca tatkriyāśca . tasmāt
sāmānyaṃ sadanityaṃ dravyavat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavacca dravyādivat, ato dravyādīnāmeva sadādiṣaḍaviśeṣā iti vyākhyā vyarthā .
ata eva cetyādi . etasmādeva dravyādyanyatamasvarūpatvāt sattāyāḥ sāmānyākhyāyāḥ nāsya sat
tadidamasat iti vigṛhya asya ityanvayāt na iti ca vyatirekād dravyaguṇakarmākhyasya trayasya sato'vadhāraṇārthaṃ pratiṣedhavācinā nañā vyavacchedyaṃ sattvamabhyupagamya svānvayavṛtti sattvavyatirekavṛtti ca nirūpitamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ niṣkalaṃ paripūrṇaṃ svarūpato'vadhāritaṃ ca sattvaṃ yasya tad dravyādi dravyāntarādisadvyatirekeṇa svānvayena ca yathā vyākhyātaṃ sidhyatyeva . tasmāt tadarthaṃ dravyādyavadhāraṇārthamabhidhānapratyayahetunānyena sattādinā nārthaḥ na prayojanaṃ svata eva siddhaprayojanatvādityuktopasaṃhāraḥ .
atra pṛthak sādhanam --tatretyādi . dravyādivyatiriktasya sadabhidhānapratyayahetordravyādāvanavakāśaḥ, svata eva siddhābhidhānapratyayatvāt, yatra svata eva siddhābhidhānapratyayatvaṃ tatrānyasya
sadabhidhānapratyayahetornāvakāśo'sti yathā sattāsamavāyaviśeṣeṣviti . athavāśrayāśrayiṇoḥ pāratantryasvātantryavyākhyākusṛtipratyutthānaṃ mā kārṣīd vaiśeṣika iti nirāśaṅkamākāśādivaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, dikkālākāśadravyāṇi hi dikkālādimukhyasāmānyaśūnyānīti . athavā prastutodāharaṇameva dṛṣṭāntaḥ --svagatetyādi . anvaya

bhidhānapratyayo devadattaḥ putra eva sūnvanapekṣaputratvaḥ, evamatra svabhāvasiddhereva dravyāditvaṃ netarasattvāt . evaṃ sattānirākaraṇaṃ kṛtam . dravyatvādyapyevameva nirākāryaṃ
vyākhyātavat .
etena satsatkaratvapakṣe'pi sākṣātkṛtameva vaiyarthyam . yastu 'anavasthā na,
dṛṣṭāntāt . tadyathā--vācā gamite viniyogārtho na kṛta iti tadarthaṃ pradīpaprakāśa
upādīyate, tasyopādānaṃ na vyartham, na ca punastasyānyaḥ prakāśaḥ prakāśanārtha upādīyate, tathehāpi dravyādikāryeṇa upabhogakriyā nāsti ityasat aśaktasadasattvāt
vyatirekayuktāvabhidhānapratyayāvaśvarathavadanvayavyatirekābhidhānapratyayau, tau svagatena putratvena saṃsiddhau yasmin
so'yaṃ svagataputratvasaṃsiddhānvayavyatirekābhidhānapratyayo devadattaḥ putra eva sūnvanapekṣaputratvaḥ
svasūnumanapekṣya vyākhyātavidhinā puruṣāntarasya pituḥ putra eva sannaputraḥ svasūnvabhāvāditi yathā putra evāputra ityucyate . ityevaṃ dṛṣṭāntārthaṃ bhāvayitvā dārṣṭāntikamupanayati --atra svabhāvasiddherityādi . svabhāvasadbhāvasiddhereva dravyāditvam, netarasattvāt na sambandhisattvāditi, vicāraphalaṃ nigamyate --evaṃ sadaviśeṣavicāradvāreṇa sattāyā nirākaraṇaṃ kṛtam .
dravyatvādyapyevameva nirākāryam, dravyādyapyevameva dravyatvādinirapekṣamityatidiśati . dravyaṃ guṇaḥ
karma ityatrāpi dravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvasāmānyaviśeṣanirapekṣāvabhidhānapratyayau svata eva dravyādīnāṃ sulabhau
vyākhyātavaditi, tatrāpi tulyapracarcatvāt .
etena satsatkaratvapakṣe'pi sākṣātkṛtameva vaiyarthyam, nāsya sadityasatpakṣe yathābhihitaṃ
vicārāvasāne --nāsataḥ satkarī sattā saddravyādivyatiriktasya sattādravyatvādestatsadabhidhānapratyayahetoranavakāśaḥ svata eva siddhābhidhānapratyayatvāt sattādivaditi tathā tadeva satāṃ dravyādīnāṃ satkarī sattā
ityatrāpīti pratyakṣīkṛtamasmākaṃ tvayaiva vaiyarthyam, sattāsambandhasya svata eva siddhatvāditi .
yastvanavasthā netyādi yāvadarthavatprakāśanāvasthāvaditi pūrvapakṣapratyuccāraṇam . anavasthādoṣaparihārārthaḥ pratisamādhānavikalpaḥ --naiṣa doṣo dṛṣṭāntādityādi, dṛṣṭāntastadyathā--vācā gamite prakāśite
ghaṭa iti jñānamātrādhāne kṛte tāvatā jalādyāharaṇādikriyāviniyogārtho na kṛta iti tadarthaṃ ghaṭagrahaṇadhāraṇādyarthaṃ ca pradīpaprakāśa upādīyate, tasya vākprakāśādanyaprakārasya pradīpaprakāśasyopādānaṃ na
vyarthaṃ na ca punastasyānyaḥ pradīpo'nyo vā prakāśaḥ prakāśanārtha upādīyate . tasmāt tatraiva vyavasthitatvād nānavasthādoṣo'stītyeṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ . upanayaḥ --tathehāpi dravyādikāryeṇa vastūdbhūtiprakāśamātreṇa
svakāraṇotpāditamātreṇa vākprakāśitaghaṭasthānīyena dravyādeḥ kāryasyopabhogakriyā nāsti, puruṣopabhogārthāśca
sarvāḥ kriyā ityataḥ kāraṇādasat, aśaktasadasattvāt aśaktasya svakāryakaraṇe sata evāsattvāt,

kṣutpratīkārāśaktāsadvrīhivat, vicitropabhogasiddhyarthaṃ bhinneṣu abhinnābhidhānapratyayavyavahārasiddhyarthaṃ ca sattvaviśeṣaṇena sambandhaḥ arthavatprakāśanāvasthāvat'
iti pratisamādhānavikalpaḥ so'pyanupapanno'vasthādṛṣṭāntāsattvāt anekāntatvāt .
vākprakāśaprakāśakapradīpavat pradīpaprakāśasyāpi indriyaprakāśyatvāt tasyāpi
bahuprabhedopakaraṇaprakāśyatvāt teṣāmapi labdhiprakāśyatvāt labdherapyupayogaphalāyā-
aṅkurāvasthāyāmiva vrīherakaṭhināvasthāyāmiva vā kṣutpratīkārāśaktāsadvrīhivat . vicitropabhogasiddhyarthaṃ ghaṭapaṭakaṭādibhiḥ parasparavyatiriktairjaladhāraṇatvaktrāṇapracchādanādyupabhogasiddhyarthaṃ bhinneṣu ghaṭādiṣu
deśakālādibhiḥ samānajātīyeṣu abhinnābhidhānapratyayavyavahārasiddhyarthaṃ ca sāmānyānviteṣu sattvaviśeṣaṇena prakārāntareṇa saṃbandhaḥ, arthavata eva vākprakāśasya punaḥ prakāśane pradīpaprakāśasyeva vākprakāśitaghaṭaviṣayasyāvasthāvadanavasthādoṣābhāvavacceti yo'yaṃ pratisamādhānavikalpaḥ so'pyanupapanna ityādi
taduttaraṃ yāvat pradīpādiprakāśanavaditi . kasmādanupapanna iti cet, ucyate --avasthādṛṣṭāntāsattvāt, asāveva pradīpadṛṣṭāntaḥ avasthāvān ityabhimato'vasthāvān na bhavati, anekāntatvāt,
ekāntarūpo hi niścito'rtho dṛṣṭāntaḥ syāt syāt . tvadudgrāhitasyārthasya tu na hi vyarthatvaikāntānugataṃ
prakāśanam, yadi pradīpasya prakāśāntareṇa prakāśanaṃ vyarthaṃ syāt tatraivāvasthā syāt, sā tu nāsti . yasmād
vākprakāśaprakāśakapradīpavat pradīpaprakāśasyāpi indriyaprakāśyatvāt, indriyeṇa hi pradīpo'pi
prakāśyate vākprakāśaprakāśakapradīpavadindriyeṇānupalabdhasyāgṛhītasya ghaṭādervicitropabhogāsiddheḥ . kimindriye'vasthā syāt ? netyucyate, tasyāpi bahuprabhedopakaraṇaprakāśyatvāt, tadapi hīndriyaṃ nirvṛttyupakaraṇa

yogyātmopāttendriyaparyāptyākhyapudgaladravyaprakāśyamañjana-pādābhyaṅga-nasya-pathyabhojana-pradīpādibāhyadravyaprakāśyaṃ

jñānātmātmaprakāśyaṃ ca . tānyapi hi nirvṛttyupakaraṇatadyogyaparyāptidravyāṇyañjanādibāhyadravyāṇi cātmanyuditakṣīṇopaśāntāṅgopāṅganāmakarmodayajñānadarśanāvaraṇavīryāntarāyakṣayopaśamāpekṣātmalabdhiprakāśyāni, tasmāt

teṣāmapi labdhiprakāśyatvādanavasthā . sāpi labdhirātmanaḥ praṇidhānākhyena vīryeṇāpanīte jñānāvaraṇādikāluṣye jīvasyopayogalakṣaṇasya prasādamātraṃ jñānamupayogastena prakāśyate labdherapyupayogaphalāyāstatpra

statprakāśyatvāt tasyāpi bāhyopayogyadravyopayogaprakāśyatvādanavasthā . tasmāt
kāśyatvādanavasthā . tasyāpi matijñānopayogādārabhya yāvat kevalopayogasya bāhyopayogyadravyopayogaprakāśyatvādanavasthā . so'pi hi
jaṃ jaṃ je je bhāve pariṇamati pa+ogavīsasādavvaṃ .taṃ taha jāṇāti jiṇo apajjave jāṇaṇā ṇatthi ॥ āvani॰ 794
iti bāhyavastupariṇāmānurūpopyogāt tatprakāśya upayogo'pītyataḥ paraṃ punaruktaṃ bhavati prakāśyaprakāśaka

prakāśyaḥ prakāśaḥ atadrūpabhāvādhigamyatvāt . sattāpi ca dravyādyatadrūpapratyayena
prakāśyate vākprakāśāvagamitārthapradīpādiprakāśanavat .
pradhānamapi caivaṃ syād bhavatparikalpitā sattā viśvarūpopabhogapratipādanārthatvāt puruṣārthatvād guṇatrayavat .
kāryamapi te prāgapi sadeva prāpnoti, aśaktasadasattvenādhyāsyamānatvāt
satkriyamāṇatvāt, utpannamātradravyādivat . yadvā na tat satkriyate na bhāvyate vā
kenacidarthāntareṇa, sadbhūtatvāt, sattādivat . na tatsattā sattāntaramapekṣate sattātma-
cakrakarūpeṇa . tasmāt prakāśyaḥ prakāśaḥ prakāśāntaraprakāśyaḥ pradīpaprakāśo'pi, atadrūpabhāvādhigamyatvādityavasthādṛṣṭāntāsattvasamarthanopasaṃhāraḥ . sattāyāmapyanavasthāmatadrūpaprakāśyasādharmyādāpādayitumāha prastutāyām --sattāpi cetyādi . sattāpi cāśrayasya dravyāderatadrūpasya pratyayenātmānaṃ
labhate, tena prakāśyate, vākprakāśāvagamitasyārthasya pradīpādinā prakāśanavat, na svata evetyanavasthādoṣo'trāpi tadavasthaḥ .
kiñcānyat, pradhānamapi caivamityādi . sāṅkhyaparikalpitaṃ sakalajagatkāraṇaṃ pradhānādiparyāyaṃ syād
bhavatā vaiśeṣikeṇa parikalpitā sattā viśvarūpopabhogapratipādanārthatvāt puruṣārthatvād guṇatrayavat, yathā sattvarajastamonāmakaṃ puruṣārthaṃ pravartamānaṃ puruṣasya viśvarūpamupabhogaṃ pratipādayituṃ pravartamānaṃ
pradhānameva na tato'nyad vyatiriktaṃ kiñcit tadvikāratvādevaṃ sattāpi pradhānameva syāt . aniṣṭaṃ caitat .
kiñcānyat, kāryamapi ta ityādi yāvad dravyādivaditi . kāryamapi tava dravyādi janmakālāt
prāgapi sadeva prāpnotītyetadapyaniṣṭāpādanam . kathaṃ tantvādikāraṇāni prāgapyuttarakālabhāvyabhimatātmasambandhīni ? aśaktasadasattvenādhyāsyamānatvādityādihetavo gatārthā yāvat satkriyamāṇatvāditi .
utpannamātradravyādivaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ .
yadvetyādi . athaivaṃ neṣyate na tat satkriyate dravyādyutpannamātraṃ na bhāvyate vā kenacidarthāntareṇa, sadbhūtatvāt, sattādivaditi, ādigrahaṇād dravyatvādisāmānyaviśeṣa-viśeṣa-samavāyavat .

katvādatyantānupravṛttasattāvat . anarthasattā cānyatrānādheyā, tata eva, svasattāvat .
yadi tat kāraṇasamavetaṃ svata eva sanna bhavati asadeva tarhi tat, svato nirupākhyatvāt avyapadeśyatvāt tathā'viśiṣṭatvāt khapuṣpavat asat syāt . kāryamapi
vā prāk sadutpatteḥ, ebhya eva, utpannamātradravyādivat .
na tatsattā sattāntaramapekṣate, dravyādīnāmutpannānāṃ svabhāvasattā sambandhisattāṃ nāpekṣate sattāsambandharahitatve'pi sattātmakatvāt, atyantānupravṛttasattāvat mahāsāmānyavadityarthaḥ . anarthasattā, arthaḥ
iti dravyaguṇakarmasu saṃjñāniyamādanarthāḥ sāmānya-viśeṣa-samavāyāḥ, teṣāmanarthānāṃ yā sattā sāpi
cānyatrānādheyā anāśritetyarthaḥ . tata eva hetoḥ, svasattāvadityetānyaniṣṭāpādanasādhanāni .
punastatraiva doṣaḥ prakārāntareṇocyate --yadi tat kāraṇasamavetamityādi . yadi kāraṇeṣu samavetamātraṃ kāryaṃ svata eva sanna bhavati, sattāsambandhāt sad bhavati, sadeveti sadeva na bhavati, aguṇaguṇatvādivadasadapīti, yadyevamiṣyate tata evamāpannam --asadeva tarhi tat . kutaḥ ? svato nirupākhyatvāt,
nirupākhyatvāt iti siddhe svataḥ iti viśeṣaṇaṃ vedanādīnāṃ svasaṃvedyānāṃ nirupākhyānāṃ sattvāt tadvadanaikāntikatā mā bhūditi . taddhi vedanādyasādhāraṇarūpeṇa nirupākhyamapi svata eva vastvātmanaiva sāmānyātmanā
aṃśāntareṇa pararūpeṇa ca vyāvṛttena sopākhyamiti . tathā vividhaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ vā apadeśyo vyapadeśyaḥ, na
vyapadeśyaḥ prakārāntareṇa vedanādivad vyapadeśyo na bhavatītyarthaḥ, khapuṣpavailakṣaṇyena tathā'viśiṣṭatvāditi viśeṣaṇena hi sadādinā vastveva sāmānyāṃśādinā vedanādi sambadhyate nāvastviti evaṃ sādharmyāt
khapuṣpavadasat syāditi gatārtham . etadanabhyupagame kāryamapi vā prāk sadutpatteḥ, ebhya eva hetubhyaḥ
svato nirupākhyatvāt ityādibhyaḥ, utpannamātradravyādivat .


yadapi ca kartrādikārakavyāpāraphalamutpannaṃ vastumātramaśeṣaviśeṣaṇavinirmuktaṃ
kāraṇasamavetamityātmāvadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā coditaṃ vastumātrasya niratiśayatvāt
sattvādiviśeṣaṇasambandhaniyamānupapattiḥ iti tat tathaiva, sattādyasambandhāt kāraṇasamavetasarvakāryātiśayābhāvāt sattādiviśeṣaṇasambandhaniyamānupapattireva .
yattu pratyucyate--na, kāraṇasāmagrye viśeṣasadbhāvāt . yattulyajātīyāvayavārabdhaṃ vastumātraṃ kāryaṃ tad dravyatvena sambadhyate . yattu kāraṇaguṇārabdhaṃ vastumātraṃ
kāryaṃ tad guṇatvena sambadhyate . yat punargurutvādibhiḥ svāśraye svāśrayasaṃyogasahitairvā

yadapi ca kartrādītyādi . kartrādīnāṃ kārakāṇāṃ samavāyināmasamavāyināṃ ca mṛdādīnāṃ devadattadaṇḍādīnāṃ ca yo vyāpāraḥ sametya svakāryārambhaḥ, tasya phalaṃ ghaṭādi kāryamutpannaṃ vastumātram, tasyātmāvadhāraṇaṃ kāryamityataḥ prāgudgrāhitārthanirākāṅkṣīkaraṇārthamāha --aśeṣaviśeṣaṇavinirmuktaṃ sattva-dravyatvaguṇatva-karmatvādibhiḥ sarvairviśeṣaṇairvinirmuktaṃ sambandhisadbhāvaśūnyaṃ svabhāvasadbhāvamātraṃ yat taducyate kāraṇasamavetaṃ tadātmā itītthamātmāvadhāraṇaṃ kṛtvā svayameva yaccoditam--vastumātrasya niratiśayatvāt
sattvādidravyatvādiviśeṣaṇasambandhaniyamānupapattiḥ, na hi tasyāmavasthāyāmidaṃ dravyam, mayā dravyatvenātraiva nilayanīyaṃ na guṇakarmatvābhyām iti dravyatvasya nilayananiyamakāraṇaṃ nāsti, atiśayābhāvādeva .
tathā guṇatvakarmatvayorapi guṇakarmaṇoriti . tat tathaivetyādi tvaduktameva kāraṇamiti tadevoccārayati yāvadanupapattireveti . sattādigrahaṇāt sattva-dravyatva-guṇatva-karmatva-ghaṭatva-rūpatva-gamanatvādyasambandhāt kāraṇasamavetasarvadravyaguṇādikāryasattādravyatvādiviśeṣakṛtasambandhātiśayābhāvāditi .
etasya parihārārthaṃ yat tu pratyucyate--na, kāraṇasāmagrye viśeṣasadbhāvāditi . tadvyākhyānaṃ --yat tulyajātīyāvayavetyādi yāvad dravyatvena sambadhyata iti dravyatvanilayananiyamaḥ .
pṛthivyaptejovāyuparamāṇubhirdvābhyāṃ bahubhirvā svasaṃyogāpekṣaistulyajātīyairārabdhe'vayavidravyakārye dravyatvaṃ nilīyata
ityarthaḥ . yattu kāraṇaguṇetyādi, tairārabdhe kāryadravye niyamata eva guṇā guṇāntaraṃ tatrasthā ārabhante
  iti vacanāt tadārabdhe guṇāntare kārye guṇatvaniyamanāt guṇatvena sambadhyate . yat
punargurutvādibhiḥ svāśraye yatrāśraye gurutvaṃ samavetaṃ tatra saṃyogābhāve patanakarmārabhyate, ādigrahaṇāt
prayatnanodanābhighātasaṃyogavegāḥ karmārabhante . svāśrayasaṃyogasahitairveti taireva gurutvādibhiḥ svāśraye

āśrayāntare karma ārabhyate tad vastumātraṃ kāryaṃ karmatvena sambadhyate ityastyatiśayaḥ .
etad nidarśanamātram, sarvatra kāraṇasāmagryaniyāmakasadbhāvāt pratiniyata eva
kapitthaphalavṛntādau gurutvena karmaṇyārabdhe tatsaṃyukte kīṭe patanamārabhyate āśrayāntare . taccārabdhaṃ vastumātraṃ karma kāryamitarābhyāṃ viśiṣṭaṃ karmatvena sambadhyate . ityastyatiśaya iti darśayan niratiśayatvasyāsiddhatāmāpādayati . etad nidarśanamātramityādi yāvad draṣṭavya iti . sarvatra ghaṭatva-gotvādi rūpatvādi

sāmānyaviśeṣasambandho draṣṭavyaḥ .
anena yattadutpannaṃ vastumātraṃ tat svata eva parasparato viśiṣṭamiti sphuṭīkṛtam .
viśeṣasadbhāvastāvadāhatya bherīmabhyupagataḥ, tadupavarṇanadvāreṇa cāviśeṣo'pi . 'avi-
gamanatvādiṣvapyanayā yuktyā sāmānyaviśeṣeṣu kāraṇasāmagryasya niyāmakasyātiśayinaḥ sadbhāvāt
pratiniyata eva sambandho draṣṭavyaḥ .
iti parihāre kṛte prastutanaya āha --anenetyādi . tvadīyenaivaitena parihāravacanena yat tadutpannaṃ
kāryaṃ vastumātrābhimataṃ tat svata eva kāraṇasāmagryātiśayādeva parasparato viśiṣṭaṃ na sattādravyatvādi-
sambandhanamapekṣyeti sphuṭīkṛtam, tenaiva vastubhāvanena viśiṣṭena sattādiviśeṣaṇasambandhakṛtyasyāviśeṣaviśeṣābhidhānapratyayahetoḥ pratiprāpitatvāt .
tatra viśeṣasadbhāvastāvadāhatya bherīmabhyupagataḥ sarvatra kāraṇasāmagryaniyāmakasadbhāvāt
pratiniyataḥ sāmānyaviśeṣasambandho draṣṭavyaḥ ityupasaṃhāravacanāt . tadupavarṇanadvāreṇa cāviśeṣo'pi
abhyupagataḥ iti vartate . tulyajātīyasaṃyogārabhyakāryatvāviśeṣasya dravyatvanilayanaviṣayaviśeṣaṇavarṇanadvāreṇa
guṇārabdhaguṇāntaraviṣayanilayanaguṇatvavarṇanadvāreṇa gurutvādyārabdhatadāśrayāśrayāntarasamavetakarmaviṣayakarmatva

śeṣaviśeṣaṇavinirmuktamapi na bhavati' ityetadapi tvayaiva bhāvitam, tulyajātīyāvayavasaṃyogādibhinnāviśeṣaviśiṣṭavastusvatattvapradarśanādasti hi... ...netarad netaratra .
punarapi ca kāraṇasāmagryā aviśeṣeṇa yogādabādiṣvapi tulyajātīyādyavayavasaṃyogādapi dravyatvaṃ bhāvitam . etena pṛthivyādibhinna... ...dravyatvamuktam .
tulyajātibhede'pi ca aviśeṣaviśeṣaṇāvinirmuktatvaṃ vastunaḥ, dvayorbahuṣu vā
  iti vacanāt .
nilayanadvāreṇa ca sarvadravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ niyataviṣayasvajātigataviśeṣavarṇanādaviśeṣo'pyāhatya bherīmabhyupagata
iti draṣṭavyam . tasmāt kāraṇagataviśeṣāviśeṣakṛtātiśayādeva kāryagataviśeṣāviśeṣaviśeṣaṇasambandhisiddhiḥ . evaṃ tāvad viśeṣaṇavarṇanadvāreṇoktam .
kiñcānyat, aviśeṣetyādi . aviśeṣaviśeṣaṇavinirmuktamapi na bhavati ityetadapi tvayaiva bhāvitam . tadyathā --tulyajātīyāvayavasaṃyogādibhinnetyādi . tulyajātīyāḥ tulyaprakārā avayavāḥ, teṣāṃ
pārthivādīnāṃ gandhādimattvaprakārāṇāṃ saṃyogairdravyaṃ pārthivaṃ kāryaṃ jāyate, ādigrahaṇād guṇakarmaṇorapi
svakāraṇasānnidhyaprakāratā prāguktā . taiḥ saṃyogādibhirbhinnatve'pyaviśeṣo dravyādīnāmityanenāviśeṣeṇa
viśiṣṭamitaravilakṣaṇaṃ vastunaḥ svatattvaṃ pradarśitaṃ tvayā . tasmāt tatpradarśanādasti hītyādyupasaṃhāragrantho
gatārtho yāvad netarad netaratreti .
kiñcānyat, punarapi cetyādi . rūparasagandhasparśavatsu pṛthivyavayaveṣu saṃyukteṣvaviśeṣo darśitaḥ . na
kevalameṣa evāviśeṣaḥ sajātīyagataḥ sphuṭīkṛtastvayā, kiṃ tarhi ? tadvijātīyeṣvapi dravyatvaṃ tathā kāraṇasāmagryā aviśeṣeṇa yogādabādiṣvapi āpyeṣvapi kāraṇasāmagryāstulyatvāt tulyajātīyādyavayavasaṃyogādapi dravyatvaṃ bhāvitam, tulyajātyavayavasaṃyogāviśeṣāt . ādigrahaṇāt tejovāyvavayavasaṃyogādapīti, atulyajātīyānāmapi tulyajātīyasaṃyogārambhāviśeṣāt   ityuktatvāt sphuṭīkṛtamaviśeṣaviśeṣaṇamiti . ato'tidiśati --etena pṛthivyādibhinnetyādi gatārthaṃ yāvad dravyatvamuktamiti .
kiñcānyat, tulyajātibhede'pi cetyādi yāvad dvayorbahuṣu veti vacanāditi . yāpīyamavāntarajātirghaṭatvapaṭatvādyākhyā pṛthivītvajātibhedaḥ tasminnapi ca sati aviśeṣaviśeṣaṇenāvinirmuktatvaṃ
vastunaḥ . kasmāt ? dvitricaturādisaṃyogāt kāryadravyamutpadyate ityuktatvāt . evaṃ tāvat sambandhyantaranirapekṣe vastumātre eva viśeṣāviśeṣaviśeṣaṇasambandhaḥ pratiprāpta ityuktam .


jātikalpanāvacca yaduktaṃ vastumātramāvirbhūtamuktavad niyāmakatayā aviśeṣaviśeṣavṛttimātreṇa sāmānyaviśeṣeṇa sambadhyate tata etadāpannam--svata eva vṛttaṃ
vastu dravyādipratyayatvādinā sambadhyate . tasmādeva tu sāmānyasyāpi prakāśakaṃ
tadeva, tadāśrayatvāt sāmānyaviśeṣādīnām .
tasmādeva pravibhaktaviṣayānvayād vicitropabhogakriyāprasiddherbhinneṣvabhinnavyavahāraprasiddheśca na viśeṣaṇasambandhaḥ kalpyaḥ . etad nidarśanamātram, sarvatra tu
ghaṭatvādāvapi kāraṇasāmagryaniyāmakasadbhāvādeva tattvam .

kiñcānyat, jātikalpanāvaccetyādi . yathā bhavatā jātiranyānākāṅkṣā vastumātre vṛttena prakāśena
svata eva prakāśate tathā kāraṇasamavetadravyādītyetasyārthasya pradarśanārthaṃ yaduktam--vastumātramāvirbhūtamiti,
uktavad niyāmakatayeti sarvatra kāraṇasāmagryaniyāmakasadbhāvādityanenoktanyāyena svenaiva mahimnā vastu
niyatatvād viśeṣaṇena dravyatvādinā sambadhyate . tacca dravyatvādi aviśeṣaviśeṣavṛttimātraṃ sāmānyaviśeṣaḥ, aviśeṣeṇa prāguktena viśeṣeṇa ca vṛttiryasya tadidamaviśeṣaviśeṣavṛtti dravyatvādi, tatparimāṇaṃ
tanmātram, tenāviśeṣaviśeṣavṛttimātreṇa sāmānyaviśeṣeṇa sambadhyate vastumātraṃ tadāvirbhūtamiti .
tataḥ kim ? iti cet, tata etadāpannam--svata eva vṛttaṃ vastu dravyādipratyayatvādinā sambadhyate
viśeṣaṇaṃ vyatiriktamanapekṣya siddhaṃ prakāśate svata eva, prakāśāntareṇa nārtha ityuktaṃ bhavati . kiñcānyat,
tasmādeva tvityādi . uktādeva nyāyāt sāmānyasyāpi prakāśakaṃ tadeva vastumātramāvirbhūtam, tadāśrayatvāt
sāmānyaviśeṣādīnām .
yadapyuktaṃ vicitropabhogakriyāprasiddhyarthaṃ sattādravyatvādisambandhaḥ kalpyate iti so'pyanenaiva
pratipāditaḥ, pradīpavad bhūtād vastunaḥ prakāśāntaranirapekṣāt tasmādeva pravibhaktaviṣayānvayāt,
pravibhakto viṣayo dravyatvasya kāraṇasāmagryaviśeṣastulyajātīyāvayavasaṃyogādiḥ kāraṇaguṇapūrvakramaḥ svāśrayāśrayāntarakriyārambhiguṇādikṛtaḥ tasya kāraṇakāryādipravibhāgād vyatirekāt sadanityādyaviśeṣānvayācca
tādṛkpravibhaktaviṣayānvayāt tasmādeva vastuno vicitropabhogakriyāprasiddherbhinneṣvabhinnavyavahāraprasiddheśceti dviprakāraṃ puruṣārthaṃ darśayati . anayośca puruṣārthayoruktavad vastuta eva siddherna viśeṣaṇa-
sambandhaḥ kalpyaḥ, sattādravyatvādiviśeṣaṇasambandho na yuktaḥ kalpayitumānarthakyāditi .
etad nidarśanamātram, tadbhedānāmapi sambandhakalpanānarthakyamuktanyāyenetyato'tidiśati --sarvatra
tu ghaṭatvādāvapi ādigrahaṇād gotvamanuṣyatvādiṣu kāraṇasāmagryaniyāmakasadbhāvādeva tattvaṃ
ghaṭatvagotvamanuṣyatvādi svata eva, na sāmānyaviśeṣāt tvatkalpitāt, iti tvadvacanādeva vastuta eva
sarvaṃ tvadiṣṭaṃ pratiprāptaṃ nārthāntarasambandhāt . tadeva ca viśeṣaṇasyāpi sattādeḥ prakāśakamiti sthitam .



idaṃ tu prasphuṭataraṃ viśeṣaṇasambandhaprakāśaṃ vastu tatsambandhaniyamāya tvayaivābhyupagatamiti darśayituṃ vacanaṃ yaduktam--athavā viśeṣaṇasambandhamantareṇāpi vastumātrāṇāṃ
parasparātiśayo'sti tena viśeṣaṇasambandhaniyamasiddhiḥ   iti .
codyaparihāro'pi caivaṃ prasiddhimasmaduktāmeva sandarśayati--kathaṃ parasparātiśaya
iti cet, kathaṃ prāk... ...atiśayaḥ syāt; na, dṛṣṭāntāt . yathā parapakṣe... ... ...atiśayastathehāpi
syāt   iti . svasamayodāharaṇamapi caitamevārthaṃ draḍhayati yaducyate—
sāmānyādivadvā... ...sasvata eva syāt   iti .
na dravyādi anyādheyasvaprakāśaṃ nādheyasattvādi nāpratipūrṇasattvādi sattvāt

kiñcānyat, idaṃ tu prasphuṭataramityādi . viśeṣaṇasya sattādravyatvādeḥ sambandhaḥ prakāśo'sminniti viśeṣaṇasambandhaprakāśaṃ vastu . tena vastunaiva prakāśyate viśeṣaṇamiti tadeva vastu prakāśanam .
tena ca vastunā nāpekṣitaḥ sāmānyena saha sambandhaḥ, sāmānyameva vastunā saha sambandhamapekṣata iti
tatsambandhaniyamāya tvayaivābhyupagatamiti darśayituṃ vacanopanyāsaḥ . katamasya vacanasyopanyāsaḥ ? ucyate—
yaduktaṃ vastvātmāvadhāraṇe kṛte'tiśayābhāvād viśeṣasambandhābhāva iti codite vikalpāntareṇa
parihāravacanaṃ tad vyaktataraṃ vastvevārthāntaranirapekṣaṃ viśeṣaṇānāmapi prakāśakamiti . tadyathā --yaduktam
athavā viśeṣaṇasambandhamantareṇāpi vastumātrāṇāṃ parasparātiśayo'sti, tena viśeṣaṇasambandhaniyamasiddhiḥ   ityetad vacanaṃ yathoktakāraṇasāmagryasadbhāvaviśeṣāviśeṣanyāyaprāṇakamiti .
codyaparihāro'pītyādi . etasmiṃścārthe yaccoditam --kathaṃ parasparātiśayaḥ iti cediti, tasya
vyākhyā --kathaṃ prāgityādi gatārthaṃ yāvadatiśayaḥ syāditi . asya codyasya parihāraḥ so'pi caivaṃ
prasiddhimasmaduktāmeva sandarśayati . ko'sau parihāraḥ ? ucyate --na, dṛṣṭāntāditi . tadvyākhyā —
yathā parapakṣa ityādi yāvadatiśayastathehāpi syāditi gatārtham .
yadi paramate sattvarajastamasāṃ parasparātiśayo'sti, tava kim ? ityatrāśaṅkāniṣedhārthaṃ svasamayodāharaṇamapi caitamevārthaṃ draḍhayatīti svavacanaṃ tadvacanapradarśanam --yaducyate sāmānyādivadvetyādi savyākhyānaṃ gatārthaṃ sopanayaṃ yāvat sasvata eva syāditi .
atra prayogāḥ --na dravyādi anyādheyasvaprakāśam, nānyenādheyo'sya dravyādeḥ prakāśa iti
pakṣaḥ, nādheyasattvādiviśeṣaṇaṃ dravyādi nāpratipūrṇasattvādiviśeṣaṇamiti vā pakṣaḥ, sattvāt, yat
sad na tadanyādheyasvaprakāśaṃ nādheyasattvādi nāpratipūrṇasattvādi dṛṣṭam, sāmānyādivat, yathā sāmānya

sātmakatvāt pratyekaṃ sattvāt svabhāvasadbhūtatvāt sāmānyādivat . asadeva vā
syāt sattvasamavāyalabhyasadbhāvatvāt kāryavat . tasmād na satāmapi dravyādīnāṃ
satkarī sattā vyarthatvāt iti sādhūktam .
nāpi sadasatāṃ satkarī sattā abhūtatvāt sadasadātmakatvasya tvanmatenaiva
khapuṣpavat . yā tu tvayoktopapattiḥ sadasadaikātmyānupapatteḥ iti sā nopapattiḥ,
tvanmatenaiva sadasadaikātmyopapatteḥ . atyantāviruddhatvāt sadasadātmakaṃ kāryaṃ prāk
sattāsambandhādapi, sāmānyādidravyāditadatatsadasadvat . sāmānyādīni svātmanā
... ... ...svasantyapi na bhavanti .
viśeṣasamavāyāḥ santo nānyaprakāśā nādheyasattvādayo nāpratipūrṇasattvādayaḥ tathā dravyādīni . evaṃ sātmakatvāt pratyekaṃ sattvāt svabhāvasadbhūtatvāditi hetavaḥ, mūlahetoreva paryāyavācino vā . evamanabhyupagame asadeva vā syāt sattvasamavāyalabhyasadbhāvatvāt, sattvasamavāyena labhyaḥ sadbhāvo'syeti
dravyādyutpannamātraṃ trayamabhisambadhyate . kāryavaditi kāraṇāvasthāyāṃ yat kāryaṃ sa dṛṣṭāntaḥ . nanvevaṃ sattvasamavāyalabhyasadbhāvaṃ tasyāmavasthāyāṃ kāryaṃ na bhavatīti cet, na, tvayaiva niṣṭhāsambandhayorekakālatvābhyupaga-
mena parihṛtatvāt .
tasmād na satāmapi dravyādīnāṃ satkarī sattā vyarthatvāditi sādhūktamiti prastutadoṣoktyupapattyupasaṃhāraḥ . evaṃ tāvadasatāṃ satāṃ ca dravyādīnāṃ satkarī na bhavati sattā ityuktam .
kiñcānyat, nāpi sadasatāṃ satkarī sattā, santaścāsantaśca dravyādayaḥ sadasanto dvyātmakāḥ,
teṣāṃ sadasatāṃ sadabhidhānapratyayakarī sattā syāditi parasyābhipretaṃ syāt tadapi na ghaṭate . kasmāt ?
abhūtatvāt sadasadātmakatvasya tvanmatenaiva khapuṣpavat, sattāsambandhāt prāg dravyādi kāryaṃ sadasadapi na bhavati asadeva tat svato nirupākhyatvādityādihetubhiḥ pūrvavat sattāsambandhalabhyasattvāt .
atha sattāsambandhanirapekṣamevāsti vyarthaḥ sattāsambandha ityuktam . tasmādubhayathāpi sadasattvavikalpo
nāsti . tasmādabhāvāt khapuṣpavat sattayā na sambadhyate tvanmatenaiva, nāsmanmatenāpyasti .
yā tu tvayoktopapattiḥ sadasattvābhāve sadasadaikātmyānupapatteḥ iti sā nopapattiḥ tvanmatenaiva
sadasadaikātmyopapatteratyantāviruddhatvaṃ tayoḥ, atyantāviruddhatvāt sadasadātmakaṃ kāryaṃ prāk sattāsambandhādapi . tadyathā --sāmānyādidravyāditadatatsadasadvat, yathā sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyākhyaṃ

nanvevaṃ tadavyavahṛteḥ prāgabhāvabhedavadabhūtatvameva, atha yadetadabhūtatvaṃ tat kiṃ
bhūtasya āhosvidabhūtasya ? yadi bhūtasya tataḥ sadasadaikātmyopapattireva . atha
abhūtasya ? abhūtatvaṃ tato dravyāderabhāvaheturvācyaḥ . ahetuto'bhavane kṣaṇikaśūnyatādivyutpattivadabhāva eva . na cet, pūrvavat sadasadaikātmyopapattireva .
vastutrayaṃ svabhāvasat svenātmanāsti tatsat, sambandhasadbhāvena nāstītyatadasat, saccāsaccetyatyantamaviruddhatvāt sadasat tvanmatenaiva . tathā dravyaguṇakarmākhyaṃ kāryatrayamutpannamātraṃ sāmānyādivat tadatatsadasaditi
siddham . tasya dṛṣṭāntadvayasya vyākhyā sāmānyādīni svātmanetyādi gatārthā yathākramaṃ yāvat svasantyapi
na bhavanti . tasmāt tvanmatenaiva sadasadaikātmyānupapatterasattvaṃ nāsti, upapattereva sattvaṃ siddham . tat
punarasattvaṃ kathaṃ tarhi ? iti, ucyate--abhūtatvāditi sādhūktamiti .
itara āha --nanvevaṃ tadavyavahṛteḥ prāgabhāvabhedavadabhūtatvameva, yathā tasyotpannamātraghaṭadravyādeḥ
prāk kuśūla-kosa-sthāsaka-śivaka-piṇḍa-mṛdavasthābhirabhāvabhedairjalādyāharaṇādivyavahāro nāstīti tatra ghaṭāsattvaṃ tathā tadavyavahṛterabhūtatvameva prāk sattāsambandhāt sadasadātmakasya kāryasya, ko doṣaḥ ? iti .
atredaṃ sampradhāryam --atha yadetadabhūtatvamityādi vikalpadvayopanyāsena praśno gatārthaḥ . tatrottaram --yadi
bhūtasya dravyāderutpannamātrasyāvyavahārādabhūtatvamiṣyate tadeva bhūtaṃ vastvātmanā tadeva cābhūtamavyavahārātmanetyataḥ sattvāsattvāvirodhiteti sadasadaikātmyopapattireva . athābhyupagamaviruddhamaikātmyaṃ mā bhūditi
abhūtatvamiṣyate tato dravyāderabhāvaheturvācyaḥ kāryasya, kena hetunā tadabhūtaṃ kāryaṃ svakāraṇeṣu samavetamutpannamātramasmaduktāvirodhahetuṃ avyavahārayogyatvāt sadapyasat ityetaṃ muktvā ? syānmatam--ahetuta
evābhūtaṃ tadabhāve kāraṇābhāvāt khapuṣpādivaditi . etaccāyuktam, yasmāt ahetuto'bhavane
niṣkāraṇato'sattve kṣaṇikaśūnyatādivyutpattivadabhāva eva syāt iti vākyaśeṣaḥ . yathā pūrvavastuni
niruddhe paścāduttaramutpadyamānaṃ nirhetukamiti prāptaṃ kṣaṇikavāditvam, tasyāpyutpannasyāhetuta eva vināśāśaṃsanāt . taccādravyatvād nirbījatvāt khapuṣpavadatyantābhāvaḥ syāt tathedamapi syāt, aniṣṭaṃ caitat . yathā
vā'siddhyayuktyanutpattisāmagrīdarśanādarśanādivyutpattyā sarvaṃ śūnyaṃ nirhetukotpattisthitivināśābhāvasādharmyāt khapuṣpavat syāt . ādigrahaṇāt pratītyotpādasamudāyasantānādisaṃvṛtivyutpattivat . na cet
pūrvavaditi, mā bhūdeṣo'tyantābhāvadoṣa iti sahetukakāryābhūtatvābhyupagame'smaduktasadasadaikātmyopapattireva
prāpnoti . evaṃ tāvat prāk sattāsambandhāt sadasat kāryamiti pratipāditam .


yadāpi sattayā sambaddhaṃ tadāpi sadasat tvanmatenaiva . yat tat kāryaṃ sattayā
sambaddhaṃ sadityabhidhīyate nanu tat svasattayaiva sat na sattāsattayā . sattāpi
āśrayapratilambhāt satī eva abhivyajyate kāraṇakāryākāraṇākāryanityānityasambandhyasambandhijātimadajātibhedāt tantusamavāyavat . itaretarābhāvādivarṇanaiśca
sarvatra sadasadaikātmyopavarṇanameva . ata idaṃ jainendratvameva pratipadya prajñāpya ca
aviviktaprajñān prati saṃvriyate .

kiñcānyat, tiṣṭhatu tāvat prāk sattayā sambandhāt kāryasya sadasattvam yadāpi sattayā sambaddhaṃ
tadāpi sadasat tvanmatenaiva, tadyathā --yat tat kāryaṃ sattayā sambaddhaṃ sadityabhidhīyate sattayā viśeṣaṇabhūtayā viśeṣyate daṇḍeneva daṇḍī viśeṣyatvāt nanu tat svasattayaiva sat labdhātmalābhameva daṇḍaviśiṣṭadevadattavat, na sattāsattayā, na hi daṇḍasambandhād devadatto'san san kriyate, kiṃ tarhi ? sanneva daṇḍitvavyapadeśabhāg bhavati svasattayā san daṇḍisattayā cāsaṃstadeti sadasan . tathā satkāryaṃ sattāsambandhakāle sadeva
svasattayā khapuṣpādyavastuvaidharmyāt . tathā sattāpi na vastusattayā asatī satī kriyate, kiṃ tarhi ?
āśrayapratilambhāt satyevābhivyajyate . tadubhayaṃ vastusattayā sadeva sattādi dravyādi ca sambandhisattayā nāstītyarthaḥ . kutaḥ ? kāraṇakāryetyādihetoryāvad bhedāditi . dravyādi vastu kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca,
sattā tvakāryamakāraṇaṃ ca, nityā sattā, dravyādyanityam, sambandhi dravyādi, sattā asambandhinī, jātimad
dravyādi, ajātiḥ sattā ityebhyo bhedebhyo bhinnatvāt . tantusamavāyavat, yathā tantavaḥ kāraṇādidharmāṇastathā dravyādayaḥ, yathā samavāyo'kāraṇādidharmā tathā satteti . dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayośca sadasattvayojanā
svabhāvasambandhasattābhyāṃ kartavyā . tasmāt sadasattvaikātmyopapattireva .
kiñcānyat, itaretarābhāvādivarṇanaiśca tvayaiva sarvatra sadasadaikātmyopavarṇanameva kṛtam
iti vākyaśeṣaḥ . saccāsat vai॰ sū॰ 9 . 1 . 4 itītaretarābhāvavarṇanaṃ ghaṭaḥ sanneva svātmanā paṭādyātmanā

nanu mayā vigṛhyaivātra vādaḥ saiddhārthīyamatāvalambinaṃ tvāmevoddiśya . yaducyate saiddhārthīyaiḥ 'upādānaniyamadarśanāt sat kāryaṃ tilatailavat tatkriyādyasattva-
nāstīti . tathā kriyāguṇavyapadeśābhāvādasat vai॰ sū॰ 9 . 1 . 1 iti asaditi bhūtāpratyakṣatvād
bhūtasmṛtervirodhipratyakṣatvācca . tathābhāve'bhāvāt vai॰ sū॰ 9 . 1 . 6--7 iti ca prāgabhāvapradhvaṃsābhāvavarṇanaṃ
ca . sarvatra sadasattvameva varṇitamekamatyantābhāvaṃ muktvā śaśaviṣāṇādivadekāntanirātmakatvānabhyupagamāditi .
ata idaṃ jainendratvameva sadasadvāditvaṃ pratipadya bahudhā prajñāpya ca mā bhūdṛjujaneṣvaviviktaprajñeṣu
jainānāmeva gauravaṃ tattvajñāḥ iti mama ca lāghavam atattvajñaḥ iti tvayaivaṃ tānaviviktaprajñān prati
saṃvriyate gūhyate .
atrāha--nāhaṃ jainendratvamabhyupaimi, na cāviviktaprajñān prati saṃvṛṇomi . nanu mayā vigṛhyaivātra
vādaḥ sadasatorvaidharmyāt kārye sadasattā na vai॰ sū॰ 9 . 1 . 12 ityanena sūtreṇa . sa punarvādaḥ siddhārthasutamatāvalambinaṃ sadasadaikātmyavādinaṃ tvāmevoddiśya . yaducyata ityādi saiddhārthīyamatapradarśanārthaḥ
pūrvapakṣaḥ . te hi saiddhārthīyāḥ sadasadekātmatvaṃ vastuno'bhilaṣanta itthamupapattiṃ brūyuḥ, tadyathā --upādānaniyamadarśanāt sat kāryaṃ tilatailavat, tatkriyādyasattvadarśanādasad vīraṇeṣviva ghaṭo mṛdyapīti .
itarathā atyantāsatkāryavāde na syādupādānaniyamaḥ khapuṣpasyeva, atyantasati ca tantvavasthāyāmeva paṭe

darśanādasat, dṛṣṭaṃ tāvat... ... ..., itarathā tantupāṃsvādiṣvaviśeṣaḥ prāgapi
vyāpārābhāvaśca syāt, dṛṣṭā tu kriyā... ... ..., ubhayaikānte doṣadarśanāt
sadevāsadeva veti cāyukta ekāntaḥ, sadasadātmakatvāt kāryasya upādānaniyamaḥ
kriyā ca yujyate' iti, tanna, vikalpānupapatteḥ . sadevāsat sadasat svenaivātmanā
saccāsacca anyenātmanā sad...ghaṭātmanā cāsat ? na tāvat... ... ...asattvapratipakṣaśca sattvam . sat sopākhyamasannirupākhyam... ... ...sadasattvaṃ na bhavatītyarthaḥ .
atra sato'satpratipakṣatvamasiddhaṃ tadaṅgatvāt tadātmakatvāt tatpravṛttitvāt ghaṭorddha-
paṭārthā kuvindasya kriyā na syāt . upādānaniyamatadarthavyāpārau sadasattve kāryasya hetū, dṛṣṭaṃ tāvadityādinā samarthayati . aniṣṭaṃ cāpādayati--tathānicchataḥ tantupāṃsvādiṣvaviśeṣaḥ syādupādānamevānupādānameva vā, labdhātmapadārthakārakavyāpārābhāvavat prāgapi vyāpārābhāvaḥ syāditi ca yathāsaṅkhyam .
nigamayati yathāsambhavaṃ dṛṣṭā tu kriyetyādi . ubhayaikānte doṣadarśanāditi sadevā'sadeva cetyekānte .
sadevāsadeva veti cāyukta ekāntaḥ, sadasadātmakatvāt kāryasya satpakṣamāśrityopādānaniyamo yuktaḥ,
asatpakṣamāśritya kriyā yukteti . yadetat saiddhārthīyaṃ mataṃ tanna, vikalpānupapatterityādi . sadevāsat
sadasadityādi pratyuccāraṇaṃ saṃkṣepeṇa vikalpadbayena sopapattikaṃ svenaivātmanā saccāsacca anyenātmanā
saditi yāvad ghaṭātmanā cāsaditi .
na tāvadityādi prathamaṃ tāvad vikalpaṃ vyavasthāpya sūtreṇa dūṣaṇamāha savyākhyānaṃ sopavarṇanaṃ yāvadasattvapratipakṣaśca sattvamiti gatārtham . sato'satā virodhaḥ prātipakṣyaṃ vaidharmyameva hetuḥ . mā maṃsthāḥ
so'siddha iti, atastatpradarśanārthamāha --sat sopākhyamityādi vaidharmyasphuṭīkaraṇaṃ yāvat sadasattvaṃ na
bhavatītyartha iti suvyākhyātam .
atrācārya uttaramāha --atra tvatsādhane sato'satpratipakṣatvaṃ virodho vaidharmyamasiddham . kutaḥ ?
tadaṅgatvāt, aṅgamavayavastadekadeśaḥ, yad yasyāṅgaṃ sa tasya pratipakṣo na bhavati, yathā ghaṭasyorddhagrīvāditva

grīvāditvavat . bhavan san bhavati pratyekavastusvarūpapratipattyarthatadatatpravṛttavyāvṛttasadasadātmakaḥ svato'tyantāvibhaktavṛttiparyanubhavo'bhūtakhapuṣpavilakṣaṇo'rthāntarabhūtakṣaṇabhaṅgavilakṣaṇaścātītānāgatavartamānabhinnabhavanasadasadekakriyaḥ ākāśavat . tathā
tantupaṭādyapi kramabhāvi sadasat, tathā yugapadbhāvi khamapi, ito'pīto'pi .
miti . itaśca pratipakṣo na bhavati, tadātmakatvāt, sa ātmā'sya bhāvasyābhāva ātmā, tadbhāvāt
tadātmakatvāt, ghaṭorddhagrīvāditvavadeva . itaśca, tatpravṛttitvāt, sa evābhāvo'sya sataḥ pravṛttiḥ,
tenābhāvarūpeṇa bhāvaḥ pravartata ityarthaḥ . eka eva bhāvābhāvarūpeṇārtho ghaṭavad mṛtpiṇḍaśivakādirūpādiyugapadayugapadbhāvidharmabhāvābhāvapravṛttiriti . athavā aṅgamātmā, ātmā ca pravṛttirityaikārthyameveti vyākhyānaṃ
tadaṅgatvasya .
bhavan san bhavatīti sattvaṃ nāma bhavata eva nābhavataḥ . bhavanaṃ ca kīdṛśam ? abhāvānuviddham,
iti taddarśayati --pratyekavastvityādi daṇḍako yāvat sadasadātmakaḥ, ekamekaṃ prati pratyekaṃ vastunaḥ svarūpaṃ
pratipattuṃ pratyekavastusvarūpapratipattyarthaṃ tatpravṛttaṃ ghaṭākhyaṃ śivakādivyāvṛttaṃ paṭādivyāvṛttaṃ ca, tasmāt tadeva
ghaṭākhyaṃ ghaṭātmanā pravṛttaṃ bhavati, paṭaśivakādyātmanā vyāvṛttaṃ na bhavati . ataḥ sadasadātmakaḥ .
tasmādabhāvo bhāvāṅgaṃ bhāvātmā bhāvapravṛttireva . evaṃ tāvad yugapadbhāvirūpādibhāvenāpi bhavan sa ghaṭo
nābhāvena svāṅgātmapravṛttisvarūpeṇa vinā bhavatītyuktaṃ dravyakṣetrāpekṣam . kālabhāvāpekṣamapyucyate--sa eva ca
bhavitā ghaṭaḥ svato'tyantāvibhaktavṛttiparyanubhavaḥ tāmātmano vṛttiṃ prāk paścācca parito'nubhavati .
tasmādbhavanātmakatvādabhūtakhapuṣpavilakṣaṇaḥ, kenacidrūpeṇa khapuṣpasyābhavanād ghaṭasya ca pūrvottararūpairbhavanāt .
arthāntarabhūtakṣaṇabhaṅgavilakṣaṇaśca prāk paścādidānīṃ ca bhavanād bhavanasya pravartanasya dravyārthato'tyantamabhinnatvāt kṣaṇabhaṅgavāde'tyantaṃ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe'nyatvābhyupagamāt tadvilakṣaṇa iti . nanvevaṃ dravyārthabhavanasyābhedādabhavanaṃ
niravakāśameveti, etacca na bhavatītyata āha --atītānāgatavartamānabhinnabhavanasadasadekakriyaḥ, yānyatītāni bhavanānyanāgatāni ca tāni vartamānabhavanād bhinnāni deśakālākāranimittādibhedāt, tebhyaśca
vartamānabhavanam, parasparavilakṣaṇatvācca paraspararūpeṇa na santi, atha ca bhavanakriyaikaiva sarvāṇi tānyucyante .
katham ? ākāśavat, yathā tavāpyākāśaṃ śabdādisamavāyināṃ ghaṭādisaṃyogināṃ cādhārabhūtamekamavicchinnabhavanamapi teṣu ghaṭapaṭaśabdādibhavanādhāratayā bhidyamānatvād bhedābhedābhyāṃ saccāsacca ityeṣaṇīyam,
anyathā teṣāṃ ghaṭaśabdādīnāṃ saṅkaraprasaṅgāt, tathāsmanmatenāpyavagāhasāmānyād bhavatyeva aṅgulighaṭādyavagāhairbhedādasacca, tathoktabhāvano ghaṭo dravyādi kāryaṃ ceti . yathākāśaṃ tathā bhūtatvāt tantupaṭādyapi

itarathā naiva bhaved vastu apūrvatvāt khapuṣpavat, vaidharmyeṇa campakapuṣpavat,
aparatvādabhedatvādavartamānatvāt vāndhyeyavat kṣaṇikavādavat, . tasmānna sadasatoḥ
pratipakṣatvam . na naikātmyam, vidhipratiṣedhaikaviṣayatvāt, bhāvitaikātmyacetanācetanatvavat .
yadapi ca sat sopākhyamasad nirupākhyamiti tadapi nopapadyate sato'pyanupākhyatvāt . ko hi prativastu pratikṣaṇasattvena sadupākhyātuṃ śaknoti ? asādhāraṇatvāt
kramabhāvi sadasat . yathā ca tat tantupaṭādi kramabhāvi tathā yugapadbhāvi khamapi sadasad bhinnābhinnaṃ
ca ito'pi ito'pīti ubhayātmakatvaṃ pradarśyata iti .
itarathā naivetyādi . evaṃ sadasadātmakatvamanicchato vastunaste naiva bhaved vastu apūrvatvāt
nirbījatvāt, nāsya pūrvamiti bahuvrīhisamāsāśrayeṇa na pūrvamapūrvaṃ prāgasattvāditi tatpuruṣāśrayeṇa vā,
khapuṣpavat . vaidharmyeṇa campakapuṣpavat, mūlāṅkurādibhavanena pūrvasyaiva sataścampakasya puṣpībhavanāt .
tacca sadasadātmakaṃ campakakusumamiti . evamaparatvādanuttaratvādabhedatvāditi yojyam . tasmād vartamānameva na syāt, tataścāvartamānatvādapi naiva syāt, vāndhyeyavat kṣaṇikavādavaditi ca khapuṣpakṣaṇabhaṅgavailakṣaṇyaprastuterudāharaṇadvayametat . tannigamayati --tasmānna sadasatoḥ pratipakṣatvamiti .
itaśca na naikātmyaṃ sadasatoraikātmyameva, dviḥ pratiṣedhasya prakṛtyāpatteḥ . kutaḥ ? vidhipratiṣedhaikaviṣayatvāt, vidhiḥ anvayaḥ, pratiṣedho vyatirekaḥ, tāvubhāvekaviṣayau ityetat pratyekavastusvarūpapratipattyarthatadatatpravṛttivyāvṛttisadasadātmaka iti avibhaktasvarūpaparyanubhavo'tītānāgatavartamānabhinnabhavanasadasadekakriyaḥ ityādivacanāt siddham . tasmāt sadasadaikātmyameva bhāvitaikātmyacetanācetanatvavat, yathā ca cetanācetanayorvidhipratiṣedhaikaviṣayatvena bhāvayitvā cetano'cetana ityuktaṃ tathehāpi
dravyādisadasadaikātmyād nāsti sadasatoḥ pratipakṣateti .
yadapi cetyādi . sadasatoḥ pratipakṣatvabhāvanārthaṃ vaidharmyamucyate tvayāṃ sat sopākhyamasad nirupākhyamiti tadapi nopapadyate, sato'pyanupākhyatvāt . ko hītyādi, vastuni vastuni rūparasādau
yo yo'sādhāraṇa ātmā pūrvakṣaṇe uttare ca kṣaṇe vilakṣaṇastasya bhāvaḥ sattvam, tena sattvena prativastu
pratikṣaṇasattvena ca sad vastu tadupākhyātuṃ kenacidaśakyam, asādhāraṇatvāt, yadasādhāraṇaṃ na
tadupākhyātuṃ śakyate svasukhādiparyanubhavavat . tasmād nāyamekāntaḥ sat sopākhyameveti . syānmatam—
na brūmaḥ sat sopākhyameva iti, yato'sya vyabhicāra ucyate . kiṃ tarhi ? sat sopākhyaṃ nirupākhyaṃ


svasukhādipayanubhavavat ? . atha ca nirupākhyatāyāmapi naiva tadasat sāmānyasopākhyatvāt . api ca tvayāpi... ... ...viśeṣaṇasambandhaḥ kalpyaḥ, atha ca na tadasad nirupākhyatvāt, sadasadeva tu sopākhyanirupākhyatvāt sāmānyavat, sopākhyaṃ nirupākhyaṃ ca sadasattvāt sāmānyavat . sāmānyaṃ svasat na sāmānyasad
vastuvaditi sadevāsat sāmānyam . sopākhyaṃ svaparapratyayābhidhānādhānāt nirupākhyaṃ ca vastuvaditi sopākhyameva nirupākhyam, vastuni viparyayaḥ . ato vyavasthāpitasopākhyanirupākhyatvāt sadasadeva sāmānyādidravyādivat .
vā syāt, nirupākhyaṃ tvasadeva, tat satā sādharmyaṃ na bhajata iti . etadapi nopapadyate vyabhicārādityata
āha --atha ca nirupākhyatāyāmapi naiva tadasat sāmānyasopākhyatvāt, upa sāmīpye, sāmīpyenākhyā upākhyā pratyāsattyetyarthaḥ, saha upākhyayā sopākhyam, yadapyasādhāraṇaṃ sukhādiparyanubhavādi tadapi
sāmānyenopākhyāyate--kimapi sukhaṃ duḥkhamityādi . tasmānnirupākhyasyāpi sattvadarśanādayuktamuktam —
asannirupākhyaṃ sat sopākhyamiti . tasmāt kenacidātmanā sadevāsat sopākhyaṃ ceti nāsti sadasatorvaidharmyam . athavā sāmānyasopākhyatvāt, yathā sāmānyaṃ svenātmanā sopākhyaṃ svasattayā, na
viśeṣaṇātmanā sāmānyāntareṇa, na tu dravyādivastuvat, iti sat sopākhyaṃ nirupākhyamasacceti dṛṣṭatvāt
tavaivaikatra sadasatornāsti vipakṣatā .
kiñcānyat, api ca tvayāpītyādi, tvatkalpanayaiva sadasat ityetat pradarśayitumidamucyate,
prāgvyākhyātārtha evaiṣa grantho yāvad viśeṣaṇasambandhaḥ kalpya iti, iha tu prāg viśeṣaṇasambandhād
vidyamānameva nirupākhyamitīṣṭaṃ tvayaiva ityetasyārthasya pradarśanārthamupanyastaḥ, ata āha --atha ca na tadasad
nirupākhyatvāditi nirupākhyatvasya sati dṛṣṭatvād vyabhicara uktaḥ . asacca tat sambandhāsattvāt
tasyāmavasthāyām, sopākhyaṃ ca taduttarakālaṃ sattāsambandhopākhyatvāt . evaṃ sopākhyanirupākhyatvāvirodhamāpādya prastutakāryasadasattvāvirodhe sādhanamāhācāryaḥ --sadasadeva tu sopākhyanirupākhyatvāt
sāmānyavaditi . athavā sopākhyaṃ nirupākhyaṃ ca sadasattvāt sāmānyavaditi sadasattvaikātmye sādhye
sopākhyanirupākhyatvaṃ hetuḥ sopākhyanirupākhyatve ca sadasattvaṃ proktanyāyena tvayaivābhyupagatatvāt .
sāmānyadṛṣṭāntasya sadasatsopākhyanirupākhyatvaikātmyaṃ darśayati --sāmānyaṃ svasat svasattayā sat
na sāmānyasad vastuvat sambandhasattayetyarthaḥ . yathā tvanmatenaiva sāmānyena sambandhād dravyaguṇakarmākhyaṃ
vastu sambandhasadiṣyate na tathā sāmānyaṃ sāmānyasya sāmānyāntarasambandhābhāvāt . iti sadevāsat

yattūktaṃ pūrvadoṣapāpīyastvād na . tadyathā--tatra hi... ...hetūpādānakriyāniyamābhāvaḥ, asmin punaḥ sadasatkāryapakṣe dvidoṣatā pāpīyasī iti, tanna, parihṛtapūrvadoṣatvāt .
sāmānyam, itiśabdasya hetvarthatvāt evaṃ sāmānyasya sadasattvaikātmyam . tadeva ca sopākhyaṃ svaparapratyayābhidhānādhānāt, svātmani sambandhini ca pratyayamabhidhānaṃ cādhatte satī sattā santi dravyaguṇakarmāṇi iti ca sāmānyam tadeva nirupākhyaṃ ca, nāsyopākhyāsti, vastuvat, vastuna iva
sambandhisāmānyādupākhyā nāsti sāmānyādeḥ sāmānyādyantarābhāvāt . iti sopākhyameva nirupākhyam, itthamuktanyāyena sopākhyanirupākhyatvayorvaidharmyābhāvaḥ . vastuni viparyaya iti, dravyāditraye
vastuni svato nirupākhyatā sāmānyena sopākhyatā, svatastvasattvaṃ sambandhyantarāt sattvaṃ ca sattāto
viparītam .
ato vyavasthāpitetyādi vyākhyātadṛṣṭāntasopākhyanirupākhyatvaikakāṣṭhīkṛtahetudharmayoḥ sadasattvaikakāṣṭhībhūtasādhyadharmāvinābhāvaḥ upasaṃhriyate . tasmāt tābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ bhinnau viruddhau ca ityabhimatābhyāmeva
pratipadyatāṃ bhavān, sopākhyanirupākhyatvāt sāmānyādidravyādivat, sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyāḥ
sāmānyādayaḥ, dravyaguṇakarmāṇi dravyādīni, sāmānyādayaśca dravyādīni ca yathā santi asanti ca
sopākhyanirupākhyāni ceti sopākhyanirupākhyatvaṃ sadasattvaikātmye hetuḥ, sadasattvamapi sopākhyanirupākhyatvaikātmye tathaiva hetustvanmatenaiva . upanaye tu dravyādīnāṃ dṛṣṭāntatvenopādānaṃ tvayaiveṣṭatvāt . atrāpi sadasattvaikātmye sopākhyanirupākhyatvaikātmye ca niḥsaṃśayamavipakṣateti .
idānīṃ syādvāde paroktān doṣān parihartukāma āha --yattūktamityādi . ṭīkāyāṃ praśastamatau
syādvādinaṃ prati pūrvadoṣapāpīyastvād na ityuktau doṣau, tatra sadasatkāryapakṣayoḥ sāṅkhyavaiśeṣikeṣṭayoryathāsaṅkhyaṃ kriyānupapattyupādānaniyamābhāvadoṣau . yathoktam --upādānaniyamasyāsati sati ca kriyāyā
abhāvaprasaṅgāt sadasat kāryam iti doṣadvayaṃ bruvato jainasya pūrvadoṣapāpīyastvaṃ kiletthamucyate . vai॰
sū॰ praśastamatiṭīkā, tadyathā--tatra hītyādi, yathāsaṅkhyaṃ pratyekadoṣapradarśanagrantho gatārtho yāvaddhetūpādāna-
kriyāniyamābhāva iti, hetavo daṇḍādyā ghaṭasya, mṛdupādānam, kriyā kulālavyāpāra iti . asmin
punaḥ sadasatkāryapakṣe dvidoṣatā pāpīyasī sadasatpakṣābhyāmekaikadoṣābhyām, sattvāt kāryasya ghaṭārthāyāḥ kriyāyā abhāvaḥ, asattvādupādānaniyamābhāvaḥ ityetaddvidoṣatvāt pāpīyāneṣa pakṣa iti .
atrācārya āha --tanna, parihṛtapūrvadoṣatvāt, parihṛtāvasmin sadasadekātmakakāryapakṣe pūrvoktau kriyā'bhāvopādānaniyamābhāvadoṣāviti .


tatra hi satkāryapakṣe kriyā kiṃ virudhyate ? sāṅkhyo yadasau ekāntena sanneva
ghaṭaḥ ityāha tatastasya kriyā niṣpannasya na yujyate kartavyābhāvāt kṛtavat iti
kriyā'bhāvadoṣo bhavati, na punaḥ syādvādinaḥ . yadi tvasau syādādinā kartavyatvamapi vidadhīta tataḥ ka enamevaṃ brūyāt ? asatkāryapakṣe'pi upādānaniyamaḥ kiṃ
virudhyate ? yadasau ekāntena asadeva kāryam iti hetūpādāneṣu sannihitasya kriyābhivyaṅgyasyārthasyoparyavajñayā brūyāt tasya 'paṭārthitāyāṃ tantūpādānaniyamo na

tat pareṇaivābhivācayati praśnapūrvakam --tatra hi satkāryapakṣe kriyā kiṃ virudhyate kena hetunā ?
sāṅkhyo yadasāvekāntenetyādi yāvat kṛtavaditi . dravyārthato hi mṛtpiṇḍe ghaṭo'sti na paryāyataḥ . sāṅkhyastu
sanneva ghaṭaḥ kāryatvaparyāyanirapekṣa ityāha tatastasya kriyā karaṇaṃ niṣpannasya sarvathā vidyamānasya na yujyate
kartavyābhāvāt kṛtavat niṣpannaghaṭavadityevaṃ tasya satkāryavādinaḥ kriyā'bhāvadoṣo bhavati, na punarākāṅkṣitakartavyaparyāyadravyārthavādinaḥ syādvādinaḥ syāt sanneva mṛtpiṇḍe ghaṭaḥ kenaciddharmeṇāsannapi iti
vadataḥ parihṛtapūrvoktasatkāryaikāntavādadoṣatvāt . yadi tvasau sāṅkhyo'pi syādādinā kartavyatvamapi
vidadhīta syādvādivat kathaṃcit kutaścit ityādinānekāntavācinā viśeṣaṇena viśeṣya sadeva kāryam
iti tataḥ ka enamevaṃ brūyāt ? ko vādī susamīkṣitavākyaguṇadoṣo'pi kriyā'bhāvadoṣaste prāptaḥ kartavyatvābhāvāt kṛtavat iti vaktuṃ śaknuyāt parihṛtapūrvadoṣaṃ vādinaṃ sāṅkhyamanyaṃ vābhyupetānekāntavādamiti .
asatkāryapakṣe'pītyādi, vaiśeṣikaṃ pratyasatkāryavādinamupādānaniyamābhāvadoṣa ukto yo'yaṃ sa
kiṃ virudhyate ? iti pūrvavat praśnopakramaṃ bhāṇayati . yadasāvekāntenetyādi, yadasau vaiśeṣikaḥ paryāyārthāśrayeṇa kriyāguṇavyapadeśābhāvādasadeva kāryam iti dravyārthato hetuṣu turyādiṣūpādāneṣu ca tantuṣu sannihitasyāvyaktasya kriyāmantareṇa kriyayābhivyaṅgyasya paṭākhyasyārthasya upari avajñayā anapekṣya taṃ brūyāt
tasya paṭarthitāyāṃ tantūpādānaniyamo na yujyate tatrāsattvāt tṛṇādivat, yathā tṛṇādyupādānaṃ
paṭārthitāyāṃ na yuktaṃ tatra tasyāsattvādevaṃ tantūpādānamapītītthamasatkāryaikāntavāde'pyupādānaniyamābhāvadoṣaḥ, so'nekāntavāde syādādiviśiṣṭe nāsti syādasat kāryam iti dattasattāvakāśamapi vadataḥ . tathā
yadi vaiśeṣiko'pi viśeṣya brūyāt ka enaṃ kiñcidapi brūyāt ? na tadā tasya vādino viśeṣitānvayavyatirekadharmadharmivyavasthasya tilatuṣaśatabhāgamātramapi vācyamastīti . uktaṃ ca--
