sattayābhisambadhyate dravyaguṇakarmākhyam, dravyatvena dravyam, guṇatvena guṇaḥ, karmatvena karmetyebhirbhāvaiḥ sāmānyākhyairlabhyaṃ svarūpaṃ vāsyeti naiva kāryasyopādānaniyamo'sti ityanekāntaḥ sidhyati . sadbhāgamāśritya ca
kriyāyā abhāva eva, yo ghaṭasya kāryasya sattvameva dravyārthato vāñchati tasya kriyāyā nāstyeva prayojanam, naiva kriyāsti, ityaniyamaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tasya vādinaḥ sarvasya sarvātmakatvāt, mṛtpiṇḍo hi
yugapadayugapadbhāvisarvadharmātmakaḥ . tena prakāreṇa tathā dravyārthavādaprakāreṇa, tathābhāvastathātvaṃ sarvasarvātmakatvam, tasmāt tathātvādasad nāma kiñcinnāstyato'tyantamasato'bhāvāt pratyekanayavivakṣāyāmanyatarāśraya itarasyābhāvād na hyatra viśeṣahetunārtha eva .
yattūcyata ityādi yāvat saptamyabhidhānena darśayatīti sūtrārthaḥ kaṭandyāṃ vyākhyātaḥ .

rvirodhādekasminneva kārye sadasacchabdayorekādhikaraṇabhāvena prayogo nāsti, sadevāsat ityanusandhānaṃ
nāstyekādhikaraṇabhāvena iti saptamyabhidhānena darśayati vai॰ sū॰ kaṭandī 9 . 1 . 12 . --etadapi na
kiñcit, ekaikārthe tattvātmani itaretarabhūtābhūtatattvaṃ jagad vṛttāvṛttaparyāyārthāvibhaktadravyārthabhāvanāyāṃ sadevāsat kiṃ nūbhayapratyapekṣābhāvayitavyasvātmani . tathā ca....
yadapyuktam--āpekṣikaṃ sadasattvam, prāgutpatteḥ mṛdātmanā sat kāryaṃ ghaṭātmanā cāsat,
niṣpanne'pi ghaṭe mṛttvadarśanād mṛdupādānopapattiḥ, ghaṭātmanā cāsattvād ghaṭārthakriyopapattirityevaṃ kila
ārhata āha . atrottaram--na, asatkāryatvasiddheḥ, evaṃ tarhi mṛdātmanaḥ kartavyatvābhāvād ghaṭātmanaḥ kartavyatvādasadeva kāryam . tasmānna prāgutpatteḥ sadasat kāryam vai॰ sū॰ kaṭandī iti .--atra na
sadasatorvaidharmyāt iti kimuktaṃ bhavati ? parasparavirodhāt samānādhikaraṇabhāvenaikasmin prāgutpatteḥ saccāsacca tadeva iti sadasacchabdārthayorvirodhādekasminneva kārye kutaḥ sattvaṃ prāgutpatteḥ ? kiṃ tarhi ? asattvameveti sadasacchabdayorekādhikaraṇabhāvena prayogo nāstīti . tad vyācaṣṭe --sadevāsat ityanusandhānaṃ
nāstyekādhikaraṇabhāveneti buddhyā nirdhāraṇaṃ nāsti, tadabhāvāt prayogo'nupapannaḥ . eṣo'rthaḥ kārye sadasattā na iti saptamyabhidhānena darśitaḥ, anyathā kāryaṃ sadasanna iti lāghavārthaṃ brūyāt . etadapi na
kiñcidityādyuttaraṃ yāvat svātmani . ekasminnekasmin ghaṭapaṭādāvarthe tattvātmani itaretarabhūtābhūtatattvaṃ
jagat, ghaṭātmanā ghaṭo'sti paṭātmanā nāsti, paṭo'pi tatheti svenātmanā bhūtatvamabhūtatvaṃ cetarātmanā,
tasmād bhūtābhūtatattvaṃ jagaditi vyāpitāṃ darśayati, na kevalaṃ kāryameva sadasaditi . tathā vṛttāvṛttābhyāṃ
piṇḍaśivakaparyāyārthābhyāṃ kramabhāvibhyāmavibhakto dravyārtha ekaḥ, tasya bhāvanā mṛtpiṇḍa eva śivakībhavati,
śivaka eva ca sthāsakībhavatītyādi yāvad ghaṭo yāvacca pāṃśuryāvacca paramāṇurityavasthāsu piṇḍātmanā bhavati
śivakādyātmanā na bhavatīti piṇḍo bhāvābhāvātmakastathā śivako'pi śivakātmanā bhavati na piṇḍātmanā,
tathottarāsvapyavasthāsu itaretarābhāvasvarūpeṇa svena ca bhāvarūpeṇa sadasadeva, saccāsat vai॰ sū॰ 9 . 1 . 4
iti vacanāt . evaṃ sakalajagadvṛttāvṛttaparyāyārthenāvibhaktadravyārthabhāvanāyāṃ sadevāsat . kinnūbhayetyādi,
kiṃ punaryugapadbhāvināmayugapadbhāvināṃ ca paryāyāṇāṃ rūparasādīnāṃ śivakādīnāṃ ca pratyapekṣayā bhāvayitavyo
yasya vastunaḥ svātmā tasmin bhāvayitavye ? niḥsandigdhameva tadā sadevāsadapītyarthaḥ . tadupasaṃharati —
tathā ceti gatārtham .
yadapyuktamāpekṣikamityādi . syādvādī kiletthaṃ sadasattvaṃ samarthayatīti pūrvapakṣaḥ . mṛdātmanā
ghaṭasya prāgutpatteḥ sattvam, niṣpattyuttarakālamapi mṛttvadarśanāt, tadātmakatvād mṛdupādānopapattiḥ . ghaṭātmanā cāsattvād ghaṭārthakriyopapattiriti . atra kilottaraṃ kaṭandīkāra āha --na, asatkāryatvasiddheḥ .

pūrvapakṣo nottarapakṣaḥ satyaḥ, ko hi nāma so'nekāntavādī evaṃ brūyāt--prāgutpatteḥ
mṛdātmanā sat kāryaṃ ghaṭātmanā cāsaditi ? evaṃ hi mṛdo'kāryatve... ...ko bhedaḥ ?
abhūtvotpattivāciprākchabdoccāraṇādeva sākṣādasattvaikāntābhyupagamaḥ . anyena
mṛdātmanā bhavati svena ca ghaṭātmanā na bhavatītyevaṃ bruvan pratyakṣādiviruddhaṃ mattonmattakādivat syāt . deśakālabhedalakṣaṇobhayaparyāyamātratvādevamayamasadvāda eva syāt .
evaṃ tarhītyādi vyākhyā . mṛdātmanaḥ kartavyatvābhāvāt, kriyate iti hi kāryam, na ca mṛt kriyate,
ghaṭo hi kriyate, sa cāsanniti . tadupanayati --tasmānna prāgutpatteḥ sadasat kāryamiti .
atra na pūrvapakṣa ityādi ācāryo brūte . atraivaṃ pūrvottarapakṣayorna kiñcit satyam, prāgatīteṣu pūrvapakṣo'pi kaścit satyaḥ syād vikalādeśavaśārpaṇāt, yathā sadbhāgamāśrityopādānam asadbhāgamāśritya
kriyābhāva ityādiḥ . iha tu na pūrvapakṣo nottarapakṣaḥ satyaḥ . pūrvapakṣāsatyatvaṃ tāvat ko hi nāma
so'nekāntavādītyādi . evaṃ hyasatkāryaikāntavāda evāvasthāpitaḥ, tadasatkāryamavasthāpya ko'nekāntavādī
evaṃ brūyāt ? ityādi, prāgityādi tasyaiva pratyuccāraṇaṃ yāvad ghaṭātmanā cāsaditi, na brūyādevetyabhiprāyaḥ . yadi brūyādanekāntavādatyāga ekāntavādābhyupagamaśca kṛta iti taddarśayati --evaṃ hi mṛdo'kāryatve
ityādi gatārtho yāvat ko bheda iti . ya evaiṣa vaiśeṣiko bauddho vā syādārhato'pīti .
kiñcānyat, abhūtvotpattītyādi yāvadabhyupagamaḥ . prākchabdo hyabhūtvotpannārthavācī ghaṭāvasthātaḥ
pūrvāvasthāvācitvāt . sa cābhūtvotpattyarthaḥ prākchabdoccāraṇādeva sākṣādabhyupagatastena syāt . tataḥ kimarthaṃ
vivadetābhyupagamyāsattvaikāntaṃ mṛdātmanā sad ghaṭātmanā cāsatkāryam iti ? tathāpi bhrāntimapi na brūte .
kiñcānyat, atyantāsamīkṣitabhāṣiṇaikāntavādināpi na tulyatāmetyasau, ghaṭādanyasyā mṛdo ya ātmā
tenātyantamanyo ghaṭo bhavati svena ca ghaṭātmanā na bhavatītyevaṃ bruvan pratyakṣādiviruddhaṃ mattonmattakādivat syāt,
so'pi caikāntavādī pratyakṣādiviruddhaṃ kiñcit pariharatīti . kiñcānyat, deśakāletyādi . deśato bhedo
rūparasādīnām, kālato bhedaḥ piṇḍaśivakādīnām, sa bhedo lakṣaṇameṣāṃ sahāsahāvasthāyināmubhayeṣāṃ
paryāyāṇāṃ te deśakālabhedalakṣaṇobhayaparyāyāḥ, tatparimāṇaṃ deśakālabhedalakṣaṇobhayaparyāyamātram,
tadbhāvāt tanmātratvādevamanena prakāreṇāyamasadvāda eva syāt, rūpaṃ rasādanyat, tadapi vibhajyamānaṃ
kṛṣṇam, punarapyekaguṇakṛṣṇamityādi ā ca paramāṇuśo vibhāgādasadeva rūpam, evaṃ rasādayaḥ, tathā piṇḍādayo

itthaṃ punaḥ ko'nekāntavādī brūyāt āpekṣikamṛdātmasattvamasadvādivat . āpekṣikamṛdātmasadviśeṣaṇāttu asadabhidhānamevedam, abhidheyasvatattvanirasananiyatatvāt,
agnyanuṣṇatvābhidhānavat . avyudāse tu ghaṭātmanāpi sanneva tadbhāvatvāt .
sadasadātmakavastutattvapratyakṣīkaraṇārthaṃ jaināḥ ekamevātmānaṃ paramārthaṃ dravyārthaparyāyārthobhayalakṣaṇamupavarṇayanti, khapuṣpavadanyathā'sambhavāt . dravyaśabdaṃ ca
'pītyasadvādaḥ . itthaṃ punaḥ ko'nekāntavādī brūyāt yathāsāvasadvādī brūte--rūpaṃ rasātmanā nāsti raso'pi
rūpātmanā kṛṣṇādyapi śuklādyātmanetyādi ? na brūyādevetyarthaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? dhṛtisaṅgrahapaktivyūhāvakāśadānātmakapṛthivyādyātmakatvād mṛdāderghaṭādeśca kathaṃ mṛdamekāmapekṣya mṛdātmanaivāsti ityāpekṣikamṛdātmasattvamasadvādivat kaḥ kuśalo brūyāt iti sambadhyate . atra prayogaḥ --āpekṣikamṛdātmasadviśeṣaṇāt tvasadabhidhānamevedam mṛdātmanā sad ghaṭātmanā cāsat iti vacanam . kutaḥ ? abhidheyasvatattvanirasananiyatatvāt, abhidheyasya mṛtpiṇḍasya svaṃ tattvaṃ deśabhinnarūparasasaṃsthānādi kālabhinnarūparasaśivakādipāṃsvādi dhṛtyādilakṣaṇabhinnapṛthivyādi ca, mṛdātmanaivāsti ghaṭo na rūpādiśivakādyabādisvatattvairiti tānyasya svatattvāni santyeva nirastāni syuḥ, tannirasane niyatatvādasya vākyasya . yad yad
vākyamabhidheyasvatattvanirasananiyataṃ tat tadasadabhidhānaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā anuṣṇo'gniḥ ityuktiḥ . abhidheyasvatattvanirasanamasiddham iti mā maṃsthāḥ, siddhamevābādyātmavyudasanāt .
syānmatam--nāvadhārya mṛdātmanaiva sat, nānyena iti brūmaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? mṛdātmanā tāvat san
ghaṭo yadi rūpādipiṇḍādiśivakādyabādyātmabhirapi bhaved bhavatu nāma tadātmatvāt, ko doṣaḥ ? iti . atra
brūmaḥ --avyudāse tu ghaṭātmanāpi sanneva tadbhāvatvāt, te bhāvā rūpādiśivakādyabādivrīhyādayo ghaṭādayaścāsyā mṛdaḥ, tadbhāvabhāvastadbhāvatvam, tasmāt tadbhāvatvāt ghaṭātmanā prāk kāryamutpatteḥ sat tadātmatvād
ghaṭātmatvāt apiśabdāt sarvātmakatvācchivakādipāṃ śvādivrīhyādyātmanāpi sat . tathā cāsatkāryatvānuktiḥ,
satkāryoktireva kṛtā tathā vadateti . tasmānna syādvādina evamāhurekāntavādina ivānapekṣya pūrvāparam .
kathaṃ tarhyāhuriti cet, ata āha --sadasadātmaketyādi . dvyātmakaṃ vastutattvam ityetasyārthasya
pratyakṣīkaraṇārthaṃ jaināḥ syādvādina ekamevātmānaṃ paramārthaṃ dravyārthataḥ sattvāt paryāyārthato'sattvāt tadubhayalakṣaṇamupavarṇayanti tādṛg vastu iti pratipāditatvāt . khapuṣpavadanyathā'sambhavāt ubhayarūpaikātmyābhāvādekarūpasya dravyārthātmanaḥ paryāyārthātmano vā nirbhedatvāt nirbījatvācca khapuṣpavadabhāvaprasaṅgāt sadasadrūpa evātmā vastuna iti . dravyaśabdavyākhyā --dravyaśabdaṃ ca mṛdādirūpādyatītānāgatavartamānabhedābhedārthaṃ varṇayantīti vartate . mṛdaḥ piṇḍaśivakādayaḥ kramabhuvaḥ, sahabhuvaḥ rūparasādayaśca bhinnāḥ, triṣu

mṛdādirūpādyatītānāgatavartamānabhedābhedārthaṃ paryāyaśabdaṃ sarvābhedabhedārthaṃ mṛdātmānaṃ
dravyārthaparyāyārthaṃ ghaṭātmānaṃ ca dravyārthaparyāyārthaṃ ca . dravyaṃ hi... ...dravyārthaghaṭo'tyantasan, paryāyastu... ... ...asan .
idamapi ca kuto mṛda eva darśanam, na punardhṛtyādivat saṅgrahādidarśanam... ...
anirdeśyaṃ ca ? kuta etat asattvād ghaṭātmanā asadeva kāryam iti, na punarmṛttattvaghaṭasattvāt tattva evānubhavakramaprāpteḥ tatpratyagrāditvavad ghaṭasattvam ?
yadapi cocyate--na, asatkāryatvasiddheḥ . evaṃ tarhi mṛdātmanaḥ kartavyatvābhāvād ghaṭā-
kāleṣu mṛdādayaḥ vartamānāśca raktatvādayo vṛtta huṇḍādayaśca, te ca bhinnā apyabhinnāḥ svāṃ mūrtimanatiyartamānatvāditi bhedābhedārthameva dravyaśabdaṃ varṇayanti . paryāyaśabdaṃ sarvābhedabhedārthaṃ teṣveva trikālavartamānakālavartiṣu jātiṃ bhindantaṃ varṇayanti . tasmādubhayorubhayārthatvam . na kevalaṃ śabdārthakathanamātrādevobhayārthatvam . kiṃ tarhi ? vastusvarūpanirūpaṇamapi kriyate, tadyathā --mṛdātmānaṃ dravyārthapayāryārthaṃ varṇayantīti
sambadhyate . ghaṭātmānaṃ ca dravyārthaparyāyārthaṃ ceti . tayoryathākramaṃ vyākhyā dravyaṃ hītyādi dravyārthasya
yāvad dravyārthaghaṭo'tyantasanniti, ghaṭasyaiva pūrvottarāvasthā mṛdādivrīhibījādimūlādirbhavatīti prāgapi
bhāvitārtham, paryāyastvityādi paryāyārthasya yāvadasanniti tadviparyayeṇa gatārtham . yathā ca ghaṭātmā mṛdapyevaṃ dravyārthaparyāyārthābhyām .
idamapi ca kuta ityādi . yaducyate --niṣpanne'pi ghaṭe mṛttvadarśanād mṛdātmakasyopādānamiti,
eṣo'pi viśiṣṭapārthivamṛttvadarśanenaikāntaḥ kutaḥ sambhavati saṅgrahapaktivyūhāvakāśadānadharmajalānalānilagaganavyudāsena dhṛtyādidharmapṛthivyātmakataiveti ? tat pradarśayati --na punardhṛtyādivat saṅgrahādidarśanamityādi
tasmin vastuni vidyamānasarvadharmadarśanāni yāvadanirdeśyaṃ ceti . tasmād na mṛda eva darśanamubhayathāpi
yadi mṛdi mṛdātmadarśanam atha ghaṭe mṛdātmadarśanamiti .
yadapyucyate --ghaṭātmanā cāsattvāt kriyopapannetyevaṃ kila ārhata āha . atrāpi kuta etadityādyuttaram . naivamārhato brūte --ghaṭātmanā'sattvādasadeva kāryamiti, kiṃ tarhi ? sannapi ghaṭa iti brūte
mṛttattvaghaṭasattvāt . taddarśayati --asattvād ghaṭātmaneti kuta etat, na punarmṛttattvaghaṭasattvāt,
tat punaḥ sattvaṃ mṛttattvasya ghaṭasya tattva evānubhavakramaprāpteḥ kramajanmaghaṭaparyāyānubhavaḥ krameṇa prāpyate
tattve dravyārthato'vasthitasvarūpa eva vastuni mṛdākhye, tatpratyagrāditvavat, yathā ghaṭasya pratyagreṣanmadhyamamadhyapurāṇatādibhāvā ghaṭatattve vyavasthitasyaiva tathaiva mṛttattva evānubhavakramaprāpteḥ ghaṭasattvam . tasmādārhatoktyaparijñānādasādhūktam .
kiñcānyat, yadapi cetyādi . etasya pūrvapakṣasyottarābhiprāyeṇocyate --na, asatkāryatvasiddheriti

tmanaḥ kartavyatvādasadeva kāryam . tasmānna prāgutpatteḥ sadasat kāryam vai॰ sū॰ kaṭandī iti .--etadapi naiva, asatkāryatvasiddhivat satkāryatvasiddheḥ... ...satkāryatvam . na hi ghaṭatāyāṃ
mṛttattvasyābhāvaḥ . mṛda ātmaiva ghaṭātmā, tattyāge tatsvarūpānupapatteḥ, atītānāgatavartamānavicitraviśeṣādhyāsisvabhāvasadbhūtamṛttvavat atītānāgatavartamānavicitraviśeṣādhyāsisvabhāvasadbhūtaghaṭavad vā . etena sarvo'syādvādaḥ pratyuktaḥ .
yāvat tasmānna prāgutpatteḥ sadasat kāryamiti gatārtham . atrottaramācārya āha --etadapi naiva, asatkāryatvasiddhivat satkāryatvasiddherityupakramya bhāvanā yāvat satkāryatvamiti . yathā mṛdbhāvādapracyutasya ghaṭasya mṛdbhāvenānutpādyāvināśyasya sata eva ghaṭavivakṣayā kartavyatvādasattvamiṣṭaṃ tvayā tathā'kartavyatvāt satatamapracyutasyākṛtakasya ghaṭādiśivakādikartavyātmano mṛttattvasya mṛttattvavivakṣayā kartavyatvābhāvāt
sadeva kāryam iti kasmād neṣyate ?
na hi ghaṭatāyāmityādi, śivakādivad mṛttattvasya ghaṭasya mṛttattvasyābhāve yadyavasthānaṃ syādasan
ghaṭaḥ prāk paścājjāyata iti syāt, tattu nāsti, yasmād mṛda ātmaiva ghaṭātmā . kasmāt ? tattyāge
tatsvarūpānupapatteḥ, yattyāge yatsvarūpānupapattiḥ sa tasyaivātmā . atītānāgatetyādi yāvad mṛttvavat,
yathā mṛtpiṇḍasyātītānāgatavartamāneṣu kāleṣu ye viśeṣāḥ śītoṣṇatvādayaḥ sārdraśuṣkakhaṇḍitaśakalādayaśca
vicitrāstānadhyāste svabhāvo yasya mṛttvasya tat tatsvabhāvam, sa eva sadbhāvaḥ paramārthaḥ, sa eva paramārtho
bhūtaṃ mṛttattvaṃ tān viśeṣān vihāya na pravartate te'pi ca taditi sa evātmā viśeṣāṇāṃ mṛttvasya ca tathā
ghaṭātmā mṛda evātmā . athavā atītānāgatavartamānavicitraviśeṣādhyāsisvabhāvasadbhūtaghaṭavaditi
dvitīyamudāharaṇam, saiva vyākhyā . mṛda ātmā ghaṭasyātmā ghaṭasyātmā mṛda ātmeti dvidhāpi pratijñāyate
tenaiva hetunā anenāpi dṛṣṭānteneti .
etena sarvo'syādvādaḥ pratyuktaḥ . kāryasadasadātmakaikavastupratipādanātmakena tadekāntapratiṣedhātmakena ca yatnena nityānityādyekāntavādaḥ sarvaḥ pratiṣiddho boddhavyaḥ upādānaniyamasyāsati sati ca
kriyāyā asambhavād nityānityaikanānākāryakāraṇasarvāsarvagatatvādirasyādvādaḥ . nityatvenānityatvamanityatvena
ca nityatvamekāntarūpaṃ bādhyate, sāpekṣaṃ ca sarvaṃ sidhyati, tadyathā--sadā sattvād nityatvam, sadā sattvaṃ
dravyārthāt, naikāntānityatvamataḥ . sadā cāsattvādanityatvam, sadā cāsattvaṃ paryāyārthatvāt, ataśca naikāntanityatvamiti .

... ...asadeva kāryam . ekībhāvagatārthasya samarthatvāt satkāryatvameva .

yadapi copādānaniyamasattvapratiṣedhārthamuttaramityādi . kartṛ kāraṇam, karma kāryam iti
kriyānimittakau śabdau, tatra prāk prasiddhavyāpārayogyadravyopādānaṃ tat kriyānimittam, na kāryasattvanimittam . atra syādvādī kila pṛcchati --athāsya vyāpāraniyamaḥ kuta ityādi yāvad na sidhyati .
atra vaiśeṣikapakṣa āśaṅkyate --samarthasya karaṇe'dhikāraparigrahāt sa iti cet . etasya
vyākhyā --samarthasyaiva kāryakriyāyāmityādi kāraṇanidarśano grantho gatārtho yāvadasadeva kāryamiti
etat kilopādānaniyamakāraṇatvena uttaramasatkāryavādinaḥ . atrācāryastaduttaramāha --ekībhāvagatārthasya
samarthatvāt satkāryatvameva, nanu tvayaiva samarthasya karaṇe'dhikāraparigrahādupādānaniyamaḥ iti bruvatā
satkāryatvaṃ sabharthitam, saṅgatārthaṃ samartham, ekībhāvaṃ gato yo'rthaḥ sa samarthaḥ sādhyena sādhanākhyaḥ, tadbhāvādekībhāvagatārthasya samarthatvāt satkāryatvameva nāsatā kharaviṣāṇena saha kasyacit sāmarthyaṃ tasya vā kenacidupapadyata iti .


atha kathaṃ tantuturyādereva kāraṇatvenopādānaṃ paṭanirvṛttau, na pāṃśuvāsyādeḥ ?
tasyaiva samarthatvāt tathā tathā paṭādikāryaṃ tantuṣu vartate tathā aṃśuṣu tathā pakṣmatuṭireṇuparamāṇuṣu tathā turyādiṣvapi, pāṃsvādiṣvapi ca, kāraṇakāraṇatvādaṇuvat .
yo'pyupacayahetuḥ 'prāg niṣpatterasat kāryaṃ kriyāguṇavyapadeśābhāvāt khapuṣpa-

asya vyākhyānam --atha kathaṃ tantuturyādi yāvat kāraṇakāraṇatvādaṇuvat vaiśeṣikameva
pṛcchaṃstenaiva vyākhyāpayati . turyādereva kāraṇatvenopādānaṃ paṭanirvṛttau na pāṃśuvāsyāderiti karaṇādhikāraparigrahādeva satkāryatvaṃ tasyaiva samarthatvāt tathā tathā tena tena prakāreṇa tattanniyatanijaśaktiyuktārthasamarthatvāt, paṭādi kāryaṃ tantuṣu vartate, tantukāraṇeṣu tathāṃśuṣu prakārāntareṇa paṭakāraṇabhāvaṃ bibhratsu, tathā pakṣmatuṭi-reṇu-paramāṇūnāmapi yathāsvaśakti prakārāntaraiḥ paṭakāraṇatvāt pāramparyeṇa tatra tatrāstyeva paṭaḥ tatsamavāyavyaṅgyatvāt tadātmakatvācca . asamavāyipaṭo'pi saṃyogavyaṅgyatvāt saṃyogidravyebhyaḥ saṃyogasyābhinnatvād
dvyaṇukatryaṇukādyanantapradeśaskandhasaṃyogatvapariṇatadravyābhedāt ta eva paramāṇavaḥ paṭaḥ, yathā saṃyogiṣu
paṭakāraṇeṣu tadātmakatvāt paṭatvaṃ tathā tatkāraṇaparamāṇūnām . tathā turyādiṣvapi, turi-vema-śalākā'ñcanikā-vilekhanikādīnāṃ kuvindaprayatnotthāpitavyāpārāṇāṃ paṭatvaṃ tadātmakatvād dravyābhedāt . pāṃsvādiṣvapi ca bhūmyambumārutānalākāśabījasaṃyoganiṣpādyakarpāsātmakatvāt paṭatvaṃ siddham, tatkāraṇakāraṇatvāt paramāṇuvat . evaṃ tāvat kāryasadasattvapratiṣedho na sidhyati pratiṣedhahetvayukteḥ sadasattvaikātmyasādhanasausthityapradarśanācca sadasadeva kāryamiti .
kiñcānyat, yo'pyupacayaheturityādi tena kila sadasattvaniṣedhaṃ kṛtvā kāryāsattvasādhanārthamupacayaheturuktaḥ, tadyathā--prāg niṣpatteśca kāryasyābhāvāt . katham ? iti taducyate --kriyā-guṇa-vyapadeśābhāvāt . kriyā tvaktrāṇādikā paṭasya tantvavasthāyāṃ guṇāśca saṃyogapariṇāmādayaḥ vyapadeśaśca śabdāntaraṃ
liṅgaṃ vā na santi, tasmāt kriyāguṇavyapadeśābhāvāt prāgutpatterasat kāryaṃ khapuṣpavaditi . asyāpyupacaya

vat' iti asyāpi viruddhatvam, sadeva bhavati kāryam, prāgabhūtakriyāguṇavyapadeśatvāt, sattā'sambandhidravyādivat . anaikāntikatā ca, asati ca khapuṣpādau satica jātamātre kāryatraye dṛṣṭatvāt . nanu khapuṣpavadanekāntaḥ, na, prāgviśeṣaṇāpakṣiptaprasaṅgatvāt .
nanu... ...sadeva tu dravyaṃ na kāryam . nanu niṣpattiḥ... .... niṣpattiśabdo
hi... .... prabhūtasya triprakārā niṣpattiḥ niyatā niścitā adhikā vā bhavanameva
hetorviruddhatvaṃ doṣa ityācārya āha . ayameva te upacayahetuḥ parapakṣasādhanāya, sadeva bhavati kāryaṃ jāyate
vyajyata utpadyate, prāgabhūtakriyāguṇavyapadeśatvāt, sattā'sambandhidravyādivat, saviśeṣaṇaṃ svapakṣasādhanaṃ vedam . yathā dravyaguṇakarmākhyaṃ kāryatrayaṃ svabhāvasat tvanmatenaiva yāvat sattayā na sambaddhaṃ tāvat
kriyāguṇavyapadeśabhāg na bhavati atha ca vidyate svakāraṇeṣu samavetamātraṃ tathedaṃ samavetakāryamityasmanmatasiddhiḥ .
anaikāntikatā ca kriyā-guṇa-vyapadeśābhāvāt ityasya hetorasati ca khapuṣpādau sati ca jātamātre
kāryatraye dṛṣṭatvāt asadeva iti sandigdham .
itara āha --nanu khapuṣpavadanekāntaḥ . prāgutpatterasat kāryamabhūtakriyāguṇavyapadeśatvāt khapuṣpavat syāt, upajātamātradravyādivat sat syāt ? iti tvatsādhanamapi saṃśayakārīti cet . etacca na,
prāgviśeṣaṇāpakṣiptaprasaṅgatvāt . syādayaṃ prasaṅgo yadyaviśeṣya kriyāguṇavyapadeśābhāvāt sat kāryam
ityetāvad brūyām, kiṃ tarhi ? prāgabhūtakriyāguṇavyapadeśatvāt iti mayā viśeṣyoktam, yasya prāgabhūtaḥ
kriyāguṇavyapadeśaḥ paścād bhaviṣyati tat sadeva, yathā tadevotpannamātradravyādi, na tu yasya prāk paścāt
iti kālāvibhāgenaivāsattvaṃ khapuṣpāderiti . ataḥ prāgviśeṣaṇādapakṣipto'naikāntikatvaprasaṅgo'sya hetoriti .
atrāha --nanvityādi yāvat sadeva tu dravyaṃ na kāryamiti . mayā prāg niṣpatterasat kāryam
iti kālaviśiṣṭaṃ yāvadanutpannaṃ tāvad nāsti iti pratijñāya kriyādyabhāvāt iti heturuktaḥ, sa tu niṣpanne
dravye nāsti, tasmāt sādhanadharmavaikalyādayukto dṛṣṭānta iti .
atra brūmaḥ --nanu niṣpattirityādi . nanu niṣpatteḥ prāk ityukte'pi niṣpatterutpattyabhūtvābhāvādisamānārthatvādavyaktasad vyaktasad bhavatītyuktaṃ bhavati . tadyathā--anupanilīnasattvaṃ ca tad dravyāditrayaṃ
jātamātraṃ sattopanilayanāt prāganiṣpannaṃ sattāsāmānyena sat sattāsamavāyāt sad bhavati vyaktasad
bhavatītyeṣo'rtho niṣpattiśabdasyeti . ata āha --niṣpattiśabdo hītyādi . tadvyākhyānam --prabhūtasya
prārabdhabhavanasya triprakārā niṣpattiḥ, tadyathā --niyatā niścitā adhikā vā . kā sā ? bhavana

te . yathā sattāsambandhādeva dravyādau kārye niyatā niścitā sattvāntarebhyo viviktatvāt sattāyāḥ adhikā punarbhavanāt, evamupādānaniyamasvasattāniyatā taṇḍulavicayavat kriyāyā vyāpāreṇa niścitā yugapadayugapatparyāyakramatathābhūteradhikā niṣpattirihāpi .
tasmāt sadasatkriyāguṇatvāt sadasata eva kriyāguṇavyapadeśāḥ . anyathā
hetuśaktyupādānānāmabhidhānamātraprasaṅgaḥ, asattvāviśeṣāt .
yasya tu vidyamāna evārthaḥ... ... ...eteṣāmarthānāmabhāvādabhidhānamātraprasaṅgaḥ
niṣpādyaniṣpādakatvāviśeṣāditi . ataścāyuktaṃ satkāryatvameveti .
meva . kasmāt ? padyateḥ sattārthatvāt . sā ca te triprakārāpi tavaiva . tadyathā--sattāsambandhādeva
dravyādau kārye niyatā kāraṇasamavāyasya sāmānyasya ca nityatvāt, niścitā dravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvaghaṭatvarūpatvotkṣepaṇādisattvāntarebhyo viviktatvāt sattāyāḥ, adhikā punarbhavanāt kāryasya tvanmatenaiva kāraṇasamavāye janmābhyupagamāt . evaṃ tāvad dṛṣṭāntasya kāryadravyāditrayasya niṣpattistrirūpā vyākhyātā .
dārṣṭāntikakāryasyādhunā --upādānaniyamasvasattāniyatā, mṛdādyupādānaniyamena ghaṭādeḥ svasattā vidyate,
tayā sattayā niyatā mṛdyeva ghaṭaniṣpatteḥ, tattvato'sau ghaṭatvena niścitā paṭatvādivyāvṛttyā, tadyathā —
tandulavicayavat, vicitā niścitāstaṇḍulāḥ kacavarādyapanayanena svarūpaparigraheṇa ca, kriyāyā vyāpāreṇa parispandena aniṣpatteḥ sakāśād niścitā apanītā ghaṭaniṣpattiḥ svarūpaparigraheṇetyarthaḥ . adhikā
yugapadayugapatparyāyakramatathābhūteḥ, ye prāg yugapadbhāvino rūpādipṛthubudhnādiparyāyāḥ piṇḍaśivakādayo
nava-madhyama-purāṇatādayaścāyugapadbhāvinaḥ teṣāṃ krameṇa śivakādikaraṇavidhinā tathābhūteḥ tena prakāreṇa bhavanādadhikā niṣpattirihāpīti . tasmād dṛṣṭāntabhūtasya dravyāditrayasya kāryasya niṣpattivadavyaktasad vyaktasad
bhavatīti samānamupādāne sataḥ kāryasyeti gatamānuṣaṅgikam . sthitaṃ prāguktaṃ sadasattvaṃ kāryasya .
tasmāt sadasata eva kriyāguṇāḥ, tadbhāvāt sadasatkriyāguṇatvāt sadasata eva kriyā-guṇavyapadeśāḥ . anyathā hetuśaktyupādānānāmabhidhānamātraprasaṅgaḥ, yadyasadeva kāryaṃ syāt hetordaṇḍādeḥ
mardanādiyogyatāyāḥ śakterupādānasya ca mṛdaḥ, ghaṭādau mṛdevopādīyate na tantvādiriti, eṣāṃ kharaviṣāṇādivadabhāve ayamasya daṇḍādihetuḥ, iyamasya śaktirmārdavādirmṛddravyasya, mṛdeva ghaṭasyopādānam iti vacanamātramevedaṃ sarvaṃ syāt, nārthaḥ kaścit, khapuṣpādiniṣpattyarthakriyāhetvādyabhāvavadasattvāviśeṣāt .
yadi tu sadeva kāryaṃ syāt tatrāpi sa eva doṣa ityata āha --yasya tu vidyamāna evārtha ityādi
gatārthaṃ yāvadeteṣāmarthānāmabhāvādabhidhānamātraprasaṅgaḥ niṣpādyaniṣpādakatvāviśeṣāditi . niṣpādyo

tasmādaikāntikapakṣayorayuktatvād yuktametat prāk sadasadeva prādurbhavatīti .
yadapi coktam--vikalpatrayānāśrayād vikalpāntarāśrayaṇācca vikalpānupapatteḥ iti na doṣaḥ, niṣṭhāsambandhayorekakālatvāt . niṣṭhā kāraṇasāmagryavyāpāra-
ghaṭaḥ, niṣpādakāḥ kulāladaṇḍādayaḥ, kulālamṛddaṇḍādyastitvavad ghaṭāstitvāt kiṃ daṇḍādinā hetunā kriyate,
na vā turyādinā ? mṛda eva mārdavādiśaktirna vajrādeḥ, mṛdevopādānaṃ ghaṭasyāniṣpannatvāt na tu niṣpannaghaṭa
iti viśeṣo nāsti, sattvāviśeṣāt . iti prasaṅgaparisamāptyarthaḥ, tadupasaṃharati --ataścāyuktaṃ satkāryatvameveti . tataḥ kimāyātam ? idamāyātam--asatkāryāyuktatvavat satkāryatvamapyaikāntikaṃ na yuktam .
tasmādaikāntikapakṣayostayorayuktatvād yuktametat pratipattuṃ prāk sadasadeva prādurbhavatīti
syādvādina upasaṃharanti . ekāntapakṣayordoṣadarśanādanekāntapakṣe cādoṣadarśanāt sadasadeva kāryamavyaktasad
vyaktasad bhavatīti sthitametat--tridhāpi vikalpānupapatteḥ sattayā na sambadhyate kāryamiti .
yadapi coktamityādi . etadvikalpapakṣatrayaparihāreṇa nirdoṣābhimataṃ vikalpāntaramāśritya yaducyate
tvayā vikalpānupapatteḥ iti nāsau doṣaḥ, vikalpatrayānāśrayād vikalpāntarāśrayaṇācca . kasmād vikalpāntarāditi cet, niṣṭhāsambandhayorekakālatvāt . kā niṣṭhā ? ityata āha --niṣṭhā kāraṇa

kālaḥ prāgasato vastubhāvaḥ niṣṭhānaṃ samāptiḥ.... sambandhaḥ svakāraṇasattāsamavāyaḥ .
tayorekakālatvam, svakāraṇasattāsambandha eva niṣṭhākālaḥ, kutaḥ ? samavāyasyaikatvāt, yasminneva kāle pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchat kāryaṃ kāraṇaiḥ sambadhyate samavāyasambandhena ayutasiddhihetunā tasminneva kāle sattādibhirapi, tasmādapravibhāgāt prāk
kāryotpatterasataḥ sadādiranāspado vikalpaḥ .--etadapi na, anupapannavikalpatvāt
asambandhāt avastutvāt . kathaṃ cāvastunaḥ kāraṇaiḥ sattayā vā sambandhaḥ ? yadi
tasya syāt khapuṣpasyāpi syāt .
sāmagryavyāpārakālaḥ, kāraṇānāṃ samavāyyasamavāyināṃ tantu-saṃyoga-daṇḍādīnāṃ sāmagryā avyāpārakālaḥ
paṭaniṣpattau turyādivyāpāroparamakāla ityarthaḥ . tameva vyācaṣṭe --prāgasato vastubhāvaḥ paṭādivastujanma
niṣṭhānaṃ samāptirityādiparyāyaiḥ . sambandhaḥ kaḥ ? ityata āha --sambandhaḥ svakāraṇasattāsamavāyaḥ,
svakāraṇeṣu tantuṣu kāryasya paṭasya sattayā ca samavāyaḥ . tayorniṣṭhāsambandhayorekakālatvam . taddarśayati —
svakāraṇasattāsambandha eva niṣṭhākālaḥ, svakāraṇaiḥ sattayā ca kāryasya yaḥ sambandhaḥ sa eva niṣṭhākāla
iti pratijñāya kutaḥ iti hetuṃ paripṛcchaya hetumāha --samavāyasyaikatvāt, samavāyo hi sambandhaḥ, sa
caiko dvayorapi, nitiṣṭhata eva sambandhāt kāraṇasattādibhiḥ . taddarśayati --yasminneva kāle pariniṣṭhāṃ
gacchat kāryamātmānaṃ labhamānaṃ paṭākhyaṃ kāraṇaistantvādibhiḥ sambadhyate samavāyasambandhena samavāyā-
khyena sambandheneti ayutasiddhihetunā saṃyogād yutasiddhihetorasya viśeṣaṃ darśayati, tasminneva kāle
sattādibhirapi sambadhyate iti vartate . ya eva kāraṇaiḥ kāryasya samavāyaḥ sa eva sattādravyatvādibhirapyekaḥ samavāyaḥ kālasyābhinnatvāt . tasmādapravibhāgaḥ, tad yasmād nāstyatra kālapravibhāgo niṣṭhāsambandhayoḥ tasmāt prāk ityetadeva nopapadyate kāryotpatterasataḥ sadādiranāspado vikalpa iti, satā
kāryeṇāsatā sadasatā vā sattāyāḥ sambandha ityarthābhāvāt kimāśrayo'sau vikalpaḥ syāt ? iti tāṃstrīnapi
vikalpānanāśritya niṣṭhāsambandhayorekakālatvavikalpo nirdoṣa āśrīyatāmiti .
atrocyate --etadapi na, anupapannavikalpatvāt . eṣo'pi vikalpo nopapadyate, tadanupapatterna doṣaparihāraḥ kṛtaḥ . kathamanupapanno'yaṃ vikalpa iti cet, asambandhāt, asambandho'pyavastutvāt,
khapuṣpasyāvastunaḥ kenacit sambandho nāsti tathā prāgutpatterasataḥ kāryasya sambandho nāsti . tasya ca kāryasya
pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchato'sattvādavastutvam, kathaṃ cāvastunaḥ kāraṇaiḥ sattayā vā sambandhaḥ ? pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchat
ityutpadyamānamasadevālabdhātmakatvāt tat kāryaṃ tasyāmavasthāyāṃ svakāraṇaiḥ sattayā vā na sambadhyate avastutvāt khapuṣpavat . yadi tasya syāt khapuṣpasyāpi syāt, yadi kāryaṃ pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchadaniṣpannamasat
kāraṇaiḥ sattayā ca sambadhyate tataḥ khapuṣpamapi pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchat svakāraṇaiḥ sattayā ca sambadhyeta, avastu-
tvāt kāryavat . tasmādayamapi vikalpaḥ asat sattayā sambadhyate ityetadvikalpāntaḥpātyeveti .


sambandhakāle tantuvad vastubhāvāt, bhavadeva ca sambadhyate pariniṣṭhānasambandhayorekakālatvāt . tasmāt sambandho vastuna eva kāryasya . punarapīdaṃ tadavasthameva,
loke hi sambadhyamānānāṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭam, na hi śaśaviṣāṇasya sambadhyamānatā dṛṣṭā,
na hi pariniṣṭhāyāḥ sambandhād vā sattvam, yadi syāt tadā hi śaśaviṣāṇamapi
niṣṭhāṃ gacchat sambadhyeta, kāryamapi vā na sambadhyeta .
samānatvānneti cet, sati asati ca sambandhādarśanatulyatvāt, yathā'sataḥ
khapuṣpādeḥ samavāyasambandhena dvividhena svakāraṇasattādibhiḥ sambadhyamānatā na dṛṣṭā
tadvat sato'pi sambadhyamānatā na dṛṣṭā; nahi sambadhyamānamaviśiṣṭamihādhikṛtam .

sambandhakāle tantuvad vastubhāvāt . syānmatam--nanu sambandhakāle'sti kāryamutpadyamānameva
vastu bhavati, paṭakāraṇaṃ tantava iva . bhavadeva ca pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchat sambadhyate pariniṣṭhānasambandhayorekakālatvāt, pariniṣṭhitaṃ sambaddhaṃ ca ityekaḥ kālaḥ, kālapravibhāgābhāvaḥ . tasmāt sambandho vastuna
eva kāryasya nāvastuna ityuktamiti .
atrocyate --punarapīdaṃ tadavasthameva, niṣpadyamānāvasthāyā utpatteḥ pūrvakālatvāt prāgutpatteśca kāryasyāsattvādasataḥ sambadhyamānatā khapuṣpāderiva kā ? no cet, tasyāmavasthāyāṃ kāryaṃ sadeva syāt svakāraṇaiḥ
sattayā ca sambadhyamānatvāt niṣpannakāryavat . loke hi sambadhyamānānāṃ sattvaṃ dṛṣṭamiti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ . na hi śaśaviṣāṇasya sambadhyamānatā dṛṣṭeti vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ, tadā na sambadhyate kāryam
asattvāt, khapuṣpavadityaniṣṭāpādanānumānaṃ vā . na hi pariniṣṭhāyāḥ sambandhād vā sattvamiti, na
hi pariniṣṭhā sambandho vānyatra dṛṣṭāvapi sattvamasataḥ kurutaḥ khapuṣpādeḥ, sata eva niṣṭhāsambandhadarśanāt .
yadi niṣṭhāyāḥ sambandhād vā sattvaṃ syāt tadā hi śaśaviṣāṇamapi niṣṭhāṃ gacchat sambadhyeta
niṣṭhitaṃ ca sambaddhaṃ ceti bhavet, asattvāt, kāryavat . kāryamapi vā pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchat svakāraṇaiḥ
sattayā ca na sambadhyeta, asattvāt, khapuṣpavat . tadeti ca tvaduktavad niṣṭhāsambandhayorekakālatvābhyupagamāvasthāyāṃ khapuṣpādyakāryasyāpi tadvadekalāle niṣṭhāsambandhau syātāṃ svakāraṇaiḥ sattayā cetyaniṣṭāpādanametaditaścetaśca .
samānatvānneti cet, syānmatam--naitadaniṣṭāpādanaṃ ghaṭate, kasmāt ? satyasati ca sambandhādarśanatulyatvāt . asya vyākhyā --yathā'sataḥ ityādi yāvadihādhikṛtamiti, yathaiva asataḥ khapuṣpādeḥ
samavāyasambandhena dvividhena svakāraṇasambandhena sattāsambandhena ca sambadhyamānatā na dṛṣṭā, ādigrahaṇād
dravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvādibhiśceti dṛṣṭāntaḥ . tadvadityādi dārṣṭāntikaṃ gatārtham, na hi sambadhyamānamaviśiṣṭaṃ
yat kiñcidihādhikṛtam, svakāraṇasvasattādivacanāditi .


atra brūmaḥ--sambandha eva sa na bhavati, satsu abhūtatvāt, śaśaviṣāṇavat . vidyamānaviṣayeṇaiva tena bhavitavyam, sambandhatvāt, dvyaṅgulisaṃyogavat .
yadi tvātmātmīyayoḥ paṭavyañjanayoḥ sadbhāve kāraṇāni tantavaḥ, sambadhyeraṃstena
paṭena . sa tu nāsti . ta eva tantavaḥ pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchantaḥ sambadhyanta iti kālāvibhāgaḥ kāryakāraṇasattāsambandhasya . tadā te yadi tantava ityeva, puruṣādikāraṇamātravādavadayaṃ vādaḥ syāt . satkāryavādo'pi na pratipūryeta, tantvākuṇḍalanavat pūrvottarakālatulyatvāt sambandhānarthakyaṃ pariniṣṭhā'pariniṣṭhā'viśeṣaśca . atha paṭo'pi,

atra brūmaḥ--sambandha eva sa na bhavati, satsu abhūtatvāt, śaśaviṣāṇavadityaniṣṭāpādanasādhanenāsatsatoḥ sambandhasyātulyatā pradarśyate . svakāraṇaiḥ svasattayā ca kāryasya sambandhaḥ prāgapi sata
eveti . tadarthasādhanaṃ cedam --vidyamānaviṣayeṇaiva tena samavāyasambandhena bhavitavyam, sambandhatvāt,
yathā saṃyogo dve aṅgulī vidyamāne eva viṣayīkurute sambandhaśabdavācyatvāt tathā samavāyo'pi kāryakāraṇe
vidyamāne eva viṣayīkurute dvyādiparādhīnavṛttitvāditi .
ataḥ śabdārthavyavahāradvāreṇātraiva doṣābhidhitsayedamāha --yadi tvātmetyādi . svakāraṇāni
svasattā ityatra svaśabdasya ātmā-''tmīya-dhanaparyāyasya ihātmani ātmīye yathāvivakṣaṃ vṛttiḥ syāt, sa
ca kāryo'rthaḥ . tayoḥ paṭavyañjanayoḥ sadbhāve kurvanti kāryaṃ paṭamiti kāraṇāni tantavaḥ sambadhyeraṃstena paṭena,
sa tu nāsti paṭaḥ, tadabhāve kiṃviṣayaṃ kāraṇānāṃ kartṛtvamityarthaḥ . vyañjanasadbhāvakartṛtvanirviṣayāḥ ta eva 
tantavaḥ pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchantaḥ sambadhyante khapuṣpeṇeva kāryakāraṇanirapekṣāḥ pariniṣṭhitāḥ sambaddhāśceti kālāvibhāgaḥ kāryakāraṇasattāsambandhasyetyetadāpannam . tataḥ ko doṣa iti cet, ukto'satā sambandhābhāvaḥ .
punarapītthamucyate --tadā te yadi tantava ityeva kāryābhāvāt kāraṇatvavyāpāravimukhāḥ kevalaṃ tantava
iti puruṣādikāraṇamātramevedam itivādavadayaṃ vādaḥ syāt, kuto'satkāryavādaḥ ? satkāryavādo'pi
sāṅkhyābhimataḥ prakṛtyantarlīnā vikārāḥ iti so'pi na pratipūryeta, stimitasaraḥsalilavad gaganavadvā
nirvyāpārakāraṇamātravādābhyupagamāt na pratipūryeteti, mā vocaṃ na pratipūryata eva iti niṣṭhuramiti sānunayamucyate . kimiva ? tantvākuṇḍalanavat, yathā tantūnāmākuṇḍalīkṛtānāṃ puñjitānāmityarthaḥ, kuvindatanana-pāyana-prasāraṇa-vayanādikriyānirapekṣāṇāṃ kāraṇatvaṃ nāsti, tatrātyantaṃ paṭakāryādarśanāt, na hi kuṇḍaliteṣu paṭo dṛśyate, tathā kāraṇamātramasampūrṇasatkāryametat, pūrvottarakālatulyatvāditi, evaṃ nirvyāpārapūrvottarakālatulyatantumātratāyāṃ paṭākhyasya kāryasya kaścid gandho'pi nāsti, atastena sambandhānarthakyaṃ
kāraṇānāṃ tantūnāṃ khapuṣpeṇeva . kiñcānyat, pariniṣṭhāpariniṣṭhāviśeṣaśca, doṣopacayaḥ, khapuṣpavat kārya

tataḥ svakāraṇasattāsambandhadvayatantupaṭadvayasānāthyaṃ nānekāntānāśrayaṇe .
asatsambandhaparihārārthaṃ ca niṣṭhāsambandhayorekakālatvāt ityetadeva vākyaṃ
sabhāṣyaṃ praśasto'nyathā vyācaṣṭe--sambandhaśca sambandhaśca sambandhau, niṣṭhāyāḥ
syātyantamasattvāt kāraṇānāṃ cātyantaṃ pūrvottarakālatulyatvādākāśavat kiṃ kathaṃ pariniṣṭhitaṃ tiṣṭhati na
parinitiṣṭhati ? sarvaṃ hi sarvadā sarvathā pariniṣṭhitamapariniṣṭhitaṃ vā syādityaviśeṣaḥ . evamasampūrṇasatkāryakāraṇamātravāditvaṃ sambandhānarthakyaṃ niṣṭhāniṣṭhāviśeṣaśceti doṣāḥ svasiddhāntoparodhinaste .
atha paṭo'pi . atha mā bhūvannete doṣā iti paṭo'pi kenacid nyāyena tantuṣvasti ityabhyupagamyate so'pyabhyupagamavirodhāyaikāntavādinaste'nekāntavādābhyupagamo jāyata ityata āha --tataḥ svakāraṇasattāsambandhadvayatantupaṭadvayasānāthyaṃ nānekāntānāśrayaṇe, paṭasya kāryasya svakāraṇaistantubhiḥ
svasattayā ceti dvau sambandhau tāveva kāryaṃ kāraṇāni ca dvāvarthāviti tadeva taccatuṣṭayam, avyaktasan
paṭaḥ tantvavasthāyāṃ tantubhiḥ svakāraṇaiḥ svasattayā ca sambaddhaḥ kuvindādikārakavyāpārottarakālaṃ vyaktasan
bhavati paṭātmanā pariṇateriti dravyaparyāyātmakasyādvādaparameśvarāśrayaprabhāvalabhyametad vacanasāmarthyaṃ nānyatheti .
tasmādeṣo'pi vikalpo'satsambandhadoṣaduṣṭa iti .
asatsambandhaparihārārthaṃ cetyādi . niṣṭhāsambandhayorekakālatvāt ityetadeva vākyaṃ
sabhāṣyamasatsambandhadoṣaparijihīrṣayā vidvasyan praśasto'nyathā vyācaṣṭe --sambandhaśca sambandhaśca sambandhau,
niṣṭhāyāḥ sambandhau niṣṭhāsambandhau, na niṣṭhā ca sambandhaśceti . tayorniṣṭhāsambandhayorekakālatvāt .

sambandhau niṣṭhāsambandhau, tayorekakālatvāt . niṣṭhitaṃ niṣṭhā, kārakaparispandād
vastubhāvamāpannamavyapadeśyādhāraṃ kāryaṃ niṣṭhitaṃ niṣṭhā ityucyate, tasya svakāraṇaiḥ
sattayā ca yugapat sambandhau bhavataḥ . bhāṣyamapi pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchad gatam ityetamarthaṃ darśayati, vartamānasāmīpye vartamānavadvā pā॰ 3 . 3 . 131 iti . yathā kārakāntaramutpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ kārakavyāpārād vastubhāvamāpannamavyapadeśyādhāraṃ nirvṛttaṃ sat svakāraṇaiḥ
sattayā ca sambadhyate tathā paṭākhyam .
tadapi na, samavāyikāraṇatvavirodhāt svavacanābhyupagamavirodhau . kiñca,
niṣṭhitasya kāryasya kāraṇaiḥ sattayā ca sambandho yutasiddhasambandhaḥ, kāryasya kāraṇebhyo'nyatra pariniṣṭhitatvāt .
niṣṭhitaṃ niṣṭhā, niṣṭhāṃ gacchad gatamityeko'rthaḥ . kartrādīnāṃ kārakāṇāṃ kuvinda-turi-vemādīnāṃ parispandād
vastubhāvaṃ vastubhavanamāpannaṃ niṣpannamavyapadeśyādhāram, avyapadeśya ādhāro'sya tantvādiḥ samavāyi-
hetuḥ, iha tantuṣu paṭaḥ itīhapratyayābhidhānakāraṇasya samavāyasambandhasya nimittabhūtaṃ paṭākhyaṃ kāryaṃ niṣṭhitaṃ
niṣṭhā ityucyate . tasya niṣṭhitasya svakāraṇaiḥ sattayā ca yugapat sambandhau bhavataḥ .
bhāṣyamapīti asya vākyasya vyākhyāgrantho'pyayaṃ pariniṣṭhāṃ gacchad gatamityetamarthaṃ darśayati . kena
punarlakṣaṇena gataṃ sad gacchadityucyate ? brūmaḥ --vartamānasāmīpye vartamānavadvā pā॰ 3 . 3 . 131 iti .
kimiva ? ityato nidarśanamāha --yathā kārakāntaramutpadyamānaṃ dṛṣṭamiti, kārakādanyat kārakaṃ kārakāntaramutpadyamānamutpannamityarthaḥ . kasmāt ? dṛṣṭam ityakṣigocarāpannārthanirdeśāt, itarathā dṛṣṭaṃ na syāt,
utpadyamānasyānutpannatve'kṣigocaratvānupapatteḥ . tat punaḥ katamat ? kārakavyāpārād devadatta-sthālīkāṣṭhādīnāṃ vyāpārād vastubhāvam ātmalābhamāpannaṃ pūrvavadavyapadeśyādhāraṃ nirvṛttaṃ sadodanādyākhyaṃ svakāraṇaistaṇḍulādibhiḥ sattayā ca sambadhyate tathā paṭākhyamiti .
atra brūmaḥ --tadapi na, samavāyikāraṇatvavirodhāt svavacanavirodho'bhyupagamavirodhaśca
doṣāvitthaṃ bruvataḥ . kriyāvad guṇavat samavāyikāraṇaṃ dravyamuktam, samavāyino dravyāntarasya guṇakarmaṇoścārambhakatvāt . yadi punarvastubhāvaṃ gataṃ kāryaṃ dravyāditrayaṃ kāraṇaiḥ sattayā cābhisambadhyate tato'nārambhakāṇi akāraṇāni ca tantvādikāraṇadravyāṇi syuḥ, tataśca svavacanamabhyupagamaśca nivartete samavāyināṃ
kāryāṇāṃ dravyam iti . kiñcetyādi yāvat pariniṣṭhitatvāditi . etāvapi svavacanābhyupagamavirodhau,
yasmāt kāryakāraṇaguṇaguṇivyaktyākṛtīnāmayutasiddhaḥ samavāyaḥ sambandha ukto'bhyupagataśca, idānīṃ niṣṭhitasya
kāryasya kāraṇaiḥ sattayā ca sambandho'bhyupagataḥ, sa ca yutasiddhasambandhaḥ, kāryasya kāraṇebhyo'nyatra
pariniṣṭhitatvād ghaṭākāśavat .


yattūcyate--samavāyikāraṇatvanivṛttiriti cet, na, anyatrāsamavāyāt . yadi tasya... ...
tasmādadoṣaḥ vai॰ sū॰ praśastamati॰ iti, so'pyaparihāraḥ, icchāmātratvāt svoktopapattiviruddhārthatvāt tadasambaddhatvāt anyatra pariniṣṭhitatvāt tantuṣviva ghaṭasya tatrāpravṛttatvāt tatrānārambhāt tadasambaddhotpattitvāt .
kāryasya cotpattivat khapuṣpamutpadyatām, kāraṇairasambaddhatvāt . akāraṇatvāditi cet, paṭādyapi motpādi akāraṇatvāt khapuṣpavat, tadvotpadyatām .
yathā tantvādīni teṣvasataḥ sato'pyakāraṇāni kāryasya tathā sarvatra kāraṇaṃ

yattūcyata ityādi yāvat tasmādadoṣa iti dravyasamavāyikāraṇatvanivṛttidoṣaparihāro yo'bhihitaḥ
samavāyikāraṇatvanivṛttiriti cedityāśaṅkya --na, anyatrāsamavāyāditi . tadvyākhyānaṃ yadi
tasyetyādi sulikhitatvād na vivriyate . so'pyaparihāra icchāmātratvāt, kāryasya niṣṭhitasya kāraṇaiḥ
sambandhoktiranyatrasamavāyākhyāyinī na, anyatrāsamavāyāt ityuttaravākyaṃ viruṇaddhi, taccetaravirodhi,
tato'nupapatterviruddhārthatvādicchāmātraṃ te vaco na parihāra ityata āha --svoktopapattiviruddhārthatvāt,
viruddhārthatvamasambaddhatvāt taiḥ kāraṇaiḥ kāryasya, tadasambaddhatvamanyatra pariniṣṭhitatvāt, kimiva ?
tantuṣviva ghaṭasya, yathā tantuṣu ghaṭasyāniṣṭhitatvādanyatra kapāleṣu niṣṭhitatvāt tantubhirasambaddhatvamevaṃ dravyādikāryasya . tadasiddhamiti cet, na, tatrāpravṛttatvāt tantuṣviva ghaṭasya iti vartate . tatrāpravṛttatvamanyatra
pravṛttatvaṃ ca tatrānārambhāt, tatra cānārambhaḥ tadasambaddhotpattitvāt, taiḥ kāraṇairasambaddhasya paṭasyotpatteriṣṭatvāt tavaiva ārambha-pravṛtti-niṣṭhāstantuṣu paṭasya na santi ghaṭasyevākāśasyeva khapuṣpasyeva vā . sāmānyenaika eva vā hetuḥ tadasambaddhotpattitvāditi .
aniṣṭāpādanaṃ cātra --kāryasya cetyādi . khapuṣpamutpadyatām, kāraṇairasambaddhatvāt, tvadabhimatakāryavat . akāraṇatvāditi cet, niṣkāraṇaṃ ca khapuṣpam, paṭādi sakāraṇam, tasmād dṛṣṭāntadārṣṭāntikayorvaiṣamyādayuktamidamaniṣṭāpādanamiti cet, ucyate --paṭādyapītyādi, paṭādyapi kāryaṃ motpādi,
akāraṇatvāt, khapuṣpavat . akāraṇatvaṃ cāsya kāraṇāsambaddhatvādākāśavat . tadvotpadyatāmiti, kāraṇāsambaddhasya kāryasyotpattivat khapuṣpaṃ votpadyatāmakāraṇatvādityuktameva .
yathā tantvādīnīti, tantvādīnāṃ kāraṇatvaṃ kāryeṇa sambandhādṛte nāsti, tasmāt teṣvasataḥ

yathāyogaṃ svasyaiva kāryasya nāsato nānyakāryasya vā asambandhāt . tasmādasti
sambandhaḥ prāgapi .
yo'yaṃ sambandhasamavāyaśabdārthaḥ so'pi evameva ghaṭate . ekībhāvena bandhaḥ
sambandhaḥ, anekasarvātmakatvāt . ekībhāvena gatiḥ ayaḥ avagatyā samavāyaḥ kāraṇasatkāryaikatvalakṣaṇaḥ .
tadāpattibhayāt tvayedamamārgapramardanaṃ kriyate yadidamavyapadeśyādhāratvam .
vyapadeśyādhāraṃ dravyādikāryaṃ samavetaṃ ca svakāraṇaiḥ prāgapi, pariniṣṭhitatvāt, vibhuparimaṇḍalaviyadādivat .
sato'pyakāraṇāni kāryasya atyantāsataḥ khapuṣpasyeva ghaṭasyeva vā kāraṇāntarasādhyasyetyuktamupanayati --sarvatra
kāraṇamityādi, karoti iti kāraṇaṃ kartṛsādhanam, khapuṣpādi ghaṭādi vā tantubhirna kriyate tatastatrākāraṇāni, paṭastu kriyate tasmāt tasya kāraṇāni, yo yo yogo yathāyogaṃ svasyaiva kāryasya tantavaḥ paṭasya
kapālāni ghaṭasya, nāsato nānyakāryasya vā, kasmāt ? asambandhāt, kāryakāraṇabhāvaśca sambaddhatve
sati bhavati, tasmādsti sambandhaḥ prāgapi kāryotpattestatkāraṇaiḥ sambandho'sti . kathaṃ tat kāryaṃ tad nitiṣṭhati
kāraṇairasambaddham ? tasmāt kāryamavyaktasad vyaktasad bhavati sambaddhaṃ ca sadā svakāraṇaiḥ ityanumīyate .
sambandhasamavāyaśabdārthāvapyevameva ghaṭete, nānyathetyato yo'yamityādyāha . sam ityekārthībhāvavācyayamupasargaḥ, ekībhāvena bandhaḥ sambandhaḥ anekaṃ kāraṇākhyaṃ vastu sadekameva kāryākhyaṃ bhavati paraspareṇa
badhyate tamarthamāha, anekasarvātmakatvāt anekasya tantvādeḥ pratisvamātmānamaparityajya sarvaikasaṅghātabhava-
nena paṭādikāryākhyena pariṇateḥ . ekībhāvena gatiḥ gamanapariṇatirayaḥ, ava apagamane, avagatyā
apagamanena prācyasaṃsthānādidharmāṇāṃ tyāgena dravyaparyāyābhyāṃ tantutvāparityāgena paṭatvapariṇāmaḥ sambandhaḥ
samavāya ityakṣarārthānusāreṇoktvā vastuni sphuṭīkartumāha --kāraṇasatkāryaikatvalakṣaṇaḥ, kāraṇeṣu viprakīrṇeṣu satkāryamekatvamāpanneṣu paṭībhavad vyāktiṃ yātītyeṣa paramārthaḥ .
tadāpattibhayādityādi . eṣa dravyaparyāyātmakasyādvādaparamārthavādaṃ mā prapatsye'ham ityakasmādbhayāt
svapakṣarāgasamutthāt parapakṣadveṣācca tvayedamamārgapramardanamasthāne śaktikṣayāyaivaṃ kriyate . katamadamārgapramardanamiti cet, ucyate --yadidamavyapadeśyādhāratvaṃ prāg vyākhyātam . tat punaḥ kimarthamārabhyate ?
iheti yataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ sa samavāyaḥ vai॰ sū॰ 7 . 2 . 29 iti ihabuddhyabhidhānābhyāṃ kāryakāraṇagatābhyāṃ samavāyo'numīyate, so'tra na sambhavati kāryasyāsattvāt, tasmādavyapadeśyādhārakāryasambandhakalpanā kriyate . ayamutpathagamanakleśo nirarthakaśca, so'pi ca mithyābhidhāna eva . avyapadeśyādhāraṃ
dravyādikāryamasamavetaṃ vā kāraṇaiḥ prāgutpatteriti mā maṃsthāḥ, manyatāṃ tu tatraivāstīti . tathā ca mantavyam —
vyapadeśyādhāraṃ dravyādikāryaṃ samavetaṃ ca svakāraṇaiḥ prāgapi nirvṛttestvanmatenaiva pariniṣṭhitatvād

yo'pi ca parihāro'bhihitaḥ--na, asyāsaṃyogāt, na hi kāraṇasambandhibhiḥ kāryasya
saṃyogo'sti vai॰ sū॰ praśastamati॰, so'pi na parihāraḥ, uktavadasaṃyogāsiddhatvāt .
tattvopanilayanāt sadādyabhidhānārthaṃ kāraṇasamavetasya vastuna uttarakālaṃ sattāsambandha iti bahūnāṃ matam . vastūtpattikāle eva iti tu vākyakārābhiprāyo'nusṛto
vastubhāvamāpannatvāt, vibhuparimaṇḍalaviyadādivat, yathā vibhutvaparimāṇānyākāśakāladigātmadravyāṇi
pariniṣṭhitatvād vibhutvaguṇasamavetāni vyapadeśyādhārāṇi ca tathā dravyādikāryam, parimaṇḍalaparimāṇāḥ
paramāṇavaḥ parimaṇḍalatvena samavetā vyapadeśyādhārāśca dvyaṇukādikārye, vibhutvaparimaṇḍalatvaguṇayorvāśrayabhūtayorvākāśaparamāṇvordvyaṇukādivyapadeśyādhāratvaṃ samavetatvaṃ ca siddhaṃ tathā dravyādikāryasyeti . evaṃ
tāvat pariniṣṭhitasambandhau bruvato dravyasya samavāyikāraṇatvanivṛttiprasaṅgaparihāro'samarthaḥ .
yo'pi cetyādi . asmaduktasya kāryakāraṇayutasiddhidoṣasya parihāro yo'bhihitaḥ --na, asyāsaṃyogāditi . tad vyācaṣṭe --na hi kāraṇasambandhibhiḥ kāryasya saṃyogo'sti, yathā dvayoraṅgulyorākāśe
yujyamānayoḥ saṃyogasya dvyaṅgulākāśasaṃyogakāraṇasya sambandhinyoryutasiddhayoḥ saṃyogo na tathā kāraṇasambandhibhiḥ kāryasya dravyādeḥ kaiścit saṃyogo'sti yato yutasiddhidoṣa āpadyeta pṛthaksiddhayoriva . tasmādasaṃyogāt saṃyogavaidharmyāt pṛthaksiddhyabhāva iti .
atrocyate --so'pi na parihāraḥ, uktavadasaṃyogāsiddhatvāt . yadi tatra pariniṣṭhitaṃ pravṛttamārabdhaṃ
kathaṃ tenāsambaddham ? ityādinā prapañcena sambaddhameva ityuktaṃ sambandhasamavāyaśabdārthavyākhyānena ca .
tasmāduktavadasaṃyogasyāsiddhatvādaparihāraḥ . yadi tatrotpannatādyasiddhiḥ sambandhāsiddhiśca syāt syādasaṃyogaḥ,
tataḥ parihāraśca yutasiddhidoṣasya syāt . evaṃ tāvad vyākhyāntaramapyayuktam .
idānīṃ sūtrakāramataṃ samarthayatāṃ vākya-bhāṣya-ṭīkākārāṇāṃ matāni samāhṛtya pradhānānugāmitvāccheṣāṇāṃ sūtrakāramatamevetthaṃ dūṣayitumāha--tattvopanilayanāt sadādyabhidhānārthaṃ kāraṇasamavetasya vastuna uttara


bhāṣyakāraiḥ . siddhasya vastunaḥ svakāraṇaiḥ svasattayā ca sambandha iti prāśastamato'bhiprāyaḥ . teṣāṃ trayāṇāmapyasatyatā, parasparaviruddhārthatvāt, kumārabrahmacāripitṛtvavat .
idameva codāharaṇamanyatra . evaṃ vaktari vā śāstrakāre sarveṣāmanuvartitvāt sa evānāpto'satyavādī vetyetadapi syāt . sadādivikalpānupapattiśca tadavasthaiva uktavat .
yat punaḥ dravyādīnāṃ svata evābhidhānapratyayaviṣayatvaṃ sattvāt sattādivat .
yathā sattādeḥ sadabhidhānapratyayau svata eva, na sattāyogāt, evaṃ dravyādīnāmapi sadabhidhānapratyayau svata eva, na sattāyogāt ityukte ucyate--naitat, atādātmyāt .
dravyādīnāmasadātmatvāt sattānimittaṃ sadabhidhānādi daṇḍanimittādaṇḍadaṇḍitva-
kālaṃ sattāsambandha iti bahūnāṃ matam . vastūtpattikāla eveti tu vākyakārābhiprāyo'nusṛto bhāṣyakāraiḥ .
siddhasya vastunaḥ svakāraṇaiḥ svasattayā ca sambandha iti prāśastamato'bhiṃprāyaḥ . asmadabhiprāyaḥ --teṣāṃ
trayāṇāmapyasatyateti . kasmāt ? parasparaviruddhārthatvāt . darśitā viruddhārthatā . kimiva ? kumārabrahmacāripitṛtvavat, yadi pitā kathaṃ kumārabrahmacārī ? atha kumārabrahmacārī kathaṃ piteti ? idameva codāharaṇamanyatreti, svoktopapattyabhyupagamaviruddhārthatvādiṣvapyetadevodāharaṇaṃ vācyamiti . evaṃ vaktari vetyādi .
sarveṣāṃ vākya-bhāṣya-ṭīkākārāṇāṃ śāstrakāramatānuvartitvāt sa evānāpto'satyavādī vetyetadapi syāditi
lokānuvṛttyā sāśaṅkamivocyate, mā bhūt tīrthakaragauravākṛṣṭamatibhiḥ anāpta eva iti niṣṭhuravacanakupitaiḥ
saha tadbhaktaiḥ kalaha iti .
kiñcānyat, sadādivikalpānupapattiśca tadavasthaiva uktavat, niṣṭhāsambandhayorekakālatvāt
iti bruvatāpi kiṃ kāryasya sattayā sambandhaḥ sato'sataḥ sadasato vā ? ityupālambhānna mocita evātmā .
tadyathā--kāryasya kiṃ sattayā sambandho niṣṭhitasyāniṣṭhitasya niṣṭhitāniṣṭhitasya ? iti samānapracarcatvāt 
na śabdāntaramātroccāraṇād doṣaparihāraḥ .
yat punardravyādīnāmityādi . dravyādīnāṃ svata evābhidhānapratyayaviṣayatvaṃ sattvāt, svataḥ
sattvāt, svabhāvasattvādityarthaḥ . kimiva ? sattādivadityādi savyākhyānamaniṣṭāpādanasādhanaṃ vaiśeṣikaṃ prati
gatārthaṃ yāvad na sattāyogādityukte ucyate parihāraḥ kila kāṇādaiḥ --naitat, atādātmyāt, sa
ātmā yasya tat tadātma sattādi, tadbhāvastādātmyam, tadvaidharmyādatādātmyād dravyādīnām, tadvyākhyā
yāvadabhidhānādīti gatārtham . daṇḍanimittādaṇḍadaṇḍitvavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, yathā daṇḍo'syāstīti daṇḍī
iti daṇḍitvamadaṇḍadaṇḍino daṇḍanimittamevaṃ dravyāderasadātmanaḥ sattānimittaṃ sadabhidhānādīti .


vaditi . atra vayaṃ sampradhārayāmaḥ--kathamidaṃ tādātmyam ? kiṃ sato bhāvāt uta
satkaratvāt ? tad yadi tāvat svato bhavanaṃ tataḥ sarveṇāpi satā bhūyate svata evetyuktam . atha satkaratvāt, tat prāk pratyuktam . yathā ca sattāyāṃ svata eva sadabhidhānapratyayau tadātmatvāt evaṃ dravyādau dravyatvādau ca tadātmatvaṃ sadabhidhānapratyayakāraṇaṃ sarvatra sati .
daṇḍe'pi ca tādātmyādeva daṇḍābhidhānapratyayasiddhau svata eva daṇḍini daṇḍyabhidhānapratyayau tādātmyena vinā na bhavataḥ . yathā ca... ... ....
athocyeta--daṇḍo'pi daṇḍavyatiriktād daṇḍatvād daṇḍābhidhānapratyayabhāk .
anudāharaṇaṃ tarhi daṇḍī, daṇḍād daṇḍyabhāvāt . daṇḍatvopapāditadaṇḍād daṇḍīti

atra vayaṃ sampradhārayāmastvayā saha --kathamidaṃ tādātmyam ? kiṃ sato bhāvāt, yat sad
bhavati tat tasya satastādātmyamātmalābhaḥ svarūpānubhavanam ? uta satkaratvam ? iti . tad yadi tāvat sato
bhavanaṃ tataḥ sarveṇāpi satā bhūyate sattādinā dravyādinā vā svata evetyuktam . atha satkaratvāt tādātmyāt
sad bhavatīti, tat prāk pratyuktam . svataḥ siddhasya dravyādeḥ sattā satkarī na bhavati vaiyarthyāt, asato'sattvāt
khapuṣpavat, sadasataḥ sambhavābhāvādityuktam .
yathā ca sattāyāmityādi bhāvanārtham . dravyāderdravyatvādeśca svata eva sadabhidhānapratyayau tadātmatvāt sattāvaditi . sataśca dravyādestadātmatvaṃ sadātmatvaṃ dravyādeḥ, evaṃ dravyatvaguṇatvasattādinityaikasarvatrageṣu
sāmānya-sāmānyaviśeṣaśūnyeṣvapi sadabhidhānapratyayau . sarvatra satīti sarvavyāpitāṃ nyāyasyāsya darśayati .
kiñcānyat, daṇḍe'pi cetyādi . yo'pi daṇḍitvavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ so'pi tādātmyādeva daṇḍasya
bhavanātmatvādeva daṇḍābhidhānapratyayasiddhau satyāṃ svata eva daṇḍini devadatte daṇḍī ityabhidhānaṃ pratyayaṃ ca
kurvati tāvabhidhānapratyayau tādātmyāt ityanenārthena vinā na bhavataḥ, ato'smadiṣṭamarthaṃ sādhayati, itarathā
daṇḍikuṇḍalyaviśeṣaḥ syāt . sādhanaṃ cātra--daṇḍo'pi svarūpābhidhānapratyayakārī svata eva, tādātmyāt,
sattāvat, tathā daṇḍyapi tata eva tadvat . yathā cetyādi, evaṃ ca sati daṇḍatvasāmānyaviśeṣanirapekṣaḥ
svata eva bhavati daṇḍaḥ, tādātmyāt, sattāvaditi siddham .
athocyetetyādi . vaiśeṣiko daṇḍamapi daṇḍatvād daṇḍavyatiriktād manyate daṇḍābhidhānapratyayabhājam . ācāryo bravīti --anudāharaṇaṃ tarhi daṇḍī, daṇḍād daṇḍyabhāvāt . daṇḍasya svato'siddhatvād daṇḍī na sidhyati, parataḥ sattvasiddhyarthaṃ codāhriyate daṇḍī, daṇḍāsiddheḥ kutastatsiddhiḥ ? iti .

cet, itaretarāśrayamidam, daṇḍatvatattvād daṇḍasiddhiḥ, daṇḍaviśeṣaṇasādhitadaṇḍisiddheḥ punardaṇḍatvatattvasiddhiḥ .
daṇḍīti ca kathamiti nirdhāryam . yadi daṇḍādeva, svataḥ siddhāt siddha ityuktam . atha daṇḍatvāt, daṇḍatvī bhavatu, mā bhūddaṇḍī, ātmāntarasaṅkāntiścaivam .
vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ--svata eva bhavati, tadabhāve'sāmānyātmakatvameva sarvasya syāt . yathā
daṇḍe evaṃ satyapi... ... ....
yadapyuktam 'atadātmatvād dravyādīnāṃ sadabhidhānapratyayau sattāyogāt, na
daṇḍatvopapāditadaṇḍād daṇḍīti cet, daṇḍatvasāmānyaviśeṣād daṇḍaḥ sidhyati, daṇḍād daṇḍīti,
tata udāharaṇasiddhirviśeṣaṇādeva viśeṣyasiddheḥ, evaṃ cenmanyase, idamāpatitam--daṇḍatvatattvād daṇḍaḥ
sidhyati, daṇḍatvatattvaṃ punardaṇḍaviśeṣaṇasādhitadaṇḍitvasiddheḥ sidhyati, tadidamitaretarāśrayaṃ jāyate, itaretarāśrayāṇi ca na prakalpante, tadyathā naurnāvi baddhā netaratrāṇāyeti tatpratipādanārtho granthaḥ --itaretaretyādirgatārtho yāvat tattvasiddhiriti .
daṇḍī iti ca devadattaḥ sa daṇḍatvād daṇḍād vā katham ? iti nirdhāryam . daṇḍo'syāstīti
daṇḍī devadattaḥ . sa yadi daṇḍādeva, svataḥ siddhāt siddha ityuktam . atha daṇḍatvāt daṇḍatvamasyāsti
iti daṇḍatvī bhavatu, mā bhūd daṇḍī, yuktaṃ tāvad daṇḍād daṇḍī, na tu daṇḍatvāt, svata eva ca
bhaveddaṇḍī . kiñcānyat, ātmāntarasaṅkrāntiścaivam, daṇḍatvādātmāntaraṃ daṇḍo daṇḍī ca, daṇḍād
daṇḍatvadaṇḍinau, daṇḍino daṇḍadaṇḍatve, daṇḍaḥ svata evābhavan daṇḍatvād bhavaṃstadātmā bhavati, evaṃ daṇḍyapīti . vayaṃ tu brūmaḥ--yat tad daṇḍena bhūyate tasyaiva daṇḍatvāt yaddaṇḍo daṇḍo bhavati tadeva daṇḍo bhavati
ātmānaṃ labhate bhāvāntaraviviktaṃ yat tena bhūyate tadeva bhavanaṃ daṇḍatvaṃ na tadvyatiriktād, na daṇḍatvatattvāt .
evaṃ devadattasya daṇḍino'pyātmānubhavanaṃ tattvam . tadabhāve'sāmānyātmakatvameva sarvasya syāt,
yadi sā daṇḍadaṇḍyādivyaktiḥ svata eva na bhavati sattā-dravyatva-daṇḍatva-daṇḍitvāditattvād bhavati
svata eva abhavantī nāstyeva sā khapuṣpavat . tataścāsāmānyameva sattādi syāt, taccāniṣṭam, svata eva
bhavataḥ samānasyābhāvāt sāmānyameva sāmānyaṃ na syāt . tasmāt svata eva daṇḍo bhavati svata eva ca
sadabhidhānapratyayau, na sattāyogāt . yathā daṇḍe evaṃ satyapītyādi gatārthaṃ sādhanam . evaṃ tāvat tādātmyāt sattādiṣu sadabhidhānādītyayuktam .
yadapyuktam--atadātmatvādityādi asattātmakatvād dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ sadabhidhānapratyayau sattāyogāt, na svata iti . tadapi na, atadātmakatvādityādiranaikāntikatvāt anaikāntikatvapratipādanārtho
grantho yāvad dravyatvādivaditi . tasya bhāvanā --dravyatvādīnāmatādātmye dravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvaghaṭatva

svataḥ' iti, tadapi na, atadātmakatvāt...dravyatvādivat . dravyatvādīnāmatādātmye
svataḥ sadabhidhānapratyayau, ekaikatvāt, ātmavat, dravyatvādiṣu svato bhavantyāḥ
sattāyāḥ sadabhidhānaṃ dṛṣṭamevaṃ dravyādīnāmapi svata eva .
sattāsambandhābhāve'pi asaṅkhyayorapi guṇatvakarmatvayorekābhidhānapratyayavat
sadabhidhānapratyayau dravyatvādiṣvaupacārikau syātāmiti cet, dravyādiṣvapyaupacārikau syātāṃ tulyatvāt .
manuṣyasiṃhatvādivat tathā añjasā anupapatterneti cet, tataste svapakṣe eva
doṣavidhānam . yadi tu... ... .... etat punaḥ sa eva praṣṭavyaḥ .
yat punaridamucyate--sattāyāṃ siddha iti cet,...ātmānamātmanā na yuktama-
rūpatvotkṣepaṇatvādīnāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣāṇāmasattātmakatve svataḥ sadabhidhānapratyayau, na sattātaḥ . kasmāt ?
ekaikatvāt . ekameva dravyatvaṃ sarvadravyeṣu, dravyatvāntarāniṣṭeḥ tatra sattāyogo neṣyate, anupravṛttyabhāvāt .
tathāpi ca sat ityabhidhīyate pratīyate ca, evaṃ guṇatvādīnyapi . tasmādekaikatvāt svataḥ sattvamātmavat
sattāvadityarthaḥ, sa ca dṛṣṭāntaḥ svato dravyatvādibhavane . tasya varṇanā --dravyatvādiṣu bhinneṣu svato
bhavantyāḥ sattāyāḥ ekasyāḥ sadabhidhānaṃ dṛṣṭamevaṃ dravyādīnāmapi svata eveti sādhanenopapādito'rthaḥ .
āha --sattāsambandhetyādi . guṇatvamekaṃ karmatvamekam ityekābhidhānapratyayau asaṅkhyayorapi
guṇatvakarmatvayoraupacārikau dṛṣṭau tathā sadabhidhānapratyayau dravyatvādiṣvaupacārikau syātāmiti ko doṣaḥ ?
atrocyate --dravyādiṣvapītyādi tulyatvāpādanamaupacārikatvena gatārtham .
āha --manuṣyasiṃhatvādivat tathāñjasā'nupapatterneti cet, yathā śauryakrauryādidharmāḥ siṃhe
mukhyāḥ siddhāḥ santo manuṣye śakyā upacarituṃ nāsiddhāstathā dravyādiṣūpacaritau syātāṃ yadyanyatrāñjasā
siddhau sadabhidhānapratyayau, na tu tau kvacit siddhau, bhāktavyavahāraśca āñjasādṛte nāsti, tasmād dravyādiṣveva mukhyāviti evaṃ cenmanyase tataste svapakṣa eva doṣavidhānam . tad bhāvayati --yadi tvityādi,
sattādiṣvapyāñjasayorasiddhatvāditi bhāvārthaḥ . etat punaḥ sa eva praṣṭavya iti, svabhāvasattāpekṣau
sadabhidhānapratyayāvicchatāṃ kiṃ naḥ sattāsambandhakalpanayā ? tava punaḥ sattāsambandhādicchato duṣpratipādaṃ
bhāvasattāvyatiriktatādātmyavādinaḥ, tasmāt tvamevāsi praṣṭavya iti .
yat punaridamucyate--sattāyāṃ siddha iti cediti sabhāṣyaṃ gatārtham . iyaṃ punarāśaṅkā kaṃ prati
yuktā ? dravyādivyatiriktāṃ sattāṃ svata eva siddhāṃ tadātmikāmicchantam, sa punarnānyo vaiśeṣikāt, tasmā

bhiyoktum... ... ...tadyoganimittam, yadā vā... ...tadyoganimittaṃ nanūttaramapyetadayuktam . asattātmanāṃ dravyādīnāṃ mukhyau sadabhidhānapratyayau kathaṃ yuktau manorathavat ?... ... ....
naiva tu... ... ...daṇḍitvadaṇḍatvavat svata eva satoḥ tatsambaddhatvāt satvataḥ
sattvāt sattvavat sadeva svam . tasmāt sarvasya sato'tādātmyābhāvāt sadātmaiva
sarvamiti bhāktatvanivṛttyādyabhāvaḥ sattādivacca svataḥ sattvam .
yataścaivaṃ tasmāt sato bhāvaḥ satteti vyutpattirdravyādyavyatiriktasattārthaiva
dātmānamātmanā na yuktamabhiyoktumityuddhaṭṭanāgrantho gatārtho yāvat tadyoganimittamiti . yadā vetyāderārabhya yāvat tadyoganimittamityevaṃprakāra uddhaṭṭanāgranthaḥ pūrvamāste . nanūttaramapyetadayuktaṃ na, dravyādiṣvañjasā siddhiḥ ityādi vakṣyamāṇamasambaddham, atadātmanimittasya satpratyayasyānupapatteḥ asattātmanāṃ
dravyādīnāṃ mukhyau sadabhidhānapratyayau kathaṃ yuktau ? iti etadācāryavacanamantare patitaṃ parasyākauśalakhyāpanārtham . manorathavaditi vaiśeṣikasya manoratha eva dravyādivyatiriktā satteti yadi bhavet, syāt .
tanmatau tu pūrvottarapakṣau vyākhyātāveva . dravyādibhāktatvanivṛttiḥ, svataḥ sattvaṃ sattādivacca ityetasya
vacanasya vyāghātaḥ ityetaddoṣadvayadarśanāditi vaiśeṣikeṇokte ācārya āha --naiva tvityādi, daṇḍitvaṃ
daṇḍatvaṃ ca yathā svata eva satoḥ tatsambaddhatvāt sattāsambaddhatvādityarthaḥ satvataḥ sattvāt
sattvavat sadeva svam, satvataḥ sataḥ sattvāt ātmatvāt svataḥ sattvādityarthaḥ . evaṃ tāvad nyāyo
yaduta sadeva sat, sattvameva sat, na sadvyatiriktā sattā, na sattāto'nyat sat . tasmāt sarvasya sato
nāstyatādātmyamasadātmatvam, tadabhāvāt sadātmaiva sarvamiti bhāktatvanivṛttyādyabhāvaḥ, nāyaṃ doṣa
ityarthaḥ, sattādivacca svataḥ sattvamiti, ādigrahaṇād dravyatva-guṇatva-karmatvavat .
yataścaivamityādi, yasmāt svata eva sattā dravyādīnāṃ yuktā tasmāt sato bhāvaḥ satteti yā
śabdavyutpattirbhedaṣaṣṭhyāpādanārthā sā dravyādyavyatiriktasattārthaiva jñāyate satāṃ bhāvaḥ satteti . kiṃ kāra-

kartari ṣaṣṭhīvṛtteḥ . yat tat sadbhirbhūyate... ... ...sadityabhidhānapratyayakāraṇaṃ sarvatra .
ata idamapi apratyayodgrāham--... ... ...svataḥ sattvamityetadayuktam . atra hi
sattādivat iti tvadanuvṛttyocyate . na mama sattā dravyādivyatiriktā kācidasti .
tato dravyādīnāmakāraṇatvādidoṣaprasaṅgāt kuto'nupapannatā mamātra nipatitā ?
mama tu dravyādīnāmekatvānnānupapannam .
kartṛṇā'kartṛṇā vā kārakeṇa yo bhavati sa eva bhāvaḥ sāmānyam, sa eva
viśeṣo'nyabhavananirapekṣaḥ kartā bhavadbhavanāt, tadeva dravyaṃ guṇaḥ, sa eva kriyā, sa
eva viśeṣo bhāvāntarād viśiṣyamāṇatvāt, vakṣyamāṇavacca sa eva samavāyaḥ .
evameva sambandhābhāvaḥ pratyākhyātaḥ sahāsattvena . nāsaṃyogaḥ, nāsamavāyaḥ . tābhyāṃ
ṇam ? kartari ṣaṣṭhīvṛtteḥ . tadvyākhyānam --yat tat sadbhirityādi gatārthaṃ yāvat sadityabhidhānapratyayakāraṇaṃ sarvatreti .
ata idamapītyādi pūrvottarapakṣau savyākhyānau gatārthau vaiśeṣikasyaiva yāvadupanayaḥ, tatra yaduktaṃ
svataḥ sattvam iti etadayuktamiti, ācāryo yathaitadapratyayodgrāhaṃ bhavati tathāha --atra hi sattādivadityādi . sarvamidaṃ tvadanuvṛttyā tvāṃ pratipādayitumucyate, na mama sattā dravyādivyatiriktā kācidasti
kartari ṣaṣṭhī ityuktatvāt . dravyādīnāmakāraṇatvādidoṣāḥ prasaktāḥ, tato'nupapannam ityeṣā tatprasaṅgāt
kuto'nupapannatā mamātra nipatitā abhyāgatā, tvanmatena tu sattāmabhyupagamya mayā sattādivad dravyādīnāmaniṣṭāpādane kṛte ? mama tu dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānāṃ caikatvānnānupapannamiti .
tad vyācaṣṭe --kartṛṇā'kartṛṇā vetyādi . bhavatīti bhāvaḥ iti kartari, bhavanaṃ bhāvaḥ iti
bhāve, ityādikārakavivakṣāyāṃ yo bhavati sa eva bhāvaḥ sāmānyam, deśakālādibhede'pi bhavanatulyatvāt .
sa eva viśeṣo'nyabhavananirapekṣaḥ kartā, uktavat kartari ṣaṣṭhī iti bhavato bhavanād bhavadeva bhavati,
tadeva dravyaṃ bhavyaṃ bhavadbhavanādeva, kalanaṃ guṇanaṃ guṇaḥ yugapadayugapatparyāyatvena bhavanāt, sa eva bhāvaḥ
kriyā bhavanaṃ bhāva iti, sa eva viśeṣo bhāvāntarād viśiṣyamāṇatvāt anyanirapekṣatvāt sadasadātmakatvāt sattvenāsattvena ca tasyaiva viśiṣyamāṇatvāt, vakṣyamāṇavacceti kāraṇākāraṇādyaikyamanantaraṃ
vakṣyate, sa eva samavāyaḥ . evameveti bhavataḥ kartṛtvena tasyaiva kāraṇatvam, tadekībhāvagatyā kāryatvāpatteḥ
pratipāditena vidhinā sambandhābhāvaḥ pratyākhyātaḥ samavāyavyākhyānāt, sahāsattveneti anenaivāsattva

ca sambandhavattvād nityatvāsattve na staḥ . ajātimanti tviti pratipādyata eva .
athavā akāraṇanityāsambandhājātīni dravyādīni, svataḥ sattvāt, sāmānyādivat . kāraṇādi ca sāmānyādi, svataḥ sattvāt, dravyādivat . tadātmatvāt svataḥ
sat sattādivat . ubhayaṃ dravyādi sāmānyādi ca vastutvāt .
yadapi ca coditaṃ yadyekaḥ samavāyo dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ dravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvādiviśeṣaṇaiḥ saha
mapi pratyākhyātam, sadasadātmakatvāt . kartṛtvāt saṃyuktameva kāryeṇeti nāsaṃyogaḥ, kāryakāraṇapratipādanāt
nāsamavāyo'sti, tābhyāṃ ceti saṃyogasamavāyābhyāṃ sambandhavattvād nityatvāsattve na staḥ .
ajātimanti tviti pratipādyata eva, dravyavyatiriktāyāḥ pratiṣiṣitsitatvāt . evaṃ tāvat kāraṇāditvaṃ dravyādeḥ .
athavetyādi . akāraṇanityāsambandhājātīni dravyādīni svataḥ sattvāduktāt sāmānyādivat .
kāraṇādi ceti, kāraṇānityasambandhajātimattvāni sāmānyaviśeṣasamavāyānām, svataḥ sattvāt dravyādivat svasatsattvādityarthaḥ . tadātmatvāt, yad yadātma tat svataḥ sat sattādivadityuktam . ubhayamiti kāraṇākāraṇanityānityasambandhāsambandhajātimadajātimattvāni dravyādīnāṃ sāmānyādīnāṃ ca sarvasya
vastutvād dvyātmakatvaṃ bhavatyevetaretararūpaikabhavanāviśeṣāt .
yadapi cetyādi . niṣṭhāyāḥ sambandhasya ca sattayaikakālatvapratipādanārthaṃ samavāyasyaikatvādekaḥ

sambandhaikatvāt padārthasaṅkaraprasaṅgaḥ   iti, sa tadavastha eva, bahūnāṃ sambandhināmekasambandhabhāvāt, vāgādigavādyabhidhānavat vyavasthānābhāvāt sarvasya sarvā-
kālaḥ ityuktvā punaratra yo doṣaścoditaḥ saṅkaraprasaṅgaḥ iti sa tadavastha eva duṣparihāraḥ . bahūnāṃ
sambandhināmekasambandhabhāvāditi hetuḥ, bahavo hi sambandhina ekasambadhībhūtāḥ, tatasteṣāṃ saṅkaraḥ,
vāgādigavādyabhidhānavat, yathā gauḥ ityukte vāg-dig-bhū-raśmyādibhirekasya gośabdasya vāgādiśabdaparyāyatvāt tattadātmāsau tattadarthapratipādanāt tattatsambandhāt amuṣyaivedaṃ sambandhi iti nirdhārya vyavasthāpayitumaśakyatvāt sarveṣāṃ daśānāmiṣṭaḥ kāraṇakāryādhāraḥ samavāyo'pi tathādheyo dravyatveneva guṇatvakarmatvā
