bhidhānapratyayau syātām, padārthalakṣaṇavyavasthānābhāvāt ṣaṭpadārthanivṛttirvā .
katham ? samavāyasyaikatvād dravyatvena guṇakarmaṇoḥ sambandhād dravyabhāvaḥ, guṇakarmabhāvayorhāniḥ . tattvaviśeṣaṇabhedāddhi tadbhedaḥ syāt, chatridaṇḍivat .
dibhiśca sambandha ihaliṅgāviśeṣād viśeṣaliṅgābhāvāccaikaḥ samavāyaḥ, tasmād dravyatvasambandhād yathā
dravye dravyabuddhiṃ tathā guṇe karmaṇi ca dravyabuddhiṃ kuryāditi sarvasya sarvābhidhānapratyayau syātāmiti sāmānyena
saṅkaradoṣa uktaḥ .
padārthetyādi dvitīyaḥ saṅkaraprakāraḥ . padārthānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dravyādīnāṃ lakṣaṇavyavasthānasyābhāvāt ṣaḍapi
padārthā nivartante iti . kathamityādi vyākhyā . samavāyasyaikatvād dravyatvena guṇakarmaṇoḥ sambandhād
dravyabhāvo dravyatvavat, tayośca svarūpasya guṇatvasya karmatvasya ca hāniriti doṣau, tattvaviśeṣaṇabhedāddhi
tadbhedaḥ syācchatridaṇḍivaditi vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ, chatraviśiṣṭaśchatrī, daṇḍaviśiṣṭo daṇḍī, na tatheha dravyatvasya
kvacid bhedo'sti .


kāryakāraṇādhārādheyasamavāyāt tau bhaviṣyata iti cet, tayorguṇakarmaṇorguṇakarmabhāvanivṛttau dravyabhāvasambandhe guṇakarmaṇāmanāśrayatvād dravyasya dravyabhāvanivṛttiḥ . kāryakāraṇādhārādheyasamavāyasyaikatvād guṇakarmaṇordravyībhūtatvād guṇakarmabhāvanivṛttau guṇakarmaṇāmanāśrayatvād na dravyaṃ kriyāvadādilakṣaṇaṃ na guṇakarmāṇi
tathālakṣaṇānīti dravyasyāpi dravyabhāvanivṛttiḥ . tathā dravyaguṇa... .... paraspara...
ṣaṭpadārthanivṛttiḥ .

kāryakāraṇetyādi . kāraṇamādhāraśca dravyam, ādheye kārye ca guṇakarmaṇī, tayorbhinnayoḥ kāryakāraṇayorādhārādheyayośca samavāyāt tau guṇakarmabhāvau bhaviṣyata iti cet evaṃ cenmanyase, mā maṃsthāḥ,
atrottaram --tayorguṇakarmaṇorityādi yāvat prathamadravyabhāvanivṛttiriti tāvadupadeśavacanam, uparitano
granthastadvyākhyā, guṇakarmaṇorguṇakarmabhāvanivṛttidvāreṇa dravyasya dravyabhāvanivṛttirākhyāyate . tadyathā--ya
uktaḥ kāryakāraṇādhārādheyasamavāyastasyaivaikatvāt yo dravyabhāvena guṇakarmaṇoḥ samavāyaḥ sa ekastena dravyeṇa 
sambandhāt te guṇakarmaṇī dravyamevaikaṃ karoti, tato guṇakarmaṇī nivartete, tannivṛttau dravyamāśrayyabhāvād
nāśrayo na ca kāraṇaṃ samavāyināṃ guṇakarmaṇāmabhāvāt, tato dravyasya dravyalakṣaṇaṃ nāsti kriyāvad guṇavat
samavāyikāraṇam vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 14 iti, kriyāguṇābhāvād na dravyaṃ tadvat .
na guṇakarmāṇi tathālakṣaṇānīti,itiśabdo hetvarthe, yasmād na santyeva tādṛglakṣaṇāni
guṇakarmāṇi teṣāmāśrayiṇāṃ samavāyināmabhāvāt tannivṛttau dravyasyāpi dravyabhāvanivṛttiḥ, guṇavat

yacca 'na, bahūnāmekatvāt . bahūnāṃ dravyādīnāmekaḥ samavāyaḥ, na tu dvayordvayoḥ... ... ...
samavāyikāraṇaṃ kriyāvadadravyamanekadravyaṃ vā dravyaṃ syāt, taccetthaṃ nādravyaṃ nānekadravyaṃ sambhavati . tasmād
guṇakarmaṇāṃ guṇakarmabhāvanivṛttau dravyabhāvasambandhe sati guṇakarmaṇāmanāśrayatvād dravyasya dravyabhāvanivṛttiriti
dravyapadārthanivṛttiruktā . athavā tvadiṣṭena dravyatvena sarvagatena sambandhe sati guṇasya karmaṇo vā dravyaṃ dravyatvena
sambaddhamiti dravyībhāvaḥ, tadbhāvād guṇakarmaṇī na dravyāśrite, tato dravyalakṣaṇāyukterdravyabhāvanivṛttiḥ,
kiṃ dravyalakṣaṇamiti cet, ucyate --kriyāvad guṇavat samavāyikāraṇam vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 14 iti,
tattu kāryakāraṇādhārādheyasamavāyasyaikatvād guṇakarmaṇordravyībhūtatvāt kriyāvadādilakṣaṇaṃ nāsti, yasmād na
tu guṇakarmāṇi tathālakṣaṇānīti guṇasya dravyāśrayyādilakṣaṇatvāt ekadravyādilakṣaṇatvāt karmaṇaḥ .
evaṃ svalakṣaṇābhāvāpekṣā dravyasya dravyabhāvanivṛttirguṇakarmalakṣaṇāyukteriti . tataśca dravyasyāpītyādi āśrayābhāvād guṇakarmābhāvamāpādya āśrayyabhāve'pi dravyasyāśrayasyābhāva iti gatārtham . evaṃ guṇakarmaṇorapi
guṇakarmalakṣaṇāvyavasthānād guṇakarmabhāvanivṛttiruktā veditavyā . evaṃ tāvad dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ vyavasthitalakṣaṇābhāvād nivṛttiḥ .
tathā dravyaguṇetyādi . dravyatva-guṇatva-karmatvādīnāmāśrayābhāvādanupapattiḥ sāmānyaviśeṣāṇām . ādigrahaṇāt sattāyāḥ . tad vyācaṣṭe --parasparetyādi bhāvitārthaṃ yāvat ṣaṭpadārthanivṛttiriti .
yaccetyādi . ādhārādheyabhāvena bhede sati saṃyogavad dvivṛttitvāt samavāyasya tataścānityatvaṃ
syāt   iti pūrvapakṣaṃ kṛtvā parihāramāha vaiśeṣikaḥ --na, bahūnāmekatvāt, bahūnāṃ dravyādīnāmekaḥ samavāya iti svarūpavarṇanaṃ dvivṛttipratiṣedhārtham . na tu dvayordvayorityādi saṃyogena vaidharmyaṃ

samavāyasya'   iti, etenāpi saṅkaraprasaṅgastadavastha eva bahūnāmekasamavāyābhyupagamāt . tataḥ ṣaḍapi padārthā nivartitāḥ .
gatārthaṃ yāvat samavāyasyeti . ācārya āha --etenāpītyādi . etenānityatvaparihāravacanenāpi saṅkaraprasaṅgaḥ sāmānyena vyavasthānābhāvāt sarvatra sarvādheyavṛttau sarvābhidhānapratyayasaṅkaraḥ viśeṣya ca padārthalakṣaṇavyavasthānāsambhavāt ṣaṭvadārthanivṛttirvetyādiruktaḥ tadavastha eva dṛḍhīkṛtaḥ, bahūnāmekasamavāyābhyupagamāt, tataḥ saṅkarāduktāt ṣaḍapi padārthā nivartitāḥ, tannivṛttau samavāyyabhāvāt samavāyanivṛtte-
stasyāsataḥ khapuṣpasyeva kuto nityatvamanityatvaṃ vā ?

yattu pratyuktam--na, ādhārādheyaniyamāt . yadyapyekaḥ samavāyaḥ sarvatra svatantrastathāpyādhārādheyaniyamo'sti . katham ? dravyeṣveva dravyatvam, guṇeṣveva guṇatvam, karmasveva karmatvam iti vai॰ sū॰
praśastamati॰ . etadapi pratyuktam... ... ...pratiniyatāni .
yattūcyate--avagamyatāṃ tāvat... ...samavāyaikatve'pyādhārādheyaniyamaḥ syāt  
iti, idamapi svavādavihitottaramārgam . na tu tathā... ... .... sarvatra tāvad
dravyadravyatvādisamavāye dvivṛttitvaṃ sambandhidvayaviśiṣṭābhidhānapratyayatvāt kuṇḍadadhyādisaṃyogavat . dravyaguṇayoḥ... ... .... tathā ca... ...anityataiva .

yattu pratyuktamityādi saṅkaradoṣasya yaduttaramuktam --na, ādhārādheyaniyamāditi . yadyapyeka
ityādi tadvyākhyā yāvat karmasveva karmatvamiti, sarvatra caikaḥ samavāyaḥ ityanena dvivṛttitvaparihāreṇānityatvamapi parihṛtamiti vaiśeṣikaḥ . ācārya āha --etadapi pratyuktamityādi gatārthaṃ yāvat pratiniyatānīti . dvivṛttitvamevāsya iti ca vakṣyati .
yattūcyate--avagamyatāṃ tāvadityādi idaṃ tasya doṣaparihāraprāṇasarvasvamanvayavyatirekābhyāmaniyamātiprasaṅgābhāvabhāvanaṃ gatārthaṃ yāvat samavāyaikatve'pyādhārādheyaniyamaḥ syāditi . atrācārya āha —
idamapītyādi, svavādenaivottaramārgo vihito'sya vacanasya tvayā ihedam vai॰ sū॰ praśastamati॰ ityādinā
samavāyalakṣaṇaṃ vyācakṣāṇena ādhārādheyasambandhajñānalakṣaṇatvāt kāryakāraṇayoścādhārādheyabhāvāt sambandhinoḥ
kuṇḍadadhidṛṣṭāntena ca subhāvito'yamarthaḥ, tenaiva vayaṃ brūmaḥ --na tu tathetyādi, na tu tathā saṅkarābhāvo
ghaṭate uttaraprakāreṇa, kuṇḍadadhisaṃyogadṛṣṭānte yadi dadhimadhūdakādibhirbahubhirādheyaiḥ kuṇḍādhāraḥ saṃyukto bhavati
tataḥ kimiti saṅkaro nāsti ? tathā yadi sarvātmakaḥ samavāyo dravya-guṇa-karma-dravyatva-guṇatva-karmatva-sattādyādhāra eka eva bhavati tadā kimiti saṅkaro na syāt ? nāpi ca dvivṛttitvanivṛttiḥ samavāyasya yataḥ
saṃyogād vaidharmyamucyate tvayā dvayordvayoḥ   ityādinā . tatra sādhanam--sarvatra tāvad
dravyadravyatvādisamavāye dvivṛttitvaṃ tvayaivopavarṇyate, sādhayāmaścaitad dvivṛttitvaṃ sambandhidvayaviśiṣṭābhidhānapratyayatvāt kuṇḍadadhyādisaṃyogavat, yathā kuṇḍadadhnoḥ saṃyoge dadhnā kuṇḍena vā viśiṣṭe
tannimittamabhidhānaṃ pratyayaśca dṛśyate dadhikuṇḍaṃ kuṇḍadadhi veti taddvivṛttitvaṃ ca tathā samavāye'pi dravyaguṇayorityādi dvivṛttivarṇanam . tasmāt tvatpūrvapakṣitadoṣāsaṅgastadavasthaḥ samavāyasyetyata āha --tathā
cetyādi yāvadanityataiveti gatārtham .


yattvidam... ...jñānamityādi, anena svapakṣe pratyakṣavirodha udgrāhyate tvayā,
na hi... ...evaṃ te samavāyaikatve dravyeṣvapi guṇajñānaṃ syād guṇajñānakāraṇatvāt
samavāyasya guṇavat .
ekatve yo'yaṃ dravyasya dravyabhāvena sambandhaḥ sa eva guṇasyāpīti dravyasyāpi
guṇatvam . guṇatvābhisambandhācca tasya dravyabhāvahāniḥ . tasya... ...nivṛttiḥ . tasya
dravyasya guṇabhāvena sambaddhatvād guṇībhūtatvād guṇānāśrayatvādabhāva iti guṇabhāvanivṛttirguṇasya tallakṣaṇānupapatteḥ . kriyāvad guṇavat samavāyikāraṇamiti dravyalakṣaṇam .
dravyāśrayī aguṇavān saṃyogavibhāgeṣvakāraṇamanapekṣa iti guṇalakṣaṇam vai॰ sū॰ 1 . 1 . 14--15 .
tataśca... .... kiṃ kāraṇam ?... ....

yattvidamityādi paroktameva granthamatidiśati yāvajjñānamityādi, dravyādīnāmādhārāṇāṃ dravyatvādibhirādheyaiḥ parasparavyatiriktairviśeṣaṇairniyamo bhavati svatattvānurūpapratyayotpatteriti . atrocyate --anena
svapakṣe pratyakṣavirodha udgrāhyate tvayā . katham ? na hītyādinā bhāvayati, hiśabdo hetvarthe, yasmāt
samavāya ekastasmād dravyādidravyatvādibhiraviśiṣṭatvād vyatireko niyamaśca nāsti, ato dravyeṣveva
dravyam iti jñānaṃ na syāt . tasya vyākhyā --evamityādi, evaṃ te samavāyaikatve dravyeṣvapi guṇajñānaṃ
syādaviśiṣṭatvād guṇeṣviva . apiśabdāt karmasvapi . kiṃ kāraṇam ? guṇajñānakāraṇatvāt samavāyasya, kimiva ? guṇavaditi, guṇeṣviva guṇavat iti sādhanam .
tadeva vyācaṣṭe --ekatve yo'yamityādi yāvad dravyasyāpi guṇatvam . yadi dadhimadhūdakādīnāṃ
kuṇḍasaṅkīrṇānāmaviveke niyamena ayamasyaiva svabhāvaḥ ityaśakyamavadhārayituṃ saṃyoge dadhikuṇḍameva, madhukuṇḍameva, udakakuṇḍameva vā iti ekatvāt saṃyogasya sarveṇāpi sambandhāt, tathātrāpi yo dravyabhāvena
sambandhaḥ sa eva guṇasyāpi iti etasmāt kāraṇāt prāptaṃ guṇatvaṃ dravyasyāpi guṇabhāvaḥ, dravyaṃ guṇo
bhavatītyarthaḥ . guṇatvābhisambandhācca tasya dravyabhāvahāniḥ, evaṃ guṇabhāvāpattau dravyabhāvo hīyata iti
pararūpatāmāpādya svarūpatyāgamāpādayati . tasyetyādi vyākhyānasādhanaṃ yāvad nivṛttiḥ . dravyaṃ guṇabhāvena
sambaddhatvāt tyaktadravyabhāvaṃ guṇavaditi . evaṃ tāvad dravyasya guṇatvāpattirdravyatvatyāgaścānavasthāne .
tasya dravyasyetyādi . tad dravyaṃ guṇabhāvena sambaddhamato guṇībhūtaṃ nāśrayo guṇāntarasyeti, dravyamanāśritasya ca guṇasyābhāvaḥ, tato guṇānāśrayasya dravyasyāpyabhāvaḥ, tadabhāvādasati dravye kasya guṇaḥ ? iti
guṇabhāvanivṛttirguṇasya tallakṣaṇānupapatteḥ . kriyāvat ityādisūtradvayena lakṣaṇaṃ darśayati . tataścetyādyuddiṣṭārthopanayaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? ityādi kāraṇapraśnapūrvake pūrvavadatrāpi dravyatvāpattiguṇatvatyāgau dve anavasthāne .


tathā yo'yaṃ guṇasya karmatvena... ...na guṇakarmaṇī tathālakṣaṇe . tayoralakṣaṇatvādasattvādāśrayatvopalakṣyadravyābhāvaḥ . tadabhāvādāśrayiṇāṃ dravyatvādīnāmapyabhāvaḥ .
evaṃ dvikasaṃyogena caturviśatiranavasthācakrakāṇi bhavanti tathā kāryakāraṇayoḥ... ...
guṇasyetyādeḥ .
nanu sarvagatatvāt samavāyasya svatattvenāpi sambandhāt tattvaṃ sidhyati . nanvata
eva saṅkara ucyate paratattvenāpi sambandhādatattvamapīti .
evaṃ ca svaviṣayasarvagatāni tattvāni samavāyasya sarvagataikatvābhyāṃ sarvagatāni
prāptāni . ato dravyaguṇakarmaṇām... ...karmasu karmajñānam .

tathā yo'yaṃ guṇasya karmatvenetyādi karmaṇā saha pararūpāpattiḥ svarūpatyāgaśca dve anavasthāne
lakṣaṇāyogadvāreṇa savyākhyāne gatārthe yāvad na guṇakarmaṇī tathālakṣaṇe iti lakṣaṇābhāvāpādanam . tayoralakṣaṇatvādasattvāt, tayorguṇakarmaṇoralakṣaṇatvādasattvaṃ khapuṣpavat, tadasattvādāśrayatvopalakṣyadravyābhāvaḥ,
guṇakarmaṇorupalakṣaṇayorāśrayiṇorabhāvādvāśrayo dravyaṃ nāsti auṣṇyābhāve'gnyabhāvavat upalakṣaṇābhāvāt khapuṣpavadvā . tasmiṃścāsati dravye nirāśrayayorguṇakarmaṇorabhāvād dravyasya cābhāvādāśrayiṇāṃ dravyatvādīnāmapyabhāvaḥ, uktaṃ hi --utpannamāśrayamāśrayantyāśrayiṇaḥ   iti .
evametāni dvikasaṃyogena dravyasya guṇena saha karmaṇā ca dve, guṇasya dravyeṇa karmaṇā ca saha dve,
karmaṇo dravyeṇa guṇena ca saha dve, iti ṣaṭ cakrakāṇi . dravyatvena guṇasya karmaṇaśca dve, guṇatvena dravyasya
karmaṇaśca dve, karmatvena dravyasya guṇasya ca dve, iti ṣaṭ . evaṃ dvādaśa cakrakāṇi . evaṃ dravyatvasya karmaṇā
guṇena ca guṇatvasya dravyeṇa karmaṇā ca karmatvasya dravyeṇa guṇena ca ṣaṭ cakrakāṇi . dravyasya guṇatvena karmatvena
ca, guṇasya dravyatvena karmatvena ca, karmaṇo dravyatvena guṇatvena ca ṣaṭ, tānyapi dvādaśa . evaṃ dvikasaṃyogena caturviṃśatiranavasthācakrakāṇi bhavanti . kasmāt ? tathā kāryakāraṇayorityādi yāvad
guṇasyetyāderiti hetuṃ vyākhyātamevopanayati .
āha --nanu sarvagatatvādityādi . samavāyasya sarvagatatvāt svatattvenāpi sambandho'sti, dravyasya
dravyatvaṃ svatattvam, evaṃ śeṣayorapi śeṣadvayam . sarveṇa saha samavāyasadbhāvāt svenāpi tattvena sambandhāt
tadbhāvastattvaṃ dravyabhāvo guṇabhāvaḥ karmabhāvo vā sidhyatīti . atrocyate --nanvata eva saṅkara ucyate
paratattvenāpi sambandhādatattvamapīti . iti hetvarthe, yasmāt paratattvenāpi sambandhastasmāt tadbhāvo'pi
atadbhāvo'pīti saṅkaradoṣāvimokṣaḥ, apiśabdena tvaduktenaiva samarthitatvāt . kiñcānyat, doṣopacayaśca, evaṃ

yadapi uktaṃ... ... ...tadapi naiva, kuṇḍadadhyādhārādheyabhāvasamavāyānāmapyekatvāt . samavāyanimittasya tattvasya svavṛttipratilambhādeva lokasiddhivad bhedabhāvāt kārakaśaktita eva tu kuṇḍadadhnoḥ saṃyogaikatve'pyādhārādheyaniyamaḥ . yathā
ca svaviṣayetyādi . svaviṣayasarvagatāni hi tattvānīṣyante tatsamavāyasya sarvagataikatvābhyāṃ tānyadhunā sarvagatāni
prāptāni, tato'bhyupagamavirodho jāyata iti śeṣapadārthābhāva ucyate, ato dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmityādi prāktana
eva grantho yāvat karmasu karmajñānamiti . tatra vyavasthitalakṣaṇānāmabhāvāt iti lakṣaṇābhāvadvāreṇa nirākaraṇam, iha tu vyavasthitānāmabhāvāt iti saha tattvairlakṣaṇaiśca teṣāṃ nirākṛtatvāditi viśeṣaḥ ādheyajñānabhedanimittaniyamanirākaraṇadvāreṇa ceti .
yadapītyādi . yadapi pareṇoktaṃ yathā kuṇḍadadhisaṃyoge dadhyevādheyam, kuṇḍamevādhāraḥ iti niyamastathā
dravyamevādhāro guṇakarmādyevādheyam, dravyaguṇakarmāṇyevādhāro dravyatvaguṇatvakarmatvānyevādheyāni iti, tadapi
naiva, kuṇḍadadhyādhārādheyabhāvasamavāyānāmapyekatvāt, tatrāpi tvanmatenādhārayoḥ kuṇḍadadhnorādheyayośca
kuṇḍatvadadhitvayostayostattvayordravyatvādīnāṃ ca tattvānāṃ ye samavāyāsteṣāmapyekatvāt samavāyibhedopacaritabhedānāmāñjasyenaikatvāt pūrvoktavidhinā tadavasthaḥ saṅkaradoṣaḥ .
yadyasaṅkareṇa niyamena cārthaḥ vayameva spaṣṭataraṃ brūmaḥ, tadyathā --samavāyanimittasyetyādi . samavāyasya
yad nimittaṃ tattvaṃ kuṇḍadadhnoḥ kuṇḍatvaṃ dadhitvaṃ ca tasya svata evātmapratilambhaḥ, tayośca lokasiddhivad

tvamevāttha na samānatvāt  iti tathehāpi samānamuttaram--samavāyaikatve'pi
kārakaśaktereva niyamabhedaḥ .... ... ...kasmiṃścideva .
yattūcyate--vyaṅgyavyañjaka... ...na saṅkaraprasaṅgaḥ   iti, etacca vyaṅgyavyañjaka
...asaṅkaraḥ syādevam . samavāyasya... .... tathā yadi ya eva... ...guṇakarmabhāvavinivṛttiriti sarvaṃ sarvavikalpaṃ prapañcanīyaṃ yathāsvārtham .
bhedaḥ svavṛttipratilambhādeva, tvanmate'pyākāśakālayoriva dadhikuṇḍayorlokena pratipanno bhedo nārthāntarāt
tathā tato vayamapi lokaviruddhaṃ mā vocāmeti lokasiddhivad bhedabhāvāt kārakaśaktita eva tu pratipadyate
bhedasiddhiṃ saṃyogapariṇāmakṛtaṃ sadapyaikyamanādṛtya tayoḥ saṃyogaikatve'pyādhāraśaktiḥ kuṇḍasya ādheyaśaktirdadhna iti niyamamasaṅkīrṇamācakṣmahe . asyārthasya bhāvanāgrantho gatārtho yāvadādhārādheyaniyama iti .
avaśyaṃ caitadevam, tvayā samavāyamapi kalpayitvaitadeva pratipattavyam; tvadvacanaprāmāṇyādeva . yathā tvamevāttheti saṃyogaikatve'pi kārakaśaktita eva kuṇḍadadhnorādhārādheyaniyamo bhinna ityuttaramāttha . kiṃ taduttaramiti cet, ucyate --na, samānatvāditi, tathehāpi samānamuttaram --samavāyaikatve'pi kārakaśaktereva niyamabhedaḥ . tadvyākhyā gatārthā yāvat kasmiṃścideveti .
yattūcyate--vyaṅgyavyañjaketyādi . vyaṅgyavyañjakatvabhedāt dravyadravyatvādīnāṃ bhedo ghaṭapradīpavaditi
parihārāntaraṃ gatārthaṃ yāvad na saṅkaraprasaṅga iti vaiśeṣikasya . ācāryavacanaṃ tu etacca vyaṅgyavyañjaketyādi, syādetadevam yadi dārṣṭāntikasya dravyadravyatvādervyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvaḥ pradīpaghaṭadṛṣṭāntavat pṛthak
siddhaḥ syāt, na tu tadātmabhedaniyamaḥ siddhaḥ, siddhe hi tadādhārādheyabhedaniyamo'pi syāt, tadarthodbhāvanaṃ
yāvadasaṅkaraḥ syādevamiti . tasya hetorasiddhipratipādanārthaṃ cāha --samavāyasyetyādi, uktottaramevaitat,
ādhārādheyabhedaniyamābhāvasya tulyatvād dṛṣṭāntasādharmyaṃ na bhajata etaditi prāg vistareṇa vyākhyātārthatvāt . tadeva smārayati --tathā yadi ya evetyādi yāvad guṇakarmabhāvavinivṛttiriti sarvaṃ sarvavikalpaṃ
prapañcanīyamiti pūrvoktārthātideśaḥ . ā kutaḥ ? iti cet, ucyate--asmād granthāvadheḥ . yathāsvārthamiti yo yaḥ svārtho yathāsvārthaṃ dravya-guṇa-karma-dravyatva-guṇatva-karmatvasaṃyogāvyavasthānacakrakāṇyeva vyākhyeyāni pūrvavaditi .


yat punaridamāśaṅkitaṃ samavāyaikatvaṃ pañcatvavyavahāreṇa virudhyate  iti,
tadevameva .
yat punaridaṃ pratyucyate--na, āśrayaviśeṣād bhāvavat... ...tathā samavāyaikatve'pi... ...
...bhaviṣyati   iti, idaṃ nirmūlameva vyaṅgyasyādhārasya vā'niyamāt kutastadvyaṅgyo vyañjako vādheyo'rthaḥ ? kuto vāśrayāṇāṃ vaicitryam ? ajalacandravadekatvāt
samavāyasya bhāvasya ca jalacandreṇa sādharmyābhāvāt kuto nānātvopacāraḥ ? bhāvo
vā kutaḥ ?
evametadubhayamubhayabhāk . sāmānyaṃ bhāvaḥ prakṛtyarthaḥ, yat tat tena bhūyate sā
sattā, viśeṣo'pi pratyayārthaḥ saḥ .

yat punaridamāśaṅkitamityādi . samavāyaikatvaṃ pañcatvavyavahāreṇa virudhyate iti yadāśaṅkitaṃ
tvayā tadevameva mamāpi pratibhāti virudhyata eveti .
yat punaridaṃ pratyucyate tasyāśaṅkitasyottaraṃ vaiśeṣikeṇa --na, āśrayaviśeṣād bhāvavadityādi,
dravyādisadbhāvatrayaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ, pratidṛṣṭāntaśca jalacandraḥ, tathā samavāyaikatve'pītyādi dārṣṭāntikaṃ gatārthaṃ
yāvad bhaviṣyatīti . asyottaramāhācāryaḥ --idaṃ nirmūlameva, vyaṅgyasyādhārasya vā'niyamāt pūrvoktādāśraya evāsiddho vyañjako vyaṅgyo vā tvadiṣṭaḥ, kutastadvyaṅgyo vyañjako vādheyo'rthaḥ ? kuto vāśrayāṇāṃ
vaicitryam, samavāyaikatve ṣaṭpadārthanivṛtteḥ subhāvitatvāt ? ajalacandravad vyomacandravadekatvāt samavāyasya bhāvasya ca sattākhyasya jalacandreṇa saha sādharmyābhāvāt kuto nānātvopacāraḥ, chāyāmātratvācca
jalacandrasyābahutvādvā ? bhāvo vā kutaḥ, bhāvo'pi dravyādivyatirikto nāstyevaikaḥ tanmūlatvādvivādasya
ityalamativikāśinyā saṅkathayā .
evaṃ svabhāvasat-sambandhasadvastubhāvabhedavādivaiśeṣikamatanirākaraṇaprapañcenaitadāyātamiti tad darśayati --evametadityādi ubhayamubhayabhāk ityasya nayasya svarūpam, yat tat sāmānyaṃ tadapi vidhīyate niya-
myate yo'pi viśeṣaḥ so'pi vidhīyate niyamyate ceti . tad vyācaṣṭe'kṣarārthaṃ pradarśayan prakṛtipratyayārthābhyām —
sāmānyaṃ bhāvaḥ prakṛtyarthaḥ, tad darśayati --yat tat tena bhūyate sā sattā, bhū sattāyām pā॰ dhā॰ 1
iti pāṭhāt sāmānyam, tat kiṃ prakṛtyarthamātrameva ? na ityucyate, viśeṣo'pi pratyayārthaḥ sa tasyaiva
bhavitṛtvavācipratyayārthatvāt sa eva prakṛtyarthaḥ pratyayārtho'pītyuktaḥ . yo'sau bhavati kartṛvācipratyayārthaḥ sa
viśeṣaḥ sāmānyamapi bhavati sattā bhāvaḥ bhavanātmakatvāt bhavanaṃ sāmānyamantareṇa tasyākartṛtvādabhavitṛtvāt
sa eva pratyayārthaḥ prakṛtyarthānatikrameṇa vṛtta iti .


sāmānyaṃ pravṛttiḥ vidhirbhāvaḥ . viśeṣo'pi... ...niyamo'bhāvaḥ . etadubhayaṃ
pūrvavadekatvamanāpadyamānaṃ sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaśca bhavataḥ . pravṛttau nivṛttiḥ... ...yena...
yathā... ...yena hi... .... yadi asya... ...khapuṣpavat .
evaṃ dravyakṣetra... ... ...sadasattvam . pratisvaṃ ghaṭādi mṛdādi kāraṇamapekṣate
nirviśeṣatve...iti svāvayavabhedeṣu sadasattvena vṛttiḥ . tadbhāvābhāvātmako ghaṭa iti

syānmatam--vidhividhinayamatavadekatvāpattiḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayoriṣṭā, saiṣā tvaduktanyāyenaivaṃ tvekatvāpattirapīti sā mā bhūt iti sarvavikalpabhāvaikatvavyudāsena viśeṣalakṣaṇamanayoḥ paryāyādibhirvibhaktaṃ
vaktukāma āha --sāmānyaṃ pravṛttirityādi yāvad vidhirbhāva iti tathā viśeṣo'pītyādi yāvad
niyamo'bhāva iti dvāvetau bhāvābhāvau paryāyabhedāt . etadubhayaṃ pūrvavad vidhividhyaravikalpapuruṣādivādavat ekamevedam ityevaṃvidhaṃ bhāvamanāpadyamānaṃ sāmānyamapi sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaśca bhavataḥ viśeṣo'pi
viśeṣaḥ sāmānyaṃ ca bhavata iti .
tad darśayati --pravṛttau nivṛttirityādi, ubhayamanyonyāvinābhāvi bhāvo vastvityarthaḥ . bhāvābhāvarūpaṃ bhavanaṃ sad vastu, tasya sato bhāvaḥ sattā, yat satā bhūyate satataniyameneti prakṛtipratyayārthayorubhayorubhayaṃ niyamo vidhiśca . tāveva darśayati yena iti pratyayārthaṃ yathā iti prakṛtyarthaṃ ca, yena hītyādi
kartrā kriyāyāṃ niyatena niyatāyāṃ bhavanamāha . yadi a ?syetyādi anyathāniṣṭāpādanaṃ yāvat
khapuṣpavaditi bhavananiyamena ātmalābho bhavata uktaḥ, tataścāvaraṇena bhavitṛniyamena bhavanātmalābha ityetadubhayamubhayatra vidhirniyamaśceti sāmānyenoktam . viśeṣyāpi vakṣyati .
evaṃ dravyakṣetretyādi yāvat sadasattvamiti . dravyato ghaṭo bhavannātmānuvṛttyā paṭādivyāvṛttyā
ghaṭāntaravyāvṛttyā ca bhāvābhāvātmabhyāṃ bhavati . kṣetrato gṛhe ghaṭo na bahirna maṃnaya ? iti svakṣetre bhavan
parakṣetre kṣetrāntare cābhavan bhavati . kālato vartamāne kāle bhavannatītānāgatayoḥ kālāntarayorabhavan
śivakastūpakādibhiḥ pūrvairuttaraiśca kapālādibhirabhavan śivakāvasthāyāmeva vā piṇḍastūpakābhyāṃ pūrvottarābhyāmabhavan śivakatvena bhavan bhavati ityucyate . athavā bhāvataḥ śivakādibhirākārairdharmairvartamānairyurayu ?gapadbhāvibhiryugapadbhāvibhiśca rūparasādibhirbhavan bhāvāntarairupayogādibhiścābhavan bhavatīti
sadasattvam, evaṃ sarvabhāvānāṃ bhāvā-'bhāvātmakatvam .


tadabhāve na bhavati bhāvābhāvabhāva eva ca bhavati . tathā ghaṭapaṭādidravyakṣetrakālabhāvabhāvābhāvasattāyā ghaṭasāmastye'pi na kaścid viśeṣaḥ, vastutvāt,
asāmastyavat . yathaiva... ... ...guṇāvṛttyanāvṛttibhedeṣu . vivakṣayā vaiṣa viśeṣa
ubhayorapi tattvāt .
tathā ghaṭastāvadastyeva kriyāguṇavyapadeśavattvāt paṭarathavat, sarvasarvasamavāyāsattvād yogyasyaiva yogyeṣu samavāyāt, yathā rūpe ghaṭaḥ, tathā rasādiṣvapi bhāvanīyaṃ

athavā pratipattivavastupravṛtteḥ vastuni vastuni vṛttiḥ ? . pratisvaṃ ghaṭādi mṛdādi kāraṇamapekṣate, ādigrahaṇāt paṭādi tantvādyapekṣate, nirviśeṣatva iti kāraṇāntarānapekṣatvāt svakāraṇāpekṣatvācca bhāvābhāvatvenāviśeṣaḥ, kaṇṭhaḥ svenātmanā bhavati kapālādyātmanā na bhavati, kapālāni svātmanā
bhavanti na kaṇṭhādyātmaneti bhāvābhāvādyātmanā parasparataścāsatsu satsu ca bhedaṃ bhedaṃ prati vṛttatvāt iti
svāvayavabhedeṣu sadasattvena vṛttiḥ . tasyārthasya bhāvanā --tadbhāvābhāvātmako ghaṭa iti tadabhāve na
bhavati bhāvābhāvābhāve na bhavati bhāvābhāvabhāva eva ca bhavati tadbhāva eva bhavatītyarthaḥ .
etasyaivārthasya bhāvanārthaṃ sādhanamāha --tathā ghaṭapaṭādidravyakṣetrakālabhāvabhāvābhāvasattāyā
ghaṭasāmastye'pi na kaścid viśeṣa iti pratijñā . ghaṭapaṭaghaṭāntaretyādidaṇḍakoktārthacāturvidhyasya
sadasattvamasāmastyena bhāvitam, sāmastye'pi tatheti sādhyārthaḥ . vastutvāditi hetuḥ . asāmastyavaditi
dṛṣṭāntaḥ . yathaivetyādi cāturvidhyena dṛṣṭāntavarṇanā gatārthā yāvad guṇāvṛttyanāvṛttibhedeṣviti . dviguṇatriguṇakṛṣṇaśuklatvādirāvṛttiḥ, śuklaḥ kṛṣṇa ityanāvṛttiḥ . tatraikaguṇasattvaṃ dviguṇāsattvam, dviguṇasattvamekaguṇāsattvam, śuklasattvaṃ kṛṣṇāsattvam, kṛṣṇasattvaṃ śuklāsattvamityādi .
bhāvābhāvātmakatvāviśeṣe sāmastyāsāmastyaviśeṣaḥ ka iti cet, ucyate --vivakṣayā vaiṣa viśeṣa
ubhayorapi sāmastyāsāmastyayoḥ . kasmāt ? tattvāt, tadbhāvastattvaṃ bhāvābhāvatvam, tasmāt tattvāt
bhāvābhāvatvād vivakṣāviśeṣādevaiṣa viśeṣaḥ samasto ghaṭaḥ, asamastaḥ kaṇṭhakapālādiḥ ityādi prāguktaṃ
cāturātmyam, sakalādeśavaśād vikalādeśavaśācca pratipādanopāyatvāt evaṃ bhāvābhāvātmakatvaṃ sarvasya
sakalādeśena bhāvitam, vikalādeśena pratyekaṃ bhāvayiṣyāmaḥ .
tatra bhāvātmakatvaṃ tāvat --tathā ghaṭastāvadastyeva kriyāguṇavyapadeśavattvāt, udakādyāharaṇaṃ
kriyā, guṇo rūpādi, vyapadeśo liṅgaṃ heturapadeśaḥ liṅgam ityādiśabdo vā . paṭarathavaditi bhāvātmakatve
dṛṣṭāntaḥ khapuṣpavailakṣaṇyena . vaidharmyeṇa sarvasarvasamavāyāsattvāditi bhāvanāhetuḥ, na hi sarvaṃ sarvatra samavaiti tantuṣu ghaṭaḥ kapāleṣu vā paṭaḥ, tasmāt sarvasarvasamavāyāsattvād yogyasyaiva yogyeṣu samavāyāt


pratyekaṃ sattvāt . atha punarevaṃ na syāt tato'sāvasannevāpadyeta sikatāsviva tailam .
na ca tathā sthitau ghaṭo na bhavati, rūparasayorghaṭabhāvāt .
nanu ghaṭa... ... ...pṛthivyapi mṛdādiḥ, itarathā nirmūlatvāt . tathā ca ekabhavanātmakatvāt ghaṭaghaṭasvātmavat tadviśeṣa eva viśeṣo nābhāvaḥ pṛthivīsāmānye
satyeva ūrddhatvavistṛtatvādiḥ .
astyeva iti vartate, yathā rūpe ghaṭaḥ guṇasamudāyavādadarśanena, rūpaṃ vā iti guṇamātravāde tadādhāro
vā ityavayavivāde yathā rūpe ghaṭo'styeva ityādi tathā rasādiṣvapi bhāvanīyamekaikasmin vṛttatvāt .
atha punarevaṃ na syāt paṭarathādisādharmyeṇa khapuṣpavailakṣaṇyena vaikaikasmiṃstileṣviva tailaṃ tato'sāvasannevāpadyeta, kimiva ? sikatāsviva avidyamānaṃ yathā sikatāsu pratyekaṃ samudāye'pi tailaṃ
nāstyeva tathā ghaṭo rūpādāvekaikasminnasattvādasannāpadyeta, aniṣṭaṃ caitat . evaṃ sāmastyena ghaṭādyastitvaṃ
rūpādīnāṃ pratyekaṃ sattvāt, itarathā rūpavad raso'pi rūpaṃ syāt svarūpāsattvāt, na ca rūpavad raso'pi
rūpaṃ bhavati rūpaṃ vā rasavad raso bhavati dṛṣṭaviruddhatvāt . yasmād rūpameva rūpaṃ rasa eva raso bhavati netarabhāvamāpadyate tasmādrūpādayaḥ santi .
evaṃ tarhi rūpādimātratvād na ghaṭa iti syādāśaṅkā, sā mā bhūt, na ca tathā sthitau ghaṭo na
bhavati . yathā parasparavyāvṛttātmatve satyapi rūpādayo bhavantīti sthitiḥ, tathā sthitau evaṃ sthite tathā
ghaṭo'pi bhavati, na na bhavati, rūparasayorghaṭabhāvāt tayoritaretarābhūtayoreva ghaṭatvāt tayorādhārabhūtayorvā ghaṭatvāt . tadupanayati --asāmastyena vā bhāvābhāvātmaka eva ghaṭa iti .
nanu ghaṭetyādi vaiśeṣiko viśeṣaṃ bhāvātmakameva vāñchan vyāvṛttyātmakaṃ viśeṣaṃ nirākurvannāha .
yathā rūpādiṣvādhāreṣu ghaṭo bhavati rūpādaya eva vā siddhāntāntaradarśanena ghaṭo na nirmūlastathā pṛthivyapi
mṛdādiḥ mṛdaśma-sikatā-loṣṭa-vajra-vṛkṣa-gulma-latā-'vatāna-vīrudādiṣu tadātmikā, tasyā eva te viśeṣā
rūpādaya iva ghaṭasya nābhāvo viśeṣaḥ, itarathā nirmūlatvādabhāvaviśeṣatve ghaṭasya rūpādīnāṃ cāsattvamāpannaṃ
khapuṣpavat, na ca tadiṣṭam . evaṃ nyāyād rūpādayo mṛdādayaśca ghaṭasya pṛthivyāśca viśeṣo bhāva ityuktam .
tathā cetyādi bhāvaviśeṣatvabhāvanāgrantho yāvad vistṛtatvādiḥ . ekabhavanātmakatvāditi hetuḥ
ekameva bhavanamekasyaiva vā bhavanamātmā'sya iti vigrahaḥ, yadekabhavanātmakaṃ tad nābhāvaviśeṣaḥ . dṛṣṭāntaḥ —
ghaṭaghaṭasvātmavat, yathā ghaṭa eva ghaṭasvātmā, nānyat khapuṣpādyasat . syānmatam--aviśeṣastarhi prāpta

naikabhavanātmakatvaṃ pṛthivībhūterapi, tasyā api bhāvābhāvātmakatvāt . nanu
pṛthivyapi udakādi na bhavati .
na, uktopanyāsavad dravyam iti bhavanāt . nanu dravyamapi guṇaḥ iti na
bhavati .
na, sat iti bhavanāt . yadi sat ityeva bhavati kena viśeṣahetunā sadeva
sarvam iti bhavati, na dravyameva iti ? yatastu... ... ...yathā tantuṣu paṭaḥ .
yadyevam, tarhi bhavati ityukte'pi na bhavati nārthaḥ ityevoktaṃ bhavati
ekabhavanātmakatvād mṛdādirūpādīnāṃ ghaṭaghaṭasvātmavat, aniṣṭaṃ caitaditi . atrocyate --na caivamaviśeṣaḥ,
ghaṭasvātmana eva deśakālarūpādiviśeṣavadātmanyeva bhāvaviśeṣadarśanāt . ata āha --tadviśeṣa eva viśeṣo
nābhāvaḥ . ko'sau pṛthivyādiviśeṣa iti cet, ucyate --pṛthivīsāmānye satyeva ūrddhatvavistṛtatvādiviśeṣo nābhāvaḥ, tathā ghaṭo'pi mṛdekabhavanātmakākāraviśeṣo bhāva eva na paṭādyabhāva iti .
atrācārya āha--tvadabhimataṃ naikabhavanātmakatvaṃ pṛthivībhūterapi, kuto ghaṭaghaṭasvātmanaḥ ? kasmāt
tasyā api pṛthivībhūteḥ bhūmibhavanasya bhāvābhāvātmakatvāt . tannidarśayati --nanvityādi, pṛthivībhavanamudakāgnyādyabhavanam, etadevāsya mūlamabhāvaviśeṣabhavanam, tanmūlatvāt kimityasyāsattvāpattiḥ ? evamabhāvaviśeṣarahitabhāvaviśeṣasiddhau māṃ prati na kiñcid nidarśanamastītyabhiprāyaḥ .
para āha --na, uktopanyāsavad dravyam iti bhavanāt, pṛthivī dravyabhavanāvinābhāvenaiva
bhavati, pṛthivyudakādi pṛthivyudakādiṣu vā dravyam, itarathā nirmūlatvādityādiḥ sa eva grantho yathāyogaṃ
vācyaḥ . atrottaram --nanu dravyamapi guṇaḥ iti na bhavatītyabhāvāvinābhāvibhavanavacanam .
na, sat iti bhavanāditi sattvabhavanavyāptyā bhāvasyaiva viśeṣa iti pūrvavat . abhāvavādyāha —
yadi sadityādi, aniṣṭāpādanamukhenāsadvādasamarthanamidam . yadi sat ityeva bhavati sattvāviśeṣād
dravyaguṇakarmaṇāmavyatirekāt paryāyamātratve kena viśeṣahetunā sadeva sarvam iti bhavati, na
dravyameva iti ? dṛṣṭaṃ cedam, dravyameva na bhavati, guṇakarmaṇorapi sadbhāvāt . guṇakarmābhāvād dravyaṃ
saditi bhavati, guṇakarmaṇī ca tadabhāvāt satī bhavataḥ . na ca dravyādivyatirekeṇa sad nāma kiñcidasti
ityuktatvād dṛṣṭaviruddhamucyate tvayeti . atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ --yatastvityādi caṭakamarkaṭikayā abhāvāvinābhāvibhāvapratipādanaṃ yathā tantuṣu paṭa iti gatārtham .
evaṃ tāvad bhāvaikāntapakṣavyāvartanadvāreṇābhāvasahito bhāva uktaḥ, ataḥ paramabhāvaikāntapakṣavyāvartana-
dvāreṇa bhāvasahita evābhāva ityetat pratipādayiṣyate --yadyevamityādi abhāvaikāntavādinaṃ bhāvaikāntavādī


parito bhavanābhāvāt khapuṣpavat . nanu paritaḥ paṭādāvabhavanneva kaṭaḥ sidhyati . nanu
paritovacanena svātmano'pyabhavanamuktaṃ bhavati . tathā... ...asattvaṃ pakṣadharmo'narthatvaikānte, paṭaḥ kaṭādirna bhavati nāpi rūpādiḥ .
nanu parito'pyabhavanameva sādhayati bhāvamapi . kaṭo'pi kaṭa iti bhavanneva
ghaṭapaṭau na bhavati .
na, guṇaḥ ityabhavanāt . nanu guṇo'pi guṇaḥ iti bhavanneva kaṭapaṭau na bhavati .
na, dravyam ityabhavanāt . yadi na bhavatyeva... ...ghaṭa iti bhavati .
nanvevam... ... ...parasparāvabaddhanaudvayavat . na, vyavasthitopakārisvarūpatvāt,
upālabhate, yadi ghaṭo bhavati ityukte'pyabhāva evokto bhavati paṭo na bhavati iti tarhi bhavati
ityukte'pi na bhavati nārthaḥ ityevoktaṃ bhavatīti prāptam . sādhanamapyatra parito bhavanābhāvāt
khapuṣpavaditi . syānmatam --nanu paritaḥ paṭādāvabhavanneva kaṭaḥ sidhyati, tasmādanaikāntika iti
cet, na, vipakṣābhāvāt, nanu paritovacanenetyādi, paritovacanaṃ sarvatrārtham, tena svātmano'pyabhavanamuktaṃ bhavati, tasmād nānaikāntikatā . tathetyādirasya nyāyasya prāptipradarśanārtho daṇḍako yāvadasattvaṃ
pakṣadharmo'narthaṃtvaikānta iti prāgvyākhyāto'rthaḥ kaṇṭhaḥ kapāle nāstītyādi, tasya nidarśanam paṭaḥ
kaṭādirna bhavati nāpi rūpādiriti, aniṣṭaṃ caitat .
atra bhāvābhāvavādī uttaramāha --nanu parito'pyabhavanameva tvaduktaṃ sādhayati asmadiṣṭaṃ
bhāvamapi, tadyathā --kaṭo'pi kaṭa iti bhavanneva ghaṭapaṭau na bhavati, ghaṭatvapaṭatvādyabhāvaḥ kaṭasya
kaṭātmabhavanāvinābhāvīti bhāvabhavanād na mucyate . itara āha--bhavan na, guṇa ityabhavanāt, atrāpi
guṇābhāvānuviddha eva kaṭabhāvaḥ guṇatvenābhavanāt . nanu guṇo'pītyādi guṇa iti vidhinā bhavanneva kaṭa
iti na bhavati viśeṣeṇa niyamena vyāvṛttyeti .
itara āha --na, dravyam ityabhavanāt, atrāpi dravyābhāvānuviddhastvadabhimato guṇabhāva iti .
atrocyate --yadi na bhavatyevetyādi caṭakamarkaṭikayā dravyaguṇayorbhāvābhāvatvamāpādya kaṭāderdravyaviśeṣasyāpādayati gatapratyāgatanyāyena, tato ghaṭasyāpi yāvad ghaṭa iti bhavatīti . evamekāntabhāvābhāvavādinoḥ parasparakṛtacodyadvayaparihāraḥ . evameva bhāvābhāvavādinaṃ pratyapi tadviparyayeṇetarabhāvanayā ekāntavādināṃ
vidhyādinayānāṃ mateṣu parihāraḥ kāryaḥ . athavā taccodyasyātrāvakāśa eva nāsti, tenāpi ubhayobhayanayena
sarvaikāntavādināṃ sunivartitatvāt sakalavikalādeśābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvatvasiddheriti .
nanvevamityādi idamapyanyaccodyaṃ vikalādeśapakṣe ubhayobhayavādinaṃ pratyaniṣṭāpādanaṃ sādhanena gatārthaṃ

dhṛtyādivṛttajagadavasthāvat . pṛthivyādīnāmanityatve'pi arthabhavanāvicchedād vyavasthitopakāritvaṃ siddhamanavasthānābhāvaśca svatvaparatvābhyāṃ tathā bhāvābhāvayoḥ .
yadi tu bhāvābhāvayorna parasparāvabaddhatvaṃ tataḥ paṭasyābhāve ghaṭabhāvābhāvaḥ
bhāva eva abhāvatulyatvāt, paṭavat . yadi vā... ... ....
nanu tasya sākṣādevābhavanamubhayataḥ . nanvata evedam... ...dravyāditvena ca .
yadi tvasau paṭaḥ paṭatvadravyatvābhyāṃ na bhavet, na paṭo bhavet, paṭatvadravyatvābhyāma-
yāvat parasparāvabaddhanaudvayavaditi pūrvapakṣaḥ . atrocyate--tad na, vyavasthitopakārisvarūpatvāt
dhṛtyādivṛttajagadavasthāvaditi sādhanenānavasthādoṣaparihāraḥ . nityatve pṛthivyādīnāṃ vyavasthitatvaṃ parasparopakāritvaṃ ca dhṛtisaṅgrahapaktivyūhāvakāśadānakriyābhiḥ siddham, tato'navasthā naivāstītyatra kā cintā ?
kintu anityatve'pyarthabhavanāvicchedāt satatabhavanasyāvicchedād bhāve vyavasthitopakāritvasya dhṛtyā
bhūmiritareṣāmātmanaścopakurute jalaṃ saṅgraheṇa agniḥ paktyā vāyurvyūhena sarveṣāmavakāśadānādākāśamityavasthitopakārisvarūpatvaṃ siddhamanavasthānābhāvaśca, akṣarārtho bhāṣye gamitaḥ, svatvaparatvābhyāmiti svarūpasiddhau
pararūpasiddhau ca teṣāṃ parasparāvabaddhatve satyapyanavasthā nāsti, tathā bhāvābhāvayoriti, yo'sau bhavati ghaṭaḥ
sa paṭo na bhavati, yadasau paṭo bhavati tad ghaṭo na bhavati, ghaṭo bhavanneva paṭo na bhavati, paṭo bhavanneva
ghaṭo na bhavati, tathā bhavati na bhavati cetyapi jñeyam, parasparāvabaddhavyavasthitopakārisvarūpatvād nānavastheti .
yadi tvityādi parasparāvabaddhabhāvābhāvatvābhāve dvayorapyekāntapakṣayordoṣābhidhānam . paṭasyābhāve
ghaṭabhāvābhāvastvadiṣṭavighātyāpadyate, ko'sau ? bhāva eva, kasmāt ? abhāvatulyatvāt paṭavadityabhāvaikāntapakṣe doṣaḥ . bhāvaikāntapakṣe'pi yadi vetyādi ghaṭapaṭādisaṅkīrṇatā doṣaḥ .
evamantaritadravyatvasattvādiguṇatvādisāmānyaviśeṣābhyāṃ bhāvābhāvātmakatā, nāntaritābhyāmeva, kiṃ
tarhi ? nanu tasya sākṣādevābhavanamubhayataḥ, sāmānyato dravyatvena svena viśeṣato'nyadravyatvena paṭagatena
guṇatvena ca ghaṭasyābhavanāt, tathā tadviparyayeṇa paṭasya, paṭaghaṭagatayośca dravyatvayorbhedāt tadbhedavat tadvyatiriktadravyatvasyābhāvāt . nanvata evedamityādinā bhāvayati yāvad dravyāditvena ceti . ghaṭo guṇatvena
paṭadravyāditvena ca sākṣānna bhavati ghaṭadravyatvena bhavati, paṭaḥ paṭadravyatvena sākṣād bhavati guṇatvena ghaṭadravyatvena ca sākṣānna bhavatīti bhāvābhāvātmakatvamevānayoḥ .
yadi tvasāvityādi aniṣṭāpādanasādhanamabhyupagame, yadi paṭaḥ paṭatvadravyatvābhyāṃ na bhavet, na paṭo

bhavanāt, ghaṭavad guṇavadvā . yatastu... ...tata evetarābhyāṃ bhavati nīlotpalādivat .
atastvanyathā... ...khapuṣpavat .
kālato'pi ca... ... .... na yathā lokavādaḥ--palālamagnirdahatīti . yadi
tad dahyate eva,... ....... ...bhasmīkaraṇānupapatteḥ pūrvavat . deśaḥ palālasya dahyate
tathāpi... ...deśasyāpi bhasmīkaraṇānupapatteḥ . athākāśavyatireka... ... ...tadapi
na... ... .... tathā ghaṭo na bhidyate kvacit .
bhavet paṭatvadravyatvābhyāmabhavanāt ghaṭavad guṇavadvā, ghaṭo guṇo vā naiva na bhavet tata eva tadvat . evaṃ
ghaṭaguṇayorapi sādhanābhyāmaniṣṭamāpādyam . etasyārthasya bhāvanā --yatastvityādi yāvat tata evetarābhyāṃ
bhavatīti . avaśyaṃ caitadevam, anvayavyatirekābhyāmarthasyāvadhāraṇe prayogasya sāphalyāt . tadyathā nīlotpalādivat, siddhe sati ārambho niyamārthaḥ, yathā raktanīlatvayoḥ siddhayoranyatarābhāvenānyatarabhāvena
cotpalaṃ niyamyate raktameva, nīlameva vā iti tathā ghaṭaḥ paṭa iti veti . tadarthabhāvanā bhāṣye'nyatarābhāvābhāve'nyatarabhāvābhāve ca sato'pyabhāvaprasaṅgāpādanadvāreṇa lokaprasiddhyanupātena kṛtā . etasya nyāyasyānabhyupagame dvayorapyabhāvaḥ, taddarśayati --atastvanyathetyādi aniṣṭāpādanasādhanaṃ gatārthaṃ yāvat khapuṣpavaditi . evaṃ dravyato bhāvābhāvātmakatā vyākhyātā .
kālato'pi cetyādi, vināśotpādayorekakālatvāt piṇḍaśivakādīnāṃ piṇḍo na bhūtaḥ śivako
bhūta ityekameva bhūtamabhūtaṃ ca kālabhedāt . atītānāgatābhyāṃ vṛttibhyāmasaṃsṛṣṭatattvā śivakāditā vartamānaikakālā . na yathā lokavāda iti avijñātārthatattvo loko mithyā brūta iti vaidharmyodāharaṇaṃ palālamagnirdahatīti, etat svavacanānumānapratyakṣaviruddhaṃ vacanamiti . tad bhāvayati --yadi tad dahyata evetyādi
yāvad bhasmīkaraṇānupapatteḥ pūrvavat palālakālavat, kālasya bhinnatvābhyupagamāt . paraḥ parihāraṃ
manyeta --deśaḥ palālasya dahyate sa ca palālameveti . tasyottaram --tathāpītyādi gatārthaṃ yāvad
deśasyāpi bhasmīkaraṇānupapatteriti . athākāśavyatireketyādi, syānmatam--dravyārthikanayamate'bhedāt palālādimūrtadravyeṣveva sambhavādākāśādyamūrtidravyavyatirekeṇa palālameva dahyate nākāśādīti .
tadapi netyādi, abhūtatadbhāve'rthe cvipratyayaḥ, tadantena bhasmīkaraṇaśabdenānyo dāho vartate anyacca
palālamiti bhinnārthatvādaparihāraḥ . athāpyekatvaṃ palālasyeṣyate dravyārthābhedāt tatastasya dāhyatā nāsti
bhasmatvābhūteriti .
tathā ghaṭa ityādi kālata eva bhāvābhāvātmakatvaviparyaye'nyadudāharaṇaṃ pūrvavad gatārthaṃ
saprasaṅgam . bhideḥ kapālaviṣayatvād ghaṭasya ūrddhvatādyākāratvāt kālabhedādanupapattiḥ . prastutaghaṭodāha

kṣetrataḥ śūnyaṃ na praviśyate... ... ....
bhāvato'saṃyato na pravrajati . evameva bhavyo na sidhyati .
raṇe bhāvayitumupādānamasyeti . athavā pūrvaṃ ghaṭapaṭāvudāhṛtau, iha darśanaviparyaye'pyudāharaṇadvayam, tathā ca
kṣetrato bhāvataśca dve dve vakṣyati, bhāvanādṛḍhīkaraṇārthatvāt kriyāntaragatatvabhāvanāto nyāyaprāptidarśanāt .
kṣetrataḥ śūnyamityādi praveśagamanasthānānupapattirgatārthā, tiṣṭhatigacchativiparyayeṇa prāsaṅgikamudāharaṇam .
bhāvato'saṃyata ityādi, anādikālasambaddhadarśanacāritramohanīyodayajāyā avirateḥ pṛthagbhāvaḥ
pravrajyā prakarṣavrajanaṃ viratiḥ, sā kathamasaṃyate ghaṭate ? evameveti ekasya bhāvābhāvātmakatvādhikārānuvṛttyā
bhāvataḥ siddha-bhavyakālabhedādayuktamityudāharati .


kumbhaṃ karoti iti ādāvapyāha . na tathā ghaṭate . yadi sa kumbha eva
mṛdavasthāyām, na kriyate, bhūtatvāt, anyamṛdvat . athābhūtaḥ, na kriyate saḥ,
abhūtatvāt, khapuṣpavat . kathamasan kumbha ucyate vā ?

athavaikamevodāharaṇaṃ dravyādicaturvidhatvaṃ yojayati ityāha --kumbhaṃ karoti ityādāvapyāha,
mṛnmardanakāle'pyāha kumbhaṃ karomi iti kumbhakāraḥ, apiśabdāt karaṇakāle nirvṛttyuttarakāle ca kṛtaḥ
kumbha iti . na tathā ghaṭate, yathā loko vadati iti vartate . yadi sa kumbha evānirvṛtto'pi mṛdavasthāyām, na kriyate, bhūtatvāt, yad bhūtaṃ tanna kriyate, yathā anyā mṛt . athābhūtaḥ kriyata iti manyase,
na kriyate saḥ, abhūtatvāt, khapuṣpavat . kathamasan kumbha ucyate vā ?


athocyeta--satyam, prāgabhūtaḥ, idānīṃ kriyate, kriyamāṇaśca bhavatīti .
atrāpi yadyabhūto na tarhi kumbhaḥ sa kriyate, bhūtatve'pi kṛtakaraṇavaiyarthyānna kriyate .
athābhūto'pi kumbha ucyate, pṛthivyapi te kumbha iti prāptā . tataśca kriyā'bhāvaḥ .
na ca kasyāñcidapyavasthāyām... ... ...kriyā .
kathaṃ tarhi so'kriyamāṇaḥ kumbho jātaḥ ? ko vā bravīti jātaḥ iti,
dravyādito janmavināśasamatvāt ? sa na jāyate iti kiṃ śakyo vaktum ? om,

athocyeta pakṣadvayānāśrayaṇena parihārasamarthaṃ matvā pakṣāntaraṃ saṃśritya satyaṃ prāgabhūta idānīṃ
kriyate, kriyamāṇaśca bhavatīti . atrāpi bhūtābhūtatvavikalpadvayānativṛttiḥ, yadyabhūto na tarhi kumbhaḥ
saḥ, paṭādivat kumbhatvenābhūtatvād na kriyate nāpi kumbhaḥ iti vaktavyaḥ . bhūtatve'pi paṭādivacca sānnidhye
kṛtakaraṇavaiyarthyād na kriyate . athābhūto'pi piṇḍādiḥ svapakṣe rāgād lokānuvṛttyā vā kumbha ucyate
pṛthivyapi te kumbha iti prāptā kumbhatvenābhūtatvāt tvadiṣṭakriyamāṇakumbhavat . tataśca kriyā'bhāvaḥ,
pṛthivyarthakriyāvaiyarthyavat kumbhārthakriyāyā abhāvaḥ . tad bhāvayati --na ca kasyāñcidapyavasthāyāmityādi
yāvat kriyeti . dravyataḥ sarvapradeśātmakasya paramāṇumātre'varuddhatvānna kriyā, dravyāntare tvabhāvādabhāvaḥ .
kṣetrato budhnamadhyordhvādibhāgāvaṣṭabdhakṣetravāditvāt katamo ghaṭaḥ kriyate ? kālataḥ pratikṣaṇamanyānyapradeśaspandāvarodhāt, bhāvataḥ sarvasaṃsthānarūpādisamāhārātmakatve ghaṭasya bhāvaṃ bhāvaṃ prati pṛthaktvāt kā kriyā ?
yasmāt kriyamāṇameva tu kriyate mṛdāharaṇādīti caturdhāpyetadudāharaṇam .
apara āha --kathaṃ tarhi so'kriyamāṇaḥ kumbho jātaḥ, kriyāyā abhāvādakriyamāṇo'kriya-
māṇatvāt kumbho jāyate khapuṣpavaditi prāptam, aniṣṭaṃ caitat, lokaprasiddhyuparodhitvāditi . atrocyate —
ko vā bravīti jātaḥ iti ? ahaṃ tu lokamevāyuktavādinaṃ manye, dravyādito janmavināśasamatvāt,
ya eva jātaḥ sa eva vinaṣṭo yatraiva tatraiva yadaiva tadaiva yathaiva tathaiveti bhāvābhāvayorbhāvo bhavanam, sa eva
bhāvābhāvabhāvo vastu sadasadātmakabhavanam, vastutvāt pūrvābhāva eva bhāvo'sya piṇḍādeḥ, pūrvabhāvasyābhāvo
vināśaḥ, sa eva uttarottaro bhāvo janma iti janmavināśayorlakṣaṇam, tayostulyatvād dravyāditaḥ . sa
bhāvābhāvātmako'rtho na jāyata iti kiṃ śakyo vaktum ? iti . omityucyate, sa na jāyate iti

vinaśyattvāt, pūrvavat . na vinaśyati ityapi śakyaṃ vaktuṃ jāyamānatvāduttaravat .
etadudāharaṇaṃ nirvartyakarmaviṣayāsu vikāryakarmaviṣayāsu ca kriyāsu, sarvāsvapi
tāsveṣaiva vārtā . prāpyakarmakriyāsvapi ca kāsucit .
evaṃ tāvadutpannaśabdānāṃ nirviṣayatā . dravyaśabdeṣvapi bhāvābhāvātmakatvāt
sarvabhāvānāṃ kutaḥ tattvopanipāti vacanam ? bhrūkṣepādivattu svābhiprāyasūcanaṃ kṛtasaṅketānāṃ kriyate .
śakyo vaktumiti . kasmāt ? vinaśyattvāt, ghaṭāvasthā hi janma, sā vinaśyadavasthaiva uktanyāyāt,
pūrvavaditi tvadiṣṭānantarāghaṭāvasthāvat . na vinaśyati ityapi śakyaṃ vaktuṃ jāyamānatvāduttaravat
ghaṭāvasthāvaditi .
etadudāharaṇaṃ nirvartyaghaṭādikarmaviṣayāsu karaṇapacanādikriyāsu, vikāryapalālādiviṣayāṣu ca dahanādikriyāsu, sarvāsvapi tāsveṣaiva vārtā--nāsti kācit kriyeti . grāmaṃ gacchati ityādiprāpyakarmikāsu
kathamiti cet, prāpyakarmakriyāsvapi ca kāsuciditi gacchatipravrajatyādiṣu bhāvitam, kāsucit tu
himavadādityaśravaṇadarśanādiṣu yadyapi naiṣā vārtā, śabdaghaṭaśravaṇadarśanādiṣveṣaiva vārtā . kiñca, kṛta-dagdhagatādiśabdaiśca ktapratyayāntairyāḥ kriyā ucyante tāsāṃ niṣṭhitatvād bhūtakālavihitatvācca ktasya kiñcinniṣṭhitaṃ
kiñcidaniṣṭhitaṃ mṛtpalālādi karma iti kṛtākṛtatvānupapatteḥ sutarāṃ prayogābhāva iti suṣṭhūcyate --yathā loko
vadati na tathā ghaṭata iti .
evaṃ tāvadutpannaśabdānāṃ kriyāvācināmākhyātānāṃ nāmnāṃ pācakādīnāṃ śuklādiguṇaśabdānāṃ ca nirviṣayatā nirarthakatetyarthaḥ . dravyaśabdeṣvapītyādi yāvad vacanamiti sarvabhāvā bhāvābhāvātmakā ityuktaṃ vistarataḥ, tadvācyabhimatānāṃ śabdānāmuktanyāyena tadasaṃsparśāt kutaḥ tattvaṃ bhāvābhāvātmakaṃ vastūpanipatituṃ
vacanasya śīlaṃ dharmaḥ sādhukāritā vā kasyacit ? iti .
evaṃ tarhi śabdārthavyavahārahāniriti cet, na ityucyate, asti śabdārthasaṃvyavahāraḥ saṃjñāsaṃjñi

atra cānyāpohaḥ śabdārthaḥ . āha hi--śabdāntarārthāpohaṃ hi svārthe kurvatī śrutiḥ
abhidhatte ityucyate   .
sambandhasanniveśātmakaḥ . bhrūkṣepādivattu akṣinikocaiḥ pāṇivihārairbhrūkṣepādibhiścāṅgavikāraiḥ svābhiprāyasūcanaṃ
kṛtasaṅketānāṃ kriyate, abhipretārthaparyāyamātratvāt tāsāṃ kriyāṇām, tathā śabdasyāpi abhidheyābhimatārthaparyāyamātraparamārthatvāt tadarthapratipattyupāyaḥ śabdo bhrūkṣepādivat . saṃjñā saṃjñaiva saṃjñāpanāt . na vācakaḥ śabdaḥ,
puruṣāṇāṃ kṛtasaṅketānāṃ pratipattyupāyaḥ, akṛtasaṅketānāṃ tu śabdagaḍumātrasampratyayanimittatvāt . yathoktam—
vikalpayonayaḥ śabdā vikalpāḥ śabdayonayaḥ .teṣāmatyantasambandho nārthāñ śabdāḥ spṛśantyapi ॥   iti .
evaṃ vastuno bhāvābhāvātmakasyānirdeśyatvāt paramārthasyāvācakaḥ, saṃvṛtisatastu vyavahārasya vācaka ivopalakṣaṇabhūtaḥ śabdaḥ .
atra cetyādi . nayamatena vastusvarūpaṃ śabdārthasambandhaṃ cāvadhārya śabdārtho'dhunāvadhāryate --atra ca
vidhiniyamavidhiniyamabhaṅge'nyāpohaḥ śabdārthaḥ . yasmādāha --śabdāntarārthetyādi, śabdādanye śabdāḥ
śabdāntarāṇi, teṣāmarthānapohate ghaṭaśabdaḥ paṭādiśabdānāṃ svato'nyeṣāṃ vyavahārānupātāt . svārthe kurvatī
śrutiḥ iti vacanena bhāvābhāvātmakamarthaṃ darśayati . abhidhatte ityucyata iti, na paramārthato'bhidhatte'rthātmano'nabhilāpyatvāt saṃjñāparamārthatvāt abhidhatte ivābhāti lakṣayan saṅketavaśādarthamiti eṣa padārthaḥ .

pratibhā ca vākyārthaḥ .
vākyārthastarhi kaḥ ? ucyate --pratibhā ca vākyārthaḥ . śabdābhyāsavāsanājanitā'rtheṣu pratibhā
vākyebhyo jāyate tiraścāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ca yathābhyāsaṃ svajātiniyatā svapratyayānukāreṇa śūra-kātarādīnāmiva

ayamṛjusūtradeśatvāt paryāyāstikaḥ .
vyāghrādiśabdaśravaṇāt kopa-harṣa-bhayādinimittetyādi yathāvadanugantavyam . vākyārthapratipattyupāyaḥ padārtho'san vākyādapoddhṛtya utprekṣayā vyākhyāyate .
ayaṃ punarnayaḥ katamaḥ śāstravihitānāmiti cet, ṛjusūtradeśatvāt paryāyāstikaḥ . ekaikasya
pari samantāt... ....
upanibandhanamapyasya ārṣam--ātā bhaṃte ! poggale, ṇo ātā ? gotamā ! siyā ātā
nayasya śatadhā bhedābhyupagamādṛjusūtradeśo'yamṛjusūtrabhedaḥ,
ekkekko ya satavidho satta ṇayasatā havaṃti evaṃ tu .bitiyo vi a ādeso paṃca ṇayasatā havaṃtevaṃ ॥ āva॰ ni॰ 759
iti vacanāt . ṛju praguṇaṃ sūtrayati tantrayata iti ṛjusūtraḥ, sūtrapātavadṛjusūtra iti vā .
pari samantādityādinā paryāyāstikaśabdārthaṃ savyutpattiṃ svayameva vyācaṣṭe .
kimetāḥ svamanīṣikā ucyante, āhosvidasya nayasya nibandhanamastyārṣam ? iti, asti ityucyate,

paramāṇupoggalāle, siyā ṇo ātā . se keṇaṭṭheṇa bhaṃte ! evaṃ vuccati--siyā ātā paramāṇupoggale
siyā ṇo ātā ? gotamā ! appaṇo ādiṭṭhe ātā parassa ādiṭṭhe ṇo ātā bhagavatīsū॰ 12 . 10 . 469 .
iti saptamo'ra ubhayobhayabhaṅgaḥ .
upanibandhanamapyasya yato nirgamastadastyārṣam . tadyathā --ātā bhaṃte ! poggale ityādi . pudgalānāmātmā
svarūpaṃ no ātmā pararūpamiti bhāvābhāvau vidhiniyamāviti praśno gautamasya indrabhūtergaṇadharasya . vyākaraṇaṃ bhagavānāha --gautama ! siyā ātā paramāṇupoggalāle siyā ṇo ātā, bhavatyapi na bhavatyapi . se keṇaṭṭheṇetyādi kāraṇapraśnaḥ . evamiti syācchabdārthaṃ pratyuccārayati . kenārthena syādātmā paramāṇupudgalaḥ, syānno ātmā ? iti vivṛṇoti tameva . ko niścaya iti praśnaḥ . bhagavānāha --gotamā !
appaṇo ādiṭṭhe ātā ātmanā svarūpeṇa ādiṣṭe arpite vivakṣite ātmā bhāvo vidhiḥ svarūpam .
parassa ādiṭṭhe ṇo ātā, parasya ādiṣṭe no ātmā avṛttirabhāvo niyama iti . tathā dvipradeśikādiskandhāḥ ākāśādyastikāyā ghaṭapaṭādayaścārthā yathā vistaraśo vyākhyātamiti .
iti nayacakraṭīkāyāṃ saptamo'ra ubhayobhayabhaṅgaḥ samāptaḥ ॥





oँ arhaँ


sadgurubhyo namaḥ

athāṣṭama ubhayaniyamāraḥ .

bhāvābhāvabhāvanāyāṃ yadi bhāvo vidhirabhāvo viśeṣaḥ, sa ca parābhāva iṣṭo
na svarūpasyaiva viśeṣaḥ, tatastadabhāve svatvaṃ paratvaṃ cāvyavasthitaṃ paratvābhāvaviśeṣatulyatvāt . tataśca dvayorapītaretarātmāpatteḥ svaparaviśeṣatvābhāve bhāvābhāvayorbhedenopanipāto na syāt svato'pyasattvaṃ parataśca sattvaṃ syāt .
idamiha sampradhāryam--kimetau bhāvābhāvau dvāvapi pradhānau, bhāvaḥ pradhānaṃ
viśeṣa upasarjanam, viśeṣaḥ pradhānaṃ bhāva upasarjanam, ubhayamupasarjanam ? yadi
dvāvapi pradhānau tatastayoraṅgāṅgibhāvo na syāt parasparānapekṣatvādaparārthatvāt pradhānatvād vijigīṣuvat . ghaṭo ghaṭabhāvena svenaiva bhavati na paṭādibhāvena nābhāvena vā,

vidhi-niyamabhaṅgasamastavṛttisatyatvapratipādanādhikāre pūrvanayadṛṣṭāvaparituṣṭeruttaranayasamārambhaḥ, tadyathā—
bhāvābhāvabhāvanāyāmityādi . yadi bhāvābhāvātmakaṃ vastviti bhāvo vidhirabhāvo viśeṣaḥ, sa ca
parābhāva iṣṭo na svarūpasyaiva bhāvasya viśeṣo niyama iti, tatastadabhāve svagataviśeṣābhāve parasyāpi
svagataviśeṣābhāve svatvaṃ paratvaṃ cāvyavasthitam, paratvābhāvaviśeṣatulyatvāt . svaṃ svaṃ na bhavati
parābhāvaviśeṣatvāt paravat, parābhāvaviśeṣatvaṃ vastutvāt svavat svabhāvaviśeṣaśūnyatvāt . paramapi paraṃ na
bhavati svabhāvaviśeṣaśūnyatvāt svavat, parābhāvaviśeṣatvāt pūrvavat pakṣe dharmasiddhiḥ . tataśca dvayorapi
svaparayoritaretarātmāpatteḥ svasya svatvaṃ parasya ca paratvam ityeṣa viśeṣo nāsti . sati ca svaparaviśeṣatvābhāve bhāvābhāvayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayorbhedenopanipāto na syāt . na syāt iti sambhāvanayā,
mā mukhaniṣṭhuraṃ vocamiti . evamaikyāpattiranayoḥ . naikyāpattireva, kiṃ tarhi ? saṅkaro'pītyata āha —
svato'pyasattvaṃ bhāvitārthameva, apiśabdāt parato'sattvaṃ tvadabhyupagatameva, parataśca sattvaṃ syāt,
aniṣṭaṃ caitat .
kiñcānyat, idamiha sampradhāryam--kimetau bhāvābhāvau dvāvapi pradhānau vijigīṣū ivānyonyanirapekṣau, bhāvaḥ pradhānaṃ viśeṣa upasarjanam, viśeṣaḥ pradhānaṃ bhāva upasarjanam, ubhayamupasarjanam ? iti . caturṣu vikalpeṣu trīn vikalpān vyudasya bhāvopasarjanaṃ viśeṣapradhānaṃ nayasyāsya mataṃ
samarthayiṣyāmaḥ . tatra tāvad yadi dvāvapītyādi ubhayaprādhānye'niṣṭāpādanaṃ yāvad vijigīṣuvaditi .

paṭo'pyevameva . śibikāvāhakavat tulyaśaktīnāmapyarthānāmaṅgāṅgibhāva iti
cet, na, śibikāvāhakavat pradhānabhūtasyānyasya kasyacit sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ prayojayiturabhāvāt . uttarabhāvaḥ prayojayiteti cet, na, tadā'bhūtatvāt utpannasyāpi
tadātmakatvāt śibikāvāhakavadasvatantratvāt .
itarasya pradhānasyārthaṃ sādhayitumaṅgaṃ pravartamānamaṅginamapekṣate, aṅgyapyaṅgamityaṅgāṅgibhāvaḥ, sa na syāt
parasparānapekṣatvāt tayoḥ, parasparānapekṣatvamaparārthatvāt, aparārthatvaṃ pradhānatvāt, yathā vijigīṣoḥ .
tato virodhādekatra pravṛttyabhāvād vastu bhāvābhāvātmakaṃ na bhavatīti .
kathaṃ tarhi bhavatīti cet, ghaṭo ghaṭabhāvena svenaiva bhavati svabhavanaprādhānyena, na paṭādibhāvena
uktasaṅkara-viśeṣāsattvadoṣabhayāt, nābhāvena vā paṭāderātmano vā, uktadoṣādeva . paṭo'pyevameva,
svenaiva paṭabhāvena bhavati na ghaṭabhāvenābhāvenaiva vā .
śibikāvāhaketyādi yāvaccediti . syānmatam --parasparanirapekṣatvādityādihetvasiddhiḥ, tulyaśaktīnāmapyarthānāmaṅgāṅgibhāvadarśanāt, yathā śibikāvāhakānāmiveti . etacca na, śibikāvāhakavadityādi yāvat prayojayiturabhāvāditi . na hetvasiddhiḥ, śibikāvāhakānāmiva pradhānabhūta īśvaro
yathā prayojayitā saṃhatyakāriṇāmaṅgāṅgibhāvaheturasti vahanakriyāyāṃ na tathā kaścit sāmānyaviśeṣayorghaṭādeḥ piṇḍaśivakādeśca pradhānabhūto'nyaḥ kaścit prayojayitāsti . tasmād vaidharmyādayuktadṛṣṭāntamidamuttaramiti .
uttarabhāvaḥ prayojayiteti cet, piṇḍasyottaro bhāvaḥ śivakādiḥ, sa prayojayitā pradhānabhūtaḥ,
tasyāpi sthāsaka-kośaka-kuśūlakādiruttaro yāvat paścimo ghaṭaḥ punarāvṛttyā iti evaṃ cenmanyase tadapi
na, tadā'bhūtatvāt, uttarasya bhāvasya tasmin kāle'nutpannatvādasataḥ prayojakatvābhāvāt kutaḥ pradhānatvaṃ
khapuṣpasyeva ? kiñcānyat, abhyupetyāpi tadutpattimutpannasyāpi tadātmakatvāt mṛtpiṇḍādyātmakatvāduttarottarabhāvasya svabījādabhinnatvāt pūrva evottaraḥ, sa kathamātmānameva prayojayitumarhati ? bhedamabhyupagamyāpi śibikāvāhakavadasvatantratvāt paravaśavartitvādapravartakatvaṃ pūrvottarayordiktaḥ kālato vā bhinnayorapi bhāvābhāvayorapradhānatvādīśvarāpreritaśibikāvāhakavat . evaṃ tāvat pradhānayorapravṛttiḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayoḥ .
atha sanmitravadityādi anyataropasarjanapradhānabhāvena sāmānyaviśeṣayoraviśiṣṭateti
pūrvapakṣayati . yathā saṃhatyakāriṇoḥ sanmitrayoḥ parasparamatānuvartinorarthavaśādekasyopasarjanatā itarasya
prādhānyamiti cet evaṃ cenmanyase, tadapi na, vakṣyamāṇetyādi yāvadabhāvāditi . bhaviturviśeṣasyaiva
prādhānyam sāmānyasya bhavanasyaivopasarjanatvamityubhayaniyamenārthavattvaṃ bhāvaśabdasya nānyathā iti vakṣyate'sya
nayasya matam . tasmād nānyataropasarjana-pradhānabhāvaḥ .


atha sanmitravadanyataropasarjanapradhānabhāvena sāmānyaviśeṣayoraviśiṣṭateti
cet, na, vakṣyamāṇobhayaniyamanayamatavadanyataropasarjanapradhānabhāvābhāvāt .
athopasarjanāveva bhāvābhāvau tatastayoḥ pradhānenānyenāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyaṃ pravartayitrā, tadabhāve pravṛttyabhāvāt . na ca bhāvābhāvavyatirikto'rtho'sti . na ca pradhānena vinopasarjanam . na ca pradhānopasarjanabhāvena vinā dṛśyate bhoktṛbhogyaśarīrāhārādivastupravṛttiriti tayoreva pradhānopasarjanatā .
ityubhayaniyama ucyate--bhavat pradhānam, bhāva upasarjanam . bhavati viśeṣaḥ,

athopasarjanāveva bhāvābhāvau tatastayoḥ pradhānenānyenāvaśyaṃ bhavitavyaṃ balavatāśrayabhūtena
dvayoriva rājapuruṣayornṛpatinā pravartayitrā, tadabhāve pravṛttyabhāvāt . dṛṣṭā hi pravṛttirabalayorbalavadāśrayā . etāvatī ca pravṛttiḥ sāmānya-viśeṣayorbhavantī bhavet, sarvathā cānupapannā, bhāvābhāvayoreva
paryāyamātratvāt tattvānyatvādidharmāṇāṃ vastvantarābhāvāt, bhāvaḥ sāmānyaṃ pravṛttirdravyaṃ vidhiranvayo dharmī
iti paryāyāḥ, abhāvo viśeṣo'nyatvaṃ nivṛttiḥ paryāyo niyamo dharmaḥ iti paryāyāḥ, guṇaguṇyādikalpanāsvapi bhāvābhāvatvavyatiriktārthāsambhavād dvidhaiva syāt . taccetthaṃ vastu parīkṣyamāṇaṃ caturdhāpi na ghaṭate .
tasmād bhāvābhāvavyatiriktasyārthasyābhāvādupasarjanayorapravṛttiriti . syānmatam--pradhānena vināpyupa-
sarjanayoḥ pravṛttirbhaviṣyatīti . tadapi na ca pradhānena vinā upasarjanam asti iti vartate, bhṛtakādiriva svāminā . tasmādakalpanā iyamapīti .
syānmatam--upakāryopakāribhāvena vināpi bhavati vastviti . etadapi na ca pradhānopasarjanabhāvenetyādi yāvad vastupravṛttiriti . bhoktā pradhānam, tadarthaṃ bhogyamupasarjanamodanavardhitakavaccharīrādyātmanaḥ .
śarīrameva bhoktṛ cetanādhiṣṭhitam, tadarthamupasarjanamāhārādi, ādigrahaṇād vastraśayyāsanagṛhādi, āhārārthaṃ
śālyādi, śālyādyarthaṃ salilādi . yathaitad bhoktṛbhogyādi guṇapradhānabhāvenaiva pravartate na vinā teneti .
dṛśyate ca vastunaḥ pravṛttiritthaṃ pratyakṣīkṛtamiti tayoreva bhāvābhāvayoḥ pradhānopasarjanatā guṇapradhānabhāvaḥ, tṛtīyavastvabhāvāt .
itiśabdasya hetvarthatvādetasmāt kāraṇādevamavasthite katarat kathaṃ niyatamityubhayaniyama ucyate,
tadyathā --bhavat pradhānaṃ kartṛsādhanaṃ pratyayārthaḥ . bhāva upasarjanaṃ bhāvasādhanaṃ prakṛtyarthaḥ . ko bhavatīti
cet, ucyate --bhavati viśeṣaḥ, sa eva bhavati iti bhāvaḥ ṇapratyayāntena kartṛvācinā śabdenocyate
pūrvanayavyākhyāvyutpattivat . arthataḥ prakṛtyarthavivakṣāyāmapi kartrarthaprādhānyād bhāvasādhanatve'pi kartrartha
evocyate, atastatpradarśanārthamāha --yat tena bhūyate, kimuktaṃ bhavatīti cet, ucyate --yadasau bhavati
bhavanamāpadyate bhavanakriyāmanubhavati svarūpapratilambhe guṇabhūtaṃ kriyātvaṃ pratipadyamāno'rtho viparivartata ityuktaṃ

yat tena bhūyate yadasau bhavati naṭaparamārthanṛpatvavat . bhavitrā bhūyate, na bhavanena .
tena bhūyate cet khapuṣpamapi bhavet bhavanasya dravyatvāpatteḥ .
na tu bhavanamaviśeṣaṃ kvacidapi bhavad dṛṣṭam, viśeṣeṇa tu bhavitrā vaśīkṛtaṃ
dṛṣṭam, kriyā-ghaṭa-vrīhi-devadattādau kāraka-rūpādi-mūlādi-bālādibhedaṃ dṛśyata eva .
ityubhayaṃ niyamyate . iha viśeṣaḥ pradhānaṃ bhāvaḥ, sāmānyamupasarjanam, śibikāvāhakayāneśvarayānavat, viśeṣabhavanameva bhāvabhavanam .
bhavati . kimiva ? naṭaparamārthanṛpatvavat, yathā naṭaḥ paramārthato naṭa eva san rājaveṣadhārī rājakriyāsvājñāpanādiṣu ca vartamāno naṭatvapradhānastadviśeṣaparamārtha evaṃ ghaṭākhyo viśeṣo jaladhāraṇādibhavaneṣu vartamāno
ghaṭatvapradhānastadviśeṣaparamārtho bhavatīti bhavitā ghaṭaḥ kartā, tena kartrā bhavitrā bhūyate sa eva bhavanībhavati
na bhavanena na kartrā bhūyate, na bhavanaṃ ghaṭo bhavati, upasarjanatvāt kartṛ bhavituṃ na śaknoti . tena bhavanena
bhūyate cet khapuṣpamapi bhavet, yadyabhavad bhavet abhavitrā bhavanamanubhūyeta khapuṣpeṇāpyanubhūyeta . na
hyabhavitṛtvāt khapuṣpaṃ bhavanamanubhavati tathā bhavanamabhavitṛtvād nānubhavatītyarthaḥ . kasmād nānubhavati bhavanaṃ
bhavanamiti cet, ucyate --bhavanasya dravyatvāpatteḥ, dravyaśabdasya kartṛpratyayāntatvād bhavati iti dravyaṃ
bhavyaṃ kṛtyalyuṭo bahulaṃ kartari iti lakṣaṇād yadi bhavati dravyaṃ syāt . aniṣṭaṃ caitaditi .
evaṃ tarhi bhavitāpyabhavanaḥ khapuṣpavad na syāditi tulyamaniṣṭāpādanam . yathā bhavitrā vinā
bhavanaṃ nāsti, tadviśiṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭam, tathā bhavitāpi bhavanena vinā nāsti, tadviśiṣṭo dṛṣṭa iti . etacca
na tu bhavanamaviśeṣaṃ sāmānyamātraṃ kvacidapi bhavad dṛṣṭam, viśeṣeṇa tu bhavitrā vaśīkṛtaṃ
dṛṣṭam, satyametat, vayamapi na brūmaḥ--bhavanaṃ nāstyeveti, kiṃ tarhi ? viśeṣapradhānaṃ svopasarjanaṃ tu dṛṣṭamiti
na tulyatvamanayoḥ . kva tad dṛśyata iti cet, ucyate --kriyāghaṭetyādi . kriyāyāṃ kārakaṃ kartā,
ghaṭe rūpādiḥ, vrīhau mūlādiḥ, devadattādau bālādiḥ, ete bhedā yasya tad bhavanasāmānyaṃ bhedapradhānaṃ
dṛśyate loke viśeṣeṇopasarjanīkṛtaṃ pradhanena .
ityubhayam asmāt kāraṇād vidhirniyamaśca niyamyete sāmānyamupasarjanameva viśeṣa eva
pradhānam iti vidhiniyamau niyatau, na yathā pūrvatrobhayamate kāmacāro vā vidhirvidhīyate niyamyate ca
niyamo vidhīyate niyamyate ceti tulyakakṣau, anantarātītanayamatavadubhayaṃ cobhayam--bhāvo'pi bhāvo

asya paryāyanayabhedatvāt sarvadravyārthabhavanaṃ pratipakṣaḥ . nāmadravyārthabhavanaṃ
tāvat--nāma kāraṇaṃ dravyaṃ tadeva kāryaṃ bhavanātmakatvāt . ghaṭasya hi kumbhakāracetanā
kāraṇam; na amūrtātmā akaraṇāt . sarvamapi caitad nāmaiva . kumbhakāro hyātmāntaḥ-
bhavatyabhāvaśca, abhāvo'pi abhāvo bhavati bhāvaśceti, saṅkaradoṣāt . ihetyasmin naye svarūpaṃ ghaṭo
viśeṣaḥ, na paṭādyabhāvaḥ . sa eva viśeṣaḥ pradhānaṃ bhāvaḥ, sāmānyaṃ kriyā bhavanaṃ prakṛtyartha upasarjanamapradhānam . kimiva ? śibikāvāhakayāneśvarayānavat, yathā śibikāvāhakānāṃ yānamīśvarayānārthatvādapradhānam ataḥ śibikāvāhakāḥ yānti iti nocyante tairuhyamāna īśvara eva pradhānatvāt yāti
ityucyate tathā sāmānyena bhavatāpyapradhānena bhavitā ghaṭa eva bhavati iti prādhānyāducyate . tasmād
nirūpitavastusvarūpamupanayati viśeṣabhavanameva bhāvabhavanamiti dārṣṭāntikamartham .
itthaṃ paryāyanayabhedo'yam . asya nayasya paryāyanayabhedatvāt sarvadravyārthabhavanaṃ pratipakṣaḥ .
tatra vidhyādayo dravyārthabhavanabhedā vyākhyātā dūṣitāśca samanantarānulomāḥ pūrvaviruddhā nivṛttaniranuśayāḥ   iti nyāyakrameṇa . te ca dravyārthabhedāḥ . nāma-sthāpanādravyabhavanayoravyākhyātayorvyākhyānaṃ kṛtvā dūṣayiṣyati . tatra nāmadravyārthabhavanaṃ tāvat svarūpataḥ namayati prahvīkaroti sarvamātmasvabhāveneti nāma, kāraṇaṃ karotīti, dravyaṃ prāgvyākhyātārtham . bhavata eva vā yad bhavanaṃ tad dravyaṃ
kāraṇaṃ nāma ityucyate . bhavatyeva bhavatyavasthitaṃ viśvasya kāraṇaṃ prāguktapuruṣādikāraṇavadekameva nāma śabdaḥ .
āha--karotīti kāraṇamuktam, kāryābhāvāt kiṃ kriyate yat kurvat tat kāraṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ syāt ? tasmāt
kāryābhāvāt kāraṇatvābhāvaḥ, kāraṇatvābhāvāt svalakṣaṇābhāvāt khapuṣpavadasaditi; ucyate --tadeva kāryakāraṇameva nāma kāryaṃ nāsat . kutaḥ ? bhavanātmakatvāt . sa hi śabdo bhavanātmakaḥ, bhavanāni avasthāviśeṣāḥ svapnādivat puruṣasya bālādivadvā piṇḍādirūpādivadvā ghaṭasya . tasmāt sa eva kāraṇaṃ svāvasthāviśeṣāṇāṃ kāryāṇāmiti .
asyoddiṣṭasya kāryakāraṇabhāvasya nirūpaṇārthamudāhṛtya ghaṭaṃ ghaṭasya hītyādyārabhate . ghaṭasya hi
kāryasya yasmāt kumbhakāracetanā kāraṇaṃ kumbhakaraṇasamarthaśarīrasahitā, cetanārahitasya akaraṇāt .
ātmā tarhi kāraṇamastu cetanatvāditi cet, tad na amūrtātmā, akaraṇāt . tataḥ kim ? kumbhakāraśarīraṃ kartṛtvād mūrtatvād mṛdādyātmakatvād ghaṭasya mūrtasya kāraṇaṃ sambhāvyeta, mṛtsalilādyātmakatvādvā
ghaṭasya mṛtsalilādyeva kāraṇaṃ sambhāvyeta, yadastu tadastu kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca, sarvathā caitanyarahitasya mūrtadravyasya ghaṭasajātīyasyāpi mūrtirahitasyāpi vā cetanasyāsajātīyaghaṭakāraṇatvāsambhavād mūrtacaitanyātmakaḥ
kumbhakāraḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśātmānaḥ saṃhatya kumbhakārākhyā bhavanti . tacca sarvamapi caitad nāmaiva
śabda eva, śabdabrahmaṇa evaikasya viparivartasvarūpaṃ pṛthivyātmādi mūrtāmūrtabhedaprabhedaṃ jagat .


saṃniviṣṭaśabdānubaddhacaitanyasvarūpatvācchabdātmakaḥ, tadanurūpapravṛttayo'pi tadātmikāḥ, na tadabhāve pravartate tantuvāyavat . na hi kācidapi cetanā'śabdāsti .
ye'pyavyaktacetanāḥ sthāvarā jaṅgamāśca te'pi śabdābhyāsavāsanājanitāntarniviṣṭasvānurūpacaitanyāḥ, hitāhitapravṛttivyāvṛttivṛttatvāt, kumbhakāravat . bhagavadarhadā-

apara āha--śabdasvatattvamākāśam, ākāśaguṇo vā śabdaḥ śrotragrāhyasyārthasya śabdasaṃjñatvāditi
kecit pratipannāḥ . tat kayopapattyedamucyate--śabda eva sarvamiti ? atrocyate --kumbhakāro hītyādi .
hiśabdo hetvarthe, kumbhakārastāvadātmāntaḥsanniviṣṭaśabdānubaddhacaitanyasvarūpatvācchabdātmakaḥ, tadanurūpāntaḥśabdānubaddhacaitanyapreritapiṇḍaśivakādyanukramapravṛttayaḥ kriyā api tadātmikāḥ, tatpravṛttitvāt,
mṛtpravṛttyātmakaghaṭavat tadbhāve bhāvāt tadabhāve cābhāvāt, vaidharmyeṇa na tadabhāve, tadanurūpāntaḥsanniviṣṭacaitanyābhāve na pravartate tantuvāyavat .
syānmatam--tadanurūpacaitanyātmakatvamastu pravṛtteścaitanyāvinābhāvāt, śabdātmakatvaṃ tu sādhyamiti .
atrocyate--kimatra sādhyam ? siddhamevaitat, na hi kācidapi cetanā'śabdāsti anādikālapravṛttaśabdavyavahārābhyāsavāsitatvād vijñānasya caitanyameva hi paśyantyavasthānaṃ madhyamāvaikharyoravasthayorutthāne
kāraṇaṃ nāma ityucyate, kāraṇātmakatvāt kāryāṇām . yathoktam --vaikharyā madhyamāyāśca paśyantyāścaitadadbhutaṃ rūpam vākyapa॰ 1 . 142 ityādi .

cet, na ityucyate, ye'pyavyaktacetanā ityādi . kṛmi-pipīlikādīnāṃ jaṅgamānāṃ vratatī-trapu-sīsakacitakarṇikādīnāṃ sthāvarāṇāṃ ca śabdābhyāsavāsanājanitāntarniviṣṭasvānurūpacaitanyāstitvaṃ pratijñāyate hitāhitapravṛttivyāvṛttivṛttatvāt kumbhakāravat, hitāhitayoḥ pravṛttivyāvṛttī nimittasaptamī sambandhaṣaṣṭhī vā, hitāhitapravṛttinivṛttyorvṛttatvāt, itthambhūtalakṣaṇā tṛtīyā vā hitāhitapravṛtti

ato yathaivetyādi uktārthopasaṅgraharūpeṇa dṛṣṭāntadaṇḍako yāvat sākṣād bhavati tathā tatheti .

dārṣṭāntiko'rtho'dhunā --tathā tatprabhavameva śabdacetanāprabhavameva kumbhakāramanuṣyaśarīraṃ mṛdādi mṛtsikatā-loṣṭa-vajrā-'śma-śilādipṛthivīkāyatiryakśarīraṃ ca, ādigrahaṇādaptejo-vāyu-vanaspatitiryakśarīraṃ

tatsambandhādvadyaḥ kāyavāṅmanaḥkarmayogaḥ śubho'śubho vā sa āśravaḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ, ekendriyādijātināmnastiryagbhedasya yogavakratā visaṃvādanaṃ ca, tadviparītaṃ yogāvakratvamavisaṃvādanaṃ ca śubhasya manuṣya-devapañcendriyajātyādināmnaḥ, ādigrahaṇādavisaṃvādanagrahaṇāt . ādeḥ iti pañcamīnirdeśāddhetorityarthaḥ .

kumbhakārakāryavat .
nāmna eva ca prabhāvād ghaṭasya ghaṭatvam, na bahirnimittāpekṣam . tathāhi—
skandanādinimittānāmanupapattāvapi jīvasyājīvasya vā nimittanirapekṣā saṃjñā
kriyate skando rudra indra iti . pratyakṣatvāt sarvalokaprasiddhaśabdābhidheyatvācca tadbhūtāḥ
pratyakṣāśca gopālādayo mukhyayā ca vṛttyocyante tasmāt ta eva te .
saṅkhyā--saṃsthānādayo rūpādayaḥ, te yasya santi so'rtho rūpādimadarthaḥ, tasya viracanā parasparasambandhānurūpyeṇa
ghaṭanā, sa evātmā yasya svarūpaṃ manuṣyatiryagaṅgopāṅgādināmanirvṛttakumbhakāraśarīramṛdāderiti dharmitvena
sambadhyate . kumbhakārakāryavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, yathā hi ghaṭapiṭharādi kulālakāryaṃ tena tena mṛnmardanādiprakāreṇāntaḥsanniviṣṭaśabdānuviddhakumbhakārapravṛttyā nirvartitatvāt tatprabhavaṃ tadātmakaṃ kumbhakārapravṛttyātmakaṃ rūpādimadarthaviracanātmakatvāt tathā kumbhakāraśarīramṛdādyapyantaḥ sanniviṣṭaśabdānuviddhacaitanyapravṛttyātmakamiti .
atrāha--pratyakṣata eva daṇḍādibahirnimittādṛte ghaṭānirvṛtteḥ kathamidamavadhāryate--nāmnaḥ sākṣād
bhavati, na daṇḍādibhya iti ? atrocyate --nāmna eva cetyādi . daṇḍādīnāṃ satāmapyakiñcitkaratvācchabdacaitanyasyaiva prabhāvāt tatpreritaprayatnaparispandajanitaniṣpattighaṭākhyasya vastunastadvastutvaṃ ghaṭatvaṃ
nāmna eva mahimno labhyate na bahirnimittāpekṣam . tatpravṛttīnāmapi sthāne sthāne śabdacetananiyojitānāmātmalābhāt tadātmatvam, itarathā teṣāmatadātmatve svarūpapravṛttireva durlabhā, kuto ghaṭasya ghaṭatvaṃ vastutvam ?
tasmāt sarvakārakasānnidhye'pi karturaudāsīnye tadabhāve vā kriyāyāḥ kāryasya cābhāvaḥ ghaṭaudanapaṭavāgādeḥ,
ataḥ śabdaprabhāvaprabhavaṃ sakalaṃ jagaditi . tathā hītyādi tannirūpayati . hiśabdo nidarśane, evaṃ ca kṛtvā
skandarudrendrāḥ skandir śoṣaṇe, rudir aśruvimocane, idi paramaiśvaryai pā॰ dhā॰ iti skandanena nimittena skandaḥ, rodanena rudraḥ, indanena indraḥ ityeteṣāṃ nimittānāmanupapattāvapi gopaśupālāderjīvasyājīvasya vā kāṣṭhakuḍyapāṣāṇādernimittanirapekṣā saṃjñā kriyate skando rudra indraḥ iti, gopālādīnāmeva taistaiḥ śabdaiḥ samadhyāropavaśāccocyate . syānmatam--bhavatīti bhavo roditīti rudra indatīti
indra iti devatāviśeṣāḥ tannimittabhūtārthabhājaḥ santyapratyakṣāḥ samayāntaraprasiddhāḥ, tanmukhyapravṛtteritaratropacāro bhaviṣyatīti . etaccāyuktam, pratyakṣatvādityādi yāvat ta eva te . apratyakṣāste bhava -kārtikeyādayaḥ samayāntaraprasiddhaśabdaparikalpagamyā na sarvalokaprasiddhaśabdābhidheyā yathā gopālādayaḥ pratyakṣāḥ
sarvalokaprasiddhaśabdābhidheyāśceti teṣāṃ sattvaṃ tacchabdātmakatvaṃ cāpratyakṣamamupacāragamyaṃ cetyetebhyaḥ kāraṇebhyastadbhūtāḥ skandādiśabdabhūtāḥ pratyakṣāśca gopālādayo mukhyayā ca vṛttyocyante tasmāt ta eva te,
gopālādaya eva skandādayaḥ, na samayāntaraparikalpitāḥ santīti . tasmācchabdaśaktiprabhāvādeva saṃjñā

ye'pi ca te samayāntaraparikalpitāḥ skandarudrendrāḥ teṣu ekasminnitarasaṃjñayorapi pravṛttinimittasadbhāvāt trayo'pi parasparasaṃjñānirdeśyāḥ syuḥ .
athānyatamanimittamātraṃ tattvamiṣyate iṣṭārthavivakṣayā evaṃ tarhi vivakṣiteṣṭārthaviṣayavyavaharaṇādantarniviṣṭaśabdānubaddhacaitanyanimittaḥ saṃjñāvyavahāro'bhyupagataḥ,

saṅkareṇa syuḥ . atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityanyatamadeva nimittamekaṃ tattvamiṣyate'saṅkīrṇasaṃjñāvyavahārārthaṃ skanda
eva, na rudro nendraḥ itīṣṭārthavivakṣayā evaṃ tarhi anyatamanimittamātratattvayā'vadhṛtayā saṃjñayā
vivakṣiteṣṭārthaviṣayavyavaharaṇādantarniviṣṭaśabdānubaddhacaitanyanimittaḥ saṃjñāvyavahāro'bhyupagataḥ,
bahirnimittaṃ tu tyaktamiti doṣaḥ, tuśabdādaniṣṭasamparigraheṣṭatyāgau viśeṣayati .
kiñcānyat, nimityapratyayenetyādi . yadi skandanādinimittapratyayena saṃjñāpravṛttistato yāvatsambhavaṃ yāvanti nimittāni bhavana-karaṇa-śayana-bhāṣaṇa-caṅkramaṇa-vartana-pariṇamanādīni sambhavanti tāvadbhirnimittaiḥ saṃjñāsanniveśe sati rodanād rudro bhavanād bhavo bhāvakaḥ karaṇāt kāraka ityādisarvavyapadeśabhāktvād bhāvakādayo'pi te prāptāḥ . tataśca tathā ca yāvadityādi, yat parimāṇamasya yāvat, yāvadeva
kiñcid bhavananimittagrastaṃ sarvamityarthaḥ . tasya sarvasya ghaṭapaṭāderindraskandādirarthaḥ sarvadhātvarthānāṃ
bhvarthatvāt paryāyaḥ, tadvācinaśca paryāyaśabdā eva . kimiva ? ghaṭakuṭaśabdavat . sarva eva sarvaḥ, ghaṭaḥ
skandaḥ, paṭaḥ skandaḥ, skandavaidyo'pi skandaḥ . evaṃ rudrendrādayaśca . skando'pi ghaṭaḥ paṭaścetyādi prāptam .
evaṃ tāvat sarvadhātubhvarthatvāt sarvasarvatvamaviśeṣāt . kiñcānyat, viśeṣato'pi sambhavighaṭanādiskandanāditvācca sarvasarvatvam . ceṣṭā-kauṭilyādyabhisandhyanabhisandhipūrvakaparispandārthatvāt pariṇatyartha

evamapi tu sthite'rthapratipādanārthatvācchabdaprayogasya sarvasarvābhidhānalakṣaṇāvyavasthāvyāvartanārthaṃ bahirnimittanirapekṣaṃ saṃjñāmātrasanniveśitaṃ skandāditvamabhyupagantavyam .
evaṃ hi saṅketamātratvācchabdārthasambandhasya mukhyārthāḥ sarvadeśabhāṣā ityetadayatnasiddham . idamapyabhiyuktānāmata eva smaraṇamupapannam--anekārthā dhātavaḥ... ... ...
dṛśyatām . iti cetanācetanabhedasya samastasyāsya jagato bhāvakaṃ nāma . ghaṭasya dravyaṃ
tvāt sarveṣāṃ jñāna-gatyarthānāṃ skandana-śoṣaṇa-visaraṇa-rodanendana-sadana-stambhanādyarthānāṃ yāvatāṃ yasminnarthe
sambhavastasya tasya tathārthatve sarvasarvatvam . vasanād vastuvāstunī, śayanasthānāsanādyekārthatvācca gatinivṛtti-paryāyāṇāṃ śeṣadhātūnāṃ ca vastvarthānativṛtteḥ katamad dravyaṃ katamena nimittena nābhidhīyate ? tataḥ
sarvasarvatvam .
syānmatam--evaṃ tarhi sutarāmatiprasaṅgāpādanadvāreṇa tvayaiva sarvasya bahirnimittāpekṣatvaṃ samarthitam,
tvatpakṣe'pi ca sarvasarvābhidhānātiprasaṅgo durnivāra iti . etaccāyuktamuktanyāyenaiva, evamapi tu sthita
ityādi yāvat skandāditvamabhyupagantavyamiti svapratipipādayiṣitārthapratipādanārthatvācchabdaprayogasya
prasakte'pi sarvasarvatve sarvasarvābhidhānalakṣaṇā'vyavasthā prāptaiva, sā mā bhūditi tadvyāvartanārthaṃ skandādiśabdāḥ kasmiṃścidarthe bahirnimittanirapekṣāḥ saṃjñāmātratvena sanniveśitāḥ santo niyamena tamevārthamabhidadhatīti prāptam, itarathā sarvasarvatve sarvābhidhānāvyavasthā'vaśyambhāvinī . tasmāt saṃjñāsanniveśānna me
kaścid doṣa iti . tasmāccodyābhāsametat samānadoṣatvāditi .
evaṃ hītyādi asya nyāyasya vyāptipradarśanam . evaṃ ca kṛtvā saṅketamātratvācchabdārthasambandhasya
mukhyārthāḥ sarvadeśabhāṣā ityetadayatnasiddham ghaṭaḥ kuṭaḥ kumbhaḥ kṣīraṃ payaḥ pāli dugdham agnirāturaḥ
kicu maṅgalaḥ ityādīnāṃ ca saṅketavaśādabhidhitsitaikārthavācitvaṃ siddham, niyatanirapekṣatvāt saṅketasya
svopayogapratipādanasamarthatvācca teṣāṃ teṣāṃ śabdānāṃ ḍitthādivat . idamapyabhiyuktānāmata eva smaraṇamupapannam, nānyathā, yathā --anekārthā dhātava iti gatārthaṃ yāvad dṛśyatām . iti cetanācetanetyādi, anena prakāreṇa yaduktaṃ nāma taccetanācetanabhedasya kumbhakāra-ghaṭādeḥ pṛthivyādi-manuṣya-nārakatiryak-siddha-paramāṇu-kālākāśādeḥ samastasyāsya jagato bhāvakaṃ nāma samastaṃ jagad nāmno bhavati
iti bhāvitam . tasmādeva ghaṭo bhavati, ghaṭasya dravyaṃ kāraṇam, ghaṭaṃ bhāvayati nāma, ghaṭasya tato

nāma, ghaṭasya tato bhavanāt, mṛdvat . anayā yathā ghaṭo bhavati tathā nāmnā ghaṭo
bhavati ghaṭakriyātmakatvaṃ vā bhāvakatvam . rūpādyupayogabhavanamantarniviṣṭaśabdānubaddhaṃ tacchabdātmakam . tasmānnāmadravyasyānupasarjanataiva . eṣa nāmadravyārthanayaḥ .
asyāpi niyamaḥ . upasarjanatveneṣyate, na prādhānyena . arthārthatvācchabdaprayogasyārthaḥ pradhānam, na śabdaḥ . arthasyāpi jñānotpattinimittatvād jñānameva pradhānam .
na hi nāmno ghaṭādi bhavati . tatastu śrotrābhighāta evotpadyate . tathā ca yadi nāmno
ghaṭotpattau dravyatvaṃ syāt tato ghaṭārthino bhavatu ghaṭa iti prabravīran .
tasmāt pravṛtti-nivṛttikāraṇamarthārthināṃ tadabhāvārthināṃ ca kṣāyopaśamiko
bhavanāt, tato bhavati iti pratipāditatvāt siddho hetuḥ . yad yato bhavati tat tasya kāraṇaṃ dṛṣṭam,
yathā mṛd mṛdo bhavato ghaṭasya kāraṇaṃ tathā nāma ghaṭasya kāraṇamityetamarthamupanayati --anayetyādi . yathā
ghaṭasya mṛd dravyaṃ bhavati tathā nāmetyarthaḥ . ghaṭakriyātmakatvaṃ vā bhāvakatvaṃ nāmna iti vartate, śabdo
dravyabhāvaṃ ghaṭakaraṇātmakatvāt pūrvoktāt pratipadyate, tasmād ghaṭaṃ bhāvayati nāma, nāmno ghaṭo bhavatītyarthaḥ .
rūpādyupayogetyādi . athavā rūpādyupayogo rūpādijñānam, tasya bhavanamantarniviṣṭaśabdānubaddhaṃ
tacchabdātmakam, rūpaṇād rūpam, rasyata iti rasaḥ, ghrāyata iti gandhaḥ, śrotragrahaṇaṃ śabdaḥ iti lakṣaṇāt
tasyopayogasya śabdātmakatvād rūpādīnāṃ ca tadātmakatvācchabdo rūpādirapi bhavati . tasmād nāmadravyasyānupasarjanataiva prādhānyamevetyarthaḥ . eṣa nāmadravyārthanayaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ .
atrottaramubhayaniyamabhaṅgāraḥ śabdanayo vakṣyatyataḥ --asyāpi niyama ityādi . eṣo'pi nāmadravyārthabhāvo niyataḥ upasarjanatveneṣyate na prādhānyena, prādhānyena tu viśeṣo niyata ityuktaḥ . na brūmaḥ--
śabdo nimittamātravyāpṛto jñānopakārī nāsti iti . jñānasyaiva pradhānasyopakārakatvena vartate jñānenaiva
cotthāpyate, arthapratyāyanārthatvācchabdaprayogasya . tasmādarthārthatvācchabdaprayogasyārthaḥ pradhānaṃ na śabdaḥ,
tasyāśabdārthatvāt . arthasyāpi jñānotpattinimittatvād jñānameva pradhānam . na ca jñāna-śabdayoraikyam,
pratyakṣapratītivirodhābhyām . yasmāt pratyakṣameva na nāmnaḥ śabdācchrotrābhighātakārād ghaṭādi bhavati,
na śabdaḥ kāraṇaṃ ghaṭasya tato'nutpatteḥ . tatastu śabdācchrotrābhighāta evotpadyate, tasmācchabdaḥ
śrotrābhighāte heturna ghaṭe na jñāne .
tathā cetyādi yāvat prabravīrannityaniṣṭāpādanam . yadi śabdasya ghaṭotpattau dravyatvaṃ syāt tato
ghaṭārthino bhavatu ghaṭa iti prabravīran; arivināśārthinaśca rājāno vijigīṣavo na hastyaśvaṃ bibhṛyuḥ,
parabalameti mā bhūt iti vā brūyuḥ . na ca tad dṛṣṭamiṣṭaṃ vā .
tasmāt pravṛtti-nivṛttikāraṇamarthārthināṃ tadabhāvārthināṃ ca kṣāyopaśamiko bhāvaḥ jñānāvaraṇakṣayopaśamanimittaṃ jñānamityarthaḥ, tata eva pravṛttinivṛttidarśanāt . so'pi dravyārthatāṃ hitvā

bhāvaḥ . so'pi dravyārthatāṃ hitvā bhavati . tenāpi viśeṣeṇaiva bhūyate . sa hi bhāvāgamaḥ . śabdo dravyāgamaḥ . tathāhyāhuḥ--āgamato jāṇaye aṇuvayutte davvasutaṃ   .
jñānameva pradhānam . tata eva cāsyotpattiḥ . pravṛttiśca tādarthyena, śibikāvāhakayāneśvarayānavat . atastvaduktivadupayogaviśeṣabhavanaprādhānyaṃ tatkāryatvācchabdasya tatkāraṇatvācca .
kṣāyopaśamiko bhāvaḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe'nyatvād dravyārthatāṃ tyaktvā bhavati kṣaṇikatvāt . tenāpi viśeṣeṇaiva
bhūyate, viśeṣa eva bhavati, uktaśabdārthavyutpattirbhavati, bhavat pradhānaṃ bhāva ityupakramya yāvad bālādibhedaṃ
dṛśyate eva ityakṣarārtho gataḥ . vastvarthataśca bhāvitam --sāmānyamupasarjanaṃ viśeṣaḥ pradhānaṃ bhāvaḥ śibikāvāhakayāneśvarayānavaditi .
sa hi bhāvāgamaḥ, yasmāt kṣāyopaśamikabhāvo jñānaṃ bhāvāgama ucyate tasmāt sa pradhānaṃ
bhavati, maryādayābhividhinā ca gamo'vabodhaḥ, tataḥ śabdasyāgamatvam, tata utthāpyate śabdo jñānāt .
tasmācchabdo dravyāgamaḥ . tathāhyāhuriti śabdadravyāgamatve jñāpakamārṣam --āgamato jāṇaye aṇuvayutte davvasutamiti .
itaśca jñānameva pradhānam, yasmāt tata eva cāsyotpattiḥ śabdasya jñānādevotpattiḥ, vakturjñānenotthāpitatvāt, jñānameva śabdasya kāraṇam . pravṛtto'pi śabdaḥ paratantro jñānārthatvāt; paratantro
jñānotpādanārthatvācchrotarītyata āha --pravṛttiśca tādarthyena . tanmūlotpatti-tadarthatvābhyāṃ jñānaṃ pradhānamityetasminnarthadvaye dṛṣṭāntaḥ --śibikāvāhakayāneśvarayānavaditi vaitanikānāṃ yānaṃ yātrāpreritamīśvareṇa
pravṛttamapīśvarayānārtham, ato'pi dvidhāpīśvaraprādhānyavad jñānaprādhānyamiti .
atastvaduktivadityādi . sāmīpyena sarvātmanā yoga upayogaḥ rūpādyarthasamīpe sarvātmapradeśānāṃ
tatpravaṇatā, śabdopayogātmayogavakratā'vakratādestiryag-manuṣyanāmanirvartitaṃ mṛdādi kumbhakārādi ca
yathāsaṅkhyaṃ bhavati rūpādimadarthaviracanātmakatvāt kumbhakārādikāryavad nāmno bhavati,
ātmā buddhyā samarthyārthān mano yuṅkte vivakṣayā . pā॰ śikṣā 6
ityādi sarvaṃ tvaduktopapattijātamupayogaviśeṣabhavanaprādhānyaṃ sādhayati, tatkāryatvācchabdasya, upa

athocyeta--sāmānyamaviśeṣaḥ, ubhayoḥ parasparakāraṇatvāviśeṣatvāt . atha
kasmādupayoga eva nāmatvamāpadyate ? iti upayogatvaprāpternāmnaḥ sarvatra viśeṣapradhānatvam .
tasyāpi vā nāmaśabdasya uraḥprabhṛtītyādinā nāmadravyārthaṃ hitvā dravyadravyārtho'ṅgīkṛtaḥ mūrtadravyābhyupagamāt . mūrtamamūrtasya dravyaṃ na bhavati . nāmaśabdo
yogasya śabdaḥ kāryam, sa eva kāraṇamupayogasya kumbhakāraśarīrāderiti tatkāraṇaṃ taditi tvayaiva prāg
bhāvitaṃ vistareṇaitat .
athocyetetyādi pūrvapakṣo gatārtho yāvadaviśeṣatvāditi . sāmānyamaviśeṣaḥ, tadbhavanamātratvaṃ
na viśeṣa ityetadāpannamiti bhāvito'rtha ubhayoḥ parasparakāraṇatvāviśeṣatvāditi .
atrottaram --atha kasmādityādi yāvat sarvatra viśeṣapradhānatvamiti . upayoga eva nāmatvamāpadyata iti viśeṣasyopayogasya prādhānyamupayogatvaprāpternāmnaḥ . tasyāpi vā nāmaśabdasyetyādi,
nāmaśabdaḥ iti vīṇā-veṇu-tālaśabdādibhyo viśiṣyate prakṛtatvādaupayogitvācca tasya uraḥprabhṛtītyādinā nāmadravyārthaṃ hitvā tvayā dravyadravyārtho'ṅgīkṛtaḥ, tadyathoktam—
ātmā buddhyā samarthyārthān mano yuṅkte vivakṣayā .manaḥ kāyāgnimāhanti sa prerayati mārutam ॥ 6 ॥mārutastūpari caran mandraṃ janayati svanam ॥ 7 ॥ pā॰ śikṣā
ityādinā mūrtadravyābhyupagamāt . ārṣamapi jñāpakam, no+āgamato dravyaṃ śarīramuktam, tadyathā—
aho ṇaṃ imeṇaṃ sarīrasamussa+eṇaṃ sāmā+i+etti padaṃ āghavitaṃ paṇṇavitaṃ  
ityādi . tasmācchabdakāraṇatvatyāgena mūrtadravyakāraṇatvābhyupagamaste virodhāyāpadyate . ata āha --mūrtamamūrtasya dravyaṃ na bhavati pariṇāmikāraṇamityarthaḥ . yathā mūrtamamūrtasya kāraṇaṃ na bhavati ityayamabhyupagamaḥ
tathā nāmaśabdasya mūrtatvādamūrtopayogakāraṇyaṃ na yujyate .
syānmatam--kathaṃ mūrtaḥ śabdo yato'syāmūrtajñānakāraṇyaṃ na bhavediti . atra brūmaḥ --nāmaśabdo

mūrtaḥ kuḍyādipratihatagatitvād loṣṭādivat . tad nāma nopayogasya dravyaṃ mūrtatvād
mṛdvat . uktaṃ hi--na hi mūrtamamūrtatvaṃ nāmūrtameti mūrtatām .dravyaṃ triṣvapi kāleṣu cyavate nātmabhāvataḥ ॥  
nanvanyonyānugatasvarūpatvād nirvṛttyupakaraṇendriyajñānatanvātmadravyavad dravyaṃ
mūrtamamūrtasya jñānasya . dravyendriyaṃ mūrtamamūrtasya jñānasya dravyam . śarīrādikaraṇād
bhavāntarātmanastanvādi dravyam, ghaṭaśca ghaṭākāśasya .
mūrta iti pratipadyatām, kuḍyādipratihatagatitvāt, yasya gatiḥ kuḍyādibhiḥ pratihanyate tad
mūrtaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā loṣṭādīti . tad nāma nopayogasyetyādi arthapradarśanasādhanam . upayogo na
mūrtadravyahetukaḥ, amūrtatvāt, ākāśavat, na hyākāśaṃ mṛdādidaṇḍādimūrtadravyasya kāryamiti sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ . mṛdvaditi vaidharmyeṇa, yad mūrtadravyahetukaṃ na tadamūrtaṃ yathā mṛditi . athavā nāmūrtasya dravyaṃ
nāmaśabdaḥ, mūrtatvāt, mṛdvat . yadamūrtasyāvagāhāderdravyaṃ na tad mūrtam, yathā ākāśamiti . uktaṃ
hītyādi jñāpakamāha . na hi mūrtamamūrtatvaṃ varṇādimat pudgaladravyaṃ mūrtaṃ sadavarṇādyātmakatvamamūrtatvaṃ na
gacchati na tathā pariṇamati jīvā-''kāśa-dharmā-'dharmatvaṃ na yāti . nāmūrtameti mūrtatvam, nāpyākāśādyamūrtaṃ mūrtatvaṃ prayāti . dravyaṃ triṣvapi atītānāgatavartamāneṣu kāleṣu, na kadācidityarthaḥ, yasmād
nātmabhāvam, yāvaddravyabhāvī yo dharmaḥ sa ātmabhāvaḥ, tamātmabhāvaṃ na kadācit parityajati
dravyamiti .
atrāha --nanvanyonyānugatetyādi yāvad ghaṭākāśasyeti . nātmabhāvaṃ tyajati pararūpaṃ nāpnoti
ityetadayuktam, anyonyānugatasvaparatvāt kṣīrodakavat . anyonyānugatasvarūpatvanidarśanaṃ nirvṛttītyādi
yāvad dravyavat . vatkaraṇaṃ nirvṛttyupakaraṇendriyajñānavat tanvātmadravyavacca iti pratyekaṃ parisamāpyate .
dravyaṃ kāraṇaṃ mūrtamamūrtasya jñānasya, dvividhaṃ dravyendriyam--nirvṛttirupakaraṇaṃ ca, nirvṛttiḥ pakṣmapuṭa-kṛṣṇasārādidravyaniṣpattiḥ, nirvṛttamupakaroti ityupakaraṇaṃ masūrakākārāścakṣurmadhyapradeśāḥ prakāśāñjanādayaścopakaraṇāni . etad dvividhamapi jñānasya dravyaṃ dṛṣṭam . tasya vyākhyānam --dravyendriyaṃ mūrtamamūrtasya
jñānasya dravyam . tathā tanvātmavat ityasya vyākhyā --śarīrādikaraṇād bhavāntarātmanaḥ, kāyāditrividhayogakāryaṃ śarīrāṅgopāṅgādināmakarma, tasya karaṇāt tanvādi bhavāntare janmāntare ya ātmā tasya
dravyaṃ kāraṇaṃ bhavati . ghaṭaśca ghaṭākāśasyeti mūrto ghaṭo'vagāhānumeyasyākāśasyāvagāhātmana iti .


āgataṃ tarhyetad yo'rtho dravyaṃ so'svatantro viśeṣeṇa tathā tathā bhāvyate, jñānamātmā ca viśeṣa eva bhavati . tatra yadi sendriyāṇi matiśrutāvadhimanaḥparyāyajñānāni tatasteṣāmindriyakṛtatvādajñānatvāt kevalameva ekaṃ jñānaṃ syāt . ātmanaśca aśarīrasyaiva svatantrasya kartṛtvāt aśarīreṇa siddhakevalinā kṛtaṃ karmaanveṣyaṃ syāt . na hastādimadrāgikṛtamapi syāt karma, tasyaiva saṃsāritveṣṭeḥ... ...
ātmano'nyatvāt . tathā ākāśaghaṭayoranāvṛtyāvṛtyātmakatvāt kuto ghaṭākāśamākāśaghaṭo vā ? evaṃ kutaḥ sānyonyānugamarūpatā ?
anyarūpānugamāttu cetanācetanayorātmabhāvatyāgāt dravyasya sāmānyabhavana-

atrocyate --āgataṃ tarhyetadityādi yāvad viśeṣa eva bhavatīti . yo'rtho dravyaṃ sāmānyaṃ
viśeṣo vā prakṛtyarthaḥ pratyayārtho vā bhavanaṃ bhāva iti yo'stu so'stu sarvathā so'svatantro viśeṣeṇa
jñānena tathā tathā bhāvyate dravyendriyādi tat sarvātmanā jñānamātmā ca viśeṣaḥ sa bhāvayati .
yadyapi bhavat sāmānyaṃ bhāvastathāpyupasarjanam, viśeṣaḥ pradhānamityuktaṃ bhavati . tatra yadītyādyaniṣṭāpādanaṃ
parasya yāvadekaṃ jñānaṃ syāditi hetuhetumadbhāvena gatārtham . sendriyāṇi mati-śrutā-'vadhi-manaḥparyāyajñānāni,
tānīndriyakṛtatvādajñānāni syuḥ, kevalajñānamevaikaṃ jñānaṃ syāditi .
kiñcānyat, --ātmātmanaścetyādi . ātmaiva svatantraścetanatvāt, na śarīram, svatantraśca kartā .
tataścāśarīreṇa śuddhena siddhakevalinā kṛtaṃ karmānveṣyaṃ syāt, taccātyantadurlabhaṃ muktasaṃsāraprasaṅgādaniṣṭaṃ ca . na hastādimadrāgikṛtamiṣṭamapi syāt karma, tasyaiva saṃsāritveṣṭeḥ pūrvavaddhetuhetumadbhāvenā-

tadviparīto ghaṭo mūrta eveti kuto ghaṭākāśamudāharaṇaṃ ghaṭate, ghaṭātmānāpatterākāśasya, ākāśānātmāpatterghaṭasya ākāśaghaṭo vā tadviparītaguṇa udāharaṇamiti ?
