vdyādinā . atha dvyādiḥ, naikavacanena śabdena bhavitavyam, uktavat . idaṃ tvabhidhānābhidheyapratyayayorvi

lakṣaṇaṃ hi nāma śabdānāṃ prakṛtipratyayādivibhāgānvākhyānam . prakṛtyādyarthāvyavasthāyāṃ lakṣaṇāvyavasthānāt kutastajjanyalakṣyatattvapratipattiḥ śabdavyavasthā
ca, aviviktībhāvitasvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt, aviviktībhāvitasvalakṣaṇaviṣayasthāṇupuruṣapratipattivyavasthāvat .
sa vṛkṣa āste iti pratipadya punaḥ ehi manye rathena yāsyasi ityasmāt
tadviparītādapi tadvadeva pratipattyā prakṛtyādilakṣaṇālakṣaṇīkaraṇaṃ pratipatteścāpratipattitvaṃ yadṛcchāpravṛttitvāt .
saṃvādāt pratītiviruddham, punarvasūśabdo dvyartho dvivacanāntatvāt' iti pratyayo nakṣatrābhidheyaviṣayapratyayena
visaṃvadati, sa cānena . kimiva ? kumārabrahmacāripitṛtvavat, yadi kumārabrahmacārī kathaṃ pitā ? atha
pitā kathaṃ kumārabrahmacārīti ? tadvadiheti .
tad bhāvayati --lakṣaṇaṃ hi nāmetyādi . śabdānāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ prakṛtipratyayādivibhāgānvākhyānam,
taddhi lakṣyāñśabdān vyavasthāpayāmi iti . teṣāṃ ca prakṛtyādivibhāgānāmavyavasthā, prakṛtyādyarthāyathārthatvāt . tasyāṃ ca śabdaviṣayaprakṛtyādyarthāvyavasthāyāṃ tadāśritalakṣaṇāvyavasthā . lakṣaṇāvyavasthānāt
kutastajjanyalakṣyatattvapratipattiḥ śabdatattvapratipattiḥ śabdavyavasthā ca ? na staḥ . kasmāt ? aviviktībhāvitasvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt . dṛṣṭāntaḥ--aviviktībhāvitetyādi, yathā viviktau santāvaviviktau bhāvitau svalakṣaṇābhyāṃ sthāṇupuruṣau, tatra yā sthāṇau puruṣapratipattirvyavasthā ca mithyāpratipattivyavasthe te, kasmāt ? aviviktībhāvitasvalakṣaṇaviṣayatvāt, tathā śabdānāṃ lakṣyāṇāṃ pratipattivyavasthe .
lakṣyāpratipattyavyavasthābhyāṃ cābhidhānābhidheyaviṣayapratyayadvayavisaṃvādāt kumārabrahmacārī pitā iti
pratyayavad nakṣatra-punarvasvādyekadvitvādivirodha iti sambandhaḥ .
evaṃ tāvat saṅkhyāviṣayaprakṛtipratyayapratipattivirodha uktaḥ . ataḥ paraṃ puruṣaviṣaya ucyate, tadyathā —
sa vṛkṣa āsta ityādi yāvadapratipattitvam . saḥ iti śeṣopapade āste iti puruṣaviṣayaprakṛtipratyayasaṃvādena svayaṃ pratipadya punaḥ ehi manye iti tadviparītapratipattyā prakṛtyādilakṣaṇamalakṣaṇīkṛtaṃ pratipattiścāpratipattīkṛtā tadvadeveti lakṣyatattvāpratipattyavyavasthādvāreṇeti . kasmāt ? yadṛcchāpravṛttitvādasamīkṣita

ehi manye iti prastutakriyāvisaṃvādāt tvaṃ yāmi, ahaṃ yāsi iti prayogavadayathārthamagamakamasādhu . prastutapratyayavisaṃvādādvā, devadatto bhūyata iti prayogavat .
aṅgīkṛtapuruṣārthavaiyadhikaraṇyavṛttatvāt, tvaṃ pacatīti prayogavat .
atra pratyayaparā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā, prayogakāle kevalayoḥ prakṛtipratyayayorasambhavāt tathā'narthakatvāt kākavāsitavat . śikṣaṇārthaṃ tu citrabhaktibindu-
paurvāparyapratyayatvād brahmacāripitṛtvavadityeva sambandhaḥ . atra prayogaḥ --ehi manya ityādi yāvadayathārthamagamakamasādhu iti pratijñāstisraḥ . prastutā kriyā manyatiḥ, tayā sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ visaṃvadati pratyayasyottamapuruṣākhyasya ehiśabdaprayuktamadhyamapuruṣavisaṃvādāditi hetvarthaḥ . tvaṃ yāmi, ahaṃ yāsi iti
prayogavaditi tadarthanidarśanaṃ hetvarthānurūpeṇa yānārthayormadhyamottamaviśiṣṭayorbhede sati visaṃvādādayathārthāgamakāsādhutvavaditi . prastutapratyayavisaṃvādādveti dvitīyo hetuḥ . devadatto bhūyata iti yatheti
dṛṣṭāntaḥ . devadatta iti prathamānirdiṣṭaḥ kartrarthaḥ prakṛtyarthamātravācinā bhāvasādhanena bhūyateśabdena sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ nārhati bhavati ityanena tu syāt tathā ehiśabdaprastutamadhyamapuruṣāntena manyeityuttamāntāyathārthāgamakāsādhutvānyupaneyāni . prastutapratyayavisaṃvādasphuṭīkaraṇārthamāha --aṅgīkṛtapuruṣārthavaiyadhikaraṇyavṛttatvāditi . tasya nidarśanam --tvaṃ pacatīti yatheti . tvam iti yuṣmadupapade pacati iti śeṣopapadaviṣayaprathamapuruṣaprayogo visaṃvadati tathā ehi manye yāsyasi iti .
atra pratyayetyādi vākyāvadhike'rthe padāvadhike vā pratipādye vākyaṃ padaṃ vā pratiyogiśabdārthāpekṣameva gamayati kevalasyāprayogāt . padāvadhike tāvadayaṃ niyamaḥ--pratyayaparā prakṛtiḥ prayoktavyā,
prakṛteḥ paraḥ pratyayaḥ pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 3 . 1 . 2 iti vyavasthāpitatvāt prayogakāle kevalayoḥ prakṛtipratyayayorasambhavāt, asambhavaśca tathānarthakatvāt bhū-laṭ-tip-śapādīnām, kimiva ? kākavāsitavat, yathā
vāyasavāsitādīnāṃ na kaścidabhidheyo'rtho'sti tathā bhū-tipādīnāṃ kevalānām .
kimarthaṃ tarhi bhū sattāyām pā॰ dhā॰ 1 kartari kṛt, laḥ karmaṇi ca pā॰ 3 . 4 . 67, 69
ityādi prakṛtipratyayārthaṃrtha ?pāṭha iti cet, ucyate --śikṣaṇārthaṃ tu citrabhaktibinduvinyasanavat
pṛthagadhyayanam . śiṣyān grāhayāmi iti vibhajya prakṛtipratyayārthau darśyete . yathā ekāmeva kāṣṭhādibhaktiṃ
lekhayiṣyaṃścitrakarācāryaḥ śiṣyān pūrvaṃ binduvinyāsān kārayati paścāt saṃyojayati tataḥ sā darśanīyā
cakṣūramaṇīyā puṣpa-vallī-gṛha-manuṣya-strī-hastyādisaṃsthānā saṃvyavahārārhā bhaktirbhavati evaṃ prakṛtipratyayārthopapradarśanaṃ pṛthak kriyate, apṛthaksiddhasamudāyārthapratipattyupāyatvāt .


vinyasanavat pṛthagadhyayanam . evameva ca kṛtvoktam--prakṛtipratyayau pratyayārthaṃ saha brūtaḥ
pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 3 . 1 . 67 . ata eva ca prakṛtiparaḥ pratyayaḥ prayoktavyaḥ pratyayaparā ca prakṛtiḥ
pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 3 . 1 . 2 . ata eva ca pratyayārthānapāyitvād manyateḥ prastutasāmānādhikaraṇyatyāgena manye iti uttamaikavacanapratyayaprayogo'yathārthābhidhānam . pratyayapuruṣāyathārthatve'pyeṣaiva bhāvanā . ityarthatrayaviṣayamayathārthatvam . idaṃ ca dravyato'yathārthatvam .
prahāsādidamasatyameveti cet, bahveva tarhi lakṣaṇānāmalakṣaṇīkaraṇaṃ lakṣyā-

pratyayārtho vivakṣito guṇatvena prakṛtyarthaḥ . ata eva ceti, yaduktaṃ bhāṣye --prakṛtiparaḥ pratyayaḥ prayo-
ktavyaḥ, pratyayaparā ca prakṛtiriti pratyayaḥ paro viśeṣaḥ pradhānaṃ yasyāḥ sā pratyayaparā prakṛtiḥ, paraśabdasya
pradhānārthatā varṇyate .
evaṃ cānena nyāyena pratyayārthād nāpaiti prakṛtiḥ, tatparatvāt . ata eva ca pratyayārthānapāyitvād manyaterityādinā bhāvayitvopasaṃharati yāvadayathārthābhidhānamiti . ehiśabdaprayogaprastutasāmānādhikaraṇyatyāgenāsmatsamānādhikaraṇottamaikavacanapratyayāyathārthatvam aṅgīkṛtapuruṣārthavaiyadhikaraṇyavṛttatvāt tvaṃ pacati iti prayogavaditi sādhūktam . evaṃ tāvat prakṛtyayathārthatvaṃ pratyayāyathārthatva ?dvāreṇānapāyitvāduktam .
pratyayapuruṣāyathārthatve'pyeṣaikaiva bhāvanā . prakṛtyavinābhāvitvāt pratyayasya pratyayatvāt
ehi manye rathena yāsyasi ityasmāt tadviparītādapi tadvadeva pratipattyā pratyayādilakṣaṇālakṣaṇīkaraṇaṃ
pratipṛtteścāpratipattitvaṃ yadṛcchāpravṛttatvādityādi yāvadayamavadhiḥ samānabhāvanaḥ pratyayapuruṣānurūpeṇa
yojyata iti . ityarthatrayaviṣayamayathārthatvamiti nigamanam itiśabdanigamanārthatvāt, anayā bhāvanayā
bhāvitameva bhavati agamakamasādhu ityapi draṣṭavyaṃ buddhicakṣuṣā . idaṃ ca dravyato'yathārthatvam, yasmāt
nāhaṃ tvam ityasmadyuṣmaddravyaviparyayeṇāyathārthatvametat . yathā caitat tathā ghaṭapaṭādiśeṣopapadaviṣayo bhinnavyavahāro nirākriyate tvaṃ pacati ityādikuṭuktvādiprayuktabhinnaliṅgādiviparyayārthaśabdaprayogavaditi .

pitā ityetadasatyameva prahāsaviṣayatvāt . ata eva lakṣaṇamuktam --prahāse ca manyopapade manyateruttama

ityuktam . tat sarvamupasaṃhṛtya sādhanamāha --dravya-kṣetra-kāla-bhāvaviṣayavisaṃvādavṛttatvāditi heturvyākhyā-
tārthaḥ . svoktārthanirākaraṇārthatvāditi sādhitārthopasaṃhārārtho hetuḥ pṛthagayāthārthyapratipādanārtho vā .
unmattapralāpavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ . idaṃ ca sādhanamatītaprapañcena bhāvitārthamiti na vivriyate .

hītyādi bhāṣyakāreṇoktam . yastu prayuṅkta iti ślokaḥ . viśeṣe vivakṣite pradhāne guṇabhūtāñśabdān
prayuṅkte yaḥ kuśalo'rthagatyarthatvācchabdaprayogasya taddarśayannāha vivakṣāpūrvakatvācchabdapravṛtteriti --yathāvadvyavahārayuktau yo yaḥ śabdo vyavahārakāle yasya yasya vivakṣitārthasya viśiṣṭasya viśiṣṭa eva gamaka ityabhimataḥ sa eva sa eva tatra prayujyate nānyo'nyatra vā gauṇamukhyādibhāvena svābhidheyapratyāyanasamarthatvāt
sarvaśabdānām . so'nantamāpnoti jayaṃ paratra . kaḥ ? vāgyogavid ya evamuktaviśeṣaviṣayaśabdārthasambandhajñaḥ . duṣyati cāpaśabdairavāgyogavid viśeṣaviṣayaprayogānabhijñaḥ . tasmād vivakṣāpūrvakatvācchabdapravṛtterviṣayaviśeṣaparigraheṇa sādhutā'sādhutā ca śabdānām, asādhutvābhimatānāmapi gavyādīnāṃ sādhutvaṃ viśeṣaviṣayatvāt, sādhutvenābhimatānāmapi gavyādīnāmasādhutvamiti . taddarśayati --gāvīgoṇītyādirgatārthā bhāvanā śabdavyutpattyā .
atrācārya āha --yadyevaṃ tarhītyādi yāvat sikatā iti . eṣo'pi nyāyo vyabhicārād na
prabhavati . udāharaṇairvyabhicārayiṣyannavijānanniva pṛcchati tameva kayā viśeṣavivakṣayeti . āpa iti
bahuvacanamekasminnapi bindau dṛṣṭam, nātra sāmānyaviśeṣabhāvo'sti . tathā ekayoṣiti dārā gṛhāḥ

yoṣiti dārā gṛhāḥ iti, ekasmiṃśca śarkarākaṇe sikatāḥ iti . nityamapi
vahvavayavavṛttatvāditi cet, ekaghaṭe'pi tarhyata eva nityaṃ bahuvacanaṃ prāptam, bindvādāviva āpaḥ . apsu vā ekavacanaṃ syād ghaṭavat .
atiśayyekātmakanirāsena viśeṣaviṣayaprayogasādhutveṣṭau kasmāt tata eva
nyāyāt bindau apchabda ekavacanānto na prayujyate viśeṣaviṣayatvād gavādivat .
sa ekavacanānta eva syāt, ekamiti gṛhītatvāt, tantupaṭavat .
tathā taṭastaṭī taṭamiti katamaṃ viśeṣamupādāya liṅgabhedaḥ katamad vā sāmānyamatidiśyate ?
nanu sthitiprasavasaṃstyānaviśeṣaviṣayo liṅgabhedaḥ . na taṭataṭītaṭānāṃ viṣayaviśeṣaḥ, abhinnasvarūpatvāt, ghaṭaghaṭasvātmavat .
bahuvacanaṃ kayā vivakṣayeti vartate . ekasmiṃśca sūkṣmaśarkarākaṇe sikatā iti, kiṃśabdasya kṣepārthatvāt
kayā vivakṣayā kiṃ tayā vivakṣayā viparītārthayeti . nityamapi bahvavayavavṛttatvāditi cet . syānmatam--bahavo'vayavāḥ paramāṇu-dvyaṇukādayo bindāvapi, tadapekṣayā bahuvacanam āpaḥ iti . atrocyate —
ekaghaṭe'pītyādi . ata eva tvaduktāt bahvavayavavṛttatvāt iti hetorekasmin ghaṭe'pi nityaṃ bahuvacanaṃ
prāptam, bindvādāviva āpaḥ ityaniṣṭāpādanadvāreṇa paroktahetuvyabhicāraḥ . apsu vetyādi,
apchabdādapi ekavacanaṃ syāt, nityamapi bahvavayavavṛttatvāt, ghaṭavat, aniṣṭaṃ caitat .
atiśayyekātmaketyādi . yathāsmābhirukto'tiśayī eka eva ātmā bhavati yat sat kiñciditi tasya nirāsena tvayā viśeṣaviṣayaprayogo gāvyādivat sādhuḥ itīṣṭaḥ, tatredaṃ te'niṣṭamāpādyate—
kasmāt tata eva nyāyāt bindau vartamāno'pchabda ekavacanānto na prayujyate, viśeṣaviṣayatvāt, gavādivaditi ? ato'yamapi nyāyo vyabhicaratīti . kiñcānyat, so'pchabda ekavacanānta
eva syāt, bahvavayavātmakatve'pi ekam iti gṛhītatvāt tantupaṭavaditi gatārthatvānna vyākhyāyate .
evaṃ tāvadayaṃ saṅkhyāviṣayo vicāro na ghaṭate . liṅgaviṣayo'pi viśeṣaprayogasādhutvanyāyo na
ghaṭate . arthaikatve saṅkhyābhedānupapattivat liṅgabhedānupapattirapītyata āha --tathā taṭastaṭītyādi . katamaṃ
vātra viśeṣamupādāya liṅgabhedaḥ ? katamad vā sāmānyamatidiśyate viśeṣapratipādanārtham ? na
sambhavatītyarthaḥ .
āha --nanu sthiti-prasava-saṃstyānaviśeṣaviṣayo liṅgabhedaḥ .

gocaraviśeṣopapattau vā so'pi nāsti, na hi taṭo gocaraḥ prasavasya, saṃstyānātmakatvāt, strīvat . na taṭī gocaraḥ saṃstyānasya, prasavātmakatvāt, puruṣavat .
na taṭaṃ gocaro'nubhayatvasya, saṃttyānaprasavātmakatvāt, strīpuṃsavat . athavā... ...
taṭīvat . evaṃ liṅgābhāva eva . tataścāsattvamapyeṣām, akriyāvyayatve satyaliṅgatvāt, khapuṣpavat .
athocyeta--nanvevaṃ saṃstyānātmakatvādityādinā triliṅgatvaṃ vyavasthāpitameva
saṃstyāne styāyaterḍraṭ strī sūteḥ sap prasave pumān .ubhayorantaraṃ yacca tadabhāve napuṃsakam ॥pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 4 . 1 . 3
sthitirnapuṃsakam, strī styānam, prasavaḥ pumān, ete cārthāḥ sarvamūrttirteṣu sambhavanti, atra
yo viśeṣo vivakṣyate tadviṣayo liṅgabheda iti . etacca na taṭa-taṭī-taṭānāṃ viṣayasya viśeṣaḥ,
ekatvādarthasya sa eva viśeṣo nāsti, yadviṣayo liṅgabhedaḥ syāt sa nāsti, abhinnasvarūpatvāt,
ghaṭa-ghaṭasvātmavat, yathā ghaṭa eva ghaṭasvātmā tathā taṭa eva taṭī taṭaṃ ca, abhinnasvarūpatvād nāsti
viśeṣaḥ . āha--gocaraviśeṣopapatterbhittyādisaṃsthānā taṭī kaṭakādisaṃsthānastaṭaḥ kuḍyādisaṃsthānaṃ taṭamiti
tasmād viṣayaviśeṣopapatterliṅgaviśeṣopapattiriti . atrocyate --gocaraviśeṣopapattau vā so'pi viśeṣo
nāsti, yasmād na taṭo gocaraḥ prasavasya, saṃstyānātmakatvāt, saṃstyānātmakatvaṃ tasyārthasya siddhaṃ
tvayaivābhyupagatatvāt tryātmakatvasya, strīvaditi stana-keśavatyāḥ prasavābhāvavaditi . evaṃ śeṣe sādhane
gatārthe yāvat strī-puṃsavaditi . eṣa bāhyastryādinidarśanabalena gocaraniṣedhaḥ kṛtaḥ . adhunā tasyaivārthasya
tritvāpekṣayā kriyate --athavetyādi sādhanāni gatārthāni yāvat taṭīvaditi . evaṃ liṅgābhāva eva
taṭatvādīnāṃ prasavādidharmābhāve gocaraviśeṣābhāvādityupanayaḥ . na liṅgābhāva eva doṣaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ?
tataścāsattvamapyeṣāṃ mūlodvartanena, akriyā-'vyayatve sati aliṅgatvāt, khapuṣpavat, mā bhūt
pacatyādisvarādyākhyātāvyayābhidheyārthavat sattvāśaṅketi akriyāvyayaviśeṣaṇam . athocyetetyādi .
pareṇocyeta parihāraḥ --nanvevaṃ prapañcanena gocaraliṅganirākaraṇavyākhyānena 'saṃstyānātmakatvādityādinā
triliṅgatvaṃ svaṃ svaṃ liṅgavyavasthāpanahetuṃ parigṛhṇatā vyavasthāpitameva tvayā . yathā na taṭī, saṃstyāna

tvayā taṭaḥ puṃliṅgaṃ prasavātmakatvāt puruṣavadityādi . na, liṅgavyavasthāpanahetvabhāvāt . prasavādīnāmekārthe sannidhibhāve vā sa pumāneva na syāt, strītvāt, devadattādivat . na strī, puṃstvāt . na tau, napuṃsakatvāt, itaravat .
parvatanadībhavanaviṣayaṃ triliṅgatvaṃ viśiṣṭaviṣayamiti cet, na, pumādibhinnabāhvādyekaliṅgatvāt ardharcādiṣu ca viśeṣādarśanādaparihārāt . nanvekasya dṛṣṭaṃ
triliṅgatvaṃ bhūtirbhavanaṃ bhāva iti . na, yadi vayaṃ loke dṛṣṭatvāt pratipadyāmahe taṭe
dṛṣṭatvādeva kasmād na pratipadyāmahe ? tadeva durdṛṣṭam . api cedaṃ sādhyam--asāvapyeko'rtho bhāvo veti .
prasavātmakatvāt, puruṣavat ityāttha tathā taḥtaṭaḥ puṃliṅgam, prasavātmakatvāt, puruṣavaditi,
ādigrahaṇāt saṃstyānānubhayatvābhyāmapi trayāṇāṃ triliṅgatvahetutvamiti . etacca na, liṅgavyavasthāpanahetvabhāvāt . nanūktam--ta eva hi prasavādayo liṅgavyavasthāpanahetavo na santīti sādhitamanantarameva,
tasmānna kiñcidetat . abhyupagamyāpi prasavādīnāmekārthe sannidhibhāve vā sa pumāneva na syāt,
strītvāt, devadattādivat, tasya strītvaṃ tvayābhyupagataṃ triliṅgatvāt . tathā na strī puṃstvāt, na
tau strīpuṃsau napuṃsakatvāt, itaratvena dṛṣṭānto'tra .
parvata-nadītyādi . syānmatam--parvataḥ pumān, tadviṣayastaṭaḥ . nadī strī, tadviṣayā taṭī . bhavanaṃ
napuṃsakam, tadviṣayaṃ taṭam . tasmāt triliṅgatvaṃ viśiṣṭaviṣayamiti . etacca na, pumādibhinnabāhvādyekaliṅgatvāt . ekasmin dehe bāhuḥ pumān, jihvā strī, akṣi napuṃsakamiti niyataliṅgatvānnaitadapi
puṣkalam . kiñcānyat, ardharcādiṣu ca viśeṣādarśanādaparihārāt na iti vartate, ardharcaḥ ardharcaṃ
gomayaḥ gomayamityādīnāṃ strīliṅgābhāvāt triliṅgatvaṃ naikārtham .
āha --nanvekasya dṛṣṭaṃ triliṅgatvam--bhūtirbhavanaṃ bhāva iti, ato'vyabhicāra iti cet,
netyucyate, yadi vayamityādi, yadi loke prayogo dṛṣṭa ityetāvatā pratipadyāmahe tvādṛśā iva parapratyeyāḥ
taṭe dṛṣṭatvādeva kasmād na pratipadyāmahe ? kiṃ vivādena ? tasmāt tadeva durdṛṣṭam, prasiddhireva
duṣprasiddhirityarthaḥ . api cedamityādi, bhūtirbhavanaṃ bhāvaḥ ityete'pi trayo'rthā yathārthābhidhānaśabdanayamatena
bhinnāḥ, tasmādetat sādhyam--asāvapyeko'rtho nāneka iti . api ca bhāvo veti etadapi

api ca ekasya trailiṅgyāyuktivicāre bhūtyādīnāṃ nānāśabdānāmupanyāso'tivispardhate, paryāyanayaviṣayatvācca bhāvaśabdasyātra kartaivaiko bhāvaḥ tasmādekabhavanāsattvādarthaikatvamapi naiva .
yadapyuktaṃ nakṣatratārārthātideśa... ... ...ayaṃ devadattaḥ, vṛkṣo'rtho bhavati .
nakṣatreṇa sāmānyena puṣyasya atideśaḥ yathā idamā devadattasya . atra yuktau,
devadattasyedaṃviṣayatvādatideśo yujyate, na nakṣatreṇa puṣyasya atadviṣayatvāt . arthena
vā vṛkṣo'tidiśyeta tadviṣayatvāt . nakṣatrādyatideśyo na bhavati puṣyaḥ, asvaviṣayatvāt, sthāṇupuruṣavat . yadyatadviṣayeṇāpyatidiśyeta ghaṭādāvapi nakṣatrādyatideśavṛttiryuktā syāt, atadviṣayatvāt, puṣyavat .
sādhyam--bhāvaḥ kriyā na kartā bhūtyādiśabdābhidheyaḥ . sa ca śabdanayasya nāsti, prakṛtyarthasya nyagbhūtatvāt .
kartrarthasyaiva sadbhāvāt manmatena .
api cetyādi . taṭaśabdasyaikārthasya ekasya trailiṅgyāyuktivicāre nānāliṅgānāṃ bhūtyādīnāṃ
nānāśabdānāmupanyāso'tivispardhate . itaśca na ghaṭate tadupanyāsaḥ, dravyārthatvāt sāmānyasya
bhūti-bhavana-bhāvākhyasyaikatvāt tadviṣayamudāharaṇaṃ syāt, na paryāyanayaviṣayam, paryāyanayaviṣayatvācca
bhāvaśabdasyātra kartaivaiko bhavati iti bhāvo viśiṣṭa evaiko ghaṭādiḥ, na tveka eva bhūtyādirūpo viśeṣaḥ
kartā . tasmādekabhavanāsattvādarthaikatvamapi naiva, sāmānyabhavanasyaikasya nyagbhūtatvāt viśeṣabhavanasya
bhūtyādiviśiṣṭaikarūpatvāt nāstyarthaikatvamatra naye'to dravyārthakṛtaṃ bhūtyādiṣvaikyaṃ tad māṃ pratyasiddhamityarthaḥ .
tasmādadṛṣṭānta iti .
kiñcānyat, tvayā yadapyuktaṃ nakṣatratārārthātideśetyādi taduktapratyuccāraṇam . sāmānyārthātideśena
viśeṣārthātisarge nidarśanam --ayaṃ devadatta iti, vṛkṣo'rtho bhavati iti dvitīyam . śeṣaṃ gatārthaṃ
sabhāvanaṃ yāvad devadattasyeti pūrvapakṣaḥ . uttarapakṣastu atra yuktau devadattasyedamityādinā vaidharmyaṃ
nidarśayati atideśābhāvabhāvanārthaṃ yāvadatadviṣayatvāditi prathamanidarśanasya . arthena vetyādinā dvitīyanidarśanavaidharmyaṃ darśayati . arthena satā vṛkṣo'tidiśyeta pratyakṣaḥ san parokṣeṇa dharmeṇa viśeṣeṇa, na
sāmānyena satā vā khapuṣpādinā vā . nakṣatrādīnāmatadviṣayatvāt pratyakṣanirdeśyasya piṇḍasya devadattārthasya
tadviṣayatvāt vṛkṣasyārthaviṣayatvācca vaidharmyam . tasmānna dṛṣṭāntaḥ . nakṣatrādyatideśyo na bhavati puṣyaḥ,
asvaviṣayatvāt, sthāṇuneva puruṣaḥ puruṣeṇa vā sthāṇuriti . yadyatadviṣayeṇāpyatidiśyeta ghaṭādāvapi nakṣatraṃ
tārā ghaṭaḥ ityatideśavṛttiryuktā syāt atadviṣayatvāt puṣyavat ityatiprasaṅgaḥ .


nanu puruṣo'pi... ... ...gavādi goṇyā . satyamucyate, na tu tadgataviśeṣavirodhena... ... ...saṃvādavyudasanavṛttiḥ . eṣa prakṛtyādivisaṃvādeṣvapi aśeṣa ākṣepaparihāraprapañca āyojyaḥ .
nanvevamākhyāturākhyeyārthagataviśeṣairvinā tadākhyānāsambhavād nāntarīyakaṃ
viśeṣaṇopādānam, tāni ca saṃkhyāliṅgādibhedā eva . na, kriyāvyutpattyādibhedena
vyākhyānopapatteḥ . uktaṃ hi--kriyākārakabhedena paryāyavacanena vākyāntareṇa ca vyākhyā

nanu puruṣo'pītyādi asvaviṣayatvāsiddhyudbhāvanaṃ yāvad gavādi goṇyeti . taduttaram --satyamucyata ityādi . śabdo hi tena prakāreṇa vācyaviśeṣaṃ saṃvādinaṃ bravīti, tatsamparigrahaguṇena satyamucyate
so'rthaviśeṣaḥ, na tu tadgatānāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ virodhenocyate yathā strī-puṃ-napuṃsakādīnāmekadvibahutvādīnāṃ
caikārthatveneti saṃvāda-visaṃvādadarśano grantho yāvat saṃvādavyudasanavṛttiriti gatārthaḥ . evaṃ liṅga-saṅkhyāvisaṃvādavṛttihetuprasaṅgena codya-parihāraprapañca uktaḥ . eṣa prakṛtyādivisaṃvādeṣvapi aśeṣa ākṣepa-parihāraprapañca āyojyaḥ samānapracarcatvāt prakṛti-pratyayādyakṣaraviśeṣoccāraṇamātrabhedaḥ prahāsādidamasatyameva
iti codyopakramaprabhṛtiryāvadetadavadhi liṅgādiviśeṣatyāgena yathānupūrvottarapakṣaviracano neya iti .
nanvevamityādi . nanvākhyāturākhyānakarmaṇi pravṛttasya ākhyeyārthagataviśeṣairavaśyambhāvibhirvinā
tadākhyānāsambhavād nāntarīyakaṃ viśeṣaṇopādānam, tāni ca viśeṣaṇāni saṅkhyāliṅgādibhedā eva, itarathā
arthopadeśābhāvaḥ, arthapratyāyanārthatvācchabdaprayogasya arthaparatantrasyānantarīyakatvavad liṅgādibhedanāntarīyakatvamiti . etacca na, kriyāvyutpattyādibhedena vyākhyānopapatteḥ . taddarśayati --uktaṃ hītyādi
jñāpakena kriyā-kārakabhedeneti,

dravyavadāśrayavṛttiḥ svasthā parasādhanā tryabhihitatā ?śca .
dve śūnye kṣayiṇī cetyaṣṭau jñeyāḥ kriyābhedāḥ ॥  

kārakabhedāḥ kartrādayaḥ ṣaḍaṣṭau vā kālopāyasahitāsta eva . paryāyavacanena ghaṭa-kuṭa-kumbhādinā
vākyāntareṇa ca sthānivadādeśo'nalvidhaupā॰ 1 . 1 . 56 ityasya sthānyādeśapṛthaktvāt sthānivadatideśo guruvad guruputre vartitavyam anyatrocchiṣṭabhojanāt pādagrahaṇācca pā. ma. bhā. 1 . 1 . 56 ityādi .

  . kriyābhedena divu krīḍāvijigīṣāvyavahāradyutistutimodamadasvapnakāntigatiṣupā॰ dhā॰ 1107... ...sa vṛkṣaḥ . ihāpi kriyākārakabhedābhyāṃ puṣyati... ...khapuṣpe .
upoddhāta... ...bhedalakṣaṇāyāḥ adhikaraṇayoga... ...vyākhyāyāḥ kā kathaṃ vā'nupapattirliṅgādyabhede'pi ? anekārthaikaśabdagrahaṇenāpi vyākhyānād liṅgādyabhede'pyarthādhigatiḥ . yathāha--vāgdigbhūraśmivāgdigbhūraśmivajreṣupaśvakṣisvargavāriṣu . daśasvartheṣu medhāvī gośabdamupadhārayet ॥... ... ...॥  ... ...dṛṣṭyā vā .
ata eva ca vyākaraṇādhyayane yatna āstheyaḥ . uktaṃ hi--... ... ...॥arthapravṛttitattvānāṃ śabdā eva nibandhanam .tattvāvabodhaḥ śabdānāṃ nāsti vyākaraṇādṛte ॥ vākyapa॰ 1 . 13
athavā ācāryeṇaiva kriyābhedena divu krīḍetyādi vyākhyātameva yāvat sa vṛkṣa iti gatārtham .
ihāpīti siddhaṃ vyākhyānaṃ pradarśya prastutaṃ yojayati kriyākārakabhedābhyāṃ puṣyatītyādi yāvat khapuṣpa
iti gatārthā vyākhyā . athavānyā vyākhyā --upoddhātetyādi yāvad bhedalakṣaṇāyā iti vyākhyāyāḥ
kā kathaṃ vehā'nupapattirliṅgādyabhede'pi iti sambhantsyate . athavāyamaparo vyākhyāmārgaḥ, tadyathā --adhikaraṇayogapadārthetyādi yāvat kā kathaṃ vānupapattirliṅgādyabhede'pīti . sodāharaṇaṃ tvasya vyākhyānaṃ
tatrāntrārthasaṅgrahādibhyo'dhigantavyam .
itaśca vyākhyānālliṅgādyabhinnārthagatirupapadyate, anekārthaikaśabdagrahaṇenāpītyādi . vyākhyātṛbhirekaḥ śabdo'nekārtha iti bruvadbhirvyākhyānād liṅgādyabhede'pyarthādhigatirabhyupagataiveti . tad

yadapyucyeta--liṅgādivicārakhedo'yamakasmāt kriyate tvayā . abhijalpo hi
śabdārthaḥ . sa ca śabda eva .so'yamityabhisambandhād rūpamekīkṛtaṃ yadā .śabdasyārthena taṃ śabdamabhijalpaṃ pracakṣate ॥
darśayati --yathāha--vāg-dig-bhū-raśmītyādi śloko'yamācāryeṇaiva vyākhyātaḥ yāvad dṛṣṭyā veti granthenaiva . evaṃ niravaśeṣavyākhyeyaviṣayavyāpitā vyākhyāyāḥ pradarśitā . ata eva cetyādi . vyākaraṇaṃ hi
lakṣyādhigataye lakṣaṇaṃ kathaṃ nāma śabdādarthe jñānamaviparītaṃ syāt iti . tasmād vyākaraṇādhyayane
yatna āstheyaḥ .
uktaṃ hītyādi ślokadvayaṃ vyākaraṇastavanārthaṃ nidarśayati . vāgādiṣu gośabda eko'nekārthaḥ,
ekasmin pṛthubudhnādilakṣaṇe'rthe ghaṭa-kuṭa-kumbhādiśabdo'nekaḥ pravṛttaḥ ityevamādeḥ prakāśyasyārthasya prakāśakaṃ
vyākaraṇaṃ sthāvara-jaṅgamānāmiva prakāśyānāṃ sūryaḥ . tathā na vyākaraṇamantareṇa vācyasya sūkṣmasya jñānaṃ
vācakasya ca śabdasya, yaḥ śabdaḥ śabdakarmako vācameva brūte hasatijalpatyādistadviṣayaṃ ca jñānaṃ na sambhavati . tacca sarvaṃ vyākaraṇajño veda . tathā arthapravṛttitattvānāmityādi . arthā abhidheyāḥ, pravṛttayaḥ
kriyāḥ puruṣahitahetavo'hitahetavo vā, teṣāmubhayeṣāṃ tattvāni svānyaviparītāni rūpāṇi śabdaireva jñāyante .
śabdānāṃ punastattvaṃ vyākaraṇādṛte na jñāyate . athavārthasya pravṛttitattvāni yathāsvamekaikasyānantadharmātmavipariṇāmāḥ, tāni śabdairjñāyante, śabdā vyākaraṇeneti . athavā arthā dharmārthakāmamokṣāḥ, taddhetavaḥ
pravṛttayaḥ, tāsāṃ tattvāni yathāsvaṃ sādhyasādhanabhāvāḥ . ityādivyākhyāviśeṣeṣu tadviṣayasamyagjñānasya
śabdāḥ kāraṇāni, śabdajñānasya tu vyākaraṇamiti .
yadapyucyetetyādi . strīpuṃnapuṃsakavyaktīnāṃ viruddhānāṃ puṣyanakṣatratārārthānāmayuktamaikādhikaraṇyam,

tayorapṛthagātmatve rūḍheravyabhicāriṇi .kiñcideva kvacid rūpaṃ prādhānyenāvatiṣṭhate ॥loke'rtharūpatāṃ śabdaḥ pratipannaḥ pravartate .śāstre tūbhayarūpatvaṃ pravibhaktaṃ vivakṣayā ॥ vākyapa॰ 2 . 129, 130, 131
darśanotprekṣābhyāmarthamupagṛhya tatra nyagbhūtasvaśaktiḥ buddhau pariplavamāna āntaro
vijñānalakṣaṇaḥ śabdātmā śrutyantarapravṛttiheturabhijalpa iti bhartṛharyādimatam .
vasurātasya bhartṛharyupādhyāyasya mataṃ tu sa ca svarūpānugatamarthamantaravibhāgena
saṃniveśayati .
punarvasū nakṣatram ityādisaṃkhyāvirodhādyayuktervijñānamapi tadviṣayamayuktam ityādivacanakhedo'yamakasmāt
kriyate tvayā . kiṃ kāraṇam ? abhijalpo hi śabdārthaḥ, hiśabdo yasmādarthe, śabdārthasyābhijalpatvād
na liṅgādivicārakhedenārthaḥ, asadviṣayatvāt, khapuṣpaviṣayavicārakhedavat . syānmatam--ko'sāvabhijalpa
iti, atrocyate --sa ca śabda eva, sa cābhijalpaḥ śabda eva .
kathamiti cet, ucyate --so'yamityabhisambandhāditi ślokaḥ . yo'rthaḥ so'yaṃ śabdo ghaṭaḥ
ityabhedopacārasambandhād yadā śabdasya rūpamarthainaikīkṛtaṃ bhavati tadā yathā indrakaḥ, candrakaḥ itīndracandrādyapratyakṣārthānabhijño'pi indra-candraśabdarūpāpannaṃ gopālādimarthaṃ pratyāyayan dṛśyate so'rthena ekībhūtaḥ
śabda eva abhijalpaḥ ityucyate . evaṃ śabdārthayoḥ kṣīrodakavadapṛthagātmatvam . tayorapṛthagātmatve
satyavyabhicāriṇi anyonyāvinābhāvitve'pi rūḍhivaśādeva kiñcid rūpaṃ prādhānyenāvatiṣṭhate śabdarūpamartharūpaṃ vā yathā laukikā arthapradhānāḥ śābdāḥ śabdapradhānā iti, tamarthaṃ pravibhāgena darśayati--saṃvyavahārakāle loke'rtharūpatāmiti śloko gatārthaḥ . agnimānaya ityukte loke dahanādilakṣaṇe'rthe sampratyayaḥ,
na śabde . śāstre tu strībhyo ḍhak pā॰ 4 . 1 . 120 iti strīvācakeṣu sārtheṣu śabdeṣu, bhujo kauṭilye
pā॰ dhā॰ 1418 ityevamādiṣu artheṣveva sampratyayaḥ . tadvyākhyā --darśanotprekṣābhyāmityādi . pradhānādidarśanena puruṣasya utprekṣayā vārthamabhidheyatvena upagṛhya pūrvoktacandrādivat sākāraṃ tatra nyagbhūtasvaśaktiḥ
asvatantrīkṛtābhidhānasāmarthyaḥ buddhau pariplavamānaḥ ayamitthamanena śabdenocyata ityāntaro vijñāna-
lakṣaṇaḥ śabdātmā śrutyantarasya bāhyasya dhvanyātmakasya pravṛttau hetuḥ utthāpakaḥ so'bhijalpālpo'bhidheyākāraparigrāhī bāhyācchabdādanya iti bhartṛharyādimatam . vasurātasya bhartṛharyupādhyāyasya mataṃ tu
sa ca svarūpānugatamityādi, sa ca abhijalpaḥ svarūpānugatamartharūpamantaravibhāgena sanniveśayatīti .




aśakteḥ sarvaśaktervā śabdaireva prakalpitā .
ekasyārthasya niyatā kriyādiparikalpanā ॥ vākyapa॰ 2 . 132

ihaikamevārthavastu ekasyāmavasthāyāmekasmin kāle yugapat paryāyeṇa vocyate
viruddhairdharmaiḥ . tadyathā--odanaṃ pacati, pākamodanasya nirvartayati, nirvṛttiṃ pākasya
karoti . tatra yadi karmatvaṃ kathaṃ śeṣarūpatvamodanasya śeṣarūpatvaṃ ca pākasya .
tasmādavidyamānā vā śaktayo'syārthasya śabdena vivakṣāvaśāt samadhyāropyante .
sarvaśaktiyoge vā niyatāstāḥ śabdaḥ prakāśayati . tatrāśaktipakṣe
vastugatā śaktiraprayojikā . na hi tasyā vastuviṣayābhyāṃ sannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ kiñcidapi prayojanamasti . yogyaśabdanibandhanā hi vivakṣā śrotṛbuddhau

satyapi bāhye'rthe tannirapekṣaṃ svātantryamabhijalpasya pradarśayitumāha --aśakteḥ sarvaśaktervetyādi . yā
etā gati-sthiti-jalpi-cintyādidhātuvācyāḥ kriyā bāhyārthaśaktyabhimatāḥ tadvān vāsau bāhyo'rtho'stu
aśaktireva vā dvayorapi śaktimadaśaktipakṣayostāḥ kriyādiśaktayo niyatā eva jalpanādi manuṣyādīnāmeva,
sarpaṇaplavanādyāḥ sarpaśakunādīnāmeva iti, sarvā eva tu ekasya kasyacidarthasya anekāḥ śabdaireva
prakalpitāḥ śabdaśaktyutthāpitā ityarthaḥ .
etamevārthaṃ bhāṣyeṇa vivṛṇoti --ihaikamevārthavastu ityādi . vastuta eka odana ekasyāṃ pacanāvasthāyāmekasmin muhūrtādau kāle bahubhirvaktṛbhiryugapadekena vā paryāyeṇa vaktrocyate viruddhairdharmaiḥ .
tadyatheti nidarśayati, odanam iti devadattādikartṛsamārūḍhakriyaṃ karma, pākamodanasya iti ṣaṣṭhyā
sambandhamātraṃ pākakarmatvam, nirvṛttiṃ pākasya iti ca pākasambandhitvamiti .
tatra yadītyādinā bhāvayati yāvat pākasyeti . bāhye'rthe viruddhadharmasambandhābhāvād yugapadekakāle
na ghaṭate evam . nāpi krameṇa prayoge, vastuna ekatvāt pākasamavāyina odanākhyasya pākāvasthāyāḥ
kālasya ca .
tasmādityādi pāriśeṣyāt avidyamānā vetyādinā prathamavikalpe darśayati śabdasyaiva śaktiṃ
yāvat samadhyāropyanta iti . sarvaśaktiyoge vetyādi dvitīyavikalpe'pi śabdaśaktimeva darśayati yāvat
prakāśayatīti .
tatrāśaktipakṣe vastugatā śaktiḥnāstyeva ityabhyupagatatvādaprayojikā śabdaprayogasya,
khapuṣpavadasattvāt . na hi tasyā ityādi bhāvanā gatārthā yāvat kiñcidapi prayojanamasti, prayojane hi

tāṃ tāṃ śaktimadhyāropayati . sarvaśaktipakṣe tu vyavasthitāmavyatikīrṇāṃ tāṃ tāṃ
śaktimupādāya svaviṣayaniyatāḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante . tasmādubhayorapi... ... ...
sambhavati .
idamapyasmadabhiprāyaprasādhanaphalam . yogyaśabdanibandhanā hi vivakṣā śrotṛbuddhau tāṃ tāṃ śaktim adhyāropayati . tatra vastu tāvadanenaiva tvadvacanena śabdādanyat siddham . tadidaṃsambandhātmakaśabdārthayorbhedād yatrāsau prayujyate śabdo
vaktumiṣyate ca śaktiśca yatrādhyāropyate tad vastu sarvasyāsyādhārabhūtam . yogyo'nurūpaḥ śabdaḥ . tasmādarthāt siddhāt paścād bhavati śabdaḥ . yathārtharūpaṃ tathā hi sa
yogyaḥ śabdastasyārthasya vācakaḥ . arthanibandhanā hi vivakṣā, itarathā vacanasya
sati prayogaḥ syāt . tasyāmasatyāmapi bāhyārthaśaktau matpakṣe sambhavatyeva śabdaprayogaḥ, yasmād yogyaśabdanibandhanetyādi gatārthaṃ yāvacchaktimadhyāropayati . sarvaśaktipakṣe tu mama viśeṣeṇa vyavasthitāṃ kutaścidanādeyāmavyatikīrṇāmananyaśabdavācyāmityādi yāvat prayujyante prayogasāphalyamastīti . tannigamayati—
tasmādubhayorapītyādi yāvat sambhavatīti pūrvapakṣaḥ .
atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ --idamapyasmadabhiprāyaprasādhanaphalam, sāmānyopasarjanā viśeṣā eva bhavanti
ityetameva sādhayati, etadasya tvadvacanasya phalaṃ bhaviṣyati . tad bhāvayitukāmo yogyaśabdetyādi pratyuccārayati yāvadadhyāropayatīti aśaktipakṣe śabdaśaktipradarśanopasaṃhāro'ntyaḥ, tatphalatvāccheṣagranthasya . tatra
vastu tāvadityādi . anenaiva tāvat tvadvacanena śabdādanyad vastu śaktyākhyaṃ śaktimadvā siddham . tat
punarvastu kīdṛśamiti cet, darśayati --tadidaṃsambandhātmaketyādi, so'yamityabhisambandhāt ityetasmādeva
vacanāt tacchabdavācyaṃ vastu idaṃśabdavācyācchabdādanyat arthādvā tacchabdavācyādidaṃśabdavācyaḥ śabdo'nyaḥ, ādhārādheyayorbhedāt tadidaṃsambandhātmakaśabdārthayoḥ . yatrāsau prayujyate śabdaḥ vaktumiṣyate
ca yadviṣayā buddhirutpādayitumiṣṭetyarthaḥ śaktiśca yatrādhyāropyate tad vastu sarvasyāsya śabdaśaktibuddhi-vivakṣākhyasyārthakalāpasyādhārabhūtam, ādheyānāmādhāraprāṇataḥ siddheḥ . yogyaśabdācca bāhyārthasiddhiḥ, yogyo'nurūpaḥ śabdaḥ, kenacidarthena kaścit tadanurūpa eva śabdo yujyate pṛthubudhnādyarthena
ghaṭaśabdaḥ . tasmād ghaṭākhyādarthāt siddhāt paścād bhavati śabdaḥ, anuśabdasya paścādarthatvāt
siddhe'rthe paścācchabdenārthasya yogo'nurūpaḥ . yathārtharūpādipami ?tyādi, athavā anurūpo yogyaḥ,
yathārtho'nuśabdaḥ, yathārūpaṃ yad yad rūpaṃ yathārūpamanurūpaṃ yathā yujyate tathetyarthaḥ . kathaṃ ca yujyata
ityata āha --tathā hi sa ityādi, tena hi prakāreṇāsau yogamarhati yogyaḥ śabdaḥ tamarthaṃ pratyāyayiṣyāmīti prayogadarśanāt tasyārthasya vācakatvopeta ityarthaḥ, yo hyarthasyāvācakaḥ sa nānurūpo na yogya ityuktaṃ
bhavati tvayaiva . yasmādarthanibandhanā vivakṣā, hiśabdahetvarthatvāt . itaratheti arthapratyāyanādṛte vacanasya

pravṛttyasambhavāt . na hi śabdo'nāmṛṣṭapratyāyyapratyāyakabhāvo vaktumiṣyate . na ca
vivakṣāmātreṇa śabdaḥ śrotṛbuddhau tāṃ tāṃ śaktimādhātuṃ śaknoti . evaṃ cānena
tvadvacanenaiva viśeṣalakṣaṇāḥ śaktayaḥ parigṛhītā eva tvayā . asmanmatavadeva ca
viśeṣasvarūpapravṛttyā vinā na kaścicchaktimānanyaḥ . viśeṣā eva śaktayaḥ svārthasatyaḥ .
tāsāṃ ca teṣu teṣu vivakṣaiva vyañjikā . vivakṣaiva tāṃ tāṃ śaktimadhyāropayati
prāgātmani paścāt prayogācchrotṛbuddhau . śabdanirapekṣaiva vivakṣādhyāropyā śaktirarthe,
pravṛttyasambhavāt . na hi śabda ityādi, śabdo hi samīkṣitapratyāyyapratyāyakasambandho vaktumiṣyate,
na hyanāmṛṣṭapratyāyyapratyāyakabhāvaḥ . vivakṣāyāścārthamantareṇāsambhavāt na ca vivakṣāmātreṇetyādi, ca
śabdo vivakṣite'nurūpe'rthe prayuktaḥ śrotṛbuddhau tāṃ tāṃ śaktimādhātuṃ śaknoti, nānyathā, śabdasyārthasya
śabdārthasya ca śaktiḥ śakanāt, śaknoti vaktuṃ śabdaḥ śakyate vaktumartha iti .
evaṃ cānenetyādi . so'yamityabhisambandhāt vākyapa॰ 2 . 129 ityādiprakramam aśakteḥ
sarvaśaktervā vākyapa॰ 2 . 132 iti vikalpya tvadīyameva vacanaṃ palāyamānasyāpi te bāhyavastusadbhāvamanatikramaṇīyaṃ pratipādayati balāt tadanicchato'pi dharaṇisakhimṛgālikāpalāyanavat . ataḥ strīpuṃnapuṃsakaikadvibahutvakartrādiviśeṣalakṣaṇāḥ śaktayaḥ parigṛhītā eva tvayeti .
itaśca asmanmatavadeva cetyādi . tvadvacanādeva asyārthasyāvidyamānāḥ śaktayo'dhyāropyante
iti vikalpotthāpanādasambhavaṃ śaktimato'nyasya vayamapi brūmaḥ . yā sā viśeṣāṇāṃ svarūpapravṛttistayā vinā
na kaścicchaktimān nāmānyaḥ, kintu viśeṣā eva viśeṣeṇāsmadabhīṣṭāḥ śaktayaḥ iti yadyucyante tvayā
ucyatām, ko vārayati ? tāśca svārthasatyaḥ svena rūpeṇa santi śaktayo viśeṣarūpeṇa strī-puṃ-napuṃsakādibhāvena
śaktyantaravyāvṛttarūpā viśeṣā eva vartamānāḥ santītyarthaḥ . tāsāṃ ca śaktīnāṃ teṣu teṣu pravṛttivastuṣu
strītvādiṣu vivakṣaiva vyañjikā, vivakṣayā vyajyante prakāśyante satya eva śabdaprayogeṇa, saiva hi vivakṣā
taṭastaṭī taṭam ityādīn sato viśeṣānabhivyanaktītyarthaḥ . kā vivakṣā ? vaktumicchā, saiva tāṃ tāṃ śaktimarthagatāṃ śabdamanapekṣya siddhāmadhyāropayati prāgātmani vaktari, paścāt prayogācchrotṛbuddhau, nāsatīm,
vaktrabhiprāyagahaṇārthaprayatanāt pumānayamanena vivakṣitaḥ, strī iyam, netare ityādyananyabuddhivyavasthāpanena .
atra prayogaḥ --śabdanirapekṣaiva vivakṣādhyāropyā śaktirartha iti pratijñā . pratyāyyatvāt,
pratyāyakena vaktrā śrotari pratyayādhānaṃ pratyāyyatvaṃ śaktyākhyasyārthasya siddhameva . yaḥ pratyāyyaḥ sa śabdanirapekṣa

pratyāyyatvāt, abhijalpārthāvayavavat, prayojakatvāccāsyāḥ śaktereva vivakṣābījatvāt .
sarvaśaktipakṣe'pi cāsmanmatamevocyate tvayā, arthārthatvācchabdaprayogasya vyavasthitāmavyatikīrṇāṃ tāṃ tāṃ śaktimupādāya svaviṣayaniyatāḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante
liṅgādibhinnasāmānādhikaraṇyakriyāyāṃ vyatikarāpatteḥ . paramārthatastu vādaparameśvaravāda evāyam, ekaikadravyānantaparyāyatvāt .
yattu viṣayodgrāhe viruddhairdharmairyuktamityabhidhīyate etannātisamyakpratyapekṣita-
eva siddhaḥ . abhijalpārthāvayavavat, yathā tvatprayuktasyābhijalpaśabdasyābhidheyo'rthaḥ samudāyaḥ ābhimukhyena jalpo'bhijalpaḥ tadidaṃsambandhātmaka ekībhāvastvayā śabdārthayorvyutpāditaḥ, sa ca pratyāyyo'vayavārthābhyām abhiśabdārthena jalpārthena ca, ābhimukhyena jalpo'bhijalpaḥ iti samudāyārthapratipatteravayavārthapratipattipūrvakatvāt . mā bhūd vivakṣā-prayogayostvadīyayorānarthakyamiti tāvabhyupagantavyau khapuṣpavailakṣaṇyena śabdanirapekṣau śaktyākhyau tvayā pratyāyyatvāt tathā śaktyākhyo'rthaḥ, itarathā abhijalpaśabdavaiyarthyaṃ syāditi . kiñcānyat, prayojakatvāccāsyā ityādi . yaduktaṃ tvayā tatrāśaktipakṣe vastugatā
śaktiraprayojikā, na hi tasyā vastuviṣayābhyāṃ sannidhānāsannidhānābhyāṃ kiñcidapi prayojanamasti
iti, tadidamitomukhaṃ yuktijātaṃ viparivartate, śaktereva vivakṣābījatvāt prayojakatvācca . evaṃ tāvadaśaktipakṣo'smanmatasiddhestvadvacanādeva nāsti .
sarvaśaktipakṣe'pi cāsmanmatamevocyate tvayā, kasmāt ? arthārthatvācchabdaprayogasya
vyavasthitām ityādinā, tadyathā--vyavasthitāṃ śabdenānāneyāmavyatikīrṇāmananyaśabdavācyāṃ tāṃ tāṃ śaktiṃ
strīpuṃnapuṃsakādikāṃ śaktyantaravyāvṛttyā vivakṣitāṃ viśiṣṭāmeva upādāya svaviṣayaniyatāḥ śabdāḥ prayujyante'bhinnaliṅgasaṅkhyādiviśiṣṭaikaśaktiviṣayaniyatāḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? liṅgādibhinnasāmānādhikaraṇyakriyāyāṃ vyatikarāpatteḥ, uktaṃ prāk --tārā-puṣya-nakṣatrāṇāṃ strī-puṃ-napuṃsakānāṃ vyatikareṇa prayogo'paśabdaḥ   iti . ayaṃ ca sarvaśaktipakṣaḥ . paramārthatastu vādaparameśvaravāda evāyam .
kasmāt ? ekaikadravyānantaparyāyatvādasmanmatameva, ahaṃ hi tvayaiva saha virudhye na vādaparameśvareṇa . tena
ca saha ko virodhaḥ ? tasya hi matam--ekaikaṃ dravyamanantaparyāyam, sāpekṣanirapekṣāśca pariṇāmāḥ paryāyāḥ
śaktaya ityucyante, dravyāṇi cānyonyānugataśaktitvāt sarvaśaktīni . yathāha--

aṇṇoṇṇāṇugatāṇaṃ imaṃ va taṃ vatti vihayaṇamayuttaṃ .
jadha duddha-pāṇiyāṇaṃ jāvaṃtita visesapajjāyā ॥ sammati॰ 1 . 47

yattu viṣayodgrāha ityādi . aśakteḥ sarvaśaktervā vākyapa॰ 2 . 132 ityetasyāḥ kārikāyā viṣayaḥ
śabdotthāpitāḥ kriyādiparikalpanā iti, etasyārthasya nidarśanārthamudgrāhyate --viruddhairdharmairyuktamityabhidhīyata

svārtham, sarvasyāsyāviruddhaikārthatvāt . nanu sarva eva aviruddho'rthaḥ yadeva odanaṃ
pacati iti karma tadeva pāka odanasya iti ṣaṣṭhyocyate . pākaśabdena ca bhāvaḥ
kṛtocyate, pacati iti tiṅā kartrarthaḥ, kṛdabhihitabhāvadravyavattvāt kartuḥ sādhyatvāt . yadā caudanaḥ pratīto bhavati tadviṣayakriyāsandehe kiṃ karoti iti praśne
odanasyāvyākhyeyatvādasyaiva pacervidhānaṃ pacati iti . tasyaiva pacaterapūrvasya

vamādibhiranyānyaprayogaireka evārtho vyākhyāyate . evaṃ sarvatra pākaḥ sādhyarūpatāyāmeva vyavasthitaḥ sādhanamākāṃkṣatīti tasminneva kāle karmatvaṃ śeṣarūpatvaṃ

ekasyārthasya niyatā kriyādiparikalpanā ॥

abhijalpaśabdārthatvamapi svarāgeṇaivoktam, abhijalpagatyarthābhāvāt . sa

evamityādi . itthaṃ vyākhyānaprakāreṇa sarvatra pākaḥ sādhyarūpatāyāmeva vyavasthitaḥ sādhanamākāṃkṣatīti tasminneva kāle karmatvaṃ śeṣatvaṃ ca bhajate, tasmād yuktamaviruddham, tādarthyāt sa eva
sādhyarūpo'rthaḥ karmarūpāpannaḥ śeṣarūpāpannaśca sādhanādhīnanirvṛttika ucyate . kasmāt ? śeṣasyākārakavivakṣaṇāt, satāmeva hi kārakāṇāmavivakṣā śeṣa ucyate, tasmādaviruddhā kriyādiparikalpanā'rthaśaktiviṣayaiva na śabdotthāpitā . tasmādudgrāhānurūpopasaṃhārābhāvādasamyakpratyapekṣitasvārthaṃ vacastvadīyamevamityupasaṃhāraḥ . tasmācchabdasyāpradhānatvādavasthitamarthamanuvartamānasya upasarjanatvāt kuto'sya kalpanāśaktiḥ ? nāstītyarthaḥ . ata iti uktanyāyāditthaṃ kārikā paṭhitavyā --śaktervā sarvaśaktervetyādi . viśeṣāḥ
śaktaya evopasarjanībhūtasāmānyāḥ, tadartho hi śabdaprayogaḥ, tasya vivakṣitatvāt, yathārthābhidhānaṃ ca śabdaḥ
tattvārthabhāṣya 1 . 35 ityasmanmatamityubhayaniyamanayadṛṣṭyā . sarvaśaktervā iti vādaparameśvaramatenoktavat

niyatā vyavasthitā kriyā-karma-śeṣa-kartrādiparikalpanā .
abhijalpaśabdārthatvamityādi . yadapi ca tvayā parikalpitam abhijalpaḥ śabdārthaḥ iti tadapi
svena rāgeṇaiva svadṛṣṭiparituṣṭyaivoktam, nopapattyā . kasmāt ? abhijalpagatyarthābhāvāt, arthagatireva
śabdagatiḥ iti vakṣyate . sa ca śabdo'bhijalpatvamāgato vācyatāṃ yāyāt ātmānamevārtharūpāpannaṃ
brūyāt sambhāvyeta, kayopapattyā ? ityata āha --so'yamityabhisambandhācchabdasyārthena sahaikīkaraṇāt,

na ca tat . asambhavaṃ darśayati --na hi kaścidityādi yāvat sambandheneti . yena sahaikīkriyate'rthena

tvanmatena yena sahaikīkriyeta śabdaḥ  sambandhena ....dravyabhavanopasarjanatvāt tasya

bhūyate tadupasarjanaṃ tad nāma, arthagatyarthatvācchabdaprayogasya tadvaśapravṛttitvāt, bhṛtyavat . nāma ca vacanādiviśeṣavaśam, yathārthaśabdatvāt . vṛkṣa ityatra yadyapi pañcakaṃ
śabdasya rūpaṃ sa mukhyo'rthaḥ, ya ekīkriyate so'pradhānaḥ iti śabdādarthasya pṛthak siddhau kriyetaikyamanayoḥ,
tattu nāsti tvanmatenārthābhāvāt . sambandhasyāpi ca dviṣṭhatvāt pṛthagarthasiddhiḥ, itarathā sambandhābhāvāt .
ato yena yena viśeṣeṇa bhūyate tasyārthasyaiva prādhānyam, nāmno dravyabhavanopasarjanatvāt dravyabhavanasyopa- ?
sarjanaṃ tat, tadbhāvād dravyabhavanopasarjanatvāt tadupasarjanamasyātyantāpūrvasya mūrtasyāmūrtalakṣaṇaṃ bhavanaṃ
viśeṣo'mūrtasya mūrtalakṣaṇam . tasmāt tasya viśeṣasya prādhānyamiti sthitametat . iti sthite viśeṣaprādhānye
itthamāntaranāmnyaprayogārhe viśeṣaprādhānyaṃ vyākhyātam .
prayujyamānanāmnyapi bāhye yena yena viśeṣeṇa bhūyate yo yo viśeṣo bhavati tadupasarjanaṃ tasyaiva

tadeva hetutvenāha --tadvaśapravṛttitvāditi, bhṛtyavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ . bhṛtyo hi svāmivaśapravṛttiḥ svāmiparatantra
upasarjanaṃ tathā śabda upasarjanamarthaḥ pradhānam, yatra prayujyate tadvaśavartī śabdaḥ, viśeṣo'rtha eva pradhānamiti .
tad darśayati --nāma ca vacanādiviśeṣavaśam . vacanaṃ saṅkhyā, ādigrahaṇād liṅga-kālakāraka-puruṣopagrahā gṛhyante viśeṣāḥ, tadvaśaṃ nāma . yathārthaśabdatvāditi śabdalakṣaṇaṃ svasamayasiddhaṃ hetumāha .

tathā ca loke vṛkṣaśabdaprayoge sāmānyamupasarjanaṃ viśeṣaḥ pradhānamiti gamyate,

vivakṣitasaṅkhyābhidhāyi eva vacanaṃ vidhīyate trayāṇāmanyatamadeva, netare . vṛkṣasyaikatvāccaikavacanaṃ vyaktikṛtam, na sarvavṛkṣagatasāmānyaṃ tenāprayojanāt . evaṃ dvibahuvacanayorapi . ekavacanam iti samāsadvayasambhavāt sandehe'vadhārayati kimekasya vacanamekavacanamekaṃ ca tadvacanaṃ ca tadekavacanamiti vā ? ekasya vacanamekavacanamucyate, anenārthaḥ, karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhīti śabdavyutpādanena . tathā cetyādi . evaṃ ca kṛtvā loke
vṛkṣaśabdaprayoge sāmānyamupasarjanaṃ viśeṣaḥ pradhānamiti gamyate . kutaḥ ? ekārthagaterdvyādinivṛtteḥ . itarathā sāmānyaprādhānyāt sarvagatiragatiḥ sandeho vā syāt, yuktā tu viśeṣagatistadvaśavartitvānnāmnaḥ . tadbhāvanā gatārthā --vṛkṣe prātipadiketyādi yāvad bhavatīti .
atrāha --nanu viśeṣāṇāmapītyādi . te'pi hi viśeṣāḥ paratantrā eva, tato'svavaśatvādanavasthānāt sāmānyabhavanaprādhānyameva . na hi vṛkṣavadekavacanameva dṛśyate sarvatra, yadi syāt syād
viśeṣaprādhānyam, tasmād viśeṣavyabhicārāt sāmānyaprādhānyameva nyāyyam . mā maṃsthāḥ--viśeṣaprādhānyāvyabhicāra iti, dṛśyate hi vacanādistasmād viśeṣādapayān, vacana-liṅga-kāla-kārakapuruṣopagrahādiviśeṣāṇāṃ svasthitivyatikramaḥ svasamānādhikaraṇaviśeṣāccāpagatirloke dṛśyate . tadudāharaṇāni --yathā ekavacanaṃ dvivacanārthaṃ nakṣatraṃ punarvasū ityādīnyuttānārthāni yāvaddhetuḥ karmeti .
sarvatrāpyevameva ca, yathāntyamudāhṛtamabhediliṅgaviśeṣavyabhicāre tathā prāktaneṣvapi vacanādi-

ato viśeṣānavasthānād viśeṣo viśeṣa eva na bhavitumarhati . tato'sau
naiva syāt, aviśiṣṭatvādanavasthānādasvavaśatvāt khapuṣpavat . tataśca sāmānyamapi
naiva, pravartakābhāvāt svavaśatvāt viviktavṛttitvāt muktavat, arthāntarābhāvabhavadbhavanābhyāṃ kenacidabādhyatvāt .
atha so'pyasti bhedenārthaḥ śabdāt na tarhi śabda eva śabdārtho'bhijalpatvamāgato vācyaḥ . sa yathā śabdastathārtho'pi sambandhenaikīkriyamāṇatvāt pṛthak
siddhaḥ kṣīrodakavad dvayorapyekīkṛtatve tulyatvāt . api ca prāguktavat pratyāyyatvādabhijalpārthāvayavavadartho'rtha eva .
viśeṣavyabhicāre tadbhāvanā . ato viśeṣānavasthānād viśeṣo viśeṣa eva na bhavitumarhati
sāmānyāghrātarūpatvād viśeṣātmānavasthānāt . tataḥ kim ? tato'sau naiva syāt, bhavanameva nānubhavet, aviśiṣṭatvādanantaroktāt, aviśiṣṭatvamanavasthānād bhāvitavat, anavasthānamasvavṛttitvādasvavaśatvād bhāvitavadeva . khapuṣpavaditi sarvatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ . pṛthak pṛthag vā viśeṣābhāve hetavastrayo'pi
khapuṣpadṛṣṭāntāḥ . tataścetyādi . tataśca viśeṣābhāvāt sāmānyamapi naiva syāditi vartate . kasmāt ?
pravartakābhāvāt, sāmānyasya hi prakṛtyarthasya bhavanādeḥ kriyātmanaḥ pravartakaḥ pratyayārthaḥ kartā syād

atasya tadupacārād bhinnayorabhedopacārāt . kimiva ? pathi gamanavat, yathā panthāḥ pāṭaliputraṃ
gacchati iti patho'sad gamanaṃ puruṣagatyabhedopacārāt tadavinābhāvād dvyarthatvāt tayorucyate tathā śabdārthayoravyabhicārādavinābhāvādabhedopacārād lokarūḍherapṛthagātmatvaṃ pṛthagbhūtayoreveti . kiñcānyat, itare

bhāvāt sanmitravat . tathā loke'rtharūpatāṃ śabdaḥ pratipannaḥ pravartate, vyākaraṇaśāstre
tu śabdarūpatāṃ pratipannaḥ pravartate, śabdādhigamārthapravṛttirviśeṣo bhavativat . arthasya
ca goḥ sāsnādi bhinnaṃ rūpam, tadarthatvācchabdasya gakārādivarṇānupūrvī śrotranādamātram . taddhi na kadācidartho bhavitumarhati kalpituṃ vā avyavasthitatvād vyatikīrṇatvādaniyatatvāt . bāhyārthastu vyavasthito'vyatikīrṇo niyataśca . tasmānna śabdo'rtharūpatāṃ pratipanno vartate . pratipanno'pi svasambandhādeva sambandhasya dviṣṭhatvācchabdārthayorekībhāvagateḥ, nānyathā uktavat . sādhvasādhutvajñānasya prayojanaṃ dharmaniyamo'pi pṛthagarthasiddhiṃ sūcayati .
tarapradhānopasarjanabhāvāt śabdasyopasarjanatvādarthasya prādhānyād dvyarthataiva, kimiva ? sanmitravat,
yathā snigdhayormitrayoḥ pṛthak siddhayorekakāryapravṛttayoritaretarapradhānopasarjanatvaniyamastathā śabdārthayoḥ,
tattu tvadvacanādeva siddham, yathoktaṃ tvayā--kvacideveti yāvadavatiṣṭhate .
yathā prathamaśloko'smanmataṃ samarthayati tathā loke'rtharūpatām ityeṣo'pi . gāmabhyāja śuklām
iti na śabde buddhiḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? abhidheye lokasiddhā . vyākaraṇaśāstre śabdarūpatāṃ pratipannaḥ
pravartate . turviśeṣaṇe, śabdādhigamārthapravṛttirviśeṣo bhavativaditi, bhavatiśabdamadhigamayiṣyan
bhū sattāyāmpā॰ dhā॰ 1 laṭ kartari ityādi karoti tasmād bhinnau .
itaśca bhinnau, rūpabhedāt . arthasya cetyādi, goḥ sāsnādi bhinnaṃ rūpam . tadarthatvācchabdasya
gakārādivarṇānupūrvīśabdasya śrotranādamātram, tadarthaṃ śabdaprayogād gakārādivarṇānupūrvīmātroccāraṇam .
taddhi na kadācidartho bhavitumarhati, kalpituṃ vā na iti vartate, tvayā yo'bhijalpaḥ kalpita eva
sa na bhavatyarthaḥ . kasmāt ? avyavasthitatvād vyatikīrṇatvādaniyatatvāt .
bāhyārthastu vyavasthitaḥ deśakālādibhinnaśabdaśatasaṅkule'pi ghaṭaśabdasya ūrdhvagrīvādye svābhidheye
prayogāt avyatikīrṇaśca, niyataḥ pratipādane'vaśyavācyatvāt tenaiva śabdena sa eva iti tatraiva
ca buddhyutpatteḥ . tasmād vyavasthitāvyatikīrṇaniyatatvebhyo bāhyo'rtho'nyaḥ rūpabhedācchabdāntarāt kalpitācca . tasmānna śabdo'rtharūpatāṃ pratipanno vartate . abhyupetyāpi rūḍherapṛthagātmatvapratipattimavyabhicārādanayoḥ pratipanno'pi svasambandhādeva sambandhasya dviṣṭhatvācchabdārthayorekībhāvagateḥ pratiniyato'bhidhānābhidheyasambandhaḥ pārthakyamantareṇa na bhavitumarhati ghaṭaśabdārthayorityuktam, ekīkaraṇasyānyathā'sambhavāt, ata
āha --nānyathā uktavaditi . kiñcānyat, śāstre tūbhayarūpatvaṃ pravibhaktaṃ vivakṣayā vākyapa॰ 2 . 131


evameva ca darśanotprekṣābhyāmityādi śabdād bahirarthasiddhau ghaṭate . itarathā kiṃ
darśanam ? kotprekṣā ?...kuto'bhijalpo heyaḥ .
śrutyantarapravṛttiheturityetadapi tvatkalpitābhijalpe naivopapadyate . dhvaniḥ śabdārthābhyāṃ na pravartyeta akartṛbhyāṃ karaṇakarmabhyām . cetanātmatvāt tvātmā svatantraḥ kartā
ityetadapyasmanmatamevānudhāvati . yastu prayuṅkte kuśalo viśeṣe pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ ityādikrameṇa gośabdasya
sāsnādimati sādhutvaṃ siddhe'rthe śabde sambandhe ca pṛthak, goṇyādāvasādhutvaṃ rūḍhitaḥ, arthaviśeṣavivakṣāyāṃ
goṇyā āvavane sādhutvamityādi ca nānyathā ghaṭate . tasya ca sādhvasādhutvajñānasya prayojanaṃ dharmaniyamaḥ
siddhe śabdārthasambandhe pā॰ vā॰ ityādiruktaḥ so'pi pṛthagarthasiddhiṃ sūcayati . lokenābhidheye'rthe
śabdāḥ prayuktāḥ prayojanena vā, tatrārthasya pṛthak siddhau śabdasya ca tadviṣayasya dharmārthaḥ prayoganiyamaḥ
sādhoḥ svārthaḥ śāstreṇa kriyate bhakṣyābhakṣyaniyamavaditi . tasmānnābhijalpo'rthaḥ .
evameva cetyādi etasyaiva kārikātrayābhihitasyārthasya varṇakadaṇḍako'pi darśanotprekṣābhyāmityādi,
pradhānapuruṣeśvarādimayam ityādidarśanāni śabdād bahirarthasiddhau ghaṭante, vastunyabhinne ghaṭādau bāhye tu
puruṣāṇāṃ cotprekṣā nityānityāditvena niyamena sadbhāve, nānyathā . itarathetyādi, abhijalpā-'rthaikye
niyatabāhyārthābhāve pradhānādidarśanāsambhavaḥ . tatra kiṃ darśanam ? nāstītyarthaḥ . kotprekṣā ? ityādi
tadgranthānusāreṇāsambhavaṃ sopapattikaṃ darśayati yāvat kuto'bhijalpo heyaḥ ? iti sabhāvanaṃ gatārtham .
arthābhāve na ghaṭate, arthasadbhāve yujyata iti piṇḍārthaḥ .
kiñcānyat, śrutyantarapravṛttihetuḥ ityetadapi tvatkalpitābhijalpe naivopapadyate, asmadiṣṭe
tūpapadyate . tadyathā--śruteranyā śrutiḥ śrutyantaram, antarekībhūtābhijalpapṛthagbhūto dhvanirvyavahārānupātī
syāt, sa tvadiṣṭābhyāṃ śabdārthābhyāṃ na pravartyeta akartṛbhyāmacetanābhyāṃ karaṇa-karmabhyām,

pravṛttihetuḥ śrutyantarasya bhavitumarhati . śabdārthayorekībhūyāntarvartamānayoḥ kānyā
śrutiḥ śrutyantaramityucyeta ? kena ca viśeṣeṇa tatpravṛttiheturucyate ?
asti viśeṣaḥ . tadyathā--ghaṭārthapratyāyanārthaṃ dhvanyātmakaśabdotpattikāryadarśanāt tadanurūpaḥ kāraṇabhūto'numīyate ghaṭaśabdaḥ, nārthaḥ tadvirūpatvāt . tasmācchrutiḥ
śrutyantarasya pravartikā śrutitvāt, nārtho nāpyātmā .
nanu tasyāpi śrutyantarasya śrutitvāt pūrvaśrutivadarthapravartitaḥ śabdaḥ, arthābhāve
prayogānarthakyāt . ābhimukhyena jalpatyarthaṃ śabdaḥ, tamartho'bhijalpayati, tadviṣaya
evābhijalpa ityucyate . evaṃ tāvad bhartṛharyādidarśanamayuktam .
yathāsaṅkhyaṃ karaṇa-karmatvācchabdārthayoḥ . cetanātmatvāt tvātmā svatantraḥ, svātantryāt kartā, sa
pravṛttihetuḥ śrutyantarasya bhavitumarhati . yathoktam --ātmā buddhyā samarthyārthān pā॰ śikṣā॰ ॥ 6 ॥
ityādi . idaṃ cāyuktaṃ śrutyantaram iti vibhajya kathanam, śabdārthayorekībhūyāntarvartamānayoḥ kānyā
śrutiḥ śrutyantaram ityucyeta ? tasmād viśeṣābhāve kathamavibhrāntairavibhaktaḥ san vibhaktaḥ śabdātmā
ucyate ? kena ca viśeṣeṇa śrutyantarābhāvena tatpravṛttiheturucyate ? caitanya-svātantryakṛtaṃ kartṛtvaviśeṣamantareṇa śrutyantarāsambhave kasya pravṛttihetutvam ?
atrāha --asti viśeṣaḥ . tadyathā--ghaṭārthapratyāyanārthamityādi . kāraṇānurūpatvāt kāryāṇāṃ
dhvanyātmakaśabdotpattikāryadarśanādantarniviṣṭo'pi tadanurūpaḥ kāraṇabhūto'numīyate śālyaṅkuradarśanācchālibījavad ghaṭaśabdaḥ, nordhvagrīvādilakṣaṇo'rthaḥ tadvirūpatvāt . upādānaṃ ca śruteranurūpā śrutireva yuktā, nārtho
ghaṭādirvairūpyāt . tasmācchrutiḥ śrutyantarasya pravartikā nārtho nāpyātmetyayaṃ viśeṣa iti .
atrocyate --nanu tasyāpi śrutyantarasyetyādi . etadapyanumānaṃ pratitarkabādhyam, vijñānasanniviṣṭaghaṭārthapravartyā sā śrutiḥ śrutitvāt . nanu prāguktam--arthapratyāyanārthaṃ śabdaḥ prayujyate na vāyasavāsitādivad nirarthakaḥ krīḍitamevāstu iti vetyādi . tasmācchrutitvāt pūrvaśrutivadarthapravartitaḥ śabdaḥ,
arthābhāve prayogānarthakyāditi .
niruktyartho'pyabhijalpasya tathā ghaṭate nānyathā, japa jalpa vyaktāyāṃ vāci pā॰ dhā॰ 397, 398,
ābhimukhyena jalpatyarthaṃ śabdaḥ, taṃ prayuṅkte'rthaḥ abhijalpayati, tadviṣaya evābhijalpa ityucyate, yadyābhimukhyenāvasthitamarthaṃ jalpati tato jalpaḥ śabdaḥ, so'rtho viṣayo'sya tadviṣaya evābhijalpaḥ śabdaḥ, etaduktaṃ
bhavati--arthaviṣayaḥ śabdaḥ śabdārthakalpanāyāṃ yuktataraḥ syāt, arthotthāpitaśabdābhijalpatvapakṣe'bhijalpaśabdārthaparikalpanā yuktatarā syāt, na tu tvatparikalpite śabdaprerite . evaṃ tāvad bhartṛharyādidarśanamayuktam .


yattu vasurāto bhartṛharerupādhyāyaḥ sa ca svarūpānugatamarthamantaravibhāgena saṃniveśayatītyāha tena dvāvapi śabdo'rthaścābhyupagatau . na tu sa tena śabdanayenābhihitānanyānyaliṅgādisāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvādidoṣān parihartuṃ śaknoti . nanu śabdānugatārthamantaravibhāgena iti bruvatā arthatantraḥ śabdo'bhihitaḥ, na śabdatantro'rthaḥ .
tato'rthatantratvācchabdapravṛtteḥ tadavasthā doṣāḥ .
yathā ca rūpādaya ekaikabhavanātmakā na paryāyāntaramapekṣante viśeṣatvāt tathā
puṣyatārānakṣatrādipuṃliṅgādayaḥ parasparavirodhitvād viśeṣāṇāmiti kutaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam ?

yattu vasurāto bhartṛharerupādhyāyaḥsa ca svarūpānugatam ityādyāha tena dvāvapi
śabdo'rthaścābhyupagatau, sambandhasya dviṣṭhatvāt sambandhinorabhyupagatiḥ . prācyādatyandhadarśanāt taimirikadarśanamidaṃ tattvadṛṣṭiṃ pratyāsīdati, na dūrāpayātam, abhijalpasvarūpaṃ tu punastenāpi nirastam . kiñca
na tu sa tenetyādi . etasminnapi darśane yathā puṣyaśabdārthayorantaḥ sanniveśanamavibhāgena svaliṅgavacanakārakādibhedayorevamiṣṭālliṅgāderanyānyaliṅgādīni anyaśabdārthagatānyapi sanniveśayiṣyati sa iti sāmānyopasarjanaviśeṣapradhānavādinā śabdanayenābhihitāṃstatsāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvādidoṣān parihartumaśakta eva
tathāpi . kasmāt ? nanu śabdānugatetyādi . svarūpamanugato'rthaḥ, tamarthamantaravibhāgena iti bruvatā
arthatantraḥ śabdo'bhihito na śabdatantro'rthaḥ, yadyarthamanugataḥ śabdo'ntaravibhāgena sanniveśyeta tataḥ
śabdapreritatvācchabdāvadhāraṇādartho vyudastaḥ syāt, kintu tadviparītaṃ śabdāvadhāraṇavyudasanādarthaprādhānyāva-
lambanaṃ kṛtam . tato'rthatantratvāt arthapradhānatvācchabdapravṛtteḥ, pravartako hi śabdasyārthaḥ, tasmāt tadavasthā
doṣāḥ . śabdaprādhānyāvadhāraṇe tu parihṛtāḥ syuḥ . tasmāduktavadeva viśeṣaprādhānyavāde'rthāntaranirapekṣāṇāṃ puṣya-tārā-nakṣatrādiviśeṣāṇāṃ nāsti sāmānādhikaraṇyam, ato viśeṣa eka eva vyavasthitaḥ .
eṣā tāvad vastuno'rthaparyāyeṣu bhāvanā kṛtā śabdagocarātikrānteṣu, vyañjanaparyāyeṣvanenātideśaḥ
kriyate --yathā cetyādi . rūpādayo yugapadbhāvyabhimatā apyekaikabhavanātmakā na paryāyāntaramapekṣante
viśeṣatvāditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ . puṣya-tārā-nakṣatrādipuṃliṅgādayaḥ parasparavirodhitvād viśeṣāṇāmiti
dārṣṭāntikaḥ . ekamekameva bhavanaṃ bhavati na dvitīyamiti kutaḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyam ? puṣyaḥ pumān
sa kathaṃ strī bhavatīti tārā iti, napuṃsakaṃ vā nakṣatram iti ? evaṃ vacana-kāla-kāraka-puruṣopagrahādibhedā na parasparāpekṣā viśeṣaikabhavanāditi bhāvanīyam .


evaṃ caitacchabdanayasya darśanam--yathārthābhidhānaṃ śabdaḥ tattvārthabhā॰ 1 . 35, tathā
nāmasthāpanādravyabhinnaliṅgādivācyeṣṭākaraṇād bhāvayuktavācī śabdaḥ   iti .
vyavahārāntaḥpātisthāpanāvācyeṣṭākaraṇapradarśanārthaṃ tu sthāpanādravyārthasvarūpameva tāvadākhyāyate .
sthīyate yasmiṃstat sthānam . kena sthīyate ? viśeṣāvacanāt sarvagatiriti . kva
ca sthīyate ? ākāre sthīyate . maryādayā karaṇamabhividhinā vā ākāraḥ . abhividhiḥ

evaṃ caitadityādyuktārthopanayaḥ . tatra śabdanayasya etaddarśanam--yathārthābhidhānameva nyāyyam . lakṣaṇaṃ
ca yathārthābhidhānaṃ śabdaḥ tattvārthabhā॰ 1 . 35 . tathā nāma-sthāpanā-dravya-bhinnaliṅgādivācyeṣṭākaraṇād
bhāvayuktavācī śabdaḥ   iti ca lakṣaṇāntaram . tatra vibhāgena dravyadravyārthavācyaṃ
pūrvanayeṣūktamiṣṭaṃ na karotīti naigamādigocaramanenāpi vyāvartitameva śabdanayena . vyavahāragocaranāmadravyārthavācyamapīṣṭaṃ na karotītyadhunā vyāvartitam . ṛjusūtrasyārthaparyāyasya gocaraṃ ca bhinnaliṅgādivācyamiṣṭaṃ na
karotīti yathā vacanādi sādhu iti manyamānaḥ śabdanayaḥ pravartate yuktyā ca yathā tasya mataṃ śabdasya tathā
prakārāntaṃ pradarśitam . tathācāryasiddhaseno'pyāha--

nāmaṃ ṭhavaṇā davi+etti esa davvaṭṭhiyassa ṇikkhevo .
bhāvo u pajjavaṭṭhiyaparūvaṇā esa paramattho ॥ sanmati॰ 1 . 6 tti .

adhunā sāmānyabhedaṃ sthāpanādravyārthamavyāvartitaṃ vyāvartayitukāmaḥ sambandhayati --vyavahārāntaḥpātisthāpanāvācyeṣṭākaraṇapradarśanārthaṃ tu, vyavahāranayāntaḥpātinī sthāpanā, tadvācyamiṣṭaṃ na karoti
ityetat pradarśayiṣyate, sthāpanādravyārthasvarūpe cāvidite na śakyaṃ tat pradarśayitumiti sthāpanādravyārthasvarūpameva tāvadākhyāyate . tatra sthānakriyāyāḥ kartustiṣṭhataḥ prayojake samavetā ṇyantavācyā
ṇyāsaśrantho yuc pā॰ 3 . 3 . 107 iti lakṣaṇāt kriyā sthāpanā . tāṃ vaktukāmaḥ sthānameva tāvad
vyācaṣṭe --sthīyate yasmiṃstat sthānam, bhāva-karaṇā-'dhikaraṇa-karmasādhaneṣvadhikaraṇaṃ tāvadāha . vakṣyamāṇārthasambandhād bhāvaḥ kriyā sthānam, kartrā tiṣṭhatā sthīyate, atastannirṇayārthaṃ pṛcchati --kena sthīyata
iti . tatprativacanam --viśeṣāvacanāt sarvagatiriti . itiśabdo hetvarthe, yasmāt sacittasya devadattāderacittasya vā ghaṭādeḥ sthānam iti viśeṣyānuktamataḥ sāmānyena yena kenacit sthātavyam . yasmin
ityadhikaraṇasyoktasya nirṇayārthaṃ pṛcchati --kva ca sthīyata iti . ucyate --ākāre sthīyate . āṅ
maryādābhividhyoḥ, maryādayā karaṇamabhividhinābhivyāptyā vā''kāraḥ, bhūkṛñoḥ sarvadhātvarthavyāpitvādā

parisamāpanamabhivyāptiḥ prastutasya rūpasya, tena ākaraṇam, tasmin sthānaṃ maryādayā vā . maryādā anyarūpavilakṣaṇatā . asya sthānasya prayojanā sthāpanā . īṣat
tiṣṭhata aikāgryeṇa sthānam, svayaṃ tiṣṭhato'sadbhāvena sarvatra viśeṣya sthāpyamānaṃ
sthānam, aniścitaikakriyaprayojyatvavat asadbhāvena vā atadbhūtarūpe'pi sthūṇendravat, tathā'kṣādiṣu .
tasmād yathā bālādivividhadravyanāmabhāvabhedopapattau devadattākārasyābhinna-
karaṇamābhavanamityarthaḥ . tatrābhividhiṃ vyācaṣṭe --abhividhiḥ parisamāpanamabhivyāptiḥ, kasya ? prastu-
tasya rūpasya svabhāvasya vastvātmanaḥ, tena abhividhinā prastutarūpaparisamāpanena ākaraṇamābhavanam,
tasmin sthānam, maryādayā vetyanarthāntaraṃ yojayati . kā maryādā ? anyarūpavilakṣaṇatā rūpāntaravyāvṛttirniyama ityarthaḥ, na hyanākāraṃ kiñcidasti, sarvamākāraparigraheṇa bhavati tiṣṭhatīti sthānamākāro
maryādābhividhibhyām . asya sthānasya svatantrasthātṛsamavāyinaḥ prayojake hetukartari vihito ṇic, tasya
bhāvaḥ kriyā prakarṣayojanā prayojanā prayojakatvaṃ hetukartṛtvaṃ sthāpanā . kimuktaṃ bhavati ? īṣat tiṣṭhato
viprakīrṇarūpasthānasya sthāturaikāgryeṇa sthānaṃ tadaikāgryādhānam . tad vyācaṣṭe --svayaṃ tiṣṭhato'sadbhāvena
sarvatreti akṣa-varāṭakādyasamāptābhipretākāraṃ svayameva tiṣṭhadasadbhāvena tiṣṭhati, tattu viśeṣya sthāpyamānaṃ
parisamāptaṃ sthānaṃ svaviśiṣṭa ākāre'bhivyāpya tiṣṭhati indro'yaṃ skandaḥ ityādi rūpāntaravyāvṛttyā maryādayā
niyataṃ veti . kimiva ? ityata āha --aniścitaikakriyaprayojyatvavat, yathā paci-paṭhi-gamyādikriyāvadhāraṇābhāvenāniścitakriyaṃ svatantraṃ kartāraṃ hetukartā paca paca iti niyuṅkte pacāveva sthāpayati kriyāntaravyāvṛttyā
tatraiva sthāne pacyākāre niyamayati sa sthāpanāniyamaḥ, evaṃ sarvatrā''kāre sadbhāvasthāpanayā niyamaḥ
prastutarūpasya parisamāptyā rūpāntaravilakṣaṇatayā maryādayā veti sthānārthaḥ . taṃ vyākhyāya sthāpanārtho
vyākhyātaḥ śabdaḥ vyutpattyā . evaṃ tarhi asadbhāvasthāpanāyā niyamayiturabhāvād na vyāpitā lakṣaṇasyeti
cet; na ityucyate, sukhapratipādyatvādādau sadbhāvasthāpanā itthaṃ pratipāditā, tatsamānaṃ pratipādanamitarasyāmapītyata āha --asadbhāvena vā atadbhūtarūpe'pi sthūṇendravat, tadeva hi vastu vyaktāvyaktākārapariṇāmaṃ svayaṃ tathā tathā tiṣṭhad viśeṣyābhīṣṭe sthāpyate yathā sthūṇaivāsaṃskṛtāvasthāyāmapyavyaktatarāvayavākārāyāṃ viśeṣyamāṇā citrāvasthāṃ vyaktāvayavākārāmapratyāsīdantī indraḥ iti sthāpyate tasmāt sāpi
sthāne niyamyate, ato vyāpyeva lakṣaṇam . etenāvyaktatarāvasthā vyākhyātetyatidiśati tathā'kṣādiṣviti gatārtham .
tasmād yathā bālādītyādi uktopapattinigamanaṃ sabhāvanamudāharaṇaṃ yāvad devadattaḥ . bālatvasya
kāraṇadravyāṇi pītthakādīni yuvatvādīnāṃ cānyānyānīti dravyabheda upapannaḥ, tathā pācako lāvako'dhyāpaka

tvāt tadākāratattvo devadatta ekaḥ sarvabhedo'pi evaṃ citralepyapustādibhedopapattāvapi
tathā tiṣṭhatastasya tasya sthānasya prayojanāt sā sthāpanā, tatkarmaṇastattvāpatteḥ .
sthāpanayā nikṣepaḥ sthāpanānikṣepaḥ, sthāpanā sadbhāvāsadbhāvābhyāṃ vastu nikṣipati . yathā puruṣād nāmakarma nāmakarmaṇo devadattāditā tathā ca citrakarādiḥ... ... ....
ityādirnāmabhedaḥ, kriyāyāḥ kṣāyopaśamikavīryātmakatvād bhāvabhedaścopapannaḥ, vividhaśabdādevamādibhedā
gṛhītāḥ . satyāṃ caivaṃ dravya-nāma-bhāvabhedopapattau devadattākārasyābhinnatvāt tadākāratattvo
devadatta ekaḥ sarvabhedo'pi nānyo'nyaśca ākāraparamārthatvābhedāditi bhāvayitvā tenodāharaṇena
dārṣṭāntikeṣu citrādiṣvapi bhāvayitumāha --evaṃ citra-lepya-pustādibhedopapattāvapi tathā tiṣṭhatastasya
tasya sthānasya prayojanāt sā sthāpanā . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tatkarmaṇastattvāpatteḥ, citrakarakarmaṇastadindratvāpatteḥ pīthakādidravya-pācakādināma-bhāvabhedakarmaṇāṃ devadattākāratvāpattivaditi vyāpitā sthāpanāyāḥ . syādvādī tu sadbhāvāsadbhāvadravyanāmabhāvādibhedatattvaṃ vastu vāñchannevaṃ brūte . sthāpanādravyārthaikāntavādinastu na kiñcidākāravyatiriktamasti, ato bhrāntimātraṃ bhedāḥ .
eṣā ca sthāpanā nikṣepānuyogadvārāntargatārthe'bhihitā . tasmāt sthāpanayā nikṣepaḥ iti tṛtīyāsamāse
sthāpanānikṣepaḥ ityasya vyākhyānārthamāha --sthāpanā sadbhāvāsadbhāvābhyāṃ vastu nikṣipati . sadbhāvenāsadbhāvena ca svātmani vastu sthāpayatītyarthaḥ . atadbhūtātmakaṃ vastu tadbhāvamākārātmānamāpādayati
ātmānamātmanetyuktaṃ bhavati . kimiva ? yathā puruṣād nāmakarma, prāgamūrtātmā lakṣaṇataḥ sannātmā
karmatvena mūrtātmanā parivartate ābhavati . tataśca nāmakarmaṇo devadattāditā, tasmādupāttāt karmaṇo
nāraka-tairyagyona-devadattākhyamanuṣyatvāpattireṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ . dārṣṭāntikaḥ tathā ca citrakarādirityādi .
tadvyākhyā --tatrātmavadatathābhūtasya tathātvāpādanāt tadekatā citrakarmādidevadattasyeti, yathā
jīva-karmaṇoranyonyātmāpattyā bhinnābhimatayorekatvāpattirākhyātā tathā citragatavarṇakādidevadattatvāpattirapītyarthaḥ . athavābhyupagacchāmo jīvakarmaṇorapi bhedam, eka eva jīvākhyo'rthaḥ pāriṇāmikajīvabhavyābhavyatvādibhāvāpattipariṇāmaḥ kṣāyopaśamikaudayikādipariṇāmaścaikadvitricaturindriyatiryaṅnārakādiḥ sarva
eva devadattaḥ karmātmaikyāditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ . mahāśvetatvādidevadattākārābhedaścitre'pīti dārṣṭāntiko'rthaḥ .
tad darśayati --yathā ca jīvatvādi pūrvarūpamityādi daṇḍako gatārthaḥ . athavā jīvasya karmapudgalānāmapi
cābheda eva, kṣāyopaśamikaudayikādipṛthakpariṇāmābhāvādeka eva pāriṇāmiko bhāvaḥ, atastayorapi nāsti

tatrātmavadatathābhūtasya tathātvāpādanāt tadekatā citrakarmādidevadattasya . yathā ca
jīvatvādi pūrvarūpam... .... yathā ca jīvatvaṃ tatpūrvam... ...ākāratattvaikatvāt .
yadi sthāpanayā citrādi sthāpyaṃ devadattoddeśena devadattasvarūpamāpadyate tathā
devadatto'pi kasmānna citrādisvarūpamāpadyate . tathendratāmakṣādirāpadyate nākṣatāmindra ityatra ko viśeṣahetuḥ ?
nanvasāvapi indranāmagotrakarmasthāpyatvāt sthāpanānikṣepātmakatāṃ nātivartate .
ato yujyata evaitat, na na yujyate .
athavā sthāpanāyā nikṣepaḥ sthāpanānikṣepaḥ . sthāpanā ākāro vastvātmā
nikṣipyate svātmani ghaṭādiḥ kumbhakārādibhiḥ, mumukṣubhirātmā . tathendro'pīndrā-
parasparato bhedo dharmābhedādityata āha --yathā ca jīvatvaṃ tatpūrvaṃ jīvapūrvaṃ pāriṇāmikena caitanyena
sarvapariṇāmābhimukhenā'vyaktākāramasadbhāvasthāpanaṃ satataṃ tiṣṭhat sthāpyate tathā pudgalānāmapi varṇādipāriṇāmikā
bhāvā asadbhāvasthāpanena mahāśveta-sindūrādivarṇakajātam, atastayorekatā, kasmāt ? ākāratattvaikatvāt
buddhyā''kriyamāṇatvenābhedāt tatpariṇāmātmakatvāt tathā tathā sthānaniyamādabheda iti .
atra codayati --yadi sthāpanayetyādi . ayamabhiprāyaḥ--yadi sthāpyākārānākāravastuno'tiriktasyoddeśyasya devadattasya svarūpaṃ citrādi sthāpyavastu āpadyate tatastadvaccitrādeḥ sthāpyasya svarūpaṃ kasmād devadattādiruddeśyo'rtho nāpadyate, tulye sthāpayitṛvaśād vyatiriktārthasvarūpāpattihetutve sthāpanāyāḥ ? tathā
indratāmakṣādirāpadyate nākṣatāmindra ityatra ko viśeṣahetuḥ ? iti sadbhāvāsadbhāvasthāpanayoścodyametat .
atrocyate --nanvasāvapītyādi yāvad na na yujyate . naitadaniṣṭam, iṣyata evaitat, ato na doṣaḥ .
yathā citra-lepyādi sthāpyamindroddeśena indro bhavati tathendro'pyakṣādirbhavati . api ca so'pīndranāma-
gotrakarmasthāpyatvāt sthāpanānikṣepātmakatāṃ nātivartate, puruṣād nāmakarma nāmakarmaṇo devadattāditā
ityādigranthena bhāvitatvāt . tasmāt sthāpanānikṣepatve satyeva jīvakarmaṇoryogavakrādipariṇāmavaicitryaṃ
vyaktākāravaiśvarūpyamamihitacitralepyādidṛṣṭāntasādharmyaṃ nātivartate . ato yujyata evaitat, na na
yujyate, dviḥpratiṣedhasya prakṛtyāpatteḥ . evaṃ tāvat sthāpanayā nikṣepaḥ iti tṛtīyāsamāse sthāpānānikṣepadravyārthanayavyāpitā darśitā .
athavetyādi ṣaṣṭhīsamāse'pi darśayitumāha . sthāpanāyā nikṣepa iti samāsaḥ karmaṇi ṣaṣṭhīṃ
kṛtvā . kiṃ karma ? sthāpanaiva . kā sā sthāpanā ? ākāraḥ . ko'sāvākāraḥ ? vastvātmā . sa eva
nikṣipyate, kva ? svātmani . kaḥ ? ghaṭādiḥ . kena ? kumbhakārādibhiriti vyākhyātaḥ
ṣaṣṭhīsamāsārtho'pi vastutaḥ prastute vyāpakatvapradarśanārthamāha --mumukṣubhirātmā svātmani nikṣipyate iti
vartate, kīdṛśa iti cet, karmāmiśraḥ sthāpyate svākāre'viviktaḥ san viviktarūpatvena . tathendro'pī

nindrayorvivekamajānatāṃ puṃsāṃ sākṣāt pradarśyate; yasmād na tadākāravinābhūta indro
ghaṭa iva vikukṣivinābhūtaḥ .
athavā sthāpanāyāṃ nikṣepaḥ sthāpanānikṣepaḥ . na nāmni nikṣipyate, sthāpanāyāmeva nikṣipyate . yato nāmāpi sahārthena tattantrameva . sthānakaraṇajanmānaḥ śabdākārāstadgamyāścārthākārāḥ sarve sthāpanāvipariṇāmavijṛmbhitamātram . tadabhāve
śabdārthayorabhāvādākārāgrahaṇe ca tayoragrahaṇāt .
dravyamapi sthāpanānikṣepa eva ākāramayatvād dravyasya . yathā śrīparṇīdāru
dravyamantarlīnākāraṃ tasya tasyākāraviśeṣasya .
tyādi aviviktaviviktasthānalakṣaṇasthāpanānikṣepātmakatvaṃ jagataḥ pratyakṣīkriyate vyāpitvād lakṣaṇasyāsya,
indrānindrayorvivekamajānatāṃ puṃsāṃ sa indraḥ sākṣāt pradarśyate . kasmāt ? yasmād na tadākāretyādi, nayanaśabdlavarṇatādyākāramantareṇa indrābhāvāt tadākāratattva evendra ityuktatvāt . kimiva ?
ghaṭa iva vikukṣitvādivinābhūtaḥ, yathā ghaṭo vikukṣitvādyākārādṛte nāsti tadātmaka evāsti tathā
indro'pi svākāravinābhūto nāsti tadātmaivāstīti .
athavā sthāpanāyāmityādi saptamīsamāso vā . sthāpanāyāṃ nikṣepo sthāpanānikṣepa iti
evakārārtho draṣṭavyaḥ, tad vyācaṣṭe --na nāmni na śabde nikṣipyate, kiṃ tarhi ? sthāpanāyāmeva nikṣipyate .
kasmāditi cet, ata āha --yato nāmāpi sahārthena tattantrameva, ākāratantra eva śabdo'rthaśca . tad
bhāvayati --sthānakaraṇetyādi, akārādayo varṇāḥ pratiniyatakaṇṭhādisthānākārajanmānaḥ saṅgatyā nairantaryeṇa
uccarantaḥ sup-tiṅntādiviśeṣākārāḥ tadgamyāśca nāmākhyātavācyadravyakriyārthākārāḥ sarve'ntarbhūtākāratattvasthāpanāvipariṇāmavijṛmbhitamātram . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tadabhāva ityādi, ākārābhāve śabdārthayorabhāvādākārāgrahaṇe ca tayoragrahaṇāt .
evaṃ tāvannāmanikṣepaḥ sthāpanānikṣepāntarbhūta uktaḥ . dravyanikṣepo'pi sthāpanāntarbhūta iti brūmaḥ,
tadyathā --dravyamapītyādi, dravyanikṣepo'pi sthāpanānikṣepa eva ākāramayatvād dravyasya, yathā
śrīparṇīdāru dravyaṃ kāraṇamantarlīnākāraṃ tasya tasyākāraviśeṣasya tadavyaktasāmānyavyaktestathā''kārasamparigrahamātramiti sthāpanaiva dravyamapi . evaṃ nāmadravyanikṣepau sthāpanānikṣepa eva .


bhāvo'pi sthāpanaiva . kriyopayogarūpādinīlādiśivakādirūpabhedo bhāva
ākāra eva .
akṣādyasadbhāvasthāpanāyāmapi rūpāntaravyāvartanena rūpāntarākaraṇādabhipretākāravṛtto nāmabuddhyadhyāropastatkarmaṇaḥ dravyārthasthāpanendrasthūṇāvat . etattattvādhyavasāyādeva liṅgasamācāradevatāpratimānamaskaraṇādi loke .
atrāpi viśeṣākāra eva paramārthaḥ . tasyaikabhavanasya sthāpanānikṣepe kārye

bhāvo'pītyādi . bhāvanikṣepo'pi sthāpanaiva āgamato no+āgamataśca, āgamatastatprābhṛtajña
upayukta ityupayukto bhāvaḥ pāriṇāmikaḥ, kṣāyopaśamikaśceṣṭā jīvasya vīryāntarāyakṣayopaśamajo bhāvaḥ,
pudgalānāṃ tu rūpādiryugapadbhāvī pāriṇāmiko bhāvo nīlādirvā tadviśeṣaḥ śivakādirayugapadbhāvī vā ityevamādirūpā bhedā yasya so'yaṃ kriyopayogarūpādinīlādiśivakādirūpabhedo bhāvaḥ . sa ākāra
eva, ābhavanameva pūrvoktavidhinā .
evaṃ nikṣepatrayaṃ sthāpanānikṣepa eva saṅkṣepato rūpāntaravyāvartanena rūpāntarākaraṇātmakasthāpanāsvarūpānatikramāt . etallakṣaṇānugṛhītatvādasadbhāvasthāpanā'vyaktākārā satī sthāpanetyāpādayitukāmaḥ parāśaṅkānivṛttyarthamāha --akṣādyasadbhāvetyādi . atrāpi rūpāntaraṃ ced vyāvartya rūpāntaraṃ nā''kuryāt rūpāntarasya
indrāderakṣanikṣepapratipādyasyāvarodhaḥ pratipattirna syāt, bhavati tu . tasmādaviruddho'bhipretākāre vṛtto
nāmnā śabdena indraḥ iti buddhyā vādhyāropaḥ tatkarmaṇaḥ akṣanikṣepasthāpanākarmaṇaḥ, kimiva ? dravyārthasthāpanendrasthūṇāvat, yathā rūpāntaravyāvṛttyā rūpāntararā ?karaṇād dravyārthasthāpanendrārthā sthūṇā
indrastathā'kṣādiriti .
etattattvādhyavasāyādeva liṅga-samācāra-devatāpratimānamaskaraṇādi loke, naitadupapattyā
pratipādyaṃ sthāpanaiva sarvam iti, loke rūḍhatvāt . tathāhi--pāṣaṇḍināṃ liṅgagrahaṇāni yathāgamamākāraviśeṣaprasiddhestatsahacāriṇo niyamā arhadrudrendrabuddhādidevatāpratimāsthāpanāni tannamaskārajapastutibalimālyādibhirabhyarcanāni ca prativiśiṣṭākāranibandhanāni dṛṣṭāni, na hi dṛṣṭād gariṣṭhaṃ pramāṇamastītyevaṃ
sthāpanādravyārthanayamatamuktam .
atrāpītyādi . asyāpi nayasyottaramidam . ākāro'pi dvividhaḥ--sāmānyākāro viśeṣākāraśca .
tatra viśeṣākāraḥ svarūpameva paramārthaḥ, na sāmānyākāraḥ . tasya paramārthasya ekabhavanasya sthāpanānikṣepe
kārye sāmānyākāradravyārtha upasarjanaṃ pradhānasya paramārthasya sadbhāvasyā'sadbhāva upakāritvāt, pāṇyaṅguli

sāmānyākāradravyārtha upasarjanam . paramārthatastu avikalpyatattvatvād na pāṇyādīni svarūpataḥ . kutasteṣāṃ sthāpanā dravyataḥ ?
kṣetrato yugapadbhāviparyāyeṣu viśeṣavyatirekeṇārthābhāvād nāsti sthāpanā .
kālato bālādyayugapadbhāviparyāyeṣvapi viśeṣavyatirekeṇārthābhāvāt kathaṃ sthāpanā
kriyatāṃ kasya vā ? asadbhāvasthāpanāyāśca dravyārthatvāt sadbhāvasthāpanāyāśca paryāyārthatvāt dravyārthaprādhānye itaranirākaraṇam . yo'pi nāmabuddhyadhyāropa uktaḥ
so'pi nāmadravyārthaparyāyārthayorviṣayaḥ . sa ca viśeṣabhavanameva . dravyadravyārthastu
vidhyādibhaṅgeṣu vyākhyāto dūṣitaḥ .
itastu bhāvayuktavācī śabdaḥ, nāmasthāpanādravyavācyeṣṭākaraṇāt . sthitamevam... ... ...yugapattattvam .
tvak-parva-sandhi-varṇa-rekhā-'vayava-paramāṇu-rūpādibhedeṣviva pratyekaṃ viśeṣatattvabhavanasya itaradupasarjanam .
paramārthatastu tadatyantaviśeṣe tattvamavikalpyamasti, na tāni pāṇyādīni svarūpataḥ, kutasteṣāṃ sthāpanā
dravyataḥ ? tathā kṣetrato yugapadbhāviparyāyeṣu viśeṣavyatirekeṇārthābhāvād nāsti sthāpanā, ākāra
ābhavanamākārye ākartari vārthe nāsti sthāpanāyā ākāratvāt . kālato'pyayugapadbhāviparyāyeṣu bālādiṣvekamekaṃ viśeṣabhavanaṃ paramārthaḥ, tad bhāvayati --bālādyayugapadbhāvītyādi yāvat kathaṃ sthāpanā kriyatāṃ
kasya vā ? iti gatārtham .
kiñcānyat, sadbhāvasthāpanāyāḥ paryāyārthatvādasadbhāvasthāpanāyā dravyārthamātratvāt te dve prarūpayatā
tvayā paryāyārthaprādhānyāvalambitvamitthaṃ nirākṛtam, dravyārthaprādhānye vā paryāyā nirākṛtā akṣādyasadbhāvetyādinā grantheneti tad darśayati --asadbhāvasthāpanāyāścetyādi yāvaditaranirākaraṇam .
yo'pi nāmabuddhyadhyāropa uktaḥ abhipretākāravṛtta ityādi so'pi nayāntarayornāmadravyārthaparyāyārthayorviṣayaḥ . tatra nāmadravyārthaviṣayo nāmādhyāropaḥ, paryāyārthaviṣayo buddhyadhyāropaḥ --āgamato
jāṇa+e uva+utte bhāvasāmā+iyaṃ   ti . sa ca viśeṣabhavanameva . dravyadravyārthastvityādi
atikrānteṣu vidhyādibhaṅgeṣu dravyadravyārtho vyākhyāto dūṣitaḥ punarna vācyaḥ .
itastu bhāvetyādi, asmiṃśca śabdanaye ubhayaniyamabhaṅgalakṣaṇe viśeṣa evaiko bhavatīti śabdārthavyākhyānena dravyadravyārthavācyaṃ nāmasthāpanādravyārthavācyaṃ ceṣṭaṃ na karotīti bhāvitameva . ato nayasvarūpamupanayati --sthitamevamityādi yāvad yugapattattvamiti .


kriyāphalāvisaṃvādo'pi ca viśeṣaikabhavanādeva . tadyuktaṃ nāmādivyavahāramaṅgīkṛtya kriyā pravartate . nāgninā śabdena pacyate na ca citralikhitena, tayorvyavahārākṣamatvāt, kiṃ tarhi ? tathāvṛttibhāvenaiva . mānamapi na yathā mānaprasthakena
tathā tannāmnā .
nāmapratyayanāmakarmatattvāt tenaiveti cet, na, cetanabhedaniyatapṛthivyāditattvābhāve yogavakratādivipariṇāmāpravṛtteḥ phalābhāvād nāmakarmādyanupapatteḥ .
na ca citralikhitāgniprasthakābhyāṃ dahanamāne tayorvyavahārākṣamatvāt .
dravyamapi ca bhavyaṃ tathā tathā bhāve eva ghaṭate, tvanmate dravyabhavane tu na .
tathā prasphuṭam agnirdravyam iti puṃnapuṃsakayorbhāvabhede sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dṛṣṭam .

etasya darśanasya lokasaṃvyavahāravyāpitāṃ darśayati --kriyā-phalāvisaṃvādo'pi cetyādi . aihikamodanādi pacikriyādeḥ sthālīkāṣṭhādisādhanāyāḥ phalam, āmuṣmikaṃ svargādi dānāderodanādisādhanāyāḥ phalam, na tatra kāṣṭhasthālyādīni nāmamātrāṇi na citralikhitāni vā, kintu tathābhūtāni
pacebhāgadhicerbhāgadheyāni tānyeva viśeṣaikabhavanāni . tadyuktaṃ nāma-citrakāṣṭhādivyavahāramaṅgīkṛtya
bhāvabhavanaṃ kriyā pravartate . nāgninā śabdena pacyate, na cetyādi bhāvitārthaṃ yāvanna yathā mānaprasthakena tathā tannāmneti .
nāmapratyayanāmakarmatattvāt tenaiveti cet . syānmatam--prāguktacaitanyanāmapratyayāyattaṃ nāmakarma,
tattattvāni kāṣṭhādīni, atastenaiva nāmnā loke vyavahāra iti . etacca na, cetanabhedetyādi yāvad
nāmakarmādyanupapatteriti, atrāpi cetanabhedeṣu yāni pṛthivyāditattvāni niyatāni tathābhūtiyogye

nāmakarma ? kutaḥ kāṣṭhādivanaspatipṛthivyagnyāditiryakśarīratvādīni ? ato viśeṣaikabhavanameva kriyā-phalādivyavahārahetuḥ na nāmaśabda iti suṣṭhūktam . tathā citrakarmetyata āha --na ca citralikhitāgni-prasthakābhyāṃ
dahana-māne tayorvyavahārākṣamatvāt, tathāvṛttibhāvasyaiva vyavahārakṣamatvāt .
dravyamapi ca bhavyaṃ tathā tatheti . dravyaṃ ca bhavye pā॰ 5 . 3 . 104, bhavati iti
bhavyaṃ tena tena prakāreṇa lokavyavahārakṣameṇa bhavanād bhāva eva ghaṭate, tvanmate dravyabhavane tu na,
agniprasthakādi sarvamekabhāva eva bhūtaṃ dravyārthābhedāt ko dravyaśabdenātyantaviruddhārthena bhedavācinā
tathā tathā bhavanārthena sambandhaḥ ?
asminnarthe nidarśanamāha --tathā prasphuṭamityādi . agnirdravyam iti puṃnapuṃsakayorbhāvabhede
sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ dṛṣṭam, nānyathā tat . syānmatam--dravyaśabdasya dārusamānādhikaraṇatvād napuṃsakaṃ

dāruprasthakatvādvā samānādhikaraṇīkaraṇād dāruṇyapi sa nāvatiṣṭheta . tathābhūta...
... ...dahano'gniḥ .
evaṃ pratipadārthaṃ bhāvanikṣepaḥ śabdanayasyāsyoktaḥ, na yatharjusūtram . atra ca
śabdārtho'pyasatyopādhisatyaḥ . yathoktam--asatyopādhi yat satyaṃ tadvā śabdanibandhanam vākyapa॰ 2 . 128 .
viśeṣā upādhayaḥ kuṇḍalādayo vikārā asatyā yasya satyasya sarvabhedānuyāyinaḥ suvarṇādeḥ sāmānyasya tadabhidhīyate viśeṣairiva sāmānyam . sate hitaṃ
prasthaka iti; etaccāyuktam, yasmād dāruprasthakatvādvā samānādhikaraṇīkaraṇād dāruṇyapi sa
nāvatiṣṭhetetyatiprasaṅgadoṣaḥ . katham ? yathā dravyatvād dāruprasthakatvābhedastathā dravyatvāt pṛthivyudakādyabheda iti doṣa eva . svamate tu doṣābhāvo guṇotkarṣaścetyata āha --tathābhūtetyādi gatārthaṃ yāvad
dahano'gniḥ .
uktārthanigamanam --evaṃ pratipadārthaṃ sarvapadārtheṣu bhāvanikṣepaḥ śabdanayasyāsyoktaḥ, na

na bhavatīti śabdamataṃ darśitam ॥
atra cetyādi . śabdārtho'pyasatyopādhisatyaḥ, nānantaranayanirdiṣṭo'nyāpohaḥ . yathoktamiti
śiṣṭāntaramataṃ ca darśayati --asatyopādhi yat satyaṃ tadvā śabdanibandhanamiti . tadvyācaṣṭe --viśeṣā
upādhaya ityādi tadīya eva grantho yāvat tadabhidhīyata iti . suvarṇaprakṛtyupamarde kuṇḍalavikārasya
viśeṣasyāsatyasya sāmānyavādimate satyaṃ prakṛtiḥ sāmānyaṃ pratipādyam . tathā puruṣādisāmānyasya pratipādakā viśeṣā upādhayaste te prakṛtipuruṣeśvarāḥ svāgameṣu . viśeṣairiva sāmānyamiti pratipādanasādharmyeṇa

coktavat, vāgvisargakālopalakṣaṇanakṣatradarśanaśrutivat . anyathā tacchabdārthatāyāṃ

adhunā svamataṃ tena samīkurvan bhāvayati --bhavadvyāpītyādi . rūpādiśivakādiparyāyā vṛttirasya

ghaṭaḥ ityādipravṛttayastadābhāḥ rūpādiśivakādiparyāyatattvābhāsāḥ . tadvastuvyāpivadābhāsate sāmānyam,
tadviśeṣaḥ paramārthaḥ san .
evameva cetyādi etaddarśanasaṃvādīdamiti jñāpakametena lakṣaṇena saṅgṛhītaṃ yāvadānīyatāmiti .

gṛhārthapratipādanārthatvāt kākārtha eva san gṛhārtha ityucyate tathā uditasvārthavat jātiśabdo viśeṣārtha
iti . tadvacanena tadarthatvaprakāreṇa vacanena uktamapi viśeṣavastu uktena tulyamuktavat na paramārthata uktameva tad gamyate i ?tyādi jātigatānāṃ sattā-dravya-pṛthivī-mṛd-ghaṭa-kuṇḍa-kuṇḍikādiliṅgasaṅkhyādīnāṃ saṃvādināṃ visaṃvādināṃ ca yā sāmānādhikaraṇyagatistayā nirūpitaṃ yādṛcchikamarthavattvamanarthikāyā
eva satyāstasyāḥ . sāpi coktavaditi, tasyā api jāterabhihitanyāyena parārthatvādarthavattvam, anarthakatvaṃ
svārthena . kimiva ? vāgvisargakālopalakṣaṇanakṣatradarśanaśrutivat, yathā nakṣatraṃ dṛṣṭvā vāco visṛjanti

paśyatiḥ svārthe eva vartate tathā jātiśabdo viśeṣārtha iti . anyathā mukhyanyāyena tacchabdārthatāyā

punaruktadoṣād viśeṣaśabdāprayoga eva syāt .
ata eva niyamārthā punaḥ punaḥ śrutiḥ, tadarthatvāt pūrvaśruteḥ . niyamaḥ svārthavyavasthāpanam . sañcāri caitat, dravyanaya... ... .... yugapadayugapat... ... .... yāvacca
... ... ...tāvat sarvamanena śabdanayaśabdārthena vyāptam . evameva ca viśeṣapradhānaśabdārthavyavasthāpanārthamidamapi--na jātiśabdo bhedānāmānantyād vyabhicārataḥ .vācako niyamārthokterjātimadvadapohavān ॥
mityādi, punaruktadoṣāt sāmānyaśabdenoktatvād viśeṣaśabdāprayoga eva syāt, uktārthānāmaprayogaḥ
pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 2 . 1 . 1 iti nyāyāt .
ata evetyādi . satyavṛttyā nokto viśeṣaḥ, upādhivṛttyokto'pyanukta eva . niyamārthā punaḥ
punaḥ śrutirvivakṣitārthā, kasmāt ? tadarthatvād viśeṣarthatvād viśeṣaṇārthatvāt pūrvaśruteḥ sāmānyaśruteḥ
brāhmaṇādeḥ . tasmācchravaṇakālakrameṇa punaḥ śrutiriti viśeṣaśabda ucyate . ko'sau niyamo nāma ? ityucyate --niyamaḥ svārthavyavasthāpanaṃ vivakṣite'rthe'vadhāraṇam . sañcāri caitaditi, na punastat sāmānyaśabdena uktavaduktaṃ vastu vyavasthitameva, kiṃ tarhi ? sañcāri viśeṣaparamparayā . tatra kāraṇaṃ sañcaraṇe
dravyanayetyādi, evaṃsamavasthasyārthasya sattvāt .
kiṃ punaḥ satyamiti cet, yugapadayugapadityādi . tasya viśeṣasya pradhānasya pratyāyyasya pratyāyakatvena upasarjanamātrapravṛttirasatyopādhirarthaḥ, taddarśayati --yāvaccetyādi gatārtham tāvat sarvamanena śabdanayaśabdārthena vyāptamiti .
evameva cetyādi etannyāye vyāptipradarśanadvāreṇa darśanāntaraṃ nirācikīrṣurāha . viśeṣapradhānaśabdārthavyavasthāpanārthamidamapīti tadvicāravastusūtram--

na jātiśabdo bhedānāmānantyād vyabhicārataḥ .
vācako niyamārthokterjātimadvadapohavān ॥ iti .

ye doṣāste'nyāpohābhidhāne'pīti pratijñā .
