na dravyādayaḥ, tathāhi--vṛkṣavadbhedeṣu saṃśayo dṛṣṭo'rthatastu dravyādiṣu niścayaḥ . svasambandhānurūpyāttviti,
yasmādasau tajjātīye dṛśyamāno'rthāntaranivṛttidvāreṇaiva dṛṣṭo'bhidhāyakaḥ prāgevānyatrādṛśyamānastasmāt
sambandhānurūpyāt tadviśiṣṭamevārthamāha . anekadharmā śabdo'pi sāmānyadharmaiḥ khaguṇatvādibhirvṛkṣārthaṃ
tasmin vastuni nābhidhatte, tathāhi--te vināpi vṛkṣārthena rasādiṣu dṛṣṭāḥ, na tu vṛkṣaśabdo'nyatra dṛṣṭaḥ,
tasmād vṛkṣaśabdenaiva pratyāyanamupapannamityuktā svapakṣasiddhāvupapattiḥ . pūrvadoṣābhāvaśca, yasmācchruteḥ
sambandhasaukaryam bahutve'pi tulyātulyayorvṛttyavṛttī, sambandhasaukaryād na cāpi vyabhicāritā bhedānabhidhānāt . evaṃ tāvad bhedābhidhāne ye doṣā uktāste parihṛtā iti anyāpohavādipakṣaḥ .
ācāryo'syāpi dūṣaṇaṃ vaktukāmaḥ prāk tāvat tatra yadidaṃ śrutisambandhasaukaryamucyata iti parihārabījameva dūṣayitumāha --etadayuktam, yata ityādi yāvad na ghaṭete iti . yasmāt tāvanvayavyatirekāvapīha na ghaṭete, dūrata eva yāvarthābhidhānahetū tulyātulyavṛttyavṛttibhyāṃ bhavata ityabhimatau . tasmādayuktaṃ
sambandhasaukaryamiti pratijñānam . tadupapādanārthamāha --anyāpohārthanairmūlyādityādi ślokaḥ . apohārthā-
bhāvāt sambandhābhāvaḥ, svārthagandhasyāpyadarśanāt saṃśayabījamapi nāsti, kuto vyabhicārāśaṅketyupanyāsaḥ .


sa kimanyo'rthaḥ sa eva bhavati utānyo na bhavati ? yadi tāvat sa eva
bhavati tatastacchabdotpādyavijñānaviṣaye'vyāvṛttyā'nyākhye'rthe vidhinaiva pratipanne
kimapohena kriyate, arthapratītervṛttatvāt . tadā hyarthāpattyā tadanyayorubhayorapi
tattvaṃ svataḥ siddham . tasmāt syādapyanayoranyāpohapratyayaḥ, asatyopādhisatyaśabdārthatvāt .
athānyo na bhavati tato'pi praśnāvyavasthā . anyatvasya cobhayaviṣayatvāt
tadagrahe ko'sāvanyaḥ ? kuto vā anyo na bhavatītyucyate ?

tato yadidamuktaṃ codyapakṣa eva arthāntarāpohena svārthābhidhāne iti, atra arthāntaraṃ nāma
anyo'rtha iti yasmād bhavati tasmāt tat tāvad vicāryate --sa kimanyo'rthaḥ sa eva bhavati
vidhinānyākhyo'rtha ucyate utānyo na bhavatītyapohena ? iti dvayī kalpanā syāt . tatra yadi tāvad
matam--anya iti sa evānyākhyo bhavatīti tataḥ saḥ iti śabdenotpādyate yad vijñānaṃ tasya vijñānasya
svārtho'bhidheya evānyākhyo'rthaḥ viṣayaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ sa eva . tataśca tasminnavyāvṛttyā'nyākhye'rthe vidhinaiva
pratipanne kimapohena kriyate ? nārtho'pohenetyarthaḥ . kasmāt ? arthapratītervṛttatvāt, arthapratītyartho hi
śabdaprayogaḥ, anyāpohakalpanā ca tadabhidhānasvarūpaparijñānārthā tadarthapratītau vyarthā sā .
athāpi syādanyāpohena prayojanamitthaṃ syād nānyathā . tadyathā --tadā tasmin vidhinānyavijñānakāle yadyanyo bhavati tataḥ sa na bhavati, atha sa bhavati anyo na bhavatīti arthādāpannaṃ tadanyayorubhayorapi
tattvam . tacca svata eva siddham . tasmāt syādapyanayostadanyayoranyāpohapratyayaḥ . sa copasarjano vidhirna
bhavitumarhati, kasmāt ? asatyopādhisatyaśabdārthatvāt . itthamanyapratipattirvidhireva, na vyāvṛttiḥ .
atha anyo na bhavati, atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa ityanyo na bhavatīti tasyāpyanyākhyasyārthasya
anyavyāvṛttireva anyo na bhavati iti syāt svarūpam . tataḥ kim ? tato'pi praśnāvyavasthā,
so'pi yo'nyo na bhavatītyucyamāno'rthaḥ kiṃ sa eva bhavati, uta anyo na bhavati ? iti pṛcchyase tvam .
tatra yadi sa eva bhavatīti brūyāstvaṃ pūrvavad vidhirarthaḥ . athānyo na bhavati so'pi anyastathā praṣṭavyo
yo'nyo na bhavatītyucyate tato'pyanyaḥ praṣṭavya iti praśnānavasthā . kasmāt ? sarvatrāsyākṣepasya tulyatvāduktavat . kiñcānyat, anyatvasya cobhayaviṣayatvāt, anya iti sa ucyate'nyāpekṣayā so'pi
etadapekṣayā ayamasmādanyo'yamasmādanyaḥ iti tayordvayorapi svarūpataḥ siddhau dviṣṭhaṃ sadanyatvaṃ sidhyati .
tatastasya anyatvasya ubhayaviṣayatvāt tadagrahe ko'sāvanyaḥ ? tayoranyākhyayorvidhirūpeṇāgrahaṇe ko'sāvanyo nāma yadapohādanyāpohaḥ syāt ? kuto vā anyo na bhavati iti ucyate yato'syānyasyānyatvaṃ sidhyet ? yato'nyo yo'nyaḥ ityetaddviṣṭhatvādanyatvasya nirdhāryametadanyatvam, nānyathā nirdhārayituṃ
śakyamityabhiprāyaḥ .


evaṃ tu na sa kaścidartho bhavitā . ubhayato'pyabhāvaprasaṅgāt svārthasyāṃśo'pi
na dṛśyata eva . anyo na bhavati ityucyamāne ubhayato'pyabhāvādanyavyāvṛtterabhavanaparamārthatvādabhūtasvānyatvād vandhyāputravadaviṣaya eva . sa ca nibandhanamanyāpohasya syāt .
athocyeta--anyo'pyananyo na bhavati . yadyanya ityananyo na bhavati
tato'nyasyaivānuvadanāt ko'sāvanyo'nanyo nāma anyānyatvatadananyatvātulyaḥ
śabdārthaḥ ? anyaśabdārthasya ca ananyaśabdārthād bhinnatve'nya ityananyo na bhavatītyapohārthaḥ syāt, atulye'nyasminnavṛtteḥ .

evaṃ tvityādi . itthamuktanyāyena na sa kaścidartho bhavitā na kadācit tādṛgvidho bhavati,
anyo'pyanyo na bhavati so'pi sa na bhavatīti ubhayato'pyabhāvaprasaṅgāt svārthasyāṃśo'pi
gandho'pi na dṛśyata eveti .
asyārthasya bhāvanā --anyo na bhavati ityucyamāne kiṃ sampravṛttam ? ubhayato'pi na
bhavati, na bhavati ityanyasya vyāvṛttireva, na kaścid vidhigandho'pītyato'nyavyāvṛtteḥ hetoḥ abhavanameva paramārthaḥ, tatparamārthatvādātmānyatvābhāvaḥ . tataśca abhūtasvānyatvād vandhyāputravadaviṣaya
eva, na hi vandhyāputrādirabhāvaḥ śabdārtho bhavitumarhati . sa ca abhāvaste'nyāpohasya nibandhanaṃ prāptaḥ .
tataścāpratipattireva syācchabdārthasya, atyantābhāvanibandhanatvāt, vandhyāputrāpratipattivat . evaṃ tāvad
yadi sa eva bhavati, anyo na bhavati iti ca vikalpayorvidhivādaprasaṅgo'nyāpohanairmūlyaṃ coktau doṣau .
atha taddoṣadvayaparihārārtham athocyeta--anyo'pyananyo na bhavati, anya iti na sa eva bhavati
nāpyanyo na bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ? tato'nyasmādanyo'nanyo na bhavati, anyāpohaśabdārthavyāpitvād
vyāvṛttyaiva gamayati, ato na vidhiprasaṅgo nābhāvamātratā veti . atrocyate --yadyanya iti ananyo
na bhavati tato'nyasyaiva anuvadanādityādi yāvadatulye'nyasminnavṛtterityuttarapakṣaḥ . kimuktaṃ
bhavati ? yo'yamanyaḥ so'nya eva san anyaḥ ucyate, sa evānanya eva, svayameva bhavati paramanapekṣyetyarthaḥ .
tataḥ kim ? tato yo'sāvananyo nāma so'nya eva, sa evānyākhyaḥ anyaḥ san ananyaḥ ityuktaṃ bhavati .
tasmāt tasyaiva anyatvasya ananyaśabdenāpi anuvadanāt ko'sāvanyaḥ pṛthak tato'nyasmādananyo nāma ?
nāstītyarthaḥ . yadi syāt parāpekṣaḥ syāditi nirūpayati --anyānyatva-tadananyatvātulyaḥ śabdārtha
iti, anyasmādanyaḥ anyānyaḥ, tadbhāvo'nyānyatvam, tasmād bhinnena ananyatvenātulyo'nyānyatvāt
ko'sau anyānyatva-tadananyatvātulyaḥ śabdārthaḥ ? yathā vaidharmyeṇa ghaṭaḥ ityukte ghaṭānyānya-tadananyātulyo


yo'sau tadatattvātulyaḥ sa ātmānyatvānyaḥ san anyaḥ ityucyate .
atulyaṃ hi ghaṭasyānyatvaṃ paṭādasmādanyasmāt . na hi ghaṭasya paṭāditarānyatvavadanyatvam, paṭasya vā ghaṭādanyatvaṃ ghaṭānyatvavat . yathoktadviṣṭhatvatulyatāyāmapi tata
evātmānanyatvaṃ tattvam . na hi ghaṭasya tasmādeva ghaṭāt paṭānanyatvavadananyatvam .
nanvevaṃ so'pi anyasmādanya eva bhavannanyaḥ sannananyo bhavati . tadananyatvaṃ
tattvamapohamāno'nyāpohastadapoha eva bhavatīti svavacanādyaśeṣapakṣavirodhāpattiḥ .
dṛśyate paṭādirapohyo ghaṭaśabdena na tatheha kaścidananyaśabdena bhinno'nanyo'sti yato'syānyasyānyānyasmād bhinnasya paṭavadavṛttiḥ syāt, anyonyāpekṣatvādanyatvasya, sa ca nāstīttham . kiñcānyat—
anyaśabdārthasya cetyādi anyāpohe nyāyaṃ darśayati . yadā cānyaśabdārthādananyaśabdārtho bhinno
bhavati tasmāccānyaśabdārthastadā anyaḥ ityukte ananyo na bhavati ityapohārtho vidherbhinnaḥ syāt .
kiṃ kāraṇam ? atulye'nyasminnavṛtterghaṭapaṭavat . na tu asti, anyasyaivānyasyānanyatvāt . tasmāt
svārthāpoha eva syāt .
itara āha--syādetadevaṃ yadyanya evānyatve sthito'nya ucyeta parāpekṣānyatvāt ananyaḥ sa evānya
iti . kiṃ tarhi ? svāpekṣānyatva eva anyaḥ ityucyate . tadbhāvayitukāma āha --yo'sāvityādi yāvad
ghaṭāt paṭānanyatvavadananyatvamiti . yo'sau tasya anyasya atadbhāvena atattvenātulya ātmīyena sa
svato'nyasmādevānyasmādātmānyatvānyaḥ ātmānyatvānyaḥ san anyaḥ ityucyate . nidarśanam --atulyaṃ hi
ghaṭasyānyatvaṃ paṭādasmādanyasmāt, na hi ghaṭasyetyādinā ghaṭānyatvasya paṭānyatvenāsaṅkaraṃ darśayati yāvaditarānyatvavadanyatvam, paṭasya vetyādinā paṭānyatvasya ghaṭānyatvāsaṅkaraṃ yāvad ghaṭānyatvavaditi
bhāvitārtham . eṣa dṛṣṭāntaḥ .
ayamarthopanayaḥ --yathoktadviṣṭhatvatulyatāyāmapītyādi . tvaduktā taddviṣṭhatvādanyatāparasparāpekṣatā, tasyāṃ tulyāyāmapītaretarāpekṣānyatāyāṃ tata eva svata evātmano'nanyatvaṃ tattvam, sa
eva ghaṭo'nanyaḥ . śeṣaḥ pūrveṇa tulyo'nyatvabhāvanāgranthenāsaṅkarapradarśanagranthaḥ . tasmādanyatvamapi svata eva
ananyatvamapi tatheti vyavasthite bhavatyanyāpoha iti .
atrocyante tava doṣāḥ --nanvevamityādi yāvat svavacanādyaśeṣapakṣavirodhāpattiriti . nanu
ityatrānujñāpayati param . nanvitthaṃ so'pi yo'nyaḥ anyasmādanyasvarūpāt svata eva siddhānyatvādanyākhyādarthādanya eva bhavannanyaḥ sannananyo bhavati sa eva bhavati . tasya anyasya svātmani vyavasthitasya tadananyatvaṃ

anyāpoha iti cānanyāpoho na bhavatītyapi na parihāra eva, anyāpoha
ityananyābhāvāpoho na bhavatīti yato'rthāntarāpohena svārthāpohe vṛttyārthe'nyaviśiṣṭo'pohaḥ . yathā apoha ityanapoho na bhavati tathānyaviśeṣaṇāpoha-
tattvamātmatvamapohamāno'nyāpohastadapoha eva bhavati svāpoha eva nānyāpohastvadiṣṭaḥ parāpoha ityarthaḥ .
itītthaṃ svavacanavirodhaḥ anyāpohaḥ iti vacanāt . tathābhyupagamādabhyupagamavirodhaḥ . lokavirodhaścetthaṃ
loke dṛṣṭatvāt svārthapratīteḥ . tathā pratyakṣadarśanāt pratyakṣavirodhaḥ . anumānavirodhaścaivamanumānāt .
ityaśeṣāḥ pakṣadoṣā āpannāḥ . vidhivādāpattiścaivamiti . evaṃ tāvad vastuno lakṣaṇānusāreṇa dūṣaṇamuktam .
syānmatam--anyāpohaśabdārthānusāracchāyāmātreṇa pariharāmīti . tadyathā --anyāpoha iti ca
ananyāpoho na bhavatīti, anyaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭāpohasya ananyaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭāpohaḥ pratipakṣaḥ, sa na
bhavatītyarthaḥ . sa cānyo'nyasmāt . ato'nyāpoha evātrāpīti .
atrocyate --ityapi na parihāra eva . kasmāt ? anyāpoha iti ananyābhāvāpoho na
bhavatīti yataḥ arthāntarāpohena svārthāpohe vṛttyārthe'nyaviśiṣṭo'poha iti . kimuktaṃ bhavati ?
ananyasyābhāvo'nyaḥ anyasya vā'bhāvo'nanyaḥ pratipakṣaḥ . tadvadapohasyānapohaḥ pratipakṣaḥ anapohasyāpoha
iti bhavati . taṃ dṛṣṭāntatvena nyāyaṃ darśayati --yathā apoha ityanapoho na bhavatīti, tathānyaviśeṣaṇā-
pohapradarśanārthamityādi dārṣṭāntikam . kimuktaṃ bhavati ? yathā apohaḥ ityukte anapoho na bhavati iti
padārthe dviḥpratiṣedhaprakṛtyāpādanādapoha evārtho bhavati tathā anyaviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭasyāpohasya pradarśanārtham
anyāpohaḥ ityukte'nyasyābhāvo'nanyaḥ, so'rtho'syeti anyābhāvārtho'nyaśabdaḥ, tadbhāvo'nyābhāvārthānyaśabdatā, satyāṃ ca tasyāmanyābhāvārthānyaśabdatāyām anyāpohaḥ ityananyābhāvasyānanyāpohasya
tadvyāvṛtteḥ apoho na bhavati ityeṣo'rthaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ . tasya cedananyābhāvasyānanyasyāpoho na bhavati na
tarhi ananyānapoho na bhavati tatpratipakṣatvādanyānapohasyeti yathā viśeṣyavipakṣavyāvṛttistatheha etasmin
anyo na bhavati ityanyaśabdārthe tvadīye anyāpohaḥ ityananyābhāvasyāpoho na bhavati,
svasyānanyasyābhāvo'nyo'nanyābhāvaḥ, tasyāpoho na bhavatītyanyāpoha eva na bhavati, ananyāpohaḥ svāpoha
evetyananyābhāvārthaḥ . sa cāniṣṭaste śabdānusāreṇāpi doṣaḥ prāptaḥ . syānmatam--anyasyaivāpoho nānanyasya
ityavadhāraṇādadoṣa iti . tacca na, yasmāt tatrāpi ko'nyaḥ ? ko'nanyaḥ ? ko'pohaḥ ? ko'napohaḥ ? iti
vicāraṇāyāmananyābhāva eva uktavadanavadhāraṇāt anyasyaiva nānanyasya iti vidhivādāpatteḥ ananyasyāpoha
eva nānapohaḥ iti svasyāpohānapohābhyāmavadhāraṇānavadhāraṇābhyāṃ vidhipratiṣedhādanyānanyavicāre ca

pradarśanārthamanyāpoha ityukte'nyābhāvārthānyaśabdatāyām anyāpohaḥ ityananyābhāvasyāpoho na bhavati . ananyāpohaḥ svāpoha eva .
evaṃ prakrame'pi ca na sa kaścidartho bhaviteti svārthasyāṃśo'pi na dṛśyata eva .
ananyo na bhavati ityucyamāne ubhayato'pyabhāvādananyavyāvṛtterabhavanaparamārthatvādabhūtasvānanyatvād vandhyāputravadaviṣaya eva . sa ca nibandhanamanyāpohasya syāt .
yeṣāmapi cārthāntarāṇāmapohena svārthābhidhānaṃ tatra yat tadarthāntaraṃ tat kiṃ
bhavadevāpohyata utābhavat ? yadi tāvad bhavadarthāntaraṃ bhavati tatastacchabdotpādyavijñānaviṣaye'vyāvṛttyā siddhe vidhivṛttaikagatigurutarapratipattyātmake bahutaraviṣaye
vidhivāde pratipanne kimapohena punaḥ kriyate, arthapratītervṛttatvāt . tadā hyarthāpattyā
vidhiprasaṅgāt sarvathānyāpohe nairmūlyamityayamapi na niḥsaraṇopāyaḥ . sthitametat --ananyābhāvasya apoho
na bhavatīti yato'rthāntarāpohena svārthābhidhāne na syāt .
evaṃ prakrame'pi cetyādi . evamāpāditaśabdārthanyāye'pi ca na sa kaścidityādināpohanairmūlyamāpādayannupasaṃharati pūrvānyavikalpadūṣāvad viparyayeṇānanyavikalpadūṣaṇaṃ yāvadabhūtasvānanyatvād vandhyāputravadaviṣaya eva, sa ca nibandhanamanyāpohasya syāditi gatārtham .
yeṣāmapi cārthāntarāṇāmityādi . yadapyuktam arthāntarāpohena svārthābhidhāne iti, atra
arthāntarāṇi arthebhyo'nyāni teṣāmarthāntarāṇāṃ madhye yat tadarthāntaraṃ so'rthādanyo'rthaḥ tat kim ? iti
pūrvavad vikalpadvayam . bhavadevārthāntaramapohyata utābhavat ? iti praśnaḥ . yadi tāvadityādi prathamavikalpe dūṣaṇam, sa eva bhavannartho'rthāntaratve sthitaḥ sa bhavatīti cediṣṭastacchabdotpādyavijñānaviṣayaḥ,
tasya viṣayasya siddhatvāt, tasminnavyāvṛttyā siddhe sā ca pratipattirasmadiṣṭāyā vidhivṛttaikagaterlaghīyasyā
ekārthaviṣayāyā garīyasī teṣāmarthānāṃ bhūyasāṃ pratipattiḥ, sa ca vidhivāda eva bhūyorthaviṣayo garīyaḥpratipattyātmakaśca, tasmiṃśca vidhivṛttaikagatigurutarapratipattyātmake bahutaraviṣaye vidhivāde pratipanne
kimapohena punaḥ kriyate, sarvārthaviṣayasya sa eva iti vidhipratipatteḥ prāgeva vṛttatvāt . tvameva hi
bahutarārthaviṣayaśabdavidhivādī saṃvṛtto'nantārthaśabdavādī cetyataḥ kimapohakalpanayā kriyate ? tadā hyarthāpattyetyādi . svārthaśca vivakṣito'rthaḥ ye cānye'rthā arthāntarāṇi, tadetadubhayaṃ svata eva siddhātmasvabhāvaṃ
vidhinaiva . yat punaratra san ghaṭaḥ ityukte sat ityanugamasāmānyajñānam asannaghaṭaśca na bhavati iti
vyāvṛttisāmānyajñānaṃ ca, tadubhayamarthāpattyā yadi bhavati bhavatu guḍamādhuryavadupasarjanīkṛtātmasvarūpam, ko

svārthārthāntarāṇāṃ tattvaṃ svataḥ siddhamityanugamasāmānyajñānaṃ vyāvṛttisāmānyajñānaṃ
ca yadi bhavati bhavatu, asatyopādhisatyaśabdārthatvāt .
athārthāntaraṃ na bhavati tato'navasthā praśnasya . arthāntarasya cobhayaviṣayatvāt
 tadagrahe kimidamarthāntaram ? kuto vārthāntaraṃ na bhavatītyucyate ?
evaṃ tu na sa kaścidartho bhavitā . ubhayato'pyabhāvaprasaṅgāt svārthasyāṃśo'pi
na dṛśyata eva . arthāntaraṃ na bhavatītyucyamāne ubhayato'pyabhāvādarthāntaravyāvṛtterabhavanaparamārthatvādabhūtasvārthāntaratvād vandhyāputravadaviṣaya eva .  tacca nibandhanamanyāpohasya syāt .
athocyeta--arthāntaramapyanarthāntaraṃ na bhavati . yadyanarthāntaraṃ na bhavati
tato'rthāntaratvasyaivānuvadanāt ko'sāvarthāntarārthāntaratvatadanarthāntaratvātulyaḥ
śabdārthaḥ ? arthāntaraśabdārthasya cānarthāntaraśabdārthād bhinnatve'rthāntaramityanarthāntaraṃ
na bhavatītyapohārthaḥ syāt atulye'nyasminnavṛtteḥ .
yo'sau tadatattvātulyaḥ sa ātmānyatvānyaḥ san arthāntaram ityucyate .
atulyaṃ hi ghaṭasyārthāntaratvaṃ paṭādasmādarthāntarāt . na hi ghaṭasya paṭāditarārthāntaratvavadarthāntaratvam, paṭasya vā ghaṭādarthāntaratvaṃ ghaṭārthāntaratvavat . yathoktadviṣṭhatvatulyatāyāmapi tata eva ātmānarthāntaratvaṃ tattvam . na hi paṭasya tasmādeva paṭād
ghaṭānarthāntaratvavadanarthāntaratvam .
nanvevaṃ tadapyarthāntarādarthāntaram  eva bhavadarthāntaraṃ sadanarthāntaraṃ bhavati .
vārayati ? asatyopādhisatyaśabdārthatvāt pūrvavat . evaṃ tāvad bhavadarthāntaraṃ ced bhavati tata
ukto doṣaḥ .
athārthāntaraṃ na bhavatīti manyase tato'navasthā praśnasya pūrvavyākhyātānyaśabdārthapraśnānavasthānavat . arthāntarasya cobhayaviṣayatvādityādi śeṣam anyatvasya cobhayaviṣayatvāt ityādinā tulyaṃ
yāvat tacca nibandhanamanyāpohasya syāditi .
athocyetetyādi yāvad na bhavatīti pūrvavadeva pūrvapakṣaḥ . uttarapakṣo'pi yadyanarthāntaramityādi
tathaiva yāvadatulye'nyasminnavṛtteriti .
yo'sau tadatattvātulya ityādi pūrvavadeva pūrvapakṣaḥ yāvat tasmādeva paṭād ghaṭānarthāntaravadanarthāntaratvamiti . tatrottarapakṣo nanvevaṃ tadapyarthāntarādarthāntaramityādi yāvadaśeṣapakṣavirodhāpatti

tadanarthāntaratvaṃ tattvamapohamāno'rthāntarāpohastadapoha eva bhavatīti  svavacanādyaśeṣapakṣavirodhāpattiḥ . aparihārastu tulyākṣara eva .
evaṃ tu prakrame na sa kaścidartho bhavitā ubhayato'pyabhāvaprasaṅgādarthāntarasvārthasyāṃśo'pi dṛśyate na sa kaścit . kutaḥ svārthasyāṃśe'pi darśanamiṣṭaṃ tvayā ?
ubhayato'pyabhāvādanyavyāvṛtterabhavanaparamārthatvādabhūtasvānyatvād vandhyāputravadaviṣaya eva . sa ca nibandhanamanyāpohasya syāt .
tadabhāve'nyaśabdārthārthāntaraśabdārthāpohaśabdārthasvārthaśabdārthanairmūlyādanvayavyatirekanairmūlyam, tannairmūlyādanyāpohārthanairmūlyam . tataḥ svārthasyāṃśe'pyadarśanāt
kva so'nvayaḥ ? ke cānye'nantāstadbhedāḥ ? ekasminnapi hi śrutisambandhābhāva eva
svārthābhāvasyoktatvāt . kleśenāpi mahatā na śakyaḥ sambandha itthamāpādayitum .
ato'laṃ sambandhasaukaryeṇa vāṅmātrasāreṇa .
ritīṣadakṣaraviparyāsena gatārthaḥ . aparihārastu tulyākṣara eveti . atra arthāntarāpoha ityanarthāntarāpoho na bhavati iti pūrvavat pareṇa parihāre'bhihite ityapi na parihāra eva anyāpoha ityananyābhāvāpoho na bhavatīti yataḥ ityādiḥ sa eva grantho'trāpi tulyārtha iti na viśeṣya likhyate tathā tu draṣṭavya
ityatidiśyate .
evaṃ tu prakrame na sa ityādiḥ sa eva granthastulyārtho yāvadanyāpohasya syāditi . viśeṣastu
arthāntarasvārthasyāṃśo'pi dṛśyate na sa kaścit, kutaḥ svārthasyāṃ'śe'pi darśanamiṣṭaṃ tvayeti .
taditthaṃ pratipāditamanyāpohārthanairmūlyamupasaṃhriyate --tadabhāve'nyaśabdārthetyādinā . nānyaśabdārthaḥ,
nārthāntaraśabdārthaḥ, nāpohaśabdārthaḥ, na svārthaśabdārthaḥ iti prasaṅgānuprasaṅgāgatānāmeṣāṃ śabdārthānāṃ
nairmūlyam, tannirmūlatvādanvayavyatirekayornairmūlyam, tannairmūlyādanyāpohārthanairmūlyam . yadbalāt tvayocyate —
anvayavyatirekau hi śabdārthasyābhidhāne dvāram, tau ca tulyātulyayorvṛttyavṛttī iti, tayorabhāvādapohārthanairmūlyaṃ svārthasya ca tvadiṣṭasyoktatvāt .
tataḥ svārthasyāṃśe'pyadarśanāt kva so'nvayaḥ ? ke cānye'nantāstadbhedāḥ ? tadabhāvāt
kimānantyena kalpitena yasmādekasminnapi śrutisambandhābhāva eva, svārthābhāvasyoktatvāt . tataśca yat tvayā
kalpyate--svārthasyāṃśe'pi darśanācchruteḥ sambandhasaukaryam pra॰ samu॰, kleśenāpi mahatā na śakyaḥ
sambandha itthamāpādayitum, ato'laṃ sambandhasaukaryeṇa vāṅmātrasāreṇa mahatāpi kleśena durupapādena, tyajyatā

āstāṃ te'vyabhicāritā . yattūktaṃ tvayā--vyabhicārataḥ pra॰ samu॰ 5 . 2 iti .
tatra vidhivāde tadatadātmakasaṃśayajñānasya prāptatvāt kimiva na prāptam ?
atra tūktanyāyena saṃśayādi anāspadam . tadatadbhāvātmakabhāvābhāvātmakaśabdārthatvādasvārthatvādanvayavyatirekaviṣayatvāsatvāt .
athavā--adṛṣṭeranyaśabdārthe svārthasyāṃśe'pyadarśanāt .śruteḥ sambandhadauṣkaryaṃ na nāsti vyabhicāritā ॥
tasya vyākhyā tvanmatavadeva . yathoktam--vṛkṣaśabdasyāvṛkṣa śabdasya vā svābhidheyeṣu
mityarthaḥ . evam--anyāpohārthanairmūlyāt svārthasyāṃśe'pyadarśanāt . āstāṃ te śabdasambandhaḥ ityanena
pādatrayeṇa ślokasya adṛṣṭeranyaśabdārthe svārthasyāṃśe'pi  darśanāt . śruteḥ sambandhasaukaryam ityetat
pādatrayaṃ dūṣitam .
caturthapādena yat tvayoktaṃ na cāsti vyabhicāritā iti sā tāvadāstāṃ svapakṣagatāpohavādinastavāvyabhicāritā viprakṛṣṭatvāt . bhedapakṣe saṃśayadoṣāpādanārthaṃ yattūktaṃ tvayā--vyabhicārata iti,
sacchabdo hi yathā dravye vartate tathā ghaṭādiṣvapīti vyabhicārāt saṃśayaḥ syāt, nābhidhānam
pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ iti . atra brūmaḥ --tatra vidhivāde sa cāsaśca vidheya-vyāvartyau bhāvau, tayostasyātasya ca bhāvasya sambhavo yasyātmā tad bhavati tadatadātmakaṃ saṃśayajñānam, tasya saṃśayajñānasya prāpta-
tvāt kimiva na prāptamabhidhānaṃ niścayo viparyayo vā'nadhyavasāyo vā ? sarvaṃ prāptamityarthaḥ . tat sarvaṃ
vidhivāda eva ghaṭate .
atra tūktanyāyena anyāpohārthanairmūlyāt svārthāṃśasyāpyadarśanāt tvatpakṣe saṃśayādyanāspadam,
ādigrahaṇād viparyayā-'nadhyavasāya-nirṇayā apyanāspadā nirviṣayā ityarthaḥ . kasmāt ? tadatadbhāvātmakabhāvābhāvātmakaśabdārthatvāt, sa cāsaśca bhavan bhāvo bhavati ityuktamasmābhiḥ, tasyābhāva ātmā
yasya śabdārthasya tvadabhimatasya, tasya bhāvāt tadatadbhāvātmakabhāvābhāvātmakaśabdārthatvāt . tadvyaktiḥ—
asvārthatvāt, na bhavati na bhavati ityubhayato'pi abhāvaviṣayatvāt . tadvyaktiḥ --anvayavyatirekaviṣayatvāsattvāditi, saṃśayaviparyayāvapi nirviṣayau vidhyarthābhāvāt, anadhyavasāyo'pi svārthabhāvātmakasyādhyavasāyasya paryudāsenā'nadhyavasāyo'dhyavasāyādanya iti bhavati, ubhayato'pyabhāve kuto'nadhyavasāyaḥ
nirviṣayatvāt khapuṣpavat ? iti .
athavetyādi pāṭhāntaram . pūrvārddhaṃ tadeva . tasya vyākhyā--tvanmatavadeva, adarśanādanyaśabdārthe
iti prathamapādārthastvadvyākhyāta eva, svārthasya cāṃśe'pyadarśanāt tvanmatavadeveti dvitīyapādārthaḥ .


sarvatra  darśane nāsti sambhavaḥ, nāpi sarvatra liṅgini sarvaliṅgasya sambhavo'gnidhūmādivat . yadyapi
kvacidasti ḍitthādiṣu sambhavastathāpi na taddvāreṇānumānam, sarvātmanā'pratīteḥ . guṇasamudāyo hi
ḍitthākhyo'rthaḥ . na ca sarve kāṇakuṇṭādayo guṇāstasya ḍitthaśabdād gamyante . tasmāt taddvāreṇānumānāsambhavaḥ   . anena yadapi tadekadeśe darśanamiṣṭaṃ svārthāṃśe tadapyadarśanamevetyuktaṃ bhavati sarvātmasvadarśanāt .
anvayānuktyudāhṛteḥ vyāvṛttyā ḍitthārthagaterudāharaṇametaditi cet, na,
tatpratipattinirmūlatvāt anavagataparyudāsakasvārthatvāt, avidite devadatte na bhavatyadevadattaḥ iti vacanavat .
evaṃ ca śabdasyārthābhāvād yaḥ sambandhāśakyatvaṃ doṣaḥ pūrvamuktaḥ sa ihāpi .
iti śruteḥ sambandhadauṣkaryam .

taṃ bhāvayati --yathoktamityādi ṭīkāgrantha eva . vṛkṣaśabdasyāvṛkṣetyādi yāvad darśane nāsti
sambhavaḥ, nāpi sarvatra liṅginītyādi śabdasyānumānatvāt sarvatrānumeye darśanāsambhavo'pi ayoguḍāṅgārāgnyādyanumeye dhūmādiliṅgādarśanavaditi . atra paro brūyāt--nanu ḍitthādisvābhidheye sarvatra darśanamiti,
atra tvayottaraṃ yaduktam --yadyapi kvacidityādi sa eva ṭīkāgrantho yāvadanumānāsambhava iti vayaṃ
tvanmatādeva brūmaḥ . anenottaravacanena tvadīyena yadapi tadekadeśe darśanamiṣṭaṃ svārthāṃśe tadapyadarśanamevetyuktaṃ
bhavati kāṇa-kuṇṭādayaḥ sarve guṇāstasya guṇasamudāyātmakasya na gamyante iti vacanāt sarvātmasvadarśanācchabdasya sarvātmanā'pratīterudāharaṇe'bhihitatvādadarśanaṃ svārthāṃśe'pi samarthitam . tata eva cānumānāsambhava ityucyate'smābhiḥ, kvacidadarśanāditi .
atra brūyāstvam --anvayānuyuktyudāhṛterityādi yāvadetaditi cediti . etaduktaṃ bhavati--'ḍitthaḥ
ityapi aḍittho na bhavati iti vyāvṛttyā ḍitthārthagateranvayābhāvādeva ḍitthodāharaṇamiti . etacca na,
tatpratipattinirmūlatvāt, naitadaḍitthavyudāsamātramupapadyate pratipatterabhāvaprasaṅgāt na bhavati na bhavati
ityubhayato'pi abhāvamātratvāt, pratipattinirmūlatvaṃ kasmāt ? anavagataparyudāsakasvārthatvāt, anavagataḥ paryudāso yasya svārthasya so'navagataparyudāsakasvārthaḥ, tadbhāvādanavagataparyudāsakasvārthakatvād nāsti
pratipatterbījam . dṛṣṭāntaḥ--avidite devadatte na bhavati adevadattaḥ iti vacanamapratipattereva kāraṇaṃ nirmūlatvāt tathaitaditi .
tadbhāvayati --evaṃ ca śabdasyetyādi yāvat sa ihāpīti . yathā pūrvamuktam --āstāṃ te śabdasambandhaḥ, arthābhāvāt' iti sambandhāśakyatvaṃ doṣaḥ sa eva . tato'nyasya cārthasyābhāvādalabdhātmake'rthadvaye
śabdasya kena sahāvinābhāvaḥ sambandhaḥ syāt ? iti śruteḥ sambandhadauṣkaryam .


yaḥ sa vṛkṣaśabdastaditaro vā tasya tenārthena na śakyate sambandhaḥ kartum, tena
sahātyantamadṛṣṭatvāt, śrāvaṇatvanityānityatvavat . na ca sambandhadvāraṃ muktvā śabdasya
liṅgasya vā svārthakhyāpanaśaktirasti . sa ca sambandho nāsti uktavat .
ata eva na nāsti vyabhicāritā, asādhāraṇadharmatvāt . yo hyasādhāraṇaḥ pakṣadharmaḥ
sa yāvatā bhedena sarvasaṅgrahastatra saṃśayahetuḥ tadvatā tatsaṅgrahādekāntavyāvṛtteśca pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ ? .

tadupasaṃhṛtya pratijñāyate --yaḥ sa vṛkṣaśabdo yasya sa vṛkṣo'rthaḥ taditaro vetyavṛkṣaśabdāvṛkṣārthayoḥ
sambandho vṛkṣaśabdārthayoḥ pratipattyarthaḥ, tasya śabdasya tenārthena lokaprasiddhena vā tvadabhiprāyānna śakyate
sambandhaḥ kartumiti pakṣaḥ, tena sahātyantamadṛṣṭatvāt śrāvaṇatvanityānityatvavaditi gatārthaṃ sādhanam .
na ca sambandhadvāraṃ muktvā śabdasya liṅgasya vā svārthakhyāpanaśaktirastīti tvayaivokto'yaṃ nyāya
iti darśayati . sa ca sambandho nāsti uktavat, uktaṃ sambandhadauṣkaryam .
ata evetyādi . etasmādeva sambandhadauṣkaryād yaduktaṃ tvayā bhedābhidhānapakṣe doṣajātaṃ vyabhibhicāraḥ, so'pohapakṣe na cāsti vyabhicāritādoṣaḥ, bhedānabhidhānāditi . tadapi na bhavati, na nāsti
vyabhicāritā astyeva sambandhadauṣkaryasyoktatvāt na nāsti astyeva vyabhicāritādoṣa iti

idamapi cātra anvayavyatirekau śabdasyārthābhidhāne dvāram ityuktvā punaranvayasya
nirākaraṇaṃ tat kenābhiprāyeṇeti na vidmo yadanvayaviṣaya ekadeśe nirūpyate tvayā
vṛkṣa ityavṛkṣo na bhavatītyavṛkṣavyudāsena .
nanvevaṃ... ... ...kvāsāvanvaya iti sarvavṛkṣārthadarśanāsambhavāt .
liṅgyekadeśasambhaviliṅgavattu na svārthāṃśamātre sambhavati pratyakṣavṛkṣamūlādibhedānantye sambandhāśakyatve pratipattyabhāvāt .
avṛkṣavyavacchinnasyāpi svārthasya nānumānāya nābhidhānāya syād vṛkṣaśabdaḥ,
pakṣaḥ . asādhāraṇadharmatvāditi hetuḥ . asādhāraṇadharmatvaṃ sapakṣāsapakṣayoradṛṣṭatvāt tad vyācaṣṭe --yo
hyasādhāraṇaḥ pakṣadharma ityādi yāvadekāntavyāvṛtteśceti tadvyākhyayā gatārtham .
kiñcānyat --idamapi cātretyādi . anvayasya nirmūlanītatvād yad anvaya-vyatirekau śabdasyārthābhidhāne dvāram ityuktvā punaranvayasya nirākaraṇaṃ tad bhavataḥ kenābhiprāyeṇeti na vidmaḥ . kimajñānād
asmadbuddhiparibhavād ihaparalokābhyāmayaśasaścābhīrutvāt ? iti . katamadanvayanirākaraṇamiti cet, ucyate —
yadanvayaviṣaya ekadeśe nirūpyate tvayā vṛkṣa ityavṛkṣo na bhavatītyavṛkṣavyudāsena .
kathaṃ punaranenānvayo nirākriyata iti ced brūmaḥ --nanvevamityādi yāvat kvāsāvanvaya iti iti
bhāvanā gatārthā . tatra kāraṇamāha --sarvavṛkṣārthadarśanāsambhavāt, bhedānantyāccāsambhava uktaḥ . svārthadeśavyāpyanvayo nāstīti cokto guṇasamudāyamātratvāt guṇabhūteṣu cāvayaveṣvasattvaṃ darśanasyoktaṃ tvayaiva .
tasmādanvayābhāve'numānānumeyasambandhābhāvādanumānānupapattivadabhidhānābhidheyabhāvasyānupapattiriti .
syānmatam--liṅgyekadeśasambhaviliṅgavadabhidheyaikadeśasambhavyabhidhānadarśanādastyanvayo'bhidhānaṃ ceti .
atrocyate tadapyabhyupetya --liṅgyekadeśetyādi . liṅgināmagnīnāmekadeśe'gnāvekasmin sambhavato dhūmasya
liṅgasyāgnergamakatvavat tu na svārthāṃśamātre sambhavatīti śabdādabhidheyapratipattirna bhavitumarhati . pratyakṣavṛkṣetyādi, ayaṃ vṛkṣaḥ iti pratyakṣasyāpi mūlādimataḥ sākṣādupalabhyamānasya saṃjñāvyutpattikāle sambandhakaraṇaṃ nāsti . śiṃśapādibhedānantye jātiśabdasya bhedairanantaiḥ sambandhāśakyatve pratipattyabhāvavadekāṃśe'pi
svārthākhye mūlādi-koṭarādi-hrasva-dīrgha-tanu-viśālādibhedānantye sambandhāśakyatvaṃ kvacidadṛṣṭatvāt, kimaṅga
punaratyantaparokṣasvargādiśabdasvārthāṃśamātre'pi tadvadevāpratipatteḥ ? no ced dhavakhadirādyanantabhedābhidhānaṃ
vṛkṣaśabdasya syādadṛṣṭasvārthāṃśatvāt .
atrāniṣṭāpādanasādhanam --avṛkṣavyavacchinnasyāpi svārthasya nānumānāya nābhidhānāya syād
vṛkṣaśabdaḥ na prabhavatītyarthaḥ . tadekadeśavartitvāt, svārthasya dharmiṇaḥ pakṣasyānumeyasya abhidheyasya ekadeśe vartituṃ śīlamasya dharmaḥ sādhu vā vṛttirasyeti tadekadeśavartī . kimuktaṃ bhavati ? avyāpipakṣadharmatvāt

tadekadeśavartitvādavyāpipakṣadharmatvāt, avanaspativyavacchinnacaitanyasādhanārthasvāpavat . aśeṣapakṣāvyāpi... ... ....
svāpodāharaṇanirapekṣādṛṣṭadeśavartitvābhyupagame tvatulye'pi vṛttiprasaṅgaḥ .
tasmādeva vānantyādakṛtasambandhajātiśabdabhedavācitve'pyadoṣaḥ, tadarthāṃśe'dṛṣṭa-
samastānumeyāvṛttitvādityarthaḥ . avanaspativyavacchinnacaitanyasādhanārthasvāpavat, yathā sacetanā
vanaspatayaḥ iti pratijñāyāṃ svāpāt iti heturdharmiṇo vanaspaterekadeśe śirīṣādau vartamāno'pi tālādiṣu
avartamāno na caitanyānumānāya prabhavati avyāpitvāt, tathā vṛkṣaśabdo'pi avṛkṣavyāvṛttyartho vṛkṣasvārthāṃśavṛttirnānumānāya nābhidhānāya prabhavati . etat punaḥ svārthāṃśavṛttyabhyupagatyā'niṣṭāpādanam . naiva vṛttirasti ityuktameva, vakṣyāmaśca anumānasyāpi svārthābhāvam .
syānmatam--sādhyāśeṣānityatvāvyāpiprayatnānantarīyakatvavadanumānaṃ syāt, vanaspatyavyāpisvāpavadanumānābhāsaḥ syāt ? iti sandeha iti . etacca na, aśeṣapakṣāvyāpītyādi, prayatnānantarīyakaṃ hi sapakṣaṃ
na vyāpnoti, svāpastu pakṣameva na vyāpnotīti parihāraḥ . vṛkṣaśabdo hyaśeṣamavṛkṣād vyavacchinnaṃ vṛkṣārthaṃ
nāmavṛkṣaṃ manuṣyādiṃ sthāpanāvṛkṣaṃ citrādiṃ vāsmanmatena sādhyadharmasāmānyena samānaṃ sapakṣaṃ na tu na
vyāpnoti, nāpyanumāne'tra doṣaḥ, svārthāṃśavṛttitvādavyāpipakṣadharmatvād vanaspaticaitanye svāpavadityudāhṛtam . tasmād nānumānāya syādvṛkṣaśabda iti sādhūktam . tatra kaḥ sambandhaḥ sādhyānityāvyāpiprayatnā-
nantarīyakatvānumānatvaprāpteriti .
syānmatam--uktasvāpadṛṣṭāntamanapekṣya vṛkṣaśabdo yatra na dṛṣṭastānapi svārthādanyān gamayati dṛṣṭasvārthānumānasādharmyādaṃśe dṛṣṭaśaktitvāditi . etaccāyuktam, apohye vṛttiprasaṅgāt . ata āha --svāpodāharaṇanirapekṣādṛṣṭadeśavartitvābhyupagame tu atulye'pi vṛttiprasaṅgaḥ, atulye sādhyavipakṣe vṛttiḥ syādavṛkṣe
ghaṭādau vṛkṣaśruteḥ, adṛṣṭadeśavartitvāt, mūlādimati palāśādau svārthāṃśe vā vṛttivat . tasmādeva vānantyādakṛtasambandhajātiśabdabhedavācitve'pyadoṣaḥ, tadarthāśe'dṛṣṭatvāt, adṛṣṭasvārthāṃśatvādityarthaḥ,

tvāt, apohasvārthavat . iti kuto'nvayavyatirekau kuto vā pakṣadharmatvaṃ kutastrailakṣaṇyaṃ kuto'numānatvaṃ śabdasya ?
yadi liṅgavacchabdastrilakṣaṇo'nyāpohena svārthaṃ gamayati tato vṛkṣaśabdasyāvṛkṣāvyavacchinneṣu vṛttiḥ syāt, anumānatvāt, anvayapradarśanārthaprayuktaghaṭādivat . na tu vṛkṣeṣu vṛttiḥ syāt, pakṣatvād vṛkṣāṇāṃ sapakṣaśabdārthāvacchinnārthatvāt
kṛtakasyeva nityeṣu . tasmāt tattulye nāsti vṛttiḥ śabdasya .
apohasvārthavaditi avṛkṣo na bhavati ityavṛkṣāpohasya svārtho mūlādimānanantaḥ koṭarādibhedena, tadvācitve
cādoṣo dṛṣṭa evaṃ bhedavādino'pyānantye'pi bhedānāmakṛtasambandhe'pi doṣābhāvaḥ syāt . tvanmatasvārthe'pi
vā tadvad doṣa eva syāditi kutastulyātulyayorvṛttyavṛttibhyāmanvayavyatirekau ? kuto vā śabdasyābhidheyasya
pakṣasya dharmatvaṃ liṅgavalliṅginaḥ ? kutastrailakṣaṇyam ? kuto'numānatvamiti, evaṃ ca śabdaliṅgagatapakṣāpakṣasapakṣavisaṃvāde sādharmyābhāvālliṅgaśabdayoḥ kuto'numānatvaṃ śabdasya ? iti .
tadvyākhyā --yadi liṅgavacchabda ityādi, yadi kṛtakatvādiliṅgavacchabdastrilakṣaṇo'nyāpohena
svārthaṃ gamayatīti manyase tato vṛkṣaśabdasyāvṛkṣāvyavacchinneṣu vṛkṣādabhidheyāt svārthāṃśākhyādanyatrātulye sapakṣe vṛttiḥ syāt pakṣadharmād vṛkṣaśabdādanyasyāvṛkṣaśabdādivācye tato vyavacchinne kṛtakatvānityatvāśraye ghaṭe iva vṛttiḥ syādanumānatvāt anvayadarśanārthaprayuktaghaṭādivaditi gatārtham . na
tu vṛkṣeṣu vṛttiḥ syāt, kiṃ kāraṇam ? pakṣatvād vṛkṣāṇām, pakṣa eva vṛkṣaśabdākhyasya dharmasya
dharmiṇo vṛkṣārthāḥ sapakṣādavacchinnāḥ, teṣveva na tu vṛttiḥ syāt, anumānatvādeva, tvadabhimatā'vṛkṣānnivṛttimātraṃ vṛkṣatā nānyasminnapi sādhyadharmasāmānyena samāne'rthe, atastvadabhimatyā tulyatvaṃ yeṣu sādhyād
vṛkṣād bhinneṣu arthāntareṣu teṣu vṛkṣaśabdasya vṛttirnāsti pakṣadharmābhimatasya . kasmāt ? sapakṣaśabdārthāvacchinnārthatvāt . kimiva ? kṛtakasyeva nityeṣviti . tasmāditi vaidharmyeṇa, tasmāt sapakṣābhāvāt
tattulye nāsti vṛttiḥ śabdasya, kiṃ tarhi ? tatraiva vṛttiḥ . tasmāt trailakṣaṇyābhāvād nānumānaṃ śabdaḥ .


tatraiva vṛttāvasapakṣavṛttigatadoṣāpattiḥ . hetvapavādaniyatavyavasthāniyamād
neti cet, na, pakṣasapakṣāsapakṣavyavasthāyāṃ tadvyavasthābhāvāt tadasiddhāvasiddhiḥ .
āpattyanabhyupagame tvanyāpohānyathātvaṃ sapakṣāvacchinnasyāpi sapakṣatvāt
sapakṣāpakṣepaṇakṣīṇaśakteśca pakṣāsapakṣayorviśeṣaṃ gamayituṃ nālam, sādhyanirdeśavat .

kiñcānyat, tvanmatavat tatraiva vṛttāvasapakṣavṛttigatadoṣāpattiḥ . sapakṣādanyo vā sapakṣābhāvo vā
syādasapakṣaḥ, sa ca sādhyadharmasāmānyena samāno'rthaḥ sapakṣaḥ pakṣādanyaḥ pakṣābhāvo'pakṣa evavā sapakṣaḥ .
iha tatraiva vṛkṣārthe vṛttatvāt vṛkṣaśabdastaddharmo'pi san viruddho'sādhāraṇānaikāntiko vā syāt .
hetvapavādetyādi yāvad neti cet . syānmatam--sa heturviparīto'smād viruddho'nyastvaniścitaḥ pra॰ samu॰ 3 . 22 iti lakṣaṇāt trilakṣaṇasya hetorapavādo hetvābhāso viruddho'sādhāraṇaḥ sādhāraṇo'siddho veti niyamitatvādasapakṣavṛttigatadoṣābhāvo'sya vṛkṣaśabdasyeti . etacca na, pakṣasapakṣāsapakṣavyavasthāyāṃ tadvyavasthābhāvāt, hetu-hetvābhāsavyavasthā pakṣa-sapakṣā-'sapakṣavyavasthāyāṃ siddhāyāṃ sidhyet .
tadasiddhāvasiddhiḥ, hetu--tadābhāsavyavasthāniyamasya pakṣādivyavasthāśrayatvāt . pakṣa eva tāvadavyasthita
ubhayato'pyabhavanaparamārthatvāt ityuktatvāt . sapakṣastu anantaranyāyo nāsti . asapakṣastu sa eva pakṣastvanmatābhyupagamāt syāt sapakṣābhāvamātratvāt, itarathā naiva syāduktavadeva . tasmāddhetvādiniyamādasapakṣavṛttigatadoṣāpattistadavasthaiva . āpattyanabhyupagame tvityādi . yadyevamāpattidoṣaṃ nābhyupaiṣi asapakṣavṛttigataṃ tato'nyāpohānyathātvaṃ doṣaḥ, anyāpoho'pi tarhi anyābhāvāt tadapohābhāvācca svārthāpoha eva
syāt . kasmāt ? sapakṣāvacchinnasyāpi sapakṣatvāt, sapakṣādanyaḥ pakṣastato'vacchinno'sapakṣo vā sa
eva sapakṣaḥ tataḥ pakṣādanyaḥ . pakṣa eva pakṣādanyaḥ sapakṣādanyatvāt . tato'nyāpohaḥ pakṣāpohaḥ svārthāpoha ityāpannaḥ .
kiñcānyat, sapakṣāpakṣepaṇakṣīṇaśakteśca, sapakṣādanyo'sapakṣaḥ pakṣa ityukte sapakṣavyāvṛttimātre
caritārthatvāt pakṣāsapakṣayorviśeṣaṃ gamayituṃ nālaṃ pakṣa evāyaṃ nāsapakṣaḥ iti . kasmāt ? uktakāraṇāt . kimiva ? sādhyanirdeśavat, yathā sādhyanirdeśaḥ pratijñā nyāyasū॰ 1 . 1 . 33 ityakṣapādapakṣalakṣaṇaṃ siddhinivṛttau caritārthatvāt sādhyaviśeṣaṃ pakṣamevāsiddhahetu-dṛṣṭāntebhyo vyatiriktaṃ na gamayitumalaṃ
vipakṣāpakṣepaṇakṣīṇaśaktitvāt tathā sapakṣādanyo'sapakṣaḥ ityasapakṣāt pakṣaṃ viśeṣya na gamayitumalaṃ sāmānyamātravṛtteḥ . tvayā tu viśeṣavṛtteḥ pakṣa evāsapakṣāvacchinnavṛttiriṣyate, tattu na sidhyatītthaṃ nyāyāt .


tadviṣayapakṣadharmatvādeva tulye vṛttirvṛkṣārtha iti cet, ananumānaṃ tarhi śabdaḥ
pakṣa eva vṛttatvād dvilakṣaṇatvādasādhāraṇavat, ekalakṣaṇatvādvā anvayavyatirekābhāvād viruddhavat tadviṣayamātrārthatvādanyāpohaśabdārthatvasya . vyatirekasya
svārthāsambhavādapi vyarthataiva vā, pakṣamātrasyāpyalakṣaṇatvāt, avyaktaśrutivat .
guṇasamudāyo hi vṛkṣākhyo'rtha iti vṛkṣasya mūlakoṭarādyānantye vācyatvābhāvaḥ
saṃvṛtimātratvāt samudāyasya tadarthāgateḥ . tasmāt taddvāreṇānumānāsambhava uktavat .
tasmāt tadekalakṣaṇatāpi nāsti, kuta evānyāpohaḥ
yacca vṛkṣaśabdo vṛkṣārthavṛttiḥ tat katham ? guṇasamudāyasaṃvṛtyarthatvāt,
senāśabdavat .

syānmatam --tadviṣaya ityādi yāvaccediti . sa eva vṛkṣārtho viṣayaḥ pakṣaḥ, tasya pakṣasya dharmo
vṛkṣaśabdaḥ, tasmāt tadviṣayapakṣadharmatvādeva tulye vṛttirvṛkṣārthe, tacca dṛṣṭam, pakṣasya dharmo hetuḥ ityanayaivoktyā
gatatvād viśeṣārthagatirevetyarthaḥ .
atrocyate --ananumānaṃ tarhi śabdaḥ, anumānābhāsa ityarthaḥ, pakṣa eva vṛttatvāt, tacca kāraṇatvenāha, dvilakṣaṇatvādasādhāraṇavadityādi gatārthaṃ yāvat tadviṣayamātrārthatvādanyāpohaśabdārthatvasyeti, sa eva viṣayastadviṣayo vṛkṣaḥ, tanmātrameva vācyam ityuktamanyāpohaśabdārthatvam . ato'sādhāraṇaviruddhate .
kiñcānyat, vyatirekasya svārthāsambhavādapi vyarthataiva vā, anyāpoho hi vyatirekamātram,
na bhavati na bhavati ityabhavanaparamārthatvādubhayato'pyabhāva eva vandhyāputravat, na svārthaḥ kaścit'
ityuktam . tasmād vṛkṣaśabdasya vyarthataiva pakṣamātrasyāpyalakṣaṇatvādavyaktaśrutivat, yathā mlecchaprayuktaśabdārtho vyāvṛttimātrārthatvāt svārthamātrasyāpyalakṣaṇād vyartho histamis ityādi tathā vṛkṣaśabdaḥ
syāditi tadarthābhāvapradarśanārthamāha --guṇasamudāyo hītyādi . tasmāt taddvāreṇānumānāsambhava uktavaditi prāguktaṃ tanmatameva smārayati, saṃvṛtisataḥ sāmānyasamudāyākhyasyāsattvād viśeṣāṇāmṛju-vakra-nirvivarakoṭarādīnāmavācyatvāditi . tasmāt tadekalakṣaṇatāpi nāsti, kuta eva svārthādbhinnasyābhūtasya pratipattiranyasya yato'nyāpohaḥ sidhyet, sa tu nāstyanyaḥ, tadabhāvāt tatpratipattiniścayalabhyapratipattilabhyo'nyo nāsti, tatpratiniścayalabhyo hi tulyātulyavivāvekātmeti .
yacca vṛkṣaśabda ityādi . vṛkṣārthasya pakṣasyābhāvāt pakṣadharmatvābhāvo vṛkṣaśabdasyeti . tadbhāvanāgranthaḥ
tat katham ityādi yāvat senāśabdavaditi gatārthaḥ . guṇasamudāyasaṃvṛtyarthatvāditi hetuḥ . vṛkṣa

vṛkṣaśabdasya samudāyārthavṛttitaiveti cet, na, abhyupagatamūlādisapakṣatvāt
tadatulyatvād vṛkṣārthasya tulyātulyavṛttyavṛttyādivacanavaiyarthyameva . saṃvṛttisatyatvācca
samudāyasyāpi vṛkṣavadanarthatvāt senāvanāderapi vyarthatvameva .
rūpādisatyatvapratipādanārthe'pi ca ḍitthādyudāharaṇe rūpādiparasparavyāvṛttyā'nvayābhāve vyatirekasyābhāvāt na kiñcit satyam, sajātīyāsajātīyavyāvṛttasvarūpatvādatyantāpūrvatvādanirdeśyasvalakṣaṇatvāt . tasmādatulye pakṣa eva vṛttiḥ
śabdasya . nāstyeva vārthe vṛttiḥśāstreṣu prakriyābhedairavidyaivopavarṇyate .anāgamavikalpā tu svayaṃ vidyopavartate ॥ vākyapa॰ 2 . 235
evaṃ sarvatrātulye pakṣa eva vṛtteḥ liṅgavacchabdo'numānaṃ na bhavati pramāṇameva
vā na bhavati .
śabdasya samudāyārthavṛttitaiveti cet . syānmatam--vṛkṣaśabdaḥ samudāyenārthenārthavān, mūlādīnāṃ ca
samudāyo vṛkṣa ucyate, tasmāt samudāyārthavattvādadoṣa iti . etacca na, abhyupagatetyādi, abhyupagatānāṃ
mūlādīnāṃ tadātmatvenaikatve sapakṣatvam, sapakṣādanyatvaṃ pakṣatvam, tenātulyatvamanyatvaṃ sapakṣād vṛkṣārthasya, tadatulyatvāt tulyātulyavṛttyavṛttyādivacanavaiyarthyameva . kiñcānyat, saṃvṛtisatyatvācca samudāyasyāpi
vṛkṣavadanarthatvāt senāvanāderapi vyarthatvameva . avṛkṣo na bhavati vṛkṣaḥ ityasya mūlādisvarūpasattāmātratvenāpyatulya eva vṛttiḥ, rūpādibhedasamudāyasaṃvṛtyarthatvāt .
rūpādisattvādarthavān syāditi cet, tadapi na, rūpādisatyatvapratipādanārthe'pi ca ḍitthādyudāharaṇe
tvayaiva kāṇa-kuṇṭādiguṇasamudāyānvayābhāvoktyā'nyāpohaprayāse kriyamāṇe rūpādiparasparavyāvṛttyā'nvayābhāve vyatirekasyābhāvāt na bhavati na bhavati ityabhavanaparamārthatvād na kiñcit satyam . tatkāraṇamāha—
sajātīyāsajātīyavyāvṛttasvarūpatvāditi, tatsatyasyāpi punaḥ kṣaṇātipātitvāt kṣaṇe kṣaṇe'tyantānyatvād
dvitīyakṣaṇe tadabhāvāt katamad rūpam, atyantāpūrvatvād nirbījatvādanirdeśyasvalakṣaṇatvāt ?
svalakṣaṇamanirdeśyaṃ rūpamindriyagocaraḥ pra॰ samu॰ 1 . 11 ?
iti hyuktam . tasmādatulye pakṣe sapakṣāsapakṣavyāvṛttyā tatraiva vṛttiḥ śabdasya . nāstyeva vārthe vṛttiḥ, athavā
śabdasyāprāmāṇyaṃ pratipannameva tvayā, yasmādetat tvanmatānusāryeva jñāpakam --śāstreṣu prakriyābhedairityādi
śloko gatārthaḥ .
evaṃ sarvatrātulya ityādi . liṅgavacchabdo'numānaṃ na bhavati pramāṇameva vā na bhavatītyuktasyārthasya yathāpratijñaṃ pratipāditasyopasaṃhāraḥ proktārthakramasaṅgrahātmakaḥ .


śabdavattu liṅge dvailakṣaṇyameva syāt, pakṣa eva vṛttatvāt, asādhāraṇavat .
ekalakṣaṇatvamanvayavyatirekābhāvād viruddhavat . sapakṣavṛttyabhāvādanyatra vṛttyasambhavādanvayābhāvād vyatirekavyāpārāvakāśābhāvādekalakṣaṇaṃ vā śabdavalliṅgamapi .
sannihitatāyāmapyananumānatvam, tāvantareṇāpyanumānatvopapatteḥ, sādhyadharmasādhanavyāptivat .
tatastayorakāraṇatvādekalakṣaṇaṃ śabdavalliṅgamapi . anumānatvādekalakṣaṇatvācca

liṅgamapi śabdavanna bhavati ityupapādayiṣyāmītyata āha --śabdavattu liṅge dvailakṣaṇyameva
syādityādi . prathamameva tāvadanumānatvācchabdavad dvilakṣaṇaṃ liṅgamiti sādhayati, tato dvilakṣaṇatvādasādhāraṇa ityādi yaduktamanantaraṃ śabde doṣajātaṃ tat sarvaṃ liṅgasya śabdavadityevoktakrameṇa jñeyam .
ekalakṣaṇatvamanvayavyatirekābhāvāt pakṣadharmatvamātraṃ viruddhavaditi śabde yaduktaṃ tad liṅge syāt .
tadvyākhyā --sapakṣavṛttyabhāvāt, kimuktaṃ bhavati ? anyatra vṛttyasambhavāt, pakṣādanyatrāvṛtterityarthaḥ .
ata evānvayābhāvād vyatirekavyāpārāvakāśābhāvaḥ, tasmād vyatirekavyāpārāvakāśābhāvādekalakṣaṇaṃ
vā śabdavalliṅgamapi, śabdasya caikalakṣaṇaṃ prāguktaṃ viruddhavadanvayavyatirekābhāvāditi .
sannihitatāyāmapyananumānatvamarthapratipattāvakāraṇatvam, tāvantareṇāpyanumānatvopapatteḥ,
vināpi tābhyāmarthagatestayoḥ sannidhānamapyakāraṇam . kimiva ? sādhyadharmasādhanavyāptivat, yathā yat
kṛtakaṃ tadanityam iti kṛtakatvasyānityatvenāvinābhāvena vyāptatvādavinābhāvino'nityatvasya gatiḥ kṛtakatvādiṣṭā, na tu yadanityaṃ tat kṛtakam ityanityatvasya kṛtakatvenāvinābhāvinā, vyāptau satyāmapyagateḥ
anyatra tadabhāve satyavivakṣitatvāt prayatnānantarīyakatvādau tvanmatena yathā tathehāpyanvayavyatirekau sannihitāvapyakāraṇam, śabdārthe tāddharmyamātrāt tadgateḥ . tasmādanvayavyatirekasannidhāne'pi akāraṇatvānnārthaḥ
śabdārthagatau tābhyām . yathānumānavicāre'bhihitam—
pratiṣedhyāpracāreṇa yasmād vyāptirapekṣyate .liṅgasya liṅgini vyāptistasmāt satyapyakāraṇam ॥ pra॰ samu॰ 2 . 22 1/2
ityādikārikārthānugamaḥ kāryaḥ .
tataḥ kim ? tatastayorakāraṇatvāt pakṣadharmatvamātrakāraṇatvādekalakṣaṇaṃ śabdavalliṅgamapi, anumānatvādekalakṣaṇatvācca viruddho'pi te'numānam ityāpannam ekalakṣaṇatvācchabdavadabhimatatrilakṣaṇaliṅgavacca .
mā śaṃkiṣṭhā ekalakṣaṇatvamasiddhamityata āha smāraṇārthamuktanyāyasiddhasyaikalakṣaṇatvasya --uktavacchabdavaditi .

viruddho'pi te'numānaṃ syāt uktavat . śabdo'pi vā nānumānaṃ viruddhavat . vyarthataiva
vā, svārthasyāpyabhāvo'nadhyavasāyavad viparyayavadvā . agniratra dhūmāditi svārthānumāne guṇasamudāyo hi dhūmākhyo'rthaḥ . bahalakuṭilatvādyānantye ca dhūmatvābhāvaḥ .
tasmāt taddvāreṇānumānāsambhava iti tadekalakṣaṇatāpi naiva, kuta evānyāpohaḥ ?
pakṣadharmyeva vā dharmasyādhāraḥ prāpnotīti tasminneva vṛttiḥ syāt pakṣadharmamātralakṣaṇā, na tulyānvayātmikā . anyatra ca vṛttau satyāṃ vyatirekākāṅkṣā syāt .
sā tu sapakṣābhāvānnāstītyanvayavyatirekābhāvaḥ .
śabdo'pi vā nānumānaṃ viruddhavaditi śabdasyānumānatvābhāve liṅgasyāpi prāptamevānanumānatvam,
dvayorapītyabhiprāyaḥ .
vyarthataiva vetyādi śabdavad liṅgasya vaiyarthyaṃ prāgvyākhyātavidhinā yojyam . svārthasyeti
pakṣadharmamātrasyāpyabhāvo'nadhyavasāyavat mlecchaśabdajñānavat, viparyayavadveti viruddhajñānavat . tad
bhāvayati --agniratra dhūmādityasminnapi svārthānumāne guṇasamudāyo hi dhūmākhyo'rtha iti, vṛkṣasya
mūlādikoṭarādyānantye vācyatvābhāvavat bahala-kuṭilatvādyānantye ca dhūmatvābhāvaḥ jñātasambandhatvā-
bhāvāt saṃvṛtimātratvācca samudāyasya tadarthāgateḥ . tasmāt taddvāreṇānanumānamityalakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ
svārthamātrasyāpīti . iti tadekalakṣaṇatāpi naiva, itthamuktaṃ svārthamātrālakṣaṇatvam . svārthamātrālakṣaṇatve
kuta eva tasyāgṛhītatvāt sa bhavati dhūmo nādhūmo'nyo bhavati itiviṣayatvādubhayapratipatterabhāve'nyābhāvādanyāpohaḥ ? kutaḥ agnirityanagnirna bhavati, dhūma ityadhūmo na bhavati iti ca ? dūrata evaitanna
ghaṭāmiyarti .
pakṣadharmyeva vetyādi . yathaiva vṛkṣa eva, na kaścit sapakṣaḥ iti prasañjitā śabdārthavṛttistathā
agniḥ iti pakṣo dharmī dhūmasya dharmasyādhāraḥ prāpnoti anumeyatvāditi sapakṣasya tulyāderabhāvaḥ, tadabhyupagame
pakṣābhāvaḥ prāguktaśabdānumānaviṣayavat, iti tasminneva vṛttiḥ syāt pakṣamātre sapakṣābhāvāt . sā
kīdṛśī ? iti cet, ucyate --pakṣadharmamātralakṣaṇā . kimuktaṃ bhavati ? na tulyānvayātmikā,
anvayārthābhāvād na syād vṛttiḥ . anyatra cetyādi, pakṣadharmasya cānyatra sapakṣe satyāṃ vṛttau tulye
tadvadatulye'pi vṛttiḥ syāt ityāśaṅkāyā vyāvṛttaye vyatirekākāṅkṣā syāt, sā tu sapakṣasyaivābhāvānnāsti
vyatirekākāṅkṣā . tasmādanvayavyatirekau na staḥ .


atha ca bhavati jñānaṃ tataḥ prāpte pratyakṣe śābdalaiṅgike'pi jñāne, anvayavyatirekaviyutatathyajñānatvāt avikalpakatvāt, sannikṛṣṭārthavat .
ata idaṃ pūrvāparāsamīkṣayaivoktaṃ na pramāṇāntaraṃ śābdamanumānāditi .

nāpramāṇāntaraṃ śābdamanumānāt tathāhi tat .
kṛtakatvādyapi svārthamātmāpohena nāśayet ॥

yadi na pramāṇāntaraṃ śābdamanumānāt, tathāhi--tat svārthamanyāpohena bhāṣate
kṛtakatvādivat tato'nyāpohārthakṛtā doṣā na śabda evaikasmin, kiṃ tarhi ? tadvidhadoṣajālopanipātasambandhyeva te'numānamapi . nanvevaṃ kṛtakatvādyapyanumānaṃ svārthamātmāpohena nāśayedeva, anyāpohena... ... ..., anyāpohaśabdārthavat .
dhūma ityadhūmo na bhavatīti niranvayā pratipattirapratipattireva, grāhyadarśanarahitatvāt sthāṇvasthāṇvapratipattivat .

atha ca bhavati jñānamiti . vināpyanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ bhavati jñānam dhūmo'yam, agnirayam,
vṛkṣo'yam iti . tataḥ kim ? tataḥ prāpte pratyakṣe . katame te prāpte ? śābda-laiṅgike'pi jñāne pratyakṣe
eva prāpnutaḥ . kasmāt ? anvayavyatirekaviyutatathyajñānatvāt avikalpakatvāt sannikṛṣṭārthavaditi vyākhyātotārthasaṅgrahaḥ . sādhanaṃ svārthaparārthānumānayoḥ śābdalaiṅgikayoḥ pratyakṣatvāsañjanaṃ gatārtham .
kiñcānyat, ata idamityādi . svapratipādyavastudharmatve sati anvayavyatirekābhyāṃ tasya gamakatvāt anumānaṃ śābdam, nānumānādanyat pramāṇam ityetadapi ata eva pūrvāparāsamīkṣayaivoktam, anvayavyatirekarahitatvasyoktatvāt pratyakṣatvasyopapāditatvāt .
eṣa tu pāṭho ghaṭamāna upalakṣyate --nāpramāṇāntaramityādi ślokaḥ . yadi na pramāṇāntaramityādi tadeva pratyuccārayati yāvat kṛtakatvādivaditi . tato'nyāpohārthetyādi doṣopanyāsaḥ . na śabda
evaikasminniti yathā mayoktāḥ śābdapratyakṣaprasaṅgādidoṣāḥ anyāpohārthakṛtāḥ kevale, kiṃ tarhi ? tadvidhadoṣajālopanipātasambandhyeva te'numānamapi . tat kathamiti cet, tarhi tadevaṃ prakāśyate --nanvevaṃ
kṛtakatvādyapyanumānaṃ svārthaṃ parārthaṃ vā trilakṣaṇaṃ liṅgaṃ śabdavaduktavidhinā svārthamātmāpohena nāśayedeva,
na na nāśayati, iyaṃ pratijñā . hetuḥ --anyāpohenetyādi gatārthaḥ, dṛṣṭāntaśca yāvadanyāpohaśabdārthavaditi sādhanam .
tasya bhāvanā sādhanam --dhūma iti adhūmo na bhavati iti niranvayā pratipattirapratipattireveti pratijñā . grāhyadarśanarahitatvāditi hetuḥ . sthāṇvasthāṇvapratipattivaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, yathā

guṇasamudāyo hi dhūmākhyo'rthaḥ bahalapāṇḍutvādyānantye ca dhūmatvābhāvaḥ,
tasmāt taddvāreṇānumānāsambhava iti tadekalakṣaṇatāpi naiva kuta evānyāpohaḥ,
agṛhītabrāhmaṇābrāhmaṇārthāpratipattivat . evaṃ tāvaddhūmārtha eva na niścīyate, kiṃ
punaryatrāsau vartate ?
yacca dhūmo'gnimatpradeśadharma iti tadapi nanvalpabahutāpa... ... ...
guṇasamudāyo'sau, nāgnideśau nāma kaucidapi staḥ . tajjñānābhyāṃ tu tadarthādhyāropaṇena... ... ...ityādi yāvadanyopādānamātmanaśca tyāgaḥ . sapakṣāsapakṣayorapyevameva yāvadātmanaśca .
sthāṇvasthāṇuviṣayavijñānarahitasya grāhyasya darśanābhāvādapratipattirniranvayatvāt tathā dhūma ityadhūmo na
bhavatīti .
tadvyākhyā --guṇasamudāyo hītyādi pūrvavadeva bhāvanīyaṃ pāṇḍutvādyakṣaraviśeṣaṃ yāvat kuta
evānyāpohaḥ, agṛhītabrāhmaṇābrāhmaṇārtharthāpratipattivaditi sādhanenaiva bhāvitamapratipattitvam .
evaṃ tāvaddhūmārtha eva na niścīyate, kiṃ punaryatrāsau dhūmo guṇasamudāye paramārthe'gnau vartate ? so'pi
na niścīyate'gnirityarthaḥ . tābhyāṃ cāgnidhūmābhyāṃ tato'nyayoranagnyadhūmayorapohau syātām, tadabhāvāt
kutastāvapi ? iti .
yacca dhūma ityādi dharme'gnau siddhe tadvati pradeśe ca dharmiṇyagnimati siddhe'gnimatpradeśadharmo dhūmaḥ
sidhyet, tat sarvamasiddhamiti taddarśayati --tadapi nanvalpabahutāpetyādi samāsadaṇḍako yāvad guṇasamudāyo'sau, nāgnideśau nāma kaucidapi sta iti tameva taduktaṃ nyāyaṃ darśayati .
tajjñānābhyāṃ tviti agnideśajñānābhyāṃ tadarthādhyāropaṇenetyādinā tamevāśeṣamatītaṃ granthamatidiśati yāvadanyopādānamātmanaśca tyāga iti granthāvadhiṃ ca darśayati samānapracarcatvāditi . evaṃ tāvat
pakṣadharmasya cānupapattirvyākhyātā kiṃ bhavadeva bhavati utābhavat, anyadananyat, apohaśca guṇasamudāyaparamārthaśca svārthaḥ ityādivikalpairātmāpohāt . sapakṣāsapakṣayorapyevamevetyatidiśati, taireva vikalpairvicāryamāṇayoḥ sapakṣāsapakṣayorapyabhāvāt . sapakṣāsapakṣāvapi bhavantāveva bhavata utābhavantau anyāvananyāvapohyohau guṇasamudāyasvārthau cetyādivikalpairātmāpoha iti samānatvāt . ā kuta ārabhya grantha
iti cet, ucyate --kimanyatve na sāmānya-bheda-paryāyavācyanut ? vidhiḥ . nanu ityetasmād granthāvadherārabhyātīto grantho yojyaḥ . kiyadavadhiriti cet, ucyate--idamasminnantare yāvadātmanaśceti .


yathā kṛtakatvāderna pakṣastenaiva nyāyena na pakṣo'nyāpohavādinaḥ . evaṃ nāsya
sapakṣo nāsapakṣaḥ .
evamanumānamapramāṇameva, atattatpratyayātmakatvāt, alātacakradhīvat . śābdamapi nāpramāṇāntaram, apramāṇamevānumānavat .
idamapi cāta eva pūrvavadalakṣaṇaṃ yat tvayoktam--

tathāṅgaṃ yena rūpeṇa liṅginaṃ nātivartate .
tenaivānekadharmāpi gamakaṃ netareṇa tu ॥


etasya granthasyopari upasaṃhāragranthaḥ prāguktanyāyaprāṇa eva --yathā kṛtakatvāderna pakṣaḥ anityaḥ
śabdaḥ, agniratra iti vā svārthaparārthayostenaiva nyāyena na pakṣo'gniviśiṣṭo deśo'nityatvaviśiṣṭaḥ śabdo
vānyāpohavādinaḥ na bhavati na bhavati ityabhavanaparamārthatvādubhayato'pyabhāvamātratvāt . tasmiṃścāsati
pradeśa-śabdādidharmiṇi pakṣe kutastasya pakṣadharmaḥ ? iti pakṣa-dharmau na staḥ . evaṃ nāsya sapakṣo nāsapakṣa
iti tathā bhāvitārthameva bahudhā .
evamanumānamapramāṇameva, atattatpratyayātmakatvāt, alātacakradhīvaditi . pakṣa-sapakṣā'sapakṣavyavasthānāddhi trailakṣaṇyavyavasthātaścānumānaprāmāṇyamiṣyate . tadevaṃ pakṣādyatathārthatvāt atasmiṃstaditi
pratyayo'numānam iti subhāvitārtham . tasmādatattatpratyayātmakatvādanumānamapramāṇam, alātacakre bhramadṛṣṭeḥ
puṃso'cakre cakram iti pratyayavaditi . tasmāt sādhūktam--

nāpramāṇāntaraṃ śābdamanumānāt tathāhi tat .
kṛtakatvādyapi svārthamātmāpohena nāśayet ॥ iti .

apramāṇādanumānāt paraparikalpitaṃ śābdamapi nāpramāṇāntaraṃ nārthāntaram, apramāṇamevānumānavaditi prakṛtopasaṃhārārthaḥ .
idamapi cāta eva pūrvavadalakṣaṇam . na pramāṇāntaraṃ śābdampra॰ samu॰ 5 . 1 iti śloko
yathā na lakṣaṇaṃ tathedamapi liṅga-liṅginorgamaka-gamyaniyamārthakam . katamat taditi cet, ucyate—
yat tvayoktam tathāṅgamityādi . liṅgamaṅgaṃ dhūma-kṛtakatvādi liṅginam agnyanityatvādiviśiṣṭaṃ deśa-śabdādimarthaṃ nātikramya vartate yena rūpeṇa, kena ca nātivartate ? dhūma ityadhūmo na bhavati, kṛtaka ityakṛtako
na bhavati ityadhūmākṛtakanivṛttyātmanā nātikrāmati, tenaiva ca rūpeṇānyato vyāvṛttyātmakena gamayati,
sattva-dravyādyanekadharmāpi saṃstaistu vyabhicārānna gamayati sattvādisāmānyadharmairiti . eṣa tāvad gamakaniyamaḥ . gamyaniyamo'pi gamyanta ityādi . liṅginaḥ anubandhinaḥ sāmānyadharmāḥ sattva-dravyatvādayo gamyante

gamyante te'pi liṅgena liṅgino ye'nubandhinaḥ .viśeṣā na tu gamyante tasyaiva vyabhicāriṇaḥ ॥liṅgānubandhinastvarthā gamayanti na liṅginam .vyabhicārād viśeṣāstu pratītāḥ pratipādakāḥ ॥ pra॰ 16 1/2 samu॰ 2 . 18 1/2
kimaṅgam... ... ....... ... ...॥... ... ....... ... ...॥... ... ....... ... ...॥
yattūktaṃ na sarvatra liṅgini liṅgaṃ sambhavati yathā agniratra dhūmāt   tadidamapyaprekṣyavāditayā . yadi liṅgyeva tat sarvaṃ kathaṃ tasya liṅgaṃ nāsti ? atha nāsti liṅgaṃ
kathaṃ tadvān .
agnidhūmodāharaṇe ca agniratra iti nirdeśādagnimattvena deśasya sādhyatvādagnimati pradeśe sarvatra dhūmavattvaṃ liṅgamastyeva .
tairavinābhāvālliṅgasya . viśeṣāstauṣa-kārīṣādayo na gamyante tasyaiva, vyabhicāritvād liṅgasya
viśeṣaiḥ sahādṛṣṭatvāt . evaṃ liṅgasyānyavyāvṛttaṃ sāmānyaṃ gamakam, nāvyāvṛttamanyataḥ sattvādi . liṅginaḥ
sāmānyaṃ gamyaṃ nivṛttamanagnyādibhyo'gnitvaṃ sattvādi cāgnitvānubaddhamavyabhicārāditi .
liṅge tvayaṃ punarviśeṣaḥ --liṅgānubandhinastvarthā ityādiślokaḥ . pūrvodāhṛtāḥ sāmānyadharmāḥ
sattvādayo liṅgasya dhūmasya na gamayanti, uktakāraṇatvāt . viśeṣāstu kecid liṅgyavinābhāvinaḥ
pratītāḥ pratipādakāḥ pāṇḍutva-bahulatvādaya iti .
etat punaḥ kathaṃ pūrvavadalakṣaṇam ? ityata āha --kimaṅgamityādi ślokatrayaṃ kṣepaprastāreṇopanyastaṃ
samastasya tvaduktasyārthajātasya pūrvoktena na bhavati, na bhavati ityabhavanaparamārthatvāt khapuṣpavadabhāvena
gamyagamakaniyamo nāstyeveti gatārtham .
kiñcānyat, yattūktamityādi pūrvapakṣapratyuccāraṇaṃ yāvaddhūmāditi . yat svārthasyāṃśe'pi darśanād
gamakatvaṃ samarthayatoktaṃ na sarvatra liṅgini liṅgaṃ sambhavati iti, tadidamapyaprekṣyavāditayā,
na vāditākauśalamityabhiprāyaḥ . tad vyācaṣṭe --yadi liṅgyevetyādi . liṅgamasyāstīti liṅgi, yadi tat
sarvaṃ liṅgi bhasmāṅgārāyoguḍapākādyagnyākhyaṃ vastu kathaṃ tasya liṅgaṃ nāsti liṅgābhāve liṅgitvasyaivābhāvāt ? matvarthīyanirdeśyasya liṅgitvābhyupagamādeva liṅgāstitvamityabhiprāyaḥ . atha nāsti liṅgaṃ kathaṃ
tadvān ? liṅgamasyāsti iti liṅgavān liṅgītyarthaḥ, matvarthīyanirdeśyo na bhavitumarhati so'rthastannimittatvābhāvāditi svavacanavirodhi te vacanamiti .
agnidhūmodāharaṇe cetyādi . idaṃ tāvat praṣṭavyo'sti--agniratra dhūmāt iti idamaḥ pratyakṣaviṣayasya prātipadikasya saptamyantanirdeśe atra iti pratyakṣopalabhyadhūmādhārapradeśābhisambandho dhūmavattvāddhūmāditi yathā agniratra iti dhūmādhārapradeśapratyakṣanirdeśādagneḥ parokṣasya jijñāsitatvāt tadvattvena deśasya

ayoguḍāṅgārādyagnau dhūmāsambhavāditi cet, na, agnisattvasya siddhatvāt
tadviṣayaliṅgāliṅgatvāt tadaliṅgitvāt pratyakṣāviṣayavat . tadasiddhau pakṣadharmādinirmūlatvāt .
atra ityabhidheyasya liṅgitvādagnidhūmavattayośca vibhāgavivakṣāyāṃ sādhya-
sādhyatvāt, itarathā atra ityanarthako nirdeśaḥ syāt, tasmāt sarvalokaprasiddhe'gnimati pradeśe sādhye sarvatra
dhūmavattvaṃ liṅgamastyeva . na ca sarvāgnimatpradeśasādhyatvam, tatra dṛṣṭāntābhāvādasādhāraṇatādidoṣaprasaṅgāt .
tasmādasti sarvatra liṅgini liṅgamiti .
ayoguḍāṅgārādyagnau dhūmāsambhavāditi cet . syānmatam--sarvatra liṅgini liṅgaṃ nāsti,
ayognau guḍāgnāvaṅgārāgnau ca kanajvalatsvapikanatsvapi dhūmasya pratyakṣata evādarśanāditi . etacca na, agnisattvasya
siddhatvāt . na hi agniratra iti pratijñāyāṃ pratītamagnisāmānyaṃ sādhyate, agnisattāyāḥ pratītatvālloke
pratyakṣopalabdhadhūmabalena atra iti deśaviśiṣṭasyāpratyakṣasya sisādhayiṣitatvāt ayoguḍāṅgārabhasmacchannādyagniṣvapi dhūmamātrāyāḥ kasyāścid darśanāt tadavinābhāvāt . tadviṣayaliṅgāliṅgatvāditi, ayoguḍāṅgārādiviṣayasya liṅgasya dhūmasyāliṅgatvāt asattvādavivakṣitatvādapratyakṣatvādvetyarthaḥ . tadaliṅgitvāt
pratyakṣaviṣayavaditi, te hyayoguḍāṅgārādyagnayo na liṅgino liṅgābhāvāt teṣāṃ tasyāmavasthāyām, deśe ca
tasminnatijñātatvāt . liṅgyate ca liṅgadarśanabalena liṅgi vastu . na hi te liṅgyante liṅgādarśanād
liṅganirapekṣaprasiddheśca, yathā pratyakṣopalabdhikāle . tasmāt teṣāmaliṅgitvāt pratyakṣavadaliṅgaṃ dhūmasteṣām .
yatra cāsau liṅgaṃ tatra liṅgini deśe siddhatvādeva liṅgam, tatrā'siddheragnitvena deśe liṅgyeveti .
syānmatam--ayognyādīnāmapyasiddhatvāt pakṣāntargatatve sati ucyate--na sarvatra liṅgini agnimati
dṛśyate dhūma iti . etadayuktam, tadasiddhau pakṣadharmādinirmūlatvāt, teṣāmapyayognyādīnāṃ sādhyatve
dhūmaḥ sarvatra dharmiṇyabhāvādavyāpī pakṣadharmo'siddhau vanaspaticaitanye svāpavat syāt . deśaviśeṣānapekṣāgnisāmānyasādhyatve sapakṣābhāvādasādhāraṇatvam atra ityabhidhānavaiyarthyaṃ ca syāt . tanmā bhūditi
atra śabdavācyasyāgniviśiṣṭasya dhūmaviśiṣṭatvena svayamātmanaiva ātmanaḥ sādhyatvāt sādhanatvācca
liṅgitvaṃ liṅgatvaṃ cetyata āha --atra ityabhidheyasya liṅgitvādagnimaddhūmavattayośca vibhāgavivakṣāyāṃ sādhyasādhanadharmabhāvāditi . sa eva hi pradeśo'gnimattvena sādhyo'pratyakṣāgnikatvāt,


sādhanadharmabhāvālliṅgini liṅgasyāsambhavo na sambhavati tayostatraiva pradhānopasarjanabhāvena parasparaṃ niyatabhāvatvāt .
agnimatpradeśaparicicchitsāyām... ... ...tatsambandhimatpratipattiśca, yadi
ca tasya deśasya... ... ...talliṅgatāṃ labhate, tayorekavastudharmatvāt . nāsambhavan
dhūmo liṅgatāṃ labhate apakṣadharmatvāt . vanaspaticaitanye svāpavadū dhūmaḥ sandehahetuḥ
syāt pakṣāvyāpisādhanadharmatvāt tatpratipattyādhānādhāradharmabhāvātmakapratyayāvyavasthānakāraṇatvāt sthāṇupuruṣabhāvābhāvapratipattivat .
dhūmavattvena sādhanaṃ pratyakṣadhūmakatvāt . tasmādviśiṣṭadeśasādhyasādhanadharmabhāvād liṅgini sādhye liṅgasya
sādhanasya asambhavo na sambhavati, sambhava eva sambhavatītyarthaḥ . kasmāt ? tayostatraiva pradhānopasarjanabhāvena parasparaṃ niyatabhāvatvāt, agniḥ pradhānaṃ dhūmanirvṛttau, dhūmasyāgnipariṇāmatvāt tannirvartyatvāt . dhūma upasarjanamagninirvṛttau, tatpariṇāmatvābhāvādatannirvartyatvāt . dhūmaḥ pradhānamagnigatau, talliṅgatvāt tamantareṇānirvṛtteranupapatteravinābhāvāt . upasarjanamagnirdhūmagatau, apratyakṣatvāt tatkāladeśayoḥ,
anyathā bhavatyevetyuktatvāt tenānyonyapradhānopasarjanabhāvena niyamena bhavantau tau dharmāvagnidhūmākhyau deśasyaikasya bhedavivakṣāyāṃ sādhya-sādhane bhavataḥ .
tadvyākhyā --agnimatpradeśaparicicchitsāyāmityādi pūrvaṃ gamakatvena liṅgasya dhūmasya prādhānyaṃ
gamyasya liṅgino'gnerguṇabhāvaṃ darśayati yāvat tatsambandhimatpratipattiśceti . tataḥ paraṃ yadi ca tasya deśasyetyādinā nirvṛttāvagneḥ prādhānyaṃ dhūmāprādhānyaṃ ca yāvat talliṅgatāṃ labhata iti . pakṣadharmatva-sapakṣānugati-
vipakṣavyāvṛttirūpatāṃ vyākhyāya dhūmasya pūrveṇāgnisādhyatāṃ gamayati . uttareṇāgniviśiṣṭadeśasādhyatvaṃ vyākhyāya
tadbalanirvṛttadhūmapratyakṣatāyāṃ trailakṣaṇyena gamakatvaṃ dhūmasya vyācaṣṭe . tayorekavastudharmatvāditi, etaduktaṃ
bhavati--sambhavatoreva liṅgaliṅginoḥ sādhyasādhanabhāvo'nvayaprādhānyāt nāpohaprādhānyāt . na cedicchasi
tato'niṣṭāpādanasādhanam --nāsambhavan dhūmo liṅgatāṃ labhate, apakṣadharmatvāt . tvanmatādeva sarvaliṅginyasambhavāt siddhamapakṣadharmatvam . yatra yatrāpakṣadharmatvaṃ tatra tatra talliṅgatvābhāvaḥ, yathā tasmin
pradeśe'nagnidhūmāderadhūmāyognyādikāle vā . kiñcānyat, prākcchabde vyākhyātamadhunā liṅge'pyucyate
vanaspaticaitanye svāpavadityādi . agnimānayaṃ deśaḥ dhūmavattvāt ityasmin sādhane tvadabhimatyā dhūmaḥ
sandehahetuḥ syāt, pakṣāvyāpisādhanadharmatvāt, tadvyākhyā --tatpratipattyādhānetyādi daṇḍakahetuḥ .
tasya pratipattistatpratipattiḥ, tasyā ādhānaṃ tatpratipattyādhānam, tasyādhāro dharmaḥ, tasya bhāva ātmā yasya
sa bhavati tatpratipattyādhānādhāradharmabhāvātmakaḥ pratyayo yathāsmābhirvyākhyātaḥ . tasya pratyayasyāvyavasthāne
kāraṇībhavati sa dhūmastvanmatena pakṣāvyāpisādhanadharmatvāt sarvatra liṅginyabhāvādaniyataliṅgisambhavatvāt .
kimiva ? sthāṇu-puruṣabhāvābhāvapratipattivat . yathā sthāṇāvabhavan vastrasaṃyamanādidharmaḥ puruṣe ca bhavan

yattu tadanyatrāyoguḍāṅgārāgnyādāvadarśanaṃ tarkyate dhūmasya tatra darśanābhāve
liṅgatvāvyākhyānādadoṣa eva . liṅginyadarśane tu syād doṣaḥ .
evaṃ cānenaiva nyāyena yastadviparītaḥ prakāśyaprakāśakatvabhedapāṭhaḥ so'pyasamyak--sambandho yadyapi dviṣṭhaḥ sahabhāvyaṅgaliṅginoḥ .ādhārādheyavadvṛttistasya saṃyogivanna tu ॥
sthāṇuḥ iti pratipattyādhānādhārabhāvātmakapratyayāvyavasthānakāraṇatvāt dviviṣayasandehakṛdekadobhayatrābhāvāt kiṃ sthāṇuḥ syāt kiṃ puruṣaḥ syāt tathā vayonilayanādiḥ puṃsi abhavan sthāṇau bhavannubhayaviṣayaṃ
saṃśayaṃ karoti . yatra dṛṣṭastatra niścayahetureva sthāṇau vayonilayanaṃ puruṣe ca vastrasaṃyamanam, tatra bhavanāt .
tathāyamapi agniratra dhūmāt iti sandehahetuḥ syāt sādhye bhavanāniyamāt .
yattu tadityādi . yat tvayedaṃ sādhyādanyatrāyoguḍāṅgārāgnyādāvadarśanaṃ pratyakṣatastarkyate dhūmasya tatra
sapakṣe liṅgasya sarvatra darśanābhāve liṅgatvāvyākhyānādadoṣa eva . liṅginyadarśane tu syād doṣaḥ, liṅgī
cātra pradeśaḥ pratyakṣadhūmasambandhī, tatra sarvatra dṛśyata eva . tasmād bhrāntavacanametat sarvatra liṅginyadarśanānna dṛṣṭavat pratipattiḥ   iti .
kiñcānyat, evaṃ cetyādi . anenaiva nyāyena darśabalādeva gamayati ityuktena yastadviparītaḥ
prakāśyaprakāśakatvabhedapāṭhaḥ so'pyasamyak . katamo'sāviti cet, ucyate --sambandho yadyapi dviṣṭha
ityādikārikāḥ sabhāṣyāḥ . tadyathā --nanu dvigatatvāt sambandhasya saṃyogivad liṅgidharmaṇā liṅgena
bhavitavyam iti codite naitadasti, sambandho yadyapi dviṣṭhaḥ pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 2 . 19 ityādi . yathā hi

yathā hi satyapi dvigatatve sambandhasya na kadācidādhāra ādheyadharmā bhavati nāpyādheya ādhāradharmā tathā na kadācilliṅgaṃ liṅgi bhavati liṅgi vā liṅgam . saṃyogī tu yathaikastathā dvitīya iti na
tadvadiha . tathāhi--liṅge liṅgi bhavatyeva liṅginyevetarat punaḥ .niyamasya viparyāse sambandho liṅgaliṅginoḥ ॥
yasmālliṃṅge liṅgi bhavatyeva tasmādyuktaṃ yadagnivad dhūmo dravyatvādīnāmapi prakāśako na taikṣṇyādīnām . yasmācca liṅginyeva liṅgaṃ bhavati nānyatra tasmād yuktaṃ yad dhūmo dhūmatveneva pāṇḍutvādibhirapi
prakāśayati na dravyatvādibhiriti . evaṃ hi avadhāraṇavaiparītyena sambandho liṅgaliṅginoḥ .
nanu ca liṅgamapi liṅgini bhavatyeva yathā kṛtakatvamanityatve--kāmaṃ liṅgamapi vyāpi liṅginyaṅgi tu tattataḥ .vyāpitvānna tu tattasya gamakaṃ goviṣāṇavat ॥
yadyapi kiñcilliṅgaṃ liṅgini bhavatyeva na tu tattena vyāpitvena liṅginaṃ gamayati . tadyathā--viṣāṇitvena govyāpitve'pi na goprakāśakatvam, vyāpitvāttu tadeva gotvena prakāśyaṃ bhavati, tadvadiheti . kiṃ
satyapi dvigatatve sambandhasya na kadācidādhāra ādheyadharmā bhavati nāpyādheya ādhāradharmā tathā na kadācilliṅgaṃ liṅgi bhavati liṅgi vā liṅgam . saṃyogī tu yathaikastathā dvitīya iti na tadvadiha .
tathāhi --liṅge liṅgi bhavatyevetyādi ślokaḥ . yasmācca liṅge liṅgi bhavatyeva tasmād yuktaṃ
yadagnivad dhūmo dravyatvādīnāmapi prakāśako na taikṣṇyādīnām . yasmācca liṅginyeva liṅgaṃ bhavati nānyatra
tasmādyuktaṃ yad dhūmo dhūmatveneva pāṇḍutvādibhirapi prakāśayati na dravyatvādibhiriti . evaṃ hi avadhāraṇa-
vaiparītyena sambandho liṅgaliṅginoḥ .
nanu ca liṅgamapi liṅgini bhavatyeva yathā kṛtakatvamanityatve, kāmaṃ liṅgamapi vyāpītyādi .
yadyapi kiñcid liṅgaṃ liṅgini bhavatyeva, na tu tatvettena vyāpitvena liṅginaṃ gamayati . tadyathā—
viṣāṇitvena govyāpitve'pi na goprakāśakatvam, vyāpitvāttu tadeva gotvena prakāśyaṃ bhavati tadvadiheti .




kāraṇam ?

pratiṣedhyāpracāreṇa yasmādvyāptirapekṣyate .
liṅgasya liṅgini vyāptistasmāt satyapyakāraṇam ॥

kṛtakatvasya hi anityārthavyāpitve'pi nityatvapratiṣedhena gamakatvam . evamanityatvasya kṛtakārthavyāpitve'pi akṛtakatvapratiṣedhena gamakatvam . tasmād yadanityārthe'pi kṛtakatvavyāpitvaṃ tenākṛtakatvānavakāśādanityatvena kṛtakatvasyākṛtakatvapratiṣedhena gamyataiva syād na gamakatvam .

tulyamiti cet, na, viṣāṇitve vyabhicārāt . āha ca--

nāśinaḥ kṛtakatvena vyāpterakṛtakaṃ na tat .
nityābhāvastu vyāptatvāt kṛtakārthe na darśyate ॥


viṣāṇitvena gaurvyāpto'viṣāṇitvaṃ nivartayet .
viṣāṇitvena gaurvyāpto'gavārthaṃ na nivartayet ॥
iti nirdiṣṭaṃ svārthānumānam pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 2 . 19 1/2--24 1/2 .


kiṃ kāraṇam ? pratiṣedhyāpracāreṇetyādi ślokaḥ . kṛtakatvasya hi anityārthavyāpitve'pi nityatvapratiṣedhena gamakatvam, tathā anityatvasya kṛtakārthavyāpitve'pi akṛtakatvapratiṣedhena gamakatvam . tasmād
yadanityārthe'pi kṛtakatvavyāpitvaṃ tenākṛtakatvānavakāśādanityatvena kṛtakatvasyākṛtakatvapratiṣedhena gamyataiva
syānna gamakatvam . tulyamiti cet, na, viṣāṇitve vyabhicārāditi .
āha cetyādi etasyārthasya nidarśane bhāvanārthe kārike --nāśinaḥ kṛtakatvenetyādi viṣāṇitvenetyādi ca . pūrvayā kārikayā kṛtakatvenānityatvaṃ vyāptaṃ na sādhanamavivakṣitatvāt . yasmād nityābhāvo'nityatvaṃ kṛtake'rthe na pradarśyate--yadanityaṃ tat kṛtakamiti, kiṃ tarhi ? nityābhāvenākṛtakābhāvasya kṛtakasya
vyāptervivakṣitatvāt kṛtakatve'rthe'nityatvaṃ pradarśyate--yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityamapimiti . dvitīyayā tasyārthasya
sphuṭīkaraṇārthaṃ vivakṣitāvivakṣitayorvyāptyorvyabhicārāvyabhicāranidarśanaṃ kriyate . viṣāṇitvād gauḥ iti
vyabhicarati, gotvād viṣāṇī iti na vyabhicarati, ato na gamayati gamayati ceti pratiṣedhyāpracārarūpā vyāptirgamayati na vidheyapracārarūpeti nirdiṣṭaṃ svārthamanumānaṃ gamyagamakaniyamavyavasthoktermayaiva
na vādavidhikārādibhirityāhopuruṣikayopasaṃharatyānyāpohikaḥ .



atrocyate--

tadbhāvadarśanādeva sādhyasādhanadharmayoḥ .
vidheḥ saṃyogivadvṛttirādhārādheyavanna tu ॥

tadbhāvadarśanaṃ yat tad bhavati tenaiva bhūyate tadbhāvasya darśanādeva dhūmo'gniṃ
gamayati . atadabhāvānvayaśabdārthatāyāmadhūmasya paṭasyābhāvo ghaṭo vandhyāputro vā
syāt, tathānagneḥ pavanasyābhāva udakaṃ khapuṣpaṃ vā syādasambaddham . tatra ityabhūtānvayasādhanārthātathārthatvāt . tadbhāvadarśanādeva tu sādhyasādhanadharmayostathābhūtānvayadarśanāt saṃyoginoriva vṛttiriṣṭā, na tvādhārādheyavadatulyā, dvayorapi liṅginyādhāre parasparapratyayādhārādheyapradhānopasarjanabhāvenāvinābhāvādekavastudharmatvāt
kṛtakānityatvavat .

atrāsmābhirucyate --tadbhāvadarśanādevetyādi ślokastadviparītārthaḥ saṃyogivad nādhārādheyavaditi .
tadbhāvadarśanaṃ yat tadityādi, sa evāgnirdhūmo bhavati, tenaivāgninā dhūmena bhūyate taddeśendhanādisambaddhena,
nānyena ayognyādinā'bādinā vā dhūmena bhūyate, na so'gnirdhūmo na bhavati bhavatyeveti tadbhāvasyāsvanivṛttihetubhāvābhūtasya darśanādeva dhūmo dhūmo bhavannevāgniṃ gamayati, na yatra na dṛṣṭastadavacchedena tvanmatena
adhūmo na bhavati yatastasmādanagnirna bhavati iti, tadbhāvāgrahaṇe doṣadarśanāt . ko doṣa iti cet,
ucyate --atadabhāvānvayaśabdārthatāyāṃ vidhirūpatadbhāvānvayaśabdārthaviparītakalpanāyām agniratra
dhūmāt ityasminnanumāne'gnidhūmavipakṣavyāvṛttimātreṣṭāvaniṣṭam adhūmasya paṭasyābhāvo ghaṭo vandhyāputro
vā syāt, aniṣṭaṃ caitat . eṣa liṅge doṣaḥ . liṅginyapi tathānagneḥ pavanasyābhāva udakaṃ khapuṣpaṃ vā
syādasambaddham, aniṣṭaṃ caitadapi . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tatretyabhūtānvayasādhanārthātathārthatvāt, yatra
dhūmastatrāgniḥ ityanvayasahitaḥ sādhanārthastathārthaḥ satyastadbhāvāt tatpradeśasambandhyagnidhūmabhāvāt, anyathā
tvadiṣṭātadabhāvātmakasya abhūtānvayasādhanārthasyātathārthatvādanantaranirdiṣṭāniṣṭaprāptiḥ . ata eva tarhi asmadiṣṭatadbhāvadarśanādeva tu sādhyasādhanadharmayoḥ agnidhūmayostathābhūtānvayadarśanahetoḥ saṃyogino-
raṅgulyoriva yathaikasya tathā dvitīyasyāpi tadbhāvāviśiṣṭā vṛttiriṣṭā, na tvādhārādheyavadatulyā, yathā
ādhāra ādhāra eva, ādheya ādheya eva, na viparyayeṇeti . kasmāt ? dvayorapi liṅgini ādhāre
deśendhanādau parasparapratyayādhārādheyapradhānopasarjanabhāvenāvinābhāvāt, prāgvyākhyātanirvartakagamyabhāvena ekavastudharmatvāt, kṛtakānityatvavat, yathā hi prāgabhāva-pradhvaṃsābhāvalakṣaṇa eka eva hyabhūtvā
bhavan bhūtvā cābhavan kṛtakaścānityaśca bhāvaḥ sādhya-sādhanākhyāṃ labhate tatheha agni-dhūmākhya eka eva

evaṃ ca sapakṣe sādhyasādhanadharmayoḥ sahabhāvadarśanārthamanvayavṛttyā sādharmyadṛṣṭānta ucyate tathāpratyakṣasambandhitvavivakṣāyāḥ .
prasiddhasya dharmasya sādhanatvādaprasiddhasya sādhyatvāt kuto liṅgaliṅgivyatikaradoṣāśaṅkā ? dharmiṇa evaikasya liṅgatvālliṅgitvācca, aliṅgatvād dhūmasyāpi
aliṅgitvāccāgneḥ .
yat punaridaṃ sambandhavādinaḥ prati liṅgaliṅgyaikarūpyāpādanameṣo'nyāyaḥ .
ko'yaṃ niyamaḥ sambandhinā dvitīyasambandhirūpeṇa bhavitavyamiti . na hi caitrā-
sādhya-sādhanavyapadeśaṃ labhate pradeśendhanādirbhāvaḥ . tasmāt sādhya-sādhanadharmayorliṅginyādhāre parasparapratyayādhārādheyapradhānopasarjanabhāvenāvinābhāvāt saṃyogivadvṛttiḥ, na tu kuṇḍabadarayorādhārādheyayoriva vṛttiḥ,
anumāne tulyakakṣatvādubhayoriti .
evaṃ ca sapakṣetyādi . etameva cāsmaduktaṃ nyāyamupodvalayati sādharmyadṛṣṭāntaprayogo lokaprasiddho
nyāyaśāstre ca . tadyathā--yatra dhūmastatrāgniḥ, yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityam iti sapakṣe sādhya-sādhanadharmayoḥ
agnidhūmayoḥ kṛtakānityatayośca tadvati deśāntare vastvantare vā ghaṭādau sahabhāvadarśanārthamanvayavṛttyā
sādharmyadṛṣṭānta ucyate . kasmāt ? tathāpratyakṣasambandhitvavivakṣāyā hetoḥ, prasiddhasya sādhanadharmatvena
aprasiddhasya ca sādhyadharmatvena vivakṣitatvādityarthaḥ .
yat punaratrāśaṅkyate tvayā --liṅgasya liṅgitvaṃ liṅgino vā liṅgatvaṃ prasaktam  
iti, etasyā āśaṅkāyā anupapattireva, prasiddhasya dharmasya sādhanatvādaprasiddhasya sādhyatvāt kuto
liṅgaliṅgivyatikaradoṣāśaṅkā liṅgaikadoṣāśaṅkānupapattirevetyarthaḥ . dharmiṇa evaikasya pradeśa-śabdāderliṅgatvād liṅgitvāccāliṅgaikadeśatvādvā liṅginaḥ, dharmyeva liṅgaṃ liṅgī ceti kṛtvā nāgnirliṅgī na dhūmo liṅgaṃ
tathā kṛtakānityatve . tasmādaliṅgatvād dhūmasyāpi nāliṅgitvādeva, aliṅgitvāccāgneḥ nāliṅgatvādeva .
tasmāt pratyakṣetarasambandhitvavivakṣitatvād na saṅkīryeyātāṃ liṅgaliṅginau . ataḥ prasiddhadharmaliṅgadvāreṇa
aprasiddhadharmaliṅgidvāreṇa caikasyaiva sādhanatvāt sādhyatvācca vyavasthitameva liṅgaliṅgitvamiti .
yat punaridaṃ sambandhavādinaḥ pratītyādi . yadetad liṅgaliṅgyaikarūpyāpādanameṣo'nyāyaḥ,
ko'yaṃ niyamaḥ--sambandhinā dvitīyasambandhirūpeṇa bhavitavyam iti ? naiṣa niyamo'sti pratyakṣāpratyakṣatvaviśeṣadarśanād dhūmāgnyādiṣu . taddarśayati --na hi caitrāśvetyādi, sva-svāmyādisaptavidhasambandheṣu
caitrāśvādisambandhināṃ pratyakṣāpratyakṣāṇāṃ na hi niyamo'sti--ekaḥ pratyakṣa iti dvitīyenāpi pratyakṣeṇa

śvādisambandhināmekaḥ pratyakṣa iti dvitīyenāpi pratyakṣeṇa bhavitavyam . tathā
saṃyogitvasādhyasādhakatva... ... ...yathaikaḥ saṃyogī tathā dvitīyaḥ .
ata eva caivaṃ vaktumayuktam--yathāhi satyapi dvigatatve sambandhasya na kadācidādhāra
ādheyadharmā bhavati nāpyādheya ādhāradharmā tathā na kadācilliṅgaṃ liṅgi bhavati liṅgi vā liṅgam .
saṃyogī tu yathaikastathā dvitīya iti tadvadiha na bhavati pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 2 . 19 1/2 iti .
tanna ghaṭate . nanu tadvadeveha . saṃyoginorapi na yathaikasya saṃyogastathā dvitīyasya,
saṃyogitvāt, sthāṇvādisaṃyogavat .
yattūktam--idaṃ punarvaktavyam--kena prakāreṇa sambandhādekasmāt pratyakṣāditi . yadi svatvādinā
bhavitavyaṃ ceti . tathā saṃyogitvasādhyasādhakatvetyādi gatārthe yathāsaṅkhyaṃ nidarśane yāvad yathaikaḥ
saṃyogī tathā dvitīya iti, na hi iti vartate, uktādeva nyāyādayuktamevaṃ bhavitum .
ata eva caivaṃ vaktumayuktaṃ yathā tvayā yata evaṃ visrabdhamucyate guṇadoṣavicāranirapekṣeṇa
niḥśaṅkena . katamadayuktamiti cet, idaṃ tad darśyate'smābhiḥ --yathā hi satyapi dvigatatva ityādi
yāvat tadvadiha na bhavatīti saṃyoginoratulya ādhārādheyoriva na bhavatīti .
tanna ghaṭata iti . tatra vayaṃ tanna ghaṭata iti brūmaḥ . tadyathā --nanu tadvadeveha ādhārādheyavadeva,
saṃyoginorapi liṅgaliṅginordhūmāgnyorna yathaikasya pratyakṣasya saṃyogastathā dvitīyasyāpratyakṣasyeti pakṣaḥ,
saṃyogitvāditi hetuḥ . sthāṇvādisaṃyogivaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, yathā hi sthāṇuśyenayoḥ saṃyoginoḥ sthāṇorakarmaṇaḥ śyenasya sakarmaṇaśca saṃyogaḥ sakarmākarmakatvābhyāmatulyaḥ tathā malla-dvyaṅgulākāśādisaṃyogasaṃyogināṃ tathā caitrāśvādīnāmapyatyantapriyavāhanāditvādyupalakṣitatve pratyakṣāpratyakṣāditvainaiva viśeṣa iti .
yatrūṇāyattūktamityādi sambandhavādinameva prati ānyāpohikena paryanuyujya yaduktaṃ doṣajātam—

tataḥ svāmisambandhitvāt svasya svāmyāyattatvāduttarakālaṃ smṛtiranarthikā . athānyathā, tannoktam .
pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 2 . 37 iti .
atra brūmaḥ--na kiñcidatra noktam . tatsambandhipratyakṣāt tathaivānumānāva-
yadi svasvāmibhāvena pratyakṣaḥ sambandhyekastato dvitīyasya svasya svāmino vā tena sahaiva gatatvādanyonyāpekṣatvācca sambandhasya śeṣasiddhyarthaṃ smṛtyānarthakyam . dṛśyate ca smṛtibalena śeṣasiddhiḥ . tasmāt svatvādipratyakṣatvādayuktamuktam . athānyathā, atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣa iti svasvāmitvādibhyo'nyena kenacit prakāreṇa
pratyakṣaḥ sambandhyekaḥ tatastatsambandhasmaraṇādanumānamiti manyethāḥ tanna bhavati tasya prakārasyānuktatvāt
svasvāmyādibhāvena sambandhāt iti vacanāt sva-svāmibhāvena vā prakṛti-vikārabhāvena vā kāryakāraṇabhāvena vā nimitta-naimittikabhāvena vā mātrā-mātrikabhāvena vā sahacaribhāvena vā vadhya-ghātakabhāvena vā kaścidarthaḥ kasyacidindriyasya pratyakṣo bhavati iti tebhyo'tiriktasyāvacanādeteṣāmeva vacanāditi .
etasmin parokte doṣajāte parihāraṃ brūmaḥ --na kiñcidatra noktam . vaktavyamaśeṣamuktamityabhiprāyaḥ .

tāraṇāt . dvayostu sambandhinorupalabdhe sambandhe'nyatarapratyakṣatvottarakālamupalabdhacarasambandhānusāriṇī smṛtiḥ kimityanarthikā syāt, agnyapekṣadhūmavat ?
evaṃ ca kṛtvoktam--kaścidarthaḥ kasyacidindriyasya pratyakṣo bhavati . tasmādidānīmindriyapratyakṣādarthāt pūrvaṃ samudāye kṛtasambandhamatiraviśiṣṭasyārthasyāstitvaṃ pratipadyate, yathā pūrvaṃ dhūmāgnyoḥ
sambandhaṃ dṛṣṭvā dhūmadarśanādagnerastitvaṃ pratipadyate   iti .
yattu tena pratyucyate--liṅgagrahaṇe tulyamiti cet pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 2 . 37, tat tathaiva .
ahamapyevaṃ bruve--liṅgisambandhitvālliṅgasya liṅgyapekṣameva liṅgatvamiti yadi
liṅgaṃ gṛhītaṃ tena sahaiva liṅgī gṛhītaḥ . athānyathā, tannoktam .
yasmāduktabhedāt sambandhādanumānam, tacca tatsambandhipratyakṣāt ekasmāt pratyakṣāt   iti
vacanāt tenaiva prakāreṇānumānāvatāraṇāt . tadvyācaṣṭe --dvayostu sambandhinorityādi yāvadagnyapekṣadhūmavat . yathā dhūmaḥ pratyakṣa eko bahula-vartulorddha-pāṇḍutvādiviśeṣeṇāgnyavinābhāvirūpeṇa viśiṣṭaḥ
pratyāsanne deśe'gniṃ gamayati viśeṣāṇāmavinābhāvināṃ gamakatvādaśvasyābharaṇa-mardanapriyatvādiviśeṣāścaitrāvinābhāvinaścaitraṃ sambandhādeva gamayanti tathā caitrasya vā viśeṣā ārohaka-poṣaka-tadguṇaraktatvādayo'śvāvinābhāvino'śvaṃ gamayantyevetyupalabdhe sambandhe'nyatarapratyakṣatvottarakālaṃ yatrāyaṃ pratyakṣo'śvaścaitro vā
tatretaro'pi iti yā upalabdhacarasambandhānusāriṇī smṛtiḥ sā kimityanarthikā syāt ? naivānarthiketyarthaḥ .
kimiva ? agnyapekṣadhūmavat . yathāgnijanyātmalābho dhūmaḥ proktaviśeṣayukto'gneḥ sambandhasmaraṇāt
pratyakṣo'pratyakṣasya sambandhino'numānāyālam, agnirvā pratyakṣo'pratyakṣasya tatpariṇāmatvād bhāvi-bhūtadeśakālasambandhī sambandhina evaikasya pratyakṣatvāt sambandhāddhādekasmāt pratyakṣāccheṣasiddhiranumānam
  iti vā pāṭhāt sambandhina eva pratyakṣasya samānādhikaraṇokteḥ .
evaṃ ca kṛtvoktamityasyaiva lakṣaṇasya bhāṣyaṃ jñāpakamāha kaścidarthaḥ kasyacidindriyasya pratyakṣa
ityādi sāmānyavācinā kiṃvṛttena yāvadagnerastitvaṃ pratipadyata iti . avaśiṣṭasyāviśiṣṭasyeti vā
pāṭhaḥ, avaśiṣṭasya apratyakṣasya, aviśiṣṭasya darśanakālatulyasya taddeśavartino veti . śeṣo gatārtho granthaḥ .
yattu tenetyādi . svāmisambandhitvāt svasya svāmyapekṣameva svatvamityuttarakālaṃ smṛterānarthakyaṃ
prāptam ityatra tena ānyāpohikena pratyucyate paramatamāśaṅkya --liṅgagrahaṇe tulyamiti cet . syānmatam—
smṛterānarthakyaṃ sva-svāmyādisambandhipratyakṣatvāt ityetalliṅga-liṅginoḥ sambandhāviśeṣāt samānaṃ doṣajātamiti . tat tathaiva, yadyeṣa doṣaḥ syāt svasvāmyāditve liṅge'pi syādevāyaṃ liṅgaliṅginoranyonyāpekṣatvāt . atha tatra neṣyate, svasvāmyādiṣvapi mā bhūditi suṣṭhacyate --ahamapyevaṃ bravebruve, kasmāt ? liṅgi

yattūcyate--na, tasya sambandhitvenāgrahaṇāt . liṅgamanumeyasthaṃ pūrvaṃ dhūmāditvena gṛhyate paścāttasyāgnyādibhiravinābhāvitvaṃ smaryate pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 2 . 37 iti . tadihāpi tulyam, anumeyasthaṃ svaṃ pūrvaṃ gṛhyate paścāt tatrasthaścaitro'vinābhāvīti smaryate na taddeśasambandhīti, deśādisthānagnidhūmavat .
yattūktam--svasvāmyādisambandhāccheṣasiddhiranumānam ityayuktamidam, kasmāt ? avyutpannasya tadgateḥ . dṛṣṭaḥ svasvāmyādisambandhānabhijñānāmapi avinābhāvitvamātropalabdherniścayaḥ, na cāgṛhītaḥ
sambandho'numānasya kāraṇam, jñānakāraṇatvena tasya jñāpakatvāt pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 2 . 37 iti .
etadayuktam, avinābhāvitvasya sahacaribhāvasambandhatvāt tasmādapi yo
niścayaḥ so'pi svāmyādyarthavyutpannānāmeva bhavati tadāditvāt sahacaribhāvasya .
sambadhitvālliṅgasyetyādi tattulyatvapradarśanaṃ gatārthaṃ yāvad liṅgī gṛhīta iti . athānyathā tannoktamiti, yathānyāṃstvamuddhaṭṭayasi svāmyāditvenāgrahaṇe'nyathā grahaṇaṃ cet tannoktamiti tathā vayamapi tvāmuddhaṭṭayāmaḥ--anyathā liṅge grahaṇaṃ svasvāmyādiṣu anyatheti cenmanyase tannoktamiti .
atra yattūcyate tvayā--mā maṃsthā liṅgagrahaṇe tulyamiti, liṅge tvasti viśeṣaḥ --na, tasya sambandhitvenāgrahaṇāt . na hi liṅgaṃ sambandhitvamātreṇa gṛhyate, kiṃ tarhi ? anumeyadeśasthaṃ dhūmāditvena
pūrvaṃ gṛhyate, paścāt tasyāgnyādibhiravinābhāvitvaṃ smaryate, ādigrahaṇācchabdasya kṛtakāditvena prāg
grahaṇaṃ paścādanityatvāvinābhāvitvena smaryata iti sarvatra vyāpīti . atrocyate --tadihāpi tulyamityādi .
tattulyatvabhāvanam --anumeyasthamityādi yāvanna taddeśasambandhīti gatārtham . deśādisthānagnidhūmavaditi
dṛṣṭāntaḥ, yathā'gnirabhavan dhūmo deśādisthaḥ prāg gṛhyate pratyakṣo'pratyakṣāgneranyatvāt tataḥ paścāt agniriha
ityanusmaryate tathāśvaḥ svaṃ caitrādanyo gṛhyate grāmādisthaḥ tataḥ paścāt tatrasthaścaitro'vinābhāvīti smaryate
ihāgniḥ iti dhūmasambandhyagnismaraṇavaditi tulyamiti .
yattūktamityādi . svasvāmyādisambandhena sambandhāccheṣasiddhiranumānam ityasya lakṣaṇasya
doṣastenoktaḥ, atra brūmaḥ --ayuktamidam . kasmāt ? avyutpannasya tadgaterityādi tanmatapratyuccāraṇaṃ
yāvajjñāpakatvāditi, svasvāmyādisambandhānabhijñā api dhūmādagnimavinābhāvasambandhād niścinvanto
dṛśyante, sa ca mā bhūdagṛhītasambandhatvānniścayaḥ, jñānakāraṇatvaṃ hi jñāpakasya hetorliṅgādergṛhītasvarūpasya
notpādakabījādivaditi .
etadayuktam . kasmāt ? avinābhāvitvasya sahacaribhāvasambandhatvāt, na vinā bhavati saha
bhavati saha caratītyeko'rthaḥ . tasmādapi sahacaribhāvasambandhād yo niścayaḥ so'pi svāmyādyarthavyutpannānāmeva
bhavati, nāvyutpannānām . kasmāt ? tadāditvāt svasvāmyāditvāt sahacaribhāvasya, saptānāṃ sambandhānā

avinābhāvagamyātiriktārthaviṣayatvena tu sahacaribhāvādṛte'pi svasvāmyādisambandhavyutpannabuddherevānumānaṃ dṛśyate . tadyathā--kākabhavana-tatsvīkṛtatatprasavakāla-tatkṛtanīḍaprasavā-'ṇḍabheda-vivṛddhi-poṣaṇa-kākaśāvakasahacaraṇa-kākīpṛṣṭhagamanāni na kāraṇāni kokilatvajñānasya vyāpitvāvinābhāvirūpopetatāyāmapi
svasvāmibhāvapratyavagamanādārāt . paścāt tatpratipattiḥ svasvāmisambandhena bhavati
kokilaśāvako'yam, tatsvabhāṣāsamanvitatvāt, itarakokilavat .
evaṃ svasvāmyādisambandhā anumāpakāḥ, anumeyavyaktikāle tathopalabhyamānatvāt, tatprasiddhaliṅgavat .
manyatamatvāt tasyāpi . sa ca sahacaribhāvo'vinābhāvo gṛhyamāṇa evānumānakāraṇaṃ jñātajñānotpattihetutvājjñāpakasya . tasmādavinābhāvasambandhajñānaṃ svasvāmyādyantaḥpāti vyutpannānāmeva nāvyutpannānāmiti .
athavā vināpyavinābhāvitvena svasvāmyādivyutpatteranumetyata āha --avinābhāvagamyātiriktā-
rthaviṣayatvena tvityādi yāvaditarakokilavaditi sādhanenopasaṃhāro'syārthasya .
vyāpako yaḥ sa evāṃśo grāhyo vyāpyastu sūcakaḥ .anekadharmaṇornānyo grāhya-grāhakadharmaṇoḥ ॥  
ityetallakṣaṇavaiparītyena sahacaribhāvādṛte'pi svasvāmyādisambandhavyutpannabuddherevānumānaṃ dṛśyate, tadyathā—
kākabhavanetyādi samāsadaṇḍako vyāpaka-vyāpyatvābhyāṃ sahacaribhāvapradarśane yāvad vyāpitvāvinābhāvirūpopetatāyāmapīti, kākājjanma vyāpīti tatsvīkṛtastatprasavakālaḥ, tatkṛtanīḍaprasavaḥ, aṇḍabhedaḥ,
vivṛddhiḥ, kākena kākyā ca poṣaṇaṃ vātsalyena, tasya dvitīyena kākaśāvakena sahacaraṇam, kākyāḥ pṛṣṭhato
gamanamityetāni pūrvapūrvakāṇi vyāpakāni sādhyāni uttarottarāṇi vyāpyāni sādhakābhimatāni avinābhāvasambandhīni dharmāntarāṇi santyapi na kāraṇāni tāni kokilatvajñānasya . yāvadā kutaḥ ? svasvāmibhāvapratyavagamanādārāt, yāvat svasvāmisambandhaṃ nāvaiti tāvat kokilatvāpratipatteḥ paścāt tatpratipattiḥ
svasvāmisambandhena bhavati, tata uttarakālaṃ kokilaśāvako'yaṃ na kākaśāvakaḥ iti parityajyāvinābhāvyabhimatāṃstāṃstān dharmān vyāpakān vyāpyāṃśca tathā loke pratipattāro vaktāraśca bhavanti, kokilaśāvako'yam ityanumimate ca tatsvabhāṣāsamanvitatvāt viśiṣṭamādhuryopetasvaratvāt, itarakokilavaditi .
ādigrahaṇāt svasvāmisambandhavat prakṛtivikārādiśeṣasambandhā api vyutpannānāmevānumānakāraṇam .
ato'tra sādhanaṃ saṃhatārthamucyate --evaṃ svasvāmyādisambandhā anumāpakā itthamuktanyāyena .
kasmāt ? anumeyavyaktikāle tathopalabhyamānatvāt, anumeyasya agni-kokilā-'nityatvāderarthasya
vyaktikāle tenaiva svasvāmyādiprakāreṇopalabhyamānatvāt . kimiva ? tatprasiddhaliṅgavat, tena tena
prakāreṇa prasiddhaṃ dhūmādiliṅgaṃ tasya sambandhino'numāpakamagnyādeḥ svasvāmyādiprakāreṇaiva sambandhāt, yathā
kokilaśāvakastajjātīyānukārisvareṇaiveti .


yadapyuktam--na cāvaśyaṃ sarvatra svasvāmyādīnāmavyabhicāraḥ . tasmāt sambandhādanumānaṃ na
bhavati . upalabdhasambandhasya na punaravyabhicārāpekṣānumitiryuktā, tasyaivābhivyañjakatvāpatteḥ pra॰ samu॰
vṛ॰ 2 . 37 iti, etadapi na, śeṣasiddhivacanenāvyabhicārividhivṛtterupāttatvāt . idaṃ hi
sarvābhāsavyudāsena sambandhānumānavidhānam . pratyakṣetarasambandhyanumeyaḥ pratyakṣādyaviruddhārthaḥ pakṣo dharmadharmisamudāyākhyo nirdoṣa evānena śeṣasiddhivacanena gṛhītaḥ .
yathāyogaṃ sambandhādekasmāt pratyakṣāt pratyakṣavadvā prasiddhāt pakṣadharmasambandhāccheṣeṇa śeṣasya siddhiriti śeṣasiddhivacanādeva viruddhāsādhāraṇadharmavyudāsaḥ . siddhivacanaṃ sādhāraṇānaikāntikavadasiddhirmā bhūditi . asiddhirvyabhicāridharmatā .
tadyathā--svāmyasampradānacaitrānyathātvam... ... ...atipriyasutavat .

kiñcānyat --yadapyuktamityādi sambandhavādino doṣavacanam . na cāvaśyamityādi pratyuccāraṇam .
etaduktaṃ bhavati--svasvāmyādisambandhādanumānaṃ na bhavati, tadavyabhicārārthaṃ viśeṣākāṅkṣitvāt upalabdhe'pi
sve svāmini vāśve caitre vā svatantrajīvadatyantāviyogā ākāṅkṣyante . teṣāmevāvyabhicārāt ta eva hi
anumāpakāḥ syuḥ, na svasvāmyādisambandhaḥ satyapi tasminnanumānābhāvād vyabhicārīti . evaṃ pratyuccārya
ācārya uttaramāha --etadapi na, śeṣasiddhivacanenāvyabhicārividhivṛtterupāttatvāt, sambandhādekasmāt pratyakṣāccheṣasiddhiranumānam   ityasmin svārthānumānalakṣaṇe śeṣasiddhivacanena
vidhivṛttiravyabhicāriṇyevopāttā, tasmādayamadoṣaḥ .
tat kathamiti bhāvyata iti cet, ucyate --idaṃ hi sarvābhāsavyudāsenetyādi . pakṣa-hetu-dṛṣṭāntābhāsāḥ sarve tenaiva sambandhānumānavidhānenāpodyante . pratyakṣāditaraḥ śeṣaḥ sambandhī svādinā viśiṣyamāṇo
deśādiḥ sambandhyate'numeyo'numānābhāsabhedaiḥ pratyakṣādivirodhairaviruddhārthaḥ pakṣo dharmadharmisamudāyākhya uttaratrāvayavavidhāne parārthānumāne vītākhye sādhyābhidhānam iti vakṣyamāṇo nirdoṣa evānena śeṣasiddhivacanena gṛhītaḥ . yathāyogaṃ sva-svāmi-nimitta-naimittikādiṣu tena tena sambandhena sambandhāt pratyakṣāditi
pratyakṣasya dharmādupalabdhāt prasiddhāditi yāvat . tatraiko yaḥ pratyakṣaḥ sa pakṣadharmaḥ, śeṣo'numeyaḥ . kṛtakatvādyapratyakṣatvādavyāpīti cet, ata āha --pratyakṣavadvā, pratyakṣavat pratyakṣaḥ prasiddhaḥ, tasmāt prasiddhatvāt,
sambandhī pakṣadharmo'śvaḥ svam, tasya pakṣadharmasya sambandhāt prāgupalabdhādanusmaryamāṇāccheṣeṇa śeṣasya caitrasya
siddhiriti śeṣasiddhivacanādeva viruddhāsādhāraṇadharmavyudāsaḥ yatra yatrāśvaḥ svaṃ tatra tatra devadattaḥ svāmī
ityatyantāviyogādisambandhānvayayuktatvāt sapakṣavṛttiḥ vipakṣa eva vā vṛttiḥ kutaḥ ? śeṣāya śeṣe vā
pratyakṣādekasmāt sambandhāt ityetāvatā siddhe siddhivacanaṃ siddhireva nāsiddhiḥ ityavadhāraṇāt prameyatvād nityaḥ iti sādhāraṇānaikāntikavadasiddhirmā bhūditi . kā punarasiddhiḥ ? vyabhicāridharmatā .
tadyathā--svāmyasampradānetyādi yāvadatipriyasutavaditi . caitrānyathātvaṃ maraṇam . śeṣaṃ gatārtham .


itthaṃ hi vyabhicāriviśeṣavyāvartanenāpi sa eva sambandhī gamakaḥ sambandhyantarasya . na te viśeṣā gamakāḥ, tatsamarthanārthatvāt . na hi vātyāprasaṅgavyāvartanena
dhūmasya vyañjakatvam, bahveva hyavātyā ghaṭapaṭādi; na hi tadvadagneragamako dhūmaḥ . na vā'vātyeti vyañjakamagnerbhavitumarhati ghaṭapaṭādyadhūmatāyāmasatyāmeva . dhūmataiva hi satī
vahnitāyāḥ vyañjikā .
tathā kṛtakatvasya anityatvopalabdhasambandhasya anityatvāvyabhicārapradarśanārthaṃ vyatireka ucyate . yadyupalabdhasambandhasya punaravyabhicāritvāpekṣamanumānaṃ
na syāt vyatirekavacanaṃ na syāt . nāpi ca tasyaivābhivyañjakatvamāpadyate . tathā ca
