kṛtakatvasyānityatvopalabdhasambandhasya punaravyabhicārāpekṣānumitiryuktā, tasyaivā-

itthaṃ hi vyabhicāriviśeṣavyāvartanenāpi sa eva sambandhī dhūmādiraśvādirvā gamakaḥ
sambandhyantarasya pratyakṣo'numeyasya dvitīyasyaikaḥ sambandhyantarasya sambandhitvāt . na te viśeṣā vyāvartyā
vidheyā vā gamakāḥ tatsamarthanārthatvāt, yathā na hi vātyāprasaṅgavyāvartanena dhūmasya vyañjakatvam,
adhūmo vātyā, sā na bhavatyayaṃ dhūmaḥ iti vātyāyāṃ nivartitāyāmagnerna gamako bhavati dhūmo yatrādṛṣṭastadvya-
vacchedamātreṇa, yasmād bahvevāvātyā ghaṭa-paṭādi, na hi tadvadagneragamako dhūmaḥ, na vā'vātyeti vyañjakaṃ
gamakamagnerbhavitumarhati ghaṭapaṭādyadhūmatāyāmasatyāmeva, kiṃ tarhi ? dhūmataiva hi satī vahnitāyāḥ
sambandhinī sambandhinyā vyañjiketi . tasmāccheṣasiddhivacanād nirastavyabhicārāśaṅkaṃ sambandhānumānameva
pratyakṣaikatvaviśeṣaṇābhyāṃ nirastasarvābhāsam .
kiñcānyat, tvayāpīṣyata etat prasiddhasambandhyevāprasiddhasambandhino gamakakaṃ yadavyabhicārasvarūpāvadhāraṇārthaṃ vyabhicāriviśeṣavyāvṛttirucyata ityatastatpradarśanārthamāha --tathā kṛtakatvasyetyādi .
anityaḥ śabdaḥ, kṛtakatvāt, yad yat kṛtakaṃ tat tadanityam iti sambandhavidhinā pradarśya
kṛtakatvasyaivānityatvāvyabhicārapradarśanārthaṃ yadanityaṃ na bhavati tat kṛtakamapi na bhavati' iti
vyatireka ucyate, yadyupalabdhasambandhasya punaravyabhicāritvāpekṣamanumānaṃ na syāt vyatirekavacanaṃ
pakṣadharmasādhyānugatisamarthanārthaṃ na syāt, tattu dṛṣṭam, nāpi ca tasyaiva vyatirekavacanasyābhivyañjakatvamāpadyate . tathā ca evaṃ ca kṛtvāsmannyāyena kṛtakatvasyānityatvopalabdhasambandhasya vyatireke punaravyabhicārāpekṣā'numitiryuktā, na tu tvanmatena . kiṃ kāraṇam ? tasyaivābhivyañjakatvavyakteḥ, yo'sau punaravyabhicāraḥ sa tasyaiva pakṣadharmasyābhivyañjakatvamabhivyanakti, na svayamevānukaṃpākampate . tathehāpīti

bhivyañjakatvavyakteḥ . tathehāpi, caitrāśvodāharaṇaṃ svasvāmisambandhasyopalakṣaṇārthamagnidhūmānityakṛtakatvādiṣu . so'tra, tadvatsattvāt, pūrvavat .
nanvevamavinābhāvopavarṇanamevedam . evamevaitat, ādhārādheyasaṃyogivadvṛttyabhedāt tvaduktasya vyāvartitatvādasmadabhihitestu pūrvatvāt . tvayā na jñātamanumānasvarūpaṃ sat mayā jñātam . yathā tvamāha tathā sambandhānumānaikadeśasya bhāṣyamātramevedam, tadanatiriktārthatvāt, vṛddhirādaijarthavyākhyānavat . evaṃ ca dravyārthāsatyo-
tatsādharmyaṃ yojayati . caitrāśvetyādi, yaccaitrāśvodāharaṇamatrānumānalakṣaṇabhāṣye tat svasvāmisambandhasyopalakṣaṇārthamagnidhūmānityakṛtakatvādiṣu tulyanyāyatvāt . so'tra sa ityapratyakṣo'gnicaitrānityatvādidharmaḥ
atra iti pradeśe pratyakṣād dhūmāśvakṛtakatvādeḥ pakṣadharmāt sādhyārthaḥ pakṣo'vagamyatām . tadvatsattvāditi
hetuḥ, so'smin sambandhī vahnicaitraśabdādirastīti tadvān dhūmāśvakṛtakatvādiḥ, sa eva dharmaḥ san tasya
bhāvāt tadvatsattvāt . yatra yatra tadvatsattvaṃ tatra tatra so'sti, pūrvavat, yathā pūrvottaradhūmādiragnyādinā
sambandhāt tatsvāmika eva tathehāpītyevamādīnāmupalakṣaṇārthaṃ caitrāśvodāharaṇamiti .
atrāha --nanvevamavinābhāvopavarṇanamevedam . nanvitthamavinābhāvasambandho madiṣṭa eva, avyabhicārākāṅkṣānumānatvāditi . atrocyate--vayamapi brūmaḥ --evamevaitat avinābhāvasambandhāt svasvāmyādivikalpādanumānam . kasmāt ? ādhārādheyasaṃyogivadvṛttyabhedāt, ādhārādheyavadvṛtteḥ saṃyogivadvṛtteścābhedāt yattvayoktam --ādhārādheyavadvṛttistasya saṃyogivanna tu pra॰ samu॰ iti, tasya vyāvartitatvāt .
kiñcānyat, asmadabhihitestu pūrvatvāt, dinna-vasubandhvādibhyo buddhācca pūrvakālatvāt kāpilasya tantrasya
ārhataikadeśanayamatānuhāritvācca tadanumānasya taccāsmanmatopajīvanameva . tvayā na jñātamanumānasvarūpaṃ
sat mayā jñātamiti .
tadvyākhyā --yathā tvamityādi . bhāṣyamātramevedamiti pakṣaḥ, sambandhānumānaikadeśasyaivaitallakṣaṇasya
bhāṣyamātraṃ tvatprayāsaphalam, tadanatiriktārthatvāt, yad yato'natiriktārthavyākhyānaṃ tat tadekadeśasyaiva
bhāṣyamātram yathā vṛddhiritīyaṃ saṃjñā bhavati ādaicāṃ varṇānām, saṃjñādhikāraḥ saṃjñāsampratyayārthaḥ ityādi
vṛddhirādaic pā॰ 1 . 1 . 1 ityasya, tathedaṃ tvadīyamavinābhāvasambandhavyutpādanamasmajjñātasya sambandhānumānaikadeśasya bhāṣyamātram, tadapi sarvaṃ na viditamityabhiprāyaḥ . kāpilamapi cāsmadupajñameva dravyārthavikalpaikadeśatvāditi cābhiprāyaḥ . ata āha --evaṃ ca dravyārthāsatyopādhisatyārthavyākhyānujñā kṛtā tvayā
sāmānyopasarjano viśeṣaḥ śabdārthaḥ iti dravyārthasyāpyanujñānādabhyupagataṃ bhavati dravyārthavādimatānumānalakṣaṇānujñānāt . tasyāṃ cāsatyopādhisatyārthavyākhyānujñāyāṃ liṅgino liṅgatvaṃ prasaktam ityasyābhāvaḥ, na

pādhisatyārthavyākhyānujñā kṛtā tvayā . tasyāṃ ca nahi liṅgino liṅgatvaṃ prasañjayituṃ śakyam .
tathāpi syāt vivakṣābhedāt tathā tathā svasvāmyādigamyagamakatvāt . tadyathā
devadatta yajñadattayoḥ saṃyuktayoranyonyaṃ liṅgatvaṃ liṅgitvaṃ ca bhavati tathā svasvāmyādiṣu . tathāhi rājño lājapeyātaraṇaṃ tatkaraṇājñayā... ... ....
na, saṃyogitva ekarūpatvād agnito'pi dhūmānumitiprasaṅgaḥ . tatkāla eva ca
dhūmo'sti . na, asambhavāt . pratyakṣatvāddhūmo'sādhyaḥ, sādhyastvagnirapratyakṣatvāt
saṃyogyekarūpatvāccāniṣṭāpādanamanapekṣitārtham . saṃyogitva... ... ....
yat punaridamuktam--yasya tvavinābhāvitvaṃ sambandho'bhimatastasyāyamadoṣaḥ pra॰ samu॰
vṛ॰ 2 . 37 iti . atra guṇadoṣābhimānaḥ... ... ....
hi liṅgino'pratyakṣasya liṅgatvaṃ pratyakṣatvaṃ prasañjayituṃ śakyamṛddhimadbhirbuddha-bodhisattvādibhirapi yathokto'smābhiravyatikara iti .
tathāpi syādityādi . na hi liṅgasya liṅgitve liṅgino vā liṅgatve kaścid doṣo'sti vivakṣābhedāt tathā tathā sva-svāmyādigamyagamakatvāt, svaṃ vā gamyatvena gamakatvena vā vivakṣyeta svāmī
vā yadā tadā vivakṣitasyānyatarasya gamyatvaṃ gamakatvaṃ vā yathāvivakṣaṃ dṛśyate, tadyathā--devadattetyādi
dṛṣṭāntaḥ, yathā kasmiṃścit kāle'nyatarakarmaṇā devadatto yajñadattena yukto bhavati yajñadatto vā devadattena
tayoścānyonyaṃ liṅgatvaṃ liṅgitvaṃ ca paryāyeṇa vivakṣāvaśād bhavati yugapadvobhayakarmajasaṃyogitvāt tathā
svasvāmyādiṣviti . tathāhītyādi rājño viśeṣitasya lājapeyātaraṇaṃ tatkaraṇājñayetyādi gatārthamagninā
dhūmānumānamiti .
atrāha --na, saṃyogitva ekarūpatvādityādi . nāgneḥ pūrvaṃ paścādvā dhūmaḥ saṃyogī na dhūmo
vāgneriti matvā'niṣṭamāpādyate --agnito'pi dhūmānumitiprasaṅga iti; kiṃ tarhi ? tatkāla eva cāgnyupalabdhikāla eva dhūmo'sti iti bhavatyevāniṣṭāpādanamidaṃ vyatikaraprasaṅga iti .
atrocyate --na, asambhavāt, na sambandhāviśeṣādagniliṅgatvaṃ dhūmaliṅgitvaṃ ca prāptam,
kiṃ tarhi ? pratyakṣatvāddhūmo'sādhyaḥ sādhanaṃ tu, sādhyastvagnirapratyakṣatvādanumeyatvādasādhanam . dhūmo'pi
sādhyaścet pratyakṣamapramāṇaṃ syāt tadaprāmāṇye cānumā nirbījā syāt . anumitiḥ ityapaśabdena parānukaraṇaṃ
doṣaścaiṣa syāditi . kiñcānyat, saṃyogyekarūpatvānumānāccāniṣṭāpādanam agnito'pi dhūmānumānaprasaṅgaḥ
iti yadetad bhavatsādhanametadanapekṣitārtham . tatpradarśanārthaṃ sādhanam --saṃyogitvetyādi gatārthamaniṣṭāpādanam .
yat punaridamityādi svapakṣe doṣābhāvapradarśanārthaṃ yaduktaṃ tvayā yasya tvavinābhāvitvamityādi

agryādisambandhī... ... ...liṅgī .
itthamuktvā yat punaridamucyate--agnito'pi dhūmānumitiprasaṅgaḥ iti nyāyadigmūḍhena tat . iha deśasādhyatāmuktvā liṅgiliṅgatattvavyavasthānavṛtterevaṃ vaktavyam—
agnimato'pi dhūmavadanumāprasaṅgaḥ... ... ...ubhayato'pi tanmatubarthasya tathā
tatheṣṭavadvṛtteḥ . dhūmaviṣaya etadeva syāt . athatra punarnāsti doṣagandho'pi .
dhūmavattvasya hi liṅgatvaṃ yuktam, liṅgitvamapi taddeśavivakṣāyā agnimattvaviśiṣṭasya
deśasyaiva . na hyagnimattvasya yuktaṃ liṅgatvaṃ sādhyatvāt . ata eva mayā tatpradhānamevocyate--agnito'pi dhūmānumitiprasaṅga iti .
yāvadadoṣa iti . vayaṃ tu brūmo'tra guṇadoṣābhimāna ityādi sādhya-sādhanadharmavaddeśādyanumeyatvamuktvā
punastasyaiva doṣābhidhānādapratyabhijñātam agnyādisambandhītyādinā tvayaivābhyupagatamiti darśayati tasyaiva
deśasya liṅgatvaṃ liṅgitvaṃ ca na dharmayoragnidhūmayoriti yāvad liṅgīti tvanmatamevedamiti
pratyabhijñāpayati .
itthamuktvā yat punaridamucyate--agnito'pi dhūmānumitiprasaṅga iti, nyāyadigmūḍhena
taditi . kathaṃ punaramūḍhā bruvata iti cet, brūmastvāṃ śikṣāṃ grāhayantaḥ, tadyathā --iha deśasādhyatāmuktvā
liṅgiliṅgatattvavyavasthānavṛtterevaṃ vaktavyamityādi, tāṃ nyāyavyavasthāmanuvartamānena tvayetthaṃ vaktavyam
agnimato'pi dhūmavadanumāprasaṅga ityādyupadeśagrantho yāvadubhayato'pi tanmatubarthasya tathā tatheṣṭavadvṛtteriti tatkāraṇoktim . dhūmaviṣaya etadeva syād dhūma eva deśaviśeṣānapekṣo'numāpakaḥ syādagnireva
vānumeyastadā'gnito dhūmānumānaṃ dhūmādagnyanumānavat syāt prasaṅgaḥ saṃyoginoraviśeṣāt . atha punardeśasya
sādhya-sādhanatvānnāsti doṣagandho'pīti .
tad bhāvayati --dhūmavattvasya hītyādi . dhūmavattvadharmaviśiṣṭasya deśasyaiva liṅgatvaṃ yuktam, dhūmavattvena siddhasya tasya sādhakatvāt . liṅgitvamapi taddeśavivakṣāyā hetoḥ agnimattvaviśiṣṭasya
deśasyaiva liṅgitvaṃ yuktam . agniviṣaye tu deśe liṅgatvaṃ na yuktam, kiṃ kāraṇam ? na hyagnimattvasya
yuktaṃ liṅgatvaṃ sādhyatvāt, sādhyatvaṃ liṅgitvāt, liṅgitvamasiddhatvāt . asmanmatena tu liṅgatvamapi
agnimattvaviśiṣṭasya deśasyaiva śakyaṃ bhāvayitum, agnipratyakṣatve dhūmāpratyakṣatve ca kadācit . ata eva
mayā tatpradhānameva deśapradhānamevocyate--agnito'pi dhūmānumitiprasaṅga iti .


nanvevaṃ deśamupekṣyāgnereva liṅgitvaṃ syādanumeyatvāt . na cāsau liṅgī bhavitumarhati loke siddhatvādananumeyatvāt . tathā coktam--

na dharmī dharmiṇā sādhyo na dharmastena dharmyapi .
dharmeṇa dharmaḥ sādhyastu sādhyatvāddharmiṇastathā ॥ pra॰ samu॰ 3 . 13

upacārādevedamucyata iti cet, atra tattvaṃ mṛgyate, suhṛtsūpacāraḥ... ... ...
sādhyatvāddharmiṇastathā .
evaṃ tvagnimaddeśasya liṅgatvam, dhūmavattvasādhakaliṅgānanyatvāt, dhūmavattvasvātmavadeva .

atrāha --nanvevaṃ deśamupekṣya anādṛtya agnereva liṅgitvaṃ syād bhavituṃ yogyam . kasmāt ?
anumeyatvāditi . atrocyate --na cāsau liṅgī bhavitumarhati agniḥ, kasmāt ? loke siddhatvāt,
ato'nanumeyatvāt .
tathā coktaṃ tvayā yathāsmanmataṃ dharmaviśiṣṭo dharmyeva sādhyaḥ sādhanaṃ ca ityatra tvadvacanameva
jñāpakam . na dharmī dharmiṇetyādi ślokaḥ . na dharmī dharmiṇā sādhyo yathāgnirdhūmena, siddhatvādagnestaddharma-
tvābhāvād dhūmasya . na dharmo dharmiṇā iti vartate, yathāgninoṣṇasparśaḥ, siddhatvāt taddharmatvābhāvācca .
tena dharmyapi tena dharmeṇā'nantaranirdiṣṭena vibhaktipariṇāmanirdeśāt dharmyapi na sādhyaḥ, yathā--asti
pradhānam, bhedānāmanvayadarśanāditi, dharmyasiddhereva dharmāsiddheḥ . pāriśeṣyād dharmeṇa dharmaḥ sādhyastu .
nanu dharmayorapi parasparaṃ dharmatvāsiddhirdharmitvābhāve, tasmādayuktaṃ sādhya-sādhanatvamiti . netyucyate
sādhyatvāddharmiṇastathā, tena prakāreṇa tathā anekadharmaṇo dharmiṇo vastunaḥ sisādhayiṣitadharmaviśiṣṭasya
sādhyatvāt siddhadharmaviśiṣṭasya sādhanatvāt . tathā cāha --sādhyatvāpekṣayā cātra dharma-dharmivyavasthā na
guṇa-guṇitvenetyadoṣaḥ   iti .
upacārādevedamucyata iti cet . syānmatam--satyam, paramārthato liṅgaliṅgibhāva ekasya vastunaḥ
siddhasādhyadharmaviśiṣṭasya tathāpi upacārakṛtāddharmabhedād bhinnamivābhinnamapyucyate iti . etaccāyuktam,
yasmādatra tattvaṃ mṛgyate suhṛtsūpacāra ityādi yāvat sādhyatvadhatvāddharmiṇastatheti gatārthaṃ
savyākhyānam . tasthāt siddhamagnimattva-dhūmavattvaviśiṣṭasyaiva deśasya liṅgatvaṃ liṅgitvaṃ ca .
tadupasaṃhṛtya tvāṃ prati yadasiddhaṃ prastutamagnimaddeśaliṅgatvaṃ tat sādhayāmaḥ . tadyathā --evaṃ tu agnimaddeśasya liṅgatvamiti pratijñā . hetuḥ --dhūmavattvasādhakaliṅgānanyatvāditi . dṛṣṭāntaḥ --dhūmavattvasvātmavadeva, yathā dhūmavattvaṃ svātmā deśasya tadananyatvāt liṅgaṃ tathāgnimattvasvātmā tadananyatvāddeśasya
liṅgameva, tadananyatvaṃ ca pratipāditameveti .


nāgnimattvasya liṅgatvaṃ vyabhicāritvāt prameyatvavat .
na, dhūmavastutvānumānabhūtena liṅgatvaṃ niyatam . avyabhicāritvopapādanenāgnyavinābhāvitvenaiva dhūmatvasiddheḥ .
athātra kiṃ pratipattavyaṃ dhūmaliṅgādagnipratipattivadagnerapi dhūmapratipattiḥ syāt .
atha kiṃviṣayaḥ sampradhāraḥ ? darśitanyāyadeśasādhyatāyā yuktameva liṅgasya
liṅgino vā liṅgitvaṃ liṅgatvaṃ vā . dhūmavattvaliṅgitvāpattau tu prameyatvavadagnimattvavyabhicārālliṅgatvābhāva eva . na hi sarvatrāgnau dhūmasyāśaṅkyamanumānam, anugamābhāvāt . deśāsādhyatāyāmapi siddhasādhananyāyavirodhadoṣaḥ .

atrāha --nāgnimattvasya liṅgatvaṃ vyabhicāritvāt, vyabhicarati hyagnimattvaṃ pradeśasya dhūmavattvādṛte'pi deśāntare kālāntare cāyoguḍāṅgārādiṣu dṛṣṭatvāt . kimiva ? prameyatvavat, yathā nityaḥ śabdaḥ,
prameyatvāt, ākāśavat ityukte prameyatvaṃ ghaṭādāvanitye vināpi nityatvena dṛṣṭaṃ tathā agnimattvaṃ dhūmavattveneti vyabhicāritvādananyatvasyāsādhakatvam . dhūmavattvasya tu bhavati agnimattvena vinā na dṛṣṭatvāditi .
atra brūmaḥ --na, dhūmavastutvānumānetyādi . dhūmasya hi vastutvena ātmalābhenaivānumānabhūtenāgnyavinābhūtena liṅgatvaṃ niyataṃ pāṇḍutvabahulatvāvicchinnamūlatvādirūpeṇa dhūmatvaniścayakareṇa, tatra liṅgitvadoṣaprasaṅgasyāvatāra eva nāsti pratyakṣatvāt siddhatvādeva liṅgatvāt . tathāgnerapi pratyakṣatve dhūmasya liṅgino
liṅgatvam . avyabhicāritvopapādanenetyādi, yadi tu agnimattvaṃ prameyatvavad dhūmaṃ vyabhicaret tato
dhūmasya dhūmatvameva sandihyeta bāṣpanīhārādibhāvenābaddhamūlāditvāt . tasmāt sandigdhāsiddho hetuḥ
syāddhūmaḥ, kuto'sya liṅgatvam ? agnyavinābhāvitvenaiva tu baddhamūlatvādirūpeṇa dhūmatvasiddheḥ syāt pakṣadharmatvālliṅgatvam, tathāgnerapi dhūmasiddhau liṅgatvam .
itara āha --athātra kiṃ pratipattavyaṃ dhūmaliṅgādagnipratipattivadagnerapi dhūmapratipattiḥ
syāt, vastuno liṅgaliṅgitvāviśeṣāt . pratipattau tu dṛṣṭo viśeṣa ityabhiprāyaḥ .
ācāryo'trāpi aviśeṣamāpādayitukāmastameva vācayituṃ cāha --atha kiṃviṣayaḥ sampradhāra iti .
itara āha --darśitanyāyadeśasādhyatatāyā hetoḥ, darśito'yaṃ nyāyaḥ--deśa evāgnimattvena sādhyaḥ
sādhanaṃ dhūmavattveneti . tasmāt yuktameva liṅgasya liṅgino vā liṅgitvaṃ liṅgatvaṃ vā, na virudhyata
etat . kintu dhūmavattvaliṅgitvāpattau tvityādi . satyapi saṃyogitvāviśeṣe dhūmasaṃyogitvamevāgnergamakaṃ
dṛṣṭam yatra yatra dhūmastatra tatrāgniḥ iti . dhūmavattvasya liṅgitve prameyatvavadagnimattvavyabhicārālliṅgatvābhāva eva . tasmādagneranyathā saṃyogitvamanyathā dhūmasya, yasmād na hi sarvatretyādi yatra yatrāgnistatra tatra
dhūmaḥ iti āśaṅkyamanumānam anugamābhāvāt sarvatrāgnau dhūmābhāvāt . mā bhūdeṣa doṣa iti deśāsādhyateṣyate, tasyāṃ ca deśāsādhyatāyāmapi siddhasādhananyāyavirodhadoṣaḥ dhūmādagniḥ iti agneḥ
siddhatvāt sādhyatvenepsitaḥ pakṣaḥ nyāyamukha॰ iti lakṣaṇānavatāraḥ prakāśitaprakāśanavacca vaiyarthyamiti .


agnisādhanavadeva hi dhūmasādhane'pi vināgninā dhūmasya dṛṣṭatvād vyabhicārād
nānumānasambhavaḥ .
sambhāvyate tu dhūmadarśanāt agniratra iti agnidarśanādvā dhūmo'tra iti,
agne randhanagṛhatvavat . yatra dhūmāsambhavastatrāgnerapyasambhavo'ntarjalavat . anvayārthaḥ
sambhavārthatvena itaravat . pratītirapi tathā . athavālaṃ bhavatu .
agniratra iti pratijñāyām agnirevātra iti nāvadhāryate tāvat tatra pṛthivīndhanādisadbhāvāt . nāpi agniratraiva ityavadhāryate pratyakṣādiprasiddhiviruddhārthatvāt .
nāpi agniratra bhavatyeva ityavadhāryate sadāgnidhūmābhāvāt tatra .
tasmād vivakṣite deśe kāle bhavatyagniriti pratijñārthaḥ, avyutpattividhyanavadhṛteḥ, raktamidaṃ karavīrapuṣpam iti pratijñāvat .

atra brūmaḥ --agnisādhanavadeva hītyādi agni-dhūmayoraviśiṣṭagamyagamakabhāvāpādanagrantho gatārthaḥ .
vāsagṛhe'panītāgnike dhūmo'gninā vinā dṛṣṭo'raṇinirmathane vā'bhūtāgnike tasmāt tulyo vyabhicāraḥ .
kathaṃ punaranumānasambhavaḥ ? sambhāvyate tu dhūmadarśanādagniratreti agnidarśanādvā dhūmo'treti,
tat punaḥ pramāṇāntaragate deśe'gnita eva dhūmaḥ, baddhamūlatvādibhirdhūmādvāgniriti . tatra dṛṣṭāntaḥ --agne randhanagṛhatvavaditi tvaritataraṇakaraṇārthājñāptāgnihastasūpakārake randhanagṛhe dhūmaḥ sambhavati iti . vaidharmyeṇa yatra
dhūmāsambhavastatrāgnerapyasambhavo'ntarjalavaditi . dhūmo'gneranyatra na sambhavatītyanvayasyārthaḥ sambhavārthatvena
itaravaditi dhūmavat, yathā dhūmo'gnau sambhavati sa kadācit kvacit tathāgnirdhūme sambhavati ityanvayārthaḥ
śakyata eva, pratītirapi tathā . athavālilaṃ bhavatviti alamiyatā krīḍiteneti vastutaḥ pratipattitaśca
pratipāditamapi asmābhirna pratipadyase liṅga-liṅgitvāviśeṣaṃ kimartham ? yadyapi na pratipadyase tathāpyata
uttaramavayavanirūpaṇenāpi pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ .
agniratra ityasyāṃ pratijñāyāmityādi . agnirevātra iti nāvadhāryate tāvat tatra pṛthivīndhanādisadbhāvāt tadabhāve'gnereva durlabhatvāt, deśasyaiva vā'bhāvāt tadādheyayoragnidhūmayorapyabhāvāpatteḥ .
nāpi agniratraiva ityavadhāryate tatpradeśāgnito'nyeṣāmagnīnāmanagnitvābhyupagame pratyakṣādiprasiddhiviruddhārthatvāt pratijñādoṣāt, tatpradeśavyatirikteṣu pradeśeṣvagnyabhāvāt yatra yatrāgnistatra tatra dhūmaḥ iti
dṛṣṭānto na śakyo vaktum, atastannirāsaḥ . nāpi agniratra bhavatyeva ityavadhāryate bhavatiprayogavyavahāreṇa, na na bhavatyapi kadāciditi . kiṃ kāraṇam ? sadāgnidhūmābhāvāt tatra tasmin deśe
kādācitkāgnivyudāso nirarthakaḥ satatamagnidhūmayorabhāvāt .
tasmādvivakṣite deśe tasmiṃstasmin kāle bhavatyagniḥ iti pratijñārthaḥ . kasmāt ?

dhūmaśca pakṣadharmo'nubaddharūpa evāgninā bhavati agnisahacaritvāgninimittatvakhyāpanārtham . iha kvacit sahacaribhāvaḥ, kvacicca nimittanaimittikabhāvaḥ . iha tu
dvyavayavameva liṅgam . tatrāvinābhāvī sahacarī . sahacarāvagnidhūmau . sahacaro'smin
vidyata iti sahacarī . asmin vidyata evāgnirdhūme, na na vidyata eva, na ca na
vidyate'pi kvacit . tasmin hi kila sati vidyata evāgniḥ, na na vidyate vātyādivat, na ca na vidyate'pi dhūmāsahacarāyognidhūmavat, na vā sapakṣasahacare na
vidyata eva kṛtakamiva nitye . evamasiddhaviruddhānaikāntikavyudāsena sahacaribhāvānumānaṃ sidhyati .
nanvevaṃ kimarthaṃ nimittanaimittikabhāvopādānam ? na, agnivad vyabhicāri-
avyutpattividhyanavadhṛteḥ, vidhinaivāvyutpāditāvadhāraṇenoktatvāt raktamidaṃ karavīrapuṣpam ityavyutpannaraktaśvetaviśeṣaṇāya puruṣāyeva tannirūpaṇārthā raktameva, śvetameva vā ityavadhāraṇānapekṣā pratijñā .
dhūmaśca pakṣadharmo'nubaddharūpa evāgninā bhavati . kimartham ? agnisahacaritvāgninimittatvakhyāpanārtham . tadvyākhyā --iha kvacidityādi, rūpasparśayoḥ sahacaribhāvaḥ, daṇḍādi nimittam ghaṭo naimittika
iti nimittanaimittikabhāvaḥ, tāvetau sahacarinimittanaimittikabhāvāvavayavau, tadeva hi tat, iha tu dvyavayavameva liṅgam . tatrāvinābhāvītyādi, sahacaribhāvaṃ tāvadādau nirūpayāmaḥ, so'vinābhāva eva .
tadvyākhyā nirūpaṇārthā --sahacarāvityādi sahacaro yasmin vidyata iti sahacarī dhūmasyāgniriti inipratyayaḥ
saptamyarthe, asya trividho'rthaḥ --asmin vidyata evāgnirdhūme agnita eva cāyamiti pakṣadharmāvadhāraṇam .
na na vidyata eveti sapakṣānanugato vipakṣa eva san iti viruddhāsādhāraṇānaikāntikāśaṅkā mā
bhūditi . na ca na vidyate'pi kvacit sahacarī dhūma iti sādhāraṇānaikāntikāśaṅkā mā bhūditi vā .
tadvyācaṣṭe --tasmin hi kila satīti, parābhimatasya dhūme liṅgini agniliṅgatvasya vyudāsārthaṃ tadudāharaṇāni, sati vidyata evāgnirna na vidyate vātyādivadityasiddhavyudāsena . na ca na vidyate'pi
dhūmāsahacarāyognidhūmavaditi sādhāraṇānaikāntikāśaṅkāvyudāsena . na vā sapakṣasahacare na vidyata eva
kṛtakamiva nitya iti viruddhāsādhāraṇānaikāntikāśaṅkāvyudāsena . evamasiddhetyādyuktopasaṃhāro gatārthaḥ .
nanvevamityādi . evaṃ tarhi asiddhaviruddhānaikāntikavyudāsena sahacaribhāvānumānasiddhau satyāṃ
kimarthamanarthakanimitta-naimittikabhāvopādānam ? tasmādekāvayavamevāstviti .
etacca na, agnivad vyabhicāritvād dhūmasyāpi, yathāgnirdhūmaṃ vyabhicarati ayognyādāvabhāvāt
tathā dhūmo'pi agnimapanītāgnikavāsagṛhādau araṇinirmathanādau ceti samānam . tadvyākhyā yadi he
hi sa sadetyādi sadṛṣṭāntopanayā sabhāvanā gatārthā prāguktanyāyā . sannihitanimitta-sahacariprakhyā

tvād dhūmasyāpi . yadi hi sa sadā... ... .... pāṇḍūrdhagatibahalotsaṅgyekadeśabaddhamūlapunaḥpunarutthāyidhūmasyāgnimantareṇābhāvād nimittanaimittikabhāva eṣitavyaḥ .
balākāpatākāvacca sahacaribhāvo'pyeṣitavyaḥ,...nimittanaimittikabhāve satyapi
dhūme'gnervyabhicāradarśanāt .
sahacarinimittopapattau tu na kācid vyabhicāradik . deśāntarāsañcāridhūmasya tatkālasannihitāgninimittatvād viśiṣṭasyaiva dhūmasyāgnau gamakatvam,
viśeṣaṇārthavattvāt . sa yathāgnimattvaṃ gamayati tathā sannihitāgninimittatvamapi .
evaṃ cāgnerapi gṛhītatvād na pratyakṣādi pramāṇāntaramapekṣyate kṛtakatvene-
panena viśiṣṭadhūmagrahaṇaṃ tasminneva deśe kāle ca nānutpanno nātīto nāpanīto vāgniḥ ityetasyārthasya
prakhyāpanārtham . satyapi sahacaribhāve nimittabhūttaṃ tamagnimantareṇa dhūmasyaivābhāvād nimittanaimittikabhāva
eṣitavyaḥ . tatastadavadhāraṇārthāni liṅgāni darśayannāha --pāṇḍūrdhagatītyādi . pāṇḍuviśeṣaṇaṃ bāṣpanīhārādivyudāsārtham . ūrdhagatyā bahalatvena ca dhūmikāvyudāsaḥ . utsaṅgigrahaṇāt śarāvākārorddhavistāritvaṃ
sūcyate, pārśvavistāritvād dhūmikādīnām . ekadeśabaddhamūlagrahaṇādabhūtā-'panītāgni-vātyādivyudāso'nekatra bhramaṇāditvāt teṣām . punaḥpunarutthāyidhūmagrahaṇādapanītāgnikavāsagṛhāraṇinirmathanāvasthāvyudāsaḥ . tasmāt salila-balākayoḥ sahacariṇorivāgnidhūmayorvyabhicāradarśanād nimittanaimittikabhāvo'pīṣṭa iti . so'pi nimittanaimittikabhāvaḥ sahacaribhāvena vinā vyabhicaratyeveti darśayannāha --balākāpatākāvaccetyādi yāvad dhūme'gnervyabhicāradarśanāditi bhāvanā gatārthā, naimittikasadbhāve nimittābhāvadarśanāt sthapatikṛtaprāsādādivaditi .
tadubhayagatadoṣaparihāreṇa dvyavayavaguṇaprakāśanārthaṃ cāha --sahacarinimittopapattāvityādi yāvad
viśeṣaṇārthavattvāditi . ubhayaviśeṣaṇasampattau satyāṃ kācid vyabhicāradig na sambhavati . tat katham ?
iti tad darśayati --deśāntarāsañcārītyādinā bhāvayan, tatkālasannihitāgninimittatvād dhūmasya vyabhicāramalaviśuddhasya tairviśeṣaṇairviśiṣṭasyaiva sahacariṇyagnau gamakatvam, itarathā dhūmasyāpi agneriva dhūme vyabhicārād viśeṣaṇasāmarthyādevānumānārthavattvam, viśeṣaṇānupādāne'gnimattvameva na gamayati ubhayato'pi
sahacaritve nimittanaimittikatve vā'sati yasmāt tasmāt sa yathāgnimattvaṃ gamayati tathā sannihitāgninimittatvamapi gamayati iti vartate, yathāgnimattvena vinā nāsti dhūmavattvaṃ tathā tannimittatvamantareṇa
nāstītyagnimattvavannimittatvamapi gamayati ubhayatrāvyabhicārāditi .
syānmatam--liṅgatvādagniḥ pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇāntaramapekṣeta dhūmavaditi . tanna bhavati, evaṃ cetyādi .
evamuktabaddhamūlatvādiviśiṣṭadhūmaparigrahe'gnerapi gṛhītatvād na pratyakṣādipramāṇāntaramapekṣyate . kimiva ?

vānityatvasya . sa eva nimittamagnirdhūmasya sahacaraśca . na hi tasyāgnito'nyad nimittaṃ
bhavitumarhati sahacaraṃ vā... ... ...kriyeta . pūrvapratyakṣasambandhasmaraṇādanyatareṇetarasyābhivyaktiḥ pratyakṣavat .... ... ....
... ... ...anityaṃ sarvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakam, ārhatatvasyābhyupagamyamānatvāt .

pravṛttatvāt sthapativat . cetanavihitavṛtti ca... ... ...savitṛgati... ... ....

dhruva sthairye, dhruvaṃ sthiram, nerdhruve tyap pā॰ ma॰ bhā॰ 4 . 2 . 104 nityam, na nityamanityamiti

pradeśātmābhedāt . sa eva nimittamagnirdhūmasya sahacaraśca, na hi tasyetyādi yāvat kriyetetyādi, nahi
tasya dhūmasya agnito'nyad nimittaṃ pradeśapariṇāmātmakād deśāntarasthāgnipāṣāṇāmbukumbhādi bhavitumarhati sahacaraṃ vā tadasambaddhatrailokyaliṅgitvaprasaṅgāt, pariṇāmyapariṇamyabhedapariṇāmāntarasādhyatve pariṇāmāntarasādhanatvāt evamasyaiva hetu-hetumadbhāvabhāvanārthamāha --pūrvapratyakṣetyādi yathā pūrvaṃ pratyakṣakāle'gninā
sambaddho dhūmo'gniśca dhūmena tathānvayakāle tasya sambandhasya smaraṇād yatrāgnistatra dhūmaḥ, yatra dhūmastatrāgniḥ ityanyatareṇa vivakṣitena hetunopāttasya itarasya sādhyasyābhivyaktiḥ pratyakṣakāle iva pratyakṣavat .
