... ... ...anityatvaprayatnānantarīyakatvayoranyonyavyāptiṃ pratijñāya hetumāha --ārhatatvasyābhyupagamyamānatvāditi anyāpohābhyupagamāt svavacanādeva jainendraṃ matamabhyupagataṃ tvayeti vakṣyāmaḥ .
svavacanānapekṣāyāmapītyādi . yadyapi svaṃ vacanamanapekṣyāpi anityaṃ sarvaṃ prayatnānantarīyakaṃ na
bhavati iti brūṣe tathāpi te vacanaṃ nyāyāpetamevedam . tadyathā --tānyapītyādi, tānyapi abhrendracāpādīni
siddhaprayatnānantarīyakānyeveti pratijñā, lokapratyakṣetyādi samāsadaṇḍako heturyāvad vihitavṛttitvāditi . kuḍyādidṛṣṭāntaḥ . tadvyākhyā lokapratyakṣetyādiviśeṣaṇaprayojanāni ca piṇḍārthena vidyudādīnāṃ caitanyaṃ tāvat sādhyate--jīvaśarīraṃ vātādayaḥ, anaṇvāditve sparśādimattvāt, govat . tasyāpi
gormṛtasya jīvatvābhāvād mā bhūdanaikāntikateti jīvaśarīratve'pi tu nātyantaktaśarīracittetyādi
yāvat svayaṃ pravṛttatvāditi viśeṣaṇavyākhyā . sthapativaditi sthapateścaitanyavat . vātādicaitanye siddhe
cetanavihitavṛtti cetyādinā vidyudabhrameghaśabdādīnāṃ cetanavātaprayatnotthatā darśyate, savitṛgatītyādinā



yāpyādhārādheyavadvṛttiḥ--liṅge liṅgī bhavatyeva liṅginyevetarat punaḥ .niyamasya viparyāse sambandho liṅgaliṅginoḥ ॥
yasmālliṅge liṅgī bhavatyeva tasmād yuktaṃ yadagnivad dhūmo dravyatvādīnāmapi prakāśako na
taikṣṇyādīnām . yasmācca liṅginyeva liṅgaṃ bhavati nānyatra tasmād yuktaṃ yad dhūmo dhūmatveneva pāṇḍutvādibhirapi prakāśayati na dravyatvādibhiḥ . evaṃ hyavadhāraṇavaiparītyena sambandho liṅgaliṅginoḥ .
pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 2 . 20 1/2 .
eṣāpi tadbhāvadarśanavidhereva gamayati na vyāvṛttibalena . na hi yoṣidgaṇḍapāṇḍutvaṃ gamayatyagnim, abhūtāgnidhūmakatvāt . dhūmabhūtaṃ gamayati dhūmabhūtāgnitvāt
tadbhāvasya tadbhāvatvenaiva gamakatvāt .
yathā cedaṃ tathā dravyatvādisāmānyasyāpi dhūmabhūtergamakatvamagneḥ pāṇḍutvavat . agnerapi dravyatvasāmānyagatiragnibhūtatvāt . yattu dhūmo dīptyādiviśeṣāṇāmagamakastat tadbhāvadarśanavidhereva tathā cānyathā ca dṛṣṭatvād vyabhicārāt .
indradhanuṣaḥ . tasmād vidyudādīni prayatnānantarīyakāni anityāni cetyanityaprayatnānantarīyakatvayoranyonyagamyagamakatā .
evamavinābhāvitvakutarkasya vinābhāvenāsmābhiḥ tadbhāvadarśanādeva sādhyasādhanadharmayoḥ vidheḥ
saṃyogivadvṛttiḥ yathāpratijñamuktā, na tvādhārādheyavadvṛttiḥ iti pratipādayiṣyāmaḥ --yāpyādhārādheyavadityādi . yāmapi ādhārādheyavadvṛttiṃ manyase liṅge liṅgī bhavatyevetyādi ślokaḥ . tadvyākhyā --yasmād
liṅge dhūme liṅgī agnirbhavatyeva na na bhavatyapi tasmād yuktamityavadhāraṇārthapradarśanam . yasmācca
liṅginyevetyādi yāvad dravyatvādibhirityādi tadviparītāvadhāraṇapradarśanaṃ gatārtham . sāmānyasya gamyatvaṃ
liṅgini na viśeṣāṇām, liṅgasya ca viśeṣāṇāṃ keṣāñcid gamakatvaṃ na sāmānyasya dṛṣṭam, tat sarvamavinābhāvādādhārādheyavadvṛtteriti pūrvapakṣaḥ .
atrottaram --eṣāpītyādi . iyamapi ādhārādheyavadvṛttiḥ tadbhāvadarśanavidhereva yatra dṛṣṭastad
gamayati darśanabalena, na yatrādṛṣṭastadvyavacchedena vyāvṛttibaleneti . atrāpi na hītyādi yāvanat ?
yoṣidgaṇḍapāṇḍutvaṃ na gamayati agnim, abhūtāgnidhūmakatvāt; dhūmabhūtaṃ tu pāṇḍutvaṃ gamayatyagniṃ dhūmabhūtāgnitvāt, vidhereva tadbhāvasya tadbhāvatvenaiva gamakatvāt .
yathā cedamityādi, pāṇḍutvādiviśeṣasya dhūmabhūtatvena gamakatvavad dravyatvādisāmānyasyāpi dhūmabhūtergamakatvamagneriti bhāvanā yāvat pāṇḍutvavaditi . evaṃ tāvaddhūmabhūtasāmānya-viśeṣadharmāṇāṃ gamakatvaṃ
tulyam . vidhereva gamyatvaniyamāviśeṣaḥ . tathāhi --agnerapi dravyatvasāmānyagatiḥ, agnibhūtatvāt .
nodakāditadvyatiriktadravyatvagatiḥ, atadbhūtatvāt . yattu dhūmo dīptyādītyādi, dīpti-taikṣṇyādiviśeṣā


tadbhāvadarśanānubandhena hi buddhyutpattiranumānam . dhūmavattvamagnimattvānubaddhamevetyaikāntikagrahaṇe'numānaṃ bhavati, avyabhicārāt . vyabhicārāttvanumānābhāsam,
tadyathā vṛkṣakṣupādivajjvalanataikṣṇyādivyabhicāreṇa . tathāvidhadarśanabuddhyanubaddhamevānumānamapi... ... .... tadatatpakṣadvayagataikāntamanāśritya jñānamanavadhṛtārthamanadhyavasāyo viparyayaścānumānābhāsau .
vyāvṛttestvanumānāprāmāṇyāpattiḥ, atyantājñānādanadhyavasāyavat, grāhyavṛttyananurodhipratipattervā viparyayavat .
gatirapi tadbhāvadarśanavidhereva, tathā cānyathā ca dīpti-taikṣṇyādirūpeṇa tadvirahitatvena ca dṛṣṭatvād
vyabhicārāt, nātyantābhūtaśītādivyabhicārādasambaddhādagatiḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? sambaddhavyabhicārādeva .
kiñcānyat, darśanavidherevānumānalakṣaṇopapatteḥ sa evaiṣitavya ityata āha --tadbhāvadarśanānubandhena hi buddhyutpattiranumānamityetadanumānalakṣaṇam . tad vyācaṣṭe --dhūmavattvamityādi, yadā dhūmavattvaṃ
pradeśasyāgnimattvānubaddhameva ityaikāntikaṃ grahaṇaṃ tadānumānaṃ bhavati dhūmādagniratra iti, tasyāgnerekāntenaiva
grahaṇamavyabhicārāt . vyabhicārāt tvanumānābhāsam, tadyathā--vṛkṣa-kṣupādivajjvalanataikṣṇyādivyabhicāreṇa,
yathā yadā tu vṛkṣaḥ kṣupo vātra, dhūmāt iti tadānumānābhāsaṃ bhavati, vināpi vṛkṣādinā dṛṣṭatvād vyabhicārād darśanabalenaiva . tadupasaṃhāraḥ tathāvidhadarśanabuddhyanubaddhamevānumānamapītyādi gatārtha evaṃ
sandehānumānābhāsaśca . anadhyavasāya-viparyayānumānābhāsāvapi, tadyathā --tadatatpakṣetyādi . sa cāsaśca
pakṣau tadatatpakṣau, tayordvayam, tadgatamekāntaṃ bhūtameva, abhūtameva ityanāśritya yathā agniratraiva, agniratra
bhavatyeva evamādyaniścitāsandigdharūpaṃ jñānamanavadhṛtārthamanadhyavasāyaḥ, viparyayaścābhūte bhūtapratyayaḥ, bhūte
cābhūtapratyayaḥ, sthāṇau puruṣapratyayavat . etāvapyanumānābhāsau . tatpariṇāmāvyavacchedena tathāvidhadarśanabuddhyanubaddhamevānumānaṃ dṛṣṭavat, tathaivānumānābhāso'pi .
tvanmatyā vyāvṛttestvanumānāprāmāṇyāpattiḥ na bhavati na bhavati ityubhayato'pyabhavanaparamārthatvādarthāntaramabhāvo vā'tyantamadṛṣṭatvāt agnirna bhavati, udakamanagniḥ sa na bhavati ghaṭaḥ khapuṣpaṃ vā iti
ajñānamevetyaprāmāṇyāpattiḥ pūrvoktanyāyena . kasmāt ? atyantājñānādanadhyavasāyavadityaprāmāṇyam .
tathā viparyayavadaprāmāṇyāpādanārthamāha --grāhyavṛttyananurodhipratipattervā viparyayavaditi . grāhyasyāgnervidhirūpeṇa vṛttiragnibhavanam, tadanurodhinī na bhavati yā pratipattiḥ sā grāhyavṛttyananurodhinī, tasyāḥ pratipattergrāhyavṛttyananurodhinyā hetoraprāmāṇyaṃ vyāvṛttyanumānasya, puruṣe sthāṇupratyayavaditi prāguktanyāyabalenāniṣṭāpādanaṃ gatārtham . tasmād dṛṣṭavadevānumānatadābhāsau yathādṛṣṭajñānānubaddhatvāditi .


evaṃ ca tadapi na dūṣaṇaṃ yat kila sambandhānumānalakṣaṇasya asyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇam
vai॰ sū॰ 9 . 1 . 18 ityādeścoktaṃ dūṣaṇam, uktavidhivṛttibhāvanatvādanumānasya .

liṅgena na vinā liṅgī... ... ....
liṅge celliṅginiyamastaikṣṇyaṃ kimiti neṣyate ॥

na yathāha--liṅge liṅgī bhavatyeva . na tu liṅgini liṅgaṃ bhavatyeva liṅgisattve'pi liṅgābhāvād ayognivat . liṅgini deśe dhūmo bhavanneva pakṣadharmo bhavati .
yathā vāha--liṅginyeva liṅgaṃ bhavati nāliṅgini, tadapi na ghaṭate, niyamena
tasya sadbhāve tatraivāgnau liṅgatvāt .

evaṃ ca tadapītyādi . atideśena sambandhānumānalakṣaṇasya sambandhādekasmāt   ityādeḥ
asyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇam vai॰ sū॰ 9 . 1 . 18 ityādeśca yat kila dūṣaṇaṃ sambandhasyāviśiṣṭatvād dhūmādagnidravyādivad dīptitaikṣṇyādīnāmapi gamyatvam, dhūmapāṇḍutvādiviśeṣagamakatvavad dravyasattvādisāmānyasyāpi
gamakatvam, agnervā gamakatvaṃ dhūmavat, dhūmasya vāgnivad gamyatvam' ityete doṣāḥ prasaktā dṛṣṭavad vidhivṛtteranumānokteḥ yathā dṛṣṭastathā sandehānadhyavasāyaviparyayaniścayakṛdityabhyupagamāditi . etadapi na dūṣaṇam,
uktavidhivṛttibhāvanatvādanumānasyeti .
kiñcānyat, liṅge liṅgī bhavatyeva ityasyāḥ kārikāyā yo'rtho'vadhāraṇavaiparītyenā'numānami-
tyuktastasya dūṣaṇārthamāhācāryaḥ --liṅgena na vinā liṅgītyādi ślokaḥ . na yathāhetyādi paramatapradarśanaṃ
yāvadayognivaditi niyamaviparyayeṇa sodāharaṇam . atrottaram --liṅgini deśe'gnimati dhūmo bhavanneva
pakṣadharmo bhavati, nābhavan asiddhatvādaliṅgatvāt . ābaddhamūlatvādiviśeṣaṇāvadhṛtapakṣadharmatvasyaiva liṅgatvālliṅgini liṅgaṃ bhavatyeva vātyādivyudāsena . tasya ca dhūmasyāgnigatataikṣṇyādiliṅgatvaṃ na bhavati, na dṛṣṭatvād
dhūme tasyāgneradṛṣṭatvāt taikṣṇyādinā ca saha vidhivṛttyeti .
yathā vāhetyādi . liṅginyeva ityasyāvadhāraṇasya nirūpaṇam--yadā bhavati liṅgaṃ tadā nāliṅgini
bhavati udakādau dhūma iti . tadapi na ghaṭate, kasmāt ? niyamenetyādi, tasya dhūmasya sadbhāve baddhamūlatvādiviśeṣaparicchinne tatraivāgnau nānyatrāyognyādau liṅgatvam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? agniratra iti atraśabdasyādhikaraṇavācino'rthavattve atraśabdavācyaitatpradeśasambandhinyevāgnau liṅgitvāt, anyathā'numānābhāvadoṣasyoktatvāt . tasmāt sa eva tasyaiva liṅgamiti siddham . yat punardhūmagatadravyatvādyagnyaprakāśanaṃ tattu
asmadiṣṭadarśanavidhereva tathā vyabhicārāt .



liṅge celliṅginiyamastaikṣṇyaṃ kimiti neṣyate ?

adarśanamiti cet, tanna, pracuraharitatṛṇendhano dhūmastārṇālpatādiviśeṣānagnergamayati . bahala... ... ...dhūmo bahutāpādiviśeṣān gamayati hastalagṛhāṅgaṇagatastauṣastauṣāgniṃ gamayati . iti liṅga eva liṅgino bhāvaḥ .
athocyeta--viśeṣā na tu gamyante tasyaiva vyabhicāriṇaḥ pra॰ samu॰ 2 . 18 . na, taikṣṇyādivacanāt . tatrāpi coktameva tadbhāvadarśanavidhereva taditi .
na ca liṅginyeva liṅgamiti niyamo vāsagṛhavat . śakyate ca liṅge dhūme
niyamādagniriti vaktum, asandhukṣitānagnitvāt .

kintu yathā ca tvayocyate liṅge liṅgī bhavatyeva iti, tatra liṅge celliṅginiyamaḥ tathā cedaṃ
doṣajātam--taikṣṇyaṃ kimiti neṣyate ? dhūmatvāvadhāraṇakāraṇaviśeṣāṇāṃ dīptatara-mandaprakāśanādiviśeṣasahacaratvād dhūmādagnigativat tadavadhāraṇakāraṇaviśeṣasahacarāgniviśeṣaḥ kasmānneṣyate tebhya eva dhūmāvadhāraṇakāraṇaviśeṣebhyaḥ ? .
syānmatam --adarśanamiti cet, tanneti darśanamasti ityucyate . tadyathā pracuraharitetyādi,
yatra dogdhāraḥ puruṣā eva dohayantībhirvirahitāḥ, gokule haritatṛṇākīrṇe navāvāse gavāṃ maśakanivāraṇārthaṃ
haritatṛṇendhano'gniḥ kriyate tatraitaddaṇḍakoktaviśeṣo dhūmastārṇālpatādiviśeṣānagnergamayati . tathā bahaletyādinā tāpābhivṛddhyā viśeṣaḥ . hastalā mṛtpātrakārāḥ śilpinaḥ, tadgṛhāṅgaṇagatastauṣastauṣāgniṃ gamayatīti
viśeṣāṇāmapi liṅgitvadṛṣṭerliṅge dhūma eva liṅgino'gnerbhāvaḥ . tasmād nāvadhāraṇavaiparītyena liṅgaliṅgitā,
na ca viśeṣāgamyateti .
athocyetetyādi . syānmatam--mayā viśeṣyokta evādoṣo'sya viśeṣā na tu gamyante, ke ? ye
tasyaiva vyabhicāriṇa iti . etadapi na, taikṣṇyādivacanāt, tvayā hi dīptitaikṣṇyādayo viśeṣā na
gamyante iti kārikārthaṃ vivṛṇvatoktatvāt taikṣṇyādīnāṃ ca gamyatattvasya darśitatvāditi .
kiñcānyat, mayā tatrāpi coktameva tadbhāvadarśanavidhereva taditi, tadapi ca viśeṣāṇāṃ gamyagamakatvaṃ
sādhyasādhanadharmayostadbhāvena dṛṣṭayorvidhirūpeṇa saṃyogivad vṛtterdṛṣṭabalenaiva na vyāvṛttyetyabhihitameva .
tasmāt liṅge liṅgī bhavatyeva ityayuktamuktam . liṅgena na vinā liṅgī ityādi ślokaśca sādhūktaḥ .
yadapyuktaṃ liṅginyeva liṅgam iti, tadapi na ca liṅginyeva liṅgam iti niyamo
vāsagṛhavat, yathā vāsagṛhe'panītāgnike liṅgināgninā vināpi dhūmasya dṛṣṭatvādaraṇinirmathanāvasthasyeti .
śakyate ca liṅge dhūme niyamādagniḥ iti vaktum, kasmāt ? asandhukṣitānagnitvāt, na hyasandīpte


evaṃ ca liṅgaṃ liṅgini vyāpitvādeva gamakatvaṃ bhajate kṛtakānityatvavat .
tvanmativat sādhyadharmasya liṅgitve sādhanadharmasya liṅgatve'pi brūmaḥ--yathā liṅgamapi vyāpi tathā liṅgamapyaṅgyapi .ubhayaṃ liṅgaṃ liṅgi vā na yat tad goviṣāṇavat ॥
yathā liṅgamapi vyāpi saṃyogivadvṛttau... ... ...tathā liṅgamapyaṅgyapi .
ndhanāvastho'raṇyavastho vāgniradhūmakaḥ, adhūmatvādanagnireva agi ragi lagi gatyarthaḥ   ityaṅganād gamanādagniḥ . anindhano na gacchati na dahati, agacchannadahannanagnireva . bhasmacchannasyāpi bāṣpoṣmapudgalaniścaraṇāt sendhanatvaṃ sadhūmatvaṃ ca paramārthataḥ tatpariṇāmādagnyabhihatakāṣṭhatṛṇādīndhanānāṃ sandīpanaprajvalanajvālāṅgāramurmurabhasmacchannoṣmamātrādyavasthāsu ślakṣṇadhūmapariṇāmāśūnyatvāt sarvatra dhūme'gnirniyataḥ
tathāgnau dhūmaḥ .
evaṃ ca kṛtvātra prayogaḥ --liṅgaṃ dhūmo liṅginyagnau vyāpitvādeva gamakatvaṃ bhajate vidhivṛttyaivetyarthaḥ . kṛtakānityatvavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, yathā kṛtakatvamanityatāṃ vyāpnuvad gamayati tathā dhūmo'pyagnimiti . evaṃ liṅga eva liṅgītyapi grāhyam .
tvanmativadityādi . asmanmatena sādhyaṃ sādhanaṃ ca ekameva ityuktatvāt parasparavyāpitvād
vidhirūpeṇaivobhayato'pi gamyagamakatā na vyāvṛttyetyatra kiṃ citram ? tvanmatenāpi bhedaṃ kṛtvā
sādhyadharmasyāgnerliṅgitve sādhanadharmasya dhūmasya liṅgatve'pi brūmaḥ --yathā liṅgamapi vyāpītyādi ślokaḥ .
yathocyate tvayā—
kāmaṃ liṅgamapi vyāpi liṅginyaṅgi tu tattataḥ .vyāpitvānna tu tattasya gamakaṃ goviṣāṇavat ॥ pra॰ samu॰ 2 . 21 1/2 iti .
kimuktaṃ bhavati ? satyapi kila kṛtakānityavat saṃyogivadvṛttyā'nyonyavyāpitve dhūma evāgnergamako
nāgnirdhūmasya, yathā gotvād viṣāṇī iti gotvaṃ viṣāṇitvasya gamakam; na viṣāṇitvād gauḥ
iti viṣāṇitvaṃ goḥ, gaja-vṛṣa-mahiṣa-varāhādiṣu vyabhicārāditi . atrāpi gamyagamakaniyamo'smanmatenetyeṣa ślokaḥ --yathā liṅgamapi vyāpīti . asya vyākhyā --saṃyogivadvṛttāvityādi pradeśadharmatvāt tasyaiva
sādhyasādhanatvopavarṇanaṃ prāguktamatidiśya tathā liṅgamapyaṅgyapi, vātyādivyudāsenāgnipariṇāmatvena baddhamūlatvāderubhayaliṅgaliṅgitā'syaiva prāguktā smaryatām, ko doṣaḥ ? iti tameva nyāyaṃ smārayati . ata

... ... ...ata eva ca... ... ...na yattad goviṣāṇavat . viṣāṇaṃ hi prameyatvavad
vyabhicāri... ... ...itaravadagauravyabhicārī--. kiṃ kāraṇam ?
vidheyārthapracāreṇa yasmādvyāptirapekṣyate .liṅgasya liṅgini vyāptistasmāt satyeva sādhanam ॥
vidheyo bhāvaḥ . tasya prakarṣeṇa gatiḥ pracāro'nutpiñjalagamanikā, na dhūmasāmānyāgnimadgativat . yasmād vyāptirevaṃvidhā'pekṣyate'smadiṣṭā dvaividhyena ubhayāvyabhicārātmikā yatra yatra... ... ...tasmāt satyeva vyāptiḥ sādhanam .
dhūmo yathāgnisānnidhyārthaviśeṣaṇairātmalābhādagnisānnidhyaṃ gamayati tathā
eva cetyādi sahetukaṃ pratijñātaṃ nigamayati . niyattaṃ na yattad goviṣāṇavaditi, yacchabdo yasmādarthe, tacchabdastannirdeśe, yasmād goviṣāṇavadekato na vyabhicarati tasmādubhayaṃ liṃgaṃ liṅgi veti grāhyam .
tadvyākhyā --viṣāṇaṃ hītyādi asādharmyadarśanaṃ go-viṣāṇayoḥ kṛtakānityatvayośca gatārtham . prameyatvavad
vyabhicāri viṣāṇitvam . itaro dhūmaḥ, tadvad gauravyabhicārīti .
kiṃ kāraṇamitthamiti cet, asmaduktāyā vyāptervidhirūpāyā eva gamyagamakatvāditi . ata
āha --vidheyārthetyādi ślokaḥ . atrāpi na yathā tvayocyate --pratiṣedhyāpracāreṇa ityādi . tadvyākhyā
vidheyo bhāva ityādi, bhāvagrahaṇamabhāvarūpāyā vyāpternirākaraṇārtham . kasmāt ? arthatvādeva . tasya
bhāvasya, nābhāvaḥ pratiṣedhyaḥ tatrāpracāraḥ, sa cāpramāṇaphalaṃ bhavitumarhati arthāntarasyātyantābhāvasya cāvivakṣitatvāt prāguktadoṣasambandhācca, prakarṣeṇa gatiḥ pracāro vastuyathābhāvāvagama ityarthaḥ, anutpiñjalagamaniketi tadarthagamanam avyathāgamanam . vaidharmyeṇa na yathā tvadiṣṭamiti darśayati --na dhūmasāmānyāgnimadgativaditi ekato vyāptiṃ viṣāṇitvādikalpāṃ darśayati . yasmād vyāptirevaṃvidhā parasparasaṃsṛṣṭā'pekṣyate
gatāvarthasya tasmāt satyeva vyāptiḥ sādhanamityabhisambhantsyate, viśabdasya dvaividhyārthatvāt . taddarśayati—
asmadiṣṭā dvaividhyena vyāptirubhayāvyabhicārātmikā, tasmāt kim ? sphuṭamevānvayātmako dṛṣṭānto
nocyate'smābhiḥ, yatra yatretyādirubhayavyāptipradarśano gatārtho yāvat satyeva sādhanamityupasaṃhāra iti .
tasmād dṛṣṭāntalakṣaṇamapi sādhyenānugamo hetoḥ pra॰ samu॰ 4 . 2 ityādi prayoganiyamābhidhānātmakamanarthakam, mudhā bhrāntaṃ cātra tvayeti .
dhūmo yathetyādi . evaṃ kṛtvā yathā'gnisānnidhyārthairviśeṣaṇairdhūmātmalābhādagnisānnidhyamevāgnisānnidhyasādhakaṃ tathā kṛtakatvaṃ ghaṭādau, ghakārā-'kāra-ṭakārā-'kāravisarjanīyānāṃ pūrvasya pūrvasya vināśa

kṛtakatvamanityatvasānnidhyādātmalābhādanityatvasānnidhyaṃ gamayati... ... ...
ghaṭakṛtakatvavat .
asmādeva ca nyāyād yadapyuktaṃ nāśinaḥ kṛtakatvena pra॰ samu॰ 2 . 23 ityādi
tadapyevamadhyeyam--nāśinaḥ kṛtakatvena vyāptestat kṛtakaṃ kṛtam .anityatvaṃ tvabhivyāptyā kṛtake'rthe pradarśyate ॥
yeyam... ... ...sthāpitam... ... ...kṛtakatvasyānityatvam .viṣāṇitvena gaurvyāpto viṣāṇitvaṃ prasādhayet .gavyevāniyamāt tattu na gavārthaprasādhanam ॥
uttarottarotpatteḥ kāraṇam, tata eva vināśādanityatvādutpatteḥ kṛtakatvasyātmalābhādanityatvasānnidhyamevānityatvasānnidhyaṃ gamayatītyubhayato vyāptiḥ satyeva kāraṇam . śivakādivināśakrameṇa etadarthabhāvanā gatārthā —
agnisānnidhyārthetyādi yāvad ghaṭakṛtakatvavaditi . tathā śabde'pi bhāvayitavyaṃ prayatnānantarīyakānityatvayoriti .
asmādeva ca nyāyād yadapyuktaṃ tvayā --nāśinaḥ kṛtakatvena pra॰ samu॰ 2 . 23 ityādi kārikayā
ekato vyāptigamakatvapradarśanārthaṃ tadapyevamadhyeyam—
nāśinaḥ kṛtakatvena vyāptestat kṛtakaṃ kṛtam .anityatvaṃ tvabhivyāptyā kṛtake'rthe pradarśyate ॥
tadvyākhyā --yeyamityādi yāvat kṛtakatvasyānityatvamiti gatārthaṃ sthāpitam ityanuvartanāditi .
etasmādeva nyāyād yo'pyukto viṣāṇitvena gaurvyāptaḥ pra॰ samu॰ 2 . 24 ityādi ślokaḥ
so'pītthaṃ paṭhitavyaḥ--

viṣāṇitvena gaurvyāpto viṣāṇitvaṃ prasādhayet .

gotvād viṣāṇī iti saṃyogivad vidhivṛtteḥ sādhayed viṣāṇitāṃ gotvaṃ tatraiva niyatatvāt .
viṣāṇitvaṃ punarasmādeva nyāyād

gavyevāniyamāt tattu na gavārthaprasādhanam .



tāvad dvayamapyuktam--anumānamabhidhānaṃ cādhārādheyavadvṛttyā na gamayati,
atra ca pakṣe kāṃścid doṣānatyadiśāma . saṃyogivad vidhivṛttyā gamayati, atra ca
pakṣe guṇānabhyadhāma .
yat punarniruktīkṛtyānvayāsambhavaṃ vyatirekāsambhavamāśaṅkyoktaṃ syādetad
vyatirekasyāpyasambhavaḥ   iti, tad yuktamevoktam, anvayavyatirekayorabhāvāt . anvayavyatirekau hi pratyayātmakau, na vastugate tulyātulyayorvṛttyavṛttī,
viśeṣasyaiva vastutvādasya nayasya . tatrānvayābhāva ukta eva tvayā . na ca sambhavo'sti sarvāvṛkṣārthavyatirekasya, ānantyāt, sarvavṛkṣārthānvayavat .

tāvadityādiruktārthopasaṃhāraḥ . dvayamapyuktam, anyāpohaviśiṣṭārthaikadeśānvayadarśanādanumānamabhidhānaṃ
cādhārādheyavadvṛttyā na gamayatītyuktam, atra ca pakṣe kāṃściddoṣānatyadiśāma adīdṛśāma, pāṭhāntaraṃ
saṃyogivad vidhivṛttyā ubhayato vyāptyā gamayatītyuktam, atra ca pakṣe guṇānabhyadhāmetyevaṃ
śabdena smārayati .
kiñcānyat, yat punarniruktīkṛtyetyādi . tvayā anvayavyatirekāvarthānumāne dvāram  
ityuktvā guṇasamudāye ḍitthākhye'rthe kāṇa-kuṇṭādyavayavānvayānabhidhānādanvayāsambhavaṃ niruktīkṛtya anvayāsambhavavad vyatirekāsambhavamāśaṅkyoktaṃ syādetad vyatirekasyāpyasambhava iti, tad yuktameva tvayoktam, asmaduktasaṃyogivadvidhivṛttimantareṇānvayavyatirekayorabhāvāt . tayoreva tāvad lakṣaṇam--anvayavyatirekau hi pratyayātmakau, samānabhavanānuvṛttipratyayo'nvayaḥ, tadviparīto vyatirekaḥ, na vastugate tulyātulyayorvṛttyavṛttī tvadukte . kasmāt ? viśeṣasyaiva vastutvādasya nayasya syādvāde'nekātmakatvāt . tatrānvayābhāva ukta eva tvayā'smābhiśca tvanmatavat .
vyatirekābhāvo'dhunocyate na ca sambhavo'stītyādi . vṛkṣaśabdasya śaktirnāsti sarvānavṛkṣān
vyatirecayitum . kasmāt ? ānantyāt, ānantye hi bhedānām pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 5 . 2 ityādigranthavyākhyānanyāyavadavṛkṣārthānāṃ ghaṭapaṭādīnāmānantyād vyatirecanābhāve nyāyo draṣṭavyaḥ . sarvavṛkṣārthānvayavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, yathā sarve vṛkṣārthā ānantyāt sambandhāśakyatvādanvayābhāvāccānabhidheyāstathā
bahutaravyāvartyaghaṭapaṭādyanantataratvādavyatirekaḥ, tathā dhūmasya udakādisarvānagnivyatirecane sāmarthyābhāvo
vācyaḥ sarvavṛkṣānantyādanvayavaditi .


yattūcyate--atulye satyapyānantye śakyamadarśanamātreṇāvṛtterākhyānam . ata eva svasambandhibhyo'nyatrādarśanāt tadvyavacchedenānumānam pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 5 . 34 iti . atra brūmaḥ--na,

dṛṣṭavadvidhirūpeṇa na celliṅgaṃ prakāśayet .
sarvatrādarśanānna syāt sarvathā vā'gatirbhavet ॥

liṅgamapadeśaḥ kāraṇaṃ nimittam ityanarthāntaram... ... ...
bhedāvivakṣaikatvāpāditaikatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ liṅgaṃ tathābhāvitaikatvasya liṅgino gamakaṃ
tadbhāvenaiva . evaṃ liṅgaṃ gamakaṃ liṅgī gamyaścetyadoṣaḥ .

atra parihārastvayokta āśaṅkyate --yattūcyata ityādi . anvayagatadoṣābhāvaṃ vyatirekagataṃ guṇaṃ ca
darśayati granthaḥ --atulye satyapyānantye ityādi . tato'nyasyābhāvamātraṃ sāmānyato vyatirecanīyaṃ tadbhedarūpāṇi asaṃspṛśatā śabdena liṅgena vā . tasmādadoṣa iti parihāraḥ .
atra brūmaḥ --na, dṛṣṭavadityādi . yadi dṛṣṭavad vidhirūpeṇa liṅgaṃ liṅginaṃ na prakāśayet sarvatra
liṅginyadarśanāt talliṅgaṃ liṅgameva na syāt, agatirvā sarvathā bhavet kasyacidapyarthasyeti piṇḍārthaḥ .
etadvyākhyā --liṅgamapadeśaḥ kāraṇaṃ nimittamityādi paryāyakathanam . śabdaḥ parārthaḥ, dhūmādiḥ
svārthaḥ . vācyavācakasambandhasyānumānānumeyasambandhasya cāviśiṣṭatvādaikadhyena dvividhasyāpyanumānasya
grahaṇam . tatra viśeṣasyaiva vācyatvādanumeyatvāccārthasya sāmānyasyāsattvādasatyopādhisatyaśabdārthatvaṃ tvayoktatvāt, asmābhiryathā arthaśabdaviśeṣasya vācyavācakateṣyate sāmānyasyāsattvād viśeṣasyaiva sattvāt,
na hyabhāvo vācyaḥ khapuṣpavat . tasya sāmānyasyāsattvādeva pūrvamadṛṣṭatve viśeṣasyaiva dṛṣṭasya kalpitāsatya-
sāmānyopasarjanadvāreṇa vācyatvācchabdasyāpi tathaiva vācakatvāt sāmānyopasarjanopāyena . tathānumāne'pi vidhiḥ .
tattvālliṅgaṃ śabdo dhūmādi vā kathaṃ gamakaṃ bhavati ? ucyate--bhedānāmavivakṣayā sāmānyasya ekatvādāpāditaṃ teṣāmekatvaṃ bhedānāṃ yasmiṃstalliṅgaṃ bhedāvivakṣāpāditaikatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ liṅgaṃ tadbhāvāpanno dharmo
dhūma-śabdādiḥ, tathābhāvitaikatvasya tena śabda-dhūmādiprakāreṇa bhāvitamekatvaṃ śākhādibhinnāvayavavatastaro

yadi tu na tathā prakāśayatītīṣṭaṃ kintvanyāpohena tato naiva prakāśakaṃ syāt
sarvasyādarśanāt pratidravyamapohyasyādarśanāt .
na hi sa vā bhavati tato'nyo vā, adṛṣṭatvāt, vandhyāputravat . na ca tadatulyamatacchabdamatadrūpaṃ tathā tathā'dṛṣṭaṃ pratipattuṃ śakyam . apratipanne ca tasmin
kasya kathaṃ vāpohaḥ syāt ?
apitṛtvavat syāditi cet . yathā pituranyo'pitā sarvo vyāvṛttibuddhimātreṇa
stāpādibhinnakarmavataścāgnerliṅginaśca, vācya-liṅgyabhedāt prāguktanyāyena ātmanaivātmano vācakā ātmanaivātmano'numeyāḥ, tadbhāvadarśanādeva sāmānyasya viśeṣapratipādanārthatvācchibikāvāhakayāneśvarayānavad gamakaṃ
tadbhāvenaiva, agnereva dhūmatvāt baddhamūlādiviśiṣṭatayā dhūmasyaivāgnitvādādimadhyānteṣu araṇyādīndhanasandhukṣaṇamurmurādyavasthadhūmādipudgalāgnitvāt . evamuktanyāyena liṅgaṃ gamakaṃ liṅgī gamyaścetyadoṣa ityatītaṃ nyāyaṃ
smārayati .
yadi tu na tathetyādi paramate doṣaḥ . yadi yena prakāreṇa dṛṣṭastenaiva prakāreṇa liṅgaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tenaiva ca
prakāreṇa vidhinā prakāśayatītiṣṭaṃ na, tvayā tu kimiṣṭam ? anyāpoheneti . tataḥ kim ? tato naiva
prakāśakaṃ syāt . kasmāt ? sarvasyādarśanāt, yathā vidheyamadṛṣṭaṃ tvanmatena tathā vyāvartyamapi kiñcinna
dṛṣṭamavṛkṣānagnyākhyam, ghaṭapaṭādibhedānāmānantyād dravyaṃ dravyaṃ prati pratidravyamapohyasyādarśanāt kiṃ
tad vṛkṣādagnerarthādanyadavṛkṣānagnyākhyam ? adṛṣṭameva bhavet . yataśca buddhervyāvṛttiriṣṭā, na hyadṛṣṭvārtham
ayaṃ bhavati, ayaṃ na bhavati ityanvayavyatirekau bhavitumarhato buddheḥ, dṛṣṭāneva buddhiranviyādarthān tebhya
eva ca vyāvarteta, yathā devadatto'yaṃ yajñadatto na ityādi, nātyantādṛṣṭakhapuṣpavandhyāputrādiviṣayā .
etadarthapradarśanārthamāha --na hi sa vṛkṣo'gnirvā bhavati tato'nyo vā ghaṭādiḥ, adṛṣṭatvāt,
vandhyāputravat . dṛṣṭa eva sa vā bhavati anyo vā tataḥ . na ca tena dṛṣṭenā'tulyamatacchabdam, na sa
vṛkṣaśabdo'gniśabdo vā śabdo'sya tadidamatacchabdamavṛkṣo'nagnyādi vā . tathā na tasya rūpaṃ rūpamasyātadrūpam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? yasmāt tathā tathā tena tena prakāreṇā'dṛṣṭaṃ ghaṭapaṭakuḍyādibhedaprakāreṇādṛṣṭatvāt
pratipattumaśakyam . tataścā'pratipanne cetyādi vyākhyātārthabhedarūpeṇāgrahaṇam, tata evānyo'pi nāsti,
sati cāgrahaṇe'nyasya cābhāvāt kasya kathaṃ vāpohaḥ syāt ? prāguktavidhinā kiṃ kena kuto'pohyate
ityādigrantho'tra yojya iti .
apitṛtvavat syāditi cet, syādiyamāśaṅkā, yathetyādi tadvyākhyā, pituranye sarve puruṣā
anāśritabhedarūpāstadanvayādṛte'pi dṛṣṭāt pituranyatvavyāvṛttibuddhimātreṇa svabhedānapekṣā niravayavā eva

niravayava eva pratīyate tathāgnivṛkṣābhyāmanye'vṛkṣājvalanāḥ sarve'pi vyāvṛttibuddhimātreṇa niravayavāḥ pratīyeran, ko doṣaḥ ?
sarvasyādarśanānna syāt . yuktaṃ piturapituśca dṛṣṭasya vyaktagrahaṇottarakālaṃ pituḥ
paryudāsenānyasyāpitṛtvaṃ pratipādyeta, na tu piturevādarśane . sa hi pitari... ... ...
pratyayotpattiḥ .
yathā tvidaṃ tvayeṣṭaṃ tulye vṛttiratulye cāvṛttiḥ . tatra tulye nāvaśyaṃ sarvatra vṛttirākhyeyā,
kvacidānantye'rthasyākhyānāsambhavāt, na hi sambhavo'sti vṛkṣaśabdasya sarvavṛkṣeṣu darśane . nāpi sarvatra
liṅgini sarvaliṅgasya sambhavaḥ, agnidhūmādivat . yadyapi ca kvacidasti ḍitthādiṣu sambhavaḥ tathāpi
guṇasamudāyamātrasya kāṇakuṇṭāderdarśanāsambhavaḥ, satyapi ca darśane sarvathā'numānāsambhavaḥ  
iti tathā sarvasyādarśanāt pitṛkalpasya... ... ...tadapohasya vā'pratipattiḥ .
yadi hi svārthaḥ parārthaśca sampiṇḍya vidhinā gṛhītaḥ syāt tata evaṃ pratipadyeta
ayaṃ vṛkṣaḥ, ayaṃ na bhavati iti, nātyantāviditavṛkṣāvṛkṣaśabdārthatāyām .
pratīyanta iti dṛṣṭāntastathāgnivṛkṣābhyāmanye'vṛkṣājvalanā vṛkṣajvalanaparyudāsenānantā bhedā api vyāvṛttibuddhimātreṇa niravayavāḥ pratīyeran ko doṣa iti .
atra doṣakutūhalaṃ ced brūmaḥ --sarvasyādarśanād na syāt . yuktaṃ piturasmaddarśanena vidhirūpeṇa
dṛṣṭasya aṅgādaṅgaṃ sambhavasi kauṣītakibrā॰ 27 ityādinyāyāt svaputrasya guṇasamudāyarūpasya prāṇān
dattavataḥ paryudāsenānyasya bhrātrādeḥ svajanasya pitṛviparītabuddheradhyāsena grāhyasya eṣa pitā devadattaḥ,
neme vasurātādayaḥ iti piturapituśca vyaktagrahaṇottarakālaṃ parajanasya cānyasyāpitṛtvaṃ pratipādyetetyeṣo'sti
nyāyaḥ . tvaddarśane punarguṇasamudāyasya na tu piturevādarśane yuktam iti vartate na ghaṭate pitureva
grahaṇāsambhave asati vā pitari guṇasamudāyamātrārthagrahaṇābhidhānābhāvaprakāreṇoktena . sa hi pitarītyādinā darśanavidhiṃ pituḥ pitṛdarśanāccāpitṝṇāṃ taditarabhedānāṃ ca kathayati darśanavidhiṃ yāvat pratyayotpattiriti granthena . eṣā dṛṣṭāntavarṇanā . dārṣṭāntikāsamañjasatedānīm . yathā tvidamityādi yathā tvayeṣṭaṃ
tulye vṛttiratulye cāvṛttiḥ ityudgrāheṇa yāvat sarvathānumānāsambhava iti grantho vyācakṣāṇa eva
gataḥ paramatam . nyāyena tvaduktenaiva tathā sarvasyādarśanāt pitṛkalpasyetyādinā dārṣṭāntikavaiṣamyāpādanaṃ gatārthaṃ yāvat tadapohasya vā'pratipattiriti . tvanmatena kasyacideva svārthasya parārthasya
cādarśanādapi pitṛtvapratyayābhāva eveti piṇḍārthaḥ . athavā sarvasyādarśanāt ityādinā prakārāntareṇa doṣaṃ
brūmaḥ --yadi hi svārtha ityādi, vṛkṣaḥ ityukte'smaduktena nyāyena sāmānyopasarjano viśeṣaḥ samastaḥ
śiṃśapādirabhihitaḥ syāt tenāpoḍhaścāvṛkṣaḥ sabhedo ghaṭapaṭādiḥ sampiṇḍya ayamanyo'smād vṛkṣāt

vṛkṣaśabdādaṃhripaśabdo'nyatvādavṛkṣaḥ, tathā tadarthaḥ, agnervahnyādiranyo'nagniḥ .
na hi kvacit... ... .... tatra sāmānyaśabdārtheṣu tāvat sadityasanna
bhavati ityatra dvayī vṛttiḥ--anaṅgīkṛtārthāntaravṛttiḥ sacchabdaḥ, aṅgīkṛtārthāntaravṛttirvā . tatra tāvadanaṅgīkṛtārthāntaratāyāmapohaḥ kevala ucyate . sadityukte asanna
bhavati iti dvinañprayogāt bhavatyeva iti siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ--yo na
bhavati yathā vā na bhavati tasya dvividhasyāpyasadbhavanasyātra sambandhitvaṃ nāsti .
iti gṛhītaḥ syāt tata evaṃ pratipadyeta --ayaṃ vṛkṣaḥ ayameva vṛkṣa eva bhavati, tato'nyo'yaṃ ghaṭapaṭādiravṛkṣo vṛkṣo na bhavatīti . kiṃ kāraṇam ? pratyakṣatvādubhayasya . nātyantāviditavṛkṣāvṛkṣaśabdatāyāṃ na
cātyantādṛṣṭavṛkṣāvṛkṣasvarūpatāyāṃ vā sā pratipattirbhavitumarhati ayaṃ vṛkṣo'yaṃ na bhavati iti, khapuṣpavandhyāputrādivaditi .
etadarthanidarśanārthaṃ dṛṣṭāntamāha --vṛkṣaśabdādaṃhripaśabdo'nyatvādavṛkṣastathā tadarthaḥ, agnervahnyādiḥ, ubhayatra vā sattvadravyatvādisāmānyaviśeṣadharmo'nyo'nagniravṛkṣaśceti viditasakalavṛkṣāvṛkṣāgnyanagnyādiśabdārthasyaiva tajjñānaṃ dṛṣṭam . tathākāśaśabdādiṣu kha-gagana-viyadādi-sattva-dravyatvādidharmāpekṣaṃ
tadatattvaṃ yojyam .
na hi kvacidityādi . na hi kiñciddarśanamātrādvā tadvṛttinirniyamo vā bhavataḥ, kasmāt ?
vyabhicārāt, vṛkṣānvayo'pi vraścakapuruṣavyabhicārād vraścanadharmābhāvavyabhicārādavṛkṣa eva . avṛkṣaghaṭo'pi
ghaṭamānapādapa-taru-śākhibhedavṛkṣavyabhicārād vṛkṣaḥ, vṛkṣo'vṛkṣo ghaṭo'ghaṭaśca . anyo'pi hi bhavannananyo bhavati pīlu-hasti-vṛkṣādivat sāmānya-viśeṣa-paryāyaśabdārthebhyaḥ .
tatra sāmānyaśabdārtheṣu tāvadudāharaṇam--sadityasanna bhavati iti, atra hi dvayī vṛttiścintyate—
anaṅgīkṛtārthāntaravṛttiḥ sacchabdaḥ aṅgīkṛtārthāntaravṛttirvā syāt ? tatra prathamaṃ tāvad vyudastabhedasāmānyamātravṛttiranaṅgīkṛtārthāntaravṛttiḥ śabdaḥ . sa kīdṛśa iti cet, tannirūpaṇārthamāha --apohaḥ kevalo
vyāvṛttyartho nirnibandhana ucyate . tadudāharaṇam --sat ityukte asad na bhavati iti dvinañprayogāt prakṛtyāpatteḥ bhavatyeva iti vidhyartha eva jñāyate . tataḥ kiṃ saṃvṛttam ? siddhe sati ārambho
niyamārtha iti asad na bhavati iti dvābhyāṃ pratiṣedhābhyāṃ niyamyate vihitaṃ sattvameva . tat kathamiti
cet, ucyate --yo na bhavati khapuṣpādiḥ yathā vā na bhavati ghaṭa-paṭādiprakāreṇa tasya dvividhasyāpyasadbhabhavanasyātra vṛkṣe sambandhitvaṃ nāstītyuktaṃ bhavati . sa ca pratiṣedhaḥ . vidhipradhānaḥ paryudāsastato'nyatra

itthaṃ ca vidhipradhānaparyudāsātmakāsacchabdārthatyāgaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhamātrārthatvādanyābhāvādarthāntarāpohasvārthābhidhānalakṣaṇābhyupagamatyāgaḥ .
athaitebhya eva doṣebhyo'ṅgīkṛtārthāntaravṛttirapoha iṣyate tata idaṃ vighaṭate—
sadityasanna bhavatīti . pratisvasat sarvamapi ghaṭādīti sadevāsadapi bhavati itaretarābhāvādibhyaḥ . asatāpi hi tena satā kenacid bhavitavyam, pratyekavṛttitvāt, yathā
ghaṭa ityaghaṭo na bhavati vṛkṣa ityavṛkṣo na bhavati .
vidhiḥ, asacchabdaśca tadarthaḥ, itthaṃ coktanyāyena asacchabdārtho vidhipradhānaparyudāsātmakastyaktaḥ syāt .
sa eva vṛkṣo bhavati sattvāt, sato'nyasyāsato'tyantābhāvāt prasajyapratiṣedhamātramasat prasaktaṃ pratiṣiddhamityeṣo'rthaḥ syāt . tasmāt prasajyapratiṣedhamātrārthatvāt tataśca ayamasmādanyaḥ ityanyasyābhāvāt anyāpohaḥ śabdaḥ ityasyābhyupagamasya tyāgaḥ kṛta iti doṣaḥ syāt . kiñcānyat, tata eva
arthāntarāpohaṃ hi svārthe kurvatī śrutirabhidhatte   ityetasya arthāntarāpohena
svārthābhidhānam iti lakṣaṇasya tyāgaḥ kṛtaḥ syāt, eṣo'pyabhyupagamatyāgadoṣo'para iti . evaṃ tāvadanaṅgīkṛtārthāntaravṛttiḥ sadityasanna bhavatīti sāmānyaśabdārthe'nyāpoho na yukto vidhireva yukta iti .
athaitebhya evetyādi . atha mā bhūvannete paryudāsātmakānyaśabdārthārthāntarāpohasvārthābhidhānalakṣaṇābhyupagamatyāgadoṣā iti tebhya eva bhayādaṅgīkṛtārthāntaravṛttirapoha iṣyate tata idaṃ vighaṭate sadityasanna bhavatīti . kasmāt ? pratisvasat sarvamapi ghaṭādīti, itiśabdasya hetvarthatvāt pratisvaṃ
sarvasya sattvāt, sarvaṃ hi pratisvaṃ pratyātma pratyekamātmanā sadevāsadapi bhavati, na hyasanna bhavati . kutaḥ ?
itaretarābhāvādibhyaḥ, prākpradhvaṃsetaretarasaṃyogasamavāyāpramāṇasāmarthyādibhedena sadevāsad bhavati iti
vistarata utpatadbhireva pratipāditamasmābhiḥ--ghaṭo ghaṭātmanā san bhavati asanneva paṭātmanā ityādi .
atra prayogaḥ --asatāpi hi tena satā kenacid bhavitavyamiti pratijñā, yo bhavati yena prakāreṇa
ca bhavati tena dvividhenāpyasatā bhavitavyamityarthaḥ . kasmāt ? pratyekavṛttitvāt, pratisvamātmarūpeṇa
vartamānatvāt, athavā sattvāt, yaḥ san pratyekaṃ vā vartate so'sannapi kenacit prakāreṇa dṛṣṭo bhāvaḥ,
yathā ghaṭādanyaḥ paṭo ghaṭatvenāsanneva paṭatvena san dṛṣṭa iti tadvadidamapi asadeva sad bhavatīti, tathā
pratyekavṛttitvāditi . evamanaṅgīkṛtārthabhedatve sad bhavatyevāsat . abhyupagatamapi caitat tvayāpi, vismṛtamadhunā mayā smāryametat --yathā ghaṭa ityaghaṭo na bhavati vṛkṣa ityavṛkṣo na bhavatīti evamādyanyāpohaśabdārthavāditvād bhavataḥ . eṣa sacchabdasāmānyārtha uktaḥ .


dravyādisāmānyaśabdārtheṣvapi anaṅgīkṛtārthāntaratāyāṃ tenaiva nyāyena bhāvitavadabhyupagamatyāgaḥ . arthāntarāpohatāyāṃ pratisvasannyāyād yathāyogaṃ yojyaṃ tathaiva .
nanūcyamānasacchabdavadetatsiddhiḥ . atra brūmaḥ--yadi sacchabdo'sacchabdo'pi
bhavati tata eva ghaṭaśabdādyudāharaṇamavakāśaṃ labhate, anyathā kuto'syāvakāśaḥ ?
sacchabda eva hi sannasacchabdo bhavatyeva itarathā ghaṭasya sataḥ paṭādyasattvābhāve kasya
sataḥ śapanācchabdaḥ syāt sacchabdaḥ . evamarthataḥ sacchabdo'sacchabdo na bhavati

dravyādisāmānyaśabdārtheṣvapi dvividhā saiva, aṅgīkṛtānaṅgīkṛtabhedārthavṛttitvāt . tatra
tāvadanaṅgīkṛtārthāntaratāyāmityādiḥ sa eva nyāyaḥ prāktanaḥ adravyaṃ na bhavati iti dvinañyayogād
dravyameveti siddhe satyārambho niyamārthaḥ, yo na bhavati yena na bhavatītyādi sa eva grantho vidhipradhānaparyudāsātmakādravyaśabdārthatyāgādidoṣāpādanaḥ prasajyapratiṣedhamātrārthatvādityetadarthātideśo gatārtho yāvad
bhāvitavadabhyupagamatyāgaḥ . dvitīyavikalpe'pi arthāntarāpohatāyāmityādi tameva nyāyamatidiśati —
pratisvasannyāyāt, pratisvadravyatvāt sarvadravyāṇāṃ dravyamityadravyaṃ na na bhavati itaretarābhāvādibhya
ityādi yathāyogaṃ yojyaṃ tathaiva .
atrāha --nanūcyamānasacchabdavadetatsiddhiḥ, siddhaṃ sacchabdamasatsvarūpavinirmuktaṃ manyamānaścodayati
yaḥ sacchabdaḥ sa sataḥ śapanādāhvānāt, ataḥ śabdād yathā sacchabda eva sadarthavācyeva ca nāsacchabdo
nāsadarthavācī vā tathā sadvastvapi syāditi . ghaṭaśabdādirapi viśeṣaśabdastadarthaśca tathā na paṭādiśabdastadartho vā bhavitumarhatīti . tasmādayuktamucyate sannasan bhavatīti .
atra brūmaḥ --yadi sacchabdo'sacchabdo'pītyādi . nābhyupagacchāma etat sacchabdo'sacchabdo
na bhavati iti, tathodāharaṇatvāsambhavāt sacchabdāsacchabdatva evodāharaṇatvasiddheḥ . yadi hi sacchabdo'sacchabdo'pi bhavati tata eva loke'nyāpohavāde ca ghaṭaśabdādyudāharaṇamavakāśaṃ labhate, anyathā
kuto'sya ghaṭādyudāharaṇasyāvakāśaḥ ?
tad vyācaṣṭe --sacchabda eva hi sannasacchabdo bhavatyeva, sadeva śabdayan ghaṭādi paṭādyaśabdanādasacchabdo bhavatyeva, itarathā ghaṭasya sataḥ paṭādyasattvābhāve sattvābhāvaḥ, sattvābhāvāt saṅkarādidoṣāccāsattve kasya sataḥ śapanācchabdaḥ syāt sacchabdo'ṅgīkṛtabhedārthatve ? tasmādayuktamuktam sacchabdavadasanna bhavati sadvastviti . evamarthataḥ sataḥ śabdaḥ sacchabdaḥ ityarthadvāreṇa sacchabdo'sacchabdo na
bhavati ityayuktam .



ityayuktam . śabdato'pi cāsti sacchabdo'nya eva . saderdhātoḥ sacchabdo'pyanya
eva . evaṃ dravyādiśabdeṣu vācyam .
viśeṣaśabdārtheṣu tu ghaṭa ityaghaṭo na bhavati ityatrāpi na na bhavatyaghaṭaḥ .
tadyathā āmacchidrādighaṭā evāghaṭā aceṣṭatvāt . ghaṭayan vā ghaṭaḥ syāt . tadabhāvādapyaghaṭo bhavatyeva . aghaṭo'pi ca ghaṭo bhavati, ghaṭate ghaṭayati vā tantutantuvāyagavāśvādiḥ .
tathā pratyakṣaprasiddherananyatvaṃ siddhaṃ gośabdasya vāgādiṣu vartamānasya, tacchabda-

śabdato'pi ca astisacchabdaḥ aserdhātoḥ śatrantasya sat iti rūpasiddheryaḥ sacchabdaḥ so'nya
eva . saderdhātoḥ kvibantasya yaḥ sacchabdaḥ so'pyanya eva, sadiprakṛtiḥ sacchabdo na bhavatyeva asiprakṛtiḥ
sacchabdaḥ . tasmācchabdato'pi sacchabdo'sacchabdo bhavatyeva na na bhavatīti .
evamityādi . yathā sacchabdasya rūpasiddhikṛtanānātvakṛte sattvāsattve tathā dravyaśabdasyāpi
draṣṭavye . tathā drorvikāro dravyam, droravayavo vā dravyam, dravyaṃ ca bhavye pā॰ 5 . 3 . 104 bhavatīti
bhavyaṃ dravyam, dravatīti dravyaṃ drūyate vā, dravaṇād guṇānāṃ guṇasandrāvo dravyam, ityādivyutpattyā pṛthivyādisvabhedāpekṣayā ca dravyaśabdaḥ sannadravyaśabdaśca . dravyādiśabdeṣu iti ādigrahaṇāt pṛthivyudakādisāmānyaśabdeṣvapi svabhedāpekṣeṣu vācyamityatideśārthaḥ . evamarthe'pi draṣṭavyam . evaṃ tāvad mahāsāmānyāparasāmānyaśabdārtheṣu sarvasyādarśanādayukto'nyāpohaḥ .
viśeṣaśabdārtheṣvityādi . tuśabdo bhedāṅgīkaraṇākaraṇavikalpābhāvaṃ sāmānyaśabdārthād viśeṣaśabdārtheṣu darśayati . ghaṭa ityaghaṭo na bhavati ityatrāpi na na bhavatyaghaṭo bhavatyaghaṭa iti . tadyathā--āmacchidrādīti, āmaghaṭaśchidraghaṭo na bhavati, ādigrahaṇāccitralepyādighaṭa ityādayo ghaṭā evāghaṭā ghaṭanasāmarthyābhāvādaceṣṭatvāt . ghaṭayan vā ghaṭaḥ syāt prayoktṛkartari, tadabhāvādapyaghaṭo bhavatyeveti . kiñcānyat--aghaṭo'pi ca ghaṭo bhavati ceṣṭārthavattvāt svatantraḥ prayoktā ca, taddarśayati --ghaṭate ghaṭayati vā
tantutantuvāyagavāśvādiriti prakṛtyantād ṇyantādvā kartaryaco vihitatvāt .
tathā pratyakṣetyādi . gaurityagaurna bhavati ityetadapi na yuktam, yasmād gauragaurbhavati, agaurapi
gaurbhavati ityetat pradarśyate . tatra hi dvayī śabdānāṃ gatiḥ--ekaḥ śabdo'nekārthaḥ, anekaḥ śabda ekārtho
bhavati . tatra ya eko'nekārthaḥ sa cintyate . gośabdasya tāvad vāgādiṣu vartamānasya ekatvaṃ pratyakṣaprasiddham,

viśeṣānirūpyatvāt tatsambandhāśakyatvam . tasmādekātmatvaṃ gośabdasya . tasmiṃścaikātmatve śaktibhedāt tattadarthapratyāyanaśaktayaḥ prakalpyāḥ, ekapuruṣapitṛputrādivat
pratisambandhamanyathāvṛtteḥ .
gadanādiviśeṣanirūpyānyatve vā gavāntaravad gaureveti gaurityagaurna bhavatītyapi na, vāgādigavānāṃ vyatirekāt .
sakṛduccaritasya vāgdigbhūraśmyādiṣu dṛṣṭatvāt . ataḥ pratyakṣaprasiddherananyatvaṃ siddham, taccānāśaṅkanīyam—
kimanyo'nanyo gośabda iti . tasmādanyāyyamanyatvam . syānmatam--bhinnārthagatergośabdasyānyatvam, sādṛśyāttu sa eva iti bhavatīti, etacca na, tacchabdaviśeṣānirūpyatvāt, ayamudātto'nudāttaḥ svarito
vāci vartate, ayaṃ diśi ityādiviśeṣarūpasyānirūpyatvād nāstyanyatvaṃ pratyakṣasyānumānād
balīyastvācca . tataḥ kim ? tatastatsambandhāśakyatvam, anirūpyātmarūpāṇāmasatāṃ pṛthaganupalabdhanānārthaiḥ saha na śakyaḥ sambandhaḥ kartum . akṛtasambandhānāṃ ca śabdānāmarthapratyāyanamanyāyyam, mlecchaprayuktaśabdaśravaṇādapyarthapratītiprasaṅgāt . tasmādekātmatvaṃ gośabdasya . tasmiṃścaikātmatve sati
śabdasya śaktibhedāt sambandhibhirabhivyaktāt tattadarthapratyāyanaśaktayaḥ prakalpyāḥ, kimiva ? ekapuruṣapitṛputrādivat, yathaika eva puruṣo'nekaśaktisambandhibhedāpekṣayā pitā putro mātulo bhāgineya ityādivyapadeśabhāg bhavati tathā gośabdo'pi vāgādiṣu . kasmāt ? pratisambandhamanyathā vṛtteḥ, sa eva
sambandhaṃ sambandhaṃ prati pratisambandhaṃ sambandhijanitamanyatvamanyathānyathā vartate . tasmādekatvād
gośabdasya vāgādibhinnārthavācitvād gaureva vāgādiragaurbhavati, agaurapi gaurbhavati .
syānmatam--nimittabhedād gośabdā bhidyante, tāni ca nimittāni gadana-garjana-gamana-giraṇādīni,
pṛṣodarādyākṛtigaṇatvād rūpasiddheranyatvameveti . etaccoktavidhinā na yuktamapyabhyupagamya gadanādiviśeṣanirūpyānyatve vā gavāntaravad gaureva, yathā hi gośabdaḥ sāsnādimatyekasminnapyarthe gamananimitte
vṛtto'pi khaṇḍa-muṇḍa-śābaleya-bāhuleya-saurabheyādibhedeṣu gavāntareṣu gaureva . iti hetvarthe, yasmāt khaṇḍādiviśeṣāpekṣayā sāmānyaśabdo gośabdastasmāt pūrvavadasminnapi pakṣe gaurityagaurna bhavatītyapi na,
kasmāt ? vāgādigavānāṃ vyatirekāt, tadyathā gauḥ ityukte vāgādiṣu na vyatiricyate gotvaṃ
gośabdavat vāgityukte digādibhyo vyatiricyate vāg na dik iti . tataḥ gauragaurapi bhavati iti
gatārthamudāharaṇam .


ekottaraśatanāmatvāccāmbhaso viṣamaviṣaṃ bhavati aviṣamapi viṣaṃ bhavatītyādi .
tathā pīluvṛkṣo vṛkṣatvādapīlurbhavati dhavādivat, hastivat pīlurvā . ataḥ pīlurapīlurapi pīluśca, apīlurapīlurapi pīluśca . evaṃ harirāmārjunādayo'pi .

evaṃ tāvadanekārthaikaśabdatve'nyāpohābhāvaḥ . anekaśabdaikārthatve'pi tadyathā --ekottaraśatanāmatvāccāmbhasa ityādi . salilamudakamamṛtaṃ vā jīvanaṃ viṣam ityādyekottaraṃ śatamudakanāmāni nirukte
paṭhyante . tato viṣamaviṣaṃ bhavati, aviṣamapi viṣaṃ bhavati, apānīyaṃ granthisarpādiviṣaṃ māraṇātmakaṃ na,
jīvanātmakam . jīvanātmakamapyudakādi māraṇātmakaṃ duṣprayogādityādi gamanikā . ādigrahaṇād ghṛtamaghṛtamityādi . tathā pīluvṛkṣaḥ vṛkṣatvādapīlurbhavati dhavādivat, hastivat pīlurvā . hastyapi pīlurapīlurbhavati hastitvād manuṣyavat . tathā viparyayeṇāhastitvādapīlurbhavati pīluvṛkṣaḥ, avṛkṣatvādapīlurhastīti .
ata ityupasaṃharati . pīlurapīluśca pīluśca, apīlurapīlurapi pīluśceti . evaṃ harirāmārjunādayo'pi
iti ca vyāpitāmapyasya nyāyasyodāharaṇabāhulyena darśayati . śakra-siṃha-vāsudeva-maṇḍūka-vānara-hayādiṣu
hariśabdadarśanādaharirhariśca . rāmo ramyavarṇa-dāśarathi-baladeva-jāmadagnyeṣu arjunastṛṇa-suvarṇa-vṛkṣa-pāṇḍavakārtavīryeṣu darśanādityādi taccātacca pūrvavat .


evaṃ śrutimātratattvo gavādirekaḥ śabdo'nekārthagamakaśaktiyuktaḥ ekādityatapana--prakāśana... ...anekārthakāritvavat .
pratyarthavṛtti... ... ...

saṃsargo viprayogaśca sāhacaryaṃ virodhitā .
arthaḥ prakaraṇaṃ liṅgaṃ śabdasyānyasya sannidhiḥ ॥


sāmarthyamaucitī deśaḥ kālo vyaktiḥ svarādayaḥ .
śabdasyārthavyavacchede viśeṣasmṛtihetavaḥ ॥ vākyapa॰ 2 . 317; 318

athocyeta--sarvathā'dṛṣṭatvāt sthite tu svārthasyābhāve sāmānyābhāvamātranivṛttirabhāvabhedāsaṃsparśāt .
atha svārthābhāvābhāvamātratve kaḥ śabdārthaḥ 'vṛkṣa ityavṛkṣo na bhavati' iti
tacchabdadhūmaliṅgābhyāmanyāvapohyāvavṛkṣānagnī bhedāsaṃsparśena . tatra ca prasahyapratiṣedhārthe tanmātrameva ca gamyeta . na vṛkṣaparyudāsena ghaṭādirarthātmā'nyaḥ kaścillabhyate .

evaṃ śrutimātretyādi . anenoktanyāyena śrutimātratattvo gavādirekaḥ śabdo'pratilabdhavibhāgo'nekārthagamakaśaktiyuktaḥ . kimiva ? ekādityetyādi yāvat kāritvavaditi gatārthaḥ proktārthopasaṃhāraḥ .
syānmatam--ekasyānekārthakāritve vibhāgapratipattyabhāvādavyavacchedaprasaṅga iti . tanna, pratyarthavṛttītyādi yāvad viśeṣasmṛtihetavaḥ iti yathāsaṅkhyaṃ sakarabhādyudāharaṇabhāvitārthaṃ kārikādvayaṃ nimittāntarādekārthāvacchedākhyānam . ādigrahaṇād gauṇa-mukhya-stuti-nindādibhāvārthakṛtavyavacchedāditi .
athocyetetyādi . atha pareṇocyeta--nanūktameva guṇasamudāyamātrasya kāṇakuṇṭāderdarśanāsambhavaḥ, satyapi ca darśane sarvathānumānāsambhavaḥ sarvaprakāreṇādṛṣṭatvāt iti nirākāṅkṣīkṛte mūlata eva
punaridānīṃ ko vicāraḥ--darśanaṃ syāt na syāditi ? sthite tu svārthasyābhāve sāmānyarūpasyābhāvamātrasya
nivṛttirabhāvabhedāsaṃsparśāt vṛkṣa ityavṛkṣo na bhavati agnirityanagnirna bhavati ityavṛkṣānagnyabhāvabhedāsaṃsparśenocyate, na vā'bhāvasya bhedāḥ santi . tasmāt sarvābhāvabhedadarśanena vinaivāpoho gamaka iti .
atrocyate --atha svārthābhāvābhāvamātratve tvadiṣṭe kaḥ śabdārtha iti pṛcchati vṛkṣa ityādi
pratyuccāryātrāpyapohābhāvamāpādayitukāmaḥ . tacchabdo vṛkṣaśabdaḥ parārthe'numāne svārthe dhūmaśca liṅge,
tābhyāmanyāvapohyāvavṛkṣānagnī ghaṭādibhedarūpāṇyasaṃspṛśyetyabhimato'rthaḥ, tatra ca prasahyapratiṣedhārthe vṛkṣo
na bhavatyavṛkṣaḥ iti tanmātrameva ca gamyeta, na ca gamyata ityabhiprāyaḥ . vṛkṣādanyo'vṛkṣa iti na vṛkṣaparyudāsena ghaṭādirarthātmā'nyaḥ kaścillabhyate, anyasyāsattvādavivakṣitatvācca vṛkṣa eva vyākhyeyo vivakṣita

vṛkṣa eva vyākhyeyaḥ . sa svayamanavagataḥ kathamabhāvaṃ viśeṣayituṃ śaknuyāt avṛkṣo
madabhāvaḥ iti, tasya bhāvena labhyātmalābhatvāt .
tataśca vṛkṣa ityavṛkṣo na bhavatītīdamuktaṃ bhavet--yo'bhāvābhāvaḥ sa vṛkṣaḥ .
tato ghaṭapaṭādīnāmabhāvanivṛttimātratvād vṛkṣaśabdārthavattvaṃ prāptam, kuto'pohasteṣāṃ syāt .
sarvathā vā gatirbhavet . sarvadarśananirākāṅkṣatāyāṃ śabdādanumānādvā vṛkṣo'gniriti ca viśeṣavacanapratyayānarthakyaṃ syāt, abhāvābhāvamātrasyaikatvāt, bhedaviṣayavacanānumānavyavahāranirviṣayatvāt abhūtabhedaviṣayatvāt khapuṣpādivat .
atrocyeta--nāpyaśeṣa... ... .... kiṃ tarhi ? svasambandhi-
tvāt, sa svayamanavagataḥ kathamabhāvaṃ viśeṣayituṃ śaknuyāt avṛkṣo vṛkṣābhāvo madabhāvaḥ iti,
khapuṣpamiva vandhyāputraḥ ? kasmāt ? tasyābhāvasya bhāvena labhyātmalābhatvāt sa svayamasan kathamasato
viśeṣaṇaṃ syāt ? ubhayatra cānvaye vyatireke ca ghaṭādīnāṃ bhedarūpāṇāṃ sapakṣāsapakṣayorasaṃspṛśyatveneṣṭatvād
na kiñcit kenacid viśeṣayituṃ śakyam .
tataścetyādi . asmāduktanyāyādeṣa śabdārthaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ, vṛkṣa ityavṛkṣo na bhavati ityukte idamuktaṃ
bhavet sambhāvyeta yo'bhāvetyādi, abhāvasyābhāvo vṛkṣa ityuktaṃ syāt, nānyadabhāvanivṛtteḥ . tato ghaṭapaṭādīnāmabhāvanivṛttimātratvād vṛkṣatāvad vṛkṣaśabdārthavattvaṃ prāptam, kuto'pohasteṣāṃ syāt ? tatsaṃsparśe
hi syādapohaste vṛkṣo na bhavatīti . itthamapohābhāvaḥ, aniṣṭaṃ caitat .
kiñcānyat, sarvathā vā gatirbhavet, abhāvābhāvamātraṃ hi vṛkṣo'gnirvā syāt, na sapakṣāsapakṣabhedasaṃsparśena dṛṣṭavat . ataḥ sarvadarśananirākāṅkṣatā, tasyāṃ ca satyāṃ śabdād vṛkṣādanumānādvā dhūmādabhāvābhāvamātravṛkṣāgnitvādadṛṣṭabhedāsaṃsparśādeva tvaduktāt vṛkṣo'gniḥ iti ca viśeṣavacanapratyayānarthakyaṃ syāt .
kasmāt ? abhāvābhāvamātrasyaikatvāditi svaparārthānumānayoḥ sāmānyena hetuḥ khapuṣpādivaditi
dṛṣṭāntaḥ . viśeṣya vā hetuḥ --bhedaviṣayavacanānumānavyavahāranirviṣayatvāt, abhūtabhedaviṣayatvāditi sāmānyena . sa eva dṛṣṭāntaḥ sarvatra, ante'bhihitatvāt . ayamanyo vyākhyāvikalpaḥ, tadyathā
vikalpaḥ --sarvathā vā'gatirbhavet praśleṣalabhyākāratvāt . agatirajñānaṃ vṛkṣaśabdoccāraṇād bhavet sarvathā .
kasmāt ? gantavyābhāvāt . gantavyābhāvaścābhāvābhāvamātravṛttitvācchabdānumānayoriti .
atrocyetetyādi . svabhedābhāvavyāvṛttilakṣaṇānyāpohe'nantatvādasambhavasambandhābhidhānādidoṣā
uktāḥ . sāmānyābhāvābhāvamātre sarvaikatvānarthakyāpohābhāvadoṣā uktāḥ . teṣāṃ pakṣadvayānabhyupagamāt
parihāraḥ --nāpyaśeṣetyādi . kiṃ tarhi ? iti pakṣāntaraṃ śrayate nirdoṣaṃ manyamānaḥ, svasambandhivṛkṣasyāgnervā

sāmānyadharmeṣu tadanubandhibhedeṣu cāvinābhāviṣu darśanasaṃsparśena tadvyatirikteṣvadarśanasaṃsparśenānyāpohasya pravṛttatvādadoṣaḥ . ata eva cedaṃ svasambandhibhyo'nyatrādarśanāt
tadvyavacchedānumānam . yatra dṛṣṭaḥ so'tra sambandhyabhipreto na tvavinābhāvitvasambandhena . anyatrādarśanāditi anumeyābhāve'darśanāt, anyathā hi vṛkṣaśabdasya dhūmasya ca tasmin vastuni pṛthivīdravyādyabhāve'pi darśanaṃ vaktavyaṃ syāt . tadvyavacchedānumānamiti yatraivādarśanamuktaṃ vṛkṣābhāve'vṛkṣe'gnyabhāve'nagnau
vā tato vyavacchedānumānam--avṛkṣo'nagnirvā na bhavatīti . evaṃ ca kṛtvā vṛkṣaśabdād dhūmācca dravyatvādyanumānamupapannaṃ bhavati . itarathā tu dravyādīnāmapyanyatvādatulya eva vṛtterapakṣadharmatvānaikāntikatvaviruddhatvānumānābhāvadoṣāḥ syuḥ . dravyādityāge tadavinābhāvinaḥ svārthasya cāsambhava eva . tasmāt
svasambandhyabhāve'darśanādanumānasya siddhiḥ   iti .
evaṃ tarhi yadi sattādīni viśeṣaṇāni vṛkṣo bhavanti sa vā tāni bhavati
ekabhavanātmako'rtho'sya vṛkṣaśabdasya tatsvātmavat tato'nanyatvāt dravyādivṛkṣa-
sattādravyatvādisāmānyadharmāstadanubandhino bhedāśca śiṃśapādayaḥ teṣvavinābhāviṣu darśanasaṃsparśena tadvyatirikteṣu ghaṭādiṣvadarśanasaṃsparśena jalādiṣu cānyāpohasya pravṛttatvānna sambhavantyubhayapakṣagatā doṣāḥ .
ata eva cedamityādi etatpakṣasaṃśrayadarśanārthaṃ bhāṣyagranthamāha svasambandhibhyo'nyatrādarśanādityādi . asya vyākhyā ṭīkāgrantho yatra dṛṣṭa ityādiḥ yāvadavṛkṣo'nagnirvā na bhavatīti gatārthaḥ .
evaṃ ca kṛtvetyādi yāvadupapannaṃ bhavatīti, anekāvinābhāvināṃ pṛthivīdravyatvādīnāṃ vṛkṣaśabdād dhūmāccānubandhināmanumānaṃ yujyate taddarśanasparśena, vṛkṣatvāt pṛthivī dravyaṃ sacca dhūmatvācca vṛkṣavadagnivacceti . itarathā
tvityādi, atyantavyatireke sambandhitvābhāve'nubandhināṃ dravyādīnāmapyanyatvādatulye vipakṣa eva vṛtterapakṣadharmatvānaikāntikatvaviruddhatvānumānābhāvadoṣāḥ syuḥ . anubandhināṃ dravyādīnāṃ tyāge tadavinābhāvino
vṛkṣasya svārthasyāsambhava eveti ca doṣaḥ . tataḥ pratyāyyapratyāyanayorarthaśabdayoranupapattiḥ . tasmāt
svasambandhyabhāvetyādyuktopasaṃhāraḥ, sambandhino'rthāntarasya bhāve darśanāt sambandhina eva bhāvābhāve'darśanāccānumānasyābhipretasya siddhiriti .
atrottaramucyate --evaṃ tarhītyādi . yadi sattādīnītyādi sattādravyapṛthivyādīni viśeṣaṇāni
vṛkṣasya vṛkṣādabhinnāni santi vṛkṣo bhavanti tāni vṛkṣa evetyarthaḥ, sa vā vṛkṣastāni bhavati tena tāni
viśeṣyante devadattapāṇyādivadekabhavanātmanetyetadāpannam . tasminnekabhavane prayogaḥ śākhādimati darśanamityucyate'syārthaḥ sa ekabhavanātmako'rtho'sya vṛkṣaśabdaprayogasya . kimiva ? tatsvātmavat sattādravyatvādivṛkṣasvātmavad vṛkṣasya sattādravyatvādisvātmavat ekabhavanātmavadityarthaḥ . kasmāt ? uktanyāyena tato'nanyatvāt tebhyastasya tasmād vā teṣāmananyatvāt dravyādivṛkṣabhāvadarśanād vṛkṣadravyādibhāvadarśanādityarthaḥ .

bhāvadarśanād dravyādyabhāvadarśanānabhyanujñānādatisphuṭa evāyaṃ vidhivādastvayābhyupagataḥ bhavanaparamārthārthābhyupagamāt . yat ko'pi bhavati tad bhavanaparamārthata
eva... ... vaidharmyeṇa khapuṣpavat . yo'pyasau vyāvartate so'pi bhavanaparamārthata
eva bhavata eva vyāvṛtteḥ, devadattādivyāvṛttivat, na khapuṣpādivat .
evaṃ bhavadbhavananirūpaṇe sthita evārtha; sa cānyaścetyanyāpohaparigrahe sarvathā vā
gatirbhavet . anugamo vidhireva .
athavā anirvāhakaikāntavyākhyāvikalpapradarśanāt sarvathā vā vikalpānāṃ
gatiranekāntaḥ sa evaivaṃ bhavet . vidhivikalpo'pi sadādyātmakārthagrahaṇāt . apoha-
kasmāt ? dravyādyabhāvadarśanānabhyanujñānāt . pṛthivīdravyasattvābhāve darśanaṃ vṛkṣasya vṛkṣābhāve vā
pṛthivyādibhāvadarśanaṃ vṛkṣātmaviṣayaṃ nābhyanujñāyate yasmāt tasmādekabhavanātmakatvānujñānādanyābhāvādatisphuṭa
evāyaṃ vidhivādastvayābhyupagataḥ, pūrveṣvapi pakṣeṣu sphuṭa eva vidhivādaḥ, asmiṃstvatisphuṭaḥ . kasmāt ?
bhavanaparamārthārthābhyupagamāt, vṛkṣaśabdasya saddravyapṛthivīmṛdādivṛkṣaikabhavanātmakaḥ paramārthato'rtha ityabhyupagatatvāt . yat ko'pi bhavatītyādinā bhavanameveti darśayati yāvad vaidharmyeṇa khapuṣpavaditi . yo'pyasāvityādi vyāvartyābhimato'pi bhavanaparamārthata iti darśayati . bhavata eva vyāvṛtteriti hetuḥ, bhavanneva
vyāvartate kartari ṣaṣṭhīvibhaktyutpatteḥ, parvate pratihatasya devadattasya vyāvṛttivat sata eva vyāvṛtterityapādānalakṣaṇā pañcamī vā, yo bhavati parvatādiḥ tasmād bhavata eva parvatāderdevadattādervyāvṛttivat na khapuṣpādivaditi
vidhivāda eva sphuṭīkṛtaḥ .
tataḥ kim ? tata idam --evaṃ bhavadbhavanetyādi . itthaṃ bhavadeva bhavatīti nirūpaṇe'yamasya sthita evārthaḥ—
sa cānyaścetyayamanyāpohaparigrahaḥ, tasmiṃśca sati sarvathā vā gatirbhavet, anugamo vidhirevetyupasaṃharati .
athavā anirvāhaketyādi, ye tvamī vyākhyāvikalpāḥ kalpitā vidhivāde'nyāpohavāde
caikāntarūpāste sarve na nirvahantītyupekṣyāḥ . tatpradarśanāt sarvathāśabdo vimardaramaṇīyaḥ pariniṣṭhito'tītasarvavicārasyāyaṃ piṇḍārtha ityetadākhyānārthaḥ . ko'sau piṇḍārtha iti cet, ucyate--veti vāśabdo vikalpārthaḥ, vikalpānāṃ gatiriti vikalpānāmeva jñānaṃ niścayaḥ pariniṣṭhā sarvathā ghaṭo ghaṭo'pyaghaṭo'pītyādi
niścayaḥ . kā sā gatiḥ ? anekāntaḥ, sa eva evaṃ bhavet sa evānekānto vimardakṣamo vicāraparyavasāne'vatiṣṭhetettham, sarvanyāyapariśuddhiphalatvādasya sarvavikalpāḥ, saṅkṣepeṇa vidhi-pratiṣedhau, tāvubhāvitthaṃ
gṛhītāviti darśayati --vidhivikalpo'pi sadādyātmakārthagrahaṇāditi vidhim, apohavikalpo'pi
svasambandhyanyapratiṣedhārthatvāditi pratiṣedham . etau tvadvacanādevāpatitau . tena sarvathā vikalpānāṃ vā gatiḥ
syādvādaḥ . sa ca dravyārthaparyāyārthāvekāntatyāgarūpaikavākyamatyātmakau, tayorviṣayavibhāgena śabdārthamupasaṃhṛtya

vikalpo'pi svasambandhyanyapratiṣedhārthatvāt . dravyārthataḥ... ... ...syādanapoha ityādi .
na ca tena saha kasyacid virodhaḥ, ārādhyatvāccharaṇatvācca sarveṣāmapi .
tataścedamapi duradhītamevānyāpohavādinā--dṛṣṭavad vidhirūpeṇa yadi liṅgaṃ prakāśayet .sarvathā'pratipattiḥ syāt sarvathā vā gatirbhavet ॥ pra॰ samu॰ 3 . 14 iti
yattūktam--anvayadvāreṇa cānumāne'yaṃ doṣaḥ--yasmādanugamo'sti vṛkṣaśabdasyārthādisahitasya śiṃśapādiṣvapi tasmāt kevalo'pi śiṃśapāvācī syād vṛkṣaśabdaḥ . atha bahuṣu palāśādiṣvapi dṛṣṭa iti saṃśayo bhavati, evaṃ sati vṛkṣārthe
sattvadravyatvapārthivatvāni santi teṣu vṛkṣaśabdasya samānatvāt saṃśayaḥ syāt,
niścayastu dṛṣṭaḥ, avṛkṣanivṛttyā'rthāmidhānavadapṛthivyadravyāsattvavyāvṛttyā vṛkṣābhidhānāt . yathā hi vṛkṣaśabdo'vṛkṣanivṛttyaikārthako'pārthivavyāvṛttyāpi svārthe vartate tathā
vṛkṣapārthivadravyasacchabdā ānulomyena tridvyekārthaniścayahetavaḥ, prātilomyena
saṃśayahetava iti .
darśayati yathāsaṅkhyam --dravyārthata ityādi gatārthaṃ sodāharaṇaṃ yāvat syādanapoha ityādi . ādigrahaṇādanyadapi yat kiñcidanyairapyudgrāhitaṃ vastūdāharaṇamevāsya sarvagatāsarvagatakāraṇakāryatvādītyabhiprāyaḥ . na ca
tenetyādi yāvat sarveṣāmapīti vādaparameśvaratvapradarśanaṃ syādvādasya gatārtham .
tataścedamapi duradhītamevānyāpohavādinā ityuktārthānusāreṇātideśena dūṣayati kārikām, anyāpohasya kevalasya dūṣitatvād darśanabalenaiva śabdārthapratipattervyākhyātatvāt ante vā syādvādopasaṃhārādekāntavidhivādadūṣaṇasya prakāśitaprakāśanavad vaiyarthyāditi .
yatūktamityādi yat pareṇa doṣajātamupanyastaṃ vidhivādinaṃ prati tat parihartukāmaḥ pūrvapakṣayati .
vṛkṣo mañcakaḥ kriyate ityādyarthaprakaraṇaśabdāntarasannidhyādibhiḥ śiṃśapādiṣvapi dṛṣṭatvāt sarvatra sarvathā
kevalo'pi śiṃśapāvācī syād vṛkṣaśabdaḥ, aniṣṭaṃ caitat kevalasyāpratyāyanāt .
atha bahuṣvityādi so'nyāpohavādyeva paramatamāśaṅkate . bahuṣu palāśādiṣvapi dṛṣṭo'yaṃ vṛkṣaśabdastasmāt katama eṣāṃ vivakṣitaḥ syāt ? iti sāmānyāt saṃśayo bhavatītyāśaṅkya tatrāpi doṣaṃ brūyādanyāpohavādī evaṃ satītyādi, vṛkṣārthe sattvadravyatvapārthivatvāni dṛṣṭāni, teṣu niścayo dṛṣṭa ityanaikāntikametat . kena punarnyāyeneti cet, avṛkṣanivṛtyā'rthābhidhānavadapṛthivyadravyāsattvavyāvṛttyā vṛkṣābhidhānād
vyāvṛttibaleneti . asya ca nyāyasya guṇopacayavarṇanam --yathā hi vṛkṣetyādi gatārthaṃ yāvat saṃśayahetava iti .


atra brūmaḥ--guṇadoṣābhimānaste svapakṣarāgāt . anvayadvāreṇa cānumāne'yaṃ
guṇaḥ--dṛṣṭabalenaivārthādibhiḥ saha śiṃśapādiṣu vṛkṣaśabdasya dṛṣṭatvānniścayo bhavati
kevalāt saṃśayo yathādarśanamanumānapravṛtteḥ . evameva ca vṛkṣārthabhavanena vinā
vṛkṣo na bhavatīti vṛkṣaśabdāt tadbhavanaṃ yathā pratīyate tathā pārthivadravyasattvāni
pratīyante, tairvinā vṛkṣabhavanasyaivādarśanāt . vidhirūpeṇa darśanasāmarthyenaiva ca
vṛkṣapārthivadravyasacchabdā ānulomyena tridvyekārthaniścayahetavaḥ, prātilomyena
saṃśayahetavaḥ . evaṃ gamyatām... ... ....
yadapyaniyataśiṃśapaṃ gamyate tatrāpi viśeṣādarśanādagatirviśeṣadarśanād gatiḥ .
yathā avibhātaikadeśa... ... ...tathā vṛkṣaśabdāt... ... ...saṃśayaḥ, tadbhāvadarśananyāyavat .

vayaṃ tvatra brūmaḥ --guṇadoṣābhimānaste svapakṣarāgāditi . vyākhyā --anvayadvāreṇa cānumāne'yaṃ guṇa ityādi, dṛṣṭabalenaiva hi artha-prakaraṇa-viśeṣaṇādibhiḥ saha śiṃśapādiṣu dṛṣṭatvānniścayo bhavati,
tairvinā na dṛṣṭatvāt kevalāt saṃśayaḥ, kiṃ kāraṇam ? yathādarśanamanumānapravṛtteḥ . viśeṣa evārthādirapi
śiṃśapādivat, viśeṣādarśanādeva palāśādyapi . vṛkṣaśabdasāmānyāt saṃśayo bhavati adṛṣṭatvād viśeṣavirahitasya . niścayastu viśeṣasahitasya dṛṣṭatvāt . yadapyucyate--sattva-dravyatva-pārthivatvādiṣu kasmād
niścayo bhavati ? iti, tatrāpi dṛṣṭabalādeva, evameva ca vṛkṣārthetyādi yāvad vṛkṣabhavanasyaivādarśanāditi
etaduktaṃ bhavati--yathā vṛkṣaḥ svārthabhavanena vinā na bhavatīti vṛkṣaśabdāt tadbhavanaṃ pratīyate tathā pārthivadravyāstitvairvinā vṛkṣatvasyābhavanād vṛkṣatvabhavanapratītivat pārthiva-dravya-sattvāni pratīyante tairvinā tasyaivādarśanāditi . yadapi ca vṛkṣaśabdāt pārthiva-dravya-sattvatryarthagatiḥ pārthivaśabdād dravya-sattvadvyarthagatiḥ
dravyaśabdāt sattvagatiḥ prātilomyena sadādyānulomyena cottareṣu pūrvasmāt saṃśaya iti tadapi vidhirūpeṇa
darśanasāmarthyenaiva ca vṛkṣapārthivadravyasacchabdā ānulomyenetyādi tatpradarśanaṃ gatārthaṃ yāvat saṃśayahetava
iti darśanasyaiva niścaya-saṃśayahetutvāt .
evaṃ gamyatāmityādiruktopasaṃhāro tuya ?darthaprakaraṇādisahitād vṛkṣaśabdācchiṃśapāvṛkṣatvatattvād
dhavādibhyo'rthebhyo'nyasmācchiṃśapādiśabdād viśeṣātmakādiva viśeṣadarśanādeveti .
yadapyaniyataśiṃśapamityādi . yo'yaṃ vṛkṣaśabdoccāraṇe kadācicchiṃśapāyā gatiḥ kadācit tadagatirityaniyamaḥ sa viśeṣādarśanādagatiḥ viśeṣadarśanād gatiḥ . tatra nidarśanam --yathā avibhātaikadeśetyādi dhūmaviṣayaṃ prāgvarṇitaṃ darśanaṃ saṃśayāya, viśiṣṭaṃ tu niścayāyeti dṛṣṭāntaḥ . dārṣṭāntiko'rthaḥ --tathā
vṛkṣaśabdādityādi yāvat saṃśayaḥ . kena punarnyāyenaitadevam ? iti tad vyācaṣṭe --tadbhāvadarśananyāyavat, yathopavarṇitaṃ prāg deśa evāgnidhūmātmakastadbhāvena dṛṣṭo vidhinā ātmānamevātmanā sādhayatītyādi
sa evātrāpīti .


evaṃ vṛkṣatvasya pṛthivītvādibhistribhiḥ pṛthivyā dravyasattvābhyāṃ dravyasya
sattvenānulomyena tathā darśanāt prātilomyena tathā'darśanācca nirṇayasaṃśayau .
atha manyeta--tāvetau na yuktau darśanādubhayato'pi aviśeṣo niścaya eva vā
syāt . manmate tu yuktau, atulyatvāt svārthābhāve vṛttyavṛttyoḥ . saṃśayahetavastāvad
vṛkṣādiśabdāḥ, śiṃśapādisvārthābhāve'pi palāśādau vṛtteḥ . niścayahetavastu vṛkṣāvayavān vyāpnuvantastadanubandhinaścārthān, svārthābhāve'vṛtteḥ .
na darśanasyaivotsargāpavādabhūtatvād vastuno'tulyatvāt, sthāṇupuruṣorddhatvasāmānyaśakuninilayanavastrasaṃyamanaviśeṣadarśanavat .
nanūktam--avṛkṣādāvadarśanāt tadvyavacchedānumānaṃ svārthābhidhānam pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 5 .
34 iti . evaṃ ca sati kva tad darśanam ?

evaṃ vṛkṣatvasyetyādi prakṛtopasaṃhāraḥ, śiṃśapādiviśeṣeṣu pṛthivyādisāmānyeṣu ca tulyamapyanekatra
vṛttaṃ vṛkṣatvaṃ svārthena sahaiva vṛtteḥ pṛthivītvādibhirgamyate tribhirānulomyena pṛthivī-dravya-sattvaiḥ pṛthivī,
dravya-sattvābhyāṃ dravyaṃ, sattve tvekameva ānulomyena tathā darśanāt . sattvādyuttarottarasaṃśayastu prātilomyenādarśanādeva tatheti yāvad nirṇayasaṃśayāviti gatārthaḥ .
atha manyetetyādi paramatamāśaṅkate . tāvetau niścayasaṃśayau na yuktau darśanādubhayato'pi vṛkṣadarśanasya dhava-śiṃśapayoraviśeṣo niścaya eva vā syāt . manmate punaranyāpohe svārthābhāve vṛtteḥ saṃśayo
yujyeta avṛtteśca niścayaḥ, kasmāt ? atulyatvāt svārthābhāve vṛttyavṛttyoḥ, te hi svārthābhāvavṛttyavṛttī yathāsaṅkhyaṃ saṃśayaniścayahetū . tad vyācaṣṭe--saṃśayahetavastāvad vṛkṣādiśabdāḥ śiṃśapādisvārthābhāve'pi palāśādau vṛtteḥ, sadādiśabdāśca dravyādisvārthābhāve'pi guṇādau vṛtteḥ saṃśayahetavaḥ . niścayahetavastu
vṛkṣāvayavāñchākhādīn vyāpnuvantaḥ pārthivamṛddravyatvādīṃścānubandhino'rthān svārthasyābhāve na vartante, tataste
vyāvṛttibalenaiva niścayahetava iti .
etacca na, darśanasyaivotsargāpavādabhūtatvāt, vṛkṣabhavanadarśanameva hi palāśaśiṃśapādiṣūtsargeṇa
pravṛttaṃ saṃśayāya śiṃśapābhavananiyatamapavādabhūtaṃ niścayāya . kasmāt ? vastuno'tulyatvāt, vastveva hi
viśiṣṭamatulyaṃ śiṃśapāpalāśākhyaṃ parasparataḥ, tadupakāritvāt sāmānyavṛkṣabhavanasya sāmānyādupasarjanāt
ityuktanyāyatvāt . kimiva ? sthāṇu-puruṣetyādi dṛṣṭānto yāvad darśanavaditi yathā ūrddhatvaṃ sāmānyaṃ
sthāṇuḥ syāt puruṣaḥ syāt iti saṃśayahetuḥ, śakuninilayanaṃ sthāṇureva iti niścayaheturviśiṣṭatvāt,
vastrasaṃyamanaṃ vā puruṣa eva iti, tathaiva vṛkṣaśiṃśapādiṣvapi darśanādeva .
atrāha --nanūktamityādi . vṛkṣāderabhāvo hi avṛkṣādi, tatraivādarśanam, tato vyavacchedyamānaṃ yat
tadavṛkṣādi na bhavatīti tadeva svārthābhidhānamiti . evaṃ ca sati kva tad darśanaṃ yat tvayeṣṭam ? yato

nanvadarśanād darśanasyaiva siddhirevam . yadi darśanaṃ nābhyupagamyate vṛkṣa ityatrāvṛkṣābhāva evoktaḥ syāt tata idamadarśanamevāvṛkṣe . tatrāvṛkṣasyaivābhāvaḥ, kutastadadarśanamavṛkṣasya vṛkṣadarśanenaiva vyāptatvāt . tasmād darśanamevaivaṃ sidhyati .
apitṛvadavṛkṣādarśanaṃ vyatireka iti cet, na uktavat . vyavasthākāri... ...
sthite hi vṛkṣe darśane tvavṛkṣa iti syāt . sa tu tava kadā... ... ...tacca neṣyata eva .
vidhiprādhānye tu pṛthivītvādyuttarabhavanaṃ vṛkṣabhavanavijñānavidhyāpādyaṃ tadātma-
darśanotsargāpavādābhyāṃ vastuno'tulyatvāt saṃśayaniścayāviṣyeyātām, tattu nāsti darśanam . vayaṃ hyānantyavyabhicārādidoṣān darśanapakṣe'pekṣyādarśanasādhanārthamavṛkṣādyabhāvo vṛkṣādiśabdārtha iti kalpayāmo
darśanasyaivābhāvāt taddoṣāsaṃsparśādadarśanamātrasyābhinnatvāditi .
atrocyate --nanvadarśanādityādi . nanu darśanasyaiva siddhirevam adarśanasyādarśanāt . tad vyācaṣṭe—
yadi darśanamanvayo vidhirnābhyupagamyate vṛkṣa ityatrāvṛkṣasyābhāva evoktaḥ syāt, na vṛkṣo nāma kaścit
syāt . tataḥ kim ? tata idamadarśanamevāvṛkṣe, vyatireka evetyarthaḥ . tataścābhāvamātrameva khapuṣpādītyādiprāguktavanna kiñciduktaṃ syāt avṛkṣābhāvo vṛkṣaḥ ityabhāvamātratvāt . tatrāvṛkṣasyaivābhāvo vṛkṣībhūtatvāt
sarvasyāvṛkṣābhāvasya kutastadadarśanamavṛkṣasya vṛkṣadarśanenaiva vyāptatvāt ? vṛkṣadarśanabalādeva cāvṛkṣādarśanasiddhiḥ, vṛkṣadarśanācca ayaṃ vṛkṣaḥ, ayaṃ ghaṭādiravṛkṣaḥ iti siddhiḥ, nādṛṣṭe . tasmād darśanamevaivaṃ sidhyati
nādarśanamiti .
apitṛvadavṛkṣādarśanaṃ vyatireka iti cet . syānmatam--pituranyo'pitā sarvaḥ ityādiprāguktavadadarśanamiti . etacca na, uktavat pitṛkalpasya darśanaṃ syādatrāpi, na cet prāguktavadevānupapattiḥ, pratyakṣadarśanabalena hi ayaṃ vṛkṣaḥ, ayamanyo'smād ghaṭādiravṛkṣaḥ iti vyavasthite vidhinā dṛṣṭe'nyāpohalakṣaṇama-
darśanaṃ syāt, nānyatheti . etadarthapradarśano granthaḥ --vyavasthākārītyādi yāvat sthite hi vṛkṣe vidheye
darśane tvavṛkṣa iti syāt vidhinā darśanānvaye sati sidhyatyetaditi darśayatyeṣa granthaḥ . vyāvṛttipakṣe
tvaniṣṭāpādanam --sa tu tava kadetyādi yāvat tacca neṣyata eva tvayeti vibhaktipariṇāmād . ghaṭādibhyo
vyāvṛttau satyāṃ vṛkṣādisiddhiḥ tatsiddhau ghaṭādivyāvṛttisiddhirityanavasthā parasparataḥ syāt . sā mā bhūditi
darśanaṃ vyavasthāpakameṣitavyaṃ vidhinā vyāvartyavyāvartakayorvṛkṣādisadādyavṛkṣādyasadādyoriti .
kathaṃ punarvidhiprādhānye taddoṣābhāvaḥ ? ucyate --vidhiprādhānye tu pṛthivītvādyuttaretyādi sādhanaṃ
yāvat svātmavaditi . vṛkṣa-pṛthivī-dravya-santo vṛkṣa-śiṃśapā-kubja-kusumita-mūla-skandha-śākhādayaśca
vṛkṣādayaḥ pūrve cottare ca bhāvā vidhinā dṛṣṭāḥ, pārthivabhavanaṃ vṛkṣabhavanavijñānavidhyāpādyameva vṛkṣātmakatvāt

katvāt tato'nanyatvād vṛkṣasvātmavat . tathā vṛkṣādipūrvabhavanaṃ śiṃśapādyuttarabhavanavijñānavidhyāpādyaṃ tadātmakatvāt tato'nanyatvād vṛkṣamūlādivat .
vyāvṛttiprādhānye tu dṛṣṭavat pārthivatvādyasiddhau vṛkṣo naiva vṛkṣaḥ syāt pārthivatvenāsiddhatvāt toyavat . tathā pārthivaṃ dravyatvenāsiddhatvāt pārthivaṃ naiva syāt,
guṇavat . evaṃ dravyaṃ na dravyaṃ syāt sattvenāsiddhatvāt khapuṣpavat . tathā sadapi na
sat, dravyāditvenāsiddhatvāt .
tato'nanyatvād vṛkṣasvātmavat, vṛkṣātmakatvaṃ ca pārthivatvādīnāṃ pūrvamāpāditaṃ mūlādyuttarabhavanānāṃ cetyatastadekātmakatvasiddhau satyāṃ sādhanasya sādhīyastvam . tathā pṛthivībhavanameva dravyabhavanam, dravyabhavanameva
sadbhavanamiti . tathā vṛkṣādipūrvetyādi sādhanaṃ tadviparyayeṇa uttarabhavanadharmāpādanam, tadanatiriktātmakatvāt
tato'nanyatvāt, vṛkṣamūlādīti dṛṣṭāntaḥ . śiṃśapādyuttarabhavanavijñānavidhyāpādyo vṛkṣaḥ, tadātmakatvāt,
mūla-skamdha-palāśādidharmātmanā vṛkṣa eva yathā bhavan dṛṣṭastathā śiṃśapādyātmanā vṛkṣa eva bhavatīti . evaṃ
vidhirūpeṇa dṛṣṭavadevānumānaṃ vidhiprādhānye yujyate'bhidhānaṃ ca .
tvanmate vyāvṛttiprādhānye tu doṣaḥ . tadyathā --dṛṣṭavat pārthivatvādyasiddhau pārthivadravyasadekātmakabhavanameva vṛkṣabhavanamanicchato'smanmataṃ te vṛkṣo naiva vṛkṣaḥ syāt pārthivatvenāsiddhatvāt toyavat, yathā toyaṃ pārthivatvenāsiddhaṃ vṛkṣo na bhavati evaṃ vṛkṣo'pi vṛkṣo naiva syāt . tathā pārthivaṃ dravyatvenāsiddhatvāt pārthivaṃ naiva syāt, guṇavat, yathā guṇasya dravyatvenāsiddhatvādapārthivatvaṃ tathā
pārthivasyāpi apārthivatvaṃ syāt . evaṃ dravyaṃ na dravyaṃ syāt, sattvenāsiddhatvāt, khapuṣpavaditi .
pārthivadravyasattvāsiddhayo'siddhā iti cet, na, vyāvṛttiprādhānye'nyatvāt svārthānubandhibhedānāmapi vyāvṛttatvāt svārthābhāvābhāvaśabdārthatvāt . prasiddhivirodhadoṣa iti cet, tavaiva vyāvṛttiprādhānyābhyupagamāddoṣo na mameti . tathā sadapi na sat, dravyāditvenāsiddhatvāt khapuṣpavat iti vartate . evaṃ pūrvaṃ
pūrvaṃ nātmarūpabhāk syāt, uttararūpeṇābhūtatvāt, agnivaditi yathāvad gatārthamaniṣṭāpādanam .
yadapyuktam—
guṇatva-gandha-saurabhya-tadviśeṣairanukramāt .adravyādivyaccheda ekavṛddhyotpalādivat ॥ pra॰ samu॰ 2 . 14
iti vyāvṛttiprādhānye guṇavattvādibhiradravyādivyaccheda ekavṛddhyā yujyate .





dṛṣṭānuvṛtteḥ... ... ...॥

dṛṣṭānuvṛttereva nādṛṣṭāvacchedādānulomyānniścayaḥ prātilomyādvā saṃśayaḥ .
yatastatra tulye'nyatve śuklatvād guṇe niścayo na dravyakarmaṇoḥ, tayoścāpoho na
sattvaguṇayoḥ .
tatrānubandhitattvadarśanānaivānyatvamiti cet, śuklaṃ tarhi nīlādyapi syāt,
rūpādananyatvāt, śuklaguṇasvarūpavat . evameva rūpaṃ rasādyapi syād guṇādananyatvād, guṇasvarūpavat,... ... ... dvyaṇukādyapi . dvyaṇukamutkṣepaṇādi rūpādi
ca syādāśritatvāt . saṃśayo na syāt śauklyaikātmyāt .

vyāvṛttiprādhānye tu—
dṛṣṭavad yadi siddhiḥ syācchauklyarūpaguṇāśritāt .kramavat prātilomye'pi dvitryekārthagatirbhavet ॥ pra॰ samu॰ 3 . 44 iti .
tadapi dṛṣṭānuvṛtterityādi ślokaḥ, krameṇa dvitryekārthagativat prātilomye dvitryekārthagatirna bhavati tathā
darśanādadarśanācceti . tadvyākhyā--dṛṣṭānuvṛttereva nādṛṣṭāvacchedāt nādṛṣṭānanuvṛtterānulomyād niścayaḥ
prātilomyādvā saṃśayaḥ . kasmāt ? yatastatra tulye'nyatve śuklatvād guṇe niścayo dravya-karmaṇorneti, tayoścāpoho na sattva-guṇayoḥ . śauklya-rūpādīnāmaikātmyād niścayaḥ, darśanādeva caikānekātmabhyāmāśritaguṇa-rūpādibhirguṇa-rūpa-śauklyeṣu saṃśaya iti .
tatrānubandhitattvadarśanād naivānyatvamiti cet . syānmatam--vṛkṣāt pārthiva-dravya-sattvānīvānanyāni śauklyād rūpaguṇāśritānubandhīni . tasmāt tatra niścayo'napohaśca . ye'nye teṣāmarūpāguṇānāśritānāmapārthivatvādivad vṛkṣādapoha iti .
atra brūmaḥ --śuklaṃ tarhītyādi . nīlaraktapītādyapi śuklaṃ syāt, rūpādananyatvāt, śuklaguṇasvarūpavat . evamevetyādi gatārthānyaniṣṭāpādanāni yāvad dvyaṇukādyapīti . dvyaṇukaṃ kāryadravyamāśritaṃ paramāṇvo

anyatvameva tarhyatulyaṃ śauklyādeḥ . rūpādayo nānye śauklyādeḥ, aniṣṭāpatteḥ .
arūpāditve śauklyasya tacchauklyameva na syāt arūpāditvāt utkṣepaṇādivat .
tasmāt tena sahānanyatvād rūpāderna tadapohaḥ . ye punaranye'pi āśritādestu
guṇādayaḥ teṣāmapohānapohābhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ . athaitadeva kutaḥ ? asmadiṣṭānvayadarśanādevaitat siddham . evaṃ tāvadānantyānuktivyabhicāradoṣayoranyāpohapakṣe'pi bhāvaḥ .
anantarasyāpi ca bhāvaḥ, yasmāt
rutkṣepaṇādi rūpādi ca syāditi āśritatvāt ityasmāddhetoḥ . saṃśayo na syāt karma-guṇeṣu saprabhedeṣu
anubandhivadananyatvāt tadupāyapradarśanaṃ sarvaguṇādiparikrameṇa . kasmāt ? śauklyaikātmyāt tvadiṣṭāditi .
atrāha --anyatvameva tarhyatulyaṃ śauklyādeḥ . evaṃ tarhi nānanyatvam, kiṃ tarhi ? anyatvameva .
mā bhūdetadaniṣṭamiti tad darśayannāha --rūpādayo nānye śauklyādeḥ, kasmāt ? tadrūpānubandhitvāt,
vṛkṣādiva pārthivatvam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? aniṣṭāpatteḥ . kiṃ tadaniṣṭamiti cet, arūpāditve śauklyasya
tacchauklyameva na syāt, arūpāditvāt, utkṣepaṇādivaditi . tasmāt tena sahānanyatvāt śauklyena
rūpāderna tadapohaḥ na rūpādyapohaḥ . ye punaranye'pi tatasteṣāmapohānapohābhyāṃ saṃśayaḥ . ke punaste ? ucyante—
āśritādestu guṇādayaḥ, tadyathā--guṇo'yamāśritatvāt ityāśrita eva niyamād guṇo nā'nāśrito'stīti .
āśritastu guṇaḥ karma sāmānyaṃ viśeṣaḥ samavāyo vetyaniyamaḥ . tasmāt tena sahāśritatvena teṣāṃ guṇādīnāmanyatvādapoho'napohaśceti saṃśayaḥ syāditi .
ācārya āha --athaitadeva kutaḥ ? śauklyādivadrūpādiṣu niścayaḥ, āśritatvād guṇādiṣu saṃśayaḥ
iti tvayā yataḥ pratyavagataṃ tad vaktavyaṃ viśeṣakāraṇaṃ vyāvṛttiprādhānyavādinā, vidhinā darśanamantareṇa vastuno
na śakyam, asmadiṣṭavastvanvayadarśanādevaitat siddham, tadabhāve tanniyamāniyamāprasiddheḥ .
evaṃ tāvadityādi . bhedapakṣe paraṃ prati uktayorānantyānukti-vyabhicāradoṣayoḥ adṛṣṭeranyaśabdārthe
pra॰ samu॰ 5 . 34 ityādināpyaparihṛtatvāt saviśeṣayoranyāpohapakṣe'pyastitvaṃ darśitamityupasaṃhāraḥ .
anantarasyāpi ca bhāvaḥ . yadapyuktam anantarasyāpi jātisambandhābhidhānapakṣayoruktasya

asanniṣedhābhāvatvād viśeṣārthavibhinnatā .
sāmānyaśabdasya hi yo'rthāntaravyudāso vyāpāraḥ sa svabhedāpratikṣepeṇa pra॰ samu॰ vṛ॰ 5 . 36 iti
vāṅmātreṇoktam . sa svabhedapratikṣepeṇaiva, tasya sanniyamārthatvādasatpratiṣedhasyābhāvatvāt bhedānāṃ parasparataḥ sadasattvāt bhedaśrutyā saha sāmānādhikaraṇyamanupapannam . sambandhasyāpi bhedairabhāvasyānupapatteḥ kasya vā te bhedāḥ ? tasmādapṛthakchrutidoṣo'styeva .
sukaro hi śabdasyānyāpohena sambandhaḥ, śabdo jātimātrasya tadyogasya vā
na vācako bhedārthairapṛthakchruteḥ . tathā hi sad dravyaṃ san guṇaḥ sat karma iti bhedārthairdravyādiśabdaiḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt, tacca dṛṣṭam . na hi sattā yogo vā dravyaṃ
guṇo vā bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ? dravyasya guṇasya vā . tathaiva hi  anyāpohasya na
samānādhikaraṇābhāvaprasaṅgadoṣajātasya abhāva iti . tadyathā --vyāpteranyaniṣedhasya tadbhedārthairabhinnatā pra॰
samu॰ 5 . 36 . sadityasanna bhavati ityasato nivṛttiḥ sarvadravyaguṇakarmaghaṭarūpotkṣepaṇādibhedavyāpinī, tasyā
asannivṛtteḥ sarvabhedavyāpitvāt tairabhinnārthatvāt sāmānādhikaraṇyamupapannamiti . etanna, yasmādasanniṣedhābhāvatvād viśeṣārthavibhinnatā . tadvyākhyā --sāmānyaśabdasya hītyādi, sāmānyaśabdasya hi sadāderyo'rthāntaravyudāsaḥ asanna bhavati iti kṛtyaṃ vyāpāraḥ sa tvayetthamavadhāritaḥ svabhedāpratikṣepeṇeti
vāṅmātreṇoktaṃ prāguktaṃ vismṛtyeti pūrvapakṣapratyuccāraṇam . atra tu vayaṃ brūmaḥ --sa svabhedapratikṣepeṇaiveti .
kasmāt ? tasya sacchabdasya sanniyamārthatvāt--asanna bhavati iti dviḥpratiṣedhasya prakṛtyāpatteḥ sattvena
niyatatvādasatpratiṣedhasyābhāvatvāt . tataḥ kim ? tato bhedānāṃ parasparataḥ sadasattvāt, itaretarābhāvatvādasattvam, sanniyamāt sattvam, ataḥ svabhedāḥ pratikṣiptā eva, santo'pyasanta eva na bhavantīti
prāptam . tataśca bhedaśrutyā dravyaguṇādikayā ghaṭapaṭādikayā ca saha sāmānādhikaraṇyamanupapannamasannivṛtterabhāvasādhanatvāt, abhāvena caikavibhaktitvamanupapannaṃ bhedānāṃ saddravyaṃ sadguṇaḥ san ghaṭaḥ ityādi . na
vibhaktimātrasāmānādhikaraṇyānupapattireva, kiṃ tarhi ? padasyāpyanupapannaṃ sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vibhaktibhedenāpi
sad dravyasya guṇasya vā ityādi . sambandhasyāpi bhedairdravyādibhirabhāvasyānupapatteḥ kasya vā te bhedāḥ
sacchabdenābhinnāsattvanivṛttimātropādānāt ? tasmādapṛthakchrutidoṣo'styeva .
tadvyākhyānārthā ṭīkā tadīyaiva --sukaro hītyādikā dṛṣṭāntatvena gatārthā yāvad dravyasya guṇasya
veti . tathaiva hīti dārṣṭāntikatvena tvanmatapradarśanameva yāvat sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt . yathā na
hi sattā dravyaṃ guṇo vā bhavatītyādi tathā na hi sadasanniṣedhābhāvastvanmato'smanmatasya pratiṣedhadvayavidheyasya sataḥ sabhedasyānabhyupagame dravyaṃ bhavati guṇo vā, kiṃ tarhi ? dravyasya guṇasya vā bhāvā

vācakaḥ, bhedārthairapṛthakchruteḥ . tathā hi sad dravyaṃ san guṇaḥ sat karma iti bhedārthairdravyādiśabdaiḥ  sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ na syāt . yathā na hi sattā dravyaṃ guṇo vā,
bhavati, kiṃ tarhi ? dravyasya guṇasya vā, tathā na hi sadasanniṣedhābhāvo dravyaṃ
bhavati guṇo vā, kiṃ tarhi ? dravyasya guṇasya vā bhāvābhāvaḥ . āha ca--vibhaktibhedo niyamād guṇaguṇyabhidhāyinoḥ .sāmānādhikaraṇyasya prasiddhirdravyaśabdayoḥ ॥ vākyapa॰ 3 . 14 . 8
yattu sattāsambandhābhidhānapakṣābhyāmapohapakṣe viśeṣahetupratipādanārthamuktam--tatra hi sattāsambandhayorguṇatvād vastunaśca guṇitvāt sāmānādhikara-
bhāvaḥ, sadasanmātramityarthaḥ, itīyaṃ vyākhyā tvanmatānusāriṇyeveti āha ceti jñāpakamapyāha --vibhaktibhedo niyamādityādi .
yattu sattetyādi . sattā-sambandhābhidhānapakṣayorapṛthakchrutidoṣo'sti, nāpohapakṣe viśeṣahetusadbhāvāditi tasya viśeṣahetoḥ pratipādanārthamuktam --tatra hītyādi . sattāsambandhābhidhānapakṣayorguṇau sattā

ṇyābhāvo yuktaḥ, iha tu arthāntarāpoho yasmin vastuni kriyate tad dravyaṃ śabdārthaḥ
nāpohamātram . sa ca sacchabdena vyāptaḥ, aparityāgāt, na tu sākṣāduktaḥ .
tadyathā--sacchabdaḥ asannivṛttyupasarjanaṃ dravyamāha, na sākṣāt, saṃśayotpatteḥ, tasmād viśeṣārthairdravyādiśabdaiḥ sacchabdasya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ vākyārthe
yuktaṃ saddravyaṃ sadguṇaḥ satkarma.... tathā hi svārthāvyabhicāro viśeṣaśabdasahitasya .
yasmādavayavaśabdārthābhyāmanyaḥ samudāyārthaḥ, tasya ca vācakau tau samuditau, na tu
sacchabdo dravyārthamāha na dravyaśabdaḥ sadartham . kathaṃ tarhi yat sat tad dravyaṃ yad
dravyaṃ tat saditi ? ubhayaśabdavyudāsānugṛhītasya śabdadvayābhidheyasya samudāyārthasyaikatvāt tathocyate, na tu sadarthasya dravyaśabdenābhidhānāt .
sambandhau viśeṣaṇatvāt, tadvastu guṇītyataḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvo yuktaḥ . iha tvarthāntarāpohaḥ sadityasanna bhavatīti nāsadbhāvamātramevocyate, kiṃ tarhi ? arthāntarāpohena viśiṣṭaṃ vastveva sadityucyate, yasmin
vastuni so'pohaḥ kriyate tacca dravyaṃ śabdārthaḥ, nāpohamātram . sa cāpohaviśiṣṭo'rtho dravyādiḥ sacchabdena
vyāpto'parityāgāt, na tu sākṣāduktaḥ .
tadvyākhyā --tadyathā sacchabda ityādi . kasmādanabhidhānamiti cet, saṃśayotpatteḥ, upāttatve
sati anabhihite saṃśayaḥ syāt . tasmāt sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ viśeṣārthairdravyādiśabdaiḥ sacchabdasya vākyārthe
yuktaṃ na padārthe . taddarśayati --saddravyaṃ sadguṇa ityādi . tathā hi svārthāvyabhicāro viśeṣasahitasyeti viśeṣaśabdaprayogaḥ . ko'sau vākyārtha ityata āha --yasmādavayavaśabdārthābhyāmanyaḥ samudāyārthaḥ, saddravyaśabdārthāvayavāvasadadravyanivṛttyupalakṣitau tābhyāmanya ubhayaśabdavyudāsānugṛhītaḥ samudāyārthaḥ, tasya ca
vācakau tau samuditau na viparītārthau, tad darśayati --na tu sacchabdo dravyārthamāha, na dravyaśabdaḥ
sadarthamiti . yathoktam--

apohyabhedād bhinnārthāḥ svārthabhedagatau jaḍāḥ .
ekatrābhinnakāryatvād viśeṣaṇaviśeṣyakāḥ ॥ pra॰ samu॰ 5 . 15 iti .

atra codyam --kathaṃ tarhīti yat sat tad dravyam, yad dravyaṃ tat sat iti bhinnārthatvena
yuktam ? iti . atra tenaivocyate --ubhayaśabdavyudāsānugṛhītasya asadadravyanivṛttyanugṛhītasya saṃhataśabdadvayābhidheyasya samudāyārthasyaikatvāt tathocyate, na tu sadarthasya dravyaśabdenābhidhānāditi pūrvapakṣaḥ .


atrāpi śakyaṃ vaktum--āśritasya guṇiṇa ?tvād guṇaguṇinorbhedāt
sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvastadavasthaḥ . iha tu jātiyogau yasmin vastuni varteyātāṃ
tad dravyaṃ sadityucyate... ... śabdadvayābhidheyatvāt .
paścimasyāpi doṣasya bhāva eva, sākṣādavṛttyādidoṣajātasya sātiśayasyokta-

uttarapakṣastu --atrāpi śakyamityādi . sattā-yogapakṣagato vibhaktibhedaprasaṅgadoṣo'trāpi śakyo
vaktum, āśritasya guṇitvāt . tadyathā--sadabhāvābhāva āśritaḥ, dravyādyabhāvābhāva āśrayaḥ, tayośca
guṇaguṇinorbhedāt tadabhidhāyinoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇyābhāvastadavasthaḥ . yā tvayoktopapattiḥ sā'pi jātiyogapakṣayorapi kramata ityatastatpradarśanārthamāha --iha tu jāti-yogau yasmin vastunītyādi . sattātaḥ
sacchabdaḥ tatsambandhādvā sati vartate vastuni dravyādibhedavati sattvavat sat ityabhedopacārād matublopādvā, tvayoktāpohavṛttivad varteyātāṃ jātiyogau sadeva sattvavat iti . śeṣastvaduktopapattigranthavattulyagamo
yāvacchabdadvayābhidheyatvāditi gatārthaḥ . tasmāt tadavastha evāpṛthakcchrutidoṣaḥ .
kiñcānyat --paścimasyāpi doṣasya bhāva eva, nābhāvaḥ . yaduktaṃ jātimatpakṣe—
tadvato nāsvatantratvād bhedājjāterajātitaḥ  
ityādi doṣajātaṃ tasyābhāvo'nyāpohapakṣe sākṣādvṛtteḥ, tatra hi sacchabdaḥ sattāmudāpāya dravye
vartamānastadbhedān ghaṭādīnākṣeptumasamarthaḥ . atra punarasatpratiṣedhena sākṣādvartata iti tasya ye viśeṣāstān
na pratikṣipati . tasmādihānākṣepadoṣo nāsti . bhāktadoṣo'pyata eva nāsti, na hyanyatra mukhyā vṛttirdravyādiṣūpacaryate . nāpi bhedānavasthānādanabhidhānadoṣaḥ, kasmāt ? abhedāt, na hyarthāntarāpoho bhedeṣu
bhidyate, abhāvāt . tanmātraṃ ca śabdenocyate, na bhedāḥ . tathā sāmānyadoṣo'pi nāsti . yattūktam—
satvān ghaṭādirartho na paṭādiṣu na vartate  
iti, sākṣād ghaṭapaṭādiṣvasatpratikṣepāditi . tanna bhavati, yasmāt sākṣādavṛttyādidoṣajātasya

tvādasmābhiḥ . sacchabdo'pohamātrasvarūpopasarjanaṃ dravyamāha, na sākṣādityādi
sarvaṃ prāguktam .
yattūktaṃ paraṃ pratyāśaṅkya--syādetat--apohaviśiṣṭārthatve... ...tulyaṃ śabdārthasya samānatvam . tataḥ--adravyatvācca bhedācca....... ... ...॥  
nāpyarthāntarāpoho nāma bhāvāntaram... ... ... ... ...nāsti sāmānyadoṣa iti . atra brūmaḥ--tadvattvaṃ ca tvaduktavat . nanu bhāvāntarataiva... ... ....
sātiśayasyoktatvādasmābhiḥ, tadeva smārayannāha --sacchabdo'pohamātrasvarūpopasarjanaṃ dravyamāha,
na sākṣādityādi sarvaṃ prāguktaṃ jātimadvadapohavān ityupakramya . tatra ca jātimatīvāpohavatyapi
sarve doṣā yathā saṅgatāstathā pratipāditā iti na punarlikhyate .
syānmatam--jātimattvavadapohavattvamapyayuktamiti, tadāśaṅkyate --yattūktamanyāpohavādinā paraṃ prati
āśaṅkya tadyathā --syādetadapohaviśiṣṭārthastarthatva ityādi yāvat tulyaṃ śabdārthasya samānatvam
śabdasya ca samānatvamarthasya ca apohapakṣe'pi iti vākyaśeṣaḥ . itthaṃ pūrvapakṣīkṛtyottaramāha--tataḥ adravyatvācca bhedācceti kārikayā caśabdād bhāṣye likhitam . tadvyākhyā --nāpyarthāntarāpoho nāmetyādi
yāvannāsti sāmānyadoṣa ityapohapakṣe jātimatpakṣagatadoṣābhāvapratipādanaṃ viśeṣapradarśanāditi tvadabhiprāyaṃ pradarśya vayamatrottaraṃ brūmaḥ --tadvattvaṃ ca tvaduktavat . asya vyākhyā --nanu bhāvāntarataivetyādi .
yadi paramatābhyupagamāt sāmānyavatpakṣe satsāmānyānvayāt sāmānyavadviśeṣaṇasya sāmānyasyārthāntaratvaṃ
pāratantryādi ca brūṣe sāmānyavad vyāvṛtterapi arthāntaratvaṃ viśeṣaṇatvaṃ pāratantryādi ca nanu tadavasthameva,
tadvato'nyapratyayātmakatvāt sāmānyavat tadvyāvṛtterapi . atha svamatena brūṣe na sāmānyaṃ na vyāvṛttimaditi
kutastadviśiṣṭavastvabhidhānaṃ khapuṣpaśekharaviśiṣṭavandhyāputrābhidhānavat .


api ca bhāvāntara... ... .... yathā jātisvarūpa... ... ...anākṣepastathā
yathākathañcit... ... ...asvātantryahetutvāt .
yadi cārthāntarāpoho na bhāvāntaraṃ kathamidam--yat sat tad dravyaṃ yad
dravyaṃ tat saditi ? ubhayaśabdavyudāsānugṛhītasya śabdadvayābhidheyasya samudāyasyaikatvāt tathocyate na tu sadarthasya dravyaśabdenābhidhānāt, arthāntarāpoho yasmin
vastuni kriyate tad dravyaṃ śabdārtho nāpohamātram . tasmādaparihṛtaḥ paścimadoṣo'pi .

api ca bhāvāntaretyādi . atra prastutārthopakārāpakārānaṅgatvād bhāvāntarābhāvāntaratvābhyāṃ
vicāritābhyāṃ na kiñcit prayojanamasti, kintu idamatra prastutārthaupayogikam, tadyathā--buddhisthasya śabdaprayogajanitajñānopalakṣitasyānvayavyatirekadvāreṇāvadhāritasyārthasyā''nuguṇyena vaśavartitayā ayaṃ bhavati,
ayaṃ na bhavati iti tayorvidhipratiṣedhayorbhedena pratyayaḥ śabdārthasambandhajñasya śabdaprayogādutpadyate, sāmānyopasarjanaviśeṣaśabdārthapakṣe vā . dvayorapi ca pakṣayorupasarjanīkṛtaviśeṣaṇatvād bhedānākṣepādasvātantryādanabhidhānaṃ tulyamityeṣa vicāraprayāsārthaḥ . tad dṛṣṭāntena darśayati --yathā jātisvarūpetyādinā tadvatpakṣavādimatena yāvadanākṣepa iti, dārṣṭāntikena ca tathā yathākathañcidityādinā yāvadasvātantryahetutvāditi suṣṭhūcyate--paścimasyāpi doṣasya sātiśayasya bhāva eveti .
yadapyuktam--arthāntarāpoho'sadaghaṭanivṛttiḥ san ghaṭa iti, tasmāt sāmānyadoṣo'pohapakṣe nāstīti,
tadapi pratyāsannamātmoktaṃ vismṛtya tvayābhihitamiti bodhayitukāma idameva tāvat pratyuccārayati --yadi
cārthāntarāpoho na bhāvāntaramityādi . abhāvāntaratvādarthāntarāpohasyāpohavānarthaḥ śabdavācyo na
bhavati, ato nāpoho viśeṣaṇaṃ nāpohavān so'rtha iti yadi tvayeṣṭamiti asya virodhāpādanārthamucyate—
kathamidamityādi pūrvapakṣitamasmābhiryāvanna tu sadarthasya dravyaśabdenābhidhānādityetasya sūcanaṃ sūtreṇa
yāvad nāpohamātramiti gatārtham . kimuktaṃ bhavatīti cet, ucyate--yadi dravyaṃ yadyadravyamarthāntarāpohaḥ
tadvāṃstvarthaḥ tvasvaśabdārthatvena vivakṣitatvāducyata eva buddhisthānvayavyatirekārthabhedapratyayotpattidarśanādityuktaṃ bhavati . na hi loke śabdaprayogajanitapratyayaparicchedyāpalāpenānyaḥ śabdārthaḥ śakyaḥ kalpayituṃ
sudūramapi gatvā pratipattiśaraṇāvasthānād vādānāmiti nāyaṃ niḥsaraṇopāyaḥ . tasmādaparihṛtaḥ paścimadoṣo'pīti . etena asvātantryād bhedājjāterajātitaḥ   iti savyākhyāvikalpā doṣahetavo'parihṛtā veditavyāḥ, teṣāṃ tvaduktanyāyādhvānatikramāt parihārahetūnāṃ tadvikalpānusāritvāccetyalaṃ prasaṅgena .


atra ca saṃghātaḥ śabdārtha utpattāvabhivyaktau vā . yadyaprāptayaugapadyāni
padāni kāryāt prasiddhād vyavasthā lokaprasiddhereva vā, anavasthitatarkatvāt
puruṣāṇām . āgamamātraṃ tvetat padasamūho'niyatānupūrvyo vākyam .

prastutanayamataḥ śabdārtho vidhīyate --atra ca vidhiniyamaniyame saṅghāto varṇa-pada-vākyādīnāṃ
śabdārtha utpattāvabhivyaktau veti . yadi varṇādayo janyante yadyabhivyajyante kārya-nityapakṣayordvayorapi
aviruddhaḥ saṅghāto vākyādiḥ śabda iti . syānmatam--utpannamātrapradhvaṃsitvād varṇādīnāṃ yaugapadyābhāve
kutaḥ saṅghāta iti, atrocyate--yadyaprāptayaugapadyāni padāni kāryāt prasiddhād vyavasthā loke, kiṃ tat
kāryam ? arthapratipādanam, tadyathā--varṇādīnāṃ tirohitānāṃ pariṇāmāntaramāpannānāṃ vinaṣṭānāṃ vā buddhau
saṃskāramādhāyā'bhidheyavijñānotpattinimittatvaṃ tadabhāve tadabhāvāt prayogānantarīyakatvācca pratyayasyānumīyate . lokaprasiddhereva vā vyavasthā, dṛṣṭā hi loke teṣāṃ varṇapadādīnāṃ śabdānāmarthapratyāyanāsambhavādarthapratyāyakastatsamudāya iti śaktiḥ prasiddhā . sannidānīṃ samudāyaḥ samudāyibhyo varṇādibhyastadasambhavikāryāntaradarśanādanya iti kecidāhuḥ, tasmādeva kāryād mā bhūdahetukamarthapratyāyanaṃ teṣu tasya pratideśaṃ
samasteṣu vā deśaiḥ sāmastyena vā vṛttyasambhavānna vyatirikta ityapare . pūrvavarṇajñānāhitasaṃskārāpekṣāntyavarṇe
saṃhṛtāśeṣaśeṣāvayavaḥ samudāyo'bhidhātā pūrvavarṇajanitabuddhiparipākādityeke . sikatātoyavad deśāntareṣu
asato'ntyeṃ'śe kutaḥ sambhavaḥ pratyāyanasya ? kintu tilatailavat sarvāvayaveṣu tirohitābhimateṣu sūkṣmatāmāpanneṣu vitatya vyavasthito buddhisaṃskāraparipākasamudāyo'bhivyañjakaḥ pratyayasyetyapare . sa ca samudāyātmā
śabda eka evābhinnaḥ pratyāyako'rthasyaikapratyayadarśanāt, aneka eva vā pratyavayavāhitasaṃskārabalādheyārthajñānatvādityevamādīni vicārāntarāṇyevaitāni . puruṣamatisamutthāpitaśuṣkatarkaviṣayatvāt kiṃ na etaiḥ,
yadi vyatiriktaḥ yadyavyatiriktaḥ antye śeṣasamasteṣvabhinno bhinno vā pratyāyakaḥ samudāyo'vayavā eva
vā ? yo'stu so'stu, sarvathā'rthapratyāyanāt phalāt samudāyaḥ śabda ityetāvadupayujyate . kiṃ kāraṇam ?
anavasthitatarkatvāt puruṣāṇām, yathoktam --yatnenānumito'pyarthaḥ vākyapa॰ 1 . 34 ityādi tathā
hastasparśādivāndhena vākyapa॰ 1 . 42 ityādi . kiṃ tarhi pratipattavyam ? āgamamātraṃ tvetat
padasamūho vākyamiti . yathoktam—
jo hetuvādapakkhaṃmi hetu+o āgame ya āgami+o .so sasamayapaṇṇava+o siddhaṃtavirādha+o itaro sammati॰ 3 . 45 tti .
sa cā'niyatānupūrvyaḥ padasamūhaḥ . anupūrvabhāva ānupūrvyam, tadaniyataṃ yasya so'niyatānupūrvyaḥ



ayaṃ ca śabdaikadeśatvāt paryavāstikaḥ . pariḥ samantādarthe, ava gatyarthe .
parito'vanaṃ paryavaḥ . samantād dravati . ko'sau ? bhedo bhāvopasarjanaḥ . so'stīti
yasya matiḥ sa paryavāstikaḥ .
nirgamavākyamapyasya--duvālasaṃgaṃ gaṇipiḍagamekaṃ purisaṃ paḍucca sādiyaṃ sapajjavasiyaṃ
nandīsū॰ 42 ityādi .
iti vidhiniyamaniyamo'ṣṭamo'raḥ .
samāptaśca dvitīyo mārgaḥ .
padasamūhaḥ, tadyathā--devadatta gāmabhyāja iti kadācit, kadācicca devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklām, devadatta
mahiṣīṃ gṛṣṭiṃ kalyāṇīm iti pātramāhara, āhara pātraṃ sauvarṇaṃ ca ityādi . vyākaraṇa-sāṅkhya-vaiśeṣika-bauddhādyanyatamagranthamātraṃ sarvāgamasamūhātmakārhatāgamo vā vākyam, vākyārtho'pi tadabhidheyo'rthaḥ . uktaḥ śabdārthaḥ .
ayaṃ punarnayaḥ kvāntarbhavati, dravyārthe kiṃ paryāyārthe ? ucyate --ayaṃ ca śabdaikadeśatvāt
paryavāstikaḥ .
mūlanimeṇaṃ pajjavaṇayassa ujjusutavayaṇavicchedo .ta
ssa tu sāhapasāhā saddavikappā suhumabhedā ॥ sammati॰ 1 . 5
ityārṣe'pi saptanayaśatāmnānāt paryavāstikabhedasya śabdanayasya bheda ityarthaḥ .
paryavāstika iti kaḥ śabdārthaḥ ? ucyate --parirupasargaḥ samantādarthe, ava gatyarthe dhātuḥ .
parito'vanaṃ samantād gamanaṃ paryavaḥ . tadācaṣṭe --samantāddravati . itthamakṣarārthamuktvā vastuto darśayati—
ko'sau ? bhedo bhāvopasarjanaḥ, yo bhavati ghaṭādirbhedaḥ sa bhavanakriyopasarjanaḥ paryavaḥ . so'stīti yasya
