nayasya matiḥ sa paryavāstika iti taddhitapratyayāntārthaḥ prakṛtyarthena viśeṣito jñeyaḥ .
kimetāḥ svamanīṣikā evocyante, asti kiñcid nibandhanamasyārṣamapīti ? asti ityucyate,
tadyathā --nirgamavākyamapyasya--duvālasaṃgaṃ gaṇipiḍagamekaṃ purisaṃ paḍuccetyādyārṣagranthaṃ sākṣitvenā''haitanmatasaṃvādinam . yadyapyayamāgamo'nekapuruṣānvayena sadā vyavasthitastathāpi pratyekaṃ puruṣaviśeṣāśrita eva niścayāya kriyāsāmānyopasarjanaviśeṣaparamārthatvād bhavatyarthasya . tacca dvādaśāṅgaṃ gaṇipiṭakamata
eva sādyaṃ saparyavasānaṃ ca kṣaṇikamevetyarthaḥ . ityādigrahaṇādanyāpi prakṛtisthityanubhāvapradeśabandhādiprarūpaṇā
ekasamayamātraviṣayā mithyādarśanādipariṇāmādhyavasāyaprarūpaṇā ca draṣṭavyā .
iti parisamāptau, itthaṃ parisamāpto vidhiniyamayorniyamopapradarśano guṇa-pradhānabhāvenāyamaṣṭamo'raḥ .
samāptaśca dvitīyo mārga ubhayavikalpabhedopadarśanaḥ ॥




oँ arhaँ


sadgurubhyo namaḥ

atha navamo niyamāraḥ .

yadi bhedapradhāno bhāvaḥ kathamasau ? sa bhavitāramantareṇa svarūpamapi prāptumasamartho'svatantratvādasan khapuṣpavat . tadabhāve bhedā eva viprakīrṇāḥ syuḥ . tataśca bhettavyābhāvād
bhedā api na bhavitumarhantīti dharmadharmisvarūpavirodhaḥ . ghaṭādibhedābhāvaḥ, bhettavyābhāvāt,
gaganodumbarakusumavat . tataścātyantanirupākhyatvāt svavacanābhyupagamānumānapratyakṣavirodhā
api .
pṛthivī ghaṭo bhavati ityatra yadi viśeṣa eva bhavati tarhi sāmānyasyābhāve
viśeṣo'pi nāstyeva . asati ca viśeṣe kutaḥ sāmānyasyāsatpradhānopakāritā ?

vidhi-niyamasarvabhaṅgavṛttyātmakaikatattvādhikāre vartamāna ubhayaniyamabhaṅgāradarśane'pyaparituṣyata
uttaranayasya niyamabhaṅgasyotthānam . tasmiṃstu dūṣite svamatapradarśanaṃ yuktamiti taddūṣaṇārthamāha --yadi
bhedapradhāno bhāva ityādi yāvad dharma-dharmisvarūpavirodhaḥ . yad bhedo bhavati prādhānyena, anvayo'syopasarjanam ityuktaṃ tatra tamevaṃvidhaṃ bhāvamavadhārayāmaḥ --kathamasau ? iti, sa tvayeṣṭo'nvayo bhāvo
bhaviturbhedasya kriyā bhedātirekeṇa bhavitāraṃ kartāramantareṇa svarūpamapi prāptumasamartho niścayoye ? .
kasmāt ? asvatantratvādakartṛtvādabhavitā, abhavitṛtvādasan khapuṣpavat . tasya anvayasya bhāvasya
abhāve bhedā eva viprakīrṇā bhedyavasturahitāḥ syuḥ . tataśca bhettavyasyānvayasyābhāvād bhedā api
na bhavitumarhanti . bhidyamāno hi bhedaḥ, kuto bhidyate'sau nirbhedyatvāt khapuṣpavaditi bhedābhāvād dharmadharmiṇoḥ svarūpābhāve anvayopasarjano bhedapradhānaḥ śabdārthaḥ ityetad vākyaṃ nirākṛtadharmadharmisvarūpakaṃ
saṃvṛttam . tadupasaṃhṛtya sādhanamāha --ghaṭādibhedābhāvaḥ, bhettavyābhāvāt, gaganodumbarakusumavaditi .
ubhayorbhettṛbhettavyayorabhāvaḥ, na gaganakusumādudumbarakusumamudumbarakusumādvā gaganakusumaṃ bhettṛ bhettavyaṃ
veti dṛṣṭāntaḥ, tathā upasarjanapradhānayoḥ sāmānya-bhedayoriti dārṣṭāntiko'rthaḥ . tataścātyantetyādi .
itthaṃ nirupākhyatvācchūnyatvāpattau svavacanā-'bhyupagamā-'numāna-pratyakṣavirodhā api prāptāḥ, te
cāniṣṭā iti .
kiñcānyat, pṛthivī ghaṭo bhavati ityatra nirdhāryam--kiṃ pṛthivī bhavati na ghaṭaḥ, uta ghaṭo
bhavati na pṛthivī, ubhayaṃ vā bhavati, na bhavati ? iti . tatra yadi viśeṣa evetyādi, sāmānyasyopasarjanasyābhāve viśeṣo'pi nāstyevetīdānīmevoktatvādasati ca ghaṭe viśeṣe kutaḥ sāmānyasyāsato'


atha pṛthivyāderanvayitvaṃ pravṛtterbhavati tataścopasarjanatvaṃ sāmānyasya nāsti . ubhayasmiṃstvasati sa yadyabhāva eva bhedaḥ, tenaiva bhedena na bhūyeta abhāvatvāt khapuṣpavat .
na hyabhāvo bhāvo bhavati . atha bhāva eva tato bhāvāvyatirekād bhūtatvādubhayathāpi na
punarbhūyeta, bhūtaghaṭādivadākāśādivat . na hi bhūta eva bhavati, tathā'sattvāpatteḥ . yadi
bhūtameva bhavet tatastadasat syāt, utpadyamānatvāt, ajātaghaṭādivat .
bhedeṣu bhavanānvaya aupacārikaḥ iti cet, nanvanvayadravyaṃ svātmanyeva
tiṣṭhati, tataśca tadavasthāmātraṃ ghaṭādibhedā iti ghaṭādibhedā evaupacārikā ityuktaṃ
bhavati . yathā aṅgulirvakrā bhavati ityukte vakratā aṅguleḥ bhedāvasthāmātramityau-
satpradhānopakāritā ? iti . athetyādi . atha mā bhūt pṛthivyādisāmānyopasarjanatve dvayorapi
sāmānya-viśeṣayorabhāvadoṣa iti pṛthivyāderanvayitvaṃ pravṛtterbhavati sattvāt, tataścopasarjanatvaṃ
sāmānyasya nāsti svatattvavyāpitvāt bhāvatvāt pravartamānatvād bhedavat, itthamapyupasarjanatvanivṛttiḥ .
ubhayasmiṃstviti sāmānye pṛthivyāṃ bhede ca ghaṭe dvaye'pi asati bhāve'nvaye bhavitari ca viśeṣe
sa yadyabhāva eva bhedo yena bhūyate bhedena sa bheda itīṣyate tenaiva bhedena na bhūyeta abhāvatvāt,
abhāvatvamabhavanakriyātmakatvāt, khapuṣpavat . na hyabhāvo bhāvo bhavatīti dṛṣṭāntārthapradarśanāt .
atha bhāva eva, mā bhūdeṣa doṣa iti anvayasvabhāva evāsau bhedo bhāva eveṣyate tato bhāvāvyatirekād bhāvātmakatvādanvayātmakatvād bhūtatvādubhayathāpi pradhānopasarjanatvābhyāṃ pṛthivī-ghaṭatvābhyāṃ
na punarbhūyeta, bhūtatvāt, bhūtaghaṭādivat ākāśādivad vaiyarthyāt . taddarśayati --na hi bhūta eva
bhavatīti . kasmāt ? tathā'sattvāpatteḥ . yadi bhūtameva bhavet utpannamevotpadyate tatastadasat
syāt, utpadyamānatvāt, ajātaghaṭādivadityasattvāpattiḥ, aniṣṭā ca seti na bhāvo bhavati
nābhāvo bhavatyubhayaṃ pṛthivī ghaṭaśceti .
bhedeṣvityādi . syānmatam--bhedeṣu ghaṭādiṣveva pṛthak satsu paramārthataḥ yo'sau bhavati bhavati
iti bhavanānvayaḥ sa aupacārika iti . atrocyate --nanvanvayetyādi . nanu tvayaiva svadravye pṛthivyādi
tiṣṭhati svātmanyeva tataśca tasya pṛthivyādidravyānvayasyāvasthāmātraṃ ghaṭādibhedā iti ghaṭādibhedā
evaupacārikāḥ, pṛthivyādisāmānyameva tattvam ityuktaṃ bhavati . kimiva ? ityata āha --yathāṅguli

pacārikatvaṃ vakratāyāḥ, nāṅguleḥ, na hi vakratvamaṅgulirbhavati anutpannatvāt khapuṣpavat .
bhedatvācca rūpavat .
ata uktanyāyāt tribhuvanaṃ bhinnābhimatamapyabhinnameva dravyāśritatvād bhedānām .
paryāyapravṛtteḥ sarvathaiva bhavanavidhyanupapattiḥ .
viśeṣasvarūpapratyavekṣāyāṃ bhavanaṃ svenaiva mahimnā pṛthag vartate . tad yadi pūrvaṃ
bhavanamasvatantraṃ pṛthak cāvṛtti tato nirmūlatvādasan ghaṭaḥ khapuṣpavat . nāpi sa
svayameva bhāvaḥ, viśeṣapradhānapakṣahāneḥ . nāpyasya bhāvaḥ, tataśca asattvāviśeṣāt
rityādi, yathā aṅgulirvakrā bhavati ityukte'ṅguleravasthā vakratā'ṅguleḥ sāmānyasya bhedāvasthāmātramityaupacārikatvaṃ vakratāyāḥ, nāṅguleḥ . yasmād na vakratvamaṅgulirbhavati, vakratvasyā'navasthātvādaṅguleḥ . aṅgulireva vakrībhavati, na vakrataivāṅgulībhavati . kasmāt punarna vakratvamaṅgulībhavati ?
ucyate --anutpannatvāt khapuṣpavat . evaṃ tāvadayugapadbhāvikālabhinnābhimataparyāyeṣu dravyamātratvamuktam .
yugapadbhāvideśabhinnābhimataparyāyeṣvapi bhedatvācca rūpavat tadavasthāmātram iti vartate . yathā ghaṭa eva
cakṣurādigrahaṇāpadeśaviśiṣṭatvāt rūpaṃ raso gandhaḥ ityādibhedenocyate'ṅgulirvā, vijñānamātrasya tatra
bhedatvād vastuno ghaṭasyābhinnatvāt, evaṃ pṛthivyādisāmānyabhedā ghaṭādayo'śma-sikatādayaśca
vijñānamātreṇeti .
kiñcānyat, ata uktanyāyādityādi . atītavidhyādidravyārthikanayeṣu eka-sarvagata-nityakāraṇavastumātravijṛmbhitaṃ stimitasarastaraṅgādivat tribhuvanaṃ bhinnābhimatamapyabhinnameva, dravyāśritatvād bhedānāmavasthādisaṃjñānāṃ puruṣādivādeṣu pratipāditatvāt dravyasya paryāyānāśritatvācca .
paryāyapravṛtterityādi, iti sarvathaiva bhavanavidhyanupapattirevaṃ pūrvātītadravyanayadarśanena .
viśeṣasvarūpetyādi . tasyāpi ca viśeṣasya svarūpaṃ pratyapekṣyamāṇamanvayasāmarthyādṛte na labhyate,
tadyathā--pūrayati pālayati kāryasyātmano'vasthādeḥ svarūpamiti kāraṇaṃ bhavanamanvayaḥ svenaiva mahimnā
pṛthag vartate bhedādṛte'pi yathopavarṇitamanekadhā'tītanayeṣu . tad yadi pūrvaṃ bhavanamasvatantraṃ pṛthak
cāvṛtti yathā tvayeṣṭaṃ syāt tataḥ kim ? tato nirmūlatvādityādi, nirmūlatvādasan ghaṭaḥ khapuṣpavat . syānmatam--kiṃ ghaṭasya mūlena bhavanena ? kiṃ na sa svayameva bhavati ? iti, etacca nāpi sa ghaṭaḥ
svayameva bhāvaḥ, kasmāt ? viśeṣapradhānapakṣahāneḥ . yadi viśeṣa eva bhāvastato ghaṭa eva viśeṣaḥ, sa
eva bhāvo bhavanam, tena bhūyate'nvayena bhāvenetyatastathābhāvatvād ghaṭasyāpi bhāvamātraṃ sāmānyamarthaṃrthaḥ ?

khapuṣpavadevāviśeṣa iti pūrvoktavadāvirbhāvādibhedānupapattivirodhāḥ .
nanu viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣata evopalabhyate . dṛśyamānatve'pi tathā tasyābhavanādasattvaṃ
dṛṣṭam, yathā mṛgatṛṣṇikāgandharvanagarayoḥ . mṛgatṛṣṇikāgandharvanagarayorhi pratyakṣatve'pi
śītādiviśeṣāsattvādasattvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathā viśeṣasya pratyakṣatve'pyasattvam .
athocyeta--śītādirjīvājīvādiśca viśeṣo mṛgatṛṣṇikāsalile gandharvanagare ca
nāstīti viśeṣāsattvāt syādasattvam, nāvaśyaṃ viśeṣe viśeṣairbhāvyaṃ yato viśeṣāsattvādasattvaṃ kalpyeta . yadi syurviśeṣe viśeṣā aviśeṣa eva syāt, viśeṣavattvāt,
saddravyapṛthivyādisāmānyavat .
api ca vayamapyetadeva brūmaḥ--anvaya eva syāditi . sa ca nāsti khapuṣpavat .
ghaṭādiviśeṣajātamapi . tatprādhānyād viśeṣasya bhāvānurodhāt sāmānyopasarjanaviśeṣapradhānapratijñāhāniḥ . evaṃ tāvad ghaṭo bhāva ityayuktam .
syānmatam--ghaṭasya bhāvo viśeṣasya sambandhinaḥ sambandhaṣaṣṭhyā . yathā ghaṭasya vinaṣṭasya kapālānyabhāvasya bhāvahetutvānniruddhasya, kapālāni hi ghaṭanirodhahetukāni utpadyante tadupakāritvāt . kimiva ?
yathāṅkurasya bījaṃ nivartamānamupakārīti . etacca nāpyasya bhāvaḥ . kasmāt ? tataścāsattvāviśeṣāt
khapuṣpavadevāviśeṣa iti pūrvoktavadāvirbhāvādibhedānupapattivirodhā ityanenātītaṃ granthamatidiśati yadetadasattvaṃ nāma tvayā kvacid manyate tato'nyat kāryam, tadasamarthavikalpatvāt, ghaṭapaṭavat .
vikalpāsāmarthyaṃ cāsatkāryayorityādi yāvat svavacanādivirodhopasaṃhāreṇa viśeṣavirodho'prayogaprasaṅgāt svarūpavirodha iti .
āha --nanu viśeṣa ityādi . sāmānyopasarjano viśeṣaḥ pratyakṣata evopalabhyate . tasmād dṛṣṭaviruddheyaṃ kalpaneti . atrocyate --dṛśyamānatve'pi pratyakṣavyabhicārapradarśanasādhanam . yathā dṛśyate tathā
tasyābhavanādasattvaṃ dṛṣṭam . yathā mṛgatṛṣṇiketyādi dṛṣṭāntaḥ . tadvyākhyā --mṛgatṛṣṇikā-gandharvanagarayorhītyādi, bhavanasya pṛthagbhāvena bhavanāt paramārthasattvāt salila-nagarayorasattvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yathā tathā
sāmānyopasarjanatāyāṃ viśeṣasya pratyakṣatve'pyasattvamiti .
athocyeta tvayā śītādirityādi . mṛgatṛṣṇikāsalile śīta-mṛdu-dravatādiviśeṣābhāvāt gandharvanagare dṛśyamānajīvājīvaviśeṣadharmābhāvāt syādasattvam . nā'vaśyaṃ viśeṣe ghaṭādau pṛthivīviśeṣāṇāmaśmasikatādibhedairbhāvyaṃ yato viśeṣāsattvaṃ kalpyeta . yadi syurviśeṣe viśeṣā aviśeṣa eva syāt,
sāmānyameva anvaya eva syād viśeṣo viśeṣavattvāt, saddravyapṛthivyādisāmānyavat .
atrācārya āha --api ca vayamapyetadeva brūmaḥ--anvaya eva aviśeṣaṃ sāmānyameva syāditi .


ākṛtiviśeṣanirvṛttau nirvṛttirghaṭādīnāṃ rūpādīnāṃ ca .
mṛgatṛṣṇikā tvākṛtajalaviśeṣāpi kiṃ śītādibhedā na bhavati ? bhāvābhāvādeva .
yathā cāsau tathā ghaṭādirviśeṣo'nvayabhāvābhāvānnāsti . yadi viśeṣa eva pradhānaṃ syāt
salilabhāvānanvitaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇikādivad ghaṭādyapyasat syāt, nirupākhyatvāt idaṃ tat
iti nopākhyāyeta . tato na kiñcit syāt pṛthivyādisāmānyenānupaṣṭabdhatvāt
khapuṣpavat .
tathā kasmādudakādinā na vyajyate pṛthivī vibhinnena ? atyantavailakṣaṇyādvā
kaścidevāvācyo'rthaḥ kasmānna syāt, anvayarahitatvāt ?
ata eva ca jīvakarmasambandhasantatyākhyānvayābhāvāt saṃsāramokṣādyanupa-
yadi tathābhavanena viśeṣeṇā''kṛtyākhyena vinā bhavedanvayo viśeṣa eva niḥsāmānyaḥ, sa ca nāsti khapuṣpavat . nāpi sāmānyameva nirviśeṣaṃ ghaṭādi, kiṃ tarhi ? ākṛtiviśeṣanirvṛttau nirvṛttirghaṭādīnāṃ
sāmānyabhavanasya viśeṣātmābhivyakteḥ, tathā rūpādīnāṃ rūpa-rasa-gandhādiviśeṣa ghaṭāvasthānāt ākriyamāṇaviśeṣasya tathā tathā vastuno bhavanāt .
tadvaidharmyaṃ mṛgatṛṣṇikāyāmityata āha --mṛgatṛṣṇikā tvākṛtajalaviśeṣāpi kiṃ śītādibhedā
na bhavati ? iti kāraṇanirṇayārthaṃ praśnaḥ . vyākaraṇaṃ cāsya bhāvābhāvādeva . yathā cāsāviti yathā
mṛgatṛṣṇikādirbhāvābhāvānnāsti tathā ghaṭādirviśeṣo'nvayabhāvābhāvānnāsti . parasya tu doṣaḥ --yadi
viśeṣa eva pradhānaṃ syāt salilabhāvetyādi salilabhavanenānanvitaṃ ghaṭādyapi mṛgatṛṣṇikākalpamasat
syāt nirupākhyatvāt, upākhyā hi bhavanaprāṇikā, kimityupākhyāyetetyata āha --idaṃ taditi
nopākhyāyeta pṛthivī iti dravyaṃ sad ghaṭaḥ iti vā . tataḥ kim ? na kiñcit syāt, kasmāt ?
pṛthivyādisāmānyenānupaṣṭabdhatvāt khapuṣpavat .
kiñcānyat tathā kasmādityādi . yadi viśeṣaḥ sāmānyanirapekṣaḥ syāt tato yathā ghaṭaḥ
paṭaḥ iti vā viśiṣṭayā vṛttyā pṛthivyādi vyajyate tathodakajvalanānilākāśādinā kasmānna vyajyate
pṛthivī vibhinnena atyantamanyasya pṛthivīdravyasya vailakṣaṇyādvā sarvasya dravyagaṇasya vyatirekeṇa niranvayo
nirupākhyaḥ kaścidevāvācyo'vedyarūpo'rthaḥ kasmānna syāt, anvayarahitatvāt ?
ata eva cetyādi . yasmādanvayarahitasya nirupākhyasyābhāvastasmād mithyādarśanādipratyayajīvakarmasambandhasantatyākhyānvayābhāvād narakādigativiśeṣasukhaduḥkhaphalākhyasaṃsāraviśeṣārthapravṛttayoḥ puṇyapāpakarmaṇoranupapattiḥ, tadanupapatteḥ saṃsārānupapattistatpratipakṣasamyagdarśanādipariṇāmaviśeṣānupapattiḥ, tata


pattiḥ, aniyatatathāpravṛtteḥ . satyāṃ ca tathāniyatapravṛttau pṛthivī ghaṭaḥ ityanvayaprādhānyamevaiṣitavyam, viśeṣastu pṛthivīmanuvartate . loke pradhānaṃ hyanuvṛtyate, na guṇaḥ .
sadāpi viśeṣānuvṛtteruktavad neti cet, etadvad viśeṣābhāvāt .
atastyaktvemau sāmānyaviśeṣaikāntapakṣau avacanīyaṃ vastu pratipattavyam . nāpyabhāvaṃ
na tadupasarjanaṃ na bhāva eva nāviśeṣaṃ na viśeṣopasarjanaṃ na viśeṣa eva nobhayopasarjanaṃ
nobhayapradhānaṃ vastu . avacanīyabhāvaviśeṣakāraṇakāryaikānekapradhānopasarjanaṃ vastu .
statprāpyamokṣānupapattirapi, tataḥ śāstrābhyāsādipuruṣakārānupapattiḥ, aniyatatathāpravṛtteḥ . atha mā
bhūvannete doṣā iti tathāniyatapravṛttiriṣyate tataḥ satyāṃ ca tathāniyatapravṛttau jīvakarmasambandhasaṃsāramokṣādikāyāṃ jīvo nārakaḥ saṃsārī muktaḥ ityādivat pṛthivī ghaṭaḥ ityanvayaprādhānyamevaiṣitavyam,
viśeṣastu ghaṭaḥ pṛthivīmanuvartate jīvatvaṃ nārakatvādiḥ . kasmāt ? yasmād loke pradhānaṃ hyanuvṛtyate na
guṇaḥ, guṇastvanuvartate na pradhānaṃ nīlotpalavaditi .
sadāpi viśeṣānuvṛtteruktavad neti cet, . syānmatam--nanūktam—
arthaśabdaviśeṣasya vācyavācakateṣyate .tasya pūrvamadṛṣṭatvāt sāmānyādupasarjanāt  ॥
ityādiprapañcena viśeṣa eva sāmānyenā'nuvṛtyate na viśeṣeṇa sāmānyamiti . etacca na, etadvad
viśeṣābhāvāt, sa eva hi viśeṣo naivāstīti pūrvanayeṣu bahudhā bhāvitam . tasmānna viśeṣaikāntapakṣaḥ
sāmānyaṃ śaknotyatyantaṃ nivartayituṃ nāpi sāmānyaikāntapakṣo viśeṣapakṣam .
atastyaktvemau sāmānya-viśeṣaikāntapakṣau vakṣyamāṇamanantaraṃ vastu pratipattavyam . avacanīyaṃ
bhavanaviśeṣābhyāṃ kāraṇakāryatvābhyāmekānekatvābhyāṃ pradhānopasarjanatvābhyām ityādibhirvikalpairvikalpyamānamavaktavyatattvaṃ vastu bhavati . nāpyabhāvaṃ niranvayam na tadupasarjanaṃ bhāvopasarjanaṃ
viśeṣapradhānaṃ vastu ityabhisaṃbadhyate, na bhāva eva nirākṛtaviśeṣaḥ, tathā nāviśeṣaṃ viśeṣaśūnyam,
na viśeṣopasarjanaṃ sāmānyapradhānamiti, na viśeṣa evā'tyantatiraskṛtasāmānyaḥ, nobhayopasarjanaṃ
vastu atyantanirākṛtasvātantryasāmānyaviśeṣam, nobhayapradhānamatyantasvatantratulyakakṣasāmānyaviśeṣam,
sarvavikalpeṣveṣvabhāvāpattidoṣadarśanāt . kīdṛk tarhi vastu bhavati ? ityata āha --avacanīyabhāvaviśeṣetyādiḥ samāsadaṇḍako gatārtha uktaparyāyavikalpayugalakaiḥ .


evaṃ hi bhavati bhavanamagnīndhanavat . yathā naikatvam agnerindhanena saha indhanasyāgninā vā saha . yadi syādekatvamagnerindhanena dagdhendhanavadagnirindhanarahitatvād na
pravarteta, anindhanasyāpravṛtteścābhāvataivāgneḥ syāt . na pravarteta, ekatvāt, dagdhendhanavat .
yathendhanamagnirahitamapyanupajātāgnikaṃ pravartate tathendhanarahito'pyagniḥ pravartsyati
sūkṣmāvastha iti cet, ko vā bravīti indhanamagnirahitam iti . tadapekṣa-

etasyārthasya bhāvanārthamudāharaṇam --evaṃ hi bhavati bhavanamagnīndhanavaditi . tatra tāvadagnīndhanayorekatvaṃ nānātvamubhayatvamanubhayatvamanyatarapradhānopasarjanatā vā syāt ? iti vikalpya sarvathāpyavaktavyataiva iti vakṣyamāṇo dṛṣṭāntārthaḥ, tadvikalpānupapatteḥ .
tatraikatvaṃ tāvanna ghaṭata iti brūmaḥ . katham ? yathā naikatvamityādi . taccaikatvamagnerindhane na
saha indhanasyāgninā vā saha syāt, sahayukte'pradhāne tṛtīyā, indhanamevāgnireva vā syāt . tanna
tāvadagnerindhanena sahaikatvaṃ ghaṭate, tenasahaikatvāt tatprādhānyād vakṣyate doṣo'sattvam . yadi syādekatvamagnerindhanena dagdhendhanavadagnirindhanarahitatvād na pravarteta, yathā dagdhendhano'gnirna pravartate tathāsyāpravṛttiḥ . anindhanasyā'pravṛtteścābhāvataivāgneḥ syāt asti-bhavati-vidyati-padyati-vartatayaḥ
sannipātaṣaṣṭhāḥ sattārthāḥ   iti vacanāt pravṛttisattārthatvādapravṛtterasattāparyāyatvāt . tadupasahṛtya sādhanamāha --na pravarteta, ekatvāt, dagdhendhanavat . yathā dagdhendhano'gnirindhanena sahaikatvādindhanāvyatirekeṇāpravartamānatvādekatvādapravṛtterasaṃstathāgniriti .
atrāha --yathendhanamityādi yāvat sūkṣmāvastha iti cet . yathendhanamagninā sahaikatve'pyanupajātāgnikaṃ pravartamānaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathāgnirapīndhanena sahaikatve pravartitumarhati sūkṣmāvasthaḥ kāryānumeyo'pratyakṣa
ityarthaḥ . tasmādanaikāntikatvādahetustadekatvamiti cenmanyase, atra brūmaḥ --ko vā bravītītyādi .
agnirahitāvasthāyāmindhanatvasyaivābhāvād vipakṣābhāve'naikāntikābhāsatā . tadvyācaṣṭe --tadapekṣatvādindhanatvasya dīpano'gnirindhana-dīpana-dahana-bhasmīkaraṇārthatvāt tatpariṇatāvevendhanam idhyate dahyate
dīpyate iti indhanamagnitvapariṇatāveva ekatvavādino viśeṣeṇa atatpariṇatāvagnitvendhanatvayora

tvādindhanatvasya indhanamagnitvapariṇatāveva . adahyamānamanindhanaṃ bhavati, kārakāṇāmeva
kārakatvāt . sūkṣmāvasthatvena ca viśeṣāvasthāprāptiḥ sā sāmānyaviśeṣakāryakāraṇaguṇapradhānānāmananyatve siddhe syāt .
atrocyetaathocyeta--agnerindhanena sahaikatvam . yadyapyagnerindhanena sahaikatvādapravṛtterasattvaṃ sambhāvyate tathāpi ādivadindhanāgnyekatvād na doṣaḥ, dṛṣṭatvāt, sahabhāvaśca dviṣṭha iti .
atha bhede pravṛttiḥ katham ? kasmānnendhanamagniḥ, dahanaikatvāt, antavat ? ante
bhāvāt ñi+indhī dīptau pā॰ dhā॰ 1449 iti smṛtervirodhitvāccānidhyamānasyānindhanatvam . ata
āha --aadahyamānamanindhanaṃ bhavatyanidhyamānam . kiṃ kāraṇam ? kārakāṇāmeva kārakatvāt,
kartṛ-karmādiśaktyāveśāvasthāyāmeva kartṛkarmādikārakatvaṃ kārakāṇāmasaṅkīrṇātmalābhaṃ syāt, nānyathā,
sarvamṛdghaṭāditvaprasaṅgāt .
yadapyuktam --sūkṣmāvasthāgnirindhanarahita iti, tadapi nopapadyata ityetatpradarśanārthamāha --sūkṣmāvasthatvena cetyādi . indhanāvyatirekeṇa dīptisāmānyāvasthasyāgneḥ sūkṣmātīndriyendhananīlālīnāgnikā dīptiviśeṣāvasthāprāptiryā tvayocyate evaṃ guṇyavasthasya guṇāvasthāprāptiḥ kāryāvasthasya
kāraṇāvasthāprāptiśca sā sāmānya-viśeṣa-kārya-kāraṇa-guṇa-pradhānānāmananyatve siddhe syāt tathā vaktuṃ
yujyeta, tadapi tu cintyamevaiteṣāmananyatvaṃ sāmānya-viśeṣādyavasthayorbhedāsiddheḥ . siddhaśced bhedaḥ kathamagnīndhanayorekatvamucyate ?
athocyetetyādi . syānmataṃ tava--nāhaṃ bravīmi agnerindhanena sahaikatvam, kintu indhanasyāgninā
sahaikatvam . tadvyākhyā --yadyapyagnerityādi, satyaṃ yathā agnerindhanena sahaikatvena kṛtādekatvādapravṛttirdagdhendhanavat, anindhanasya apravṛtteścāsattvaṃ sambhāvyate doṣaḥ tathaikatve'sattvadoṣasambhāvanāyāṃ satyāmapi
adoṣatve'sti nyāyaḥ . tadyathā --ādivadindhanāgnyekatvāt, indhanasyāgninā sahaikatvānna bhaviṣyati
doṣaḥ . kasmāt ? dṛṣṭatvāt, dṛṣṭā hīndhane'nupajātāgnike prāgavyaktasyāgneḥ paścād vyaktiruttarādharayoraraṇyornirmathanena . kiñca, yasmāt sahabhāvaśca dviṣṭha iti, itiśabdasya hetvarthatvād yathā
agninā sahendhanaṃ bhavatyevamagnirapīndhanena saha bhavatītyataḥ prāgagnyutpatteḥ sata evāgnervyaktivadagnāvapīndhanasya sattvameva, anyathā sahabhāvānupapatteriti .
atra brūmaḥ--etadeva tvaṃ pṛcchyase --atha bhede pravṛttiḥ katham ? agnīndhanayorekatve ko viśeṣa


vendhanatvāpattiragneḥ, indhanaikatvāt, prāgvat .
vikalpāccaikatvavyāghātaḥ . ekatve kuto'yaṃ viśeṣaḥ--idaṃ na sahedaṃ saheti . mathanakriyādhārakaraṇādyanupapatteśca .
athāpi kathañcidekatvaṃ tathāpi ekam ekameva iti na vaktavyam, ekatvāt, ekadevadattahastādyanekatvavat . hasto'pyeka eveti na vaktavyaḥ, aṅgulyādyanekatvāt . aṅgulirapi parvādibahutvāt . parvāpi skandhabahutvāt . skandho'pi paramāṇubahutvāt . yāvadaṇo
rūpādyanekatvāt . rūpādeḥ pratikṣaṇamanyatvāt . pratikṣaṇaikasyāpi atyantānekatvāt .
heturyena sahabhāvasya dviṣṭhatvāt ityucyate tvayā ? atrāniṣṭāpādanasādhanamapi tadyathā --kasmānnendhanamityādi . itaretaraikarūpāpattyabhyupagamād vyaktendhanāgnitvābhyāmaraṇyavasthāyāmiva jvālāvasthāyāmiva
ca indhanamagniragnirapīndhanameva syāt . tatra tāvadindhanamagnireva syāt, dahanaikatvāt, antavat
antakālavat kevalāgnikālavat jvālāṅgārādyavasthāvadityarthaḥ . ante veti tadviparyayeṇa indhanatvāpattiragnerjvālādyavasthasya indhanaikatvāt prāgvat araṇyavasthāvat, aniṣṭaṃ caitat te .
kiñcānyat --vikalpāccaikatvavyāghātaḥ . indhanena sahāgnirekaḥ, agninā sahendhanam iti
vikalpābhyupagamādekatvapratijñāhāniḥ, bhede hi satyetau vikalpau yujyete, tadekatve vikalpānupapatteḥ .
atastaddarśayannāha --ekatve kuto'yaṃ viśeṣaḥ--idaṃ na sahedaṃ saheti vikalpānupapattipradarśanaṃ gatārthaṃ
puruṣādyekakāraṇamātrādvaitavādināmiveti . kiñcānyat, ekatve mathanakriyādhārakaraṇādyanupapatteśca
ekatvavyāghātaḥ iti vartate, 'adharāraṇirādhāro mathanakriyāyām, karaṇamuttarāraṇiḥ, ataḥ karma
ityevamādikārakavyāpārādibhedaḥ sarvo lokaprasiddho nopapadyate, agnīndhanayorekatvāt, ākāśamathanādyabhāvavat . dṛṣṭaścaiṣa kārakavyāpārabhedavyavahāraḥ, tasmādayuktamekatvam .
athāpi kathañcidityādi . tvanmatānuvṛttyābhyupagamyāpi agnīndhanaikatvaṃ kathañcit kenacinnyāyāntareṇa, dravyārthikadiśetyabhiprāyaḥ . tathāpi yadekamityabhimataṃ tadekamiti na vaktavyaṃ syāt,
ekameva iti na vaktavyamityarthaḥ . kasmāt ? ekatvāt, yatraikatvaṃ tatra ekameva ityavaktavyaṃ dṛṣṭam,
ekadevadattahastādyanekatvavat, yathaika ityabhimato'pi devadatto hastapādādyavayavabahutvāt eka eva
iti na vaktavya evamagnīndhanayoriti dārṣṭāntiko vakṣyate . hasto'pyeka eveti na vaktavyaḥ,
aṅgulyādyanekatvāt, aṅguli-prakoṣṭha-bahirantastalādibahutvāt . aṅgulirapi parvādibahutvāt,

atha mā bhūvannamī doṣā ityagnīndhanayoranyatvamabhyupagamyate tena tarhīdamāpatitam—
tasyendhanāt pṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpamākhyeyaṃ yathānyeṣāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ paṭādibhyaḥ pṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpamākhyāyate .
rūpākhyānamaśakyaṃ kartum, na hyanyadanyasādhāraṇam, agnerindhanaṃ pṛthag nirdeṣṭuṃ na śakyate
sāmānyaviśeṣaikānyatvānavasthitatattvaghaṭapaṭasaṃvṛtivat, anirūpyamāṇastvasannāpadyetāgniḥ,
parvāpi tvagādiparvāvayavaskandhabahutvāt, skandho'pi paramāṇubahutvāt ekameva iti na vaktavyam
iti vartate, yāvadaṇoriti, mūrtadravyameva paryantāvadhitvāt kimaṇureka iti vaktavyaḥ ? netyucyate, aṇo
rūpādyanekatvāt, rūpa-rasa-gandha-sparśabahutvād rūpādyātmakatvāt . rūpaṃ raso gandhaḥ sparśo vā ekaḥ
iti vaktavyaḥ ? netyucyate, rūpādeḥ pratikṣaṇamanyatvāt, rūpamapi kṣaṇe kṣaṇe'nyadanyadutpadyate vinaśyati
cetyanyatvādanekamekatvād rūpamiti na vaktavyam . evaṃ raso gandhaḥ sparśaśca vācya iti . syānmatam—
deśabhinneṣu aṅguli-parva-tvagrūpādīnāmanekatvāt ekam ityavaktavyaṃ syāt, kālabhinnastu kṣaṇika eka
eva rūpādyanyatamo'sādhāraṇo'rthaḥ kimiti ekaḥ iti nocyate iti . atrocyate --pratikṣaṇaikasyāpi
atyantānekatvāt, kṣaṇe kṣaṇe hyekaḥ pratikṣaṇaikaḥ, kṣaṇaṃ kṣaṇaṃ prati vartata iti vīpsārthakarmapravacanīyatvāt prateḥ, so'pyanekaḥ parasparāsaṅkīrṇarūpaḥ kenacit kadācidasambadhyamānatvādasamāno'sādhāraṇaḥ,
asamānaścānekaḥ, samānatve hyekatvaṃ syāt . tasmādasambandhādasamānatvādanekatve'pyavaktavya eva, sambaddho
hyarthaḥ sāmānyenocyeta ayaṃ saḥ iti itthamayam iti vā . tattu nāsti sāmānyamityavaktavyaḥ . evaṃ
tāvadekatve'gnīndhanayoravācyatvamuktam .
atha mā bhūvannityādi . etatpakṣatyāgena pakṣāntaraparigrahe kāraṇamācakṣāṇaḥ pakṣāntaraṃ grāhayati —
agnīndhanayoranyatvapakṣo nirdoṣa iti manyamānenābhyupagamyate cet tvayā so'pi nirdoṣa iti mā maṃsthāḥ,
tena tarhītyādi, tena agnīndhanayoranyatvābhyupagamena kāraṇena idamāpatitam--tasyāgnerindhanāt
pṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpamākhyeyaṃ ghaṭāderivākāśasya sauṣiryam . nirdiṣṭe hi pṛthagbhūte rūpe'nyatvaṃ sidhyecchakyaṃ ca
pratipattum--ayamasmādanya iti . kimiva ? yathānyeṣāmityādi, anyeṣāṃ ghaṭādīnāmagnīndhanādīnāmanyebhyaḥ paṭādibhyaścānyeṣām . tattu tvayā na śakyate'gnerindhanāt pṛthagbhūtaṃ tattvaṃ darśayitum .
yasmād na hi anyadanyasādhāraṇam, hiśabdo yasmādarthe, yasmād ghaṭādi paṭādyanyasādhāraṇarūpaṃ na
bhavati tantvādīnāṃ tasmācchakyate tataḥ pṛthagbhūtena tattvena nirdeṣṭum, na tathendhanāt pṛthagbhūtamasādhāraṇamagnestattvaṃ ghaṭasyeva jalāharaṇādi paṭādivilakṣaṇaṃ śakyaṃ vaktum .
syānmatam--kathaṃ tvayādhunā ghaṭāt paṭo'nyaḥ iti viśeṣeṇa nānātvena pṛthivī ghaṭaḥ iti ca
sāmānyakṛtaikyena nirdiṣṭaṃ rūpam ? tathāgnīndhanayorapi śakyata eva vakṣyamāṇaṃ dāhyadāhakratvādīti .

anindhanatve'rūpatvāt, khapuṣpavat .
athocyeta--yadetajjvālā deśe . tadvā kuto'nindhanam ? yadi syādanindhano'gniḥ
satatameva niravaśeṣadagdhendhano'pi bhavet, agnitvāt, jvālāvat .
athocyeta--yadyapyagnerindhanena sahānyatvaṃ nāsti tathāpi indhanasya agninā sahānyatvamasti dṛṣṭatvāt . dṛṣṭaṃ hīndhanamagnivinābhūtamapi yathendhanamāharati kāṣṭhamāharatīti .
tadviṣaya evaiṣa upacāraḥ . tadanyatve sa naiva syāt . ata eva tu indhanatvaṃ sidhyatyu-
atrocyate--na mama kiñcidavaktavyavādinaḥ sāmānya-viśeṣādyekatva-nānātvābhyāṃ vyavasthitamasti vastu
kiñcit, kiṃ tarhi ? tvanmatānuvṛttyā pratipādanārthaṃ saṃvṛtyā sāmānya-viśeṣaikatvānyatvābhyāṃ pṛthivīghaṭapaṭavat ityudāhiyate, na manmatena, manmatena tu tāvanavasthitatattvāveveti tat pradarśayannudāharati--
sāmānyaviśeṣetyādi, sāmānya-viśeṣayorekatvānyatvābhyāmanavasthitaṃ tattvaṃ yayostāvimau ghaṭapaṭau
sāmānyaviśeṣaikānyatvānavasthitatattvaghaṭapaṭau, tayoḥ saṃvṛtiḥ upacāraḥ, abhyupagatya parakalpanena
udāharaṇam, tayā tulyaṃ saṃvṛtivat, yathā saṃvṛtyā ghaṭapaṭāviṣṭāvapi asādhāraṇarūpau nirdiśyete na
tathāgnīndhane ityarthaḥ . tasmādanirūpyo'nirūpyamāṇastvasannāpadyeta agniḥ, kasmāt ? anindhanatve
sati arūpatvāt khapuṣpavat, upādānasvarūpāt pṛthaganirūpitātmarūpatvādityarthaḥ . ghaṭa-paṭādiṣvapyetat
sādhanam--amṛttve sati arūpatvād ghaṭo'san khapuṣpavat, atantutve sati arūpatvāt paṭo'san khapuṣpavadityādi yojyam .
athocyeta--yadetajjvālā deśe . athācakṣothāstvam--indhanāt pṛthagagnerasti rūpam, tadyathā—
jvālā gaganadeśe . tasmād mayā''khyātaṃ te pṛthagindhanādagnirūpam . tasmādarūpatvāsiddhernāsattvamiti .
atra brūmaḥ --tadvā kuto'nindhanam ? yattajjvālārūpamagnergaganadeśe tadapīndhanasahitameva, agnitvapariṇatendhanapudgalānāmākāśadeśe'vasthānājjvālādhṛteḥ . na jvālā anindhanā, agnitvāt, aṅgārādyagnivat . vaidyutasyāpi udakendhanatvānnānaikāntikatvam . ato'gnirindhanāt pṛthagbhūto nāsti . yāvaccendhanaṃ tāvadevāgniḥ, niṣṭhitendhano vidhyāta ityucyate . tasmānnendhanāt pṛthagagnirvaktuṃ śakyaḥ . evamanicchato doṣa ucyate--yadi syādanindhano'gniḥ satatameva niravaśeṣadagdhendhano'pi murmurādyavastho-
ttarakālamapi bhavet, agnitvāt, jvālāvat . aniṣṭaṃ caitat . evaṃ tāvat pūrvoktaikatvavadindhanena
sahāgneranyatvaṃ na vaktavyam .
athocyetetyādi vikalpāntaraṃ pūrvavat . indhanasyānyatvaṃ hutavahāt, dṛṣṭatvāt, loke hi dṛṣṭam—
indhanamāharati kāṣṭhamāharatīti, na hi dṛṣṭād gariṣṭhaṃ pramāṇamasti . granthaśca yadyapyagnerityādi
yāvadāharatīti gatārthaḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ . atrottaram --tadviṣaya evaiṣa upacāraḥ, agnitvapariṇatikāla

pacārataḥ, gauṇasya mukhyamūlatvāt . ñi+indhī dīptau pā॰ dhā॰ 1449 iti dīptisvabhāvo'gnirevendhanam . pūrvoktācca tadvṛttitvāt svātmavad nānyatvam .
kāṣṭhaśabdavyavahāre'pi agnikāṣṭhayoranyatvavyāghātaḥ . yadāyaṃ tadā tato'nyo
nāsti . nanu yadaiva kāṣṭhamanagnikaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadaivānyatvam . athābhedavṛttiranyatve na prāpnoti .
siddhayathārthendhanatvaṃ mukhyamapekṣya tadviṣayamagnyapariṇate'pi dāruṇi indhanatvamupacārād bhavati . tadanyatve
agnīndhanānyatve sa upacāro naiva syāt, mukhyendhanābhāvāt, kharaviṣāṇatīkṣṇakuṇṭhādisādharmyābhāve
tadupacārābhāvāt .
ata eva tvityādi . agnipariṇatadārumukhyendhanatvādeva tadapariṇatāvapi indhanatvaṃ sidhyatyupacārataḥ, kasmāt ? gauṇasya mukhyamūlatvāt, siddhe hi mukhye siṃhe śaurya-krauryāditatsādharmyād māṇavakaḥ
siṃha ucyate nāsati mukhye siṃhe . citrakarādivadvā, citrālekhanādikriyāpariṇatyavasthālabdhacitrakaratvavyapadeśo nāsati tatkriyāpariṇāme . tasyāgnitvapariṇatāvevendhanatvasaṃvādinīṃ smṛtiṃ jñāpikāmāha --ñi+indhī dīptau pā॰ dhā॰ 1449 iti, nanu smarantyabhiyuktāḥ vaiyākaraṇāḥ śabdārthasambandhajñā dīpana
ityagnim, dīptisvabhāvo'gnirevendhanaṃ dīptyarthatvādindheḥ .
kiñcānyat, pūrvoktācca tadvṛttitvāt svātmavad nānyatvam . yathā prāgekatve yadyagnirindhanena sahaikaḥ syāt tato dagdhendhanavadekasyāpravṛtterabhāvataiva syādityādi granthoktena nyāyenaikatvaṃ niṣiddhaṃ yāvat sahāsahatvadviṣṭhatvāditi, tathā anyatve dagdhendhanavadanyasyāpravṛtterabhāvataiva
syādityādistulyārthagamaviśeṣeṇa grantho yojyaḥ, anyatve'pyabhāvāpattisāmyāt . svātmavad nānyatvamiti, agnisvātmā'gneryathānyo na bhavati tathā tadindhanamapi, tadvṛttitvāt, tasya vṛttistadvṛttiḥ, saiva
vā vṛttistadvṛttiḥ, tadvṛttireva vṛttirasya tadvṛttiragniḥ, dīptirevendhanatvavṛttiḥ, dīptirūpavṛttitvādagnirevendhanamagnyātmavat . adahyamānaṃ hīndhanameva na bhavati kārakāṇāmeva kārakatvādityādi
vyākhyātatvāt . evaṃ tāvadindhanodāharaṇe'gnyanyatvavyāghāta uktaḥ .
kāṣṭhodāharaṇe'pi tadyathā --kāṣṭhaśabdetyādi . kāṣṭhaśabdavyavahāre'pi agnikāṣṭhayoranyatvaṃ
vyāhanyate, tadyathā --yadāyamityādi, kāṣṭhendhano'gnistato'nyo nāsti svendhanāt . vaidyuto'pyudakendhanapṛthagbhūto nāsti . atrāśaṅkā --nanu yadaiva kāṣṭhamanagnikaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tadā tenāgnināvinā dṛṣṭatvādanyatvasiddhiriti . atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ --athābhedavṛttiḥ dṛṣṭā hīyamabhedavṛttiḥ dīpyamānaṃ kāṣṭhamindhanam

kasmānnāgniḥ kāṣṭhaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ vāgniḥ prāgvat paścādvadvā tadanyatvāt ? yadi kāṣṭhaṃ kathamanagni ? kāśṛdīptau pā॰ dhā॰ 647, 1162 ityaśeṣavirodhāḥ .
dāruṇyapi śodhanāvakhaṇḍanārthayostāvat siddhameva . dāna-rakṣaṇārthayorasambhavāt tadarthadāru tvanudāharaṇam, anindhanatvādākāśavat .
sahāsahabhavanaṃ dviṣṭhatvāt siddhe hyanyatve syāt . tattu na siddham .
iti, sā cābhedavṛttiranyatve na prāpnoti, adīpyamānākāśendhanatvāprāptivat . kasmādityādi
paraspararūpāpādanenāniṣṭāpādanaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaṃ prāgvat paścādvadvā tadanyatvāditi gatārthaṃ sādhanadvayam .
kiñcānyat --yadi kāṣṭhaṃ kathamanagniḥ ? kāśanāt kāṣṭhamagnitvameva kāśanād dīpanādaṅganāt, nānyathā . tasmāt kāṣṭhamanagni tat iti svavacanavirodhaḥ . tathā indhanamanagni ityapi
svavacanavirodhaḥ, yasmāt kāṣṭhaṃ niyamādagniḥ agnirapi niyamāt kāṣṭhamevamindhanamagniśca, tataḥ
svavacanavirodhaḥ . tadbhāvanārthaṃ tadarthasaṃvādinīṃ smṛtiṃ jñāpikāmāha --kāśṛ dīptau pā॰ dhā॰ 647, 1162
kāśaterauṇādike kartṛvācini kthanpratyaye kāṣṭham iti rūpasiddherityasmāddhetoraśeṣavirodhāḥ . tathā
dṛṣṭatvāt pratyakṣavirodhaḥ . loke rūḍhatvād rūḍhivirodhaḥ . evamanumitatvādanumānavirodhaḥ . tathābhyupagamādabhyupagamavirodha iti .
kiṃ dāruṇyapi śakyamitthaṃ bhāvayitum ? dāñ dāne pā॰ dhā॰ 1091 deñṅ rakṣaṇe
pā॰ dhā॰ 962 do avakhaṇḍane pā॰ dhā॰ 1148 daip śodhane pā॰ dhā॰ 924 ityeteṣāṃ caturṇāmanyatamasya rupratyayāntasya dāru iti rūpasiddheḥ . ko hi nāma śakyaṃ na śaknuyād vaktum . śodhanāvakhaṇḍanārthayostāvat siddhameva, daha bhasmīkaraṇe pā॰ dhā॰ 991 ekārthatvāt tathāpi dānarakṣaṇārthayorasambhavāt tadarthadāru tvanudāharaṇam, tannodāharaṇatvena vivakṣyate . kasmāt ? anindhanatvādākāśavat, dīptyarthāsambhavād dāruśabdasyāvivakṣitatvādadoṣo'tra gaganāvivakṣāvat .
kiñcānyat, sahāsahetyādi . sahabhavanamasahabhavanamityetad dvayamapi dviṣṭham, ato yadyekaṃ
kāṣṭhamagnināgnirvā kāṣṭhena atha nānā sarvathāpyanayoranyonyāvinābhāvinorbhavati etat, tattu dvayamekamanyaditi vā na śakyate vaktum, tasmānna tadanyat .


athāpi kathañcidanyatvam, anyat anyadeva iti na vaktavyam, anyatvāt hastādyanyānanyadevadattavat, yāvad rūpādikṣaṇāntarānyānanyaparamāṇuvat .
abhāvastarhi te, agnyanagnitvavyāvṛtteḥ, khapuṣpavat . nanu bhinnavyavasthānalakṣaṇatvādanubhayatvamapi na vacanīyam . yadi dāhyadāhakatvalakṣaṇaniyamo na syāt tato'gnirapi

athāpi kathañcidityādi . pūrvavadabhyupetya tvanmatyā anyat anyadeva iti na vaktavyam,
anyatvāt, hastādyanyānanyadevadattavat, hastā-'ṅguli-parva-tvak-skandha-paramāṇu-rūpa-rasa-kṣaṇikatvādyanyatve'pi devadatta evaikastathā tathā gṛhyate cakṣurādivyapadeśaviśiṣṭarūpādyātmakaghaṭavat sambandhyantarāpekṣaviśiṣṭapitṛtvādivyapadeśātmakadevadattavacca sa evaikaḥ, anyathā tadekatvābhāve tadbhedābhāvād
bhedāsta eva anye iti vaktumaśakyāḥ, devadattātmakatvād ghaṭādyātmakatvācca, tatpratipādanopāyapradarśano granthaḥ --yāvad rūpādikṣaṇāntarānyānanyaparamāṇuvaditi bhāvanodāharaṇaṃ bhāvitārthamevamanyatrāpi ghaṭādau bhāvayitavyamiti .
atrāha --abhāvastarhītyādi . te agnīndhane na stastarhi, kasmāt ? agnyanagnitvavyāvṛtteḥ,
vyāvṛttāgnyanagnitvādityataḥ ekatve'gnirevendhanam anyatve'nagniḥ . tathā indhanānindhanatvavyāvṛtteḥ
ityapi bhavati hetuḥ tatparyāyārthatvāt, khapuṣpavat, yathā khapuṣpaṃ nā'gnirnānagniḥ tadekatvānekatvavyāvṛtterasacca tathā agnīndhane na syātām, ubhayamapi netyarthaḥ .
atra vayaṃ brūmaḥ --nanu bhinnetyādi . etadapyanubhayatvaṃ na vacanīyam, kasmāt ? bhinnavyavasthānalakṣaṇatvāt . bhinnaṃ viviktamasaṅkīrṇaṃ vyavasthānaṃ kāṣṭhamevedaṃ dāhyaśaktyādilakṣaṇam,
agnirevāyamauṣṇyadāhakādilakṣaṇaḥ iti, tadeva vyavasthānaṃ cihnaṃ lakṣaṇamasya ubhayasya, tadbhāvād
bhinnavyavasthānalakṣaṇatvāt saṃvṛtisadghaṭa-paṭavad nānubhayatvam . tasmāllakṣaṇasadbhāvād nāsti ityapyavacanīyameva .
syānmatam--dāhyadahanādilakṣaṇatvāsiddhiḥ, tallakṣyadharmyasiddheriti . etacca na, yasmāt siddhaṃ sattvaṃ
dharma-dharmiṇoriti tatprasādhanārthamāha --yadi dāhyadāhakatvetyādi . yadi dāru dāhyameva, dāhako'gnireva iti lakṣaṇaniyamo na syāt tayorvyavasthitastato'gnirapi dahyeta kāṣṭhavat, pacyeta
odanavat pācakatvalakṣaṇāvyavasthānāt pākyatvāt, tato bhujyeta ca odanavadeva pṛthak, aniṣṭaṃ
caitat . tasmād vyavasthitaṃ pācakadāhakatvādilakṣaṇamagneḥ . tathendhanamapi dāhyapākyādivyavasthitabhinnalakṣaṇaṃ yadi na syāt pṛthageva dahed vināpi agninā kāṣṭhatṛṇādi saṃhatam paceccodanādika

dahyeta kāṣṭhavat, pacyeta odanavat, bhujyeta ca pṛthak, tathendhanamapi pṛthageva dahet, paceccodanādikamagnivadityanubhayatāpyavaktavyaiva . bhinnavyavasthānavṛttamubhayamasti .
bhinnavyavasthānavṛttobhayatvānabhyupagame tu sarvātmakaikabhāva evātyantābhāva eva vobhayatvaṃ syāt .
anubhayapratiṣedhādubhayatvamiti cet, na, anyatvāvaktavyatvāt .
anyatvapratiṣedha ekatvamiti cet, na, tasyāpyavaktavyatvāt .
ekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvapratiṣedhena ca pradhānopasarjanabhāvo'pi pratiṣiddha eva .
tasmāt sarvathāpyavaktavyataiva .
magnivadagnitvādityato dahanamantareṇaiva pākaḥ syāt, na tu bhavati . tadupasaṃharati --ityanubhayatāpyavaktavyaiveti . anubhayaṃ cennāsti ubhayamasti tarhi, taccobhayaṃ bhinnavyavasthānavṛttam .
athaivaṃ nābhyupagamyate tato bhinnavyavasthānavṛttobhayatvānabhyupagame tu prāptaṃ kīdṛgubhayam ? tadyathā --sarvātmakaiketyādi ekaṃ sarvātmakaṃ nityaṃ sarvagatamanutpādavyayaṃ kāla-niyati-svabhāvapradhāna-puruṣādīnāmanyatamad bhāvatattvamasadalīkanirupākhyamavastu atyantāsat khapuṣpādi vetyetadubhayaṃ
syāt, ekatvānyatvānubhayatvābhāve gatyantarābhāvāt . tacca na bhavati, niṣṭhitatvādeṣāṃ pakṣāṇām .
anubhayapratiṣedhādubhayatvamiti cet . syānmatam--anubhayamubhayābhāvo'sattvam asattvasya pratiṣiddhatvādubhayaṃ tatpratipakṣaḥ satī eva dve vastunī bhavitumarhata iti . tadapi na, anyatvāvaktavyatvāt,
etadubhayatvamanyatvameva parasparabhinnalakṣaṇe agnīndhane anyonyasmādanye iti, taccānyatvaṃ vicāritam—
asadeva iti . tasmādasyāpyavaktavyatvamasattvāt . avaktavyatvānnānubhayatvapratiṣedhādubhayatvam .
anyatvapratiṣedha ekatvamiti cet . syānmatam--anyatvapratiṣedhe tarhi ekatvameva sidhyatīti .
etacca na, tasyāpyavaktavyatvāt, ekatvasyāpyasattvasya utpatataiva mayoktatvādavaktavyataiva . itthamekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvāni pratiṣiddhāni .
syādāśaṅkā--sāmānyaviśeṣayoragnīndhanayoścaikatvādyabhāve'pi anyatarapradhānopasarjanatayā pravṛtterastu vaktavyataiveti . etaccāyuktam, ekatvādyayuktivat tadayukteriti tadatidiśannāha --ekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvapratiṣedhena ca pradhānopasarjanabhāvo'pi pratiṣiddha eveti . yasmādetayoḥ
sāmānyaviśeṣayorapravṛtteragnīndhanayoścāsattvamevaikatvānyatvapakṣayoriti pratipāditaṃ tasmādanayorasatoḥ
kā pradhānopasarjanatā khapuṣpavandhyāsutayoriva ? sā hi satoreva svāmi-bhṛtyayordṛṣṭeti . kiñca,
anyatvapakṣa evaiṣā pradhānopasarjanatā yujyate, sa ca niṣiddhaḥ . agnīndhanayośca pravṛtteretāvatāṃ gatiḥ

evaṃ yadyekatvaṃ viśeṣasya bhāvena nānyatā, tato'nātmano bhāvasya kharaviṣāṇavadapravṛtterabhāvataiva syāt . na pravṛttiḥ, anātmatvāt, kharaviṣāṇavat .
nanu yathā viśeṣa eko'pi rūparasādirghaṭapaṭādirvā bhāvarahitaḥ pravartate tathā
sūkṣmāvastha ekako bhāvaḥ pravartsyatīti cet, ko vā bravīti viśeṣo bhāvarahita iti ?
viśiṣyate viśeṣa iti sata eva viśeṣatvāt tadapekṣatvācca viśiṣyate sa tasmāt tena vā sa
ityādinā . aviśiṣyamāṇo'viśiṃṣan vā na viśeṣo bhavati, kārakāṇāmeva kārakatvāt .
ko vā''śvāso viśeṣa ekaika eva pravartate iti saṃvṛtisadghaṭapaṭavat ?
syād yaduta ekatvaṃ nānātvamubhayatvamanubhayatvamagnyupasarjanamindhanapradhānatvamindhanopasarjanamagnipradhānatvamiti, sarvathāpi na ghaṭate, tasmāt sarvathāpyavaktavyataiveti dṛṣṭāntavarṇanamidaṃ kṛtam .
evamityādi prastutasāmānyaviśeṣādidārṣṭāntikavarṇanārtha uttaro granthaḥ . sāmānyaviśeṣayostāvat tadyathā--yadyekatvaṃ viśeṣasya ghaṭāderbhāvena anvayena pṛthivyādinā, kimuktaṃ bhavati ?
sāmānyameva nirviśeṣaṃ bhavatyekamityatastatpradarśanārthamāha --nānyateti . tataḥ kim ? tato'nātmano
bhāvasya aśmasikatāmṛlloṣṭavajrādighaṭādiviśeṣātmakalābharahitasyānātmatvaṃ pṛthivyādeḥ sāmānyasya,
anātmatvācca kharaviṣāṇavadapravṛttiḥ, apravṛtterabhāvataiva syāt kharaviṣāṇavadeva . tat sādhanena
darśayati --na pravṛttiriti gatārtham .
nanu yathendhanetyādi sa eva nanu yathā viśeṣa eko'pi ityādiḥ pūrvapakṣaḥ . kintu rūpādiyugapadbhāviparyāyaṃ viśeṣavādinaṃ prati siddhamudāhṛtya bhāvavādī tvanmate tatpravṛttivad manmate sūkṣmāvastha ekako bhāvaḥ pravartsyati iti brūyāt . atrāvaktavyavādī svamatenottaraṃ brūte --ko vā bravītītyādi niḥsāmānyaviśeṣapravṛttyabhāvāpādanena dṛṣṭāntāsiddhiṃ varṇayati . sata eva viśeṣatvāt, sanneva
viśeṣībhavati sāmānyameva nāsat khapuṣpādītyarthaḥ . tadapekṣatvācceti, rūpaṃ rasād viśiṣyamāṇaṃ
sambandhirasamapekṣya viśeṣo bhavati, tathā raso'pi rūpam, ghaṭa-paṭau cā'nyonyam, nātyantāsat khapuṣpamamapekṣyeti . taddarśayati kārakavyākhyayā viśiṣyate sa tasmāt tena vā sa ityādinā . kārakatraye
darśite sambhavīnyanyānyapi kārakāṇyūhyānītyādigrahaṇam . aviśiṣyamāṇe ṇa ityādi, yadi

sūkṣmāvasthāprāptirapi avayavāvayavisāmānyaviśeṣakāryakāraṇānāṃ bhede siddhe syāt .
tathā ca tadanupapattiḥ, abhāvatvāpattyabhyupagamāt . prāgabhāva-pradhvaṃsābhāvātmakatvādavasthayoḥ sūkṣmasthūlayoḥ .
athābhāvatvameva bhāvasya tataśca cakṣurādilakṣaṇarūpādīnāmākāśādīnāṃ cotpattirasatī .
bhāvena rahito viśeṣastato viśeṣaḥ iti nirdeśameva nārhet, viśiṃṣannanyamanyena ca viśiṣyamāṇo
viśeṣo bhavati vyāpārāveśādeva kārakāṇāṃ kartrādīnāṃ kārakatvāt, viśeṣaṇakriyāveśābhāve hyaviśeṣa
eva syāditi . tasmāt sthitamidam--sāmānyameva viśeṣaḥ sāmānyāpekṣa eva veti . tathā ca kutaḥ
pṛthak pravṛttirviśeṣasya sāmānyāvinābhāvāt ? ko vā''śvāsaḥ ? na manoratho'pi karaṇīyaḥ --rūpaṃ raso
vā ghaṭapaṭādirvā viśeṣa ekaika eva pravartata iti, tvanmanorathānuvṛttyā saṃvṛtisattvenā'bhyupagatayorghaṭapaṭayorivānyatvapratipatternimittabhūtamiti svapne'pyevaṃ mā maṃsthā ityabhiprāyaḥ .
sūkṣmāvasthetyādi . yāpi prāptidik kācit tvayonnīyate kenacinnayāntareṇa sūkṣmāvastho
bhāvo viśeṣarahitastiṣṭhati iti sāpyavayavānāmavayavino viśeṣāṇāṃ sāmānyāt kāraṇāt kāryāṇāṃ
bhede siddhe syāditi sambhāvyeta, nānyathā . pradhānāvasthā hi sūkṣmā sattvarajastamasāṃ samatā, sā mahadādiviṣayasthūlāvasthāpekṣaiva, ta eva hi guṇāḥ sūkṣmāḥ sthūlāśca, te cāvasthe parasparāpekṣe, sarpasphaṭāṭopakuṭilagatisthitikuṇḍalakībhavanādivat sarpamantareṇa na te viśeṣā bhāvaṃ na tānantareṇa sa iti, evaṃ
ca sūkṣmāvasthoktyaiva tvayābhyupagataṃ bhavati, sa ca sūkṣmatāṃ yān bhāvo bāla-yuva-madhyama-sthavirādyavasthāviśeṣa eva bhavati tadvyatirekeṇānavasthānāt . tathā ca tadanupapattiḥ, evaṃ ca sati bhāvasyānvayākhyasya bhāvatvānupapattiḥ, abhāvatvāpattyabhyupagamāt . kasmāt ? prāgabhāva-pradhvaṃsābhāvātmakatvādavasthayoḥ sūkṣma-sthūlayoḥ, yathā ghaṭaḥ prāgabhūtvā bhavati bhūtvā ca na bhavatītyabhāvātmakatvādasanneva prāk paścācca . evamasūkṣmaḥ sūkṣmo bhavati punaśca na bhavati, tathā sthūlo'pītyabhāvavāditvamāpannaṃ bhāvavādinaste'bhyupagamahāniśca .
atha mā bhūdabhyupetahānirityabhāvatvameva bhāvasyābhyupagacchasi tataśca cakṣurādilakṣaṇetyādi . yadyasattvaṃ sāmānyasyeṣṭaṃ tasmāccāsataḥ sāmānyāccakṣurādilakṣaṇarūpādīnāmākāśādīnāṃ
cāvasthākhyānāṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ nirbījānāmutpattirasatī, rūpasya cakṣurlakṣaṇam, ādigrahaṇācchrotra-tvagajihvā-ghrāṇāni śabda-sparśa-rasa-gandhānāṃ lakṣaṇāni, lakṣyā rūpādayaḥ, śabdādyātmakāni cākāśādīni
bhūtānītyādisarvaśāstra-lokagatavyavahārābhāvaprasaṅgād bhāvasyābhāvatvamapi nābhyupagantavyamiti .


athocyeta--viśeṣasya bhāvena sahaikatvam . yadi bhāvaḥ viśeṣān vyāpnoti na tu
viśeṣo bhāvaṃ tasmād viśeṣeṇa saha bhāvasyaikatvaṃ nāsti, viśeṣasya tvasti bhāvena saha
bhāvopagrahāntarbhāvitavṛtterviśeṣatvāt .
atha bhedavṛttiḥ katham ? kasmānna samānabhūtaḥ sannaviśeṣarūpa eva saṃvṛtto bhāvavat ?
bhāvo vā viśiṣṭatvād viśeṣarūpaḥ, tadekatvāt, viśeṣavat ?

athocyetetyādi . prāgagnīndhanaikatve--agnerindhanena sahaikatve doṣādindhanasyāgninā sahaikatve
doṣābhāvaṃ manyamānena yathā parihāraḥ pareṇocyate tatheha bhāvasya viśeṣeṇa sahaikatve doṣād viśeṣasya
bhāvena sahaikatve doṣābhāvaṃ manyamānaḥ parihāramāha--tadyathā--yadi bhāvaḥ sāmānyaṃ pṛthivītvādi ghaṭapaṭādīnaśma-sikatādīṃśca viśeṣān vyāpnoti, na tu viśeṣo'śma-ghaṭādirbhāvaṃ pṛthivītvaṃ vyāpnoti ekadeśavṛttitvāt . tasmād viśeṣeṇa saha ghaṭena paṭena vā pṛthivyā ekatvaṃ nāsti, ghaṭasya tvasti viśeṣasya
sāmānyena pṛthivyādinā bhāvena saha . kasmāt ? bhāvopagrahāntarbhāvitavṛtterviśeṣatvāt, bhāvasya
sāmānyasya upagraheṇa tenopagṛhītatvāt tasminnantarbhāvitā vṛttiḥ vartanamastitvaṃ viśeṣasya bhāvātmarūpāpannatvāt kāraṇād viśeṣasya viśeṣatvam nānyathā . tasmād bhāvopagrahāntarbhāvitavṛtterviśeṣatvād
viśeṣasya sāmānyena sahaikatvamastu bhāvāvyatiriktātmatvāt, ko doṣa iti .
etāvat pṛcchyate sāmānyaviśeṣaikatvavādī samānopālambhānivṛtteḥ --atha bhedavṛttiḥ katham ?
iti . pūrvavadeva dṛṣṭā bhedena vṛttirloke'nayoḥ . tadyathā--pṛthivī ityaviśeṣeṇa ghaṭa-paṭādiṣvabhinnā
bhāvasya, ghaṭa paṭo na bhavati iti ghaṭā-paṭāderbhinnā viśeṣasya, te ca vṛttī parasparavibhinne, tayoḥ kopapattirekatve paraspararūpānāpattau nānātvakṛtāyām ? iti taddarśayati aniṣṭāpādanadvāreṇa --kasmānna samānabhūtaḥ sannaviśeṣarūpa eva saṃvṛttaḥ ? yo'yaṃ ghaṭo rūpādirvā viśeṣaḥ paṭādibhyo rasādibhyo vā
vyāvṛtto'pi mṛd mṛdeva ityavyāvṛttaḥ samānabhūtaḥ sa san san, bhavati bhavati, pṛthivī pṛthivī ityeva
vā nirviśeṣaḥ kasmānna bhāvavad bhavati, pratiṣedhadvayasyāviśeṣāniṣṭāpādanāt ? dṛṣṭaṃ viśeṣaṃ samarthayati—
bhāvo vā viśiṣṭatvād viśeṣarūpaḥ kasmānna saṃvṛttaḥ iti vartate, tadekatvād viśeṣavat,
mṛdbhavanapṛthivītvatyaktarūpo rūparasādiviśeṣa eva kasmānna bhavati ? ubhayatra tadekatvāt iti hetuḥ .
itaretarasvarūpe dṛṣṭāntau . dṛṣṭā ceyaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣayoranuvṛttivyāvṛttibhyāṃ bhedavṛttiḥ . aniṣṭāpādanasādhanaṃ ca --bhāvo viśeṣa eva syāt tadekatvāt tatsvātmavat, viśeṣo vā bhāva eva syāt
tadekatvāt tatsvātmavat, mṛt syād ghaṭa eva tadekatvāt ghaṭasvātmavat, ghaṭo vā mṛdeva syāt
tadekatvāt tatsvātmavat .


vikalpāccaikatvavyāghātaḥ . kuto'yaṃ viśeṣaḥ--idaṃ sahedaṃ na saheti, dviṣṭhatvāt
sahāsahabhāvasya, viśeṣaṇakriyādhārakaraṇādyanupapatteśca .
athāpi kathañcidekatvaṃ tathāpyekam ekameva iti na vaktavyamityādi pūrvavad yāvat
paramāṇuvaditi .
atha mā bhūvannamī doṣā ityanyatvaṃ bhāvaviśeṣayoḥ . tatra yadi bhāvasya viśeṣeṇa
sahānyatvamabhyupagamyate tata idamāpatitaṃ tena tarhi tasya viśeṣapṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpamākhyeyaṃ
yathānyeṣāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ paṭādipṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpamākhyāyate . rūpākhyānamaśakyaṃ kartum, na hyanyadanya-

kiñcānyat --vikalpāccaikatvavyāvātaḥ . ekatve kuto'yaṃ viśeṣaḥ--idaṃ na sahedaṃ saheti ?
bhāvo viśeṣeṇa sahaiko na viśeṣo bhāvena, viśeṣo bhāvena sahaiko na bhāvo viśeṣeṇa ityetau vikalpau 
naikatve ghaṭete, viśeṣahetvabhāvāt, anyatva eva ca ghaṭete, dviṣṭhatvāt sahāsahabhāvasyeti . itaśca
nopapannamekatvaṃ bhāvena saha viśeṣasya viśeṣaṇakriyādhārakaraṇādyanupapatteśca, viśeṣaṇakriyā kartari
viśiṃṣati samavetā viśeṣye vā karmaṇi pṛthivī-ghaṭādau, tau tasyā yathāvivakṣamādhārau, yena paṭādinā
vipakṣabhūtena viśiṣyate tat karaṇam, bhāvasyaiva vā viśeṣaḥ yato viśiṣyate ghaṭo'yaṃ paṭādirna bhavati
iti so'rtho'pādānam, yasmai viśiṣyate pratipādyate sa sampradānaṃ śrotā ityeṣāṃ kārakāṇāṃ kriyāyāśca
vipūrvaśiṣidhātuvācyāyā bhinnārthanibandhanatvādekatve satyanupapattiḥ . dṛṣṭaśvāyaṃ kārakavyavahāro bhedanibandhanaḥ . tasmād dṛṣṭatvādayuktamekatvam .
abhyupetyāpyekatvaṃ na yuktameveti brūmaḥ --athāpi kathañcidityādi pūrvavadekatvapratiṣedhenāvaktavyaprasādhanaṃ tameva granthamatidiśati pūrvavad yāvat paramāṇuvaditi sāvadhikaṃ sahetudṛṣṭāntāpādyāvaktavyatvaniṣṭhaṃ tulyagamakatvād vyākhyātārthameveti . evaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣayorekatve doṣā uktāḥ .
etaddoṣabhayāt pakṣāntaraṃ nirdoṣaṃ manyamānaścet paro gṛhṇīyāt --atha mā bhūvannamī doṣā iti,
kiṃ tat pakṣāntaram ? anyatvaṃ bhāva-viśeṣayoḥ . tatrāpyekatvavad dvayī gatiḥ--bhāvasya viśeṣeṇa
sahānyatvaṃ viśeṣasya vā bhāveneti . tatra tāvad yadi bhāvasya viśeṣeṇa sahānyatvamabhyupagamyate
tata idamāpatitaṃ doṣajātam --tena tarhītyādi yāvat saṃvṛtighaṭa-paṭava  diti tulyagamaṃ pūrvavat .
tasya bhāvasya viśeṣapṛthagbhūtamitīha sāmānyaviśeṣaprastuterviśeṣyate . śeṣaṃ tathaiva gamanīyaṃ rūpākhyā-
namaśa  kyaṃ kartumityādi . upasaṃhārasādhanam --anirūpyamāṇastvasannāpadyeta, aviśeṣatve'rūpatvāt,
khapuṣpavat, aviśeṣatvaṃ bhāvasya viśeṣādatyantamanyatvāt pṛthivyā aśmasikatādyavasthāviśeṣamanta

sādhāraṇam, sāmānyaviśeṣaikānyatvānavasthitatattvasaṃvṛtighaṭapaṭavat . anirūpyamāṇastvasannāpadyeta, aviśeṣatve'rūpatvāt, khapuṣpavat .
athocyeta--rūpaṃ pṛthag bhāvasya viśeṣād vyāvṛttirūpādanupravṛttau . tadvā kuto'viśeṣam ?
yadi syād bhāvo viśeṣarahitastato niravaśeṣaviśeṣābhāve'pi khapuṣpādāvanupravṛttirūpaḥ
syād bhāvatvād ghaṭādivat .
yadyapi sāmānyasya viśeṣeṇa sahānyatvaṃ nāsti tathāpi viśeṣasya sāmānyena
sahānyatvamasti dṛṣṭatvāt . dṛṣṭo hi viśeṣo bhāvavinābhūto'pi yathā bhinno ghaṭa iti .
bhāvaviṣaya evaiṣa bhedopacāraḥ . tadanyatve sa naiva syāt, abhāvatvāt, khapuṣpavat .
ata eva tatsiddhiḥ; bhinnasamānādhikaraṇasya mukhyamūlatvād gauṇasya . pūrvoktācca tadvṛtti-
reṇāsthānāt tadātmatvamanicchata ekāntenāviśeṣatvam, aviśeṣatve satyarūpatvaṃ bhāvasya tadatirekeṇānirūpyarūpatvāt . tasmādasattvamāpannaṃ vastuno'nyatve pṛthagrūpāvaśyambhāvāt tadākhyānāśakyatve cāsattvam .
ityukte'nyatvavādinā athocyeta--rūpaṃ pṛthag bhāvasya viśeṣād vyāvṛttirūpādanupravṛttau
dṛṣṭam iti vākyaśeṣaḥ . atra brūmaḥ --tadvā kuto'viśeṣam ? yadetad ghaṭāśmādiṣu pṛthivītvānuvṛttilakṣaṇaṃ rūpaṃ tad viśeṣeṇa vinā naivāstīti tadavasthaṃ pṛthagrūpākhyānāśakyatvam . abhyupetyāpi tvadanuvṛttyā nirviśeṣaṃ bhāvamatyantānyatvavādinaste doṣaṃ brūmaḥ --yadi syād bhāvo viśeṣarahitastato niravaśeṣaviśeṣābhāve'pi khapuṣpādāvanupravṛttirūpaḥ syād bhāvatvād ghaṭādāviva . aniṣṭaṃ caitat .
athocyetetyādi . uktadoṣabhayāt sāmānyasya viśeṣeṇa sahānyatvam ityetad viśeṣapradhānamanyatvaṃ mā bhūnnāma tathāpi viśeṣasya sāmānyena sahānyatvamasti dṛṣṭatvāt, dṛṣṭo hi viśeṣo
bhāvavinābhūto'pi viśeṣa eva bhāvarahitaḥ kva dṛṣṭa iti taddarśayati --yathā bhinno ghaṭa iti, bhedo
hi ghaṭasya pradhvaṃsābhāvo vināśaparyāyaḥ, sa ca viśeṣo bhāvādatyantavilakṣaṇo dṛṣṭaśca, ato'nyatvaṃ
viśeṣasya bhāvāditi .
atrocyate --bhāvaviṣaya evaiṣa bhedopacāraḥ . bhidikriyāviśeṣaṇaviśiṣṭāvasthānubhāvino
bhāvasyaiva ghaṭākhyasyāvyavacchinnamṛtpiṇḍaśivakādibhavanānuviddhasya utpanna-nava-madhyama-purāṇa-viśaraṇāvasthākrameṇāvayavasaṅghātajanitātmalābhasyāyamapi kapālāvasthāviśeṣaḥ . tasmādavinaśvarāṇvādipudgalasaṅghāta-visaṅghātaviṣayapariṇāmatvāt utpanno vinaṣṭaḥ ityādyupacāro bhāvasyaiva nābhāvasya khapuṣpādeḥ
sambhavati . yadi manyethā bhāvādabhedopacāra iti, sa bhāvādanyatve khapuṣpavad naiva syāt, bhinnaḥ
utpannaḥ iti vā nopacaryeta ghaṭaḥ, abhāvatvād viśeṣatvāt khapuṣpavat .


tvācca svātmavad nānyatvam . bhāvādantyaviśeṣastu naiva pṛthagbhūtaḥ, viśeṣatvāt, ghaṭavat .
yadā cāyaṃ bhāvāvyatirikta evopalabhyate tadā na kadācidapyabhāvo bhavati khapuṣpavat .
nanu yadaiva sāmānyamaviśeṣaṃ tadaivānyatvam, na, aviśeṣāt . siddhe hyanyatve sahāsahabhavanaṃ dviṣṭhatvāt syāt, tattu na siddham .

kiñcānyat, ata eva tatsiddhiḥ . avaśyaṃ caitadevam--bhāvaviṣaya evaiṣa bhedopacāraḥ, bhedopacārādeva bhedasiddhiḥ, bhāvādeva vā bhedopacārasiddhiḥ . kiṃ kāraṇam ? bhinnasamānādhikaraṇasya mukhyamūlatvād gauṇasya, bhinno ghaṭaḥ iti ghaṭena samānādhikaraṇo bhedopacāro gauṇo mukhyaṃ bhedamanupravṛttisahacaritamavasthāviśeṣaṃ nava-taruṇa-madhya-jīrṇādikaṃ sarpasyeva sphaṭāṭopa-kuṭilagati-kuṇḍala-prasṛta-dīrghavṛttyāttādyavasthāviśeṣaṃ bhāvasyāpekṣya vinaṣṭe'pi bhinnaḥ ityupacāraḥ kriyate, gauṇasya mukhyamūlatvāt .
abhinna eva vā bhāve kapālādyavasthāyāṃ bheda upacaryate stimitasaraḥsalilavadanutpādavyayatvād bhāvasya
puruṣa-kālādikāraṇamātrasya .
kiñca, viśiṣyate viśeṣaḥ iti sato viśeṣatvāt tadapekṣatvācca viśiṣyate sa tasmāt tena vā
sa ityādinā aviśeśiṃṣannaviśiṣyamāṇo vā na viśeṣa eva kārakāṇāmeva kārakatvāt pṛ॰ 753
ityādigranthena pūrvoktāccetyatidiśati . kiñca, tadvṛttitvācca pūrvoktācca iti vartate viśeṣavṛttitvād bhāvasya viśeṣasvātmavad na viśeṣebhyo'nyatvam, tathā ca bhāvavṛttitvādvā bhāvavad
viśeṣasya bhāvād nānyatvam, tadvṛttitvaṃ cānayoratītanyāyena subhāvitam, ghaṭapaṭādibhāvānuvṛttirūpatve'pi pṛthaganirdeśyarūpatvāt .
syānmatam--antyaviśeṣastu paramāṇuṣvanyapratyayahetutvād vyāvṛttirūpa eveti cet, tanna, yasmād
bhāvādantyaviśeṣastu naiva pṛthagbhūtaḥ, viśeṣatvāt, ghaṭavat, yathā ghaṭo viśeṣo bhāvātmakastadvṛttitvāt svātmavad bhāvādapṛthagbhūtastathāntyaviśeṣo'pi . tad vyācaṣṭe --yadā cāyamityādi,
na kadācidapyabhāvo bhavati, khapuṣpavat iti vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ . bhāvāvyatiriktaviśeṣopalabdherbhāvād viśeṣasyānyatvaṃ vyāvṛttam, ato'siddhamanyatvamityupanayaḥ .
atrāha --nanu yadaiva sāmānyamaviśeṣaṃ tadaivānyatvam, nanu bhāvo'nuvṛttilakṣaṇo nirākṛtasarvaghaṭapaṭādiviśeṣo na kvacit kutaścid vyāvartate, ato viśeṣāt parasparavyāvṛttilakṣaṇādanyaḥ iti
siddhamiti . etacca na aviśeṣāt, uktaṃ prāganekadhā nirākṛtasarvaviśeṣasya bhāvasyātmalābhābhāvādabhāvatvam, aviśeṣatvācca khapuṣpavadasataḥ kuto'nyatvam ?
kiñca, yadapi ca bhāvo viśeṣeṇa saha bhavati na viśeṣaḥ, viśeṣo bhāvena saha na bhāvaḥ, tau ca

athāpi kathañcidanyatvam, anyat anyadeva iti na vaktavyam, anyatvāt, hastādyanyānanyadevadattavad yāvad rūpādikṣaṇāntarānyānanyaparamāṇuvat .
atyantābhāvastarhi tau, viśeṣāviśeṣatvābhāvāt, khapuṣpavat .
nanu bhinnavyavasthānalakṣaṇatvādanubhayatvamapyavacanīyam . yadi hyanuvṛtti-vyāvṛttilakṣaṇaniyamo na syāt tato rūpādirapi viśeṣaḥ pravarteta bhāvavat . bhāvo'pi cānuvṛttirūpaḥ
vyāvarteta, khapuṣpavat . bhinnavyavasthānalakṣaṇamubhayatvamastu .
parasparamasaha iti vṛttibheda ucyate sa cāsiddhaḥ, tayoranyatvasyāsiddhatvāt . siddhe hyanyatve sahāsahabhavanaṃ dviṣṭhatvāt syāt, tattu na siddham, . tasmādayuktā sahāsahabhavanakalpanā'nyatvaṃ ca tayoḥ .
abhyupagamyāpi brūmaḥ --taathāpi kathañcidityādi yāvat paramāṇuvaditi sa eva tulyagamo
grantho'nyatvaniṣedhārthaḥ anyat anyadeva iti na vaktavyamiti pratijñāya anyatvāt, hastādyanyānanyadevadattavad yāvad rūpādikṣaṇāntarānyānanyaparamāṇuvaditi savyākhyānopāyapradarśanena
gatārthaḥ .
evamekatvānyatvayorniṣiddhayorāha paraḥ --atyantābhāvastarhi tau, viśeṣāviśeṣatvābhāvāt,
khapuṣpavat . bhāva-viśeṣayoraviśeṣa ekatvam, viśeṣo'nyatvam, tayoḥ pratiṣiddhatvād viśeṣāviśeṣatvābhāvaḥ, yasya viśeṣāviśeṣatvābhāvastasyāsattvam, yathā khapuṣpasyeti .
atrocyate --nanu bhinnetyādi . anubhayatvamasattvam, tadapi avacanīyam, kasmāt ? bhinnavyavasthānalakṣaṇatvāt, yathāgnīndhanayordahana-dāhyādivyavasthāne bhinne lakṣaṇe sta ityanubhayatvaṃ nāstītyuktaṃ tatheha bhāva-viśeṣayorapi anuvṛtti-vyāvṛttī vyavasthāne bhinne lakṣaṇe sta ityanubhayatvamapi
avacanīyam . pūrvavacca gamanīyamiti tatprasādhanārthamāha --yadi hyanuvṛttītyādi . aniṣṭāpādanodāharaṇe tu viśeṣa --tato rūpādirapītyādi, rūpaṃ viśeṣo raso'pi pravarteta pṛthageva bhāvāt svenaiva
rūpeṇa vyāvṛttirūparahitatvāt bhāvavat . bhāvo'pi cānuvṛttirūpaḥ san rūpādeḥ pṛthageva vyāvarteta
anupravṛttirūparahitatvāt khapuṣpavat . yadyanupravṛtti-vyāvṛttī sāmānya-viśeṣayorbhinnavyavasthāne na syātāṃ
syādeṣa prasaṅgaḥ prastute, yasmād bhāvo rūpa-rasādiṣvanupravartamāno dṛśyate viśeṣaśca rūpa-rasādibhyaḥ
parasparaṃ vyāvartamānaḥ tasmānnānubhayatvamapyasti . kintu bhinnavyavasthānalakṣaṇamubhayatvamastu anyatvamityarthaḥ . etadanabhyupagame doṣa ucyate --bhinnavyavasthānetyādi yāvadubhayatvaṃ syāt . sarvātmakaikabhāva

bhinnavyavasthānalakṣaṇavṛttobhayatvānabhyupagame tu sarvātmakaikabhāva evātyantābhāva eva
vobhayatvaṃ syāt .
anubhayatvapratiṣedhādubhayatvamiti cet, na, anyatvāvaktavyatvāt . anyatvapratiṣedha
ekatvamiti cet, na, tasyāpyavaktavyatvāt . ekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvapratiṣedhena ca
pradhānopasarjanabhāvo'pi pratiṣiddha eva . tasmāt sarvathaivāvaktavyataiva . dravya-guṇa-kāraṇakāryādiṣvapyevameva .
ato'nyathoktau vastuvisaṃvādaḥ, anyasyānanyatvena ekasyānekatvena ubhayasyānubhayatvenāvadhāraṇāt, ghaṭapaṭaviparyayāvadhṛtivat .
ayaṃ ca niyamo niyama eva vastu itīcchati, sāmānyaviśeṣaikatvānyatvaikāntāyatasvavṛttereva niścitaniyatādhikyayamanāt .
evobhayatvaṃ syāt, atyantābhāve khapuṣpa eva vā, gatyantarābhāvāt . taccāniṣṭaṃ sarvātmakaikabhāvobhayatvamatyantābhāvobhayatvaṃ vā .
anubhayatvapratiṣedhādityādiḥ pūrvavat tulyagamo grantho yāvat sarvathaivāvaktavyataiveti dṛṣṭāntāgnīndhanopasaṃhāravad dārṣṭāntikabhāvaviśeṣopasaṃhāreṇa gatārthaḥ .
evamāpādyāvaktavyatāṃ sāmānyaviśeṣayoratidiśati --dravya-guṇa-kāraṇa-kāryādiṣvapi evameveti . evaṃ hi bhavati bhavanamagnīndhanavat ityupakramya sa eva dṛṣṭāntagrantho yāvat sarvathāpyavaktavyataiva iti . tasyopari yadyekatvaṃ guṇasya dravyeṇa saha nānyatetyādi dravya-guṇayoḥ paraspareṇa
sahaikatvānyatvānubhayatvobhayatvapradhānopasarjanatvapratiṣedhena sarvathaiva avaktavyatā ityupasaṃhāro yāvat
tāvadaśeṣo grantho yojyaḥ . tathā kāraṇa-kāryayorapi punaḥ saiva granthayojanā . ādigrahaṇāt sarvagatā'sarvagata-nityā-'nityā-'vasthā-'vasthāvad-bhojya-bhoktrādivikalpeṣu samānaḥ pracarca iti sthitamavacanīyaṃ
vastviti .
ato'nyathoktau vastuvisaṃvāda iti pratijñā . anyasyānanyatvenetyādi yāvadavadhāraṇāditi hetuḥ . ghaṭa-paṭaviparyayāvadhṛtivaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ . yathā ghaṭe paṭaḥ ityavadhāryamāṇe paṭe ca ghaṭaḥ
ityavadhāryamāṇe visaṃvādaḥ evamanyatvamananyatvenetyādi yojyam, ekatvā-'nyatvobhayatvā-'nubhayatvā'nyatarapradhānopasarjanatvairavadhāryamāṇaṃ vastu visaṃvadate parasparata iti vastu vyākhyātam .
nayasvarūpamucyate --ayaṃ ca niyamaḥ vidhi-niyamasarvabhaṅgasamūhasamyaktvapratipādanādhikāre pratyeka

atra cābhijalpaḥ śabdārthaḥ . āha hi—
śabdo vāpyabhijalpatvamāgato yāti vācyatām .
so'yamityabhisambandhād rūpamakīkṛtarūpamekīkṛtaṃ yadā .
śabdasyārthena taṃ śabdamabhijalpaṃ pracakṣate ॥ vākya pa॰ 2/128/2, 129
śeṣamabhyūhyam... ... ....
so'yamityekīkṛtatvācchabdarūpasyārthena anyatvamavaktavyam ityuktaṃ bhavati . arthena
ityekatvaṃ dviṣṭhatvādekīkaraṇasya avaktavyamityuktaṃ bhavati .
svarūpajijñāsāyāmeṣa nayo niyama eva vastu itīcchati . yathā varṇitaṃ niyamaśabdākṣarārthaṃ ca
vastunā yojayati atītavikalpavastvasambhavaṃ pradarśayan--tadyathā sāmānyaviśeṣaikatvānyatvaikāntāyatasvavṛttereva niścita-niyatā-''dhikyayamanāt, yamernipūrvasya ghañi prādisamāse niścito yamo
niyato'dhiko vā niyamaḥ, kasmāt ? uktavidhinā sāmānya-viśeṣayorekatve'nyatve dvitve ubhayatve'nyatarapradhānopasarjanatve ca ayatasvavṛttitvād niścita-niyatā-'dhikābhāvena, avaktavyatve niścitaniyatā-'dhikabhāvena yatasvavṛtitvād yathārthaniyamasaṃjño'yaṃ bhaṅgaḥ .
evaṃ vastuto'kṣarārthataśca niyamasvarūpamuktvā śabdārthamāha --atra caivaṃvidhabhāvatāyāmabhijalpaḥ
śabdārthaḥ . prāgeṣo'bhijalpaḥ śabdārthaḥ prāsaṅgiko vyaktyādivastupratyākhyānaprasaṅganokta iti na
punarvyākhyāyate . tatsūcanārthaṃ tvāha --āha hītyādi tallakṣaṇakārikāḥ sūcayaṃstameva granthaṃ samarpayati
śabdo vāpyabhijalpatvamāgata ityādidvyardhakārikayā . śeṣamabhyūhyamityādi .
kathaṃ punastena granthenāvaktavyatoktā ? iti cet tatpradarśanārthamāha --so'yam ityekīkṛtatvācchabdarūpasyārthena so'yam ityabhedasambandhavaśenaikīkṛtaṃ yadā iti vacanādanyatvamavaktavyamityuktaṃ
bhavati . arthena ityekatvaṃ śabdāda bhinnenārthenaikīkaraṇaṃ dviṣṭhatvādekīkaraṇasya anekamekaṃ
kriyate śabdarūpamarthena iti vacanādekatvamavaktavyamityuktaṃ bhavati . etābhyāmeva yuktibhyāmubhayatvamanubhayatvaṃ ca pradhānopasarjanate cāvaktavyānīti jñeyāni . vyākhyātaḥ śabdārtha . sa eṣa padārthaḥ .


saṅghāto vākyam, devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklām iti pratyekavṛttisāmānyaviśeṣaikatvānyatvānekārthasthatvāt .
evaṃ ca kṛtvā dikpradarśanamātreṇa śabdo'rthapratyāsattyā bravīti ityucyate .

vākyārthastarhi kaḥ ? vākye jñāte vākyārtho jñāyata evetyāha --saṅghāto vākyam . varṇasaṅghātaḥ
padam, ekākṣarasyāpi svaravyañjanasaṅghātatvāt . padasaṅghāto vākyam . kasmāt ? iti cet, ucyate—
devadatta gāmabhyāja śuklām iti pratyekavṛttisāmānyaviśeṣaikatvānyatvānekārthasthatvāt,
yasmād devadattādīni padāni padārthasāmānye pratyekaṃ vartamānāni viśiṣṭasaṃsarge'rthe vartante sa vākyārthaḥ,
yathoktam --sāmānyavartināṃ padānāṃ viśeṣe'vasthānaṃ vākyārthaḥ  , tayośca
sāmānyaviśeṣayorekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvādyanekātmakārthatvasyāvacanīyatvena parigrahādanekārthe sthitaḥ
śabda ekarūpeṇāvadhārayitumaśaṃkyatvādavaktavyastadartha iti .
evaṃ ca kṛtvā yadapyuktam—
sāmānyārthastirobhūto viśeṣo nopajāyate .upāttasya kutastyāgo nivṛttiḥ kvāvatiṣṭhatām ॥ vākyapa॰ 2 . 15
iti, tadapi pratyuktameva yathāvicāritaniścitamavaktavyaṃ sarvathā vastviti dikpradarśanamātreṇa śabdo'rthapratyāsattyā vijñānādhānamātreṇa bravīti ityucyate .


evameva ca bhāvayuktavācī iti yujyate yadavaktavyamiti paryavaṇamātramāha .
śabdanayadeśatvāt paryavāstika eṣaḥ . bhuvo bhinnadhātvarthavācitvāt paryavati bhavatīti

evameva ceti yadapi lakṣaṇakāreṇa śabdanayalakṣaṇamuktam --nāma-sthāpanā-dravyavācyeṣṭākaraṇād bhāvayuktavācī śabdaḥ   iti, bhāvaḥ paryāyo niyamo guṇo vā, tadyuktavācī
tadyuktamarthaṃ brūte iti śabdanayamataṃ tadapi evaṃ yujyate yadavaktavyamiti paryavaṇamātramāha, sāmānyaviśeṣaikatvānyatvānekātmakasya vastuno vācā vaktumaśakyatvāt .
śabdanayadeśatvāt paryavāstika eṣaḥ,tassa tu saddavikappā sāha-pasāhā suhumabhedā sanmati॰ 1 . 5
iti vacanācchabdanaye'ntarbhūtaḥ . kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhāvayuktavācitve paryāyagrahaṇaṃ na sāmānyagrahaṇaṃ bhāvaśabdasya sāmānyavācitve ? iti cet, ucyate --bhuvo bhinnadhātvarthavācitvāt, bhūvādayaḥ sarvadhātavo
bhvarthe, bhūvādaya iti vaderauṇādika iñpratyaye bhūvādayaḥ sarvadhātavaḥ . tasmānna sattārtha eva bhūḥ, bhū-kṛñoḥ
sarvadhātvarthavācitvāt . paryavati bhavatīti bhāvaḥ, paryavaṇaṃ ca praveśanam, ava rakṣaṇa-gati-kāntiprīti-tṛptyavagamana-praveśa-śravaṇa-svāmyarthayācana-kriyecchā-dīptyavāptyāliṅgana-hiṃsā-dahanabhāva-vṛddhiṣu pā॰ dhā॰ 60॰ iti paṭhitatvād bhāvaḥ paryavaḥ praveśaḥ . samantādavaḥ paryava iti pariśabdaḥ samantādarthaḥ, avaśabdaḥ praveśārthaḥ . tad vastuto darśayati --samantāt praviśati ekatāmanyatāmubhayatāmanubhayatāṃ ca yo'rthaḥ sa paryavaḥ, asti ityasya matirāstikaḥ, paryave āstikaḥ paryavāstika iti mūlasaṃjñāsya nayasya śabdasya .


bhāvaḥ, samantāt praviśati ekatāmanyatāmubhayatāmanubhayatāṃ ca yo'rthaḥ sa paryavaḥ, paryave
āstikaḥ paryavāstikaḥ .
upanibandhanamasya--tadubhayassa ādiṭṭhe avattavvaṃ ātā ti ya ṇo ātā ti yabhagavatī॰
12 . 10 . 469 iti .
iti niyamabhaṅgo navamo'raḥ ॥

kimetāḥ svamanīṣikā ucyanta utāstyasyopanibandhanamārṣamapi ? iti, asti ityucyate--
upanibandhanamasya tadubhayassa ādiṭṭhe ityādi . imā ṇaṃ bhaṃte rayaṇappabhā puḍhavī ātā no
ātā ? iti pṛṣṭe bhagavadvacanam --gotamā ! si+ā ātā si+ā ṇo ātā . se keṇaṭṭheṇaṃ
bhaṃte evaṃ vuccati si+ā ātā si+ā ṇo ātā ? iti hetuparipraśnaḥ . bhagavāṃstaduttaramāha—
go+amā ! appaṇo ādiṭṭhe ātā, parassa ādiṭṭhe ṇo ātā, tadubhayassa ādiṭṭhe avattavvaṃ
ātā ti ya ṇo ātā ti ya iti . evamavaktavyatvamātmānātmaparyāyābhyāmādeśe'tra jñāpakanibandhanatva ucyate .
iti niyamabhaṅgo navamo'raḥ śrīmallavādipraṇītanayacakrasya ṭīkāyāṃ
nyāyāgamānusāriṇyāṃ siṃhasūrigaṇivādikṣamāśramaṇadṛbdhāyāṃ
samāptaḥ ॥




oँ arhaँ


॥ jayanti śrīpārśvajinendrāḥ ॥

atha daśamo niyamavidhyaraḥ .

naivaṃvidho niyamo yujyate svavacanavirodhādidoṣādanekāvasthāpattāvaniyatatvācca .
tadyathā--idaṃ tat tadevodyate tadeva cāpodyate tvayā . tataścāsat tat, svayaṃvihitanivartitvāt, sarvoktānṛtatvapakṣavat . ekatvādi pratiṣidhya vyavasthāpya ca parasparataḥ
punaścāpodyate .
dṛṣṭānte yaduktam agnerindhanapṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpamākhyeyam ityādinā ca pratiṣiddhaṃ
so'pi ca pratiṣedho'pratyayaḥ, yathoktam--'agnerindhanapṛthagbhūtaṃ tattvamaśakyaṃ darśayitum, na

vidhyādisakalabhaṅgātmakasamyagdarśanādhikāre vartamāne vikalanayasvarūpajñānamūlatvāt samyagdarśanasya vidhyubhayavikalpacatuṣṭayātmakau mārgau vyākhyāya niyamavikalpacatuṣṭayātmake tṛtīye mārge vartamāne tatra niyamabhaṅgaṃ prathamamuktvā abhijalpaśabdārthatvamābhimukhyena dikpratyāsattyā na sākṣād vastunaḥ
sāmānyaviśeṣayorekatvānyatvādyanekaduruparavadhārāvasthatvādavaktavyatā ityanantaraṃ niyamanaye'bhidhānāt
atrāpyaparituṣyan niyamavidhibhaṅgārastvāha --naivaṃvidho niyamo yujyate svavacanavirodhādidoṣādanekāvasthāpattāvaniyatatvācca, idaṃ hi tvadīyaṃ vacanaṃ lokābhāṇaka eva saṃvṛttaḥ . tadyathā--idaṃ
tattadevodyate tadeva cāpodyate tvayā, tadeva vadasyapavadasi cetyarthaḥ . tataḥ kim ? tataścāsat
tadaśobhanaṃ nāsti vetyarthaḥ . kasmāt ? svayaṃvihitanivartitvāt, ātmanā vihitameva nivartayituṃ
śīlamasyeti svayaṃvihitanivarti tvadvacanam, tadbhāvāt svayaṃvihitanivartitvāt . kimiva ? sarvoktānṛtapakṣavat, yathā sarvamuktamanṛtam iti vadatā yadevoditaṃ sarvamuktamanṛtam iti vidhinā tadevānṛtatvena vyāptatvāt pratiṣidhyamānamapodyate tathedamapi tvadīyaṃ sarvamavaktavyam iti .
etasya pratipādanārthamekatvādi pratiṣidhya vyavasthāpya ca parasparataḥ punaścāpodyate .
tadyathā--prāgeva tāvat sāmānya-viśeṣayorekatve pratiṣiddhe'nyatvamupasthitamarthāt, tadvalena pratiṣedhāt .
tadanyatvaṃ vidhāya punaḥ pratiṣiddham .
kathaṃ pratiṣiddham ? iti cet, ucyate--tadyathā --dṛṣṭānte yaduktam agnerindhanapṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpamā

hyanyadanyasādhāraṇam, sāmānyaviśeṣaikatvānyatvānavasthitatattvaghaṭapaṭasaṃvṛtivat anirūpyastvasannāpadyetetyādi . tadetat punastvayaivāpoditaṃ nanu jvālā deśe ityanyatvaṃ sphuṭībhūtamapi tadvā kuto'nindhanam ? jvālārūpamindhanasahitameva iti bruvatā .
upasaṃhāre'pi yaduktaṃ viśeṣasya bhāvapṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpamākhyeyam... ... ....
etadapi tvayaivāpoditamanyatvapratiṣedhavacanam . nanu bhavadviśeṣasamudāyakṛtamekatvaṃ rūparasādighaṭaikatvaviśeṣavat, ato'nyatvapratiṣedho'tisphuṭa eva svavacanavirodhaḥ .
khyeyam ityādinā ca pratiṣiddhaṃ so'pi ca pratiṣedho'pratyayaḥ . taṃ pratiṣedhagranthaṃ darśayati apratyayatvena --yathoktam--agnerindhanapṛthagbhūtamityādi yāvadasannāpadyetetyādi . ādigrahaṇāt sayuktikaṃ
sarvaṃ granthaṃ sandiśati . tadetat punastvayā svayamevāpoditaṃ nirākṛtam . katham ? iti cet, ucyate—
nanu jvālā deśe, yat tadindhanapṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpamagneḥ pṛcchyate tajjvālā ākāśadeśe gṛhāṇeti nirūpaṇenānyatvaṃ sphuṭībhūtamapi punaḥ tadvā kuto'nindhanam ityanindhanapratyākhyānena jvālārūpamindhanasahitameva iti bruvatā . tathā cedamuktaṃ bhavati--adīpyamānaṃ prāganindhanamakāṣṭhaṃ ca saddārūdakādi paścād
dīptisvabhāvamindhanaṃ kāṣṭhaṃ bhavatīti . tacca yatsamparkādidhyate dīpyate ca dārūdakādi tat
tasyāgne rūpamiti . etacca anyatvapratiṣedhārthaṃ vacanamanyatvameva samarthayati ato'pratyayam . yadyanyatvaṃ
samarthitameva parigṛhyeta syāt sapratyayam, na tu parigṛhītam . tasmādanyatvapratiṣedho'pratyayaḥ, tatsamarthanāt .
evaṃ dṛṣṭāntavarṇana'nyatvapratiṣegho'pratyayaḥ .
kiñcānyat, upasaṃhāre'pītyādi . bhāva-viśeṣayorekatvaṃ pratiṣidhyānyatvaṃ vyavasthāpya tatpratiṣedhidārṣṭāntikopasaṃhāre yaduktaṃ viśeṣasya bhāvapṛthagbhūtaṃ rūpamākhyeyam ityādi tameva granthaṃ taduktaṃ
darśayati, etadapi tvayaivāpoditamanyatvapratiṣedhavacanam .
katham ? iti taddarśayati --nanu bhavadviśeṣetyādi . nanu viśeṣā eva bhavanti, na sāmānyaṃ nāma
kiñcidasti . te ca viśeṣā eva bhavantaḥ samuditā ekam ityucyante . naikaṃ kiñcidanekātmakaṃ vastu,
kiṃ tarhi ? ekaika evaiko viśeṣo'nyo'nyo bhavatīti paramārthaḥ praṇidhānavadbhirabhrāntairavagamyate,
bhrāntāstu viśeṣā eva bhavantaḥ samuditā ekaśa ekam ityupāsate . kimiva ? rūparasādighaṭaikatvaviśeṣavat, yathā rūpa-rasa-gandha-sparśa-saṅkhyā  saṃsthānādayo dharmā viviktā bhinnendriyagrāhyāḥ samuditā
eko ghaṭaḥ ityucyante tathā bhrāntyā samudāyaikatve'satyapi viśeṣā eva rūpaṃ raso na bhavati raso'pi

nanūbhayato'pi pratiṣedhādadoṣaḥ . kiṃviṣayā tarhyavaktavyatā ? na tāvad bhāvasya
viśeṣasyobhayasya vā . ekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvāni pravibhāgenāpravibhāgena vā syuḥ .
apravibhāgatastāvadekatvaṃ nāsti pratiṣiddhatvāt, pravibhāgato'pi nāsti niṣiddhatvādeva .
siddhe caikatve tadbalenānyatvaṃ vyāvartyeta . tathaiva pravibhāgato'pravibhāgato vānyatvaṃ nāsti
yadbalenānubhayatvaṃ vyāvartyetaikatvaṃ vā . tathānubhayatvamapi nāsti yadbalenaikatvānyatvobhayatvāni vyāvartyeran, yasya vācyatāṃ gṛhītvā'vācyaṃ vā vyāvartyeta .
rūpaṃ na bhavati  ityādītaretarābhūtevirviśeṣaguṇaḥ anyo'nyo na bhavatīti samudāyakṛtādekatvād
bhrāntihetukāt pṛthagekatvavilakṣaṇaṃ viviktaṃ viśeṣaviṣayaṃ pratipādayituṃ viśeṣasya bhāvapṛthagbhūtaṃ
rūpamākhyeyam ityādinā pṛthagekatvamanyatvaṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ svarūpeṇāvadhārayitavyamiti vacanādevānyatvaṃ
samarthitam, ato'nyatvapratiṣedho'tisphuṭa eva svavacanavirodho dārṣṭāntikopasaṃhāre'pīti .
brūyāstvam --nanūbhayato'pi pratiṣedhādadoṣaḥ . ekatvaṃ pratiṣidhya punaranyatvamapi pratiṣiddhameva,
tathobhayatvamanubhayatvaṃ ca pratiṣidhyāvaktavyataiva samarthiteti . atredamasi tvaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ --kiṃviṣayā
tarhyavaktavyatā ? yadyubhayapratiṣedha eva katamat tadvastu yadavaktavyam ? kiṃ tad bhāvo viśeṣa ubhayaṃ
vā ? iti nirdhāryam, vastutve sati vikalpatrayānativṛtteḥ . tatra na tāvad bhāvasya, na viśeṣasya,
na ubhayasya vā, nakārānuvartanāt . bhāvasya ekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvāni pravibhāgenāpravibhāgena
vā syuḥ . apravibhāgenaikatvaṃ yathā --puruṣa evedaṃ sarvam śuklayaju॰ saṃ॰ 31 . 2 ityādi . pravibhāgena sati
dvitīye tena sahāsamparkādekaṃ syāt, yathā—
na siṃhavṛndaṃ bhuvi bhūtapūrvamāśīviṣāṇāmapi nāsti vṛndam .ekākinaste vicaranti dhīrāstejasvināṃ nāsti sahāyakṛtyam ॥  
ityekaśabdasyāsahāyārthatvāt .
apravibhāgatastāvadekatvaṃ bhāvasya viśeṣasya ubhayasya vā nāsti, dvitīyarahitasya rūpākhyānāśakyatvena tvayaiva pratiṣiddhatvāt . pravibhāgato'pi nāsti sahāsahabhavanasya dviṣṭhatvāt ityādinā niṣiddhatvādeva . tathā viśeṣasyobhayasya caikatvaṃ nāstītyuktam . siddhe caikatve tadbalenānyatvaṃ
vyāvartyeta, sambhāvyetaikatvaṃ parigṛhya taddvāreṇa tadupāyenānyatvasya vyāvartanam, tattu nāstyaikatvam,
tadabhāvādanyatvapratiṣedhābhāvaḥ .


katham ? ekaśabdo hyanyanirapekṣasaṃkhyārtho'pravibhāgaikaśabdārthatvāt . sa ca na ghaṭate
ekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvavikalpānāmanyonyāpekṣatvāt . athāsahāyavacana ekaśabdastathāpi sahagaterdvyādyarthenāvyatirekādekatvaṃ nāsti . anyārthe tu sākṣādanyatvameva viśeṣaviṣayam . tathā cānanyatvamapi pratipakṣākṣepādavaktavyanirviṣayatā vānyathā . evamanyatvo-

syānmatam--anyatvaṃ siddham, tadbalenaikatvobhayatvādi pratiṣidhyata iti . tacca nānyatvaṃ siddham,
tathaiva pravibhāgato'pravibhāgato vānyatvaṃ nāsti ghaṭa-paṭayoriva jīva-śarīrayoriva vā
sambhāvyamānam, tvayaiva tasyāpi niṣiddhatvāt, yadbalenānyatvadvāreṇānubhayatvaṃ vyāvartyetaikatvaṃ vā .
tathānubhayatvamapi nāsti ekatvānyatvayorlakṣaṇabhedaniyamādityuktam yadbalena ekatvānyatvobhayatvāni vyāvartertyeran, yasya vācyatāṃ gṛhītveti idaṃ vācyamekatvamanyatvamubhayatvaṃ vā dṛṣṭamidaṃ tu tadvanna bhavatītyavācyaṃ tathedaṃ vācyamanubhayaṃ tadvat tāni na vācyānītyati vācyabalādavācyaṃ vā vyāvartyeta itaravyavasthāpūrvatvāditaravyāvartanasyānvaya-vyatirekābhyāmarthādhigamācca .
kathamiti tat kathaṃ bhāvyate ? iti pṛcchati . ucyate --ekaśabdo hyanyanirapekṣasaṅkhyārtho'pravibhāgaikaśabdārthatvāt, hiśabdo yasmādarthaḥ, yasmādekaśabdaḥ saṅkhyāvācitve'nyanirapekṣāṃ saṅkhyāṃ
saṅkhyeyaprādhānyenāha--saṅkhyāntaravyāvartanārthārtham eko'yaṃ na dvi-tryādayo'rthāḥ iti loke tasmāt
ekaḥ ityukte nānyo'sti ityuktaṃ bhavati, sa cārtho na ghaṭate, na sa nirapekṣaḥ, yasmād ekatvānyatvobhayatvānubhayatvavikalpānāmanyonyāpekṣatvāt prāguktavidhinā .
athāsahāyavacana ekaśabdaḥ . atha mā bhūdeṣa doṣo'nyanirapekṣasaṅkhyārthatvakṛta ityasahāyavācī
vikalpyetaikaśabdastasmādastyekatvam, tadastitvādanyatvādyapyastītyavaktavyaviṣayasadbhāvasiddhiriti . atra
brūmaḥ --tathāpītyādi, sahaiti iti sahāyaḥ, sahā'yanaṃ sahagatirdvayorbahūnāṃ vā bhavatīti sahagaterdvyādyarthenāvyatirekādekatvaṃ nāstīti tadavasthamavaktavyāviṣayatvam, kintu anyatvameva ca sidhyediti punaranyatvameva . evamekaśabdo'rthāpattyānyatvavācītyuktam .
athaanya ekaḥ, so'pi tato'nya ekaḥ, ityekaśabdo'nyārthavācī tato'nyārthe tu sākṣādanyatvameva viśeṣaviṣayam, tato'nyatvaniṣedho'tisphuṭa eva svavacanavirodha ityuktam .
kiñcānyat, tathā cānanyatvamapi . yathā caikaśabdo'smaduktanyāyenānyatve vartate tena prakāreṇa
tathānanyatvamapi sidhyati, ananyatvena vinānyatvasyābhāvāt . tata āha --pratipakṣākṣepāditi

bhayatvādāvapi . ityekatvādipratiṣedhāḥ kim ? kathamavaktavyam ? te tu niṣedhyānāmatathātve
nirmūlatvādavaktavyameva vyāvartayanti .
na, parābhiprāyagataikatvādyekāntavyāvartanārthatvāt . atha ta ekatvādayo vidyamānāḥ
pratiṣidhyante tatastatrāvaktavyatvanirviṣayatā . athāvidyamānāḥ kathaṃ pareṇa pratipannāḥ ?
na hyeṣāṃ bhavataikāntabhavanaṃ vyāvartyānekāntabhavanaṃ pratipādyate vādaparameśvaravādavat .
gatārthaṃ yathāvyākhyātamekatvānyatvayoḥ parasparapratipakṣatvāt tathobhayatvānubhayatvayośceti . evaṃ tāvadekatvaṃ
siddhapratipakṣabalāt siddhaṃ sad vyāvartyate nānyadetyavaktavyanirviṣayatā vānyathetyuktam .
anena śeṣamuktaṃ bhavatītyatidiśati --evamanyatvobhayatvādāvapīti . ādigrahaṇādanubhayatve
vāyaṃ nyāyo'vatāryaḥ . na tāvad bhāvasya viśeṣasya ubhayasya vā kathañcidapi pravibhāgato'pavibhāgato
vānyatvamasti ubhayatvamasti ityupakramya anyatvāsiddhāvekatvābhāvamubhayatvābhāvamubhayatvāsiddhau caikatvānyatvābhāvaṃ vā''pādayitvā bhāvayitavyamiti .
tadupasaṃharati --ityekatvādipratiṣedhāḥ kiṃ kathamityādi yāvad vyāvartayantīti . evamuktavidhinā ekatvādipratiṣedhāḥ kim ? ke te pratiṣedhāḥ ? na bhavantītyarthaḥ . tatpratiṣedhābhāvāt
kathamavaktavyamiti nirupapattikaṃ nirviṣayaṃ cetyarthaḥ . te tu ekatvādipratiṣedhā niṣedhyānāmatathātve
niṣedhyatvābhāve nirmūlā nirmūlatvādavaktavyameva vyāvartayantīti .
atrāha --na, parābhiprāyagataikatvādyekāntavyāvartanārthatvāt . na nirmūlāḥ pratiṣedhāḥ, na ca
nirviṣayamavaktavyam, ekatvādipratiṣedhatathārthatvāt . te hi parābhiprāyagatānāmekatvādīnāṃ pratiṣedhyānāmekāntānāṃ vyāvartanārthāḥ, tasmādadoṣa iti .
atrocyate --atha ta ekatvādaya ityādi yāvat kathaṃ pareṇa pratipannā iti . yadi tāvadekatvādayaḥ pareṇa yathā vidyante tathaiva pratipannāḥ santaḥ pratiṣidhyante tatastatrāvaktavyatvanirviṣayatoktā .
athāvidyamānā atyantamabhūtatvāt khapuṣpavadasantaste kathaṃ pratipattuṃ śakyante ? ato'pratipannatvādeva
na pratiṣedhyā iti pratiṣedhānupapattiḥ .
syānmatam--syādvāde'pi sāmānya-viśeṣayoḥ kimekatvaṃ nānātvamubhayatvamanubhayatvamavaktavyatvam ?
iti pṛṣṭe pratiṣedhāḥ kriyante--naikatvaṃ nānyatvaṃ nobhayatvaṃ nāvaktavyatvam, kiṃ tarhi ? syādekatvaṃ
syādanyatvaṃ syādubhayatvaṃ syādanubhayatvaṃ syādavaktavyamityādi . etaccāyuktaṃ tadvaidharmyāditi taddarśayati—
na hyeṣāṃ bhavatetyādi . syādvādo hi vādānāmīṣṭe nigrahānugrahasamarthatvāt, tasmiṃścaikatvādayo bhavanta


avaktavyaśabdasya tu pratipakṣaḥ sambhāvyate, nañyuktatvāt, abrāhmaṇavat . api ca
tvayāpi dikpratyāsattyā vaktavyo'rtha ityabhyupagatam . sa cāvaktavya eva nañā pratiṣidhyate .
tasmādarthādāpanno dvinañprayogaḥ pratiṣedhapratiṣedhatvāt prakṛtiṃ gamayati anabrāhmaṇavat .
saṃvṛtyaiva vāgvyavahāra iti cet; aparamārthastarhyavaktavyatvam, saṃvṛtisatyapadasamudāyārthatvāt, maṇḍūkajaṭābhārakṛtakeśālaṅkāravandhyāputrakhapuṣpamuṇḍamālākhyānavat . dharmadharmivibhāgavyavasthā'bhāvāt pakṣādyasādhanatvāt sambhāvanīyamavaktavyatvaṃ vastunaḥ, nānyathā .
evaikāntagrāhaniṣedhena nigṛhyante'nugṛhyante cānekāntapratipādanāt, na tadvadavaktavyavādinā bhavatāmeva
teṣāmekatvādīnāmekāntabhavanaṃ vyāvartyānekāntabhavanaṃ pratipādyate . tasmādasatpratiṣedhādasamañjaso'yaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ --vādaparameśvaravādavaditi . tatra hyanekāntarūpeṇa syādaikyaṃ syānnānātvam ityādi
vaktavyā eva santaḥ ekāntarūpeṇāvaktavyāḥ ityucyante sapratipakṣatvād bhāvānām, tathā hyāha--

sapratipakṣāṇyetāni yatastasmānna tāni vācyāni .
ekāntena hi vadato mithyāvādaḥ prasajyeta ॥   iti .

atra sādhanamāha niyamavidhinayaḥ --avaktavyaśabdasya tu pratipakṣaḥ sambhāvyate, nañyuktatvāt, abrāhmaṇavat . sambhāvyamānapratipakṣa evāvaktavyaśabdastadartho veti pakṣaḥ . nañyuktatvāditi śabde'rthe ca heturyojyaḥ, tathā dṛṣṭānto'pi abrāhmaṇavaditi brāhmaṇo na bhavatyanyo vā
brāhmaṇādityabrāhmaṇaḥ satyeva brāhmaṇe pratipakṣe kṣatriyādirbhavati tathā pratipakṣe vastuni vaktavye satyavaktavyaśabdo'rtho  vā bhavitumarhatīti .
api ca tvayāpītyādi . na kevalaṃ sambhāvanayāsmadīyayā vaktavyatvamavaktavyatvaṃ ca vastunaḥ,
kiṃ tarhi ? tvayāpi abhijalpaśabdārthavā  dinā dikpratyāsattyā vaktavyo'rthaḥ ityabhyupagatam, atra
cāvayormatisaṃvādaḥ, sa cāvaktavya eva tvanmatyā yo'bhijalpenocyate'rthaḥ so'vaktavya iti vaktavya eva
nañā pratiṣidhyate . tasmādarthādāpanno dvinañprayogo'yam--avaktavya ityavaktavyaḥ, sa ca dvinañprayogaḥ
pratiṣedhapratiṣedhatvāt prakṛtiṃ gamayati, anabrāhmaṇavaditi . athavā kaścilloke brūyāt--avaktavyo na
bhavati abrāhmaṇo na bhavati iti prayogavat so'navaktavyadvinañprayogāt pratiṣedhapratiṣedhatvāt prakṛtiṃ
gamayediti . etena svavacanābhyupagamavirodhāvudbhāvya svayaṃ vaktavyatve sādhanamāheti piṇḍārthaḥ .
saṃvṛtyaiva vāgvyavahāra iti cet . syānmatam--na śabdaḥ kañcidarthaṃ brūte, yathoktam—
vikalpayonayaḥ śabdā vikalpāḥ śabdayonayaḥ .teṣāmatyantasambandho nārthāñ śabdāḥ spṛśantyapi ॥  

atha yasyāvaktavyasya ete deśāḥ sāmānyaviśeṣaikatvānyatvādayastadviśeṣāt kiṃ tadavyatiriktaṃ vyatiriktaṃ vā ? avaktavyasya svāvayavatathāniyamādeva tasya vyavasthānāt .
yena yena vikalpena yad yad vastu vikalpyate .parikalpita evāsau svabhāvo na hi vidyate ॥ triṃśikāvijña॰
ityādi . tatra kaḥ śabdārthaḥ ? kā vā cintā--mayoktaṃ satyaṃ na tvayoktamiti ? tasmāt saṃvṛtisatyavyavahāragocaratvādadoṣaṃ sarvamiti .
atra brūmaḥ --aparamārthastarhi avaktavyatvam . kasmāt ? saṃvṛtisatyapadasamudāyārthatvāt,
yastvayā padasaṅghāto'bhyadhāyi vākyamiti śabdastadarthaśca sa saṃvṛtimātrārthatvādaparamārthaḥ . dṛṣṭāntaḥ—
maṇḍūkajaṭetyādi . maṇḍūkajaṭābhāreṇa kṛtaḥ keśālaṅkāro naṭakeśabhārako yasya vandhyāputrasya sa
maṇḍūkajaṭābhārakṛtakeśālaṅkāravandhyāputraḥ, tasya khapuṣpadāmnā muṇḍamālā kṛtā, tasyā ākhyānaṃ
surabhiḥ pañcavarṇā svākāragaganakusumamayī ityādi varṇanaṃ saṃvṛtisatyapadasamudāyārthatvānna paramārtha stathedaṃ
sarvamapīti nāstyavaktavyatā .
kiñcānyat, dharmadharmītyādi . ā viditamitthaṃ bhavatyavaktavyaṃ vastu, pratipādanapramāṇābhāvāt .
pratipādanapramāṇābhāvo dharmadharmivibhāgavyavasthābhāvāt, tadabhāvo'vaktavyatvāt . dharma-dharmiṇau hi
vibhāgena vyavasthitau punaḥ samuditau pakṣaḥ syāt, yathā sādhyadharmaviśiṣṭo dharmī pakṣaḥ--anityaḥ śabda
iti . tasya dharmiṇaḥ kṛtakatvādiranyo dharmo vyavasthita eva hetuḥ syāt . tau ca sādhyasādhanadharmau
sahitau dharmyantare pradarśyete yatra yat kṛtakaṃ tadanityaṃ dṛṣṭam, yathā ghaṭaḥ iti sa dṛṣṭānta itīdaṃ dharmadharmivibhāgavyavasthānātmakaṃ sādhanaṃ nopapadyate nirastadharmadharmivibhāgavyavasthatvāt, dharmadharminirasanaṃ
cāvaktavyatvād bhāvaviśeṣaikatvānyatvādinirasanadvāreṇa vastunastasya ca nirviṣayatvasyānantaroktatvāt .
tasmānnirastadharma-dharmisaṅgrahātmakatvāt pakṣādi asādhanam kharaṃ kharaviṣāṇam, sphuṭitapṛṣṭhatvāt,

yadi sāmānyakṛtaikatvobhayatvakṛtānyatvayorviśeṣeṇākrānteḥ sāmānyakṛtaikatvobhayatvakṛtānyatvaviśeṣāvyatiriktatāyāmavaktavyārthasaṃvādādavaktavyatvasya niyamatvāt tathā tathā
viśeṣādavyatiriktaṃ tato vyatirekādanyatvākṣānteḥ, nanu viśeṣamātramevaivam . yathā bhinno'pyeko
ākāśasphoṭavat iti pakṣādivat . tasmāt pakṣādyasādhanatvāt sambhāvanīyamavaktavyatvaṃ tvatparikalpitasya vastuno nānyathetyudghaṭṭako'yam .
abhyupetyāpi avaktavyatāṃ doṣaṃ brūmaḥ--idamasi tvaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ --atha yasyetyādi . avaktavyātmakasya deśino ya ete deśāḥ sāmānyaviśeṣaikatvānyatvādayo yaistadavaktavyamiṣyate teṣāṃ yo viśeṣo'vayavastasmāt kiṃ tadavyatiriktamityādi ayaṃ hi niyamavidhinayo viśeṣavādī tameva svābhipretaṃ
viśeṣaṃ gṛhītvā codayati .
syānmatam--sāmānyaviśeṣaikatvādinirākaraṇenaivāvaktavyaṃ jātyantaraṃ vastu niyamitaṃ niścitaniyatā'dhikabhāvena, tatra kutastadavyatiriktatvādipraśnotthānam ? iti, atrocyate--avaktavyasya
viśeṣāṣasvāvayavatathāniyamādevāsti tasya vastuno vyavasthānāt tat kiṃ tairavyatiriktaṃ vyatiriktaṃ vā ityādi praśnotthānaṃ tadavayavatvācca tasya sāmānyaviśeṣaikatvādyāśaṅkāsambhavavaditi
tadupapattiṃ pradarśayan paramatamāśaṅkate--tadyathā yadi sāmānyetyādi . sāmānyameva sāṅkhyādīnāmekaṃ vastu
ca . viśeṣa eva bauddhasya . ubhayaṃ vaiśeṣikasya paramato'nyat . tatrāvaktavyavāde yadi tat sāmānyakṛtamekatvaṃ viśeṣībhūtamākramya viśeṣaḥ svarūpaṃ vastunyarpayan sāmānyakṛtaikatvaviśeṣaṃ vyāvartayet na
sāmānyameva ityaviśeṣāpādanena yadi cobhayatvakṛtamanyatvaṃ na sāmānyaṃ ca viśeṣaścaiva iti, tatastadekatvānyatvayorapi viśeṣeṇāvyatiriktatāyāṃ satyāmavaktavyārthaḥ saṃvadet, nānyathā, teṣāmekatvādiviśeṣāṇāṃ svātantrye sati avaktavyatvanivṛtteḥ, viśeṣāṇāṃ hi vastuparatantratve sati avaktavyārtho
niyamyamānaḥ saṃvadatītyata āha --avaktavyatvasya niyamatvāt, tasya ca niyamasya tathā tathā
tena tena prakāreṇa sāmānyaviśeṣaikatvānyatvobhayatvādīnāmātmāntaranivṛttāvātmāntaratvāpatterviśeṣyamāṇasya niyamatvādavaktavyatvasya viśeṣatvameva, tasmādavyatiriktaṃ viśeṣādavaktavyaṃ vastu . yadi
punarviśeṣavyatiriktaṃ syāt tato vyatirekādanyatvaṃ viśeṣāṇāṃ vastunaḥ parasparataścaikatvādīnāṃ syāt .
taccānyatvaṃ na viṣahate vastu, ekāntāpatteravaktavyatvalopāt . iṣṭaṃ cāvaktavyaṃ tvayetyata āha—
tato vyatirekādanyatvākṣānteriti . itthaṃ viśeṣāvyatirekopapattiravaktavyavastuna iti .
tathā bhāvopavenā''krānterviśeṣakṛtaikatvobhayakṛtānyatvabhāvāvyatiriktatāyāmavaktavyārthasaṃvādādavaktavyatvasya niyamatvāt tathā tathā viśeṣādavyatiriktaṃ tato vyatirekādanyatvākṣānteḥ iti paṭhitvā bhāvavādipakṣe'pyupapattiravyatirekasya tathaiva yojyā . tathā

viśeṣaḥ svarūpādavyatiriktatvād viśeṣa evābhyupagamyate . yasya bhāvena sahaikatvānyatvādi
vicāryate yasmācca bhāva ekatvānyavādibhiravaktavya ucyate eṣa viśeṣo'pyekaikaḥ .
avyatireko hyekalakṣaṇam . sa ca vastu viśeṣāvyatiriktatvāt tatsvātmavat, bhavatīti
bhāva iti sattārthatvāt tasya . tataśca viśeṣamātrameva . tadekatvāt kuto'vacanīyatā tasya . na
hi viśeṣo'vacanīyaḥ, viśeṣāvyatiriktatvāt, tatsvātmavat . tathā ca nirdhāritārthāvaktavya-
sāmānyaviśeṣābhyāmākrānteḥ bhāvaviśeṣakṛtaikatvānyatvabhāvaviśeṣāvyatiriktatāyām
ityādiḥ sa eva grantho yāvat ekatvākṣānteḥ ityubhayavādipakṣe'pyupapattiravyatirekasya tathaiva yojyeti .
evamavaktavyavādimatasaṃvādād viśeṣāvyatiriktaṃ vastu . tataḥ kim ? yadyevaṃ viśeṣāvyatiriktaṃ
tata etadāyātam --nanu viśeṣamātramevaivaṃ niyamavidhinayamanorathapūraṇam . tad bhāvayati --yathā
bhinno'pītyādi, yathā parasparaviviktāsādhāraṇarūpatvād viśeṣāṇāṃ bhinno'pyeko viśeṣo rūpādiḥ
svarūpād rūpādyātmano'vyatiriktatvād viśeṣa eveti dṛṣṭāntavarṇanaṃ vakṣyamāṇatvādabhyupagamyata
iti tvayāpīṣṭamityanumānayati .
syānmatam--tat kathaṃ mayābhyupagatam ? iti tatpradarśanārthamāha --yasya bhāvenetyādi, yo'sau tvayā
kiṃ bhāvena saha viśeṣasya ekatvam, anyatvam ? ityādivicāre'bhyupagato yasmācca viśeṣād bhāva
ekatvānyatvādibhiravaktavya ityucyate eṣa viśeṣo'pi ekaikaḥ . kasmāt ? avyatireko hyekalakṣaṇam,
yaddhi na kutaścid vyatiricyate tad ekam ityucyate, yathā puruṣa evedaṃ sarvam śukla yaju. saṃ. 31 . 2
ityādi . sa ca viśeṣabhāvo vastu, avaktavyasya viśeṣāvyatiriktatvāt, uktavidhinā siddho
hetuḥ, tatsvātmavaditi viśeṣāvyatiriktaṃ viśeṣasya viśeṣa eva viśeṣa iti yathā tathā'vaktavyākhyamiti sambandhaḥ .
mā bhūt prāguktasāmānyaparyāyabhāvaśabdabuddhirityasaṃmohārthaṃ bhāvo vastu iti vastuparyāyatvaṃ
darśayannāha --bhavatīti bhāva iti sattārthatvāt tasya, tataśca viśeṣamātrameva iti sāmānyaśaṅkānirāso vastuparyāyaścetyupanayārthaḥ . mātragrahaṇāt siddhe sphuṭīkaraṇārthamiṣṭato'vadhāraṇārthaṃ ca evakāragrahaṇam . sthitamidameka eva viśeṣastadavaktavyasāmānyamiti, tasmiṃśca sthite tadekatvāt kuto'vacanīyatā ? dvitīyābhāvāt kena sahaikatvānyatvādyavaktavyatā tasya viśeṣamātrasya bhāvasya ? iti .
tadbhāvanā --na hi viśeṣa ityādi, nāvacanīyo viśeṣaḥ, viśeṣāvyatiriktatvāt, tatsvātmavadityuktārthopasaṃhārārthaṃ sādhanaṃ gatārtham . evaṃ nirdhārito viśeṣaḥ, nirdhāritatvād vācya eva syāt,
anirdhārite hyavācyaḥ syāt .


vacanād yādṛcchikavyavahāraprasaṅgaḥ . tasmādavaktavyasāmānyārtho viśeṣa eva iti
vaktavyaḥ, viśeṣāvyatiriktatvāt, tatsvātmavat . atha tathāpyavacanīyamevāvacanīyasāmānyamicchasi evaṃ tarhi viśeṣo viśeṣa ityavacanīyaḥ, viśeṣāvyatiriktatvāt, avaktavyasāmānyavat . tasyāpyavācyatve vastunaścāvācyatve tayoḥ parasparamavacanīyatvādubhayato'pyavacanīyaṃ sāmānyaṃ vacanīyaṃ prasaktam, tathā viśeṣo'pi .
atha viśeṣavyatiriktaṃ vastu, avaktavyatvāt . nanvevaṃ tasya bhāvatve vaktavyataiva
abhāvatve'pi vaktavyataiva . tathā tvaduktavadapyavastutā abhūtāvaktavyatvāt, yathā ca vastu
viśeṣād vyatiriktaṃ tathā viśeṣo'pi vastuno vyatiriktaḥ . evaṃ ca tadevāsattvamanayoḥ .
