sadgurubhyo namaḥ

atha dvādvaśādvādaśārāntaram .

etadapi pūrvavadevaikāntatvādayuktam, sambhavivikalpānupapatteḥ .
evaṃ bruvata evaṃ vijñānavacasī niḥsvabhāve .
athāatha mā bhūdayaṃ doṣa iti sasvabhāve vijñāna-vacasī abhyupagacchasi, sarvaṃ niḥsvabhāvamityabhyupagamavirodhaḥ . vacaso'pi sasvabhāvatve na tarhi sarvaṃ niḥsvabhāvamiti svavacanavirodhaśca doṣaḥ .

vidhyādisarvabhaṅgātmakaikavṛttisamyagdarśanādhikāre pratyekavṛttimithyādarśanatvāpādanārthaṃ pravṛttatvādāha --etadapi pūrvavadevaikāntatvādayuktam, yathā kṣaṇikameva rūpādisamudāyameva avaktavyameva
sāmānya-viśeṣaikā-'nyatvādīnītī ?tyekāntavādānāmayuktatvamekāntatvāt, yuktatve vā jainendratvamanekāntapratiṣṭhagatitvādvetyuktaṃ tathaitadapi sarvaṃ niḥsvabhāvam iti matam . kasmāt ? sambhavivikalpānupapatteḥ, asminnapi mate ye vikalpāḥ sambhavanti saṅgraheṇa vijñāna-vacasornaiḥsvābhāvyaṃ
svābhāvyaṃ vā ityanayoreva bhedā vakṣyamāṇāste sarvathā nopapadyante, tadanupapatterasyāpi matasyāyuktiḥ .
ato jainakalpitānekāntarūpatvaṃ vastunaḥ śreya ityupasaṃhāro bhaviṣyati .
tadyathā --evaṃ sarvaṃ niḥsvabhāvamiti bruvato'tītāsiddhyādiyuktiprakāreṇa tava iti pratyuccāraṇaṃ
prathamaivaṃśabdāt . dvitīyaivaṃśabdād vijñāna-vacasorapi tvayoktayoḥ sarvāntaḥpātitvādaviśeṣya sarvaṃ
niḥsvabhāvam ityuktatvād vijñānatattvāccātiprasaktaṃ vijñāna-vacasī niḥsvabhāve ityetad vacaḥ,
aniṣṭaṃ ca tad vijñāna-vacasorapratyāyanaprasaṅgāt . yadā hi vijñānamasat tadā niḥsvabhāvamidaṃ sarvam
ityaniścitam svayamaniścityāsmān pratipipādayiṣataste pakṣādisādhanavacanāsattvaṃ ca . tasmāt
parapratyāyanamayuktam vijñānavacasorniścitapakṣāditvenābhūtatvāt unmattavijñāna-pralāpavaditi niḥsvabhāvavikalpo jñāna-vacasoḥ sarvavastunaiḥsvābhāvyaṃ vyāvartayatīti doṣaḥ .
atha mā bhūdityādi . etaddoṣabhayāt sasvabhāve vijñānavacasī tvadīye cedabhyupagacchasi sarvaṃ
niḥsvabhāvam ityasyābhyupagamasya virodhaḥ, kena ? jñāna-vacanasasvabhāvatvābhyupagamenetyabhyupagamavirodhaḥ

evaṃ ca ghaṭādyapi sat, vyavahāravṛttatvāt, tadvākyavat . tacchūnyatve tu pratyakṣādivirodhāḥ . sarvanaiḥsvābhāvye tu pratyakṣādivirodhāḥ sphuṭā eva . sarvaśūnyavādagatapakṣadharmādyabhāvaśca na sādhyaḥ .
api ca vijñānābhyupagamād vijñānamātramevedaṃ sarvam, sarvasya sato vijñānalakṣaṇatvāt . sa ca puruṣa eva jñaḥ . tanmayaṃ cedam . yathoktaṃ prāk--
pratijñādoṣaḥ . na kevalamabhyupagamavirodha eva jñānaviṣayaḥ, vacaso'pi pakṣādilakṣaṇasyānte sasvabhāvatve
yat prāguktaṃ tanna tarhi sarvaṃ niḥsvabhāvam, idānīṃ sasvabhāvatvābhyupagamāt iti svavacanavirodhaśca
doṣaḥ, itiśabdasya hetvarthatvāt . itthaṃ sādhana-dūṣaṇa-pratipādya-pratipādanavyavahāramārgānupātinaḥ
sataste'numāna-āgama-lokavirodhā apītyata āha--
evaṃ ca ghaṭādyapi saditi pratijñāyate tvāṃ pratyasiddhatvāt sarvalokaprasiddhamapi . anantaroktasasvabhāvatve vijñāna-vacasoḥ iti smārayati evaṃśabdaḥ . kasmāt sad ghaṭādi ? iti cet, ucyate—
vyavahāravṛttatvāt, tadvākyavat, asiddhyayuktyanutpāda-sāmagrīdarśanā-'darśanapakṣa-parāyattobhayaviro- 
dhādivikalpahetukhapuṣpādidṛṣṭāntabuddhi-vacasāṃ sasvabhāvatvavad ghaṭādīnāṃ vyavahāravṛttānāṃ sasvabhāvatvaṃ
syāditi . tacchūnyatve tu pratyakṣādivirodhāḥ, tasya tasya vacanasya śrotrendriyapratyakṣasya pakṣādyavayavavibhāgasya ghaṭādipratipādyārthasahitasya tadvijñānasya ca tava mama ca svasaṃvedyasya śūnyatve pratyakṣādivirodhāḥ sasvabhāvatvamanicchataḥ . icchata abhyupagama-svavacanavirodhāvuktāveva . ādigrahaṇādanumānā''gamavirodhau, arhad-buddha-kapila-kaṇāda-brahmādiproktairāgamaiḥ saha virodhitvāt . lokavirodhastu
prasahyaivopāttastvayā ghaṭādayo bāhyārthāḥ jñāna-vacane ca santi iti prapannaṃ sarvalokamavamatya śūnyāḥ
sarvabhāvāḥ iti pravṛttatvāt . evaṃ jñāna-vacanaśūnyāśūnyatvayorabhyupagamavirodhādisarvadoṣāḥ . sarvanaiḥsvābhāvye tu sarve'pi pratyakṣādivirodhāḥ sphuṭā eva jñāna-vacanayoḥ sarvāntaḥpātitvād yathā yojitaṃ tayā
diśetyevaṃ tāvat pakṣadoṣāḥ sāmānyata uktāḥ .
doṣadikpradarśanārthaṃ tayaiva diśāha--sarvaśūnyavādagatapakṣadharmādyabhāvaśca na sādhyaḥ, asiddhyādipakṣāsiddhau parāyattādihetavo na sidhyantyevānayoktadiśeti sphuṭatvānnātrābhiniviśāmahe .
api ca vijñānābhyupagamādityādi yāvat sato vijñānalakṣaṇatvāditi . tvayaivābhyupaga-
tamasiddhyādihetubhirbāhyārthanaiḥsvābhāvyamāpādya vijñānamātramevedaṃ sarvaṃ svapnasiṃhādivajjāgratsiṃhadarśana

puruṣa evedaṃ sava yad bhūtaṃ yacca bhāvyam .utāmṛtatvasyeśāno yadannenātirohati ॥ ṛgvedaḥ 10 . 8 . 90
nanu vijñānaśabdenotprekṣāmātramucyate nārthavattvaṃ vijñānasya . yathoktaṃ tadabhāve
tadapyasat... ...svapnamudāharadbhiḥ .
etadapyayuktam, jāgaritavyatiriktasvapnodāharaṇādeva vijñānamātratvavyāvartanāt .
yadi tanmātraṃ kiṃ svapno'svapnaḥ ? svapnasya jāgaraṇād viśeṣaṇaṃ na ghaṭate, ubhayorapyabhāvatulyatvāt .
putrajanmādi-bhaya-harṣa-sukha-duḥkhādivijñānamapi ityataḥ sarvasya vijñānalakṣaṇasyaiva sattvāt tasya ca
sarvatvāt sarvametadvijñānamātram, sa ca puruṣa eva jñaḥ, tanmayaṃ cedamatītānāgatābhimatamapi vartamānameva
stimitasaraḥsalilataraṅgabudbudādyavasthāvat suṣupta-supta-jāgarita-turīyākhyacaturavasthāmātrabhedamabhinnamastyevāstītyabhyupagataṃ bhavati . yathoktaṃ vidhividhinayārabhaṅge prāk-puruṣa evedaṃ sarvamityādi .
etat puruṣasūktaṃ vyākhyātaṃ tatraiveti na punarvivriyate .
atrāha --nanu vijñānaśabdena utprekṣāmātramucyate nārthavattvaṃ vijñānasya . svapnasiṃhadarśanabhayādivat ityudāhṛtya kalpanāmātratvasya pratipāditatvād grāhyābhāvaḥ, grāhyābhāve grāhakatvasyābhāvaḥ .
yathoktaṃ tadabhāve tadapyasaditi pratyuccāraṇameva tadarthaṃ yāvat svapnamudāharadbhiriti .
atrocyate--etadapyayuktam, jāgaritavyatiriktasvapnodāharaṇādeva vijñānamātratvavyāvartanāt .
sapratipakṣatvācca bhāvānāṃ pramāṇa-pramāṇābhāsatvavat sādhya-dṛṣṭāntabhedābhyupagamo'vaśyaṃbhāvī . yadi
tanmātraṃ kimityādi, yadi vijñānameva svapno'svapno na bhavati, tasmin svapne siṃhadarśanamasadeva
bhayanimittam, vibuddhasya bhayāpagamo'sattve svapnasiṃhasya, jāgratsiṃhadarśanaṃ ca sākṣānmṛtyunimittaṃ
satyameva, prītihetuśca jāgratputradarśanam, svapne'tadapekṣaṃ vibuddhe prītyapagamāt . bhinnau tau ityavagamya
jāgradvijñānavyatiriktasvapnodāharaṇaṃ yujyate . tattu tvatpakṣe svapnasya jāgaraṇād viśeṣaṇaṃ na ghaṭate,
kasmāt ? ubhayorapyabhāvatulyatvāt khapuṣpasya vandhyāsutādiveti .


pratipādyamatyapekṣayeti cet, na, ubhayorapyabhāvatulyatvāt . khapuṣpavyudasanena ca
svapnasiṃhadarśanavaditi vacanaṃ ghaṭate . nanu vijñānaviṣayā cāstitā sthitaiva . nirbhedaṃ ca
nāstitvaṃ nāstyeva . sattvameva tat tathā .
athocyeta--vijñānāstitvamapi kaḥ pratipadyate kalpanāmātratvāt ? vijñānāddhi
vijñānaṃ tadvijñeyābhāve kutastat ? svapne tatkāraṇasya vijñeyasyābhāvāt . vibuddhe'pyevameva .
evamapi vijñāna-vijñeyā-'vijñānā-'vijñeyatadatadbhedābhyupagamāt sadvāda evābhyupagato'tra tvayā .

pratipādyamatyapekṣayeti cet . syānmatam--bhāvyadṛṣṭāntayorjāgara-svapnavijñānayorarthābhāvatulyatvaṃ tathāpi tvatprasiddhābhāvārthena svapnenaiva jāgarābhāvārthatvapratipādanaṃ sukaraṃ tvanmatyanuvṛttyā
kriyate . ayaṃ hi pratipādyasya materanurodha upāyaḥ pratipādayitumabhāvatulyatve'pīti .
etacca na, ubhayorapyabhāvatulyatvāt, materapyamaterbhedena viśeṣaṇaṃ pratipādyasya pratipādakāderapratipādyād viśeṣaṇam ityādyapyabhāvatulyatvānna ghaṭata eva . kiñcānyat, svapnadṛṣṭānto'pi
khapuṣpavyudasanena ca svapnasiṃhadarśanavat iti vacanaṃ ghaṭate khapuṣpaṃ na bhavati siṃha iti . svapnadṛṣṭāntavyākhyāne ca vṛthābhaya-harṣādi viśeṣaṇamavṛthābhaya-harṣādinā vinā na bhavitumarhati .
nanvityanujñāpayati . kiñcānyat, vijñānaviṣayā cāstitā nanu sthitaiva, vijñānamātram
iti bruvatā vijñānāstitvamabhyupagatameva tvayā, tataśca sarvaṃ niḥsvabhāvam ityetad mithyā .
kiñca, nirbhedaṃ ca nāstitvaṃ nāstyeva, kutaścit sato vastuno viśeṣya sadeva śakyaṃ vaktuṃ
nāstīti khapuṣpasya puṣpaṃ nāsti nāśokasya iti, nāviśeṣya . tasmānna śūnyatvaṃ sarvasya, sarvamiti
sattvameva tat tathā tena prakāreṇa svapnavijñānasiṃhāderapi nāstitvamanyāstitvaṃ sādhayatīti .
athocyetetyādi . vijñānāstitvamapi kaḥ pratipadyate, kalpanāmātratvāt ? asiddhyādihetubhya eva svapnavannāsti vijñānamapi, vijānāti iti hi vijñānaṃ syāt, sā ca vijñānakriyā kartṛtvaṃ
vā vijñānasya nāsti vijñeyakarmābhāvāt svapne . tat pradarśayannāha --vijñānāddhi vijñānaṃ tadvijñeyābhāve kutastat ? vijānāti iti vijñānasya vijñānatvaṃ syāt, tadvijñeye karmaṇyasati kutaḥ ? nāsti
kutaścit kāraṇāt, svapne tatkāraṇasya vijñeyasyābhāvāt . vibuddhe'pyevameveti jāgradvijñānasyāpi
svapnavijñānavad vijñeyābhāve vijñānatvābhāvāt kā vijñānāstitvāśā ? iti .
atrocyate --evamapītyādi . vijānāti vijñānam ityavijñānāt svapnājjāgradvijñānaṃ viśeṣyate
tvayaiva, avijñānam iti ca svapno jāgradvijñānāt, tathā vijñeyam ityavijñeyāt svapnaviṣayādarthā

tathā vijñāna-bhāvādiṣu nañaḥ kā gatiḥ ? kiṃ prāgādiviśeṣeṇa nāsti utāviśeṣeṇavaṇaiva ? yadi viśeṣya nāsti tataḥ prākpaścāditaretarāsāmarthyāsaṃyogebhyo nanu nirvṛttā'dhvasta-tat-samartha-sambaddhaghaṭāstitvameva prasajyate .
athocyeta--naiva nirvṛttāstitvādiprasaṅgaḥ, vandhyāputrādivadaviśeṣya atyantaṃ nāstītyucyate . atha kathaṃ punarvandhyāputro na bhavati ? yadi tadviṣayo'tyantābhāvaḥ syāt vandhyāputro na sambhavet . sambhavati tu svayaṃ bhavitṛtvena . tadyathā--bhavacca tad dravyaṃ cetanamace-
bhāsājjāgradviṣayo rūpādirarthaḥ, jāgradviṣayācca vijñeyāt avijñeyam iti svapnaviṣayaṃ vastu taccātacca
bhedenābhyupagamyate jñāna-vacanaviṣayatayā sadvāda evābhyupagato'tra tvayā . no ced vijñāna-vijñeyā'vijñānā-'vijñeya-jñāna-vacanaviśeṣaṇabhedābhāvādabhāvāviśeṣāt tūṣṇīṃbhāvaste samāśrayaṇīyaḥ syāt .
kiñcānyat, tathā vijñānetyādi . vijñānamapi vijñānaṃ na bhavati, bhāvo bhāvo na bhavati
ityādiṣu nañaḥ kā gatiḥ ? vicārya tvayā vācyam, kimatra niścitaṃ sattvamasattvaṃ vijñānādeḥ ? kiṃ
prāgādiviśeṣeṇa nāstīti utāviśeṣeṇaiva ? iti nirdhārya brūhi . tatra yadi viśeṣya nāsti
ityucyate tataḥ prākpaścāditaretarāsāmarthyāsaṃyogebhyaḥ yathā ghaṭaḥ prāg nāsti mṛdādyavasthāyāṃ
paścāt kapālatve itaretaratayā paṭatve asāmarthye chidrabudhnatve asaṃyoge gehe nāstīti tato yathāsaṅkhyaṃ
nanu nirvṛttetyādi, prāgabhāve nirvṛtto'sti iti nañ viśeṣayati, paścādabhāve'pi adhvasto'sti
iti, itaretarābhāve so'sti, asāmarthyābhāve samartho'sti, gehasaṃyogābhāve bahiḥsaṃyogo'sti iti .
tasmādastitvameva ghaṭasya nañ viśeṣayati .
athocyate--naivetyādi . atha mā bhūdevaṃ nirvṛttāstitvādiprasaṅga ityaviśeṣya nāsti, na
bhavati ityādiparyāyairasiddhyādihetubhyo vandhyāputrādivadaviśeṣāṣyā'tyantaṃ nāstītyucyate evaṃ
cenmanyase, atrāpi brūmaḥ --atha kathaṃ punarityādi, bandhyāputranāstitvamapi atyantābhāvābhimatamasiddham,
ato nirvṛttā-'dhvasta-tat-sāmarthya-sambandhapramāṇādiviśeṣapratiṣedhavācinaiva nañā sāmānādhikaraṇyād
bhavatyeveti vayaṃ sambhāvayāmaḥ .
yadi tadviṣaya ityādi . yadi vandhyāputro'tyantābhāvaḥ syāt nirvṛttyādimatprāgabhāvādisvabhāveṣu na sambhavet, sambhavati tu svayaṃ bhavitṛtvena, tasmānnātyantābhāvaḥ, kiṃ tarhi ? sambhavatyevāsya
nirvṛttyādi bhavitṛtvabhākṣvartheṣu . tadyathā--bhavacca tat sambhāvyate dravyaṃ cetanamacetanaṃ ca dvividham .

tanaṃ ca . tatra cetanasya anādyanantabhavabhāvitvam, karmaparivartānyathātvāt, itaradravyavat .
anantarabhavavandhyā... ... ...prabandhātmakatvāt avandhyātve'pi tadbhāvānatiriktatvāt
tadvad bālakumāravadvā .
acetanasyāpi tadbhāvānatiriktatvādanādyanantaviparivartānyathātvāda viruddhaṃ vandhyāputratvam tadanyonyānugatimantareṇa tadabhāvāt śarīrārambhavat .
tatra cetanasyetyādi, idaṃ hi cetanamātmadravyamanādyanantabhaveṣu bhavitumutsahate, kutaḥ ? karmaparivartānyathātvāt, anādyanantakarmabandhasantānasya viparivartāstiryaṅ-nara-narakā-'marabhavāḥ, te cānādyanantā
bhavanaśīlā eva svajātyaparityāgenā'nyathā'nyathā'nyathābhavantaḥ, itaradravyavat pudgaladravyavat, yathā
pudgaladravyaṃ rūpa-rasa-gandha-sparśalakṣaṇamūrtyācaitanyāparityāgena bhūmyudaka-vahni-pavana-vanaspati-trasa-śarīriśarīra-śītoṣṇa-tamaśchāyā-''tapodyotādiparivartamanyathā tathā cānubhavati tathā cetanātmakarmaparivartānubhāvimanuṣyastrīvandhyāvātvābhyāṃ pracyutya janmāntare manuṣyatvotpattau strītvotpattau vā putravattve
dravyārthābhedāt saiva vandhyā putravatī jāyata ityatra vandhyāputra ityenamarthaṃ daṇḍakena darśayati—
anantarabhavavandhyetyādinā yāvat prabandhātmakatvāt avandhyātve'pi, kasmāt ? tadbhāvānatiriktatvāt, tasmāt pūrvasmād bhāvādanatiriktaḥ sakarmā cetanaḥ, tadvat pūrvavandhyātvavat putravattvaparyāyasambhūtāvapi bālakumāravadveti dṛṣṭāntāntaraṃ lokasiddham, yathā bālaḥ kumāro yuvā ityādiparyāyeṣvapi sa eva bhavati tathā vandhyā-putravattvāvasthayoreka eva jīva iti . evaṃ tāvaccetanasyānādyanantabhavabhāvitvāt tadbhāvānatiriktatvācca tattve vandhyāputrāstitvamuktam .
acetanasyāpi brūmaḥ . tadyathā--vandhyāśarīragatānāṃ pudgalānāmutsṛṣṭānāṃ keśa-nakha-danta-mūtraśakṛt-sveda-rasa-rudhira-māṃsādīnāṃ mṛttva-vrīhyāditvasambhūtau a ?vandhyayā striyā puṃsā vā''hāritānāṃ
rakta-śukratvādibhāvena copāttānāṃ putratvenotpattāvapi vandhyāputrāstitvaṃ tadbhāvānatiriktatvādanādyanantaviparivartānyathātvāt ityādinā nyāyenāviruddhaṃ vandhyāputratvam . tat sādhayati --tadanyonyānugatimantareṇa tadabhāvāt, yad yadanyonyānugatimantareṇa na bhavati tat tat tasyaiva tadeva vā, śarīrārambhavat, yathā śarīraṃ teṣāṃ pudgalānāmanādyanantabhavabhāviparivartānyathātvādanyonyānugatimantareṇābhāvācca tānyeva tāni jīvapudgaladravyāṇi tathā vandhyāyā eva pudgalāḥ putrapudgalā ityapyaviruddhaṃ
vandhyāputratvam . tasmādasti vandhyāputraḥ .


tasmāt sarvamidaṃ sarvasvabhāvamaśūnyamiti pratipattavyam aśūnyagṛhavat praveṣṭṛsthātṛnirgantṛkalpotpādasthitivināśasahitameva sarvamekamanekātmakaṃ vyavahārapravyaktāparikalpitatadatadākāraṃ svataḥ parata ubhayataścāstyeva .
atha kathaṃ svaparobhayabhāvaḥ ? saṃsiddhisaṃyuktyanutpādasāmagrīdarśanasadādarśanebhyaḥ .
saṃsiddhistāvat tadātmabhedaikībhāvena sadbhāvaḥ . dīrghatvaṃ dīrghe'styeva aparāyattatvāt .
yadi tvasvaviṣayametat syāt, nānāmikā madhyamādīrghatāyāmapi kaniṣṭhikāto dīrghā syāt,
na ca madhyamā śakrayaṣṭidīrghatāyām . evaṃ hrasvatvamapi .

tasmāt sarvamidamityādi . sarvaśūnyavāde sādhana-dūṣaṇāsambhavāt pratipādya-pratipādakavyavahārābhāvāt vijñānamātrapakṣasyāpi sarvaikajñapuruṣamātratvābhyupagamāpatteḥ svapna-vandhyāputrādidṛṣṭāntānāṃ ca
sarvasarvātmakatve sati asiddheḥ idaṃ sarvasvabhāvamaśūnyam iti pratipattavyam tvaduktārthaviparyayeṇa aśūnyagṛhavat praveṣṭṛva-sthātṛpraveṣṭṛ-sthātṛ-nirgantṛkalpairutpāda-sthiti-vināśaiḥ sahitameva sarvamekamanekātmakamaṅgulivakrapraguṇatvādivat vicitravarṇakṛkalāsavadvā vyavahāreṇa pravyajyamānaiḥ saha-kramabhāvibhiraparikalpitaireva
satyairbhedairnityādibhistaccātacca vastu tadatadākāravipariṇāmadarśanād vyavahārapravyaktāparikalpitatadatadākāraṃ svataḥ parata ubhayataścāstyeva, na nāsti iti grāhyamuktanyāyāt .
atrāha --atha kathaṃ sva-parobhayabhāvaḥ ? iti . atra brūmaḥ --saṃsiddhi-saṃyuktyanutpādasāmagrīdarśana-sadādarśanebhyo hetubhyaḥ .
saṃsiddhistāvatsam ityekībhāve, sarve bhāvā bhedābhimatāḥ sāmānyāntarbhūtāḥ parasparamekībhūtāḥ
sidhyantītyata āha --saṃsiddhistadātmabhedaikībhāvena sadbhāvaḥ, saṃsiddhiḥ sahabhāvaḥ sahanirvṛttiryugapadvṛttirityanarthāntaram . tad bhāvayati --dīrghatvaṃ dīrghe'styeva, aparāyattatvāt svāyattatvādevetyarthaḥ .
taddhi dīrghatvaṃ svāyattamevānāmikāyāḥ . yadi svatvasvaviṣayametat kaniṣṭhikāhrasvatvāpekṣamanāmikādīrghatvaṃ tvanmatena syāt nānāmikā madhyamādīrghatāyāmapi kaniṣṭhikāto dīrghā syāt,
madhyamāṃ dīrghāṃ dṛṣṭvā svagatena hrasvatvapariṇāmena hrasvā satī dīrghā punarna syādevārthāntarāpekṣayāpi
svātmanyavidyamānadīrghatvāt khapuṣpavat madhyamāyattahrasvatvāt, bhavati tu dīrghāpi svāyattakaniṣṭhikāpekṣasvagatadīrghatvapariṇāmāt . tasmāt svāyattaṃ dīrghatvamanāmikāyāḥ . tathā na ca madhyamā śakrayaṣṭidīrghatāyāṃ śakrayaṣṭyapekṣamadhyamāhrasvapariṇāmāt svagatād hrasveti na cānāmikāpekṣāt svadīrghatva

svagatanānārūpyānatikramāttu ekapuruṣapitṛputratvādivat tathā tathā niyamavṛtterhrasvatvadīrghatvāvyāghātaḥ . evaṃ netaretarābhāvetaretarāśrayāsiddhayaḥ . hrasve'pi ca dīrghatvaṃ dīrghatve'pi hrasvatvam, apratidbandvitvāt, iṣṭahrasvadīrghasvātmavat . evameva cetaretarayogavicārānavatāraḥ .
pariṇāmāt dīrghā syāt iti vartate, bhavati tu . tasmādanāmikāyā madhyamāyāśca kaniṣṭhikāpekṣābhimataṃ
dīrghatvaṃ svāyattameva dīrghatarāpekṣe hrasvatve saṃvṛtte'pi sasvato hrasvatarāpekṣayā dīrghatvasyāvasthitatvāt .
evaṃ hrasvatvamapītyanenaiva nyāyena kaniṣṭhikāyā hrasvatvamapi svāyattameva ityatidiśati . yadi
hyasvaviṣayametat syāt na kaniṣṭhikā'nāmikādīrghatāyāmapi saparvāvayavādibhyo dīrghā syāt, na
cānāmikā madhyamādīrghatāyāmiti .
kasmāddhetoḥ ? svagatanānārūpyānatikramāttu yasmādātmagatā eva tāstāḥ sāpekṣa-nirapakṣāḥ
pariṇāmaśaktayo hrasva-dīrgha-sthūla-kṛśa-laghu-guru-nityā-'nitya-mūrtā-'mūrta-cetanā-'cetanādayaḥ pudgalānā-
manyeṣāṃ cākāśā-''tma-kālādīnāṃ sve sve pariṇāmā jainendradarśanāt sarvasarvātmakadravyārthanaye vā
vidhividhyādibhaṅgāntare . kimiva ? ekapuruṣapitṛputratvādivat, yathaika eva puruṣaḥ svaputrāpekṣayā
pitṛtvena pariṇataḥ svapitrapekṣayā ca putratvena tathā mātula-bhāgineya-bhrātṛ-śvaśura-pautra-dauhitra-bhrātrīyaprācyodīcya-hrasva-dīrgha-paṇḍita-mūrkha-svāmi-dāsādiśaktibhiḥ pariṇamati svagatābhirāpekṣakṣikaiśca
jñāna-darśana-sukha-duḥkha-krodha-harṣa-bhayādibhirutpāda-vyaya-dhrauvyalakṣaṇatvād vastutvāt . na ca tāḥ śaktayastatrāvidyamānāḥ sambhāvyante khapuṣpādāviva . na ca tāsāṃ śaktīnāṃ parasparavirodho nāpyanavasthā na
ca saṅkaraḥ svaputrāpekṣayā pitṛtvasya niyatatvāt, evaṃ śeṣāṇāmapītyata āha dārṣṭāntikam --tathā tathā 
niyamavṛtteḥ hrasvatva-dīrghatvāvyāghāta iti etad virodhābhāvopanayanam, tathā saṅkarā-'navasthādoṣābhāvopanayanamapi draṣṭavyam .
evaṃ netaretarābhāvetaretarāśrayāsiddhaya iti . anenaiva svagatanānārūpyānatikramāttvekapuruṣapitṛ-putratvavat tathā niyamapravṛtterhrasvatva-dīrghatvāvyāghāta iti doṣaparihāranyāyena hrasvasadbhāvo 
dīrghasyābhāvo na bhavatīti sahānavasthānadoṣaparihāraḥ kṛto bhavatīti tasmādeva hetoruktadṛṣṭāntavat .
tathā itaretarāśrayatvādasiddhiḥ ityeṣo'pi doṣo nāsti uktavat svāśrayatvādeva .
ata evāpratidvandvitvam, viruddhābhimatasarvadharmāvirodhavṛttatvāt ata, itthaṃ sādhanam --hrasve'pi
ca dīrghatvamiti pakṣaḥ, dvitīyo dīrghatve'pi hrasvatvamiti . eka eva hetuḥ --apratidvandvitvāditi .

saṃyukterapi ca svaparobhayabhāvaḥ . iha bhāva eva bhāvo nābhāvaḥ . sa ca tadatadatītānāgatavartamāneṣu aviśiṣṭa eka eva tadbhāve bhāvāt tadabhāve'bhāvāt ghaṭa-pāṃśu-karpāsatantu-paṭavat . iti sarvasarvaikyam . tatra astyeko ghaṭaḥ iti trayāṇāmekatve yatraikatvaṃ
tatrāstitvasyāpi niṣkalena svatattvena bhavitavyam, anarthāntaratvāt, yatra yasyānarthāntaratvaṃ
tatra tasya niṣkalameva svatattvaṃ bhavati ekasminnekatvasvatattvavat . astitvasvatattvaṃ ca sarva-
iṣṭahrasva-dīrghasvātmavat, iṣṭasya hrasvasya svātmā tena svātmanā hrasvatvenāpratidvandvitvād hrasve
bhavatyevaṃ hrasve dīrghatvaṃ bhavati dīrghe'pi hrasvatvaṃ hrasvātmavaditi virodhadoṣo'pi parihṛta ittham .
yo'pi tadanantaramitaretarayogadoṣodbhāvanāya vicāraḥ kṛtastasyānavatāra eva, sva-parobhayebhyo
bhavane sarvabhedānāṃ virodhābhāvapratipādanādeva tadgatadoṣaparihārasyāpi kṛtatvāt . ata āha—
evameva cetaretarayogavicārānavatāra iti gatārtham . evaṃ tāvat sva-parobhayabhāvaḥ saṃsiddheḥ siddhaḥ .
saṃyukterapi ca sva-parobhayabhāvaḥ . tad bhāvayati --iha bhāva eva bhāvo nābhāva iti
sarvabhedaśakti bhavatyeva bhavati vastu na na bhavati ityuktatvāt . sa cetyādi, sa ca bhāvaḥ tadatadatītā-'nāgata-vartamāneṣu tasminnatasmiṃśca vṛtte vartamāne vartsyati ca deśa-kālaviśiṣṭābhimateṣu
aviśiṣṭa eka eva . kasmāt ? tadbhāve bhāvāt tadabhāve'bhāvāt, teṣu teṣu svabhedeṣu
bhavatsveva bhavati abhavatsu na bhavati atastadbhāve bhāvāt tadabhāve cābhāvādaviśiṣṭa eva tebhya
ekaḥ . kimiva ? ghaṭa-pāṃśu-karpāsa-tantu-paṭavat, yathā ghaṭaḥ kapāla-śakalādikrameṇa pāṃśubhūtaḥ,
pāṃśurmṛt, mṛdi karpāsabījasambandhāt karpāsībhūtāyāṃ tantavaḥ, tantubhyaḥ paṭa iti krameṇa ghaṭa-paṭaikatvavat
sarvasarvaikyamiti sthite'sminnyāye tatra astyeko ghaṭaḥ iti trayāṇāmekatvameva, sati caikatve
yatraikatvaṃ tatrāstitvasyāpi niṣkalena svatattvena bhavitavyam, kasmāt ? anarthāntaratvāt .
asya hetoḥ sādhyenānvitatvaṃ pradarśyate --yatra yasyetyādi yāvat svatattvaṃ bhavatīti gatārtham . kimiva ?
ekasminnekatvasvatattvavat, yathaikasmin vastuni ekatvasvatatvaṃ tato'narthāntaratvānniṣkalameva bhavati
tathaikatve'stitvamapi niṣkalameva bhavitumarhatīti . astitvasvatattvaṃ ca sarvabhāvā iti pareṇāniṣṭamāpādayitumuktam, mama tu sarvaśakti ekaṃ vastvicchata iṣṭameveti na doṣaḥ .


bhāvāḥ . yatrāstitvamityādi sādhanaṃ pūrvavat . astitvaikatvābhyāmananye sarvabhāvāḥ ghaṭādayaḥ,
ekaśca ghaṭastadananyadastitvam, saṃśca ghaṭastadananyadekatvam iti ghaṭe sarvasiddhiḥ .
tathā ghaṭatvaṃ yatra tatrāstitvaikatvayorapi niṣkalenaiva svatattvena bhavitavyam, anarthāntaratvāt, yatra yasyānarthāntaratvaṃ tatra tasya niṣkalameva svatattvaṃ bhavati ghaṭa iva ghaṭasvatattvasya . ato ghaṭādananyatve'stitvaikatvayorastitvaikatvāvyatirekād ghaṭavat sarvaḥ paṭādirapi
ghaṭaḥ . tathā'pādiḥ . ūrdhvamadhyabudhnadeśabhede'pyabhinnaḥ sa evaiko'sti ca ghaṭaḥ . bālakumārādibhede sa evaiko naraḥ . tathā sarvabhāvāḥ .
tathā ca sarvātmakamekamevāsti vastviti pratyakṣādipramāṇairupalabhāmahe . anyathā
pratyakṣādivirodhāḥ .

kiñcānyat, yatrāstitvamityādi dvitīyamaniṣṭāpādanaṃ pareṇoktaṃ tadapīṣṭameveti pūrvavat
parihāra iti manyamānastathaiva sādhanaṃ pūrvavadityatidiśati . tadyathā --yatrāstitvaṃ tatraikatvasyāpi
niṣkalenaiva svatattvena bhavitavyam, tato'narthāntaratvāt, yatra yasyānarthāntaratvaṃ tatra tasya niṣkalameva
svatattvam, astitve'stisvatattvavat, ekatvasvatattvaṃ ca sarvasminnekaikasmin ekaikamastyekaṃ cetyato'- 
stitvaikatvābhyāmananye sarvabhāvāḥ . ke ca te ? ghaṭādayaḥ ghaṭa-paṭādayaḥ . ekaśca ghaṭastadananyadastitvam, ekaghaṭādananyadastitvam, tasmādeka-ghaṭābhyāmananyasmādastitvādananye sarvabhāvāḥ . ata
ekasmādavyatirekāt sarvameva ghaṭaḥ paṭādiḥ . saṃśca ghaṭa iti sattvenaikatvāvyatirekadvāreṇa paghaṭaikatvāstitvābhyāṃ sarvabhāvaghaṭatvaṃ yathā evaṃ ghaṭe sarvasiddhiḥ astitvāvyatirekādekatvāvyatirekatvācceti
ghaṭe sarvasiddhiruktā .
tathā ghaṭatvamityādinā ghaṭe astitvaikatvāvyatirekatvādanarthāntaratvādinā'stitvaikatvāvyatirekād ghaṭavat sarvaḥ paṭādirapi ghaṭaḥ . tathā'pādiḥ udakādirapi ghaṭa eva yāvān bhāvaḥ, na me
kaściddoṣaḥ, matpakṣasādhanā eva te hetavaḥ . tannidarśanam--deśamātrabhede tāvat ūrdhvamadhyabudhnadeśabhede'pyabhinnaḥ sa evaiko'sti ca ghaṭaḥ, kālamātrabhede'pi bāla-kumārādibhede sa evaiko naraḥ,
tathā sarvabhāvāḥ, parasparato deśa-kālā-''kārādimātrabhede'pi ekabhavanāviśiṣṭatvādabhinna eka eva
bhāvo bhinna ivābhāti .
tathā cetyādi . evamuktanyāyena sarvātmakamevakamevāsti nityaṃ sarvagataṃ sarvabhedasvabhāvaṃ ca
vastviti pratyakṣādipramāṇairupalabhāmahe . ato'nyathā pratyakṣādivirodhāḥ, ghaṭasya kapāla-mṛt-karpāsa

ete cenneṣyante sarvaṃ ghaṭo'styeka iti pratipattavyam, ghaṭānarthāntaratvāt, ghaṭasvātmavat .
viparītasvabhāvābhāvabahutvādyāśaṅkānavatāra eva anyatvānabhyupagamāt .
athocyeta--nanvanyathā tāvad nāstyeva ghaṭaḥ . ghaṭaḥ paṭatvena nāsti paṭo'pi ghaṭatvenetyādi . ghaṭo hi ghaṭa evopalabhyate na tvasau paṭo'pīti . atha punaḥ sāmānye ghaṭasyāstitvaikatve syātāṃ tataḥ sarvarūpa upalabhyeta ghaṭaḥ .
ko vā bravīti nopalabhyata iti ? 'na bhoḥ ! ahamupalabhyamānameva sarvarūpaṃ santaṃ
tantu-paṭa-vrīhyudakādiparivartasya pratyakṣaṃ darśanāt pratyakṣavirodhastadbhāvameva sarvātmakamanicchataḥ .
tādṛgvidhārthānumeyatvādanumānavirodhaḥ lokā-''gamā-'bhyupagama-svavacanavirodhāḥ svaparalokaprasiddhasādhanadūṣaṇasaṃvyavahārābhyupagamādastyekatvāvyatirekācca teṣām .
ete cenneṣyante mā bhūvannete doṣā iti maduktaṃ yāvat kiñcit tat sarvaṃ ghaṭo'styeka iti
pratipattavyam, kasmāt ? ghaṭānarthāntaratvāt, ghaṭasvātmavaditi sādhanamupasaṃhārārtham . evaṃ tāvat
trayāṇāmekatve nāsti doṣaḥ .
yat punaruktam astyekaghaṭānāṃ trayāṇāṃ nānātve viparītasvabhāvatvaṃ ghaṭabahutvamabhāvatvaṃ ca
prāpnuyuḥ iti vikalpāntarāśaṅkayā vicārāntaraṃ kṛtaṃ tatra brūmaḥ --viparītasvabhāvā-'bhāva-bahutvādyāśaṅkānavatāra eva, anyatvānabhyupagamāt sarvaśaktyekavastutadātmabhedaikībhāvena saṃsiddhisadbhāvābhyupagamādapratijñātavyāsyāropaṇaṃ tat svamativilasitamātrameva te . tasmāt tadvikalpagatadoṣā nāsmān
bādhanta iti .
athocyeta--nanvanyathā tāvadityādi . idaṃ tāvad nāstitvaṃ pratyakṣādipramāṇasiddham--ghaṭādi
anyadanyena prakāreṇa uṣṭrādyapyanyadanyena ghaṭo'pi paṭāduṣṭro'pi gardabhādanyo'nyathā pratyakṣādibhirupalabhyate
nāstīti, tadyathā--ghaṭaḥ paṭatvena nāsti paṭo'pi ghaṭatvenetyādi . tad bhāvayati --ghaṭo hītyādi, hiśabdo
yasmādarthe, yasmād ghaṭo ghaṭa evopalabhyate na tvasau paṭo'pīti upalabhyate, tasmāt pratyakṣata eva ghaṭaḥ
paṭatvena nāsti . atha punastvanmatena yadi sāmānye ghaṭasya tasyāstitvaikatve syātāṃ tatastvaduktanyāyena
sarvarūpa upalabhyeta ghaṭaḥ paṭa-kaṭa-rathādirūpaḥ, na tūpalabhyate, tasmānnāsti paṭāditveneti pararūpeṇābhāvaḥ .
tathā svarūpeṇāpyabhāvaḥ pararūpāsattvāditi prāptaḥ khapuṣpavaditi .
atra brūmaḥ --ko vā bravītītyādi . sarvarūpa upalabhyata eva, nopalabhyate iti tvanmukhādetacchrūyate . na bho ityādi, tvaṃ nāma sarvātmakamupalabhyamānamapyapalapya śūnyaṃ kartumicchasi, na
punarahamupalabhyamānameva sarvarūpaṃ santaṃ kartuṃ śaknomi ityaho sāhasam . upalabdhiḥ sarvalokapratyakṣā


kartuṃ śaknomi' ityaho sāhasam . ghaṭo mṛt, mṛdaḥ pṛthivītvam, pṛthivyā dravyatvaṃ druvikāratvāt, dravyasya bhavyatvād bhavyasya bhavitṛtvād bhavituḥ sarvatvāt sarvaṃ hi bhavad bhavati iti
sarvasya sarvatvāt sarvarūpo ghaṭa upalabhyate hastavat .
athocyeta--bhinna evāsāvartho bhinnaprakāratvāt vādiprativādimativacanavat . na,
tulyatvāt . yena prakāreṇaikasyātmalābhastena prakāreṇāstitvaikatvādinā sarvabhāvānāmapyātmalābhaḥ . sarvo'pyabhinno'sāvarthaḥ, nañsahitaḥ sa eva hetuḥ, ekavat . na hi tābhyāmasti-
tvayā'palapyamānā pūrvoktasarvapramāṇavirodhitāṃ te vacasaḥ sampādayati . tasmādayukto bhavato'bhiprāya
iti grantho gatārthatvānna vivriyate .
tad vastu ghaṭākhyaṃ bhavat sarvarūpaṃ bhavati ityetad bhāvayitumāha --ghaṭo mṛt, mṛnmayatvāt mṛttvaṃ
ghaṭasya siddham, mṛdaḥ pṛthivītvaṃ tadaṃśatvāt, pṛthivyā dravyatvaṃ druvikāratvāt sattāvikāratvāt, dravyasya
bhavyatvāt, bhavyasya bhavitṛtvāt, bhavituḥ sarvatvāt, sarvaṃ hi bhavad bhavati, tacca sadasti bhāva iti
ghaṭa-paṭādi sarvaṃ parasparasvarūpam, tasmāt sarvasya sarvatvāt sarvarūpo ghaṭa upalabhyate . kimiva ?
hastavat, yathā hasto'ṅgulaparva-sandhi-rekhādisarvarūpa upalabhyate sadekāṅgulādyātmakatvāt tathā ghaṭo'pi
sadekātmakapaṭādirūpa upalabhyata eveti na kiñcidetat anyathā tāvannāstyeva ghaṭaḥ iti, anyathā 
tathāpi ca ghaṭasya sattvādanyathātvāsiddheriti .
athocyeta--anyatvaṃ tarhi sādhayāmi bhinna evāsāvartho ghaṭaḥ paṭādibhyo bhinnaprakāratvāt
vādi-prativādimativacanavat varṇa-saṃsthāna-prayojanādiprakārabhedadarśanācca nāsiddhirhetoḥ . ato'nyatve
siddhe tadupalabdhirapi bhinnaprakāraiveti na syāt sarvasarvarūpopalabdhiriti .
etacca na, tulyatvāt, naitaduttaraṃ tulyatvādasya hetorasmatpakṣasādhanatvena . tadbhāvanā --yena
prakāreṇaikasyātmalābho ghaṭasya tena prakāreṇāstitvaikatvādinā sarvabhāvānāmapyātmalābho
deśa-kālabhedābhimatodrdhva-madhyā-'dhobhāga-nava-yuva-madhya-purāṇādinā . ataḥ pratijñāyate --sarvo'pyabhinno'sāvartha iti . nañsahitaḥ sa eva hetuḥ ātmalābhe bhinnaprakāratvāt iti yastvayoktaḥ
ātmalābhe'bhinnaprakāratvāt iti sa vaktavyaḥ . ekavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, yathaiko ghaṭaḥ paṭo vā bhavannūrdhvādi-navādi-deśa-kālaprakāreṇa bhinna ityabhimato'pyabhinna eva astitvaikatva-ghaṭatvābhedāt evaṃ paṭādiḥ
tathā sarvabhāvā abhinnaprakārātmalābhatvāḥ syuḥ .


tvaikatvābhyāṃ ghaṭasyānyatvamasti ghaṭādvā sarvabhedabhājastayoranyatvam . tatastadananyatve teṣāmapi ghaṭātmakatvaṃ tadanarthāntaratvāt ghaṭasvātmavat .
nanvekatve pratyakṣasiddhaṃ tṛptisukhādi virudhyate . nanu tat sarvasiddhānteṣvapi pratyakṣasiddhamatathā matvā mokṣāya yatyate . iti saṃyukterapi sarvabhāvāḥ santi .
tathānutpādādapi sarvabhāvāḥ santi . yadi hi tad vastūtpadyeta vinaśyed vā tataḥ
prāgabhāva-paścādabhāvavad madhye'pyabhāvasvābhāvyānna syādekarūpaṃ tvadiṣṭaśūnyatā vā syāt .

mā maṃsthā asiddho heturityata āha --na hi tābhyāmastitvaikatvābhyāṃ ghaṭasyānyatvamasti
sa tveka eva ghaṭo yasmāt ghaṭādvā sarvabhedabhājastayorastitvaikatvayoranyatvam na hi iti vartate,
sarvān paṭa-kaṭādīn bhedān svagatānūrdhvādi-navādīniva bhajamānād ghaṭādastitvaikatvayoranānātvam .
tataḥ kim ? tatastadananyatve ghaṭāstitvaikatvānanyatve'bhihitanyāyena siddhe sarve bhāvāḥ
paṭādayo'pi tato'nanye, tadastitvaikatvābhyāmanarthāntaratvāt, ghaṭavadityuktatvāt . ata āha --teṣāmapi
ghaṭātmakatvaṃ paṭādīnāṃ tadanarthāntaratvāt ghaṭāstitvaikatvānarthāntaratvāt ghaṭasvātmavaditi bhāvitārtho'yamatītārthopasaṃhāraḥ .
atrāha --nanvekatve pratyakṣasiddhaṃ tṛptisukhādi virudhyate iti . itthaṃ sarvamekaṃ sarvātmakam
iti bruvataste pratyakṣadṛṣṭaṃ bhedenā'śanāyitabhuktyanantarā tṛptirbubhukṣāvirodhinī tadanantarabhāvi ca
sukhaṃ duḥkhavirodhītyevamādi virudhyate, na hi pratyakṣaviruddhaṃ pratijñātuṃ yogyamiti .
atra brūmaḥ --nanu tat sarvasiddhānteṣvapi pratyakṣasiddhamatathā matvā mokṣāya yatyate iti .
nanu viṣayasukhānāmatathātvāt duḥkhapratīkāramātratvāt duḥkhasanmiśratvāt duḥkhabhūyiṣṭhatvāt anātyantikatvācca duḥkhatvameva, tṛpterapi gṛddhyabhilāṣajananahetutvādatṛptitvameveti matvā nirābādhamaparādhīnamātyantikamaikāntikaṃ viṣayasukhaviparītaṃ kathaṃ nāma muktisukhaṃ nirdvandvaṃ prāpnuyāma iti śāstraprāmāṇyāt sarvasiddhāntaprasiddhapravṛttitvānna tvayā punaranyā vimatiḥ kāryeti saṃyukterapi sarvabhāvāḥ
santīti grāhyāḥ .
tathānutpādādapi sarvabhāvāḥ santi . yadi hi ityādi, yadi hi tad vastūtpadyeta
utpannatvācca vinaśyedevetyutpadyeta vinaśyed vā, tataḥ kim ? tataḥ prāgabhāva utpatteḥ, paścādabhāvo,
vināśāt, tadvad madhye'pyabhāvasvābhāvyānna syādekarūpamiti bhedavadvā syāt tvadiṣṭaśūnyatā vā


na tu kasyacid vastuna ādiranto vāsti vastutvātyāgāt śivakādikapālādighaṭamṛdvat
pratyakṣamevānādyanantatvāt .
ato'sau tathāvasthita eka eva bhāvo nirbhedaḥ, bhedāsambhavāt . utpādavināśābhyāṃ
hi bhedaḥ sambhāvyeta .
nanvaniṣṭhitaṃ prāk, paścādārambhāt kriyāto niṣṭhā . yadi niṣṭhitaṃ syād niṣṭhitatvānnārabhyeta niṣpannaghaṭavat .
idaṃ vipratiṣiddham . yadyaniṣṭhitam, aniṣṭhitatvādasattvāt khapuṣpavannārabhyate, itaro
ghaṭavat . kiṃ na khapuṣpādadravyādervārabhyate ?
syāt, vāśabdād yattvayā tarkyate tasyopapattiḥ sambhāvyetotpatti-vināśasadbhāve . kiṃ tarhi ? na tu
kasyacid vastuna ādiḥ utpattiḥ antaḥ vināśo vāsti . kasmāt ? vastutvātyāgāt, na hi
vastu svarūpaṃ vastutvaṃ tyajati . kimiva ? śivakādi-kapālādighaṭa-mṛdvat, yathā hi ghaṭaḥ śivakastūpaka-cchatraka-kuśūla-ghaṭāvasthāsu bhedābhimatāsu mṛttvābhedād mṛdeva, kapāla-śarkarikā-dhūli-tuṭi-paramāṇuṣvapi mṛttattvād mṛdevādyantarahitā, tathānyadapi vijñānādi vastutvātyāgāditi nāstyutpādaḥ, tadabhāvād
vināśābhāvaḥ . kiñca, pratyakṣamevānādyanantatvāt mṛcchivaka-kapālādiviparivarteṣvapi rūpāditattvasyotpāda-vināśābhāvādanādyanantaṃ mūrtam, mūrtavaccāmūrtamapi vastutvātyāgādanutpāda-vināśābhyāmanādyanantam . tasmāt satatamavasthānameva vastunaḥ .
tadupasaṃharati --ato'sau tathāvasthita eka eva bhāvo nirbheda iti, bhedāsambhavāt
bhedasambhavakāraṇābhāvāt . taddarśayati vaidharmyeṇa--utpāda-vināśābhyāṃ hi bhedaḥ sambhāvyeta, sa tūktavidhinānādyanantatvānna sambhavatīti .
atrāha --nanvaniṣṭhitamityādi . nanūktaṃ dravyāṇi dravyāntaramārabhante pṛthivyādiparamāṇudravyāṇi
svataḥ svātmani dve bahūni vā parasparasaṃyogāpekṣāṇi ārabhante kāryadravyamanyat . guṇāśca ārambhakacaturvidhadravyasamavetāstairārabdhe kāryadravye niyamata eva svataḥ parātmani guṇāntaramārabhante . karma
saṃyoga-vibhāga-saṃskārānārabhate parataḥ parātmani . ityādinā ārambhavacanenāniṣṭhitaṃ prāk, paścādārambhāt kriyā, kriyāto niṣṭhetyaniṣṭhitam . tatra yadi niṣṭhitaṃ syād niṣṭhitatvānnā''rabhyeta
niṣpannaghaṭavaditi .
atra brūmaḥ --idaṃ vipratiṣiddhamityādi . vipratiṣedhaṃ bhāvayati yadyaniṣṭhitamityādinā .
aniṣṭhitatvādasat khapuṣpavat, asattvāt tadvad nārabhyate nārabhate . itaro ghaṭavaditi vaidharmyadṛṣṭāntaḥ,


tadrūpaśaktivivartamātraṃ tvetat sarvam bhāvaikyāt . ato nāniṣṭhitaṃ vastu, anārabdhārabdhatvāt śikyakādivat .
athaivamapi vastuno'vasthānaṃ neṣyate tato'nārabdhāni tāni dravyāntarāṇi, aniṣṭhitatvāt, khapuṣpavat . athocyeta--ādiḥ pratyakṣata eva bhedaheturdṛśyate . sa kiṃ nityo'nityaḥ
yadi nityaḥ sarvavastunityatā, ādisvarūpatvāt tannityatvācca . kriyamāṇaniṣṭhitayoścā-
yathā ghaṭo mṛdrūpāditvena niṣṭhita eva sannākārāntaravyaktirūpeṇārabhyate pṛthubudhnorddhagrīvādinā na
tathārabhyeteti . tadvyaktiḥ--kiṃ na khapuṣpādadravyādervārabhyate ? iti dravya-guṇa-karmādibhedavadvastuviparītat
kutaścidanārambhād niṣṭhitādevotpattirabhivyaktirārambhaḥ .
etaduktaṃ bhavati saṅkṣepataḥ--tadrūpaśaktivivartamātraṃ tvetat sarvamiti . kiṃ kāraṇam ? bhāvaikyāt,
ekasyaiva puruṣāderbhāvasya kāraṇamātrasya vijṛmbhitatvāt kāryatvāvasthāmātrabhedena .
tadupasaṃhṛtyāha --ato nāniṣṭhitamityādi . niṣṭhitameva vastu nāniṣṭhitam, kasmāt ? anārabdhārabdhatvāt anārabdhaṃ kāryābhivyaktirūpeṇa ārabdhakemeva ca kāraṇalīnaśaktyavasthatvena,
yaccānārabdhārabdhaṃ tad niṣṭhitameva nāniṣṭhitam, kimiva ? śikyakādivat, yathānārabdhamapi
śikyakatvena sūtraṃ śaktatvād niṣṭhitamevamanyadapi vastviti pathā yajñopavītasūtrādidṛṣṭāntairbhāvayitavyam .
athaivamapītyādi . itthaṃ yuktyā pratipāditamapyavasthānaṃ vastuno neṣyate tataste aniṣṭāpādanamidam --anārabdhāni tāni dravyāntarāṇi ārabdhābhimatānyapi, aniṣṭhitatvāt, khapuṣpavadatyantāsattvādityabhiprāyaḥ .
athocyetetyādi . ādirutpattiḥ pratyakṣata eva ghaṭāderdṛśyate, sa ca bhede heturghaṭādervastunaḥ, yadi
hyanutpannāvinaṣṭaṃ syāt syādabhinnamiti . atra pṛcchyase --sa kimityādi, sa ādirārambhaḥ sa
pratyakṣābhimataḥ kiṃ nityo'nityaḥ ? iti nirdhāryaḥ . kiñcātaḥ ? yadi nityaḥ sarvavastunityatā,
sarveṣāṃ ghaṭādīnāṃ ca vastūnāmaviśeṣeṇa nityatvameva syāt, ādisvarūpatvāt tannityatvācca .
aniṣṭaṃ caitad bruvataḥ .
kiñcānyat, kriyamāṇa-niṣṭhitayoścābhāvāt tathājanyabhedābhāvaḥ . ādernityatvādādereva
ca vastutvādārambha evādisaṃjño'sti na kriyā-niṣṭhe staḥ, tayośca kriyamāṇa-niṣṭhayorabhāvāt tathā
janayitavyasya tena prakāreṇa ghaṭāditvena utpādyasya bhedasyābhāvaḥ . tataścāsmadiṣṭo'vasthānapakṣa eva
jayati .


bhāvāt tathājanyabhedābhāvaḥ . ādipratyakṣapramāṇīkaraṇācca kriyā niṣṭhāpratyakṣadvayaparityāgaḥ .
tayośca dṛṣṭavyabhicāramitaratraikasmin pratyakṣaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇīkariṣyata iti punarapi taddhāniḥ .
athādinityatāyāṃ doṣānnirvṛttanityatvamabhyupagacchasi, itthaṃ hi nirvṛttanityatāyāṃ
sarvaikyaṃ nāsti pṛthagvibhinnasvarūpatvāt .
nanvevamapi nārambho na kriyā iti bhedābhāva eva . athādiranityo'bhyupagamyate
tataḥ sa kiṃ jāto'jātaḥ ? yadi jātastasyaivānutpādaḥ, ajātatvāt, nirvṛttaghaṭavadityādiḥ,
tatvaduktavadevedaṃ na yujyate .
antoktamapi ca tvaduktadoṣāvimokṣānna yujyate pūrvavadityante'pyutpādābhāvaḥ evamanutpādāt sarvabhedaikyasiddhiḥ .

kiñcānyat, ādipratyakṣetyādi . ādiḥ pratyakṣata eva bhedaheturdṛśyata iti viśeṣya ādidereva pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇīkṛtaṃ na kriyā-niṣṭhe, tayoḥ pratyakṣayorapi parityāgaśca kṛtaḥ, sa ca pratyakṣavirodhādayuktaḥ . tayoścetyādi, tayośca pratyakṣayoḥ kriyā-niṣṭhayorapramāṇīkaraṇe pratyakṣamapyapramāṇamiti dṛṣṭo
vyabhicāraḥ, taddarśanādāderapi pratyakṣasya tadvadevāprāmāṇyāt punarapyādeḥ pratyakṣasya tyāga iti sarvathā
tvayaiva pratyakṣamapramāṇīkṛtam . evaṃ tāvadādernityatāyāṃ doṣaḥ .
athādinityatāyāmityādi . etaddoṣabhayādādinityatvapakṣaṃ tyaktvā nirvṛttanityatvamabhyupagacchasi doṣābhāvaṃ ca yasmānna paraikateti, itthaṃ hi nirvṛttanityatāyāṃ tvayoktaṃ sarvaikyam, tacca nāsti
pṛthagvibhinnasvarūpatvāditi .
atra brūmaḥ --nanvevamapītyādi . yadi nityaniṣṭhitameva vastu tato nārambho'sti na kriyā
ityabhyupagatatvāt kuto bheda ārambhaḥ kriyā labhyate ? iti bhedābhāva evāsmadiṣṭaḥ prasaktaḥ . evaṃ
tāvadādinityatāyāṃ doṣaḥ .
athetyādi . etaddoṣabhayādāderanityatābhyupagamyate cet tvayā tata itthaṃ paryanuyojyo'si—
sa kimādirjāto'jātaḥ ? ityādi tvatparyanuyogavadeva triṣvapi vikalpeṣu tvaduktadoṣavaddoṣā iti diśaṃ
darśayati --yadi jātaḥ tasyaivānutpādaḥ, ajātatvāt, nirvṛttaghaṭavadityādiriti prathamavikalpamuktvā 
śeṣaṃ granthamatidiśati --tatvaduktavadevedaṃ na yujyate ityajātajātājātavikalpayorapi tvaduktā eva
doṣā ityutpādābhāvaḥ .
antoktamapi cetyādi, ante'pyutpādābhāvo vinaṣṭā-'vinaṣṭa-vinaṣṭāvinaṣṭavikalpeṣu tvaduktadoṣāvimokṣāt yāvadathocyeta--antaḥ pratyakṣa eva bhedaheturdṛśyata iti asmin pūrvapakṣe sa kiṃ nityo'

sāmagrīdarśanādapi sarvāstitvasiddhiḥ . tathā ca tadevaikaṃ sarvātmakam . sāmagrī aśeṣabhāvānāṃ bhāvāntaraṃ bhāvāntaraṃ prati vṛttiḥ . yathā pṛthivyādisāmagryāḥ karpāsa-tadrūpādyaṇupakṣama-tantu-paṭādikaṃ prati . etatsaṃvādena ghaṭapaṭādīti dṛśyate saṃjñā yataḥ pravartate cetanācetanaṃ
jagat .
yadi sāmagryaśeṣatā sarvasya sarvatra vṛttestileṣu tailavat sikatāsvapi tailaṃ syāt .
nitya ityādi sa eva paryanuyogaḥ, viśeṣastu atra antapratyakṣapramāṇīkaraṇācca ārambha-kriyamāṇapratyakṣadvayaparityāgaḥ, tayośca dṛṣṭavyabhicāramitaratraikasmin pratyakṣaṃ kathaṃ pramāṇīkariṣyate ? iti punarapi
taddhāniriti vācya ityatideśaphalam --evamanutpādāt sarvabhedaikyasiddhiḥ .
kiñca, sāmagrīdarśanādapi puruṣa-niyati-kāla-svabhāva-bhāvādyanyatamakāraṇātmakasyāvasthādibhedasāmagryāmevaivaṃ darśanādapi hetoḥ sarvāstitvasiddhiḥ . tathā ca tena prakāreṇotpatti-vināśābhāvādiproktakāraṇatayā tadevaikaṃ sarvātmakaṃ svaṃ paramubhayaṃ cetyetamarthaṃ sampādayati sāmagrī svāvayavātmakatvāt tasyāḥ . sā ca sāmagrī dṛśyate pratyakṣataḥ . kiṃlakṣaṇā sāmagrī ? iti cet, ucyate --sāmagrī
aśeṣabhāvānāṃ bhāvāntaraṃ bhāvāntaraṃ prati vṛttiḥ ekaikasminnabhinnaikātmakavastubhedamātre bhāve
bhedāntarasyaikaikasya vṛttiryā sā sāmagrī ityucyate . taddarśayati --yathā pṛthivyādisāmagryā ityādi,
pṛthivyudaka-vahni-pavana-gaganā-''tmādisarvasamūhātmakaḥ karpāsaḥ tadrūpādayaḥ, tatsamūho'ṇuḥ, aṇusamūhāḥ
pakṣmāṇi, tatsamūhāstantavaḥ, tatsamūhaḥ paṭa iti taṃ tamarthaṃ prati sāmagrī pṛthivyapyudakādi-tadrūpādi-paṭādisamūhātmikā vastuno'nekaśaktyātmakasyaikasya vyaktā-'vyaktaśaktyapekṣatvāt sarvasarvātmakatvāt
sāmagryāmevaṃ darśanam .
etatsaṃvādenetyādi . etena sarvasarvātmakaikavastubhedasāmagrīdarśanatvena saṃvādi rūpādi pṛthivyādi
parasparasāmagrī ghaṭa-paṭādīti dṛśyate saṃjñā yatetaḥ pravartate cetanācetanaṃ jagat yathā vidhividhinayabhaṅge prāg vyākhyātam . tasmāt saṃsiddhyādibhyo'pi hetubhyaścetanācetanātmakaikavastuvijṛmbhitamātramidaṃ sidhyatīti .
atrāha --yadi sāmagryaśeṣatetyādi . yadyaśeṣaṃ svabhedasāmagrīmātraṃ sarvasya sarvatra vṛtteryathā tileṣu
tailaṃ sat tathā sikatāsvapi tailaṃ syāt tatrābhāvavat tileṣvapyabhāva eva syāt, na tu bhavati .
tasmānnāśeṣaṃ sāmagrīmātramiti .



nanu yathā tileṣvapyavyaktaṃ tailaṃ nopalabhyate tathā sikatāsvapyanabhivyaktaṃ tailaṃ nopalabhyate sikatānāmeva tathā tathā viparivṛtteḥ sikatānāmabhāve tilamūlādyabhāvāt . tadvadudaka... ... ...dravyeṣu... ... ...bhāvamanyasyātmani .
tathā sadā darśanāt . saṃsiddhyādihetubhiḥ sampāditasarvāṃtmakaikatvādatyantasatyāste'darśanādasanta iti kalpyeran . tadapi nāstyevādarśanam, bhāvitavadekabhavanātmakatvāt .
tasmāt sa evātītaḥ.... yathoktam--

tadejati tannaijati tad dūre tadvantike .
tadantarasya sarvasya tadu sarvasyāsya bāhyataḥ ॥ śukla yaju॰ vā॰ saṃ॰ 40 . 5


atrocyate --nanu yathetyādi . ko vā bravīti--sikatāsu nāsti tailaṃ tileṣvevāstīti ? kintu
yathā tileṣvapyavyaktaṃ svābhivyaktyupāyādyaṃtadyantrapīḍanādermarṛte nopalabhyate carvaṇādikriyāsu
kṣīravadāsvādyamānakṛttilānāṃ mūlāṅkurādyavasthāsu ca tathā sikatāsvapyanabhivyaktaṃ tailaṃ nopalabhyate
sikatābhūpradeśoptatilabījasyāṅkura-mūla-parṇādiprabhave sikatānāmeva tathā tathā viparivṛtteḥ sikatānāmabhāve tilamūlādyabhāvāt sikatāsveva tailamasti tadvadudakādidravyeṣu samāsadaṇḍakokteṣu dravyeṣvasti
tailaṃ yāvadbhāvamanyasyātmanīti tilatayotpannajīvadravyasyāpi tailavattvāt vyaktāvyaktarūpeṇa sarvasya
sarvatra bhāvāt samānametat .
tathā sadā darśanāt, sarvadā bhāvasya bhāgāntarādarśane'pi darśanameva . kasmāt ? saṃsiddhyādihetubhiḥ sampāditasarvātmakaikavastutvāt prākpaścāditaretara-deśa-pramāṇa-sāmarthya-saṃyogātyantābhāvānāṃ
pratipakṣabhūtā bhāvā evātyantābhūtābhimatavandhyāputrāntā ityuktatvādatyantasatyāste santorthyā'rthāḥ
adarśanād dṛṣṭyaṣṭiśaktivaikalyādadṛśyamānabhāgāntarā asanta iti kalpyeran na paramārthato'santo
na vā na dṛśyante, yasmāt tadapi nāstyevādarśanam, kasmānnāsti ? yasmād bhāvitaṃ sāmagrīdarśanahetau
ekabhavanātmakam iti, tadvad bhāvitavadekabhavanātmakatvāt atītanyāyabhāvitasarvātmakabhavanātmakatvāt, nirvibhāgasya hi vastunaḥ para-madhyabhāgāḥ śaktibhedāt kalpitā api vastvabhedāt tadeva te, 
bhāgasya dṛśyatvāt tato'pṛthaktvād bhāgāntarāṇāmapi darśanameva . nirvibhāgameva hi sadvastu, vibhāgenekṣaṇaṃ bhrāntiḥ ityuktam . tasmāt sa ाevātīta ityādi gatārtham . tasmāt sadā darśanameva nādarśanam .
yathoktamityādinā prāgatītaṃ nyāyaṃ jñāpakatvenāha . tadejati tannaijati ityādi ṛgdvayaṃ
tatraiva vyākhyātatvānna vivriyate . nyāyaṃ tu saprabhedaṃ smāraṇārthamatidiśati --bhāvitānekārthadravyārtha

puruṣa evedaṃ sarva yad bhūtaṃ yacca bhāvyam .utāmṛtatvasyeśāno yadannenātirohati ॥ ṛgvedaḥ 10 . 8 . 90
bhāvitānekārthadravyārthabhedavat .
yaḥ punarbhedaḥ so'satyeva bhede bhedābhimānaḥ tasyābhinnasya kramābhivyakteḥ ekadravyasvatattvarūpādivat .iti dvādaśārāntaram .
bhedavaditi dravyārthanayeṣu ṣaṭsu vidhyādibhedeṣvādyeṣu yathā bhāvitaṃ prāk yathālokagrāhameva vastu
ityādiṣu sa evāśeṣo grantho'trāvatārayitavyaḥ .
ya punarbhedo ghaṭaḥ paṭa ityādiḥ so'satyeva bhede bhedābhimānaḥ, kasmāt ? tasyābhinnasya
vastunaḥ kramābhivyakteḥ, krameṇa hi śaktimataḥ śaktimātrā abhivyajyamānā bhedā ivābhāsante puruṣagrahaṇaśaktyapekṣayā, na tu paramārthato bhedo'sti . kimiva ? ekadravyasvatattvarūpādivat, yathaikameva
ghaṭākhyaṃ vastu cakṣurādigrahaṇāpadeśaviśiṣṭaṃ rūpādivyapadeśabhāg bhavati yathā cakṣuṣā gṛhyamāṇaṃ rūpam
jihvayā rasaḥ ghrāṇena gandhaḥ śrotreṇa śabdaḥ tvacā sparśa iti tathā sarvasyābhinnasyaikasyaiva ghaṭa-paṭādibhedābhāvasanamabhimānamātrameveti . evaṃ tāvacchūnyavādaḥ puruṣādidravyārthavādena nivartitaḥ .
iti dvādaśārāntaraṃ samāptam ॥




oँ arhaँ


saṭgurubhyo namaḥ

atha nayacakratumbam

etadapi naivaikāntena yuktamiti prakrāntameva . tataśca vidhividhinayādārabhya
vidhividhyantarānukrameṇa yāvad dravyakriyobhayanayaḥ tāvad dravyārthāṃśāvadhṛteḥ tataḥ paraṃ
paryāyārthabhedānāmuttarottaraikāntāyuktatvaprakrāntyā yāvacchūnyavādasyāpi ekāntāyuktatvamadhunā prakrāntam .
teṣāmupari yathālokaparigrahameva vastu iti vidhiḥ . tadvyāvartitasāmānyaviśeṣoddhārārthaṃ vidhiniyamavidhiḥ . tannivartanārthamubhayobhayanayaḥ yāvadayamavadhiḥ .

ataḥ paraṃ tumbaṃ nayacakrasya vartiṣyate . tadapi kiṃ dravyārthaikāntamataṃ satyaṃ kimasatyam ityasmin
sandehe'bhidhīyate --etadapi naivaikāntena yuktamiti prakrāntameva, kathamityata āha --tataścetyādi, 
tataśca sarvasaṃgrahātmakād vidhervidhinayārādārabhya uttarottaraikāntāyuktatvaprakrāntyā teṣu teṣvarāntareṣu
vicāritameva kiṃ puruṣa evāvasthā avasthā eva puruṣaḥ ityādivikalpaparyanuyogopakrameṇeti tadanusmārayati --vidhividhyantarānukrameṇa vidhividherbhedānāṃ puruṣa-niyati-kāla-svabhāva-bhāvānāṃ pūrvapūrvadūṣaṇenottarottaravyavasthānam, tataḥ paraṃ vidhyubhayādīnāmanukramasya paripāṭyāḥ krameṇa vidhinā yāvat
ko'vadhirdravyārthadūṣaṇamiti cet, ucyate--yāvad dravya-kriyobhayanayaḥ uktastāvad dravyārthāṃśāvadhṛteḥ
tataḥ paraṃ paryāyārthabhedāt, teṣāmapi paryāyārthabhedānāmuttarottaraikāntāyuktatvaprakrāntyā yāvacchūnyavādaḥ,
śūnyavādasyāpi ekāntāyuktatvamadhunā vidhividhinayamate prakrāntam .
tadekāntāyuktatvakhyāpanā tu ekāntavādānāṃ parasparasaṃyuktatvamāpādya pratyekaśo dviśo yāvad
dvādaśaśaḥ saprabhedasteṣāmupari vidhinayaḥ prathamokto draṣṭavyaḥ, tatsmāraṇaṃ yathālokaparigrahameva
vastviti vidhiriti, tadutthānādigranthagrahaṇāt samastārasūcanam .
tadvyāvartitetyādi, tena vidhinayena vyāvartitayoḥ savikalpayoḥ sāmānyaviśeṣayoruddhārārthaṃ
vidhiniyamavidhiḥ, tatastannivartanārthamubhayobhayanaya ityayamapi kramo yāvat punarayamavadhiriti .


yathā cānena śūnyavāde pūrvapakṣatvasambandhastathā ṣaḍvidhena dravyārthena . yathā ca taiḥ
sambandhaḥ śūnyavādasya tathā vidhyādīnāṃ dvādaśānāmapi yathārucitamabhisambandhaḥ, śūnyavādasyāpi yena kenacidantaritasya sambandhopapatteḥ . evameva cāsya nayacakramityanvarthasaṃjñā
syāt . evaṃ tāvadasmādantyāt sarvanayotthānaṃ na virudhyate . yathā cāsmādevaṃ sarvebhyo'pi .

yathā cānenetyādi, yathā cānena vidhividhinayenaikāntāyuktatvavādinā śūnyavāde pūrvapakṣatvasambandhastathaikaikena ṣaḍvidhena dravyārthena . yathā ca tairityādi, yathā ca dravyārthabhedaiḥ pratyekaṃ vidhividhinayenaiva yogaḥ śūnyavādasya tathā śūnyavāde pratiṣiddhe'pi tadanantarameva vidhyādīnāṃ dvādaśānāmapyarāṇāṃ yathārucitamabhisambandhaḥ, śūnyavādasyāpi yena kenacidekādaśānāmanyatamenāntaritasya
sambandhopapatteḥ, pratyekaṃ jagatsvabhāvapratipādanasamarthānāṃ vyāpināṃ yena kenaciditi vacanāt yadi
vidhyaranayādīnāṃ samanantareṇaikādyantaritena uttareṣāṃ vā pūrveṇa samanantarātītenaikādyantaritātītenetyaviruddhaḥ krameṇotkrameṇotkramakramābhyāṃ vā sambandho'stītyarthaḥ, tasmācca sarvabhāvavyāvartanānantarasambandhād dvādaśānāmanyatamādarādanantarasyānantarasyotthānaṃ tattadaradūṣaṇārthaṃ kramaḥ . tena krameṇa sambandhena sarvakumatapakṣāṇāṃ mithyādṛṣṭipraṇītaśāstrāṇāṃ vyavasthāyāśceṣṭanārthaṃ sarvamidaṃ nayacakraśāstraṃ kramate
sarvaikyabhāvāpāditasyādvādānapekṣasarvanayamithyādṛṣṭitvāt tatra tatra ca tattaddaurvihityasya pratipāditatvāt
parasparavihiha ?tapakṣāṇāṃ krameṇoktārthānusāreṇa sarveṣāmanyonyadūṣaṇatvāt .
evamevetyādi . evaṃ ca kṛtvāsya śāstrasya nayādīnāṃ cakraṃ nayacakraṃ nayasamūha ityanvarthasaṃjñā
syāt, nayānāṃ svaparamatasādhana-dūṣaṇasamarthānāṃ samūhatvāt . nayante'rthān prāpayanti nayanti gamayantīti
nayāḥ, vastuno'nekātmakasyānyatamaikātmakaikāntaparigrahātmakā nayā iti, teṣāṃ cakram . evaṃ
tāvadasmādantyācchūnyavādanayāt sarvanayotthānaṃ na virudhyate .
yathā cāsmādevaṃ sarvebhyo'pi . yathaitasmānnayādutthānaṃ sarvanayānāmantyādaviruddhaṃ tathā sarvebhyo'pi, sarvasmādekaikasmādapi nayāt sarvanayānāmutthānamaviruddhameva, sarvasya sarveṇa saha virodhitve sati
vivādasadbhāvāt .


eṣāmaśeṣaśāsananayārāṇāṃ bhagavadarhadvacanamupanibandhanam . teṣāṃ dravyārtha-paryāyārthanayau
dvau mūlabhedau, tatprabhedāḥ saṃgrahādayaḥ . teṣāmupagrāhakaṃ jinavacanaṃ tadyathā--

imā ṇaṃ bhaṃte ! rayaṇappabhā puḍhavī kiṃ sāsatā asāsatā ? gotamā ! sitā sāsatā, sitā
asāsatā . se keṇaṭṭheṇaṃ bhaṃte ! evaṃ vuccati--sitā sāsatā, sitā asāsata tti ? gotamā ! davvaṭṭhatā+e
sāsatā, vaṇṇapajjavehiṃ gaṃdhapajjavehiṃ rasapajjavehiṃ phāsapajjavehiṃ saṃṭhāṇapajjavehiṃ asāsatā .
jīvājīvābhi॰ 3 . 1 . 78


eṣāmityādi . eṣāmaśeṣanayānāṃ kiṃ nibandhanamiti ceducyate --eṣāmaśeṣaśāsanānanayārāṇām, aśeṣaśāsanānyeva jaiminīyopaniṣadādīni nayāḥ arasaṃsthānīyāni syādvādatumbasya
nayacakrasya, teṣāmaśeṣaśāsananayārāṇāṃ ca bhagavadarhadvacanamupanibandhanam . jinaśāsanamahāsamudrasyaiva
taraṅgā ete . tathā ca tatra tatra bhāvitam . yathācāryasiddhasenaścāha--

bhaddaṃ micchādaṃsaṇasamūhama+iyassa amatasādassa .
jiṇavayaṇassa bhagavato saṃviggamusuhābhigammassa ॥ sammati॰ 3 . 69 iti .

teṣāṃ cāśeṣaśāsanārāṇāṃ dravyārtha-paryāyārthanayau dvau samāsato mūlabhedau, tatprabhedāḥ saṃgrahādayaḥ,
titthakaravayaṇasaṃgahavisesapatthāramūlavākaraṇī .davvaṭṭhi+o ya pajjavaṇayo ya sesā vikappā siṃ ॥ sammati॰ 1 . 3 ityādivyākhyānāt .
tatra dravyārthasya vikalpāḥ ṣaṭ saṃkṣepeṇātroktāḥ, paryāyārthasya ṣaṭ . teṣāmupagrāhakaṃ jinavacanaṃ
tadyathā --imā ṇaṃ bhaṃte ! rayaṇappabhā puḍhavī kiṃ sāsatā asāsatā iti pṛṣṭe vyākaraṇaṃ siyā
sāsatā, sitā asāsatā iti samagrādeśāt . punaḥ se keṇaṭṭheṇaṃ bhaṃte ! etaṃ evaṃ vuccati—
sitā sāsatā, sitā asāsatā iti vyākhyāpanārthaḥ praśnaḥ . tasya vikalādeśād vyākaraṇam,
ratnaprabhāyāḥ svatattvamubhayātmakaṃ vibhāgena vidadhāti, tadyathā --davvaṭṭhatā+e sāsatā, vaṇṇapajjavehiṃ
gaṃdhapajjavehiṃ rasa jjavehiṃ phāsapajjavehiṃ saṃṭhāṇapajjavehiṃ asāsata tti .
tadanuyātavṛttisādhanaṃ nābhikriyā, tasyā ratnaprabhāyāḥ śāśvatāśāśvatadharmasvatattvāyāḥ
kāraṇābhyāṃ dravyārthaparyāyārthābhyāṃ pratyekaṣaḍvikalpābhyāṃ kāritaṃ svatattvamanekāntātmakaṃ vidadhato

tadanuyātavṛttisādhanaṃ nābhikriyā . tadyathā--vidhi-vidhividhi-vidhyubhaya-vidhiniyama-ubhaya-ubhayavidhi-ubhayobhaya-ubhayaniyama-niyama-niyamavidhi-niyamobhaya-niyamaniyamā ekaprabandhenānyonyāpekṣavṛttayaḥ satyārthāḥ, etadbhaṅganiyatasyādvādalakṣaṇaḥ śabdaḥ
syānnityaḥ syānnityānityaḥ syādanityaḥ, vidhyādidvādaśavikalpaniyatākṛtaka-kṛtakākṛtakakṛtakatvānekāntavikalpātmakatvāt, ghaṭavat .
jinavacanasyānugamād dvādaśānāmarāṇāmaśeṣaśeṣaśāsanasaṃgrāhiṇāmitthaṃ tumbakriyā syādvādanābhikaraṇam,
tatpratibaddhasarvārāvasthānāt, ato'nyathā viśaraṇāt, yathoktam--

jammi kulaṃ āyattaṃ taṃ purisaṃ āyareṇa rakkhāhiṃ .
ṇa hu tuṃbammi viṇaṭṭhe arayā sāhāraṇaṃyā hoṃti ॥   iti .

tadyathā--vidhividhītyādi sādhanadaṇḍako yāvad ghaṭavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ . evaṃ tumbakaraṇaṃ
savikalpadvādaśāranayacakraikavākyānayanasādhanam . tatra vidhibhaṅgāścatvāra ādyā ubhayabhaṅgā madhyamāścatvāro niyamabhaṅgāścatvāraḥ pāścātyā yathāsaṅkhyaṃ nityapratijñāḥ 4 nityānityapratijñāḥ 4 anityapratijñāśca 4 . vidhiḥ vidhervidhiḥ vidhervidhiniyamau vidherniyama iti prathamabhaṅgacatuṣṭayam, madhyamaṃ
vidhiniyamau vidhiniyamayorvidhiḥ vidhiniyamayorvidhiniyamau vidhiniyamayorniyama iti, pāścātyamapi
niyamo niyamasya vidhiḥ niyamasya vidhiniyamau niyamasya niyama ityete dvādaśāpyaranayā ekapradyadyeprabandhenānyonyāpekṣavṛttayaḥ satyārthā iti sasaṃpiṇḍarūpeṇa pratijñā, etadbhaṅganiyatasyādvādalakṣaṇaḥ
śabda iti, syānnityaḥ syānnityānityaḥ syādanityaḥ śabda iti, tatsaṃkṣepastrividho heturapi
vidhyādidvādaśavikalpaniyatākṛtaka-kṛtakākṛtaka-kṛtakatvānekāntavikalpātmakatvāditi
prāgvyākhyātabhaṅgārthasamāhārātmaka evāyaṃ pratijñāvat tannayadarśanavikalpaikavākyātmakatvād ghaṭavaditi

vyākhyānadigdarśanasādhanaṃ tu tadyathā--vyavahāraikatā... ... ...śūnyatā'nityaḥ śabdaḥ,
vyavahṛtyekatva... ... ...kṣaṇika-śūnyatā-kṛtakatvāt, ghaṭavat .
dṛṣṭāntaḥ parasparāpekṣavṛttisamastanayamataikamatyānuvṛttirnitya-nityānitya-anityatvānekāntavikalpātmakānugatākṛtaka-kṛtakākṛtaka-kṛtakatvānekāntavikalpātmakaḥ siddha eveti prāgvyākhyātārthatvāt .
vyākhyānadigdarśanasādhanaṃ tu etasyānantarābhihitanābhikriyānekāntatvaprakhyāpanasādhanasya
vyākhyānadiśaṃ darśayatyetat sādhanam atītānāṃ dvādaśānāmarāṇāṃ pratyekaṃ yathāsaṅkhyaprasthānārthopanyāsārthatvāt, tadyathā--vyavahāraikatetyādidaṇḍakapratijñopanyāso yāvacchūnyatā'nityaḥ śabda iti .
heturvyavahṛtyekatvetyādidaṇḍako yāvat kṣaṇikaśūnyatākṛtakatvāditi .
vidhinayasya tāvad yathālokagrāhameva vastu, yathā lokena parigṛhītameva nityānitya-kāraṇa-kāryaika-nānātvādyaśakyaprāptyaprayojanatvāvicāreṇa śakyaprāptiprayojanavatkarmaphalasambandhamātraparijñānamapauruṣeyānādyanidhanāgamagamyamiti darśanam .
vidhividhistu kriyāvidhāyivākyaparijñānasyāpyaśakyaprāptyaprayojanatvādidoṣāvimokṣāt
svavacanādivirodhād vastutattvaparijñānāvinābhāvādayukteḥ sarvaikakāraṇamātratvam . tacca puruṣa-kālaniyati-svabhāva-bhāvādyanyatamātmakam, ātmaprabhedamātrāvasthābhedamātravyavahṛteriti .
tasyāpi vidhividheravasthāvasthāvadbhedopādānāvaśyaṃbhāvāt paramaśūnya-kṣaṇikādyanabhipretavādaprasaṅgāccāsannidhivyāvṛttabhavanavṛttidvaitavādaḥ śreyān prakāśa-pravṛtti-niyamātmabhogyasattva-raja-stamomaya- 
prakṛtivyāpārasyodāsīnabhoktṛpuruṣopabhogārthapravṛtteriti vidhirvidhīyate niyamyate ceti vidhividhiniyamanayadarśanaṃ na sarvamekātmakaṃ, kiṃ tarhi ? sarvaṃ sarvātmakam iti .
asyaiva vā vikalpāntaraṃ vidhyubhayanayadarśanasya prakṛti-puruṣayorguṇatrayavyavasthānupapatteḥ
sthityutpattivināśānātmakatvādasattvāpatteśca bhāvadvaitaṃ bhāvya-bhavitṛbhedāt prativiśiṣṭabuddhisvatantrādhiṣṭhātradhiṣṭheyāsvatantratvadvaividhyādīśvareśitavyātmakaṃ dvaitamidamiti .
etasyāpi prakṛtipuruṣasya parasparātmānāpattau karma-phalasambandhābhāve saṃsāra-mokṣādyanupapatterīśvarasyāpi ca pravartyapuruṣa  karmavaśapravṛtteranīśvaratvādekaikasya sarvatvamīśvaratvaṃ ca sarvasya ca cetanācetanātmakasya parivṛttyānyonyātmakatvānubhavanāt sarvapuruṣāṇāṃ  karmakṛtatvāt karmaṇāṃ puruṣakṛtatvādātmanaivātmanaḥ
kāryakāraṇatvādekaṃ sarvaṃ sarvaṃ caikamiti vidhiniyamyatvād vidhiniyamanayadarśanamiti .

eṣāṃ caturṇāṃ dravyārthatvādakṛtakanityatvaikāntaḥ . bhavitṛ-bhavanayordravya-kriyayoranyatarapradhānopasarjanatvānupapattirabhāvāpatteḥ, ato vidhiniyamau pradhānāveva dravya-bhāvaparigrahātmakāvityubhayanayadarśanam .
asyāpi matasya parasparanirapekṣasvātantrye dravyabhāvayoranupapannasthityutpattivināśasvāvasthayorabhāvatvaṃ khapuṣpavat . ataḥ parataḥ svataśca tadvyaktyākṛtyākhyaṃ guṇapradhānabhāvena dravyādi sat parataḥ
sattādi svata ityasadapi bhavatīti vidhiniyamemau vidhīyayete iti vidhiniyamavidhinayadarśanam .
asyāpi asadutpattivāñchino nayasyāsannihitakhapuṣpādivat sato'sataḥ sadasato vā satā'satā
sadasatā vā sambandhābhāvāt satkaratvābhāvāccāsadutpattyayukteḥ pravṛttinivṛttirūpamitaretarābhāvalakṣaṇamabhavad bhavati vastviti ubhayobhayanayadarśanam .
asyāpi darśanasya parābhāvasya svarūpaviśeṣāsambhave'navasthānād dvayorapi abhāva-saṃkararūpādidoṣādayukterbhavitṛpradhānaṃ bhavanopasarjanatvamiti ubhayaniyamanayamatam .
eteṣu ca caturṣu ubhayavidhyādiṣu kṛtakākṛtakatvādanityanityatvāvalambicaturavayavaḥ pratijñāhetuvyākhyāvikalpaḥ .
asyāpi nayasya bhedaprādhānye'nvayābhāva upasarjanatvād bhedasyāpi tadavinābhāvino'bhāvo
gaganodumbarakusumavat sāmānya-viśeṣayoranyatarobhayapradhānopasarjanapakṣavikalpānāmatyantābhāvābhimukhānāṃ
tyāgādagnīndhanavat tattvānyatvobhayāsattā'vaktavyatā śreyasīti niyamanayamatametat .
etadapi matam 'avaktavyam iti vaktavyatvānativṛtteḥ svavāgvirodhāderanirūpitavastusvatattvavādinaścāvāditvaprasaṅgād rūpa-rasādyatyantaviviktadeśabhinnaviśeṣasamudayamātraṃ vastviti niyamasya
vidhiḥ .
idamapi nayamatamaśobhanam, dravyabhavanavyāvṛttau pratijñātāyāṃ ko'trābhedabhāvo nāma samudāyiyī ? saṃvṛtisamudāyināmutpāda-vināśavyatiriktasvarūpābhāvādabhāvatvāpatteḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe'tyantabhinnarūpādyasādhāraṇānirdeśyaparamārthatvād vastuna iti niyamo vidhīyate niyamyate ceti niyamobhayanayamatam .
asyāpi nayamatasyāsādhutā, kṣaṇo'syāstīti kṣaṇika iti śabdavyutpattau ṭhanpratyaya-ṣaṣṭhyarthābhyāṃ
sahabhāvibhāvābhyupagamādanirvahanīyatvādabhāvaparamārthavastutvādasiddhyādibhyaḥ śūnyatvameva vastuna iti .
eteṣu caturṣu niyama-niyamavidhyādiṣu kṛtakatvādanitya iti hetu-pratijñāvyākhyāvikalpaḥ, sarvatra
vyākhyātārthaghaṭavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ . eṣa sarvārthapiṇḍanenaikaḥ sādhanaprayogaḥ sahavyākhyānadikpradarśanena
kṛtaḥ .


evaṃ sarvaprabhedeṣvapi . syādekaḥ syādekānekaḥ syādanekaḥ, syāt kāraṇaṃ syāt kāraṇakārye syāt kāryam, syāt sarvagataṃ syāt sarvagatāsarvagataṃ syādasarvagatam, vidhi-vidhiniyamaniyamasvabhāvatvāt vidhyādidvādaśātmakatvāt, ghaṭavaditi bhāvitameva nayacakraśāstreṇānena .

syāt kāraṇaṃ, syāt kāraṇakārye, syāt kāryameveti . tathā syāt sarvagataṃ, syāt sarvagatāsarvagataṃ,

niyamagrahaṇena niyamavikalpāścatvāraḥ, vidhiśca vidhiniyamau ca niyamaśca vidhi-vidhiniyama-niyamā
iti vigrahāt, tadvyaktyarthamāha --vidhyādidvādaśātmakatvāditi, ghaṭavaditi dṛṣṭāntaḥ, bhāvitameveti

eṣo'rtho bhāvita evātītasamastanayacakraśāstreṇa .
artho'bhidheyo yasya ghaṭa-bhavatyādeḥ padasya saṃgṛhītānekabhedānekāntātmakaḥ, tena sahāvyabhicāriṇāṃ
